) qui l’engagent à protéger et à promouvoir la diversité culturelle et le droit de chaque citoyen à s’épanouir dans sa langue et dans sa culture , les mesures fondamentales suivantes s’imposent : - l’officialisation de toutes nos langues nationales en vue d’en faire des langues d’enseignement , d’administration , de communication , d’économie et de promotion sociale , en un mot leur permettre d’investir tous les domaines de la vie nationale .

Aamadu Jool a yahii nde " yontaani " a woppidii min e yeeweede , ngoppu ɗa caggal ma jinnaaɓe ɓe korsa mu’en e ma humpaani , miñiraaɓe , sehilaaɓe e cuddiiɗo kam e suka baggo mo diwaani , hay aayaawo ma haaraani .
Aamadu Jool kañum e wonde suka ko noon kadi wayi wonde neɗɗo teddinɗo diine mum , kala ko omo golloo so tawii waktu yontii , o woppat , o salligoo , o juula nde o fuɗɗoo ruttaade e golle makko .
Aamadu Jool ko neɗɗo heewɗo njurum ndeeraagu , jiɗɗo mo woni kala , mo siicaani hay go’to wonii ko Haalpulaar en , Jolfuɓe , Safalɓe e raneeɓe ; garɗo e makko fof wiyata ko kañum tan woni sehil makko , Allah e makko yaajde fiɗtaandu e laaɓde yeeso .
Aamadu Maalik Gay , kala fiɓnde , pellital e kiram waawnoo joganaade Pulaar ne , nde o yahi ndee , santar o ene waawnoo artude he juuɗe woɗɓe ɓe ngonaa enen , ndeen hay innde Makko ene waawno waasde innitireede santar o .
Aamadu Muusaa Bah , ko ɗuum woni innde makko tigiri , haysinno omo nootoroo kadi he innde Mamma , jibinaa ko to leegal Madiina Gunaas he nder falnde geejawaay , diiwal Ndakaaru laamorgo leydi Senegaal .
Aamadu Siley Mbooc mo jamɗe-mbaawaa ko neɗɗo joom geɗal .
Aamadu Tijjaan Baal , gonnooɗo hooreejo HAPA e oon sahaa , gardinooɗo ataliyee o , roŋki tonngude golle ɗe , sibu alaa ɗo hawraa .
Aamadu Tumaani Tuure nana moolii hannde Senegaal , e ndeenka laamɗo keso leydi ndii hono Makki Sal .
Aamadu Umar oo , firlitantnoo-mi winndannde Mbiɗo waawi wiyde hannde oo , ɗo njahrat-mi ɗo , wonaa wasaade , kono , ko noon woori , so tawii wiyaama , Kajjata Jallo ina waawi haalde pulaar , walla ina selli ɗemngal , ko F .
Aamadu ko ɓiy Sokna Bah , lollirɗo Bojel he nder magoji Demmba e Bojel walla nii gila e " Ceerno Demmba " mago ngo o waɗdu noo e Haadii Gaajo , addungo tuufeere mum walla nii mbiyen mahngo ɓalal timmungal e ɓamtaare mago he ɗemngal Pulaar .

Aawaja wiyi mo : mi roondantaako ma lekki kii so wonaa ñamminaa-mi beɗi mburu haa mi haara .
Abba Babti
Abbere nde o ñaami ndee , nde naatnoo reedu makko tan , tenngaade makko laamu ndee weɗii , ummii e hoore makko , kala ko o tottiranoo ngam laamu nguu ɗum ummii e makko .
Abdaraamaani Siisee
Abdarahmaan Saalif wiyi Gellaay rewii aadi oo ko juuti , kono nde yahnoo haa ɓooyi , waɗti saltaade .

Abdul Bookar joganii ɓe hurum , waawi fooɗtude ɓe , kamɓe fof , e hare mum e tuubakooɓe Farayse .
Abdul Bookar ko ɓiy Bookar Aali Dunndu Segele , ko o taanum Aali Segele , hono gooto e jaagorɗe Fuuta , e yonta Almaami Abdul Kadeer .
Abdul Bookar noddee e innde laamɗo Boosoya e Ngenaar ara Farmbaal juulde noddee e innde mum ara .

Abdullaay Wad .
Abdullaay Wad hollitiino e oon sahaa heɓaare mum neldude toon konu mum , hay so tawii noon ballal makko e folluɓe laamu Siidi wul Sheek Abdallaahi e Muritani kam e Militeeruuji Gine Konaakii ina maantini .
Abdullaay Wad sakkittoo ƴettude konngol .

Abdullaay Wadd ene fotnoo yeewtude ko faati e eɓɓo ɗoo e hitaande 2015 ko faati cellal ( Omd ) , Kono jaayndiyaŋkooɓe ndañaani naatde .

Adan , fayndaare ndee wonnoo ko janngin’de tuuburu en hesɓe ɓee holno mahortoo he Islaam , gila e ɓoornungal juulɗo haa e holno juuldetee walla holno dewe Allah goɗɗe ɗee ne ngollirte .
Adan ko nii waynoo , jooni wontii nii .
Adannde ndee foti joofde ko e hitaande 2025 , watindiinde ndee ko e ndeeɗoo hitaande 2023 joofata .
Addaannoo mo wartaade , ko añde koyeera e saltaade fenaande .
Addani miijo ngoo hawrande njuɓɓudi ndii fof ko caɗeele safaara ɓuri mawnude e nokku hee .
Addani mo rutteede ngal ɗo teddungal ko sabu makko wiyeede ko o moƴƴo o wonnoo tee alaa fof e laamɓe ɓe ɓe o waɗanaani fotde , hay sinno tawii ɗo o jaggiraa ko o mooliiɗo kono wonaa laamɗo leydi .
Addani mo wiyeede Nuuhu , ko o meeɗii hawrude e rawaandu ina waɗi gite nay ( 4 ) o wiyi : " kooni ko nduu rawaandu boni no wayi " .
Addani ɓe sosde mo ko " haala Eli mbattindiika kaa " .
Addani ɓe suɓeede ko darnde maɓɓe e yiɗde maɓɓe golle ɗee .
Addata ɗum ko caragol ɗemngal ngal .
Addi en ɗoo hannde ko ko faati e ñeeñal .
Addi haala ko WhatsApp wiyi ine hesɗitina sarɗiiji kuutoragol mum .
Addi koloñaal farayse to Mali tawo , ko hollude " doole mum " e daranaade ko ndi sikki foti " wonde donngal tuubaako " .
Addi ndeen innde noon ko kala ɓiɗɗo mo laamɗo oo meeɗi dañde , ruttoto ko adii nde innatee .
Addi ngal naamnal ko ko addi wolde Riisi-Ikren koo , yantude e haala Waladimiir Putin hooreejo leydi Riisi .
Addi ɗum ko golle mbaylaandi , faggudeeje walla teeruweeje ɗe neɗɗo waɗata , yantude e ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ngol o saabii .
Addi ɗum ko jom jimol en ngol ina njahdina e ko mbaɗata koo gaatuleeje goɗɗe nodduɗe jinneeji walla barooɗe ladde baklotooɗe e kaawisaaji goɗɗi koɗɗi e nder ladde walla e nder ndiyam .
Addi ɗum ko nde ɓe njahata , kamɓe tan ɗiɗo jiiduɓe yumma e baaba .

Aduna ena haawnii , ena jiiɓii , ena hulɓinii , so woodii ko Alla anndin maa e heen e kaawisaaji .
Aduna ko ko waylotoo , alaa-e-sago renndo waylodoo heen .
Aduna majje ko e ceeɓɗi e dunaaji , so wonaa rewriwal tewingal kaaɗtudi waawaa heen sorde .
Aduna nan bosa wonaa jamaanu kaaye kecce yimbe ngoni .

Afrik
Afrik , wonande heen leyɗeele ɗo Islaam yaaji sari ɗee , joom mum en nana njannga ɗemngal Arab maa won duuɓi ujununere , kono haa jooni hay faamu men he Islaam ene fenngiɗi .
Afrik , ɓe mbiyi , meeɗani ƴellitde hay pinal gootal walla njuɓɓudi renndoyankoori ndi ene hollira neɗɗo ɓaleejo ene waawnoo yuɓɓin’de renndo e laamaade hoore mum .
Afrik Bŋ Worgo-naaɓe ena mbeltii e kawral mum'en e Meksik sabu won diɗɗe goɗɗe ɗe ɓe kulatnoo hawrude !
Afrik Worgo , Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik , Ganaa , Niseer , Niiseriyaa , e Santar Afrik , ngarii kadi kollirii Pine mum en e dow nehdi e hakkilantaagal yiɗde ɓeydoraade heddiiɓe .
Afrik noon ene anndiraa won’de .
Afrik noon heɓii wune mawɗe e ngel kawgel sabu leydi Manndelaa hollii ngati alaa ɓurɓe ɗum'en waawde yuɓɓinde dille mawɗe bayɗe hono kawgel winndere fuku .
Afriknaaɓe noon , goram ene keewi wiyde " min njiɗaa oya too laamoo , min njiɗi ko oo gaa " .
Agogo woni hannde jontaaɗo e nder Ganaa .

Aguyaaji ndillii , sagataaɓe ngummee !

Alaa !
Alaa , en njeewtat tan .
Alaa , hay seeɗa ɗe ŋakkiranooka .
Alaa , ko sabu golle makko tiiɗde ɗe o waɗanta leñol Fulɓe ngam ɓamtude e hisnude ɗemngal Pulaa/Fulfulde haa daɗa e maayde e majjude , tawa ko rewrude he huutoraade binndol .
Alaa , ko to laamɗo njahat mi ngam yoɓnoyaade ñamaande joganiii mi ko ɓooyi .
Alaa , naamnii ko ganndal , heewde pelle ndee , so paandaale ɗee ngoɗɗondiraani bonaani , kono kam wonaa yimɓe tato fof mbaɗa fedde , haala kaa neh hina moƴƴi , kono yo wood heen wonɓe haalooɓe tawa ko ɓurɓe humpitaade , joganiiɓe ɗum ganndal ɓee , wooda heɗiiɓe , wooda kadi immaniiɓe siynude ko annduɓe ɓee kaalata koo , kono so yimɓe fof ngontii haalooɓe e fewjooɓe , tawa heɗotooɓe siinooɓe ngalaa , walla kaalɗo konngi ( konnguɗi ) Pulaar tati nannduɗi fof , inniree ngenndiyanke , leñol mahtortaake nih !
Alaa , yoga heen , mbaɗɗini e sukaaɓe ɓee ko janngirde ɗemɗe ɗe paamataa no moƴƴi , walla nii , ko ɓuri ɗuum bonde , janngirde ɗemɗe ɗe nganndaa .
Alaa , ɗum wonataa !
Alaa baawɗo farlinde e neɗɗo goppugol hakke mum e jeyi , so wonaa tawa ko e nafoore ndenndaandi , tawa kadi joom mum ina lomtinana ko yerondiri e ɗuum .
Alaa baawɗo yamireede yo mah , walla yo as fooraas walla rema , walla aawa leɗɗe e ɗiin nokkuuji hurum , so wonaa neɗɗo teelɗuɗo walla njuɓɓudi ( fedde ) ɓe ƴellitgol nokku oo jeyaa e ngoƴa mum en .

Alaa caɗeele kawraaɗe .
Alaa cuusɗo yeddude .
Alaa dey !
Alaa e hay nokku gooto e leyɗeele men ɗo Pulaar jogii ayaawo , rajo maŋngo ( kuumtinngo leyɗeele e diwannuji ) , jaaynde mawnde , malla jaaynde yaltoore kala ñalawma e ɗemngal Pulaar .
Alaa e sago , moni fof diine mum hormee .
Alaa e sago anndinee golle galle , ɗe semmbe mum hattani , tawo alaa rewam mbaɗtinoojam e cellal ɓanndu nduu .
Alaa e sago cukalel waawa ɗemɗe ɗiɗi ɗee kala , nde waawa ɓennude , sibu heen huunde e fannuuji njanngintee ko he Farayse ( Hiisiwal , Ɓalliwal , Guurɗiwal ) , feccere woɗnde ndee ( Daartol , Ganndal leydi , Falsafa ekn ) janngintee ko he Arab , he nder jaŋde hakkundeere ndee .
Alaa e sago cuusal huccande oo gagga jogee ngam laɓɓinde mo , ñaawoore waɗee mbele ndee toɓɓere ɓaleere sooftinnde jeytaare leydi men ine momtee hankadi .
Alaa e sago fedde nde ɓeyda kaalis , sabu njaru leydi Sebka e njaru leydi Tafrak Seyna potaani .
Alaa e sago fulɓe jeccitoo , mbadda gite ŋaas , gite nii e dow ñorgo no Umaar Tokosel Bah heewi wiyde .
Alaa e sago hujja danyee .
Alaa e sago jaŋde ndee waɗee he nder ɗemngal ko ɓuri heewde e sukaaɓe ɓee ɓuri waawde haalde e faamde ;
Alaa e sago kaaldigal hakkunde laamu e luutndere ko toɗɗii naamnde ɗee kala : ngootaagu ngenndi , faggudu men , demokaraasii men , jokkondire men jaltuɗe kam e jokkondiral hakkunde konu e e dawrugol .
Alaa e sago kadi njetten Jaaynde men AIDES-TV , sabu jaaynirɗe ɗe terɗe mumen njeyaa e kawgel ɗee fof , ko kayre tan woni dilliroore laylayti renndo .
Alaa e sago keɓtinen wonde , e goonga , ɗumɗoo fof ko feere ooyrude faggudu e renndo rewrude e leeltingol pinal moɓe ɓesngu jiimaaɗe ɗee , sabu kulol duumingol feccoyde e mum en laamu .
Alaa e sago ko maa mbaɗten hakkillaaji , no feewi .
Alaa e sago mbaylen jikkuuji men : kala to neɗɗo heɓi rufa mbalis , weddoo kuus , rufa ndiyam boru .
Alaa e sago ndañen no keblir-ɗen hay so yimɓe ɗiɗo maa tato ko faati e ɗuum , sibu ko gooto jogii ɗee geɗe kala e ooɗoo sahaa , tee , njahaten enen fof ko e haajaande Alla .
Alaa e sago ngopen " miin " , ngopen yiɗde ardaade tawa en filaaka , tawa en mbawanaa .
Alaa e sago noon wonda e dental e pellital Fuutaŋkooɓe fof , tawa ko e anniya ɓamtude diine Alla , tee wonda e muñal , sibu Alla wondi ko e muñɓe .
Alaa e sago noon wooda ɗo kuraaje njani , fuɗɗoree ɗoon , ko heddii rewa heen .
Alaa e sago o lomtinee ko ɓuri yaaccaade mbele jotondiral hakkunde amen e ANAIR ina moƴƴita .
Alaa e sago sukaaɓe men keblee he ɗuum mbele ine naftoroo fartaŋŋeeji keewɗi coomiiɗi heen .
Alaa e sago waya noon sibu sukaaɓe njiyaani nafoore janngude : hay so a janngaani ko a paasoowo walla keɓoowo berke , a tampintaa hoore maa janngude !
Alaa e sago yimɓe tiiɗnoo , sibu to caggal too ine waɗi golle .
Alaa e sago ɓe ekkoo miijaade e faamde no hakkille gollortee , ɓe ngoowaa dallinde " .
Alaa e sago ɗanniyankooɓe ɓee e heddiiɓe e gure ɗee ndokkondira juuɗe ngam faabaade ɓesnguuji ɗii woto ɗi kawkude walla laataade dunuuje .
Alaa fiɗannde fotnde yoɓireede warngo .
Alaa fof caɗeele ngoodi hakkunde ɗee leyɗe " .
Alaa fof jokkondiral kadi waɗdaa e mooliiɓe to Mali .
Alaa fof ko boni ko haalaaka e makko nder kaalanɗe e jeewte laaminooɓe " .
Alaa fof ko darii cot ɗo gootel .
Alaa fof ko laamu nguu ñawndi e caɗeele leyɗeele ndema keɓtanooɗe , tottaa woɗɓe .
Alaa fof ko o waɗaani mbele omo hoomta Kunta en , haɓdiiɓe Idawaysh ko ɓooyi : gila nde ɓeen ndiiwi ɓe Tagante , nduppi wuro maɓɓe ( 1885 ) .
Alaa fof ko woni heen goonga tigi rigi , ( tigtigi ) , alaa fof ko woni heen goonga mo yeddotaako , timmuɗo mo alaa to fawii .
Alaa fof kuulal ngal COP 27 ƴetti , jaawnowal kaɓgol he kawjugol kilimaa sabu nanondiral paatungal he yakawere ɓarakorde .
Alaa fof majjuɗo darnde e nafoore golle maɓɓe , kanko e naalankooɓe woɗɓe : ɓe njettinii pinal fulɓe ɗo henndu poofaali mum en waawaa heɓde .
Alaa fof no faamortoo so wonaa to bannge pooɗondiral leyɗe ɗiɗi he nder diiwaan oo , ngootiri heen fof ine ndaara ɓurde ngoɗndi ndii doolnude .
Alaa fof no laamu Apartaayd waɗaani ngam naatnude hakkunde maɓɓe sikkeeji , rewrude e nan-nanti bonɗi ɗi ɓe takkata Winii , kono , yimɓe fof ina njenanaa ko keñje gaño .
Alaa fof to Njerebi yahaano .
Alaa fof to o yettoyaaki , o yahi haa leydi Farayse , e ballal e woon e Tuubakooɓe " awokaaji " ( avocats ) .
Alaa geɗe kaantare walla e biyaate bonɗe , ɗe o hollaaka , gila e haala haa e baɗe , ngam hulɓinde mo walla yamminde mo mbele omo woppa ko o yahata koo .
Alaa heen fof ko waawi wonde hujja nanniiɗo .
Alaa hinnde hesere feeñi , fellitnde , waawnde ardaade ardaade dartagol jibinannde Muritani ngam haɓtaade koloñaal en .
Alaa kay , wonaa aɓe majji ɓaleeɓe ngañaani aarabeere , kono aɓe njenanaa nde wonaano waawnere nde ɓe ɓuraani hay gooto waawde arabeere .
Alaa keddiiɗo mo haalaani .
Alaa ko Farayse woppi he Afrik so wonaa daasol juutngol conndi e ƴiiƴam .
Alaa ko addani almuɓɓe leefde so wonaa waasde faamde ɗemngal njanngnirtee ngal .
Alaa ko artiri
Alaa ko bojji nafata , alaa ko jaleeɗe ɓamtata .
Alaa ko haali , ngartam njibinteeɗam heen ɗam .
Alaa ko haali noon yiyde hooreejo leydi Senegaal e nder reedu Fuuta ene wertanaa " tapis rouge " gardeeɓe ene taarii ɗum no dariiɗo galle laamorɗo ni , ene hucciti e Senegaalnaaɓe ene haalda e mum en e Pulaar , ma mbiyaa laamu Senegaal koko eggi ene artiraa he Fuuta .
Alaa ko haawnii heen sibu o anndondirii e Mandelaa gila e kitaale 1940 .
Alaa ko haɗata noon nde tawnoo o muynu .
Alaa ko heddii so wonaa golle puɗɗoo .
Alaa ko jinnaaɗo mum yiɗi waɗee hay so tawii ko barɗo hoore .
Alaa ko kon ngoppi e makko so wonaa ɓernde nde .
Alaa ko oo faɗtirta Abdul Bookar huunde fof ko omo gayna o gaynat tan .

Alaa ko waawi dartinde darnde meeɗen so wonaa Alla heɓta woŋki ko e luɓi-mi kii .
Alaa ko waawi dartin’de ɓe .
Alaa ko waylii e mayre hay baɗte !
Alaa ko ɓuri haawnaade pompiyee adda siterna mo alaa hay waadere , kadi dogana ñifde jayngol .
Alaa kombaaw-ɗen waɗde hankadi ngam falaade ɗuum .
Alaa mbo humpi ɗemɗe men ina mbaawi janngireede ganndiwal , ɗemɗe men ina ndoondii kala fannu mo ɗemngal Aarabeere roondii hannde , kono ko kala huunde en kaandaani , so wonaa jiimeede e yaɓɓeede .
Alaa mo ene fewja ko yaltini mo e caɗeele ɗee , saka noon daroo heen .
Alaa mo o yahdi so wonaa Koolaaɗo kuuɓal guwarnama kam e jaggal toowngal nokku kalfinaaɗo jojjanɗe aadee .
Alaa ne kay mo renndata suudu so wonaa ɗowtiiɗo , jebbiliiɗo , mo alaa ko heddorii e kelmeendi mum so wonaa " Eey " .
Alaa oon so wonaa biynooɗo ma ko oya woni gaño maa oo .
Alaa puurɗo , alaa purguɗo , alaa kadi puujiiɗo saka yantinee e bolol .
Alaa safaara koronaa keɓtinaaɗo woodi tawo .
Alaa tawo ko yiytaa ko ɓuri annoore yaawde .
Alaa toon ne so wonaa e yimɓe woowɓe waɗde geɗe jaasɗe .

Alaa ɗo o waajaaka , ɗo o wasiyaaka yoo yaltir laamu damal faayiida e kellifaagu .
Alaa ɗo tawataa e duunde aduna he ɗo pullo naati e diine goɗɗo ko wonaa diine lislaam .

Alaseri e oon sahaa ƴaañii no doole mum potirnoo S .
Alaseri suuyniri mette mum ko haɗtude abiyoŋaaji leydi Farayse ( teeŋti noon e abiyoŋaaji larme tiindiiɗi Mali ) weeyde e dow leydi mum .

Aleksi Nawalni ene yahratnoo he duuɓi 47 .
Alfaa Moolo ardinoo ndee wolde salaare njiimaandi e ɓiɗtere .
Alfaa Moolo e harbiyaŋkooɓe mum puɗɗii hirjinde yimɓe , ɓe tawtoraa kareeli pamari ɗi Almameeɓe Fuuta Jaloŋ ummaninoo feewde e Mandiŋkooɓe .
Alfaa Moolo renndini hoohooɓe Fulɓe fof kam e waañooɓe nder wuro Ndorma , sara wuro makko Sulabali .
Alfaa wiyi wonde felluɓe ɓee njiylotonoo ko warde ɗum .

Alhajji Maalik Sih jeyaa kadi ko e adiiɓe waɗde mowluuda e nder leyɗeele Hirnaange Afrik .
Alhajji Maamuudu ko gabbotooɗo fulɓe haa he nder ladde to seernaaɓe njettaaki oon sahaa , won heen ni tawi keɓaano naatde diine lislaam , o tuubni ɗumen , wonande kabaruuji ɗi keɓ-mi he taniraaɓe ɓeen fulɓe .

Alla
Alla adii wallirde dingiral ngal fof ko to bannge mikoroo .
Alla anndi no nde fotnoo hade mayre sumde !
Alla anndi no ɓe njogori ñaawirde mo e hol kuugal ɓe pawata e makko .
Alla dee anndi ko arooɓe ngaddata , kono ɓee ardiiɓe nguu Goomu hannde kam kollirii ko haalatenoo he ngel kawgel koo .
Alla dee anndi kono ameriknaaɓe won ko puɗɗii haalde heen caggal nde ɓe ɓe caakti sirruuji Ben Laaden caggal nde ɓe mbari ɗum e hitaande 2011 to Pakistaan .

Alla e aduna o mawnude , e ngoɗɗeeki , heen deente pamɗitat haa laatoo no diidel tokosel nih , walla ni , no toɓɓere nih .
Alla e aduna o mawnude , e ngoɗɗeeki , heen deente pamɗitat haa laatoo no diidel tokosel nii , walla nii , no toɓɓere nii .
Alla e caɗeele ɗe heewde miin ko hikka waɗti cili tati ko mboɗo luppa bakkaaloriyaa , miñi am gorko o , kañum woppii jaŋde sabu doole ngalaa .
Alla e golle aamen , min diwtinaama duɗal , min ngummiinaama kalaas les faade mo dow , tawa ko mo wuuri min poɗnoo yaade toon .
Alla e jamaanu nguu heewde , gori ndonkaa ko darneede .

Alla fawi e dow hoore makko kadi laafa mbayka no tenngaade nii .
Alla fawii e mo koorka makko , e nder heen damuɗe Aljanna udditte , ko heen kadi damuɗe jeyli uddee , ko ndeen seyɗaneeji tongetee , ina heen jamma ɓurɗo ujunere lewru , oon mo hormii ɗum , yo anndu hormaama .
Alla hoddiraani o waɗa ngeel kawgel sabu woon tonngi .
Alla ine rokkunoo mo kattanɗe weytinde yimɓe .
Alla jaaraama on njaaraama gooto e mon fof innde mum e yettoode mum .
Alla jaraama , sukaaɓe aamen ngollii .
Alla jaɓi ñaagunde makko , o jibini ɓiɗɗo gorko .
Alla jippinii heen kadi simoore timmunde , Ko ndeen woni simoore Nuuhu .
Alla ko moƴƴo , alaa ko ɗum bonni , kono annduɓe ɓeydiima faayde , sibu so tawiino ko haayre ɓurnde mawnude , ina waawnoo bonnude e waɗande aadee en tanaaji keewɗi .
Alla loowi e nder makko teemedde tati e capanɗe jeegom ɗaɗol e teemedde ɗiɗi e capanɗe tergal , e sappo e ɗiɗi jokkorde , e nder hoore ndee ina heen palanteeji jeeɗiɗi , o waɗani mo juuɗe ɗiɗi e koyɗe ɗiɗi e ko wonaa ɗeen geɗe tan .
Alla ne kadi , yiɗiri goofi maɓɓe ɗii ko ngam wallude Ibliis .
Alla neli mo feewde e winndere ngam e oon yonta yimɓe nattii anndude Alla ina woodi , kadi yimɓe mbatɗii ñaawreede majjere ; ngam alaa ko nganndi hay huunde so wonaa rewde sanamuuji .
Alla noon anndi nguurndam , tagi nguurndam ; ko Alla tagɗo tagopeeje ɗe ko kanko tan anndi ko woni e majje tigirigi .
Alla resi en reeni en haa ndunngu toɓi , gese njabbaama , ngaawaama , puɗii , heddii ko demal .
Alla rokki en fartaŋŋe , e oon dumunna , yimɓe men ( Aysata Laam e Aamadu Umar Bah ) , kawri e ameriknaaɓe to njahnoo misiyoŋ , kolliti ɗum en eɗen njiɗi mo mo ngollodi-ɗen Ɓe ngari ɗoo , ɓe njahdaa to ngesa too , ɓe njiyi ɗum , ɓe mbiyi aɓe njiɗi gollaade ngesa baa .

Alla rokkiino mo kadi ɓesngu keewngu timmungu .

Alla woni seede .
Alla yaltinii gooto e tagoore mum e maayo he , debbojuutɗo jubbi , heewɗo jubbi , mo wonaa boɗeejo , ko o ɓaleejo , ko o daɓɓo , omo heddii ɓalndu mehru , o feeñanii mo haa e enɗi hee Caggal nde ɓe ngasni janngude , ɓe njiytondiri , ɓe njokki laawol maɓɓe .

Almuudo Moodi Saahal kuɓɓunooɗo duɗal diine ha almudɓe gure saraaji njaaɓi he makko .
Almuudo Ngay ( alaa teew alaa xiixam ; lappotaapo woppotaako )
Almuudo kala maa sañan hoore mum humpito jaŋde heeriingo , e ballal keɓe keewɗe ɗe waawi huutoraade ( e-learning , binndanɗe , golle goomuuji , jaŋde he ɓoggol ) jahduɗe he tolno mum , e kattanɗe mum , kam e ko yiɗi naftoraade ko janngata koo .
Almuudo o waawa heɓde seedanfaagu mum duɗe hakkundeeje tawa waawani ɗemɗe maɓɓe tati ɗee kala , woni Faransinkoore , Almaare e Liksammbuurnaare .
Almuudo so yiɗii heɓde barke yoo teddin kala jiyaaɗo Allah mo yi’i , o wona memmbotooɗo , o waasa wonde almuudo cuɓotooɗo seernaaɓe ; mo o yi’i kala yo way ko oon woni ceerno makko ni , sabu aɗa sikka ko kaari woni ceerno ma , tawa wonaa , ko mo a sikkaani o .
Almuɓɓe , gila naati ekkol haa njettoo bakkaa , koko paasata tan .
Almuɓɓe Aali njaɓɓorii ɓe conndi e kure , ɓe ndogi ɓe ngarti .

Amerik , Danmark ) .
Amerik e Israayiimbelaaka ɗum .
Amerik e Orop fof noon mbeltaaki , ina kuli nii , ko Siin wiyata ina yaajtina jokkondire mum politik e faggudu ko .
Amerik ina yooɓtorii Siin waasde nuunɗude to bannge njulaagu , takki ɗum ñukkindaade e honde atampirisaaji kesamkesaagu , ngam daɗtaade ɗum en ɗoo e duuɓi .
Amerik noon , wiyi woni ko e haɓde e waɗooɓe tarafik dorog kam e geriyaa mo Wenusuelaa wammbi walla nii ɗuhi .
Amerik waranaama toon fotde 2 500 koninke , feriima heen fotde 2 313 miliyaar dolaar , e tuugnaade e won ɗiin hiisaaji .
Amerik yowii piye mum e fedde hee , sabu mum mettinde ɗuum .
Ameriknaajo gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 42 , ina wondunoo , gila saawiyee
Ameriknaajo gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 42 , ina wondunoo , gila saawiyee 2018 , e rafi bonɗo , tampinnooɗo ɗum haa ɗoon waawi haaɗde : kala ko o memi , o sammintu ɗum e leydi , kala konngol ngol o fuɗɗii , o ronka joofnude ; o yahii haa o natti anndude , e koreeji makko ɓadiiɗi , hol heen maayɓe e hol heen wuurɓe .

Annduɓe ɓee ina kiisii wonde en ɓennii
Annduɓe ɓee ina kuli hoto ɗiin guubiliiji naange mbonnude geese yiite ( resoo kuuraa ) fotde lebbi walla kitaale wonande won ɗiin nokkuuji e Leydi men ndii .

Annduɓe ɓee ine keppi heɓde seedeeji ƴettaaɗi toon ɗii haa mbaawa yuurnaade ɗum en Sibu , hay sinno Perseverance ine jogii laboratuwaar tokooso gaddanoowo ɗum waɗde silooji garwaniiji , deegowel ngel waɗii heen ko waawnoo fof .
Annduɓe ɓee kiisiima : so degereeji ɗiɗi goɗɗi pawtiima e nguleeki weeyo ɗo yahratnoo ko adii mbaylaandi , ko 5 , 2% e kulle goodnooɗe ɗee nattata woodde .

Ardinoo batu nguu ko yarham mum Muhammed el Habiib Soh gonnooɗo Hooreejo Fedde ndee haa ñalnde heɓtinaa ndee , ƴettatnoo kuuɓal joɗnde ndee ko Yaayaa Mammadu Bah .
Ardinoo dental ngal ko Pr Yoro Jakitee , e " ɓosiyanke Sheek Umaar Siisoko , e daartiyanke Diriisa Jaitee , e ñaawoowo Haamiidu Jabatee e sanɗa ( ndeen ) Umaar Marikoo .
Ardinoo konu ngu ko mawɗo soofaaji Podoor .
Ardinoo nde ko biyetenooɗo Habiib wul Mahfuud ( yo Geno waɗ toon fooftorde makko ) e ballondiral Hinndu Mintu Ayniin , ( gonnooɗo jaagorɗo pinal e fitiram-gollaagu ) , Wul Umeer , Accee Alasan , Caam Mammadu , Koytaa Mullaay Ismaa’iila .
Ardinoo ngalɗoo kaaldigal ko Ablaase Woydarago ( Dental Afrik ) e Joaquim Chissano ( hooreejo kaaldigal ngal , neɗɗo SADC ) , e Edem Kodjo ( OIF ) e Cebile Daraame ( Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe ) ; fof ko yimɓe seedtanaaɓe nuunɗal

Au terme de cette période d’expérimentation de six ans , l’ILN a réalisé de remarquables travaux .
Aucune de ces réformes n’a tenu compte du caractère multiculturel du pays , aucune d’elles n’a répondu aux exigences d’indépendance , de développement et de démocratie , encore moins aux aspirations des populations dans leur ensemble .
Aujourd’hui , au regard de ces différents facteurs , de la Constitution du pays , des résultats de l’ex Institut des Langues Nationales , des textes et règlements internationaux ratifiés par la Mauritanie ( Déclaration universelle des droits de l’homme , Charte Africaine des droits de l’Homme et des Peuples , etc .

Avec ce livre , par devoir de mémoire , cette faille sera en partie couverte .

Aññeere ndee memtaaki nii .

Añɓe maggol yoo pelle .

Aɓe ceeka , aɓe ceeka , haa ɓe njettii ngel , ɓe tawi ko ɓe cikkatnoo ko cinndel koo , ko jalɓol teelngol .
Aɓe kaalaa haala ka mi meeɗaa nande : ka wonaa wolof , ka wonaa sooninke , ka wonaa Pulaar , ka wonaa Arab .
Aɓe keewi kadi yennude sagataaɓe , maa jiknaaɓe sunnotooɓe , e haaltooɓe golle maɓɓe .
Aɓe keɓtinnoo njiimaandi Putugeec , kono tan ɗum yuumtaani to bannge politik sibu e hitaande 1486 Purtugeec en mballii laamɗo Bemoin to Senegaal , kono oon liɓaa , waraa .
Aɓe kuutoroo kaɓirɗe bonɗe ( wutteeji-njamndi e kanuuji ) ɗi waawata
Aɓe mbaawi wonnde toon dumunna juutɗo ( yontere fayi dow ) .
Aɓe mbaɗa " golle kaantare " , geɗe " baylooje mbaydi leñol Aarabeeɓe e diine Islaam " .
Aɓe nganniyii kadi neldude toon Chang’e-5 e hitaande 2019 .
Aɓe njeyaa e daraninooɓe laŋ mahngo neɗɗaagu politik leydi men , gila noon e woote depiteeji gadane Farayse wonande nokkuuji gaɗa-maayo geec ɗii , e hitaande 1946 haa yettii referaandoom wellitaare , haa yettii termondire baɗdanooɗe e Farayse ngam jeytaare leydi ndii .
Aɓe njogii fedde nde ɓe inniri Dental Jagge Muritaninaaje gonɗe caggal leydi ( Collectif des Cadres Mauritaniens Expatriés ) .
Aɓe njogii hooreejo leydi kono ko to teddungal tan .
Aɓe njogii mawɗo gardiiɗo raddo ngo , ina wonndi e humre mum ngam faddinnde ɓe .
Aɓe poti toɗɗaade gardotooɗo yolnde nde kam e gardiiɗo hilifaaɓe yantude e terɗe guwarnama keddiiɗe ɗe .
Aɓe poti yuɓɓude , ɓe cosa pelle jiknaaɓe , ɓe mballondira e ardinaaɓe janngirɗe ɗee , ɓe ndaroo ngam heɓde jannginooɓe yonɓe , waɗooɓe golle mum en , kono kadi , kala mo janngintaa ɓe ngullitoo haa ittee he nokku maɓɓe , ɓe caloo paasnude kala mo haandaani heen .
Aɓe tolnoo e ujunnaaje 10 haa 12 ujunere neɗɗo .

BON RETOUR
Ba joofnu tan , tal nanaa , lella yani faɗɗii .
Ba woni e murde jaaɓe .
Baaa Maal addii heen ballalal mum mawngal ; kaɓirɗe keewɗe faayiida laaɓtuɗe sawta kanko fo e heewde haajuuji o yaɓɓii koyɗe makko kank o e diɗɗal makko Daande leñol ngol ena jeyaa e maɓɓe Mansuur Sek moƴƴo peewɗo newiiɗo kam e Abuu Paam jokkowoo enɗam ; Taala Fay juŋngo ñaamo Baaba Maal ; ɓinngel neene makko ena jogii mesal mum ena ñoota hakkunde Daande Leñol e renndo ngo haa teeŋti noon e renndo Haalpulaar e ko taarii ɗum ; dimo gannduɗo ko Allah waɗi hakkunde Seereer e Haal pulaar walla Pullo ; Cehilaagal so juutii Alla ena welaa kono goonga ena tawaa ko goonga tigirirgi woni hakkunde maɓɓe yo Allah juutnu haa juuta ; Ɗownoo seto ngo ko Umar waddo gardiiɗo Daande Leñol ngol darnde makko tinaama heen teskaama heen no feewi sanne .
Baaba Baydi Maal darnde makko wonaa tan e njimri tan walla tan pinal alaa o ɓennii ɗoon mo yeddi yo yah Fuuta gila e nokkuuji cafrirɗi haa e janngirɗi haa e taariindi ; waylaare wul ɓuuɓdi ( climat ) o haaliino heen maa won jooni ko ɓuri duuɓi sappo .

Baaba Muusa e Njole pewjani laawol Ndakaaru .
Baaba Muusa kadi ina hokkatnoomo ayeeji .
Baaba Muusa ko kilifa gooto koɗnooɗo to Sanndeen to Siin .
Baaba Muusa wi' i : " Kala poftiiɗo hannde , meeɗi tampude Cerno jël na abiyoŋ Nde Ceerno jibina nde , hol ko ɓe miiji waɗde ngam o juuta balɗe ?

Bah
Bah ( jooma deftere mawnde inneteende : Fulɓe Presence in Sierra Leone ) holliino gila law wonde : " Wonaa hay fedde wootere jeyi Fulɓe " , Fulɓe hitanto fedde nde ɓe yiɗi fow , yo taw non hooreeɓe nden fedde yoolataa fotdeeji leñol ngol , jogaade Fulɓe e fedde kaariire tan yonataa yo Fulɓe hitano nde , ko maa Fulɓe wonɓe e nden fedde kame kala jagge nden fedde , no haani daranaade leñol ngol e fotdeeji mum .
Bah , jantaande dow nde Ko men anndi tun , woni Fulɓe no tawaa walla tawaaka e laamu hesu aroowu ngu , laamu-woo-laamu , gooto kala yo anndu leñol ngol daɗii yoolaade e nder leydi Sira Liyon , lutta non , si tawii Fulɓe luttuɓe ɓe hoɗɓe e leyɗeeele goo , hino goongini ɗum malla ɓe goonginaali , ngam hino heewi ka men yeddotirata e Fulɓe musidɓe amen ɓe , e goodal Fulɓe e nder leydi Sira Liyon .
Bah Aadama Sammba fulve asie
Bah nanngaa o sokoyaa to Camp Boiro ( wiyetenoo ko : Camp de Camayenne ) .
Bah yalti he 1966 , o faytiraa duɗal polytechnique ngal Kankan yo o jannginoy toon .
Bakteri kam safaara mum ina woodaa sabu antibiotikaaji ( antibiotiques ) ina haɓoo ɗum .
Balla Jeerel wonaa cubballo kono ko kañum wari Gumaalo , wardi ɗum cefi ɗo subalɓe ndonki .
Balla arnoo ko jiggoore kono hootii rimɗaani , sabu jaaltaaɓe renndinii ɗum e ngabu ɗeɓi yoolde ɗum , dogi woppi comci mum e yeeso Kummba e yumma mum .
Balla en ine ñaama gundo .
Balla ko ceɗɗo , tee ko ceɗɗo jeeri .
Ballal Baaba Maal e gaaci ( score/soundtrack ) Black Panther waawde heɓde njeenaaje keewɗe ko huunde nde alaa jeddi .
Ballal garwaniiwal woni so neɗɗo waɗanaa-ma huunde yo o naftoro .
Ballal na ɗoo ndeke , to bannge politik e konu fof .
Ballifanɗe maɓɓe ene njogii rewam mawɗam he joljole patamlame baɗnooɗe he gasirɗe teemedannde 18ɓre , ko wayno declaration of Independence 1776 , gonɗo sabaabu jibineede Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik , e Rewolison mo Farayse 1789 -1794 , gonɗo sabaabu ɗoofgol toon laamuuji ndonu sompi laamu Republique .
Ballondiral ina moƴƴi , ina yooɗi .
Balɗe garooje , maa laaɓ .
Balɗe jeeɗiɗi janaysa taƴaama ngam ruttude-mo hurum e teddungal .
Balɗe nay tan ko 8 marse mawninanoo .
Balɗe seeɗa keddii hade lofu ngadanu laamuyaŋkooje ɗee fuɗɗade ,
Balɗe seeɗe ko adii ɗuum yiyaama kanko Bello Boɗeejo e terɗe Fedde makko yantude e yimɓe laamu Nijerya , e ɓe njuɓɓini kawtal mawngal e ɓe kollira ɓaargol ɓeen sukaaɓe heblaaɓe mbele maa mbaaw reende Fulɓe aynaaɓe e jawɗeele mum en he nder dawla Nasrawa .
Balɗe tati caggal mum , oo ɗanniyanke mawɗo waɗi ɗanngal mawngal , cakkital ngal artetaake , ñalnde 4 lewru siilo 1978 , ena yahra e duuɓi capanɗe jeeɗiɗi e tati .
Balɗe tati tan caggal laamu kesu ndarnaangu , Me Abdullaay Wade nani saatoo doggol Suleymaani Ndeene Njaay .
Balɗe ɗiɗi caggaɗuum , maalde leyɗe hirnaange , e gardagoFarayse , wondude e ballateeŋtungaAmerik , udditi jaynge e konu Kaddaafi ; nguu njangu woni ɗiɗmu to bannge doole , caggawolde liɓnoonde laamɗo jartodinɗo biyeteeɗo Saddaam Huseyn to Irak .
Bamako " riiwtii oo daliilu mo gooto e leyɗe Saahal nde wiyi sabaabu oo ko ngonka dawrugol e ndeenka leydi ndi , ɗum fof ko yiɗde salaade Mali ardoo " .
Bamako maa Mooɓti ɓurnoo ɓadaade .
Bamako tuumii G5-Saahal ɓelsude jeytaare mum , leyɗe baɗtaaɗe kuutorɗe e jogaade njuɓɓudi ndi laaɓaani .
Banke Winndere duuftanii Meksik hakke 25 miliyaar dolaar ngam tambitaade-ɓe e hare surde ñawu nguu waasa yaajde .
Banke moñnjaal tawtude ko heewɓe ( haralleeɓe jangde , Unesco ekn ) kaalata gila leyɗe men ndimɗaani tawo .
Banke winndereejo ine foti gollodaade e leyɗe gollodiiɗe kam e gollodiiɓe ɓamtaare ngam sosde e feccondirde ngaluuji tawa kadi ine daranii wallitde kattanɗe janngingol potndowol , ngol faayiida dowrowo , ɗe politikaaji juɓɓuɗi Ɗemngal Jaŋde rokkata .
Banndiraagel dewelngel ngelne lelii haa weetndoogo , o siftori wonde alaa ko Saada meeɗiɗum naaɓndaade haa o jaɓi : ko hannde nde famɗeende makko gacce haaɗata !
Banndiraaɓe , ko ɗoo njiɗ-mi juutnaade seeɗa , haa njiyen hol no Gellaay sañirta jimol , ngannden ƴiye gonɗe heen e mbaadi ndi o rokkata konnguɗi makko so tawii omo sifoo won ɗeen geɗe .
Banndiraaɓe , miijanteeje ngootam-pineeje tuƴƴinii jaatiiji renndo men , ɓooyngo hormaade heewandere pine mum .
Banndiraaɓe , ɗum ko sinamaa .
Banndiraaɓe Allah yiɗaa ko ɓurti , sabu ina anndaa laana Joolaa waɗiraa ko jaɓɓaade teemedde njeyo e capanɗe njeetato neɗɗo ( 580 ) , so ɓurnaama ɗoon ina laaɓi joofle ɗe njibinta ko hono nde ɗo boomaare fiynde leydi fof .
Banndiraaɓe fukɓe kala ena noddaa yoo ngar e keewal maninde ñalɗi ɗii .
Banndiraaɓe fulɓe , dente , pelle , jaŋngooɓe e jaŋnginooɓe onon kala eeraango ena fayi e mon ngam waɗtude hakkillaaji mon e sukaaɓe daraniiɓe rap e ɗemngal men sabu ko kamɓe keedti e yontannde hannde , yontaaɓe jaŋngo !
Banndiraaɓe juulɓe heewɓe ina nganndi mo ɗo e wuro ngo sabu en mbaɗdii e makko jeewte keewɗe ɗo e Rajo Top Bendje e lewru Koorka 2009 ko fa’ti e cellugol koorka .
Banndiraaɓe makko ina mbaɗa yah-ngartaa e nder galle hee , ina duwanoo mo .
Banndiraaɓe nganndinaa wonde duɗe pulaar koko ngudditta .
Banndiraaɓe woɗɗuɓe e ɓadiiɓe fof nootorii no yooɗiri .
Bannge e makki ko jammbel-ƴiiwoonde liɓi ɗum .
Bannge goɗɗo e galle oo nani ara e yannde .
Bannge hirnaange leydi ndii , woɗɗaani keerol Nijeer .
Bannge keddinooɗo e fooɓre ndee ko jumatnooɓe ñaaku , nduppi .
Bannge njaggirɗen hirnaange o , ko oon bannge naange fuɗirta to tagofeere " hoodere Jaayre " ( Wenus ) .
Bannge tuubakooɓe e wondiiɓe mum hay gooto heɓaani hay dara .
Bannge ñaamo SRL ine juuroo dow Mbaañ ine rimndi deegowel potngel heɓoyde seedeeji ƴettanooɗi ɗii ( hakkunde ) kam e fiiseeyel potngel artirde seedeeji ɗii dow , to laawol jirlol Mbaañ .
Barak Obaama woni ko ɗaɓɓude wonde ɓaleejo gadano meeɗɗo toɗɗeede e hoore Dowlaaji Dennduɗi Amerik .
Barakna en mbaɗti heɓde 2 000 sollewol hitaande kala .
Barakna en pooli .
Barke Alla maa mi suutoo .
Barlaade nde o defirta nde liggoraa ko kaŋŋe .
Barme bonɗe ko huunde nde kulle lakde ɓuri añde , sabu ko ɓuri heew e oon sahaa tawata ko waawanaa hoyre mum hay huunde .
Barooɓe Jakel jiimi ko e maayo Senegaal , bannge mum worgo , hakkunde wuro Waasetaake e Salnde Tebegut .
Barooɓe Jakel ko wuro diineyankoowo , ɓooydungo e diine .
Barooɓe Jakel wuro seeremɓe e waliyaaɓe duworteeɓe , duwotooɓe Alla jaaboo .
Barooɓe adii Pete hoɗde kono hankadi ngo lommbitiima , falnde ndee moɗii ngo , ngo jeytaama e nder Pete .
Baru Sal ena tunnga , Mammaa Gay ena cerkita , Baaba ena weddoo daande jamma , Fulɓe fof ɓerɗe mum'en nduri .
Baru ko demowo koɗɗo gurel Jibaa .
Baru taaɓi laayɗe hooti galle mum .
Baru turi , woni e woyde .
Baru weltii no feewi , heñii moofti wakannde ndee to juuɗe njottotaako .
Batte hare makko e tuubakooɓe , e luural makko e almameeɓe , ko wirnude jaagorɗe keddiiɓe ɗe .
Batte maajum dow mahngo dowla-ngenndi keso
Batte majjum tinaama haa e nokkuuji poottiiɗi fotde 350 000 km .
Batte mum ko ronkude heɓde kartal koɗaagu e wonde e ngonka ka rewaani laawol , ɗum noon ko waasde golle mum rewata heen , oon sahaa mo leyɗe Orop ngoni e kiris .
Batu Diisnondiral ko batu potngu jooɗaade hakkunde batuuji ɗiɗi mooɓondiral kala ( duuɓi ɗiɗi caggal batu mooɓondiral ) .
Batu ndenndinngu kumaandaŋ serkal Barakna e Tararsa e Gorgol , yantude e ardiiɓe taƴre Misriyya e Ɓoggee jooɗiima ñalnde 19 mee to Eeleega .
Batu nguu hawri ko e fitinaaji ɓesnguuji aarabeeɓe , ngu joofiri ko ɗamaawu nduu henndu maa yuumtu e aduna ɓurɗo nuunɗude e heewde njurum .
Batu nguu jooɗiima gila ñalnde 17-19 Siilo to ngalluure Nuwaksoot , laamorgo Muritani .
Batu nguu waɗi ko e hitaande 1768 e tawtoreede yimɓe woɗɓe , ɓe miijo ngoo hawrani , gila e jannguɓe haa e ɓe njanngaani .
Batu nguu waɗi ko he nder galle Muusaa Mammadu Bah , lollirɗo Muuse Bah , gootal e jaale pulaa , binnduɗo deftere heewnde faayiida nde tiitoonde mum woni Geelel Galo dañaani taɓɓe dañi yoolaare , cukko Hooreejo Catal FƁPM Nuwaadibu .
Batu nguu waɗii faayiida , seyyelnaaɓe nootitiima e keewal e teddungal e nehdi , sukaaɓe rewɓe e worɓe ngarii , e tawtoreede hoohooɓe mawɓe wuro ngoo .
Batuuji keewɗi ndaɗɗaama he nokkuuje ceertuɗe ngam rokkondirde kakkillaaji .
Bawɗi ɗii tunngii , rajo ngoo yeynii , yimɓe puɗɗiima yaltude .
Bayadmi kono mi wona funtanké ni !
Bayal Sammba Teen wiyi " ko pekaan semmbini cubalaagu " .
Baydi Kacceseeraano kadi e wiyde yimɓe ɓee wonde warde tuubaako jeyaa ko fellande diine , etee kala barɗo tuubaako ko aljanna fayi .
Baydinoddoyaa , ari .
Bayyinaango ngoo ko kelle ɗiɗi , heen hello ko aybinde Eli tan .
Bazum ina añi gañgu ngu suuɗaaki loppitooɓe laamu hono Caad e Gine e Burkina wonande jeyaaɗe he Afiriki Hirnaange .
Baŋ-yoo-baŋ yimɓe ina ngara e Emiir Tagante e Wulaad Buu Sbaa en yiɗde waɗdude e mum en tamannde wootere mbele ina kaɓtoo koloñaal en : wolde ummanaama .
Baŋke Winndere nelii haralleeɓe ngam beɗde njaajeendi bonannde ndee hade maɓɓe eɓɓude yaltinde kopporeeje fayde e Haytii .
Baŋnge e Palestiin heɓtaa , ɓe cosi heen Israa'el .
Baŋnge goɗɗo oo holi to defte ɗee ngoni , yo ɗe njiye ɗe njebbilanee renndo .
Baɗle goɗɗe ɗe laamu Abdullaahi Wadda huninoo ɗe fof hannde o , ɗen mbaawi wiyde ko ko ngonti deedi leliiɗi .
Baɗtande fof , ɗeen dente keewi ko feccaade .
Baɗte majjum , he lewru adanndu nduu , ko nguleeki weeyo maa usto ko ine tolnoo he 10°C ; ɗuum maa jibin jaangol ɓurtungol , ɓurngol ngol yonta horngilo ( période glaciaire ) kewnongol he Leydi men ndii .
Baɗte majjum : ustude nguleeki .
Baɗte mum e jaŋde sukaaɓe ɓee moƴƴaani , sibu jannginooɓe heewɓe paamaani ngol saka pammina sukaaɓe .
Baɗte mum ko ɓeydagol maayɗeele fotde 427 000 neɗɗo hitaande kala " .
Be mbiyi mo haddinaaka waawa jaggude hoore mum ; ndeen ne dey ndeysaan pijirlooji keewdi e fuuta di mbadaten di kaddungal ina wallita dum sabu rewbe ngonata tan ko yiilaade hoto welemma nanateedo o woni .
Be mbiynoon jom goonga duudotaako .
Be puɗɗii surde lajal maɓɓe ngam yiɗde yoo alluwal ngal haaɗ ɗoo !
Be ñaagii yamiroore suudu sarɗi , ɓe ndokkaa , ɓe njokki .
Beelel kaŋŋe ngel ko keɓtinagol ngol .
Beelinaaɓe ina waɗi fotde 240 fooyre , fooyre fof waawii heɓde : saak maaro , saak suukara , bidoŋ 20 .
Beer Caaka ( mo Haggaar ) adii laamaade ; kono Yerim Mbañik ( mo Teedyekk ) , mo tuubakooɓe mballi haa laamii , fooli Beer Caaka nde hare hakkunde maɓɓe juutoynoo .
Bees ko waccoore hormorde .
Bees senngo Misrata to Libiya ittani mo geɗal , ko ɗuum jibini ceeral UFDD mo Mahamat Nuuri e FACT mo Mahamat Mahdi .
Beetawe dabbunde , weeyo ina furɗi seeɗa henndu jaangol .
Belees Kompaawore mejaatoor Gine , yettii Jeneraal Seekubaa Konaate sabu darnde mum heeriinde fa'tunde e ci'nde alaa nanndo ciynugol nanondiral Wagadugu .
Bellitgol puɗɗanoongol e leydi men ndii yaawii hollude en wonde yonaani , tee teddeendi renndo e politik teppii ɗum , haa wonti ko woni hannde koo , so waasde wonde bellitgol .
Bempeƴƴe mwɗe towɗe kaaƴe gummii njanoyi e pokpokalam wonti saaƴaango mawngo .
Ben Aali e jom suudu mum Leylaa e galle esiraaɓe makko hono galle Tarabelsiinaaɓe , kam en fof hannde kulol ina hoɗii ɗum en .
Benee hootii
Bennu ine famɗi , hakkundol mum ko 500 meeteer fat , ƴeewaa haayre boomnoonde dinosooruuji ndee , hakkundol mum ko kiloomeeteruuji 10 .
Berbeer en ena njogii inɗe mum'en keeriiɗe .
Berbeer en jeyaaɓe Awdagost , wonnooɓe e njiimaandi laamu Ganaa , murti , caltii laamɗo Awdagost oo , mbari ɗum , lomtini ɗoon goɗɗo .
Beresiil noon ɓernde mum mettii hikka sibu ardunoo ko nawtude raay , ine ardi e fettooɓe ŋanaa , kono yalti ko he nayaɓal joofirde .
Berɗe Burkinaa puɗɗiima maayde Alla e Ganaanaaɓe uddude lajal mum'en !
Bey e baali ndilla jamma ƴeewaa so wuyɓe ngaraani ?
Beydi adoo Falde .
Beñuwaaruuji konngee , bawɗi cerkitee weltaare .
Biden e Cuuɗi sarɗi leydi ndii njaɓii yaltinde kaalis katojinaaɗo ngam ɗuum oo , hono capanɗe miliyaaruuji dolaar
Bilii ñaaƴo ngo , ko ñaaƴo mobelaaji sarwisaaji wuro ngo , duumiingo fotde waktuuji tati kuurɗi .
Bindirgal Pulaar ñawndii ndeen saɗeende .
Bindirgal kadi , ko tappirde yaawnde no feewi .
Binndanɗe Nana Asma’u ene njannginatnoo ɗum ɗoo kala , kono kadi eɗe kirjinatnoo fayde jikkuuji suufiyankaagal e mahaade he dow Sunna , rewrude he teeŋtin’de he nder jime makko hol ko woni jikkuuji neɗɗaagu , timmal e kulol Allah .
Binndanɗe Ruttorde Ganndal ɗee fof piraka tawo e ɗemngal Pulaar .
Binndanɗe keblaa .
Binndanɗe makko ko dowrowe , belɗe no limmbam , ko ɗuum addani en innirde mo : " Kuɗol kaŋŋe , ngommbudi njuumri " .
Binndi Pulaar
Binndi Pulaar heɓiino jokkondirde he hooreejo maɓɓe Usmaan Makka Lih , jaayndiyanke kadi keptinaaɗo he daranaade ɗemngal Pulaar , ngam saaftan’de en lewlewal he golle maɓɓe .
Binndirgal ine waɗi kadi huunde he hitooji gaddanooji mo haalataano ɗemngal ngal woowtude gowlugol Pulaar .
Binndol foti jaggireede ko no paggaaɗe keddotooɗe e daartol .
Binndol warhooreeji ɗi Farayse waɗi , ɗi meeɗaa yaafnaade , keƴataa he kagguuji keewɗi defterdu .
Binndoowo daartol foti wonde ko jankiniiɗo joɓoowo diminna ; o annda , kadi o anndina so leñol makko teelno bannge mum ƴellittaako .
Binnduɗo cappanɗe joy ( 50 ) yimre e ko gasi haa muulaa , kadi o wallifii defte nay pentol ( miilol ) , ko jiidaa e goɗɗe ɗe o wallondira e binndol mum en .
Binta Lali Soh woni gooto e jogorɗo huɓɓude diŋiral ngal sabu ko o jaalal e nalaŋkaagal fulɓe .
Biraam wul Daa wul Abeydi ( mawɗo IRA ) e Barahiim Kaliil e Jibi Soh ( mawɗo Kawtal ) nanngaa heen , caggal ɗum paanaa kasoo Rooso .
Biraan lamin e Koli Lamin .
Biritannaaɓe karmini njulaagu ɓaleeɓe .
Biritannaaɓe karmininjulaagu ɓaleeɓe .
Bisimilla maɓɓe noon e leydi hee .
Bisimilla mon !
Bismaango Ñalawma oo fawaa ko e yeeso Ceerno Muhammadul Madaani TAAL , Kaliif mo Ceerno Muntagaa TAAL kam e sete mum .
Bismaanoo e hiirde hee ko perfee bahbahɓe , meer , juurnittooɗo jaŋnde diiwan oo , cafroowo opitaal oo ; mawɗo fedde jiknaaɓe elewaaji , mawɓe pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyaŋkooje e koope .
Biyeteeɗo Basiiru Hammadi Giro , taani mum Sammba Abdullaay Giro , gonɗo hannde joom-wuro Girooɓe oo , lomtiima fotde hitaande e feccere .
Biyeteeɗo Penrose oo rokkiraa njeenaari ndii ko sabu mum hollitde wonde " miijannde yowito huuɓtodinngo ko tijjannde tiiɗnde jibinegol gudde ɓaleeje " , ɗum firti ko goodgol gudde ɓaleeje ko huunde nde ganndal yowito huuɓtodinngo Albert Einstein tijjinoo fawaade e dalillaaji tiiɗɗi .
Biyɗo oo wiyi mo " kanko dey jikku makko ko gooto tan ko o ñaaɗɗo kaɓeteeɗo " .
Biɗtugol hoodere ndee ine waawi fammina en ndii punndi ngonndi nder tageefo , ɓeydo-ɗen faamde hol no ndi feeñiri .
Biɗɗo oo wiyi mo " woni jikku makko ko gooto , ko o pijoowo , jaafɗo kaddol wudere .
Bojel !
Bojel ko kullel ƴoƴngel keewngel peeje .
Boli BA
Bolol goɗngol ngol njuuteendi kiloomeeteer gooto , e meeteruuji 5 , 8 tooweendi , maa mahe ɗoo e maayirɗe hitaande faande ndee .
Bolol ngol ko ɗeɓi-murlol , wonaa murlol , ko ngol ommbol ( ellipse ) .
Bolondee Joop to bannge mum , joginoo koyngal ko e adunaaji ɗiɗi ɗii kala .
Bonannde diwataa ɗoo wonande leydi mbaandi no Muritani nii heewde waasɓe e heewde ngalu .
Bonannde makko kadi fawii ko e nokku ɗo o tawetee : won e nokkuuji ( tooweeki hakkunde 12 e 50 kiloomeeteer ) o ɓuuɓtintu weeyo ( ɗo omo moƴƴi e men ) .
Bonannde ndee millaama e miliyaaruuji 7 dolaar .
Bone ena haalee gasaani , Bubakar Soŋngo ari ɓayndi e alluwal Kodduwaar ngaari e hoƴom 85 .
Bonna taanum , soo maayii , wiyee suka oo ko liggaaɗo .
Bonngo ari e laamu ko e 1967 .
Bonnugol jawdi buur e eɓɓaaɗe ɗe ngalaa nafoore ko wayi no ciiñcugol gure kese e nder ladde moraande tawi gure goodnooɗe ina ŋakkiraa fof " ; " 5 .
Bookar Aamadu , caggal nde safri Hammadi , yahi ƴeewoyde ndiyam .
Bookar Eli lollirɗo Bootay lomtiima fotde duuɓi 36 .
Bookar KAN
Bookara Aamadu Bah
Bookara Aamadu gonnooɗo jaalal F .
Bookara Saar dañii duuɓi 70 pawɗi .
Boomaare mawnde : 9 487 maayɗo , 15 617 neɗɗo majjuɗo , ɓe njiyataaka .
Boomi hannde ko ɓuraa teeŋde laasol e feeñde toni mbaddata .
Booseya ; 4 .
Boowe leppuɗe , puɗooje ko wayi no huɗo walla gaandi maa polli , ngam yiɗde wirnaade haa daña no ruɓiri kulle walla wirnoo yiyooɓe no foti fof .

Caggal
Caggal Demmba Jeey Mawɗo , ko ɓeeɗoo njimi pekaan e nder Jeeyɓe : Demmba Ciiwa , Ŋaɓoodu , Mammadu Jeey , Saara Jeey ( ɓee fof njeyaa ko Jaarangel e nder diiwaan Podoor ) , kam e biyeteeɗo Demmba Jeey goɗɗo ine jeyaa Siiwre ( Podoor ) , jannginɗo Gellaay oo .
Caggal Leydi , ɓuri fof jotde en ko Naange .
Caggal Mbaaraa , ɓe nawaa Weendu Bees .
Caggal Ndakaaru e Librewil e Jibuti , ko tuddunde maɓɓe Njamena ɓuri semmbolinnde .
Caggal Pir Sañekuru , Suleymaani Baal yahii haa to Fuuta Jaloŋ .
Caggal Taasoor , Yero arti e Senegaal e wuro Maatam , naati ɗoon e duɗal arab .
Caggal balɗe 3 ko o woni e koomaa , o waɗtindii ko hawrude e lajal .
Caggal batu Beaule to Farayse keneeli potal nguttiri baŋ-yoo-baŋ e aduna o , Nijeer yuɓɓini batu ngenndi ( conference nationale ) , ko nguun batu nii jibni potal keɓangal hannde ngal .
Caggal calminaali , Kamalenku Tulde Dubaango e Hartallo adii sifaade tawo ko enɗam ngonɗam hakkunde Sifaa e Fedde Adeskoo , hannde ko ena wona duuɓi .
Caggal calminaali e njettoor feewde e Fedde ADESKO , musiɗɗo Simaka waɗi eeraango mum feewde e sukaaɓe ɓee , nde ndadotoo dadungal tiiɗngal ngam wuurtinde finaa-tawaa men , ɓe mbaasaa ŋottilaade e pine tuubakooɓe gaddaaɗe tawi faandotiraa heen ko ɗaaynude e fuuynude ɓesnguuji men .
Caggal defte makko ɗiɗi fento : " Ñaawoore " e " Firtaare " , Islaam e Pinal Fulɓe kanum ari ko he mbaydi ngoɗndi .
Caggal doga-fooftoo , ɗannungal juutngal hakkunde Dakaar e Fuuta , nde ɓe njettoytoo Podoor tawi woni hedde waktiiiji ɗiɗi jamma , kono tawi ko Podoor ɗaanaaki nde tawnoo ko ɗoon Jaalal Leñol Baaba baydi Maal waali .
Caggal dukooji juutɗi e pooɗee nduureeji , he hitaande 1979 , CMSN ( laamu Haydalla ) ƴetti pellital soasde yuɓɓo wiyeteengo Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ( Institut des Langues Nationales ) ngam yoo jarribo janngingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije Muritani keddiiɗe ɗee , ɗuum woni Pulaar , Sooninkoore e Wolof .
Caggal duuɓi cappanɗe limti-limtinɗe , dukooji , hareeji e goytaali ɓiyɓe Fulɓe he nder Senegaal wonnde ko ɗawaaɓe e jaayndeeji Senegaal , teeŋti noon he ayaawo habrirde , hannde Allah addanii en Tele .
Caggal duuɓi tati tan ko gollorgal ngal sosa he 2018 , taw mbaɗtii yeeyde ko ene sowoo hakki laabi nay e ko puɗɗorinoo ko .
Caggal futuro haa feccere jamma , yeewtere mawnde yuɓɓinaama ɗoon .

Caggal jaŋde leslesre e hakkundeere o yahi duɗal jaaɓihaaɗtirde o janngi toon haa o dañi seedanfaagu makko heɓindo ( maitrse ) he ganndal aadee he fannu pine leñɗi .
Caggal jaŋde teskinnde he duɗe leslese e hakkundeere he nder Lagine , ko adii jeytaare , o yahi Senegaal caggal ɗuum o ummii ɗoon o fay Farayse o jokkoyi jaŋde makko to wuro Nancy .
Caggal jaŋde yuumtunde nde o waɗi to Muritani , to Kayoor ( duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Pir Sañekuru ) , to Ɓunndu e to Fuuta Jaloŋ , o arti e ngenndi makko , omo ardi e anniya yiɗde ɓamtude lislaam .
Caggal jeytaare leyɗeele ɗee to bannge dawrugol ( politik ) , nde ngannduɗaa ko innde tan , laamuuji ndoolndoolaagu ( autocraties ) doŋre ndee ( Afrik ) e ballal leyɗeele koloñaal jiimnooɗeɗe ɗee , cuɓii semmbinde doole majji , tawi ko feere ngam ñifde kala laabi waylitaare , ñifde filñitaagol dente e dille noddooje fayde e jeytaare e taƴgol geƴƴelle njiimaandi e peeje laamuuji jowitiiɗi e ngaluyŋkaagal ( capitalism ) .

Catal heen fof darnii yimɓe mum , tawi ko suɓaaɓe , labaaɓe , labaaɓe e nder keele ŋariiji .

Ciftinen Eriterea e hoore mum jeyanoo ko he Ecopia , ɓe ceegii ɓe keɓi jeytaare maɓɓe timmunde gila 1993 .
Ciftinen Jendere wonnoo ko he dummbirdu gila 2015 nde o enndi lopptide laamu haa o waawa artirde Kompawre e jappeere .
Ciftinen bnndiraaɓe ɓe tan ko ñaaƴo Liberwil ngo , toɗɗinoo tan ko militeer ‘en .
Ciftinen njuɓɓudi laamu Ecopia ko dental dowlaaji , dowla fof ina jogii won ndeen wellitaare , ɗi nduttii ɗi ndeenti he laamu ngootu .

Ciftinen tan deegowel ngel duñnoo ummoraade Leydi ko ñalnde 23 sulyee 2020 , ine jolnaa nder ɓeeynirka ɗanngal Tianwen-1 ; ɗanngal jettingal saraaji Mbaañ ñalnde 10 feebariyee 2021 .

Coñce !
Coñce e ñeeñal leñol ngol keewi feeñde ko e sahaa ɓoornungal , e yannge , e wolde , e raddo , e jolal waalo , e coñal , e polindaaji , e fiyfiyre , e innde , ekon .

Coñce haa haa ñalla waala , fina kadi dawta !

Cukalel
Cukalel , luɓ am innde maa ndee .
Cukalel ngel jusii salmini lekki kii salminaango teddungo .
Cukalel ngel noon ina jogii hakke , so tolnoyiima e hitaande adiinde duuɗi kellifuya ( duuɓi 21 ) , ɓooraade e Moritaniyaagal ; – kala jibinaaɗo e Moritani , tawi baaba mum ko arani kono noon jibinaa kanyum ne ko e Moritani ; – cukalel jibinaangel e Moritani , tawi yummu ko arani kono noon jibina ko e Moritani .
Cukalon kon naŋtii e yummiraaɓe mumen .
Cukke ( reegreego ) ena keewi e laawol A13 fayde damal St-Cloud kono miɗo ɗaminii yettaade hade fuɗɗaade .
Cukko haakem oo noon wiyi wonde " ndee eɓɓaande dokkal waɗanaama jeeyngal gila 5 suwee wonande lajal balɗe 60 , mbele kala neɗɗo walla dental jogingal hujja e nokku hee ina ara hujjikinaade , kono ɓe ngaddaani dokimaaji kollitooji ko kamɓe njeyi nokku oo " .

Daande dolokke ko ko daaminiraa gaarawol oolol .
Daaneeji jamma , buunaaji weetndoogo , wonaa gidduɗo fof nannga e laaci .
Daarol heewi kadi tan ko yiyrude leñol fof laamɗo mum e won oon yonta .
Daarol ina sifoo gilli , e cuusal , e ndoolndoolaagu , e jaambaraagal , e kaawisaaji .
Daarol jaŋtotoo ko dille jawtuɗe , kono e ko ɓuri heewde daaroowo jinngantu leñol daaranta ngol , ɓurna ngol nuska leñƴi keddiiɗi .
Daarol ko haala , angolnoddi yumteende ɗemngal , e peeje , e ñeeñal .
Daarol ngol , eɗen mbaawi wiyde nih " daartol " Manndelaa heƴataa e CD gooto walla ɗiɗi walla nih sappo !
Daarorgal ngal , wudduwol mum ko meeteruuji 6 e feccere ( 6 , 5m ) .
Daartiyanke maa wona neɗɗo nuunɗuɗo , jaŋtoo kala ko yiyi e daartol , hay so welaani leydi mum maa leñol mum , maa neɗɗo keriiɗo .
Daartiyaŋkooɓe kawrii yettoode makko ko Kulibali .
Daartol Ben Saalah min mbaɗanaa hannde ngol faamninii kam " e wiyde suka gooto Daarel Barkanaajo ina wiyee Elimaan Kan .
Daartol heewi toɗɗaade ko kewuuji , golle e balle yimɓe , e leƴƴi , e leydi , walla jaambaaro , e galo , e ganndo , maa jarlitaniiɗo leñol mum walla leydi mum , e ko nanndi heen .
Daartol heewi wonde ko huunde winndaande .
Daartol ina hollira ƴellito kala leñol yaadata ko e ngo leñƴi cawndiiɗi koddaaɗi , kuutondiral hakkunde majji .
Daartol ina jaara kaalateeɗo oo , tawa ina yahdi e asko makko .
Daartol ina waawi yaltinde ko manata maa ko ñiŋata neɗɗo , maa leñol .
Daartol ko tinndinoore yankinaare holloore ballal ɓesnguuji e leñƴi keewɗi goɗɗi ngaddi e pinal leñol toɗɗangol .
Daartol leñol aarabeeɓe ( safalɓe ) tan , maa daartol soninkooɓe tan , maa daartol jolfuɓe tan , maa daartol fulɓe ( haalpulaar’en ) tan , maa daartol Mandinkooɓe tan wonaa daartol Nuritani fof .
Daartol nguurndam makko jokkondiri ko e tiifaande lomtondiral e jappere laamu e nder hinnde ndee .

Denndaangal alkule binndirɗe Pulaar naatii e Unicode gila e yamre 5 .
Denndaangal ammbasaduuji leyɗe hirnaange jooɗaniiɗe leyɗe mum en e Nuwaasoot ina njuuroo Biraam e ko duumii , to galle mum , tee cuuɗaaki e ɗuum , ko noon wonande denndaangal misiyoŋaaji laamuuji garooji e Muritani " hade makko fawtude heen " e ko min tini " e joonirde " Muritani meeɗaa woytaade ɗuum hay nokku gooto .
Denndaangal demokaraat en wonnooɓe toon , ngummii ndarii , ngoni e foɓɓande mo .
Denndaangal dowlaaji ( leyɗeele ) jeyaaɗe he piɓondiral ngal ine tawtoree COP .
Denndaangal gure taariiɗe Bahbahɓe ndañii tawtoreede hiirde nde , hiirde ndee Sifaa Hanki Pinal Hannde yuɓɓini , holliti heen tinndinooje paytuɗe e oon rafi .
Denndaangal hujjaaji kuutoranooɗi ngam yande e ndii leydi , laatiima penaale mawɗe ( wonde Irak ina jogii bommbooje bonɗe ekn ) .
Denndaangal jaayɗe , hay ɗe nganndu-ɗaa peeñataa , ko jamirooje tan njogii , sarwisaaji keewɗi ina ndokka ɗum e adonmaaji , FƁ alaa meeɗɗo rokkude ɗum ɗuum , so wonaa kalifu kumpital e dow wagginoore ( 2008 ) , walla Rajo Muritani e gardagol wul Kaabeer , maa Kominotee Urben " CUN " e gardagol Ahmed wul Hamsa .
Denndaangal jom diineeji luurdaani wonde ngummi-ɗen ko e yumma men Hawaa e baaba Aadama .
Denndaangal kullon kon " ƴiiƴam ngulɗam " ko wayi no kulle muuyninooje e colli mbaawaa yiyde caafe les-boɗewol , nde tawnoo ɓalli mum en ine mbiimtoo nguleeki .
Denndaangal kuule maa ƴette ngam newnude ngool gartugol ɓiɓɓe yummiraaɓe men he nder leydi mum en .
Denndaangal leyɗeele jeyaaɗe he yuɓɓo ngoo , so ngaal peŋngal nanondirii he feere , ko alaa e sago , ɓe njowoo he ngaal nanondiral walla ngaal pellital .
Denndaangal luure ubbinooɗe , ubbitii .
Denndaangal mahaandi leydi ndi bonnaa , gila e isinaaji , haa e laabi , e poŋuuji , e nokkuuji pinal mawɗi .
Denndaangal meeɗɓe laamaade Muritani kala garɗo ko he felo siynude ndeen fayndaare yaɓɓata .
Denndaangal ngol jaɓɓugol sariya ngol mawɗo leydi oo waawi yooɓtoreede , kanko e huunde e gollodiiɓe makko ( hooreeɓe hilifaaɓe , hilifaaɓe , Ardiiɓe ) .
Denndaangal senaateeruuji demokaraat en , yanti e senateruuji tati ( 3 ) repobilikee en hakindiiɓe , ngootanii oo debbo ñaawoowo , jahroowo e duuɓi 51 , biyeteeɗo Ketanji Brown Jackson , lollirɗo " KBJ " , mbele jeyee he Ñaawirdu haaɗtirdu .
Denndaangal wuro Likseyba e diiwaan mu rewɓe haa heɓi worɓe mawɓe e sukaaɓe kala , so a weddiima ñorgo hay so saggaani ne , yanata ko e neɗɗo .
Denndaangal yahruɓe to ganndal koode mbaawii haalande mo kanko laamɗo Suuwereydi , kala ko jogori aroyde e maɓɓe e yiyannde maɓɓe , ɗuum noon ko gila e yonta maɓɓe , haa heɓa yontaaji kesam-hesamaagu paaɗo arde , gila e laamuuji juulɓe e heefereeɓe kala .
Denndaangal ɗeeɗoo cimooje jangtaaɗe , Alla jangtiima heen golwole Annabi Nuuhu ( JKM ) .
Denndaangal ɗowooɓe diwooje wonɓe to Beresil , Afrik e Espaañ etiima jokkondirde e lanaa koo , kono ɓe korii tan haa woni .
Dental Dowlaaji Amerik jogii 17% e daaɗe ɗe , kono ina jogii kadi ko wiyetee " droit de véto " , ɗum firti ko kala ko ina waɗee alaa e sago ɓe njaɓa , kala ko ɓe luulndii ɓennataa .
Dental Orop ( UE ) lollinii daande ngam hollide Salaare mum e kappogol laamu nduu .
Dental UPR dallinorii ko yo yahre jam-jam , sariya oo lelnee lelngo feewngo , etee ngalɗo daawal batuuji suudu nduu woni ko e joofde , ɗuum noon ina waawi fadeede haa dawal paangal puɗɗotongal e lewru oktoobar .
Dental UPR saltii yo batu nguu jooɗo nde wiyanoo ndee , farliniri doole keeweendi mum dirtingol batu nguu haa ñalnde 27 lewru nduu .
Dental men e nanonndiral men woni doole men .
Dental ngal o sinciidi e Mammadu JENG .
Dental noon haa jooni , wonaa dental ɓalli tan ɗo ɓerɗe tawaaka sabu Pulaar ene wiya " ɓerɗe kuccondira ɓuri damuɗe galleeji kuccondira " .
Dental sarɗiyankooɓe UPR njaɓaani siifde ɗaɓɓaande ndee .
Dente sarɗiyankooɓe ɓee fof ina kawrunoo e fewjannde ndee , nde rewi ɗo nde fotnoo rewde kala , haa heddii ende yawtinee he batu kuuɓtidinngu Suudu nduu , potnoongu waɗde ñalnde 13 sulyee 2020 .
Dente tati duuɗe ɓurɗe teskinde ɗee ko ɗeeɗoo : Malanesi e Mikronesi e Polinesi .
Denɗiiko Louis XIV kam ne sosi kompaañi " La Compagnie du Sénégal " e ndeen hitaande wootere , fusi " Compagnie des Indes de Colbert " gooto e kompañiiji koloñaal Farayse gidiiɗi , ɗi o yooɓtorii waasde hattande faggaade jiyaaɓe .
Denɗiiko Sayku Umar Al Fuutiiyu TAAL , oon yiyiino dokke makko diwtuɗe aadi ɗee gila law .
Depiteeji e meeruuji diiwaan oo ngarii toon .
Depiteeji ko hoolaaɓe ɓesngu , jooɗaniiɓe ɗum , ko ɓe joom en hurum en .
Deppuru ko kullel ngel fulɓe ɓuri heewde ko tooñiri e nder kulle ɗee fof , sabu fulɓe alaa ko mbiyaani Demmba .
Deppuru ko kullel sonngayel .
Des ONG locales et internationales dénoncent un régression des aptitudes en Tunisie depuis que le gouvernant Saïed s’est arrogé les pleins droits le 25 juillet 2021 .
Dewbo oo wiyi mo : so aɗa yiɗi ƴamde mi fokkit yah to baabam ƴamaa-mi to makko .
Dewo oon suka , ina jogii haayre kaŋŋe e foloŋ junngo nano ngoo .
Dewuut jippii e galle Dukkureenaaɓe walla Dukkeenaaɓe , kañum ne ƴetti yettoode mumen .
Deye ɗee keewi ko daranaade nguura , ko ɗuum waɗi mbaroodi deyri ɓuri heewde ko sonngata , kadi ko deye ɗee keewi ardaade sonngere .
Deƴƴere maɓɓe ndee ina
Deɓi aayɗinde ɗum tan , ko Kiristinaa Kirshneer heɓaani arde tawtoreede finaal oo .
Diine Lislaam e hoore mum ina mawnini laaɓal .
Diine ko ngonki immiiki to tagɗo terɗe gooɗɗe ɗee fof oo .
Diine lislaam haɗat maa ko tiiɗnoraade ngonkiiji jaasɗi e maa ɗii .

Diiraali e piyanɗe gummotooɗe e ɓanndu naange ndu , fiyaaku mumen e fiyaaku mbommboo atomik nanndi , kono kañum en ɓuri bommbooji atomik doole ɗo woɗɗi .
Diiso Hoohooɓe Soninkooɓe Muritani ( DHSM ) , kam fof e woɗɗitaade kala miijo leñamleñaagu , e heddaade e yiɗde hisnude tigi rigi darnde mum ɓooynde jaamburaagal e waasde naatde e geɗe Dowla oo , fellitii huccitde e laamu kalfinaangu yuɓɓinde janngo men denndaaɗo oo , kam e gollooɓe politik e leƴƴi goɗɗi jeyaaɗi e Muritani ɗii e ɓiɗɓe leydi ndii kala .
Diiso Njuɓɓudi ( CA ) golliima heen ko heewi , gollodii kadi e haralleeɓe woɗɓe haa min ndañi waɗdude e maɓɓe nanondiral gadanal ɗo min kaalata kala ko faati e njeñtudi ndii .
Diiwaan Daŋana ina deeƴi , so wonaa dille hakkunde remooɓe nde leyɗeele rewo mayo peccitaa .
Diiwaan Kaasamaasa ko kañum nde tawnoo ko nokku toɓoowo ko ina abbo e lebbi jeenayi ko kanko ɓuri wonde faawru maa wecco remruyankeewo leydi ndi .
Diiwaan kala yimɓe mum mbaɗti wallifaade he ko yowitii e nguurndam mum en , gila e coñce , daari , tinndi haa e daartol nokku mum en .
Diiwe goɗɗe dummbuɗe ina toon , ina heen leñol Oromo’en ( won wiyooɓe ɓee ko Fulɓe kono ɗum jaalaaki ) , ina heen leñol Afaar e Iisaa ( ɓuri ɓadaade ko leñol Somaali’en to leydi Somaalia ) .

Dingiral ko jannginirde , nehirde , heblirde .
Dingiral ko nokku janngirɗo , nehirɗo , ko nokku joljole coomɗe jeewte , duƴƴe , cifti e daari , njimri kam e ngamri .

Doktoor Alhuseyni Sal jaabtiima ngaal naamnal : Paawngal Dennge ina
Doktoor Bah Mammadu Alasan gummoriiɗo to Senegaal walla Luuren e woɗɓe ɓe en ndañaani anndude inɗe mumen ngarii e ñalawma oo ko jiidaa e ardiiɓe palɗe wonɓe e diiwaan Barakna haa e halfinaaɓe ndeenka e kisal teeŋti e jooɗiiɓe ɗo wuro Mbaañ ɗoo .
Doktoor Hammadi Sih hollii en wonnde so pellital yantii heen , ɗuum ene gasa laataade .
Doktoor oo haalii ko yannoo e Sammba , Aali kam e Ummu .
Doktoreeɓe ( hono Dr Aliwseyni Sal gonɗo to Kanada ) mbiyi so neɗɗo sikkitiima jofe mum ko nanngaaɗe , ina ɗojja ɗojjo yoorngo ( ngo yahdaani he kaakte ) , kine makko njoraani , ɗum firti ko ɓanndu makko woni ko he haɓde he mboros oo .
Doktoreeɓe lomtiniri ngol taƴre tergal tafangal : ko ngaal o foofirta hannde , tee o ɓamtii golle , o dañii ɓinngel , e duuɓi makko 40 , omo yaha e haajuuji makko no yimɓe ɓee fof nii .
Doktoreeɓe tafani mo goddol ummingol e ɗaɗol nanowol ƴiiƴam , ɗaɗol ngol waylii wonti goddol .

Doole Ngenndiije Dentuɗe e ɗe Farayse e ɗe Afiriki .
Doole e ɗiin konnguɗi paamnaaki .
Doole kala kuccinaa ko e yiɗde surde
Doole kalito ngoo ina sowoo laabi 10 kalito bommbo atomik mo Amerik werlinoo e wuro Hiroshima .
Doole maggo ko 7 , 8 .
Doole maggo ko hakkunde 9 , 1 e 9 , 3 .
Doole tuubakiri waɗi he ndee hare ina hollita kulol ɓe njogii he ɗee dille salaare , teeŋti tawa wonaa seernaaɓe mawɓe ngardii ɗum .
Doole wuro ngoo to bannge faggudu fawii ko e geɗe nay : ndema , awo , ngaynaaka e njulaagu .
Doole yerɓo ngo ko 7 , 3 .
Doole yerɓo ngoo tolniima e 7 , 1 haa 7 , 3 .
Doole ɗemngal no wayi nii , ko kam moofti pinal .

Doosngal leydi Moritani
Doosɗe leydi 4 marse 1968 wayliino ɗum seeɗa nde waɗti Arab ɗemngal laawɗungal , fotndi ɗum e ɗemngal jiimnooɗo oo , heddii kadi e wonde ɗemngal ngenndiwal gootal : pulaar e sooninke e wolof mbinndaaka heen boom .
Doosɗe leydi ndi njowaa , Goomu militeer ngu terɗe jeenay sosaa yo ardo leydi ndi tawi ardii ɗum ko kanko .

Doudna have won the Nobel Prize 2020 in chemistry for developing a method of genome editing likened to " molecular scissors " that offer the promise of one day curing genetic diseases .
Dow Leydi ndiin njaaweendi ko 11 , 2 km nder leƴƴannde kala ( 40 000 km/w ) .
Dow Mbaañ , bibje ɗee ndañataa " ko nduñi " no feewi ( ɗo ɓaggii ) haa mbaawa suutde teddeendi .
Dow aaludere nde woni toon ko faɗo woɗngo , e nder mum ena woodi lobbuli tawa " mboofoondi " leydi ndi ( ko mbiyaten kaaƴe kaynaaɗe ko ) ena naati heen .
Dowla Burkina ɗaɓɓi yo o dummbe duuɓi 30 , kanko e neɗɗo maako mo o suuɗodii to Kodduwaar Yasinte Kafando dogɗo kam ne ñar-ñar gila 2016 .
Dowla Mali ina foti nih ɗaɓɓude yo ko heddii e ɓanndu makko artire Segu .
Dowla Senegaal kadi yamirii balɗe tati sunu e leydi hee ( 18 , 19 e 20 abriil ) .
Dowla oo fellitii ummanaade jeyi ganni mo tuubakiri ronkannoo oo .
Dowla oo ɗeɓi wayde ko no wuro wooto nii ( ko dental nduukon 63 ) .
Dowla ɗaɓɓi ko kanko yo o dummbe ko famɗi fof duuɓi 20 .
Dowlaaji Dentuɗi kolliri tawo ko nokkuuji ɗo mbaɗnoo balle mumen e leydi Muritani hade mumen timminirde geɗe mumen yimre e ɗemngal engele .
Dowlaaji Orop keewɗi ndewi heen , hay so tawii keñoraaki ɗumno feewi .
Dowlaaji ɗii nanondirii he tuugnorgal golle ngam reende tataɓal ( 30% ) ɗaŋre men ndee ɗoo e 2030 , e yaltinde ballal 30 miliyaar dolaar hitaande kala faade e leyɗe pamare doole ngam wallude ɗum en he golle biyaaɗe ɗee .
Doŋel Gicce Joop e yumma mum ƴeewi ɓurɗo toowde darnde e hiirde ndee , ndarni ɗum e hakkunde yimɓe , potndi callalal ŋeñemaaje kaŋŋe e darnde mum , taƴi , mbeddii min , yo min mbaɗ e cannje moolooji amen .

Duuɓi aññeere ko 3 300 hitaande .
Duuɓi capanɗe tati e nay haa njahdi e naange .
Duuɓi e kitaale kadi ko yimɓe heewɓe paami wonde ɓamtaare yaawataa tawi yimɓe kuutortoo ko ɗemɗe koɗe he nder jangde mum en .
Duuɓi keewɗi Clive McCay yeebinooma njeñtudi wiɗto oo ganndo .
Duuɓi keewɗi ɓennii hade makko jaɓde yeɓtinde kisal Muritani .
Duuɓi o wirnii ɗii , alaa fof mo dillaani .
Duuɓi sappo caggal ɗuum , he lewru mee 1997 , cuddiiɗo Sankara ɗaɓɓi yo warɓe jom-galle makko ngannde , ñaawee .
Duuɓi seeɗa caggal ɗuum , Kuuɓal Dowla Amerik , hono James Baker noddi he mahgol tippudi kisndi hakkunde Dental Dowlaaji Amerik , Orop e Riisi , tippudi ngootiɗinoori winndere ndee tuggi Wankuwer haa Waladiwostok .
Duuɓi seeɗa caggal ɗuum , cerindiiɗo oo wonti loraaɗo .
Duuɓi ɗiɗ no woorunoo !
Duuɓi ɗiɗi caggal ɗuum , e lewru Juko ( Août ) 2016 , o artiraa o lomtii Muhamed Alhuseyni Tuure e ɗowgol e kuuɓal jooɗorde Ndenndaandi .
Duuɓi ɗiɗi no woorunoo !
Duuɓi ɗiɗi wolde to Konngo cabiima warngo ko ina tolnoo e miliyoŋaaji nay neɗɗo ( 3 , 8 miliyoŋ ) .
Duuɗe Salomon ɗee ngoni ko he laawol laaɗe ndiyam teeŋtungol hakkunde Asii e Dental Dowlaaji Amerik , ɗo miliyoŋaaji miliyoŋaaji ton marsandiis ndewrata hitaande kala .

Duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde Harvard ( Harvard University ) walla Harvard tan , ko duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde Ameriknaawal gonngal to Massachusetts ( Amerik ) , cosangal ñalnde 28 oktoobar 1636 ; ɗum noon kanngal woni duɗal toowngal ɓurngal ɓooyde to Amerik .
Duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije waɗi golle paayodinɗe , patam-lame , tuggude 1980-88 ɓetooji tati mbaɗaa heen ( Breda-Unesco 1982 kadi he 1984 ) ɓeto jaagorgal kalfinaangal jaŋde 1988 , fof tabitini wonnde ɓetooji ɗii ene moƴƴi kadi mbasiyii yoo janngingol he ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee sare , yaajne he nder duɗe he .
Duɗalngal huɓɓaa ko ñalnde02/05/2009 to wuro wiyateengo Besoo he leydi waala fenndoo ( Farayse ) .
Duɗe 45 ina njannga oo sahaa .
Duɗe jarriborɗe udditaa .
Duɗe keeriiɗe ( ekkolaaji piriwee ) e jinnaaɓe sukaaɓe mettinii no feewi he ndee feere .
Duɗe ɗee ine ukki haa ɓurti ( ine ɓura 100 almuudo he janngirde wootere ) , haa ko jaŋde waawaa feewde heen , haa teeŋti noon so tawii ko jannginooɓe ɓe ngalaa tolno , ɓe keblaaka , ɓe paamaani laabi jannginirɗe njannginta Jaŋde waawaa moƴƴude e ooɗoo sifaa .
Duɗe ɗee ɓetaama cili ɗiɗi : hitaande 1984 biro Unesco gonnooɗo to Ndakaaru ine wiyee Breda ɓetii ɗe , caggal ɗuum , e hitaande 1988 jaagordu jaŋde Muritani e hoore mum ɓetii jaŋde ndee : ɓe ceedtiima jaŋde ndee ine yuumti , ɓe mbasiyii nde nde huuɓtodintee .

E dow ɗum
