E hitaande 1138 yerɓo leydi tolniingo e 8 , 5 waɗii ɗoon .
E hitaande 1458 laamɗo biyeteeɗo Henri hollitii ɓurani ɗum ko yo yimɓe mum cood jiyaaɓe , ɓe mbaasa dahde .
E hitaande 1462 ɓe ciiñti e duuɗe kap Weer ( cap Vert ) ( nder geec tolnde Senegaal ) .
E hitaande 1486 ɓe njettii duunde Sao Tome ( to sorfundu Gine , tolnde Gabon e Gine Ekaatoriyaal ) .
E hitaande 1500 ko hedde 1 000 jiyaaɗo taccinaa , kono e hitaande 1530 , ɓe njettiima hakkunde 4 000 e 5 000 jiyaaɗo taccinaaɗo , walla jolnaaɓe faade Amerik , ummoraade Konngo ɗoo .
E hitaande 1674 , Louis XIV wonti laamɗo dowrowo .
E hitaande 1730 yerɓo leydi tolniingo e 8 , 3 yanii e duunde Japoŋ ɗiɗmere to bannge mawnugol wiyeteende Hokkaido , daɓɓiti leydi , ummini tsunami barɗi ko ina wona 137 000 neɗɗo .
E hitaande 1764 Laamu Riisi heɓti diiwaan oo fof .
E hitaande 1857 , konu Sayku fellondiri e tuubakooɓe e nder wuro Madiina
E hitaande 1862 Al Hajji Umar Taal heɓti Jenne e Hamdallaay .
E hitaande 1890 Faraysenaaɓe keɓti Segu e ballal wambarankooɓe .
E hitaande 1918 , Muusaa Moolo fayi leydi Sira Leon e ballal Engele en , o woni toon haa e hitaande 1923 , o arti kadi Gambi .
E hitaande 1928 , o ɓenninaa wuro Podoor .
E hitaande 1931 , ɓe mbaɗi kawgel ngam fayde to Duɗal Ɓiɓɓe Laamɓe ( Ecole des Fils de Chefs ) to wuro Ndar .
E hitaande 1938 ndee , haa hannde , e lewru jolal ( noowammbar ) , o woppi kadi golle posto , o arti e janngingol .
E hitaande 1939 , o nawaa duɗal Fedeerba to Ndakaaru .
E hitaande 1941 , o toɗɗaa hooreejo duɗal Wookaam .
E hitaande 1943 , ñalnde 13 lewru feebariyee , o ari e Nuwaasot , laamorgo Muritani .
E hitaande 1945 , leyɗeele poolɗe ɗee njuɓɓini ñaawoore to wuro Nuremberg ngam ñaawde nasiyaagal ( nazisme ) kam e añam-nguraagu mum .
E hitaande 1945 , o artiraa Ɓoggee to kumaandaŋ biyeteeɗo Laburus ( Labrousse ) .
E hitaande 1946 , sosaa to Bamako ( Mali ) lannda politik afrikyanke ina wiyee " RDA " ( Rassemblement democartique africain ) , tawa ardinoo ndeen Fedde ko yarhammu Felix Houphouet Boigny horeejo Kodduwaar , kanko Modiboo Keytaa o tamnaa koolaaɗo kuuɓal L’Union soudanaise RDA .
E hitaande 1950 yimɓe mayri ko miliyoŋaaji ɗiɗi ( 2 000 000 ) , sappo e tati miliyoŋ e 2005 e kiɓɓal gootal fof ko yimɓe sappo koɗi e mum .
E hitaande 1951 leydi ndii sosi dowlaaji sappo ( 10 ) Bantustaan , dowlaaji baɗanaaɗi Ɓaleeɓe tan , jaalɗini he leydi hee paaltoor hakkunde leƴƴi .
E hitaande 1954 , o nawaa Neema , toppitaade geɗe paytuɗe e ngalu .
E hitaande 1955 , o waɗaa binndoowo njuɓɓudi laamu kuuɓtidinngu ( Rédacteur d’administration générale ) .
E hitaande 1956 , o yahi Lome , laamorgo dowla Togo , o naati e duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde .
E hitaande 1958 , o toɗɗaa walla o sufaa hoyreejo fedde Kawtal Mali " Federation du Mali " .
E hitaande 1959 , sabu darnde leyɗe maruceeje , OMS lelni tuugnorgal mumtugol bade .
E hitaande 1959 kadi ɓe werlii ɓeynirka Venera feewde Venus .
E hitaande 1963 Modiboo Keytaa jeyaama e wallifiiɓe kuulal ( charte ) Fedde leyɗeele walla dowlaaji dentuɗi Afrik Organisation de l’Unite Africaine ( OUA ) , kanko fof e wondunoode e oon sahaa ngenndiyankooɓe huɓɓuɓe wayɓe no : Gamaal Abdel Naseer mo Esipto , Ahmed Ben Belaa , Kuwaame Kurumah ko kanko wonnoo , ñeeñiyanke , teenoowo e duñtoowo ngal ɗoon duɗal ngootaaguyankeewal ngal tuubakooɓe Farayse meeɗaani weleede hay sahaa go’to .
E hitaande 1967 , Modiboo hetti murteende ( revolution active ) , yowi kuulal ngenndi lomtini ɗoon fedde soldateere wiyeteende : Comite National de defense de la revolution ( CNDR ) .
E hitaande 1971 OMS jaɓi abbaade e hujja " safaaruuji cellal garwaniiji " .
E hitaande 1973 , o yaltini deftere woɗnde nde tiitoonde mum woni : Firo e Faccuro Konnguɗi ummiiɗi e Manndeŋ koɗdigal hakkunde kelmeendi ummiiɗe e ɗemɗe goɗɗe e Pulaar jiggii .
E hitaande 1974 , deftere nde o yaltini woni : Holi no Pulaar e ɗemngal Hasaaniya cifortoo sahaa ?
E hitaande 1975 , Front Polisario leɓii heɓde Nuwaasoot sabu ɓe ngari haa e takko wuro ngoo ɓe puɗɗii fellude-ngo .
E hitaande 1977 haa 1984 jogaade rajo tawi a alaa lefol Abdul Aataa walla Sammba Haggaa Sek wayi kono kafe ɗe ngalaa suukara .
E hitaande 1980 OMS wiyi " bade mumtaama he winndere ndee " .
E hitaande 1982 , o tawtoraama sosngo Kawtal Bordoo .
E hitaande 1989 , " o woppi kala ko o fagginoo " , o tacci ngam sosde dillere dartagol laamu wul Taaya .
E hitaande 1989 , caggal kewkewe hakkunde Muritani e Senegaal , o nanngaa , o ɓooraa .
E hitaande 1991 alluwal ASCII ngal yaajtinaa , waɗtaa no annama 16 alluwal nii , ngam heɓtinde denndaangal alkule ɗemɗe Orop hirnaange ( farayse , almaa , españool , danuwaa , e islanndee ) , woni 191 alkulal , woni ko anndiraa yuɓɓo ISO/CEI 8859 .
E hitaande 1992 , Dowlaaji Dennduɗi Amerik e Aŋngalteer keɓii yoo Fedde Leyɗeele Dennduɗe ( ONU ) yaltin kuwgal tiwaande ( sanctions ) 748 fawee e dow Libi sabu salaade-mum weeɗde jeyaaɓe mum ɗiɗo tuumaaɓe ko kañum'en njuɓɓini yano ngo .
E hitaande 1992 , o waɗaa gardiiɗo jooɗorde ( Directeur de Cabinet ) Alfaa Umar Konaare , Hooreejo Ndenndaandi .
E hitaande 1993 , Mahamaan Usumaan fiilaa hoyreejo leydi tawa ko nijeernaaɓe cuɓii mo e nder birooji woote mu’en .
E hitaande 1993 , nde Yiilirde nde ummanii mahde galle o , nde tawi ko eɓɓaande koɗki leegal ngal waklitaama ; galle fedde nde , kam e yoga e galleeji cawindinooɗi mo fof mbaɗtaa ko e Galle Pinal e Coftal Ɓalli Sukaaaɓe Sebka , tawi teskaaka noon ɗoon ko ko hokkanoo woɗɓe , tawi kadi joom mum en ndiisnondiraaka .
E hitaande 2000 , o fektaa to Suudu siwil tŋ 1 Ñaawirde haaɗtirde .
E hitaande 2001 , Eltis yettiima 11 062 000 Afriknaajodahaaɗo , jolnaa e laaɗe , kono ko yettii heen Amerik ko 9 599 000 jiyaaɗo , hakkunde 1519 e 1867 .
E hitaande 2001 , o rokkaa njeenaari Nobel wonande jam sabu darnde maɓɓe ngam yiylaade deeƴre e winndere ndee .
E hitaande 2002 , Joseph ( Sosef ) Inikori rokkii limoore 12 700 000Afriknaajo taccinaaɗo rewrude e Atalantik .
E hitaande 2003 , laamu Norwees sosanii hiisiwal njeenaari kesiri mbiyeteendi Abel ( ngam mawninde hiisiyanke mawɗo biyeteeɗo Niels Henrik Abel ( jibinanooɗo e hitaande 1802 ) ) .
E hitaande 2003 , laamu Norwees sosanii matematik njeenaari kesiri mbiyeteendi Abel ( ngam mawninde hiisiwo mawɗo biyeteeɗo Niels Henrik Abel ( jibinanooɗo e hitaande 1802 ) ) .
E hitaande 2003 , o feeñnini miijo makko e wolde Amerik to Irak , o wiyi : " ñalawma am ɓurɗo ɓawlude , ko wolde Irak , sabu am ronkude haɗde nde " .
E hitaande 2004 , leyɗe jeeɗiɗi jeyanooɗe he senngo fuɗnaange , hono : Bulgari , Estoni , Lettoni , Lituwani e Rumaani e Slowaki , Sloweni , haa teeŋti noon e Lettoni , e Estoni e Lituani , naati OTAN .
E hitaande 2004 won tuubakooɓe ngarnoo ɗoo e Magaama ena ngardi sabu punewaagu ( jumelage ) , min njuɓɓini ñalawma wejo hono no hannde nih .
E hitaande 2006 , ADEMA/PASJ feƴtii , ɓee heen payi to Sumeyla Siisee , ɓeya ngonani Aamadu Tumaani Tuure ɗaɓɓoowo lefol ɗiɗaɓol hooreyaagal leydi e hitaande 2007 .
E hitaande 2008 , ambasad Israayiil kam e nokku gooto , yanaama , pellondiral waɗi e nder Tafarak Seyna haa woodi ofisee polis maayi heen .
E hitaande 2008 laamu ngu kadi siifi dekereeji ɗiɗi 2008-1338 e 2008-1339 , ɗiin dekereeji njoopotoo maa njaynotoo ko laabi walla njuɓɓudi potndi lelneede ngam waawde faabaade paabagol moƴƴol ɓeen sukaaɓe wiyeteeɓe alyatimeeɓe ngenndi .
E hitaande 2010 haakem Wul Yenje haɗiino yimɓe jeyanooɓe e wuro Wul Jiddu Ganngenaaɓe artunooɓe , hoɗtude e wuro mum en , ko maa tergal guwarnama mon jilli heen nde ɓe ndañi ɗuum .
E hitaande 2010 ngal rendinnoo ko 35 leydi e teemedde haralleeɓe jooɗiiɓe to Pari .
E hitaande 2010 petto bal biyeteeɗo Lillan Thuram mawninii mo e deftere mum " mes étoiles noires " ( koode am ɓaleeje ) .
E hitaande 2012 , ɓee rewɓe ɗiɗo annduɓe tafii kuutorgal kesal ngam newnude baylugol ndontaandi .
E hitaande 2016 , min mbayli ndeen innde kadi min mbaɗti innde yahoore hannde ndee : Daakaa Subalɓe .
E hitaande 2017 ndee , ɗooftagol hakkeeji aadee yahrii caggal .
E hitaande 2017 o waɗi tele , o inniri ɗe TV Mbammbiloor , ɓiɓɓe
E hitaande 2018 to Togoo , tawaama ko ine wona gure sappo egginaaɗe gila 2009 , ndiiwaa e koɗorɗe mumen , lekkolaaji mumen boni , sukaaɓe sagataaɓe ɗannii to leyɗe goɗɗe , tee tawi gure ɗee keɓaani ndaamordi camorndi .
E hitaande 2019 ndee tan , PAM faabiima fotde 97 miliyoŋ neɗɗo he nder 88 leydi .
E hitaande 2021 , maa ɓoggol Siin gadanol ( 12 000 km njuuteendi ) yetto Farayse .
E hitaande 856 yerɓo leydi tolniingo e toɓɓe 8 .
E hitaande ɓennunde ndee , PAM wiyi rokkii 15 miliyaar bottaari , wallitii fotde 97 miliyoŋ neɗɗo nder 88 leydi .
E hitande 1935 fayde hitaande 1936 , o jannginii e wuro wiyeteengo Kupentum .
E hittande kala , feccere e ekipaaji aamen ena keblaa no haanirta nih .
E hol no miijo ngoo ardi e mayri , kayri njuɓɓudi ndii e hol ko addani ndi adoraade mahde safrirde tawo ?
E hono no jaŋtoriiɗum Foloriyan Bobeen he nder winndannde mum yaajniinde , " OMAR BOLONNDEE JOOP : NGAMA WAYLITAARE AFRIKNAARE " , yaltunde he lowre binndipulaar .
E hono no mbiyrunoo-mi on , e ooɗoo sahaa ganndal coñce men fuɗɗiima yaajde ko faati e Gellaay , won ɓesnooje keewɗe dañaaɗe e nder wiɗto jime makko .
E hoƴom 45 , Maykel Esiyen faddii fiyannde kufara , fiyi ngaallo garɗo , sokki bal e lajal ( 1-1 ) .
E hoƴom 83 , nde fuɗɗaa sikkeede ɓe payi ko e seerndoore ( prolongation ) , Muntari duɓɓiti falo Nijeriyaa , faafi fayde e Agogo ena ara ena ɗaara !
E hoƴomaaji battindiiɗi ɗii , Holannda wiyi ena haɓtoo seeɗa kono ñebbe ndefaama !
E innde am e innde fedde nde ngardii-mi ndee , mboɗo wiya ɓe , ɓe njaaraama .
E jaabawol ngol njaabinoo-mi Sammba Juulde Caam e ɗemngal farayseere , miɗo siiftina heen kuule ɗe laamu Senegaal woni e yaɓɓude nde wiyi en nuskina ɗemɗe men .
E jamaanu men ndeen hay so debbo ina hurtoytonoo ko maa ara e baylo wayla ɗum haa para , ngati ko maa waɗa ganni ko mbiyaten hannde cosaan koo , waɗa kootone doɓɓe , waɗa cakkaaji .
E jamanuuji ndeen , jabet fannu 2 heewnoo yiyeede ko e yimɓe heewɓe duuɓi .
E jaŋde ndon-ɗen he koloñaal Farayse , enen , haa he ñalngu hannde nguu , hay so gooto he men roondiima ganndal aduna ngal fof , so artii wokkanta tan ko gollaade e laamu , artida he miijo yawaare kala ko joginoo renndo men , gila he pinal , golle ekn .
E jiyle maɓɓe , ɗum ena foti wayleede .
E jokkiri_jeeri worgo .
E joofirde , ine waɗɗii kadi nokkuuji ɗii kam e Renndo Siwil ngoo jokkude e jeertaade e tintinde kala moygol ngol faamnaaki walla cikkingol .
E joofirde teeminannde jeetaɓiire , laamɗo Wagadu , hono Kayaa Magan Siisee ( " Laamɗo kaŋŋe " ) riiwti berbeer en , wootiɗini sooninkooɓe , sompi laamaandi Wagadu .
E joofnirde seedantaagal ngal , Yiilirde Ngenndiire duwaniima heen ɓesngu Abdullaay Isaaga Nyaŋ to Jowol , duttiiɗo e joom mum ; yo Alla yurmo mo , yaafoo mo , haarna mo aaljannaa , aamiin .
E jooni jooni o , hay go’to waawaa haaldude haqiiga mbele ɓe ɗo worɓe joom en garaduuji ngonnoo ko e fewjude maalde ngam liɓde laamu Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo mbele transition o ina telɓa .
E jooni jooni o , yimɓe ɓe yoo paam laamu ngu woni ko hakkunde yeebaare e lusindaare e kala baɗlal fayde e waayeeɓe ngenndi sooynaaka hakkunde leydi e asamaan " .
E ka rimndi fotde tonuuji 5 kaake , ine heen laana njirlatooka ( orbiteur ) , laana njuurnoowa ( atterrisseur ) , kam e ndeegoowa ( rover ) ka 240 kg .
E kaan dumunna , ko gorko pullo gooto joginoo fartaŋŋe suynude mette ɓittaaɓe , fiyaaɓe kaɗaa woyde saka haalde .
E kaawisi Alla , dawɓe gila nde kacitii haa midi yoni , njahaani ko foti no 2km .
E kala hitaande , sosiyetee SNIM ina mawnina nguun ñalngu .
E kala jarɗo sanngara aduna yarataa sanngara aljannaaji ñalnde darga .
E kala ko waawi wonde jaabowol ngol , laamu waylaare hollirii kadi cuuneyaagal mum e no haaldi Walfadjri .
E kala sahaa mboɗo heɓa tonngoode nde loowdi maantinndi , kabaruuji jolɗi , pinal , coñce kam e dawrugol ndadaani on .
E kebungal ɗiiɗoo ñalɗi , kala ganndo nantuɗo innde mum walla jontaaɗo peɗɗitiiɗo e fannu mum e nder leñol ngol , hakkunde Senegaal e Muritani , ɓe njettiima ɗum walla ɓe noddii ɗum e jeew-deesto ngam bismaade ɗum haa heddoo dañde no ardi walla waasde dañde .
E kikiiɗe hee , kamɓe heftuɓe laamu ɓee , ɓe cosii Waggino Dowla ( Conseil D'état ) ngam ɗowde geɗe leydi ndii haa toɗɗe goɗɗe mbaɗeee ɗoo e lebbi ɗiɗi ( e ko min kabraa ) .
E kiram mum debbo sukaajo oo , owi’i gorko oo : " Gite kay ɓuri wonde hannde ko potɗaa ndaartude , sabu ko gite nji’ata , kersata .
E kitaale 89-91 ko ɓuri ɗum bonde waɗaama ɗoo , tee alaa kumpaaɗo , kono hay gooto e wullooɓe hannde ɓee dillaano .
E kitaale cakkitiiɗe ɗee kadi , ko kayri woni hoore to bannge moƴƴude jaŋde hiisiwal e nder leyɗe OCDE .
E ko aadoraa , yerɓo leydi fuɗɗotoo tineede ko hedde toɓɓe 3 haa 4 ( jerɓe tolniiɗe ɗoo ina mbaɗa fotde laabi teemedde ujunnaaje hitaande kala ) .
E ko addata ɗuum ko ɗemngal ina daňa haalooɓe ɓe ngonaa ɗum , yoga heen kadi ko waawɓe haala ɗemngal ngal tawi mbaawaa ɗemngal ngal !
E ko annduɗe kaali , so Siidi S Jara woodi ñaaweede , kaso makko ina waawi yottoyaade duuɓi sapo sabu ko ɗum woni ko rewnetee e dow hoore calliiɗo ɗoftaade ñawoore .
E ko artata koo noon , o nani debbo joom maayo ina yima jimol .
E ko daarti kaali wonde Moodiboo Keytaa sankii ko e kasoo to diwaan Kidaal ñalnde 16 lewru duujal , woɗɓe kadi mbi’I o sankii ko Bamako caggal nde maalde waɗaa o ñamminaa ñaamde fosnaande .
E ko feeňi , ko ɗoon tampere laamu ngu haaɗnoo e kewuuji keeriiɗi e leydi ndi , alaano kewu keeriingu mbaawnoongu ummin’de laamɗo leydi ndi e jooɗorde mum nde , hay so woodiino ne waɗɗanooki , no laawol ( loi ) leydi ndi – laawol aduna o heedniri laamɗo leydi ndi dowu ni ko noon ɓerɗe e golle ɓesngu leydi ndi heednirnoo mo dowu , sabu ko ɗuum woni ko woodi .
E ko geno wiyi ɓe , no haaldi e nder Ɓuraana mum tedduɗo " ñaame heen no haaniri e kala no njiɗir-ɗon , kono hoto ɓadto-ɗee kiiɗoo lekki laato-ɗon kon tooñɓe " simoore nagge , kaawise : 35 .
E ko refti heen , won e koɗanɗe ena ngoɗɗi to ngoni , joom mumen ena ndaña sahaa fof caɗeele teeŋti e ñalɗi aljumaa .
E ko refti heen ko haa min mbaawa ɓetde doole amen to bannge keewal e juumtugol .
E ko sakkitii koo , miɗo joginoo tonngoode WhatsApp nde mi huutorinooka fotde hitaande , pellit-mi waɗde nde he telefoŋ goɗɗo mbele mi daña tonngooɗe ɗiɗi WhatsApp ngam waawde seerndude golle am .
E ko yaawi Maamuudu heedi yeeso , daɗtii ɓe dogdata ɓee .
E ko ɓuri heewde , jannginooɓe keewaani ( nattii ) waɗde ɓeto hebloowo ngoo ( hay nii he nder duɗe laamu ) .
E ko ɓuri heewde , jiknaaɓe sukaaɓe ɓee kiisii ko so cukalel waawaani ɗemɗe mawɗe ɗee ( iwdi koloñaal ) , dañataa golle moƴƴinooje janngo mum en .
E ko ɓuri heewde , kala renndo walla kala leñol ina
E kolce bamɗi , min nanii ko gollooɓe ummoriiɓe leyɗe Golf ndokkaa ɗoon .
E kominikee maɓɓe , APP naamnii ko yoo laamu artu e demokaraasii ko yaajtii , ɓe kollii nefgol maɓɓe e kala ko tugnaaki e doosɗe demokaraasii leydi ndii .
E konngol joom wuro ngoo hono Kolombaa Bah , hardaneeɓe ( safalɓe ɓaleeɓe ) ɓe ɓe ngoppunoo e nokkuuji ɗi e tuma hare 1989 nde , ko ko njooɗtii hannde e leyɗeele maɓɓe e dow faalkinaare laamu .
E konngol makko haa jooni , Laana ka ardata ko e kippu mum , e haralleeɓe jogorɓe heblude Moritaninaaɓe toppitoytooɓe golle makka , so tawii ka jeyetee ko e kaɓtorɗe cunnorteeɗe , sabu eɗen nganndi , e no o wiyiri , Uujooɓe heewɓe ummortooɓe Afiriik Hirnaange ina ndewra e leydi ndii feewde tufɗe Arsiipel kanari ( to Espaañ ) .
E koye men eɗen mbiya eɗen ngoodi , e ɓetanɗe goɗɗe , en ngoodaani .
E kulol , kanko gorko oo o ɓamiri noon gaas oo , o weddii .
E kuulal Seŋngoor , ndu relatif ko jejjitaaɗo !
E kuuɓal , 90% oon teret waɗi ko caggal 1672 , caggal cosgol to Angalteer fedde wiyeteende " Compagnie royale d’Afrique " .
E kuuɓal , min etotoo ko wonde moccooɓe , mahooɓe e ƴeewooɓe ko foti , kono ɗuum haɗataa min aybinde dille laamu nguu so tawii geɗe ɗee njahaani ko feewti e yiilngo leydi ndii .
E laawol , Hammee jippii e galle Hebbeeɓe , waɗti yetteede Kebbee .
E laawol mawngol ɗo sate laamɓe ɓee fotnoo rewde ɗoo , ardiiɓe ɓee peewnitno laabi e kuɓeeje ɗee fof , ngam etaade suuɗde kala maale baasal e wuro Ndakaaru ngo .
E laawol maɓɓe , kala ɗo ɓe ndaaklii , ɓe ƴettii yettoode ɓurnoonde yaajde e oonɗoon nokku .
E laawol ngol , daddoowo oo na yima ina wiya : mbele Alla ɓesngu am daɗa e bone nooroo .
E laawol ngol , o woni emijtaade : " dañɗo kaŋŋe kay mette mum nduŋtimaama .
E laawol ngol , ɓe mbirtiima gure keewɗe .
E laawol ngol toɓo heewngo heɓtii mo .
E lebbi battindiiɗi ɗii , ñawu koronaa hawridinii aduna oo kala , yooɓiima pittaali keewɗi , teeŋti noon e leyɗe hirnaange ɗee , kono kadi ronkaama dañaneede safaara haa won naalanke gooto qirrii , e nder jimɗi mum wonde " koronaa koko horana " .
E lebbi cakkitiiɗi ɗii , cumuuji ladde keewɗi mbaɗii to Portugaal , Kanadaa , Dowlaaji Amerik dentuɗi , Itaali , Farayse tawi ina jeyaa eko saabii ɗum en nguleeki .
E lewru noowammbar 2011 , o yuɓɓini ko lappol feewde Inaal , ngam juuroyaade gaññeeje 28 kooninke ɓaleejo waranooɓe ñalnde 28 noowammbar 1990 .
E lewru noowammbar 2018 , Pekin saaktii muul laana
E lewru oktoobar 2000 nomaa-mi Gardo Nokku Ngenndiijo Senaare ( ko anndiranoo CNH ) , caggal ɗuum , e hitaande 2005 mbaɗaa-mi Gardo Duɗal Ngenndiwal Njiylaawuuji paatuɗi e Cellal Renndo ( Institut National de Recherches en Santé Publique ) .
E lewru suliyee 2021 , Alaseri fellitii taƴde jotondiral mum e leydi Maruk caggal nde nodditi jooɗaniiɗo ɗum to Rabaa ; woytoraandu mum ko koohoowo maruknaajo won ɗo wiyi " ina wondii e keɓgol jeytaare mum diwaan berbeer en keedɗo fuɗɗaange worgo alaseri " , alaseri reftini heen ko haɗde abiyoŋaaji Maruk rewde e weeyo mum .
E lewru sulyee won e maɓɓe njani e hooreejo hilifaaɓe , hono wul Waagef , alaa fof ko keddani ɗum .
E leydi hee huunde hawrantu am tan mi wada so hawranaani-mi mi wiya hay loppet ( ko enen tan mbiyi hay loppet kono Farmbaal wonaa noon wiyri ngati en majjaani so ceɗɗo hanki sekii no jaabortoo ) .
E leydi ndii , hay daande meeɗaa
E leyɗe Orop fof ko hono ɗii miijooji bonɗi loowaa e hakkillaaji sukaaɓe .
E maanditaare 60-ɓiire jeytaare leydi men , Muhammed wul Sheex Gaswaani saytoraani yargo 28 koninke ɓaleejo , warhoore bonɗo nde warkoyeeɓe ndakmitorii ngam tuftoraade añamnguraagu keblaangu .
E maayirɗe hitaande nde , Goomu ciynoowu e mudda naatni ɓaleeɓe e gardagol fiyakuuji leydi ndi , leeɗe ɗo ɓaleeɓe njoñanoo pusaa .
E maayirɗe teeminannde jeenaɓiire , laamɓe Ganaa njaajtini njiimaandi mum feewde hirnaange , e dow diiwaan kaŋŋe Ngalam kam e Tekruur , saraaji Jenne e Tummbuktu ; feewde rewo kadi e dow won ɗiin leƴƴi ( tirbiiji ) gonnooɗi e moraande Saharaa .
E majje ina sifee ɗe limtat-mi ɗee
E miijo Huygens lewño ko onndo tan , alaa ñiso .
E miijo Newton , lewño ina jogii ñiso , wayi ko no ɓalli keddiiɗi ɗii nii .
E miijo Riisi noon , ɗuum waawi wonde ko he sarɗi gooto : Riisi waawa jokkude njiimaandi mum he Orop fuɗnaange .
E miijo Trump boom , maa sosiyateeji Siin njaɓ wallitde e njoɓdi kubbal ngal woto ɗi mbaasde kiliyaneeɓe majji nder Amerik .
E miijo am , goomu gannde kese ena foti soseede tawa ko fulɓe jeyaaɓe e Fuutaaji ɗii kala ngoni heen .
E miijo am , hannde kala mo ezen povvana , yoo taw ko nafoowo en !
E miijo amen ko bonnude jawdi .
E miijo fuutankooɓe , Lislaam ina foti huutoreede ngam salaade njimmandi njananndi e/walla haɓtaade laamuuji tuugiiɗi e fenaande , gaadoraaɗi walla tumarankooji kala .
E miijo makko " kala nde Wagner naati leydi , lomtotoo ɗoon ko pamaran doole , baasal mum ɓeydoo , kisal ustoo , wonta leydi kalfaandi " .
E miijo makko , so won ko leyɗeele catiiɗe ɗee mbaawi yoo ndokku-ɓe kaɓirɗe e jogitaaje ngam foolde ceeramaagu Tuwaareg en to rewo leydi ndii .
E miijo makko , won ko laamu Ganaa moofti ko heewi ko en nganndaa , tee wiɗtooji biiɗlewal ine poti waɗeede he nokku gonɗo hakkunde Tiisit e Waadaan , kadi e nder diiwaanuuji Tagante e Adraar ɗii Gollordu woɗndu kadi udditii ñalnde 23 ndee faatundu e cellingol binndi e gootiɗingol ɗemɗe sooninke ngal .
E miijo makko , wonaa kuudetaa sabu hay waadere ƴiiƴal rufaani .
E miijo makko , ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo woni tawo koe fuɗɗoode mum , hay so tawii won ko puɗɗi-ɗen yiyde heen .
E miijo makko jeyi leydi keeriiɗo jeyaa ko e jojjanɗe kala aadee to bannge renndo e to bannge politigi kono kadi jeyi ndenndaandi ina jojji e kala ngenndi ngam gaddanaade ɓesgu mum ƴellitaare huuftidinnde .
E miijo maɓɓe , ko ngañgu makko e tuubakooɓe reɓi haa e ngañgu makko e mawɗo diiwaan Laaw , addani mo joñtoyaade Gawdal Koolɗi , kanko e almuɓɓe makko e mahde toon tata hare .
E miijo maɓɓe nii winndannde kala foti ko rokkude almuɓɓe njiylawu ( memmbo , gagga ) , jannginoowo ko jirwinoowo , ɗowoowo golle tan , ko janngoowo woni nehaade ekkagol .
E miijo maɓɓe won añaan en suuɗiiɓe e nder laamu nguu , pelliti haɗde ɓeeɗoo sukaaɓe wasɓe ɗannaade ngalɗoo ɗanngal ngal mbeeɓaaka .
E miijo yimɓe heewɓe , wiyde ina farlina " kartal koɗaagu " , ko waɗde golle polis Farayse fotnoo waɗde , tee faandaare mum haa hannde ko " yiɗde ɗawde ɓaleeɓe Muritani ngenndaagu mum en , oon sahaa gooto mo laamu Muritani winndittoo saharaanaaɓe e malinaaɓe " .
E miijo yimɓe ɓee , so neɗɗo baaɗo no ELON MUSK haalii ɗum , ɗum firti ko WhatsApp nattii hoolnaade , hay so tawii noon wonaa ɗuum o wiyi .

E nder nguu njillu makko habbanoongu ko ɓooyi , o yewtidan e yerondiraaɗo makko mo Ruusiya Vladimir Putiin ko faati e huuwondiral hakkunde Peken e Mosku , kaŋun e alhaali lannugol hare hakkunde Ukreeniya e Ruusiya huunde nde Putiin holli no weltori , no udditanii kaaldal .
E nder nguun batu o holliti ko gondugol makko e feere Abdul Ajiiju , yiɗde ɗum yuɓɓinde wooteeji ɗi ngonaa nanondiraaɗi , no U .
E nder nguun njillu poilitikyankeewu Jeneraal Seekubaa Konaate Hooreejo laamu luɓal balloriima oon fartaŋŋe yaɓɓi koyɗe mum yahi yettinoyi duwaawu fa'nde e Muusaa Dadiss Kamara Hooreejo gppmu CNDD , sabu sankaare ɓiyi gorko biyeteeɗo Moribaa Jiñoor cankiiɗo ñalnde 16 lewru Juko to leydi Kanadaa caggal nde yoolii e doorumaaru ndiyam ( pisin ndiyam ) .
E nder nguurndam kulle lakde ( ladde ) , keewal hinaa heewi heen , nafoore .
E nder nguurndam makko ena laaɓi wonde geɗe tati ena laaɓti heen : Fiɓnde , Duwaawu e Jaambaraagal .
E nder nguurndam makko o jibini ɓiɗɗo gorko ina wiyee Sam-uun , oon ne Alla waɗi ɗum Annabi , o jibini kadi Daawuuda , oon woni Baaba mum Sileymaani , ( JKM ) .
E nder nguurndam pobbi ko arɗo oo jogotoo ko heewi e ngonka muumen .
E nder oon kampaañ , heewɓe njooɓtiriima ɓe huutoraade ngalu buur kam e njuɓɓudi mum .
E nder oon mudda , Amerik alaa ko yeeyi nder Siin so wonaa 178 miliyaar dolaar ( ko ɓuri heewde heen ko soja ( ñebbe maɓɓe ) , diwooje e otooji .
E nder oon referendum lanndaaji politik leydi ndi fof eerii ko yoo militaaji mu’en mbiy " eey " constitution keso sabu ko kanko jibinta cufal horeejo leydi ñalnde 31 lewru Samwiyee e hitaande aroore nde fayndaare nde ko tottinde siwil en jappeere nde e lewru Seeɗto ( avril ) .
E nder oon sahaa , ma mi nelan hoohooɓe Tooro fof , mi waawna ɗum en kubbal teemedde nay ( 400 ) ngaari , e ujunere ( 1000 ) fetel , e pucci noogaas ( 20 ) .
E nder oon ɗoon ngaanumma , Alla lonngini mo gorko gooto ina wiyee Aawaja ɓiy Unuku ina addana mo lekki kii , ko ɗoon o fuɗɗii foofde .
E nder oto hee , jeewte ɗee ɓeydii jirwude kadi .
E nder poosuuji ƴiiƴam nay fof , heen gooto ko beddeteeɗo sabu mum soomde antiseen ( antigène ) HBs .
E nder renndo Fulɓe , roondaade gacce , ine waawi yerondireede e buruuti , wuɗo maa rafi ɗaɗi ngaanndi ɗi cafrotaako .
E nder renndo eɗen njogii pulareeje ina mawnina debbo yeru : " Njodom fooli tuuba " , " arde debbo bonaani , arde gorko bonaani , boni tan ko jaasde yeru mum " e konnguɗi mawninooji gorko : " Tuuba ko ngoota ko gorko duhii "
E nder renndo men , jaaynde ina roondii ɗee nafooje fof , kono kadi ina roondii potle goɗɗe ( fotdeeji goɗɗi ) : hono tammbaade ɗemngal e pinal ɗoon ɗo baawe laamu nduŋtii ɗumen , ɗaccidi ɗumen e koye mumen .
E nder rewɓe sappo ɓe heen nayo meeɗiino hebleede to bannge ñootol , heen ɗiɗo ( Rewɓe Boowel 1 ) ko fuɗɗiiɓe ɗigginde tigi rigi , darnde maɓɓe e tiinnaare maɓɓe ina teskaa no feewi .
E nder sato saɗtungo , e jogogal kakindiingal , ɓe mbaawii waɗtude " hakke kabrugol " goonga laatiiɗo .
E nder sifaa njooɗndam rewɓe , Hawaa alaa mo fotndetee njooɗndam e ɓiɓɓe mum , ɗum woni enen , gila ndeen haa jooni , ko noon kadi jikku mum moƴƴiri .

E nder winndannde ndee , ko Konaate .
E nder winndere hee kala , laamuuji njokkii haɗde yimɓe naftoraade hakke seppude .
E nder winndere ndee , ina hasii " diwisiyoŋ " ko taƴre konu moƴƴere waɗnde hakkunde 10 000 e 30 000 koninke ( soldaat ) .
E nder winndere ndee , ko miliyaruuji baawɗe !
E nder wiɗto makko , Abel yuurniima Pekaan , o asi , o aastii , o ubbiti heen gannde baɗɗe faayiida .
E nder wootere e jime makko , o werlinooma naamnal laaɓtungal , o wiyi " holi ko woni ngenndiyanke " ?
E nder yiyde am , haŋki nde kulle ngoodi ndee e ɗii nokkuuji peraani tawaa , e oon sahaa , hina sella tawaa , ndu woni heen fof , heɓe njogii nooɓe mbi`ata ndu .
E nder ñalɗi hee yuɓɓinaama heen yeewtere .

E nder ɓanndu naange fattooru ndu , aɗa ɓeydoo mutde e nder heen tan , nguleeki ena ɓeydoo mawnude , haa ɗum ɓura milioqaaji e milioqaaji degereeji .

E nder ɓesngu nguu , eddaaji kala njaltii heen : woɗeeɓe e ɓaleeɓe , gorko e debbo kala ko heen njalti , ko aldaa e luural to annduɓe .

E nder ɓiɗɓe sappo ɓe baaba makko , Muusaa Bukari SAAR daññoo ɓee , ko kanko daɗi e kala banngeeji .
E nder ɓoccoonɗe ɗee , ko yimɓe , rewɓe e worɓe , e dimaaɗi njaltata heen .
E nder ɗeen jeewti ; omo wiyatnoo : " Leñol fulɓe ko leñol ɓooyngol , sabu ɗemngol pulaar , ko gila e Baaba men Aadama , Baaba Aadama haalatnoo ko Pulaar ndeen noon ko e leñol fulɓe o jeyaa .
E nder ɗeen ɗoon balɗe capanɗe nay ndeke laamɗo guurtaaɗo e warde sukaaɓe oo maayii .
E nder ɗii mbaawkaaji tati , ko mbaawka ñaawoore ɓuri himmude ngam mahgol Dowla ngenndiijo .
E nder ɗiin , ko SAWAB tan dañi njeñtudi moƴƴiri , tolniindi e njeñtudi Biram Dah Abeid heɓnoo e woote gardagol leydi jawtuɗe ɗee .
E nder ɗiin diiwanuuji , gure 11 memaama .
E nder ɗiin duuɓi , heen 30 o waɗi ɗum ko e naalaŋkaagal .
E nder ɗiin manndaaji ɗiɗi ɗi Mammadu Tannjaa waɗi ina sikkanoo hankadi ndi loosii e potal , kono nde tawnoo persidaaji Afrik ndeenaani konnguɗi mu’en hay go’tol Mammadu Tannjaa hoyre mum loka wayli constitution dottunooɗo happu persidaa e manndaaji ɗiɗi , wiyi aadanii Allah ko maa rokkee manndaa tataɓo sabu gasnaani ko yiɗnoo gollaade ko fof .
E nder ɗiin ɗoon ñalɗi wiɗto jooɗiiɗi ñalnde 23 haa 25 suwee 2014 to Otel Tufeyla e Nuwaasoot , geɗe kimmuɗe njeewtaama heen .
E nder ɗiiɗoo duuɓi 10 cakkitiiɗi , musibbaaji tago 13 mbaɗii .
E nder ɗoyngol hee , o hoyɗi debbo nayeejo ina holla mo laawol , tottori mo horde waɗnde ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe E ngool koyɗol , debbo oo anndinii Goppaaɗo wonde omo foti aawde ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe ɗee so naange fuɗi .
E nder ɗoyngol ngol o hoyɗitinaa Hawaa ina takkii mo , o wuurorii bannge mo Hawaa woni oo , ko adii nde Hawaa tagetee .
E nder ɗum Yiilirde yettinii kabaaru wonde ɓe ngoni ko e njiilaw ngam laartude dingire e nder diiwaan Ndakaaru , Maatam , Wuro Soogi , Tammbaakunndaa e Nuwaasot ( Muritani ) e doggi kadi udditaama wonande kala jiɗɗo walla paalaaɗo heɓde parsel .
E nder ɗum omo sikki wonde heptinde goodal ngaal daawal niɓɓal e nder taariik leydi men ko huunde haannde mbele hoolaare ina jibinee e nder hakkillaaji e ɓerɗe .

E nder ɗuum , UNESCO hollitii dalillaaji keewɗi teeŋtinooji jaŋde tuugiinde he ɗemngal neeniwal/nokkuwal .
E nder ɗuum , ardiiɓe ɓee , gooto e mum en kala ina huutoroo ɓallagol mum laamu nguu , ngam honde ngalu e keɓe leydi ndii , haa ko jeyi keeriiɗo e jeyi buur ndenti ceerndotaako .
E nder ɗuum , e min kabra on wonde bitik mo ANAIR mahnoo to Foonde Maayel yanii e balɗe ɓennuɗe ɗe , huunde addonoore en sikkitaade moƴƴugol golle ɗe .

E nder ɗuum , ina moƴƴi nde sukaaɓe ɓee njokkondirta e jeyanooɓe e maɓɓe , wuurɓe haa hannde , waawɓe seedtaade nguurndam yimɓe mawɓe , jaambareeɓe , darinooɓe darnde tiiɗnde , kono ɓe nganndaaka .
E nder ɗuum , ina ɗaminaa maa " nokkuuji leppunooɗi ɓeydo heewde toɓooli , nokkuuji joorɗi ɓeydoo yoorde " .
E nder ɗuum , jaaynde ganndal wiyeteende Sciences et Avenir jokkondirii e haralleeɓe gollotooɓe to sarwiis ɗaɗi Opitaal jaaɓi haaɗtirde Brest ( Farayse ) ngam hollitde on peeje paddorɗe ñawu nguu .
E nder ɗuum , kadi o yiyi ndiwri ndaneeri ina diftoo yimɓe ina moɗa ɗumen e hakkunde kaaƴe ɗiɗi mawɗe , aduna oo ina ɓawli ina wiyi kurum , ina woni e nder niɓɓere , e nder koyɗol ngol laatiima yimɓe ɓee fof ina ndenti ɗo gootel ina mbayi no ummiiɓe e awooɓe nih , ina njeeya liɗɗi mumen .
E nder ɗuum , ko ina 200 Senegaalnaajo taccinaama laawol gootol , sabu mum en yooɓtoreede waasde jogaade " kartal koɗaagu " .
E nder ɗuum , ko maa 2/3 ( tataɓe ɗiɗi ) dipiteeji ɗii ngoota njaɓaani nde goomu nguu wasaa sompeede .
E nder ɗuum kadi , ko rewɓe ɓuri loreede heen to Dental dowlaaji Amerik , to Riisi e to Poloñ .
E nder ɗuum won sukaaɓe muuynooɓe , njuɗaa , yummiraaɓe mum en tottaa , yoo nyaam .

E ngaan saanga kadi taw appaare mo o naniratnoo oo boni , ko he binndol tan o haaldotoo .

E ngaan sahnga leydi fof
E ngalɗoo daawal ( 2006 faade hannde ) , jaaynde ndee ina waylii so ƴeewdaama e daawal gadanal ngal ( 1980-1989 ) : nde waɗtii yaltude lewru kala , tee jooni nde ɓuri duumaade ; ŋari mayre ɓeydiima ; nde ɓeydiima mawnude , sibu ndeen ko ɗereeji 4 haa 8 tokoosi so heewii , hannde ko 8 mawɗi cowiiɗi laabi ɗiɗi gadani ɗii .
E ngalɗoo daawal Fedde ndee dañii hooreeɓe ɗiɗo , Mammadu Siley Bah e Umar Idriisa Saawo .
E ngalɗoo daawal doɓindagol keɓe hakkunde 2018 e 2025 , ƴeewirde naange ndee duumotoo ko e jirlol nde lommet mum ɓadii Naange , e nde ceɓɓet mum tolnii jirlol Venus .
E ngo hoɗee jeeri dow rewo .
E ngo huutoroo denndaangal kabaruuji meteyoo goodaaɗi : ƴeewndagol to les ( leydi ) e dow ( weeyo ) ummoriingol e diwooje daddooje guubiliiji , nate radaaruuji e satelitaaji ( njowitiikon ) .
E ngo jeyaa kadi e yerɓooji ɓurɗi juutde , sibu ngo waɗii hojomaaji 8 haa 10 .
E ngo yettoo 55 cm to ŋorol peccol .
E ngol laawol , oto alaa , saretaaji keewaani .
E ngol sokli ngenndiyankooɓe saasɓe , e kala sahaa , e kala nokku .
E ngol waawi wuurde duuɓi
E ngol waawi wuurde duuɓi 40 .
E ngol ɗoo laawol , a yaafaama .
E ngolɗoo laawol , njokkanten banndiraaɓe ko no Girooɓe ngardi , ɓe tawi e nokku oo e no ngondiri e ɓeen .
E ngolɗoo laawol ko e jarribo min ngonnoo .
E ngoo-ɗoon weeyo , alaa fof ko waawi toon fooɗde ma , sabu alaa jeyɗo ngoo-ɗoon weeyo .
E ngoo-ɗoon weeyo , so yiɗii potaa e ñiiwa teddude , walla mbayaa hoyde no ɓowngu , hay batte a ɓetataa toon !
E ngoon saato , mawɗo leydi ndii yaafiima Ibraahiima Siisee cuɓanooɗo ngam lomtaade Usmaan Ngom .
E ngoon senngo ɗemɗe neeniije maa ngenndiije so tawii ɗemngal Farayse gollorteengal e nder birooji laamu ngu ɓennii Nijeer ina mari ( jogii ) ko ina tolnoo e ɗemɗe jeeɗiɗi ngenndiyankooje mawɗe keɓtinaaɗe tawa kadi ko kaaleteeɗe e nder diiwanuuji leydi ndii .
E ngoon yeeso , min mbasiyoo
E ngoon yeeso kadi , deftere men ndee ko jarriborde sabu won ɗo kóŋnguɗi góóti mbinndiraa e mayre e fannuuji ɗiɗi céérɗi , ɗuum fóf noon haa yimɓe mbaawa ƴeewande koye mumen hol heen binndól ɓurngól yuɓɓude .
E ngootu e njilluuji ɗi Ibraahiim yillinooɓe noddimo e teelal , yeewtaniri mo muuyaande ndee e newaare .
E ngoɗɗeeki , laatotoo e gite men ko ndiyam , walla weendu , aɗa ɓeydoo ɓadaade tan , e ɗum ɓeydoo woɗɗitaade .
E ngu joganaa peeje tati paddorɗe ɓurɗe teeŋtude , hono ceekgol
E nguurndam makko , alaa ko wonnoo ngoƴa makko so wonaa yettinde teddungal ngal Fuuta fof waɗi e makko , e teddeendi pawaandi e balabe makko ɗe .
E njettoraaji makko teeŋtuɗi fayde e Tuldenaaɓe yuɓɓinɓe nguu ɗoo ñalngu haa teeŋti kadi e musiɗɗo Abuu Sih e gollal maantinngal ngal o waɗi .
E njiimaandi lannda Union Progressiste Senegalaise , oon parti gooto e leydi ndii mo o ardinoo , ardiiɓe ɓee njaltini ko peeje muusɗe to bannge kaɓagol , lorlugol ; ɓe kulɓina , ɓe njagga , ɓe coka , ɓe lorla kala serindiiɓe , ɓe njaha haa ɓe " mbartina ɓe " ( nduñaɓe e wartaade ) .
E no bayyinaango batu jaagorɗe saaktiri .
E no daarol wiyri , ko e ɗiin sahaaji pidduɗi woni nde Sammba yiyti Ɗeɓi-duunde Jeeriyel Tummbere to Tummbere Jiinge , fotde 10 km , rewo Jowol ɗo o jibinaa ɗoo .
E no o haaldi ko oon gorko o yeeɓatnoo e oon sahaa , hay so tawii e wiyde makko " alaa fof biyoowo ko kañum janngini mi naalaŋkaagal " .
E no ɓe mbiirata ɗum e kala sahaa : " Ko jamma juuti fof haɗataa naange fuɗɗe " .
E noowammbar 1842 , ɓiy Muhammed Bello biyeteeɗi Aali roni laamu to Sokoto , caggal sankaare Atiku .
E o sahaa , galle keytanaaɓe mo Wurosoogi nana e juuɗe laamu .
E oo beeetawe , duule ina ciŋki asamaan , weeyo ina higgiɗi , henndu ɓuuɓndu ina wutta , henndu ummiindu dow leydi leppundi , ina siŋkii huɗo bewko , leɗɗe biltuɗe , henndu uurndu .
E oo fatara mo laamu fotnoo addude safaara jojjuɗo woni ko e weddaade naange ɓooɗe , so fellitde haaɗnude mbinnditagol naatooɓe ekkol e duɗe laamu , tawa naworaani duɗe keeriɗe .
E oo sahaa , e yowitaade e ardiiɓe fedde mooliiɓe ɓe , laamu nguu wiyi ko waawaa sakkan’de hay gooto feere sabu ngu suwaa jooɗaade tawo .
E oo sahaa leyɗe keewɗe ine nganniyii huutoraade ɗi , ko nanndi e Inndonoosi , Turki , Maruk , Beresiil Maruk maa huutoro kadi ñakku ngoɗngu ummortooɗo ɗum to fedde Suwed-Biritaaniire wiyeteende " AstraZeneca " , hollitnde ko sakkitii koo wonde yuumteende feso mum tolniima e 100% ( ɗum firti kala pesiiɗo lekki mum sellat tan ) .
E oo sahaa mo mbinndaten , o waɗii ko ɓuri teemedde tato maayɗo e
E oo yonta alaa daliilu mo konu Mali waɗiri ɗee golle , fawiiɓe e hakkeeji aadee " .
E oo ñalawma fulɓe mbaasi Murtoɗo , bawɗi puusii , taballeeji ceekiima .
E oo ñalawma moni kala nana woya , kono jaŋngo ko jaleeɗe keŋ-keŋ lomtotoo .
E oo ɗo sahaa e nder goomu E , ko diɗɗal Barooɗe Senegaal ngal ardii kam e diɗɗal Barooɗe Kameruun , caggal nde ɓeen piyi diɗɗal duunde MORIIS tati e gootel ( 3-1 ) .

E oon sahaa gooto , huunde e ɓiɗɓe leydi ndii ina tampinee tampere ɓurtunde nde hay gooto waawaa miijaade , haa ko binnditagol maɓɓe dartinaama e nokkuuji binnditgol keewɗi .
E oon sahaa gooto mo yimɓe leydi ndii ɓeydotoo , faggugu mum ina ɓeydoo yaajde e ƴellitaade , njuɓɓudi laamu ina ɓeydoo saraade , jagge ina ɓeydoo sokleede , Muritani ina yaajtina jotondire mum banngeeji fof e winndere ndee kala , geɗal sooninkooɓe kañum woni tan ko e ustaade ñalnde kala , haa wonti hay huunde wonande nokkuuji keewɗi .
E oon sahaa gooto mukaataaji ɗiɗi kesi ( Saami jowitiiɗo e Daklet Nuwaadibu e mukaataa Dar jowitiiɗo e diiwaan Hod hirnaange , tawi laamorgo mum ko Nbeiket Lahuwash ) cosaama e nokkuuji pamɗuɗi yimɓe .

E oon sahaa heewi wonde ko kikiiɗe .
E oon sahaa heewi wuurde ko e kedde walla geɗe ɓurɗe weeɓde foolde .

E oon sahaa ina waawi waɗtude yande e yimɓe , nde wonnoo neɗɗo ko e kulle ɓurɗe weeɓde warde to baŋŋe barooɗe , so ngardii ɗuum .

E oon sahaa ko hare mum mawnde e deye ɗee .

E oon sahaa ko o nokku kenaniiɗo biltugol nguurndam yimɓe , sibu ko weendu yaajndu wonnoo , tawi saraaji mum ko dunli leɗɗe cukkiɗi , kam e loope ( paraaje ) moƴƴooje ndema .

E oon sahaa ko Ñaawirde Toownde ñaawata mo .
E oon sahaa maa en nganndu so a nde jogori walla jogoraani buɓɓaade e men .

E oon sahaa noon , nde wonde karallaagal e doole fedde ndee won ɗo kaaɗi , ko ɓuri saɗtude e jaltingol jaaynde nde ko binndol masiŋ ngol , kebbitingol ɗereeji ɗi edenndingol kaayitaaji ɗi teppa ɗum , saka e oon sahaa min pooɗaninoo ko yaltinde e tonngoode kala ujunere ( 1000 ) tummbitere .
E oon sahaa noon , sukaaɓe ɓee e dooltinde ɗo tuddunde amen ɗoo , mi naataano ɓe , hakkille am alaano e ko ɓe mbaɗatnoo koo .

E ooɗoo sahaa , 22 , 3 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer ine ɓilii hakkunde men e mayre , kono ɗoo e duuɓi 20 tawata ko nde ɓadtiima en no feewi , sibu ko hedde miliyoŋaaji 2 km fat wonata hakkunde mayre e Leydi men .

E raɓɓiɗinaade haɗi keewi haa maay , kono kadi Ko noon ɗi mbay seertude ko ɗuum saabii won heen baɗooji connexion gratuit won heen ɗi mbaɗataa hannde kam nih keewɗi heen mbattaa , kono nde wonnoo fof wonaa gootum wadde gooto emen fof ena waawi etaade huutoraade ɗum ndaara so tawii maa yaa walla yahataa .
E raɓɓiɗinde haala tan binndanɗe keewɗe peeñninii sifaaji no njiyaagu nguu foti tabitinireede : cogguuji rewɓe ɓee fawaade e duuɓi mum en , hol no worɓe ɓee potata yettoraade ɓe , hakkeeji ɗi horɓe ɓee njogii ekn ɓe ndallinirta ɗum ko wiyde " ko nii renndooji ganni juulɓe ngollortonoo " .

E sifaa kuuɓtodinɗo tolnooji jaŋde ɗii , wonande almuɓɓe ɓe njanngaani so wonaa Pulaar , ko tati tan
E siftinde , Mammadu Ñaŋ adii naatnude tawii omo ɓoornii wutte goobu Senegaal ko ñande 27 lewru mbooy 2002 , tawii diɗɗal Barooɗe Senegaal ina hawri e kippu dowla Boliwi .
E siftinde , ɗiɗɗal ko e dow gardangol Ceerno Mamadu Lamiin Lih , Ceerno Abuu Lih ( Wuro Soogi ) , Ceerno Mohamadu Saamasa ( Maatam ) , to Tooro e Halayɓe e Laaw jeeri e waalo ko Ceerno Aamadu Lamin Jiggo , imaam raatib wuro Demet e Ceerno Haamiidu Wele imaam raatib Siwre Caamɓe .
E siftinde e oon ñalawma , caggal nde Wadd noddi ɓe , o fuɗɗinooma yennude ɓe ; huunde nde Mammadu Ceerno Talla , hooreejo jaaynde " L’AS " waawaano muñde , sibu o jaabiima Wadd ogeddi , sibu e no o haaldi , " a waawaa noddude yimɓe e yeewtere e diisongiral , tawa aɗa yenna ɗumen " .
E siftinde hono Kpatcha woniino jaagorngal topitiigal ndeenka leydi Togoo .
E siftinde wonde wuro ngoo ena jogii 365 ɗanniyaŋke wuurɓe e ɗee ɗoo leyɗeele limtaaɗe .
E sikke , sahaa mayre ko gila e jamanuuji ɓennuɗi , ɓooyɗi , ɗi ngoɗɗaani hade-daartol .
E sikke am , en potii woppude miijo wonde kala mo waɗaani ko mbaɗat-en koo ko jaŋfante walla ko gaño leñol .
E sikke maa aan neɗɗo piɗirat-mi ko woynude , gaañde e warde .
E taawilaaji , wiyaama won e maɓɓe yaaɓe haa mbii deftere ndee fotaani jaŋngeede e duɗe ɗe laamu halfi .
E tee ina laaɓi ko ngal kiiɓirgal ɓaleeɓe tan , ngati kaltiiɗo e maɓɓe kala nani janngina sukaabe mum e ekkolaaji ɗo e Moritani , ɗo jaŋngintaake so wonaa e farayse e enngele ; joom num ruttoo haalda kadi e jannginoobe nder galleeji ( kadi tawo ko ɓaleeɓe , sabu ɓe mbiyata ko ɓeen ɓuri waawde farayse , ekw ) .
E tee ina teskaa U .
E tee kanko , mo kaaldu mi o , omo yiɗnoo arde ko haaju jaggi mo .
E tee ne , ko ɓe njoɓetee koo alaa no wayi .
E tee so en ƴeewii , ine jeyaa e ko addanta neɗɗo hormeede , hersee , ittanee geɗal , ko suuraare , mawɓe men ine mbiya : " Woto bannde en nganndu no nguurdu-ɗaa , ko duwaaw " .
E tee ɓe ŋakkiranooka ceeɓndam jiyle e fewjiyankaagal .
E teeminannde 15ɓiire , laamɗo katolik purtugeeco , biyeteeɗo " Henri le Navigateur " miijii tafngo " caravelles " ( laaɗe ndiyam mbiyaa noon ) .
E teeminannde 17ɓiire luural ina woodnoo heen .
E teskaade e yoga e yimɓe , hono ɗeeɗoo ƴiiwoole e heewde ndiyam wayrii yiyeede .
E teskaade gardiiɗo Fedde Suleymaani Baal to Senegaal ko Seneraal e nder konunkaagu Senegaal .
E teskaade teemedde ɗemɗe maayooje , njejjitteeɗe , muumaaɗe , kaɗaaɗe haaleede ekn , UNESCO toɗɗii 21 Colte ñalngu ciiftinoowu winndere fotdeeji potɗi daraneede to baŋnge ɗemɗe .

E teskuya am , jaayde ndee ene wuuri ngurndam nduumiɗam .

E tuugnaade e biyeeji coodaaɗi maa jeeyaaɗi ñalnde heen ɗi ko ina tolnoo e teemedde njeetato e njeeyano ( 809 passagers ) ɗanniyanke ina njoli e reedu makka eɓe ngondi e militeeruuji capanɗe njoyo e ɗiɗo ( 52 militaires ) hakkunde dognooɓe e tamnaaɓe kisal e nder laana ka .
E tuugnaade e faandaare ɗanngal ngal , so yiytude ɓarakke nguurndam ɓooyɗam , ɓeeynirka kaa juurnaa ko e nokku baɗɗo mbaañiri ( leydi Mbaañ ) ɓooyndi , taweteendi he nder ngaska kaa .
E tuugnaade e limooje mooftaaɗe e duttorɗe Duɗal Jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Tuskegee to Alabama ( Amerik ) , hakkunde 1890 e 1965 ko 2 911 ɓaleejo mbardaa piggal .
E tuugnaade e won e wiɗtooji , heewɓe ine njenanaa wonde ɗoo e duuɓi 8 ( ɗoo e 2030 ) maa nattu soklude golloyaade to birooji .
E tuugnaade e ɗeen caɗeele , ɓuri heen teskeede , ko ina wona ujjunnaaje njeetato ( 8 000 ) almuudo jahroowo e duubi ɗiɗi haa duuɓi sappo e joyi njelotoo e nder mbeddaaji Ndakaaru .
E tuugnorgal ñalawma oo , jeewte jowitiiɗe e kuutoragol karallaagal kesal e batte mum e dow deftere mbaɗaama .

E wiyde annduɓe , ɗee geɗe ine njotondiri e ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ngol .

E yeeso artigal 65 lutlutndal , niɓɓal e fannuuji limtinɗi , buumirangal cuddi , sompaa he mum cugge , soɗaa he mum mogge ngam newnoyde taranɗe gultoytooɗe , baartoytooɗe hakkeeji loŋnginanooɗi , won heewɓe dartoriiɓe hujjikinanaade ngal , e rewrude e dalillaaji ɓurɗi nuuntoriɗde .
E yeeso cinnde ɗee , ɗo , he mbaadi wuurannde laaɓtunde , kuulal ngal holliti anniya mum farlude e hakkeeji men janngude e ɗemɗe men rewneede ɗumen e koolkisol cakkitoowol jaɓgol walla calogol kuuɓtidinngol mumen , e yeeso ngeen tooñannge heewɓe ngonii eewnotooɓe en he jebbilaare maa hillanooɓe ngal kuulal , caggal ñaagunde peewniton kiistaron kon ɓe njenanaa kuuɓnoytaake .

E yeru : Ceerno Suleymaani Baal mo Boode e jammuule ; Abdul Bookara Kan mo Daabiya ; Elimaan Buubakar Kan mo Dimat ; Baydi Kacce Paam mo Giyaa ; Alfa Umaar Ceerno Baylaa mo Mbummba ( walla Kanel ) ; Yonta almamaagal e nder Fuuta Tooro ; Fuuta saanga Laam Termes , walla e yonta deeniyankooɓe ; Dartagol leƴƴi Afrik walla Asii esaanga peeñgol koloñaal en
E yeru : Haalpulaar en / Fulɓe mbiyi : Mawɗo soodaani ganndal , ɓooy wuurde ; Ko woni e lahal fof , ma juuɗe njiytu ; Ko hooynantenoo , so saamii , hoccete ; Hiraande ko jamma ñaamatee , kono fewjetee ko ñalawma .
E yeru ko nde fuɗɗii gollaade , ko sosde Ekkol piriwee ( ecole privee ) jaaroowo e duuɓi tati jooni , walla tafde kippu fettooɓe fuko koyɗe ( équipe de football ) jaaroowo e tolno ɗimmo ( deuxieme division ) , ekwn En paamii tan , ndeke fedde ndee jooɗaaki .

E yiyannde Alaseri , ɗum ko moojobere waɗiraande yo " yerɓin leydi mum " .
E yiyannde makko , " so PDS ina jokki e ɗee baɗe feewi ko e njomu mbonngu .
E yiyannde makko , hare ɗemɗe ɗee nattii tan wonde darnde pineyaŋkeewal kono nde arii haa nde naati e dawrugol : " kala jiɗɗo ɗemɗe ɗee ɓamtoo , yoo daro to bannge e politik , haɓee mbele laamuuji ɗii ena mbaɗta ɗemɗe ɗee ɗemɗe dowla , ɗe mbaɗta janngee de e duɗe laamu .
E yiyannde makko , ko hakke makko yani e Wojere .
E yiyannde men ɗuum jaraani loskude .
E yiyannde ñuuñu , ɗuum ko ɓurndoolaagu tan ngu neɗɗo jogii ina huutoroo .
E yiyde makko , Farayse e Afrik haa jooni ngoni ko e fannu jotondiral hakkunde jiimanooɓe e jiimnooɓe ummiingal e saahnga " koloñaal " .
E yiyde makko , Ganaa ena waawi wonde ñembeteedi sabu Ganaanaaɓe kollii haalde ɗemɗe keewɗe e jogaade leƴƴi keewɗi haɗataa leydi ñiiɓnude potal e hakkeedi ɓiyɓe leydi kala .
E yiyde makko , he " ɗii lebbi cakkitiiɗe , biiñorɗi IA ngoni ko e daɗndu hulɓiniindu tafndo ngaandiiji limneeji ɓurɗi doolnude ɗi hay tafooɓe ɗum en ɓee mbaawaa faamde walla nganndaa ɗo mbattinta walla mbaawaa tamde no moƴƴi " .
E yiyde maɓɓe kamɓe ɗowooɓe eɓɓo ngoo , hay so tawii leyɗeele baasɗe ɗee ɓeydii fere mum'en fayde e jaŋde sukaaɓe , golle mbaawaa gayneede Alla e jaŋde sukaaɓe yeeɗde caggal .
E yiɗde makko , Maruk yoo yah haa waɗda e Senegaal keerol !

E ɓe ciftina en wonnde , he 1979 wiyaanoo ko eɓɓo ngoo foti duumaade ko duuɓi jeegom , kono laamu nguu lirii ɗum haa woni duuɓi noogaas .
E ɓe cooynoo ɗum yeeso tan eɓe ndoga eɓe ngabbo heen .
E ɓe keblii e ngaal banngal e wiyde makko , wallondirde e kala gollotooɓe e nafoore ndenndaandi to bannge wasiyaaji e peeje karalleeje ngam ndaartude peeje jamyame e wallondirde e laamu e pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje .
E ɓe limtanee 3 000 oto ɗi jeloode " humvee " , 50 shaar , 150 belendee e 60 000 ujunere fetel hay so tawii nii yoga e njogitaaje ɗee mbonnaama e bommbardamaaji leyɗe maalde hirnaange .
E ɓe mari faa nder ɗuɗal too goomu wiyeteeɗo " Club Fulfulde " .
E ɓe mbaawi e ko heerii juutnaneede lajal gollagol leydi ndii tawa diwataa hitaande .
E ɓe mbaɗa geɗe keewɗe ngam suusnude winndiyankooɓe e wiɗtiyankooɓe Pulaar kala nde gooto e mum en yaltini deftere hesere .
E ɓe piɓi kadi jokkude waɗde ɗee golle hitaande kala so Geno muuyi .
E ɓe ummii leydi Yaman bannge worgo , e ɓe ndaayatnoo fayde rewo .

E ɗee kitaale jawtuɗe , nguu laamu dartorii ko ustude wellitaare yuɓɓingol dille , ngu dartorii ko dirtinde ngalu leydi e huutoraade doole mum haa bona .
E ɗee kuule diine ene jogii heen geɗal mum .
E ɗeen balɗe maa jewte keewɗe mbaɗe ko faati e ñawndude basal , heege , yuurnitaade ko fayti e nanluɗe laaɗe , ngam yo renndo won e jam ekn .
E ɗeen diɗɗe ena jayaa heen diɗɗe Afrik jeegom : Alaseri , Ganaa , Kodduwaar , Nijeriyaa , Afrik Bŋ Worgo ( njaatige kawgel ) e Kameruun .

E ɗeen ɗofte , alaa ŋakkatnooɗo heen : Kajjata Maalik en ( dipitee hannde to Asammbele nasiyonaal ) , Sileymaani Kan en ( gonnooɗo Hooreejo Duɗal Ɗemɗe ) , Yaaya Mammadu Bah , Aamadu Tijjaani Kan ( consul to kap weer hannde ) , Aysata Jaari en ( conseillère municipale to Baabaaɓe ) , Lelle Kan duttiɗo e joomum hannde ( yoo yurmeende Alla won e makko ) , Abdullaay Sal en ( tergal yiilirde ngenndi hannde ) e yoga woɗɓe ɓe limtaaka tawi wonaa yawde golle mum en e liggeey oo .
E ɗemngal Pulaar wiyatee ko ɗam hujjitii , alaa ko heddii e dow leydi ko waɗi fittaandu so wonaa ko jolnoo e nder laana kaa .
E ɗeɓi-duunde ndee , ɓokki mawki ena darii heen , saayaande makki ena tiimti e diiwaan hee fof .
E ɗi nganndi so dabbunde fotii ɓennude to Oorop too , tawa noon ko gah e Afrik ɗi ngoni ( wonaa metewo en kaalanta ɗi , etee ɗi keɗotaako rajooji ) , ɗi nduttoo , ɗi ngarta ɗo ɗi ngonnoo hade dabbunde .
E ɗi nganndi so dabbunde fotii ɓennude to Oorop too , tawa noon ko gah e Afrik ɗi ngoni ( wonaa metewoo en kaalanta ɗi , etee ɗi keɗotaako rajooji ) , ɗi nduttoo , ɗi ngarta ɗo ɗi ngonnoo , hade dabbunde .
E ɗi njogii hakke e wuurde e deeƴre e hakke e kisal .

E ɗiiɗoo duuɓi cakkitiiɗi , ɗum ɓeydii ko bonde sabu toɓooli ɓurtuɗi joolɗi wuro ngo .
E ɗo wattindii ɗoo , caggal njillu makko e leydi Abuu Dabi , nootoyaade bismaango laamɗo leydi ndii , Alhajji Mahmuud Bah renndinii denndaangal almuɓɓe mum e yoga e darodinooɓe e mum , rewɓe e worɓe , ñalnde 1 lewru siilo 1978 ngam jaarde ɗumen sabu darnde hiisnde nde ndarodinoo e makko , darnde haɓde e humambinnaagal , darnde riiwtude majjere haa e darnde yeynaade hakkillaaji niɓɓi .
E ɗum eɗen pota waawde sompude " Cosal Murtuɗo " ( Fondation Murtuɗo ) .

Ellee e suɗaare .
Ellee hay gooto heddaaki e laabi ɗii , yimɓe fof ɗuhoyii e nder galleeji .

Ellee neehdi taniraaɗo .
Ellee ngel yiɗi ko taƴde ɓoggol ngol .
