Emin kaka , emin caɓɓitoo no yarɓe loonde follere nde alaa suukara .
Emin laaraa , emin laara ko weɓaani .
Emin mbasorii ngal taaɓal , emin miijii waɗde , minen e njuɓɓudi amen halfinaandi ngal naamndal , ko ɓuri ko gollaa koo e oo bannge .
Emin mbeddii eeraango e denndaangal to ndee winndannde jogori yettaade nde ngarata ñaasde min e ko min ngoni e dow mum ko .
Emin mbiya ka ngonka ka ɓe nguuri gila nde ɓe ngarti ko nganka ka aaɓnotaako to bannge renndo hay to bannge ɗereeji kam e caɗeele leyɗeele maɓɓe .
Emin mbiya yo Alla sellin doole .
Emin ngoɗii konngol " lannda islaamiyankeewa " sabu ɗuum noddude woon faamaamuya .
Emin njetta ɗoo noon banndiraaɗo debbo biyeteeɗo Ummu Demmba , jooɗiiɗo to leydi Farayse .
Emin njogii noon mawɓe amen sakkitooɓe min peeje moƴƴe , wayɓe no Soh Abuu Demmba , gonnooɗo jaagorɗo , Soh Haamiidu Bellu e Umaar Jibi Cooyo .
Emin njogii wellemma mawɗo e teddungal huccitinde e mon ooɗo ɓataake , ngam bismaade on e nyalowma pinal , teddiniraaɗo Yero Dooro JALLO , mo mbaɗaten nyalnde hoore biir , 03 / 01 / 2009 , tuggude e waktu 14 .
Emin ñaama , juuɗe makko ina ciñña , ina ngerngerta , ko aldaa e dartaade , noon o woniri , omo siñña , ha min ngasni ñaamde , ha o ummii , o waynii min , o yahi .
Emin ɗaɓɓi walliteede e miijooji e peeje , mbele min njalta e kaa ngaanuuma kaaɓniika , mettuka , kulɓiniika no wallineede e nder suudu wiinndu , niɓɓuru , ruŋtiindu wuro yulndu e wuttolo , e nokku ɗo kullon conngowon e wuyɓe ɓe ngalaa njurum mbaalata yahde e sor-sortude .
Emmaniyel Makron jaɓɓike hay si tawii oo neɗɗo no lolliri anngal teddingol hakkeeji neɗɗo , no jeyaa e ɗin maayde Jamal Khashoggi , jaayndeyankeejo lunndiiɗo .
Emmanuyel makroŋ yo waylu darnde mum e ngal daawal laamu mum kesal ko yowitii e hakkunnde riisi e ikren e ko yowitii e kaɓagol seɓɓitiiɓe suuɗiiɓe ( terriste ) e duunde afrik nde .
Emperiyaalisam naatii , addorii mbaydi e tagoodi kesiri , alaa e sago kaɓtagol keso , golwole kese njiytee , ndartoree , golwole ndeen kiiɗɗii , hay so ina poola e kareeli mbaawaa foolde e wolde koloñaal .
En
En cuwaa tawo weemtande laabi diidaaɗi ngam hokkude ɗemɗe hakkeeji mum'en .
En effet , en 1979 , dans la perspective de la mise en place en 1985 d’une réforme de l’enseignement basée sur les langues nationales , le gouvernement mauritanien a créé un Institut des Langues Nationales ( ILN ) avec pour mission d’expérimenter pendant six ans les langues pulaar , sooninke et wolof comme véhicules d’enseignement à tous les niveaux du cycle fondamental et dans les programmes d’alphabétisation .
En effet , ne pas témoigner de la qualité , du rôle et surtout de la place acquise par ce périodique dans le cœur des populations voire dans le développement du pays , relève d’un manque de civisme .
En hollan nafoore ñeeñal e battane maggal e ɓamtaare ngenndi , kadi holno haralleeɓe ñeeñal mbaawata haɓugol caɗeele walla saɗɗaaji renndooji men .
En jaɓɓoto Yuusuf JALLO renndoyankeejo jeyaaɗo Burkina Faso , hooreejo fedde " Tiyaater Pinal " .
En kaalaani haala Alaseri , puɗɗuɗo , gaddiiɗo Nanondire Alsee , mo nan-nanti keewɗi ɗi koolkisaaka tuumi jogaade darnde nde laaɓtaani he jiylagol jihaadiyanke biyeteeɗo Iyad Aghali .
En kaalaani nih , lollinooɓe e enternet ine caakta no nguurdi e suddiiɓe mumen maa e worɓe mumen , ɗaɓɓira sehilaaɓe mumen Facebook bagginaali .
En kaalaani nii tawo pom Federba .
En kaalataa kadi duɗe ɗe o udditi walla jumaaji e jamaaji ɗi o mahi , kono njiɗ-ɗen joofaade ɗoo ko ko anddani mo seertude e annduɓe heddiiɓe haa o feeñi no lewru e hakkunde koode .
En kaɗaani ɓe yiylaade " mooniŋ " kono pel-ɗen tan , ko ɗawde Pulaar e dokkugol kabaruuji .
En keɓaani yeewtitde e maɓɓe
En keɓii juutnaade e cosgol mayre sanne ngam ɓaydude dakamme mayre to bannge cifafol kelme ɗee , kadi ɓeydu ɗen sukkinde cañu mayre .
En keɓii kadi fartaŋŋe yiyde yeruuji koɗdigal moƴƴi , nannguɗi hakkille men .
En keɓii kadi fawde gite men e bacce Ngaari Ŋawle e laaci ñiiwa ba o waɗɗotonoo so omo waañoya .
En keɓii nii kabaaru wonde e balɗe paaɗe , maa duɗe pulaar e jaŋde diine udditane rewɓe wuro ngoo , fawaade e ɗaɓɓaande mum en .
En keɓiino hollitde , e nder Fooyre Ɓamtaare t° 47 , wonde pelle men ngenndiyankooje tati toppitiiɗe pinal ( Ɓamtaare Pulaar , e Sooninke , e Wolof e nder Muritani ) , caggal nde ndiisnondiri , ndentinii e joɗnde wootere haralleeɓe pelle ɗe , e gollinooɓe e Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije , e teelɗuɓe toppitiiɓe golle jaŋde ( sukaaɓe e mawɓe ) , e ɗemɗiyankaagal , e ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ɗe , ɗoo e nder Nuwaasoot , ñalnde alet 7 oktoobar 2007 .
En keɗoto kadi , Hammet Aamadu LI , o artan en e taarika gimɗi slam .
En keɗoto kadi e nder yeewtere ndee , nalankee goɗɗo , jeyaaɗo Mali e nder komiin Wankoro , bi’eteeɗo Adama Sidibe e fanndu haala Abdulaay DIKKO .
En kiisaaki boom wonde ƴergol diƴƴe geecuuji ngol maa haaɗtin diƴƴe gonɗe nder leydi , usta kadi keɓgol ndiyam mbelɗam .
En kuuɓnataa ɗoo hannde ndee toɓɓere ñamñamtiweere .
En mai , des journalistes tunisiens avaient manifesté moyennant libérer la gouvernant " répressive " du aigrit , qui instrumentalise subséquent eux la droit moyennant gêner et familiariser les médias .
En majjaani ko haɗi lanndaaji men dawrugol wonde gootum e haɓɓondirde haa keɓa sagooji mumen .
En mbaasataano ɗii kaalisaaji jogornooɗi arde , sabu oo kuudetaa 2008 .
En mbaasi .
En mbaasii ɗoo tigi jinnaaɗo !
En mbaawa limtidde ɗoo teddule ɗe ɓe mbaɗani , hattanteeɓe leñol ngol , mawɓe maggol e annduɓe maggol ; rewɓe e worɓe ; wuurɓe e maayɓe .
En mbaawaa deƴƴude inɗe ɗiɗi hay so tawii ko terɗe Fedde ndee : Mammadu Bookara Lih hade mum fekteede Nuwaadibu e Ifraa Al Hajji Boli hade mum rafeede .
En mbaawaa duumaade e jaɓde leyɗeele men ena nguura e coodtaari , e fenaande sabu ko ɓurɓe famɗude semmbe tan lorotoo heen .
En mbaawaa gaynidde ko hatojinaa he naɓaka gooto , kono ɗum ɗoo tan ene tinndina en wonnde , naɓaka gooto walla mago wooto ko entreprise kanum e hoore mum .
En mbaawaa haaldude ñaam-goolluuje Yero Dooro Jallo , hay so en ndokkaama yaajeende timmunde walla gollorɗe timmuɗe .
En mbaawaa jaŋtaade ɗum ɗoo , nde tawnoo maa diwtu keerol winndande ndee .
En mbaawaa limtude fof .
En mbaawaa limtude jaaɓnirɗe ɗee , tawo en innaani yuman jaaɓngal hono Facebook , ko geese ɗo yimɓe kala ceŋondiri , mo nganndu-ɗaa e mo a anndaa fof huunde kala ine saaktee heen .
En mbaawaa mutde he deƴƴere haa caayen he yeebaare hersiniinde ɗoon ɗo tooñannge ɓurtunge woni e sompeede nder boowal kuule tammbotooɗe mahdi leydi men .
En mbaawaa muɓɓude gite e yeeso ɓenningol jamfa potɗo nii mawnude nder jofnde doosɗe sariyeeje ɗowirɗe nguurndam renndo men .
En mbaawaa waasde siiftorde hare hakkunde Makki Sal e Ablaay Wadd wuftunde e jippogol Makki e hoore Suudu Sarɗiiji Senegaal cosgol lannda APR-Yaakaar .
En mbaawaa yahde Muulirde Ngenndi , sibu en ngalaa yamiroore , kono ɗuum haɗaani en ƴeewndaande .
En mbaawii dakmitoraade heen naatnaattondire ñeeñiije , conceweeje , feeloweeje , karalleweeje , ganndiweeje e ɗemɗiweeje coñtuɗe .
En mbaawii noon teskaade hono ndeen yiyannde to won yimɓe teelɓe , maa mbiyen ɓe nootaaki he innde fedde .
En mbindiino winndannde e
En mbiyataa yaakaare alaa , kono yolnde nde ko juutnde sanne , ngati ko ndafu moritaninaabe safalbe , ko ɗum hakkilantaagu .
En mbiyii nii heen wonde isin
En mbiyii won’de saabii ɗum ko siftorde nde yimɓe taccinaa maayo , njaltinaa leydi mum en , woodi warraɓe ; wardaaɓe petellaaji , woodi wardaaɓe , paakaaji , woodi wardaaɓe cabbi .
En mbiyii ñalawma gooto e dow Uraanus ko waktuuji men 10 pawɗi hojomaaji men 49 .
En ndañataano dowla jeeyoowo huunde fof , hay kaayitaaji etaa siwil .
En ndañataano persidaa jawiiɗo wallitooɓe ɗum , mo hormaaki luulndiiɓe ɗum .
En ndañataano persidaa kaaloowo maayka waktuuji tati deggondirɗi .
En ndañataano persidaa kuutortooɗo bidsee laamu ngam leeptude ɓe mbeldaani e mum .
En ndañataano persidaa mo alaa ko anndani faggudu , baɗoowo ko luundii ko yimɓe fof mbaɗata , cosoowo sosiyateeji laamu ɗi ngasataa , tawi heddiiɓe fof ina cortoo heen .
En ndañataano persidaa mo koreeji mum , ko ɓooyaani koo tan ko waasɓe ɓaleeɓe kurum , ina pijira hannde miliyaaruuji , tee ruttoo wona e wiyde woni ko e haɓde e bonnugol jawdi .
En ndañataano persidaa naatoowo e dokkitgol golle ɓurɗe famɗude ngam wiyde yo oo walla oya totte .
En ndañataano persidaa teelɗinɗo leydi mum , mo weldaani e hay keediiɗo gooto .
En ndañataano ɗii senerooji fof , wonande konu ngu diwaani ujunnaaje seeɗa neɗɗo .
En ndañii kadi huunde hesere seedtotoonde ɗuum , so alluwel hiisa ɓooyngel ko ina wona duuɓi 3 700 , jiytangel toon e maayirɗe teeminannde yawtunde ndee .
En ndeen deftere , Latif ena hollita jawdi ngujjaandi , bonnaandi e keblugol toowngu OCI ngol Karim Wadd e Generaation du Concret ndesnnanoo .
En ndewii he nokkuuji baaɗi no Garlol , Goyniit , Kammbal , Kiifa , Gufaafa ; Worti , ekn , en njiyii koɗdiigu moƴƴu hakkunde sooninkooɓe e fulɓe walla hakkunde safalɓe e fulɓe e Sooninkooɓe .
En ndillinii sabaabu , kono eɗen keddoraa : njuɓɓudi men ndii ine lohi haa jooni .
En ndukii haa kunuɗe mbaɗii cooɓe , kono fof alaa ko nafi .
En nduwiima nde o ɓeydata tiiɗnaare haa daande makko seeka ladde , haa yettoo keeri winndere .
En nduwwima tan nde Alla hokkata-mo martaba ñalnde 12 Jolal to Mantu-Laa-Jolii .
En ngannda hay huunde e baɗte majjum .
En nganndaa !
En nganndaa , kono tan Kawtal kam woniino fedde Fulɓe , goongɗinnoonde ngootagu Fulɓe winndere kala , kadi ɓe ngolliima ko heewi ko ene tinndina ɗuum .
En nganndaa .
En nganndaa hikka , mbele e darorɗe mayre mbar en njaabanaama .
En ngarii ɗoo e ndee alatiire 30 lewru 04ɓuru hitaande 2023 , ngam humpitaade alhaali kisal ɓe sukaaɓe taweteeɓe e laawi Dakar addaaɓe e nder ndu suudu .
En ngartaataa e limooje ɗe o haali ɗee .
En ngartataa ɗoo e fillaade dewrewe mayre .
En ngartii kadi hannde e siiftorde ceerno men , deede men tawa ko e mbaydi kuɗol sabu e miijo , en ceerataa e mande-mo e duwunaade-mo .
En ngonat he naywude tan soofaaji ɓalli men ina ɓeydoo famɗude doole , tugaaje galle men ina ɓeydoo wuɗde e yaafde .
En ngoyii , en cekkii , en ngullii , en mettinii , kono alaa ko naïf .
En nimsitaani sabu ko fetto yuɓɓungo njiy-ɗen hannde hakkunde ɗee diɗɗe ɗiɗi jeyaaɗe e tuumaaɗe ena njogori nawde raay e kawgel 2008 .
En njaarii Hooreejo Catal Fonndu hono ceerno Mammadu Jah lollirɗo giɗo ngenndi e denndaangal terɗe Catal ngal .
En njaarii seernaaɓe catal Fonndu .
En njahrataa ɗoo to bannge no o janngiri , keewal almuɓɓe makko walla e seedanteeje toowɗe , ɗe o heɓi .
En njaɓaani !
En njaɓii yoɓde kono seeɗa fuɗɗii heewde , ɓurtude , haa yottii ɗo haaɗi lamɗam .
En njaɓɓoto , kadi , Muusa MBAAY , badoowo slam ko o anndiraaɗo Fada Muusa , jeyaaɗo Senegaal .
En njeewtidi kadi e Kajjata BA , hooreejo ‘GIE Dental Ɓamtaare Toro " .
En njejjitaani saaysayeeɓe huɓɓuɓe roŋkanaaɓe ɓee hono Mammadu Ñaŋ e Ƴahƴaho nehtoroo oo hono Hammadi Jah ( ndo !
En njetti PULAAGU kaaddi njettooru sabu wuurtinde ngenndiyankoo6e leñol ngol .
En njetti PULAAGU kaaɗdi njettooru sabu wuurtinde golle ngenndiyankooɓe leñol ngol .
En njettii Alla nde luɓiri en mo e mudda , artani mo ngam , eɗen nduwii , ƴellitde mo nder to ɓuri toowde he aljannaaji Mum .
En njettii Mammadu Hammadi Njaay lollirɗo Bosko , keblatnooɗo haralde ndee .
En njettii heen Alla no feewi !
En njettii kadi musiɗɗo men Abdullaahi Jool ɗo e wuro Poor-Janti ngo sabu ko kanko heɓni en natal ngal , kadi o seedtanii en huunde e nguurndam Aamadu Jool .
En njettii mo njettoor keeriiɗo .
En njettiima e daawal ɓoornaade ceelti-beelti waɗa widiyooji ine yeeynira ŋari mum .
En njettotonooka jaasre njetti-ɗen hannde ndee .
En njewtidat e makko ko faati e nalankaagal .
En njiyi finnde ngenndiyaŋke ena wona kadi debbo jayduɗo e jamaanu , gonɗo e reedu Amerik , leydi gannde , leydi doole e karallaagal .
En njiyii arti tan ko e ko Ibiraahiima Sar wiynoo e yimre mum " Laamu rewii ɗoo reftii ɗoo kono waylaani gonal men e dunyaa " .
En njiyii caggal ɗuum , gargol Coɓid-19 addanii yimɓe etaade wuurdude , walla " yahdude " e ngonka kesa kaa .
En njiyii heen Gaboonaajo , Gine Konaakirinaajo , Fuladunaajo e Gammbinaajo ( en keɓaani anndude inɗe maɓɓe ) .
En njiyii ko waynoon he Ñalnde Finaa-tawaaji men Gambia .
En njiyii nde ekkolaaji uddaa sabu Cowid-19 , leyɗeele ɗee fof paati ko he karallaagal ngam jokkude jaŋde , walla gollaade , he nder galleeji mum en : he Tele , walla internet Tee leyɗe keewɗe , yimɓe heewɓe , maa njokku gollaade walla janngude tawa ko he deestaare hay sinno Covid-19 yawtii , hay sinno noon caɗeele ine ngoodi tawo to oon bannge
En njiyii ɓiɓɓe subalɓe ɓee no tiiɗiri koye e hol ko ɗum jibini .
En njiyii ɗoo Sheriif Saydu Ɗaahaa to Unfani sara Butelmiina e Sheriif Ɗeyyibu mo Cilon .
En njiyiino kadi lomtiiɓe Federba ɓee kawri ko Malinaaɓe ngummaniima haɓde e tuubakiri .
En njiɗaano wiyde , hay so tawii ko huunde nde njenana-ɗen , wonde so nguleeki aduna kii ɓeydiima , ko ndeen kadi ndoolndoolaagu e fitinaaji ɓeydortoo heewde .
En njyi taccuɓe maaje , ena lummboo haa ɓadoo pokpokalam , njooloo Kono kadi yuɓɓinɓe hiirde ndee won ɗo njuumi e miijo am , so waasde darnude goomu ndeenka tiiɗnngu tawa ko heeroriiɓe kisal kiirɗeeli bayɗi hono nih .
En paami , ɗum wonaa hanki , wonaa hecci hanki .
En paami wadde so en mbiy Mammadu Abdul Gawlo leñol Fulɓe to njiɗɗen nokkoyde too ene luggiɗi .
En paamii , hitaande fof ngel kawgel ene waɗetenoo , kono ko jaayndiyankooɓe haalooɓe walla winndooɓe he Arab e Farayse tan ngel heewnoo toɗɗaade .
En paamii e ngoon miijo , wonde , ndeke , haa jooni Afrik ummaaki e kalifaandi tuubakiri .
En paamii tan , no Gellaay fuɗɗorii bonnitirde Balla tawi ko e sifaade nokku ɗo ummii ɗoo .
En paamii tan , ɗaɗi añam-nguraagu ine ñiɓii ɗo ɓuri luggiɗde he daartol .
En paamii tan teeŋtini luural ngal ko kulol Riisi yiyde Dental Orop e konu mum , hono Otan , ine ɓallitoroo ɗum nii , ine heɓta leyɗe jeyaanooɗe e Riisi taariiɗe ɗum .
En paamii ɗoo , sahaa gonɗo nder hoore makko ndee , ɓuri famɗude e sahaa jokkondirɗo e ɓetirgel makko ngel .
En pamminiino e winndannde ɓennunde
En puɗɗiima etaade ɓallaade mo gila 1985 , njokkir-ɗen e makko e mbaadi ngoɗndi caggal nde ndaay-ɗen .
En sikkaa kamɓe ne , ɓe noosata ko Njaslaare 5 Koorka yoo juule .
En tawii renndo mahiingo he nder koɗdigal , naatnaatondiral , e kormondiral hakkunde leƴƴi , haa teeŋti hakkunde fulɓe e safalɓe .
En teskiima , so ñalngu 28 nguu ɓennii , alaa mo ɗemngal mum ene taatoo heen , saka haala e rajo walla winnda e jaaynirɗe jolɗe hannde ɗee .
En teskiima heen garal Ceerno Baabakar Abba , elimaan raatib gooto e jumaaji to leydi Kameruun e Ceerno Ahmadu Ceerno Mohammed Lamiin to Dumga .
En teskiima heen wiyeteeɓe Aadama Taal ummoriiɗo to Kodduwaar , Dono Sampaate Jallo , Hajjaa Jinndaa Dem mo Aañam Coɗay , Aysata Pulaagu Sidibee mo Bannjagara Mali e Kolonel konu Gine Bisaawo .
En teskiima ko kaŋko toɗɗinoo Laghdaf yo ardo ɗowgu ngo o darnunoo ñalnde weetata omo sammina laamu toɗɗanoongu e suɓngooji demokaraasiije 2007 .
En ɓooyi yide laamuuji ena ƴetta kuwle haɓo-coodtaariyaŋkeeje kono ñaawooɓe ɓee ndimɗaani e rewnude woofɓe e laawol .
En ɓooyii nande e jime e jimɗi pelle pine , konnguɗi bayɗi no " Tuubakooɓe ciiɓiima ngaluuji men , caggal nde ndahi ɓesnguuji afrik , kuutorii ɗumen ngam alɗinde leyɗeele mumen " .
En ɓooyii nande e jime e jimɗi pelle pine , konnguɗi bayɗi no " Tuubakooɓe ciiɓiima ngaluuji men , caggal nde ndahi ɓesnguuji ََAfrik , kuutorii ɗumen ngam alɗinde leyɗeele mumen " .
Ena
Ena anndaa ko caggal leydi innde laamɗo ɓuri yaawde bonde !
Ena e jettooɗe Barooɓe kadi yettoode Talla .
Ena e ɓeen Baham Wul Sheexna , kisnoowo ngenndi , Kan Mammadu Hadiya , gardiiɗo catal Jaatiiji ngenndi e jaayndeyaŋke kalfinaaɗo kumpital .
Ena e ɓeen Muktaar Wul Daddah , hooreejo gadano leydi Muritani e Kadafi laaminooɗo leydi Libi .
Ena e ɓeen wayɓe no Hamediin Yero Aadama e ɓesngu mum , Manoore Saar soowaa wiyaa Manaama Saar , Mayram Wad , Joom Seydi Waddu e lappol mum , Pennda Yero Aadama Kummba Njaay Raasin Saar , ekn .
Ena gasa tawa natatnooɓe nde e oon sahaa njahrunoo e naykiɓɓe ɗee ko pate walla todde , keewɗe yiyeede e won e nayi .
Ena gasa tawa o tuugnii ko ko o yiynoo e duuɓi jawtuɗi ɗii to Fuuta Jaloŋ e to Ɓunndu , kono faandaare makko ɓurnde teeŋtude ko lelnude njuɓɓudi diineyankeeri .
Ena habraa nih wonde diwooje Alaserinaaje puɗɗiima weeytude e falnde jeerennde Saharaa hee .
Ena hatojinaa e famminde annduɓe hol no golle ɗee njahrata tee hol no gooto kala ɓeydirta ganndal baɗte ko golla koo , haa waawa fanndinde .
Ena heewi e dawrugol Senegaal nde jiidugal ardii goonga e ɓiyngenndiyaŋkaagal e geɗe laamu .
Ena heewi ko Farayse juuldi e ko ɓuri heewde e leyɗeele aduna ɗee .
Ena hulaa ko ka njanka e diƴƴe maayo haaɗngo wiyeteengo Atlantik ngoo , hakke teemedde joyi mileeje woɗɗaade tufɗe Beresil .
Ena jeyaa e ko ɓe ngadii waɗde ɗoon e wuro ngoo galle fitiram gollaagu ɗo mecce njanngetee .
Ena jeyaa e ko ɓuuɓnata ɓerɗe yoga e hulɓe maa " piyanɗe " Al Kayidaa mbaɗtu naneede haa e nder gure men Fuuta so ɓe poolaaki gila e jooni .
Ena jeyaa e luural ngal ko gila adan tan , luutndaare ndee wiya heftinaani CC sabu ko ɓe soodaaɓe .
Ena jeyaa e mbumbaay hee Ngaari Ŋawle , Pekaan Suley Maal , Pekaan Sammba Suley , Baaba Ganŋnge e woɗɓe ɓe limtotaako .
Ena jeyaa e ɗeen " defte taro Sammba e Kummba " , " celluka Pulaar " e " Ndikkiri joom moolo " .
Ena jeyaa e ɗeen leyɗeele Konngo , Maali ,
Ena jeyanoo e dogantunooɓe Demokaraat en gooto e fulɓe iwdi Sar Liyon ena wiyee Mohamed S Jallo .
Ena jirwi , kadi so a meeɗi a woppataa !
Ena laaɓi wobi yamiroore ko hoɓɓude kala biyɗo ena seppa walla ena renndina jamaanu e nder laabi .
Ena maɓɓe heedtuɓe e rewɓe sowiiɓe e annduɓe rafiiji sukaaɓe e ñabbuuli noppi e heertoriiɓe gite yahruɓe to bannge ñiiƴe e humpitiiɓe muusu ɓerɗe e caɗeele koyɗe , e safrooɓe rafiiji ɗii fof .
Ena saɗi ko ɓe cerindii .
Ena sikkaa kaŋko Rose Francine ma o fooɗano laamaade Gaboo .
Ena sikkanoo , e lebbi ɓennuɗi ɗii ko Keñaa Obamaa adotoo yillaade sabu baaba makko jeyeede toon .
Ena sikketenoo so Kanel yaltii tan diŋiral ngal maayat haa Usmaan Gaŋngue joli O foɓɓanaa haa juuɗe kuɓɓi sahnga nde o toƴƴi " haɗi renndo men welde " .
Ena tawtoraa-ngo yoga e jaggidanooɓe e Siidi Muhammed Wul Seek Abdallaahi .
Ena teskaa kadi tawtoreede hiirde ndee Usmaan Sarr , hooreejo fedde Avomm , fedde daraniinde ɓesnguuji waraaɓe to leydi Muritani .
Ena teskaa wonde nde juulgol gasi , gardiiɗo Rajo Muritani ena jeyaa e sajjitinooɓe gooski kii ngam nawde ɗum to ngaska ngasanooka kaa .
Ena teskini e jaltugol ndee yamre ballondiral hakkunde Unicode e ANLoc ( African Network for Localization ) dental toppitiingal nokkuɗinde gannde kese kumpitirɗe ( TIC ) .
Ena tijjanoo maa laamɗo keso oo toɗɗo jogorɗo ɗowande-mo golle leydi ndii ko leelaani .
Ena waawi taw o yiɗaa suka debbo oo .
Ena waawi wonde kadi tawa laana koo ko paaniraaka won e radaruuji ; ko ɗiin mballata piloteeɓe yiyde ɗo ƴiiwoole keedti ngal taaraade-ɗe .
Ena wayi hannde hono guutorgol doole ena anii no feewi e ngoo weeyo sabu hade AQMI happitaade dahgol faraysenaaɓe ɓee , maa mooti-ɓe e nokku kisɗo mo weeɓaani yiytude walla yettaade .
Ena wayi hono barigal ko ko " moonti " hakkunde ƴamooɓe jappeere laamu nguu gila toɗɗe ɗee ndiwwtaa haa 18 Morso .
Ena wayi hono laamu nguu fuɗɗiima ummanaade ɗeen caɗeele !
Ena wayi hono ɗii laabi ɗiɗi hay gootol heen feraani tawa sabu M23 wiyi tan ko aadii Wadd ɗaɓɓataa gortal tataɓal sabu laawol hokkaani-mo oon hakke .
Ena waɗi duuɗe pattamlame ciftinooje geɗe hanki no goodal gure ɓooyɗe , laatiiɗe paabi ganni mooftuɗe ɓarakke taariik .
Ena weeɓi e maa naworaa kam to njahataa too .
Ena winndaa heen " Min jaɓataa , ɗemɗe amen ina momtee , pine amen ina mbaree , neɗɗaagal amen ina yaɓɓee sibu yiɗɗe mawninde Arabeere e arabaagal ; ko min juulɓe kono min ngonaa arabeeɓe , min caliima macugaagu etee yoo laamu ngu dartin ɓittude haɓantooɓe jojjanɗe aadee " .
Ena wiyee , hono duƴƴe ena mbaɗa e ɗii lobbuli baɗɗi kaaƴe kaynaaɗe .
Ena wona tawa Wadd ena huli wonde so o heddiima e jaagorde caggal leydi , omo waawi heede Karim Wadd e naange , o haɗa ɗum anndeede walla anndireede no feewi .
Ena wona tawa ɗum joofii ko gootgol kuule kese e nder Farayse ngam haɗde juulɓe rewɓe muurnaade walla ngam saɗtinde dewgol diine Lislaam e nder Farayse .
Ena wuuri ena selli hay so ɓanndu tampii haŋkadi .
Ena yahdinaa e ñalɗi hee lorngo leɗɗe ɓesnooje e wuro hee .
Ena yanta e maɓɓe , ummoraade Senegaal naalŋke mawɗo jolfo mo faaytetaake hono Umar Pen e Paap Juuf .
Ena yooɗi sanne !
Ena ñaagaa kala aafɗo Firefox e Ngaandi mum yoo winndito e Jakkaa Fulɓe ngam yeewtude toon baɗte ƴeewndo tpoirde ndee .
Ena ñuumbee hannde e NDakaaru wonde rewi e doggol layyanteeɓe Karim Wadd ko Ablaay Joop Ngati mbar Senegaal ena jogori heddoreede yontaaɓe jogorɓe ɗowde leydi ndii janngo e jam ?
Ena ñuumbee ɗee balɗe fof , Duudu Waad e wonndiiɓe mum , e yamiroore Ablaay Waadd ena pewjana Maki ko ɓuri bonde ngam duñde-mo haa o ummoo e jooɗnde mawɗo Suudu Sarɗiiji nduu .
Ena ɓeydii teeŋtude wonnde Barak Obaama asii ɓulel hakkunde mum e Hilariy Klinton sabu yolnde hakkunde maɓɓe e toɓɓe ana abboo e ko ɓuri 10% .
Ena ɗoon kadi kaɓirɗe harbiyankooɓe e nate gaadanteeje ƴettanooɗe gila e duuɓi jeytaare .
Ende noddi nde uddittee kaaldigal goongireegoonga , ngal aldaa e mofamtumaagu , ngal jiidaa e ngal nanondiral puunti .
Ende renndinnoo 500 wuro he nder Fuuta tuggude fanlnde Podoor haa e diiwal Maatam .
Ende taga mo marde gannde kaqqilinorteeɗe , ɗe hakkille meho tan hattantaa jaggude walla huɓindaade ( savoir ) , ende addana mo waawde siynude walla tabitinde ganndal makko e sato makko e naftoraade ngo ( savoir-faire ) , ende rokka mo waawde wonde e woodde e nder yonta makko e senaade e nguurndam makko ( savoir-être ) .
Ende wiɗtii e ko faati e teddingol hakkeeji neɗɗanke e nder winndere ndee .
Ender ɗiiɗoo duuɓi nay , Janyjaawid en ɓe kam e konu leydi ndi nduppii ko ina abboo e 2000 wuro ɓaleeɓe Afrik , mbari yimɓe mum en , koni jawdi mum en .
Endu waɗa ko fowru woowi waɗde e nder ladde koo .
Endu yaha , e ndu arta , ndu doga seeɗa ndu dartoo kadi , ndu sunnoo ɗoo , ndu ŋuuña ɗaa .
Ene
Ene anndaa , Gardiiɗo hannde leydi Nijeriya biyateeɗo Buhaari oo , ko neɗɗo mawɗo , joom konngol , keewɗo neɗɗaagu .
Ene anndaa kay , gure men fof peccii ko e leeɗe .
Ene e amen kadi nii yejjitooɓe ko jibinaaɓe , jogiiɓe yummiraaɓe e baabiraaɓe rokkunooɓe min inɗe pattamlame ɗe min coodtiri inɗe goɗɗe mbele emin limtidee e ɓeen wiyeteeɓe ngenndiyankooɓe .
Ene e ɗaam ngartam , mawninde innde wuro ngoo .
Ene e ɗeen pecce , ɗeɓooɓe wonde ɗo hakkunde ɗoo , ɓe miijo mumen ɗeɓata renndinde miijooji ɗiɗi ɗii fof .
Ene e ɗiin kooli
Ene famɗi mo goongɗinaani ɗum .
Ene gasa , tawa ko ɗum waɗi haa ceerno Boy yimi e jimɗi mum ɗi nanir-ɗen ceerno Ñokkaan , ɗo o wiyata " woto mantu giɗo maa e dow añɓe mum , kono kadi woto yennu gaño maa e dow yiɗɓe mum " .
Ene gasa , tawa waɗnoo mo wiyde noon ko goongɗinde konngol ganndo biynooɗo " baɗoowo dawrugol mo nuunɗaani , heewaani haalde ko jogori waɗde .
Ene gasa ngartoyen e firo ɗee alkule ɗiɗi , ko fayi arde , e ballal Joomiraaaɗo .
Ene gasa noon , tawa ko kamɓe ngoni ɓe nganndaa ko woni golle maɓɓe haa ko luulndo ene faggitooɓe .
Ene gasa tawa ko Sifaa ɗoo koo faamaama wonaa ñaamdu rewooru e goddol faya reedu , ko kabaruji , won wiyooɓe ɗum kumpite walla kumpital ( fawaade e ngaddiinaaji ) , janngirteeɗi gite walla e keɗorteeɗi noppi , tottee hakkille seɗa resnda hoyre yoo mooftu .
Ene gasa tawa ko heen njeyaa-mi .
Ene gasa tawa ndee winndannde daɗataa e ɗuum .
Ene haaloobe doo be fof ko buri heen heewde ko worbe be ngandaa hay dara e ko rewbe wadaabe dum bee nguurii .
Ene hasii , so omo wondunoo e maɓɓo kadi sellora .
Ene heen dental biyeteengal " Sdhintel-1igene vive " .
Ene heewi faayiida no feewi , to banngal golle , winndude he Pulaar ɓuri fof newaade e kala no njiɗir-mi , fof miɗi waɗa e Pulaar Hiisa Excel , haa e Fannuuji ɗi njanngunoo-mi to Almaañ miɗo huutoroo ɗum hannde e ɗemngal am .
Ene hersinii e Fulɓe , wiyooɓe ko kanum en ɓuri heewde he nder Senegaal , rajo mum en walla tele mum en uddiree wonnde alaa heɗotooɓe walla yeeɓooɓe .
Ene janngina tawa laawol jettinirangol ngol ɓeydotoo ko majjinde .
Ene jeyaa e defte makko kadi yaltunde ko ɓooyani , " Deftere Ganndal Koode e Ƴeewngal .
Ene jeyaa e ko addani ɗuum laataade , sooseede Baytul Hikmah .
Ene jeyaa e ko ɓe ngadii firde , binndanɗe Euclid , Aristotle , e Claudius Ptolemy .
Ene jeyaa e ko ɓuri teskinde he ndeen eɓɓaande , waɗde Arabeere ɗemngal janngirngal ɓiyɓe leydi ndii he kala tolno , Faraysinkoore wontata tan ko ɗemngal janngeteengal ngam haa joom mum daña no udditorii he aduna ( langue d’ouverture ) hono no Engele ni walla Españool .
Ene jeyaa e ko ɓuri teskinde kadi e golle maɓɓe , ko wonnde yoo Fulɓe ɓeydo faamde ko leñol gootol , caloo peccooru inɗe e kinɗe , pooɗanoo dental .
Ene jeyaa e nelanooɓe toon , Al-Hajjaj Ibnu Mater , Ibnu Al-Batriiq , Salaam Ibnu Haaruun ( Koroowo Daar al-Hikmah ) , Yuhanna Ibn Masawayha e Hunayn Ibnu Ishaaq .
Ene jeyaa e payndaale hee , haɓde e yooro , haɓde e heege , e wallude sukaaɓe ɓe jaŋde daɗi e sukaaɓe woppuɓe jaŋde law haa ndaña ɗo nanngitii , nguura heen , mbaasa miijaade ɗannaade , haa teeŋti e ɗannoraade nguyka .
Ene jeyaa e semmbinɓe ndeen dillere , filosof en ko wayno Spinosa ( Spinoza ) , Locke , Bayle e Newton , caggal ɗuum nde sarii he nder Orop kala haa yetti Farayse he teemadannde 18ɓre .
Ene jeyaa e taarinoomo koo , ñeeñɓe e jabbaaji Fulɓe ene njima en njarfoo o taanum jaaltaaɓe .
Ene jeyaa e ɗiin defterɗi inniraandu Ahmad Baaba ndu ene tawee e mum ko ene wona 30 , 000 ballifanɗe .
Ene jeyaa heen : Firo al-Qur’aan , tawa ko kaamiilu o kiɓɓuɗo he ɗemngal Pulaar , saggitorde Pulaar waɗnde kelme 20 , 000 , e deftere mawnd nde tiitoonde mum woni : " Gila Dawaa Dawi " .
Ene jeyaa heen Jean Boyd he deftere nde tiitoonde mum woni : The Caliph’s Sister : Nana Asma’u 1793 – 1865 : Teacher , Poet and Islamic Leader ( 1989 ) , e One Woman’s Jihad : Nana Asma’u , Scholar and Scribe nde wallifii ɗum Beverly B .
Ene jeyaa heen Justin Bibier , Drake , Eminem , kamɓe tato tan so renndinaama e ɓe njogii 146 Miliyon abonee he Yotube .
Ene jeyaa heen kolonel Maalik Jaw , gardiiɗo hannde Suudu Sarɗiiji Mali ndu Koninkooɓe ɓee cosi nginniri " Diisnordu Ngenndi Sabbordu " .
Ene jeyanoo e miijooji makko " yo Pulaar jannge mbele ɓamtoo , jalba yaynoo " .
Ene jeyyaa heen waylude ɗemngal maɓɓe ummoraade he won’de ɗemngal yimiyankeeɓe waɗti ɗum ɗemngal ɓurngal toowde he nder ɗemɗe aduna ɗee kala .
Ene jiyaa heen kadi firo deftere Al-Qur’aan he ɗemngal Pulaar , firo deftere Seek Anta Joop Nations Nègres et Culture ( Ngenndiij Ɓaleeɓe e Pine Mum en ) .
Ene jogii ɗo tiiɗi ɗo ɓe mbaawi heedde noon so ɓe njaɓi .
Ene jooɗtoraa ko kanko jogori rontude baaba makko e jooɗtaade he jappeere mum janngo so oon yiyaaka .
Ene moƴƴi kadi mo woni fof annda , " mbele woote ko hakke ( jojjanɗe ) walla ko fotde " .
Ene ndañi fannuuji ɓulnotooɗi kopporeeje .
Ene safriree kadi ñiiƴe muusooje , koppi walla jokki-terɗe muusooje , hoyre muusoore , ñawanɗe njogoram , sukundu ɓorotoondu e nguru ɓanndu .
Ene saɗi biyoowo ɗoo meeɗaani jeyeede he ɗeen geɗe , kono ɗuum laɓɓintaa laamu jooni ngu , alaa , yontii ko enen fof nde peleten , no doole men potnoo , ndee ŋakkere nuunɗal .
Ene siforee coñce kaalaaɗe : daari , e daarti , e cifti , e gaanti , e pulaareeje .
Ene teeŋti e kala juulɗo huutoraade mo , nde wonnoo ko ɗuum deeƴnata ɓernde , humataa haaju hay gooto .
Ene waawi , so ɓooyii , wooda heen helmere ɓurnde jaalaade .
Ene waawi kadi , so fasnaama haa fasii , walla soofnaama haa tuutii , feewniree kafe , walla lipton , walla waɗee kosam ene yaree .
Ene wayno hannde kala ɗemngal Afriknaawal ene
Ene wayno kala ko adinooɓe mo njoginoo e hiime ngam yoo gannde pire mbaɗtee he ɗemngal Arab , nde o ari kanko o daɗtiima ɗum en ɗo pucci ndogata .
Ene wayno ko kanko lomtii ɓeen mawɓe ɓe innuɗen fof he wonde ndarorgal jaayndiyankoɓe Fulɓe Senegaal , ngal yonta keso o tiimtatoo he golle mum .
Ene waɗi noon , leyɗeele ( Laamuuji ) dokkuɗe jaayniyankooɓe wellitaare no kumpitiri , tawa aldaa e waawnere .
Ene wiyee , ɗiin puɗi ɓuri waawde fuɗde ko leydi mbiyeteendi Madagaskaar .
Ene wiyee kadi ko he yamiroore Abu Jaafar al-Mansuur , Ibn Ishaaq winndi deftere mum siira ( Daartol Nguurndam Nelaaɗo Allah ) .
Ene wiyee nde konu juulɓe nguu honi Ankara o yamiriɓe yoɓe kisnu kala defterdu wonnoondu toon , ɓe mooɓe defte ɗee kala ɓe ndimnda ɗum en ɓe paytira Baghdaad .
Ene wona , ene moƴƴi , koko ɓamtata , sinno ene yeewtidee , sabu ko e pelɓondiral miijooji , mijo moƴƴo dañetee .
Ene yonatnoo Arabeeɓe tan wiyde Allah suɓiima ɗemngal mum en jippinii heen Qur’aan mum tedduɗo o , ɓe katojinaani e hay ganndal gootal hankadi , kono wonaa noon ɓe mbaɗi .
Ene ñohee noon won’de kamɓe , ɓe ngoonŋɗinaani ndee hare .
Ene ɓura welde nii seedaade mo tan sahaaji e jalte nder caaktirɗe , hakkunde bayyinaali dow haajuuji ñeŋngaaɗi ɗi ngalaa hay ngartam ngootam wonande ñawndugol caɗeele guuraaɗe .
Enen cikkaten woni jaambaaro ko kaaloowo ena haaktoo jaynge !
Enen fof , eɗen nganndi , enen ƴaaŋɓe e duɗe laamu ɓee , baawal janngoowo ina ɓeyda himme e coftal janngoowo e yiɗde jeynaade ko o janngata koo no feewi sanne .
Enen fof en nanii , en nootiima .
Enen fof eɗen nganndi caɗeele ɗe pulaar jogii e leydi Senegaal tawde ko ndiin leydi kaalat-en .
Enen fof ndenten ndaroɗen he no ɗeen ballifanɗe muuliraa ɗe caree he leñol he .
Enen fulɓe eɗen ndaɗaa heen no feewi .
Enen heddiiɓe caggal maɓɓe ɓe , yoo yurmeende Geno huuro he men , o hokka en kawral ngam ɓamtaare leñol ngol .
Enen kam eɗen nduwoo yo Muritani heɓtu denndaangal ko hujjananoo , haa arti e ɗii duuɓi sappo cakkitiiɗi , tawa so heɓtii , ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii fof ine naftoroo ɗum .
Enen kam nii eɗen nganndi ceɗɗaagu anndiraa ko jaambaraagal kono wonaa ɗuum woƴi Gellaay .
Enen ko en juulɓe , en ndewii Lislaam , kono so en njahii ɗo Enndo ɗo , e miijooji Mahandman Ganndi yaltini , omo haali heen geɗe keewɗe , ko wayi no haala ndiin jawdi ekn .
Enen ko teleeji e rajooji njeewti en .
Enen leñol men adii laƴirde ko dow , ko miin wiy noon .
Enen njiɗɗen raɓɓikinaade tan ko he toɓɓere nde Murtuɗo rokkunoo nguundam fof ndee woni jaŋde e binndol pulaar .
Enen noon , eɗen teskii , gila Eli feeñnikinii e luulndo hee , laamu nguu ko ko laawanii mo .
Enen noon en ngalanaa ɗum ɗeen doole .
Enen noon to bange men , mbindirɗen tan ko no hakkille men sikkiri ko noon fóti winndireede .
Enen wonɓe e Leydi ɓee , njiyaten
Engal waawi wonde daawal gootal walla daawe ɗiɗi , fof he nder lebbi 6 ( hedde waktuuji 100 ) .
Engel haari , nguru nguu ranwi tall , waɗi pate ɓaleeje .
Engel jogii hakke noon so ngel welaama ɓooraade Moritaniyaagal hitaande adiinde duuɓi maggel kellifuya ( duuɓi 21 ) .
Engel rimndi kaɓirɗe jeegom ( 6 ) nganndinal : ine heen kameraaji , radaar , kam e kaɓirɗe kaaƴweeje ( instruments météorologiques ) , kono ngel jogaaki junngo hattanhooreewo ( bras robotique ) hono no Curiosity nii walla no Perseverance nii .
Engo juula e jeeri woni Kodee .
Engo juula he jehri , woni kolongal Kodee .
Engo semmboo e mayo .
Engo semmboo e tufnde Makanjam , haayorde .
Engo wiyee kadi suudu Tooru , ɗo ɓe ñaagotonoo Geno poolngo .
Engo ɓaggii e Dammee .
Engol jogii baɗte keewɗe e yimɓe , e renndo , e jotondiral hakkunde leyɗeele , engol jogii baɗte e dente e yimɓe fof .
Engol sokla ngenndiyankooɓe saasɓe e kala sahaa e kala nokku .
Eno ciimtol ngol yahri , ngaan tuma taw Ibn Ishaaq ene wonndi e al-Mansuur to Baghdaad e ɓe njooɗii haa ɓiy al-Mansuur biyeteeɗo Muhammad Ibn Al-Mansuur ( Al-Mahdi ) oo naati .
Eno miña wi’etee ?
Escortant le SNJT , une vingtaine de journalistes sont poursuivis par la droit moyennant à eux accouchement .
Eskey !
Eskey , mi laaɓaama ndeke hiirde ndee ko ko jogori safde , waɗa sooboyoobo e " kelaa-killegaa " !
Eskey Leñol Pulaar suniima .
Espaañ kadi waawaa wiyeede ɓuri addude fetto yuɓɓungo sabo kamɓe ne ɓe ndillinaani sabaabu e kawral ngal so wonaa laabi seeɗa !
Essayé .
Etee , a waawaa woyde sabu a foofataa , henndu poofateendu toon alaa !
Etee , hoodere siirtiinde ndee , ko nde njamdi nde wonnoo .
Etee , hoto yejjit hay sahaa gooto , wonde kala ko heɓanoo e ɗeen jeewte , heɓiraa ko sabu tiiɗnaare Abel Sanndee .
Etee , hoto yejjit hay sahaa gooto , wonde ngonka Tooro moƴƴanaano en , saanga nde mo Abel Sanndee lomtinoo oo nodditaa nde .
Etee , nde ɓe ngoni to lewru nde , ɓe njiyatnoo leydi ko ena fuɗa , haa ɓooya ɓe mbiya leydi " arii leydi e hoyre " , haa ɓooya ɓe njiya leydi ena muta ( no njiyraten naange e lewru ena mbaɗa nii ) .
Etee , so en njiyii eɗum bulɗa , waɗi noon weeyo men ngo , ko henndu weeyo ngo sarata caafe naange ɗe bang-yoo-bang , haa mbaydi ndii bulɗa e gite men .
Etee Gaajo ena jogii jokkondire tekkuɗe caggal leydi .
Etee Hawwaa kañum ne kala ko wonnoo e mum ko wayi no cuɗaari e mbaadi , ɗum ɓoraa he mum haa laaɓi cer .
Etee Ndulumaaji Demɓe renndinii ko wonaa ɓeeɗoo tan fotde balɗe tati e jammaaji mumen e nder mum .
Etee alaa heen ko mbaawanɗen .
Etee bonannde waɗnoonde e kitaale 89-91 haaɗaani tan e militeer en sabu pittaali keewɗi mbaraama e daande maayo hee , tawi ko siwil en , ko ɗum waɗi mi wiyde , feere maɓɓe ndee , ko jaddiɗnde .
Etee e kaawisi Geno , liikon tokoson kaɗetekon mawnude kon , ko koon mawnoyatnoo , njibinoya ngoɗkon e ko refti heen ko ngalu leydi ndii , ngalu ngu ɓesngu nguu fotnoo naftoraade woni e bonneede .
Etee eɗen nganndi Pinal ko jelogal renndo maa leñol , ko pinal seerndata leƴƴi jiiduɗi guri , ko pinal woni faaro leñol , woni fittaandu leñol .
Etee goonga heedi ko to haɓatooɓe hakkeeji ɗemɗiyaŋkooje sabu ko hakkeeji keftinaaɗi to Pelle winndere mawɗe .
Etee he ko kumpiti-ɗen alaa ko jaayndeeji ɗemɗe keddiiɗe ɗee ɓuri nde , mi anndaa nih hay to bannge njeeygu so tawii jayndeeji goɗɗi ɗii ina ɓuri FOOYRE men jarde .
Etee ina fuɗi e dow makki butaali gawri , abbere heen fof foti ko no hoore ngelooba nih , tee ina weli haa wayi no njuumiri , ina ranwi ina wiyi tal , ellee kosam .
Etee ko e dental – kamɓe nder am , miin nder maɓɓe – min mahroyta , tuufeere tuufeere , wondude e muñal e pellital , leydi min koyɗata ndii .
Etee ko ɓuri heen haawnaade , hannde e oo sahaa jotondiral ɓuri weewde , Internet , laaɗe diwooje , laaɗe deegooge , noddirɗe ( telefon ) , fof ene ngoondi .
Etee laatiima o mahiraa ko ɓakkere waɗirteende maarbere woɗeere , ko e bewre ndiyam ndee ko ndeen o ɓamtaa , no Geno jangtorii ɗum e simoore Alhaaqatu nih .
Etee ndee waylannde ko waylanne demokaraasii .
Etee to dow hoodere jaayre naange fuɗirta ko hirnaange so ɗum yeewdaama e tagofeere men Leydi .
Etee won e koode ɓuri naange men ngee mawnude laabi ujunnaje !
Etinooɓe poɗɗe
Eto'o e hoore mum aaftoyii bal too artiri e hakkunde diŋiral mbele Ejiptnaaɓe ena mbaasa leelkinaade .
Eto'o hoɓɓi garɗo e ngaallooji , sokki bal oo e nder gacculi !
Eto-ɗee Ƴeewon .
Eto-ɗee ƴeewon !
Eto-ɗen yaajnaade seeɗa hakke baawɗe e ngoo renndo .
Etoɗee Ƴeewon .
Eyyoo ngaari faandiima laana ŋaɓɓitii kunungal , kunungal wojji no lewlewndu .
Eɓe diwa eɓe ndoƴƴoo .
Eɓe eɓɓi waɗde e nder galle hee taarorde sukaaɓe .
Eɓe holla kadi mette maɓɓe ko faati e dawro .
Eɓe keɓa !
Eɓe kirjina yo yimɓe ndem .
Eɓe mbaawi haɓde e koye maɓɓe kono goɗɗo fotaani ɓilaade ɗoon .
Eɓe mbaawi siforeede hatanteeɓe , jogiiɗo fiɓnde , nehɓe koyre mumen e golle tabitɗe ngam yooltude hujjaaji renndo to bannge dawrugol , faggudu , pinal walla nguurndam .
Eɓe mbaawi wonde e pelle biyateeɗe Pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje , eɓe mbaawi kadi tan wonde yimɓe heeriiɓe .
Eɓe mbiya gollirde Siidi S Jara e nder wittooji mum aybinii ɓee nde footaano jofaade .
Eɓe naamndii gammbol ngam falaade diƴƴe .
Eɓe ndappa e Pulaar mo alaa ella , eɓe ciimta pinal men haŋki eɓe manta jinnaɓe nehɓe-ɓee haa ɓe mbaawi naftoraade pinal mum'en .
Eɓe ndenti , eɓe ndegii , eɓe katojini e duppude gacculi Ganaa .
Eɓe ndilla e wallude pelle remooɓe no njeñtiniri golle mumen .
Eɓe nganndi ndii ɗoo ndiwri weeyataa so wonaa ɗo ndiyam woni , kono kamɓe ɓe ɗaminaaki ndiyam wonde e o nokku .
Eɓe nganniyii mahde jannginirɗi e noddude haralleeɓe jaŋde humpitiiɓe ngam ndewindanoo ɓe golle ɗee .
Eɓe ngardi e Ceerno Kabiiru Kan e Ceerno Alfaa Baabayel Sih e Ceerno Abuu Aamadu Joop .
Eɓe ngardi e Iisaa Aamadu Njaay , gardiiɗo ANCAR e biyeteeɗo Abuu Loh , mo nganndu-ɗaa ko oon ardii RTP e Papa Biraan Caam mo PAISD .
Eɓe ngardi e rewɓe e sukaaɓe .
Eɓe ngoni e laana ndiyam , Orient-Ekpres , ɓe taƴciti Orop e laana njoorndi , hade maɓɓe yettaade e kaŋ Fedyin en ɓe Palastin e nder leydi Siri , e haɓeteeɓe leydi Eritere .
Eɓe ngonndi e Gowerneer diiwaan NDar , ena ardi e jooɗaniiɗo Muritani to leydi Senegaal .
Eɓe ngonndi e rewɓe woɗɓe toɗɗaaɓe jaagorɗe : Ciisee Mint Seek El Boyde ( Pinal ) e sokno Mulaay Mint El Moktaar ( Geɗe renndo ) .
Eɓe ngonndi e sukaaɓe heedooɓe ɓee ( hotesses ) ena ñaanndii , kañum'en kala ena nanndi comci .
Eɓe njima ngol ɗoo kasol : " neene am neene am Dikko fiyii kam kellel , baaaba am baaba am Dikko fiyii kam kellel , deƴƴu tan neene am ko he sahre janannde ngon-ɗen .
Eɓe njiɗi ko fayi arde kaɓirɗe timmuɗe , ko wayi no masiŋaaji demooji , coñooji , ngona ɗoo he diiwaan gorgol ngam wallitde remooɓe , tawa nde soklaa fof ina waawa heɓeede , tawa wonaa yowitaade e masiŋaaji tammpuɗi .
Eɓe njiɗondiri , eɓe njaggondiri , eɓe njiɗi nokku maɓɓe haa laaɓti .
Eɓe njooɓii cuusal ngal weeɓaa nanndal , eɓe njaɓɓira hakkilantaagal ceekngal aada , ma ɓe aaf gollal jogorngal battinde he kala loowdi oon ñalawma .
Eɓe poti hollitaaade ko yaajtii mbele kuwle ena ɓamee e faddaade ñawu nguu e maɓɓe .
Eɓe poti waaawde jimɗi pulaar ko famɗi fof jime tati .
Eɓe puñcinoo e mbeelon no mbaakon nii .
Eɓe ɓoornii comci ganni Fulɓe haa ɓe mbaɗti yaltinde peete !
Eɓe ɓoornii ɓee ko rommbal , ɓee ko folmaat , kamɓe fof eɓe mbayi no cayɗe dime teeya ñaaƴal , boomi ñaldooji e kaŋŋe ɓe ñalndaani e yeeweende !
Eɓe ɓura ɓallaade laamorgo leydi ndii tan , sukaaɓe ɓee ina ɓeydoo haaweede .
Eɓe ɗaminii , maa sehilaaɓe maɓɓe keɓ mo ɗo e balɗe ɗiɗi .
Eɓɓooje ɗee fof mbaɗdetaake e laawol gootol .
Eɓɓoore maɓɓe wonnoo ko diiftaade jooɗaniiɗo ( Ambasadeur ) Farayse e Senegaal , ngam wostondirde mo e haɓdiiɓe maɓɓe sokaaɓe .
Eɗe mbaɗi kaaƴe keewɗe , ina heen kaŋŋe e kiri .

Eɗen mbaawi limtude heen
Eɗen mbaawi limtude heen ɓoggi tacci-atalantik ( hakkunde Orop/Afrik e Amerik ) lolluɗi ɗii , jokkondirɗi Dental Dowlaaji Amerik , ɗo maamaaje geese ganndiraaɗe GAFAM ngoni ɗoo , e miliyoŋaaji-miliyoŋaaji oropnaaɓe seŋiiɓe no feewi e enternet .
Eɗen mbaawi ni waasde yahde to koode : jerondiren nguurdam men e nguurndam Leydi .
Eɗen mbaawi nii waasde yahde to koode : jerondiren nguurdam men e nguurndam Leydi .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde , ine jeyaa e addani Riisi yande he Ikren hannde , ko goonga yiɗde mahtaade Riisi , kono kadi kulol OTAN jooka ɗum , heɓta leyɗe jeyanooɗe he URSS ndeen .

Eɗen njenanaa ko ɓuri heewde e yimɓe ko noon mbaɗata .

Eɗen njokka winndannde ndee
Eɗen paama tan , saabii ngalɗoo pellital ko muusgol kiiɗal laamu Kaddaafi fawnoo e maɓɓe .
Eɗen paami tan keñe laamu nguu e njeenaari mum ko yiɗde heñnjude ɓaleeɓe mbele ina huutoroo ɗum en e wooteeji payɗi ; Haalpulaar en noon ina keewi wiyde " yahduɓe ñaawoore keewaani waɗdude tawti-nodda " .
Eɗen paami tan ko goomuuji ownooji ( terroristes en ) gonɗi e ɗeen leyɗeele , maa wonii iwdi mum en ko e El Qayda njeyanoo , ina ngonti Daesh walla kam ina qirrii gardagol Daesh .
Eɗen paccirana ɗum renndo ngoo haa faamamuuya ɓeydoo !
Eɗen paɗti hujjaaji kesi keborɗi addeede so ñaawoore ndee jokkii .
Eɗen peewna kaɓirɗe e konuuji eɗen mbarondira .
Eɗen pira , o noddi e nder niɓɓe , holi nodduɗo ?
Eɗen porti noppi men haa yeeso
Eɗen poti areede jarakatakata e kala sahaa sabu huunde fof ina waawi heɓtaade Senegaal hannde , yoo wonan Sud quotidien .
Eɗen poti jokkude e rewde e maggol , sabu koye tati tiiɗɗe ɗe taƴ-ɗen ɗee , e peeje goɗɗe ɗe njogor-ɗen ƴeftude ɗee .
Eɗen poti nii anndude les-boɗewol sibu ine gasa tawa on meeɗii yeeɓde filmuuji ƴettiraaɗi ( pilmiraaɗi ) kameraaji les-boɗewol .
Eɗen poti reentaade bonnude ndiyam .
Eɗen poti siftorde ooɗoo debbo laatiiɗo maande ɓamtaare e wellitaare rewɓe .
Eɗen poti tabitinde ko mbiyno-ɗen ko , eɗen poti joofnude ɗum , e siifde ɗum , ngam falaade jaatirgol caggal wallidiiɓe men , e ngam anndinde ɓe wonde laawol ngol per-ɗen ngol ko laaɓtungol , ko e maggol tan ndewaten , etee hay dara ittataa en e maggol .
Eɗen poti teskaade wonaa ɓe mboros oo heɓindii
Eɗen poti waɗtude hakkille e gollodaade ko juuti pine ɓooyduɗe , luɓondirooje , naatnaattondirɗe haa e tolno mo faamamuyaaji tokoosi , ɗi ngoodaani , mbaawaa yettaade .
Eɗen tafa konuuji ngabbon ceene ngam raɓɓiɗinde peeton nguurndam kon Geno yeɗi en kon !
Eɗen teskii nii ɗo e Moritani , jehe udditaama kañum e jeeyirɗe goɗɗe , restoraaji ekn .
Eɗen tesko he ɗuum ne Pulaagu Fuuta Tooro yiytiima heen hoore mum , gila e wutteeji mum en goobaaɗi , gude leppi cañaaɗi , cuɗaaje mum en e moori mum en ganni haa e teŋngaaɗe e maageeji , kono Fuuta Jalon ne yiytiima heen hoore mum rewrude e wutteeji mum en leppi ganni ñootaaɗi daande tawa ñootira ko jannaŋkeewol haa e kufunaaji maɓɓe leppi goro .
Eɗen teskoo ine winndaa heen wonde ɗaŋre Afrik ndee yantude e huunde e Asi ko ɗaŋre ɓaleeɓe e monngol en ( " nègres et négroides " ) , " mongoloide " ) , ɗaŋre Orop , ko oropnaaɓe e ɗaŋre Amerik hirnaange e huunde e Amerik worgo e Oseyani , ko ɗaŋre berbeer en e aarabeeɓe , dooɓaaɓe Afrik e eñnjee en ( pygmées d’afrique , indiens d’amérique ) , e leƴƴi rewo leydi ceɓɓitiiɗo sara wuddu leydi rewo ceɓɓitiiɗo .
Eɗen teskoo kadi ko he ngoo wuro Abdallahi ibn Yaasiin mo Maraabat en jeyaa .
Eɗen teskoo kadi limlebbi berbeer en ɓuri limlebbi gereguwaar ɓooyde sibu omo yahra hikka e duuɓi 2969 , tawi limlebbi winndereejo oo ( lemlebbi gereguwaar ) yahrata tan ko e duuɓi 2019 .
Eɗen teskoo nii ko caggal ɗeen joɗle miijooji ardiiɓe jaagordu jaŋde ɓosii , sibu ko tuggi ndeen ɓe tawti miijo men .
Eɗen teskoo noon sooninkooɓe keeroraaki ndee ɗawre .
Eɗen teskoo yoga e kaɓirɗe Turki paatuɗe e karallaagal konu koolkisaa ko he wolde 2020 , ine heen dorone ( doronaaji ) ɗi Turki rokki Ikren ine huutoroo ɗum en hannde he wolde mum e Riisi .
Eɗen torii musidɓe kala nde mballata-en toownude innde makko , mballa-en kadi jokkude e golle ɗe o daraninoo .
Eɗen ñaagii Alla nde ɗum juutata .
Eɗen ñaagii kadi jaayndiyankooɓe men fof nde ɓeydata tiiɗnaare , ndokka meccal ngal teddungal ngal haandi .
Eɗen ñaagonoo heddiiɓe ɓe moƴƴere , nde ngaccittee e dow jam hay sinno tawii kaalisaaji ina mbona .
Eɗen ñaagoo Geno oo yoo barke makko heddo e ko o ɗacci .
Eɗen ñaagoo Geno toowɗo o nde sellinta doole ; moƴƴina battane ; ɓeyda barke o , hokka en tawtoreede hitaande faynde .
Eɗen ɗaminii feere no fof egginiraa e nokku ɓurɗo yahdude e karalliwe hande ɗee
Eɗen ɗaminii ma nde hirjini yonta men he waɗtude hakkille e jaŋɗe ɗemɗe neeniweeje , haa teeŋtii he binndol ngol .
Eɗen ɗaminii moƴƴere nde Mali artata .
Eɗi cirka eɗi noddondira .
Eɗi kaala hannde ko faati he " Ndeenka Keɓe Keeriiɗe " ( Protection de données personnelles ) , kono eɗen nganndi wonaa ɗuum ɓuri wonde ngoƴa laamuuji ɗii e hooreeɓe leyɗe men ɗee .
Eɗi mboni e weeyo no feewi .
Eɗi njogii hakke e dañde ɗo ɗi ngullitii kala nde hakkeeji majji njaɓɓaa .
Eɗi njogii hakke jogaade jaaynirɗe e nder ɗemɗe majji e heɓde denndaangal sifaaji jaayɗe , ko aldaa e paltoor gooto .
Eɗi potnoo kadi waɗde wasiyaaji kollitooji nafoore coftal ɓalli , kam e ñaamdu seniindu e senaare nguurndam .
Eɗii sifaaji ɗiɗi kala , suukara neɗɗo oo ñaami kala heddoto ko e nder ƴiiƴam , o yettoytaako nder terɗe ɓanndu .
Eɗum jalnii noon .
Eɗum ɗaɓɓi darnde men enen kala , woni mballen ɓe e ngoon yeeso , hono no Fedde Halayɓe fuɗɗorii waɗde nii .

FOOYRE ƁAMTAARE wontii jaaynde yahdunde he yonta mum , gila e mbaadi haa e loowdi .
Faama Mbay e Siley Baal ne teskinii e oon jamma .
Faamaama wonde paltoor oo ko kuutorgal ooyrugal laamu kuuɓtodinngal e tolnooji kala .
Faammin min no ɗum aaɓnortoo !
Faamnude neɗɗo koɗɗo e dow Leydi ena ɗeɓi tiiɗde seeɗa , kono so en ƴeewii yeru , en mbaɗtii hakkillaaji sanne ma en paam no ɗum wonirta .
Faamɓe yoo pammin .
Faandaare Safaara keso oo ko yiytude feere
Faandaare Unicode ko rokkude denndaangal maaɗe ɗemɗe winndere ndee tonngooɗe limoore nder informatik mbele gostondiral ina aaɓnoo hakkunde binndanɗe ɗemɗe ceertuɗe .
Faandaare amen ko yo yimɓe ɓee fof naatnu heen juuɗe mumen .
Faandaare eɓɓoore ndee ko jarribaade ngam teeŋtinde nafoore wonnde heen ndee .
Faandaare eɓɓoore ndee ko mbele , e wattan hitaande ndee tawa sukaaɓe ɓee keɓindiima taro : gila e alkule ɗee , mbaawii kijjanɗe kam e kelme tokoose .
Faandaare lappol ngol ko caaktugol dallinannde pelle pinal ɗee e hirjinde ɓesngu nguu ko faati e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof kam e naattingol mum en he nder jaŋde leydi ndii .
Faandaare maggal ko nawde yimɓe dow lewru ɗoo e hitaande 2025 .
Faandaare maggal wonnoo ko sukkude yolnde wonnoonde hakkunde koloniiji Afrik hirnaange farayseejo e ndeenaandi ( protectorat ) Maruk e teelɗugol njiimaandi Alaseri , njiimaandi koɗki , mbaɗtundi Alaseri departemaa Farayse .
Faandaare maggol ko waɗde hoolkiso mawngo fuɗɗortoongo lottugol fiisee Space Launch System ( SLS ) , neldugol nguuna inniraaka Orion ka hoɗaaka ngam taartaade Lewru , arta he Leydi .
Faandaare makka ko wiɗtude bannge meetelol naange keedɗo dow oo , mo tekkeendi mum tolnii e miliyoŋaaji miliyoŋaaji kiloomeeteer .
Faandaare mayre adannde ko laaɓal .
Faandaare mayre ko yiytidde peeje gonooje ngooroondi potal nder renndo , e ɓiyleydaagu e ndimaagu aadee e ɗooftagol hakkeeji gorwori aadee , gardagol sariya , tiiɗtingol gootiɗingol Ngenndi , tawa gooto kala ina hormii heddiiɓe ɓee , e nanondirde e eɓɓaande renndo waawnde tiiɗtinde ngootaagu renndo e jam .
Faandaare maɓɓe heen wonnoo ko haɗde woɗɓe ɓee yande he maɓɓe .
Faandaare men ko waɗde jaaɓngal ( App ) tawa ena waɗi tigille keewɗe , jom mum wona e jiɓtirde no weliraa .
Faandaare mum kadi ko haɗde konu ngu e waɗnooɓe bonanndeeji ɗi ñaaweede janngo e jam .
Faandaare ndee ko etaade faamde hol ko saabii huurgo Naange ngoo , ɓurde naange ngee e hoore mum wulde fotde laabi 300 , e hol ko waɗi pecoron mum ( particules ) semmbe ina caaboo duleeɗi yiitesulɗeeji ( électromagnétiques ) baawɗi haljinde gollagol yiite dow Leydi men ndii .
Faandaare ndee ko haɗde Ameriknaaɓe soodde marsandiis Siin ( sibu kubbal ngal ɓeydii coggu makko haa o ɓurtiima bagi Amerik tiiɗde ) .
Faandaare ndee ko rokkude wasiyaaji e sakkitde peeje ngam ummital ngenndiwal ngam tabitingol nuunɗal e beldital e deeƴre nder renndo , geɗe gonooje ngooroondi ƴellitaare faggudu renndo fotndoowo yimɓe fof .
Faandaare ndee ko wallitde janngooɓe ɓee waawde Taro , taro regiingo wonande Janngooɓe fof .
Faandaare ndee ko yaltinde deftere feeñninoore jokkondire baɗdanooɗe , e hooreejo gadano suudu sarɗi Muritani .
Faandaare ngal " piɓondiral jam hakkunde men e tago " , innirangal " nanondiral Kumming-Montréal " ko reende leyɗe , e maaje e eddaaji , hisna ɗum en he dorsingol e doostagol e boneeji kilimaa .
Faandaare ngalɗoo ballal , wonaa ñiŋde won ɓeen walla woyande woɗɓe .
Faandaare ngolɗoo diwgol nayaɓol ko teskaade nokku ɗo ngel waawata juuraade angel hisi .
Faandaare ngool ngaal tuugnorgal ko hollitde wonde Amerik waawi Riisi to bannge weeyo .
Faandaare ooɗoo dokimaa ko fooɗtude hakkillaaji yimɓe fof , rewrude , ko idii fof , e cifagol ngonka daartol njuumtuka e sosngo Mauritani kaa ( I ) .
Faandaare rowrowre ndee ko daranaade jojjanɗe aadee e wallitde tabitingol nuunɗal nder renndo kam e ñiɓagol demokaraasi e nder Muritani juumtuɗo , dentuɗo .
Faandaare ɗuum wonnoo ko ustude ñawu jabet walla ɗaɗi e ɓernde , e tellinde ɓeto kolesterol e dummbo ɗaɗi .
Faanditaa e ɗuum fof noon ko ngam lelnude , e ko tabiti , ngonka leydi ndii , njaajeendi mum e ko woni e nder mum .
Faanditaa heen ko jaaynde ndee foti wonande fedde ndee e lenyol ngol kala ko " jomngol ko ina hollita ɗum laawol ɓamtaare " .
Faanditaare ooɗoo kawise e konngol geno : caggal Annabi Muusaa kanko Sam-uun laatiima ko e iwdi Annabi Haaruuna ( JKM ) o ummii , ina laatii ko o Annabi Israayiilnaaɓe , golle makko noon ɓuri yahrude ko e ñaawoore , ina teskitaa ko o baawɗo ñaawde goonga e fenaade , nde Asbaaɗi maayi , Asbaaɗi noon ko to suudu renndo , kono e nder yonta Israyiilnaaɓe won laamɗo maɓɓe biyatenooɗo ndeenɗoon innde .
Faanditanoo he keewal maɓɓe ko feeñninde mbaydi kesiri njimri yimɓe heewɓe yuɓɓuɓe yahduɓe ɗo luural alaa gila he njimri haa he taaɓe .
Faarmata ko baaye guurdunooɗo e nawlum yummum , gonnooɗo lemmbel baaba makko .
Faarmata meeɗaa daɗde e liggeey galle muusɗo .
Faarmata yahi balɗe tati , hawri e debbo nayeejo .
Faatel ardii goomu lollirɗo " goornomaa eskoleer .
Faatel wallii lekkol amen dañde funeere .
Faatimata ko diwo , laawol ine rokki worɓe yo ngar ƴama ɗum .
Faatu Lawɓe , Moor Taala Naar gonduɗo hannde e Fallu Jeŋ , Maam Njaay ekn .
Faatumata SI SAAWAANE
Faayida goɗɗo o ko eɗen njannga he nder yeewtere ndee hol ko addanta sukaaɓe men jibinaaɓe he nder gure ɗe ɗemngal Pulaar jaalaaki ronkude waawde Pulaar .
Faayida goɗɗo o ko eɗen njannga he nder yeewtere ndee hol ko addanta sukaaɓe men jibinaaɓe he nder gure ɗe ɗemngal Pulaar njaalaaki ɗee , ronkude waawde Pulaar haa moƴƴa .
Faayiida Jeeriyel gadano wonaani e kawisi mbaydi mum walla e jarabi siilaaji ndiwri ndiyam nde fooɗtata e saanga ile mawɗe , kono faayiida oo soomii ko e daartol diiwaan oo .
Faayiida mum tan , caggal Ceerno Iba Deer Caam ko Ceerno Abdul Malal Joop .
Faayiida tan , jaltugol Firefox e ɗemngal Pulaar woni taaɓal ɓurgnal mawnude ngal Pulaar taaɓii gila alkule e Tappirde pulaartafaa Ko dille ɗee tan pamɗunoo , yiɗde gollaade e higgu tawa wofaani , ŋuuraani .
Faayndaare maggu ko yiiltude hakkillaaji yimɓe e aawde e mum en ngañgu e kusumma hakkunde leƴƴi , sikkude ɗuum ina waawi yaltinde ngu e caɗeele ngu wondi hannde ɗee .
Faayndaare nde kadi ko haɗde ronooɓe ɓe naamnaade iddiya paayodinɗo .
Faayndaare ndee ko mbele ɓe keblanoo naatnugol jaŋde ɗemɗe ɗee he nder TNJ , ɓe naata pelle ɗee , ɓe mballita cargol dallinannde ndee , ɓe mballita ñawndande pelle ɗee caɗeele jannginooɓe .
Faayre alaa noon sabu hannde ko " maa weeta yoo !
Faayre ndee njogani-ɗen keerol men fuɗɗaange ngol , sabu buuytagol laamu Mali e deɓgol " jihaadist en " e nder saahal , to rewo too ne kay , ina foti faaynude en so Alaseri e Maruk ndikkondirii .
Facebook e YouTube ɓuraa huutoreede e nder majje .
Facebook wiyi waɗiri ɗuum ko ngam huuɓnude ɗaɓɓaande haalooɓe berbeer e nder winndere ndee .

Fadannooɓe waylowaylo mawngo alaa ko njiyi : Aziz hesɗitinii Laghdaf e hoore ɗowgu Muritani .
Faddorde israayiil he njuuteendi gaawol Suyees fusi .
Faggudu laamaandi ndii tuuginoo ko e nehngo jawdi , na’i e baali .
Faggudu tawtii kopporeeje .

Falnde ndee ene waɗi kominaaji nay , kominateeji dowriiji sappo , e hakke 272 wuro .

Fanay kadi ko duɗal jaŋde Lislaam , tesketeengal nder Fuuta-Tooro .

Fanaynaaɓe , he gardagol mawɗo wuro , Elimaan Mammadu Lih , calii rewde he makko .
Fanaynaaɓe heewɓe tawtoraama fergo feewde leyɗe Wambarankooɓe nootaade eeraango Sayko Umar , ko heewi heen artaani .
Fanniyankkoɓe kollii Kayis Sayid jeyaa ko he miijanɗe " ngenndiyankaagal Arab " , o fuɗɗii tabitinde " jeytaare " leydi leyɗe aarabeeɓe haa o wiyi " kala jotondiral he leydi Israayiil foti jaggireede ko jamfa mawɗo " .
Fanniyankooɓe ina njogii heen jiyanɗe ceertuɗe .
Fannu fijirde kala waɓete e ɗee ñalaaɗe .
Fannuuji joyi Ɓiyleydaagu ko : Ɓiyleydaagu to bannge dawrugol , Ɓiyleydaagu to bannge renndo , Ɓiyleydaagu to bannge faggudu , Ɓiyleydaagu to bannge pinal , Ɓiyleydaagu to bannge demokraasi .
Fannuyankooɓe loskiyankaagal diine mbiyi capanɗe jeenayi e dow teemedere ( 90% ) e yimɓe mayri ndewata ko diine Annebi men Mohammadu Rasuulu ( MJK ) walla mbiyen diine islaam 10% keddiiɗo o rewata ko diineeji gaadanteeɗi .
Fannuyankooɓe ngoon senngo mbiyi sinno wonaano ɗanniyankaagal ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii keewal mayri maa yettoyo capanɗe joyi miliyoŋ ( 50 .
Fannuyankooɓe ɓesnugol mbiyi aduna o fof haa fiyi feggere ko rewɓe Nijeer ɓuri Waawde jibinde , sabu debbo fof ina jibina so famɗii sukaaɓe njeeɗiɗo .
Fanu Slam wonii fanu ƴettirɗo kongol sukaaɓe .
Fara Pennda ne hunii yiylotaako tee jogantaako hay Waalo-waalo gooto guuraninooɗo tuubakooɓe .
Farayse , englee ekw .
Farayse e maaldiiɓe mum ndaraani haɓde e koninkooɓe Mali , ɓeen ne kolliti njaltii njiimaandi Farayse .
Farayse e yahdiiɓe mum tuubakooɓe e Afirikinaaɓe hono leyɗe CEDEAO e leyɗe G5-Saahal ina njogii heen mettere , haa ɓe pawi e Mali kuuge muusɗe .
Farayse heɓii hannde " miis " jontaaɗo paarnorteeɗo : Rugi Wele , koɗɗo to Mantu-Laa-Jolii .
Farayse ina mettini pollugol laamu ɗimmol ngol e joñgol laamu sabbordu nduu , hiisii ko laamu Mali hannde nguu dagaaki ; teeŋti noon e jotondiral maggu e Riis en , walla Wagner ɓe ɓe kiisii ko " heɓi dawna en " .
Farayse woofi ɗiɗi , Arsantiin wallini laabi nay , ɓe nduuyi , ɓe maɓɓondiri , ɓe ngulli !
Farayse ɓeydii doolnude sabu ŋatere , Muusa Moolo uuji e hitaande 1901 , o fayi leydi Gambi , o mooloyii to Engele en , nder wuro Keserkunnda .
Faraysenaaɓe , nde tawnoo ina njenanaa Muhammed el Habiib yiɗanaa ɗum en jam , pelliti wolde ɓiloto tan hakkunde mum en e Waalo .
Faraysenaaɓe keeranii Kheerfi Khari Daaro ; Fara Pennda noon , Linngeer Jommbot Mbooc ( ɓe Faraysenaaɓe tampini haa cuggi , yiɗde ɓe o heedana Kheerfi ) e ko ɓuri heewde e mawɓe maantinɓe e Waalo .
Faraysenaaɓe mbiyi o diiraniino ɗum en e hitaande 1905 , yiɗde siifondireede .
Faraysenaaɓe ngullitiima nde cuɓaaka hoore doggol , kono Fifa teeŋtinii suɓngo mum Afrik Bŋ Worgo sabu ko ngal njaatigeewal kawgel ngel .
Faraysenaaɓe njooɗinoo ndeen ko to wuro Seeju .
Farbaaji tawi ko Jool ina soppinii .
Fari Silat Kah , he darnde mum wonde mawɗo fedde Fulɓe Senegaal , ko adii nde omo ɓoorno paɗe makko omo yaha he ɗee koyɗe kanko tan walla kanko e huunde e terɗe ARP-TP , omo fotnoo jokkondirde e mawɓe leñol ngol heddiiɓe ɓee o diisnondira e mum en heen .
Farmbaal dañaani follude laamɗo mum kono laamɗo oo ne dañaani jiimde e makko tan no laamaaɓe ɓee fof nih .
Fartaŋŋe naamnaade hol ko seerndi " geec " e " fiiltiingo " .
Fartaŋŋe ɗimmo oo ko daande Ndey Kummba Jah e segene Muusaa Sih , kamalenku Juude Jaaɓi .
Farysenaaɓe njunnginii , Mbappe sunii , ñirɓinii , kam fof e daɗndude Farayse e cili tati !
Fawaa e maɓɓe ko tuumayre " ndeenka Dowla " , e " suuɗde maayɗo " , e " moojobere warhoore " .
Fawaade e dille kuule asamaan jiyotooɗe , ko wayi no ngonka
Fawaade e hadiis Awsi bun Awsi saŋafi ( MAWM ) wi’i : " mi yiyii Annabi ( MJKM ) wi’i : so gooto e mon finii subaka yoo loot juuɗe mum laabi tati ngam o anndaa cammeeje juuɗe makko to mbaalata .
Fawaade he ɗuum ɓe pelliti ko waɗɗe jakkaa oo ɓe njowa tottiroygol nanondireewol ngol haa sahaa goɗɗo .
Fawaade heen kadi nde tawnoo yimɓe ndeen , balɗe mum en ina njuutatnoo , ko ɗum tagi jibingol wayataa no wayi jooni nih .
Fawde fof he Wagner ina hulɓinii , ko ummaade he kalifaandi ( Farayse ) sakkoo he kesiri ( Riisi ) .
Fawii heen kadi , Ibliis naamndinooma joommum yo ƴeew ɗum haa ñalnde darnga etee o jaɓanaama ɗuum .
Fawii tan ko e ndaaroowo oo : gonɗo dow huɓeere , ma wiy lampa ko les woni ena seŋii e mbildi .
Fawotoo ko e waasde ɓe hawrude e miijooji no geɗe leydi ndii potiri ɗowireede .
Fawtii heen , jikku neɗɗo maɓɓe jooɗaniiɗo ɓe o , hono Saamori Mammadu Jallo , wallittaa nanondiral hakkunde artuɓe ɓe .
Fawtii heen kadi yiyaama hay ndiwri e muunteewon ngonkon e nder laana kaa koorii oon ɗoon ñalawma .
Fawtii heen ko lebbi jeenay , Bah Ndaw ittaa , tawi kadi ko ɓeen ittunooɓe IBK he laamu , ngitti mo kadi he gardagol Asimi Goyta .
Fawtii heen ngal teskaaki daawal hakkunde duɗal e koɗki , ko noon kadi ɓe mbaasiri teskaade kisal cukalon kon .
Fayndaare
Fayndaare UNESCO ko hirjinde e paamgol darnde ɗemngal e nder pinal aadee .
Fayndaare adannde ndee ko ngam hollunoode ɓesnguuji maɓɓe jibinaaɓe caggal leydi pinal mum en .
Fayndaare heblo ngoo ko ɓeydude humpito jaayndyankooɓe ɓee haa mbaawa moƴƴinde golle mum en no haanirta nih .
Fayndaare leyɗe ƴellitiiɗe ko jiimde petroŋ .
Fayndaare maggu ko wallitde diisnondiral adunankeewal ko fayti e geɗe faggudu .
Fayndaare makko ko dañde feere tuugiinde e diine : ɗum woni huutoraade diine ngam waasde ñawndude gagga o : wiɗtude haa annda ko waɗi ko woni ?
Fayndaare makko wonnoo ko ruttanaade bonanndeeji baɗanooɗi ɗi , heɗoo ɓe bonannde nde yettinoo ɓe , waɗa doggol waraaɓe siwil e militeer en .
Fayndaare maɓɓe ( ko ɓe muuyi e mum ) ko janngin’de , sukaaɓe ɓe duuɓi jeetati haa duuɓi sappo e joy , waawde winndude e taraade he ɗemngal mum en neeniwal fulfulde .
Fayndaare maɓɓe ko tabitinde jaalagol arabeere he dow ɗemɗe leydi keddiiɗe ɗee .
Fayndaare mum ko haɗde ɓaleeɓe Sudannaaɓe murtande laamu Omar Al Basiir , sibu ɓeen ko saltinooɓe ndiin njiimaandi gila e hitaande 2003 .
Fayndaare wejo ngoo ko ngam artirde teskuyaaji yimɓe ɓee he batteeje yah-ngartaa jogii he nder saareeje ( cahe ) ɗe .
Fayndaare ɗiɗimere ndee ko jokkondirde wuro ngoo e pelle Oropnaaje ballooje e ɓamtaare walla waɗɗe punondiral ( jumelage ) hakkunde won e gure Farayse e wuro Ciloñ ngoo .
Fayɓe heen to woɗɗi e to ɓadii , yo Geno yettinoy ɗumen e dow jam , tawta kadi jam to jeese mumen .
Faɗo Fotosfeer ngo ma sowo ndiyam pasɗam wulde laabi 45 , kono ko kanngo ɓuri ɓuudɓe e ko heddii e naange ko !
Faɗo Pasifik kadi ina ɓosa hitaande kala hedde santimeeteruuji 10 ( 10 cm ) feewde fuɗnaange rewo .
Feccere e jeere ndee heewi del ndiyam .
Feccere e mayru
Feccere kala pullo , seereer , kam e jeeyoowo teewu , nani heen , Saalif njoɓoowo oo ina rewi e maɓɓe .
Feccere otelaaji Farayse meeɗii heɓde ɗi .
Feccere teetaari ndii maa habrude en heen ko laaɓti .
Feccere ɗiɗmere ndee ardii ɗum ko Ndate Yalla : ande salii kalifaandi safalɓe , tee ɓe njaɓaani yo tuubakooɓe mbaɗ e Waalo ko mbelaa .
Feccere ɗiɗmere ndee yowittoo ko e cifagol batte gallugol tijjanoongol koɗdigal hakkunde leƴƴi , hono no tabitiniranoo nii .

Fedde Pinal Looti ko sukaare sabu nde yahrata tan ko e duuɓi joy , nde wonnoo nde sosaa ko e hitaande 2005 , Kono ko nde dariinde dadiinde hatojinaande .
Fedde Sayku Tijjaani e gardagol sokna Kaggu Sem e heewɓe haa nan-ɓe moƴƴere ndee tan nootii hayso tawii e imtidaani fof .
Fedde UNESCO , fedde faggudu winndere , haralleeɓe njanngiin fof , ina kawri e nafoore wonnde e fuɗɗoraade jannginde kala cukalel ɗemngal mum neeniwal .
Fedde UNICEF hollitii fotde 160 miliyoŋ cukalel tuggi duuɓi 5 haa 14 ko gollinteeɓe .
Fedde adunaŋkoore toppitiide cellal erriima leyɗeele kala nde ɓamata kuwle tiiɗɗe ngam surde ɓesnguuje mum'en e raaɓeede nguu ñawu mbaawngu warde .
Fedde heen fof ne nelaani ko ŋakki terɗe 5 .
Fedde nde riiwtaani hay go’to , kala nanɗo dille mayre , yoo ar jokkoo , waasa joñde ho’re mum e meyre ; woni pele Fedde nde ko renndinde e mooɓde ɓiɓɓe mbiy-mi haa ngonta gootum .
Fedde ndee ea erroo kala pullo gonɗo e leydi ndii , haa teeŋti e diiwaan Pari yoo ar tawtoree yeewtere ndee .
Fedde ndee ena jogii lowre Enternet ena wiyee " hookii .
Fedde ndee ina renndini 334 wuro tuggi Dagana haa Demmankaani .
Fedde ndee ina waɗi sukaaɓe wuro , lewru fof eɓe piya , e sukaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi .
Fedde ndee joganii mo nguura , hoɗorde , koltu , jolngo , safaara e geɗe keeriiɗe .
Fedde ndee ko nde ONG , jogiinde resipisee mum .
Fedde ndee ne , so suusii hannde noddude e daraade e yeeso yimɓe , ena laaɓi won wonɓe caggal mayre .
Fedde ndee noddiri-mo ko yoɓde mo ñaamgolluuje makko e sirŋinaare nde o holli ngam yoo fedde ndee tabit .
Fedde ndee sosaaama maa won duuɓi nayi .
Fedde ndee toɗɗiima e kala heen deedal geec , Duɗal meteyoo diiwaniiwal karalleewal to bannge tijjo guubiliiji : Miami ( wonande Atalantik rewo e Pasifik fuɗnaange-rewo ) ; Tokiyoo ( wonande Pasifik hirnaange-rewo ) ; Honolulu ( Pasifik hekkundeejo ) ; New Delhi ( wonande sorfundu Benngaal e geec Omaan ) ; Nadi ( wonande duuɗe Fidji , Pasifik hirnaange-worgo ) ; Nokku Météo-France mo Saint Denis de La Réunion ( wonande hirnaange-worgo geec iñnjeejo ) .
Fedde ndee yaltiniino ballal peewtungal e haalirde pete ( 3 000 000 ) .

Fedde ɓamtaare pulaar he Muritani ina teddiniraa golle ɗee e kuuɓal , haa teeŋti noon e Catal Nuwaadibu ngal , sabu ɓesngu Tuldenaaɓe njooɗiingu ɗoo e wuro men Nuwaadibu lobbudu yurmrende , teddinirii catal ngal denndaangal golle ɗee , gila e fuɗɗorde haa heɓi wortorde majje .

Federba nuli e maɓɓe konu mum e nder Kajoor ( febariyee 1856 ) , o fuɗɗitii ruggooji makko .

Feere Sharon gallii .
Feere adannde ko werlaade laana ngam faloyaade haayre nder weeyo .
Feere fotnde huutoreede ko gollondiral e joom mum en ɓee , mbele peeje juumtuɗe ina ƴettee ngam lomtingol moƴƴol , nuunɗungol ; peeje deentorɗe batte goɗɗe ɗe ɗum waawi jibinde cakkee , tawa ko baawɗe bonnude sato walla faggudu maa renndo e pinal .
Feere laamu nguu rewi haa jooni ndee , haa wiyi ooɗoo doosiyee uddaama , wonaa feere yuumtunde wonande ko ɓuri heewde e pelle loranooɓe daɗɓe , walla ronooɓe ɗum en ɓee .
Feere majjum ko rokkude alkulal kala tonngoode winndiraande " 0 " e " 1 " tan .
Feere makko ko ɓeydude kubbal ( lempoo ) pawetenoongal e marsandiis Siin naatnata Dental Dowlaaji Amerik .
Feere maɓɓe ine facciraa haa laaɓi , tee njaru mum ine hiisaa haa timmi .
Feere nde ɓe ndañi ko " findinde yimɓe " , ko saaktude sirluuji ɗii sosiyateeje , mbele yimɓe fof ine ngummanoo ɗum en .
Feere nde ɓe ƴetti ko wiyde " ɓayri ɓe mbaɗtii waɗde hono ɗee geɗe , ɓayri aɓe kumpitii he yimɓe ɗumɗoo fof , aɓe nganndi sirluuji yimɓe fof , pindinen ɓesnguuji ɗii mbele ine ngannda ko waɗetee he dow keeceeje mum en , mbele aɓe naamndoo ɗee pelle , kala ko ine mbaɗa he yimɓe ɓee , yo ɗaɓɓu tawo yamiroore mum en " .

Firti
Firti ko demal maaro ina heewi ngartam .
Firti ko enen fof en ngummaniima huunde , firti ko alaa e sago wona .
Firti ko ina soña ko heewi hay so mawnaani , ina mowwa no feewi .
Firti ko so pulaagu heewirii nii ɗii calti , saabii ɗum tan ko julyultondiral pine , pinal koɗdangal fof wostondiree kelmeendi , ñemmbondiree jikkuuji , jiggondiree aadaaji .
Firti ko so tawii laana kaa paanii jaynge , haŋkadi diwnude ka nattat newaade .
Firti ko ñaawoore alaa .
Firti ko ɓe ngoonɗinaani ɗemɗe men ina kaandi e janngireede gannde .
Firti ko ɓeen , kañum en , ina jarani ɗum en huunde fof .
Firti ndeke ko laamu Maruk woni ko e yiɗde momtude kala finaa tawaa walla ɗemɗe ɗe ngonaa Aarabeeje e nder Maruk .
Firti tan ko Manndelaa jooɗaaki , hay so tawii , nde o woppata laamu nde , o huninooma hankati toppitaade ( wuurande ) taaniraakon makko e jom suudu makko Graça Machel , mo o ɓamti omo yahra e duuɓi 80 .
Firti tan ko ɓooyii .
Firugol nde e Pulaar , pellet wontany defterdu men nduu 6eydaari ndi 6etotaako , nde wonnoo d`um ko ko meemi ndanka wonkiiji men .

Fiɓir-baaji mo o haalanaa fof o ƴeewoyaa ɗum .

Fooyre joginoo tan ko " dépôt légal " keɓanooɗo e hitaande 1980 , ndaa ɗuum nattii waawde yaltinde jaaynde .
Fooyre ko loowdi tekkundi , nate jooɗɗe , e ciŋkal ŋarɗungal .
Fooyre taccii ɗoo yolnde juutnde , liɓii pale keewɗe haa laatii hannde jaaynde teskinnde e nder jaayɗe leydi ndii .
Fooyre wonnoonde e tiinde baaba makko nde eggi faati e makko .
Fooyre yaltini tonngoode mum adannde ko e lewru noowammbar 1980 .
Fooyre yetti tan ko atu mum , e koosgol e golle goomu mum winndooɓe , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa ko ŋatɓe .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare firanii on miijo karallo gooto , yahdungo e ko jogornoo wasiyaade .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare ina darii ndeen darnde , nde sagataaɓe , soofaaji Pulaagu ceeraani e wammbude ɗum haa nde ɓeydoo doolnude no jaayɗe mawɗe adunayankooje keɓi ɗoo .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko jaaynde timmunde yuɓɓunde , heewnde ñamri , nde ina tawa e mum fannuuji ɗii kala , ina tawee e mayre kabaruuji keewɗi paayodinɗi .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare yeewtidii e makko gila e nguurndam naalaŋkaagal haa e ngonka debbo nder renndo men .
Fooyre ɓamtaare dariima ndeen darnde saɗtunde , darorii no ɓuri feewirde .

Fowru hinaa yana e ko kulle goɗɗe conngi , loppita .

Fowru jaabii : ko lekki kaaloowi .
Fowru ko kullel kulngel reedu no feewi .
Fowru nduu wiyi mbeewa baa : " Bottaari , abbo too !
Fowru ruttii ene ŋattoo , haa tawi mbeewa nder ngaska , ene futtini gite mum boɗeeje .
Fowru so feewnatiima e coppi ( ɓoosaaji ) , mbaroodi e ngatam , tan warat .
Fowru so juhii neɗɗo , so o naatii e ɗo sukki tan heewi ko fadoyde ɗum , haa o yalta ɗo niɓɓiɗi ɗoo .
Fowru wi'i : mi woondirii hunuko neene am , mbiɗo waawi hollude ma lekki kaaloowi no miin e maa nii .
Fowru wii : " Alaa , Kaawu Mbaroodi , a yiyii , cumu am nguu , nde ndu faandii ɗoo tan , ngu waɗi keel , ngu faati too .
Fowru wiyi : " Hiraande , to Bottaari yahata ?
Fowru wiyi : " Ɗum ko mbeewa ne ?

Fuuta , hay
Fuuta Tooro woni yuman pulaagu .
Fuuta fof nootii mo .
Fuuta-Tooro kam wiyata tan ko " feɗeendu " .
Fuutaaji ɗii ko nay ( 4 ) : – Fuuta Tooro ; – Fuuta kiiɗndi walla Kiinngi ; – Fuuta Maasina e – Fuuta Jaloŋ .
Fuutankooɓe walla ɓaleeɓe fof nii , mettinɓe no feewi e ngonka mum en e leydi ndii , ina keewi fawtude bone ɗee fof e makko , sibu , e wiyde mum en " ko kanko salii jaɓde ardaade leydi ndii oon sahaa " .
Fuutaŋkooɓe-Tooro fof ena ciiftora hare bonnde haɓaande hakkunde Muritani e Front Polisario .
Fuuyre ardi ko e deeɓte , hooddata ko e kasaŋka .
Fuɗɗaade e Al-Kaydaa haa e jeeyoowo gerte e laabi Nuwaasoot , ena saɗi mo ñiŋaani ngal jotondiral , ena saɗi mo yiɗaa ngal daaƴee ko yaawi .
Fuɗɗi bonannde , findini seyɗaane he Mali , ko gartugol tuwaareg en jeyanooɓe e " légion verte " ina ndoondii kaake e njogitaaje , ƴettitɓe ɗoon e ɗoon hujjaaji mum en ndimaagu ɓooyɗi , hade jihaadiyankooɓe arditaade ɗum en .
Fuɗɗi mowluuda e nder Barooɓe Jakel ko Ceerno Muktaar Sammba lollirɗo Ceerno Yero Kudeeje .
Fuɗɗoode rafi o anndaaka tawo , etee hay kulle daaɓateeɗe nganndidaaka tawo , won tuumooɓe bilwile e kulle goɗɗe , ina yaakora neɗɗo heɓi rafi o ko e kulle dafanooɗe , maa tawa ko o ñaamɗo teew majje , walla o mem ɗe .

Gaa-gaa Arɗooji lolluɗi ko wayi no
Gaa-gaa batuuji-weeyo ( visio-conférence ) , kuutorɗe goɗɗe limneeje , baaɗe no jaaɓɗe jannginirɗe ɗemɗe , walla topirɗe jaŋde he nder internet , ɓeydiima heewde no feewi .
Gaa-gaa fayndaare mum wonde weltinooɓe kadi ɓamtooɓe Pinal Senegaalnaɓe walla mbiyen Afriknaaɓe e ɗemɗe mum en , teeŋti noon he Pulaar , ɗemngal ɓurngal yaajde e saraade he nder Afrik , Piindi ko sosooɓe golle ( créateur des emplois ) ɓe ene mballita e ƴellitaare faggude leydi mum en .
Gaa-gaa ko nde soccondirta e laamu Senegaal ngam yooltude jojjanɗe leñol fulɓe e ɗemngal Pulaar , e ɓe mbaɗti hakkillaaji maɓɓe no feewi e yimɓe gollanooɓe leñol haalpulaar en e ɗemngal Pulaar .
Gaaci ɗi kala ɓiyɗo Afriknaajo keɗiiɗo ɗum maa yiyto heen hoore mum , yiytoo heen pinal mum e hanki mum .
Gaagaa fiqhu mo o janngata oo , ceerno woownii mo mahdu nabiiyu no feewi haa o woni heen yimiyanke mawɗo .
Gaagaa wullitaango ngo hujjitantooɓe Kompawre en mbaawi waɗde , ina heddii senngo baɗe jaltuɗe leydi Burkina maa nih jaltuɗe Afirik .
Gaaji biwotooɗi parfara .
Gaanti keewi huutoreede ko e sahaa sorbooji e dingire .
Gaas karbonik ina waawi wonnde 100 hitaande e nder weeyo .
Gaas ko konngol ganndal , leƴƴi fof ena mbaawi huutoraade ɗum .
Gaasuuji dammbo jookiiɗi nder leydi ɗii ko joyaɓal wertallo Leydi men .
Gaasuuji gaddoojii seer ɗii kala so ndenndinaama , mbiitam ndiyam wonata heen ko 70% .

Gadanal ngal ko daawal ɗo bannge lewñoowo oo
Gadano o ko baaba mum ɗiɗaɓo o .
Gadano oo ko Abdallanaajo , ko kanko e Mammadu Demmba Sih pijdi , mawnidi , naatdi jaŋde .
Gadanol ngol , tiitoonde mum ko " Doondu " , ngati yiɗande hoore mum wonaa anande banndum .
Gadiiɗo mo oo , haaɗre mum ko 11 000 km wonnoo , kanko Sarmat , " o alaa haaɗre " e wiyde Putin , tee o ɓeydi heen " omo waawi feccitde wuddu leydi Rewo walla Worgo , o fiɗa toɓɓannde " .
Gagga jeyi leydi ileteendi daande maayo ndi golle Fedde Peewnugol Maayo Senegaal ( OMVS ) rokkiti faayiida , ina jokkondiree e caɗeele koɗdigal leƴƴi leydi ndii .
Galle
Galle Ceerno Njaay Baro to Nuwaadibu neldii , kañum ne , seto fattamlamo e gardagol Ceerno Mohammadu Kaamil Baro .
Galle Fedde Ko ɓee ngarani cate mum en
Galle Laamorgo leydi ndii wontii joowre jaaƴe , kañum e jooɗorde Dowlaaji Dennduɗi ( ONU ) .
Galle Salli Ummu , joom-wuro Sahre Fadduɓe , ɓesngu mum yiytoytee ko to wiyetee Seegeela , haa hannde e nder leydi Mali .
Galle Tabital Pulaaku Farayse walla winndere , miijo mahngo galle fitiramgollaagu ngu ummorii ko e gootal e jaale lenyol noddirteeɗo ceerno Mammadu LOH , guurɗo to Orliyaa e nder leydi Farayse ( France ) jeyaaɗo to Joŋto nder leydi Senegaal .
Galle goɗɗo ɓurɗo mawnude mo min naamnii oo nafoore mum ina heerii seeɗa ngati emin ngondi e lawɓe ɓeen ne ina njogii caɗeele to batte leɗɗe ɗe potata soppude ngam waawde liggoraade .
Galle keso oo ma o waɗ cuudi joyi e saal jaajɗo .
Galle maa Liksaar e to Jaagordu ndema e ngaynaaka laatiima nehaande Joobɓe he kuuɓal , aan e ɓiy-yumma maa , giɗo maa Aamadu Muttaar Jallo mo tawoy-ɗaa , yo Geno Toowɗo O yurmo on yaafoo on , onon e maayɓe men kala .
Galle maɓɓe ko juulɓe jannguɓe kono ɓe ngonaa lolluɓe , ɓe njeyaaka he galleeji laamotooɗi .
Galle oo jooni maa o waɗ cuuɗi joyi .
Galle oo ko jaajɗo , keeɗo leɗɗe baɗɗo kuɓeeje ɗiɗi kuccondirɗe , mangowi mawki ina e hakkunde galle hee .
Galle oo ma o waɗ suudu hoɓɓe .
Galle oo wonataa sakketaaji , kono ko simoŋ .
Galo soodi ñebbe jeeyeteeɗe e dow laawol , nde o ñaami ɗe reedu makko dogi .
Ganaa fooli ko gootol , foolaa laabi ɗiɗi , waɗde hootii law .
Ganaa gayni rogere ndee ko e jooɗnde ɗiɗaɓere caggal Kodduwaar .
Ganaa go'o , Burkinaa hay fus !
Ganaa heddiima fettooɓe sappo .
Ganaa heɓi kaaɗtudi mum ko e teeminannde 11ɓiire .
Ganaa horiima yaltinde-ɓe e boowal mum , ngati ɓe mbaɗti aaynaade baluuji juutɗi feewde e lajal Burkinaa kono loocol toowngol Burkinaa hono Bakari Kone rutta baluuji toowɗi kala !
Ganaa ine faati hikka , sibu laabi jeeɗiɗi bal ine ɓiloo he saakit mum .
Ganaa ko leydi njontaandi e baŋnge fuku sabu maɓɓe nawde raay laabi keewɗi .
Ganaa nawii raay laabi ɗiɗi , Gine gootol , ko heddii ko joɓɓi dawaaɗi .
Ganaa taccii
Ganndal e ganndondiral , cuusondiral e hoolaare ndañaama e kewu nguu hay so ngu waɗii pergitte to bannge njuɓɓudi .
Ganndal ko fitirla njalbuka , ndiiwtowa niɓɓere humambinnaagal , kaɓoowa e dunndariyankaagal ngam waɗtude neɗɗo jannguɗo oo jamyamo , juumtanɗo renndo .
Ganndal mawngal ngal Geno ina totti ɓe , eɓe ƴetti heen
Ganndal noon heɓotoo ko e jaŋde , mahen janngirɗe njannginen ɓesngu men gannde ɗee fof , gooto fof to muuyo mum yahri walliree toon .
Ganndal-guurɗe ene jeyaa e gannde ɓurɗe faayodin’de hannde sabu ko ngal wallata neɗɗo he anndude hoore mum mbele haa o ɓeydo waawde tabitin’de goodaangal makko .
Gannde e ngoƴaaji paatuɗi e gagga ɗemngal ɓetirgal ine ɓeydoo heewde .
Gannde ɗee fof ena keƴa e ɗemngal men .
Ganndo , binndo mawɗo Ginenaajo biyeteeɗo Ceerno Monenemmbo kadi innirii mo deftere mum " Le Terroriste noir " ( Ownoowo ɓaleejo ) .
Ganndo gooto waɗiino wiɗto duuɓi nay : o teskiima so o ustii ñaamdu doombi , haa ɗi ɗeɓii heyɗude , ( ɗum firti o haarnataa ɗi ) cellal majji ina ɓeydoo , balɗe majji kadi ina njokkoo .
Ganndo gooto ɓeydi heen "
Ganndo goɗɗo wiyi : " ko waawi heen wonnde fof , so yiɗii sahaa e sahaa fof o tagtee o wonta goɗɗum , faayiida e leñol ɗo o woni ɗoo , ko ɗoon ƴeewetee .
Ganndo guurɗiwal biritannaajo gooto , biyeteeɗo Dave Goulson dallinii wonde " so koowooje majjii , aadee majja !
Ganndondiral coñcungal naftowal kadi arii heen .
Ganndondiral men waylii nguurndam am .
Gannduɗo ko ngenndi firti fof noon , ene anndi kam Ngenndi Pulaar woodaani .
Garaaɗo ɗum fuɗɗortoo ko maɓɓo e paawngal ngal muusaani no feewi .
Garal makko e nokku wonaa garal Sammba Ngoƴa e nokku , ko ɓeydaare , ko martaba joom nokku en ɓee .
Gardagol Kaddaafi U .
Gardagol Louis Napoléon de Bonaparte ( Napoléon III ) guwarnama Farayse hawri ko e Protet ina woni guwerneer Senegaal ( 1850-1854 ) , ɗum addani Faraysenaaɓe jogaade politik tuugnorgal koloñaal kesal .
Gardagol daɓɓol laamu Patrice Lumummba Ko caggal wooteeji ɗii , parti Lumumba hono MNC fooli he nder ɗiin wooteeji , fedde ABAKO abbii he maɓɓe , ko ɗuum saabii Lumumba , sabu yiɗde teeŋtinde ngootaagu hakkunde ɓiɓɓe Konngo , o rokki Kasa vubu teddungal yoo laamo leydi ndi kaŋko o toɗɗa yoo ardo gowornama oo a ardoo jaagorɗe ɗe e tee ko noon doosgal leydi maɓɓe lelnirnoo .
Gardeeɓe ɗiɗo ɓee cuuɗii , neli ɗowoowo oo yo jaɓɓoyo mo .
Gardiiɗo Diiso ngoo waawataa hankadi wonde hooreejo leydi walla kalifu ñaawoore , kono ko neɗɗo mo denndaangal terɗe Diiso ngoo njaɓi , jeyaaɗo e hoohooɓe ɓe ngonaa sarɗooɓe ɓee .
Gardiiɗo Ganniiru Ngenndi hono Mammadu Haadiya Kan ƴettii toon konngol ngam hollitde wonde ko fotnoo haaleede e laamu Ganaa fof haalaama , haa teeŋti noon ko faati e aadaaji jangtaaɗi .
Gardiiɗo Jaagorɗe Mali wiyi " laamu Mali taƴii yaltude juɓɓule G5-Saahal , ina heen denndal doole kaɓooje e seɓɓitiiɓe " .
Gardiiɗo Jaagorɗe ko Abiy Ahmed , ko oon jogii hattan golle laamu ɗee fof .
Gardiiɗo SONADER , nde ari ndee wiyi yimɓe ɓee ngoni ko e waɗde Gasra , o wiyi gese ɗee ina potnoo jogaade haralleeɓe , no remiraa nii ina ŋakki njuɓɓudi .
Gardiiɗo laaɓal , ekkinii min no min cooɗortoo juuɗe kam e no min ndeenirta looɗe .
Gardiiɗo wuro ngoo , jaɓɓii ngoon miijo batu yuɓɓinaa nder galle makko ñande 15/07/2022 ngam winnditaade yiɗɓe jeyeede e Catal Haayre Golleere .
Gardiiɗo yuɓɓo koloñaal tunndu Daŋana , Dolisse winndi ɓataake feewde he Gardiiɗo diiwaan Ndar .
Gardinooɗo ɓe , na holla ɓe laawol majjini ɓe , ngenndiyankooɓe mbetti ɓe to Ñemlaan , ngadii Alla e balɗe Andrieux .
Gargol makko e laamu , e ko gollii gila o ari e jappeere 2019 , wonaa yiɗde lohnude luulndo walla warde ngo haa ɓuuɓa , deeƴa e no o teeŋtiniri .
Garlol – Aamadu Sih
Garnoono Fuuta fof dogtii , faati gure mawɗe ɓurɗe ɓuuɓde ,
Garɗo fof mbiyaa ko kañum ɓuri siŋkaade e yooɗde e ɓennuɗo oo .
Garɗo heen kala wonata ko e moosde walla ina jala .
Gasaani tawo dee : tele oo ko dobeteeɗo , neɗɗo soklaani huutoraade telekomaande , ko peɗeele maa tan ndoboto-ɗaa heen , addan maa ko njiɗ-ɗaa .
Gasii !
Gaw niɓɓo ɗo ɗi naati , mo goomuuji ɗiɗi parlemaa puɗɗii yaynanaade en , waɗde ɗi laamu nguu heñii e ubbidde e senaa oo .
Gawlo makko wattindii ko yahde haa to leyɗeele goɗɗuɗe , dañoyi toon jaabanaaɗo , addi .
Gawlo oo yeeyni daande dow e rajo ngoo : ''Sinncannaaɓe ngari , yo well'' .
Gawlo oo ƴetti konngol .
Gawri samme ina sikkaa fuɗɗorii remeede ko bannge fuɗnaange Weendu Caad hedde 7 000 hitaande ko idii jooni .

Geec ɓuri famɗude hay so tawii alaa ɗo dottaa .
Geelel wooroo oo beetawe .
Geelel wooroo oo beetawe e Fallemme !
Geewu oo ena toownaa ngam woɗɗuɓe ena mbaawa yiyde miisuuji ( yontaaɓe ) ɓee .
Gellaay , ko idii fof ine janngi no feewi pekaan .
Gellaay ine haala heen gundooji .
Gellaay ine huutoroo kadi konnguɗi kollirooji baasal ngal ɗo tolnii , konnguɗi bayɗi no " suuna " ( leñol gawri ndiyamiri , wollet ko ñebbe ) .
Gellaay sankii ko Aram e hitaande 1971 ( koleraa ) , omo yahra e duuɓi 70 pawɗe ( Abel Sih e Yero Sillaa kawrii heen ) .
Gellaay siftoraa haa e Neere Waalo , Jowgel e Baalaaji .
Gelongal Fuuta , kañum yahri ko to Ngenndi , Leñol e darnde Sagata e nder Leñol .
Gelongal Fuuta duuɗaani ko addani leydi ndii
Gelongal Fuuta lollirɗo , Njaay Saydu Aamadu
Geloonga jibinii giɗli , enɗam e njonngu tiiɗngu hakkunde wuurdunooɓe ɗoon .
Geloonga yaltinii subalɓe mawɓe annduɓe ndiyam , naalaŋkooɓe dowluɓe , mbirooji udduɗi lammbaaji e yontaaɓe nantuɓe inɗe mumen .
Gelooɗi puɗɗii naatde nokku oo ummoraade Arabi , ko leeli fof ko hedde duuɓi 2 500 hade hannde , fuɗɗii waɗtude huutoreede e mbaɗɗu e ruso sibu kañum ɓuri waawde muñde caɗeele .
General Abdel Aziiz yeewtidii e saaktooɓe kabaruuji ngam famminde ko ummini Yano maɓɓe haŋki e Galle laamu haa mawɗo leydi e mawɗo ɗowgu teppaa .
General Aziz ina jokkunoo e artirde ɓeen mooliiɓe e laamu mum ndool-ndoolaagu kono hay dara o waylaano e nguurndam maɓɓe cattuɗam .
Generally , the longest wavelengths appear redder and the shortest wavelengths are shown as more blue .
Geno haalni mbeewa e kattanɗe mum , wiyi ɓe " ooɗoo
Geno joofanii mo wonde nelaaɗo goɗɗo ina aroya ina wiyee Mohammed , ma ar tawa ina wondi e worɓe nayo wallidiiɓe .
Geno kadi lonngini mo ɗum laawol ɗiɗmol wiyi mo : sinno wonaano mi waɗii les leeɓol ngoɗngol e ɓalndu maa muñal , tawatnoo ɓalndu maa fof hujjitii muuseeki .
Geno lonngini ɗi , wiyi ɗi : " oɗon kira ɓiɓɓe Aadama e golle mum en .
Geno lonngini ɗi yo ɗi cuɓo maleykaaji ɗiɗi e maɓɓe tawa ina mbelaa , o jippina ɗumen to dow leydi , o loowa e nder mum en ngena hono kaa o loownoo e yimɓe kaa , maleykaaji cuɓii maleykaaji ɗiɗi etee ina mbelaa , ɗum woni ɗiiɗoo maleykaaji ɗiɗi : haaruuta e maaruuta .
Geno neli mo feewde e Israyiilnaaɓe caggal yimɓe .
Geno noon humpitii kanko o wonaa moƴƴo .
Geno toowɗo oo ina jangtii ɗum to simmore Huudu , kaawise : ( 44 ) .
Geno toowɗo oo kadi hokki mo lella keewba kosam , ko e mabba o muynata
Geno wiyi : " so tawii ɗuufaan jolii , ma a yii neɗɗo doondinooɗo ɓiyum roottoo ɗum waɗta ɗum les kosɗe mum .
Geno yamiri ɓe yo ɓe ñaaw hakkunde yimɓe goonga e fenaande , ɓe kaɗa ɓe renndinde Geno e goɗɗum , e warde fittaandu ko aldaa e goonga , reentaade jinaa e yarde sanngara .
