Geɗaa Sillaa , Kalfinaaɗo jaŋde PIP-PMA to Njum - Senegaal
Geɗal amen hankadi natti diwde kalifu gooto , walla ɗiɗo , Kuuɓal kuɓtodinngal gootal , ammbasadeer gooto walla hay gooto , e konsil gooto walla hay gooto ; ɗumɗoo ko wonande pootooji laamu toowɗi ɗii .
Geɗal gadanal ngal ko seedaade deweteeɗo alaa so wonaa Alla ; ɗimmal ngal ko juulɗeele joy jamiraaɗe ɗee , tataɓal ngal ko koorka ramadaan .
Geɗal jarngal teskaade kadi ko pelle Fulɓe cosaaɗe caggal jookdu Afrik ɗee , Fulɓe jeyaaɓe he leyɗee ceertuɗe ene keewi rentude heen , walla nii haysinno ko he nder jookdu Afrik tawa ko he leyɗeele ( lesɗe ) ɗe ngonaa ɗo Fulɓe njeyaa , ɗuum ene dañee heen .
Geɗal tataɓal ngal ko Alluwal ina winndaa heen Tawraata .
Geɗal tataɓal ngal ma en kaal hol no ngal ardi .
Geɗal tataɓal ngal omo siforoo Balla leñol mum .
Geɗal ɓurngal himmude ngal mbasiya-ɗon , ko gollanaade ngootaagu ɓesngu Muritani , potngu mahondirde .
Geɗal ɗiɗmal ngal , O tagii lekki ina wiyee ɗuubi e ɗemngal Arab ngal .
Geɗe " banndiyaagal " keewiino haa walliti añamleñameeɓe , ko wayi no Konngonaaɓe ɗiɗo waranooɓe he 2016 , yanti e sarɗiyankooɓe ɗiɗo cakkiti sariya kaɓoowo e añamleñamaagu , e ngañgu , e ceerundal .
Geɗe bejaaɗe e mayru ko ŋarɗuɗe , belɗe yeeɓde saɗne .
Geɗe goɗɗe baaɗe no azote , fosfoor , Suufar ine tawee heen .
Geɗe keewɗe goɗorteeɗe , ko wayi no kaarammburaagu , ceddaagu , wasre ekn maa mbiyaa ko ɗe lawaaɗe ɗe mbaɗanaa ceŋalal majje inniraa gacce .
Geɗe nannduɗe e koode , walla e naange , ene mbaawi wuurde ( woodde ) duuɓi miliyaaruuji .
Geɗe paayodinɗe , ɗe taariik jogori teskaade e nder cowtanɗe jamanuuji , mbaɗaama toon e oon ñalawma gila golle haa e haala .
Geɗe tati en teskiima heen eɗen cikki so rewaama ene waawi ɓeydude cuusondiral e koolondiral hakkunde Fulɓe diiwaanuuji ceertuɗi .
Geɗe ɓalliije joopaaɗe ɗee ko geɗe ƴulɓeeje ( éléments carbonés ) , tawi ɓuri heewde heen ko gatome poofiri ( oxygène ) e ndiƴƴiri ( hydrogène ) .
Geɗe ɗe njeyaaka e teyaaɗe men ndartini ɗeen jokkondire , geɗe goɗɗe leeltini bayyingol majje .
Geɗe ɗe oo debbo ñaaɗɗo , ɓe yo yoga e ardiiɓe konu Farayse ngañi , saakti toon ɗee , ngaddii haala mawka .
Geɗe ɗe tinaton he nder mon , woni mbaawon ɗe heɓindaande , woni ndonkon ɗum .
Geɗe ɗee ( kaaƴe , walla kaaƴe dennduɗe e jamɗe ) cumata ko e faɗo weeyo wonngo to tooweeki potki e 80 km e dow koye men .
Geɗe ɗee njooɗii , peewii .
Geɗel gootel , wonande miijiyankooɓe : petroŋ .
Geɗel heen fof ne , winndiyanke oo haɗaani tan e jaŋtaade e faccirde ko woni maana mum , kono kadi o waddii heen duttorɗe wonan’de kala jiɗɗo yaajnaade e wiɗtude heen ko ɓuri luggiɗde .
Geɗel tataɓel ngel ɗiiɗoo nokkuuji ko nokkuuji ilatnooɗi .
Geɗel ɗimmel ngel yowitii ko e ngaameela remooɓe ɓee , nde tawnoo won gese keewɗe ɓennduɗe potnooɗe soñeede , joom mum en ina cabbii masiŋaaji , so joomum en kuutironooma bafɗi mum en , ina wayi no keɓataa ɗeeɗoo caɗeele .
Gidimaka daɗaani e ɗuum , sibu biidi njiytaama Woynduyol e Tektaake .
Gii Mariyus Saañaa e woɗɓe ina nguuri caɗeele gonɗe heen ɗee .
Gila
Gila 1970 Moritani woni tan ko e kudetaaji , yimɓe ɓe tampii , leydi ndii bonii Yahduɓe e Asiis e woote ɓe , ko jaasɓe , sibu so en ƴeewii , hay capaato gooto jaɓaani naatde e oo sinemaa .
Gila 1977 ( duuɓi 45 jooni ) haralleeɓe ine ngolloo he nder birooji maɓɓe ko faati e baylagol kilimaa , e ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo Leydi .
Gila 1988 , Riisi deestii , Dental Amerik e ESA ( Nokku Orop toppitiiɗo weeyo ) e Japon lomi yolnde .
Gila 2012 ñawu Parkinson jaggiraa no " ñawu remooɓe " .
Gila 2020 , SpaceX woni fedde heeriinde he winndere hee , idiinde neldude weeyeeɓe ( astronautes ) nder weeyo .
Gila 29 siilo 2008 , HCR nawtii ko ina wona 20 000 neɗɗo , kono ko ko yowanoo ko ina wona lebbi sappo .
Gila Aarabeeɓe keɓti wuro ngoo e hitaande 638 , ɓe koɗdii ɗoon , e cili keewɗi , e huunde e yahuud en .
Gila Chirac e Hollande e Sarkosi haa yettii Macron , Farayse ina waabi Debi .
Gila Laamu Sarkosii naati Elysée , seedaama wonde arani'en , diineeji mum'en e aadaaji mum'en ngoni ko e ñiŋeede jamma e ñalawma e kunuɗe lanndaaji " ñaamaŋkooje " leydi ndii , haa teeŋti e UMP mo Sarkosii .
Gila dawaa dawi ,
Gila dawaa dawi , ɗum meeɗaa waylaade haa e laamu Maawiiya e hitaande 1999 .
Gila e Dunnguru en he sahaa deeniyankooɓe .
Gila e duuɓi 1990 ko kirjingol e jeeyngal mawngal huccinaa e nder leydi hee e boowal mayri haa addani sikkitinooɓe goodal haala kaa paami ko waɗnoo koo .
Gila e firo Quraana , defte Fiqhu e Hadiis , e tinndinooje Sunna e nehdi suufiyankaagal , ɓe piili ɗum ngool lefol teddungal .
Gila e hitaande 2006 , ɓe njaajtiniima e leydi Siiri tuggi 2013 kono kadi won ɗo ɓe mogginii e nder won jookli e nder leydi Turki .
Gila e iwdi Fulɓe , diineeji mum en ɓooyma , naatgol mum en he Islaam , pine mum en , finaatawaaji mum en , laamuuji mum en ko adii Islaam haa yettii laamu Tuubakooɓe .
Gila e kuutorɗe awo aadanteewo haa e cambe awo mbaylaandi , tuggude e lawlawre maama Labbo haa e serem Kalmbaan , geɗe ngaynaaka , gollorɗe wayluɓe , cañu geese e yahdiiɓe mum taññeteeɗi e nder mbaylaandi Kaaw Jarno , maabo e geɗe goɗɗe mahngo ena ɗoon ndiimaa .
Gila e lewru juko ( août ) hitaande 2013 , o seeraani e noddude ngam siftinde en .
Gila e ngonka mum en e nder galleeji ɗii , haa e no ngollirta geɗe mum en diiniyankooje .
Gila e ngootaagu ngenndi , haa to demokarasii , haa yettii faggude e renndo .
Gila e niɓɓere jamanuuji Kuyaatenaaɓe ko awluɓe Keytaanaaɓe laamatooɓe Manndeŋ .
Gila e oon sahaa , haa nde o maayi , Abdul Bookar tawtoraama kala ko toɗɗii Fuuta fof , gila e kewu , haa e wolde , haa arti noon e haɓtaade tuubakooɓe .
Gila e refto , lelngo binndol pulaar tawa ko naamnde jahduɗe e jaabawuuji mumen .
Gila e saataade haa e laɓɓitinde miijooji mbele ɓura yaawde faamaade .
Gila e wuro
Gila e ñalawma gadano rewɓe ɓe puɗɗiima tigi rigi diirnuude masiŋaaji .
Gila fajiri gogo Pennda arani sukaaɓe ɓee hade kaar jahoowo toon oo ɓ occitaade .
Gila gollirde nde sosa , nde loskii gollirɗe laamu kewɗe .
Gila goomuuji compaa e gardagol Abdullaay Muusaa Sal ( Yo Alla yurmo mo , yaafoo mo ) haa e gardagol sokna Salimata Bah .
Gila hanki haa hannde leñol men ina ɓafa to gootel Holko saabii gila hanki haa hannde leñol men ina ɓafa to gootel .
Gila hannde laamu Sharl III E Kamilla lawɗinaama .
Gila he jooni nganndon ine waɗi kaalis haa heewi .
Gila he kaamiilu kiɓɓuɗo o haa e taƴanɗe ko wayno taƴannde " Amma " .
Gila he lewru Korse ( suwee ) 2021 , konu Tigere TDF ( Tigray Denfense Forces ) heɓti laamorgo mum Mekele .
Gila he rajooji , teleeji haa jaayndeeji numerik .
Gila he seernaaɓe ngenndiyankooɓe ɓennuɓe , Aali Yero Joob ceerno tuugnii , ngam ƴettitde hare feewde he koloñaal .
Gila he taamakurunaaɓe haa he taamaaki , yahataa waɗɗaaki en .
Gila hurmi , Ganaa ena duña Alla e mum hulde yaltude e kawgel ngel .
Gila jeytaare haa yettii ɗo njahraten ɗoo , ko polle doosɗiwe ngoni e teɓɓiteede no jabe , ko mbayliguuji baawnaaɗi dow tippudi men nehdi e jaŋde pawondiri no tuufeeje mahtotooɗe leydi ndii nder mbaadi aarabeeri honiindi , dartoriindi momtude kala pine e ɗemɗe kedɗiiɗe .
Gila jooma-galle makko Assimi Goyta sammini laamu Mali laawol gadanol he juuɗe Ibraahiim B .
Gila ko ina tolnoo hannde he duuɓi 45 ko a daraniiɗo ɗemngal men Pulaar , ndimaagu e ngootaagu leñƴi men kala , a haɓaniima compal demokarasi e potal nder ndii leydi ndi teddin-ɗaa .
Gila ko ɓooyi ngal ñeeñal nanngiranooka no haaniri non .
Gila laamujji militeer en ngari , haa teeŋti noon e feccere kitaale capanɗe jeetati , yimɓe amen ustiima no feewi e nder juɓɓule laamu haa wonti ceɗta kunal .
Gila lewru siilo 2023 , jogiiɗo konngol laamu Tuunus , Kalifa Shibani , hollitiino nder yeewtere rajo heeriingo " ɓee Afirikinaaɓe ɓaleeɓe inan puɗɗoo heewde nder wuro Esfaksa " .
Gila leydi men heɓi jeytaare mum faade jooni , ko ina tolnoo e 550 miliyaar ugiyya feraama e ngooɗoo senngo , tawi ko jawdi ummoriindi caggal leydi maa jawdi dowla oo e hoore mum .
Gila nde " Renowaasiyoŋ " Njum lelni araaraay , ko kamɓe ƴettiti .
Gila nde Makki Sal fuɗɗi dowlude he dawrugol e jogaade yiɗde foɗanaade ko toowi he nder laamu Senegaal , o fuɗɗii fooɗtude asli makko fuutankaagal , nde tawno pulaar wiyi , " doole liingu ko ndiyam " , kadi rokkata semmbe he dawrugol ko dañde ɗo ɓaarii .
Gila nde kewu nguu diganaa haa ɗo ngu gasi ɗoo ,
Gila nde ngol fuɗɗii gollaade e hitaande 2012 , kattanɗe waraango ƴeeŋrude Nuwaasoot ndee ko 40 Gb/leƴ ( ko idii ɗuum ko 1 Gb/lƴ fat wonnoo ) .
Gila nde ɓamtaa e hitaande 2006 , ko lebbi ɗiɗi fat ( noowammbar e desammbar 2010 ) nde waasi yaltude .
Gila ndeen , Pulaar ko ko heftinaa tigi ɗo Mozilla ɗoo sabu men jeyeede e ɗemɗe ɓurɗe yaawde haljitde golle ɗee .
Gila ndeen , alaa ko dilli so
Gila ndeen , banngeeji ɗiɗi ɗii kala ( laamu ngu e luutndiiɓe ɓe ) ceeraani e jarribaade weeyo ngoo ngam yiɗde anndude mbele filñitannde waɗnoonde ndee jibini ɗum ko mette koɗɗe e ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓee , gaddanɗe ɗum en fellitde sooɗaade juuɗe mum en he laamu Makki Sal e yahdiiɓe mum haa laaɓa , walla mbele ko ɗum henndu wirtinoondu tan , jooni ndu daarii kadi huunde heen fof ruttima ɗo wonno ?
Gila ndeen , banngeeji ɗiɗi ɗii kala , Hirnaange bannge , Riisi bannge goɗɗo oo , njejjitii miijooji deeƴre .
Gila ndeen , e ko ɓuri teeŋtude , jaŋde leydi ndii waɗetee tan ko he ɗemngal arab , walla e Farayse wonande fannuuji siyaas , kono hay ɗuum ine heewi ɗo ɗooftaaka : yoga e jannginooɓe kuutortoo ko sapatoore so ine njanngina hiisiwal walla ɓalliwal maa guurɗiwal .

Gila ndeen , hitaande kala arnde tolno sukaaɓe ɓee ine ɓeydoo leefde , haa yettii nokku ɗo mbaaw-ɗen wiyde " alaa ko woodi hannde " .
Gila ndeen , hoɗɓe ɗoon mbiyaa " Ifirikiyin " ( yimɓe Ifirikisha ) .

Gila ndeen , lowre ndee woni ko e masiŋaaji am .
Gila ndeen , o darii , o dadii haa tiiɗi , o janngi .

Gila ndeen Hamdallaay mahtaama , wontii
Gila ndeen faade jooni goɗɗo fiilaaka .

Gila ndeen haa jooni , Baru faami wonde jawdi aade ko cellal .
Gila ndeen haa jooni ko waram , mi warmaa hakkunde Isra'el e Palestiin .

Gila ndeen hay so omo safree ne ko o cokaaɗo tawo .
Gila ndeen ka wonnoo ko e taartaade Mbaañ , hade makka juurnude deegowel Zhurong ngel ñalnde 15 mee ndee .

Ginol golle wonnoo ko
Ginol golle ñaaƴo ngo puɗɗoraa ko takkande medayuuji ( meetolol ) poor-jentinaaɓe ɓe Ngenndi teskanii golle moƴƴe e nder hitaande wonaande nde .
Ginol golle ɓurngol ñaamde sahaa maɓɓe o ko ƴeewde walla sakkude peeje lugge ɓamtooje diiwaan o haa teeŋti noon e leyɗeele maɓɓe ɗiɗi nji'duɗe neene e baaba ɗe .

Gite nooro oo ina ngojji no ƴulɓe jeyngol .

Gollal caɗtungal haa ɗoon waawi haaɗde .
Gollal ngal ko caɗtungal no feewi , e wiyde annduɓe Siin .

Golle Catal Fonndu kaani ko ñemmbeede .
Golle Daesh e Aqmii , ngaal banngal , ko gootum , ɓe kiisotoo hannde ko winndere ndee nanngiri ko ngalu winndere ndee kala , ko geɗe sanamuuji luulndiiɗi diine lislaam .
Golle aadee noon timmataa .
Golle jamma , golle ñalawma kaŋko e wonndiiɓe makko haa hannde ɗe ngortaama .
Golle kaantoriɗɗe dadiiɓe walla milis popileer e jangol doole kaalis faraa mali " dévaluation du franc malien en 1967 " , ina jeyaa e uube politik lugge caabiiɗe njangu laamu Modiboo Keytaa .
Golle konu Riisi e gardagol Maresaal mo wonaa " kooninke mawna reedu " , ina wiyee Jukov ina ceedtini , sibu ko e gardagol Maresaal Jukov , konu Riisi ( Armée rouge woni ‘Konu mboɗeewu‘ ) riiwi konu Hitler gila Riisi , haa ɓe uddi Berlin ñalnde 24 abriil 1945 , ɓe ñippi raay Dental Dowlaaji Sowiyet dow jubudu Reishtag ( galle laamu ɗo Hitler wartii oon ñalawma gooto ) ñalnde 30 abriil 1945 .
Golle mabhe mayata ha abada .

Golle majjum ummanaama duuɓi 15 jooni .
Golle makko ina maantinii .
Golle makko njiidaa e " jangti gaadoraaɗi tee ine uddita gita men haa paamen tigi tigi Afrik Fuɗnaange , mo anndaaka no moƴƴi he nder nokkuuji keewɗi he winndere hee " .
Golle makko paati ko aawde ki lekki wi’eteeki Nebedaay walla woɓɓe noddiraki " Moringa " .
Golle maɓɓe kadi ene tinndina en wonnde ɓe ngonaa hatanteeɓe tan kono kadi ko ɓe haralleeɓe gollirooɓe ñeeñal taw ko faawade he yiyannde e payndaale laaɓtuɗe .
Golle men alaa e sago lollinee , tintine renndooji kala ɗo ɗemngal tiiɗi , ɗo ɗemngal neeniwal hiisaa , yiɗaa , hokkaa hakke mum haa timmi .
Golle nguuɗoo batu ko yuurnitaade duuɓi ɗiɗi ɓennuɗi ɗii , e waɗde wasiyaaji wonande daawal duuɓi ɗiɗi paaɗi ɗii .
Golle potɗe nii tiiɗde njaru ( sibu ko hedde miliyaaruuji jeetati ugiyya MRO wiyaa ) , so mbaɗii ella potɗo nii ko huunde hulɓiniinde .
Golle teeŋtuɗe ɗee mbaɗiri ko kikiiɗe feewde jamma .
Golle tuubakiri majjinii yoga e ngonka men , e kuutorɗe men , sabu ɗe lollini ko kulol , e caru pinal , e weftilaare hakkillaaji ɓesngu .
Golle ñalawma ɗee puɗɗii ko 9w30h , ɗe njoofoyi ko takkusaan , 17w 00 h .
Golle ñalɗi ɗi ko hono nii lelorii
Golle ɗee ina njokka e balɗe e lebbi e duuɓi garooji ngam Firefox daña hoolaare e ɗemngal men e golle men haa tawee-ɗen nafoore ndee duuɓi e banndum .
Golle ɗee kadi ina mbaɗi geɗe keewɗe potɗe ooñteede e feewniteede .
Golle ɗee keewii faayiida no feewi sabu ŋarɗugol joɗnde ndee , haa e tawtoreede almameeɓe jumaaji e jannginooɓe .
Golle ɗee ko nii mbayi
Golle ɗee noon , min puɗɗu-ɗe tan kono wonaa jeyi amen , kadi wonaa ko min kappii so wonaa tan huutoraade baawal ngal Alla hokki min ngal ngam fuɗɗude ngooroondi golle ɗee .
Golle ɗee puɗɗi ko e lewru Yarkomaa 2009 , ko jooni njeñcudi ndii bayyinaa .
Golle ɗee puɗɗii ko e hitaande 1991 .
Golle ɗee puɗɗitii ko 16w30 hojom .
Golle ɗee ɓamii ko ɓuri hitaande tawa go puɗal e mutal so wonaa ñalnde dawaaka !
Gollingol sukaaɓe , ko tiiɗallaaji winndireyankooji ɗi kaaɗaani tan e leyɗe baasɗe , kono yettiima e leyɗe galɗuɗe ƴellitiiɗe .
Gollingol sukaaɓe noon , ine heewi mbaydiiji , eɗen mbaawi laworaade ɗi hono nih e kala heen ciirol ndokken ɗum anndinoore mum heeriinde .
Gollirde makko ina toppitii ƴewde ( enquêter ) so ngalu leydi rewnaama ɗo ngu foti rewde , e loskude so ngalu leydi huutoraama no haanirii .
Gollirdu nduu wiyi ɓooyataa ɓe njettoo ndeen faandaare .

Gonɗo e nder mbeelu huɓeere nde wiyata ko caafal janowal e makko ngal ummii ko e daarorgal ngal , kono eɗen nganndi ko caafal piltinangal , gummingal to naange , asli maggal ko naange ( sabu jamma niɓɓo daarorgal waawataa yeeynaade !

Goomu UNESCO kalfinaangu ngalu winndereewu waɗtii wuro " Al khaliil " ɓooyngo ngoo , anndiraango " Hebron " e nokkuuji jogiiɗi " faayiida winndereejo diwtuɗo aada " .
Goomu heen fof ina farlinaa e mum jogaade sarɗiiji njuɓɓudi mum , adda doggol dipiteeji ciifɗi ina njeyaa heen , lelna bayyinaago mum politik , toɗɗoo yiilirde mum .
Goomu joyaɓo oo , ko suɓaaɓe wuro ngoo sabu ɓerɗe maɓɓe laaɓɗe .
Goomu kala ina waɗi worɓe rewɓe e tolno kala .
Goomu mawɓe ɓee kañum suɓotoo nde kaddungal waɗata kam e to waɗetee .
Goomu mbo min cosi oo toppittoo laaɓal lekkol ngal .
Goomu ngalu , ko Elisabet ardii .
Goomu ngu fotnoo ko sakkitde miijo e peeje .
Goomu nguu ena heewnoo tugnaade e ganndiwe kammuyaŋkooje ngam hiisaade nde hooretee .
Goomu nguu heɓii heɗaade jagge laamu ɓooyɗe haa teeŋti e hooreeɓe hilifaaɓe laamu Abdel Asiis .
Goomu nguu jokkondirii kadi e denndaangal leyɗeele garnooɗe , heɓii kadi kinnaali e wasiyaaji yimɓe mawɓe ummoriiɓe e nder laamorgo ngoo tawi ko arnooɓe horde golle fedde ndee .
Goomu nguu maa waawu jokkondirde e sarɗooɓe afiriknaaɓe jogiiɓe ndeen yiɗde fof , ina waawi wallikinaade kala juɓɓule e kala geɗe ɗe luutondiraani e doosɗe leydi ndii .
Goomu nguu maa waɗane bidsee 25 miliyaar ɗi ɓe njogori feccude hakkunde maɓɓe rewrude e fuuntiiji nguyka biyeteeɗi consultation .
Goomu nguu waɗii jokkondire keewɗe , ballitɗe no feewi fedde ndee ɓeydaade anndeede gila e tolno laamu , haa e nder renndo ngoo ( hoohooɓe diine e politik , fiilaaɓe , pelle gure ) .
Goomu nguu yamiraa ko yo waɗ losko e fiyakuuji ɗiiɗoo : – ko leydi ndii jogii e ngartam to bannge peteroŋ ; – jeeygol boowe leydi e nder wuro Nuwaasoot ; – golle sosiyetee awo siinnaajo biyeteeɗo Poly hong dong ; – kuutaragol ngalu kees jokkere-enɗam SNIM ; – marse jowitiiɗo e kuuraa jaynotooɗo mbeddaaji tawi ittaa ko e semmbe naange ; – marse jowitiiɗo e kuutaragol hawngo konteneeruuji jippotooɗi e poor Nuwaasoot ; – pusgol sosiyetee SONIMEX .
Goomu ofisiyeeji ɓooraaɗi , tawi won heen ngoni ko Orop , njokkondiraa , mbagginaa yo njokkondir e seneraal , yo ngar tawtoree ñalɗi jowitiiɗi e demokaraasi , ɓe njamiraa jokkondirde e koreeji maɓɓe mbele ina njaɓa feere tafateende les nde , tawi noon hay gooto anndaa ko ndeen feere woni .
Goomu sukaaɓe ɓee ina yeewta e rajo nokku oo .
Goomu toɗɗaama ngam ƴeewde , ɗoo e COP 28 potɗo jooɗaade to Dubay he 2023 , no nguun goomu sifortoo .
Goomu yonaaɓe gure komin Teekaan Muritani ( Madiina fanay , Ndikiin Aali Kan , Ñakwar , Sima I , II , III e IV , Teekaan , Koleyla , Meleyga , Ksaar Mbarik ) ina mbinndunoo hooreejo leydi Muritani ɓataake caaktaaɗo , gila 17 marse 2016 .
Goomu ñaamdu e yardu ɓuri heewde yimɓe .
Goomuuji ɗii fof ngartirii golle mum en e nder ñalɗi ɗiɗi pinal , ñande aset 10 e alet 11/11/2007 to Galle Sukaaɓe Keso to , e dow ballal Kalifu Cukaagu e Coftal Ɓalli , e Intermon-Oxfam , e Fonadh ( eɗen njetta ɓe heen kaaɗtudi njettoor ) .
Goomuuji ɗii ngartiri golle mumen , golle ɗee caataa .
Goonga fof ɓe njiɗaano , alaa ko ɓe njiɗnoo so wonaa jiimde daande maayo ngoo , e yettoyaade maayo Niijeer ( maayo Jaliba ) , e Weendu Caad .
Goonga fotaani suuɗeede e daartol hay so welaani .
Goonga fotde yeletaake , teettete !
Goonga nde yaltiniraama " ƴeewndo " gila ko neeɓi seeɗa kono ko jooni ɓe pelliti yaltinde-nde caggal nde ƴeewndooji ɗii ngasi .
Goonga oo tan ko jojjannde salaade nde leyɗeele joy ɗee ndokkaa ndee ene foti nattude , kono eɗen nganndi ɗuum weeɓataa .
Goongɗina ɗum hannde ?
Gootal e maaɗe cakkitiiɗe hare luulndiinde Apartaayd yahii , ngati Winii jeyanoo ko e yimɓe ɓurɓe haɓaade laamu paltoor Afrik worgo .
Gooto , oo ko njool ɓaleejo , joom ɓanndu seeɗa , keddiiɗo oo ko naawo , cewɗo mo gite ɓutte daneeje .
Gooto e fettooɓe Ganaa riiwaa e diŋiral caggal nde furgi e Nijeriyaanaaɓe laabi ɗiɗi .
Gooto e gollodiiɓe makko , biyeteeɗo Boyden , ɓuri moƴƴinde jikke .
Gooto e heedooɓe makko tuubakooɓe ɓee , joopii ko kuulal 93 Doosɗe leydi paatungal e " hurum hooreydaagu " .
Gooto e hoohooɓe konu Burkina ina wiyee Blaise Saanu wiyi : " ɓurnoo nangtaade e laamu fof ko Blaise Kompawre , ko ɗuum addannoo mo etaade waylude Doosɗe Burkina caggal nde o laamii duuɓi 27 " .
Gooto e hoohooɓe leñol makko ɓee , wiyi : minen min njiyiraani ma so wonaa e majjere feeñnde ngon-ɗaa ( 60 ) .
Gooto e jagge mawɗe naalaŋkooɓe , lollinnooɗo jimol " Maayel Yoo " , jeyaaɗo e adiiɓe yimde jimol ngol .
Gooto e maɓɓe fof
Gooto e maɓɓe fof , waɗaa ko no Baydi Kacce wardiraa nii .
Gooto e maɓɓe fof , yettii , sajjitii ɓinngel , ƴeewtaaki , fiyi e dow keeci , happani wuro .
Gooto e maɓɓe fof ari huccini haala mum e amen , ɓee pulaar laaɓtuɗo , ɓeya maa mbiyaa tan ko ko kuñii konnguɗi keeriiɗi haa mbaasi ɗiggude , e pulaar mo a ɗeɓataa faamde !
Gooto e maɓɓe fof dañii ko yeewtani jamaanu ngarnoongu nguu , gila e golle Suleymaani Baal haa e kewkewe maantiniiɗe , baɗnooɗe e nder lefol almameeɓe .
Gooto e maɓɓe fof ena wammbi ɓinngel .
Gooto e maɓɓe fof ina fawa kubbe e marsandiis goɗɗo oo .
Gooto e maɓɓe fu okkaama seedanfaagu ( attestation d’aptitude ) he ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde , gineeji ko ɓe njanngiri ( des fournitures scolaires ) , e tisetaaji .
Gooto e maɓɓe kala ina doga ko waawi ngam yaawde yottaade .
Gooto e maɓɓe wiꞌi yoo gawƴoowo oo takko ŋoral ngal ɓe njippina mo .
Gooto e maɓɓe wiꞌi yoo yaafe sabu o ɗalaani Bojel e sago makko etee o ñaamaani ñebbe ɗe .
Gooto e men fof yo liggano tan e moƴƴinde ko heedi ko , ko ɗum ɗoon woni ko waawata naftude en ko .
Gooto e men fof yowa miin-miinaagal mum .
Gooto e sababuuji hee ine waawi wonde ŋakkere anndude nafoore janngingol he ɗemngal janngooɓe ɓee ɓuri waawde haalde , e faamde no moƴƴi .
Gooto e sahaaji ɓurɗi welde e hiirde ndee woni nde o noddi Kanel Joop yoo yimdu e makko .
Gooto e sosɓe Apple , jeyaaɗo e wiiñordu IA Google DeepMind , hono Steve Wozniak ine jeyaa e siifɓe ɓee .
Gooto e sukaaɓe ɓee ina jogii maande mawnde e keeci ina haɗa ɗum ajjaade .
Gooto e ɓaɓɓe kala ina feññini pellital e yeeso mum .
Gooto e ɓaɓɓe kala ina haalana goɗɗo oo nguurndam mum .
Gooto e ɓiyɓe fulɓe ena jeyaa Muritani ko toon gollotonoo .
Gooto fof , fotnoo ko waɗde ciimtol roɓindo ko yowitii e Koronawiris tampinɗo hannde aduna oo .
Gooto fof e ɗemngal mum walla ko Aarabeere tan mawnintee ?
Gooto fof ene anndi enɗam hakkunde Fulɓe e leñɗi Senegambi , ko wayno Jolfuɓe ( Wolof en ) , Seeraraaɓe , Soninkeeɓe walla Joolaaɓe e Basari en .
Gooto fof ina anndi donngal mum , fotde mum e jeyi mum , ina taarii ko jeyaa , ina nuunɗi e ko renndaa .
Gooto fof kadi , ndeke ena mooftunoo annde e natal leydi Muritani , ɗo hoɗi ɗoo , ena majjiraa gane keddiiɗe ɗee .
Gooto fof leydi ko ka fooɗata ɗum .
Gooto fof woni e artude , ena mooytoo , Alla waɗi , kamɓe nayo fof , ɓe kawriti ɗoon .
Gooto fof yaltini annde nde mooftunoo ndee , ɓe ɓastii natal leydi ngal .
Gooto he maɓɓe yaaɓani gammbu pucci ngam daccitde kannaat , waawnude soofaaji yoo uddit .
Gooto heen fof tan waya no muccuɗo jaɓɓe ene yartii follere nde waɗaaka suukara .
Gooto joom wutte ooli , Mo tuba ooliMo kufunaaji gelooɗe , Kanoyel barbuubiJoom nano winndaango , Mo ñaamo tanngilaangoJunngo maa wonaa ñaakuWonaa ɓalndu ñaakuKono ñallataa jumaaniHiirataa nawaaniWaalataa liiraani cawgu .
Gooto kala , kattaɗo , ina foti waɗde heen junngo mum .
Gooto kala e maɓɓe addii kaɓirɗe .
Gooto kala ena yiyloo no foottiri poolgu to mum , foti ko iirtude boneeji ɓooyɗi ɗeɓi boomde Kodduwaar !
Gooto kala ene heppa nde tamata ɗum he juuɗe mum haa uurno ɗum ɓuucoo ɗum ko adii nii nde hippitta ɗereeji mum taroo binndanɗe mum .
Gooto kala ene heɓa heen nafoore , kadi ɗum nafa leñol ngol ɓamta ɗemngal ngal .
Gooto kala haalani goɗɗo oo innde mum .
Gooto kala ina ara e galle hee yuurnaade .
Gooto kala ina jaɓi tampude sabu yiɗde teddungal .
Gooto kala ina wiya ko mbiru mum liɓata .
Gooto kala ina yidɦi hollirde nafoore ponondiral ngal jogii .
Gooto kala wiꞌi dañii jahdiiɗo jeewtuɗo ɗum e laawol ngol .
Gooto kala yoo daro darnde foti daraade .
Goppaaɗo feerti giti yiꞌi sonndu yooɗndu ina tiimi e mum ina weeya .
Goppaaɗo jibinaa haa dañi duuɓi keewɗi waawaani tawo yahde .
Goppaaɗo siftini wonde kala nde yimɓe kawri e ɓuuɓri makki , ɓe ngonata ko e woocde baramlefi ɓokki kii .
Goppaaɗo wonndi e jikke jahduɗo e ngaanuma .
Goppaaɗo yeewtidi e maɓɓe e no ladde foti reenireede ruttii waggini ɓe loorde leɗɗe so ndonngu toɓii .
Goppaaɗo ƴettii kadi ɓiɗɗo gooto e ɓohre nde , ñaagii yoo Alla taccin ɗum maayo ngoo .
Goram , ndeen noon , wonnoo ko hare petelaaji e gaawe .
Goranam , nde ngel toccinaa haa ngel dañi balɗe jeetati tan ngel woni baaye .
Goransson dañii waawde gollude ɗum wonndude e naalankooɓe Afriknaaɓe ko wayno Baaba Maal mo daande mum welnde udditta naɓaka kaa , kono kadi Masammba Joop piyoowo buuba ( ɓittee wela ) e Magat Soh kanum ne ko piyoowo bawɗi jooɗiiɗo to Califonia , e naalanke Ginenaajo guttoowo serdu .
Gorkaajo Bahbaho oo ko kilifa mawɗo koɗnooɗoo e wuro ganni dowlungo wi'eteengo Lummbol e nder Fuuta .
Gorkaajo oo ƴetti konngol wi'i : ''Ñiiɓee e kawral , tawa saha kala oɗon kawra kaaldon " .
Gorko e debbo , mawɓe e sukaaɓe , moni kala ina dañi heen geɗal mum .
Gorko e debbo , suka e mawɗo , boomi e sagataaɓe haa e mawɓe ɓee , moni kala dañii ko waɗi .
Gorko gaan'duɗo e hoore mum ko biyaaɗo : " Aan ko mbiiɗaa naane koo noon ?
Gorko jannjanɗo en jaamaa oo ko Hoyreejo leydi , Muhammad O Sheex Alghazwaani nde felliti wonde yo koolol pinal waɗe Jowol hitaande kala ngam teeŋtinde wonde wuro ngoo ko wuro ganni .
Gorko jooɗaniiɗo Fedde Ngootaagu Dowlaaji Dentuɗi ( Onu ) toon e Afrik bannge hiirnaange hono alserinaajo biyeteeɗo Sa’id Jinniit hollitii wonde renndii jooɗnde e hoyreejo laamu luɓal ngu hono Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo , oon e hoyre mum rokkii mo hollaare timmunde wonde so tawii Allah jaɓii maa mosol gartiroowol potal ngol loosne haa yettee happu nanondiraaɗo o , hay sinno tawii e o ɗo sahaa leydi ndi ina faayi seeɗa e nde ɗo maalde sooyɗinaande .
Gorko kadi so o alaa keedo omo yona wonande hoore makko keedo , kono debbo ko maa jinnaaɗo mum tawee walla lomto jinnaaɗo oo , walla laamɗo nokku oo .
Gorko ndeen e hareeji mum daaydi joodaaki do goootel omo anndi ne kay tergal debbo tayeteengal ngal ko ngaal wonii coornowal welam timmudo e debbo .
Gorko o jooɗii tan deƴƴini ɗerewol e dow taabal he , wiyi mo njiɗmi ko teeŋtinde ceergal hakkunde men .
Gorko o teeldi e hoore mum , ina miijo hol ko fotata wadde .
Gorko o wiyi mi tampii , mi maayii , njiɗmi ko ceeren , kadi so en ceeri njiɗmi ko humande sehil ma kaari .
Gorko oo haali sifaa mo tawiri Ceerno e no nawiri ɗum galle makko .
Gorko oo huudiima gila weetndoogo , fayi gese , ñalli remde haa naange darii e hoore , ɓaari jalo mum , fayi beelel lootoyii haa ɓalndu mum laaɓi , fayti gese heɓi ñallinirki mum ɓuuɓki , ɗaanii wiyi soy !
Gorko oo naatii to ɓe ngoni too , o yiyi ɓe tan , o naji no ɓe ciforii toon nih .
Gorko tataɓo kadi ari e makko wiyi mo : " mi
Gorko ɓurɗo lollude e hohooɓe winndere ndee arii njuuraade renndo ngoo e diŋiral ngal omo wonndi e jom suudu makko e satiiɓe mo .
Gorooje e saakuuji karite ɗi o jolnunoo nana carii e ladde .
Goulson jeyaa ko he 20 000 ganndo siifnooɓe " jeertinaango faade e winndere " e hitaande 2017 , faatungo e keewal ciiri nguurndam .
Goyta yamirii yo konu uddit nebbiso ɗii warngooji .
Goɗngal ine woodnoo ine wiyee niiwnorgal Hubble .
Goɗɗe nattii dañde ɗo ndurni jawdi mum en , hay lappi faade ladde nattii woodde .
Goɗɗo alaa so wonaa gooto e naalaŋkooɓe men ŋanaa , ngenndiyaŋke , cubiiɗo golloraade concal e ñeeñal mun ngam ɓemtude pulaagu e fuutaŋkaagal .
Goɗɗo e maɓɓe ƴetti telefon mum noddi polis .
Goɗɗo jokkiti wiꞌi : " " Njaltinee ɓalewagal reedu , haasidaagal e kiram e nder ɓerɗe mon , woto ngañee hay gooto .
Goɗɗo kadi ine wiyee Erik Kantona , pettoowo faraysenaajo .
Goɗɗo waawaa !
Go’o , ganndal jikku , ɗuum toɗɗii ko nehdi aada e nehdi diine haa e denndaangal jikkuuji neɗɗo jogii e nder nguurndam mum ɗam wuuroyta e daawe ceertuɗe .
Go’to e amen fof naati jaŋde haa to Allah haaɗnunoo ; kanko o jokki jaŋde makko haa Allah waɗi sutura mum , o heɓi heen golle tawa ko e ɗemngal makko neeniwal dakmungal , Pulaar .
Go’to heen kala ina ñaañtii haa yooɗi , ina ñaaƴira seese so mbirtiima tiribin caatee kelle , mbiyee yoo njaɓɓit koyɗe mbele heddiiɓe ɓe ina mbaawa yettaade .
Grossièrement , il cet finances permettra de acquitter le asphaltage des routes en instaurant les infrastructures qui favorisent le désenclavement des zones de épanouissement quant à de collaborer l’survenue aux grands bassins agricoles conséquemment qu’aux marchés .
Gulaali , kelle e bawɗi ɓamti .
Gulaali e luukaali keewti njaga njaay oo kala .
Gulaali e luukaali ɓeydoo seekde jamma .
Gulaali nattaani haa ɓe naattoyi caggal geewu !
Gulaali ngulli , Espaañ summbi .
Gulaali ngulli e nder saal hee nde kura toɗɗii Meksik yoo hawru e Afrik Bŋ Worgo e kawral uddital !
Guli nganndaa ngoomaa .
Gullitooɗo caliiɗo oo , jogii ko lajal lebbi ɗiɗi ngam hollirde dalillaaji mum .
Gulumbol e guli cooji .
Gulwulti e dow naatgol Muritani e nder hare Al Kayidaa nanaaa e nder diŋiral dawrugol Muritani , kono kadi e nder baktirɗe ( forum ) geese .
Gumaalo maayii , balla warii ɗum , jaaltaaɓe tawoyii debbo Gumaalo .
Gural Njabaldinaaɓe e Muuseyaaɓe , taaniraaɓe Eli Baro e Hammee Baro e Dewuut Baro , diiri Hebbeeɓe woɗeeɓe e ɓaleeɓe , jatti Talla e Taal , Gasamme , Dem , Dukkee e Koreera , aljanna wayluɓe waylooɓe jamɗe , ɓe mbaylaani diine Alla " .
Gural ngoone Maalik .
Gurdoŋaaji , alaa ko heddii heen so wonaa ko mahanoo gila e yontaaji ɓennuɗi Ko ɗee geɗe kala ngaddani en wultinde ndee winndannde nde ɓuuɓaano nii , winndanoonde hedde 5 settaambar 2013 .
Gure Mboon ɗee fof ngarii .
Gure fulɓe njeewaama sabu alaa fof hannde jokkuɗo gollal waaño , nde tawnoo sooño feewnitiima .
Gure garɗe , ngaddi biisuuji ; nawooji 80 neɗɗo e nawuuji 60 neɗɗo fof njiyaama toon , ɗeen gure gadduɗe werlaaji ngoni jaajɗi : Orléans , Etampes , Arpajon , Silly Maɗarin , Corbeil Essonne .
Gure keewɗe ina njeyanoo e doggol gure potɗe bommbeede , ngol " Target Committee " ( Goomu cuɓotoongu Toɓɓanɗe ) , lelnunoo , ɓurɗe maantinde e pinal Japon , kono kadi jogiiɗe faayiida to bannge konu .
Gure keewɗe koɗiino kono hannde oo ko ɗe nattuɗe woodde , teeŋti e gonnooɗe hakkunde wuro Seleŋ e Kaaƴe Ƴeew .
Gure keewɗe nootitiima heen , ɗe Jeeri e Daande Maayo , Awgaale haa Doɗel ko jiidaa e setooji ɗiɗi pattamlami gummoriiɗi to Saalum e to Kayoor e gardagol Mammadu Baal , Maam Sammba Baal e Aliyuun Baal .
Gure koɗduɗe , ndenndi ladde , nannga ñalngu raddo .
Gure kuufɗe ndu ko Jiinge , Maraysa , Wuro Gijili , Wuro Mbaayɓe , Loƴol , Maafoondu e Ganki Siree Binta .
Gure mawɗe winndere ndee , ɓittatnooɗe yimɓe ( Pari , New York e goɗɗe ) fof ko nii ciforii .
Gure mayri ɓurɗe lollude ko Biserta , takko mayo haaɗngo .
Gure maɓɓe ɗiɗi ɗee kala ina nganndi kakkunde maɓɓe haa ko gooto fof ina yiɗi ñemmbude ɓe .
Gure nootitiiɗe e ñalɗi ɗi ko Lugge Sayɓooɓe e Ganki e Maafoondu e huunde e gure tokoose taariiɗe Moongel .
Gure nootitiiɗe ɗee , mbaɗanaa ko caaleeje beertaaɗe haa njooɗi e dookooɓe softuɓe .
Gure saraaji Fonndu fof tawtoraama ndee .
Gure teeru mawɗe mahanooɗe ɗo toowaani ( ɓurɗe geec lesɗude ) ina mbaawi ilde , ko nanndi e Senngapuur , Miami , New York , Amsterdam , Rotterdam , Nuwaasoot , ekn .
Gure ɗe laddeeji mumen peƴƴaa haa cukkiri natti , toɓo waɗti leelde arde .
Gurel Waalata woɗɗaani keerol Mali .
Gurel amen heddodii e baasal e yeeweende So hiiri , nagge huunataa , gool teeɗataa , a nanataa so wonaa ŋeewaango boyiiru e ñuuñaango fowru .
Gurnah jibinaa ko 1948 to duunde Sansibaar .
Guubiliiji ina njogii inɗe keewɗe e fawaade e deedal guubiliiwal ɗo ɗi nguttata ɗoo .
Guwerneer Protet felliti hankadi haɓde e Waalo-waalo en , raaŋana safalɓe Tararsa .
Guwerneer Saint Germain hunii , yaltini Fara Pennda Laamu , lomtini Kheerfi , fawti heen " Waalo-waalo mo welaaka kala so yiɗii fera !
Guwernoor Ndar yamiri yo o wallondir e Fuutaŋkooɓe Laaw e Yirlaaɓe e Tooro , o yana e Gawdal Kooli .
Guylol woni ko hakkunde Waalalde e Jaaynga .
H .
HAA YEESO KO LAAWOL .
HAALOOBE PULAAR MBI' : " HAADE SO TAWII NEDDO WADII KO BONE FELETE , SO WADII KO MOYYI YOO YETTE " GOOTO E MEN FOF HANNDE FOTI WONDE KO FEETERE JEYNGE DO YANI FOF WONTA DUDAL MAWNGAL PULAAGU BAMTOO .
HAARP WONI KO TO GAKONA , TO ALASKA .
HUYI !
Ha yeeso ko laawol !
Haa 1963 ko sahaa e sahaa tan , e mudaaji daɓɓi , o yiyata Manndelaa nder suuɗaare .
Haa 2008 faafi seeɗa , fedde ndee e juuɗe kadi sukaaɓe woɗɓe , nde arti e sifaa dartinde .
Haa Alla waɗi , hedde 1999 , rafi cellal heɓtii mo , o nattiti yiyde , o heɓtoyi Baabaaɓe .
Haa abada ɓesngu Maali ina yettu maa .
Haa arti noon , hay Dental Afrik ina sosi njuɓɓudi ndi alaa ko toppitii so wonaa ɓamtude Pulaar/Fulfulde , mbiyeteendi FULCOM .
Haa arti noon Fulɓe ina mbiya ina njogii pelle hakkunde leyɗe " daraniiɗe ɓamtude e tabitinde pulaagu " ?
Haa arti noon e ko fawaa e dow daaɗe ƴiiƴiiɓe tato ɓe : Blaise Kompawre , e Hyacinthe Kafando , e Gilbert Diendere .
Haa ba nani gurdu-gurdu tan ba naati e ngaska mbabba ladde – walla ngirja – ba naati haa heddii hoore ndee .
Haa bada afriknaaɓe ina njettu maa .
Haa caggal waklitere Tuunus e Misra , hakillaaji kuccunoo ko leyɗe goɗɗe , hay gooto miijanooki ko Libinaaɓe njogori lomde yolnde .
Haa e kitaale 1950 Kirime fof jeyanoo ko he Riisi .
Haa e oo aljumaa 11 , yerɓo ɓurnoongo doolnude waɗnoongo e leydi he waɗnoo ko ñalnde 1 settaambar 1923 ( hakkunde 7 , 9 e 8 , 3 ) : ngo bonniino fotde 700 000 hoɗorde e nder diiwanuuji Tokiyoo e Yokohoma , ngo yooɓii fotde 143 000 fittaandu .
Haa e oo yonta hannde , awluɓe Mandiŋkooɓe ina ciftina jaambaraagal laamɓe Gaabu , teeŋti noon e darnde rewɓe darinoo heen .
Haa e sahaa , kala nde ngel diwnoo , ko maa ngel arti ɗo ngel wonnoo ɗoo .
Haa e ñalawma hannde oo , wontii hankadi aada , kala nde yimɓe njiyi hoodere ena siirtii , mbiyata won ɗo mawɗo ganndaaɗo maayi , walla won ɗo laamɗo mawɗo moƴƴo maayi ; caggal ɗum ɓuuco-ɗen .
Haa hannde , e ndiin mbaydi , en nanirii gooto e sukaaɓe dowlirɓe njimri e nder wuro ngoo , ena wiyee Aamadu Saydu Baro ena wiya wonde nanirii Ceerno Maamuudu Jah mo Salnde Tebegut ( yo yurmeende Alla won e mum ) ena haala e nder hiirde mum wonde Barooɓe Jakel fuɗɗodiima e mowludaaji gila mawɓe mum ena kippa boɓi , kuɓɓa jeynge , taaroo , njooɗoo , ngona e yimde .
Haa hannde , e wiyde Muusaa Kamara , won e maɓɓe kadi yetteteeɓe Baro .
Haa hannde , mo jaɓi artidde e gorko Lugge Saybooɓe , maa o haalan ɗum hitaande , nde Konu Muritani sosanoo , to ngu sosanoo e nokkuuji walla e gure , ko o gollinoo e nder nguunɗoon konu , diiwanuuji ɗi o meeɗnoo wonde , no Wolde Sahara yahrunoo e no nde siiltiri haa e rewamuuji mayre .
Haa hannde , wonande binnditagol etaa siwil ngol : paltoor oo haaɗaani tan e kaayitaaji naamneteeɗi ngam waawde winnditaade ɗii , so wonaa wonande muritaninaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi , no kollitir-ɗen nii .
Haa hannde , ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii ina ngoytoo caɗeele e heɗɗooji baɗiraaɗi saɗtinde binnditgol mum en .
Haa hannde alaa tuddunde jogii " suudu cellal " alaa ko haali poosto cellal .
Haa hannde dee Dental Dowlaaji Amerik suwaa tawo gaño ndee wolde !
Haa hannde ko eeraango ngo mbaɗno-ɗen e maayde Tijjaani Aan , ko ngoon woni ngo ɓamtaten ɗo , sabu ko payɗi mettondirta ; deftere janngirtee ko deftere banndum : " No Tijjaani Aan nii , maayde Yero Dooro Jallo ko baasal mawngal wonande leñol ngol .
Haa hannde laamu kesu Suleymaani Ndennee Njaay , ina safroo ñabbuuji cukaagu ; hakkunde ustude , ɓedude e wooñtude .
Haa hannde silsil bellitgol diiwanuuji kaalanoongol ko ɓooyi ngol siynaaka , ko noon kadi wonande bellitgol mukaataaji ngol .
Haa jooni , e yowitaade e konnguɗi tawtoraaɓe .
Haa jooni , golle ndee fedde mawnde hakkunde pelle koko njokki .
Haa jooni alla e ɗeeɗo golle yuɓude , fedde ADEME ene jogori ɓeydude diwal , sibu maɓe nguddit jaŋngirde wotnde too e wuro Ndar ( Senegaal )
Haa jooni ande juuree , won ummotooɓe haa leydi Mali juuraade yanaande makko .
Haa jooni ardii lammba kaa ko John MCain to oon baŋnge !
Haa jooni dee Sammba hulaani .
Haa jooni dee ko kanko haalata , o wiyi : " he nanallaaji , nde yahi haa leeɓi hoore Aadama njuuti , cegeneeji ɗii kadi njuuti haa ɓurti , Jibriil ( JKM ) ari e makko , femmbi hoore ndee , mecci cegeneeji ɗii , asi leydi ubbi , ɗoon fuɗi tamaroowi .
Haa jooni dee ko konngol ibnu abbaas , o wiyi " haɗi aadama e Hawwaa fuɗɗoraade ñaamde gawri , ko ngam heewde caɗeele , ngam nde neɗɗo heɓata heen ko ñaami ko maa heɓa tampere no feewi " .
Haa jooni dey , ngal artigal tammbingal kam tan dawrugol ɗemɗiwol duɗal ngenndiwal tafateengal ngal , maa mbiyen tonngungal ñaawoore nde leydi ndii sakkiti wonande pooɗondiral ɗemɗe ngal ndi aafoynoo nder duɗal ngal e hoore mum , ngal kuulal nana ɗoon haa jooni heddodii e niɓɓe mum kulɓiniiɗe tonngiiɗe e janngite luurdoyooje .
Haa jooni en keɓaani tawo kabaruuji Bah Mammadu Abdullaay , gooto e cuuɗodiiɓe makko gonnooɗo tambiiɗo koŋngol hooreejo leydi janndinaaɗo oo .
Haa jooni kamɓe jaaynde ndee ɓe mbiy ngam yiɗnoode ko laaɓi e tabitinde kaan haala , jokkondiraaɗo maɓɓe o etiima heɓde kalfinaaɗo konngol DSS woni Dr Peter Afunanya , kono oon jaabaaki telefon makko e binndol makko kala .
Haa jooni kanko hooreejo leydi Tunis o , o wiy garaangal cente ɓaleeɓe Afriknaaɓe he Tunis ko feere bonnooɓe yiɗɓe waylude mbaydi leñɗi Tunis , ngam waɗtude ɗum leydi ɓaleeɓe ɓe njotondiraani hayhuunde e leyɗeele Arabeeɓe e Islaam .
Haa jooni miɗo teskii wonde kala nde dille mbaɗi , ko njimri walla ngamri , ƴaaƴooji e faɗɗondiral .
Haa jooni ne kay ne , eɗen nduwonoo mo ; kono nde tawnoo eɗen kiisii ko e men jeyaa , eɗen torii mo nde waɗtata rokkude en kabaruuji kumpital e ɗemngal Pulaar , so heddiima emisiyoŋaaji cooden , so heddiiɓe ɓee coodii .
Haa jooni to bannge mbaylaaji too , aktiris Faraysenaajo o Ludivine Saganier , actoor Burkinaabe Isaka Sawadogo , e Roger Salah mo Senegal , maa mbaɗ anime mbayla tawa ko e gollondiral duɗal naɓoka ( cinema ) Kourtrajme tawa loowdi ndi ko " aktoraagal he ɓernde pentugol " .
Haa jooni woni ko e lewde , kono nattii wonde eelde .
Haa jooni ɗaɓɓitugol ɓee yooliiɓe no jokkaa .
Haa jooni ɗee naamne
Haa juuti , o lotti daande , o woni e yimde leele omo yiila hoore haa o sooynii mburu e kosam e loonde ɓuuɓnde e nokku ceniiɗo mo alaa dille , aldaa e deenoowo .
Haa ko ɗuum saabii so batu laamɓe ina waɗa Farmbaal ina tawtoree .
Haa nde min njahi Kaasamaasa .
Haa rawaandu anndi mbeewa foti yettoyaade , tan rawaandu ƴeeŋi , ndu wiyi fowru : " Mbeewa yettoyiima wuro .
Haa teeŋti e Senegaal , en njyi wototooɓe ñalnde kala nde pulaar nanetaake e lollinirɗe laamu , walla so nanaama ne ko seeɗa !
Haa teeŋti e ngorba kanba , mbaarnu ba .
Haa teeŋti e so tawii ko ngootiri .
Haa teeŋti ko waɗi to Kodduwaar caggal peññingol keɓe kollitɗe ɗaftugol Alasan watara hay sinno haa jooni toon waɗi caɗeele .
Haa teeŋti noon , e so woodii gaañiiɓe .
Haa teeŋti noon caggal 1989 nde gure daande maayo keewɗe taccinaa , leyɗe mum en keɓtaa .
Haa teeŋti noon e Poolel e Kummba to bannge diwgol .
Haa teeŋti noon e annduɓe fulɓe ,
Haa teeŋti noon e ñalɗi diisnondiral juɓɓinanooɗi e lewru oktoobar e noowammbar 2021 , ɗe mbismaa heen , ɗe ndarii heen haa ko ɓuri teeŋtude e miijooji majje njaɓaa .
Haa teeŋti noon kadi ɗum laɓɓintaa no feewi noppi .
Haa teeŋti noon so tawii omo wondi e warnooɓe koye ( senerooji ɗiɗi ɗi o nomi yantude e cukko hooreejo assemblée ) .
Haa teeŋti so oɗon ciftora teppe duuf hoɓɓe lannda amen tuma nde mooɓondiral amen gadanal , lanndaaji dawrugol ummiiɗi e leyɗeele aarabeeɓe , Afrik haa to Asii .
Haa teeŋtinoon so hinaa nanaa dille yimɓe jaɓooɓe .
Haa telloo he tufnde makanjam .
Haa waɗi ñalaande wootere o weetoyi caali jakkaa haa bottaari ɓallii , o dogtani galle , o ƴaaŋi jehre o soodi kilooji tati teewu , o addi o totti jom suudu oo , o wiyi ɗum ko hiraande .
Haa weetndoogo nde ɗaanii mi .
Haa yeeso ko laawol .
Haa ɓeydoo laaɓde , e nder paandaale amen , emin nganniyii
Haa ɓeydoo laaɓde , huɓeere safrirde woodnoonde ndee feewnita haa ŋarɗi , mahanaa kadi kuɓeeje tati goɗɗe , njanti e mayre .
Haa ɓooyi o fayti ardorde nehngo jawdi ( elewaas ) .
Haa ɓuri teeŋtude e kala nde o yiyi Ibraahiim ene toppitoo Haajaratu e Ismaa’iil , ene feeñina giɗli mum e korsa mum e maɓɓe .
Haa ɗo e hitaande 2003 , saanga jooɗagol Jonnde Mooɓondiral , alaa ko ɗum jibini .
Haa ɗo laamu ngu ko ko hofi maa ŋoggi juuɗe mum jaɓaani waɗde junngo e jayba yaltina kaalis paayodinɗo , yeru mum hay fedde nde ngardii mi nde ina roofoliɗi ( doole ) no feewi to bannge ngalu , sabu hay kaalisal kal min njogii kal alaa ko nafata so wonaa yoɓde warñeende ( lakkere ) gollotooɓe ɓe .
Haa ɗo ɗoyngol ɓurata welde ɗoo , ñuuñu mooytoo fiɗa mi .
Haade Farmbaal heedi ko bannge rewo noon ko heedi toon koo fof ko kañum laamii .
Haade faamaama wonde ko jaŋde woni fof , ɗo jaŋde alaa , ɓural wonataa ɗoon , ɗo jaŋde alaa ɓamtaare e kisal ngonataa ɗoon , yo yontaaɓe e hatanteeɓe nokkuuji men , haalooɓe keɗee , fewjanooɓe en , ndarano moƴƴingol jaŋde e nder gure men , hono no Kawral Commune saŋe woni e waɗde nii .
Haade ko renndo aadiyankeewo kaaleten , mbiyen ko yimɓe rentuɓe , ɗooftiiɓe kuule njuɓɓudi ngootiri laaɓtundi , tawa ɓerɗe ɗee e terɗe ɗee ko goote , ngalaa sereendu fawaade e kisal mumen walla faggudu mumen .
Haade noon ngenndiyankaagal ko huunde tiiɗnde , nde weeɓaani , etee wonaa mo woni kala rokketee ɗum , so en ndañii ngenndiyanke , tiiɗno -ɗen e mum gila e nguurndam mum .
Haade noon ngenndiyankaagal ko huunde tiiɗnde , nde weɓaani , etee wonaa mo woni kala rokketee ɗum , so en ndañii ngenndiyanke , tiiɗno-ɗen e mum gila e nguurndam mum .
Haadi pulaar wiyii mo fukkaani , fooftaani tawo ; haa jooni kaalat mi ko he eɓɓoore Sammba Juulde Caam he ɗemɗe ngenndi Senegaal walla mbiyen Afrik .
Haajar ne heddodii kanum tan gooto e ɓiyngel mum baasnumel ngel e ndee jeereende hittunde , nde alaa hay batte goote nguurndam .
Haajar waɗi ɓoolol taarni ɗum sewnde ndee wato ndiyam ɗam waltude e caaɗngol hee5 , o yetti Allah kadi o ɓeydii so’de wonnde garaangal maɓɓe e o nukko ene soomi muuyaande Allah .
Haaju maɓɓe gooto ko ponndugol leƴƴe Senegaal fof , tawa mo woni fof no yiya pinal mum e donaaɗi mum e goowaaɗi mum e goowaaɗi mum e nder leydi Senegaal .
Haaju oo ko haaju garanɗo jowlnaaɓe ngam won ko dikkii ɗumen .
Haajuuji kumtoo , gooto fof yiytoo heen hoore mum .
Haakem Kayahayɗi wonndude e mawɗo alkateeɓe yilliima hanki nokkuuji ɗo egginaaɓe ɓee ngoni ɗoo , o hollitii maa wood ko ɓe keɓi e ñalawma alet oo , kono haa subaka altine alaa ko ɓe keɓi ummoraade e laamu .
Haakim yettina Waali pillitol no feere ndee siiniraa .
Haal ko njiɗ-ɗaa mi hokku maa .
Haal mi nana .
Haala firti hol no neɗɗo famminirta yimɓe haa yimɓe fof paama tigi rigi .
Haala hannde kaa tiindini ko geɗel gootel : so laaɓal waɗaaka , nuunɗal rewaaka , haa cay haala kaa ñifataa .
Haala ina heewi heen : won wiyɓe wonde joopaa e njeenaari hee ko gannde " kuutorɗe " , woni baawɗe huutoreede e nguurndam ; won wiyɓe ko sabu kiram hakkunde Alfred Nobel e hiisiwo biyeteeɗo Gosta Mittag Lefleer , mo o yiɗanaano njeenaari ndii , sibu mum ɗaftu mo debbo biyeteeɗo Sofii Hess ( Sophie Hess ) Kono heewɓe ngoongɗinaani kaaɗoo haala .
Haala kaa ko anndude hol darnde men enen , hol nehdi pot-ɗen jogaade feewde he ɗee geɗe ?
Haala kaalaaka e nder renndoFulɓe ( Haal Pulaar en ) ina heewi manooje , e njettoor , e askooji jaambareeɓe , maa jime golle e baɗle .
Haala kaalis ine mawni he pottital hikka ngal .
Haala ko faati e añam-nguraagu weeɓaani , sibu ɗum wonaa huunde tuugiinde e hakkille .
Haala koko jokki
Haala majje ina jotondiri e laaɓndal " mbele lewño ( lumière ) ina jogii ñiso ( masse ) " , ɗum noon , " mbele ɓaaƴo ina fooɗa lewño " hono no ɓaaƴo fooɗirta pecorel ( particule ) ɓakdi nii .
Haala mum en heewaani haaleede .
Haalaaji keewɗi nanaama haa fayndaare ndee fuɗɗii dalƴude ; joom en jili ( hakkillaaji pelliti yoo fedde ndee waylu sawru mbaggu .
Haalan am ko njiɗ-ɗaa .
Haalan am to njahataa aan pamarel ngel ?
Haalande lawakeere ndee he ngaan saanga holliri ko o bartiiɗo he nder suudu ɗo o dummba noo ɗo , kono baaba makko kanum ene yeddunoo ɗuum gila heen ngaan saanga .
Haalannde ( declaration ) ndee nde fayndaare mum woni ko helde hujjaaji diine ɗi seɓɓitiiɓe ɓee kuutortoo , kadi e ustude boneeji fawaade dallinoraade diine , naattinaama he ɗereeji duttorɗi " Yiyannde Afrik ngam Kisal " he batu 33ɓiiwu Hooreeɓe leyɗeele Afrik .
Haaldooɓe kadi haa tinee kaalee , mbele e ngenndiyakooɓe , min ngaskitinee .
Haaletee ɗoo ko Pulaar e ɓiɓɓe mum jannguɓe ɗemde ngoɗɗe kalki ɗum .
Haali ɗum ko Dental Iiñturu Winnderewal ( ICG – International Crisis Group ) nder ciimtol mum bayyinangol he 2020 .
Haaliyanke biyateeɗo Njaay Saydu wiyii e wootere e jime mum " so leñol rentii , hulee hersee , ittanee fotde nde haandi " .
Haaliyankooɓe ene mbiya " neɗɗo ene wona cukalel
Haalooɓe ngal ko seeɗa nder leydi Siwis , keewngal calti , ngal yimɓe mum ndonki dañde doosɗe denndinooje ɗum en .
Haalooɓe pulaar mbiyi : " so neɗɗo welaama warde walla seertude e rawaandu mum heewi fawde ɗum ko sayo " , ɗo ne mbar Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo yiɗaani seertude e maɓɓe mbele ina jooɗoo ko juuti e jappeere nde addani ɗum wiyde ko ɓe yiɗnooɓe duugaade koyɗe mum .
Haalooɓe pulaar mbiyi : " woodani gumɗo ko lummbaade kono wiyde ko ɗo njoofat mi fotaani wonde heen " , kamɓe ne e nder ɗaam lummbojam jammaagu yooli heewɓe heen ko wonaa finnere maayo ngo kono ko mawnugol bempeƴƴe ɗe e waasde anndude to foti joofoyde , ngati wempeƴere heen ina ɓeta diraaji ɗiɗi tooweeki .
Haalooɓe pulaar mbi’i : " aduna ko dannga waandu , waɗat jaaɓe waɗa makka " , ina sikkaa ɓe paamii ɗum hannde .
Haalooɓe pulaar noon mbi’i : " kala ɗo yawaa e galle ko ɗoon ƴaaɓortee " , ina waawi tawa ko kalasal galle Depitee Sammba Juulde Caam ngal ɓuri yawnaade , haa ko Haalpulaar en ina ƴaaɓoo ɗoon , ina nanndi e goonga sabu nde o rokki yiyannde makko e njanngu ɗemngal ngenndiwal Wolof e nder reedu Fuuta tawa ko eɓɓoore ngu laamu ngu yettinnoo suudu sarɗiiji Senegaal .
Haalpulaar en mbiyi : " so neɗɗo nanaani ko yimɓe kaali , maa nan ko bone haali " , Mammadu Tannjaa ne nde jaɓaano nande ko aduna haali , jooni kam ina sikkaa o nanii ko bone haali haade wonii o alaa e sago makko .
Haame warii muynudo kosam mo haalaani Demngal !
Haamiidu Demmba Muusaa Soh e mawɓe woɗɓe
Haamnii heen tan noon ko kala nde laamu Safalɓe yiɗi waɗde fenaande , rewrata ko e ɓaleeɓe .
Haandude e wonde keedo , ɗuum ko nde gorko kellifaaɗo kaqqilɗo dimo .
Haannoo nii ko haysinno ko fulɓe leydi ngootiri , njuɓɓini ñalɗi pinal he nder leydi mum en ( yeru nder Fuuta ) , pine Fulɓe kala kolliree heen .
Haaruun al-Rashiid ne yamiriino Ibn Qarib al-Asm’l ( 121-216 H ) yoo winndan ɗum deftere daartol ( taariik ) o gayni winndude deftere nde ko he nder Bayt al-Hikmah .
Haawi kam e fuutangkoobe ko yidde dumen uddaade e fiitaade becce no so tawii ko kambe Alla halfini diine o e senegaal fof .
Haawnaaki , kala miijtiiɗo no feewi e kaa ɗoo haala , maa waaw jaabaade naamnal , walla naamɗe jogorɗe arde yeeso ɗee .
Haawnaaki , so en ɗaldii ɓooyi , maa en keɓoy heen ko laaɓi .
Haawnaaki , so mi anndiino ɗum , galo joom jawdi arataano e am tan yeena mi kaalis mi totta ɗum Kartal am dantitee .
Haawnaaki e balɗe garooje ɗe , keɓen heen ko laaɓi , sabu Jeneraal Sekubaa ko jahnooɗo nootoyaade ɓiyi neene mum Ahmadu Tumaani Tuure ngam mawninde Maanditaare duuɓi capanɗe joyi jeytaare leydi mum .
Haawnaaki e ngal ɗoon daawal Allah rokka ɓe wune ɓe keɓa juɗtude njomngu ngadnu ngu .
Haawnaaki maa heewɓe mbiy hol no ɗum anndiraa , hol no ki nguleeki ɓetiraa .
Haawnaaki tawa ena waɗi nguurndam ɗam Alla tan anndi , kono ko fayti e yimɓe walla jawdi walla e huɗoo e leɗɗe , ɗum yiyaaka e tagopeeje ɗe , so wonaa e dow Leydi .
Haawnaaki tawa on meeɗii yiyde ( e nder " teleeji " ) laaɗe Riisnaaɓe walla Ameriknaaɓe ena taaroo leydi ; so on teskiima , wonɓe e nder laaɗe ɓe mbayata ko ena kaya nii , ɓe nattat jogaade teddeeki !
Haawnii , haaɓnii heen noon , ko so joom mum dañii heen caɗeele tan wontii gooto .
Haawniinde !
Haayre Annabiijo .
Haayre nana ara e laawol , kono beddiiɗo oo nattii wonde ɗoon , a nattii yiyde ɗum .
Haaɓe nganndi fowru so woɗɗii e so ɓadiima e dille mum .
Haaɓnii e ngonka men kaa fof , ko kala mo njiy ɗaa wonata ko e woyde " en ndentaani , en kawraani , alaa e men jiɗanɗo goɗɗo finde saka tina " kono alaa mo ene fuɗɗa .
Haaɓnii heen kadi , ko nde min naati e ɗeen dente dillooje fof , min keewi ko yiɗde tamde ɗumen , e waawnude ɗumen rewde miijooji amen .
Haaɓnii heen noon ko en ngalaa e suɓotooɓe .
Haaɗata ko e wiyde ngudditee defte mon , njanngee , pokkitee .
Habii Jakariyaa Kontee mo Maqaama nde tawnoo ko ngenndiyaŋke , paamɗo darnde ndee heeranaaki tan worɓe kadi jeyaaɗo he ɓurɓe anndude holi Murtuɗo , nde o naati he leydi Farayse , o woor enɗam makko fof , o jippii galle njaatigo ceerno biyateeɗo Saydu Bah ngam jaggude Ceerno ko jiɗnaaɗo .
Habri ɗum ko annduɓe ko fayti e kuule weeyo ñalnde 24 ut 2010 .
Habri ɗum ko halfinaaɓe dummbirde ɓe .
Habri ɗuum ko jaaynde wiyeteende Le Parisien .
Hade Joolaa ummaade duunde Karabaan tawi asamaan o , fuɗɗiima niɓɓitde toɓo mawgo wonii e buttude e makka .
Hade am woɗɗoyde ne , mboɗo yiɗi ñaagaade ɓe ngollodotoo-mi ɓee nde njokkata darnde .
Hade amen ñaamde walla so min njaltii e taarorde min cooɗoto juuɗe amen haa ɗe laaɓa .
Hade feere Unicode nanondireede , ɗemngal fof , walla ɗemɗe ɓadondirɗe fof njoginoo ko " dokkol' mum'en keeringol .
Hade gorko Duwoyra naatde dingiral tawi Pakko Leñol , Raasin Jah , Mammadu Dem e Abuu Sih njeewtii jamaanu nguu no feewi .
Hade hiirde ndee fusde , tawi Hammadi Cammaa bismiima yimɓe ɓee leegal mum en e ko fayi arde .
Hade jinnaaɓe maɓɓe wirnaade , ɓe ndenndini ɓesnguuji ɗiɗi ɗii kala , debbo e gorgo , suka e mawɗo .
Hade kikiiɗe yonde tawi ɓe njettiima daral haa ɓe puɗɗii ƴeewde naꞌi ɗii .
Hade maggal yeeyeede ngal feccitaa ko e lowe jeetati .
Hade makko arde ɗoon e diiwaan he , ina wiyee hoɗnoo ɗoon ko Seereraaɓe yetteteeɓe Ngom e Fulɓe Jawjawɓe : ɗum ko e sahaa laamaandi Ganaa walla Wagadu .
Hade makko gaynude haala makko , Abdurahiim Aañ holirii darnde jaagorgal mum nde roggere ɗiggata , hay sinno hay mbuudu Senegaal yahaani heen .

Hannde jaayle ɗee ɓuri haalde ko ngenndiyanke naalanke mawɗo hono Bob Marlee .
Hannde jojji ko golle , jojji ko taftaade koye men , taftaade leñol men , darnude fedde fulɓe adunya mawnde , ñiibnde .
Hannde kadi aɗen nganndi yontaaɓe men njeyaama he ñamal laamu Muritani , wodɓe ndikkiima laamu Senegaal , won kadi mbiruuji mawɗi ngoni he geewanaade lammbaaji garoyooji to senegaal e leyɗe godɗe etee aɗen nganndi ko hono Obamaa en ngoni dariiɓe hannde ɓee .
Hannde kadi baɗte wolde ndee ɓeydiima soofde , sibu baasgol konu Amerik betteede to bannge baasgol jooɗtoraade poolgu taliban en baangu nii yaawde , kam e juɓɓingol jaltingol toon konu nguu .

Hannde ne he yonta internet , njulaagu heewngu waɗatee ko e karalleeje kese ɗe .

Hannde nguun bati ene jeyaa e kewuuji ɓurɗi faayodinde baɗooji he nder jookdu Afrik ngam haɓaade e waɗboniyankaagal he innde diine tawa kadi ɓe kaɓtortoo ɓeen ko tuugnaade he binndi ( ko wayno Qur’an , hadisaaji e defte sariya ) Islaam .
Hannde noon , Jaawel jaabaki mo .
Hannde noon , Pulaagu ina rutta mo leppi teddungal sabu nguurndam makko fof o waɗnoo ɗum ko e momtugol humambinnaagu e ɗemngal makko neeniwal ngal o ñaaƴirtunoo , o faarnorii duuɓi e kitaale kanko fof e hiɓindaade ɗemngal tuubakiri , Farayse .
Hannde noon , denndaangal annduɓe ko faati e ɓalliwal koode ( ɓalkoodewal : astrophysique ) njenanaama gawuuji ɓaleeji ( gudde ɓaleeje ) ine ngoodi , tee heen gooto ina e sara men ɗoo : to wuddu jiiryiirngal men , hono wuddu Fedannde Malaaɗo , hedde ñukkere koode wiyeteende Mbaangu A ( Sagittaire A ) .
Hannde noon , denndaangal annduɓe ko faati e ɓalliwal koode ( ɓalkoodewal : astrophysique ) njenanaama gawuuji ɓaleeji ( gudde ɓaleeje ) ine ngoodi , tee heen gooto ina e sara men ɗoo : to wuddu jiiryiirngal men , hono wuddu Fedannde Malaaɗo , hedde ñukkere koode wiyeteende Mbaangu A , ( Sagittaire A ) .
Hannde noon , enen fulɓe , ene saɗi haala kaalateeka , tawa en miijaaki heen dawrugol .
Hannde noon , min njiyii Pennda Gise e Pennda Budal ena ndarii he ñawndude ɗeen joote .
Hannde noon , tabitii , addi ngoo yooro ko ŋakkere leɗɗe e laddeeji men .
Hannde noon , won gardiiɗo leydi ndii .
Hannde noon caɗeele peeñanii fuutankooɓe e mbaydiiji ɗiɗi haa ɗi keɓi tati

Hannde o waɗtii yahde e haajuuji makko , haa o yejjitii nii o meeɗii ñawde
Hannde oo , Siwis ina faggitoroo ɗum ngalu neɗɗankeewu e koppareewu doolnungu .

Hannde oo , ñaawooɓe Burkina mberliima ɗaɓɓaande winndereere , kala ɗo ɓe kawraa yo ɓe nannge ɓe ngartiree Burkina .
Hannde oo caafal nana darii e duñde ndeen fayndaare .
Hannde oo ko ɓeen poɗɗen haɓaade , kadi ko diine lislaam oo ɓuri waawde wallude en e ndeen hare .
Hannde oo noon , gite ƴoogii , ɓerɗe men kecciɗii sabu wi’de ina sifoo Aamadu Jool wonaa huunde weeɓnde , kono noon go’to fof ina waawi haalde heen e makko ko anndi , kono kadi maa wood ko yejjiti e makko ko heewi .
Hannde so neɗɗo wiyii ina itta e Pulaar kelme jiggaaɗe , haa teeŋti e arab , ko seeɗa heddotoo .
Hannde taliban en fof e riiwaneede he laamu e hitaande 2001 , ko kamɓe ngoni he welkude .
Hannde tawatnoo ko omo woni baasɗo no miin nih walla aan , mbar maa " leñol " ngol hokku-mo ko o ñaami koy ?
Hannde tuggi Ndar haa Bakkel fof ko sogo gooto .
Hannde won ko waylii haa heewi sabu ko soknoo Ibraahiima Saar , warnoo Teen Yusuf Gey , fellunoo yoga e kooniŋkooɓe ɓaleeɓe , ko ɗum tigi woni e peŋcu hannde !
Hannde yimɓe heewɓe ina kuli wonde Fedde ngenndiije ko ko wonti kuutorgal leyɗe hirnaange .
Hannde yimɓe heewɓe ina njenanaa ko USA e Angalteer ummini warngooji ɗi , hay so tawii noon ko Farayse ɓurɓi ɗi .
Hannde yoga e maɓɓe koɗnaa ko e turi e ndeen mbilloñ caggal cahe maɓɓe gadane sara koorommbi gese maɓɓe keɓtiraaɗe mbaawka .
Hannde yoga e rewankooɓe moolinooɓe lappol daande mayo Senegaal kootii leydi mum en e jaɓɓungal laamu kañum e heblo HCR ( feede adunayankoore halfinaande mooliiɓe ) , kono heewɓe heen ina jokki e nimsa kootal mum en .
Hannde ɓe keɓtii ko ɓurnoo faayodinde e leydi Libi ndi , Kaddaafi kañum nana suuɗii e laamorgo he , caggal nde wari haa natti waawde , wulli sappii haa tampi .
Hannde ɗo heɓaa ɗoo ena boni : ena wayi hono leƴƴi goɗɗi ɗii ko ko njaɓri Alla , ena njalɗiɗi e dow doole ɗe laamu nguu fawi e majji ngam nuskinde ɗemɗe e pine maɓɓe !
Hannde ɗum ɗoon fof nattii , kerooje majjii , waañooɓe kam e raddooɓe najii , kiirɗeeli pattamlami nattii , petelaaji lonkaaji njejjitaama , leɗɗe mawɗe , dunli cukkuɗi , Eere , Ɗooje , Murotooɗe , Gellooɗe , Lawñannde , Bamammbe , Nammaade , Barkeeje nattii heewde e ceene men .
Hannde ɗuum hina fuɗɗii feeñde e leñol men ngol haa laaɓti .
Hannde ɗuum ine aanni hay feewnooɓe kaɓirɗe ɗee .
Haralleeɓe ina keɓtini wonde ko ka ndema njahduka e ngonka daande maayo .
Haralleeɓe jaŋde ine mbiya wonde " winndannde fuɗɗoriinde firo , ndeen winndannde bonii " .
Haralleeɓe keɓtinii wonde ko yahraa yeeso feewde e paandaale EPT ngam moƴƴingol jaŋde e jaajtingol kattanɗe jaŋde wonande goomuuji joñaaɗi , ɓuraaɗi " njonaani tee njaawaani ngam waawde ɗoftaade lajal dottangal ngal , haa teeŋti wonande leyɗe Afrik worgo Saharaa kam e dowlaaji Arab .
Haralleeɓe sosiyatee oo ine nganndunoo hay lajal nde mbayliigu ngonka kilimaa tinotoo .
Haralleeɓe ɓee kollitii boom ko yoga e leyɗe Afrik kuutortoo heen ko hedde joyaɓal ( 20% ) kattanɗe ɗiin ɓoggi .
Haralleeɓe ɗiɗo ko faati e baylagol geɗe weeyo , hono Syukuro Manabe Ameriknaajo heen , Sapponnaajo heen , e Almaañnaajo Klaus Hasselmann , yantude e Itaalinaajo biyeteeɗo Giorgio Parisi , miijiyanke Tippule Ɓalliije Ɗuuɗe ( des systèmes physiques complexes ) .
Harameeji jeeɗiɗi !
Haray ko telen ngon senngo ɗon won-mi winndirde ndee windannde ɗoo .
Harbiyankooɓe ɓe njeyaaka e leydi njiyaama
Hare Ismaayila waɗi ko hakkunde 18 e 22 oktoobar .
Hare haannde luulndiinde mbaadiiji jaanduyaagal e nder jeyi leydi ɗo hardaneeɓe e ɓiɗɓe jiyaaɓe to leƴƴi ɓaleeji , fotaano wonde daliilu ittugol jeyi denndaaɗo jotondirɗo e jeyi enɗam gure .
Hare hakkillaaji .
Hare hakkunde remooɓe e aynaaɓe ɓaleeɓe , hare keewnde waɗde e keerol hakkunde leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee , hono daande maayo Senegaal , waɗi toon kadi , haa woodi maayɓe heen .
Hare jihaadi nde seernaaɓe addii ɓe mo umminnoo , ummini ina heddii he hakkillaaji Fuutaŋkooɓe .
Hare ko ko jokki
Hare muusii hakkunde maɓɓe haa nde rogere adannde ndaari gasde .
Hare nde fuɗɗiima gila 4 ( Jolal ) Nowambar 2020 .
Hare ndee muusi haa israayiilnaaɓe kuutorii napalm .
Hare ndee raayti , nde tawnoo nde hanndaaka e leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee kala , haa wonti raddo ɓaleeɓe e nder Muritani .
Hare ndee waɗi haa Maki ittaa e jooɗnde mum cukko mawɗo leydi ndii lannda PDS .
Hare ummii hakkunde leyɗeele ɗiɗi ɗee e fedde wiyeteende POLISARIO daraninoonde jeytaare S .
Hare wertii haa yettii diiwe Amhaara e Afaar .
Hareeji bonɗi kuɓɓi hakkunde maɓɓe e laamu Bosni , kono doole keednoo ko e maɓɓe Alla e laamu Serbiy mo Milosevic ardinoo wallude-ɓe .
Hareeji keewɗi mbaɗii e leydi he , hakkunde galleeji laamotonooɗi , haa teeqti noon hakkunde galleeji tati : Loggaar en ɓe nganndu-ɗaa ko iwdi safalɓe , Dyoos en , iwdi Seereraaɓe e Tedyek en , iwdi Fulɓe .
Hareen ji ɗii lollini wuro wiyeteengo Sarayewoo , laamorgo Bosniy hannde .
Hari non , Fulɓe annduɓe dawro leydi ndi , wano Dr .
Harminde peccitagol poostooji laamu tuugingol e ƴele leƴƴi , tirbii , diiwaan , walla galle goodngol hannde ngol .
