Hasan II , e nguurndam mum , laartannoo ko mawninde Maruk haa maayo Senegaal .
Hatanteeɓe Pulaar golle maɓɓe moƴƴe yoo teske .
Hattaa toon tan e gure ɗo Senegaalnaaɓe koɗi ko Mantes la Jolie .
Hawaariyankooɓe mbiyi Iisaa " aan ko a fittaandu geno , jooni kay , ko aan adotoo ñaamde nde min puɗɗoo ñaamde .
Hawo nii fuɗɗinooma rufde gonɗi kono o waɗii feere ha hay gooto yiyaani mo .
Hawo ɓoornii ko robbo mum boɗeejo mo soodananoo luuma too , omo moori jubbi jooɗɗi baɗaaɗi ñaaƴe ɗelkooje .
Hawraama sukaaɓe maa mbaɗane doggol mum en keeringol no rewɓe nii e sarɗi tawa he nder doggol hee rewɓe e worɓe lommbondirtu etee ko famɗi fof hay so ɗiɗo wonduɓe e sii mbaɗee heen .
Hawraande 338 Fedde Ngenndiije dartini hare ndee ñalnde 22 oktoobar , waktu 18 e hojomaaji 52 .
Hawri kadi mawɗo leydi ndii ine joginoo toon koyngal ndartoyde yiɗɓe gollaade e leydi hee , hawri haala men e maɓɓe ko e ɓenndude wonnoo , woni fartaŋŋe kisa siifoyde toon nanondiral ngal .
Hawri ko e Mawnde ( Aljumaa ) .
Hawri matalaaji eppoos ena ngonnoo ɗoon , kañum enne njaɓi , ngoni e sumde .
Hawri noon e won he dipiteeji kañum en fof he jeyeede he senngo laamu , ina joginoo miijo ngoo .
Hawri teemedanɗe 14 , eɗen naatani teemedannde sappo e joyaɓiire .
Hawrunoo ko e lewru koorka .
Hawsankooɓe , e urɓugol Tuwaareg en nokku Ayiir ( Aïr ) , kam e laamɗo Kanem Bornu , calii laamu diine kiisɗo Sokoto .
Hawwaa noon faanditinoo e ñaamde lekki kii ko ngam yiɗde duumaade e nder aljannaji ɗii , ko ɗum tagi ko kanko adii ƴettude e lekki kii o ñaami ɗum .
Hay Awaja ɓurnooɗo yimɓe aduna oo fof toowde halkiima , firti ko o yooliima , wiyaama noon tibbooje ( pyramide ) ɗi laamɗo Suuwereydi mahnoo ɗi to Misra , ɗiin mutaani haa laaɓi .
Hay DDA dañaana waɗde ɗuum e laawol mum gadanol .
Hay Fedde Ngenndiije wallitii ndee fenaande .
Hay Senegaal , kam fof e heedde caggal nder dartagol raaɓo jihaadiyankaagal , nana nawda juuɗe e koyɗe ngam tafande hoore mum heɗɗaawo kisal to bannge mum fuɗnaange too .
Hay Sep Blatter e hoore mum , won ɗo wiyi " nimsii ko Kataar suɓaa yo yuɓɓin Kawgel ngel .
Hay Tabo Mbeki wallitinooma mo nde lomtii Manndelaa ndee .
Hay addoyɓe jaamde pukka bahe mum'en damal galle ,
Hay aduna mo ngon-ɗen hannde oo , so neɗɗo dañii duuɓi teemedere ina anndaa sakkii ɗum ko cellal , alaa ko haali joom duuɓi teemedde joy haa ujunere .
Hay baaba maa kañum e baaba mum ganndaa ɗum .
Hay batte waylataa nokku mum so leydi arii e yiilaade .
Hay daartol maɓɓe majjinte hono no leñɗi keewɗi hannde gonɗi he les njiimaandi Arabeeɓe , ko wayno Libye , Egypte , Algerie , Irak e Syrie ekn .
Hay dara laamu haalaani , kono ine wiyee won gaañiiɓe heen .
Hay dara siiraani heen , sibu won geɗe keewɗe ɗe kiisaaka e ɓeto hee , yanti heen , alaa mo ɗum jogori gaañde e leydi hee .
Hay dutal yiɗaa .
Hay fanniyanke haala gooto waawaa sifodaade ma ŋarɗugol jaɓɓungal ngal haade kay a yiyraani yitere maa .
Hay fannu gooto e ngamri ndi ɓe kolliri ndii , alaa heen ko jiggaa .
Hay gaadoraaɗe goote barooje pittaali , ɗanninooje filñitaare , potaani teddinde hakkillaaji men , kaɗa ɗi feertude e faamde , haa njolla ɗi nder jebbilaare reentateende .
Hay gaatuleeje mbileweeje goote , hay ɗe karallo laabi ñaawooje mo duuɓi 13 jaŋnde , keɓaani tawo majjitinde ɗee cugge coɗiiɗe he ngal artigal , peeñanooje boom hay kala humambinne so tawii tan omo heddodii e nuunɗal makko timmungal .
Hay gollidiiɓe makko he waalde Kisal ko wayno Dougoukolo ( Baaba Alfa Bah ) Konaare , ɓiy hooreejo leydi Mali kiiɗɗo o , Alfaa Umar Konaare e Binta Sidibe-Gascon kanum ne ko cukko hooreejo Kisal , kadi goownoɗo yaltude ene wullitoo he jaayndeeji , ɓeen fof kisaani biyaaɗe bonɗe e jaŋtowooli najoore .
Hay gonnooɗo " seneraal " wonti tan " gobi " .
Hay gooto !
Hay gooto addaani mo , ko kaŋko addi hoore makko caggal nde o miijtii no feewi .
Hay gooto alaa cuusal huccitde e mayre .
Hay gooto anndaa .
Hay gooto anndaa haa hannde ko kewnoo ñalnde heen to " Tweila " , " giɗo " pellunooɗo oo kadi , hay gooto anndanaa ɗum huunde , ko jaafaaɗo gila hay gooto anndaa ko kewi .
Hay gooto anndaa hannde ɗo oo
Hay gooto anndaa ko woni , sibu ko henndu bonndu , toɓo , majje , digaali jokkondirɗi .
Hay gooto anndaa so wonaa bajjo !
Hay gooto e maɓɓe heɓaani tawo duuɓi 10 .
Hay gooto e sukaaɓe ɓee yiɗaa daɗeede .
Hay gooto faamataa , sibu ko ɗee balɗe bennuɗe tan , Wadd noddunoo ardiiɓe galleeji jaayndeeji , o haaldi e mum .
Hay gooto feeraa ɗum yiyde .
Hay gooto fotaani fijirde ɗum .
Hay gooto fotaani laaɓde laaɓal gertogal : laaɓa boowal , tunwa nder " .
Hay gooto haalantaake nafoore awluɓe e renndo men , darnde maɓɓe so wolde dawii , darnde maɓɓe so haala enɗam dawii , darnde maɓɓe so haala pinal dawii : awluɓe ngoni mooftirgal ( mémoire ) leñol Fulɓe .
Hay gooto hannde waawaa wiyde ko oo jogori foolde sabu lanndaaji maɓɓe mbayrii hawrude gila 2001 e toɗɗe meeriyaŋkooje , nde lannda Gbagbo heɓi 33% , Watara 29% e Bedie 23% !
Hay gooto heddaaki sabu ngal kawral ko ɓurngal mawnude e ko fulɓe kawrata .
Hay gooto heftinaani ooɗoo Senegaal gonnooɗo ñemborde e
Hay gooto heɓaani salmondireede , kono Baaba Muusa ina waajooɓe .
Hay gooto heɗantaako hay gooto , saka jaɓana ɗum .
Hay gooto hoɗaani ɗoon .
Hay gooto jogaaki nguurndam goɗɗo oon , gooto fof ko kartal mum tan jogii , ɗo welaa weddotoo .
Hay gooto kadi yejjitaani mukke Biriksel " .
Hay gooto kam haɗaani yimɓe parlemaa sosde goomu , kono , miin , mi hulaani ɗuum ; wonaa to oon bannge keɓratee-mi " .
Hay gooto meeɗaa yiyde kawleeje ɗiɗi , walla dabbule ɗiɗi ene ngara e nder hitaande wootere .
Hay gooto sikkaano kaŋko mawɗo leydi ndii omo ruttina Muritani e jammaaji mum ɓurɗi niɓɓiɗde , kono kadi daaɗe keewɗe umminooma wiyde demokaraasii oo haa jooni tiiɗaani sabu Lannda laamu nguu wonndude e howhowɓe laamu Maawiiyaa , addunooɓe caɗeele murɗe muusde e leydi ndii .
Hay gooto suusaa haalande hay gooto goonga .
Hay gooto tawo anndaa !
Hay gooto tinaani .
Hay gooto to ŋakku .
Hay gooto waawa limde ɓesngu makko , Waandu noon ɓesngu mum diwaani teemedere .
Hay gooto waawaa faamde no ɗum wonirta .
Hay gooto waawaa faamde ɗuum .
Hay gooto waawaa haɗde on ɗuum " e wiyde woɗɓe ɓee ( artiraaɓe ɓee ) " so on mbaawii ndeeƴon , so wonaa ɗum min ndiiwa on , sibu oɗon nganndi on njeyaaka ɗoo " .
Hay gooto waawaa limde boowe , pomuuji , laabi , ekn .
Hay gooto waawaa wiyde hannde ko nii maayɓe ɓe poti .
Hay gooto waawaa wiyde yoo ɗemngal goɗngal lomto neeniwal sabu ɗemngal neeniwal yahdata ko e kala ngalu ndonaangu ngu leñol jogii hannde .
Hay gooto waawaanoo miijaade he nder yonta gooto tan Pulaar ene ummo he jogaade yeewtere yontere fof laawol gootal , haa waɗta limaneede Teleeji e Rajooji teemedde .
Hay go’to e maɓɓe wiyataa , yiyaani caɗeele renndo ngo jogii ko fa’ti e ɗiin galleeji kabrooji .
Hay haame am !
Hay haame noon , kala nde ɗuum waɗi , ko ɓaleeɓe ɓee keewi yarde mone .
Hay haame noon min ndewindaaki ndeen toɓɓere nde tawnoo ɓooytani caggal ɗuum tan o ummii Cincinnati o fayti Columbus , Ohio o rewriɗoon o fayti New York .
Hay heddiiɓe toon ɓee , ngalaa kaɓirɗe e ngalu ko ina waawa liggaade leyɗeele ɗee .
Hay heen mbayliigu ngootu teskaaki keewal pine leydi ndii , hay heen ngootu yahdaani e jojjanɗe ndimaagu , e ɓamtaare e demokaraasi , alaa ko haali jojjanɗe ɓesngu leydi ndii he kuuɓal mum .
Hay heerto dawrugol wooto o jeyanooka .
Hay hooreejo gooto leyɗe arabeeje ɗee araani , kamɓe fof ɓe neli ko jaagorɗe .
Hay huunde !
Hay huunde dillataa e nder makko .
Hay huunde woppanaaka jawdi e durnirɗe .
Hay jawdi lakde ndii ine fera deppi keddoo .
Hay jimol gootol fiytaaka fof ko kisi pul !
Hay kaake dafaaɗo huutortonoo ina ndaaɓe sabu waasata waɗde ñonkoto o .
Hay kadi mo yahaano heen Alseri ne , o anndinii ɗum , e laabi ɗiɗi ɗii fof , no jotondiral hakkunde haɓantonooɓe ndimaagu e jeytaare Alseri e konunkooɓe arnooɓe ɓee , waynoo .
Hay kaɓirɗe jaŋde timmaani walla heɓataa .
Hay kaɓirɗe ɗe ngalɗinee , woni njahdinee e kaɓirɗe kese , njaltinooje sifaa gaaci belooji yontannde hannde nde .
Hay keppugol ngol ko caɗeele wonno , sibu , oon sahaa , hay dañde keppirgal moƴƴal weeɓaano .
Hay kippu Afrik gooto yaafraani nii .
Hay ko ngummani-ɗen laawol Kameruun koo , o noddii en cili keewɗi .
Hay laamiiɓe nokkuuji ɓe , o noddaani zum en e batuuji makko .
Hay laamu tubakooɓe ina anndunoomo , " guworneer " Ndar oo ina hurminoomo no feewi .
Hay lamɗam maa mi ñaagoo .
Hay leñol gootol yejjitaaka walla welsindaaka .
Hay mawɓe ena njiɗa luggiɗinaade e nguurndam mum alaa ko haali yontaaji
Hay mbaydi hare min potnoo haɓeede , waɗi ko luural hakkunde amen .
Hay militeer en ɓoccitinooɓe e warngooji ina njaɓi podooje seneraal .
Hay naamniiɗo yoo laɓɓitinane , min njaggirta ɗum ko gaño .
Hay nawligaaji di ko buri heen heewde duum ina sabobina dum ngati debbo dohaddaaki ina tawtu maa e ngena kaa kadi ina heewi no weltin maa haa timma sabu ina tina no haanirta nih .
Hay neɗɗankaagal gootal alaa e momtugol pine , hay jam e deeƴre wootere ngoodaa e gootolingol baawnangol dartoringol jaalnude ɗemngal gootal e jaasnude keddiiɗe nela ɗumen e nattugol panndungol , hay njuɓɓam-ngollaagu wootu wooda e feere pemmbugol heewandere men ɗemɗe e pine .
Hay neɗɗo gooto alaa koyɗe e juuɗe pamɗuɗe baꞌɗe no makko ni .
Hay ngoon " firo " heewaano toɗɗaade firo gorworo , walla tawa ina anndaa ngati goodal defte e jaayɗe .
Hay ngootu heen heblaaka heblo moƴƴo , yeewtaaka , ɓetaaka haa anndee moƴƴii walla moƴƴaani .
Hay nih Aamadu Kufa inneteeɗo oo , en keɓii silsil
Hay nih Blaise Kompawre nde naamnaa miijo mum he ñaawoore ndee , o wiyi " sete koninkooɓe he gardagol mawɗo mum en Jilbeer Jenndere , ko kam en pelliti arditaade yimɓe Sankara yiɗnooɓe nanngude mo " .
Hay nokku , mi yiyaani !
Hay oolel ñukkindiiɗo ena
Hay pelle tooñaaɓe ɓe , yimɓe militeer en ko ko cunɓinii e nder mum en .
Hay pinal woni ko nder .
Hay safalɓe nokku o kollitii finaa tawaa mum en .
Hay safroowɓe maa mbaɗtu huutoraade mo ngam oppirde ñawɓe tawa ko e ayaawo .
Hay salminaandu , heewi ko nattude dogde hakkunde am e mum .
Hay seerndude hakkunde yimɓe nokku oo he yitere tan , wonaa huunde newiinde .
Hay si tawii hannde Penken no hatonjini e Mosko , kono ko Mosku ɓuri haajeede e Mosku .
Hay sinno CIA hollii alaa fof ɗo riño maɓɓe tonngaa e kaayit , lannda republicain en ka wontii amwookaa CIA e yeeso Pulosii .
Hay sinno a wiyaama wonde ɗii kabaruuji ko gananooɗi ( crypté ) , annooɓe ɗum ɓee ina mbaawi antude ɗi .
Hay sinno digaali hol ɓe kaɗi ɗaanaade , yoga e yimɓe ko ndiyam haa nder kuɓeeje addani ɗum daraade haa subaka .
Hay sinno doole ngalaa , pellital e ɗaɗol tiiɗngol nani ɗoo tammbii golle ɗee .
Hay sinno en mbaawaa yiyrude huunde ndee gite men , ande yaltina nguleeki .
Hay sinno eɗen njenanaa ɓee uujiyankooɓe ko woytoraandu tan , ɓuri yaajde he haala makko ko sikkude yimɓe fof njiylotoo ko telɓinde leydi Tuunus , ellee ko kam woni nehaande winndere .
Hay sinno jaŋngoowo jaaynde walla deftere maa waɗtin faamde , caggal nde yuurni yuurnitii , wallude ɗum faamde , tawaa fawii ko e mbinndiin , ɓuri fóóftinde .
Hay sinno ko enen fof ndenndi neesu ne , diiwaan fof ko e aadaaji mum e goowaaɗi mum .
Hay sinno ko mesaas keeriiɗo , janngo haala mum ine waawi yaltude boowal .
Hay sinno ko o dimo , o yeeynirii .
Hay sinno o alanaa kam nafoore ne , miijii mi ko wootande goɗɗo , mi waasa wootande banndu am ene hersinii .
Hay sinno payndaale mayre politik alaa heen haɗaani nde dillude e ngoon senngo .
Hay sinno ɓe mbaɗani ko koye maɓɓe , eɗen mbiya ɓe Alla jaaraama , ɓe njaaraama .
Hay sinno ɗii-ɗóó sarɗiiji ene njókkóndiri , ɗi njiidaa sariyaaji , te woto yejjite ko mbinndiin hééwi feññinde wowlaango , ndeke noon fotaani nuskeede .
Hay so Alhajji Mahmuud yettodaaki ɗeen paandaale 100% , a waɗii jeloode nde maaytataa e leƴƴi hirnaange Afrik , teeŋti e hakkunde Muritani , Senegaal e leydi Mali .
Hay so Alhajji Mahmuud yettodaaki ɗeen paandaale 100% , o waɗii jeloode nde maaytataa e leƴƴi hirnaange Afrik , teeŋti e hakkunde Muritani , Senegaal e leydi Mali .
Hay so Caad laamoraaka peewal e nuunɗal gila to dawrugol e to faggudu haa to renndo , Farayse waawata tan ko heedande Idiris Debi Itno , lammodiiɗo e " Itno " en no ngoorunoo .
Hay so Elimaan Mammadu Lih woni ko worgo , omo jokkondiri he koreeji makko wonɓe rewo maayo , to Madiina-Fanay e to Fanay-Ñakwaar .
Hay so Mosku jaɓaani huutoraade doole ngam añde bonnude jotondire mum e Baku , Turki kañum naatii heen haa heƴi no doole mum potiri , ina wallita Aserbayijaan haɓaade gaño mum ɓooyɗo hono Armeni , huunde nde DDA e Farayse ceyfiti .
Hay so Umaar Gafoo Sanngoot e Mammadooru Maabo nguuraani hannde ne yimɓe ɓee kam nganndii ndeke dillere maayataa sabu yimatnooɓe ɗum ɓee ena jogii rontooɓe .
Hay so a yiɗii ɗum ne , a nattii joganaade ɗum kattanɗe e doole .
Hay so e oon sahaa o hiiɗaama nde o hanndaa e nder nokku gooto ( ekkol polis ) , caggal ɗuum farlinaa e makko nde o waasata yaltude wuro ngoo tawi sanndarmori ina ƴeewtoo mo sahaa kala , caggal ɗuum ngonka makko newnaama tawde wonii sariya suwaa tuumde mo tawo , haa ndeen wellitaare rokki mo fartaŋŋe ɗannaade feewde Farayse .
Hay so en momtii ñawbuuli nannduɗi e bade walla woofɗo , eɗen
Hay so en nduttiima he jaambraagal , Jowol ina anndiraa wuro ngo heewaani awluɓe .
Hay so ena danndatnoo , ko lella foti naftoraade .
Hay so ena woodi ɓamtortooɓe Leñol , hay so ena woodi ngenndiyankooɓe " saloŋaaji " ɓuuɓɗi , hay so ena woodi leliiɓe , luliiɓe no janaale , ndeke ena woodi dadiiɓe , dariiɓe no jullaaje .
Hay so jogoriino waɗeede barke ne maa mi waɗ heen ceenal mbele herƴa " .
Hay so ko a ñiiwa !
Hay so ko renndini-ɓe Wadd ena seerti , gooto e maɓɓe kala yoɓii haa timmi salaare mum ƴukkaade e yeeso ɓiyngel Ablaay Wadd .
Hay so ko wooturu .
Hay so leydi Caad laatiima leydi toɓoori sahaa fof seɓɓitiiɓe hono no Debi heɓirnoo , alaa-e-sagel Farayse waaba mo .
Hay so luggiɗaani , ɓe nganndinee kam , holi no kabaaru ƴoogirtee , holi no kabaaru defirtee ko adii nde ene yaltinee .
Hay so neɗɗo waawiino wuurde duuɓi 200 , so ɗum ƴeewndaama e goodgol walla e nguurndam hoodere ɓetirteeɗam teemedde e teemedde miliyaruuji duuɓi , nguurndam neɗɗo ɗam wayata raɓɓiɗde ko no majaango yitere nih .
Hay so noon ɗum dañaaka waɗeede he dingiral ngal sahaa dokaaɗo oo yonataa .
Hay so tawii , won ko woni heen goonga , sibu e dawal hakkunde ngal , ngenndiyankooɓe heewɓe njibinaama , leyɗe keewɗe ndimɗii ( Sammbi , Tansaani , Malawi , Anngolaa , Mosammbik ) , ittataa hono Manndelaa jibinaaka tawo e duunde he , e winndere ndee fof nii .
Hay so tawii caggal duɗal janngoowo oo so artii galle , so o saggii jinnaaɓe walla hoɗdiiɓe makko , so tawii ko jannguɓe pulaar , so o saggii ina mbaawi saggitde mo , ɗuum yonaani .
Hay so tawii en njettaaki ɗoon tawo , ngonka Muritani ina faayni .
Hay so tawii goommu kumpital ANAIR ( Nokku kalfinaaɗo gartirgol mooliiɓe ) hollii lemseende mawnde , ittaataa yimɓe fof ina kawri wonde artuɓe ɓe nattii toppitoreede no toppitiranoo adan nii .
Hay so tawii hina ɓadii yimɓe ne , tawata ko hina famɗi kosɗe , maa dille keewɗe walla mawɗe .
Hay so tawii ina sonnga kulle goɗɗe ne , heewaani no feewi , ko maa ñoolee tan nde hucca ɗum he ɗuum .
Hay so tawii ko golle makko tammbii njoɓdi makko , ittataa wonaa mo woni kala nuunɗi e nder golle mum , laaɓi heen reedu .
Hay so tawii laamu Muritani jaɓiino PSIR , ina wayino golle ɗee mbaɗaa ko e suuɗaare ; ko ɗum tagi artunooɓe heen ɓee njaɓɓaaka , tee joɗɗinaaka .
Hay so tawii noon , tolno katanɗe men to bannge leydi ndemateendi famɗaani : wertaango leydi ndemateendi tolniima e 530 000 hektaar tawi heen 135 000 ha koko waawi ilneede kono alaa ko huutoraa heen so wonaa 34% .
Hay so tawii noon Amerik waawii warde Ben Laaden caggal ɗuum , ñalnde 2 mee 2011 , Amerik yaltaani leydi ndii , konu mum jooɗi toon ngam , e wiyde maɓɓe , heblude konu leydi ndii , konu ngu nganndu-ɗaa , ɗo yahanoo artaa fof , talibaa en ndiddii ɗum law , haa dogi woppi leydi ndi alaa deenoowo .
Hay so tawii noon eɗen nganndi won mo ɗum hoomtata e nder leyɗeele Afrik ɗe , teeŋti noon e hoɗɓe beccal hirnaange ɓe .
Hay so tawii noon eɗen nganndi wonde geɗe goɗɗe ina caaboo kareeli e fitinaaji , tawi alaa ko nguleeki woni heen , ko wayi no tolno jaŋde e pinal , ustagol ngeña , sababuuji politik e faggudu e renndo e leƴƴi e diineeji .
Hay so tawii o wonaa ceerno dartoriiɗo jannginde , ko o cakkitinteeɗo , e no o wiyri , o haalanii yimɓe ko deeƴata e hakkillaaji mumen .
Hay so tawii sariya hiisi nokkuuji hurum ko e jeyi laamu keeriiɗo njeyaa , ittataa hoɗɓe e sawndooji nokkuuji ɗii ina njogii konngol e jiilgol majji .
Hay so tawii tsunami ina yaawi koyngal , ñay onndo mu mina mawni no feewi , haa ko laaɗe gonɗe nder geec keewaani nii tinde mo .
Hay so tawii ɓe ndañaani gollorɗe ɗee kala , wall balle fof , Ekipu mo Bopp fiyii fiyannde .
Hay so tawii ɗum ɗoon kam wonaa goonga , dille masiŋ e nder " gaabi leyla " o e dow hoɗorde ( 5e bloc ) ina nanetenoo to woɗɗi .
Hay so yimɓe ɓee mbiyii njiɗaa kabaruuji mum en caree , ɗuum haɗataa ɓe sarde ɗi e juloraade ɗi .
Hay so ɗum wonaa ko teyaa , ena laaɓi ndeke mi jeyaaka e woyooɓe tan bojji dimari , walla mi jooɗoo hitaande haa dartoo mo wuuri nde mi fuɗɗoo siiftorde-mo !
Hay so ɗuum noddi ko miijooji laaɓtuɗi , darnde tiiɗnde , e jawdi njonndi , hay so ɗuum weeɓaani ina jaadii , ina waɗoo .
Hay telefoŋ maa werlo !
Hay tergal gootal he fedde OLAN , e tee won heen keewɗe baawnooɗe kam en ne wejde baɗe mumen ɗe njaasaani ɓure , tawtaani ɓe he ngal boowal lutndingal ndimaagu kan e semteende .
Hay terɗe jaltuɗe ɗee yoga e mum en wonaa lohre ittunoo ɗum en , kono ko sabu mum en yaltude wuro Nuwaasoot ngoo .
Hay to bannge ndiftungu walla caayngal jombaajo , kaw walla potle nodduɗe keewal yimɓe , ko ɗeeɗoo pelle keewi gollodaade .
Hay woytortonooɓe waɗi ɗum en yuɓɓinde wooteeji ko mbele ina kormoo doosɗe leydi mum en , njuɓɓinii wooteeji " kersiniiɗi " tawde wonii ko ɓuri heewde e ɓesngu hee nootitaaki heen ( Mali e Gine ) , mbar nii ɗiin wooteeji ina ndagii ?
Hay yulnde maa mi luɓoyoo .
Hay ñaantal Bookar Aamadu Bah , gardiiɗo jaaynde wiyeteende Fooyre Ɓamtaare , waɗaani e yeeso makko .
Hay ñaawoowo ina waawi , e fawaade e feere mum kañum e hoore mum , umminde haala kaa .
Hay ɗuum ne , wiyaama nokkuuji keewɗi ,
Hay ɗuum ne haaɗata tan ko e waɗde ngemmbe walla haddaare , ko ɗum tagi ɗum wonti aada Inndo en heddaade ɓalli ɓoli so wonaa kaddule .
Hay ɗuum ne ɗeɓaani , sibu ko he nder duuɓi 35 !
Haysinno
Haysinno Kawtal nde sosanoo to leyɗeele Arabeeɓe too ene renndinatnoo Fulɓe leyɗeele keewɗe ne , nde fedde ndee dooltinoyi to Farayse elle ko Fulɓe Senegaalnaaɓe e Muritaninaaɓe ( Fuuta Tooro e Fuladu ) tan keerorii ɗum .
Haysinno Mamma fiji heen ko rol tokooso ne , golle makko gonii maantiɗe kadi kollirɗe fijo naɓoka ko huunde fesaande makko nde o jibdina .
Haysinno o anndaani hol mo ngol ummii e mum walla hol to ngol ummortoo mo .
Hayso Malinaaɓe cuwaa anndude ko heewi tawo he jeewo maɓɓe o ne , hakkillaaji maɓɓe ene kawri e wonde jeewo maɓɓe oo ko lobbo labaaɗo .
Hayso deftere makko yettaki en ne , Qur’aan ene habra en podooje ɗe Allah fodannoo mo .
Hayso en ndaɓɓiɗiniima he ɗiiɗoo yeruuji seeɗa , ma en paam darnde ngawlaagu he renndooji Afriknaaɓe haa teeŋti noon he Fulɓe Fuuta Tooro , kono kadi ma en tesko ngawlaagu diwii tan hinnde , kono ko kanum woni calɗi mahanteeri renndooji Afrik e pinal mum , hono no Jibriil Tamsiir siforii darnde Balla Fasake he nder renndo Manndeŋ ni .
Hayso he nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe eɓe njiɗi kadi e ɓe pasnii neeniwal maɓɓe ne , kala nde ɓe kaaldi e woɗɓe ɓee ɓeen njalat ɓe kadi njaggiraɓe no ŋakkuɓe ɓe timmaani ni .
Hayso ko jamma gooto , maa yimɓe yahrooɓe koyɗe ɓee ne , ndañ deeƴre he kalluuji ɗi , tawa alaa ñiddeende , diiraali e yah-ngartaa werlaaji .
Hayso limoode maɓɓe anndaaka no foti .
Hayso oon tigi ñaantiima ene anndaa tan ko o
Hayso pine ŋellitiiɗe jibinooje ɓamtaare e ƴellitaare ngoka aadee he fannuuji keewɗi ene faggitee he nder teeru ne , pine bonɗe borjinooje kadi ene newii ko faggittee he nder teeru .
Hayso tawii Kumanco Jeynaba Jallo ko pullo mo fulɓe aduna ɓee fof paarnorto ne , so tawii fulɓe ndentii o teddinaama heen ma Fuuta Jalonnaaɓe mbelto heen kadi tina heen koye mum en .
Hayso tawii Malinaaɓe nganndaa no moƴƴi hooreejo mum en keso o e hol ko ɓe mbaawi ɗaminaade e laamu makko ne ko ɓurno wonde gunndo ( bettere ) wonande ɓiyɓe Malinaaɓe e aduna oo kala ko yiyde jooma-suudu makko Lala Jallo .
Hayso tawii ene tuuma wonnde won mooftuɓe haajoni defte e ballifanɗe ɓooyɗe he nder diiwan he ene calii yaltin’de sabu hulde ko heɓnooɓe e tuma nde Farayse honi leydi ndi .
Hayso tawii enen kam en njiɗaa yiyrude ɗum noon , nde tawno yimɓe pelle pinal , dawrugol , sanɗaaɓe Fulɓe walla jaayndiyankooɓe yahɓe toon ɓee kala ko heɓtinaaɓe he ɓooyde dukde e haɓaade he ko wayni .
Hayso tawii he nder
Hayso tawii ko Nana Asma’u ɓuri lollude he nder maɓɓe ne , woɗɓe ko wayno Maryam e Faatimatu , yanti e suddiiɓe galle oo ɓe , ko wayno Aysatu ( A’isha ) e Hawwa’u , ko anndiranooɓe won’de wallifiyankooɓe kadi e joganoode konngol he ko yowitii he dawrugol leydi ndi .
Hayso tawii won ko o waɗi ne e ɓe njiɗnoo ko ɓuri , kadi eɓe ɗamininoo e makko ko ɓuri ɗum .
Hayso tawii ɗuum hannde nattii ne , oon martaba nana ɗoon heddii .
Hayso wona fof jogori waɗeede nii , eɗen nganndi , waasataa heen kam ko waɗaa .
Hayso wonaa ubboowel-ceenel , woɗɗaani sibu ko almaami e gardeyon seeɗa Ɓaleeɓe njuuli mo .
Hayso ɗiin ciimti pawaaki e ƴiye Qur’aan walla sewndeeji laaɓɗi , pawii tan ko e ciimti jom diineeji defte en gaadanteeji ne , dalilaaji keewɗi ene ngoodi ɗi ene cemmbina goodaangal Suudu Allah Hurmanteeru ndu gila e yontaaji keccuɗi teskuya aade .
Hayso ɗo adanɗoo Fulɓe Fuuta Jalon nootinooma he mayre ne , ɗo waɗtan ɗoo nde wonti tan ko fedde Fuuta Toorankooɓe ( Senegaal e Muritani ) .
Hayso ɗo fuɗɗoode ɗoo joom mum en dentii ne , so yahii haa ɓooyi woodat heen rostiiɓe njaha ngoppa ɗoon heddiiɓe ɓee , heddo fedde ndee wonta fedde fulɓe iwruɓe leydi ngootiri walla diiwaan gooto ( Senegaalnaaɓe e Muritaninaaɓe walla Ginenaaɓe e Sierra Leonnaaɓe ) .
Haŋkadi Maali foti ko naatnude ga'i ɗiɗi mbele tacca !
Haŋkadi ilam artii maayo , gooto kala ena bata laamu ngarngu nguu ngam ɗaɓɓude e maggu teddungal .
Haŋkadi mi luliima e diŋiral sabu mi waawaa luuteede ɗee kawre kuɓɓuɗe !
Haŋkadi ndu wonata tan ko e
Haŋkadi nguurndam makko fof , o yiɗi tan ko naalaŋkaagal .
Haŋkadi omo ɗaminii so o jotondirii e Isra'el , maa laamu makko ɓeydo hisde .
Haŋkadi yimɓe ɓe caakii .
Haŋki , kala ɗo jaaltaaɓe mappinnoo gubbol walla artunoo awo , yeeyataano liɗɗi mum so wonaa nde hoɗdiiɓe ngittanaa geɗe mumen haa timmi to bannge cakkudi .
Haŋki , yoga e dipiteeji e senaateer en , wiyaama ena njahdi e kuudetaa oo .
Haŋki , ɓe mbaɗi huunde kala mbele eɓe kawa Benee .
Haŋki e mawɓe men so fowru dillii tan heɓe nganndi , nduu maa bonnu hannde .
Haŋki jamma ( Njeslaare ) , laamɗo lomtiiɗo-mo gila lewru Colte 2010 hono Goodluck Jonathan renndinii jaagorɗe mum kala ngam heblude wirwirnde makko fodaande ñalnde Naasaande 6 .
Haɓaade wasre fawaande e rewɓe , cowagol baawnengol , cowagol ngol yiɗaaka , baɗe jooɗtoriɗe renndoyankooje e pinalyankooje kam jogagol bonngol .
Haɓatnooɓe ɓe ko kanko tan mbaawnoo heɗanaade .
Haɓdiiɓe maɓɓe saliiɓe kalifaandi calii lelnude petelaaji , potndi heen nguurndam e maayde , ɓaarorii rewo e hirnaange rewo , hono worgo Maruk , nder leydi mbiyeteendi hannde RASD ( Saharaa ) .
Haɓeteeɓe tampii , dahaaɓe keewii e kasooji Front Polisario .
Haɓtaare Mosammbik ena leefi no feewi , haŋkadi Nijeriyaa fellitii warde haala ko leelaani .
Haɗaani dey eɗen ɗo , en potaani hay e ngabbon ceenal , kono eɗen kaɓa , eɗen cippira eɗen mbaɗa ko moƴƴi , eɗen ɓura waɗde ko boni .
Haɗaani dey eɗen ɗoo , en potaani hay e ngabbon ceenal , kono eɗen kaɓa , eɗen cippira , eɗen mbaɗa ko moƴƴi , eɗen ɓura waɗde ko boni .
Haɗaani kamɓe kala ɓe ngari e galle hee ngam wallude .
Haɗaani laamdo Nooro wi'ide ɓesngu mum yo wad ko moƴƴi .
Haɗaani noon denɗiraaɓe maɓɓe tooñii ɓe .
Haɗaano noon e min njeewtidatnoo e min kaaldatno min nduuñta luure amen e caɗeele dawrugol ɗee , tawa fayndaare mum wonno tan ko ngam jam ene duumo piɗtaali mbasaa bonde .
Haɗata ndu
Haɗataa noon daaroowo ina waawi ɓeydude ko heewi he daarol mum haa wela heɗaade .
Haɗataa noon ɓe ngollinee golle ɓurtuɗe mbaawka maɓɓe , roondeede doŋle tedduɗe kadi kala no gollinoowo oo weliraa ko noon gollinirta ɓe haajaaka ƴeewde semmbe cukalel ko hattani e ko hattanaani ngati wonaa ɓiyum mo jibini e reedu mum .
Haɗi ɗum joofde ko caɗeele coomiiɗe heen ɗee , sibu maggol fuɗɗorireede no feewaani , jokkireede no feewaani .
He
He .
He 1745 Gottfried Sellius , ganndo dowluɗo jeyanooɗo he Royal Society , ɗaɓɓiri saatiyanke ( editeure ) Parinaajo ene wiyee André Le Breton , mbele ene fira Cyclopaedia he farayse .
He 1833 taw Gaawoo he Tumbuktu fof naattii he laamu Fulɓe Maasina ( l’Empire Peul du Macina ) .
He 1961 nde sukaaɓe janngooɓe ɓee mbaɗi seppooji ngam hollirde mettere mum en he Seyku Tuure , laamɗo canndallo o soki duɗal ngal he hujjiniraade wonnde dillere sukaaɓe ɓee ndee saabii ɗum ko maalde jannginooɓe ɓe .
He 1971 kadi nanngaa he dumunna daɓɓo o woppitaa .
He 1979 laamu felliti jarribaade ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof , sosi Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ( DƊNG ) ngam toppitaade golle ɗee : ɓetooji baɗanooɗi kollitii wonde ndeen jaŋde ine moƴƴi , ine waawi huuɓtodineede .
He 1982 Kawtal Janngooɓe Pulaar\Fulfulde sosaa he mooɓondiral jooɗinoongal to wuro Bordeaux he nder leydi Farayse .
He 1990 , Abuubakri Dem , hooreejo kiiɗɗo fedde ɓamtoore Pulaar Senegal , firi deftere makko L’Aventure ambiguë he Pulaar , suɓaniinde tiitoonde " Inta Aanniinde " .
He 1991 ko armeninaaɓe jeyaaɓe e Haut-Karabak ƴettunoo fetel ngam yaltude njiimaandi Aserbayijaan , hannde ko Aseri en ( Azerbayijaannaaɓe ) njiɗi heɓtude leyɗe baasaaɗe ɗee .
He 2009 o yahi farayse o jokkoyi toon jaŋde toownde to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Cergy-Pontoise , he nder leydi frayse ɗo o janngi haa o heɓi doktaraa makko .
He 2020 , nde waɗii fotde 6 500 maayɗo .
He 2024 kadi maa oropnaaɓe lottu ɓeeynirka mum en Hera ngam sunnaade Dimorfos e hitaande 2026 .
He Batu Ngaawe ( Sommet de la Terre ) njooɗinoongu to Rio , gaa-gaa COP paatuɗo he baylagol ngonka weeyo , Nanondire ɗiɗi goɗɗe ƴettaama toon , heen gootal yowitii ko he " keewal guurɗiwal " , goɗngal ngal ko kaɓgol he laygol moraande ( lutte contre la désertification ) .
He Muritani , ko o gooto ballifiiɗo defte jahduɗe he fannuuji keewɗi to coñce , pefi e jime e mogooji e tinndi e daari Pelle winndiyankooɓe Afirik teskiima ɗuum .
He arwannde ɓe eɓɓunoo tan ko winndude tummbte sappo , kono nde golle ɗee timmi tawi deftere ndee woni 28 tumbitere .
He ballifanɗe makko omo jaŋtoo heen ko yowitii he daartol , e toɓɓe goɗɗe ko wayno waajuuji , jeertinooje , wasiyaaji ɗiggere ( piete ) , e jaarooje .
He biyɗe Séraphine Angoula , hooreejo kadi cosɗo Sanaga Films , puɗɗuɗo miijo ngol ɗoo koolol ( Dakar séries ) : " Ngal ɗoo gollorgal ( industrie ) nana hebla fanniyankooɓe heewɓe , kadi aɗa yiya ñalnde kala yimɓe jooma’en ñeeñal ene peeña heen .
He biyɗe makko : addimo Tuubaa ko juuraade mawɗo laawol Murid en ɓee e ñaagaade duwaa e addude ballal makko fayde he yimɓe wuro ngoo hatojinɓe he ballal , teeŋti to bannge safaara .
He ciimtol winndereyeewol ngam rewindo eɓɓande " Nehdi ko joojannde mo woni kala " , ( education pour tous ) ngol UNESCO yaltini he 2005 , ene teeŋtina wonnde ɗemngal ngal leydi ( renndo ) suɓii ngam waɗde jannginirngal , e dawrugol mum ɗemɗiyankeewol he nder jannginirɗe ene jogii rewam mawɗam he moƴƴugol jaŋnde ndee e jahrugol mayre yeeso .
He cukaaku makko o seedinooma heen Jihaadi Fulɓe ( 804-808 ) e golwole mum en he nder leydi Hawsa , jeyɗe sabaabu darogl laamu Juulɓe Sokoto he gardagol baaba makko , Seyku Usmaan Ɓiy Foodiyo .
He daaɗe ɓoggooɓe jaaɓe e murotooɗe e eede e kelle e meeñelle .
He daaɗe ɗoofoyooɓe laalo .
He darorɗe 2018 , jolo wooto feeñii , ine tonngiroo " deestondiral " .
He darorɗe 2020 pelle ɗee pelliti teeŋtinde darnde cargol ngol , ɗe lelni feere , ɗe cosi goomuuji potɗi waɗde golle ɗee : jokkondiral he hoohooɓe laamu , e hoohooɓe leƴƴi ɗii , e pelle politik , e fiilaaɓe ( depiteeji ) , e pelle renndo siwil , e jooɗaniiɓe leyɗe mum he Nuwaasoot , e hoohooɓe renndo ( seernaaɓe , ) , e jaaynooɓe
He darorɗe kitaale 90 , nde " Dental Sowiet " fusi ndee e nde denndanndi Turkiiji ɗi Asia keɓi jeytaare mum en , abajada Turk pawiiɗo he " Latin " ɓadtiiɗo abajada leydi Turkiya hawranooma .
He darorɗe lewru Jolal , filñitiiɓe maaldondiri , njahɓani liɓde Abiy Ahmed .
He dawrugol noon , ene anndaa , so a yiɗii faggitaade yimɓe alaa e sago wooda ko puuntirɗaa ɗum en .
He dow bismaango Jaagorgal Jaŋde ngenndi e mbayliigu Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde , Jokkorde pelle pinal pulaar , sooninke e wolof tawtoraama haa timmi joɗle diiwaaniyankooje e ngenndiije jowitiiɗe he diisnondiral paatungal he mbayliigu jaŋde .
He dow ɗuum , " feɗeendu " wiyatee to Fuuta Jaloŋ e to Burkina ko " honndu " , to pulfule fuɗnaange ko " hoondu " ( ɗum ko he ceerundal baymaanaagal ) .
He duuɓi ɓennuɗi ɗi ( 2008 ) , ko Farayse faabii Debi nde seɓɓitiiɓe naati Njamena haa njettii jooɗorde hooreyaagal Caad ɗo Debi suuɗinoo .
He feebariyee 2014 Facebook soodti WhatsApp hedde 22 miliyaar dolaar ( hedde 8 050 miliyaar ugiyya ɓooyɗo oo ) .
He feebariyee 2021 , jaaynde The Guardian hiisiima 6 750 uujɗo gollotonooɓe , maayi heen tuggi 2010 faade ndeen , kono limoore laamu Katar holliti tan ko 37 maayɗo .
He gardagol Galojiina ( mawɗo nokku o to aada mo Waalo-Barak ) Samna Yomba Giile Mbooc e sete koninkooɓe , njahi nanngoyi Aali Yero ñalnde 7 feebariyee ( colte ) 1906 .
He haalannde nde laamu nguu yaltini , ene holla heen wonnde jahgol hooreejo leydi ndii , kanum e hoore mum , ngam jaɓɓoyaade Ginenaaɓe artuɓe ɓee ene hollira wonnde laamu nguu ene rewindii ngonka maɓɓe to Tunis gila nde tergal ɓurngal toowde he nder leydi Tunis liɓi konngol mum ngol nde .
He hare peerndam teskniiɓe .
He hitaande 1977 , o yahi guurte to ngenndi Misira ( Egypte ) , ko toon o tawnoo Ceerno Jiggo Tafsiiru , nde o gasni guurte makko , o arti he saare Bordoo ngenndi Faransi , ko he saare Bordoo , o fuɗɗii jaŋngude ɗemngal Pulaar , gila ndeen , o mbo tawaa he jagge daraniiɗe wuurnude pinal leñol Fulɓe e jaŋngude e jaŋngingol ɗemngal Pulaar .
He hitaande 2019 o tawtoraama wolde Otapuwana nder fuɗnaange Burkina , fotde lebbi jeeɗiɗi .
He hitaande 2021 fayi 2022 o darodiima e fedde ndee he jokkondire baɗdaaɗe e laamu walla baɗdaaɗe e hoohooɓe ngam sarde dallinannde pelle pinal ɗee , faatunde e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije kam e naattingol mum en he duɗe laamu .
He jaabowol makko laaɓndal Hammee Lih he nder yeewtere mum Ngalu ñalnde Hoorebiir 30 Bowte , 2023 , Aliw Sal wiy nde Hooreejo leydi Senegaal , wiy ƴamtaani daawal tataɓal , o diw haa dow o wiy " Alhamdulillah " .
He jeese yimɓe fof , Aali seeki ɓataake oo , o wiyi so won ko Chesse waawi yo anndu ko hare dooki hakkunde maɓɓe .
He kawgel paangel , he 2026 , juɓɓinoyteengel to Dental Dowlaaji Amerik , Kanada e Meksik , 48 kippu tawtortee .
He kitaale 1977-1978 , ko ndee nnganndotir-ɗen , cosdu-ɗen peŋgal Liksaar FƁPM nga ɗowɗo-ɗaa .
He kitaale sooño o ɗannii feewde Kaasamaasa nder Senegaal , o naatoyi haa Gine Bisaawo , he oon tuuma Gine Bisaawo e Kap weer ina ngoni he wolde jeytaare , ina kaɓa e Purtogees en .
He ko ɓuri heewde , baylugol yuɓɓo kelmeendi ko gollal ɗemɗiyankooɓe .
He ko ɓuri heewde , ko ɓe tuumaaɓe yiɗde " soodde seedeeji " , ndokkee ceede maa kulɓinee mbele ina mbaasa seedtaade ko njiyi .
He konngol makko kadi " ndesee jiɗniiɗo , jibinoowo , ngam ko mi baɗdeteeɗo ɓuraa heewde leñol ñalnde darnga " .
He konngol nulaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) o wiyi : " dewgal sellataa gaa gaa jinnaaɗo e seedeeji ɗiɗi nuunɗuɗi .
He kuccondiral makko e .
He kuɗol Frédérik Lewino
He lewbi jawtuɗi ɗii , eɗen nganndi , ko kanaal Piindi TV taƴooɓe ɓee njannoo kadi celni ɗum laawol .
He lewru Suwee 1933 , o yuɓɓini batu ngam sosde peŋgal sanɗaaji Afirik Hirnaange wonɓe Paris .
He lewru desaambar 2020 , lappol Chang’e 5 woni gadanol caggal kitaale 1970 , artirde kaaƴe Lewru he Leydi .
He lewru desaambar nduu , 94 neɗɗo kalkiima toon he ƴiiwoole bonɗe .
He lewru ut 2008 , ko 71 000 soldaat jananiŋke ngonnoo toon ; he hitaande 2009 , ɓe njettiima 113 000 , he ut 2013 87 207 , he 15 saawiyee 2014 ko ɓe 58 129 fat .
He lewru yarkomaa 2020 konu Aserbayijaan yurƴi no feewi he nder Armeni , haa luural ngal wonti luural adunankeewal .
He lewru ɓennundu nduu , Riisi huutorinooma misil baaɗo noon ine wiyee Kinjal , ngam bonnude faawru njogitaaje nder leydi to hirnaange Ikren .
He leydi Senegaal , hono no ko heewi e leyɗeele meeɗnooɗe kaaɗeeki njiimaandi tuubakiri , haa jooni njanngata ko e ɗemɗe koɗe , wonaa e ɗemɗe mumen neeniije .
He mbeñdi , Fuɗnaange Afrik ,
He mbeñdi leyɗeele joom en pine ƴellitiiɗe ɗee , Afriknaaɓe kanum en mbaawaa miijanaade koye mum , daliilu mum ko Afriknaaɓe meeɗaani anndude binndol ; ɓe ngalaa coñce ; ɓe mbinndaani hayhuunde he daartol nguurndam maɓɓe saka noon ƴellitde ganndal naftowal aadee .
He nate neldaaɗe ɗee , aɗa yiya ɓeeynirka Siin ngadana juuraade he " tagofeere woɗeere ndee " ( Mbaañ ) ine larti barware naangeeje , hine tiindini antenaaji mum feewde e wiiwaano Mbaañ , ngam jokkondirde e Leydi e neldude ɗum nate ƴetti ɗee .
He ndaɓɓa , no Senegaalnaaɓe ɓee fof ni , Fuutankooɓe ne mbaɗtii laaɓndaae koye mum en , hol nafooree laamu nguu waawi jogaade he nguurndam mum en .
He ndee tonngoode njaltinen ko doggol tawtoranooɓe Batu Kuuɓtodinngu cosngu Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani .
He ndeen joɗnde o ɗaɓɓiri pelle ɗee yo kumpit ɓe ko faati he ngaal DƊNG : ko ɗuum woni ko pelle mbaɗi ɗoon e ɗoon , gila e nder dallinannde ndee , haa e binndaaɗe goɗɗe joganooɗe , paatuɗe e jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije he daawal 1979-1999 .
He ndeen ñalnde hay gooto maɓɓe yiyrataa hoore mum ko ɗoftoowo , ala sabu yiyii heen ko woowi ko , ko jogitorinoo wonnde ko ɗum woni pinal fulɓe ko , hayso tawii ma ɓeydo anndude wonnde wonɗo pinal fulɓe kadi feeñrata he mbaydi ngoɗndi .
He nder 100 kanndidaa kala , ko 8 fat keɓi heen , ko ñoggirtee nii 8% .
He nder 2019 kadi , konu Farayse " bommbii " seɓɓitiiɓe UFR ( " Union des Forces de Résistance " – Dental Doole Jattinaare- ) nde ɓe naati wuro ngoo .
He nder Ciloñ nokku ɓurnooɗo lollude ɗo ɗiin sarooji mbaɗatnoo wiyetee ko Cilingel-Jeere .
He nder Hiirnaange Afrik ne ɗemɗe
He nder Tumbuktu , kadi o wiy , ko kanko defterdu mum ɓurnoo famɗude defte , te kanko omo joginoo ko ɓuri ujunere e teemedde nay ( 1400 ) deftere he nder defterdu makko .
He nder Tumbuktu , kadi o wiy , ko kanko defterdu mum ɓurnoo famɗude defte , te kanko omo joginoo ko ɓuri ujunere e teemedde nay deftere he nder defterdu makko .
He nder almudɓe ( taalibaaɓe ) cappanɗe jeegomo , heen sappo dañɓe toɓɓe ɓurɗe toowde ɓee keɓii njeenaari ( mbuuña ) .
He nder bayyinaango maɓɓe , koninkooɓe MPSR kuniima maa " ngartir laamu ngu he juuɗe siwil’en nder mudda laaɓtuɗo mo juutaani , maa ɓe lelnu Tuugnorgal gartirowol doosɗe ngal yimɓe njaɓi " .
He nder deftere Jibril Tamsiir Ñaan nde , " Soundjata ou l’épopée mandingue " , ene lime heen ko ene wona sappo e jeegom gollal ( ko mbaawɗen noddirde hannde Meccal ) tawa fof ko e ngawlaagu jeyanoo .
He nder duuɓi cappanɗe nay , ko anndaa he ko o winndi ene wona cappanɗe jeegom wallifo , tawa ko ɓuri heen heewde winnda ko he ɗemngal makko neeniwal , Fulfulde , ko heddi koo ko he Arabeere e Hawsankoore .
He nder duɗe hakkundeeje ɗee , jannginooɓe hiisiwal e ɓalliwal e guurɗiwal heewɓe keblanoo ko he ɗemngal Arab , ko heen njanngintunoo , alaa e sago ɓe keblitee haa ɓe mbaawa jannginde he nder ɗemngal Farayse : kono heblito maɓɓe yahraani no fotnoo yahrude , waɗde moƴƴaani .
He nder fuuta Tooro , innde Wullum Seyku ene lollunoo no feewi he nder taƴooɓe .
He nder gollondiral maɓɓe o udditi duɗe ɗiɗi Pulaar he nder wuro maɓɓe Poolel Jaawɓe , kadi o waɗaa gardiiɗo jaaynde dental nde .
He nder heen , ngol rewii Gural Eeleega , ngam sosde ɗoon catal FƁPM .
He nder hiirde ndee maa yeeɓooɓe ɓe ndañ fartaŋŋe yeeɓde naɓaka ( film ) kaa tawa orkester o ene fija gaaci ( score/Soundtrack ) filma o ɗi ngannduɗaa yuɓɓinno ɗum en ko juɓɓinoowo gaaci ( musique compositeur ) Suwednaajo , Goransson Ludwig .
He nder hitaande 1918 , ko ina tolnoo he 683 innama-aadee ina nguurnoo nder " kantoŋ " hee .
He nder hojomaaji daɓɓi tawi ɓernde makko werliima hakkille makko laaɓndal , hol no Baaba Demmba waawi jibinirde o suka dewbo ceniiɗo ?
He nder jeewte men e makko e ngaan tuma , o wiyno en omo wallifii ko heewi he ɗemngal Pulaar , kadi o firii heen gannde tawo ko toowɗe dowrowe ko wayno Fisik ( physique ) e chimie .
He nder joɗnde hee kadi , haala mahngo boowal fedde ndee , haalaama Ko ɓuri heewde he cate nder leydi ɗee nootiima , neldii terɗe mum ɗiɗi : hooreejo ( maa lomto mum ) e tergal goɗngal .
He nder lewru Jolal ndu , ko ina ɓura yimɓe 36 000 mooloyiima Suudaan , ñalawma kala ko yimɓe 4 000 taƴtata keerol .
He nder ndee joɗnde wonaa Baaba woni jimoowo , alaa , ko kanko wonnoo jimeteeɗo .
He nder nehaande haala kuulal ngal , en kollitaama pelle ciforteeɗe pine ɗee , wonaa dow kaanhaanɗe fannu dartogol majje nder heen , maa nii fawaade e ɓeto golle maɓɓe ɓennude teddinteeɗe , kono ɗe eewnoraa heen ko hono no hujja huuɓnuka , dunndorteeka .
He nder ngarmi ngaraa he o fof sukaaɓe Senegaalnaaɓe ɓe , baddiiɗo mum en oo , hono Gamba , meeɗaani faaynude ɗum en .
He nder ngoon renndo ɗo ceernaajo wonaa tan jannginoowo defte e ganndal diine , juulnoowo jamaaji , anndina hol no Allah rewretee .
He nder nguun njiilawu ko ɗoon ñuuñu felɓondirta e neɗɗo .
He nder oon wuuku-waaka ko daaɗe ɗiɗi tan nanetenoo , maa wonii ko hillanooɓe Usmaan Sonko , ene takka laamu nguu maalde walla heedanɓe laamu nguu ene ndanndoo .
He nder renndo ngo woowaani huwtoraade binndol , hono no renndooji Afrik haanki ɗi nii , jime e beyti ko coñce newnatnooɗe sarde miijooji e tinndinooje ko yaawi kadi nawa ɗum en to woɗɗi tawa ko e dumunna daɓɓo .
He nder renndooji Senegammbi ko awluɓe ngonno dogatnooɓe he moƴƴere , ñifde fitinaaji e yiilaade jam hakkunde wolidiiɓe ( médiateur et intermédiaire ) ; ko kamɓe ngonno askinatnooɓe , suudu kala e ɓe nganndi iwdi mum asko mum , golwole e ñaam-golluje taaniraaɓe mum en .
He nder suɓngooji gadani ( primary walla primaire ) ɗii noon , he nder lannda kala , ƴamooɓe wonde ngemmbaaɓe lannda mum en ɓe ene keewa .
He nder wideyoo gooto ƴettaaɗo to duɗal Hamdallaay , gootal e leeɗe Wagadugu , sukaaɓe ɓee ene kollira weltaare mum en he ko ɓe njannginaa ko , kadi ene yiyee heen goɗɗo ene taroo " Hurumaaji Jeeɗiɗi Fulɓe " , ɗuum woni wiyude miɗen kunii tabitin’de ɗii hurumaaji jeeɗiɗi Fulɓe :
He nder wolde adunaare ɗimmere , Kirimee e tufnde mum , hono Sebastopol ndariima darnde teeŋtunde nder hare hakkunde Riisi e Almaañ .
He nder woldeeji ( golwole ) e ruggooji makko ɗi o waɗnoo he nder laamanteeri Baysantiin , o mooɓii toon defte keewɗe ummoraade he defterɗi mum en o artiri ɗum Baghdaad .
He nder yeewtere maɓɓe , magiyanke oo habri wonnde omo jogori tawtude Piindi TV ko ɓooyata , tawa o arata ko wonde ɗowoowo yeewtere " Njuddu Jeeri " , nde ɗowatnoo ɗum Ummu Jeng , ceertuɗo e Piindi ko ene wona jooni lebbi jonɗi .
He nder yoga e leyɗe , jannginooɓe e janngooɓe ko waawneteeɓe jannginirde e janngirde ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe kaalataa ( ɗe ngonaa ɗemɗe maɓɓe ) , tee ine anndaa wonde , he nder almuɓɓe sappo ( 10 ) fof , heen njeenayo ( 9 ) ( ɗuum woni ko ɓuri 90% ) ine mbaawi waasde dañde kattanɗe ɓurɗe famɗude katojinaaɗe ɗee , ko wayi no taro e hiisa lesleso , nder ekkolaaji dewɗi oon politik jannginirgol ɗemɗe koɗe wonande janngooɓe e jannginooɓe .
He nder ñaawetenooɓe ɓee , heen njeetato taƴanaa ko kitaale tati haa noogaas nder dummbirdu .
He nder ɓeeyno waɗanoongo e hitaande 2013 , ko 15% fat njaggiri koye mum en Ikrenaaɓe , tawi 40% njaggiri koye mum en ko Riisnaaɓe .
He nder ɗee balɗe tati jibnannde Fuuta fof arii tawtii Ciloñnaaɓe ngam mawninde pinal Fulɓe e Fuutankaagal .
He nder ɗii duuɓi noogaas jaayndiyaagal e wiɗtooji politik , alaa fof ɗo tawetee he binndol am , diidol gootol ɗo mantat-mi njiimaandi koloñaal ɓooyndi .
He nder ɗii duuɓi ɗiɗi ( 2 ) , njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ndii ine foti wallitoraade humpito Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije yuumtungo ngoo ngam moƴƴinde golle keblugol kuuɓtodingol jaŋde he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof .
He nder ɗiin wejooji ene feeña heen ciŋkal rewɓe Fuutankooɓe , gila e cuɗaaje mum en haa e leppi cañaaɗi e comci goobaaɗi tappaaɗi .
He nder ɗuum , farlinee e kala Muritaninaajo waawde ko famɗi fof ɗemɗe 2 ngenndiije , kam e jaŋde , ko famɗi fof , ɗemɗe 2 mawɗe , ngam cukalel waawa yahdude e aduna karallaagal e julyultondiral winndere ndee .
He nder ɗuum , laamu jokkondiraama , partiiji politik njokkondiraama , jooɗaniiɓe leyɗe mum en njokkondiraama , jaayɗe njokkondiraama , pelle gure njokkondiraama , hoohooɓe renndo ( ardiiɓe diine e yontaaɓe ) njokkondiraama E jokkondiral majje ñalnde 13/8/2021 , kalfinaaɗo jaŋde habrii ɗe maa bismo ɗe he ñalɗi diisnondiral jogirɗi yuɓɓineede ko neeɓaani .
He nder ɗuum , o wonii he Duɗal mum Toowngal he kitaale 1978-1980 , o wonii Hooreejo peŋgal Madinaaji he Nuwaasoot , kadi , ina famɗi he peŋɗe catal Nuwaasoot ɗo o jirwinaani jeewte .
He nder ɗuum o sosi , e hitaande 1986 walla 1987 ekkolaaji BAMA .
He ndiin mbaydi , ene teskaa ɗemɗe keewɗe ndowliino sabu pinal joom-mum en jaalaade he nder wertaango yaajgo haa njalti nehaande mum en , njettoyi diwanuuji goɗɗi goɗɗuɗi .
He ndiin ɗoon mbaydi Murtuɗo ene jeyaa e tafɓe pelle pulaaryankooje keewɗe gila he Muritani , Senegaal haa he leydi Farayse .
He ner interwiw mo Baaba Maal waɗnoo , ene haala heen wonnde , nde juɓɓinoowo gaaci ( music composer ) Suwednaajo oo wiyimo ene ara kadi addata ɗum ko yiɗd ɓeydoraade ganndal e janngude gaaci Afriknaaji , o wiy ɗum ko so ene yiɗi ɗuum yoo ar yahda e makko to mbunndi-mbunndi ɗiin gaaci ñeɗetee to .
He ngaan saanga , gaagaa wonde mo Pullo daande maayanke guurɗo ɗeen joljole , kono omo jeyanoo kadi e yarlitiiɓe golanatnooɓe HCR e Croix Rouge ngam wallude ɓeen taccinaaɓe .
He ngaan tuma , oo dewbo pullo , ɓiy laamiiɗo juulɓe , tawi kanum ko ganndo kuɓɓuɗo , ceernaajo jannginoowo rewɓe e worɓe kala , kadi winndiyanke ŋana .
He ngaan tuma mi heɓiino laaɓndaademo ko waɗi ɗeen defte fof hay wootere heen muulaaka ?
He ngelɗoo kawgel kadi , maa ñaawooɓe ɓee mbaaw wallitoraade ko wiyetee " ballitgol jiytugol oornde " ( détection semi-automatique du hors-jeu ) .
He ngol laawol ne kadi nde suudu diisnorndu doosɗe firti dekkere Makki Sal , o wiy ko Alhamdulillah .
He no ɓe mbiyiri kadi , hay batte eɓɓaande ndee teskaaki he njaltudi ñalɗi diisnondire jowitiiɗi he tippudi jaŋde , tonngunooɗi miijooji ŋarɗuɗi yimɓe teelɗuɓe haa e dallinannde pelle pine ɗee .
He oo jamaanu mo yimɓe fof ngoni e yiilaade geɗe adunayankeeje , ngonɗen ko waasde neɗɗaagal men , ngonɗen ko he ngonka kiris he ndiiɗoo leydi ( Senegaal ) .
He oon bannge noon , Fuutankooɓe ɓee ellee ene ɗeɓi yawande Makki Sal .
He oon sahaa dallinannde ndee sariima no feewi , haa teeŋti he nder laylayti enternet .
He oon tuma , gaagaa julɓe ( muslim en ) aduna ɓee kala ɓe ngannduɗaa ko Arabeere wonnoo ɗemngal mum en diinewal , kono hay leñɗi goɗɗi keewɗi , ko wayno Nasraanyankooɓe Oropnaaɓe walla Yahuudiyankooɓe e Hinndu en , ene kuwtortonoo ɗemngal Arab ngal ngam janngude gannde ɗe kaalɗen dow ɗe .
He oon tuma , laamu Mali wiyiino maa losko waɗe haa warhoreeɓe ɓee njiytee .
He oon tuma tawi ko o fuɗɗiima faggitaade karallaagal naɓoka ( cinéma ) e teknikaaji fijo mum .
He oon tuma tawi ko ɗemɗe Oropnaaje loownooɗe pine mawɗe ɗe , ko wayno Gerek e Latin , maaytii .
He oon tuma ɓe ndaraniima no ɗemngal Pulaar janngiraa , ɓe udditi duɗe he nder wertaango leydi Senegaal hee kala ; ɓe pinndini yimɓe e faamde nafoore janngude ɗemngal mum .
He rogere adannde kewu nguu , he pottitte goomuuji ɗii , jaggondire gadane ɗee puɗɗotoo ko he waktu 13 toon , woni waktu 10 ɗoo ( beetawe ) , jaggondire cakkitiiɗe ɗee puɗɗotoo toon ko he waktu 22 , woni waktu 19 ɗoo ( caggal futuro tan ) .
He sifaaji ɗiɗi ɗii fof , ɗemɗe potɗe ɓeydeede ɗee ko ɗemɗe binndaaɗe .
He sikke am , hono no musiɗɗo Saar wiyri nii , ko noon tan pot-ɗen yahrude .
He teemadannde 18ɓre innde ŋeeñal walla ŋeeñe ( les Arts ) ene nawori kala ko neɗɗo ene dilla ( golloo ) he mum .
He teemadannde sappo he joyeɗiɗiɓiire ( tm .
He teemedannde 12 ɓre taw ngo wontii saare teerirde julankooɓe , ɗo kaŋŋe , lamɗam , ñiiñe ñiibi e nguuraaji njeeyete no .
He teemedannde 14ɓre taw ngo jeytaama he Laamu Mali ( l’Empire du Mali ) , duuɓi seeɗe he garwanɗe teemedannde 15ɓre ngo woniino he les njiimaandi Tuwaareg en kono ɓooytaani , he 1468 ngo arti he juuɗe laamɓe Songgaay .
He tele noon , ɗuum fof soklaani , so a soodii tan , a huɓɓat , ngonaa e yeeɓde tawa hay huunde goɗɗum a aafaani heen .
He wallifannde nde UNESCO yaltini gila 1953 , ene teeŋtina faayiida nehde sukaaɓe he ɗemɗe mum neenewiije .
He warngo Sankara o joginoo ko galaŋ " lieutenant " , kanko wonnoo cukko Kompawore to duɗal peewnitagol " komanndooji " .
He wiyde Doktoor Umar Bah , wuro Waalata sosaa ko hedde teeminannde 6ɓiire .
He wiyde ICG , konu Tigere ina renndini ko ina tolnoo he koninkooɓe 250 000 , yanti he ballal Miliyoŋaaji 6 hoɗɓe he Tigere .
He wiyde maɓɓe , ko konu Ecopia jogii gure mawɗe ɗe , kono ko LFPT reeni dowri ndi , kadi ko e maɓɓe ɓesngu Tigere wondi .
He wolde Badri , nde juulɓe ɓee pooli heeferɓe Makka haa ndahi heen heewɓe , yoga e maɓɓe ko maa coodtii nde keɓti ndimaagu mum en , kono heen ɓe ngalaano ko coodtorii ɓe kala heen baawɗo taraade e winndud Nelaaɗo Allah ( Yoo Allah juul he mum hisna ɗum ) wiyi wonata coodtordi mum ko janngin’de ɓiyɓe juulɓe sappo taraade e winndude .
He yeeso jaayndiyankooɓe , o wiyi hoɗdiiɓe maɓɓe rewo ( woni Burkinaa ) , ciifondirii nanondiral e fedde konuyankooɓe heeriiɓe leydi Riisi , yoɓee-dawa en ( mercenaires ) .
He yeru mum laaɓɗo , daande makko rokkoonde kabaruuji goowaaɗi ɗii jiydaa e daande makko komikeeji ɓoli ɗii , ndeen kadi jiydaa e daande makko addoonde taggeeji ndee .
He yeruuji daɓɓi tan , so en paami , neɗɗo ko huunde toownde he nder nooneeje goodal .
He yiyannde ko ɓuri heewde e dawriyankooɓe ɓaleeɓe Muritani , ittude Farayse lomtina ɗoon ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee ko jamfa soomii heen .
He yiyannde yimɓe OLAN , muumde ɗee toɓɓe saloo laɓɓinde ɗum en ene tinndina , laamu nguu ene soomi jamfa e hodo .
He yonta Banu Umayya en kanum en ne mballi no feewi he ƴellitogol ganndal hadisaaji , tafsiir , fiqhu , daartol kanum e ɗemngal arab ( jime , nahwu e sarf ) .
He ñalngu 18 mbooy ( marsa ) 2021 , ñalndeen tan , fedde wiyeteende " Réseau international Justice pour Thomas Sankara " ( Geese Winndereere ngam Hakke Thomas Sankara ) , siftini Emanuel Macron fodoore huninoo nde o waɗata jeeyngal hooreleydiyaagal , hunaare maa o waɗ so o wonii hooreejo leydi Farayse so saaktude ɗereeji jowitiiɗi he warngo Sankara ndeen e jooni wonii duuɓi nay .
He ɗeen maale , eɗen mbaawi limtude
He ɗo baylo wayli mboɗeeri , simki suɗi .
He ɗo baylo wayli mboɗeeri simki suɗi .
Hebbiyaaɓe ; 5 .
Hebli rewɓe ɓee ko Aminata Umaar Bah , kebloowo to Duɗal Keblorgal karallaagal ( Centre de Formation Professionnelle ) .
Heblo he nder oo ngaddiin keso feewaani , kadi jannginooɓe heewɓe ndañaani hebleede boom .
Heblo ngoo noon fuɗɗorii ko e ñaawooɓe ɓee ( qaadiiji ) .
Heblo ngoo tuugnii ko e toɓɓe ɗiɗi mawɗe : karallaagal njangiin sukaaɓe tokosɓe e nafoore idaade jannginde cukalel e ɗemngal mum neeniwal .
Heblo ngoo waɗi ko he nder ñiiɓirde Fedde ARDM .
Heblo ngoo waɗi ko to ñiiɓirde fedde nde wonaa laamuyankoore wiyeteende E A F T ( Heblude Jannginde Debbo Gooboowo ) .
Heblo ngoo yowitii ko e janngude ñootol .
Heblo ngoo yowitii ko he jojjanɗe rewɓe .
Heblo ngoo ɓuri toɗɗaade ko sukaaɓe rewɓe , roondiiɓe mbayliigu .
Heblo ñootol e nder balɗe joyi ina famɗi no feewi , kono ko meeɗnel tan , heddii ko kamɓe heblaaɓe ɓe ɓe njokka golle so tawii ɓe ngartii e gure ɗee .
Heblooji goɗɗi kadi njuɓɓinaa to duɗal dowrowal keblowal terɗe jiilooje golle laamu e ñaawooɓe .
Heblude fentoyooɓe , yiilotooɓe , ñawndooɓe caɗeele , miijantooɓe koye mum en golle mum en , ngolaanoo koye mum en , tawa kadi ko geɗe naftooje renndo .
Hedde 1475 , Purtugeec en coodatnoo jiyaaɓe ko e sorfundu ( golf ) Beneŋ .
Hedde 1550 , Konngo wonti nokku njulaagu jiyaaɓe ɓurɗo mawnude , kono , nde tawnoo ko Purtugeec en coklunoo heen koo ina heewi no feewi , ɗoon ɗoon laamɗo oo ronki huuɓnande ɓe oon sokla .
Hedde 1553 , dowla goɗɗo keso Afrikanaajo naati e njiyaagu hee , hono laamaandi nganndiraandi Ode Itsekiri to Forcados ( sara laamu Beneŋ .
Hedde 1830 , o sosi dental rewɓe jannginooɓe ngal o inniri " Jajis " , Ko rewɓe ɓe o heblata kanko e hoore makko , o janngina ɗum en haa o okka ɗum en seedanfaagu .
Hedde 23 H jamma tawi Joolaa sawndiima powle diƴƴe leydi Gammbi ( cotes ) e ko ina abboo 170 km Worgo Ndakaaru e nder maayo haaɗngo finnungo .
Hedde lebbi men tati naange fuɗa toon tawa mutaani .
Hedde miliyaaruuji ɗiɗi neɗɗo ine kuutoroo hannde WhatsApp .
Hedde waktuuji 8 e hojomaaji 15 piyanɗe ndartii tawi kure ngasii
Heddi ko ngannden kaɓdiiɗo men .
Heddii Saarel ine dumoo ko gasataa , aandi e feere mum .
Heddii Siidi wul Muhammed Faal e Ahmed wul Muhammed Faal ( Ahmed wul Deyd ) ina ndaara adaade Alla e balɗe makko .
Heddii hankadi , ko heewi e yimɓe tuubɓe e ɓiɗtaaɓe e laamuuji Fuuta mbaɗti tiimtaade e Fuuta haa addani won e mum en eggude , koɗtoyi Fuuta .
Heddii hannde ko hol nde maayde Bonngo jogori teeŋtinireede toon to Gaboo .
Heddii hannde ko kulol mawngol naatii e ɓerɗe hoohowɓe winndere ndee sabu ñawu nguu ena waawi wontude pandemire ( pandémie ) , woni aduna oo kala leydi walla diiwaan mo memaaka .
Heddii kay ko mbar nanondiral ina waawi dañeede hakkunde luulndo e partiiji laamu ko yowitii e woote .
Heddii ko e oon yonta ɓennuɗo , geɗe keewɗe ina mbaawi kewde yimɓe tinaani .
Heddii ko faati e laabi potɗi reweede , tawa janngo e jam so tawii ñaawoore ine heen , tawa en ngaanataa .
Heddii ko feere wiyaande wonde joom mum en ina mbaawi darnude koppe , ndennda leydi ndii , mbaasa feccitaade ɗum , mbar ɗum feeñninoytaa ɓurondiral e kake goɗɗe dogetenooɗe ɗee ?
Heddii ko geɗe ɗiɗi : luutndaare ndee jaɓa sippirde e makko to senngo kartal , walla etoo liɓirde-mo doole .
Heddii ko hol ko nanngirtee " leyɗeele diiwtuɗe " , tawde eɗen nganndi wonde gila e kitaale 70 yooro bonngo ina yillii en haa ko ilam ustiima no feewi walla nii nattii woodde , ilam gese waalo ina saɗti , pooɗe kam kaalaaka .
Heddii ko hol to ɗum joofoyta ?
Heddii ko jaaynde ndee ina sokli wallitooɓe , gila he jom ngaluuji haa he janngooɓe haa e yeeynooɓe .
Heddii ko jokkude e duñcude e wifde Fooyre men mbele ande jokka e yaynanaade en bolol men .
Heddii ko kala
Heddii ko laamu nguu faama , wonde hay so tawii ko ngu yiɗi waɗde koo ko nafoore yimɓe ɓee , alaa e sago ngu diisnondira e maɓɓe tawo , ngu faamnina ɓe ko yehetee , haa ɓe paama , kamɓe e koye maɓɓe ɓe njooɗodoo e yiɗɓe gollaade leyɗe ɗee , ɓe kaalda , ɓe paamondira , mbele ɓe mbaawa hisnude nafooje maɓɓe .
Heddii ko maa ɓeeynirka kaa jokku golle goɗɗe ka fotnoo waɗde ɗee , ɗoo e duuɓi ɗiɗi : roɓindaade kabaruuji paatuɗi e yerɓo leydi ( yerɓo mbaañiri ) toon , walla kadi paatuɗi e ɓernde Mbaañ .
Heddii ko moni kala ngemmbo cuusal e caasal , daroo ɗo foti daraade ngam njoolten jojjanɗe men .
Heddii ko toɓɓere laawɗingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof , haalaande he ñalɗi ɗii , kono nde feeñaani e tonngol hee .
Heddii ko waɗde eeraango feewde e leñol ngol .
Heddii ko yimɓe ɓee nguuri tan ko e meedinaade he miijooji mawɓe e annduɓe ɓennuɓe ko aldaa e hiñde walla ƴeewndaade .
Heddii noodi ɗii na ŋaaɓa kuɗe tan ina leha sabu heege muusnge .
Heddii noon , ene wiyee " moƴƴuru alaa e baaɗi , so wonaa ndu bonnaani gese " .
Heddii noon , ko heen sahaaji , mboɗo sikka yimɓe ɓee paamaani ɗum .
Heddii noon , ko ina sikkaa wonaa sabu Alla ɓolo tan Google waɗiri ɗum , sibu maa dañoy heen ngartam .
Heddii noon , ko waɗaa ko , heɗum fof e famɗude fawaade e ko naamni-ɗen ko , siko laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije , eɗen poti nanngude heen , njokken naamnaade nde ɗemɗe ɗee naattintee e tippudi nehdi njaŋde wondude e gollorɗe laamu .
Heddii noon ko kellifuya
Heddii noon ko masiŋ , ko ƴoƴi ƴoƴi koo fof , waawaa waɗtude tinde mbelemma walla mettere , walla yurmaade ekn .
Heddii noon ko mbele maa ɓe mbaaw waylude mbaadi ɓe lolliniri ndii , so wonde hiiɗooɓe , haa teeŋti hiiɗooɓe rewɓe .
Heddii noon ko ɗe keeroraaki oon jey .
Heddii tan ko emin ngumbiloo , emin mbuɓɓoo .
Heddii tan ko haa annduɓe ɓee njokka golle
Heddii tan ko ndi liggee ( gollee ) , ndi yuɓɓinee , loowdi jimɗi ɗi alɗinee maa waylee haa yahda e yonta hannde o .
Heddii tawo ko alaa ɗo keeri ndarii hakkunde maɓɓe e dowlaaji keddiiɗi ɗii , ɓe ngalaa tawo kaalis baawɗo weccaade e jogaade hattan waɗande yimɓe maɓɓe kaayitaaji maandinirɗi .
Heddiima ko Arabeere tan wonti ɗemngal lawakeewal leydi Muritani , hayso wonii ɗemɗe keddiiɗe ɗee ɓeydaama he doosɗe leydi ndi ndokkaama martaba ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Heddiinde ndee ko yeewtere banndi men debbo Jeewo Sal , waɗoore aljumaa fof , wiyeteende " Ndee Ladde " , e nde yoɓee walla nde yoɓetaake .
Heddiiɓe ɓe njaaɓani debbo ceemeedo jeeyoowo kafe tuuba oo .
Heddiiɓe ɓee ( Tawaasul , APP e Sawab " Biram " ) yantondirde e yoga e partiiji laamu walla ƴaañɓe laamu nguu , ngonani ko wonooɓe he goomu nguu poti wonde ko hoolaaɓe partiiji ɗii .
Heddiiɓe ɓee mbii " ko hay so wonaa dowla ne , fuɗɗiima jogaade mbaadi mum , ko e laawol woni " , daliilu maɓɓe heen ko tawde wonii eɓe njogii leydi , eɓe compi larme , eɓe ƴetta kubbe ( lempoo ) , eɓe njogii polis , ñaawirɗe ekn heddanii ɓe tan ko heɓtineede e renndo adunankeewo ngoo , ɓe njaɓa sariyaaji mum .
Heddiiɓe ɓee ne , comaani hay naatde .
Heddinoo ko Maseduwaan , jeytii hoore mum e 1991 .
Heddinoo tan ko wottaade e fooftaade e fawtude won e farillaaji .
Heddoo kollondiral e pompondiral dalillaaji haa wooda heen baawtiiɗi keddiiɗi ɗi .
Heddoo noon , ene waɗi kadi ɓurɓe seɓɓitaade yeru : Le Pen .
Heddotoo ko won arooɓe kuwtoroo fuunti e hodo , woɗɓe , ko wayno Mu’awiyya en , ngari kuwtorii doole , neegre e ceddaagal , kono alaa e maɓɓe mo gollanaaki siynude ndeen fayndaare .
Heddotoo noon ko ɗoo jooni , won ganndo gooto , ko o ganndaaɗo kanko ne , o wiyi : ko waawi wonde heen fof , so yiɗii wona aawdi , so yiɗii sahaa e sahaa o tagtee o wonta goɗɗum , faayiida e leñol ɗo o woni ɗo , ko ɗoon ƴeewatee .
Hedii ko yontaaɓe ɓee ena ngarda gooto gooto ngam haaldude e dental ngal , ngam wowlude huunde seeɗa e pulaar sabu ena jeyaa e ko waɗɗii fooɗantooɓe raayi ɓee waawde haalde ɗemngal men , waawde wowlude e maggal miijooji nefooji , jiyanɗe moƴƴe toɗɗiiɗe ngonka renndo fulɓe e nder winndere .
Hee !
Hee ngaan saanga kooniŋkooɓe Farayse duppii ko heewi e defte e ballifanɗe ɗe njiitunoo toon .
Heedde 16w15h , yimɓe cooynii nduudi dimaaɗi baaraaɗi ena mbaarnii ena payti e dingiral jaɓɓungal ngal ngam habrude jettagol jaagorɗe garɗe hurmbitde duɗal ngal .
Heedi heeda kam feeñii e tabitingol ooɗoo sariya , sabu o siynaa tan ko daande maayo , nokkuuji keddiiɗi ɗii kam tinaani mo no feewi .
Heedi ndi bannge rewo ko " mer du nord " ( maayo rewo ) e leydi Danemark e " mer baltique " , bannge fuɗnaange mayri heedi toon ko Poloñ e Rippoobilik Cekoslowaki , heedi ndi bannge worgo ko Otris e Siwis , bannge hirnaange ko Farayse e Luksaambuur e Belsik e Pays-Bas .
Heege amen muusnge ngee , min mbaawaa ɗaldude ma nii tan aɗa yahra noon .

Heege e ɗomka nanngiɓe , bojji sukayel ngel jibinanimo faayre , sunaare e ngaanumma .
Heege ina tampini ɓeen mooliiɓe .
Heege koko dooki ɗumen .

Heen bannge ko seernaaɓe .
Heen daawal kala ine ɗaɓɓi gannde keewɗe , ceeɓɗe moolanaaɗe .
Heen duuɓi sappo o laamii tan ko Boosoya , ko heddi e laamu makko koo ko Boosoya e Ngenaar fof tawi nanondiral waɗii hakkunde ɗii diiwanuuji ɗiɗi .
Heen e koode ciirtatooɗe ko jamɗe , goɗɗe ɗee ko kaaƴe .
Heen e lebbi mayre njiytaa ko e kitaale 2002 e 2003 .
Heen e majje , Alla e mum en mawnude , Alla e mum en ɓurde nannge men ngee mawnude , so yerondiraama e naange men ngee , wayata ko takkude gabbel ceenal e sara kaaƴe Fuuta Jaloŋ walla yerondirde ngel e Haayre Ngaal walla yerondirde gel e Kaaƴal Kameruun ngal .
Heen e majje , alla e mumen mawnude , Alla e mumen ɓurde nannge men nge mawnude , so yerondiraama e naange men nge , wayata ko takkude gabbel ceenal e sara kaaƴe Fuuta Jaloŋ walla yerondirde ngel e Haayre Ngaal walla yerondirde gel e Kaaƴal Kameruun ngal .
Heen e majje ko mawɗe , maa ɓur kaaƴe ɗe njiyaten ena tullinii e leyɗeele men ɗee , ma ɓur " suudu fowru " to Jowol , ma ɓur haayre Asaba to Muritani walla haayre Ngaal to Senegaal , walla ɓura haayre Kameruun , heen kadi ena njaasa ɗe mawnude .
Heen e majje ko mawɗe , ngasataa sumde haa njana e leydi .
Heen e majje ɓuri laaɓtude beɗi , goɗɗe ɗe beɗi mum en ena niɓɓiɗi ena saɗti yiyde .
Heen e maɓɓe heednooɓe bannge Faas Gunaas , wuro sara Kuppentum e nder senegaal , ngo Ceerno Mawɗo siiñti hedde 1967 , waɗi ɗoon almuudo mum ɓiyum Ceerno Mawɗo , ganndo Ceerno Ahmadu Tijjaani Faas , yo o jooɗo ɗoon janngina .
Heen e tagopeeje ena ɓuri leydi mawnude no feewi , goɗɗe ɗe , ɓuri ɓuri ndi famɗude .
Heen ena mbaawi felɓondirde e leydi ( bone waɗa !
Heen ena takkii e naange ko nanndi e tagofeere Meerkiir , ko naandi e tagofeere hoodere jaayre ( wenus ) , heen ena ngoɗɗi naange ko nanndi e tagofeere Pulutoon ) .
Heen gootiri ko ɓaleeri keddiindi ndii ko mboɗeeri , Jibriil anndini Aadama no remirta , o addani Aadama nokkannde gemha , o janngini ɗum no aawirta ɗum , o aawi ɗum .
Heen gootol ɓe ngari kadi ɓe ndufi taabel makko , ɓe nikñi njeeygu makko haa boni .
Heen joy ko diiñiiɗe ndirtataa , ɗeen ngoni Siin ( Chine ) Farayse , Dental Sowiyatik ( Jooni ko Risi ) , Laamanteeri Ndentundi ( Royaum Uni ) Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik , sappo keddiiɗe ɗee ko taƴanteeɗe happu so gasii ko lomteteeɗe .
Heen konngol wiyi ko " neɗɗo ene waawi ittude junngo mum e junngo gaño mum tawa bikkitaaki " .
Heen lebbi 4 ndardotoo ko bannge fuɗnaange .
Heen loggi tati , ko gorko mo Cempeŋ Mammadu Baydi Ñaŋ yowi ɗumen e nder gacculi Konngonaaɓe .
Heen ngaandiire wootere wonnoo ko e nder gollordu mawɗo nokku oo .
Heen njeegomo ko e njuɓɓudi ɗanniyaŋkooɓe , ngoni ko ladde , keedti e roɓanaade min ngaluuji , njeeɗiɗo heddiiɓe ɓee ngoni wonanɓe min to wuro too , kuufi golle mahdi ndii , ndoganta min e laamu mbele safrirde ndee ina heptinee e gardagol sarɗiyaŋke Bah Siley Aali , joom-wuro wuro ngoo , Kolonel Umaar Abdullaay , Muusaa Abdullaay gonɗo to Jaagorde Sato ( taariindi ) , kalfinaaɗo ngalu amen Aali Aamadu , Abuu Sammba Yero e safrooɓe ɗiɗo Abuu Hammadi Buubu e Daawda Aamadu .
Heen nokku kala ina foti waɗde ɗo otooji ngaarata " nder leydi " .

Heen o woni haa hitaande 1999 , nde duɗal ngal fusaa ndee .
Heen sahaaji , mahngo ngenndi ine waawi jotondirde e ɓamtugol ɗemngal leñol gootol dow ɗemɗe leƴƴi keddiiɗi ɗii .
Heen sahaaji aɗa fotta e almuudo ina yeeya suukara walla comci , ina waɗta ɗum kaalis sabu tawa o suusa nawande ceerno oo ɗeen geɗe ; woni heen e maɓɓe , so ndañaani ko nawani ceerno kulat hotde to mum , keewi ko dogde majja .
Heen sahaaji batte ɗeen puccitte ine mbaawi yettaade Leydi men ndii , kawjina caaktugol onndooji rajo-yiiteeji ( ko anndiraa ƴiiwoole sulɗaande ) .
Heen sahaaji boom ɓe tonndira ɗum en , ɓe mbiskita golle mum en e pewje mum en dawrugol .
Heen sahaaji diɗɗe ɗiɗi ene pottita he dow bolol gootol heen diɗɗal fof saloo selande heddiiɓe ɓee haa wonta hareeji .
Heen sahaaji ina waawi
Heen sahaaji ko joom-mum en waasde haalaneede Pulaar he nder galleeji mum en , waasde fijudude e Haalpulaar’en , walla waasde naweede to diiwe Fulɓe ɗo jibnaaɓe mum ngiwi too , ko wayno Fuuta , Fuladu , Ɓunndu , walla Ferlo , haa ɗemɗe mum en ngoosa he Pulaar .
Heen sahaaji mbeɗon kon ine ndosoo , ƴiyon kon memondira , keeci joomum waɗta muusde .
Heen sahaaji nih ɗum yonataa , reftata heen ko sankaare joom mum .
Heen sahaaji nii , ko kulle ɗe cuwaa hay yiyteede , majjata ko adii nde nganndaten ɗum en .
Heen sahaaji noon , e nder yoga e leyɗeele , Lanndaaji luulnde keewi luulndaade ko neɗɗo gardiiɗo oo , wonaa golle mum .
Heen sahaaji paawngal dennge gardungal e tuƴƴam ina waawi
Heen sahaaji ɗiin fitinaaji ene ngona parwuɗi , haa jibina dufondiral ƴiiƴameeje , warngooji e dummbere dartiyankooɓe ɓaleeɓe , hono no 86 e 89 ni .
Heen tergal fof o tagani ɗum debbo e gorko , o waɗi en leƴƴi e kinɗe , haa gooto fof heɓa e goɗɗo oo ko alaano to mum .
Heen toɓɓere yowitii ko e geɗe baawɗe siforeede " no ustude huunde he wertaango Ndenndaandi " ndii , sibu wiyaama goomu nguu heɓii ko ina seedtoo wonde gardinooɗo leydi ndii ƴettiino feere rokkude laamɗo leydi Katar duunde wiyeteende Tiidra .
Heen wooturu darortoo ko bannge Fuɗnaange .
Heen yuɓɓo kala won ko heerorii , ciiri guurooji he mum , no gollortoo , no siforii ekn .
Heen ɓeeynirɗe ɗiɗi , ka Emiraat leyɗe Aarabeeɓe inniraaka " Yaakaare " e ka Siin ( Tianwen-1 ) ngidii yettaade , nana taartoo Mbaañ , tataɓa kaa , hono " Perseverance " juuriima toon ñalnde 18 feebariyee 2021 .

Heewde e famɗude fof , firti ko alaa no fotataa .

Heewi nii ko won ɓe ñawu nguu heɓtotoo , cella e

Heewii ɗo ACB sahtii seernaaɓe mawɓe he ɗemngal Farayse , gila e tuubakooɓe haa e woɗɓe , haa teeŋti e taatinooɓe e piɓle ndimaagu e potal walla ngootaagu .
Heewii ɗoo e Ndakaaru nawaaɓe polis tawa ina mbaɗti wuijjude walla simmaade simme ɗaaynoowo walla soomde tekkere ina ɓuucoo tawa ko e asid suubaa .
Heewiino
Heewɓe ceeraani e fooɗtude hakkillaaji e caɗeele won ɗeen dente renndo , ko nanndi e hardaneeɓe , nguuri , walla paltoor leƴƴi ɓaleeji paltetee e laamu hee Ko hono ɗuum jaaynoowo gooto ine wiyee Ahmed Jiddu Aali , binndunooɗo " Enen fof ko en arani en " , yaltinde winndannde woɗnde tiitoriinde " Doole Konu Ngenndi : mumtogol ngol woni ko e laawol " .
Heewɓe e jooɗiiɓe ena ndaara mo ɓee , njimri makko won ko siftinta ɗumen .
Heewɓe e maayɓe ɓee , ko cuurki faɗɗi ɗum en , kisa jaynge tawa ɗum en ɗoon , cumoro kisa .
Heewɓe e maɓɓe ngoni e
Heewɓe e maɓɓe paamataano hay huunde he ɗiin waajuuji saka boom taraade ko woni he defte maɓɓe dine alaa ko haali filosofii walla gannde hakkilleyankeeje .
Heewɓe e ɓee wonnooɓe ɗoo njehii caggal leydi ɗaɓoyde golle .
Heewɓe e ɓeen ina njeddondira mbele ASB foti siforeede ko jaayndiyanke walla daartiyanke walla ko coñciyanke tan ?
Heewɓe etinooma rewde e laabi makko ɗii kono caggi ko e hakkunde yolnde , laatii ngabbii-keɓaani , ngarti-tawtaani .
Heewɓe ina kaawaa ɗum , sibu ko ɓe takkaa koo fof , alaa heen ko laatii e koye maɓɓe .
Heewɓe ina kuli hoto en peewnude masiŋaaji ɓurɗi
Heewɓe ina mbiya ko ndeen darnde faytunde e ñaawgol warkoyeeɓe addani wul Waagef taƴondirde e militeer en ɓe , wagginnooɓe mo Siidi .
Heewɓe ina nganndi jaaynde ndee ina alɗi to kabaruuji ɗii .
Heewɓe kadi e rewindiiɓe ƴellitaare mago he ɗemngal Pulaar , ene taƴnii wonnde Le Fils du Khalif , addii kesem-hesaagu e jaɓɓal kesal he nder mago Pulaar .
Heewɓe kadi ina nganndunoo Wullum no feewi , kono cuusaano haalde walla tawa omo moƴƴunoo e mum en .
Heewɓe kadi mbaɗii wiɗtooji walla mballifii defte he makko .
Heewɓe kollii , addi ngoo miijo ko juumre .
Heewɓe mballitii ɓe , gila e nder leydi hee haa e boowal mayri , kono gartirgol maɓɓe ngol ronkaama yo joof haa hannde , sabu kittugol gagga oo , kono , e ko ɓuri teeŋtude , sabu darɗe ceertuɗe laamuuji Muritani .
Heewɓe mbiyi , alaa !
Heewɓe mbiyino o ari ko dogde e masaalahaa kono nde o yettii Dakaar o wiyi addi-mo mo rewindaade woote ɗee hay so tawii ena wona o waɗda heen masaalahaa sabu weeyo ngoo no wayi nih .
Heewɓe ngetinooma rewde e laabi makko ɗii kono caggi ko e hakkunde yolnde , laatii ngabbii-keɓaani , ngarti-tawtaani .
Heewɓe ngonii ɓeen golliiɓe ko tiiɗi wonande kisnugol ɗemɗe ɗee tawa meeɗaani naatde maa dillude e ɗee pelle .
Heewɓe ngullii ɗum ko ɓooyi , kono ma a taw , ko jooni pin-ɗen !
Heewɓe njaggiri mo ko no njogitaari nikleyeer ɓurndi doolnude hannde .
Heewɓe nootitii e eeraango ngoo , gila e hilifaaɓe aada haa e seɓɓe koliyaaɓe wonnooɓe jagge satigeeɓe to bannge harbiyaŋkaagal .
Heewɓe ƴettii konngi ko adii nde nde yimɓe ɓee paatata to les tillisaaji too .

Heɗoɗen mo .
Heɗto mi etee tesko-ɗaa ko kaalantu-maa-mi koo .
Hiintotooɓe njuurnitiima tawi hay so woodi ɗo nafi ne ko lorlata ko ɓuri heewde .
Hiirde Baaba Maal e nder Le Havre diwii ko ɗaminanoo sabu ɓe piyi gaaci sanne !
Hiirde heewnde ngartam , gila e ganndal e ɓeto almudɓe catal ngal , haa e pinal leñol fulɓe , e tawtoreede keewal ɓesngu leñol ngol .
Hiirde ndee , so Alla welii , jirwii , amaama , wullaama , foɓɓaama !
Hiirde ndee fusi ko caggal nde awluɓe men e sukaaɓe ɓee naatti diŋiral ena ngaddi ñaaƴo yombayɓe , dewle cosaan .
Hiirde ndee fuɗɗii ko waktuuji sappo e ɗiɗi jamma , gasi ko waktuuji joyi subaka .
Hiirde ndee gasii haa laaɓi , heddii ko baynondiral e jokkondiral , calmondiral e maɓɓondiral .
Hiirde ndee gasirii aayaare kono nde ayodaaki e kuuɓal .
Hiirde ndee waɗii fayiida no feewi , sukaaɓe Fonndunaaɓe kollirii ko yooɗi , cosaan , ɓornateeri e ciŋkal men hanki e nder gaaci belɗi .
Hiirde ndee waɗii ngartam , yimɓe fof mbeltiima .
Hiirde ndee wortoraa ko rippoo
Hiisayel baɗangel ɗo ngel , ko fuunti , mbele yimɓe ena mbaawa faamde hol ko woni hitaande , hol ko woni ñalawma .
Hiisiwal ina joganaa njeenaari keeriindi , tolnondirndi e njeenaari Nobel , mbiyeteendi " Galaŋ Fields " gila hitaande 1936 .
Hiisortee leyɗeele " diiwtuɗe " , ko leyɗeele ɗe meeɗaa golleede walla so meeɗii golleede ne , alaa batte jiytiniiɗe kollitooje ɗuum .
Hijjoyde so ina hattani .
Hikka Fooyre feccii ko 107 000 MRO ( ko waawaa yaltinde jaaynde hay laawol gootol ) .
Hikka Kawtal ena jogori yuɓɓinde yontere pinal jogorngal waɗde faayiida to Mantu-Laa-Jolii , leydi Farayse .
Hikka kadi , hay
Hikka kadi , rewɓe ɓe worɓe mum en mbaranoo kam e baayeeɓe e koreeji mum en ciftinii ɗuum winndere ndee mbele ñaawoore ine yuɓɓinee .
Hikka kadi , ɗum ŋakkataa sabu ɓe cosii goomu toppitooɗo yuɓɓo ngoo .
Hikka kadi Fooyre ine tonngana on no njeenaaje ɗee ciforii .
Hikka kadi o arii welnude jammaaji ɗii hono no o woowi waɗde ni .
Hikka kadi yantii heen , e gardagol Kaliifa Muhammadu Mansuur Sih , e Ceerno Basiiru Taal , galle taalɓe fof ina teddinira juulɓe ameriknaaɓe jamma mawningol ganndo Allah , giɗo Allah ngenndiyanke mo innde mum ɓeydaa maantoore Funtaŋke , oon woni Sayku Umaar'AL Fuutiyu Taal .
Hikka kippu Maruk ɓenninii Afrik haa feccere joofirde , huunde nde meeɗaano waɗde .
Hikka laamu nguu yiɗi arditaade dillere ndee , etii aditaade ɓe , so dummbude yaakoraaɓe ko kam en ngardii dillere ndee , ñalnde 27 jolol ndee , kono nde weeti ñande 28 jolal ɗum haɗaani sukaaɓe e rewɓe waɗdude polɓugu he mbeddaaji baabaaɓe haa poliseeji naatti he ndertuddule mum en .
Hikka noon , en mbaɗtii yaltinde tigille ɗee e jaaynde men Fooyre Ɓamtaare , jooɗiinde no Nuwaaksoot , leydi Muritani .
Hikka noon , wuro worgankeewo ɓeydaama heen .
Hikka noon caggal nde pelle daraniiɗe ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof ɗaɓɓiti heblaneede jaayndiyankooɓe mumen , ndewni heen ko ñagaade yo ɓeen mbaɗtu jeyeede e ngel kawgel , mbele kanum en ne ɓeta mbaawka mumen .
Hikka noon e baawɗe Alla , ɗeeɗoo gese maaro ndañii caɗeele , heewɓe mboniraama .
Hikka noon hawri ko he haala mbayliigu Tippudi nehdi e jaŋde .
Hikka noon ko to Neema .
Hikka noon senngo toppitiingo coftal kam e pinal udditii damal Kawgel yimiyankaagal kam e tinndinooje ( njalniika ) .
Hikka noon ɓe ɓuri heewde e ko ɓe njaɓɓinoo e ɗii duuɓi ɓennuɗi .
Hikka o timminta duuɓi jeegom .
Hikka say sinno ɓe " mbaasi " ko foti no fettooɓe njeenayo , sukaaɓe rewɓe , Bopp ustaaki e doole mum .
Hikka welii , yoo mo wuuri ɓur .

Hina heewi wonde rewru ɓurndu duuɓi .
Hina mbaawi feƴtitde ( feccitde ) , wuro kono alaa koɗi mbonnat , e oon sahaa .
Hina muusa am -mi , so ko wonnoo joyi , so wontii gootel , walla ko wonnoo ɗiɗi wontii gootel .
Hina teskaa kala ɗo pobbi koɗi , hina heewi so a ɓadiima ɗoon tan njiyaa maale mum .
Hina teskaa mbaroodi heewi sonngirde ko jamma .
Hina teskaa ndee hare ko ngordi seto , walla gore seto tan keewi haɓeede nde .
Hina teskaa so foolaama , yaltinaama seto , heewi ko maayde .
Hina waawi tawaa ɓurii ɗoon .
Hinaa heewi juhde .
Hinaa heewi so laawii dartoo kadii abbitoo haa naata e majji kadii daroo heɗoo .
Hinaa jeyaa e jikkuuji deppuru , huuñɗude , e wonde borjoŋo , e waasde hellifeede .
Hinaa teskaa so deppi njaltii hinaa ŋuuña .
Hinaa teskaa so nayi oorii jamma , bamɗi hinaa keewi yahdude e nayi ɗi .
Hinaa teskoo dille mum .

Hitaande aroore nde kam min ɗaminaaki yahde ekkol , sabu laamu ngu ko wiynoo fof fof waɗaani " .
Hitaande caggal ɗuum o woppiri ngo ɓiyiiko biyeteeɗo Aamadu Taal , o tiindii Hamdallaay , laamorgo laamlaamu fulɓe Maasina .
Hitaande e dow Leydi ndi nguurɗen e dow mum ndi ko balɗe 365 walla ena wona 366 .
Hitaande fof , moritaninaaɓe e wallidiiɓe mum en , ene mbaɗa feere haa aduna o waasa yejjitde ko waɗaa ko .
Hitaande fof eɓe nganniyii hokkude njeenaari , winndiyankooɓe walla yimiyankooɓe ɓe wallifooji mum en muula he hitaande yawtude nde .

Hitaande kala Pelle pinal ngenndiije , hono FƁPM e AMPLCS e APROLAWO , ine mawnina kañum enne ñalawma oo no winndere ndee kala mawninirta mo nii , ngam semmbinnde kuutoragol ɗemɗe ngenndiije nder ekkol , semmbinde keewal ɗemɗe e pine , e tiiɗtinde ngootaagu ngenndi .

Holi no kabaaru bayyinirtee .

Hooreejo feeñinii weltaare mum sabu gargol yimɓe ɓee ko aldaa e lorla , kadi o siftinii kadi wonde-mo naŋtiiɗo e miijooji jokkere enɗam hakkunde Afriknaaɓe ( panafricanism ) , dente e ballondiral hakkunde leñɗi Afriknaaɓe , foti ko ɓaleeɓe walla raneeɓe .
Hooreejo jaagorɗe Burkina Appollinaire Kyelem mo Tembela , yahii Mosku njillu he ndee Altinaare 5 desaambar 2022 .
Hooreejo kiɗɗo on anndinii faale makko wullitagol e nduu firtirdu ñaawooje
Hooreejo leydi Senegaal , hono Makki Sal , yahii haa toon ngam yiyrude gite mum ko kewi koo e duwanaade jaayaaɓe ɓee .
Hooreejo leydi ndii noon hollitii wonde maa waɗ ko huninoo e wooteeji ɓennuɗi ɗii ko , maa siynu ɗum .
Hooreejo leydi oo noon , he nder diskuur mum , saytoraani ɗuum .
Hooreejo leydi oo noon , he nder diskuur mum , siftori tan ko weltaare ndee , saytoraani nii muusalla rewɓe ɓe worɓe mum en mbaraa ɓee kam e baayeeɓe ɓee , ngondi oo .
Hooreejo maɓɓe oo , Jeynaba Jallo wi'iiɓe wonde ɓe eggat palaas o haa Sappoor pompiyee'en mbecca ndiyam ɗam .
Hooreejo tirbinaal falnde ndee ina foti siifde , jela , kala heen hello e karnal hee .
Hooreeɓe pelle ɗee teeŋtiniino ɗum he jokkondiral e jaagorgal leydi ndii , ɓe ɗaɓɓiri mo cosgol goomu karalleewu ngam toppitoo sakkande daawal cabborgal ngal peeje .
Hooreeɓe teddungal ɓee ndarodiima e ardorde fedde ndee nder Goomu dallinannde ngam waɗde jokkondire keewɗe nafoore , gila e jokkondiral e hoohooɓe laamu , hoohooɓe diine e hoohooɓe politik .
Hoosnooɓe e binndol Pulaar , ɓurnooɓe softande golle ɗee , ina kalji e golle goɗɗe , teeŋtuɗe kam enne .
Hooyi !
Horeejo masoŋeeɓe ɓee holliri plaŋ galle oo .

Huray kadi ma en ngartu e mum ko ɓooyaani so Alla jaɓii
Huray noon so wonii naalaŋke wonaa nguyka sabu o tawi ko ena jooɗii ɗo galle Daawuuda Sammba Jeey ɗoo .

Hurmbiti dingiral ngal e oon fannu ko Jalluɗi Jam , njaatigi jamma oo .
Hurmbiti ndee haayre ko Muhammed wul Suweydaat Jaagorgal Pinal e Cofta Ɓalli e Jokkondiral e Suudu Sarɗi ñalnde 19 mars , saanga Koolol Jowol .
Huufi golle ɗee ko jooɗaniiɗo fedde FONADH e diiwaan Gorgol .
Huunde e amen nootitiima heen , kono tan won ɓe njaɓaani ɗum .
Huunde e amen wiyi " alaa , won fuunti soomii heen " .
Huunde e amen wiyi ko " won ko dañaa , nanngen , pooɗano-ɗen goɗɗum " .
Huunde e dalillaaji dokkanooɗi ko wiyde wonde " heewɓe ceediima e asamaan , hojomaaji seeɗa ko adii yerɓannde leydi ndi , baylagol goobu duule kaawningol e weeyo Sisuwan " : ina wiyee wonde waɗata noon koonndooji yiite-sulɗaande ( ondes électromagnétiques ) jahdooji e jarribo ngo .
Huunde e jaabawuuji
Huunde e jiyaaɓe ɓee coggeteno faade Elmina , ɗo Afrikanaaɓe woɗɓe coodtirtunoo ɓe kaŋŋe .
Huunde e majje ngontoyi laamuuji cemmbolinɗi , ko wayi no Bonny , New Calabar , Warri , Bell Town , e Akwa Town to Kamaruun ; tee leyɗe mawɗe julaaje kadi peeñi , ko nanndi e Old Calabar e Brass .
Huunde e maɓɓe kadi iwdi
Huunde e pelle renndo nootiima noddaango ngoo , ko wayi " TPMN " , " dillere 25 feebariyee " , IRA-Mauritanie , REVE e COVIRE .
Huunde e terɗe ina mbaawi jokkude gollineede kono ko nattooje gollaade so ceŋtaama e ko gollintunoo ɗum en koo .
Huunde e ɗeen kuuje ine natoo , ko wayi no tagopeeje yuɓɓo naange , kono huunde e majje mbaawaa nateede .
Huunde faaynude winndere ndee kala , sibu naatgol kaalis e hare hee , alaa ɗo batte mum tinetaake e winndere hee .
Huunde fof ko hade tawo tan wiyetee , Ɗiin rafiiji njettaaki Fonndu tawo .
Huunde fof ko mi jamirɗo hoyre am !
Huunde fof waɗaande , woodat gardiiɗo tan kono firtaani gardiiɗo walla puɗuɗo oo jeyi , kamɓe be juɓin tan kono juulɓe fof ndendi .
Huunde fotnde jeertineede , sibu hay gooto anndaa ɗo baɗte mum kaaɗoyta .
Huunde haawnde hay hooreejo CENI e hoore mum , kollitɗo mettere e ko woote ɗee mbaɗtaa to Arafaat .
Huunde haawniinde , sibu , e ko aadoraa , so a woɗɗitiima sewnde nguleeki , nguleeki kii foti ko ustaade , kono to Naange , aɗa ɓeydoo woɗɗitaade tan , ina ɓeydoo wulde !
Huunde haawniinde , sibu ko ɓuri heewde e Aseri en ( Aserbayijaan en ) ko juulɓe shii’iyankooɓe .
Huunde haawniinde sibu hooreejo leydi oo meeɗaa seerde e wiyde wonde " keesuuji buur ina mbiyi tef kaalis !
Huunde haawniinde teskaama : to Koddiwaar e to Sawuud , gaa gaa kaayitaaji parlinaaɗi e Muritaninaaɓe fof ɗii , ( kaayit binnditagol 1998 woni Ranvec e kaayitaaji binnditagol jiknaaɓe , walla seedewol sankaare ) , ɓeydataa heen tan ko kaayit ceedtotooɗo ko a muritaninaajo , mbinndite-ɗaa To Farayse noon , alaa e sago ngaddaa kartal koɗaagu ngal laamu Farayse rokkata tumarankooɓe .
Huunde heen fof ena jogii ardinaaɓe ɗum e sahaa mum nde foti yuɓɓineede .
Huunde hulɓiniinde , faaynoore .
Huunde meeɗnoonde waɗde , yeru , e hitaande 1908 nde haayre tolndirnde e mayre saayi e asamaan Siberi ( Riisi ) e nokku mo hoɗaaka .
Huunde nde Muritaninaaɓe kumpitii hakkunde 1979 e 1999 nde Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ( DƊNG ) sosanoo , ɗemɗe ɗee njarribaa , jaŋde mum en hoolkisaa , ɓetaa , tawaa ine foti kuuɓtodineede he duɗe laamu ɗee fof .
Huunde ndee arti deeƴi .
Huunde ndee ena jirwi haa wonb e mawɓe seeɗa ndoŋki deeƴde , ngoni e rippude !
Huunde ndee kala deeƴti , co’anɗe koɗiiɗe mi ɗee ellee ko mi gonɗo he dewal alla luggiɗngal , walla keɗotonooɗo waaju diine .
Huunde ndee waɗi
Huunde ndee weli , jirwi haa won e rewɓe sulbalɓe maɓɓii e ndiyam , teyaani .
Huunde saɗtunde sanne , sibu aɗa waawi limde miliyoŋ reedu , tawa ko heen wooturu tan wayi nii .
Huunde ummiinde to joomiraaɗo noon foti tan ko jaɓeede ko aldaa e naamnaade [ hol ] sabaabu ?
Huunde waawata yande tan ko tawa huunde nde woni ko e dow tagofeere , dow Leydi , dow Lewru walla dow hoodere .
Huunde wontaa sorno ɗoo , tawa mi yiyaani ɗum !
Huunde wonude hannde sabu jiiɓoldu e yanugol faggudu leyɗeele .
Huunde ɗaɓɓunde kuutoragol peeje juumtuɗe , mbele hay gooto ina waasa yejjiteede , tawa ko e nder nuunɗal , tawa kala feere ƴettaande ina dagoo , peeje e wasiyaaji cakkitaaɗi kala ine teskee .
Huurngo faddorgo naange ngoo , njaajeendi mum ko 12 meeteer , njuuteendi mum ko 22 meeteer ( hakkundol daarorgal Hubble ko 2 , 5 m fat wonnoo !
Huutorii ngaluuji men .
Huutoroo hakkille , ɓitta ɓernde mum .
Huuɓnude fodoore potal , ko waawde tabitinde potal hakkeeji e fartaŋŋeeji , ko waɗde feere mbele ko yimɓe ɓe ceerti ko ina waasa jaggireede no geɗel ceerndowel , kono no ngalu nii , tawa kadi yimɓe fof ina njiytoo e ɗeeɗoo ɓure dowla tuugiiɗo e diine , so kormondiral e ɓiyngu yummaagu e nuunɗal .
Huɓeere am ndiyam naatii heen , ƴiiwoonde ndee nde ari jamma ndee , ndiyam ɗam naati , wonaa bakane , wonaa maaro , kaake amen fof mbonii , haa min ɗeɓi yoolaade , min njaltinaa mbiɗo wondi e ɓiyam boofo gila jamma min payi bannge goɗɗo , cuuɗi ɗii fof kelii " .
Huɓeere ɓurnde mawnude e Nuwaasoot , mahaande ɗo bolokaaji boɗeeji ( A ) ngonnoo ɗoo , ina hucciti e Afarco ndee , nde Muhammed wul Abdel Asiis , hooreejo leydi ndii hurmbitii ñalnde 28 noowammbar 2017 ndee , ndeen huɓeere toownde mbiy-ɗen , ina waɗi gebbi baŋ-yoo-baŋ .
Huɗo koo e kaɓɓi ɗii cumi haa ndoyti , kanko Hammee o yalti , o warñaani .
Hydre Homme

I am a student at the University of Nouakchott .
I am now in the United States of America to do INTENSIVE Courses for two months at the University of Delaware .

Idi Dembele
Idii heɓde njeenaari ndii laabi ɗiɗi ko faraysenaajo-poloñnaajo Marie Curie ( ɓalliwal 1903 , wayliwal 1911 ) , rewi heen ko ameriknaajo Linus Pauling ( wayliwal 1954 e jam 1962 ) , ameriknaajo John Bardeen ( ɓalliwal 1956 e 1972 ) kam e Biritannaajo Frederick Sanger ( wayliwal 1958 e 1980 ) .
Idiris Debi noon jeyaa ko e leñol Zagwa en .
Idorii ko Muritani , leydi ndi meeɗaa heen seertude .
Idorii ko wonde uddo ( Fort ) , caggal ɗum koɗorɗe mahaa .
Idotoo ƴeeweede so ine woodnoo ko ɓarakke ndiyam , caggal ɗuum molekule ( mooɓte ) kullon ñillon , mbaɗkon karbon ( hay sinno wonaa karbon fof woni maale nguurndam ) .
