Ina
Ina anndaa Kayhayɗi hannde jeyaa ko e gure ɓurɗe tunwude e Muritani .
Ina anndaa tan ko ñaayngal jaajngal , haa leydi ndii ɗeɓi laggude .
Ina anndaa wonde pine mawɗe tati kalkoriima noon e yontaaji ɓennuɗi .
Ina anndanoo jotondiral ina woodi hakkunde ngonka weeyo ( climat ) e mbayliigaaji politik .
Ina ardi e ɗerewol , teeŋtinde ceergal maɓɓe .
Ina e ɓee harbiyankooɓe ko
Ina e ɓeen dewoowo mi , ina e ɓeen kadi goofoowo mi .
Ina e ɓeen hoɗooɓe ŋanaa , mawɗo biyateeɗo Umar Gawlo , mo o anndondiri e hitaande 1954 , tawi omo yahra e duuɓi 15 .
Ina e ɓeen ɓiɓɓe Aadama annoore mum en ko peete , e dow ɗuum , Aadama wiyi : " eehey maa joom am !
Ina e ɗiin
Ina faayaa wonde ndee dillere hesere wiyeteende Dillere Ngenndiire Ndimaagu Asawad ( MNLA ) ko ko heɓi " ballal kaɓirɗe " ummoraade e Nuwaasoot .
Ina farlii e Waali o , so tawii jaɓaani rokkude ɗaɓɓoowo nasiyonalitee kaayit mum , nde haalanta joom mum dalillaaji ɗi salorii ɗi caggal ɗum kumpita Ministeer Lenteriyeer .
Ina farlii e oon Noteer nde loskata so tawii oon kaayit tottirgol ina rewi laawol hade makko rokkirde kaayit nuunɗinaaɗo to bannge noteer mo o foti winnditoyaade to Ardorde huuftidinnde leyɗeele e jawdi Dowla e nder Karnal leydi e nder Mughataa .
Ina feeña e kaa haala wonde ganndal e jaŋde adii geɗe diina keddiiɗe ɗee .
Ina feeñi e haala maɓɓe ɗee geɗe
Ina feeñi kadi ko UPR wiynoo ina jogii 1 115 000 tergal ( miliyoŋ e teemedere e sappo e joy ) koo laataaki , sibu ko wootani ɗum e woote ɗee ( yeru e doggol ngenndiwol depiteeji ) ko 136 809 fat .
Ina foti jeyeede e ndiin njuɓɓudi : pelle renndo siwil ( feccere ) , e fiilaaɓe ( konseyeeji kominaaji e depiteeji ) kam e jooɗaniiɓe laamu halfinaaɓe potal fartaŋŋeeji e hare luulndiinde paltooraaji , haa teeŋti noon e baɗe njiyaagu , yantude e kala ɓe paltoor yettinoo sabu tolno mum en nder renndo walla sabu mbaadi mum en , tirbii mum en , maa leñol mum en , walla ɓalli mum en ( feccere heddiinde ndee ) .
Ina foti mi laɓɓitina gila ɗoo , wonde hay so hasiima ɗum wona ko seekata aada , miin fof e gollude nder bunndi jaaɓi-haaɗtiro , miɗo selndii ndiin mbaadi miijiyanke .
Ina gasa noon tawa eɗi ( seriiji ɗii ) mbaɗi ngartam to bannge ngalu e faggorde , kono ɗi ndoondii ko tolaade ƴiyal keeci pine men e nduu dogdu pine adunayankooje ɗe ngalaa njurum , mo waawi kala wara .
Ina gasa noon tawa ɗum fawii ko e ɗowooɓe maslahaa ɓe e koye mum en .
Ina gasa tawa Mursi woni ko e arditaade , hoto ko heɓtii Muritani e Turki koo , ɗo koninkooɓe njattinii calii woɗɗitaade laamu koo , heɓtaade Misra .
Ina gasa tawa ko ndema ndiyamiri idii waɗeede bannge rewo Maayo mawngo ( maayo Senegaal ) hedde 8 000 hitaande ko adii hannde .
Ina gasa tawa ko sabu majji jogaade kaalis .
Ina gasa tawa ko ɗuum laamu Senegaal faami nde nuli toon jaagorgal geɗe nder leydi , hono Abdullaay Daawuuda Jallo , yo ɗaɓɓir mawɗo Madiina Gunaas nde duwantoo leydi ndii " ndunngu keewngu ndiyam , kono kadi wooteeji jamyami " , hade mum teeŋtinde pellital laamu Senegaal jogii ngam wallitde kisal ɓurngal moƴƴude nokku nguu e keñoragol mahngo e kesɗingol Daakaa kaa .
Ina gasa tawa maa hakkillaaji mon njaɓ goongɗinde , kono mate ma ɗi njaɓ fiɓde ?
Ina gasa tawa ɗum ina jeyaa e ko newni toɗɗagol e kawral Mammadu Aamadu Sal .
Ina gasa wonde tawa ɗii haalaluuji " ministereeɓe " muusaani ɓe .
Ina haani ɓe njannginee , ɓe nehee nehdi moƴƴiri , ɓe ndokkee kaɓɓirɗe ceniiɗe ngam waawde jiiɓtoyde gaggaaji walla pergitte e tiifaaɗe ɗe ɓe kawroyta janngo e nguurndam maɓɓe .
Ina haannoo paamon ɗum , njuurnito-ɗon golle mbaɗaton ɗee , sabu majje heewde ŋakke , ŋakke kollitanooɗe gila e fuɗɗoode binnditagol ngol .
Ina haawnii sibu hiisiwal woni yummum gannde Siyaas .
Ina hasii o waɗa ɗoon ko wayi no ceenal seeɗa .
Ina hasii so tawii seneraal birigaad halfinaama golle , o heewi ardaade walla " kumanaade " ko hedde ujunaaje sappo koninke .
Ina hasii won e seernaaɓe won ko nganndi ; ɓe mbiyi so aɗa waɗa ɗum , mbaɗdataa ɗum ko e lefol nanngam .
Ina hasii ɗee leyɗe ina njokkondiri tigi to dawrugol , to faggudu maa to pinal .
Ina hawra kadi wonde Dowla ina foti wallitde partiiji politigi e fereeje ɗe mbaɗata so ummaniima kampañ e sahaaji woote .
Ina hawraa ko Leydi taarotoo Naange ( leydi ko tagofeere ) , Lewru ina taaroo Leydi ( Lewru ko yowitiinde ) .
Ina heddii , hol dille Leydi nder fedde faru men ndee ?
Ina heen Belees Kompawore e Jilbeer Jendere .
Ina heen Beles Kompawore e soofaa " daande-wutte " mum Yasinte Kafanndo .
Ina heen daranaade koɗdigal
Ina heen ganndal Fisik , daarto maamiraaɓe Ejipta .
Ina heen jaayɗe 32 e lowe internet 23 e dente 7 .
Ina heen jogitiiɓe petelaaji ( marfaaji ) , ina heen ko silameeje e cabbi tan njogii .
Ina heen kadi Berbeer en adiiɓe ɗoon Aarabeeɓe .
Ina heen kadi Kayruwaan meeɗnoongo wonde wuro ngo Ɓaleeɓe umminooɓe Misra tuddinnoo .
Ina heen kadi ɗemngal " Euskara Batua " walla " Baskoore hawritaande/renndaande " , ɗemngal doosɗangal e ndii mbaydi nder wertaango diiwaan leñol Baska en nder leydi Espaañ ( seeɗa e leydi Farayse ) .
Ina heen ɗee defte cariiɗe nder Afiriki e Doŋe keddiiɗe .
Ina hey-ɗaa , e ngu laaɓaa ɗum cer .
Ina hiisaa ko kanngal woni go’o e duɗe jaaɓi haaɗtirde winndere ndee kala .
Ina himmi kolliten wonde dille cakkitiiɗe ɗee njibinaa ko caggal juɓɓitgol dille ngenndiyankooje aarabeeɓe gidinooɗe soseede .
Ina huufi hiirde ndee
Ina jeyaa e ardiiɓe ɗeeɗoo gure : Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal , eBaydi Kacce Paam , e saɗtidiiɓe mum en , e hoohooɓe Tooro heewɓe .
Ina jeyaa e dowlinɓe leele : Siidi Siriif , e Sammba Joob , e Abdullay Ceenel .
Ina jeyaa e ko jirwinta naalankaagal e pijirlooji leñol ngol : ñaañooji , e buubaaji , e bawɗi , e kumballi , e kolli , e mooluuji , e kelle , e kuljinaali , e cinnde , e ciŋlooji Ko ɗum rewi haa eɗen mbiya " kelle , e kuljinali , e bawɗi , e buubaaji " .
Ina jeyaa e ko softinnoo mo he ɗuum , won hoohooɓe ɓaleeɓe jeyaaɓe e laamu hee , walla nii won e pelle lorɓe ndaartatnoo ɗum , sabu mum en jooɗtoraade yoga e ɗaɓɓatnooɓe ñaawoore ina gasa ngoppa ɗum so ndokkaama won ndiin ndaaamordi ceɓorndi .
Ina jeyaa e ko ɓeydata ɗum cukaagu walla heego , sibu e oon sahaa tawata ko " jooɗorde " ( bassin ) jibinoowo o ina pamɗi , tiggu o hooroo yaltude
Ina jeyaa e nokku hee : tuggi hirnaange Botswana haa Namibi to bannge hirnaange ; e haa Simmbaabuwee to bannge fuɗnaange ; woni nokku Makgadikgadi gontuɗo hannde moraande lamɗam oo .
Ina jeyaa e paayndaale ɗee : saaktude kam e daranaade ɗemngal pulaar jiydaa e eɓɓooji ɗi fedde ndee jogii ngam kawral hakkunde terɗe fedde ndeee jokkondiral e " jasporaa " .
Ina jeyaa e rokkaa ɓe konngi hono Mariam Kan nootitiiɗo e innde Meeri Suwoyraat , Haamiidu Bah catal Suwoyraat fedde ɓpm , Aali siree wañ jooɗaniiɗo jaagorgal toppitiingal sukaaɓe , pinal kam e coftal , Aliytun Bah hoyreejo fedde tulde ɗoo e wuro suwoyraat .
Ina jeyaa e yimɓe mooɓaaɓe ɓee , Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal , e Baydi Kacce Paam .
Ina jeyaa e ɓeen , kolonel Muhammed Lemiin wul Njaayaan , gonnooɗo mawɗo Taamasoor .
Ina jeyaa e ɓeen cukalel biyeteengel Stompie Seipei , piyanoongel baral e hitaande 1989 .
Ina jeyaa e ɗeen : Hawusaŋkoore ( 43 , 9% ) , rewi heen Jermaŋkoore ( 17 , 9% ) , banndiraaɓe men Fulɓe walla Fulaani ɓe ko ( 8 , 5% ) .
Ina jeyaa e ɗeen jeddittoonde , yeddittoonde anndiraande yeddittoonde Siimson .
Ina jeyaa e ɗeen tufɗe : tufnde Senegammbi ( ɗoo , ko Faraysenaaɓe e Purtugeec en e Biritannaaɓe njulodtonoo ɗoo e Jolfuɓe e Sereer en e Mandeŋ en e Julaa e Balante en e Felupe en ) .
Ina jeyaa hannde kadi e ngoƴa men , uddo hakkunde diwanuuji leydi Muritani sabu yah-ngarta gollotooɓe sarwisaaji laamu , julaaɓe , yiilooɓe eɓɓooji nder leydi , jom soklaaji en e laamorgo leydi fof dartiima .
Ina jeyaa he ko addi ɗum nde Abiy Ahmed cetti kuule he 2019 ngam waylude ngonka laamu ngu , ngonka lelnanooka gila 1994 : jerondiral e tawtoragol diiwe e leñƴi ɗii fof nder laamu .
Ina jeyaa heen Belees Kompawre e Yasenta Kafando gardinooɗo ndeenka Kompawre , e Seneral Jenndere bees suudu laamordu .
Ina jeyaa heen duuɗe Mariyaan Rewo , Guyam , Wake , Palaos , duuɗe Marshall , duuɗe Gilbert e Banaba ( Kiribati ) , Nauru kam e Federaasiyoŋ Dowlaaji Mikronesi .
Ina jeyaa heen kuraa .
Ina jeyaa heen wiiduru Sorimalee e wiiduru Wocci .
Ina jeyaa ko luurdini mo e Sankara nde oo arɗo waklitere Burkina yiɗi sompude heerto dawrugol gootol .
Ina jeyaa ko saabii ɗum raddooɓe ɓee kam e lawɓe ɓee .
Ina jeyanoo e goomu he : Obri Lekonte ( o meeɗiino wonde kumaandaŋ seerkal Podoor ) , e kapiteen Pino .
Ina jeyanoo e ko saabinoo ngol liiltugol , luulndo salanoode yo hooreejo leydi ndii toɗɗo gardiiɗo lannda UPR nde ɗowata ngaal kaaldigal , sabu , e miijo maggu " so wonaani hooreejo leydi ndii , yo won neɗɗo jaambuur walla gooto e jagge laamu mo toɗɗii " , etee tawi luulndo ngoo fuɗɗiima haaɓde liiltugol kaaldigal ngal , haa jeertini laamu nguu wonde so tawii ɓe pellitaani ɗum " kañum ne maa ƴeewto mbele dawrugol mum kaaldigal ina jojji haa hannde " .
Ina jeyanoo e paandaale mooɓondiral Pari , waɗde feere mbele ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ina jaasa 2°C .
Ina jeyanoo e tuugnorgal nguun goomu , toɓɓe tati , maantinɗe : heɓtude yeewtere rajo , e wuurtinde Fooyre Ɓamtaare e sosde lowre internet .
Ina jeyanoo e tuugnorgal nguun goomu , toɓɓe ɗiɗi haa tati , maantinɗe : heɓtude yeewtere rajo , e wuurtinde Fooyre Ɓamtaare e sosde lowre internet .
Ina jeyanoo e ɗiin musibbaaji ketɗi , hujjaaji " Maruk mawɗo " kiisinooɗi wonde Maruk yahii haa daande maayo Senegaal .
Ina jeyanoo he ko ɓuri tiiɗde he piɓle maɓɓe , haɓaade njiimaandi koloñaal en , kono eɓe paami kadi so tawii ɓe mbaawaani haɓaade diwaaniyankaagal , leƴƴiyankaagal e kinɗe he nder leyɗeele maɓɓe , ɓe mbaawataa teeŋtinde ngootaagu ngenndiiji maɓɓe mbaawngu falaade njiimaandi koloñaal en .
Ina jogii meerii gardiiɗo gure keewɗe .
Ina jogii rewɓe e worɓe dadiiɓe ngam ɓamtaare wuro mumen : ko wayi no pelle ɓamtaare rewɓe e worɓe , ko wayi no ɗanniyankooɓe ekn .
Ina laatii kadi omo wuurtinatnoo maayɓe e sakkitinoore geno .
Ina laatii kiin ɗoon lekki ko kañim ɓuri mawnude e leɗɗe aljannaaji .
Ina laaɓi , ɗi njaɓataa !
Ina laaɓi haa hannde tiimaandi Farayse heɓtinaani jeyi ganni oo tawo , kono leƴƴi ɗii ne , ɗum waylaani miijo mum en .
Ina laaɓi kala jula yiɗi ko heɓde ngartam e njulaagu mum , ɗoon jeddi ngalaa ɗoon .
Ina laaɓti , ngaal kanndal woniri ɗoon tan ko kujjikinorgal ngaameela .
Ina limtee e majje : Nuwel Gine ( duunde pasifik ɓurnde mawnude , duunde ɗimmere e nder winndere ndee caggal Groenland ) , Nuwel Kaledoni , Wanuatu , Fidji , duuɗe Salomon ( Sileymaani )
Ina limtee e ɗuum borjingol jawdi dowla e porlugol mum e nafoore heeriinde ( ñawoore mum caggal losko Parlamaa ina hiisoo ɗum e ko ɓurata 90 miliyaar ugiya , etee gasaani tawo ) , jaɓɓugol hakkeeji aadee ( bonaandeeji 89 e warngooji dewnooɗi heen inan puŋŋinii tawo , ndañanaaka safaara ) batte njiyaagu e ɗawgol won leƴƴi e kinɗe e nder leydi ndii wontii dawrugol laamu , en limtaani noon iñcuru to bannge nguura , waasamgollaagu e ñawu Covid 19
Ina moƴƴi kadi nde duwatooɗo oo janngata ndeeɗoo hoore simoore rewɓe " nisaa " o wiya : " innde Alla jurumdeero jurmotooɗo , eehey .
Ina moƴƴi yuurniteede tigi-rigi ngam faamde darnde makko e golle makko jogorɗe arde .
Ina nanndi e niɓɓere hulɓiniinde ina wuuɗa no luukaali boynaaru .
Ina noddanoo heen denndaangal gure takkiiɗe Riñnjaw ko wayi no Beelinaaɓe , Njafaan , Jookee , Woolum Neere , Kaañaaɗi , Jaawut , Neere waalo , Siñtu Buubu Maka , Sillaa e Riñnjaw wuro ɗo ɗum waɗetee ɗo .
Ina sikkaa Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo faamii ngoƴaaji nijeernaaɓe , kadi transition maɓɓe o jogoraani nanndude e mo Gine konaakiri mo Jeneraal Seekubaa Konaate donkuɗo haa woni yoo lofu ɗimmu ngu laatoo .
Ina sikkaa en ngoɗɗaani ko ɓe kaali ko e leñol ngol .
Ina sikkaa kadi ndema pulook fuɗɗii ɗoon e nokkuuji dunli e boowe ko hedde duuɓi 6 000 ko idii hannde .
Ina sikkaa ko Muhamad Bazum mo Niijeer waar e Makoroŋ mo Farayse .
Ina sikkaa ko kanko ardinoo goomu soofaaji warɓe Sankara e yahdiiɓe mum 12 .
Ina sikkaa ɓe mbaɗiri ɗum ko muñtoriɗde ko poliseeji mbarata ɓaleeɓe koo .
Ina tawee he mayri iwdi Ruumnaaɓe e Turkinaaɓe gila nde diiwal ngal woni les njiimaandi maɓɓe .
Ina tawtoraa heen kadi duppooɓe ladde ndee yo ɗaccu .
Ina tawtoranoo batu nguu ardiiɓe pelle teelɗuɗe kam e pelle ballitooje koporeeje ( Sociéte civile et balleurs de fond ) .
Ina tawtoranoo hiirde ndee koɗo men Ceerno Ɓan to cuuɗi men Kuñekaari ( Mali ) e woɗɓe e woɗɓe woppuɓe haaju mu’en e hammuuji mu’en ngam yiɗde tawtoreede nde ɗo jooɗnde nde diine islaam woni ngooroondi mum .
Ina tawtoranoo ɗum 124 hebletenooɓe ɓee , kam e ardorde duɗal keblorgal ngal e jannginooɓe heblo ngoo e jagge laamu goɗɗe .
Ina teskaa , walla ina anndaa , ustugol ñaamɗe ina wallita ɓalndu won ɗeen tagooje dartaade won ɗiin ñawbuuli , ko wayi no nguɗu ( kaaseer ) , walla ñawbuuli paddorɗe , haa arti noon wonande baaɗi .
Ina teskaa tan wonde laabi gine ɗii ina keewi caɗeele , nde wonnoo ɗi keewaani godoroŋaaji , ɗum addanii otooji lappol ngol dañde caɗeele keewɗe haa woodi e majji bonɗi , yimɓe mbaali e ladde tuulaa heelaa .
Ina tuumaa ñawu nguu ummorii aadee ko e kullon ladde ɗiɗon : wilwilnde e " panngolen " ( annama yeendu nii ) , kullon kon tebbuuli mum en korsinaa to Siin .
Ina waawi faamee , ina waawi waasa faameede walla faamnaade ( sibu hay sinno ko e Farayse walla e Engele winndannde ndee wonnoo , ko noon mettirta faamnaade walla faamninde ) .
Ina waawi ka jipporoo hedde Espaañ , Faryse , Purtugaal ekn ) kono woto paayee .
Ina waawi maa tawa ko ɗum addani ɓeen faayande janngo mu’en pelliti luunndaade mo mbele maa siwil en kaaytu weeɗeede laamu ngu .
Ina waawi noon tawa ngaska ɓurka luggiɗde to bannge rewo tagofeere nde ina waɗi weendu , sabu teddeeki kammu maa tolno 1155 paskaal , kadi nguleeki nokku o ina waawi ɓurde 0°C , ngaska ka ko batte njomu kaaƴal mawngal ko ɓooyi , ka wiyetee ko Hellas Planitia .
Ina waawi o taƴanee warngo maa dummbirdu hakke nguurndam , nde o jaggaa fof kuugal fawee e dow makko .
Ina waawi so Demokraraasi yahtiraani yeeso , yahtortaa caggal .
Ina waawi tawa nii boom ɓe ɓurii ɗoon sabu eɗen nganndi kala leydi ndi ngon-ɗen , so en ɓuraani keewal , eɗen keewi sukkude e ardiiɓe ɓe .
Ina waawi wiyeede nii Fedde Ngootaagu Afrik ( UA ) hannde nde ko njartudi ndeen Fedde hettaande ko adii jeytaare yoga e leyɗeele men .
Ina waawi wonde noon he wimmballooji kaaƴe , ngam yiylaade ɓuuɓri , kono wonaa suuɗaade , sabu heewaani ko suuɗatoo , sabu ko ndi kullel ñalawma e jamma fof .
Ina waawi yidde sawtu o kala kediido kono kadi faamde loowdi ndi kala nanoowo pulaar !
Ina waawi ɓurde ɗoon famɗude to woɗɗi so tawii seneraal oo halfinaa ko golle karalleeje ; yeru seneraal konndiroowo diwooje hare ina waawi ardaade ko timmaani hay sappo , walla nii hay gooto .
Ina waawnoo ɓurde ɗoon , sibu Hitler yamirnoo konu mum , ko kala ɗo riiwaa e leydi hee , hoto woppu hay dara caggal mum , yo duppu fof haa laaɓa hoto konuuji añɓe naftoraade , kono ndeen yamiroore ɗooftaaka no feewi .
Ina wayi ko doosɗe leydi no ngoorunoo .
Ina wayi no , ko hakilantaagal e yiɗde diwtude caɗeele e waɗde ko nafata ardinaa ɗo : wonaa " yiɗde fuuntude ɓee , e wallude woɗɓe " walla ƴoƴokaagal ardinaa .
Ina wayi no , wiɗto heso saaktaango jooni ngoo abbitii ko e miijo ɗiɗmo ngoo .
Ina wayi no demokaraasi mo tuubakooɓe njogii oo ronkii safrude saɗande ndeenka he nokkuuji keewɗi .
Ina wayi no hankadi ɗuufaano ƴerii sariima e aduna yimɓe e kullon fof ndañii caɗeele , to dogee waɗii , to fayee alaa , koyɗe yimɓe e muumunteewon fof taƴii , ngam alaa ɗo nangtii .
Ina wayi no ɗeeɗoo doge ɗiɗi fof ɓe mbaɗii ɗum .
Ina wayi no ɗeeɗoo inɗe ɗiɗi ndentii , ngontii innde wootere .
Ina wayno alaa ko ɗaccu-ɗaa e dedtere ndee .
Ina wayno gooto e mon kala addii ballal timmungal fa’de leñol men .
Ina waɗa sahngaaji nder nguurndam renndo potɗi heɓtineede e teeŋtineede sabu teddeendi doŋle mumen , sabu mbaawka mumen haɓɓude piɓle kese , e sabu semmbe mumen waylude ngonkaaji e heltude tiindi lappi daartol .
Ina waɗa ɗoo jeere mawnde wi’eteende " FIARA " , luumo adunayankoowo yowitiingo e ndema e ngaluuji e njawdi dariindi .
Ina waɗi gallunkooɓe felluɓe jihaadi nde njahdi e konu Alhajji Umar .
Ina waɗi heen hay wallitɓe jeytaare leyɗe Afrik , no jowolnaaɓe heddiiɓe fof nii , ngam ɓe njantiino e konuuji tuubakooɓe nde cokli ballal ndee .
Ina waɗi kadi seedanteeji goɗɗe ko wayi no debbo gadiiɗo joofnude Quraana e nder wuro ngoo , e dowlinɗo ndema e wuro ngoo , e gadiiɗo heɓde meer komin Bagodin tawi ko jeyaaɗo e wuro ngoo ; ɓee kala keɓii geɗe mumen .
Ina waɗi noodi tokoosi , kakindiiɗi e mawɗi keewɗi doole .
Ina waɗi noon wallitɓe gila e maaro , nebam haa e suukara ekn kaalis oo soodaa maaro , nebam e suukara .
Ina waɗi sababuuji goɗɗi jotondirɗi e aadaaji nguurndam , ko wayi no simme , ɓuttiɗgol , fooftere ɓurtunde , sanngara walla ñaamdu heewndu lamɗam , ɓellere jawdi e suukara , famɗundu ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe e sewo-sewo ( legimaaji ) .
Ina waɗɗii e men haa ko foti alaa e waawnude keɓtinegol ɗemɗe ngenndiije leydi ndii fof , ɗemngal heen fof heɓa hakke mo haandi , tawa aldaa e jinngere diwtunde keerol .
Ina waɗɗii en waɗde feere mbele muritaninaaɓe kala ina paarnoroo jeyeede e ngenndi mawndi .
Ina waɗɗii kadi kala jiɗɗo winnditaade addude kaayitaaji naamneteeɗi gaa e nder Muritani , kam e kartal koɗaagu ngal laamu leydi ngonaandi ndii ( wonɓe Sawuud e Koddiwaar , e yeru , naamnaaka ɗuum ) .
Ina waɗɗii ñawɗo oo diisnaade cafroowo ɗum oo , mbele oon ina
Ina weli kono tan weeɓaani sabu saawndorde fireteende ndee ko ɓuri heen heewde woni ko e ɗemngal Engele .
Ina wiyaa heen kadi , " ɗuum ko huunde woowtaande , nde haralleeɓe nganndi , sibu ko dogtugol raako ngoo caggal nde yoori , haa teeŋti noon kadi ɗum fawii ko e geɗe ɗe njiƴƴaani , njidaa edda " .
Ina wiyee kadi helmere Barak ndee ummii ko e Baarka Boo Mbooc , lomtinooɗo Njaajaan Njaay .
Ina wiyee kala ɗo o arnoo kanko mawɗo leydi oo , o fuuptiima jagge UPR , o wiyi ɗum en alaa parti potɗo wootaneede so wonaa UPR .
Ina wiyee ko ownooɓe wiyeteeɓe Bokko Haram mbaɗi bonannde ndee .
Ina wiyee ko ɗum woni sabaabu ɓurɗo teeŋtude gaddanɗo militeer en ɓe joñde pelle daraniiɗe jojjanɗe aadee kam e pelle ɓe bonannde nde yannoo ɓe e njiylawu " safaara " oo gagga muusɗo .
Ina wiyee nii wonde fenti helmere " tsunami " ( nde firti e haala Japoŋ ko wempeƴere tufnde ) ndee ko awooɓe , sibu wonnooɓe nder geec , ɓe tinataa hay dara , ƴeeŋtoyi tawi tufnde mum en ina boni haa boni .
Ina wiyee wonde Asiis ƴetti ko telefoŋ noddi Kabore ngam hollitde ɗum mettere mum woppude " banndi , barhoore " ina ñiŋa mo e Tele ngenndiijo Burkinaa .
Ina wiyee wonde HCR winnditiima ɓe , ngam heblude gartugol maɓɓe .
Ina woodi heen
Ina woodi heen fannu tinndol kam e ciftol .
Ina woodi heen sagata gorko gooto tampuɗo sabu hoore ndee ko helnde .
Ina woodi toon kadi haɓtotooɓe e " banndiiji " jogitiiɓe wujjooɓe jawdi , wujjooɓe hay yimɓe mbaɗa jukunɗe .
Ina yaakoraa maa njaaweendi majje yettoyo 1 220 km/h ( woni sowoo laabi 4 njaaweendi dillaango ( oolel ) .
Ina yaakoraa maa ñaawoore nde suuɗtu kala ko niɓɓiɗi heen .
Ina yaakoraa tan wonde laawol lowangol ngol , so selaaka , maa jaaƴnje Muritani moƴƴu .
Ina yahdi e jeeyngal jaajngal añamleñaagu nder geese renndo enternet e jaayɗe leydi Tuunus .
Ina yiɗaa nde o janngata heen aayeeji ɓuraana tedduɗo oo .
Ina yooɗi kadi so ngal ɓaara , ngenndiyankooɓe ɓee tina .
Ina ñaagaa nde Fulɓe ɓe ngarata e keewal e cuusal mbaasa lusindaade Fedde nde ɓe mbaɗa Fedde nde ko kamɓe njeyi .
Ina ñohee wonde ko koninkooɓe ndusi yoga e kaake ɗe SOMIMA woppunoo toon , gila e kilimateseeruuji haa e mbertateeri
Ina ɓeydoo yahde tiiɗde haa hannde fendere yeeyetee ko ujunere e teemedde pawɗe to jeere HLM , Ndakaaru .
Ina ɗaminaa Allah e wonde moƴƴo maa Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo hoyreejo laamu luɓal ( transition ) maa ñemmbu yaɓɓa e pele gorko biyeteeɗo Aamadu Tumaani Tuure hoyreejo leydi Mali nde faabii malinaaɓe e laamu Jeneraal Muusaa Tarawore .
Indi woodaa , ɓesngu nguu ina anndi .
Indien ( oiseau )
Ine anndaa hannde , he nder aduna oo , yimɓe njanngirta ko haa paggoo ganndal , kono kadi njogoo peeje .
Ine anniyaa dartinde ngaal gollondiral nder paamondiral .
Ine e doggol hee 18 wuro Japon ( e oon sahaa noon , ko ina tolnoo e 66 wuro e nder Japon ko bonnaaɗe haa mboni ) .
Ine e majje : Nuwel Selannde , duuɗe Haway , Rotuma , duuɗe Midway , duuɗe Phonix ( Kiribati ) , duuɗe Liiñ ( ile de la Ligne ) ( pecciiɗe hakkunde Kiribati e Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik ) , duuɗe Samoa ( pecciiɗe hakkunde dowla Samao dimo e Samoa amerikeeje ) , Tonga , Tuwalu , duuɗe Kuuk ( Cook ) , Wallis-e-Futuna , Tokelo , Niue , Polinesi farayseejo , e duuɗe Pâcques .
Ine e rokkaaɓe ɓee inɗe goɗɗe baaɗe no " Produits Alimentaires SA " , " Oasis Atlantic " , " Rouge pour le Tourisme " " ASA investissement " , " Chinguitty Aluminium " , " Hôtel du Repos " , " Maurilait " ekn .
Ine eɓɓaa heen kadi mahngo e baɗgol kaɓirɗe e postooji takkondirɗi deenooji taccugol keerol ngol , kam e mahngo , ko famɗi fof , 60 km laabi caltooji e nder nokkuuji ndema e ngaynaaka .
Ine fotnoo yaakoreede , ɓayri juulɓe Shii’iyankooɓe keewraani he aduna hee no juulɓe sunniyankooɓe keewiri heen nii , wonde maa Iraan wallit ɓe kala ɗo ɓe mbaawi wonde , yeru no ɓe mballitirta ɓe to Siiri ( Iraan wallitta ko laamu Bashaar el Asad ) , to Libaan ɗo Iraan wallitta shii’iyankooɓe Hesbollaah , walla kadi to Yemen .
Ine gasa tawa ko noon wonande renndooji keddiiɗi ɗii .
Ine gasa tawa on nanii konngol " Data woni petroŋ hannde " ; " Data woni kaŋŋe hannde " .
Ine gasa wonaa sabu ɓallondirde to bannge politik , kono tan hay gooto rokkirtaa leydi ngonndi he wolde kaɓirɗe , tawi ko e Alla ɓolo .
Ine gasa ɗum laatoo he gootal e daawe tuugnorgal Artemis : Artemis 1 , Artemis 2 , Artemis 3 , Artemis 4 ekn
Ine he maggal ƴiyon daande njeeɗiɗon ( 7 ) , sappo e ɗiɗi ( 12 ) ƴiyon keeci , e ƴiyon nadorde njoyon ( 5 ) , ƴiyon dote ( njoyon takkondirkon ) , e feññeññe ( ƴiyon taton haa nayon ndooɓakon , takkondirkon ) .
Ine heen kadi waasde yimɓe ɓee reentaade Ɗum noon ko geɗe keewɗe ndenndi ɗoon .
Ine hiisaa nii hay jettagol toɓɓannde deŋgol ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo he 2°C ine waawi aaɓnaade , kono ine ɗaɓɓi tiiɗnaare mawnde .
Ine hulaa hoto ɗi ɓoccitaade , ɗi nduttoo he weeyo so tawii nguleeki ine jokki e ɓeydaade .
Ine jangtee wonde biyeteeɗo Caton ɓooyɗo , he nder woldeeji njoftiigu hakkunde Room e Kartaas , seeraani e wiyde , ko Senaa waawi wiyde fof , " alaa e sago Kartaas bonnee tan " .
Ine jeyaa e baɗte ɗii mbayliigaaji , joñgol ɓurtungol sukaaɓe ɓe ɗemngal mum en neeniwal wonaa Arab .
Ine jeyaa e golle ndeegoowa Nasa inniraaka Viper neldoyteeka toon he maayirɗe 2024 , fotde , natde , asde , sunnaade ndiyam he wuddu worgo lewru hee .
Ine jeyaa e ko aaɓni ɗumɗoo , internet tawo , e telefoŋaaji ƴoƴɗi ɗii ( ɗi njogi-ɗen hannde ɗii ) , kam e kaɓirɗe kisnaaɗe , kaɓirɗe keɓtinirɗe yeeso ekn , ɓeydotooɗe ñalnde kala heewde , kam e laylayti jokkondiral ɓurɗi yaawde , e ƴoƴre tafaande ɓurnde ƴoƴde kadi , ɓeydotooɗe yuumtude ñalnde kala .
Ine jeyaa e maale maggu : siññere ɓalndu , jaɗɗugol terɗe , caɗeele dillugol .
Ine jeyaa e ndeeɗoon fedde , gumbalaa ( jimɗi seɓɓe ) e kerooɗe ( jimɗi waañooɓe ) , dillere ( jimɗi maabuɓe ) , fantaŋ ( jimɗi fulɓe aynaaɓe ) , yeelaa ( jimɗi awluɓe ) , naale ( jimɗi riimayɓe ) , leele , daari , tinndi , cifti , pulareeje , jimɗi walla coñce denndaaɗe , ɗe leñol haalpulaar en fof njeyi .
Ine jeyaa e oo abajada alkule 26 binndi latin ɗii ( mawɗi e tokoosi ) , lime sappo ɗee , tuggi 0 haa 9 , yantude e poofirɗe , ɗum fof ko ngam waawde winndude he Engele wonnoo .
Ine jeyaa e paandaale Zhurong loskude e yiytude dalillaaji goodaangal ɓooyngal , ɓennungal walla luttungal haa hannde , ndiyam e nokku hee .
Ine jeyaa e paandaale peewnugol tele baaɗe nii , waawde lomtaade koon alluwon , sibu addani kon huutoreede e ngoon yeeso ko donkal ko ɓuri ɗuum .
Ine jeyaa e yeewtatnooɓe ɓee , porfesoor Abdel Kadeer Kidira ( ko faati e ɗemngal e daartol laamaandi Wagadu walla Ganaa ) .
Ine jeyaa e ɓeen annduɓe biyeteeɗo Sam Altman , hooreejo OpenAI , coso chatGPT , ine jeyaa heen kadi biyeteeɗo Elon Musk joom SpaceX e Tesla , e teemedde woɗɓe Noddaango maɓɓe ngoo ko jeertinaango e kulol : aɓe kuli IA !
Ine jeyaa he dallillaaji ɗii , hollitde wonde janngingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee maa wallit ngootaagu ngenndi ndii , sibu suka muritaninaajo kala maa janngu ɗemngal goɗɗo oo , ɗemngal gooto haali fof tawa goɗɗo oo ine faama ɗum .
Ine jeyaa he sifaaji mum tiiɗre e cuusal e bonki .
Ine jeyaa he ɗaam kuɓɓam ɓarakke : petroŋ , ƴulɓe , gaas
Ine jeyaa he ɗeen geɗe loskugol ko wiyetee wonde Muhammed Abdel Asiis rokkii laamɗo Kataar duungel biyeteengel Tiidra , kam he toɓɓere woɗde faatunde he geɗe baawɗe siforeede no jaɓɓugol sariya kaɓtotooɗo borjingol jawdi leydi .
Ine jeyaa heen ojif kollitaaɗo e hitaande 2019 , baawɗo taccude 2 000 km yolnde , kono baawɗo nii diwde ko ɓuri ɗum juutde , taartoo leydi .
Ine jeyaa heen ustugol nguleeki weeyo rewrude he jeñtingol e kuutoragol semmbe ɓooyoowo , kam e jahgol e cosgol lullnde aadee to tagofeere Mars ( Mbaañ ) .
Ine jeyaa peeje kaɓtorɗe ɗee haɗde caragol ñawu nguu haɓtoraade ittude ndiyam ndiiñiɗam ngam dartinde deɓagol ñawu nguu .
Ine jeyanoo e aadaaji FƁPM , ko adii 1989 , yuɓɓinde ñalɗi jaŋde , ngam , e sahaa kala anndude ko gollaa e no golliraa , ƴeewde ko ŋakki heen , e naftoraade humpito dañaango e daawal jawtungal , ngam ɓeydaade moƴƴinde ko golletee koo , rewrude e tuugnorɗe jaŋde .
Ine jeyanoo e lappol ngol ceerno Jibril Muusaa Joop , tergal FƁPM , e Hammat Muusaa Kan , karallo toppitiiɗo naatnugol deftere ndee he nder jaaɓnirgal .
Ine jeyanoo heen misilaaji ɓurhitooji Kinjal e Avangard .
Ine sifee heen kadi keewal heen ciirol kala , nafoore mum
Ine sifee heen kadi won ɗeen geɗe , yeru wonande aadee : noordi nguru ɓanndu ( raneeɓe , ɓaleeɓe ) , noordi sukundu , noordi gite ekn .
Ine sikkaa , heen geɗe joy ko duumotooɗe .
Ine sikkaa no feewi ko ɗuum addani dinosooruuji majjude ( nattude woodde ) kam e ciiri kulle goɗɗe he nder winndere ndee kala sabu batte buɓɓannde ndee .
Ine sikkaa wonde kullon ndaɗkon heen kon ko kullon ɓurnokon famɗude sokla to bannge nguura , keddoranookon nguura seeɗa , ka jeyaaka e callalal nguura majjuka kaa , tuugingal e leɗɗe guurɗe .
Ine tawtoraa kadi udditgol ngol , sooninkooɓe ummoriiɓe e diiwanuuji leydi ndii , leyɗe goɗɗe ( Mali , Senegaal , Gammbi , Gine Bisaawo , Gine Konaakiri ) ko jiidaa e ɗaaniyankooɓe ( Farayse , Amerik , Anngolaa ) .
Ine waawi tawa ko idii nde Gellaay feeñata , yimɓe heewɓe woɗɓe njimii pekaan , kono ko ɓeeɗoo ɓuri heen lollude .
Ine waɗa rewɓe mawɓe alɗuɓe gijortooɓe maa hoomtirooɓe noon sukaaɓe worɓe ɓe gollinta e galle .
Ine waɗa sahaa so ɓe koriima dañde hay ɗeen golle baawnateeɗe , hulde hootirde juuɗe mehe ine duña ɓe e nguykaaji maa waalde e laabi nokkuuji joñiiɗi kadi kulɓiniiɗi tawo ngel miijotaako nguurndam maggel woni ko semmu huunde kala ine waawi heɓtaade ngel .
Ine waɗi heen tokoose , ɗe neɗɗo waawi sinndaade , itta ɗum en nokku faade nokku goɗɗo ngam ƴeewrude weeyo .
Ine waɗi kadi heen dente dokkaaɗe laabi keewɗi tawi ko e nder Nuwaasoot , ko wayi no " Béton et Briques " walla " Etablissement mauritanien de fabrication des fibres " .
Ine wiyaa heen " doŋngal IPELAN ko ( i ) yuɓɓinde , jokkondirde e ƴellitde denndaangal wiɗtooji ciynaaɗi paatuɗi he ɗemɗe ngenndiije ; ( ii ) heblude naattingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof nder tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi ndii ( TNJ ) ; ( iii ) toppitaade heblo yimɓe halfinaaɓe jannginde ɗemɗe ɗee nder duɗe laamu ; e ( iv ) toppitaade keblugol kaɓirɗe jaŋde .
Ine wiyanoo heen : " He ñalawma hannde oo , Mbaañ ( Mars ) woni tagofeere ɓurnde ƴameede e tagopeeje yuɓɓo naange .
Ine wiyee aɗi kattani " wappaade denndaangal tippule kese paddorɗe , ɗe weeyo walla goɗɗe fof " .
Ine wiyee he daawal gadanal laamu maɓɓe , hakkunde 1996 e 2001 , ɓe tabitiniino toon ciynugol caɗtungol sariya Lislaam ( ko goonga walla ko ɓe takkaaɓe ?
Ine wiyee kadi huunde e safalɓe Aftuut e Eeleega ina cuuɗatnoo mo , caloo haaltude ngonka makko , sabu kulol Wullum warii yimɓe heewɓe , o " heli koyɗe fulɓe heewɓe , o wari jawdi mum en " .
Ine wiyee ko toon woni jofnde koode laaci , ko wayi no hoodere laaci Curi ( Thiouri ) nde ɓeeynirka Roseta jippinnoo e dow mum roboo biyeteeɗe Philae ( Filayee ) .
Ine wiyee ngo yooɓiima fotde 200 000 fittaandu .
Ine wiyee nii ko laamorgo mayri , hono Kief ( Kiev ) , woni mbootu dowlaaji Ikreen e bioyeloriisi , e riisi .
Ine wiyee o peeñii e Afrik ko ina wona 165 miliyoŋ haa 240 miliyoŋ hitaande jooni , kono haa hannde , yimɓe kawraani e ɗo ɓe idii feeñde ɗoo .
Ine wiyee ɗi tolniima hannde e 450 ɓoggol , ɗi njuuteendi mum en kam en fof tolnii e miliyoŋ e teemedde tati ujunere kiloomeeteer ( 1 300 000 km ) .
Ine woodi kadi jimɗi goɗɗi ɗi Gellaay yimi ina sifoo ladde walla ngaari maamaari to fooftii ekn .
Ine woodi kadi ɓoggi nawooji yiite , kono wonaa ɗiin ngoƴa-ɗen ɗoo .
Ine woodi ko wiyetee " geofencing " : yeru ndewaa sara bitik tan keɓaa mesaas ine wiy maa " a rewii sara mangasiin comci , aɗa waawi ustaneede 20% so a soodii huunde " .
Ine yaakoraa " Zhurong " maa waaw gollaade fotde lebbi tati , ine ƴetta nate , ine renndina kabaruuji paatuɗi he ngonka mbaañirdi Mbaañ : nduufdi mum , kaaƴe mum , weeyo mum ekn

Innde Ceemoko Garang Kuyaate ina foti tigi ubbiteede .

Innde Murtuɗo ndee ko noon wayi haa inɗe ngenndiyaŋkooɓe heewɓe ñemmbi ɗum .

Iraan kadi , ñalnde 28 feebariyee 1995 , leydi yerɓii fotde leƴƴanɗe 15 e rewo leydi ndii kala , fotde 150 000 neɗɗo maayi heen .

Isra'el haaɗaani ɗoon sabu baŋnge e Siriy ( ena wiyee golaan ) e ceɓtam Ejipt ( ena wiyee Sinayi ) keɓtaa , njanti e Isra'el .
Israa'el ne , ena saɗaa jotondire e aarabeeɓe sabu leyɗeele ɗee kalal ( woorti Jordaan e Ejipt ) ko ko nefi-ɓe .

Ittaɗi e 62 naɓa e 64 .
Itti Oropnaaɓe he nder jamma niɓɓo mo ɓe njoolinoo he ɗoyli majjere fotde teemedanɗe limti-limtinɗe .
Ittude ko nde waɗtaa ñaawoore Arab koo tan , e hirjinde jeyegol hardaneeɓe e ɓaleeɓe Muritani e tippudi ñaawoore hee , ɓe ngidoo ƴetteede e doge ENAJM garooje .

Iwde fereyon e mbaadi ndeelam wonta henndu naamndii ko siiɓaade nguleeki , ( way tan kono fasnude ndiyam nih , ala e sago jayngol tawee ) , tawde guccurol cuurkol woni ko nder frigo , ko heen siiɓatoo nguleeki ɓuubol lomtoo , ko noon ɓuuɓol heɓirtee nder , kadi ko waɗaa nder fo nguleeki mum ñoortee ( siiɓee ) .
Iwdi caɗeele Muritani nde keɓi hoore mum ndee

Iwdi maggol ko he ɗemngal Berbeer , ko " Tafaske " .
Iwdi makko ko Amerik , to o jibinaa ñalnde 3 suwee 1906 .

JOONI NOON HOL SAFAARA NJOGANI DHEN DHUM ?
Jaaboo : " miin Yero Dimo " .
Jaabowol : so Alla toowɗo oo yiɗiino goofi mbaasa waɗde , omo waawnoo waasde tagde Ibliis etee kadi , keddugol Ibliis ko haa heefereeɓe ɓeydoo tampude tan , yurmeende heddoo e goongɗinɓe Alla .

Jaŋde he nder ɗemngal neeniwal ko huunde waawnde wallitde hisnude pine kulanaaɗe majjude , tee ine rokka mo woni kala feere ngam teeŋtinde , ƴellitde , yuumtinde neɗɗaagal mum .

Jaŋde ɓurnde yaawde addude e waawnude ganndal ndee noon ko janngirde ɗemngal mum neeniwal , firtaani noon yo neɗɗo haaɗ e ngaal tan , alaa , ko yo o adoro ngal , o heedna ngal yeeso so dañaama , o fawa heen ko hedii ko o waawi e ko o yiɗi fof .
Jaŋde ɗemɗe , fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar nde sosaa nde , noddii kiram keewɗam .

Jeewte juɓɓuɗe to bannge renndo men , e pinal men e diine men , fof feññinaama e ndee ɗoo hiirde .
Jeewte keewɗe faayiida njeewtaama he kewu nguu , kollitoowo nafoore soomiinde e firo deftere he Pulaar .
Jeewte rajooji , e nder dingire , jakkaaji , saaluuji mawɗi , fof njirwinaama ngam jeertinde ɓesngu winndere nde e nguu ñawu , hono Jabet .

Jiidaa e ngonka neɗɗo oo to bannge fittiwal alaa e sago o winnda o lollina e laylaytol renndo adunaaru nduu annda ngonka makko oo sahaa no siforii , wiyde mbiɗo wondi e wemmbere , won mo njiɗ-mi , ko mi jeewaaɗo ekn .

Jooni ( abril 2021 ) , woni duuɓi jeenay caggal ɗuum , en njaltinii tonngooɗe 100 goɗɗe .
Jooni , aɗa waawi renndinde tabbe keewɗe , ndokkaa-ɗe goobu keeriingu mbele ena waaɓta yiytude walla danndude ngam hurmitinde waŋngorde ndee , arta ɗo uddanoo ɗoo .
Jooni , feewnooɓe ɓee njiɗi ko feewnude teleeji dirtintooɗi , ɗi neɗɗo waawi reegnude , darna ɗum en ɗo welaa nder galle .
Jooni , ine moƴƴi ngannden tawo hol to aduna tiindii , ko huccani , ko leyɗe pooɗondirta ngam heedde yeeso .
Jooni , laaɓii ; ngal yeeyaama .
Jooni , min mbiyaama fedde hesere sosaama , tawi wonata heen ko yimiyankooɓe ganni , Sooninkoore , Wolofaare , Safaroore e Pulaar .
Jooni , walla mbiyen ñalnde 12 mee 2022 ndee , ƴettaa ( fotaa ) ko wuddere ɓaleere wonnde hakkunde jiiryiirngal men , ( hono jiiryiirngal " Fedannde malaaɗo " : hono wuddere ɓaleere pattamñisre , wiyeteende " Sagittarius A " ( Mbaangu A ) !
Jooni , ɓayri fof wayii no yiɗiranoo nii , daawe goɗɗe ɗee ine mbaawi yaaɓaneede .
Jooni , ɓesngu maa nguu kala reggondirɓe kakkunde ki lekki ki ŋon-mi e kiya lekki ki cooynato-ɗa .
Jooni e no kuulal ngal leldii , ina waawi o waasa wonde debbo , hay so tawii ko oon muuya Abdullaay Wade hollirnoo .
Jooni en polaama , ko enen jaɓɓi koye men .
Jooni ene naamndee hol e ɓee suddiiɓe jogori wonnde " dewoo leydi " Afrik Sud Sud .
Jooni eɗen etoo jangtaade golle makko maantinɗe , golle joopiiɗe ndimaagu Magreb .
Jooni hay so lowe " Enternet " nana ndemee seeɗa-seeɗa , ko heewi ene heddii .
Jooni heddii ko anndude hol hitaande nde ɓe tagaa .
Jooni heddii ko anndude mbele nde meeɗii hoɗeede .
Jooni heddii ko fandinde galle oo .
Jooni kadi , he nduu lewru settaambar ( Silto ) 2022 , njogitaaji nana pelɓondira ne ƴettita he nokku mo Waladmiir Putin jaggiri no jeyaaɗo e " tiimaandi mum " , hay so tawii noon hannde won ko woƴi ɗum goɗɗum , so wolde Ikren ; tawi ko heediiɓe woɗɓe , haa arti e Turki e Iraan naati heen , fawaade e nafooje gaas e petroŋ .
Jooni kadi , he ɗee balɗe , ine wiyee wonde " ko jooni natal gadanal , natal goonga-goonga wuddere ɓaleere ƴettaa " .
Jooni kadi , ko fedde wiyeteende APP yaltini bayyinaango ɗo hollitta wonde " nana wona dumunaa ko kabaruuji keewɗi , keniiɗi , teeŋtini wonde kippu Gollorde Ngenndi Binndol Yimɓe e Binndaaɗe Kisnaaɗe ( l’Agence Nationale du Registre des Populations et des Titres Sécurisés ) neldaaɗo ko ɓooyaani koo to Basikunu , inan winnditoo yimɓe ummiiɓe Mali fof .

Kaboore " .
Kaboore , juɓɓe seɓɓitiiɓe noototooɓe e innde Al-Qaida e Dowla Islaam , ndufii ƴiiƴam fotde ujune ɗiɗi neɗɗo ( 2 000 ) , pernii ko ina tolnoo e miliyoŋ neɗɗo , feccere miliyoŋ e teemedde joy ujunere neɗɗo , njalti leydi e gure mum en , mooloyii banngeeji goɗɗi .
Kaboore .
Kaboore e laamu fof .
Kaboore hollitii ñalnde kikiiɗe altine ndee , nder hello mum Twitter kala " ƴettunooɓe kaɓirɗe ngam faabaade mo yo njoɗɗin sabi Nafoore ngenndi " , o ñaagii kadi nde ɓe kuutortoo " keɗondiral e kaaldigal " .
Kaboore jaggaama , inan reenaa ɗo hisi .
Kaboore jooɗii e jappeere laamu ko 2015 nde o fiilaa gadanol .
Kaboore siifata ngal ɓatakal , tawi koninkooɓe njaltinii nder tele Burkina bayyinaango holliroowo ɓe loppitii laamu he juuɗe Rock Kaboore .
Kabore jaabtii mo wonde addi ɗum e laamu ko waklitere ( rewolisiyoŋ ) , tee Doosgal leydi mum rokkaani ɗum hakke reɗɗude wellitaare haalde walla wanngaade e leydi mum .
Kabrol ngol jokki wiyi " jotondiral e leyɗeele Sahaal ina jokki " e wiyde Jaagorgal Njuɓɓudi ndernderi , Kolonel Abdullaay Maygaa .
Kaddungal ko aada booydo e aduna he wonaa tan fuuta walla senegaal wonaa tan ne kay juulbe mbdata dum .
Kaddungal ko musiiba ko jooni haralleebe nganndi dun .
Kaddungal ngal waɗata ko e ñalaaɗe gadiiɗe e lewru Settaamburu .
Kadi
Kadi , Elena Adams debbo aasiñoor to NASA wiyiino kam ne " Miɗo sikki enen Mbaañnaaɓe ( Leydiyankooɓe ) , eɗen mbaawi hankadi ɗaanoraade noppi men ɗiɗi ɗii kala .
Kadi , Fooyre ine adda ballal mayre e kasdi joɗnde fedde ndee gila hitaande 2008 .
Kadi , Libi yaltini ko ena abboo e 2 , 5 miliyaar dolaar ngam huurde njoɓdi ɓesnguuji maayɓe ɓee .
Kadi , Maruk woni hoore goomu wonnoo nguu , hoonii toon Korowaasi ( 0-0 ) , Belsik ( 0-2 ) , Kanada ( 1-2 ) .
Kadi , caggal kala daawal hakkunde mooɓondire ɗiɗi , tuugnorɗe njanngiin kese ine lelnee , teskotooɗe humpito dañaango e daawal jawtungal ngal , dotta kadi laabi njanngiin wonande daawal paangal .
Kadi , eɗen nganndi Duuɗe Salomon taƴii jokkondiral njogodinoo e Taywaan e hitaande 2019 , cuɓii jokkondirde e Beejin ( Pekin ) .
Kadi , fiiltiingo kala heertii ɗum ko doŋe , jiidaa e geec .
Kadi , fulfulde ko ko heftinaa to baŋnge ɗemɗe aduna ɗee sabu en keɓii kod ɗemngal ngal hono no Farayse jogotii FR , Senegaal Ko fayti e golle mobil , miɗo sikki wonaa ko saɗti no feewi
Kadi , he pottitte hee , kippu ine waawi lomtinde laabi joy ( he 2018 ko tato mbaawnoo lomtineede ) .
Kadi , he referaandoom paatuɗo e gartugol Ikren nder Riisi , jaɓɓe ɗum ɓee ( EEY oo ) tolniima e 97% .
Kadi , ine anndaa , he daartol winndere ndee , ɗum yahdi ko e dagnugol njiimaandi e ciiɓagol doole janane .
Kadi , ko mi bittoowo , mbeze anndi zum zoo ko munyal e tampere e waasde zaanaade anndinta zum nezzo .
Kadi , ko ngol woni gadanol ko leydi Oseyaani ine yahda e leydi Asi he jeetaɓal kawgel ngel .
Kadi , ko o bileejo baawɗo mbileewu e yonta maɓɓe .
Kadi , ko ñalnde 13 lewru colte , o wirnaa e Nuwaasot .
Kadi , mbaroodi hulaani so wonaa baroodi banndi mum .
Kadi , mi yiyyi nata maaza , ko a cukolel , zum firti won'de ko a tampanzo zum .
Kadi , miɗo summba e laawol Alla e am yiɗde tawtoreede go'o nde fulɓe Faraysenaaɓe toɗɗoɗoo paɗɗuɗo mum'en !
Kadi , ngam hisnude keeri hirnaange ɗii ( kuccitɗi e Orop ) , Mosku daraniima mahde nokku hakkundeejo keedanoowo ɗum e leyɗe hirnaange .
Kadi , won humpito woodaa , miijooji juumtuɗi lelni wasiyaaji moƴƴi , dowrowi wonande fannu oo e sifaa kuuɓtodinɗo , wonande kadi , ma a taw , denndaangal gaggaaji tokoosi laaɓtuɗi .
Kadi , ñalnde 28 feebariyee , hono balɗe ɗiɗi caggal nde weeyoyankooɓe Faraysenaaɓe ɗiɗo njiyti nde , tawi Duɗal Oropnaawal paatungal e weeyo ( ESA ) mbaɗtii nde hoore e doggol kaaƴe weeyo kulaaɗe , hay so tawii sikkannde buɓɓondiral ngal ine famɗi ( hedde 1/847 e maayirɗe feebariyee 2023 ) .
Kadi , ɗemngal lawɗinaangal wootiɗinaa ko njogitaari naat-naattondiral diiwe Afiriki , ko jukunnde nguurndam ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde .
Kadi Aan neɗɗo , holi ko saabii rawaandu wofa ngummo-ɗaa ƴeewto-ɗaa damal ma ?
Kadi Demmba yiɗi haɗde Baaba Maal waɗde no waɗi nii .
Kadi Fulɓe ɓen e hoore mum no feccii hikka e nder hitagol ngol , hay si tawii muuyɗe maɓɓe ɗen ko gootum , ngam hay Alhajji Aamadu Jallo , yeesoojo fedde NDA nde , e hoore mum , heɓaali hitooji Fulɓe ɓen no o hoolornoo non .
Kadi Ganaa yuɓɓini hikka kawgel ngel ; ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii kala nana ndadii ngam semmbinde fettoɓe maɓɓe .
Kadi Ibliis naamndinoo-ma Alla , yo Alla muñan ɗum haa ñalnde darnga , Alla kadi jaɓaniino mo ɗuum .

Kadi barme mo mbaroodi ɓuri añde fof ko kelal .
Kadi duuɓi makko won ɗo keɓi , yettere Alla ɗo makko .
Kadi e kawtal " Afrik-Orop " baɗnongal Purtugaal ñalnde 8 haa 9 lewru Bowte , Senegaal waɗii toon fayiida .
Kadi ena waɗaa e waŋngorde hesere ndee ndeenka tuufogol , nguyka klik ( clickjacking ) e maawo ( fishing ) .
Kadi ene addana hunuko joom mum uurde .
Kadi ene ɓeydoo ɗaatnude ɗum .

Kadi eɗen mbiya yo ngol heblu ko heewi ngol moofta , mbele ngol waasa betteede ma jamfeede .

Kadi eɗen njokki e yiylaade koɗnoowo jogiiɗo jame PHP ɗe katojin-ɗen ɗee , tawa pawataama nguru taktakri lewru kala !
Kadi eɗum aamnoo nde tawnoo jaribaama e nokkuuji keewɗi , yimɓe njiyri gite mumen .
Kadi fedde ndee ena jogii konngol cifotoongol woni " nagge ngee hookii kono nge maayaani " !
Kadi fenaande alaa leydi , ɗo tawɗaa ɗu fof aɗa foti heen haɓeeɗdi .
Kadi gartol ngol waɗata ko tawa jaŋde woɗɗoyii , ɗum ena waawi addude caɗeele e artuɓe jooni .
Kadi gila hi taande 2012 , o mbo udditi duɗal Pulaar to saare wi’eteende Siñcaŋ Suleymaan he tunndu Koldaa , jaŋngata heen ko sukaaɓe e mawɓe o mbo yoɓa jaŋnginoowo o fotde : 30 000 CFA , kala lewru .
Kadi gila ndeen ɓe ceeraani he jeertinde aduna oo e kala jaɓɗo heɗaadeɓe wonnde hayso e ɓe njaɓi wonnde Fulɓe nana he pelle jihaadiyankeeɓe kadi ene mbaɗa bonanndeeji kaantoriɗɗi ne , soldateeɓe Mali ɓee ne nana mbara siwil en rewɓe , sukaaɓe e nayeeɓe Fulɓe ɓe ngalaa fof ko mbaɗi .
Kadi golle ɗee ƴetti fotde duuɓi cappanɗe tati .
Kadi haa hannde omo softi , omo darodii e FƁPM he kala darnde ummanii .
Kadi hakkunde ɗee ɗemɗe , gostondiral woodaano sabu dokkule ɗee jaaɓondiraani ( nanondirtaa ) .
Kadi he ɗiin yontaaji annduɓe juulɓe ɓee tawi ƴellitii ɗeen gannde haa daɗi ɗo Gerek en ɓe tolninoo heen ɗo .
Kadi heewaani dille no feewi .
Kadi heewi wonde arɗo pobbi ko reyru .

Kadi ina hurɓa .
Kadi ina teskaa so mbaroodi leltiima e keeci mum tan firti ko jaɓii foolaama .

Kadi ko ɓuri heewde ko e kalifaandi arɗo oo wonata .
Kadi kuɓɓam ɗam addi cuurki ɓaleewi kurum , tekkuki , haa yimɓe natti yiyondirde e koye mum en .

Kadi luure maa kewoy hakkunde leyɗe , paatuɗe e kuutoragol ngaluuji denndaaɗi .
Kadi ma fottu ɗoo e yimɓe iwruɓe to banngeeji kala he leyɗeele takkiiɗe ɗoo ɗee , tawa addi ɗum en tan ko yiilaade Allah .
Kadi mbayliigu doosɗe ɗee 1961 nguu ko ɗoon woppi ngaal kuulal .
Kadi miɗo siñña .
Kadi murtuɗo wonaa jime tan winndi , o winndi gannde keewɗe .
Kadi ndee nde waawaa waɗeede e Enternet , ko e ɗerewol tan .

Kadi nguu kawgu ena jaɓɓoraa weytaare alaa ɗo haaɗi e nokkuuji arani-en , ɗanniyaŋkooɓe e Faraysenaaɓe ummiiɓe e leyɗeele goɗɗe .
Kadi nii tigi woni fayndaare nde .
Kadi no pulaar way saraade e yaajde ni , ko noon kadi Fulɓe ngoniri joom en enɗameeji en he nder jookdu Afrik .
Kadi nokku o fccaa waɗaa no departamaaji ni ( Riwaq ) , fannu ganndal fof rokka departamaa mum .
Kadi o rokkii laamu Turki miliyonŋ gooto dolaar ( 615 miliyoŋ fcfa ) .
Kadi o wiyi " onon " haalpulaar'en eɗen ngulla dental kono en kono en ndentaani .

Kadi omo winndatnoo he tati gadane ɗee he huwtoraade alkule ajami ( alkule Arab ) .
Kadi peeje ƴettee ngam ciynugol ngol , ine heen peeje njuɓɓudi e tippudi fof .
Kadi sinno ko Kagame haalata ɗoon , o wiyataa " Tutsi en e Hutu en mbarondirii " sibu ina anndaa ko warhoore leñol Tutsi en waɗaa to Ruwanndaa .
Kadi so deppi ngummaniima rewngo , ko majji fof ndenndata fudo ngoo , hay so tawii ne ko reyru wooturu ummii , gori ɗii ndenndat .
Kadi so haaɓre arii , alaa gannduɗo ko waɗata !
Kadi so laamɗo oo maayii , e nder sarɗiiji Gaboo , happo yuɓɓinde suɓngooji ko balɗe 45 haa e lebbi tati .
Kadi so o yimii toon maa oon waaw yiyde hol co’anɗe yimɓe ɓee njogotoo heen , holno ɓe mbaɗata ha ɓe kollira wetaare maɓɓe .
Kadi so pobbi mbaɗii fudo wiyatee e pulaar ko " jeelɗi " .
Kadi tagopeeje njaltata ko he duule punndi koode .
Kadi tawa ina mbaawa addande mo ñaamde e yarde kala nde o woni e yolnde , o hooƴaa ( o heyɗi ) walla o ɗomɗi .
Kadi tawata ko mawnii , mawngu kadi ko maale leefre .
Kadi tawde ñalnde heen woni 30 Koorka , janngo mum alaa
Kadi wiyde addi Farayse to Mali tawo ko ngam hisnude " nafooje mum " , ko bonnude haala mum , sibu ko huunde anndaande .
Kadi wonaa fulɓe tan ndañata ɗee caɗeele .
Kadi yimɓe ine njenanaa wonde " golle he ceŋol " walla mbiyen aadaaji men golle maa nattu waade no mbaanoo nii .
Kadi ñuuñu wuuri ko ngabbon e ceŋle , ɓadondiral nguurndam ɗam ina heɓi ɗo ceeraagu waawaa woodde .
Kadi ɓe innu ɗen dow ɓee hono mum en nana Fuuta , Ɓunndu , Fuladu , Ferlo e Ñooro di Rip ( Siin e Saalum ) .
Kadi ɗowngo mum ɓuri newaade , ine waawi ooñteede , hayliteede ekn .
Kadi ɗum yaajiino sanne he .
Kadi ɗuum ene addanamo rewde e laawol ngol ene fayra mo e ɗuum ɗoon .
Kadi ɗuum fawotoo ko e jarribo heso ngam ƴeewde so tawii ɗuum ene aaɓno .
Kadii e nguurndam kulle kala , heen ko ɓesni ( ɓeyni ) , bonki mum e ñanngeende , mum hinaa ɓesdoo .
Kadii fulɓe hina njogii feƴƴo , ɓaƴƴal , ko e reenaade woto lekki ki maay , ko ɗuum waɗii heɓe peƴƴa ngoon feƴƴo .
Kadii heɓe nganndi e fowru ko ɓe nganndaa e kulle goɗɗe .
Kadii hina mbaawi yahde haa naata wuro , tawa alaa ko mbonni .
Kadii hinaa heewi so laawii nayi dartoo heɗoo .
Kadii hinaa ndogana haa ɓadoo nguus ulla e mum lesdi .
Kadii hinaa teskaa fowru hinaa wiya : " e jimol mum , maa walla jargoore mum e mbabba .
Kadii hinaa teskaa nde kulle tinata , tawata ko gasi .
Kadii hinaa teskaa so fowru jibinaama , yahii haa entaama , fuɗɗiima mawnude .
Kadii ko e kulle jammaaje jeyaa so hiiri tan ngonata ko e tallasde ina ndilla ina keblanoo yaltude .
Kadii ko e kulle ɓurɗe muusde sonngere .
Kadii ko ɓuri heewde njuru hisnirta nguura mum , ko waɗde e reedu .
Kadii ngel sonngataa , ina sella tawaa ko famɗude ngel nafoore addi haa ngel yaltinaa dental .
Kadii so njeelii sonngataa .
Kadii wontii hannde ngaddinaaji , e yoga e miijooji fulɓe .
Kadiso tawii ɗemngal woodaano , ngootaagu renndo ngam haɓtaade doole tageefo e musiibaaji beeyooji duumotaako ( amooji , heege , conngon , cumuuji .
Kaftii-mi , nootitii-mi e daande moolo ndee .
Kahayɗi ko wuro heedngo bannge fuɗnaange worgo Muritani , jiimngo e maayo senegaal bannge mum rewo .
Kajjaa e heedooɓe woɗɓe ɓee ena puuɗii , ena moorii ena cacci haa njooɗi .
Kala
Kala Fuutannke biyoowo mbiimi ina nyaaga yo sood lefol ngol .
Kala bannge ina waɗi beɗi joy mburu mawɗi kala heen mbeɗu ina e dow mum oliif e tamarooje ina taarnaa e saraaji mum ( episeriiji ) .
Kala bayɗo heen no Baaba Talla , mo alaa hay mbuuɗu , hay mbuuɗu alaa ɗum , woni kaalaawo heen goonga , mo konngol mum teskaaka .
Kala baɗɗo ko heewɓe mbaɗaani , tawi ko e moƴƴere , maa dañ kadi ko heewɓe ndañaani e moƴƴere .
Kala baɗɗo ɗuum , yo anndu wallitii Fooyre Ɓamtaare .
Kala belaaɗo ina waawi " ɓoornude Facebook wutte Pulaar " , woni tawa so neɗɗo ina waawi Pulaar , ina waawa huutoraade ɗum , sibu jamirooje e jamminooje Facebook ɗee fof ko e Pulaar ngonata .
Kala biyoowo noon na ardina goɗɗum ko waawi wonde fof gaa diine lislaam , yo juumum oo anndu ardinii jaasre gaa neɗɗaagal .
Kala cafroowo gonɗo e falnde nde hee , mi yahii toon .
Kala caɗeele , naamne , jowe , wasiyaaji ko to ndeen lowre waɗetee .
Kala ceerno mo o yeewtidnoo , yeeɓiino luggiɗanagol makko e ngootampaagu Allah .
Kala ceɓorɗo walla mo saɓori oo .
Kala cubballo jeyaaɗo , tuggude e diiwaan Laaw , Mboon , Suska , Soowa , Edi haa addan maa e diiwaan Ceelaaw , ena anndi ngol etee so ngol innaama , so mawɗo , so suka , maa wood ko ɓernde mum miijii walla yiila hoore , fawta heen eskey aduna .
Kala daaroowo ina jogii ciŋkal e fannuuji jangiñankooji haala neɗɗo oo .
Kala dille ɗee fowru dilli so mawɓe fulɓe nanii hinaa nganndi , ko ɗee dille pirata .
Kala duumiiɗo e ɗum ina foti daɗde .
Kala e maɓɓe koriiɗo sakkeede , suusaa hootirde juuɗe ɓole .
Kala e maɓɓe noddaaɗo , feewnitoo , diwa .
Kala e miliyaaruuji ɗiɗi huutortooɓe WhatsApp ɓee caliiɗo ɗii sarɗiiji kesi , waawataa hankadi huutoraade WhatsApp .
Kala e mon
Kala e mon duwatooɗo yo fuɗɗoro yettude geno toowɗo oo , e juulde e Annabi , ( JKM ) .
Kala falnde hannde nde njahɗaa he nder Fuuta , ma a hawru e fiiliiɓe leppi boɗeeji ene ngoytoo ngoƴaaji falnde mum en .
Kala fannu gawƴugol seedaama toon , rewo maayo fof ina ɓawli kurum yeeɓooɓe , woɗɓe ina tolnii worgo , sabareeji ina konnga , gulaali e luukaali awluɓe e coolooji e almudɓe Ngay ina coomondiri .
Kala gardiiɗo e maɓɓe ina suuti alluwal binndangal innde lekkol wuro mum .
Kala gollal ngal ɓe teskii ene moƴƴi e ɓesnguuji ɗii , ɓe cuusna , ɓe mballita .
Kala golloowo ɗum , yoo o laaɓnu ɓernde makko , o yiɗana
Kala golluɗuɗo noon dañat ngartam .
Kala gonnduɗo e oon rafi yo o fiññino bete omo safroo .
Kala gootel he guurɗe-ɓosooje boom ene jogii keeriiɗe mum fotde he no tago mbaydi mum rokkiri ɗum .
Kala goɗɗum ko wonaa ɗuum , hayso wonaa mehre ne , tiiɗaani ɗo makko .
Kala gure gonɗe e ooɗoo nokku njeyaa ko e Damga ;
Kala hannde ko mbiy-ɗaa , so a ŋaaɓtii hunuko maa , a haalii tan , rewete !
Kala he men laaɓndaaɗo , yoo o wiy ko o Pullo , ɗemngal
Kala heen Duɗal meteyoo ina jogii kettol keeringol tijjorgol bolol e doole guubiliiji ngam ñemtinde ƴellitagol majji .
Kala heen gootel won ɗo heedi e juɓɓondiral juɓɓe ɗee .
Kala heen ngarndi he ɗo laamu mumen haaɗi , woodat ɗo tiisi walla woppa ɗoon jalte mum .
Kala heen poolaaɗo waɗtee jiyaaɗo ( riimayɓe ) ligginteeɗo nder ndema .
Kala heen yimre , ina teskee konnguɗi puɗɗorɗi ɗi keewaani mbaylaandi so ummiima e yimre feewde e yimre woɗnde .
Kala humpaaɗo yo janngu deftere Dr .
Kala jagguɗo rajo ngoo ɓe heɗto jeewte pulaar , heɗoo pine e peeje ɓamtaare men haa waktu 15 w pine .
Kala jaroowo he ndee tufnde , mizo ñaagii nde wazata heen to jeyaa , to woni , ko gollatoo he leñol ngol e njiytam mum .
Kala jiytuɗo walla pirtuɗo naamnde ɗee ko kañum wontata laamɗo leydi ndii .

Kamiyoŋ oo na rimndunoo bagaas haa heewi .

Kamɓe
Kamɓe , ɓe ɓaarii bannge hirnaange , ɓe ndewi e nokkuuji kaalaaɗi dow ɗii , ɓe taƴti maayo haa ɓe ngari Barooɓe Jakel .
Kamɓe annduɓe ɓee noon ko ɓe hoolkisiiɓe tawo ko ɓe kaalii koo , haa ɓe nganndi ine aaɓnoo .
Kamɓe calinoo ɗaanaade e nder harkille .
Kamɓe e jannguɓe pulaar ɓolo ɓee fof ndenndi ngal .
Kamɓe e ɓesnguuji maɓɓe kala ɓe nguuri ko he kulol e jerminaare .
Kamɓe fof , ɓe njetti mawɗo leydi Senegaal e ɗee ɗoo golle paayodinɗe ko adii nde mawɗo leydi Senegaal , M .
Kamɓe fof e anndude fowru hinaa yaawi hunduko saka nde yiirii .
Kamɓe fof eɓeni ɗoo .
Kamɓe fof ko ɓe ustoraaɓe terɗe .
Kamɓe fof ko ɗoo e Farayse ɓe njibinaa , ɓe mawni .
Kamɓe fof o salii ɓe .
Kamɓe fof ɓe caliima heftinde Isra'el ena woodi .
Kamɓe fof ɓe ngari hay gooto heddaaki .
Kamɓe fof ɓe njillaama .
Kamɓe fof ɓe ŋabbi e dow saret , ɓe njahi to daral .
Kamɓe hawaariyankooɓe ɓee ɓe calii ñaamde liingu nguu ngam hulde hoto ɓe ndañde caɗeele .
Kamɓe kala ɓe tina wonde dowla o ina reeni kisal maɓɓe tee ina fotndi ɓe kamɓe kala , ko aldaa e paltoor .
Kamɓe kala ɓe tina wonde dowla oo ina reeni kisal maɓɓe tee ina fotndi ɓe kamɓe kala , ko aldaa e paltoor .
Kamɓe kala ɓe ƴeewondiri .
Kamɓe koy ndemaandi maɓɓe , ɓe nguuri ɓe nguuraani e njiggaandi .
Kamɓe maslooɓe ɓe ɓe mbaawii teskaade wonde Madagaskaarnaaɓe kala ina kawri e nanondiral politik keɓangal ngal .
Kamɓe mawɓe ɓee , e meer wuro ngoo , ɓe tawtoraama batu kuuɓtodinngu lappol ngol yuɓɓini ɗoon nguu .
Kamɓe ndenndi fedde renndo ko aldaa e ceerungal , ardiiɓe ɗiɗo , capaato ( ɓaleejo ) e pullo cawndondiri ɗoon .
Kamɓe ne he ɗiin yontaaji , ɓe njooɗotono he nder Eglisaaji seernaaɓe ɓee ene mbaajooɓe he ɗemngal latin , tawa keeweendi e maɓɓe faamataa ko ɓeen kaalata .
Kamɓe ngenndiyankooɓe leñol men wirniiɓe ɓee , sikke alaa ko ɓe mawnuɓe tigi ; mawnin'de ɓe noon , ko mawnin'de ko'e men .
Kamɓe ngonnoo jeyɓe diƴƴe les njimaandi jom-leydi’en , woni " Jiyaa’en " ɓe Soni Aali Beer teetti laamu e juuɗe mum en .
Kamɓe njanngidi ekkol , kono suka gorko oo ko njeeygu tan yiɗnoo .
Kamɓe njaŋndnoo to Duɗal Piir .
Kamɓe njoɓata gollotooɓe ekn .
Kamɓe tato fof ɓe ndummbaa ɗo Daŋana ɗoo , hade maɓɓe joñoyeede to Seeju nder Kasamaas .
Kamɓe wonɓe Farayse ɓee noon , ɓe mbiyi ko " sarɗiiji ɗii ina poti hoybineede e laɓɓineede .
Kamɓe yahɓe ɓee fof en nduwaniima ɓe jaaƴnde moƴƴere .
Kamɓe ɓurnoo jokkondirde e Afrik to bannge njulaagu jiyaaɓe haa e hitaande 1738 .

Keeri burkina uddaama , haɗde lelnaama .
Keeriindi gaaci ɗii noon wonno ko ƴettude hitooji gaaci Afriknaaji o renndina ɗum he e hitooji orkester kalaasik tawa fof ene renta wona fiingo Afriknaawo .
Keerol gonngol hakkunde Niiseer e Niiseriyaa hannde ngol woɗɗondiraani e keerol gonnongol hakkunde laamlaamu Sokoto , bannge worgo , e laamuuji jeynooɗi koye mum en ( Gobiir , Maradi e Sinndeer ) bannge rewo .
Keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab e dewondiral geɗe ɗee
Keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab ina haawnii gila e fuɗɗoode mum , sibu dalliniraa ko ɗaɗndude en e wostaare to bannge pinal , wostaare jotondirnde e njiimaandi koloñaal , kono ngol wonti kadi ko feere waɗtirde Muritani fof mbaadi ngootiri , e waasde teskaade pine leydi ndii keddiiɗe ɗee .
Keew-ɗen waɗde Korompolle tan ko he ataaye mbele ene uurna ɗum .
Keew-ɗen wiyde yimɓe wuurnooɓe ko adii yonta men ko " mawɓe adiiɓe " .
Keewal haalooɓe ngal , muynuɓe ngal haɗaani so a arii e leyɗeele bayɗi hono Senegaal , Muritani , Gine , laamu ɓuri mawninde ko ɗemɗe goɗɗe , potal alaa !
Keewal yimɓe terɗe fedde ndee yettiima 3185 neɗɗo .
Keewal ɗemɗe fotaani wonde paddal .
Keeweende depiteeji wondiiɓe laamu nguu njaɓii kuulal ngal e dow seeɗa mo lanndaaji cerindiiɗi ɗii njogii toon .
Keeweendi e yimɓe ɓee kaalatnoo ko calte walla ɗemɗe mum en diiwaneeje .
Keeweendi he Oropnaaɓe e yimɓe Orop mbaawaano faggitaade he ɗeen gannde nde tawno ɓe mbaawaano taraade e winndude , kadi ɓe nanataa Gerek e Latin , hayso tawii dee , so ɓe njahiino to Eglisaaji maɓɓe seernaɓe maɓɓe mbaajotonoo ɓe ko e ɗemngal Gerek ( Europe de l’Est ) walla Latin ( Europe de l’Ouest ) .
Keeweendi maɓɓe heen Ine waawi faamraade moƴƴugol janngirɗe maɓɓe jaaɓi-haaɗtirde e waawde Amerik fooɗtude annduɓe winndere ndee kala .

Kibaaru mum ?
Kibaaru noon lewru ndu cikkataa tato ene mbaawi roondaade wonndu 384 .
Kibaaru noon taarotooɗo suudu ndu tawi ko caggal wuro woni ?
Kibaaru on anndinaali ko honɗum e nawnaare woni sabu makko .
Kibbo coroowo he sore-ore , ladoowo e lade-lade , birgoowo he birge-birge , soppinoo waɗa he bore ngaari .

Kikiiɗe , ngol hirndani Seyyen Gababe .
Kikiiɗe , ñalnde 6 ndee , kuccondiral waɗi hakkunde mbiruuji Muritani e Senegaal to Rajo e Tele Fulɓe .
Kikiiɗe 12 mee , laakta-ɗen mo to Mederdara , e to Butelmiit .
Kikiiɗe kala hirndotoo ko daaydaayre ( parade de pirogues ) e maayo men maayo Fuuta .
Kikiiɗe ko fuku bal hakkunde Moongel e Lugge Sayɓooɓe ( 0-0 ) , jamma ko hiirde pinal ; yuɓɓini hiirde nde ko goomu pinal wuro Moongel .
Kikiiɗe mum , tawi denɗiiko oo yahii ko ina wona waktu ko adii ɗuum , ɓe njahdi e makko fotde 400 meeteer , gooto e maɓɓe girbii saayaande makko , ɗiɗaɓo oo wiyi ina nannga junngo makko ñaamo tawi Wullum sortii wolweere mum , kono tawi tataɓo oo girbiima fetel makko , felli mo hade makko fellude wulaad biri en tatato ɓee .

Kippu garɗo ɗiɗaɓo maa heɓ fotde 30 miliyoŋ dolaar .
Kippu gooto wiɗtooɓe to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Tours ( Farayse ) ine yiyti yowiti gooto nder rawaandu jaakoraaɗo wayloyde safaara nguɗu .
Kippu tataɓo maa heɓ 27 miliyoŋ , e kippu nayaɓo 25 miliyoŋ dolaar .
Kippuuji jettiiɗi jeetaɓal joofnirde maa keɓ gooto kala 13 miliyoŋ dolaar ; kippuuji 13 keddiiɗi ɗii maa nawtu heen gooto kala miliyoŋaaji 9 !
Kippuuji keddiiɗi ɗii pecca ko heddii koo , 316 miliyoŋ dolaar .

Ko Alla
Ko Alla nii anndi , mbele so hunuko koo heewii , maa joom mum siftor en .
Ko Alla tan anndi .
Ko Alla waɗi , pirtoowo woodaa !
Ko Alla waɗi .
Ko Alla waɗi koo waylotaako ; kono ko yimɓe mbaɗi koo , ina wayloo tigi , mbele debbo ina waawa daraade darnde timmunde , darnde addanoore ɗum ƴellitaade , e faamde ngonka mum , saloo famɗineede , saloo kalifaandi mbele ina waawa ƴellitaade .

Ko adii , mo ina ɗaɓɓa kaayit nasiyonaalitee foti ndaartude ɗum ko e diiwaan ɗo winnditii ɗo , waɗa ɗaɓɓaande mum yahdunde e denndaangal kaayitaaji ceedtotooɗi moritaniyaagal makko no sariya wiyri ni .
Ko adii fof , foti teskeede e ngalɗoo diɗɗal , ngal waɗi ko sukaaɓe tokosɓe .
Ko adii fof , kelme amen keewi wonde ko ɓutte , payɗe .
Ko adii fof , ko ɗaɓɓirde nelduɗo ma kabaaru oo ( so tawii ko a neldaaɗo mo ) hol to heɓi ɗum , haa o haalan maa ko laaɓi .
Ko adii fof , lannda kaa hollitii wonde woni darnde mum ko " yettinde ngenndi Senegaal eɓɓo waylitde yuman saɗiiji leydi ndii " ngam ƴellitde demokaraasii e nuunɗal laamu e nder leydi ndii .
Ko adii fof , o yaltaani leydi Serbiy ndii sabu ko e nder laamorgo ngoo e suppitorii wonde cafroowo safaruuji birniiɗi .
Ko adii fof , woon hatanteeɓe luutndiiɓe-macungaagu ɓe mbeltaaki heen .
Ko adii fof eɗen ciftina wonnde Makki Sal hayso tawii o jibinaaka he nder Fuuta , kadi o nehaaki toon ne , o innitortoo ko wonde Fuutanke nde tawnoo ko toon jibnaaɓe makko ɗiɗi fof ngiwi koɗoyi Siin , leydi Seereraaɓe , he wuro Fatik ngo o jibinaa ngo .
Ko adii fof ko a ) wiyeede ɗemɗe ɗee maa njariɓe fotaani wonde sabu ɗuum waɗanooma he ko yawti haa hawra wonde golle ɗee moƴƴii , kadi UNESCO wasiyii ɗuum yoo yaajne he nder duɗe leydi ndii kala .
Ko adii fof ko humre waɗetee , joom mum naata e nder ngaska kaa tawi ina nawori ɓoggol , wona e memmbaade haa heɓa hoyre mbaroodi ngonndi nder ndii , fiila heen ɓoggol , walla haɓɓa hunuko mayri .
Ko adii fof ko nde yeewtere njalniika , nde tawnoo ko Pulaar waynoon .
Ko adii fof ko ngardiigu nuunɗungu , ngoɗɗitiingu politik e jinngere .
Ko adii hikka , Kamaruun idii yahde nayaɓal joofirde e hitaande 1990 , rewi heen ko Senegaal e hitaande 2002 , e Ganaa e hitaande 2010 .
Ko adii jiyondiral am en , miɗo mawninatnoo ñalngu nguu , mi innira ɗum juulde jime he kala duuɓi 10 .
Ko adii ko eɗen ngara e jaabtawol ngol , alaa e sago tawo ɗisen ɗoo winndannde yowitiinde e kelmeendi , ngam waawde yaltinde heen kelme tokaraaje .
Ko adii kóó fóf , mi siftina ko kaalnóómi e puɗɗórgel- golle Paalel Njuumri :
Ko adii nde beɗel ngel rewata laawol , heen gooto yimi daawe cukaagu mum e nder leegal Sammba Cillo Kayhayɗi .
Ko adii nde njumpaten he maayo ñalaaɗe oo basorɗo , njubben tawo he faayiida innde makko Murtuɗo ndee .
Ko adii nde o uddata haala makko , o heɓii hollitde wonde so Suleymaani Baal anndaama to lelii , garɗo fof tawa huɓeere ena mahaa , ena sinkaa , arkille ena diilaa nder heen , caggal Alla , njettoor keeriiɗo fayti ko e Jiingenaaɓe e fedde Suleymaani Baal wonnde to Ieydi Itali .
Ko adii ndeen noon , ma mi heɓtu puccu Laam Tooro Sidiiki ndaneewu nguu , mi hokka ngu Arɗo Mbantu , ɓe hono jaggunooɗo Baydi Kacce , e cuusnooɗo wonande en , saanga nde denndaangal wallidiiɓe men ciññatnoo kulol sara haɓdiiɓe men , seegiiɓe ( hono Baydi Kacce Paam , e Laam Tooro Sidiki , e Mammadu Yero ) .
Ko adii noon nde laaɗe ɗee njoletee , taw ko jeemaayo en njolii e maayo hee , ɓe kaayii ngo , gooto e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe Sih Mammadu Awƴi ɓe , ɓe ngollii hono ko taaniraaɓe ngollatnoo koo .
Ko adii seeɗa keɓgol leyɗeele Afrik jeytaare mum en tuggi 1946 haa 1991 he pusgol Dental sowiyet , teskaama follooji limti- limtinɗi ɓaawo hare aduyankeere ɗimmere .
Ko adii taw ɗuum fof alaano heen .
Ko adii ɗiiɗoo peeñɗi noon , alaa ko joomum hollirta tigi rigi kono so tawii neɗɗo ina wuuri he sato ɗo ñawngu nguu teskaa , omo foti , ko yaaccii , loskoyde ɓalndu makko to doktoor .
Ko adii ɗum , ardiiɓe Fedde Baaba Leñol e Mawɓe wuro Mbaañ fof njettii arnooɓe tawtoreede , ummiiɓe to woɗɗi e to ɓadii .
Ko adii ɗum , he nder Orop fof ko ɗemngal Gerek e ɗemngal Latin tan ngonnoo ɗemɗe paggitorɗe ganndal , ko kamɗe ngonnoo binndeteeɗe , janngirteeɗe .
Ko adii ɗum lefol Ngay meeɗnoo fiileede ko ñalnde 22 , Morso 2016 .
Ko adii ɗum noon o wasiyii nde hay gooto waasata haalde ko ina wallita ɗee golle .
Ko adii ɗuum , Alhajji Umar Taal mo Fuuta Tooro , rewiino Fuladu e hitaande 1846 .
Ko adii ɗuum , ganndo goɗɗo , karallo ko faati e ɗee geɗe wasiyiima ko ɓooyi kuutoragol Signal .
Ko adii ɗuum , o gollaniima laamuuji Muritani gila yonta Muttaar wul Daddah .
Ko adii ɗuum , o hokkanooka ɗoyngol .
Ko adii ɗuum Gorbacef wasiyinooma ngootaagu Orop fof .
Ko adii ɗuum jaambureeɓe , fotde 300 Ɓaleeɓe Afiriknaaɓe njaggaama nder yontere wootere , cokaa sibu woytoraandu ɓe ngalaa kaayitaaji jamirooji ɓe jooɗaade he leydi hee .
Ko adii ɗuum ngarmi-ngaraa heewiino hakkunde makko e laaminooɓe reedu Fuuta oon yonta , ɓeen ngoni Almaami Ibiraa Almaami mo Laaw , Andul Laamtooro mo Tooro yanti Almaami Yirlaaɓe .
Ko aduna oo addiri noon , haa ɓuuɓa leelanii keyɗuɗo !
Ko alaa e sago tiiɗno-ɗen njarlito-ɗen , ɗuum jarana en kasoo e karwaas ; no Murtuɗo joop ( yerham mum wiyatnoo ni .
Ko alla e daddooje Farayse biyeteeɗo " Jaguar " ɗee , ngummi ñalnde heen to foŋngorde mum'en to Dakaar ngari hakkitde Maurinati , wuro ngoo daɗi jaggeede !
Ko almaa en mahi ngal hedde 1880 haa hedde wolde winndereere adannde , nde keɓti diiwaan Alsace-Lorraine oo .
Ko anndude huutoraade ɗum ko nafoore e ƴellitaare .
Ko anndude ɓe ɗuum addani mi waɗde doole maaɓe e heblo ngoo .
Ko annduɓe buri sikkude , ko laana ka ko piyaaka jamngel leydi caggal nde ka naati e ƴiiwoonde hittude .
Ko ardii fof , eɗen poti siftorde gootiɗingol ina waawi jogaade jaɓɓe ɗiɗi : peewnitgol yuɓɓo kelmeendi e peewnitgol darngo ɗemngal ngal .
Ko ardii fof jokkondiral waɗdaama e ardiiɓe duɗe ɓee , caggal ɗum jannginooɓe ɓee njokkondiraama ngam famminde ɓe tigi rigi hol ko woni loowdi eɓɓoore ndee , ɓe paama ɗum .
Ko ardii fof koko haaloove Pulaar mbiyi ko " so fowru riddii sagata , haa naati wuro , yiyi zum ko e javval sagata o " Sinno laamu Senegaal waynoo kono foti wayde nih , maa won ko vivve mum mbazaaka e laddeeji he .
Ko ardiiɓe dowlaaji ciifɗi nanondiral ngal ndentata , kam e gollooɓe he renndo siwil , ko wayi no Dente ɗe ngonaa laamu , senndikaaji , e pelle antampirisaaji .
Ko ari hikka ko noon hono mum suwaano waɗde , to bannge yaajde e hulɓinaade , etee ari ko e nokkuuji ɗi meeɗa arde .
Ko añde loritaade tan e wiyde ngaddee !
Ko añɓe ngaani tan ena mbicca e mɗɗ mbonɗam kono nafaani .
Ko aɗa yiɗi ɗum tan , a yiɗaa ɗuma , ɓe tiima heen : ɓee ina monngoo , ɓeya ina koɓoo makka ina ciirta ñebbe , heddiiɓe ina muuɗa padaas e jaheeje , ina njartoo ndiyam tawi jeewte e yanooji hakkunde maɓɓe taƴondiraani .
Ko baaba mum piileteeɗo hannde oo wonnoo , Hammadi Alasan Mbooc , o wonii heen duuɓi jeeɗiɗi , o sankii .
Ko baasal wonande fulɓe , ko baasal wonande kadi Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani , sibu Ustaas jeyaa ko he jagge tawtoraaɗe batuuji cosgol fedde ndee .
Ko baawɗe Alla
Ko balɗe seeɗa fawtii heen , terɗe yuɓɓo Halfinaango ndeenka e kisal Nijerya ( DSS ) , yantude e huunde soldateeɓe konu Nijerya ngari ɗo ñiiɓirde fedde ndee ñalnde Mawbaare 23 Siilo , saanga 3 : 40 kikiiɗe njaggimo .
Ko balɗe seeɗa pawii heen ñande , 21/04/2022 muritaninaaɓe 9 asooɓe kaŋŋe kadi ndaɗi piyanɗe ɗe saharanaaɓe toɓɓunoo ɗumen , saraaji Geleybaat ɗiɗo e maɓɓe mbarmi heen gooto ko tampuɗo no feewi .
Ko bannge mayre hirnaange ko ɓuri heewde e njanguuji iwratnoo Riisi ( jangu Napoleyon 1812 , njangu Almaañ Hitler .
Ko biyeteeɗo Abbaas Sammba Faal waawni mo , suusni mo haa o waɗti yimde .
Ko boomaare mawnde wonande ɓesnguuji keewɗi
Ko bulɗata ko fawii tan ko e caafe naange ɗee e golle henndu weeyo ngoo .
Ko caggal compugol demokarasii e Moritani e hitaande 1991 sabu baawnugol leydi farayse e lelnugol sariyaaji laawɗinooji partiiji politigi e jaayɗeele , nde fedde nde etii ɓamtude golle e wuurtinde F .
Ko caggal innugol ɗiiɗoo nokkuuji hankadi , mawɗo diiwaan oo yettitii dingiral jaɓɓungal ngal .
Ko caggal makko ko Ceerno Abuu Siraajo ɓami konngol , manti denndaangal banndiraɓe tawtoranooɓe , semmbini haala makko kaa teeŋtini ka .
Ko caggal makko njanguuji puɗɗii e nder Burkinaa .
Ko caggal nde guurte ( powtal ) ari , ɓe piɓi naɓude ɗeen golle faa yotto to gure e ngalluuje Burkina ɗe Fulɓe tawetee e mum ɗee fu .
Ko caggal nde o dañi duuɓi jeenay ( 9 ) o naati jaŋde Quraana e duɗal baabi makko Mustafa Ñannga ( meeɗii ardineede wuro ngoo e maayirɗe kitaale 90 ) , miñum baabi makko Aamadu Ñannga caŋkiiɗo law e kitaale 70 .
Ko caggal peƴtooru ɓe njalti UFDD ( Union des forces pour la démocratie et le développement – Dental Doole Demokarasi e Ƴellitaare- ) , dental ngal Mahamat Nuuri ardinoo .
Ko caggal seppooji rewɓe e tikke janngooɓe teeɗantooɓe potal , ko nder nduun iiñturu renndoyankeewu ko kapiteen Aamadu Tumaani Tuure e oon sahaa e wondiiɓe liɓi laamu Jeneraal Muusaa Tarawore e hitaande 1992 .
Ko caggal ɗeeɗoo geɗe fof Geno toowɗo oo , humani hakkunde Aadama e Hawaa .
Ko caggal ɗuum , he nder hitaande 2002 , naɓokayanke goɗɗo , Aamadu Coor , suɓiimo rokkimo rol dowrowo ( acteur pricipal ) he nder filma mum " Maayel " .
Ko caggal ɗuum Holanndee en e Engele en e Faraysenaaɓe ngari .
Ko caggal ɗuum geno lonngini annabi Nuuhu ko Aawaja tan waawi addude lekki potki waɗireede laana kaa .
Ko caggal ɗuum hillanooɓe heen bannge kala cemmbinta hujja mo keeranii oo fawaade e ƴiye sariyaaji laawɗuɗi nder Moritani .
Ko caggal ɗuum mooɓondire leyɗeele pelpolɓondiri haa teeŋti he Haɓɓere fuɗnaange ( Bloc de l’Est ) e Haɓɓere hirnaange ( Bloc de l’Ouest ) .
Ko caggal ɗuum o bayyini ƴeesagol gollordu nduu .
Ko caggal ɗuum o naati jaŋde Farayse .
Ko caggal ɗuum o rokkaa innde Murtuɗo nde o anndiraa he ñalaaɗe teddungal aadee .
Ko caggal ɗuum ɓe ndañi ganndo mawɗo ina wiyee Aali ɓiyi Asbaaɗi bun Haaruuna ( JKM ) .
Ko cakalo , jaawɗo woowde , kaayanaaɗo njimri mo welaani daande , wiɗtoyaŋke , ganngo Aduna e leƴƴi mum .
Ko cakkitiiɗo oo woni hannde ɓurɗo waɗeede
Ko ceerno Saydu Nuuru mo Paate Galo jaarnoo e ɓurɗo winndere ko noon e jime goɗɗe Alliyankooje haa teeŋti noon e jime almudɓe Ngay , fof o waɗii heen ñalɗi e ñalaaɗe e ñaamgolluuji .
Ko ceerno maa rokki min bifirɗe ngonɗe e hoore maa ɗee .
Ko ceɗta kunal kadi ɓe keɓata e ngalu leydi hee , sabu politik paltoor to bannge faggudu tuugiiɗo e baɗtugol sosiyateeji laamu sosiyateeji keeriiɗi bannginteeji , kam e cosgol bankeeji e pelle gaddotooɗe kisal , kam e dokkitgol jamirooje awo tuugingol e heedi-heeda .
Ko ceɗta kunal rewrata heen he satelitaaji walla weeyo ( antenaaji rajo ) .
Ko comci goobaaɗi goobu Fulɓe Jaloo ɓe ɓoornii , taybaasuuji e gude nannduɗi .
Ko comciyaŋke ŋanaa hono Ummu Sih ummotooɗo Senegaal , jogori ardaade golle ɗee .
Ko cooynoto-ɗen ine ranwi koo ko ñukkulle koode , ɗe yitere neɗɗo mehre waawaa laaɓtindaade .
Ko daarol ciimtoowol geɗe bonɗe ɗe ɓaleeɓe mbaɗanoo e Muritani e hitaande 1989 .
Ko daawal daɓɓal , kuyfiɗngal .
Ko daddoowo oo yahata ko fof , nooroo na memmboo na ƴeewa so tawii alaa e ɓiɓɓe hee teɓɓitiiɗo .
Ko daliilu oon ɗoon farilla , ko fawaade e yeewtere Umar ( MAWM ) , hono nelaado Alla ( MJKM ) wi’i : " gollal neɗɗo fawii ko e anniya mum , kala neɗɗo , nguurndam mum fawii ko e anniya mum .
Ko daranaade kawral denndaangal ceŋɗe leydi ndi fof e leƴƴi mum mbele feere waawnde ƴetteede fof , maa wonii ko hol no taccinaaɓe ɓe ngartirta , walla hol no warngooji ɓennuɗi ɗi ñawndirtee walla hol no macungaagu mumtirtee tawa ko e nanondiral e ngootaagu .
Ko dañaa heen fof feccee hakkunde gure ɗee fof .
Ko daɗnoo e arnooɓe e yande e posto ngoo , ndogi ,
Ko debbo kabbaaro ko feewti e nootol comci rewɓe e worɓe .
Ko debbo lollonooɗo , ganndaaɗo , kala ɗo o rewi o teskete .
Ko denndaangal ɗee geɗe ngaddani mo wiyde ko bannge Makgadikgadi woni ñiiɓirde aadee en idiiɓe .
Ko dental heefereeɓe woni majjuɓe kaa haala Allah lugga .
Ko diidol dewngol ɗo jaalal suudu ndu kono fuɗɗi ko ɗo hakkunde suudu ɗo .
Ko diine Lislaam e Sunna Mohammed ( SAS ) min ndewi .
Ko diwooje neldetee to toowi no feewi ngam saakde toon ñilkon ( cristaux ) kaaƴe tokoñillon .
Ko dolokke gonduɗo e tuuba mbaseŋ daneejo .
Ko dum aada mo wadaaka barka .
Ko dum waɗi ko bannge gooto tan e tagofeere hoodere jaayre enen leydiyankooBe mbaawɗen yiide .
Ko dum woone adumna .
Ko duuɓi teemedere mbiyatee teemedannde .
Ko duɗal Pulaar , baɗiraangal jannginirde sukaaɓe he ɗemɗe mum en neeniije .
Ko e 2016 biyeteeɗo Mahamat Mahdi Aali sosi nde to wuro Tanwa , woyla ceɓɓitiiɗo Caad .
Ko e Jolal 2009 o yalti leydi ndii ngam safroyaade to Sawudi Arabiya .
Ko e Kommbol , Umaar Bah anndiri e Mammadu Jah , gardinooɗo leydi Senegaal .
Ko e Naasaande 3 lewru ndu Waghf felliti weeɗde jappeere mum kono laamɗo leydi ndii waɗtiimo mawɗo dowru , wiyi-mo yoo o sos dowru woɗndu .
Ko e boowal ladde fuɗnaange Caamɓe waɗatee .
Ko e cosgol e pirtugol dille e partiiji politik e nder Muritani , dille ngenndiyankooje Arab e Afrik njibinaa .
Ko e diiwaan Kaasamaas , o waɗi kawgel ngam wontude golloowo e " posto " .
Ko e dow ɗuum yimɓe kooti , kirtoyii , pooftoyii hade hiirde Baaba Maal fuɗɗaade .
Ko e eɓɓo mum wonaa .
Ko e gartal amen e nguun njillu min ɓeydii faamde wonde emin poti yaajnude ɗum e kala dilloowo e finaa tawaa , tawa ina yiytoo heen hoore mum ; tawa kadi kala to min njooɗii fof ko minen njooɗodii .
Ko e gerngal , gawri ( cammeeje walla butaali ) nokketee , waɗee e gacculi , tiree .
Ko e hitaande 1461 kontuwaar ( nokku njulaagu ) gadano e foor ( tuddunde konu hidiinde ) gasni maheede to Arguin ( e Muritani ) .
Ko e hitaande 1568 banngotooɗo biyeteeɗo yiyte ɗe , inniri ɗe Salomon ( Annabi Sileymaani ) .
Ko e hitaande 1817 Sir James Parkinson , cafroowo biritaannaajo idii teskaade baɗte maggu , kono ko e hitaande 1872 ngu inniraa mo , caggal nde ɗaɗiyanke faraysenaajo lolluɗo biyeteeɗo Jean-Martin Charco wiɗti ñawu nguu no feewi , waggini yo Parkinson teddinire innireede ngu .
Ko e hitaande 1904 , dekere goɗɗo ƴettaa ñalnde 23 oktoobar , teeŋtinoowo dekere gadiiɗo oo , kono keɓtinoowo wonde leyɗeele goɗɗe ina ngoodi ko wonaa jeyi laamu tan , ɗum woni leyɗeele jeyi ganni .
Ko e hitaande 1937 , caggal nde o resondiri he tuubaako faraysenaajo , o heɓi ngenndaagu Farayse .
Ko e hitaande 1948 waɗnoo .
Ko e hitaande 1978 Ejipt felliti welditde e Isra'el e gardagol Anuwaar el Sadaat .
Ko e hitaande 1982 puɗɗii-mi waɗde ɗum e Pulaar , kono mi ɓooyii jiñtude tigille e Farayseere , gila tuma nde njeeyatnoo-mi jaayde ( lomtaade kaaw am gooto sahaa sahaa ) .
Ko e hitaande 1983 o ari ɗoo e wuro Nuwaasoot , o naatii e duɗe Falah e tolno doge kolees 1 , 2 e 3 amo yahdini heen naatde e duɗe FƁPM : duɗe leslese , duɗal fannuuji , o waɗi Duɗal Keblorgal Jannginooɓe caggal kawgel juɓɓinanoongel e suliyee 1988 , o yaltidi e seedantaagal makko ñande 22 settamburu 1988 .
Ko e hitaande ɓennunde ndee conndi jilli heen .
Ko e hoƴom 58 Zoro Marc ɓamti fiyannde ummiinde e korneer , o diwi haa o jiimi falotooɓe Maali , o hoɓɓi ngaallo : 2-0 !
Ko e hoƴom 59 Salomon Kaluu yulfitoyi e hakkunde duuñtooɓe Nijeriyaa , o duulii tato e maɓɓe , o sokki bal oo hakkunde lajal !
Ko e hoƴomaaji battindiiɗi Iniesta heɓi bal ena teeli baŋnge ñaamo , o sokki bal e nder gacculi sahnga nde sikkanoo Epaañnajo ena oorndii .
Ko e kaa ngonka Alfaa Moolo e wondiiɓe mum ummanii hare feewde e laamɗo Mandiŋke biyeteeɗo Keekuta Soona .
Ko e kaan ngonka owgol beeli e leepte caɗtuɗe woni nde njangu Sammba Jaadanaa Njaac heblaa , siynaa e lewru seeɗto 1890 , e gardagol Ibraa Almaami , caggal cakkital kumaandaŋ Salnde .
Ko e kulle ɗe ƴeeŋataa jeyaa .
Ko e laawol ngol Wojere wiꞌi sehil mum : Musiɗɗo am , ma mi weltotono so anndii innde maa .
Ko e laawol wona e miijo am fayde e nanondiral , potal e jokkere enɗam hakkunde Muritaninaaɓe kala .
Ko e les makki jamirooje kala ƴettetenoo .
Ko e lewru Silto hee keɓ-ɗen ko en ɗaminanooki .
Ko e lewru ɓennundu nduu waɗi duuɓi jeeɗiɗi e yontere yahdunde e naange ko ayaawo habrirde senegaalnaare nde wonaa laamuyankoore 2STV sosaa .
Ko e maayirɗe hitaande 1958 o heɓi hawrude e ɓe njoofi-ɗen dow ɓee he nder batu ngu " Ɓesnguuli Afiriknaaɓe " njuɓɓinnoo to Accra laamorgo leydi Ganaa .
Ko e maayo ndiyam ummotoo , ko e maayo cakkudi ( liɗɗi ) ndañetee , fawtii heen kadi , kamɓe subalɓe awooɓe hawraama ko kamɓe ngoni hinnde tan nde nguurndam mum ɓuri hoybineede : eɓe ngawa , eɓe ndema , eɓe ngayna .
Ko e makki , o humatnoo puccu makko .
Ko e maɓɓe hare Fulɓe
Ko e maɓɓe jogatooɓe leydi ndii janngo njaltata .
Ko e mudda gardagol makko deeyre arti e wuro hee .
Ko e ndee hitaande 1818 Maasinankooɓe njaggondiri e
Ko e ndeen hare Kolonel El-Ouali waraa Haa jooni Saharaa ena mawnina innde makko sabu makko wonde jaambaaro leydi ndii .
Ko e ndeen resorde kala gollotooɓe masiŋaaji ngaanndi ɓamata humpito toɗɗiiɗo ɗemɗe ngam yaltinde ɗee ɗemɗe e tafirɗe ( topirɗe ) .
Ko e ndeen teeminannde 11ɓiire laamu nguu woni e deestaade sabu caɗeele weeyo e sato , sibu Kummbi Saaleh woni ko e nokku gaddanoowo ɗum tiimtude e denndaangal laabi njulaagu , kono ko nokku joorɗo , toɓooji mum ngalaa ɗo ndarii .
Ko e nder Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Moritani mahii-mi .
Ko e nder bunndi kaan yonta ngon-ɗen hannde , sabu so daartol hina winndee hannde e yonta ka ngon-ɗen kaa , enen en kaaletaake , waɗi noon ko en yaltuɓe daartol ( taariika ) .
Ko e nder ndeen ƴiiwoonde toɓo burgu laana Joolaa huɓɓi masiŋaaji mum fiytii e nder deedal woni e feeraade raaŋani luggere maayo haaɗngo .
Ko e nder ndiin mbaydi o dañi pellital daranaade e haɓanaade momtugol humambinndaagu leñol fulɓe hakke baawɗe makko .
Ko e nder ngaal kebungal addani Jaaynde mon Pulaagu .
Ko e nder ngoon wuro kadi o waɗi cukaagu makko walla nii boom mbiyen ko ɗoon mbootu makko daasaa , o waɗi arjagaa , muumel dorli e tuk-tukooru .
Ko e nder wuro ngoo o jaggaa ñalnde 21 Morso tawi omo fada kaar ( biis ) e dow tinndinoore ñukkindiiɓe laamu ( services secrets ) leydi ngoɗndi ndi innaaka .
Ko e nder ɗuum ,
Ko e nder ɗuum , o faamanta hoore makko , ngoƴa renndo kaa ɓurka jojjande ɗum .
Ko e nder ɗuum Aamadu Bakaw Jaw to Lisaa Tool jaltini winndannde hollitoore darnde Duɗal Piir Sañakuur e mahngo ngootaagu senegaalnaaɓe .
Ko e nder ɗuum kadi sariya karminoowo njiyaagu wootaa , gartirgol taccinanooɓe ummanaa , tawi huunde e parlemaa o welaaka ɗum .
Ko e nder ɗuum o hólliri wonde pesooɗe ene póti huutoreede : é e nder céli ; éé e nder cééli ; ó e nder ɓólél ; óó e nder ɓóólél ( hello ƳI ; o rókkii kadi kóŋnguɗi góɗɗi : kelle 27 e 81 ) .
Ko e nder ɗuum ɓe njuɓɓini yeewtere gostondiral miijooji ñalnde 14 marse 2019 to Otel Wissal , ɓe noddi heen jagge keewɗe gollooje politik e jojjanɗe aadee e renndo siwil .
Ko e ngaal daawal kadi tuubakooɓe liggotonooɓe e fedde nde wonaa laamuyankoore españool en diftaa hakkunde ɗoo e Nuwaadibu , caggal ɗum ngoppitaa nde Al qayda rokkaa njeenaari .
Ko e ngal pooɗondiral huunde e aadaaji men jooɗɗi njaɓɓetee .
Ko e ngalɗoo daawal , o hebli deftere makko joofnirde jaŋde toownde maa mbiyen to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Sorbon .
Ko e ngoo wuro kawgeadunankeeweRugby fotnoo yuɓɓineede e settaambar e oktoobar 2011 .
Ko e ngool ɗoon laawol Annabi Yuusaa rewi haa yettii nder wuro Ariihaayi e dow kattanɗe Alla toowɗo oo , nde o fooli ɓe o heɓti jawɗeele maɓɓe , o harlitii o fayi to leydi Kin-aan , ɗum noon ko nder leydi Iraak hannde ndii , o wari toon ko ina wona capanɗe tati laamɗo sabu keeferaagal mum en , o itti hurum mum en .
Ko e ngooɗoo yeeso tan mbaawaten goongɗinde wonde jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije so lelniraama nii maa jibinoy ngartam moƴƴam .
Ko e nguun batu fellitaa wonde Konngo ina heɓta jeytaare mum ñalnde 30 suwee 1960 e fawaade he ɗuum , wooteeji koko njuɓɓintee he lewru mee he nder ndeen hitaande .
Ko e nguun njillu maa eskaal maale boomaare puɗɗii feeñde e makka , sabu ko ɗoon haralleeɓe makka puɗɗii teskaade wuuraare heen wibjo .
Ko e njiimaandi makko yoga e nokkuuji poolanooɗi keɓtiti ndimaagu mum , hay so tawii , e ɗemngal , ina njaɓi yowitaare mum en laamiiɗo juulɓe jooɗotooɗo to Sokoto oo .
Ko e oo dumunna hormankooɓe ne ngummii Maruk , alaa fof bonannde nde mbaɗaani .
Ko e oon bannge yeeyooɓe liɗɗi ɓee jooɗotonoo .
Ko e oon dumunna , e lewru saawiyee 2012 , ɓiy hooreejo leydi oo fellunoo suka debbo gooto , jooɗtiiɗo e doole mum hannde , pellunooɗo ina jokki e haaju mum .
Ko e oon fannu mawɗo leydi Senegal , M .
Ko e oon mudda o rokki Xali Majaxate Kaala wirdu Tijjani .
Ko e oon sahaa , kalfinaa mi gardagol njuɓɓudi ndii .
Ko e oon sahaa , ɓesngu nguu , gila e wonɓe ɗoo e nder wuro ngoo , nder Muritani haa e wonɓe to caggal leydi njokkondiri , ndesndi geɗe ɗee haralleeɓe fanniyaŋkooɓe to bannge mahdi ngam ɓetde ngalu potngu mahreede nguu .
Ko e oon sahaa Demmba Jeey to Siiwre ari , walli mo haa jeeyɓe njaɓani mo yo o yim , kono e dow ooɗoo sarɗi : kala nde Gellaay feŋi hiirde , ko waawi dañde heen fof yo tottu jeeyo tawaaɗo fof , hay so tawii ko cukalel , oon noon itta heen ko welaa fof , rokka mo .
Ko e oon sahaa ndema maaro fuɗɗii feeñde ɗoon , ummoraade e maaro ladde ko ina wona jooni duuɓi 5 000 .
Ko e oon sahaa o yiyondiri e Muktaar wul Daddah , gardinooɗo leydi Muritani caggal nde Aamadu Ahijoo itti wirnaawo hakkunde maɓɓe , newni kadi joɗnde hakkunde maɓɓe .
Ko e oon sahaa woni nde seppo ganni waɗaa ngam hollirde Jontaaɗo Fulɓe e nder diiwaan Fuuta Tooro no foti wayde .
Ko e oon tuma teskaa waawde makko ndefu .
Ko e rogere ɗiɗaɓere ndee Kameruun filñitii , reggini hartaango e hartaango haa e hoƴom 51 , Jeremii ɗoo teelnoo e baŋnge ñaamo , udditani Eto'o junnitannde fotnde .
Ko e teddungal o lomtinaa e ngardiigu catal Kayhayɗi .

Ko e ɗanngal Bamako e hitaande 2014
Ko e ɗeen golle tuugaa ngam feewnude , he kitaale 2010 , safaara ñawu nguu , ganndiraaɗo sofosbuvir .
Ko e ɗeen golwole Damel Amari Ndella Kummba Faal e Barak Fara Pennda Teg Rella Mbooc , kawi Almaami Abdul Kadeer Kan , nanngi ɗum , coki ɗum lebbi keewɗi to Kayoor .
Ko e ɗeen keɓtinirɗe kuuɓtidinɗe , keɓtinirgal aadee anndatee wondude e tolno neɗɗaagu mum , no o neesorii tawi alanaa mo hay tanaa maa gacce .
Ko e ɗeen leyɗeele njiyaten rajooji , teleeji walla jaayndeeji binndaaɗi keewɗi .
Ko e ɗeen ñalaaɗe sukaaɓe ɓee kam e jignaaɓe maɓɓe jogori seninde lekkol oo haa laaɓa .
Ko eey ena woodnoo ena woodi kadi haa hannde , tee ɗuum wodat haa janngo , ko goonga nih nattii waade no waanoo haŋki nih , sibu jooni jeyɓe ɗum ɓee .
Ko ena wona duuɓi noogaas e joy .
Ko ene abboo e yimɓe noogaas kollirrino yiɗde mum wonde kanndidaa en republikyankooɓe , ene jeyanoo heen Mike Pence , gonnooɗo cukko hooreejo Dowlaaji Dentuɗi he laamu Donald Trump e Ron DeSantis guwerneer Foloridaa ( Florida ) ɗaminanooɗo maa faddo Trump heeda ɗum he laawol , haɗa ɗum ɓennude , e Nikki Haley gonnoɗo guwernoor South Carolina ( Caroline du Sud ) kadi Ambasadoor Dowlaaji Dentuɗi to Yuɓɓo Kawtal Ngenndiiji ( Nations Unis ) tawi ko Trump suɓinoo ɗum waɗi ɗum toon , Tim Scott ( taroro Eskaat ) , senaatoor ɓaleejo mo Karolin Worgo ( South Carolina ) .
Ko ene wona duuɓi 1000 hannde , he nder Fuuta , kutba aljumaa waɗatee tan ko he ɗemngal Arab , etee ne dee , tawa jumaa kaa haa huuɓtidini hay gooto heen nanataa hay konngol Arab gootol ɓuri famɗude .
Ko ene wona hannde yontere , o dewbo pullo cukko hooreejo fedde haɓanteende jojjannde aade , ko he kulol mawngol woni sabu ƴattooje e sappaneede warngo ɗe ɓiyɓe Malinaaɓe jogitiiɓe ko o jamfiiɗo ngenndi makko , ngoni e huccinde e makko .
Ko ene wona jooni duuɓi cappanɗe Joy , yiyannde laamu nde , so wiyde ko o bartiiɗoɗo waylaaki , kono heewɓe hakkillaaji mum en ene njeddi ɗuum .
Ko ene wona jooni duuɓi cappanɗe Joy , yiyannde laamu nde , so wi’de ko o baraaɗo , heewɓe ene calii ɗum , ɓeen jagguɓe wonnde ko woni goonga koo , koo o baraaɗo .
Ko ene ɓura teemedere neɗɗo nanngaama heen he nder gure jeetati , ene jeyaa e ɓeen gooto beeynatnooɗo fataraare ene winndaa heen " Baroowo " , he sara nokku ɗo dawriyankooɓe sokaaɓe ( walla sokanooɓe gila yonta sowiyatik ) mawnintenoo .
Ko enen ngoni adii ummaade , sakkitii sulmaade .
Ko enen ngoyatnoo yo en ndañ teleeji e rajooji so waɗaama kadi ko enen poti ɗum heɗaade e yeeɓde .
Ko eɓɓannde nde ANLoc yuɓɓini e ballondiral laamu Kanadaa .
Ko eɓɓo mawngo hakkunde Dji Barkham Production e Big Weltaare TV ngam ƴellitde naɓoka ( cinéma ) Pulaar to the next level , hono no Engele wiyata nii .
Ko fa'ti kadi e laaɓal , cellal ɓalli , taariindi , coftal ɓalli kam , ina feeñi heen .
Ko faamde mi tan yontii nde kala senngo dillintee ngam
