Ko faati e ndi wuro ndii , ko na’i e bammɗi e ndammiri e gelooɗi ekn .
Ko faati e ngonka maɓɓe jaagorgal topitiingal jaŋnge sukaaɓe lees-less , hakundeeɓe e mawɓe , Kaliidu Jallo fellitii addude ballal mum
Ko faayodini heen koo fof woni ko les .
Ko famɗi fof 230 000 neɗɗo maayii heen .
Ko famɗi fof 35 neɗɗo maayii heen .
Ko famɗi fof maa ngal gollo duuɓi 10 .
Ko fannu gooto tan haaletee e nder lekkol hee .
Ko fartaŋŋe kadi rentinde e wootiɗinde yimɓe ɓe iwdiiji ceertuɗi e nder faandaare semmbinde timmondiral hakkunde maɓɓe ngam gooto heen fof waawa udditaade e ɓeyditoraade humpitooji heddiiɓe ɓee " .
Ko fawaade he ɗii sarɗiiji goomu nguu waawata heɓtineede .
Ko fayi arde maa annduɓe ɓee mbaawoy feewnude ƴeewndooji ngam anndude worɓe jogorɓe feññinde ñawu nguu , ɓe peewna safaara ( antibiyotikaaji ) paddotooka nguu ñawu worɓe ,
Ko fayi e ñaamnde maɓbɓe galleeji ɗii lomtondirat .
Ko fayi yeeso , kala jiɗɗo wallitde wuro Kayhayɗi to bannge laaɓal , ina waawi jokkondirde e maɓɓe .
Ko fayti e dawriyaŋkooɓe mawɓe , ko goonga en nganndidaa ɓe kamɓe fof kono meer komin Bagodin hono Umaar Haamiidu Jah e Bookar Sule Bah to Bagodin , en njiyii ɗumen e dental ngal kadi ngardii e setooji mawɗi , teskinɗi .
Ko fayti e deftere koo , ko nde Alla wiyi : " eehey mon goongɗinɓe waɗɗinaama e dow mon koorka hono no waɗɗirinanoo e adinooɓe on , mbele oɗon kula Alla " 183 .
Ko fayti e hiirde maa yeewtere ndee : Ende feccii e doge ɗiɗi .
Ko fayti e jaambaraagal , Alhajji Mahmuud , sinno wonaano cuusal makko , njuɓɓudi Al Falaah yettotanooko ɗo yettii e duuɓi jawtuɗi ɗii .
Ko fayti e ko wejaa ɗoo koo , to gude ɗee ina waɗi heen " Giitala " e " Waali fengoo " e " Gurel beyi " e " Kolosaba " ; ɗuum fof ina ɗoo .
Ko fayti e pulaar , Catal kiifa heɓii njeenaari ngadanndi wonande jime , Geru nawi njeenaari ɗimmiri ndii haa jooni he jime pulaar .

Ko faꞌti e ceellal ɓalli ko heen jeyaa .

Ko fedde e hoore mum foti sakkude peeje no winndiri ɗee defte jahduɗe e tuugnorgal mum njanngiin .
Ko fedde wiyeteende Alcatel Submarine Networks ( ASN ) halfinaa feewnude ndee eɓɓaande moolanaande inniraande " 2Africa " .
Ko fedde yontaaɓe Mantu hono SDL ( Sehilaaɓe Daande Leñol ) njuɓɓini hiirde ndee ngam lollinde duuɓe sappo e ɗiɗi darnde NJaayel e nafoore mum e leñol ngol .
Ko feewti e maɓɓe , o heewi wiyde ko " yaa aan Alla , mbiɗo ñaagii nde njaafoto-ɗaa leñol am ngol , waɗi noon ko ɓe mbaɗata koo ɓe nganndaa .
Ko feewti e paandaale hol ko fuɗɗii heɓeede heen ?
Ko feewti e Ɗaawuus noon , kañum ne mbaadi mum ustaama , refti heen ko jippineede nde yaltinaa aljanna , etee ngal jippinaa ko to leydi Baabilon , ɗum woni he nder leydi Iraak .
Ko fotde men , hayso en ɗaɓɓaani yamiroore makko , jippin’de ɗoo ndeen winndannde , ngam mo woni kala ñaawirana ɗum hakkille mum .
Ko fotde men mawninde ngenndiyankooɓe men hono Abdul Bookara , hono Bakkaar wul Suwed Ahmed e Siidi wul Mullaay Seyni , hono Sileymaani Baal e Malamin Darame e Ndate Yalla .
Ko foti e 100 neɗɗo ena waawi jolde e makko .
Ko foti golleede e yolnde nde ina sifaa haa laaɓti , sibu
Ko foti no 200 diɗe tawtoraama nde ñalnde .
Ko foti no ooɗo dumunna e juutde , heewɓe ndoostiima ( gila e am haa e woɗɓe ) kono onon oɗon ndaranii leñol ngol on kaaɓataa .
Ko fotnoo muñoreede wontii huunde jaalɗunde .
Ko fowru , e deppuru , e cillel , e demmbayal , e ɓaleeru , e njuru , e waasooru , e bonnooru , e ɗum ɗoo fof ko inɗe e baccooje mum .
Ko fowru adii artude woni sunnaade .
Ko futuro oto oo yettii Ndakaaru , ɓe ƴetti oto tokooso ngam yahde Geejawaay .
Ko fuunti hakkille e ko fuunti gite ena heewi e aduna .
Ko ganndal kadi waɗi waktuuji njuulu ɗi ndewaten ɗii .
Ko ganndal wiyi maa lewru jagge ñalnde nanngam , waktu nanngam
Ko ganndo gooto , lollirɗo Didier Raoul fuɗɗii wasiyaade kuutoragol kolorokin ( safaara pali ) , kono ɗuum suwaa faamondireede tawo , hay so tawii noon won wiyɓe njaribiima ɗuum , ndañii heen yitere moƴƴere ( Senegaal ) .
Ko geno tan anndi .
Ko gila ko ɓooyi .
Ko gila ndeen duule ƴiiwoole ɓamtaare e ngootaagu men puɗɗii saayde , añɓe piyi ñidde e cowte mbiyi poolii ɓiɓɓe Afrik kaalɗo fof kela , taƴa .
Ko gila ndeen wojere harmini wallude neɗɗo .
Ko gila ndeen ɓe mbaɗti innirde tamaroowi baaba cawndiiɗo .
Ko gimɗiyankeejo , taaliyankeejo , maaginowo e renndoyankeejo .
Ko gollaa ɗoo ko fof ko dingaral sakkeeɓe tuggude e hitaande 2004 haa fayi ɗoo fedde ndee ina darii e golle ñeeñal tawi ko huutoraade cawgu .
Ko golle e darnde makko he ndeen fedde jey sabaabu jiytondiral makko e Amar Yaayaa Sal gonnooɗo , he ngaan saanga , koroowo jaŋde mawɓe ( inspecteur d’alphabétisation ) .
Ko golle honɗe haani wonude , kuugal aranal lontotooɗo Mahmadu Buhari ?
Ko golle maawɗe , keewɗe caɗtuɗe so neɗɗo heblaaka , kono juuɗe ena coklaa toon ngam gaynude golle ɗee e lebbi seeɗa .
Ko golle tan !
Ko gonga gardogol laaɓndi ko karallaagal e kantantaagal , kono hoto leydi ngootir ( Fuuta Tooro , Fuuta Jalon walla Maasina ) tan jaɓ heeroraade fof wiya ene acca woɗɓe ɓee ene ngona rewooɓe .
Ko googa ?
Ko goomu jooɗotoo renndina , suɓtoo haa yaltina heen tummbitte .
Ko goomuuji jaŋde dariiɗi he tolno peŋgal e catal e ngenndi mbaawi ɗum toppitaade .
Ko goonga !
Ko goonga , en ngonaa jaŋnguɓe diine kono ko ngoƴa no feewi faamde hol nde hooretee walla hol nde juuletee e jaati .
Ko goonga , gila batu COP21 , aduna oo ɓeydiima jeertaade , yontannde hannde ndee faamii tanaa coomiiɗo e ɓeydagol nguleeki ngol , leyɗe aduna ɗee kuniima daraade ngam tellinde teeɗannde nguleeki ndee , hay so tawii noon , ruttinde caggal teeɗannde waande nii teddude , wonaa huunde newiinde , haa teeŋti noon kadi so alaa maale kollitooje jahrugol caggal huunde ndee , he " duuɓi jeeɗiɗi cakkitiiɗii ɗii kala , nguleeki weeyo ɓeydiima ko ɓuri degere Celsus ( 1°C ) tolno nguleeki winndere ndee ko adii yonta mbaylaandi " .
Ko goonga , ko " neɗɗo e peeje mum , Alla e hoddirooji mum " , kono Mbajjiri Joom baawɗe wiyi " Mi waylataa renndo ngo ummanaaki waylude hoyre mum " .
Ko goonga , ko miin e makko njeydi Neene e Baaba , kono so tawii wiyaama nguurndam makko ina haalee , Mammadu Aamadu Lih mo Ared Goomu , Ibaraahiima Saar ɓi’i Neene makko to Farayse e Aliw kebe to Nguy keedaani caggal , sabu ɓe pellidii piyanɗe momtugol humambinnaagu e nder Senegaal .
Ko goonga , luutndere wonde caggal leydi ina seerti e luutndere nder leydiire sabu ngonkaaji e kaɓtorɗe ɗee mbaawaa wonde gootum .
Ko goonga Obamaa ko ɓiɗɗo leydi Amerik pecciiɗo he ƴiiƴam Afrik , ndeke no Geno rokkiri mo geɗal to Amerik nii , aɗen ɗaminii maa hono ɗuum feeñ he Afrik .
Ko goonga dille ɗee ɗuuɗii , kono yontii nde laloto-ɗen jiyanɗe ɓeen ɓe Geno rokki faamde rewam miijo ngoo ɗo gootel mbele wonana en ndesaari ngonoyoori janngo kaɓtorgal nguu mooƴu e mbuɗu keblanaangu jaalal ɓamtaare Afrik .
Ko goonga ena wayi hono junngo Farayse ena e golwole cakkitiiɗe ɗe laamu Abdel Aziz mbaɗi e nder Maali ɗee balɗe ɓennude .
Ko goonga fetto maɓɓe yaltiraani no hono kawre maɓɓe gadane ɗee haa teeŋti e nde ɓe piyi Arjentiin baral ( 4-0 ) .
Ko goonga gaynde en njettiima jeetaɓal .
Ko goonga hannde mago-doge ene woodi he kala ɗemɗe ngenndiije Senegaal , teeŋti kadi e ɗiɗi ɓurɗe mawnude ɗe , woni Pulaar e Wolof .
Ko goonga hiirde ndee hiirii fuɗɗaade sanne sabu geɗe keewɗe ena mbaɗaa e njuɓɓudi ndii .
Ko goonga jimol ngol ena weli , ena yooɗi .
Ko goonga juheede hinaa hulɓinii kono , mbo hulaani o ɓuri heewde sowde e bone pobbi .
Ko goonga kadi pulaar ɓuri famdude caɗeele e oon fannu .
Ko goonga kaŋko Obama o iwaani e ndonu macungaagu sabu Baaba makko ummii ko Keñaa , neene makko ko tuubaako .
Ko goonga keewal seto ina addana ngo huleede to bannge setooji goɗɗi , kono kam seto ko barooɗe dewe e gore maa ngori keewi rentude ngona seto .
Ko goonga ko e dariiɓe , ko en dadiiɓe ngam ɓamtude ngal , kono en cuwaa tawo jogaade peeje yantude e renndo hakkundeleyɗeewo haɓantoongo potal e keewal ɗemɗe .
Ko goonga kulle cuusaa yimɓe , kono hina heewi e kulle teewuuje so koriima , ko he yimɓe paytata .
Ko goonga laamuuji ɗii ko ɗo ngonnoo ɗoo tan ngoni gila ko ɓooyi , ina ɗuurnii no feewi ngal naamndal .
Ko goonga mbabba hinaa haɓtoo njuru , haa horanoo mba .
Ko goonga ndee hafeere ina woodnoo " .
Ko goonga ne kay nde gulaali ɗii keewi ndee , yimɓe ɓee kolliti mettere mum he nder layti renndooji he , won ɓoorniiɓe paɗe mum en njehi to ñiiɓirde yuɓɓo halfinaango limtogol ngoo , ANSD , ngam hujjondiroyde e mum en , tawi nii wonaa leñol ngol nuli ɗum en , kadi tawi yahɓe toon ɓee fof , hay gooto heen tintondiraani e goɗɗo o ; ɓe ɓamdaani e feere walla ɓe diisnondira he dawro ( strategie ) .
Ko goonga ngaddinaaji ko e ngalu ɓurɗo yooɗde e ngaluuji ɗemɗe .
Ko goonga nih laaɗe jooni peewniraa ko yoo mbaaw yaltude e sooyre tawa ena kisi , ena hulaa maa taw jamngel leydi ngel won ko bonni e masiŋaaji ballooji piloteeɓe ɓee diwnude laana kaa e kisal haa juuroo , teeŋti noon so ɓe ndiwata ko jamma .
Ko goonga nii , cili keewɗi , aadee waawii tijjaade
Ko goonga nii , keɓɗo naatde nder suudu sarɗiiji limtetaake e waasɓe , kono sikke alaa , wonaa tan yiɗde jawdi addi ngal pooɗondiral .
Ko goonga nii ballidiiɗo oo waajiima-mo .
Ko goonga nii enen aadee en , haa teeŋti noon e annduɓe ko faati e weeyo , en meeɗaa seertude e kulol wonde haayre mawnde ummoriinde e weeyo ina waawi yande e men , fusa leydi men .
Ko goonga nii o majjani wonde nooroo ko jamfante , kono o darii e wallude ɗum .
Ko goonga noon , ko ngol woni go’o ko hono ndee jokkere tergal e neɗɗo ina waɗee e aduna hee .
Ko goonga noon anndaaka no feewi ko addata ngu , kono tan yimɓe ine kawri wonde geɗe taariindi ine njeyaa e ko wallitta ñawu nguu , ko wayi no kuutoragol puudareeje ndema .
Ko goonga noon cikkaten ko Naange ngee tan yahata , kono ko juumre , hay Leydi ndii kay ina doga ( siftor hakkunde jolɗo e oto dogoowo e leɗɗe cawndiiɗe : ina gasa waya e makko ko leɗɗe ɗee ndogata nii .
Ko goonga noon laaɓanaani en sibu tawanooɓe ɓee njaɓaani haalde goonga .
Ko goonga noon no referaandoom oo yuɓɓiniraa nii laaɓtaani no feewi , kono ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , ine anndaa EEY oo arata dow .
Ko goonga noon o ɗaanotaako , kono ɗum haɗataa jamma oo raɓiɗde e nder hoore makko ) .
Ko goonga noon so ɓe mbaɗaano noon , wolof heewat jiɓuyaaji : weer ( léwru ) seerataano e wéér ( ɓaarde , liirde ) .
Ko goonga noon ɗee geɗe ine keɓiroo silsil mo noddaani nguurndam , kono ɗe ɓuri anndireede ko nafoore majje nder silsilaaji nguurndam keewɗi .
Ko goonga tigi !
Ko goonga weeyo hina jogii heen geɗal no feewi .
Ko goonga wonaa Makki adii arde he nder Fuuta tawi ko hooreejo leydi .
Ko goonga wonaa ɗee binndanɗe caabii ɗum , geɗe goɗɗe renndo e faggudu ( ina heen peccitagol ngalu leydi ) ina heen , kono eɗen paami kam , etaade mahde ɗum e jikkuuji sukaaɓe gila e law , maa wallitoy geɗe keddiiɗe ɗee , hono jurmondiral e ballondiral , e heblude hoohooɓe yurmoytooɓe ɓesnguuji mum en .
Ko goonga ɗemɗe ɗee kala ko Senegaalnaaje , kono neɗɗo kala ene yiɗi faarnoraade ko o jey .
Ko gulaali ɗi e saaƴaango ngo otooji ɗii noddi Kungelnaaɓe .
Ko haala koɗo oo tan ɓe kaalata Joom wuro ngoo noddi yahdiiɓe ɗiɗo ɓe .
Ko haani winndeede , ko : Bush woppidi mo ( ciifel alaa hakkunde gollal ngal e lomto on ) .
Ko haaɓnii
Ko hakke wuurde nder ndimaagu caggal nde natti jogaade doole walla semmbe gollaade .
Ko hakkilantaagal Muritaninaaɓe timmungal , e nder ceerungal mum e nder njaajeendi mum to bannge pinal e ñeeñal , woni ɗoon .
Ko hakkunde joolaa e seereer ngam siftinde koɗdigal moƴƴal hakkunde Fulɓe e ɗii ɗoo leƴƴi koɗdaaɗi .
Ko hannde Hoore-biir 13 Siilo Kawtrital fugu pettel ɓurngel mawnude he nder jookdu he , woni Kuppu Afrik mo .
Ko hare miijooji .
Ko hawsankooɓe boom ɓurnoo heewde e konu makko .
Ko hay so tawii Alajji Njaay waɗii janngo fiilere kabaruuji , mbar ɗum tan yoni haa pulaar haɓa hakke mum e Senegaal ?
Ko haŋki 21 Morso 2008 habraa wonnde Radovan Karadzic jaggaama .
Ko haɓaade jom miijooji ceɓɓitiiɗi en maa wonii ko fuuynooɓe haala ka walla miijotooɓe waktu joftagol yontii haa joomum en mbemja , njogitoo haalaluuji bonɗi ceerndooji , gaddooji fitina .
Ko haɗata duwaaw jaabeede ko e sarɗiyeeji jeyaa , ko yooɗnata ɗum ko , ko e nehdiiji duwaaw jeyaa .
Ko haɗata mo wiyde en : " ƴeewee huunde nena daasa huunde " , no njiyraten mettelli ena ndaasa mbuubu maayngu nih ?
Ko haɗata tagoore nde wiyde en ngalaa hakkilaaji ?
Ko haɗata tagoore ndee wiyde en ngalaa hakkilaaji ?
Ko haɗatamo wiyde en : " ƴeewee huunde nena daasa huunde " , no njiyraten mettelli ena ndaasa mbuubu maayngu nih ?
Ko haɗi Fulɓe soodde jeewte ( emisiyoŋaaji ) e oo Tele , hono no ngenndiyanke oo wasiyirinoo nii ?
Ko haɗi ɗum teɓɓitaade tawde taarii ɗum bannge-yoo-bannge ( bang-yoo-bang ) ko weeyo ?
Ko he 1923 o ɓenninaa leydi Farayse .
Ko he 1984 mbayliigu tuugiingu he ɗemɗe ngenndiije fotnoo waɗde , ngu waɗaaka , nii woni jaŋde ndee heddorii noon e kuule cabborɗe haa 1999 ( hitaande pusgol DƊNG ) .
Ko he Bowte 2020 weeyo Tigere udditaa , piirooje mbaɗti diwde e juuraade .
Ko he dabi Lislaam wonanoo .
Ko he hitaande 1929 o seholondiri e Jomo Kenyata ( mo leydi Kenya ) , e James W .
Ko he hitaande 1965 , o yahi to Dakaar , ko toon o naatti he duɗal Farankoo-Arab , ngal Alhajji Ibrahiima Ñas , ɓaawo ɗuum , o yahi jaŋngoyde to ngenndi Tuunus , ɗuum ko he hitaande 1970 , ko toon o woni haa he hitaande 1973 , o naatti he ngenndi Faransi , ndengar mi he ngenndi Farasi ndee , naattumi he jaŋngude ɗemngal Faransee , ǌaŋngu mi ngal , haa keɓmi tolno seedanfaagu C .
Ko he hojomaaji sappo cakkitiiɗi ɗii tan Farayse ummini hoore , wallini laabi ɗiɗi , woni ( 2 , 2 ) , he koyɗe Mbappe jinne oo .
Ko he kaa ngonka mettuka ɓaleeɓe Afriknaaɓe ngoni nder leydi Tuunus .
Ko he kaan tuma Njaay Saydu Aamadu arti he humpitde ko yowitii e Koolol daande maayo eyɓinaangol ngol , o tabitini ina woodi , o rokki hay dalilaaji mum .
Ko he kew juɓɓinanooɗo ngam bayyinde keɓgol jeytaare leydi Konngo tawi saakti ɗum ko laamɗo Belge en hono " roi Baudouin " he nder diskuur babbabilo ko o nanondirnoo e Kasa Vubu , Gardiiɗo jaagorɗe leydi ndi Patrice Lumumba jaabtii mo .
Ko he konnguɗi min nguurtinirta ñaam-golluuje laamɓe hanki mbele haa yonta hannde tesko .
Ko he lewru Morso ( juillet ) 2021 senngooji ɗiɗi ɗi puɗɗii haaldude .
Ko he lewru desaambar 2019 nguun batu mooɓondiral 7ɓu jooɗinoo , toɗɗii yiilirde hesere ñalnde 29/12/2019 .
Ko he lewru suweŋ 2020 cate goodnooɗe ɗee ndokkaa yamiroore hesɗitinde juɓɓule mum en .
Ko he maggal Yuɓɓo Naange woni , ɗum noon ko e maggal Leydi ( Ngaawe ) woni , ɗum noon ngon-ɗen .
Ko he maggal almuɓɓe njanngata karallaagal janngingol ( binndol , taro , hiisa ) .
Ko he mbayliigu doosɗe 1991 , e kuulal mum 6ɓal , wiyi : " Ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee ko Arab , Pulaar , Soninke e Wolof , ɗemngal lawakeewal ngal ko Arabeere .
Ko he ndeen hitaande kadi o yalti he filma Alain Gomis " Aujourdhui " kadi he filma Muusa Tuure " La Pirogue " .
Ko he nder ngeel jerƴowel punndi kaaƴe ndi Perseverance ƴetti ndii waañjittee .
Ko he nder ɗuum o toɗɗaa sarɗiyanke Ɓoggee e cili ɗiɗi , les wimmbu Dental Doole Demokaraasi ( UFP ) , e ballal ɓesngu departemaa Ɓoggee , o naati Suudu sarɗi leydi makko ɗo o darii darnde teeŋtunde nde hay gooto humpaaka ndee .
Ko he ndii tippudi ngon-ɗen hannde .
Ko he ndiin leydi koohoowo e nder koninkooɓe jaggaa , sabu tuumeede yiɗnoode dergitde laamu Robespierre Kaboore .
Ko he ndiin mbaydi kadi ɓe ndutti teddungal , oon mo nganndu ɗaa ko kanum woni Ceerno Bah , hooreejo Dental Ngootaagu e Ballondiral ( Union Solidarité Entraide ) lomtiiɗo Amadu Maalik Gay , jokki golle mum , roosi ko oon aawno haa waawi wuurde e daraade .
Ko he ndiin mbaydi ɗemngal Gerek e ɗemngal latin , njaalorinoo he nder Orop fof , e huunde e Afrik ( Egypte e Carthage ) e Fuɗnaage-Ɓadiiɗo ( Siri , Palastiin , e Jordaani ) .
Ko he ndiin ɗoon mbaydi tinndinooje Islaam carorii he nder dowlaaji juulɓe haa ɓuri teeŋtude he hiirnaange Afrik .
Ko he ngaynaaka o adii wonnde .
Ko he oon diskuur o holliti , go’o , darnde laamu Muritani nder bonanndeeji kaalaaɗi ɗii , o yaafnii e innde dowla oo .
Ko he oon kees ( walla ɗiin keesuuji ) njoɓdi paasiyoŋaaji ittetee .
Ko he oon mudda diiwaan he nder Konngo yiɗi serindaade dowla nehaande oo , ɗum woni Katannga e gardagol Moyiis Commbee ( Moise Tshombé ) e ballal won hoohooɓe Belsik en ( beesuuji konu ) .
Ko he oon tuma Mammadu Abdul fuɗɗii naatde he pelle pinal e ɓamtaare .
Ko he oon waylo-waylo timmal makko heɓaa .
Ko he sahaa nde o woni jaagorgal pinal Muritani nde o eƴɓini keɓtingol Jowol wonde ɗum wuro ganni .
Ko he sosɓe Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani e hitaande 1974 , dariiɓe ine njanngina , haa fedde ndee heɓtinaa ñalnde 4 suwee 1976 , o toɗɗaa yo o ardo ɗum .
Ko he suukaaji ɗii heddotoo .
Ko he yonta Abbaasyankooɓe , he nder laamorgo maɓɓe Baghdaad , pinal Islaam ƴellitii ; gannde piindi haa njuumti , layiriɗoon haa ciifnii he nder aduna oo kala .
Ko he ɗiin batuuji keewɗi yuɓɓineede laawol gootol hitaande kala , peeje ciynirɗe piɓondiral ngal ɓetetee .
Ko he ɗiin nokkuuji kulle keewɗe ɓuri yiɗde wonde .
Ko heddi ko yo Allahou reen suur Gabrielle Zia Kan .
Ko heddii , so neɗɗo anndii ko woni ñawu mum , so daraaki safrii wata woyru goɗɗo !
Ko heddii e koorkaaji koo , ma en kaal ɗum e damuɗe goɗɗe garoyooje .
Ko heddii ko koko Usmaan Makka haali ko , moxxo e men ko maayzo tan guurzo fof , dilloowo en kavoto zum , mbonnen innde mum , haa wonti nii , lenyol men alaa moxxo .
Ko heddii ko noon ko nguurndam joom mum keeriɗam .
Ko heddii koo , ko yarlitaare tan .
Ko heddii koo oɗon nganndi no yahri !
Ko heddii noon , ko mawve men mbiyii : " Anndi fof , haali fof , bonni fof .
Ko heddinoo he dunndareeɓe ndogi .
Ko heen jannginatnoo yimɓe mawɓe , ko wayi no Aamadu Tijjaan Baal , cakkitoriiɗo haalde he rajo .
Ko heen musidɗo gooto tawaaɗo geɗe ɗee holliti wonde ko nih yahri .
Ko heen o woni haa 1946 .
Ko heen ɓe njoɓi Bulukuntu saak makkaari mo laamɗo ñamlinoo .

Ko heewi e Waalo Waalo en e mawɓe mum en ngeggi , koɗtoyi Fuuta .
Ko heewi e nguura men hannde jiggaa ko caggal leydi .
Ko heewi e ɓurɓe naywude e men ko ɗo ngoppi leydi ena yaha haaju mum .
Ko heewi e ɓurɓe naywude e men ko ɗoo ngoppi leydi ena yaha haaju mum .
Ko heewi he coñce fulɓe ko jaŋtaaɗe Coñce maɓɓe ko huunde nde fotaani yeebeede ngam galɗugol majje e heewde ɗe nafoore , so ɗe ngonii ɗe dingiral sukaaɓe , so ɗe ngonii ɗe dingiral mawɓe ( mbedda walla nder galleeji ekn .
Ko heewi kala rufat , wonande Mosku ɗum haaɗii lamɗam .
Ko heewi maa haale e laamu makko , kono valeeve Moritani potaani yejjitde darnde makko e duuvi zi mboomatee e leydi mumen zii .
Ko heewi nde tinatee tawata ko gasii walla seɓɓitiima .
Ko henndu wanndu doole seŋŋiti cuuɗi kewdi e galle hee .
Ko heɓaa e njeeygu hee fof waɗetee ko e booñ laamu .
Ko hiisa maggal yaltini koo ina laaɓti cer !

Ko hol no neɗɗo waɗata haa waawa huutoraade numeruuji mum fof e WhatsApp .
Ko hol ɗum bonnaniɓe ?
Ko hollitde weltaare maɓɓe tan e ko ɓe njiyi e Muritani ko haa teeŋti e Nuwaadibu ko .

Ko holɗi e gaaci o waɗata ?
Ko hono kaaɗoo ngonka ka leyɗeele Afrik ngoni hannde Oropnaaɓe nguurno he mum hakke duuɓi ujunere , tuggude he teemedannde 5ɓre haa 15ɓre .

Ko hono noon kadi
Ko hono noon kadi , nde leydi yerɓi to Saafaraasiskoo ( San Francisco ) e hitaande 1906 , cumuuji keewɗi nduppitiima nde tawi ko ɓuri heewde heen saabii ɗum en ko pusgol tiwooji nawooji gaas .
Ko hono noon laamɓe Gaawo ndewretenoo .
Ko hono noon mbawaten faamrude gartugol Usmaan Ngom e laamu nguu .
Ko hono noon ne , ardiiɓe Egliis en mbiyi wonde diine maɓɓe yamiraani riiwtude neɗɗo , kono so njelaari ndii yuɓɓinaama , laamu nguu naatnii heen junngo mum tan njelaari ndii reftat laawol ha yubba no haanirta nih .
Ko hono noon ne kadi Fulɓe Sierra Leon ene keewi he Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik kadi e ɓe njuɓɓi he fedde maɓɓe Ɓantal Fulɓe Sierra Leon .
Ko hono noon ne kadi Haajaratu sabu hankadi o natti tan wonde gallunke , kono o wontii neene mum bajjo galle o .
Ko hono noon ne kadi ɓe mbaɗanii winndiyankooɓe heewɓe wejo defte mum en , ko wayno deftere Jeynaba Buubu Soh , Renndo e Taariindi ; Abuu Sih , Gila Dawaa Dawi , Dr .
Ko hono noon ne kadi ɗemngal Farsi ( Iran ) kanum ne jaalinooma he wertaango yaajngo he tuma nde laamɓe Safawid ( Safavid dynasty ) ndoolnunoo ndee ( tm .
Ko hono noon ne to bannge faggudu e ɓamtaare , Fuuta , hono no ko ɓuri heewde e dowri Senegaal , alaa ko laamu ngu waɗi toon .
Ko hono noon pelle men pine e renndoyankeeje ; pelle sanɗaaɓe ko wayno MEEF walla pelle jaayndiyankooɓe Fulɓe .
Ko hono noon so leydi Senegaal
Ko hono noon so tele waɗaama e diiwal he , hayso tawii wonaa pulaar tan haaletee heen ne , yaama kam pulaar ɓura yaajde heen , nde tawnoo ko Fulɓe ɓuri heewde he nder diiwal he .
Ko hono noon ɗemngal Farayseere wayi ( laawol Parinaaɓe ) , maa Italeere ( laawol Florentiin ) .
Ko hono noon-ne cikkirten ko naange nge ummotoo fuɗnaange ena faya hirnaange tawi noon ko leydi ndi yirlotoo e nder weeyo no moti yirlirtoo nii , walla no dennde tallortoo nii , ummina bannge mum hirnaange faarna fuɗnaange !
Ko hono ɗemɗe Iskanndinawiyanke , ɗemɗe Turkinke ( Turkiya e doŋre nehaande Asia ) .
Ko hono ɗum jibinta ɗemɗe biyeteeɗe " koine " , ( doosgal ngal wiyatee ko " koineization " he Engeleere ) .
Ko hono ɗumɗoo woni ko jaaynooɓe mbiyata FAKE NEWS walla INFOX woni KABAARU FENAANDE , hono kabaaru mo goongɗaani baɗiraaɗo fuuntude yimɓe e waɗnude ɗum en e haalnude ɗum en huunde Ko ɗum huunde yaajnde hannde e internet , haa teeŋti noon e Goomuuji WhatsApp .

Ko hono ɗuum annduɓe kilimaa kadi kaali .
Ko hono ɗuum kadi jaayndeyanke ŋanaa , Sennen Andriamirado mo Madaskaar haali .
Ko hono ɗuum nii yiyaa Burkina Faso , leydi ndi " fella yoɓee en " tampini .

Ko hooreejo leydi ndii hono Joe Biden suɓinoo mo he lewru feebariyee , caggal nde hunii , e oorngal woote ɓennuɗe ɗee , maa toɗɗo debbo ɓaleejo he nder ñaawirde leydi ndii ɓurnde toowde e ɓooyde , sibu nde sosaama duuɓi 233 jooni .
Ko hooreejo leydi oo foti eewnaade feewde e kaaldigal ko feewti e geɗe leydi ndii .
Ko hooynantenoo saamii , mo alaa juuɗe sooyii .
Ko huunde moƴƴere sabi maa ɗum hollu sukaaɓe men daartol men , daartol goongɗungol ngol .
Ko huunde nde ene jaranamo doole makko , ganndal makko , jawdi makko , e kala hojom he nder nguurndam makko .
Ko huunde nde oo ngenndiyanke mawɗo , gooto e sosɓe Muritani , haandi .
Ko huunde saɗtunde wonnoo , kono Stalin etinoowa teskaade koɗki leƴƴi gonɗi ɗoon ɗii , mbele ine waawa tamde nokkuuji ɗii .
Ko huunde yooɗnde sanne , sikke alaa ko gollal jinne .
Ko huɓeere raneere jogiinde jimme .
Ko idii fof , Koppolaani yetti Podoor tan , ƴeftiti politik malnooɗo ɗum Daŋana e Suwel el Maa : teertaade mawɓe kinɗe gardiiɗe , uurnaade kunuɗe maɓɓe , annda luure maɓɓe , yeena ɓee , heɓa ɓee , ronkana ɓee , haɓa e maɓɓe , tawa doole dental ngal ina ngustii no feewi .
Ko idii fof ko darnde tiiɗnde e nguurndam majji .
Ko idii fof ko lajal ngal ina yoni ( fotde lebbi 18 ) , wonaa kipir-kapet nanondiral Ndakaaru ( NN ) nii .
Ko idii oo musiiba heewɓe nganndaano Hayiti , walla nanatno ɗum tan , sibu ina famɗi ngoƴanooɗo koyahata toon .
Ko ina abboo e 300000 neɗɗo mbaraama heen , ko ina miliyoŋaaji ɗiɗi ndogii .
Ko ina abboo e duuɓi sappo tuggi 1968-1978 laamii Mali ko goomu soldateewu ( comite militaire de liberation nationale ) .
Ko ina abboo e soofaaji 700 njaaɓani Njamena , ɓe mbiyi anniya maɓɓe ko " nanngude Idiris Debi " .
Ko ina dilla e Fuuta fof , so baylo tawaaka ina tekma no feewi .
Ko ina tolnoo e piɗtaali 150 baŋ-yo-baŋ maayii e ndee wolde .
Ko ina tolnoo he 950 000 ferɓe sabi hare nde , heen 50 000 mooloyii ko Suudaan .
Ko ina tolnoo tan he neɗɗo gooto nder njeegomo ( 1/6 ) heewi ñawde , wonda he caɗeele foofaandu .
Ko ina tolnoyoo e capanɗe nayo neɗɗo ( limoore ndee ina waɗi luure ) maayii heen , ko jiida e kaake bonɗe e jawdi maayndi heen .
Ko ina wona 80% e jookinooɓe hakkunde ɓale e mboorndi mbaawii danndeede , kono jaabto tolniingo e 7 , 1 e kikiiɗe oon ñalawma gooto warii yimɓe heewɓe .
Ko ina wona duuɓi 10 jooni , ko 5% ɓoggi ɗii ɓe njeynoo ; hannde , ko kamɓe njeyi heen feccere ( 50% ) ; ɗoo e duuɓi tati paaɗi ko kamɓe njeyata heen fotde 95% !
Ko ina wona duuɓi 40 caggal wakilitere Sankara , leydi " yimɓe nuunɗuɓe " woni ko he ndaarde daɓɓitaade , kasaare ina satii ɗum baŋ-yoo-baŋ .
Ko ina wona duuɓi 60 hannde , annduɓe ɓee ina kuuñƴi e tafde laana mbaaka nii , kono ɓooyaani ko ganndal aadee to bannge karallaagal yettii e waawde tafde warwarde waawnde hisde e nguleeki tolniiki ɗoo .
Ko ina wona e 60% e artunooɓe e daawal cakkitiingal ngal ( ngal HCR yuɓɓinnoo ngal ) , ndañii kaayitaaji jibinegol .
Ko ina ɓura hitaande Dakaar ina heblanoo nguun njillu , raɓiɗngu , ngu ñalawma gooto tan .
Ko ine 1000 edda dinosoora njiytaama haa ɗoo , kono annduɓe ine cikki ɗi ɓurii ɗoon heewde to woɗɗi .
Ko ine wona capanɗe jeeɗiɗi neɗɗo winnditaama , soodɓe karte mumen .
Ko innitortoo dowla oo kadi ina tawee e nder leydi Libi .
Ko jaasi fof 30 suka ine mbaawi liggaade heen e janngude heen hitaande fof .
Ko jaayiya tan mo Alla haaji .
Ko jaaynde Sud wiyi noon e facciro mum .
Ko jamaanu mawɗo , temedde keewɗe yimɓe .
Ko janngingol muumo tan , no mbiy-ɗen nii .
Ko jannginoowo gooto heblata ɓe .
Ko jannginoowo keblatnooɗo ɓe oo duusi ɓe .
Ko janngo boom , miin poti tottude mo suka debbo oo .
Ko jaŋngo laaɓata hakkunde maɓɓe so wootooɓe ndawanii toɗɗe ɗee e dowla New Hampshire .
Ko jerɓannɗe ɗiɗi mawɗe mbaɗi e Haytii e teemedanɗe ɓennuɗe ɗee : 1750 e 1771 .
Ko jeyngol ɓurngol wulde !
Ko jiidaa e dipiteeji nantuɗi inɗe mumen wayɓe heen no Farba Ngom , gawlo hooreejo leydi ndii , Saydu Jallo , Dipitee Aliiw Demburu Soh e nulaaɗo jaagorgal cellal .
Ko jiidaa e doggol woote ngol hay gooto anndaa binnditaaɗo heen ( ngol horaaka ) .
Ko jiidaa e hoɗɓe limtaaɓe dow ɓee , gure catiiɗe ɗee , alaa heen heddiingo ngo araani .
Ko jiidaa e nokkuuji jooliiɗi ɗii , kuɓeeje ɓakke keewɗe njanii .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum ,
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum , kala huunde ñisnde no feewi , ko wayi no hoodere walla wuddere ɓaleere ina wayla mbaadi saraaji faru-sahaa .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum , ko parti bajjo laawɗinaa , woni parti-dowla ( parti-Etat ) ngam tamde haa tiiɗa denndaangal gini laamu ngu o renndaani hay gooto .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum , ko ɗum kaawis mo heewɓe ngarata yeeɓde .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum , laaɗe jeeɗiɗi ( 7 ) nani njirloo Mars : heen tati ko ɗe DDA , heen ɗiɗi ko Oropnaaje , e heen ngoota Inndonaare .
Ko jiidaa sokaaɓe fotde duuɓe , e Nuwaasoor , e Walata , haa woodi e mum en maayɓe toon , ko wayino , Tafsiiru JIGGU , Yuusuf Gey , Alasan Umar Bah , Abdul Ŋudduusu BAH .
Ko jinnaaɓe ɓee e renndo taariingo suka oo ndarotoo ndeen darnde .
Ko jinnaaɗo debbo oo walla lomto mum , walla laamɗo nokku oo , e keedanɗo gorko oo , e seedeeji banngeeji ɗiɗi ɗii fof .
Ko jiyaaɓe ɓe coodatnoo nder leydi too , walla warkoyeeɓe ñaawanooɓe .
Ko jiɗɗo caakri e ruy , subaka fof o soodat jaaynde wiyateende " lo moonnd " o jannga ɗum , haa o waɗti innirde nde kacitaari .
Ko joom ganndal jaajngal to bannge maayo
Ko joom jammbere adotoo e dunndu , lewa , waɗa ñakkeeje , duppa , fitta haa boowal dañee , rutto waɗana boowal ngal galle .
Ko jooni annduɓe siyaas to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde New South Wales to Ostaraali njiyti maanaa alluwel ngel .
Ko jooni waɗtii yiyeede ine caaya ( dow kaaƴe toowɗe walla to gulli leydi ) , sabu ɓeydagol toon wulde .
Ko jubbude tan e ko ɓuri teskinde e nguurndam oo gorko ñemmbeteeɗo , caliiɗo jusaade gila nde alaa koyɗe .
Ko ka njirlotooka ka 1 500 kg .
Ko kaan ngonka jibinoyta ceŋɗe ɗiɗi he ngardiigu duunde Afrik , hono senngo ɓadiingo leydi Ruusi e senngo woɗngo ruttitii yoga he leyɗeele tuubakooɓe jogiiɗe doole .
Ko kala toɓɓere nde min ngaddi tawa enen fof eɗen ndenta njeewten heen .
Ko kam woni geɗal ɓurngal himmude potngal gollaneede e kala sahaa , ko aldaa e tampere .
Ko kamngal adii wonde gollorgal peewnoowal ñaamdu sukaaɓe tawa ko he Senegaal 100% fof feewna .
Ko kamɓe
Ko kamɓe kam pelliti suurtude koolaaɗo maɓɓe e hare feewde e ownooɓe , hono Muhammed Abdel Asiis , kono " ko woni e lahal fof maa juuɗe njiytu " .
Ko kamɓe laatii haalooɓe e inɗe ɓesnguuji ɗi ngalaa no ene kaalda , sabu kanum en ɓuri woƴeede ko no nguurdi e no nguurniri galleeji mumen .
Ko kamɓe mbaɗi ngoo nangito video etee ɓe calinooma joldude e makko e kaa laana haa dognoowo laana kaa kañum ne salii diwde so wonaa nde oo suka gorko jippinaa .
Ko kamɓe ngarani-mi haa galle , njol-mi caggal oto miɗo wayi hono laamɗo e nder laamɓe !
Ko kamɓe njimantunoo koye maɓɓe ɓe ngamana koye maɓɓe tawi eɓe ɓaggii he pinal maɓɓe e neesu maɓɓe .
Ko kamɓe njogii nguura amen e kala-kala amen .
Ko kamɓe tigi padanoo .
Ko kamɓe ñallata waɗde heen cowtiiji yeeso e caggal kam e baydi-yaggaaji , Alhajji Njaay ina hucciti heen haalaani .
Ko kanko Bayillo Jallo Kontee lomtinirnoo Arafan Kamaraa ɓaawo nde sordaasiiɓe ( konunkooɓe ) heewɓe murtunoo balɗe ɗuuɗuɗe woni e fellugol hulɓina jamaa on hippoo jawle yimɓe .
Ko kanko Nuuhu woni mo Alla adii nelde feewde he yimɓe he nder winndere ndee .
Ko kanko Suwednaajo oo haalata o wiy : " Ko minen fof ñaamdi e lahal gootal kadi minen kala , min ñaamiri ko juuɗe amen .
Ko kanko ardinoo ngaal duɗal .
Ko kanko e hoore makko waggini fedde ( fonndaasiyoŋ ) Manndelaa huutoraade tonngoode makko kasoo , hono 46664 , waɗta ɗum maande kaɓtorgal Sida .
Ko kanko e hoore makko wonnoo mo suwaano heɗteede , o noddaama kono o jaɓaani nootaade E mudda cakkitiiɗo oo fof , ko haala cosgol walla coftingol Ñaawirde Toownde , nde nganndu-ɗaa ko kam jogii mbaawka ñaawde hooreeɓe leydi Kono ellee kadi ɗuum wayi ko no huunde haaytunde nii , walla kam nde anndaaka so ine jogori laataade walla alaa .
Ko kanko firi deftere Aristotle , deftere Daabeeje ( Kitaab al-Haywaan ) .
Ko kanko fotnoo yimde cagagal nde Baaba maal , mo Daande leñol gasni .
Ko kanko kadi fuɗɗi ƴettude comci cañaaɗi o sooɗta ɗum kaŋŋe .
Ko kanko kadi woni sabaabu haa diɗɗal Cewɗi RD Konngo loggi loggol mumen ɗiɗaɓol ngol .
Ko kanko kadi yahdunoo e hooreejo leydi , Jacob Zuma , ñande subngooji laamɗo leydi e 22 Seeɗto bennuɗo , hay sinno nih ko Sizakele Khumalo , debbo mo duuɓi 69 buri heewde yiydeede ene laamɗo o , hay ñannde o fiilete ( 9 Duujal ) .
Ko kanko oo laamɗo waɗtunoo Konngo he njiimaandi e maayirɗe teeminannde 19ɓiire .
Ko kanko saakti goodaangal tuugnorɗe " ñukkindagol renndo " to Amerik e Angalteer .
Ko kanko sakkitnoo ɓe ngo gila eɓe to duunde Orop .
Ko kanko sinci koolol paatungol e " Croûte " baɗowol Senegaal , to suudu Pinal Duuta Sek .
Ko kanko winndani-mi jimɗi keewɗi , ko kanko kadi waɗi-mi faamde e jogaade humpito e gede keewde paatuɗe e leñol ngol mbiɗo yiɗnoo hannde yettude mo e wiyde mo haa bada mi yejjittaa " .
Ko kanko woni hooreejo Suudu Martabaaji Fuuta Jaloo .
Ko kanko woni jaaltaaɓe , o fotaani jaɓde ɓiyiiko ine adoo firtude aadi e nder subalɓe .
Ko kanko woni teddiniraaɗo ñalawma oo .
Ko kanko wonnoo kalfinaaɗo jaŋde e pinal fedde nde .

Ko kanum wonti Taaske he Pulaar , Tabaski he Wolof .
Ko kawral kuɓɓungal njogorɗen seedaade .
Ko kayre bayyini haala ganndo gooto Ostralinaajo biyeteeɗo Frank Fenner , ceedtanaaɗo ganndal ko fayti e " ñifgol ciiri tagooje " .
Ko kayre mahi isin oo e laawol hakkunde Nuwaasoot e Aksuus , kam mahi 440 koɗorde gollotooɓe ɗee .
Ko kañje kadi ndenndu-ɗen alkulal , ko kañje kadi ɓuri saraade e winndere ndee .
Ko kañum woni tayaɓal ɓaawo
Ko kañumen mahi safrirde ndee , mahori hoɗorde cafroowo , mbaɗi heen leece , filsideer ɓuuɓrirɗo leɗɗe , mbaɗi gallol e jeynge tawi ko ko kuɓɓam naange ( panneaux solaires ) .

Ko laamaandi njeyaandi he dental Commonwealth .

Ko laamɗo , galo kadi ganndo , kono ko jankininooɗo newiiɗo kadi kaaraysire .
Ko laamɗo Norwees rokkata ndi e lewru Noowammbar , njaru mayri ko miliyoŋaaji 6 kaalis Norwees ( hedde 730 000 ooroo ) .
Ko laamɗo Norwees rokkata ndi e lewru Noowammbar kala .

Ko laaɓi tan , ñalnde heen ammbilaas ñalli ko wullude ; en nganndaa so tawii ko gaañiiɓe ittaaɓe kasoo too , walla ko gañiiɓe ittaaɓe to ardorde kisal too , nawetenoo opitaal .

Ko maa 1964 ɗoo tan nde sariya ganndiraaɗo " Civil Right Act " itti ɗuum to bannge binndol .
Ko maa 20 suwee 1991 nde Arab waɗtaa ɗemngal bajjal laawɗinangal , ɗemɗe e pine keddiiɗe ɗee , jeyaaɗe e Muritani kam enne , ndañi hankati wontude ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Ko maa Alla faaboo ONU fuɗɗiima addude faabu sabu ma ɓe mbeernu hakke 9500 Kaske bulaaje ( soldateeɓe ) ngam hisnude toɗɗe ɗee .
Ko maa Mikitaa Kurutshef ari e hitaande 1954 , felliti rokkunde nokku oo Ikren .
Ko maa hitaande 1820 nde konu diƴƴelaamu Farayse waɗti haɓde no haanirta nii e tarafikaa en ( wujjittooɓe ) .
Ko maa hitaande 1969 , nde daartoowoameriknaajo gooto ine wiyee Philip D .
Ko maa joom mum en malee dañde neɗɗo bayɗo no Madiba nii .
Ko maa ngonaa baylo dowrowo to bannge tafngo kelmeendi walla karallo peɗɗitiiɗo to bannge njuɓɓudi nde mbaawaa rokkude janngooɓe jubbannde cocre ( cetta ) e ko feeñninaa e dow maggal koo to bannge ŋarɗugol golle tabitinaaɗe ɗee .
Ko maa pooɓne takket takket Ɓoosaaji deyi ɗii ndiiwetaake e seto .
Ko maa yimɓe puɗɗii wullude nde Seneraal Abdel Asiis holliti wonde ina woƴaa gagga o .
Ko maa ɗee naamnde kala ciggee , ko maa fotdeeji kala ƴettee ko adii nde geɗe ceɓɓittoo .
Ko maa ɗoo e balɗe seeɗa nde ngannden mbele NASA yettiima ndeen faandaare walla alaa .
Ko maale nguurndam gadane peeñi he mayri waɗii miliyaaruuji 3 hitaande , he nder diƴƴe .
Ko mahdi kesiri , pentiraandi goobu daneejo .
Ko mahondiral e paamondiral ɓurnoo teeŋtude e jotondire hakkunde dente ɗe pine ceertuɗe , hay so tawii noon waɗii caɗeele gila e maayirɗe kitaale 1960 , caggal ɗuum e kitaale 70 .
Ko maslahaa mbaɗ-mi ɗoon .
Ko mawɗo Suudu Sarɗiiji Senegaal , hono Makki Sal woni Baban ñalawma oo , ko kaŋko inniraa koolol ngol .
Ko mawɗo men , naalaŋke men towɗo pinal fuuta gila hannde araani , yimi Deliyaa , toƴƴi daande jamma e ñalawma wiyi " Farmata Hawwa , woy baayo " : oon woni Siidi Baylel Caam .
Ko mawɗo men Umaar Bah woni siwil gollotooɗo , gadiiɗo e wuro Nuwaaasot .
Ko mawɗo wuro Fanay salii koo ina haaɓnii he makko .
Ko mbaaw-mi hannde koo fof , ko yeeɓetee e am hannde koo fof , mbiɗo sikki ko Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar rokki-mi ɗum .
Ko mbaaw-ɗen wiyde tan , gaa gaa teskuyaaji ɗi cifi-ɗen dow ɗii , Aqmi inan jokki e rommbaade Muritani , fiyii Maali , fiyoyii Burkina Fasoo e Kodduwaar , inan meeroo Senegaal .
Ko mbaaw-ɗen wiyde tan ko Alla rewnii golle ɗee laawol e wondude e nanondiral e peewal e weltaare e nanngondiral tiiɗngal .
Ko mbaawaten teskaade tan , ko yoga e leyɗeele aarabeeɓe hannde , walla Afiriik e Asii , njanguuji ownooɓe hakkillaaji ina mbaɗa e nder mum en tawa yeeytotoo ɗiin njanguuji ko " dowla daesh " ko wayi no to Afganistaan , Alaseri , Ejipt , Enndonosii , Tinisii , Yemen , Somaali , Niseriyaa ekn .
Ko mbaroodi doganta ɓuri heewde e ko dogata , nde wonno wonaa he kulle kulooje ndoga jeyaa .
Ko mbaɗmi koo ko ɗuum tan mbaɗmi .
Ko mbedda seerndi gure ɗee kono hay genaale ko kannje ndenndi .
Ko mbelaa-mi mbaɗat-mi , ko njiɗ-mi mbaɗat-mi ; ɓe mbiyi ɗo neɗɗo " est un être de plaisir " , ɗum woni " neɗɗo ko weli ɗum tan waɗata " , ɗum noon noddi ko njawdiigu ɓaadi alaa ɗo haaɗi hankadi .
Ko mbiy-ɗon e kala jaɓɗo miijo halkoowo leñol mum ?
Ko mbiyɗaa ko ?
Ko mi joorɗo hoore etee hakkille am oo heewaani .
Ko mi punaaɗo .
Ko mi yiyaani fof , haaju am alaa heen !
Ko miijo wage biyeteeɗo Elon Musk ( mawɗo antampiris Tesla Motors – peewnoowo laaɗe kuuraa – e SpaceX ( diwooje ) ) e PayPal ( lowre enternet yoɓirde ) .
Ko miijooji luggiɗɗi njalti he mayre .
Ko miin addi miijo ngoo , e nder beetawe gooto ndañ-mi siifooɓe ko ina rokka mi mbaawka tafde goomu nguu .
Ko miin ardinoo njuɓɓudi ɗanniyaŋkooɓe wuro am ngoo fotde duuɓi 4 .
Ko miin hokki CDji ɗii sukaaɓe amen wonɓe Farayse , Amerik , Itali yo ɓe njeey leppi ɗii , ko ɓe keɓi heen fof ɓe ɓama !
Ko miin woni Jali Mammadu Kuyaate , ɓiy Bintu Kuyaate e Jali Kajaan Kuyaate dabi ñeeñal konngol .
Ko miin woni baccirteeɗe kawsara " ko ngaal ɗoon cerundal woni cuɗaari daande maayo kala .
Ko miin woni coowiraaɗo kawsara "
Ko miin woni yummum kullon ladde kon kala .
Ko miin yiɗi leñol am , teddini Pulaar hormii Fulɓe .
Ko min Pullo hersi annde .
Ko min basi konngol .
Ko min bataaji mooftuɗi sirluuji teemedanɗe limtinɗe .
Ko min haalooɓe min ndeƴƴataa , ko min seppooɓe min ndartintaa " En nganndi nde Biraama e wondiiɓe mum nde ñaawanoo Rooso , cokoyaa ko Eeleega .
Ko min puɗɗii waɗtude hakkillaaji koo , ko kayre yeƴi pinal amen e ganndal amen wonde pulaar tigi " ko ɗemngal " .
Ko min ɗawaa koo ɓuri laaɓtude kadi ko to Ministeer ñaawoore , sibu min ngalaa hay carɗo ( Magistrat ) gooto , hay ñaawoowo gooto , hay binndoowo ( gerefiyee ) gooto .
Ko minen ngoni hakkillaaji mooftooji golle worɓe ( yimɓe ) .
Ko molekilde ( mooɓtoore ) nde woɗɗondiraani e sakkaroos .
Ko moɓaare ɓurnoo heewde .
Ko musiɓɓe Wright en ngollinoo ɗuum .
Ko musiɗɗo Mikaayiilu Haaruuna Bah , kalfinaaɗo kumpital e jokkondiral e yilirde catal hee heedi e mikoro hee .
Ko muusimo ko ina muusi-mi , tee ina foti muusde kala mo ƴiiƴam pulaagu dogata he ɓanndu mum .
Ko muuyo , koyɗol walla ko ramli peeñɗo ?
Ko naamnal ngal suwaa jaabeede taw , sabu en cuwaa yi'i de ko ina tabitinana en won'de won woodɓe ɓe ngonaa enen .
Ko naange e hoyre kellew kadi Soogel woppi Ibiraahiima yantoyi e seppatnooɓe ngam liɓde laamu mum .
Ko nafooje mawɗe , teeŋtuɗe coomii heen .
Ko nafoore sinkata neɗɗo , yiɗna ɗum , horsina ɗum .
Ko nanndi e inɗe ɗe nganndu-ɗen Penndel en , Demmbel en , ekn Ɗee inɗe noon wonaa arab addi ɗum !
Ko nanndi jooni , e ñawu jontinooje , ngu ɓowɗi kuutortoo .
Ko nanndi jooni e nyaw jontinooje , ngu ɓowɗi kuutrotoo .
Ko naññi yimɓe kay ko won e ceŋɗe jooɗtoraaɗe ko he luulndo njeyaa , won heen ko jaɓnooɓe caltii , won heen ɓe njaɓaano , caggal mum njaɓtori , kono tengiti ngal dow , ko cerindiiɗo hannde luulndo ngoo etee ina darii ina aybina ɗum .
Ko nde Rumnaaɓe ngari njiimi rewo Afrik fof , gila Moretani ( hedde Maruk e Alseri hannde ) , haa Tiripoliteen ( hedde Libiya hannde ) , ɓe inniri doŋre ndee fof " Ifirikiya " haa wontoyi Afrik .
Ko nde caafal ngal wiyi pat e gite men , ko ndeen njiyaten ngee , mbiyen nge fuɗii !
Ko nde darnde makko teskaa he ɗeen golle , o woni coftuɗo , cuusɗo , ganndo , baawɗo konngol haa o heerorii innde Murtuɗo ndee .
Ko nde deftere fanniinde , nde mo woni kala , dewbo e gorko , ene hatojini he humpito ko loowdi deftere nde jaŋtotoo ko .
Ko nde fedde fotnde semmbineede no feewi .
Ko nde haɓotonoo koo , woni ittude peccooru , kinɗe e diiwaanuuji walla hakkunde Fulɓe aynaaɓe e saarankooɓe , ko nguun ceeriigu waɗtindii jaalaade he mayre ha fusi nde , haa nde wonti fehre meere nde alaa lekki .
Ko nde lowre kabaruuji e jeewte ɗo yimɓe naatnata jowe baɗte kala ko joli e winndere ndee .
Ko nde meeteer gooto e feccere njuuteendi .
Ko nde o fiilaa " Teen " , o waɗti wiyeede Teen Yuusuf Gey .
Ko nde o ummitii Labe , o fiilaa " Alfaa " , o waɗti wiyeede Alfaa Moolo .
Ko nde o yiɗi hootde ndee o sooynii Bojel ina tellorii oya bannge .
Ko nde tagofeere kaaƴiire , woni tagofeere waɗnde kaaƴe e nduufdi nanndundi e Leydi men ndii , hono kadi no Merkiir ( Mercure ) e Wenis ( Venus ) nii .
Ko nde ɓe mbari ndu nde o yaltidi omo weltii .
Ko ndee feccere ɓuri yaajde .
Ko ndee pellit-ɗen dartinde haa feere woɗnde heɓee .
Ko ndeen
Ko ndeen " fiiltiingo Atalantik " , " fiiltiingo Deeƴngo " , caggal ɗuum " fiiltiingo Inndo " , " fiiltiingo Austral " e " fiiltiingo Arctique " puɗɗii feeñde he karte .
Ko ndeen , konu Muritani yanndini-mo e gardogol Kolonel Mustafaa Wul Mohamet Salek e hitaande 1978 .
Ko ndeen , yeru , dokkol JIL ( Japanese Industrial Standard ) naatinaa heen ngam sifaade alkule Sapoo ( Japan ) , yanti heen alkule ujunnaaje kuurɗe ɗemɗe keewɗe hannde .
Ko ndeen Aadama e Hawaa puɗɗii jibinde .
Ko ndeen Abiy Ahmed werlii noddaango feewde e Ecopianaaɓe hattanɓe fof nde nganndata " yontii aɓe kollita ngenndiyankaagal maɓɓe " .
Ko ndeen Abiy Ahmed wiyi ko kamɓe mbelaa yaltude wuro mbele " remooɓe ina mbaawa yahde gese , mbele addooɓe balle ñaamdu ina kattana naatde wuro ngo , mbele kadi LFPT ina yahɓana deeƴre " .
Ko ndeen Demeke Mekonnen jaabii mo wiyi kaa haala wonaa goonga .
Ko ndeen Farayse heɓti diiwanuuji waasnoo e wolde 1870-1871 , hono Alsace e Lorraine Ko ina wona 88 000 km2 taƴaa e mayri ( fotde miliyoŋaaji 8 fittaandu ) .
Ko ndeen Gabrielle ne naati geew o .
Ko ndeen Geno lonngini annabi Nuuhu , wiyi ɗum : " sinno mi hoddiriino mbiɗo faaboo hay sinno ko gooto e yimɓe leñol maa , ma mi faabotono ooɗoo debbo jom ɓinngel , heddi noon ko mi fodaniino ɓe halkaare , ngam goofi maɓɓe " .
Ko ndeen Geno lonngini annabi Nuuhu ɓeeɗoo worɓe ngoni : Abuubakiri , Umar , e Usmaan , Aliw ɓii Abaa Ɗaalib .
Ko ndeen Goodluck Jonathan toɗɗaa lomtiiɗo hade makko haɓtude aafiya .
Ko ndeen Ibliis kuɗaaɗo oo wirtii mo fiyi junngo mum e dow reedu Aadama .
Ko ndeen Ibliis meeɗi woondirde geno , wiyi : " mi woondiri Geno toowɗo Oo , so on ñaamii heen , hay huunde ɗum lorlataa on .
Ko ndeen Jibriil nanngi e juŋngo Aadama ina woni kolɗo ina heddii hoore mehre , o yahdi e mum to haayre mawnde ina to leydi Enndo ine wiyee Raayhuun , o jippini mo ɗoon saanga kikiiɗe , ina hawri ñalnde aljumaa .
Ko ndeen Koppolaani yenanaa coktirgal e kannaat Muritani ko Tagante e Adraar .
Ko ndeen Makkah hoɗaa .
Ko ndeen Mark e sehilaaɓe mum ɓe janngidtunoo puɗɗii topaade ngol e nder cuuɗi mum en , kono ndeen ko sanɗaaji duɗal ngal tan mbaawnoo seŋaade heen .
Ko ndeen Saharaa darni konu mum ena woyee " Front Polisario " ñalnde 10 Duujal 1973 .
Ko ndeen Senegaal fuɗɗi anndude o suka dewbo Pullo , mo hoddiro e ɗannugal baaba mum to Konngo ( Congo ) addani ɗum jibinoyeede Brazzaville he 1992 .
Ko ndeen Teekaan waɗaa " kantoŋ " , Njaay Aliw Kan waɗaa gardiiɗo " kantoŋ " Teekaan .
Ko ndeen Wadd ( ena ñuumbee ) tuumi ko Seek Tijjaan Gaajo habri Latif Kulibali ko suuɗinoo walla nih , hokki-ɗum kaayitaaji cirlinɗi ɗi potaano yande e juuɗe tumaraŋkooɓe goomu ANOCI .
Ko ndeen Yero'en nduttii , pa'i galle Saalif .
Ko ndeen aduna oo kala seedii semmbe kulɓiniiɗo kaɓirɗe nikleyeer .
Ko ndeen biyeteeɗo Aliw Tarawele , cowɗo he moobaare ndee weltaade haa wiyi : " Kompawre e cibooji mum njiɗnoo ko helde hay koyɗi amen , kono duuɓi 35 amin padi ndee ñalaande , duuɓi 35 min pini min tawi koyɗol ɓesngu Burkinaa e gardagol Sankara ndewi ko laawol pooccingol .
Ko ndeen darnde Goodal yiɗi jokkude tawi ene yaɓɓi he pele maɓɓe kono kadi tawa ene huwtorii peeje ɗe yonta hannde o laaɓndi ɗe .
Ko ndeen dillere jibini pelle Pulaar ko wayno Fedde Ɓamtoore Pulaar Senegaal e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he nder Muritani .
Ko ndeen faayre addani fannuyankooɓe politik leydi ndi waɗde eeraango fa'de e Belees Kompaawore yoo noddu Sellu e Konnde yahdooɓe lofu ɗimmu ɓe , ko ɓuri yaawde e yaajtaade mbele eɓe kajoo militaaji maɓɓe ko adii lofu ngu ina dawree .
Ko ndeen feere ɓe ɓamdi hade goɗɗum .
Ko ndeen fulɓe puɗɗi saraade .
Ko ndeen geno toowɗo Oo lonngini aadama , wiyi ɗumɗoo ko aljannaaji ɗiɗi : ɗoo ko galle teddungal mon , naatee no weliri on .
Ko ndeen geno yamiri maleykaaji yo ƴettu laana kaa ɓamta ɗum dow hakkunde leydi e asamaan , etee e nder kaawisaaji geno nde laana kaa ɓamtetee ndee , banndiraaɓe ɓee fof ina ndaara haa ka wirnii gite maɓɓe e kattanɗe geno .
Ko ndeen golle ɗee ngasi .
Ko ndeen hankadi Fuladu wonti nehaande Laamaandi Fuladu .
Ko ndeen haŋkadi jokkondiral maɓɓe e leydi taƴi .
Ko ndeen heerto FDRPE toɗɗii Abiy Ahmed yoo won Gardiiɗo Jaagorɗe ñalnde 2 Abiriil ( Seeɗto ) 2018 .
Ko ndeen hitaande ( 2012 ) , nde waawi dañande heen hoore mayre kaɓirɗe , nde yoɓi ko ina ɓura 800 000 MRO luwaas joɗnde Fedde ndee e kaɓirɗe mum ( ko ndeen fedde ndee waawi ƴettude joɗnde moƴƴere ) .
Ko ndeen hitaande min ciimti fuku e nder Fuuta , ena heɗee haa jooni e diiwaan oo .
Ko ndeen hitaande o naati e heerto kominist en – PCF .
Ko ndeen jotondiral hakkunde Muritani e Ejipt darii .
Ko ndeen joɗnde toɗɗii Yiilirde aroore ndee , fotnde toppitaade keɓtingol mayre to laamu .
Ko ndeen kadi Dowlaaji ɗo njiyaagu luttunoo woodde kunii haɗdenjulaagu nguu .
Ko ndeen kadi François Coty , faraysenaajo gardinooɗo jaaynde " l’Ami du Peuple " – Musiɗɗo Ɓesngu ) , ummanii jeeyngal haɓde e Ceemoko .
Ko ndeen kadi naɓokayanke goɗɗo , Daawuuda Idi Jaawara suɓiimo rokkimo rol dowrowo filma mum " Ruer dans les Brancards " .
Ko ndeen kadi ngel ɓuroyta duumaade he ekkol .
Ko ndeen kadi o addondiri e Manndelaa wonde ma o daar nguurndam mum e ɗemngal pulaar e tugnaade e defte keewɗe binndaaɗe e nguurndam Manndelaa .
Ko ndeen kadi o fuɗɗii ellaade , walla mbiyen ɗum ruŋaade , yiyde ƴiiƴam , o natti anndude asko , ko ndeen yimɓe mbaɗti wiyɓe ɓiɓɓe aadama , ko ɗum waɗi alaa e ɓiyɓe maɓɓe fof , jooftinteeɗo e Hawwaa .
Ko ndeen kanko E .
Ko ndeen kiliyaneeɓe ɓee njippii ina laara ko kaccitii .
Ko ndeen konu Oromo naati he hare nde .
Ko ndeen koyngal fiyi-mo , ladde noddi , o ɗannorii Maali , Kodduwaar , Ganaa , Togo , Benee e Nijeriyaa Hakke duuɓi joy omo woni e ladde !
Ko ndeen laamɗo Firdu biyeteeɗo Jaŋka Waali foolaa , o salii waɗteede maccuɗo , o renndini ɓesngu makko e jagge laamu makko fof , debbo e gorko , kamɓe fof ɓe mbartii .
Ko ndeen lella wi'i ndu njahen .
Ko ndeen leyɗeele Orpo , yantude e Dowlaaji Denntuɗi pettliti darnude TPI ( Galle ñaawooje winndere ) to Laa Hay .
Ko ndeen mawɗo wuro Fanay-Jeeri , Mammadu Saydu Kan yahi haaltani Chesse , mawɗo tunndu Daŋana .
Ko ndeen miijo ɓeydude e dokkol alkulal fof bitere ɓamaa .
Ko ndeen miñi mum Ibiraa Almaami , Biraan Abdul waraa , goɗɗo biyeteeɗo Aamadu Kuro barminaa .
Ko ndeen naalaŋkooɓe naatata diŋiral , kuɓɓa jaynde hakkunde leydi e aamaan ngam dillinde ɓerɗe men , weltinde piɗtaali men e mawninde pine men .
Ko ndeen ndee winndannde himmunde , wiyeteende " Nanondiral paatungal e keew-guurɗiwal " winndaa , baɗɗingal he dow kala leyɗe ciifɗe ngal , to bannge hisnude keewal ciiri kullon , e to bannge daranaade feewnitde e wiltinde juɓɓe sato doostiiɗe walla bonnaaɗe .
Ko ndeen ngel cukalel biyeteengel Saydu Bah ƴeftaa ɗoon ko yaawi , ɗo guli ngalaa , jeddi ngoodaani .
Ko ndeen nih o resi kanko saam ɓiɗɗo debbo ina wiyee Rahmata .
Ko ndeen njooɗaa mi golle e teddungal sahre Mammadu Saar mo catal Tijjaani Aan ngal Tabital Pulaaku Farayse jogii hoolaare haa resndi ɗum gollal cukko hoyreejo to korbey Eson .
Ko ndeen noon annabi Iisaa , ( JKM ) yahi noddoyi waasɓe , wumɓe , woofɗuɓe , faaɗuɓe fof , yo ngar e garjuɓe wonndunooɓe e ñawu mboros en , yo ɓe ngar ɓe ñaama liingu nguu .
Ko ndeen o anndondiri e debbo gaaciyanke ŋanaa Joséphine Baker .
Ko ndeen o arti Labe caggal maayde kaaw makko Seyku Balde gonnooɗo arɗo Nduyeeɓe to Labe .
Ko ndeen o arti Senegaal o fayi Duɗal Kebloowal Jannginooɓe ( Ecole Normale Superieure ) , caggal heblo duuɓi ɗiɗi , o wonti jannginoowo he duɗe hakkundeeje ( Lycée ) he nder Senegaal .
Ko ndeen o fodani Alfaa Moolo darjeende e laamu , o wiyi ma o laato kuuɓnoowo wellitaare leydi makko .
Ko ndeen o fuɗɗii lelnude eɓɓo e diidde pewje ngam darnude isin peewnoowo ñaamdu sukaaɓe he nder Senegaal he ballal waalde walloore rewɓe Women Investment Club ( WIC ) e Impact Hub Dakaar , caggal ɗuum kadi woɗɓe renndidiiɓe ngari mbaɗi heen juuɗe mum en , ɓe cosi Le Lionceau he 2018 , kanko e janngidiiɓe makko ɓe o wonndunoo to duɗal asiñoraagal .
Ko ndeen o holli Aadama inɗe ɗee kala , hono no Alla wiyiri : " anndinii Aadama inɗe kala " simoore nagge , kaawise 31 .
Ko ndeen o holliti ( e haala tan ) laabi ɗi o wiyi potɗi reweede , o teeŋtini wonde Muritaninaaɓe kala maa mbinndite , kono ko doge nay waɗatee
Ko ndeen o itti yimɓe Afirik ngari Moscou janngude ko fayti e " senndikaagal " .
Ko ndeen o jippinaa , kono battande makko nganndaaka e oo sahaa kono ina ɗaminaa maa guut maɓɓe lor mo sabu gila ɓe celaani gite yeeɓooɓe , ɓe ceeraani e fettude , dampude , yerƴude mo ɗo gaañata .
Ko ndeen o mahi heen buluŋŋe , ɓe mbaɗi heen nokku ɗo ɓe mooftata henndu ngam reentaade hoto ɓe mbaasde ɗum , wontana ɓe lor mo hono mum alaa .
Ko ndeen o naati e dawrugol , o jeytaa e dille almuɓɓe " nannanɓe " , tuugninooɓe e " Miijanteendi " Mawoo Sedong .
Ko ndeen o naati to duɗal Ñeene ( école des arts ) .
Ko ndeen o suɓii gooto e ɓadiiɓe-mo e lannda ADIL ( mo laamu nguu ) ena wiyee Yahya Wul Ahmed Waghf .
Ko ndeen o toɗɗaa laamɗo Nijeriyaa e lomtagol Olusegun Obasanjo .
Ko ndeen o waawi renndin’de ko ina tolnoo e miliyaaruuji 1800 , balle ɗe o heɓi e leyɗe .
Ko ndeen o waawi telɓinde teette laamu ( " coups d’état " keewɗe .
Ko ndeen o waɗti ɓoornaade ko nafata .
Ko ndeen o wiyi , e no Alla wiyiri e Ɓuraana mum tedduɗo oo " joomi am , hoto ko keddu-ɗaa e dow leydi e ubbooɓe dewe Alla ɗee , ( ubbooɓe dewe Alla , woni heefereeɓe ) waɗi noon ko so tawii a woppii ɓe he dow leydi , alaa ko ɓeydatoo e maɓɓe so wonaa majjinde jiyaaɓe maa , ɓe njibintaa hay huunde so wonaa ooñiiɓe ubbooɓe .
Ko ndeen o wiyi : " Alfaa Moolo , aɗa roondii hakke wellitde Fulɓe Gaabu , ittaa ɓe e njiimaandi Mandiŋkooɓe " .
Ko ndeen o ƴettiti nguurndam neɗɗo laawɗuɗo e nder njuɓɓudi laamu Muritani tawi o yeebaaki nguurndam duɗe Al falaah e mahgol jumaaji e nder weertaango Afrik bannge hirnaange .
Ko ndeen pewjaten eɓɓooji men , toɗɗo-ɗen ɗowooɓe ɗiin eɓɓooji tawa ko goomuuji hakkundeleyɗiije .
Ko ndeen puɗɗii-mi winndude ɗum e Pulaar .
Ko ndeen raɓɓiɗinaade woni deftere makko anndaande ndee .
Ko ndeen ruuhu maa ŋabbi dow kammuuji , sorkii he duule , ɗelñitii nder annoore wellitiiɓe he Firdaws .
Ko ndeen senngo " Ɓaleeɓe " udditaa nder fedde " Winndereere Kominist’en – Internationale communiste " .
Ko ndeen so sukaaɓe rewɓe ene njaha ene pay to lammba too , ɓe mbaɗata diɗɗe maɓɓe eɓe njaha e ɓe njima cayɗe .
Ko ndeen sukaaɓe jeyaaɓe e 40% galleeji ɓuri famɗude doole to bannge renndo e faggudu , ɓuroyta waawde janngirde ɗemngal ngal paamataa , tee galleeji maɓɓe ngalaa ngalu mbaawngu ustude baɗte politikaaji ɗemngal jaŋde ɗi moƴƴaani he nder ekkollaaji ɗo njanngata ɗoo .
Ko ndeen tan ENAJM e denndaangal juɓɓule jaŋde e heblo ngonata nokkuuji mahooji ngootaagu ngenndi , ɗi ngona kadi kuutorɗe baawɗe rokkude halfinaaɓe njuɓɓudi laamu ɓee , ñaawooɓe ɓee , e jaaynooɓe ɓee , e denndaangal fanniyankooɓe " geɗe ndenndaandi " , gannde paatuɗe e ɗemɗe , e pinal e renndo , gaddanooje ɗum en waawde jokkondirde e yimɓe ɗo ɓe ngollotoo ɗoo , kam e waawde ardaade gardagol juumtungol .
Ko ndeen tan kuule ndewetee tawa addaani luure .
Ko ndeen ujunnaaji ɓiɓɓe Fuuta naati e konu Muritani ngam haɓoyeede to leydi Saharaa , sabu kisal Muritani .
Ko ndeen waɗooɓe kawgel dogdu kollirta ko mbaawi e yeeso renndo ngoo .
Ko ndeen waɗooɓe kawgel ngel puɗɗii yirlaade e digiral ngal e nder gorowoccol jooɗngol .
Ko ndeen wiyaa o waɗdii e Jinneeji ( baralli ) .
Ko ndeen wiyetee Wolde Gawdal Koolɗi , nde mbiy-ɗen joofri ko e kirsugol Ceernaajo oo .
Ko ndeen wojere fiɗɗi , fiɗɗitii noppi mum juutɗi ɗii .
Ko ndeen wojere ummii rewi e laawol fowru .
Ko ndeen wolde wiyetee Wolde ɗacce .
Ko ndeen woni nde Alla wahiyii mo , walla mbiyen lonngini mo , wiyi mo hankadi yontii mbiɗo anndi semmbe maa e dow worɓe e rewɓe , e dow ɗumɗoon alaa keddiiɗo e dow leydi walla gonɗo e nder reedu yummum hannde mo ina nana ko noddataa koo .
Ko ndeen woni nde Fooyre fuɗɗii heɓde hoore mum , caɗeele ustii to oon bannge , hay so tawii eɗe keddii to bannge tappugol e keblugol nate ekn To oon bannge ne , huutortenoo e oon sahaa ko " stensilaaji elektoronik " , ɗi keewno-ɗen " juɗoyde " to Duɗal ɗemɗe Ngenndiije , sibu ko kam tan joginoo oon masiŋ .
Ko ndeen woni nde lappol Ngijilonnaaɓe
Ko ndeen woni nde ɓe mahi rawda makko , ɓe taƴani mo ñalngu keeriingu , ñalnde 15 siilto , ñalawma siftorgol e mawningol ñaam-golluuje makko e Ballal Alla e ballal Fedde Sileymaani Baal jooɗiinde to leydi Itali to bannge ngalu .
Ko ndeen woni sahaa ɓurɗo hawrande banngagol .
Ko ndeen yaajtina haa nde ɓeydii lakkitaade ngam waawde tammbaade fannuuji keewɗi to bannge safaara .
Ko ndeen yamiroore njoɗɗin-ɗen to muulirde ngenndi ngam hebbitinde tonngoode 33 ( sulyee 2006 ) .
Ko ndeen ñaawooɓe Wagadugu kolliti ɗaɓɓaande makko jaɓnaani .
Ko ndeen ɓe calmondiri e helifaaɓe ɓee .
Ko ndeen ɓe lelni " Comité de Défense d’Éthiopie – Goomu Falanaade Ecopiya " .
Ko ndeen ɓe njaɓi heɓtinde yimɓe maɓɓe ena poti weeɗeede ngam ena ñaawee .
Ko ndeen ɗoon tonngoode 31 saraa e ñalɗi mawningol hitaande 30ɓiire Fedde ndee ( 3 e 4 suwee 2006 ) .
Ko ndeeɗoo hitaande , fuutankooɓe mbiyata hitaande mowluuda , nde tawnoo ko ndeen ɓe mbaɗti waɗde mowluuda .
Ko ndeeɗoo rogere woni rogere Balla .
Ko nder neɗɗo , nder fittaandu neɗɗo ina woodi bannge , wiyat maa tan ko " waɗ ko mbele-ɗaa fof !
Ko ndiin cuɗaari feeñi he KOOLOL NGENNDI PINIYANKEEWOL TO JOWOL 2023 .
Ko ndiin kadi ɓurnoo yuɓɓude .
Ko ndiin tuundi " ɓiɗtata nguurndam terɗe haa ndonka foofde " , rewata heen ko maayde Ɓe miijii ɗum noon ko feewnude geɗe caaynooje tuundi e nder ɓalndu , no saabunnde laaɓɓinirta ɓalnu nii , walla comcol nii , walla kaakol nii .
Ko ndiiɗoo keeweendi kam e " kuutoragol men ngaluuji tago " ngol yuɓɓaani , saabotoo majjugol aadee .
Ko ndu 400 m2 , ndu woniri ko dow , e etaas gadano .
Ko nduu inciru wono e nder ɗereeji jayɗe Mali .
Ko nduun sawru kelli liibiindu mo woni kala e hitaande hikka nde addani fannuyankooɓe njanngu leydi ndi wi’de wonde tolno almuudɓe ɓe ina tellii haa ɓurti haa ko ɗum saabii njeñtudi ndi woynii heewɓe ( almudɓe e jibnaaɓe ) .
Ko neɗɗo ndaarata e aduna sikka ko nih , tawa wonaa noon ene heewi : sahaa so nguleeki heewii , yimɓe ena keewi yiyde ndiyam walla beeli e boowal goɗɗungal : ko ɗuum mbiyaten " ɓiɓɓe naange " .
Ko neɗɗo woni sabaabu ko ɓuri heewde e makko .
Ko ngaal goodal e oon waylo-waylo Ceerno Aamadu Sammba Demmbele ɓurɗo lollirde DAS , yiɗi yeewtande en he nder ndee deftere makko yaltunde ko ɓooyaani .
Ko ngaal nuunɗal addanta liggotooɗo ɓeydaneede " martaba " ( grade ) haa halfinee golle goɗɗe ɓurɗe faayodinde , mantee e timmal ɗeen golle .

Ko ngaal piggal laatii woni wuddu neɗɗo nduu .
Ko ngaal pottital o toɗɗaa yo o won jiiloowo goomu cuɓanoongu yo ardo ngaal pottital .
Ko ngaal ɗoon mooɓondiral jibini waylo waylo keewɗo e nder fedde hee , ɓeydi luggiɗingol karallaagal jaŋde nde , jaaƴcingol mayre e cosgol fannuuji kesi , ina jeyaa heen jaaynde winndeteende hono Fooyre Ɓamtaare .

Ko ngol nii woni go’o ko hono ɗum ina waɗa to Angalteer .
Ko ngol waɗi ɗiɗmol ko Goomu ndariniingu rewindo jaayndeeji ene yuɓɓina kawgel , tawtina heen ɗemɗe Ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof .
Ko ngol woni goo kati ko Afrik ine heɓa poolguuji jeeɗiɗi he daawal goomuuji .
Ko ngol woni koolol sappo e ɗiɗi gila ñalɗii ɗii puɗɗa waɗeede he 1998 .
Ko ngol woni nayaɓol ko rewɓe mehɓe ine keɓa njeenaari Nobel , caggal Nobel Wayliwal mo Marie Curie ( Faraysenaaɓe poloñnaajo ) heɓi e hitaande 1911 , mo Dorothy Crowfoot Hodgkin ( Biritaannaajo ) heɓi e hitaande 1964 , kam e Nobel nehsuwal-selliwal mo Barbara McClintock ( Ameriknaajo ) heɓi e hitaande 1983 .
Ko ngol woni ɗimmol ko batu nguu ine jooɗoo he Fuɗnaange Ɓadiiɗo , gadanol ngol wonnoo ko to Kataar he hitaande 2012 ( tawi Magreb hiisaaka heen ) .
Ko ngol ɗoo waɗi laabi ɗiɗi na riiwtee !
Ko ngolɗoo laawol ñalɗi ɗii teeŋtini kadi .

Ko ngonka makko ko waɗata sahaaji ɗii potataa .

Ko ngoonga heen sahaaji won e taƴooɓe ( hakers ) ko haɓaade bonannde e salaade tooñannge addanta ɗum en waɗde ɗum , ko wayno fedde jaayndiyankooɓe wekileaks , nde Julian Assange jaayndiyanke Austarlinaajo ardino , aawtinooɓe sirluuji leydi Amerik njaltini ɗum en boowal , ngam yiɗnoode seyfitde golle Amerik e Angalteer mbaɗatnoo Fuɗnaange hakkunddejo ɗe .

Ko noon ne kadi binndugol defte .
Ko noon ne kadi coñce men keewiri soowreede jawdi nehaandi , maa mbarakon ladde , ngam siftinde dental ngal ko waɗnoo maa ko jommbaani laatoo .
