Ko ɗum waɗi naange fuɗirta toon ko wonani en hirnaange ko .
Ko ɗum waɗi naataani .
Ko ɗum waɗi nde Rajo Cukaaku uddi ( Rajo Jeunesse ) , o waɗti waɗde heen jeewte jirwuɗe e ballal Jallo Saydu Mammadu , jiiloowo tuugnorgal jeewte catal Pulaar e nder Rajo Muritani .
Ko ɗum waɗi nde ngartu-ɗen ñalnde 26/12/2013 , en ɓuuɓtinaani , enen fof e tampude .
Ko ɗum waɗi nih so en kulaani , mbiyen o jaggiraa jooni ko sabu Orop wiyi ko so wonaa Serbiy jagga waɗnooɓe bonandeeji e Bosniy , weeɗaɗum'en Laa Hay , haala yantude e Dental Orop haaletaake .
Ko ɗum waɗi njiɗ-ɗen ko damal ngal wona piroowal sariyaaji ɗii e ɗemngal pulaar , sila ɗi , kadi heɗtoo on to bannge miijo ngo njogi-ɗon heen e kabaaruuji ɗi ndokkaton ko feewti e luure e tooñanngeeji jolooji heen .
Ko ɗum waɗi o seerataa e funtude ma .
Ko ɗum waɗi o ɗomɗi .
Ko ɗum waɗi so hiirii , walla subaka , asamaan oo heewi ko wojjude seeɗa .
Ko ɗum waɗi so tawii a ƴeewii hannde ko julaaɓe tan walla jagge toowɗe e nder laamu hee ndokketee leydi .
Ko ɗum waɗi wiyde ina tonnga limoore maɓɓe wonaa huunde newiinde fawaade e ɗiin dalillaaji .
Ko ɗum waɗi wiyeede gannde men keewɗe ko maabo e cubballo njogii ɗum .
Ko ɗum waɗi ɓe njurmaaki Maali hay sahaa !
Ko ɗum waɗi ɗii duuɓi
Ko ɗum waɗi ɗoo e dumunna daɓɓo , so en ndeenaaki , maa dingiral politigi diwaan Saahel oo jogo mbaadi kesiri .
Ko ɗum waɗnoo hello dokkaango e ASCII keeriiɗo waawaa yaltinde alkule dokkaaɗe e ko wonaa ASCII .
Ko ɗum waɗnoo so neɗɗoo neldii alkule e Enternet horoo yaltinde no fotiri sabu dokkule ɗee njiidaa .
Ko ɗum waɗɗi mbiyɗen " sinno " ) .
Ko ɗum weltaare wonande sukaaɓe ɓee .
Ko ɗum wiꞌi baaba Jeeri : Demmba waɗaani hay huunde , fof ko miin .
Ko ɗum woni faandaare amen e ɗiin nokkuuji .
Ko ɗum woni ko Pulaar wiyata " roni ronna " .
Ko ɗum woni ko anndiraa " motion de censure " e ɗemngal farayseere .
Ko ɗum woni ko feeñninaa ( bayyinaa ) ɗo hannde , e Fooyre Ɓamtaare t° 55 e faynde arde .
Ko ɗum woni paandaale laamu ngu .
Ko ɗum woni sabaabu , mo tinaton to ɓuri woɗɗude he mon , keedoowo on e fiɓde hay so araniino on goongɗinde .
Ko ɗum yeewtere ,
Ko ɗum ñuumbetenoo e Senegaal , kono hannde , daaɗe ko dow gila e jaayndeeji haa e rajooji , hay gooto suuɗaaki !
Ko ɗum ɓuri wonde sunna .
Ko ɗum ɗoo foti wonde darnde e dadungal mo woni kala
Ko ɗum ɗoon wonoyta hujja " seppo feewde rewo " e cuɓagol koloñaal innde " Muritani " ndee e hitaande 1899 , e tafde ko jogori wontoyde leydi men koo .
Ko ɗumɗo firata duwaawu awluɓe o : " Yalla yo a wuur ha bada !
Ko ɗumɗoo addani PAM lolludirde wonde fedde ɓurnde waawde faabaade e nder ngonkaaji keñoraaɗi , sabu kattanɗe mum yaawde faabaade , tawi ko e nokkuuji ɓurɗi mettude yettaade .
Ko ɗumɗoo woni ballal am seeɗa e kaɓgol e fiɗo VIH/SIDA .
Ko ɗumɗoo woni ko hulɓinii koo , ko ɗumɗoo foti faameede .
Ko ɗumɗoo woni ko urmbiti haala .
Ko ɗumɗoon waɗi , laamaandi ngaadanteeri salafɓe ɓuri heddaade sibu njiimaandi koloñaal e maɓɓe ɓuri raɓɓiɗde .
Ko ɗuum
Ko ɗuum Abdul naamndii sehil mum .
Ko ɗuum Singapuur suɓii , so waɗtude doole mum e ƴellite ƴoƴre yimɓe mum .
Ko ɗuum addani Canngalle , Jeelli , Dolluɗi , Boje , Jihe , Dagaaji , Gundooji , Eleeji , Bolle , Dasi , Ndawuuji , Doobe , Gerle , Jaawle , Liwe barooɗe , Liwe goobeeje eggude ceene men .
Ko ɗuum addani Doktoor My Said Afif , hooreejo Fedde Maruknaare toppitiinde Gannde Safaara ( Société Marocaine des Sciences Médicales ) , jeyaaɗo kadi e goomu karalleewu e nganndeewu ñakku Covid , wiyde : " feere ñakku Sinofarm ( Sinopharm ) huutoroyteende he Maruk ndee , ko feere siirnde , sibu nde huutorii ko wiris cammitaaɗo " .
Ko ɗuum addani Fedde
Ko ɗuum addani Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe waɗande ngu Ñalngu keeriingu ngam findinde yimɓe , e semmbinde ɗum loskude koye mum en law , mbele ina njiyta ngu law .
Ko ɗuum addani Geloonga wiyeede suukara caalli
Ko ɗuum addani Goomu winndereewu teddeele ( keewal teddeendi ) e ɓetirɗe ( Comité international des poids et mesures ) wagginde , e hitaande 2005 , baylugol tuugorgal ñiso .
Ko ɗuum addani Guwerneer oo
Ko ɗuum addani Neɗɗo ( Aadee ) wiyeede ine jeyaa e saabiiɓe majjugol ciiri nguurndam keewɗi .
Ko ɗuum addani Suleymaani Baal e jagge mawɗe to bannge lislaam , ɗe wondunoo , waasde dañde caɗeele e liɓgol lawake deeniyanke cakkitto e 1776 .
Ko ɗuum addani UNESCO semmbinde , gila 1953 , jaŋde ɗemngal neeniwal he tolno jaŋde leslesre .
Ko ɗuum addani annduɓe ɓee heblude lappol goɗngol , ngam etaade ustude njaru nguu rewrude e ustugol kaɓirɗe ɗee , potngol holliteede e hitaande 2019 , mbele DART ina waawa werleede 2022 walla 2024 .
Ko ɗuum addani biyeteeɗo Hammadi Sammba Jallo halfineede lefol ngol tuggude e hitaande 2013 fayde ɗoo hannde ɗo ƴeftu-ɗen taariik oo ( hitaande 2014 ) .
Ko ɗuum addani biyeteeɗo Jibriil Sih winndude he Balal mum Facebook " Hoorejo leydi majjikiniiɗo tuundi 28 noowammbar waawaa wiyde ko " persidaa Muritaninaaɓe fof !
Ko ɗuum addani fedde wiyeteende " SOS Diabète " muritaninaare daraniinde wallitde fiyaaɓe nguun ñawu , no ndaɗiri e bonannde maggu , e GIFES , fedde nde muritaninaajo sosi leydi Farayse , tawi faandaare mum ko heesndaade tumarankooɓe afiriknaaɓe , teeŋti noon e muritaninaaɓe yillotooɓe Orop ngam wallitde ɗum en no naatiri e renndo tuubakooɓe , haa mbaawa hisde heen to bannge ɗaɓɓugol golle , hebleede to bannge mecce e humpitaade hakkeeji mum en , e parliiɗi e dow mum en toon to njillii .
Ko ɗuum addani leydi Siin ne daraade hannde ngam ruppaade ndeen yowitaare e añde daɗeede .
Ko ɗuum addani l’Office wiyde Idi nani yuurnoo jooɗorde Wade .
Ko ɗuum addani mo innireede bayti Elmaamuur dimɗinaaɗo , koo dimɗinaaɗo gaa ɗuufaan .
Ko ɗuum addani mo pellital muulde defte Pulaar/Fulfulde he kala tolno , ngam mbele sukaaɓe ɓee ene kirjinee he janngude e waawde taraade he maggal .
Ko ɗuum addani ndi dogde e maslahaa .
Ko ɗuum addani pelle ɗee wasiyaade Dowla Muritani
Ko ɗuum addani porfeseer Martinod wiyde " terɗe tafaaɗe ko kam en njogori wayloyde ganndal safaara janngo " .
Ko ɗuum addani sunnotooɓe dawrugol Burkina nanndinde Ibrahiima Tarawele e Thomas Sankara nde ardotoo laamu Burkina he 1983 .
Ko ɗuum addani won oon wiyde " Persidaa majjikiniiɗo tuundi 28 noowammbar , waawaa wiyde ko persidaa Murianinaaɓe fof "
Ko ɗuum addani ɓe , sabu maɓɓe woƴeede koɗdigal moƴƴal nder leydi ndii , heblude winndannde ɗo ɓe kolliti ngoƴa maɓɓe e ngootaagu ngenndi ndii , ɓe cakkiti heen peeje potɗe siyneede ngam moƴƴinde gondigal e leydi hee .
Ko ɗuum addani ɓe hawritde ñalnde 13 abriil 2015 to Itaali ngam lelnude peeje no leydi men ruuɗorii ɗeen kaaƴe .
Ko ɗuum addani ɓe yaltinde " fatwa " , harminde naatnugol sukaaɓe Dimatnaaɓe " ekkolaaji " Tuubakooɓe .
Ko ɗuum addani ɗum arande mo saanga de baaba makko saŋkii ndee , ngam yahdude e makko .

Ko ɗuum addannoo Seneraal Haftar " bommbude ‘ tuddule maɓɓe to Dulaki ( 2014 ) , e Jebel Sawda ( 2016 ) , e Al Jufarah ( 2016 ) .
Ko ɗuum addannoo dowlaaji innitortooɗi Almaa rentude ngam haɓde e Farayse .
Ko ɗuum addannoo kam fiɓde e fellitde dañande kaa ngonka feere .
Ko ɗuum addannoo yimɓe hoɗɓe e nduukon Bikini nder Pasifik , ɗaɓɓude moolaade e hoɗtineede nder Dental dowlaaji Amerik .
Ko ɗuum addanooɓe waɗan’de Ibraahiima Malal Saar teddungal mawngal , ñalnde 15 Mbooy , 2015 to UCAD ( Jaaɓi haaɗtirde Seek Anta Joop Dakar ) .
Ko ɗuum addanta ɓe dukde sabu heen gooto fof e ɓaraade no sariya lelniri walla no foti faamreede , ko heen fawata dallinannde mum .

Ko ɗuum addi musiiba oo .
Ko ɗuum addi yidde aamen kala suka jaŋngoo e jam yo waaw jogaade koor mum " , Joob .
Ko ɗuum addunoo fergooji galleeji seernaaɓe keewɗi , bayɗi no galle Abdul Qaadir Kan en e galle Maba Jaxu Bah , peranɗi diiwaan Saalum , walla ɗoofagol duɗe njanngu mawɗe ko wayi no duɗal Ceerno Amar Faal , paytungal to Pir Sañekuru .
Ko ɗuum annduɓe mbiyi ko geno haalni laana kaa , ngam nde ka haali ɗuum ndee , alaa jiyaaɗo nder makka .
Ko ɗuum battini e golle ɗee haa yanoyi e jeewte ɗee .
Ko ɗuum e nanallaaji goongɗinɓe ɓee ngadii ñaamde e nder winndere ko reseŋ .
Ko ɗuum gooto e amparantiiji ɗii jaabii mo .
Ko ɗuum heɓtinoo Alfaa Konndee to Gine , kono ko hono ɗuum Alasan Watara to Koddiwaar waɗi , to Cad ne kay ko ɓiy Idiriis Debii Mohammat Debii jooɗtii e dow jappeere baaba mum nde waraa ( warngo e niɓɓere ) , haɗi mo doosgal leydi dagnunoo lomtagol mum .
Ko ɗuum jey sabaabu ganndondiral makko e Jean Claude Boulard , Senateur kadi Meer wuro Mans , mo o wonno balloowo mum to suudu sarɗiiji ( assistante parlementaire ) .
Ko ɗuum jey sabaabu laamu Senegaal halfin’de ɓe ñalawma uddirɗo yontere jaŋde mawɓe ( Clôture de la semaine nationale de l’Alphabétisation ) , ɓaɗnooɗo ñalnde 14 Silto , 2019 , to Ecole Ceerno Sileymaan Baal he tawtoreede jaagorɗo o , e Aliw Sal Meer mo Geejawaay , yantude e pelle walla yimɓe daraniiɓe ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije Senegaal .
Ko ɗuum jey tafeede Peŋngal Ndeenka e Kisal ( Conseil de sécurité des nations unis ) cosangal ñalnde 17 Siilo 1946 .
Ko ɗuum jeyi sabaabu keewgol jettooɗe maɓɓe : Kebbee , Dukkuree walla Dukkee , Koreera , Gasamma e Sumaare .
Ko ɗuum jeyi sabaabu ɓamtu-ɗen ndeeɗoo tiitoonde ngam suɗirde winndannde mem faytunde e nguurndam makko .
Ko ɗuum jibinta yerƴo ndampoowa kaɓirgel ngel .
Ko ɗuum kadi findini yimɓe heewɓe ko faati e sato .
Ko ɗuum maama Booy naamnii Ndoorel .
Ko ɗuum nawnoo-mi Jeneef to Siwis ngam tawtoreede kewu dokkitgol njeenaari ndii .

Ko ɗuum nii addani

Ko ɗuum ordinateer

Ko ɗuum seerndi ɗum e tinndol .

Ko ɗuum tagi , gila nde Riisi yani he Ikren he lewru feebariyee 2022 , ɓerɗe keewɗe ko dariiɗe .
Ko ɗuum tagi , haa hannde ko ɓeeynirɗe ɗiɗi tan ( ɓeeynirɗe Voyager ) kattani ɓoccitaade yuɓɓo Naange .

Ko ɗuum tagi , so Alla , mi faamaani ngalɗoo ceerungal " .
Ko ɗuum tagi , so en njiɗii ndee feere yettoo no moƴƴi faandaare mum toɓɓaande ndee , alaa-e-sago nde naatta e feere ɓurnde yaajde , so mbayliigu tippudi nehdi e jaŋde tuugiingu e janngingol ɗemɗe men ngenndiije ɗee kala , nde tuugoo e politik goonganteejo laawɗingol ɗemɗe Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof .
Ko ɗuum tagi , ɓaaƴo ngoo fof e leefde to Mbaañ too , ko maa karalleeɓe NASA tafi laanel koyngel no feewi , ngel njaaweeki jirlagol bibje mum ɓuri ( to woɗɗi ) jirlagol bibje elikopter gaadoraaɗo , nde ɗum aaɓnoo .
Ko ɗuum tagi en njiyii , hade Perseverance juuraade heen , tawi NASA tampii no feewi , haa ko hojomaaji 7 ko idii ngool juuragol inniraa " hojomaaji 7 kulol gido " ( les sept minutes de la terreur ) .
Ko ɗuum tagi en njiyii , hade deegowel DDA biyeteengel Perseverance ngel juuraade heen , tawi NASA soklii no feewi , haa ko hojomaaji 7 ko idii ngool juuragol inniraa " hojomaaji 7 giɗo " ( les 7 minutes de la terreur ) .

Ko ɗuum tagi haayre ndee wattinta
Ko ɗuum tagi haayre ndee wattinta tan ko saamde nder wuddere ɓaleere ndee .
Ko ɗuum tagi ko ine ɓura 9 e nder 10 ( 90% ) yettotooɓe bakkaa , ngalaa oon tolno ( ko ɗuum feeñata duuɓi e kitaale jooni he nder njeñtudi bakkaa ) .
Ko ɗuum tagi luural alaa , ko " cellal woni afo kala ngalu " ko cellal woni hoyre kala malu .
Ko ɗuum tagi nder Afiriki ko Ecopia e Liberia ngoni leyɗe ɗe meeɗaa halfeede .
Ko ɗuum tagi ngooroondi majji ina fota e tooweendi majji , no tooweendi ndi wayi nih ko noon luggeeki kii foti he nder leydi .
Ko ɗuum tagi nii , min njogii jotondiral moƴƴal e kaa lannda kaalaaka , tawi min ngaldaa hono ngaal jokkondiral e ba'siyankooɓe moritaninaaɓe .
Ko ɗuum tagi oon tuubaako egginaa ɗoon , tuubaako goɗɗo ganndiraaɗo Kumaandaŋ Abel Sanndee addaa ɗoon , lomtii moe nder wuro Podoor , e nder hitaande 1890 .
Ko ɗuum tagi ɗe
Ko ɗuum tagi ɗum wontude feere safrirde nde annduɓe keɓtini , wonnde e saakteede e winndere ndee .

Ko ɗuum umminta wempeƴere .

Ko ɗuum waɗaa e kaayitaaji makko laaɓɗuɗi , ko ɗuum kadi jeyi sabaabu , haa hannde , wiyeede o yahri ko duuɓi 38 .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , eɗen njaha haa 63% hannde , janngo ngarten e 48% walla ko wayi noon , sibu tawata ko kelmeendi kesiri ɓeydaama heen , nde tawnoo , karallaagal kesal seerataa e hesɗitde e ɓamtaade
Ko ɗuum waɗi , eɗen njiya nehdi sukaaɓe Boosoya seerta e ndi Laaw , jikkuuji Ngenaarnaaɓe ceerta e ɗi Damgankooɓe , walla no Toorankooɓe ngowlirta seerta e gowlaali Ɓunndunnkooɓe .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , heen sahaaji ɓe paaydee e lannddaji luulndo walla e wonduɓe e laamu .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , heewɓe e yimɓe nde tintata ina gonndi e ñawu nguu , tawata ko ngu woɗɗi e bonannde .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , jiyɗe amen ina ngoɗɗi ɗe maɓɓe to ɓe mbaawi jeyeede e leƴƴi kala .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , keew-ɗen nande ene heɗee toon , ene yeeɓee toon walla ene taree toon tan , ko jaaynirɗe laamu jeyi ɗee .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , min ƴettude sahaa amen , doole amen ngam darnude luutndere nder leydiire .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , naatde e ngoon , weeɓaani .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , so a ƴeewdii Leydi e Naange , maa a anndu Leydi ina yaha .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , ɗi kuutoraaki kuule ceddinɗe njiyaagu .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , ɗoo e Muritani , Laamu sosi njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi rewindaade kala ko yowitii e jaaynirɗe binndeteeɗe , kaaleteeɗe , walla kollirooje nate ɓosooje ( wideyooji ) .
Ko ɗuum waɗi Hooreejo leydi waawi ñaawreede ko geɗe jeyaaɗe he mbaawka rokkaa kaa .
Ko ɗuum waɗi e kooli gadani ɗii suukaaɓe maɓɓe jibinaaɓe Farayse ene tawtortenoo e keewal ngam mbaawa anndude pinal mum en e ganni mum en .
Ko ɗuum waɗi eɗen poti reende kala nokku ɗam dañetee : woyndu , caaɗngol , ekn .
Ko ɗuum waɗi fulɓe mbiyi " Keeci mbaroodi memataa leddi " .
Ko ɗuum waɗi fulɓe mbiyi : " cammalal mbaroodi ɓuri cagataagal fowru " .
Ko ɗuum waɗi gila o heɓi manndaa makko ɗiɗimo ɓe puɗɗi ŋormaade e wiyde ɓe cuwaa yiytaade tawo e laamu makko .
Ko ɗuum waɗi golwole e fowru e fulɓe hina keewi limotaako .
Ko ɗuum waɗi gooto fof nana miijoroo bannge ngam sakkitde feere mum , ine heen ɓurɗe fof haangeede .
Ko ɗuum waɗi haala fotaani wonde suɓaade hakkunde Facebook e Signal , alaa !
Ko ɗuum waɗi hakkillaaji fof nduttiima he lebbi 16 ɗaɓɓi , ɗi o ardinoo leydi ndii , kono kadi maantinɗi sabu golle baɗaaɗe , kam e faayiida e hoolaare Muritani heɓtunoo e ngaal daawal daɓɓal .
Ko ɗuum waɗi hannde inɗe keewɗe keddiima e heen edda gooto .
Ko ɗuum waɗi he nder galle Seyku Usmaan jaŋde faltaaki gorko e dewbo .
Ko ɗuum waɗi he yonta renaissance gannde gereknaaɓe naattiri Orop ko ummoraade e annduɓe juulɓe ko wayno Ibnu Siina ( Avecinia ) , Ibnu Rushdu ( Averros ) , Al-Faaraabii , e Al-Kinndi , ekn .
Ko ɗuum waɗi he yontere yawtunde ndee , nde nate makko njalti omo jooɗodii he Mawɗo laawol Murid en , Ceerno Muntagaa Mbakke , ñiŋooɓe-mo ɓee njiyraani ɗum jam , nde tawnoo he yiyannde ɓeen haɓdiiɓe makko , ko ko haanaani waɗi .
Ko ɗuum waɗi hina teskaa kala , nde pobbi njeeli ( pudii ) , mbaretaake .
Ko ɗuum waɗi kamɓe fof ɓe ndenti ɓe kaɓi e makko sabu reende hinnde ndee .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ko gore ɗee tan keedi e kisal .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ko maa feere ngam haɓde e nduu boomooru .
Ko ɗuum waɗi lannda amen wiyii e yeewtere nde min njuɓɓinnoo e maanditaare jeytaare ndee : " eɗen mawnina ñalawma 28 jolal , kono kadi eɗen cunii ko waɗanoo e oon ñalawma to Inaal , so warngo 28 ofisiyee kam e soofaaji moritaninaajo ɓaleeɓe .
Ko ɗuum waɗi leyɗeele Worgo ( Sud ) ɗee kala ene nodda he no mbayliigu waawi waɗireede tawa huunde ndee ene ɓura waɗde potal .
Ko ɗuum waɗi mbiy-ɗen , hannde winndannde men ko naamne tan , walla boom ko naamne ɓurata heewde heen .
Ko ɗuum waɗi mi wondaani e haɓeteeɓe yoo pulaar wóntu gooto e nder leyɗeele Afrik fóf ; ɗuum alaa fóf ɗemngal baangal noon wóódi , wonaa farayse wonaa engele ; kala ɗemɗe jaajɗe , alaa-e-sago njogoo mbaadiiji kééwɗi ; ɗoo ɗo yimɓe ene paamondira , alaa baasi .
Ko ɗuum waɗi mo heewde yerɓude .
Ko ɗuum waɗi nde dillere renaissance ndee ummii ko kamɓe seernaaɓe nasraan en ɓee kadi ndarii lang ngam haɓaade ɗum .
Ko ɗuum waɗi nde ɓe puɗɗii waɗtude winndude he ɗeen ɗemɗe diiwaneeje e janngude ɗemɗe maɓɓe neeniweeje , ko ndeen binndol fuɗɗii saraade he nder Orop , kadi faggitaade ganndal waawi newanaade mo woni kala .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ngel felliti yahde to laamɗo .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ngootiri kala e ɗee leyɗeele e
Ko ɗuum waɗi noon , aɓe tini heen no jamfa nii , maa yidde jaagordu nduu ɓenninde miijo ɓenndinanoongo gila ko ɓooyi sanne .
Ko ɗuum waɗi sahaa e sahaa fof eɓe kolla Fulɓe Fuuta Tooro wonde bannge mo ɓe keedti oo lohaani .
Ko ɗuum waɗi sanndarma oo winndani mo kaayit ngam o yoɓa pawe .
Ko ɗuum waɗi so a dañii ñawɗo walla koriiɗo tampuɗo maa fero e mum ko ɓuri ko mbaɗataa e yannge walla e innde tawa kadi nde joom mum yettoytoo safrirde tawata ko ngonka mum ɓeydiima jiiɓaade .
Ko ɗuum waɗi teemadannde ndee noddireede " Yonta Lewlewal " ( lumiere ) , nde tawnoo he nder Orop ngaan saanga ene waɗnoo waalde annduɓe innitortooɓe " Lewlewalyankooɓe " ( illumine ) , ɗuum woni yaltuɓe he niɓɓere majjere naati he lewlewal ganndal e hakkilantaagal .
Ko ɗuum waɗi tuggude e hooreejo leydi ndii gadano , Mukhtaar Wuldu Daddah , haa denndaangal arɓe caggal mum en yiyannde mum en ko wootere .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ñalnde 22 Colte , 2020 , GOODAL suɓii gooto e hilifaaɓe leñol Fulɓe , Ceerno Jalaaluddiin Bah mo Madiina Gunaas , ballifiiɗo ko ene yaha e defte sappo he ɗemngal Pulaar , tawa fof koko yowitii he diine Islaam .
Ko ɗuum waɗi ɗum wonde he kulle ƴiiƴiije .
Ko ɗuum waɗii mawɓe men mbiyi : " fowru hinaa reena tufle jeeɗiɗi walla gure jeeɗiɗi .
Ko ɗuum weli ɗum , en njiyi neɗɗo ko " ko welata ɗum tan " .
Ko ɗuum woni ballondiral hakkunde yontaaji , hakkunde gollotooɓe e yahɓe fooftere ( doole ndonkii yo doole keɓɓo ) .
Ko ɗuum woni firo maalde jolnoonde hakkunde Hassan’en e Satigeeɓe e Barak’en nder teeminannde XVII [ 1 ] , hakkunde Ndate Yalla eJommbot Mbooc e Muhamed el Habib haa wontoyi dewgal , hakkunde Abdul Bookara Kan e Bakkaar wul Suweyd Ahmed e Aali Buri Njaay , ekn .
Ko ɗuum woni ko Nokku Orop toppitiiɗo geɗe weeyo ( ESA ) habri ñalnde 6 marse 2018 .
Ko ɗuum woni ko Sammba yiɗi waɗde .
Ko ɗuum woni ko heɓtii wuro Maraysa , hakkunde mum e jagge jooɗaniiɗe laamu e diiwaan oo caggal ƴiiwoole muusɗe rewam toɓnooɗe .
Ko ɗuum woni ko laamu nguu jooɗtorii , ndeke ɓe mbeltotaako e ballal amen ngal .
Ko ɗuum woni ko njaltinten ɗoo jooni , mbele janngooɓe Fooyre ine kumpitoo ɗum kam enne .
Ko ɗuum woni ko waɗi lebbi seeɗa caggal ɗuum , nde fitinaaji kuɓɓi he leeɗe taariiɗe cahe Farayse .
Ko ɗuum woni ko wiɗtooji keewɗi , mawɗi , jangtaaɗi ɗoo e cili keewɗi , kolliti .
Ko ɗuum woni ɗemɗe maɓɓe diiwaneeje walla mbiyen neenewiije maɓɓe .
Ko ɗuum woni ɗo , Nafisatu teew e ƴiiƴam o ene ɗo he ngal damal , he oo beetawe baggo , kono yiila o yahii , hakkille o seertii e ɓanndu ndu oorii , yoo Alla newnu jofaango tawa coŋngooji ene ngoppi .
Ko ɗuum wonnoo eɓɓaande adannde ndee , kono leyɗe 22 jeyaaɗe e ESA ɗee kawraani e haala , sibu njaru majjum ina heewi doole ( hedde 200 miliyoŋ oroo ) .
Ko ɗuum wonnoo geɗal ngal Allah feccani Makkah gila e yonta Ibraahiim , kadi haa jooni hay gooto e ɗi hurumaaji ñoortetaake e nder ngo wuro Allah malaango .
Ko ɗuum wonoyta faandaare lappol goɗngol , biyeteengol Mars Sample Return ( Gartirgol santiyoŋaaji Mbaañ ) .
Ko ɗuum ɓe ekkortoo limoore e ɓeydugol e ustugol e cowgol e peccugol ( ko woodi , memotoo ) .
Ko ɗuum ɓe noddirta he daartol maɓɓe yonta " medieval " , ɗuum firti yonta " hakkundeejo " .
Ko ɗuum ɓuri deeƴde e hakkille sabu ko ɗuum hóllirta wonde kelme keso oo ummii ko e kelmééji ɗiɗi dénndinaaɓi .
Ko ɗuum ɓuri fof teeŋtude , huccidde e aduna fof ñaawoore warnooɓe ɓiy-ngenndiijo Burkinaajo e yahdiiɓe mum .
Ko ɗuum ɓuri waawde suurde ndaarɗe " ( jangtoore hawraande ) .
Koccirten ɗum : 1 .
Kodda gorko oo , ñaayre nana faŋŋinii e tiinde mum haa yiɗi ɓuurnude yi'tere ndee .
Koddiren ko oto , tuubaak sinuwaanaajo soodi mo , subaka fof o toppitoo mo , o lawƴa mo , so omo dogna omo toppitii ko o wiyaa heen koo , so o darnii oto oo , omo reeni ɗum .
Koddu e Faati ndewi heen , yimɓe kala ina njeenaɓe .
Kodduwaar e Nijeriyaa ena nduumii e hartaade kono bal oo jaaɓaani ( cadré ) .
Kodduwaar ena anndi taccii , kono ɓe njiɗi ko ardaade taƴre ndee mbele eɓe ngoora hawrude e Ganaa .
Kodduwaar haŋki falaani heen hay ommbal , ɓe piyi Maali laaɓngal ( 2-0 ) e kawral baɗtanal taƴre B haŋki te Sekonndi .
Kofi Annan jibinaa ko ñalnde 8 abriil 1938 , o janngii to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Amerik lollungal biyeteengal Massachusetts Institute of Technology ( MIT ) hade makko gollaade e Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe ( FNGD ) tuggi 1962 .
Kofi Annan lomtinoo e ngardiigu FNGD ko Misranaajo biyetenooɗo Butros Butros Gaali ñalnde 1 saawiyee 1997 .
Kolleten ɗoo tan ko hakke ko nganndu-ɗen heen .
Kolliren jeyiiji men : Jawɗeele , galleeji ,
Kollita caɗeele wuro mumen jogii .
Kollitten tan wonde ɗiiɗoo lappi fof , seteeji Moritani tawtoraama gila fuɗɗoode haa wortorde .
Kolombaa noon kadi hollitii yiɗde maɓɓe nawde nduu jiiɓuru haa to ɓuri toowde ngam yooltude hujjaaji mum en hay sinno o wullitiima kadi rafi ɓamdugol pehe mooliiɓe artuɓe ɓe .
Kolonel Abdullaay Bajiyee gonnooɗo cukko ɗimmo laamu luɓal jaggaa ko ñalnde aljumaa 15 lewru ndu ngon-ɗen ndu , sabu e nder ndeen yontere nan-nanti keewɗi mbaɗii wonde maaalde yiɗde firtude laamu ngu ina fewjee e leydi haa wiyaa nii kala ɗo njeeƴi-ɗaa e mbeddaaji wuro Ñaame ngo potataa ko e cente cente tedda paɗe ( dadiiɓe ) en ina mbakkii petetaali nde tawnoo ɗum wayrii yiyeede e maggo yimɓe ɓe ɓeydii maayde kulol reedu e goongɗinde wonde dadiiɓe ɓe ngoni ko e fewjude maalde no ceertiri e Jeneraal Saaluu Jiboo yanti heen e oon tuma ko o ɗanninooɗo caggal leydi .
Kolonel Abdullaay Bajiyee jaggaa ko galle sahtu kikiiɗe kiirɗo rokkiri kabaaru o ko yimɓe galle makko e wiyde kadi soldeteeɓe ɓurɓe ɓadaade kabaaru o , o mooftaa ko to tuddunde walla kaŋ sanndarmori mo Ñaame .
Kolonel Feree wiyi kañum : Fulɓe ummi ko wiyetnaam .
Kolonel alaa tawo jaabawol .
Kolonel fodi maa yettin ɗum laamu ngu .
Kolonel o yaaɓani tabitinde tuugnorgal mum .
Kolonel winnda kadi , foda yettinde ɗum laamu .
Kolonel ɓoornii paɗe mum , tawi alaa fof miijo joganii ɗum .
Koloneluuji 5 nomaama senerooji , ɓeen ngoni : Hamadi wul Eli Mawluud , gonnooɗo mawɗo biro ɗimmo ; Ahmed wul Siidi Muhammed , gardiiɗo opitaal Militeer ; Muhammed wul Eli , gardiiɗo biro nayaɓo ; Hammaada wul Bedda , kalfinaaɗo geɗe koninkaagu to Biriksel ; Tiyib wul Muhammed Mahmuud , gardiiɗo cellal koninkaagu .
Koloñaal
Koloñaal en mballitii no feewi kanndidaaji jaɓannooɗi ɗum en e nder woote depiteeji baɗnooɗe e hitaande 1946 kam e toɗɗe diiso guwarnama e hitaande 1957 juumtunooɗe e wellitaare , caggal ɗum e jeytaare leydi men .
Koloñaal en mbari mo ko Ñalnde 10 settaamburu 1890 , e nder wuro Podoor , caggal nde Baydi Kacce Paam felli kumaandaŋ Serkal Podoor , hono AbelSanndee .
Koloñaal naatani ɗaɓɓude kalifaandi Muritani tigi-rigi .
Koloñaal yani siɓaani taaɓal , gure firigaaji nootii e wulaango conndi ?
Komaantini e nguuɗoo batu ko yiɗde Kaddaafi ardineede laawol goɗngol fedde nde , caggal nde o joofni manndaa makko tuggunooɗo gila e lewru febariyee 2009 .
Komersaaji safalɓe wonnooɓe Senegaal njanaa , marsandiis mum en ƴettaa .
Komiin Kayhayɗi e ndeeɗoo fedde kala ko mbaawi waɗde , so tawii yimɓe ndaraaki mballi ɓe , gollal maɓɓe alaa fof ɗo yahata .
Komiin Ligisayba Gorgol waɗi ko palɗe ɗiɗi teeŋtuɗe , falnde jeeri mawndi e falnde jeeri lommbiri .
Kominaaji ko goonga ngalaa doole , kono ndonkaama tan yo lelnu ginol golle laaɓtungol ngam gollal duumingal ngam haɓaade mbalisaaji , laaɓal duumoo .
Kominaaji ɗii ina njogii caɗeele njuɓɓudi , haa teeŋti noon e jokkondiral majji e pelle sukaaɓe gonɗe e leeɗe ɗee , toppitiiɗe ƴellitaare leeɗe ɗe .
Kompawore jooɗii he jappeere laamu gila 1987 ( warngo Sankara ) haa 2014 nde ɓesngu Burkina riiwi mo .
Kompawore neli sete koninkooɓe e gardagol Hyacinthe Kafando tawoyi ɓe to Diisnordu Ngenndiwu Filñitere ( CNR/Conseil National de la Révolution ) .
Kompawre " yiɗaano gootiɗingol goomuuji ngenndiiji ngam waklitere " gardinooɗi dillere waklitere Sankara .
Kompawre e yahdiiɓe mum Hyacinthe Kafando , e Gilber Diendere taƴaanaama dummbirdu haa abada .
Kon ko cukalon ndeegu sasa .
Kon mbeelon huunde kala ina wona heen .
Kon ngeɗon hono mum en ko miliyaaruuji e miliyaaruuji e keewal , limotaako alla e heewde .
Kona yanta heen kala , ko maa pooɓne , so wonaa tawa arɗo oo ina welaa yantere ndee .
Koni ko Dum muusi e Berde .
Koninkooɓe mbaɗi ɗee golle ko he innde ko ɓe inniri Dillere Ngenndiire ngam Kisal e Hesɗitino ( Mouvement patriotique pour la sauvegarde et la restauration – MPSR – ) .
Koninkooɓe ndallinorii gittugol nguun laamu ne , ko wiyde eɓe ndiisnondira e laamu leydi Farayse tee ko peeje laamu Farayse tan ɓe tabitinta .
Koninkooɓe njowi doosɗe dowla Burkinaa hade maɓɓe artirde ɗe he Colte 2022 .
Konngo ( 1998-2000 ) : Alaa mo humpi , " kareeli ɓesngu " to Konngo e Sudaan , ko Amerik woni les mum .
Konngo e Anngolaa ina njeeyatnoo 48% dahaaɓe feewdelappol hirnaange , haa teeminannde 19ɓiire .
Konngol ( haala ) ko keɓal gollal miijo kala adee , ngam waawde yaajnude e wertude gannde mum , e fawaade e soklaaji renndo .
Konngol Facebook ngol ko nii lelorii " On njaaraama e ko ɗaɓɓu-ɗon nde ɗemngal mon ɓeydetee e ɗemɗe Facebook .
Konngol goɗngol ngol wiyi ko " so jam ronkaama , yo bone dañe mbele jam yalta heen " .
Konngol ina moƴƴi feewnee , lelnee no faamirtee , no moƴƴi .
Konngol maa cakkitol ngol njiɗ-ɗaa werlaade banndiraaɓe ɓee
Konngol maɓɓe jeeyngal wonnoo ko " Ƴiiƴiiɓe beyuwe njaltat , yoo wuur Afiri " .
Konngol nulaaɗo ( JKM ) wonande oon naamniiɗo jojjannde gorko e dow debbo mum : " aɗa ñammina so tawii a ñaamii , aɗa holtina mo so tawii a holtii , hoto fiy mo he yeeso , hoto jalkit mo , hoto bonnit mo , hoto taƴo so wonaa he nder suudu , hoto yaltin mo fayde to suudu woɗndu ngam taƴaade mo "
Konngol nulaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) wiyi : " ɓuri moƴƴude e rewɓe ko oon mo ndaarataa mbelto-ɗaa , so a yamirii mo o ɗowto maa , so a wirniima mo , o reenan maa hoore makko , o reenan maa jawdi maa .
Konngol renaissance ngol fayndoraa heen ko wiyde Oropnaaɓe nduttiima he ngonka mum en tuma nde pinal Gerek jaalinoo he nder Orop .
Kono
Kono " kominist en " ɓe Farayse kaɓii ɗum sabu njiyri ɗum ko leñamleñamaagu , haɗa lannda " ubiriyeeji " renndude hare .
Kono , " ko woni e lahal kala maa juuɗe njiytu " , nana yeeso men .
Kono , " nana wonta aada , ñaantetee tan ko sehilaaɓe e banndiraaɓe " .
Kono , Engele en e Faraysenaaɓe nde naati diginiral , ndaɗtii ɓe .
Kono , Mayram e jibel mberlii naamne jowitiiɗe e nafoore punondiral ngaal .
Kono , Pulaar ina keewi wiyde " bone piltat " sabu kulan-ɗen nii ko koye men , sabu pelɓondiral ɗiin gay ɗiɗi , nafataa sawndiiɓe ɗum .
Kono , Sammba anndaa ko woni kulol .
Kono , alaa dañirɗe Fooyre joginoo so wonaa ko yeeyetee e jaaynde kaayit ndee .
Kono , caɗeele tati teeŋtuɗe ina ndooki en : Ŋakkeende ngalu , ŋakkeende karalleeɓe , e gollotooɓe woni juuɗe ( gila e winndooɓe haa e sarooɓe ekn ) .
Kono , e balɗe cakkitiiɗe ɗe , ellee won luural joli hakkunde maɓɓe .
Kono , e hitaande 2015 ndee tan , poliseeji Amerik pellii , mbari 258 ɓaleejo " , tee " 2016 no fuɗɗorii nii woɗɗoytaa ɗoon " .
Kono , e nder bayyinaango AQMI , Farayse reentinaama e etaade wiyde ena huutoroo doole kooniŋkoore ngam teettude dahaaɓe ɓee e juuɗe maɓɓe .
Kono , e nguun batu , caɗeele ɗeeɗoo ciftoraaka nii .
Kono , e oo sahaa , ko neɗɗo gooto tan waawi heɗoraade noon , sibu ko kameraa gooto woodi heen .
Kono , e oon sahaa , fof ko ko uddunoo , sabu laamu lofnoongu golle Fedde ndee , haɗti jaltugol Fooyre , uddi yeewtere men to Rajo Muritani , ko kam wonnoo ɗoo .
Kono , e oon sahaa gooto , ngonka leydi Amerik , kooniinde e wolde 1945 , dillaani .
Kono , e sikke huunde e yimɓe , " ɗuum woodaani , haa hannde ko laamu tan uddi enternet " .
Kono , e wiyde makko , peeje kala ngoni ko e ɓameede ngam humpitaade hol ko heɓi laana kaa e hol to ka woni .
Kono , e wiyde won ɓeen annduɓe , tanaaji goɗɗi ina ngoodi , baawɗi joopaade goodal winndere ndee e nder duuɓi 50 paaɗi .
Kono , ellee kadi Manndelaa ɓuri heñaade .
Kono , en njettii Alla , en njettii Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani , sabu mum sosde ndee jaaynde , gila nde heewɓe purƴinta Pulaar ndee , wuurni ɗum haa Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije sosaa , haa e oo sahaa hannde mo yimɓe fof , gila haralleeɓe jaŋde e ɗemɗiyankooɓe , haa e laamuuji , haa e furƴintunooɓe fof , heɓtini nafoore duttanagol ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Kono , ena laaɓi kaa haala waawaa deƴƴeede ko juuti sabu daaɗe ena toɗɗee ñalnde kala ngam anndude hol to laamu darii e makka .
Kono , eɗen ndeeƴna he hakkillaaji men wonde ngal ɗemngal cellinaangal coñcewal fotaani waɗteede ɓellere-gajjal , wonaa huunde diƴnde , ko ko memtatee ñalnde kala wonande calti ɗemngal .
Kono , gila 1950 lewe dunli e
Kono , gila 2014 , ina hiisaa ko faggudu Siin woni ɓurndu doolnude .
Kono , gila henndu " demokaraasi " wutii e leydi he , ɗum woni gila 1992 , o wonti jaaynoowo , jaaynoowo ŋanaa , sibu , ina famɗi e jaayɗe leydi ndii ɗe o gollodaaki : gila e " Al Bayane " , " Le Calame " , " La Tribune " , " Echtary " , " La Nouvelle Expression "
Kono , gila hitaande ɓennunde ndee , Hapa naatnii heen ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof .

Kono e wiyde seedeeji nanngondire ɗee , FACT addi tan ko seeɗa e soofaaji mum , hedde 700 soofaa .
Kono e yiyannde neɗɗo oo , ko ñuuñu ɗaccii laawol mum .
Kono e yonta men hannde , mi sikkaani so won laaɓndotooɗo holi gonɗo Murtuɗo Joop .
Kono ellee ɓe ɓurii ɗoon .
Kono en kollitii ngal en mbeltaaki heen sibu eɓɓaande ndee yaltinaani ko ɓuri himmude he ko nanondiranoo he ñalɗi diisnondiral ɗii .
Kono en kollittu kadi no hadiraani ko noon woni no yamiriraani ko fawtii heen ko wonno teddungal so wonti lor hol ko fotaa wadeede , E Risaala to kaddungal ari too naatnaa ko e lowre ustugol mustaas , hooltaade cegeneeji , ekn ; duum firti tan ko teengtaani .
Kono en kumpaaka , foti ɓurde wonde gollal men , e hare men , ko daraade haa ndenten , kawren , ndañen gardiiɗo mo kooli-ɗen , koolodi-ɗen , kawren e konngol , ngitten ŋuttu-ŋuttuuji , ngitten mi " yiɗaa tinaa mi yiɗaa pinaa " .
Kono en njahaani toon , sabu ciirtagol woodaani hakkunde hoodere e tagofeere .
Kono en njaɓrii Joomiraaɗo joom baawɗe Oo .
Kono en njiyaani hay fedde wootere walla neɗɗo gooto mo leñol ngol joofii , wiy ko o potɗen umminde yaha soccondiroyee e nguu fiyaaku he innde leñol ngol kala , haa ndee fenaande ittee goonga lomtine ɗoon .
Kono en potaani naatde e feere tubakiri ngam haɓde e Ndaɗɗudi .
Kono en teskiima dental Fulɓe ummoriiɓe leyɗeele ceertuɗe ene saɗti .
Kono ena
Kono ena anndaa fitina meeɗaa jibinde jam , nanondiral e deeƴre .
Kono ena anndaa hay so lewru yiyaaka , firtaani ndu
Kono ena anndaa wonde so wonaa anndee e jaati ɗo dahaaɓe ɓee mooftaa , hay gooto waawaa huutoraade doole ngaddaaɗe ɗee .
Kono ena laaɓi Juulde koorka 2019 waawata wonde tan ko
Kono ena laaɓi caggal ko heɓi Makki Sal , Ablaay Wadd ena wayi no ko jokkuɗo e yiɗde woɗɗaade kala mo nanondiraani e eɓɓo makko lamminde ɓiyi makko Karim Wadd .
Kono ena waawi tawde gonɗe ngonaa gootum ( nokkuuji ɗii ngonaa gootum ) , lebbi 3 to Pulutoon tawat jibinaaɗo toon oo wonii sagata , kono sagata mo leɓɓi tati .
Kono ena waawi tawde gon’ɗe ngonaa gootum ( nokkuuji ɗi ngonaa gootum ) , lebbi 3 to Pulutoon tawat jibinaaɗo toon o wonii sagata , kono sagata mo leɓɓi tati .
Kono ene woodi terɗe ɗiɗi gonɗe kadi e aadee ɗe meeɗaani seerde e sippirde .
Kono enen fof eɗen ganndi ɗiin hakkeeji gowlaaɗi , ciifaaɗi leyɗeele keewɗe ko ko njaɓɓaa e leyɗeele keewɗe .
Kono enen renndo ngoo , en ndaɓɓiɗaani darɗe !
Kono enen so defte ɗe o woppidi en ɗee muulaaka , caraa e leñol he ngol naftorii ñamaadne makko nana he daaɗe men .
Kono etaade amde duƴƴal jaambaaro e nder keeri janani , e wondude e dawrugol ngol en ngalanaa ɗum hattan , mboɗo sikki ɗuum jaɓotaako .
Kono eɗen mbaawi wonde leñol kaaldowol , diisnondiroowol e koye men , renndooɓe peeje , ɓamdooɓe konngol .
Kono eɗen mbeltii , jooni won ummannde sooynaa he nder won ɗiin nokkuuji winndere ndee , ngam waɗde wiɗtooji keewɗi , ɓurɗi moƴƴude .
Kono eɗen ndewi ɗum haa jooni .
Kono eɗen nganndi Tetris noddoriino diɗɗal Tinariwen en .
Kono eɗen nganndi ko idii Perseverance ɓeeynirɗe ɗiɗi goɗɗe nana taartoo Mbaañ .
Kono eɗen nganndi o waawaa daɗde ñaaweede to Laa Hay sabu leydi Serbiy jaɓataa faabaade-mo ngam yiɗde-ndi naatde e Dental Orop ( EU ) .
Kono eɗen nganndi won e hareeji wonaa neɗɗo gooto tan waawi haɓeede ɗum , ko maa wonnda e dental .
Kono eɗen nganndi wonaa magooji baɗeteeɗi he ɗemɗe ɗee kala poti to bannge ƴellitaare majje , nde tawno doole e ngaluuji kuutorteeɗi heen ɗii njiidaa .
Kono eɗen nganndi ɗeen ɗemɗe ɗoon ɗo ɗe cuwaa liggeede , ɗe njanngiraa haa ɗe mbaawi wonde ɗemɗe gollorɗe , hayso ɗe ndokkaama martaba ɗemɗe ngenndiije ne , so faraysinkoore ittaama , ko arabeere wontata alaa-e-sago , ɗemngal janngirngal e gollorngal leydi Muritani .
Kono eɗen paama won caɗeele keewɗe gooɗɗe haa teeŋti to bannge kisal maa mbiyen ndeenka , haa ɗuum wonanii follooji ɗii hujja .
Kono fad tan , maa ndu anndu ko wojere ɓuri ndu ƴoƴde .
Kono fannu ɓurɗo yaawde oo kam ko ñiklude ɗum .
Kono feere DSK bonii e suudu Hotel Sofitel mo New York , ñalawma mo o tuumaa ƴeeɓo suka debbo Ginenaajo biyeteeɗo Nafisatu Jallo
Kono feeñde fedde yaawirnde nii yuɓɓude e tiiɗirde dartogol cemmbungol , ɗum kam ngu meeɗataa ɗum haynaade saka noon jooɗtoraade .
Kono fuku , woni arsuko ko naatnude ga'i : ko Hosnii deeli ndiyam yaakaare Kameruun e hoƴom 82 .
Kono galaŋ makko ko Kapiteen tan , o wonaa Seneraal .
Kono gila 2013 , caɗeele ɓeydii heewde hakkunde nokkuuji ɓurɗi ɓallaade Riisi to bannge pinal e nokkuuji goɗɗi Ikreen ɗii , jiɗɗi ɓallitaade Dental Orop .

Kono ginol makka ɓoccitiima annduɓe Siin ɓee gila 2015 , nde ɓe cakkitii fiytaade ka haa ka rewta jirlorgol makka .
Kono gite amen nana kuciiti e yaynirde ( écran/sreen ) ndee , hay majaango !
Kono golle makko haa jooni ( haa janngo e ɓaawo-janngo ) ina jangtee , nder Burkina e nder winndere ndee muum .
Kono gori ɗii , no mbaawi fotde fof , so ngonii ɗiɗiiji fayi tatiiji , ɗi ndiiwete .
Kono gorko ne yoo tiiɗno daranoo ganndal daña no huufiri cuddiiɗo e ɓesngu mum .
Kono haa hannde Fuutankooɓe njejjitaani ɓe .

Kono haay gooto ejaani mo .
Kono habraama o fuɗɗiima haɓtaade sabu wonndiiɓe makko njoƴƴinii hakre ( contestation/recours ) ngam salaade o weeɗee .
Kono hade makko maayde tawi ko o feranii wondiiɓe makko laabi ngam sosde laamanteeri tuugniindi e potal .
Kono hade makko nawde deenoowo kaso cakkitiiɗo oo to ñaawoore , ardiiɓe toowɓe ɓee lomtinirimo ñaawoowo goɗɗo , oon , duuɓi ɗiɗi yeeso majjum , dartini ñaawoore ndee , nde o yaltini kaayitol pellital " ordonnance d’incompetence " wonnde ñaawoore ndee " alaa mbaawka ñaawde ɗum " !
Kono hade men feeñninde ɗo e FƁ ndeeɗoo hujjinannde nde tawi ko nde neldaama Hooreejo leydi ndi .
Kono hade men woɗɗoyde , mboɗo yiɗi laaɓta e hakkille maa wonde wonaa doktoor woni e yeeso maa , ko debbo cubballo njooɗodi-ɗaa ɗoo hannde !
Kono hankadi ko yeeso
Kono hannde , ko kamɓe njeyi feccere ( 50% ) e ɓoggi geec ɗii , tee , ɗoo e duuɓi tati paaɗi ( ɗoo e 2023 ) ko kamɓe njeyata heen fotde 95% !
Kono hannde , ko ngu ñawu
Kono hannde e oo ñalawma , hay gooto anndaa no Maali heftirta rewo leydi mum tawa ardaabi caggal leydi .
Kono hannde ko o hoodere jaayre he nder Senegaal nde hay gooto waawa hooynaade kammu o tawa yiyaani lewlewal mum .

Kono hannde omo hebori ñaaweede sabu ndee fenaande fenngiɗnde .
Kono hannde yontii nde goonga anndaa , yaltinaa , rewee tawa paltooru alaa e juulɓe kala e winndere men .

Kono hay gooto haangaaka .
Kono hay gooto waawaa haɗde en miijaade wonde ɓooy juutde fof , ma en ndañ enenne Muhammed Mursi men .

Kono hay ɗuum nattii tuggi hitaande 1963 , nde Manndelaa ñaawaa kasoo kaaɗdi nguurndam , werloyaa to kasoo Robben Island .

Kono haɗaani bañoowo oo wi'ide ngaal seedantaagal tan yonaani .
Kono haɗaani fotde 500 innama aadee senegaalnaajo e leƴƴi mum en ceertuɗi , Fulɓe Seereraaɓe , Sooninkooɓe e jolfuɓe e leƴƴi goɗɗi ngarii seppude ngam yiɗde yoo ɗemɗe e pine Senegaal kala ponnde e rajooji e teleeji e telefonŋaaji jaabotooɗi noddoɓe , jaabotooɗi e ɗemngal gootal .
Kono he nder kaan haala o huwtorii ko konngol " hordes " woni diɗɗal yimɓe boniranteeɓe , ɓe ngalaa curo , ngalaa kajo .

Kono heɓi tawtoreede hiirde ndee ko
Kono heɓi tawtoreede hiirde ndee ko Baal Umaar Hammaat , Sal Sileymaani , Aysata Jaari Sal e mawɓe pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje e koppe .
Kono heɗɗaawo ina woodnoo to bannge sariya , sibu baylugol sariyaaji jowitiiɗi e jaayɗe .
Kono hikka jaagorgal njanngu leydi ndi e yamiroore guwernama o wi’I ko tati memataa jeenayi , kala mo heɓaani toɓɓe sappo dow noogaas ( 10/20 ) heɓata bak tan ko e koyɗol , e kala mo heɓaani toɓɓe jeenayi dow noogaas ( 9/20 ) waɗtata lofu ɗimmu .

Kono jimol makko yerol -daaroo saa !
Kono jirlagol jiyetengol e Lilluɗe hee ina luutondiri e ngol yuɓɓo naange no feewi , sabu njaaweeki jirlagol koode ɓadiiɗe wuddu ɗee e goɗɗuɗe ɗee fof ko gootum , ɗuum noon ɓe pelliti wonde won ko Lilluɗe ɗee coomi walla ndasori ko teddi ko ɓe korii yiyde , ɓe mbiyi ɗum ɓakdi ɓaleeri .

Kono jooni kadi niiwnorgal kesal ngal addii natal ɓurngal laaɓtude
Kono jooɗiiɗe e nder makka , so ka yerɓaani , sikkata koka ndariika , tinata yahdu makka .
Kono jooɗiiɗo e nder makka , so ka yerɓaani , sikkata ko ka ndariika , tinata yahdu makka .
Kono kabaaru ene wela , tawa no yettiniraa nii feewaani .
Kono kadi , en keɓii yiyondirde e mawɗo men hono Fari Kah mo pulaagu fof heɓtini golle mum e leñol ngol , mawɓe men kadi ko wayi no Ceerno Bah mo USE/PIP tawtoranooma ɗeen golle paayodinɗe .
Kono kadi , ene famɗi getiiɗo faamde ko saabii ɗum , saka noon ƴefta feere no safriri ɗum .
Kono kadi , golle makko ɗee ene poti finndin’de kala ɓiy pullo walla ganndo Afriknaajo , kuwtortooɗo ɗemɗe koɗe ngam winndude , gaagaa ɗemɗe ngenndije Afrik , e miijtaade mbele nafoore mum en woni ko he winndude e ɗemɗe ɗo ganndal mum huwtortaake , walla ko addude tuufere mum e mahde jeytaare Afrik , nde fooɓre mum ko rimɗinde koye men e huwtoraade ɗemɗe janane ngam nehde ɓesguuji men .
Kono kadi , hoto hay gooto ardu e njogitaar .

Kono kadi , so a ndaardii nde caggal , a yeddittaako ko nde ngaari .
Kono kadi , won e amen , haa jooni ko saliiɓe , sabu sikkude ko fuunti ngam o feewnitoo .
Kono kadi , ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo maa jibin dumunnaaji ɓuuɓol mawngol , to gulli leydi to Orop ( e yeru ) .

Kono kadi Jowol ina heerorii wonde alaa hinnde nde waɗataa hay baɗte .

Kono kadi caafe naange ɗee njettotoo tan
Kono kadi e ko o holliri , faandaare makko ko naatnude renndo makko gaynaako e nder neesu adunayaŋkeewu tawa ina yahda e aduna oo e waasde woppude finaa-tawaa mum .
Kono kadi ene tawee he nder defterdu hee gannde goɗɗe ko wonaa Islaam ko wayno jime , mbewu , dabare e safaara .
Kono kadi eɓe mbaawi jibidinde ɓinngel ngel wondaani heen , walla ɓinngel gondungel heen ngl rafi oo tampintaa .
Kono kadi eɗe mbaawnoo yiyreede no dille ceɓɓitiiɗe nii , ɗoon ɗo ɗe njeddi hujjaaji leƴƴi ɓaleeji ɗii , baaɗi no hujjaaji maɓɓe ɗii nii haande .
Kono kadi fedde GOODAL teddinii wuurɓe , dariiɓe jamma e ñalawma ene ngollana ɗemngal e leñol ngol hoto ngol daɗeede he kesam-hesaagu karallaagal-mbaylaandi .
Kono kadi fotaani hiiɗde en , halfa en , ndewen mbelemma pittaali men , ngati won ko ine wela neɗɗo tawa moƴƴaani e mum .
Kono kadi hay dokimaaji am !
Kono kadi hol ko woni kuccam laamu ngu e eɓooji jogaaɗi ngam naatnude ɗemɗe ɗee he nder tippude jaŋde duɗe laamu ɗee .
Kono kadi holi ko warɓe ɓee njiylotonoo .
Kono kadi jimɗi e ngameeje ganni Fuuta , ko wayno yelaa Awluɓe , pekaan Subalɓe , dillere Maabuɓe e saawaali lawɓe .
Kono kadi kellifuya ene waawi firtude ngonka
Kono kadi ko e ballal gaaciyankooɓe mum wayɓe no Saydu Bah bammbaaɗo , baɗnooɗo ko ɓe mbaɗi , waɗi ko ɓe mbaɗaani .
Kono kadi ko haɓaade ɓeen yooɓiiɓe bonnitde miijo ngo sabu ngo firti ko feere bonnde nde ɓe mooɓnoo e ɓerɗe maɓɓe , laamu mbonngu walliti ɓe heen .
Kono kadi ko ngol waɗti laabi ɗiɗi eɓe mbeeyna kubeeri caggal nde ɓe kawi e kawgel Orop 2008 .
Kono kadi ko ngol woni goo ko doŋe ɗee kala ine tawtoree ngalɗoo daawal pottitte ɗee : Afrik , Amerik , Asi , Orop , Oseyani , heen doŋre kala ine jogii he jeetaɓe hee hay so kippu gooto .
Kono kadi ko o debbo , ko o yummiraaɗo , jom suudu " .
Kono kadi ko o neɗɗo ndimaagu , jeyanooɗo he dartinooɓe njiimaandi Almaañ .
Kono kadi mi teskiima ko maa rewɓe njilla he dingire ɗee nde jonɗe yeeɓooɓe ɗee kiɓɓa .
Kono kadi mo wiyi Jowol , wiya Sammba Gelaajo , wiya Konko Buubu Muusaa .
Kono kadi nde saabiima jibingol jaayɗe goɗɗe , keewɗe e ɗemngal pulaar e nder cate fedde hee walla pelle gure yeru : Lewlewal Catal Nuwaadibu , e Ƴellitaare catal Suwoyraat e goɗɗe .
Kono kadi nde waɗtii dañde lulniiɓe ( ɓe njettaama kaaɗdi njettoor ) gila nde waɗti yeeyreede mbaadi limnere ( version numérique ) , sibu nguun njeeygu ɓuri newaade , tee kala ɗo neɗɗo waawi wonde ine waawi heɓde ɗum .
Kono kadi ngam hóllude ko geɗe ɗiɗi denndinaaɗe , alaa-e-sago ɗi ndañanee diideljókkirgel hakkunde majji : oo-ɗoo , oo-ɗaa .
Kono kadi ngo luulndaaki laamu .
Kono kadi o ardiima goomuuji keeriiɗi to kuuɓal Maalde Aarabeeɓe .
Kono kadi omo magotonoo he seriiji Pulaar keewɗi ko wayno " Jamfa Gilli " e " Arɗo e Jeyla " eko nanandi heen .
Kono kadi paamen , to wiiwaano too , hay huunde alaa toon , hay ɓakdi ngootiri alaa ɗoon !
Kono kadi so fenaande wiyi ena firta goonga , xakka dubuuje haa ɗeɗɗoo !
Kono kadi tawdi pulaar ene ɓadii no feewi wolof , ko enen póti abbaade e maɓɓe , mbaasen joñde no won e ɗemɗiyaŋkooɓe men njoñiri nii .
Kono kadi waasde yimɓe ɓe hormaade wasiyaaji wonde yoo ndeeƴtu e galleeji mum en , yoo ɗoofto sahaaji dottanaani " couvre feu " , hoto nootitto e dente ɗo yimɓe pawndirta ekn Jawɗeele keewɗe denndinaaɗe ngam faabaade roofolɓe nattuɓe gollaade sabu curagol walla nii tawa ko miskineeɓe tan , alaa heen ko yiyaa tawo , winnditinooɓe e ɗum , yoga e mum en keɓaani tawo hay dara sabu hay dara laaɓaani e peƴtugol tuuse caggal " minuit " .
Kono kadi waɗii ɓiyɓe leydi ndi e leñol ngol njanfii ngenndiyankooɓe , ɗo ɓiyɓe leydi ndi keedani añɓe ɓesngu .
Kono kadi won anndunooɓe eɗen njiɗi ko'e men kono cikkaano eɗen mbaawi arde haa ɗoo !
Kono kadi won jogiiɓe ko kaali , mbaawi haalde , nduɗtii kadi njogii ɗo kaali .
Kono kadi won ko waylaa e no geɗe ɗee potnoo waɗireede nii he ko sakkitii koo .
Kono kadii hinaa naaɓndii nguura keewka , ko weeɓaani hisnu ko e ngonka kulle lakde .
Kono kala keɗɗiiɗo ka haala ina faaya wonde faandaare maɓɓe ko yiɗde warde pine e ɗemɗe ɗe ngonaa aarabeeje gonɗe e Muritani .
Kono kam , fulɓe mbiyi " ndesnden ɓooy " .
Kono kam , ɗum ɗoo ko o wiyata embo dallinoroo , ɗum wonaa daliilu !
Kono kam e kuuɓal , kamɓe fof ko ɓe ngonka ngoota to baŋnge yahtirde keeci e yaltude daartol .
Kono kam peeje e karallaagal mbaddaama heen .
Kono kamɓe fof e ɓene ndeeƴi , e ɓe calii jaabaade sabu kulol e salaade duñcude docette fitina .
Kono kamɓe kala ɓe kawri ko yo Alasan fiile , sabu softeende mum e katantaagal mum e pellital mum .
Kono kamɓe ne , ɓee njaɓaani riweede : ɓe njettini haala kaa ñawooɓe .
Kono kamɓe ne won caɗeele ɓe ngaddi : e mbinndiin ó juutɗo e é juutɗo , ɗo pesooɗe nane potnoo wonde ɗiɗi ( óó , éé ) , ɓe kaaɗi ko e wootere .
Kono kamɓe ne ɓe njogitii ko koɓe joñaaɓe ɓe kiisaaka e leñol mum en .
Kono kannje fof e jogaade , gootel heen fof e keeriiɗe mum ne , ittaani eɗe ndenndi e ko’e majje won he loowdiiji to bannge tagooje majje terɗeyankeeje e ko ɗuum laaɓndii ngam waawde tabitde .
Kono kannjum fo e famɗude semmbe dillinta bemmbeƴƴe maaje Leydi ,
Kono keewɗe e majje ngoni ko e maayde ñifde .
Kono ko Aali tan diwi ngol .
Kono ko Alla jogii-en , jogii-ɓe !
Kono ko Fulɓe Gine ɓuri waawde wiyde pehe .
Kono ko Nijeriyaa fiyi Benee 2-0 koo waɗi Maali ena fotnoo hawde Kodduwaar walla waɗda e mum joɓɓi dawaaɗi nde ɓenna .
Kono ko addani Nana Asma’u lollude ko won’demo ganndo kuɓɓuɗo he yonta makko , tawi he oon yonta , yoga e leyɗeele biyeteeɗe hannde ƴellitiide ɗee rewɓe mum en ene ndummbaa he kasooji majjere ; ngalaa hay jojjannde wootere saka noon konngol he nder dawrugol leyɗeele mum en .
Kono ko addani nokku Arafaat oo wiyeede Arafaat ngam ko ɗoon Aadama e Hawaa potti , njiytondiri , gooto e maɓɓe kala heɓtini goɗɗo oo , anndi ɗum .
Kono ko adii jippagol Aadama , jawdi lakde e wuro kala ina kaalatnoo , e wiyde annduɓe .
Kono ko adii nde album oo yaltata tawi ko taƴooɓe ɓee caastiima heen jimol , njeeyi ɗum he nder Internet he .
Kono ko adii nde rogere adannde ndee yaltata , eɓe eɓɓi yuɓɓinde ñalawma tintinoore jolal 2 ngal to Centre Culturelle Blaise Senghor ñande 27 Juko ( Aout ) 2023 .
Kono ko alkateeɓe njerƴaa e ɓee seppooɓe .
Kono ko bonatnoo bonii .
Kono ko coodoowo oo yoɓata ɗiin hakkeeji duwaan , wonaa jeeyoowo oo .
Kono ko daartiyankeeɓe noddirta yonta kaŋŋeejo Islaam koo ari ko he yonta Abbaasyankooɓe .
Kono ko e ndeen yolnde pollugol laamu cabborgu nguu waɗi , tawi saabiiɓe ɗum ɓee ko kañum en kadi pollunoo laamu IBK , iiñcuru joli hakkunde laamu soldateeɓe Mali hakkunde mum en e CEDEAO ( Dental dowlaaji leyɗeele hirnaange Afrik ) etee ngol laawol ɓeen ɓuri hiisde to bannge kuuge ɓe ƴettanta waɗɓe kuudetaa : gaaga yowde joomum en e fedde hee , ɓe nduttiima ɓe njamirii leyɗeele catiiɗe Mali fof ( haa heddii Muritani , nde wonde jeyaaka e maɓɓe ) yo uddu keeri mum en , ɓe cisiri denndaangal kaalis Mali desndanooɗo e banke dowlaaji CEDEAO hono UMEOA ( dental kaalis dowlaaji hirnaange Afrik ) , ɓuri lorde e ngoon uddo fof ko miskineeɓe tawde alaa ko adoytee , alaa ko yeeyoytee .
Kono ko fadanoo ɗii lebbi kala ko njillu makko e Afrik ɓaleeɓe .
Kono ko fowru huli koo reedu fof , so sonngii weeɓaani loppitde .
Kono ko fulɓe ɓee mbaɗaa to Sehilbaabi e wul Yenje e Kankoosa koo , ɓuri bonde e taccineede : ownugol beeli , warngooji , tilfiiɓe ɓe njiytaaka , teettugol jawdi ndariindi , tawi ɗum fof ko golle njuɓɓudi laamu , bannge siwil e konu kala , walla milisaaji ɗi ɓe kuufi .
Kono ko fulɓe ɓuri tampude e nder ɗee leyɗeele .
Kono ko gonduɗi e nder laamu gooto tan , woɗndu yantataa heen .
Kono ko haalaa e ñaawoore hee koo , hollitaani ɗuum .
Kono ko haawnii heen koo , ko adii nde jihaadiyankooɓe tiimata Mali e laamu Tumaani Tuure , ABDUL Ajiiju ina " teɗɗintunoo reedu " mum , naatoya leydi Maali ina yanoya e jihadiyankooɓe e yamiroore Sarkosii , kono kadi teskaa hannde ko Muritani ina neldi konuuji to Santarafrik , to Sudaan e to Sawuud .
Kono ko hono no mbiyruno-ɗen nii , mo woni kala waɗata ko gollal mum , ko janngo e ɓooy laɓɓitinta nelal kala heen , peññina paandoraale ɗee kala .
Kono ko huunde e yuɓɓooji ɓurɗi waawde huutoreede ɗii tan njogananoo kuutorɗe newnooje binndugol ( haa teeŋti e Tappirɗe ) , ko wayi no Windows , e Android .
Kono ko ina wona heen fof fulbe mbiyii : neddo manetaake , yennetaake : o sifete tan : So tawii ngol konngol ina laatii oodo gorko biyeteedo Makki Sal ; ko sifaa e makko e ko'o seedtanaa e ngoo hello addanii kam yananeede ko o gorko mo hono mum weebaani e nder fulbe Afrik hannde sabu neddo no wayi fof ko banndum en ngadotoo haalde hade wodbe .
Kono ko kamɓe
Kono ko kayre tan waawi dognude lowre ndee .
Kono ko kaŋki foti yiilanaade mi feere no ndañir-mi ko ñaam-mi haa mi haara .
Kono ko kaŋko anndi ko jarani-mo yoo won maaɓe , barmuɓe , yoo leydi ndii huɓɓu !
Kono ko kewi ɗoo koo wona huunde hesere he Youtube walla nii mbiyen inernet fof no fotirno .
Kono ko laamu Farayse , doole mum ina waɗi heen .
Kono ko laaɓi ko tan , dokkirgol leydi maantorii tan ko loppitgol jeyi janano rokka ɗum woɗɓe ( ko heewi heen , ko arani en ) , ɗum ɗoon noon ko huunde yaɓɓunde hay sariya lelnaaɗo oo .
Kono ko lekki cafroowi ko heewi e ɓanndu aadee .
Kono ko maa ndiin punndi heɓee tawo .
Kono ko ngol woni go’o ko ɗe njiytaa haa heewi he nokku jaakoranooɗo henanaade nguurndam .
Kono ko seerndi Makki e Seengoor , Abdu Juuf walla Abdullaay Wadda , ko ɓeen so ngarii kaalata ko ɗemɗe lohotooɓe .
Kono ko teskaa tan kam , ko ngol waɗi laaɓi ɗiɗi seppooji hono ɗiiɗoo ene mbaɗee , kono mantunaaɓe njiyaaka heen .
Kono ko tuggude he sappannde 80ɓere teemedannde sakkitiinde ndee , haa yetti e kiɓɓugol ujunannde ɗiɗimere ndee golle mayre ɓurnoo teskinde e anndeede he nder leñol he .
Kono ko vuri heewde e dawriyankoove men loppaaka zum , mbiyata en nii ko en vurtuve , ko en seerndoove lexxi , etee , alaa ko kaalzen so wonaa yoo en kev hakke men .
Kono ko wonaa ɗuum noon ?
Kono ko ñalnde 26 ɗe mawnini ñalawma oo rewrude e juɓɓingol wejo binndaaɗe Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije kam e pelle pinal ɗee ngollii .
Kono ko ɓe mbiyata " wileeɓe jeyaaɓe he galleeji tokoosi kadi ɓe keewaani ganndal " .
Kono ko ɓuri
Kono ko ɓuri heen muusde ko debbo jannga haa " collége " , waɗta unde , defde e ƴoogoyde waɗtii waawde wallude jinnaaɗo mum , ko ɗoon jaŋde mum heewi bonde .
Kono ko ɓuri heewde , taƴooɓe ( hakers ) ko waɗboniyankooɓe faggitortooɓe ngalu no laaɓaani .
Kono ko ɓuri teeŋtude e jaabawol hee " ko cellal ɓuri welde e aduna " nde gede limtaade dow ɗee ndewa heen .
Kono ko ɓuri ɗum bonde ko no o waylorii hakkunde lofuuji ɗiɗi ɗii .
Kono ko ɓurii heewde ko arɗo majji oo hewi ardaade njangu .
Kono ko ɗoon haaɗi : ko heddii heen koo , doole keedi ( tawo ) ko to saramboomooɓe .
Kono koddigal ngal ko ko Pulaar wiyata " rogere kaangaaɗo , ɗiggataa yuppetaake " .
Kono konndirooɓe wonɓe e leydi ɓee , won ko mbayli he diwngo ngoo : ngolɗoo elikopter-yel ngel diwii fotde leƴƴande 50 , tee yahii haa meeteruuji 5 tooweeki , kadi ngel yahrii sawndo .
Kono konngol ɓurngol teskinde ko konngol Ekkehard Strauss jooɗaniiɗo Diiso toowngo pelle ngenndiije dentuɗe e nder Muritani ko feewti e jojjanɗe aadee : o holliri ko nduuɗoo gollordu ndu Fonadh yuɓɓini hannde ko yowitii e jeyi leydi ina yahdi e paandaale ɗe Biro jojjanɗe aadee e nder Muritani ngo o ardii ngoo daranii e yiɗde wallondirde ɗum e laamu nguu e pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje .
Kono laamorgo ngoo wattini ko fecceede pecce ɗiɗi tan : Rippoobilik Federaal Almaañ ( cosaaɗo ñalnde 23 mee 1949 ) , bannge hirnaange , wuro wiyeteengo Bonn waɗaa laamorgo mum , e Rippoobilik Demokaraasiijo Almaañ ( cosaaɗo ñalnde 7 oktoobar 1949 ) bannge fuɗnaange , laamorgo mum waɗaa Berlin fuɗnaange
Kono laamu nguu ena holli dartaare hulminiinde : Poliis saakaama e laabi leydi ndii haa teeŋti e nder Dakaar .
Kono laamɓe Muritani ndañii deeƴde gila 2011 .
Kono lappol ngol haayti tuddinoyde to Firiitaawna , ngol felliti heddaade ɗo Poor Loko , ngol yahat tan to Firitaawna , ngol waɗa ko ngol foti waɗde koo , ngol arta Poor Lokoo .
Kono le Populaire waɗi ɗum no fuunti funeere .
Kono lelorɗe potii tuuba Saada ustaaka haa fota e korle Saada !
Kono leyɗeele joy ɗe kaalɗen dow ɗee , gaagaa wonde ɗe ɓaafniiɗe ɗe ndirtataa , eɗe njogii kadi ko wiyetee " Jojjannde walla kattanɗe salaade " ( droit de veto walla he Engele veto power ) .
Kono lomtiiɓe Federba ɓee kawri ko Malinaaɓe ngummaniima haɓde e tuubakiri .
Kono ma a taw o anndaa , neɗɗo waawaa winnditaade toon tawa addaani paaspoor
Kono maa taw ɓe ngondi ko bonde hakkillaaji sabu nde ɓe teeti jappeere Mammadu Tannjaa nde tawi leydi ndi ina woni e kiriis ( crise ) bonɗo kala ministre gonnooɗo e laamu ngu teetanaama kaalis walla galleeji ɗi joom mum waawaa haalde no heɓiri , yanti heen kadi hay hoyreejo laamu luɓal ngal wiyi ko kala gannduɗo huunde faytunde e mum yoo haal kanko e hoyre makko o noddee e laawol o dallina ko o tuumaa ko .
Kono maa ɗum artoy e ɓesngu maa .
Kono mande jaŋde artata e ngoƴaaji men ?
Kono masalahaa aduna ɓe lelnunoo fof firtaama gila e koloñaal
Kono masiŋaaji ngaanndi hannde kuutortoo ko bitte 8 ngam yaltinde alkulal .
Kono mbaroodi ko dental e doole e tiiɗre e cuusal hisnirta nguura mum .
Kono mbele eɗen mbaawi yaltinde " anke/aŋke " he nder Pulaar hannde haa laaɓa ?
Kono mbele hannde ɓe katojini ko e dañde laamɗo pullo tan walla ko laamɗo ittanoowoɓe caɗeele e joote ɗe ɓe ngoni he dow mum ɗee .
Kono mbele maa magiyankooɓe Senegaalnaaɓe kala njiyto heen koye mum en ?
Kono mbele waɗanaaɓe ɗee golle e ɗii duuɓi , e ɗii lebbi e ɗii ñalawmaaji ene ndokki wune ?
Kono mbelle ɗum ko feere moƴƴere ?
Kono mboombiri ko jiknaaɓe makko qiimantoo mo teŋe makko , e kawral annduɓe diina .
Kono mboros COVID-19 ko bonɗo , mo Allah bonni .
Kono mi naatnaani oon fannu tawo ngam heewde golle .
Kono mi tinii .
Kono mi yiyii dadiiɓe dadungal waaño e konu ina ardii ɗum en Aamadu Kaaliidu Wan , seeɗa mi faayda mo e Niimaa Hoolaa Aali Bedenki , pullo piɗoowo he soññere so laaɓaama woofataa .
Kono miin noon miɗo jogii saggere , sabu mbiyɗaa konngol " anke walla aŋke " wonaa pulaar ko en luɓiiɓe .
Kono min celii Ruwaa ngam addorde naalaŋke men , ngenndiyaŋke men moƴƴo mo aldaa e ɓurnaade , oon woni Daawuuda Sammba Jeey .
Kono minen e nder lannda Tawasul , ko adii kala , ko yoo ko laaɓi waɗe e ko ɓenni ko feewti e ndaamordi ( ?
Kono minen wiyateeɓe genndiyakooɓe ɓee , ko ɓuri heewde , so miijooji amen pelɓondiraama , wonaa miijo moƴƴo yaltata heen .
Kono minen wiyooɓe ko min ngenndiyankooɓe , suutooɓe tiba leñol , min kaaldataa , min pewjidtaa , min ndiisnondirtaa .
Kono miɗo waawi yeewtude golle won fedde dariinde , sooborii heen warñeende mum e ƴiiƴam mum , nder oo sahaa laaɓtuɗo wonande daarol men .
Kono mo munyaani cuurki hebhataa yulbhe .
Kono mo waɗanaani-ma ko moƴƴi , waɗanaani-ma ko boni , Hol sabaabu aɗa haɓoo-ɗum ?
Kono mo woni kala e yiɗde mum yoo kaaldigal waɗ , alaa ko gasi .
Kono moni kala ina anndi waandu suusa ndiyam .
Kono muritaninaajo kala , ko aldaa e paltoor gooto , ina waawi jeyde heen taƴre , so rewrii laawol .
Kono nana joƴƴini ɗoon ko ɗeɓata siforeede no sokkiñeeji , ɗuum woni laamiiɓe ummiiɓe e men soko jooɗaniiɓe ɗoo laamuuji leyɗeele doolnuɗe " .
Kono nde ka yettii , tawi kuɓɓam makka gasii haa laaɓi , ka alaano ko ine addana ka waawde naatde nder jirlol e taartaade Pluton .
Kono nde laatiima majjaande nde laamu nguu tijjanooki .
Kono nde luggiɗin mi wiɗto ngoo , mi tawii kadi ɗaminaare ene jeyaa e ko haɗi en hawrude .
Kono nde o arti e lewru Colte , o horii ɓamtude golle makko e hoore laamu nguu , ngati ɓanndu nduu ena jaggi-mo no feewi .
Kono nde tawnoo darnde ndee nani ɗoo , pellital ngal nani ɗoo , ko ɗuum waɗi na jokki tan .
Kono nde tawnoo omo jogii ngilngu ɓernde , o sali , o suɓii ruttaade sahre jinnaaɓe makko , ɗo o anndaa , o woowaa .
Kono nde tawnoo ɗum waɗetee ko he diiwaan ( wuddu leydi ) mo heewaani yimɓe , baɗte moƴƴe ɗee ɓurata heewde e baɗte bonɗe ɗee ( so ine ngoodi ) : potindiral ngartam/tanaa ngal ko moƴƴal .
Kono nde tin-mi soldateeɓe waraaɓe , hay loototooɓe e maayo ena mbaree , nde tin-mi tiwaande dariinde e huɓɓinde ɓerɗe ɓaleeɓe e gure Fuuta , ɗum fof e dow yamiroore ummiinde e laamu ; ndeen pellit-mi addude ceedtogol am feewde e taaniraaɓe men aroyooɓe jaŋngo
Kono nde weetata , kullon kon kala njippii leesoo ina ngoytoo wonde ñakki kaɗii ɗumen ɗaanaade .
Kono nde wonde oon fannu e sariya oo alaa tawo ɗo meeɗi jolde , tabitino ngal ɗoon kuulal alaa ɗo meeɗi waɗde .
Kono nde wonnoo FACT naatiraani bannge gooto , ɓe mbeeɓaani haɓde .
Kono nde wonnoo gooto fof ko e goonga mum jooɗii , so jam ena ara ne , jogori ardude ko nokku goɗɗo .
Kono nde wonnoo innde
Kono nde ɓe ndarii e dingiral , kala ganndunooɗo Fuuta hanki , mo luttaani , wostaaka , ɓernde mum dillii no feewi .
Kono nde ɗi pelliti siynude ndeen feere , naatde ɗi e paalel njuumri ngel e darnude ɗi koyɗe woni gootum .
Kono ndee feere ina soomi tanaa , sibu kaletine kalito ngoo e hoye mum en ina mbaawi yande e men .
Kono ndee feere waawi huutoreede tan ko so ñawɗo oo arii law ( e nder waktuuji 4 e feccere caggal nde ɗum heɓtii ɗum ndee ) .
Kono ndee innde ko fowru jeyi .
Kono ndee lowre , loowdi mum fof majjataa .
Kono ndeen ( ko ɗuum woni ko hesɗi he kabaaru jooni oo ) , ko natal wuddere ɓaleere wonnde hakkunde jiiryiirngal goɗngal biyeteengal " Messier 87 " ; ndeen wudere ɓaleere wiyetee ko M87 .
Kono ndeen , ko natal wuddere ɓaleere wiyeteende M87 .
Kono ndeen , nde tawnoo leydi men wonaa leydi ndentundi , ndi laamu ngootu , njiimaandi ngootiri , Muritaninaaɓe kaɓtorii ko ina ceerti , moni fof bannge mum e diiwaan mo wonnoo oo , no wonirnoo oon dumunna .
Kono ndii mbaadi jiyrugol geɗe ina ɗaɓɓi wiɗtooji juutɗi ɗi keñoraaka , loskitooji , guurɗi e goongɗingol goodal hakillaaji mettuɗi jaɓnude wonde , aduna oo tuugii tan ko e hannde , aduna ko waɗee waɗtoo .
Kono ndum addanaani Nooro woppude ko o nanngunoo ko .
Kono neeɓaani woodi fuɗɗiiɓe sortaade e ɗuum : Biraam Dah hollirii fotaani fotndeede e heddiiɓe ɓee ( ɗaɓɓi ko e nder jonnde hee foti ko dañde yimɓe nayo sabu wooteeji ɓennuɗi ɗii kollirii ko so Ghaswaani ɓennii tan ko kañum rewi heen ) , Mesawuud kañum ne holliri ko maa yiyondira tawo e Ghaswani nde nootoo e kaaldigal hee , hay so tawii noon e fuɗɗoode , o siifondiriino e luulndo ngoo ɗerewol perngol laawol kaaldigal ngal .
Kono neɗɗo yalti ko he liingel ɓurngel ɗoon famɗude , jogingel cammalal ƴiye e ƴiyon keeci .
Kono ngaal duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije e golle mum paayodinɗe dartinaa he 1999 , e sahaa laamu Mu’awiyya Ould Ahmed Tayya .
Kono ngal waɗtaa waktu ñalnde 19 .
Kono ngam anndude mbele ɗuum ummii ko e he nguurndam ine ɗaɓɓi losko luggo ngo waawaa waɗeede toon , ɗuum addani en artirde mbaañiri ndii gaa e Leydi ngam waɗde ngoon losko luggo .
Kono ngannden fowru wonaa e kulle kulɗe sooño no feewi .
Kono ngannden wonaa wooturu , ko pobbi keewɗi caratoo , ndu woni heen fof , hinaa yiyloo ko yani .
Kono ngel faamii wonde ɗum weeɓataa .
Kono ngel ronkii diwde nayaɓol ngol , ñalnde alkamiisa 29 abril ndee .
Kono nguun goomu heɓaani toɗɗeede saka golloo .
Kono nguura mum ndowrowa ko teewu .
Kono nguurndameeje maɓɓe hannde ene saɗti wonaa seeɗe .
Kono no ndee tagofeere yiitiraa ena yooɗi ; tagofeere nde yiitiraa ko feere mawnde !
Kono noon
Kono noon , hay heen semmbe goote , wonaa ɗe duuɓi ujunere laamu taaniraaɓe men ɓe Gaana , wonaa ɓe Tekruuri en , wonaa ɓe manndikooɓe , saka noon biifnanɗe haɓɓere laamu Jolof e temedannde 15ɓere , alaa heen fof naatanɗe kiiɓal pinal haa pelliti heen mahtaade ngonkeele leƴƴi , so ɗi ngonii ɗuwaaɗi maa tiimaaɗi , waɗtude ɗe e mbaadi leñol keelnungol ngol .
Kono noon , janngo wonaa hiraande walla bottari , kono ina jari ɓetorde .
Kono noon , ko fayti e leɗɗe peƴƴateeɗe to Mansabaa , tuggi ko Umaru Siisakoo Mbaaloo ari e laamu , o ƴettii kuulal ngam ndartinde feƴƴere ndee .
Kono noon , miin Talla dey , won ko haawi mi , banndiraaɓe !
Kono noon , so mi danii winndanooɓe mi jimɗi , mbeɗe yiɗi .
Kono noon , ɓe kuutortoo ɗoo tan ko mbayka woota e mbaykaaji ɗi hakkillaaji mon njogii .
Kono noon Baru , maa mi heɓtu kaŋŋe maa oo fof .
Kono noon Haalpulaar en mbiy : " Ko alaa hoore yahataa , kono koye sappo kadi mbaawaa yahde nde tawnoo wootere heen kala fooɗirta ko bannge mum .
Kono noon alaa e sago nanondiren e konngol .
Kono noon corɓinogol ngol e piiptogol ngol fof , ko yoo ndiyam mem hunuko e hinere tan .

Kono noon dey , ɗum ina haawnii , hay gooto meeɗaa yiꞌde ko wayi nii .
Kono noon goolirɗe ƴewtotoonde waawi tan ko jofaade : nde ñawatta , nde nawantaa ñawoowo .
Kono noon ina anndaa hono ko Aamadu Hampaate Bah wiyi : " Baylo hula haa aña " So a hulii huunde haa a hulii , ɓernde hulii hulii , a añtat ɗum , ɗum ko kulol .
Kono noon ina wiyee ganndal dow , ganndal ooɗoo maabo , e ganndal oya too gonɗo nder maayo , gannde maɓɓe ɗiɗi tammbii Aduna oo .
Kono noon kadi won ko heddii .
Kono noon lekki kii ƴeewirtu maa ko no mbaroodi ñaɗndi ŋaaɓndi hunuko nii .
Kono noon mi anndaa fof ko jari ɗum .
Kono noon miin ɓaydi tolno am e baɗal am njettinaani mi ɗoon , miijo am e ɗemngal am ina njettini mi ɗoon .
Kono noon nde ɓesngu hollunoo ɗum ina tiiɗi ɗum alaa e sago wona , ɗum laatinooma , ko ɗum addi tigi cosgol Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Kono noon o rokkaaka mbaawka waylude kuule ngenndi walla yaafaade baɗboniijo ekn .
Kono noon o tawtaani toon hay abbere kaŋŋe .
Kono noon o yiɗi ngoo ɗoo rajo , o ɓamti ngo , o jeyaa he darjinɓe ngo , o darjori heen , haa yalti keeri leydi Moritani , tacci maayo Senegaal e keeri Mali haa to Gine .
Kono noon waɗii rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓe koyɗe mumen keli .
Kono noon won jeyanooɓe e maggu njaggaa .
Kono nooroo oo wiꞌi yo o ɓeydo yahde nder seeɗa .
Kono o
Kono o alaa lonngorgal ko o ƴeewri .
Kono o artii heen e duuɓi cakkitiiɗi ɗii .
Kono o dañaani .
Kono o deeƴnii hakkillaaji renndo ngoo wonde " Ibraahiima Saar mo ɓe nganndunoo oo , o majjaani , o waylaaki hay so tawii noon o wirniima-ɓe e fannu mo ɓe mbiyata oo " .
Kono o foolaa , o dogi o woppi yoga e jagge konu makko he juuɗe Berbeer en .
Kono o heɓaani siynude ɗeen golle .
Kono o riiwa he ngal duɗal e 1926 sabi ɓe mbiyi omo waɗa jeeyngal " kominist en " .
Kono o siftorii ɗoon Ibraahiima Saar , Jibi Hammee Lih , Mammadu Alasan Bah , Alhajji Abuubakri Dem e ngenndiyaŋkooɓe wodɓe , o yaafnii Geno , o duwanii Saydu Kan , o du wii yoo juut darnde woppaaɓe he ndee darnde ndimaagu .
Kono o suwaa tawo laataade ngati keewal e leyɗe ɗee kuutortoo tawo ko abajada " Kirilik " mo Riis fawnoo he dow maɓɓe .
Kono o toƴƴi kadi daande o yimi , o waajii , o wasiyii yo sukaaɓe ɓeydi yooɗnude , ɓeyda hollude holi kañum'en , teddina iwdi mum'en .
Kono o ubbaa ko nokku ina wiyee Hawraan .
Kono o wiyi mi tan ko o dañaani muulowo .

Kono o ɓooyaani ɗoon , tee yimɓe nokku oo alaa ko tini o golliima ɗoon .
Kono omi winndi goɗɗum ko heewi ko suwaa tawo muuleede .
Kono oon aadee wonaa garɗo tan ene ardi e timmal mum , alaa .
Kono oon holliti ko : 1 .
Kono oon sariya siyaani , sabu leƴƴi ɗii keɓtinaani mo .
Kono oon sarɗi farlaaki so tawii laamu rokkirnoo leydi kaleteendi ndii ko pandungal .
Kono oon wiy he ngaan saanga ko wonaa sabu tafeede diɗɗal sukaaɓe reenooɓe ɓee addani mo nanngeede .
Kono oon ñaawoowo hannde wuurani he dow leydi , hayso tawii haala makko koko filmaa .
Kono ooɗo sariya rewi tan ko ɗo sariyaaji koloñaal en ndewnoo ɗoo .
Kono ooɗoo kabaaru ine adda ɗamaawu : annduɓe ameriknaaɓe mbaawii feewnude batiriiji ɓurɗi waawde ɗooftaade taariindi , tawi kadi kuutortoo ko geɗel taweteengel he laalaaɗe kullon diƴƴe , ko wayi no puccu yaare ( karab ) walla homard
Kono opitaaluuji e sinemaaji e ekkolaaji ndaɗaani heen .
Kono oɗon mbaawi winnditaade ( muulde ) e ɗerewol ngam waɗirde junngo .
Kono paamen noon , aduna o dartotaako e ɗeeɗoo maayɗeele , ko o jokkoowo .
Kono paamen noon , aduna oo dartotaako e ɗeeɗoo maayɗeele , ko o jokkoowo .
Kono paamen tawo hol ko woni hitaande .
Kono paltoor oo ina woodi haa e terɗe goomuuji kalfinaaɗi binnditagol ɗii , sibu ma a taw kamɓe fof ko ɓe safalɓe .
Kono politik meeɗaa woɗɗude ndee maande hormaande .
Kono pulaar wi’i ; " noppi nanooji puɗata ko e hoyre malaande " .
Kono rennduɓe ko feccotaako , hay sinno won ɗo kawraani ne , ɗo teeldi fof njiytondirat .
Kono sabu coñce Islaam ( Arabeeɓe ) woownude hakkillaaji men wonnde neɗɗo ɓaleejo ko maccuɗo kadi nelaaɓe e annabaaɓe jaŋtateeɓe he Qur’aan ɓee kala ko Yahuudyankooɓe walla Arabeeɓe waɗi juulɓe ɓaleeɓe ene koɗni he hakkillaji mum en wonnde annabaagal e nelal ko ɗiin leñɗi tan keerorii ɗum .
Kono sabu koronaa-wiris , wuro ngoo dañii caɗeele mawɗe to bannge nguura sabu taƴondiral maggo e gure keewɗe dawatnooɗe he jeere hee , haa teeŋti e addatnooɓe ligimaaji e geɗe goɗɗe guuraaɗe .
Kono sahaa ena ara nde hakkeeji ɗemɗe ngontata hakkeeji tiiɗɗi , darotooɗi hakkunde diŋiral no hakkeeji aadee nih .
Kono sariya ari dów njurum e ko heddii fóf !
Kono seese tan , keɗo-ɗen ko ɓe kaalata koo .
Kono seeɗa mo njubbuɗen heen oo ene anndina en wonnde , GOODAL ko fedde dariinde , gollanoore leñol Fulɓe ko tiiɗi , tawa kadi ene wonndi e yarlitaare .
Kono senndikaaji gollotooɓe ɓee njaɓaani ɗuum , tee ñalnde kala ko yahɓe gerew ( gila saawiyee haa e ñalawma hannde oo , ñalnde 17 marse 2023 ) .
Kono seteeji gure goɗɗe ceedaama toon haa teeŋti e Pari , Mantu ( Mantes ) , Orléans ( Orliyaa ) , Honfuloor ( Honfleur ) , Ruwaa ( Rouen ) e gure goɗɗe ɗe e mbaawaa limtude .
Kono sikke alaa daartiyankooɓe men ina poti huutoraade sanne daari e tinndi ngati ɗi njeyaa ko e duttorɗe jaŋtaaɗe daartol .
Kono so Alla haajii ndeen manoore ummoriima e winndere , dakamme majjum alaa ɗo haaɗi , tee a yenante a gollii ko potno-ɗaa gollude , a weltoto kadi no feewi e mbelemma e faaro yimɓe ɓadiiɓe ma paarnotoo heen , no sehilaaɓe maa e jiidaaɓe leydi fof mbeltortoo heen , paarnortoo ɗum .
Kono so cumu waɗi , walla so jeyngol mawngol huɓɓaama , so a woɗɗitiima ko foti meeteruuji 100 , a tinataa nguleeki ki .
Kono so dañii ñalawma ne , woppataa .
Kono so en nanii haaliyankooɓe ene mbiya " mbiy-mi , wiy-mi e wiy-maa-mi fof ko gootum " , ko yiɗde anndinde en tan laawol almaddaa rewni jimol mum fof joofoyta tan ko e Aamadaa .
Kono so en ƴeewi hakkunde ɗee ɗoo ɗemɗe
Kono so en ƴeewii
Kono so en ƴeewii , njuuteeki ñalawma to hoodere jaayre , mbiy-ɗen ko balɗe men 243 .
Kono so en ƴetti yeru e yimre nde o wiy ko kanum o adii winndude ndee , woni : " Ƴiiƴam Rufii " , o winndi ɗum ko he 1989 he saanga dillere waɗnoonde hakkunde Senegaal e Muritani , haa saabii ɓaleeɓe Muritaninaaɓe heewɓe ndiiwaa he nder leydi mum en taccinaa maayo paynaa Senegaal .
Kono so jokkii , ɗum yaha haa to gaasuuji ɗii ngostondirta too , to joofirde tekteki henndu ɗii , raaɓta jofe haa waɗta yaltinde mboros oo boowal , raaɓora heen yimɓe ɓe ngondaano heen .
Kono so mbabba ladde , wojere walla fowru naatii wuro , dawaaɗi funnaange ɗii e ɗi hirnaange ɗii fof ndentat njana e mum .
Kono so ndeyri ngoɗndi arii ina naatta e seto hee , ko maa deye seto ngoo njaɓa , maa walla ngayi waawna ɗe .
Kono so ndi taariima naange haa ndi artii ɗo ndi wonnoo ɗo , ɗum wonata ko hitaande .
Kono so neɗɗo hulaani pobbi , keewaani yande e mum , so wonaa ɗii ɓuraa heewde , walla ɗii ɓura woowde yande e yimɓe .
Kono so ngol ɗoo lefol wonii goo ne , waasataa won goo gadiiɗo , walla goow uuji gadiiɗi .
Kono so on koorii ɓuri moƴƴude e mon .
Kono so renndude feere yontii tawa eɗen mbaawi noddondirde njeewtiden , ndiisnondiren tawa gooto kala ene hurmii goɗɗo o ; gooto kala , e no semmbe mum e martaba mum waawi fotde kala ene anndi kanum tan waawaa wonde leñol .
Kono so tawii gollii tan ko e nafoore mum heeriinde ko e ñaawirɗe gaadoraaɗe ɗe tan o ñaawetee sabu hiisetee tan ko o baɗboniijo .
Kono so tawii ko Arabeere tan o janngiri , so wonaa laamu Muritani rokkimo golle , alaa fof ɗo o waawi dañoyde golle , sabu eɗen nganndi leyɗeele Arabeeɓe ɗe kaalɗen dow ɗee fof alaa ɗo neɗɗo ɓaleejo arata haa rokke hurum e teddungal saka waawde dañde ɗoon martaba , kala no ganndal makko waawi fotde noon .
Kono so tawii ko he weeyo , aaɓnotaako ɓeydude kuɓɓam .
Kono so tawii o naamndii teŋe makko ko caggal nde o dakmitii e dewbo o ɗuum jaɓetaake .
Kono so waɗtaama e lebi , hawrata ko teemedde ɗiɗi ( 200 ) lewru .
Kono so yahdaani e daliilu deeƴoowo e hakkille , woɗɗondirtaa e wiyde ene werloo naange ɓooɗe .
Kono so yontaaji hannde ɗii kaalaani ɗemngal ngal kadi ndontini ɗum yontaaji garooji maayde ɗemngal ngal jommbaani .
Kono so ɓe mbarii kam ne , noogaas
Kono so ɓe ngoppii haa CC yaltinii kuugal ngal ɓe calii , ena haawnii seeɗa .
Kono so ɓe njiɗii innirde-ɗe sukaaɓe maɓɓe , eɓe keɓa heen caɗeele no feewi .
Kono so ɗii warngooji Muritaninaaɓe nattaani , jotondiral Mali e Muritani bonat .
Kono so ɗuum ina heen dagaaki .
Kono soofaaji yooɓiiɓe warngo , pawi e makko conndi e kure , dow dinndeere Boleeru Burkina ndu Diiso Nanondiral .
Kono sukaaɓe leñol , teeŋti noon yiɗɓe daranaade ɗemɗe men darnde ittunde , ngasnataa ndeen darnde tawa pottaani e golle ɗe o golli .
Kono sunami mboorka tintintaa , ɗe mbettat .
Kono tan " leydi maaytundi " waawi ittude jeyi neɗɗo tan ko yo a taw ko saabii ɗum koo wonaa doole diwtuɗe hattan aadee .
Kono tan , e duuɓi cakkitiiɗi ɗi , koɗdigal ngal hawrii e caɗeele teeŋtuɗe e golle e baɗe muusɗe .
Kono tan , e duuɓi cakkitiiɗi ɗii , koɗdigal ngal hawrii e caɗeele teeŋtuɗe e golle e baɗe muusɗe .
Kono tan , e duuɓi garooji ɗii , ɓetooji ɗii kala ina kawri wonde alluwon kon ɓurtotoo waawde huutoreede e ordinateeruuji goowaaɗi hannde ɗii .
Kono tan , e hono no Nikolai Shapiro wiyri nii , " batte ƴero walla ñoƴƴo weeyo walla bempeƴƴe ina pamɗi so ƴeewdaama e batte doole nderndere dillaango Leydi kam e ɓosgol paɗe leydi .
Kono tan , e miijo amen , ndee feere hesere ine luurondiri e hoore mum , sibu ko toɗɗii " kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi laamu " e " ñaawoowo " koo , ɓuri toɗɗaade kadi ko jannginoowo e cafroowo , kam e denndaangal mecce jowitiiɗe e mbaawka laamu .
Kono tan , emin karii , emin ŋati tan yo ɗuum laato , hay sinno alaa ko waɗaa ngam ɗuum wooda .
Kono tan , eɗen
Kono tan , eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko kewi ɗoo koo , hay so ɗum fooɗtaani hakkillaaji ko ɓuri heewde e yimɓe , ko daawal mawngal kadi aadee tacci he nder njiylawu mum gannde dowrowe , sibu hay yamiroore diwgol ngol ummorii Ingenuity ko he Leydi men gaa , hay so tawii noon caggal ɗuum ko kanngel diwni hoore maggel , caggal nde ngel ɓetani hoore maggel ngonka maggel he dow ɗo ngel juurii ɗoo .
Kono tan , haa jooni , leydi amen Durmam Daƴƴel ene jogii caɗeele .
Kono tan , hannde , ardorde kaan lannda anndaaka no feewi , sabu gardinooɗo ganndanooɗo oo ruttiima sahre goonga , ɗo bojji nafataa , ɓinngu moƴƴaagu nafataa , ngalu artirtaa ( yoo Alla waɗ toon fooftorde makko ) ;
Kono tan , haɗaani nde kam siimtinde gonngol ,
Kono tan , huunde e amen wiyi ko " loppet , alaa heen " .
Kono tan , ina hawraa , tee De Grey ko ɗuum miijii , wonde sabaabu gorworo naywugol walla solɓito nguurndam , ko ko annduɓe mbiyata " musiiba jinnde " ɗum woni joowogol tuundi e nder ɓalndu .
Kono tan , ina wasiyaa
Kono tan , kuutoragol leƴƴi ina jeyaa e ko ɓeydi geɗe ceerndooje Ngenndi Muritani : ɗawgol e geɗe renndo , to bannge politik e faggudu kam e cuɓagol dente gollondiral diiwaniije .
Kono tan , sabu koongu e mawnikinaare , min ndonkii dañde jaabawol laaɓtungol
Kono tan , teskaama , heewnoo noddeede e ngeel kawgel tan ko jaayndiyankooɓe gollortooɓe ɗemngal Farayse e ɗemngal Arab .
Kono tan , teŋe qiima mum alaa ɗo haaɗi , fawii tan ko he nanondiral hakkunde resondirooɓe ɓee , ngam so tawii ko debbo diwo , o yiɗi tan ko yo ƴamoowo mo oo , janngan mo aayeeji ɗiɗi haa tati quraana ina yona .
Kono tan , ɗum rewaaka no feewi , sibu yoga e yimɓe njaɓaani waɗde hoolkisooji cellal katojinaaɗi ɗii .
Kono tan Farayse hootaani juuɗe ɓole , sibu ko famɗi fof , maa nawtu cuuɗi mum en ko ine tolnoo e 30 miliyoŋ dolaar ( Arsantiin nawti kañum ko 42 miliyaar ) ko jiidaa 1 , 5 miliyoŋ dolaar keblorɗe .
Kono tan Hal pulaar mbi wow-wow rawaaDu dilinaani ngeloba .
Kono tan e jamanuuji battindiiɗi ɗii , o waɗtii memde hay sukaaɓe tokosɓe walla sagataaɓe .
Kono tan eɓe mbeltii e ngooɗoo seppo eɓe ñaagii ardiiɓe fedde nde , nde ɓeydata moñal , kadi njettoo yimɓe fof , sabu wonaa mantu tan nŋakki toon e gure ɗo senegaalnaaɓe koɗi .
Kono tan haa hannde , won wajiiɓe , ene ndartii , ene nguuri woondu " .
Kono tan haalaluuji ardiiɓe hare jojjanɗe aadee , ko wayi no Mammadu Saar mo Fonadh , walla awokaaji , ko wayi no Faatimata MBay , maa waranaaɓe ɓee e koye mum en , walla huunde de depiteeji , ko nanndi e Kajjata Maalik Jallo yeeso hooreejo hilifaaɓe , yantude e seppo AJD/MR yuɓɓini ko wattindii koo , ɗee geɗe fof ina kollita wonde doosiyee oo , ma a taw ko hannde fof ɓuri yaññinaade !
Kono tan hoto njejjiten gila Erdogan ardii Turki , ine yiɗi hollude doole mum he diiwaan Kokaas oo , sibu huunde e yimɓe mum kaalata ko ɗemngal Turki .
Kono tan ina yiɗaa tottude mo huunde e teŋe ko adii naatdiigu , ngam Abuu daawuuda e Nisaa`iyyu kumpiti wonde , nulaaɗo Alla ( mo jam e kisal ngoni e mum ) yamiri Aliyyu yoo tottu Faatimata huunde e teŋe mum ko adii naatdiigu .
Kono tan jahral heen yeeso ngal ine leeli no feewi , kadi kaɓirɗe goodaaɗe ɗee nganndaaka no feewi walla paamaaka .
Kono tan mbeze sikki cazeele ze ko lenyol men venndaani tawo .

Kono tan min ndonkii hawrude e loowdi maggal .
Kono tan mo jam e kisal ngoni he mum oo , ina jokki waajuuji mum dartinaani , kañum ne ɓeydi semmbe mum e muñal mum nde tawnoo ko e Alla wondi .
Kono tan ngol ɗoo laawol ndu ɓurata ɓadaade , ngol ɓadagol wayri waɗde ko 29 Siilto ( janvier ) 1948 , kadi hawrata ko e lewlewal mawngal , Lewru e leydi fo koko kayata e weeyo , lewru ko e leydi rewi ina wanngoo , e nder banngagol mayru e ndu ɓadoo leydi haa ngoɗɗeeki hakkunde majje arta e 356 509 kilomeeteer , tawa ko ɓuri heewde ndu wanngotoo ko hedde 384 400 km ngoɗɗeeki , sahaaji e ndu lusoya haa 406 300 km .
Kono tan o jaɓaani dogde e maslahaa to Kosowo e to Rippoobilik Demokaraatik Konngo ( RDC ) .
Kono tan on kumpaaka keewal men ina heewi waɗde jeddi maa mbiyen yeddeede , yeru Muritani e Sengaal alaa noon ko haali leyɗeele keddiiɗe ɗe .
Kono tan oo ɗoo ngenndiyanke , jaaruɗo cukaagu , ari ko e yejjiteede e nder leydi Senegaal ndii .
Kono tan sikkannde ndee daraaki ɗo gootel , sibu nde wayliima fotde laabi 4 e nder daawal jonte ɗiɗi ; huunde hollitoore wonde annduɓe ɓee cuwaa tawo huɓindaade no moƴƴi geɗe mayre .
Kono tan won ko daartoowo waawaa waasde haalde , zuum woni pille mawze , zeen njijjitaake .
Kono tan yimɓe ɓee nattaani werlaade mo kaaƴe e fiyde mo cabbi .
Kono tan yiyortaako gite , memortaako junngo .
Kono tan yoga e daraniiɓe taariindi ine kuli goɗɗugol laje dottaaɗe ɗee , sibu paaynugol ngonka kaa .
Kono tan ɓetooji tuugiiɗi e ganndal mbaɗaama .
Kono tawde ardiiɓe en ɓee caliima
Kono tawde fulɓe mbi’i ko golle ɓuri haala , ɗuum waɗi en njuutnaaki e haala hee kono en naat e duɗal mawngal tawa ina waɗi ko ina wona 25 Ordinaateer .
Kono tawde hankadi helmere ndee mahiima e hakkillaaji , kala kuutoriiɗo ko wonaa kayre yaawataa faammeede .
Kono tawde ko CC taƴi yo Wadd yah , M23 jaɓaani ko CC taƴi koo kono waawaa haɓde Goomu toowngu nguu .
Kono tawde to nde wonnoo ɗoo ena woɗɗi en kaɗdtudi goɗɗugol , ko jooni caafe ɗe ngarata e men .

Kono taƴondiral baɗngal e nder dental ngal addaniiɓe yuurnitaade feere maɓɓe .

Kono tuggi 1776 ɗum deestii caggal nde njulaagu jiyaaɓe harminaa toon .

Kono wordu heewaani laamaade .
Kono wota ɓe njejjit dey , haa hannde leñol Fulɓe ina soobii e ngonka mum hanki hono no kitaale capanɗe jeetati e jeenayi haa capanɗe jeenayi ( 89-90 ) , ɗuum noon leñol Fulɓe njaɓɓen ko tiiɗi keblano-ɗen ko huccanaa koo .

Kono ɗeen defte noon haajooni leñol ngol daraaki he no ɗe muuldaa .
Kono ɗeen jammuule fof hannde oo maayii , batte mumen majjii , lomtii ɗe ko ciluɗe .

Konu Juulɓe teemedde tato e
Konu Mali ko konu ngu alaa huñtito hoore mum , kadi konunkooɓe Mali njiɗi ko hollirde keɓtii nokkuuji seɓɓitiiɓe njoginoo tawi ko e ballal Riisnaaɓe .
Konu Mali naati heen waɗti jinngande kala haɓooɓe e fulɓe sabi gooto e mawɓe jihaadiyankooɓe ɓee ko pullo , oon woni Aamadu Kuufa .

Kulle fof corniima heen .
Kulle goɗɗe keewɗe ngara ina mooloo heen , ina nguura heen ( yeru e ɓoccooɗe koraay ) , ko wayi no liɗɗi , e guje , e barooɗe maayo goɗɗe .
Kulle keewɗe ina loppita ko kullel goɗngel sonngi , so ɓurii ngel doole .
Kulle ɗee njahdi , ɓooyani tan ɗe njotti e ladde serwunde ndee .
Kullon mawkon ŋabbitii fayde fuɗnaange rewo , ɓurɗo heewde yurmeende , Kullon tokoson mboomaama e welewma yontaaji njiimaandi Oropnaaɓe , kañum en e won liggotooɓe laamu Afriknaaɓe , ɓe petelaaji yonta hannde bonnooji , ɗi cifortaako no fetelaaji men kaaƴe gaadanteeji .
