Laamɗo balloowo ɓe haa faggudu maɓɓe ɓamtoo ; ɓe ndaña laabi berkaaɗi e pomuuji ɗi ene njulyultondira jeeri e waalo .
Laamɗo ballowo ɓe e peeje ngam sukaaɓe maɓɓe mbaawa jooɗaade he leydi mum en , ngollo heen tawa njolaani e laaɗe ene kalkoyoo he nder geejuuji .
Laamɗo ballowo ɓe ɓe ndaña ndiyam mbelɗam tawa wonaa boyli ɓulli ɗi ndiyam mum en laaɓaani sellaani , kono hayɗaam ko maa waɗanee dawol walla kiirndol goɗɗungol nde dañee .
Laamɗo keso oo , hono Siidi Muhammet Wul Seek Abdallaahi wiyiino maa kaa haala ummane , hollitee ɓiɓɓe Muritani mbele ena wootee hol no dawrugol fayde e Israa'el foti daroraade .
Laamɗo maayii yontii goɗɗo ene lomtoo kono ko seese yahrete .
Laamɗo mahanoowo ɓe cafrorɗe e duɗe leslese , hakkundeeje haa jaaɓihaaɗtirde tawa ɓiyɓe maɓɓe njahataa janngoyde he gure ɗo ngontoyta tumarankooɓe .
Laamɗo mawɗo noodi ɗii wiyatee ko Yeri .
Laamɗo maɓɓe hiilnii waɗdude e Afrik worgo Saharaa njulaagu .
Laamɗo noon waɗataa daartol ko daartol waɗata laamɗo .
Laamɗo oo heɗii mo haa o joofni .
Laamɗo oo naamndii mbeewa baa hol ko anndi e ko
Laamɗo oo yiɗi dañande mo joom galle kono yiyaani hay gooto Goppaaɗo tolniima e reseede etee alaa joom galle .
Laamɗo toɗaaɗo yanndinaama .
Laamɗo wiyi
Laamɗo wiꞌi kala gadduɗo finnde ko kañum wari nooro oo , ko naamnii fof heɓat .
Laana Joolaa ko kañum wonnoo kallu walla jokkondiral maayoyankeewal hakkunde Cikisoor wuro laamorgo diiwaan o e Ndakaaru wuro laamorgo plitik leydi ndi , ka takkoo duunde Karabaan to leydi Gammbi .
Laana annabi Nuuhu kaa ɓooyi ɗoon no feewi .
Laana kaa , ngam hisnude kaɓirɗe ganndal roondii ɗee e nguleeki tolniiki e 1 400 daawannde Selsus ( degré Celsius ) , ina huuraa warwarde nde santimeeteruuji 10 tekkeendi , mbele nguleeki nder laana kaa ina duumoo e 29°C fat !
Laana kaa fotiino yettaade Pari sahnga 11 : 15 subaka , kono haa jooni anndaaka ko heɓi ka haa ka majjirii yimɓe kala .
Laana kaa jofa e jam woni ɓural moni kala .
Laana kaa waɗii he bolol fotde lebbi jeeɗiɗi sibu ka duñi ko e lewru sulyee 2020 , ka taccii 500 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer yolnde .
Laana mbuɓɓirka kaa ɓuri oto tokooso famɗude .
Laatiima Aadama so yiɗii renndude e Hawwaa , ɓe naattata ko he fabiyoŋ kaŋŋe luulu , fabiyoŋ oo tellinee e maɓɓe ngam suturo maɓɓe ina ñilka no majje nih .
Laatiima Hawwaa so ina yaha e nder tataaji aljannaaji ɗii , he nder ɗee kurmuɗe , ɗum firti so tawii ko huunde ɓalejum ko maa hurma , so tawii ko ko wojji ko maa hurma , so ndaneeri ko noon .
Laatiima e nder yonta Muusaa ( JKM ) hono ñalawma aset ko ñalngu dewe Geno toowɗo oo .
Laatiima farlineede ndu e juulɓe ko ñalnde Altine tawa lewru soobaan nduu maayii haa ɓenni balɗe ɗiɗi e nder hitaande ɗimmere ferngo nelaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) .
Laatiima maayde makko kanko Aali ɓii Asbaaɗi oo , maayde makko e maayde Annabi Muusaa ( JKM ) , ko duuɓi teemedde nay e capanɗe jeetati .
Laatiima nde Hawaa tagaa ndee , o ari ko omo jogii teemedde jeeɗiɗi jubbol .
Laatiima ngaan saanga , annabi Nuuhu jogii ko beɗi tati mburu gawri , o sorti heen mbeɗu o totti ɗum Aawaja , o wiyi ɗum ñaam .
Laaw ; 7 .
Laawaŋkooɓe ñaawi mo warngo .
Laawol ena foti rewneede e waɗ-ɓe bonanndeeji sabu ñawooɓe hono ɗeen baɗe ena ngoodi e rennduo leyɗeele .
Laawol goonga fawaama e Sidiiki , e Mammadu Yero .
Laawol gootol tan mbaaw-ɗaa dañde toon ndiyam e nder hitaande ndee .
Laawol heen kala ( nde kaal-mi kala ) , miɗo teeŋtina mbele miɗo annda miijo makko ko faati e doosiyeeji mawɗi leydi ndii , ngam mi naftoroo humpito makko , haa arti noon ngo o dañi e laamu makko ndaɓɓu nguu .
Laawol jaŋde fannuuji goɗɗi ɗii fof huutortoo ko laabi teeŋtinooji njiylawu e gollingol e coftal almuudo .
Laawol ngol juutii , donngal ngal teddii , kaɓirɗe e doole keewaani sabu añɓe nana bannge yoo bannge , ballo jaawo sooynaaka ; kono banndiraaɓe so hono nii nattaani , jooni njettinen faayndaare .
Laawol ngol ɓe ndewi ngol , waɗii haa Ndakaaru ɓeydii haawde sukaaɓe ɓee .
Laawol tagofeere Puluton sawndondiraani e majje .
Laawɗinal kuɓtodinngal firti ko renndinde doosɗe pulfule keewɗe tawa ina suɓtee heen geɗe ɓurɗe yaajde ( keewal maa caragol pulfulal ) , ɓurngal tabitde , ɓurngal yuɓɓude , ɓurngal newaade e soomde miijanteendi , ekn .
Laaɓal soomi cellal , cellal woni afo ngalu .
Laaɓal woni : laaɓal ɓanndu , laaɓal ñamri , laaɓal nokku ( nder galle e caggal galle ) .
Laaɓanii yimɓe tan ko ardiiɓe ɗum ɓee ndaranii ko nafooje mum en hooram hoorameeje , hay so tawii njeeytotoo ko daranaade hinnde .
Laaɓi tan hannde ko teemedde ɗiɗi e sappo e jeegom fiɗtaandu mbonii hannde e ndee boomaare nde Air France heɓi hannde .
Laaɓi tan ko won ko suuɗaa e baɗte Umar Bonngo sabu ko e kumpa wonaa ɗee jonte kala .
Laaɓii noon Sayid Kayis ( hayso innde makko ko hitowol Berbeer ) anndaa daartol leydi Tuunus .
Laaɓndal am ko hol ko lomtinten ɗoon haa ɓura wonde Pulaar/Fulfulde sellunde ?
Laaɓndal ngal ko mbele tafnoode Duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije , ko pellital tigirigi ƴellitde ɗemɗe ɓaleeɓe Muritani ɓe ngonaa salfaɓe , walla ko hodo wonnoo , e jooɗtoronoode wonnde hayso eɓɓo ngoo waɗaama yahataa ɓe ndaña woytoraandu ?
Laaɓndal ngal mberloto-ɗen , mbele ɓeen wejooɓe nguurndam mumen keeriɗam e enternet , natooɓe terɗe mumen , waɗooɓe hitooji ñidduɗi nefniiɗi , miijiima baɗte ɗee janngo ?
Laaɓndi moomi mbele omo jogii yaajeende fiilde gaaci walla haysinno kam hokkudemi fartaŋŋe yiyndirde e makko , o wiy eey kono ko o jahoowo njillu ( tourné ) so miɗo waawi so mi arii yomi abbo mo mi mirewa e makko .
Laaɓndoto-maa-mi ko yo a rentin baawal maa no diidorinoo , nder laawol ngol cuɓi-ɗaa , tawtaa ndee hare dartoriinde hisnude nguurndam maa e reende hurum maa .
Laaɗe kelooji galaas ine ngoodi , kono golle mum njaawaani , tee ko mosol tan mbaawi rokkude laaɗe seeɗa waawde wefaade .
Laaɗe taan Dikal e Bookara .
Labbo labanii tugunnde ɓurɗi welde bawɗi , nguurndam .
Laboratuwaaruuji Pfizer e Moderna peewnii ñakku mum en , puɗɗiingu huutoreede he leyɗe keewɗe he winndere ndee ( Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ɗo ɗi peewnaa ɗoo , Kanadaa , e Orop ) .
Laddeeji ena keewi kalfaandi .
Lagos e Uwida ( Ouidah ) inanjeeyatnoo 60% dahaaɓe ɓee , nawetenooɓe Beneŋ ( 10 000 dahaaɗo hitaande kala haahitaande 1850 ) .

Lampaaji ɗi goobi ceertuɗi ena mbeddoo lewñanɗe jooɗɗe .
Lannda Ba'si jeyaa ko e gadiiɗi jaabtaade e ndeen yiɗde .
Lannda Muritani biyeteeɗo Alvadhila ( jeyaaɗo e dowru Muritani hannde ) hollitii yiɗde mum yoo Muritan artu ɗo wonnoo , daaƴa gollondiral e Israa'el .
Lannda Tawaasul nih yaltinii heen bayyinaango ina ñiŋa heen ngool jahtirgol caggal .
Lannda fof njogiika ko ina tolnoo e dipiteeji jeeɗiɗi fayi dow , ina jogii hakke sosde nguun goomu sarɗooɓe ( groupe parlementaire ) .
Lannda kaa heɓi yayamiroore gollaade no lanndaaji fof nii .
Lannda men oo ina tijjaa e mum darnde faayodinnde , nde foti daraade heen , tee ko donngal joortangal waawde mo gaddaade ɗum , ngal o jojjidi roondaade .
Lannda men siftorii wonde doosɗe mum yummaaje ko ngooroondi tammbiindi Lislaam e nder Laamaandi ?
Lanndaaji cerindiiɗi ɗii kam en fof mbiyi ko ngalaa e ngal ɗoo kuulal .
Lanndaaji luutndiii leydi ndii puɗɗiima ñiŋde Aziz e naatgol ndee hare nde ɓe tuumi ko Farayse huccini Muritani e Al Kayidaa .
Lanndaaji ɗi ngalaa ndeen limoore ina mbaawi rentinde sarɗooɓe mum en , mbaɗa goomu ngootu .
Lappi ɗii naati wuro ko heedde takkusaan les .
Lappol cakkitol njahnongol toppitaade Hubble ko 2009 yahnoo ngam feewnitde ngal haa ngal gollaade ɗoo e 2030 .
Lappol fof rokkaa jippunde , njaatigi e heedooɓe , yimɓe pooftoyii .
Lappol maɓɓe ko yettinde nulal Umaru Siisoko Mbaalo hooreejo leydi Gine Bisaaw , gardiiɗo hannde CEDEAO .
Lappol nawnongol toon yimɓe ngol wiyetenoo ko Appolo 11 , ɗum waɗnoo ko ñalnde altine 21 sulyee 1969 .
Lappol ngol na joginoo biisuuji Joyi ( 5 ) e oto gooto tokooso kono heɗi kala ɗi ndañii caɗeele .
Lappol ngol ñalti ɗo Likseyba , ngol hirndani Sehilbaabi .
Lappol ngol ñaltoyi to Fonndu , ɗo ngol jaɓɓaa jaɓɓungal mawngal .
Lappol safroobe ummoriibe Nuwaasot e Kayhayɗi e huunde e ɗanniyankooɓe jofii ɗoo e Likseyba jamma aljumaa 5 ut 2016 .
Lappol tataɓol ngol ko leyɗe joyi ( 5 ) njillaa , ɗeen ngoni : Gammbii , Senegaal , Gine Bisaawo , Gine e Seeree Lewoon , tuggi 20 nowaammbar haa e10 desaammbar 2021 .
Lappol ɗimmol ummii , o yahdi e ngool , kanko e hoore makko , haa Maqaama .
Lare ɗee ko lare kaaƴe .
Law , o naati e " haɓɓere sukaaɓe maruceeɓe " , sibu tawi omo yahra e duuɓi 12 fat , o waɗti werlaade tarakuuji , e kareeli dartagol ciynugol sariya kaɗatnooɗo iñnjiyee jogaade jeyi leydi e wuro Durban , walla daratgol tawtoregol Afrik worgo wolde adunaare ɗiɗmere .
Law-law kadi haala kaa wonti so omo foti ñaaweede so goomu nguu hollitii e losko mum ngoo won bonande o waɗi .
Lawakooɓe Mbaañ ko Joobɓe woni suudu ndu Murtuɗo jeyaa nduu .
Lawɓe Ndulumaaji e lawɓe woɗɓe nootitinooɓe , kañumen naati dingiral mbelni haa weli , ƴeeŋi .
Lawɓe ngaree kooten Saalum ngoowaandi , wuro e wuro .

Lebbi 6 ngam yahde toon , duuɓi jeegom ngam ƴettude toon mbaañiri ndii , lappol goɗngol nana heblee ine wiyee Mars Orbiter potngal yahde toon laabi ɗiɗi , ƴetta mbaañiri ndi perseverance woppi toon ndii , ngam artirde ɗum he Leydi , ɗum noon maa yettinoy en hedde 2031 .
Lebbi jeegom caggal nde ñaawoore nde fuɗɗii , lebbi jeegom losko , alaa ko fadanoo so wonaa tonngol haralleeɓe ñaawooje .
Lebbi majji ko saawiyee , feebariyee , marse , abriil , mee , suweŋ , sulyee , ut , settaambar , oktoobar , noowammbar , desaambar .
Lebbi tati caggal ɗuum , joɗnde nde jooɗaaki sabi añde Mali ardoo fedde nde .
Lebbi teemedde ɗiɗi ko ɓe keppaani , ɓe kaaɓaani ene ndarii , ene cirŋinii , ngam ittude en e majjere , niɓɓere kanum e humambinnaagal e kumpa .
Lebbi ɗiɗi pawii heen , leydi ndii naati haɗde cowid-19 .
Lebu en ko leñel tokkosel so a yerondirii ɗum en e Fulɓe , kamɓe ko ɓe seeɗa kadi ɓe njaajaani , ko leeɗe tan ɓe njogii he nder diiwal kapweer ( Ndakaaru haa Tinngeej ) , ɗuum waɗi e ɓe mbaawi rentude ɓe tafa njuɓɓudi ɓe cuɓoo arɗo maɓɓe , kamɓe kala ɓe keddoo caggal mum .
Leece mbertaa haa peewi , jooɗorɗe pawaa .
Leegal neɗɗo yahi heen fof , maa taw toon dawaaɗi ene nehaa .
Leegal ngal ina jirwi , kono waktu jaŋde , a yi'ataa hay suka gooto .
Leelaani , Perjel lamdam feeñi , bawɗi ɗii cerkiti .
Leelaani , sabu moƴƴugol makko hakkille e baawgol makko ɗemngal Farayse , kabaaru makko yanoyi e kumaandaŋ Luga .
Leelaani leydi Afrik worgo e wondiiɓe mum njaɓni batu ngu nde nanondirta e feere mbele ina saloo pollugol laamu Madagaskaar e feere nde laamu ngu " dagaaki " ngu ( laamu André Rajoelina ) yiɗi ƴettude ngam yuɓɓinde wooteeji dipiteeji .
Leelaani tan gulaali e ciikaali diiri , Baaba naatii dingiral , Le Havre waɗtii koyɗol goona !
Leeɗe nay wuro ngoo , gootal heen fof suɓii paɗɗuɗo mum addi
Lefol " Teeñ " ina woodnoo Bawol Jolof , ɗo Joobɓe e Faalɓe piiletenoo .
Lefol " teen " tawatee he Fuuta-Tooro ko he gure tati , Kayhayɗi mo Geyɓe , Duungel mo Gayɓe , Ɓohki mo Saarɓe .
Lefol ngol faayiida mum , neɗɗaagal mum ina barkinoree haa jooni .
Leggal kaaloowal !
Leggel boru yoo !
Lekki bukki anndini ɓe wonnde koɗo oo ko ɓiy laamɗo .
Lekki fof mawki ki min ngari , min ndaroo , ɓee ena njima , ɓeya ena koɗa , ɓeyatoo ena ɓoppa , ena ngama , haa juuta kadi min ɓenna .
Lekki kaaloowi .
Lekki ki geno teddini sanne .
Lekki kii naamnii mo : " Ɓinngel am to njahataa aan tan e oo jamma niɓɓo ?
Lekki kii rokki ndu yeeso neɗɗo .
Lekki kii ƴettetee ko laawol gootol .
Lekki mawki mbiifniiki kii weddii catal mum , fooɗi fowru haa sara hunuko makki .
Lekki ñaayataa banndum " .
Lekkol ko nokku pinal , keewɗo faayida poɗɗo waɗde ngartam .
Lekkol oo foftaaki e anndinde min hol no taariindi reenirtee .
Lella , so a yiꞌii ɗum , mi woondii a haawete haa mbiꞌaa : eeh , lekki kaaloowi !
Lella ba yiꞌi lekki ɓurki mawnude e huɓeere , jogii yeeso neɗɗo ina wulla no boyi nii .
Lella huli jerminii haa wiꞌi : leggal haaloowal !
Lelngo jooɗorɗe ɗee ena yooɗi , ena feewi .

Lemmbel oo yontaa ina waɗa ataaya .
Les Lionceaux walla barooɗe tokoose ko ekip sukaaɓe yahrooɓe he les duuɓi noogaas , yahnooɓe jeyeede e kawgel Afrik mo oon ɗoon tolno , ɓe mbaɗi toon golle jooɗɗe , sabu ko wonaa tan nawde kup o , ɓe njahii haa ɓe ngartii ɓe natnaaka loggol .
Lewbi jeegom fof maɓe njaltin tummbitere , kala keɓɗo tummbitere mum kadi ene jogii ko foti yoɓde , ko noon haa nde ɓe njoofnoyi deftere ndee kala .
Lewooɓe ɓee ndogii .
Lewru aout rawané ( 200 , mbidda wondé é mawnam gooto , min jangui werla min ngabbima aeroport , ko mawni amen haruna jah to burkina nelnoomin é ma , kono , min tawi ko a yéhi , min kebi yiidé tan ko salli bougal seck .
Lewru do timminii ɗeen daawe , lewru dawa kadi .
Lewru fof eɓe njooɗoo , kala nde leegal ɗaɓɓi ballal ngam laɓɓinde nokku mum , kamɓe terɗe Fedde ndee eɓe ngara , ɓe ndarodoo e yimɓe .
Lewru ina timmina wanngaade naange kala balɗe 27 e waktuuji 8 .
Lewru kala miliyaar e 590 miliyoŋ neɗɗo ina seŋoo e magggol .
Lewru kala nih haa hitaande ndee maaya .
Lewru ko huunde woowaande , yiyotoonde e gite ɓole , nde yimɓe njiyata ñalnde kala , hakkunde mum e Leydi ko hedde 384 400 km doŋ ( hakkunde 356 410 e 405 500 km ) .
Lewru ko huunde woowaande , yiyotoonde e gite ɓole , nde yimɓe njiyata ñalnde kala , hakkunde mum e Leydi ko hedde 384 400 km doŋ .
Lewru ko yowitiindu .
Lewru mayre inniraandu Didymoon ( Didymos B ) , hakkundol mum ko 170 m ; ko kayru toɓɓaa .
Lewru mee faatiindu nduu , laamu Muritani hollitiino nduttiniino 7000 ɗanniyanke yiɗnooɓe yahde e suuɗsuuɗoondu , tawi ko ummoriiɓe e leyɗe keewɗe ceertuɗe .
Lewru noon , haaju mum ko waɗde yiloo banngoo e hoyre mum , tawa kadi ena taaroo leydi .
Lewru noon ɓuri yowitaade ko e leydi ( tawde ndu taarotoo ko Leydi ) .
Leydeele Afrik kala ina poti habanaade haa laamu potal nguu arta wonaa hay yeewde dirtinde subngooji woni ko wallata muritaninaabe ; sabu hay subngo wadii hannde janngo goddo ina waawi follude dum e dow doole wiya maa wooteeji mbadte ; hay gooto e lanndaaji di potaano jabde yahde e subngo aroowo ngo sabu alaa ko laaboyta heen ko wonaa ko weli eli
Leydi , Lewru , naange e koode , gooto fof ena jogii semmbe fooɗngo .
Leydi Farayse ko leydi ngarwaniiri he leyɗeele ballodiije he nder Afrik hirnaange , ngam artirde kisal e deeƴre , kono alaa golle maantinɗe memotooɗe jiyaaɗe gila ɓe ngaddi I koninkooɓe maɓɓe he nder ɗeen leyɗeele ko ina wonaa jooni duuɓi 10 .
Leydi Farayse mo Macron yamiri yimɓe mum wonɓe Burkina nde " ndeentotoo , mbaasa yaltude e yahde hakkunde gure " .
Leydi Gine ɗum yanani e mum tawo , Burkinaa Fasoo ina daɗi tawo e ndeen bonannde .

Leydi amen , to nganndu mi ngoowaa mi , to cooynetee mi " haayoo " waɗa .
Leydi e lewru njiidaa tagoore , njiidaa fedde , njiidaa haaju .
Leydi hurmiindi ceeral leñɗi e ɗemɗe ɓiyɓe mum , pawiindi he moƴam koddigu , potal e deengol jojjannde kala ɓiy leydi , ko aldaa e paltoor fawaade he mbaydi nguru ɓanndu makko walla ɗemngal makko .
Leydi ina heewi yerɓude e Iraan , sibu ndi jooɗii ko e paɗe ɗiɗi leydi dillooje .
Leydi ina yirloo e hoore mum kadi , no herndelde yirlortoo nii .
Leydi ine sowoo Mbaañ fotde laabi sappo , kono Mbaañ ine sowoo Lewru fotde laabi sappo kam ne .

Leydi mahortee tan ko potal ɓiɓɓe leydi mo yeddi
Leydi ndi ina soklunoo taccude cazeele wondunuuze hay so tawiino ku oo wonaano feere burnde moxxude .
Leydi ndi nguurɗen e dow mum ndi enen yimɓe , maaje , kaaƴe , gila ɗo ngonɗaa ɗo fof haa ɗo mbaawɗaa miijaade e nokkuji ɓurɗi woɗɗude e dow duunde Baaba Aadama nde , tuggi Muritani haa Amerik , haa Sapoq haa Ostaraali , haa Inndo , haa Riis , haa ɗo mbaawɗaa miijaade fof , so hono mumen ndenndii haa ngonii 332 .
Leydi ndi njeyaa mi ndii wiyatee ko Durmam Daƴƴel Salndu Gelooki .
Leydi ndi ɓe tiimi ndii , ɓe peccitii ɗum ko e diwanuuji jeeɗiɗi , heen diwaan fof ardii ɗum ko goforneer tiimɗo sarwisaaji toppitiiɗi fiyakuuji ndenndaandi , ndeenka e kisal .
Leydi ndii ina tiiɗi oon bannge .
Leydi ndii inniraa " Ifirikiya " .
Leydi ndii ko fecciinde : ɓee ena ceppana laamu kesu ngu , beya ena kaɓoo-ngu e der batuuji , seppooji e kominikeeji .
Leydi ndii moɗi ɓe kamɓe kala .
Leydi ndii waawii hisde e caɗeele
Leydi ndii wiyetee ko Tuunus , laamorgo ngoo ne ko Tuunus inniraa .
Leydi njuvvindi kawgel ngenndiije Afrik hawii Nijeriyaa kawgu tiiɗngu , njooɗngu caggal ngal kawral jirwungal , kulɓiningal .
Leydi so ena taaroo naange , yahrata ko yahdu feewndu .

Leydi so waɗii yiloo-banngoo e hoyre mum tuggi waktu haa waktu o nde artoyi , so waktuuji ɗi limaama , ɗi ngonata ko 24 .

Leyɗeele dokkiranooɗe , ina mbinnditaa e inɗe mawɓe gure , hoohooɓe leƴƴi ekn kiisetee ko gure ɗee kala maa leƴƴi ɗii fof ndenndi ɗum en , kadi ɗe poti ko fecciteede e potal e denndaangal yimɓe jeytoranooɓe e gollugol leydi ndii kam e duumagol golle ɗee .

Leñol Fulɓe on njaaraama .
Leñol heen kala ina jogii ko heerorii gila e daartol mum haa e ngenndi mum , ɗi ndentoyi woni daartol Muritani fofhannde .
Leñol kala ine jogii goonga mum yeesoyankeewa e keɓtinirɗe mum .
Leñol men ina alɗi to bannge coñce , to jime , to tinndi , to daari , to ganooje , to payka , to cifti .
Leñol men ngol neh , ko ɗoon tan rewi , ngol waawataano selde ɗoon , waɗi noon ko nguurndam woniri noon .
Leñol ngol ina foti haɓaade , ñiŋa , seyfita , ɗuurnoo kala caliiɗo rokkude leñol ngol fartaŋŋe no ɓamtorii , keedoowo ngol e naange ƴellitaare .
Leñol noon mayirta ko wontude goɗngol .
Leñol wayi ko hono lekki nih , lekki so ɗaɗi mum ɗoofiima hay sinno ki yanaani neh , ki wuurataa ki yoorat , leñol neh so seerndaama e pinal mum , jatti mum , finaa-tawaa e daartol mum tan maayat .

MONI FOF YOO ETO TO BANGE MUM .
MOOV .
MTN .
Ma a taw , e nder leydi hee , ko Fooyre Ɓamtaare tan waawi wasaade , wiya , gila 2010 , meɗaa sownude hay laawol gootol nde foti yaltude ndee , tee ina huuɓni denndaangal sarɗiiji pawiiɗi e mum , tee ɓuri jaayɗe ɗee kala ɓooyde sibu mum soseede gila 1980 .
Ma a taw kam nguurndam neɗɗo ɓuri deftere .
Ma a taw ko pamɗugol semmbe to bannge dañal kono ɓe etiima sukkude jolɗe mawɗe .
Ma a taw maa wood nde ngal yettii en ?
Ma a taw so nde ɓoƴotono ɓe , walla nde wujjatno won ɓeen , waytaano noon Kono ɗuum wonaa ko mayre .
Ma a taw ustii golle mum en e daranaade golle F .
Ma a taw ɗo am ɗo , so Allah jaɓii , jeyaaɗo e muñɓe .
Ma a tawnii , ko ɗum huunde suuɗetenoonde .
Ma a war e maɓɓe ko heewi , kono aan ne kadi , ma a waas ɓiɓɓe yumma heewɓe , wandiraaɓe rewɓe heewɓe , koreeji e sehilaaɓe , yimɓe ngannduno-ɗaa , ɓe njokkondirno-ɗaa Lajal maa inan fad maa e lobugel mbedda heppaani , nder yanaande walla nder dunndu , so a yanii e pittol ɓe tuufi maa , walla , so tawii ko a malaaɗo , mbattindaa e opitaal-yel , doktoor kuruwaa ruus toppito maa .
Ma a yiy haayre ndee ena ara e maa , kono beddiiɗo oo , a yiyataa ɗum .
Ma a yiy mo omo jala e tele , e JT ( Suurnaal parlee Tele ) 20h , omo daranii beldital , omo wiy maa yo a yaafo .
Ma en eto werlaade miijooji men e ngonka men e aduna he , e ngonka men e winndere nde .
Ma en kaalen heen renndo ngoo no gooto kala addirta heen ballal mum .
Ma en ngartu e Taaw Legnol en e balɗe garooje ɗee sabu en mbaɗdii e maɓɓe yeewtere timmunde .
Ma en noddirɗum peŋɗe ( hayso tawii ɗum woowi noddireede ko batuuji- Conseil ) , nde tawnoo ene he nder mum cate e goomuuji karalleeji .
Ma ka ƴeewndore mbele laana ine waawi diwde e weeyo waango no weeyo Mars nii hoybude .
Ma mi winndu Laam Tooro Siidi Abdul , e hoohooɓe Tooro , mbele eɓe mballita en e deeƴre , e ɗooftaare , e siynude gollal ngal Abel Sanndee ummaninoo ngal .
Ma nde jokku golle mayre , ko ɗum muusi fof , haa nde hujjaaji teeɗanaaɗi ɗii keɓaa .
Ma nde jokku hare mayre e lutndaade ndii-ɗoo mbaadi kuulal ngal , e compegol mum .
Ma o waaltoyii Rinjaw maa o waaltoyii Jowol kono o waalataa e Kahayɗi ngati Farmbaal hankadi ɓe koolondiraani .
Ma o yiy ɗoon teddungal fuutankooɓe , e waawde ɗum en jaɓɓaade e hoɗtude koɗo .
Ma on njiy e wejo ngoo jale e jammbe , ɗuum feewnirtenoo ko jamɗe , jamɗe ɗe wayluɓe ngittatnoo e kaaƴe mbaɗa duuɗe pewna heen jale e jammbe yimɓe liggoroo ndaña no nguurdi .
Ma taw joom wuro oo ko jejjitɗo ma .
Ma wonii ɗe ngadoo gollal ngal , ma ɗe njahdii heen , ma ɗe mbattindiima ngal .
Ma ɓe kollir toon huunde e mago ngoo kadi e holno ngo fiiliraa .
Ma ɗum won ndeke lebbi men 8 !

Maa mbiyaa hannde ko kikiiɗe
Maa mbiyaa jaaynde ndee , mo woni kala ina foti loggaade e mayre sabu ko nde deftordu wonande janngooɓe e wiɗtooɓe .

Maa won

Maa wood jaabiiɓe mi wonde tumaaji mbayliima , ellee wowlude ɗii konngi koybuɗi ina lomtoo hujja seniika , kono mi ƴettitat tan konngol Moktaar wul Daddaa , e hoore mum , huutortonoo ngam sifaade Muritani : O wi’i ko " Muritani ko Siwis Afrik " .

Maabuɓe njimii no feewi ko goonga kono subalɓe ɓee ne kay ŋaññaaki hiirde ndee .
Maalde Fuutaŋkooɓe e Tuubakiri waawi sete seernaaɓe e almuuɓe e Kasganaaɓe .
Maalde ndee ina jogii dallinannde inniraande : " Deftere haakoore " e nder mayre caɗeele guuraaɗe ɗee kala ina cifee heen , ɗe kollittee ko ardiiɓe leyɗeele men ɗee , mbele ɓeen ina mbaawa wallude ɓesnguuji Afrik e wuurde nguurndam moƴƴam e nder leyɗe men ɗee .
Maale ɓurɗe heewde ɗee ko : maaygol bannge e yeeso , walla terɗe walla nattugol mum en tinde ; ina hasii wona bannge e ɓalndu , ina wona kadi caɗeele haalde ( hunuko nanngee ) , walla yejjitde haala , walla ronkude faamde ; ina waawi wonde kadi ngumndam mbannginteewam walla kuuɓtodinɗam yitere wootere walla bannge nano maa ñaamo , ina wona kadi muus hoore ɓurtuɗo .
Maale ɗee tan njonaani .
Maali ena joginoo ɗaminaare mawnde eɓe njogori taccoyde .
Maali ena yaakorinoo e memlingol Benee e dow Nijeriyaa mbele ena arta e geew .

Maasina
Maasina kañum ko 1810 .
Maataw ko no yeewtere ndee gasiri niih bonni jokkondiraal hakkunde makko e jaayndeeji .
Maataw ni ko ɗuum waɗi Fuutankooɓe heewɓe wonɓe he laamu ene kersiratnoo haalde Pulaar e nder golleeji mum en walla ni kula feeñikinaade wonnde ko Fulɓe .
Maawiiya ena ñoolaa oo sahaa sabu caɗele mum en nder leydi ndii : hare makko e ko wayi no Flam e denndaangal leñol Fulɓe , Iraak wonnoo joŋngoowo makko , fiyaama haa fortii .
Maawiiya fuɗɗi jotondirde e Isra'el ko ballal Espaañ .
Maayde Ustaas kadi ko baasal wonande Pulaar .
Maayde kilinikeere ( mort clinique ) ko maayde e mudda , woni ko mbiyaten faɗɗaade koo , sibu neɗɗo oo ina waawi ɗiftinireede peeje ɗiftingol .
Maayde makko ko baasal mawngal wonande ɓesngu Muritani no diidorinoo , ko baasal wonande fulɓe , ko baasal wonande kadi Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani .
Maayde makko ko jaaya mawɗo no feewi e leñol ngol .
Maayde makko ko ko jaaya mawdo no feewi e leñol ngol .
Maayde ngaanndiire firti ko ngaanndi joom mum nattii gollaade hay huunde .
Maayde ngaanndiire ina teskee so safrooɓe ɗiɗo koolkisiima wonde joom mum nattii tinde muuseeki , so gite mum kaggii , e so terɗe joom mum nattii nootaade .
Maayde tottiranooɗo leydi e mudda so tawii kay ronooɓe makko walla ɓe o hunaninoo dokkal leydi ndi njaɓaani e nder lajal hitaande caggal nde o saŋkii , leydi ndi winnditee e inɗe mum en , kollitaani kadi yiɗde mum en lomtaade maayɗo oo e denndaangal ko farlinoo e mum ko yowitii e tottirgol leydi ndii .
Maayirɗe 1942 , darorɗe 1943 tawi cabbi gorle mbeñtitiima , maalde haɓɓondirɓe ( Alliés en ) , hono Angalteer e Kanadaa e Dowlaaji Amerik Dentuɗi e Riisi uni konuuji " Axe " ( Almaañ e wallidiiɓe mum ko nanndi e Itaali e Japon ) haa ɗiggi .
Maayirɗe lewru fof endi rentatnoo ngam waɗde piye e haalorde ngoƴaaji wuro .
Maayɓe heen njettiima e 176 000 .
Maayɓe keewii baŋ-yoo-baŋ .
Mabbu e Keeleele .
Mack e Jean Boyd ( 2000 ) .
Macron o wiyi : " ɗereeji njuɓɓudi-laamu Farayse nder laamu Sankara e caggal warngo makko maa caakte mbele jiɗɗo fof ina ni yiya , fawaade he ɗaɓɓaande ñaawooɓe Burkina " .
Macron waɗti heen wiyi " no ñalnde kala , min ngondi ko e yuɓɓo renndo faggudu dowlaaji Afirik Hirnaange ( CEDEAO ) , salaade loppito laamu koninkooɓe mbaɗi Burkina-Faso ngo " .
Madam Soh yettii konngol ngam anndinde yimɓe ɓee puɗɗagol kawgel ngel .
Madiina Fanay e Ñakwar njookiima , ɗawaama hakke mum en jogaade boowal hurum guurwuural hono no eɓɓiraa e laabi e sariyaaji jowitiiɗi heen , haa arti noon e kuule 28 , 29 e 54 dekere 2000-089 mo 17 sulyee 2000 jowitiiɗo e juɓɓitingol jeyi leydi .
Madiina hollii en ko Fuutaŋkaagal daranii .
Madiina jaaraama , Haadi yettaama e Ibrahiima juuraama e darnde mon seedaande e seedtinnde ngam tammbaade demngal pulaar .
Madiina ko jiɗɗo leñol etee ko baawɗo golle mum .
Madiina min beltaniimama .
Mago ngoo soɗii ko he mbaydi filmaaji " Gangster " caltal he nder soɗo " crime genre " walla mbiyen soɗooji baɗtamboniigu .
Mahamadu Isufu wondunoo ko e soknaajo Jaagorgal Geɗe Boowaliije mo Gine Bisaaw biyeteeɗo Sudi Carla Barbosa , wondude e Dr Umar aliw Tuure , hooreejo goomu njuɓɓudi diiwaniiri to CEDA .
Mahata waande ko mooƴu , hoɗi e nder mum ko mooƴu .
Mahde isinaaji walla janngirɗe e cafrirɗe hina saɗi nih , sabu hina naamnii jogogal e ganndal fof , kono ko mahde neɗɗo gollinoowo ɗi oo , ɓuri saɗde , ngam ɗuum naamnii ko jogogal , ganndal e daawal juutngal fof .
Mahde walla mahtaade leñol noon , wonaa ko weeɓi , waɗi noon mahtaade leñol firti ko mahtaade yimɓe , ɗuum noon ko huunde naamniinde muñal , naamniinde pewje peewnitorɗe ( istiraatiiji ) juutɗe .
Mahdi ndi yani , ko heewi ko bonni e galle hee .
Mahdiiji tammbotooɗi ndema ƴellitaaka , ngoodaani ( laabi dewteeɗi , kuuraa , ndiyam e sato njulaagu mbaawngu fooɗtude teelɗuɓe ñamlirooɓe kaalisaaji , wallitooɓe kaɓirɗe karallaagal ndema .
Mahi ngal ko Sileymaani Kan e peeje mum .
Mahi ngal ko hooreejo leydi Senegaal hono Alhajji Makki Sal .
Mahler , gardinooɗo OMS tuggi 1973 haa 1988 .
Mahler daraniima lelnugol " doggol safaara ɓurɗo teeŋtude " caaktangol he hitaande 1977 , doggol 200 safaara beeɓɗo coggu , ceedtanaaɗo moƴƴugol .
Mahngo lillungal kooñollowal ɗeɓata waade ko no seto naange mahorii nii , waɗi ko faandu hakkunde e daso-daso catiiɗo faandu nduu no mbeɗu ni .

Mammadu A Sek ko winndiyanke mawɗo !
Mammadu Abda Mbaay , no o heewnoo noddireede , naati e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani ko e hitaande 1980 , to Nuwaasoot nder peŋgal Yurmmeende to leegal jeegoɓal .
Mammadu Demmba Sih ko neɗɗo baawɗo yiɗde .
Mammadu Demmba Sih yanii tawi wolde ndimaagu joofaani , kono golliima golle pattamlame , ɗaccii geɗe tiiɗɗe , ɗe njuuteendi aduna gasnidtaa momtude .

Mawɓe diiwanuuji Laaw e Ngiril ( Yirlaaɓe-Hebbiyaaɓe ) , tawi nii kañumen ɗiɗo fof naatii e ndeenka tuubakooɓe , kaɓɓondiri e ballal kumaandaŋ tuubaak , mawɗo tata Salnde ( Salnde Tebegut ) .
Mawɓe ina mbiyatnoo ko ɗuum reeni wuro
Mawɓe men ko heen keewi tuugnaade ngam hiisaade mande lewru foti daraade .
Mawɓe men ko heen keewi tuuŋnaade ngam hiisaade mande lewru foti daraade .
Mawɓe men mbiyi : " Woto neɗɗo jaɓ sakkitaade e lahal " .
Mawɓe poti ko heɗaade sukaaɓe haa ngannda muusanɗe mum'en , paandaaje mum'en .
Mawɓe woppuɓe haajuuji e hammuuji , rewɓe hippuɓe barmeeji ene padi haa ngarta nde ndefa kiraaɗe , e sukaaɓe softuɓe wayɓe no noddaaɓe e ko keppannoo tawtoreede .

Mawɗo
Mawɗo Caali kii hono ceerno Ibrahiima hollitii sabaabu denndinɗo ɗoo ɗee jaale .
Mawɗo LFPT wiyi " so Ecopianaaɓe ina njokki huuraade e Tigere , hare nde dartotaako " .

Mawɗo Samba Yomb Giile Mbooc rewi he maɓɓe , woodi heen ɓe o jaggi " .
Mawɗo baɗɗo ɗum oo jaaraama "
Mawɗo gooto ganngo meeɗii wiyde
Mawɗo gooto ina wiyatnoo " Miin so mi hokkaama galle hakkunde gure mi yiɗaa , sibu ɗum ko miin yiyiri gite am ooɗoo nokku laaɗe ina njaha heen " .
Mawɗo gooto wi'i : " Ndeeƴee , taƴre ɓernde alaa , kulol alaa , ngonee jaambareeɓe .
Mawɗo gooto wiyi ko e hitaande 1971 ko ndeen boowal hakkunde gure wayri waɗeede laana , e oon sahaa eɗen nganndi ko ndeen sooño fuɗɗii e diiwaan Sahel , saabii gustagol toɓooji .
Mawɗo hilifaaɓe ( premier ministre ) ina foti wonde mawɗo guwarnama tigi rigi ; o yowitii ko e asaambele ngenndi ; kanko e hilifaaɓe heddiiɓe ɓee , ko ɓe njuɓɓudi bannge , ndi jiidaa e hooreejo leydi jogiiɗo kam ne mbaawkaaji mum e wellitaare mum heeriinde .
Mawɗo leloo yiya , cukalel daroo yiyataa .
Mawɗo leydi Farayse , hono Nikolaa Sarkosii yilliima ɓesnguuji wonnooɓe e laana kaa to boowal diwooje Ruwaasii ( Pari ) .
Mawɗo leydi Muritani nde ari ƴamde lefol laamu , ari tuubanii ɓaleeɓe woykinii ( bojji jiɗɗo humtude haaju mum e nder wuro Kayhayɗi ) , kono ɗiin bojji ngonnoo ko haa mi laamoo mi waɗa ko weli mi .
Mawɗo leydi ndii felliti ittude hoolaare mum e Zeydaan ko e lewru Duujal 2008 .
Mawɗo mo golle mum ɓuri heewde e haala , ngaddu ɗen , tawi e jaati ko kanko laaɓani en reedu o jonni en huunde ( jubbannde ) e nguurndam makko , oon woni Ceerno Aliw MBAALO , yo Geno ɓooynu mo e jeese men .
Mawɗo soodaani ganndal , ɓooy wuurde !
Mawɗo tuddunde Daŋana tintinaa ɗum .
Mawɗo wuro oo waɗii ciimtol tolno hojomaaji 10 .
Mayram Sankara noon jaabtii mo wiyi , tawaaɗo e mo tawaaka fof ko warɓe koye tan .

Mbaaroodi ubbat .
Mbaasen tan wiyde alaa e sago o waɗa tan o waɗa ko njiɗ-ɗen koo e no njiɗir-ɗen nih tawa alaa fof to paw-ɗen ɗum .
Mbaasen yejjitde hakkunde peɗeeli e cegeneeji e feɗeendu wordu nduu .

Mbaawka makko , kam e humpito makko to bannge diine , e ganndal aadee ina seedtaa
Mbaawka makko hoɗdu addanii hay ɓe njeyaaka e Muritani heɗotonooɓe jeewte makko teskaade mo .
Mbaawɗen ko foɗondirde jaagorɗe , mbaawɗen ko haasidaagal .
Mbaawɗen ko woyde maayɗo , fiilde ɗuum lefol teddungal tawa maayii .
Mbaawɗen wiyde tan ko eɗen njoortanii-mo wonde juulɗo no kala ɓiyɗo Pullo ni , kadi golle makko ko ɗuum tinndini .
Mbaañ ina nanndi e Lewru to bannge gasɗe , jooli , ina nanndi e Leydi to bannge weeyo , e lare leydi , woni boorɗe ( mboorkaaji ) , jolɓite/jooli ( rifts ) , leslesi , tule ceene , ekn .
Mbaaɗen ko no ɓe ciftortaa hay huunde nii , sibu duuɓi keewɗi jooni , njeñtudi bakkaa ko nii tan wayatnoo , walla nii ko jaasi njeñtudi hikka ndii , yeru he 2019 ko 7 , 26% wonnoo , he 2017 ko 7 , 95% .

Mbele Allah wiyaani , e aaye 13 simoore 49 Quraana tedduɗo oo " Eehey mon yimɓe , Min tagii on ummoraade gorko e debbo , min mbaɗi on leƴƴi leƴƴi mbele nganndondiron .
Mbele Internet gratuit ne woodi Internet taw hay mbuuɗu a yoɓaani nde welmaa fof ene weldu maa fof .
Mbele Muraitani so rimɗii foti ñaantoraade ko wutte mum capataagu , ɗuum firti wonde leydi safalɓe gila to pinal haa e ɗemngal e kala maandeeji ( symboles ) mum ?
Mbele aɗa sikki jawdi tan yoni ngam heɓde mbelemma aduna ?
Mbele aɗa waawi qiimanaade en to bannge ceede fere nawaale gabbitinaaɗe heen ɗee haa safrirde ndee waawi gollaade ?
Mbele baɗoowo ko moƴƴi ina foti sabbaade heen njoɓdi ?
Mbele en cikkaani , ɓuri heewde e leñol hee ko " ndaaree kam , keɗo-ɗee paykaaji am , tinee kam , toownee kam " .
Mbele en laati heɓaaɓe njejji-jejjitooru walla en ŋakka ceeɓndam haa muɓɓiɗen yeeso ɗee jeertinooje ɗe ndee neegre e golle ƴiiƴiije ɗe ngee tooñannge limtantee , gila boom nde nge woni e daawal magge leefngal ?
Mbele en ngoppidtu golle men fof masiŋaaji , hay ɓurɗi faayodinɗi ɗii ?
Mbele en njokkat e woyde , saɓɓitaade , haamtaade walla woytanoyaade jogiiɓe haa juuji ɓurɗi tiiɗde ɗumen , ɓeen ɓe tinaani mette men sabu mumen jogaade haajuuji ɓurɗi jolal waalo e jannje jeeri .
Mbele en tafat hakkillaaji ɗi ngonaa ɗi aadee en , ɓurtotooɗi en heewde , baawɗi janngo e jam ɓurtaade en ƴoƴde , keɓtooji golle men fof ?

Mbindito ɗaa ( cree compte )
Mbindito ɗaa ( cree compte ) So gaynii hankadi , defte ɗee maa njaltu , heddii tan ko njiilo ɗaa ko welmaa fof on njaaraama .
Mbinnden alkule he ɗemngal Ilo .

Mbiy-mi njanngen !
Mbiy-moo-mi noon , mi
Mbiy-ɗen ko golle e dow balle , kaaldigal , nonondiral e dow paamal e peewal .
Mbiy-ɗen nde yiytaa ko 23 Siilo e hitaande 1930 ; ɗum firtata ko gila nde yiytaa fayde hannde ( 2005 ) , wonaani tawo hitaande e dow mayre ; ɗum firtata kadi gila nde yiytaa , nde suwaa tawo taaraade naange haa nde arta ɗo nde yiyanoo e hitaande 1930 ɗo .
Mbiyaa-mi ko a jaggal ( tigi-rigi ) daraniingal jaŋde he nder ɗemɗe neeniije , haa teeŋti e Pulaar .
Mbiyat-mi tan ko aduna oo daɗoyii ( woɗɗoyii ) , kono enen ko en heddiiɓe caggal , alaa e sago ngollo-ɗen , njannginen sukaaɓe gaynuɓe jangde waɗde eɓɓaaɗe jeñcinooje , kollen ɓe laawol ngol .
Mbiyatee mi ko Katante leñol Kan mo Aañam Yeroyaaɓe .
Mbiyaten tan ko yo Geno yurmo mo , yaafoo mo , kanko e denndaangal maayɓe juulɓe .
Mbiye-ɗaa yo a wiltu deftere ndee .
Mbiyen ene gasa kono ndeen kóŋnguɗi baaɗi nii fóf keewat taƴe tawa noon alaa ko ɗeen taƴe mbaylata e njaŋngiin e maanaa majji .
Mbiyen gila ñanlde go'o lewru desammburu 2008 , Makki Sal sosiino lannda mum , kono gila ndeen ha jooni o heɓaano kayit makko .
Mbiyen jaŋde ɗemɗe kuutorɗe .
Mbiyen kanko woni Muritaninaajo gadiiɗo wallifaade pefol he ɗemngal Farayse .
Mbiyen ko jooni fuɗɗii .
Mbiyen tan ENA ina waɗi catal toppitingal ɗemɗe , kono noon ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( pulaar , sooninke e wolof ) ngalaano heen ; wonnoo heen tan ko arab , farayse egele ekn
Mbiyen ɗi ngalaa hakkillaaji , ɗi mbaawaa fewjude , ɗi mbaawaa miijaade !
Mbiyno-ɗen ko henndu ndimaagu wuttii , jooni wontii mobbooru ndimaagu .
Mbiyɗen wiyde ana haala golle ceerno men Murtuɗo wayi ko no wiyde ena dawra horsude maayo tawa woni kaɓirgal mum ko wujo .
Mbiɗa anndi won ko ñalalpural haalan maa , miin tan arii e duunde ndee .
Mbiɗa fadi ha ngaraa mi yaafno ma , mi habrumaa ndennden ndeen weltaare .
Mbiɗo anndin maa kadi , hoto hay huunde
Mbiɗo anndunoo ɗo e Siñcaan hoɓɓe men ngaanataa .
Mbiɗo duwanoo jinnaaɓe sankoraaɓe ɓee , nde Allah yurmotoo ɓe yaafoo ɓe , barmuɓe ɓee yo Allah rokku ɗumen cellal .
Mbiɗo heddoraa hitaande wootere mi waɗa bak .
Mbiɗo hokka on yeru e maabuɓe .
Mbiɗo ruttoo wiyde , nguun jangu wonaa e nder leydi ndii waɗi " .
Mbiɗo sikki ko kaŋko wari nooro oo'' .
Mbiɗo sikki mi yejjittaa .
Mbiɗo teskii kala dewnooɗo e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar , miijo muuɗum , e ngaddiin muuɗum , no lelnirta haala mum , heddiiɓe ɓe hay gooto wayaani noon .
Mbiɗo wasii yo en tiiɗno , yo njanngu , kala mo jaŋde daɗi yoo tiiɗno e peeje mum e peccorɗe mum wooda ko waawi , nde wonnoo meccal ( gollal ) wonko ko nafata .
Mbiɗo wiꞌee ko koɗo .
Mbiɗo yaha to laamɗo mbele yoɓa mi ko joganii mi ko .
Mbi’i-ɗen Modiboo Keytaa jibinaa ko ñalnde 4 lewru korse 1915 to Bamako Kuraa hanki wuro laamorgo Sudaa Farayse kadi o heɓii jannginde e ngal ɗoon leegal ɗo o waɗi cukaagu makko , baaba makko ko Daba Keytaa , neene makko ko Faatumata Kamara .
Mbo ine loppitana ngatam ko maa ƴeeŋa .
Mboombiri noon yo o sakkitine cakkitgol makko ko deƴƴude , so o moosii omo yiɗi , kono so o ñirɓinii yeeso , firti ko o yiɗaa , ina waawi sabbeede seeɗa , so hawrii he gorko mo heñaaki no feewi .
Mboomri ndii foti ko ñaanteede no laamdo nii , so gasi siŋke kaŋŋe haa yooɗa .
Mborosaaji goɗɗi ina ngoodnoo bayɗi no COVID-19 ganndiranooɗi ko wayi no Kornawiris 2 maa SARS-CoV-2 .

Mboɗo anndi kadi holi
Mboɗo anndina mo tawo , ngalɗoo naamndal ko naamndal keewngal faayiida etee ngal ɓooyiino naamndeede e sahaa ɓennuɗo goɗɗuɗo to leyɗeele tuubakooɓe ( leyɗeele nasara en ) .
Mboɗo heewnoo nannde " fulɓe , alaa ɗo kawrata , so wonaa e woto kawren " .
Mboɗo jogii heen weltaare e coftal sabu nde ummatoo-mi galle amen hay dara mi anndaa e ñootol , hannde noon alhamdulillahi , mi waawii ñootde kala ko weli-mi , ɗum kadi mboɗo ñaagoo nde heblooji ɗii njokkata haa ɓura ɗoo .
Mboɗo jogii ngalu .

Mboɗo sikke , emin keelɗunoo e ndeen winndannde .
Mboɗo sikki , ɓesnguuji ɗii nattii jaɓde laamuuji canndolinɗi .
Mboɗo sikki min ngollii ko mawni e ko himmi e yerɓinde laamu Taayaa .
Mboɗo teskoo haa jooni to cuuɗi amen Juude Jaaɓi , ndeen min tolniima e naatde njanngu Baa Mboɗo teskoo haa jooni to cuuɗi amen Juude Jaaɓi , ndeen min tolniima e naatde njanngu Baaba am noddi min , min ngari min kofii yeeso makko , o wi’i : " Njiɗ mi ko naatnude on jaŋde go’to e mon fof yoo haal ko yiɗi janngude , so Farayse walla Quraana , kala noon ko cuɓi-ɗon yoo taw oɗon mbaɗtina heen .
Mboɗo waawi sifaade laaɓngol makko reedu e golle ɗe o gollantonoo leñol ngol .
Mboɗo waawnoo ɓeydude heen dartiyankooɓe ɗiɗon wayɓe no Soñaan Mammadu Abuu lollirnooɗo Aali Soñaan mo Haayre Golleera e Sal jibiriil Zakariyaa mo Haayre Mbaara .
Mboɗo waɗa eeraango feewde e ɓiɓɓe
Mboɗo weltii e garɗo oo , mboɗo bismoo-on kadi .
Mboɗo wiya yo ɓe njokku tiiɗnaare sabu wuro ɓamtortoo ko hono ngal kawral .
Mboɗo woondira Allah kadi mi hulaani sabu mi yanataa heen woondoore , kala nde neɗɗo moƴƴini haaju mo o tagraa oo , tagɗo mo oo moƴƴina e makko kala haaju goɗɗo mo o immanii .
Mboɗo yaafnoo denndaangal pergitte tinaaɗe walla taataaɗe ɗe gooto e fedde ndee waɗi , tuggude e miin hoore am , haa heɓi kodda fedde ndee , foti noon ko e haala walla ko e baɗe .
Mboɗo yahra hannde e duuɓi 70 , arde-mi hannde mi hawra e ɗee geɗe , ɓuri-mi hannde weltaade tan ko maayɗo ina naati aljanna !
Mboɗo yananaa hay bandiraaɓe men heewɓe wonɓe e bannge worgo ko woƴaabe hono mayre .
Mboɗo yenanaa , so hawriino e faamde e harolliɗde e miijtaade e udditaare , dingiral ina waawnoo wallude diine faameede e saraade tawi wosteede nde jolaani heen .
Mboɗo yetta hoddiiɓe amen safalɓe , ko ɓiɓɓe yummiraaɓe amen ɓe min njogodii koɗdigal moƴƴal " .
Mboɗo yetta ndee darnde maantinnde nde njogi-ɗon .
Mboɗo yetta terɗe fedde ndee e kuuɓal , dariiɗe gila e fuɗɗorde haa e woortorde haa ko dañaa koo waawi dañeede e dow deeƴre e kisal .
Mboɗo yimana worɓe sahre am .
Mboɗo ƴetta kadi njettoor keeriiɗo ɓesngu Siñcaan Njaakiri e kuuɓal , debbo mum e gorko mum , suka haa e mawɗo , jaɓɓinooɓe miijo ngoo gila e koyɗe gule , ndarii darnde laaɓtunde haa wonani min teddungal e nder winndere .
Mbunndi mbunndi dingiral wonaa waɗde cangarte : ko to dingiral neɗɗaagu e neɗɗaagal fuutanke mahetenoo .
Meer Boode Laaw , Aliyuun Joop ƴetti konngol , bismii yeewtiyanke oo e hoɗɓe arɓe ɓee bismaango fayngo .
Meer nokku oo wullii yo faabe , sibu ina huli yo a taw wonaa " paawngal Caaɗngol Rift " , ñawu ngu laamu nguu wiynoo wontaa heɓto hay gooto , caggal nde ngu yooɓii pittaali yimɓe tato , rarwane .
Meer oo holliri weltaare mum , anndiniɓe ma o nanngan ɓe .
Meer oo wiynoo : " ko ɗemngal woni kaɓirgal dowrowal jaŋde .
Meer Ɓoggee Hammadi Haasamiyyu Jah e hoohooɓe mawɓe e yontaaɓe heewɓe nootitiima e ooɗoo ndaja .
Meeriiji ɗii tawtoraama joɗle ɗee rewrude he diisneteeɓe mum en ( konseyeeji ) , huniiɓe saaktude dallinannde ndee .

Meeɗii waɗde suka gorko gooto koɗnooɗo e nder reedu Fuuta .
Meguett a invité les députés à contribuer à l’trou de la débat excellence connu 2022-2023 qui sera cordiale vendredi autrui à 10 heures .
Mejaaji e pèlerinage adunyankooje neeɓii tuumude Gereesi salanagol ɗannniyannkooɓe ɗaɓayɓe ka fattoo e nder dental Erop .
Merkajee ɗaɓɓiri mo janngingol , o jaɓi , waɗi ɓataake , o ƴettaa jannginoowo .
Meŋkelde ko 28 garaam ) .
Meɗen e nder suudu wi’eteendu Circonscription Marinier ( wuro ndarndorgo , ko ndu jaɓɓotoondu sukaaɓe dartanrtooɓe e laawi ɗii .
Mi
Mi .
Mi Liggiima TAKRAF fedde Almaañ to Nuwaadiibu wonande Fedde SNIM 2012 .
Mi Liggiima e Fedde PFI wiɗito Karallaagal puɗi demeteeɗi ɗi ngannduɗaa ene kuutoree to bannge ngalu e jeyli Wuro Pirmasens 2009-2010 .
Mi anndaa baajotooɗo mo , kono huunde fof moƴƴi woppeede ko gila nde weli ndee , woni woppirde teddungal .
Mi anndaa ko saabii ɗum !
Mi anndaa ko waɗi ñalnde heen , mi huɓɓaani
Mi anndaa ko yiɗde tineede walla ko yiɗde liggaade e ɓadaade renndo ngo ?
Mi anndaa nii nde naat-mi heen .
Mi anndondiraani e Alajji Njaay , kadi gite amen meeɗaa laaɓdude nay , kono miɗo yenanaa won ɗo o wallata fulɓe bannge goɗɗo tawa en kumpitaaki .
Mi bonnii aduna ɓesngu am .
Mi daaranii ɓe ko woni hookre , kadi ko anndanta nayi hookde .
Mi danyii fartaŋŋe janngude penti makko ɗiɗi Ɓii Tato e Tenngaade !
Mi dartaaki , njokku-mi , njah-mi Jakao ƴettude haalannde mawɗo Biraam Senngoor , mo baaba mum ine wiyee Mbap jeyaa e waranooɓe he ngoo warngo bonngo , mo o meeɗaa seerde e ɗaɓɓude ɓamtugol mum .
Mi duwani-maa ma " , o jaggi mo , fooɗi mo nder , mutni mo nder maayo .
Mi duwaniima Besngu nguu kala , kam e denndaangal bandiraaBe , ngati sunaare ndee ko renndaande .
Mi duwanimaama aan e vikkeon neene ma en fof .
Mi duwii ma yoo toon won fooftorde makka , Geno rokka en rontude mo .
Mi duwiima e berndam .
Mi duwiima yoo Allah 6eydu GANNDAL , hebbina hona ma en .
Mi e am duwawuuji maa payi .
Mi ejaani ko koli .
Mi faamaani !
Mi faamii Huunde kam , kala jiilotooɗo diimaajo haa yotti nooro yoo nanngu tiiɗa .
Mi fiilii leppi ɗiɗi .
Mi firaani nih e Almaa , ko noon tan nawir-mi Ambassade Almaañ piranmoo-mi Eɓaande ndee .
Mi fottii e tuubako gooto ina jeyaa Españ gila e hitaande 1993 to wuro Nuwaadibu .
Mi fuɗɗiima gollaade e lowre heeriinde tawa ko ɗiin eɓɓooji tan ngonata heen .
Mi fuɗɗinooma jaŋngude e winndude e Pulaar kono noon yahraani yeeso .
Mi gasnataa ngoo seedtaango tawa mi huccinaani jaaroore am heeriinde e ceerno Bookar Aamadu Bah .
Mi gasnira konnguɗi am ɗii , wonde neɗɗo ko haaju mawɗo tagiraa .
Mi gaynira wiyde on yoo Alla wallu .
Mi haalaani golloraade ɓernde .
Mi haalaani hono defte jippinaaɗe ɗe , ko nanndi e Islaam .
Mi haalataa goomuuji rewɓe cosaaɗi e gure Fuuta , ɗaccooɓe worɓe mum en njaha e alaa e sago waaldoyde e gardeeɓe safalɓe , etee kala heen jontaaɗo mo araani , ko galle mum en fof leptatee !
Mi haaɗaani ɗoon , sibu , nde ngardii-mi kabaruuji to Tfm , ɓur-mi weltaade fof ko nde pellit-mi bismaade , e ballal Doktoor Jaalo Joop , daartiyanke biyeteeɗo Armelle Mabon , he surnaal 20H , ngam artande en he warngo Tirayeer Senegaalnaaɓe to tuddunde Caaroy .
Mi hettanee wutt mi doga mi sooroo nder ladde .
Mi heɓaani jokkondirde e maɓɓe sabu tampere jolande tawanooɓe hiirde ndee fof , kono miɗo laaɓaa weltaare e mette koɗdi e nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe hannde ; weltaare suɓeede e nder yontaaɓe , mette yiyde ko weli ena gasira nih !
Mi heɓiino wiydemo mbele miɗo waawi holtide Pulaar Speaking fiyaaku defte ɗee min ƴeewa so ɓeen ene njaɓe muulde ɗum , e so ɓe njaɓii mbele kanko ne omo jaɓa jebbildeɓe defte ɗe​ ?
Mi heɗiima gaaci Afriknaaji keewɗi kadi ceertuɗi nooneeji , kono won ko woni e ɓawɗi e sabareeji Hiirnaange Afrik , e yakawere ndee , ko ene so’a naɓayankaagu ɗo am ɗo .
Mi heɗoo soññaango fori ngoo .
Mi horiima goongɗinde sabu ɓernde ndee
Mi inna ɗoo Njuɓɓudi ngam laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( innateendi OLAN ) .
Mi jaabiima hay gooto hollaani ɗoo seytanaagal , gooto kala haali ko ko miijii .
Mi jaaboo : hol meeɗo teɓɓitaade fayi hedde lewru !
Mi jaarii kala dillunooɗo he ndee ustaare nde leñol ngol kala renndi , kadi mi duwiima nde Geno moƴƴinta jaaƴnde makko kaŋko e maayɓe Fulɓe e maayɓe juulɓe kala .
Mi joofantaako ma hay fedde wootere nde pot-ɗaa tawtoyde .
Mi joofnira woytaango ɗaɓɓude ñaawoore nuunɗunde wonande boomaaaɓe e ŋañaŋañalde e kitaale niɓɓe e daartol men .
Mi joopaaki hay gooto , kono alaa mo ngoppu-mi ; moni kala ɗo yiytii hoyre mum ɗoo , yoo anndu ko ɗoo foti daraade , daroo darned mum ha timma .
Mi jooɗoo ?
Mi jumpataa e tiguuji joolaaɗi e mayo , sukaaɓe wujjaaɓi , mbɗtoyaa maccuɓe .
Mi laaɓndi moomo ko haɗimo nawde ɗe ARED ɓeen muula ɗum ?
Mi laɓɓitinaama tawa darnga daraaki " .
Mi lelnii peeje gollondiral to bannge ganndal e kippuuji winndereeji keewɗi , mi wallitii kadi heblo faatungo e njiylawu .
Mi liggiima ALS to Nokku TASIAST 2013 , Fedde ANED 2013 .
Mi liggiima e Fedde DIMA wuro Manhaam Ko abbitii he wiɗto ngalu wonande Pelle Almaañ gonɗe Farayse , Siwis e Almaañ 2010-2011 .
Mi liggiima e cañirgal duuɓi 47 .
Mi maayii , mi waasii nguurndam am !
Mi malla heen jom ↠gacce seɗa
Mi meeɗaa yiꞌde lekki jaaɓi ina samma hoore mum .
Mi meeɗii jooɗodaade e ceerno Saydu Kan batu to wuro ena wiyee Orliyaa ( Orléans , Farayse ) .
Mi neldii-mo imeel ngam naamnaade yoo deeƴnu ɓerɗe amen omo hisi .
Mi noddii haa mi tampii , kono mi hevaani , heen gootol nih ko e noddirgel Sammba Teeraa wonnoo .
Mi refta heen waylaaka hay sinno ko e disndondiram wonaa "
Mi rippa seeɗa e ɗum ɗo .
Mi rokka ɗum e yeru , " mbela neɗɗo wonata koko jaggi woni koo , walla wonata koko foti wonde koo ?
Mi salmini kala bi owo bimi a bimami guila hiir nagué ha founnagué reewo a woorgo .
Mi salminii-ma .
Mi siftina kadi ko o
Mi siftina on wonde Iddawayesh en ko pecce ɗiɗi : Abbakaak en ( woni baaɗi ) e Sharaatiit en ( woni powbi ) .
Mi sikkaani .
Mi sikkaani kadi so Alajji Njaay ena waawi yerondireede e Sammba Juulde nde wiyi yoo wolof janngine alaa e sago e mbertaandi leydi ndii e kuuɓal .
Mi sikkaani so tawii neɗɗo mo waɗaani ko njiɗɗen koo fof tan mbaɗten ɗum gaño !
Mi sikkiino nii ko miin o mallata , nde tawnoo njeyaa-mi ko e sikkooɓe ko ngenndiyankooɓe ɓee , walla yiɗɓe wiyeede noon ɓee .
Mi suusaa nii haalde ko fayti e leydi ndogoori 106 200 km e waktu !
Mi suusaano haalde hay e nder renndo .
Mi takkaama haala ka mi meeɗaa haalde , njowitiika e kewkewe muusɗe baɗnooɗe e leydi men e hakkunde Senegaal e Muritani .
Mi tinaani nii hiirii , no heewi waade so neɗɗo fottii e neɗɗo baaɗo no makko nii .
Mi tonngira siftinde , ko hikka woni gadanol ko jaayndiyankooɓe Fooyre Ɓamtaare ene tawtoree ngel kawgel .
Mi totta heen yiyannde am : Kala mawɗo lannda Senegaal , mawɗo fedde haɓantoonde ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ngenndiiji Afrik e pelle daraniiɗe yooltude jojjanɗe aadee he winndere ndee yoo jooɗodo e gollodiiɓe mum mbele tonngol kala dental ena heɓee , ɗum rentinee ɗo gootel .
Mi ummiima ,
Mi waawataano janngidde e rogere nde njahdat-mi nde .
Mi wallitii lelnugol feere yiytirde wirisaaji ngam toppitagol e dewindagol ñawɓe VIH wonɓe e safraade , kam e compugol nokkuuji baajagol e ƴeewndagol bellitangol VIH .
Mi welitinooma e ko ɓe njoftanii kam koo .
Mi weltaniima kala bi Pullo gondo do e Amerik ha tenti non e Muritani najo .
Mi weltanike on fota wonaa seeɗa .
Mi weltii ma jonnde Belsik nde no feewi .
Mi weltiima he golle maa .
Mi winndiino heen miijo am nana ɓooya seeɗa .
Mi wiyaani noon dawriyankooɓe , ɓeen ene njogii ɗo tijjaa , kono won ɗo eɓe noddee ɓe pergitat en tan , kono ɓe mballataa .
Mi wiyii no on naane , geɗe keewɗe eɗen mbaɗa ɗum , so en naamndaama mbiyen en nganndaa walla eeh !
Mi wiyiino on , mi reftaninoo ma on , Waalo maa seertii e Tararsa , maa heddiima wiiɗnde " .
Mi wiyino ma tan ma mi fiyre ko wonaa junngo am .
Mi wonaa waliyyu deh , kono e nder luggere ɓernde am , ɓur-mi sikkude tan ko Bonngo ko maayɗo !
Mi woyii hoore am e oo jamaanu , Jamaanu pinal e ɓamtaare , Jamaanu GANNDE KESE e PULAAGU , Jamaanu ɗo ɗereeji juddu e paas poor mbinndaa e PULAAR , Jamaanu ɗo biyeeji abiyonŋ mbinndaa e PULAAR , Jamaanu ɗo compte bancaire uddittee e PULAAR , Jamaanu ɗo credit carte huutortee e PULAAR , Jamaanu ɗo koriimi winndude innde am e PULAAR , jamaanu mo ngoy-mi hoore am .
Mi yaawaani tin'de kabaaru o .
Mi yahat too maayo too ƴoogoowde .
Mi yahii Gammbi e Muritani Caggal Duunde Afirik , mi yilliima Almaan e Belsik e Farayse e Italiya e Angelteer Mi suwaa yillaade Amerik kono so Alla jaɓii ma , ma ɗum ar .
Mi yahii haa mi tampii .
Mi yejjitaa abada ndee feere " .
Mi yejjittaa kadi kaawu am Umaar Hammaat Saar , Saalum Hammaat Saar ; on njaaraama , on nduttaama duwaawu yoo ñamaande juut yoɓaaka .
Mi yejjittaa ɗee kitaale bonɗe bonnuɗe .
Mi yettii gardiiɗo jaaynde ndee e denndaangal goomu winndooɓe ɓee , njettoor teeŋtuɗo feewde e janngooɓe maa soodooɓe jaaynde ndee : Ko ɓeeɗoo fof nguurni jaaynde men fooyre .
Mi yiyani mi nanani Demba ina wiya ko boni wala ina amba Baba é fijirde nde .
Mi yiyii , so sukaaɓe ina ngawtoo filmo ngam yeeɓoyde ɗum , ko maa ɓe pada fotde waktuuji keewɗi , nde filmo oo gasa tellaade .
Mi yiɗaa haalde ɗum no feewi sibu won etotooɓe waylude geɗe ɗe " .
Mi yondinoo ɗoo tan , hay sinno woɗɓe hono maɓɓe ene ngoodnoo tigi e nder renndo ngoo , tee woɗɓe kadi ene goodi haa jooni " yoo Alla ɓooynu ɓe e jeese men " .
Mi ŋabba e Haayre Yulnde .
Mi ɓadtinanno ɓe warqa e suukara tan , miin mi ƴetta leeso am , mi joñoo haa woodi wiyɓe mi yo mi anndu sukaaɓe ɓee kiirdata ɗoon ko sabaabu nde am .
Mi ɓooyii eraade yo goomu sose sabu gooto fof ena fooɗira baŋnge wonaa ko nawata-en yeeso .
Mi ɓuura wutte walla tuuba .
Mi ɗeɓii wiyde tiiɗɓe koye .

Mide rooko pulaaku faa handen tinnode nanguduren faa wooda noon watta de pulaaku yaara yeeso .
Miicto heen
Miijannde tuuginnde e humpito Pelle ɗe ngonaa laamu garatnooɗe wallitde Afrik e Asi e Amerik latineejo , yanti e humpito " safrooji mamdiiɓe " ( médecins aux pieds nus ) sinuwaa en .
Miijo Aali Yero Joob wonnoo ko tuubnude hay tuubakooɓe katolik en , adduɓe soɓe dow leydi Fuuta .
Miijo adano ngoo ummorii ko he Ceerno Aliw Yero Joob dowlirɗo Kaɓoowo e baasal cippiroowo e humambinnaagu , ɗanniyanke jooɗiiɗo to leydi Farayse .
Miijo am ko yo en njuurnito no feewi hol ko addani pulaar ɓitteede e Senegaal e hol no renndo men yaltirta e ndeen ɓittere .
Miijo am ngoo tuugnii ko e geɗe jiytiniiɗe , ɗe kumpitii-mi gila haŋki , kam e kabaruuji ɗi keɓ-mi , ummoriiɗi mi banngeeji fof .
Miijo amen ko taƴtinanooɓe moritaninaaɓe ina njari e ummoraade e leydi maɓɓe jotondiral " keeringal " , ngonka neema haa teeŋti to bannge muññital kam e jawdi ustooji ko ɓe nguurnoo e tooñannge e oon tuma .
Miijo artii e Falo laamorgo e lummbirde , lummbirde Tufnde Jaawɓe Dinndi , funnaange Tufnde Haaraw .
Miijo laawɗinɓe sariya oo , ko oon jeyi ina heewi soomde ɓurondiral hakkunde yimɓe walla soomde njiyaagu .
Miijo maggel woni tan ko ɗaɓɓude peeje no ngel daɗiri e oo laamɗo bonɗo .
Miijo makko addi wonde ma a taw saabii ɗuum ko ñaamdu maɓɓe tuugii ko e sewo sewo e liɗɗi .
Miijo makko ko fadde haa yeeso nde ɓe puɗɗoo yahde wuro teeru to .
Miijo maɓɓe ko naatnude yowiti oo he neɗɗo ( sibu alaa ko o waɗata aadee ) , nder ñawannde nguɗu ndee e hoore mum : " ɗuum maa bonnu celule ñawɗe ɗee , kadi findina paddorɗe neɗɗo ñawɗo oo , sibu ñawu nguu heewi idoraade ko ɗanninde paddorɗe joomum " .
Miijo militeer en ɓooraaɓe ɓe , ina wayi no yahata ko e ooyde heddiiɓe ɓe e kaalisaaji lomtingol ngol e paasiyoŋaaji alteret .
Miijo ngoo duri , o miijii ko jinne oo wi'inoo mo , o fuɗɗii nimsude .
Miijo ngoo hollitaa , rewrude e Fonadh , GIZ ( Njuɓɓudi balle leydi Almaañ he Muritani ) , ɓe njaɓi wallitde to bannge jolngo e jippinde e ñaamdu e yardu lappol ngol .
Miijo ngoo ina waawi siyide nii
Miijo ngoo ko heblude " gollantooɓe cellal renndo , hellifinde renndooji ɗii e koye mum en , huuɓtodinde paddagol ñawu e naatnude ɓesngu nder golle hee " .
Miijo ngoo ko ñonngude yolnde oto dogata hakkunde gure ɗiɗi .
Miijo tan deftere mawnde , nde ujunere hello ine wili , kelle mum fof ko ceekaaɗe , cilkitaa .
Miijo yimɓe gure ɗee ina waawi tonngaade e ngolɗoo konngol : " ko njiiloytono-ɗaa so arii tawii ma , waɗanii ma sokla maa , tawi ko Alla meho , ko njettoor tan joomum en kaandi " .
Miijo yuɓɓinde ɗee kiirɗe , ina jeyaa heen sikke alaa yiɗde weytinde , kono ɓuri teeŋtude heen ko yiɗde wallondirde e banndiraaɓe awluɓe ngam wuurtinde e ƴellitde ooɗoo fannu kimmuɗo e pinal Haal Pulaar en .
Miijo ɓeeɗoo wurduɓe hannde e gaanooɗe wolde nde ɓe kaanaano anndude , mooftuɓe mette mum en e ɓerɗe ƴeefooje haame , ɓe janngo mum en boni
Miijo-ɗee no feewi hol to ngol konngol ummiii .
Miijo-ɗen , pewjen , penten !
Miijooji makko to bannge politik ngonaano ɓurɗi ŋeerde , kono noon ardiiɓe laamu koloñaal ina tuumatnoo mo wonnde o yiɗaa leydi Farayse , sabu golle makko jowitiiɗe e pelle jooltooje hujjaaji liggotooɓe- sendikaaji- e naatgol makko e lannda Section Française de l’Internationale Ouvriere mo Meeter Lamin Gey ardinoo .
Miijooji maɓɓe haanaani hoto yeebe .
Miijooji maɓɓe kawri e Siidi Eli .
Miijooji ɗi DHSM sakkitta ( cakkitte ) , kam e wasiyaaji waɗata ɗii , ina peccitoo e dame 5 garooje ɗee
Miijtannde yahri kesum , so sifaade lanndaaji renndooji Afirik , gila e hiiɗaaɓe haa e hiiɗooɓe .
Miiktiyankooɓe ɓee ɓeydi heen " so defɗo fawii sahii , heewi nawande ko neene mum , wonaa esum " .
Miin , e miijortooɗo no am fof kam , emin njooɗni ɗum .
Miin , ko kaal-mi ko , ma o ƴeftu ɗoon , kanko ne , o ruttitoo , o innitoo " .
Miin , mboɗo yimana yuwooɓe .
Miin , ngar mi ko lawƴude horde nde neene am totti mi .
Miin , oɗon nganndi jaabawólam : cuɓiimi ko waasde rewde kuulal ngal , mi timmitina ngal .
Miin ?
Miin baaba am sankii ko e yoolayru laana Joolaa ka , ko min ɗiɗo rewɓe e ɗiɗo worɓe , baaba am woppidii min galle mo mahaaka ( terrain ) .
Miin cikkatnoo mi ko bayɗo no oo lawake , so darnii Tele e nder leydi Senegaal , so Pulaar , ɗemngal makko ngal o muuyni ngal , so wonaani arɗo e jaagaraf , fotaani wonde jogo comci , tekkoowo roondotooɓe e nder oon galle biyoowo fannorii ko ɓamtude pine senegaalnaaɓe e kuuɓal .
Miin cuɓii mi njanngu Quraana , kanko o suɓii jaŋde ekkol Farayse , ɗo Juude Jaaɓi ɗo .
Miin de komi jaŋnginooɗo pulaar tigi noon , mino ɗoo ɗo Espaaña .
Miin deh won ɓe tuummi hay so tuumo ɓolo yahataa jamaa !
Miin dey ko e leydi hee ngonatmi , ndeenat-mi ko ko njeyi-mi ko .
Miin dey mo yahaani fof , mi yehii Mantu hannde hannde !
Miin e Aadama Demmba Njuuk min ɓenni , min ñalloyi Ɓoggee Min eeli naange e Ɓoggee , min payi Guylol , ko ɗoon galle amen daakinoo ena awa e oon sahaa .
Miin e hoore am ko ɗoon ndew-mi , kono haŋkadi mi tawii alla ko nafata waɗtude fulɓe haɓdiiɓe tawa wiyooɓe en njoola en ɓee nana pola , paaynaaka .
Miin e mon ɗo haa yowmal qiyam
Miin e wallondirde e Fedde Ɓamtaare pulaar min mbaɗta heblude ɓe e pulaar , hay sinno o janngunoo ko farayse so o janngii e pulaar o ɓurata heɓindaade .
Miin e yiyannde am
Miin fof e raɓɓiɗde miijo e famɗude ganndal , mboɗo sikki tan so en njiɗaa aduna daɗa en , en mbaylat ngonka men , tellinen kufuneeji men ɗii , gooto e men fof yankinoo , hoddira ko oya ɓuri ɗum .
Miin kaaloowo oo keɓ-mi BAC am ko e ɗemngal Arab , ngam hollirde kala janngoyɗo ndee winndande annda ɓaleeɓe Muritani calaaki janngude e jannginde ɓiɓɓe mumen ɗemngal Arab , kono ina naamndii " hakke " ɗemngal mumen neeniwal haa timma .
Miin kaaloowo oo ko huunde nde laaɓaa-mi sabu mi wonndii e makko suudu wooturu to Afrik Kummba Yumma men .
Miin kam e famɗude ganndal , pinal e humpito , mi sikkiino ko waɗooɓe politik fof o haaldatnoo .
Miin kam mi harii " .
Miin ko heen njeyanoo mi .
Miin ko mi almuudo golloowo binndi e lekɗe he leydi Farayse ko ɓuri hannde duuɓi 25 .
Miin ko mi binndoowo jime e jimɗi Pulaar etee miɗo bismii jokkondiral men ngam cuɓoɓoɗaa heen ko yahdata e golle maaɗa , so a yawaani aan e kala naalaŋke Pullu .
Miin ko mi mbuubu nayeewu , ɓiɓɓe am ena taaroo mi , ena naamndoo mi , hol no mbaɗ-mi haa njuut-mi balɗe !
Miin ko mi mbuubu nayeewu , ɓiɓɓe am ena taaroo mi ena naamndoo mi , hol no mbaɗmi haa njuutmi balɗe !
Miin ko wayi nii bettaano mi hay seeɗa ; so wayaano nii haawa mi ; capaato ko ullundu hay so hajjoyii doombi potaano hoolaade ; capaata ko puuyɗo mo renndotaako !
Miin mbadmi ko rewbe be e koye mumen nawlirta sabu so miin mi resii mi arii e maa tee ada anndi komi desdo a jabii mi resma ; jeewoo o ne jabii joodiima tawadum gorko alaa ko wadi heen .
Miin mbiɗo hulani on leeɓte muusɗe ( 59 ) .
Miin mi heɓaani yiyondirde e makko kono ganndondiral amen waɗii faayiida ; ko e ngaal jokkondiral deftere nde mbinndunoo mi , nde tiitoonde mum woni : " Ɓe njahii , ɓe ngartaani " , heɓi muuleede to ARED ; ko Allah e ŋatgol oo ngenndiyanke e tiiɗnaare mum suba ko maa o jojjini e miñiiko Abdullaay Jool e yiytude to ngon-mi ko ɗuum waawi naamndaade kala .
Miin mo nganndu-ɗa ko miin woni laamɗo duunde ndee , maa mi ummo e geɗe maa .
Miin ndonkumi nih faamde hol ko jeyi sabaabu won e yimbe ina poootta dum e diine .
Miin ne , mi yahii .
Miin ne , ngam yiɗde yoftaade , mberliimi mo ɗo o ɓuri hulde ɗoo .
Miin ne kay won wayluɓe ndenndinmi- mo haa ɓee taƴi noppi makko .
Miin ngartam mum mi heɓii haa gasi so renndo ngoo naftoraade golle ɗee .
Miin njimat-mi ko ko Geloonganaaɓe njimatnoo koo .
Miin noon , Talla , mi wondaani e Sammba e dow wonde teeɗantooɗo daande maa , mbele ina ɗeɗɗu maa , rokketaake ɓoggol dimol , fortanee daande .
Miin noon , so o wiyii omo hirtoo mi , o hirtoto jenngunde .
Miin noon ko he ɓeen njeyaa mi .
Miin noon ko miin e Aamadu Jool njiydi Yumma e baaba go’to kono kadi ko min sehilaaɓe haa ko ɗoon waawi haaɗde ko weeɓaani ko ; sabu yimɓe ina mbaawi jiydude Neene e Baaba tawa ngonaa sehilaaɓe minen noon Allah waɗii ko min sehilaaɓe min ngonnoo .
Miin noon maa mi wiy Fulɓe : ngoppee kala ko wonaa diine njaggon e diine , ɓurana on leƴƴi mon , mbela ko yiilatee e leñol hee koo , na heɓoo .
Miin noon mbiyat mi tan ko : yo on tiiɗno e Fedde nde haa teeŋti noon e darnugol duɗal mbiyɗon ngal , sabu Annebi mo jam e kisal ngoni e mumm won ɗo wi’i : so tawii on njiɗii Aduna njanngee , so on njiɗii laakara , so oɗon njiɗi aduna e laakara ne njanngat .
Miin noon ɓur-mi yahrude ko jimɗi e ngamri gaadanteeji , ko ɗuum kadi mawnintu-mi .
Miin puɗɗorii mi binndugol jime pulaar ko wiyateende DIINE POLOTIK ena hawri e ñalnde 26/05/1983 to wuro am en Aañam Yeroyaaɓe .
Miin so neɗɗo yarii e am mi weltoto .
Miin sumi nde !
Miin sumi ndee ladde reedaande !

Minen , emin ndiddii terorisma .
Minen amin kisna keɓe mon " .
Minen deh ko min dariiɓe , amin eeroo yoo jannguɓe yeebiiɓe pulaar ɓee yoo ngartir hakkillaaji mum'en paama won'de remde ngesa njanana wattinta ta ko e nimsa !
Minen dey ko gaa e Muritani min ngoni , so min ndañii ; amin njiɗi haalaneede hol to lefol ngol waawi dañeede ; sinno ko sago kadi , tawi o waɗi ɗum ko e CD ROM , ɗuum ɓuri hoybude hannde .

Minen ko Diine Lislaam joƴƴini min ɗoo .
Minen lawɓe ko minen cehata boɓi , min ceha lahe , min ceha alluuje e naakaaɗe ekn Ndeke noon lawaagu wonaa sara e karallaagal e ñeeñaagu .
Minen lornooɓe he nder pittali he ɓerɗe amen , he kiɗal koloñaal en , emin mbiya on haŋkati , ɗuum joofii !

Minen ngoni haalooɓe haa nanee tawa golle ngalaa .
Minen worbe haa teengti e sikkoobe ko kanum en Alla wadi doo ngam reende aduna ene cikka ko fuuta buri Senegaal fof ina ndiiwta kala ko iwi bannge goddo ngam beydoo tiidtinde njiimaandi mumen e renndo ngo alaa heen fof ganndudoo no muusalla mon tonnii .

Miɗo anndi tan eɗen poti dartaade !
Miɗo faamnoo darnde ngenndiyaŋkooɓe ndee ko haannde , kono ko mi kuminooɗo he binndi ɗemngal am Pulaar .
Miɗo golloo heen kono alaa e ɓoggi saka goɗɗo yiya nde .
Miɗo goongɗiɗi haa jooni kala mo harlitaaki gollanaade leñol mum , alaa ko mbaaw-ɗen e mum hay baɗte !
Miɗo hebii e wallondireede e ɗuum so Allah jaɓii ;
Miɗo heewi heɓde naamne ɓaɗte mum , kono yaajeende alaa ngam haaldude e mokala .
Miɗo heewi wiyde " fenaande ena yaawi koyngal , kono suusaa yolnde " !
Miɗo hulnoo leeltude haa fuɗɗoo sabu ko w18 : 30 wiyanoo , kono hay gooto alaa nder so wonaa heblooɓe kaɓirɗe e yuɓɓinɓe hiirde ndee !
Miɗo janngina to Duɗal Jaaɓi-haaɗtirde , miɗo siimta mawmawu miɗo hoolii hoore am haa ɓurti Sara maa , mi janngii ñeeñal binndol , mi janngii ɓure waawde heɗaade , mi faamii haawtaare ko wasu , mi faamii ɓure muñondiral , e luggeendi yankinaare , nuunɗangol fiɓnde , yiɗde janngondirde , kono ko ɓuri teeŋtude fof , mi faamii maanaa helmere Nuuñɗal Ceerno am , yo jiidal ñaawe !
Miɗo jeyaa kadi haa jooni e sikkooɓe o ɗanni tan , jooni o arta !
Miɗo joortii ko he men tan caɗeele ɗee keedi to baŋnge njuɓɓudi .
Miɗo laaɓaa enen kala maa en mbelto no feewi sabu ko golle tiiɗɗe mbaɗaa ɗoon .

Miɗo tottira
Miɗo waawi wiyde nii ko kañum tan woni heɗɗaawo wattano reenoowo en e yoorɓerndaagu e fenaande wayloore mbaadi daartol winndere ndee " .
Miɗo wagoo ( ardina miijo ) , tuugnaade he jikku mawɗo budureejo kooniiɗo oo , miɗo wiya maa o duppu yimɓe .
Miɗo weltoroo kadi yiyde woɗɓe renndaaɓe golle suɓiiɓe firtude ngal kanndal taƴowal hakkunde renndo e miijtiyankooɓe , haa ɓeen luutee boowe kareeli renndoyankeeji .
Miɗo wiya on , onon rewɓe hesniiɓe , onon baayeeji , onon mooliiɓe , onon kala hiiɗaaɓe ɓe ndimaagu mum en nuskaa , wonde ko enen ndenndi oo muus .
Miɗo wiya on , onon rewɓe hesniiɓe , onon baayeeji , onon mooliiɓe , onon kala hiiɗaaɓe ɓe ndimaagu mum en nuskaa , wonde ko enen ndenndi oo muuso .
Miɗo wiya on yo en pammin ɓe nganndaano tigilde kelme no ɗum yahrata .
Miɗo woppi
Miɗo wulaa jaw , ɓanndu ena warña .
Miɗo wuurta kala pullo e fuutaŋke yoo taro-nde sabu ko ndee deftere woni seede bonandeeji ɗii .
Miɗo yaakorii tan denndaangal peeje cakkaama ngam anndude saabiiɓe ɗii bonanndeeji ngam siynude e mum en ñaawoore .
Miɗo yahra hikka e duuɓi 61 .
Miɗo yetta-on e darnde nde ndari-ɗon ndee .

Mo Faakuru KhummbaTannjaa .
Mo anndaa to ummii , anndataa to hucci .
Mo anndaa ɗemngal pulaar , so wallitiraama pesooɗe nane , maa faam ko yaawi oo ee ko bellitiiɗo , oya ko teppiiɗo , walla oo ko ŋaaɓiiɗo oya ko dennduɗo !
Mo cooyni-ɗaa heen fof daande mum ina ɗelka kaŋŋe .
Mo dañi cuuraay , fendere e " mendere " , heewaani laawaade .
Mo dogataa , hulataa , yahrataa caggal .
Mo ina " rappa " , yo o naatnu gaaci e hiitooji men e golle mum , o huutoroo yoga e ñaantule men asliyankooje , o ñemmba cummbaali e duƴƴe men , hay so tawii omo abbitoo e ngadduki aduna hannde o , e yiɗde yonta makko .
Mo inni hannde coñce Pulaar kala hakkillaaji Fulɓe fof ngadatoo yahde ko he Alasan Muntagaa Sal ɓurɗo lollirde Demmbel Sal , joom " Ɗam Alla Adii Ɗam Dennde " , go’o e ɗiɗi , joom Dimo e Daw-law , defte jafnirteeɗe sukaaɓe hannde he nder renndo Fulɓe kala ; cuynirteeɗe mette mawɓe , jalnooje , goynooje , kono kadi udditirteeɗe yeewtere , kala ɗo Haalpulaar ndenti .
Mo kaalzaa taanum , tawi wonaa mantugol fof , wiyata ko a ganyo muuzum .
Mo miijotaako fof wiya gila dawaa dawi yimbe ina kaddoo kono hay gooto beedaa yiide heen cadeele ; cadeele meedaani waasde wonde heen heddi kay ko annda nooka no rafiiji keewdi e boneeji konirnoo e aduna tawi njitanaaka hay hay safaara .
Mo nano winndaango .
Mo njiyi-ɗaa fof na turii na jaggi e tiinde .
Mo noddaa e yannge dewgal salii nootoyaade ko aldaa e ngantu , oon woofii Alla e nulaaɗo mum .
Mo o foti welde daande weeɓaani , mo o foti moƴƴude hakkille ina saɗi , sabu wiyaama kala ko o jaŋngi gootol o huñoto .
Mo o woni e pooɗondirde laamu ngun jeyaaɗo e fedde sosiyal-demokratejo , Kemal Kiliçdaroglu heɓii cappanɗe nayi e jeeɗiɗi piccal jeenay .
Mo sellaani oo , ko oon wonnoo baafal kisal laamɗo oo e galle oo fof .
Mo sellaano oo haftii , darii , jaabtii naamnde ɗee .
Mo taariindi oo , tutii lekkie tawtoreede amen .
Mo tafi hoore mum kala ƴeeŋna mbuure .
Mo wiyi Jowol noon , wiya bilbasi , ɗo kew-kewe keewɗe kewnoo e sahaaji maantiniiɗi .
Mo wiyi maayo , inna ɓernde Fuutaaji kala .
Mo wiyi pekaan wiya Gellaay .
Mo woni e maɓɓe fof ina yiɗi lomtaade Alfaa Moolo , baaba mum Muusaa , mawni mum Bakari e Dikkori .
Mo woni fof ne anndi oo ñawu , doktooreeɓe ene ngoondi , kono way gooto mo ena safra oo sukuño , makañoo Goonga won etiiɓe safrude , kono yonaani .
Mo woni kala , nana ñori juuɗe no waawiri e yantude e laamu nguu .
Mo woni kala ina halfinaa geɗal keeringal , yeru ko Alfaa Nuhum
Mo woni kala ko jaroowo ƴiiƴam !
Mo woni kala nana haala , ene noosa no yiyiri nih henna
Mo yarlitaaki ne , hattee , tawde tan bonnanaani leñol ngol hay baɗte , yoo woppe !
Mo yeddi kala yoo yah to Youtube , tappa " yero maama "
Mo ɗigginaani ɗemngal mum , waawataa janngude ɗemngal goɗɗo haa waawa .
Mo ɗum yettii kala ina jogii hakke wullitaade e hilifaaɓe njuɓɓudi laamu walla ñaawirɗe taƴɗe sañ ngam niilnaneede oon dekere walla aretee .
Modiboo Keytaa alla e mum salaade macungaagu ( njiimaandi ) tuubakooɓe pawi e ɓiɓɓe afriknaaɓe , ɓamii haɓeede yoo ɗum nattu gila e 1937 e nder pelle keewɗe hay sinno e oon tuma tuubakooɓe ina kaɗi ɓiɓɓe afriknaaɓe waɗde politik .
Modiboo Keytaa añaani faraysenaaɓe , kono ko neɗɗo caliiɗo macungaagu maa kalifaandi tuubakiri .
Module C ) .

Mohamed Lemin O .
Mohamed Vall ari o wonani ɗum Gardiiɗo kabine hooreejo laamu sabbordu tuggi 2005 haa hitaande 2007 .
Moni fof ene yaha haaju mum , seppooji , jeewte , ɗiɗɗe ekn waɗaama , hay gooto haɗaaka .
Moni kala addori kaɓorɗe mum , ɓee ɗoo buruwetaaji , ɓee ɗaa jammbe .
Moni kala e sukaaɓe maɓɓe ina yiɗi dañde araaraay .
Moni kala ina etoo daɗde ndiyam ɗam .
Moni kala ina foti reende hoore mum reenora hoɗdiiɓe .
Moni kala ina haala ɓela laamɗo ina sikka ko aan wari nooro oo .
Moni kala ina jogii hakke ɗaɓɓude peccitagol leydi ndii .
Moni kala inahuti Ceerno .
Moni kala jignaaɓe mum ene keblano ɗum .
Moni kala yo waɗir no yiɗiri , no waawiri tawa ene tuugnii e doosle leydi ; so wonaa ɗuum laawol yana e mum "
Moo Mboodi Maalik fiila Barak ( tawi tuubakooɓe mbelaaka mo , ɓurnoo yiɗande ko Yerim Mbañik tokooso , kono nelaaɗo maɓɓe , hono Derneville , tardi ñalnde Barak fiiletee ndee ) , kono laamu heddii ko e juuɗe Jommbot e miñum debbo Ndate Yalla .
Moobiboo Keytaa hoyreejo Mali gila 1960 haa heɓi 1968 jibinaa ko ñalnde 4 lewru Korse 1915 e leegal ina wiyee Bamako Kuraa e nder wuro laamorgo leydi ndi , haalooɓe ɗemngal wamarankoore mbi’I Bamako firtata ko Weendu Noodi so en pirii helmere nde e Fulfulde .
Moodi Makam e haaƴorde .
Moodi Muhammad Abdallaahi wiyi mo
Moodibo Aadama , gooto e yahdiiɓe Usmaan Dan Fojo , jooɗii Yola , yaajtini laamu mum haa to fuɗnaange worgo laamlaamu Sokoto e hitaande 1841 .
Moorotooɓe tippa kannjara .
Mooƴu ko haralleeɓe mahngo yuɓɓuɓe , mahrooɓe peeje juumtuɗe : tunelaaji e gudde naatnirɗe henndu , potndirɗe nguleeki e olweende , kuutoragol semmbe e goppe .
Mooƴu ne ko noon tan .
Mooɓe ONG keewɗe caaktii hare fotnde huccaneede he kaa " haala ngañgu nguru ɓanndu " ka Kayis Sayed ɓamti he innde mum .
Mooɓondiral mawngal waɗii hannde 6 lewru 5ɓuru fii joɗɗingol e jollere laamu .
Mooɓondiral winnderewal annduɓe hiisiwal winndunoo e makko " ko o kuɓindiiɗo karalleeje keewɗe , ceertuɗe , wonande hiisiwal kam e pine hiisiwal keewɗe .
Mooɓondiral wonti melɓondire , yimɓe caakii
Moris de Lafos wiɗtii wiɗtooji baɗɗi faayiida .
Moritani fotaani ɗoweede no ɗowretenoo adan nii .
Moritaninaaɓe e ciiri mum en kala kawritii ɗoon ( jaayndiyankooɓe ɗemɗe ɗee kala , sehilaaɓe makko , banndiiko en , yahdiiɓe makko to bannge dawrugol e yiɗɓe tan Kamɓe ɓe kala ceedtiima ( teeŋti heen boom safalɓe ɓee ) " Abdullaay Siree Bah ( ASB ) ko dowrowo he nder jaayndiyankooɓe " sabu kuɓindagol makko kala fannuuji jowitiiɗi e jaaynde , maa wonii winndaande walla jangtaande , tawi ɗuum fof ina yahdi e nuunɗal , goongantaagal e cuusal to bannge miijo .
Morlal filma o ene hollira , wonnde o haalata koko fayti he rafi depression , he nder renndo ngo alanaa nguun ñaw hay innde .
Mosammbik ena paami ko naatnude waɗɗii hannde nde ɓe keɓi fartaŋŋe fof .
Mosku " tintinirii ɗum " Wasinton no haaniri nii ngoo hoolkiso , " fawaade e baɗɗiiɗe binndaaɗe he nder nanondire paatuɗe e geɗe nikleyeer , ndeke ɗum bettaani " , e wiyde jaagordu Amerik toppitiindu konu .
Motaani ko mboɗo limta , sabu enen fof eɗen nganndi ko haɗata ñaamooɓe ñiiri siforaade ɗum " ene wuli , welaani , ko seeɗa te leelii defteede " .

Muhammadu Faalil Sih jibinaa ko 1990 to Beelinaaɓe , nder Muritani
Muhammadu Faalil Sih jibinaa ko ñalnde 23 Siilo ( Janvier ) 1990 he wuro he nder Fuuta Tooro ene wiyee Beelinaaɓe he diiwal Boosoya , walla so tawii ko to feccere njiilgu Muritani ɗo ngo jeyaa hannde ɗoo , mbiyen diiwal Gorgol .
Muhammadu Faalil Sy , Hiisawe .
Muhammadu Faalil walla mbiyen " Pullo Gaynaako , " innde nde o suɓanii hoore makko , woniino toon almuudo teskinɗo sabu makko won’de belɗo hakkille , baawɗo jaŋde .
Muhammed Bello nehi ɓe .
Muhammed Bello sankii e hitaande 1837 .
Muhammed Faal wari baaba mum cawndiiɗo , Eli Jommbot lomtii .
Muhammed Lehbiib hunii wontaa fooɗano laamu Barak kam e ɓesngu mum , haa yetti ɓiɗɓe makko e Jommbot Mbooc .
Muhammed el Habiib adinoo ko wuranaade Kheerfi , nde juuti o fayti e Fara .
Mullaay darni konu ngu 500 soldaat .
Muritani artirii araaraayuuji tati e nder heen mo Bah Mammadu Abdullaay lollirɗo Belee Bah teddiniranoo .
Muritani foti sinkoraade e ñaaƴirde tan ko pinal e ɗemngal Arab .
Muritani foti tan ko ɓoornaade wutte capataagal .
Muritani ko leydi ndi heewaani yimɓe , seeɗa e ngalu irngu eleydi ndii ena waawi hokkude kala muritaninaajo no wuurdi .
Muritaninaaɓe e !
Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe Farayse ɓee tan ina tolnoo e 20 000 haa 30 000 fittaandu , tee , ko 40 tan mbinndittoo ñalnde kala .
Muritaninaaɓe ɓe alaa ko mbiyi , alaa ko mbaɗi njaltinaa leydi mum en .
Murtuɓe ɓe ( Rebel en ) pooli mo , o mooloyii to Ammbasaad Portugaal , caggal ɗum o joñtoyii to leydi Portugaal .
Murtuɗo Joob ene wiyatnoo e nder wootere e jime mum , " polotigi ko pene tigi " .
Murtuɗo daraninoo tan ko jaŋde .
Murtuɗo dariima he leydi Senegaal haa laamu waɗani pulaar seedanteeje keɓtinaaɗe he yonta Mammadu Ndooy .
Murtuɗo ko deftere nde dame ceerɗe : To bannge diine o sifortee ko waliiw suufiyaŋke .
Murtuɗo rokkiino nguurndam mum fof leñol Fulɓe e ɗemngal Pulaar .
Murtuɗo wallii heewɓe haa njaɓanaa moolayru to Orop e Amerik .
Murtuɗo ɗalii sukaaɓe ɗiɗo rewɓe : woni Aysata Murtuɗo e Jeynaba Murtuɗo .
Musdɗo men Abuu Haaruuna Cuun woniino jannginoowo e Eɓɓoore laamuyankoore fannoriinde momtugol humambinndaagu so en kaalii farayse mbiyen ( Projet Alphabetisation Intensif ) .
Musidɓe tedduɓe Fulɓe ena keewi añɓe no feewi , kono hono ɗee geɗe jaasɗe ko Pullo tan waawi waɗude ɗum .
Musidɓe tedduɓe mi yettii kadi kala e mon dariiɗo e waɗtude Pulaar ɗemngal toowngal , coomngal gannde , kadi jahdungal e jamaanu .
Musiɗɗo Yaayaa ɓooyii jokkondirde e men ko fayti e ɗiiɗoo ñalɗi .
Musiɗɗo am gooto , Muktaar Baro , ina jannga Almaañ , o wiyi yo mi ar Almaañ , ko leydi mbaɗndi faayiida .

Mustafaa kañum nana heñioo .
Muttaar nanngi mo artiri mo Laaw .
Muusaa , sofeer oo , hay gooto anndaa to o naati .
Muusaa Sih ne ko koɗoowo ŋanaa .
Muusaa huli , yalti oto oo , roondii juuɗe naati e ladde .
Muusaa ko sofeer belsindiiɗo .
Muuseeki kii tampinii mo no feewi haa o woni e tallaade e leydi .
Muuyo maɓɓe e ndee siifannde wonaa mogginiinde : ɓe njiɗi tan ko momtude haa laaɓa cer pine e ɗemɗe baɗɗe leydi Muritani leydi sammba-ari-ndenndi’en .

NIRCam also defines the difference between the older star populations and dense dust in the core and the younger star populations outside of it .
NIRCam was built by a team at the University of Arizona and Lockheed Martin’s Advanced Technology Center .
NJARU MUM KO 30 MILIYOŊ DOLAAR .
Na piya payka njahra jam jam .
Na'i kaɓɓaama to dingiral , rewɓe ngari ina kuljina , yimɓe fof mbeltii .
Na'i mbaɗtaani yardude laaceeje ?
Naage werlotoo caafe mum cakkitte ɗee , e nder yolnde fotnde hojomaaji 8 caafe ɗe ko laawol ngoni , aɗa ndaarda caafe e mbaydi nange ngee , tawa noon yumma oo ( hono naange ngee ) waɗi hedde hojomaaji 8 ko nge wirnii .
Naalankaagal e pijirlooji Fulɓe ene noddi jokkondiral hakkunde jibinanɗe e yontaaɓe gure ( e nder lammbaaji , e mbabatuuji , e jime , e jimɗi , ekon ) e dow ko ina adda paamondiral , e musiɗɗaagal .
Naalankaagal kesal Haalpulaar’en woppaaka caggal .
Naalanke Bur Domo ina saDi hannde e nder Afrik .
Naalankooɓe jirnooɓe kewuuji , hay gooto ŋakkaani .
Naalaŋkaagal pulaagu ena saɗi waɗde haa teeŋti he rewɓe , ngati ndewaagu ena heewi reeno-reeno he renndo men .
Naamdel : mbele so en njokkii ngal jaɓɓal eɗen mbaawi ɗamineede heeptineede e ɗemɗe binndirteeɗe informatik ?
Naamnaaki hakkille belɗo ngam reftude heen .
Naamnal : Mbele won haaloobe pulaar dariibe e yidde y " clavier " pulaar dane wondude e " distionnaire pulaar e nder " ordinateur .
Naamnal nana yirloo e hakkille am tan , ena horii
Naamnal ngal woni " holi
Naamndal amen ko hol nde ɗumɗoo jogori nattude .
Naamnde mberlaa , hay gooto e maɓɓe jaabtaaki haa alaa ko heddii so wonaa laamu ena ruttitoo ɗo wonnoo .
Naamnde ɗe ko ɗiɗi .
Naamndo julaa en e bete en to Koddiwaar , naamndo Utu en e Tutsi en to cuuɗi amen , wuurduɓe hannde alaa e sago , muñondirɓe hannde alaa e sago , e dow mbaawnoor ɓeen wiyatnooɓe ɓe wonde guurdigal nattii aaɓnaade .
Naamne ɓurtiiɗe kaayitaaji laamu rokkunoo ɗii , kam e kaayitaaji etaa siwil dewɗi laawol ɗii , himmude ngam dallinde ko ɓe Muritaninaaɓe .
Naamnii-mi " onon kam holi oo gorko kaaleteeɗo " ?
Naange , Leydi , koode , lebbi , tagopeeje e geɗe keewɗe goɗɗe fof ko kuulon winndere ndee .
Naange , ena waawi mooftude e nder mum ko foti e 1 .
Naange , no mbiy-ɗen nii , ko hoodere ɓurnde fof ɓadtaade en , alaa ɗo seŋii .
Naange ena waawi mooftude e nder mum ko foti e 1 300 000 Leydi .
Naange ko hoodere ɓurnde fof ɓadtaade en ( 149 600 000 Km ) .
Naange ngee kadi lewñinta tan ko bannge e lewru
Naange noon ɓuri murliɗde .
Naange woɗɗunge en ko foti e 149 .
Naange wulnge nge njiyaten ñalnde fof ngee , ko hoodere , en kaaliino ɗum .
Naat-mi jaŋde Pulaar ko 1982 .
Naatgol Tawassul e nder daartol ndii ɗoo leydi ko yeru jokkondirɗe koppi , tawi ko ɗuum waawi jibinde waylaare ɗaminaande ndee e ngenndi ndii .
Naatgol e nokku yeewtere ndee ala njoɓdi .
Naatnude he jaŋde hee , gila he law , jaŋde karallaagal kesal ( KK ) , haa teeŋti e internet e kuutorɗe jahdooje heen , sabu mum waylude nguurndam aadee he nder winndere ndee eɗii duuɓi 30 cakkitiiɗi , gila to bannge jokkondiral , kumpital , keɓagol ganndal , e kuutorɗe , tee mbayliigaaji ɓurɗi luggiɗde kadi ine keti .
Nadorde gorko fotaani ɓurde 85 santimeeteer ( sm ) , nadorde debbo fotaani ɓurde 90 sm .
Nafata ko safaara
Nafata tan ko golle .
Nafi tan e no jaaynde ndee laydi , ko en ngalaa bommbooje jooni jooni .
Nafii no feewi , haɗii Pulaar majjude walla saayde no duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije saayiri nii .
Nafooje e jamfaaji ɗe ɗum jibini , kuutorteeɗi ngam hoonaade nder Muritani , leydi ndi suwaa tawo tiiɗde , ngonaa sara e ɗuum kadi .
Nafooje goɗɗe kadi ina eɓɓidaa e mahngo sala kaa , ko wayi no peewnitgol ekkolaaji 7 e nokkuuji cellal 3 , walla kadi mahngo laylaytol dokkitgol ndiyam ceniɗam nder Roosooji ɗiɗi ɗii , yantude e laylaytol senaare e mahngo e baɗgol kaɓirɗe nokku weytaare sukaaɓe , walla nokkuuji goɗɗi renndo wonande rewɓe e ɗawaaɓe won ɗeen kattanɗe e nder Rooso Muritani .
Nafooje keewɗe keɓetenooɗe heen ɗe cowoo .
Nafoore leelataa maa waɗ oto heppe .
Nafoore majjum ko yaajnude daraniiɓe golle ɗee .
Nafoore ngolɗoo kowol laamu tataɓol ko ɓoornude laamu nguu wutte demokaraasi e rokkude ɗum mbaadi laamu tirbiiji keewɗi e leƴƴi keewɗi e eddaaji ɓalndu keewɗi , haa nanndita e Ngenndi e huutoraade ɗum e woote .
Nafoore tinndol yaltata ko e tonngol mum .
Naftortooɓe maa kuutoro ndeen ɓesnoore tawa coodaani , ɗannanaaki .
Nagge haala , Pullo jaabo .
Nagge ina wiyee ko soñtunge so tawii enge heewi kosam .
Nagge ladde ngee ne najii nde yiꞌi lekki kii .
Nagge ruudii jajal , gaynde reentii , nde potti janngo jajal , golle kaaltee " eɓe njima heen kadi kasi , yeruuji " oo karaw sagurattee , oo karaw magurattee , sagurettee magurattee , oo karaw bedi ngaddi " walla kadi " nagge huunii to dow to woorataa Barka Buulel , moƴƴa ŋari toowa koofol , oorataa Barka Buulele " .
Najoore !
Nammnde keewɗe ɗe hay gooto waawaa tawo jaabaade .
Nanaa ɓe kaala gooto e ɓe ɓe mbiyata jaambareeɓe ɓee , haɓii e paso mum mo renndi leñol e hinnde fof , wari ɗum teeɗti jawdi mum , aɗa anndi ɗumɗoo neɗɗaagal jaɓataa ɗum .
Nanaama kadi , e nder laana kaa heewii dubuuje , yimɓe ɓee ngullitii ɗum Nuuhu , nde ɗum waɗi , geno lonngini annabi Nuuhu , yo ɓiɗ banngee e reedu ñiiwa haa ko wonnoo e reedu mum ustoo .
Nanaama ko MAA jeyi heen booñ E oo sahaa mo njahraten , hay gooto anndaa ɗo ɗum hucci e ɗo haaɗoyta .

Nde o halaani ɗum Baaba Muusa subaka , oon wi'i mo yo o jogo jikke moƴƴo .
Nde o heɓi " bakkaa " makko o jokkoyi jaŋde jaayndiyankaagal to CESTi ( Centre d’Études des Sciences et Techniques de l’Information ) to Duɗal Toowngal Sheek Anta Joob mo Ndakaaru .
Nde o heɓi bal oo , omo woɗɗi lajal Kameni sanne , kono o faamii wuddere ena udditii hakkunde duuñtooɓe Kameruun .
Nde o heɓi duubi jeegom , o waɗaa e alluwal ɓuraana .
Nde o heɓi seedantaagal jannginoowo to William-Ponty , o wonti jannginoowo to Kodduwaar he kitaale 1921 haa 1923 .
Nde o hooti , o sokaa e suudu gila subaka haa kikiiɗe , ɓe ɓufti mo lekki ɓe njarni mo aaye .
Nde o huufi haalirde , o jolani jamaanu njooɗiingu nguu ko e laamu almameeɓe , ngooroondi e golle .
Nde o jaŋngata Deftere Alla nder Jolof nde ( Piir woni ko Jolof ) , o ñooti jokkondiral e musidal tiiɗngal hakkunde makko e Burba Jolof , Sayeer Mati .
Nde o jibinaa haa woni balɗe jeeɗiɗi o inniraa Goppaaɗo .
Nde o jibini ndee tan , ɓooyaani caggal ɗuum o maayi .
Nde o joofni e ɗuum , o jokki ko huunde e dawrugol , o eeriima dental ɓe njaggarata ɗum'en , sabu donngol ngol " Beno Bok Yaakaar " waɗi Makki Sal ala heen , kala beddaniiɗo ɓe kartal mum , firti Mustafa Ñas cuɓi-ɗaa .
Nde o joofni ko Ceerno Aiw Yero Joob ɓami konngol ngam yeewtande juulɓe ɓee .
Nde o joofni tan , geno lonngini mo wiyi mo : eehey maa Ayyuuba !
Nde o lelni konngol , o yetti Lummbolnaaɓe e halifaaɓe mum kala Ƴettunooɓe konngol ɓee kala kaalii nafoore punondiral ngaal .
Nde o naati Farayse hitaande 2001 , Fedde KAWTAL sosani mo ko goomu safaara : Sammba Cooyel Bah , Aliw Bah , Jaalo Sek e Katante leñol Kan .
Nde o naati leydi ndii , o jooɗinoo ko to wiyetenoo Girooɓe Mawnde , o yeñi ɗoon no feewi .
Nde o nani fuutankooɓe ndeftiima Al Hajji Umar , miijo makko ɓeydii tiiɗde mo .
Nde o nanti sawtowol ngol laawol goɗngol o yananaa ko sawtowol tigi o nani .
Nde o neli Pennde maayo ndaayaan nde hol ko wonnoo anniya makko ?
Nde o rafaa noppi , pelle pulaar kala ndariima he safaara makko .
Nde o reftii e laaɓndal makko laawbi keewɗi Ibraahiim jaabaaki mo , o wiy ɗum mbele ko Allah yamiri ɗum ko waɗi ko .
Nde o rowi , Aamadu Bookar Baal yettini konngol Seneraal Usmaan Kan , hooreejo fedde Ceerno Sileymaani Baal Ndakaaru .
Nde o rowi , arnooɓe hiirde ɓee kala ndarii , kelle njahdinaa .
Nde o rowi , fawii heen ko haalannde mawɗo Mustafa Kan ( Farayse e Pulaar ) kono ko e mbaydi wideyoo .
Nde o rowi , jonaaɗo Dental Ndulumaaji ƴefti konngol , siftini golle gollanooɓe e sahaaji jawtuɗi , no ñalɗi ɗiiɗoo kebliraa gila e peeje haa e ngalu hade mum jumpude e paandaale ñalɗi ɗii .
Nde o rowi , konngol arti e Ceerno Mohammed Kaamil Baro , nulaaɗo galle Ceerno Njaay Baro to Nuwaadibu .
Nde o rowi ko nelaaɗo hooreejo leydi Nijeer ƴetti konngol .
Nde o rowi konngol , hawri ko e naatgol Ceerno Umaar Jum e nder nokku oo .
Nde o rowi konngol , naamne udditaa , Ceerno Laam ɓeydi laɓɓitinde ko suggunoo e hakkillaaji naamndiiɓe ɓee .
Nde o rowi konngol , terɗe Sifaa naati dingiral , mbaɗi golle maantiniiɗe gila to njimri , mago haa e ngamri haa jamaanu nguu fof weltii .
Nde o ruttiti to joomiraaɗo jom baawɗe OO , o haalani ɗum hono ko Jibiriil haalnoo koo .
Nde o sankii e hitaande 1987 , to leydi Farayse , lomtii mo ko Kolonel Ali Saibuu , oon ne nde ari yaafii yimɓe uddanooɓe heewɓe tawi nguddiraa ko sabu politik .

Nde o saŋkii e kasoo , lebbi sappo e nay caggal nde o ñaawaa , kuugal sokeede duuɓi tati fawaa e makko sabu " njanngu e kisal laamu " , ardiiɓe laamu senegaal mbi’i wonnde ko o bartiiɗo .
Nde o seeraa , Manndelaa resti mo e lewru suwee 1958 .
Nde o suppitii , o yaltidi e ganndal .
Nde o toƴƴunoo daande mawɓe njiilii koye .
Nde o ummanii jihaadi e wondude e Ahmeddu mo Barakna , ɓiyum Usmaan , e Wulaad Ahmed en , Kunta en e Sharaatiit en En puɗɗinooma haalde haala Koppolaani .
Nde o ummii e juuɗe oon , no yoga e sukaaɓe fuutankooɓe nii , o naati e ladde , o waɗi : Sagata yonta yiiloo .
Nde o ummii e juuɗe oon , o fayi ko to wiyetee Lammbaango , e nder dowla Senegaal .
Nde o ummitii ɗoon o sakkitorii sariya ko Likseyba Gorgol e junngo Alfaa Demmba Umuru Sih mo Likseyba Gorgol .
Nde o waynii yahde , owi'i ɓe : " woto mbeetee dey so Alla jaɓii , sabu on potaa ñallude .
Nde o winndittoo ndee ngam ɗannaande ndee , o suɓoo ɗo o yiɗi jooɗaade ɗoo , ko ɗoon kadi o huutortoo telefoŋ makko ngam rokkude denndaangal kabaruuji paatuɗi e bagaas makko oo .
Nde o wiyaa yo o lor lekki kii tawa ndeen asamaan ina haɗaa yaltinde hay waadere , leydi kañum ne ko noon , ngam kañum ne yamiraama hay huunde hoto fuɗ e dow mum .

Nde o woni suka , o naati jaŋde ko he duɗal Ceerno Alfaa Muusaa Sih mo Fanay-Waalo .
Nde o woppaa o fayi Moscou tawtoroyeede kawtal winnderewal senndikaaji .
