Nde o yahnoo haa o woɗɗoyi , o ruttii .
Nde o yalti nde , hay gooto rewaani e makko , ko ɗum tagi o majjiri yimɓe ɓe .
Nde o yettii , o itti comcol , o totti ɗum Aadama .
Nde o yettii Hawaa , o mecci leeɓi njawdi ndii , o totti ɗum Hawaa , o anndini Hawaa hol no mottirta leeɓi ɗii .
Nde o yettii Makka ndee , geno lonngini Aadama yo wanngo suudu nduu , o joofanii Aadama nokku oo , Aadama wanngii suudu nduu laabi jeeɗiɗi wondude e kolndam , omo heddii hoore mehre , ko ɗum waɗtaa sunna hijjoore .
Nde o yettii Nuwaadibu o adii yiylaade fof ko hol to joɗnde Catal Ɓamtaare Pulaar woni e nder wuro ngoo , o jokkondiri e ardiiɓe catal ngal , o holli ɓeen kaayit makko eggirɗo , ɓeen ndokki mo peŋgal ngal o foti jokkaade ngal , so peŋgal Jediida ; o naatnaa e nder goomuuji golle , o golli heen golle maantinɗe .
Nde o yettii haayre ndee ina waɗi luuro , o naati e nder luuro ngoo ngam hulde laamɗo nokku oo hoto tinde ɗuum , ngam oon ɗoon laamɗo Geno wuurti ɗum tan ko e warde sukaaɓe , haa teeŋti e sukaaɓe worɓe .
Nde o yettii kadi o jokki golle ɓamtaare , pinlal e ganndal he nder Kawtal Janngooɓe Pulaar/Fulfulde e Winndere , ngal leydi Farayse .
Nde o yettii toon , e no ɓuraani wiyiri " eey geno joomi amen , jippinan min taabal ummoraade e asamaan , ɗum wonana min welnere adiinde e wattindiinde , ɗum wona kaawise ummoraade e maa , arjiginaa min , etee ko aan ɓuri moƴƴude e arjiginooɓe " simoore taabal , kaawise : 114 .
Nde o yettii toon o heddii amo geewoo to bannge politigi ( o yuɓɓini pottitte e jaayndiyaŋkooɓe , o jokkondiri e won ɗeen pelle politigi uujnooɗe njalti leydi sabu politigi , e won e yimɓe makko jooɗaniiɓe mo toon .
Nde o yettii ɓe o salmini ɓe , ɓe calmitii mo .
Nde o yiytondiri e Aamadu Maalik Gay e wayɓe noon , ɓe pelliti daranaade Afrik to bannge ɗemɗe e dawrugol , ɓe nginniri goomu maɓɓe " MURTUƁE " ndeen gooto he maɓɓe kala ena noddirtenoo innde Murtuɗo ndee .
Nde o yiꞌi comci Wojere ina moddi leydi tan , o sikki ko kañum waɗi ɗee golle bonɗe .
Nde o yonti naatde jaŋde ko jinnaaɗo makko Amar Demmba winndani mo " ba " .
Nde o yottii ko ɗum o wiꞌi : Tawde mi roŋkii addude Bojel , jooni ko mbele-ɗaa kala pawaa kam .
Nde o ƴetti fetel oo haa o pari , o wi'i : Moƴƴii , jooni mbiɗo ƴeewondoo so tawi ko jinne oo haali koo ko goonga !
Nde o ƴetti gonngol , o laɓɓini punondiral gonngal hakkunde wuro ngoo e Lummbol .
Nde o ƴettiti e laawol seeɗa tan , o yetti e suudu huɗo .
Nde o ƴettuno ɗeeɗoo geɗe fof , o addani ɗum joomiraaɗo jom baawɗe OO .
Nde o ɓadtinaa bottaari makko ndee , mbiy-mi gooto e soldeteeɓe ɓee : Njahee mbiyee oya gorko , yo o addor bottaari mum , ara tawta en ɗo njooɗi-ɗen ɗoo , ñaamda e men .
Nde o ɓallii Kungel , ko ndeen o fuɗɗii tinde tampere .
Nde o ɓallii ngu tan , puccu nguu ummi darii .
Nde o ɓami konngol , rewrude he peeñirgal ayaawo , Aminata Dikko seyfitii golle waɗboniyankeeɓe jihaadiyankeeɓe ɓe , kono o yooɗnaani golle soldateeɓe Mali kanum en e wallidiiɓe mum en Risinaaɓe , hono diɗɗal Wagner .
Nde o ɗaɓɓoyi safaara annabi Ayyuuba ndee kanko Raamata , o hawri toon e Ibliis ina jogii mbaadi gorko timmuɗo falii mo ngam ina anndi annabi Ayyuba sellii , kono Raamata o anndaa ɗuum .
Nde oon ari , holliti mo , kanko laamɗo oo wonde ko o pergitiiɗo e fergitere mawnde .
Nde oon iwi , lomtii ɗum ko Siree Bookar .
Nde oon koninke nanngaa ndee holliri mettere mum ko wiyde : " Laamu Maayii , woodi jooni tan ko dool-dooliiɓe " .
Nde oon resni , Saaratu wiy Ibraahiim yoo res ɗum mbele Allah e wonde moƴƴo , maa rokku ɗum heen ɓesngu ɓaawo kanum fiɓtiima jibinde hankadi .
Nde oon ummii e jappeere , lomtii ɗum ko biyeteeɗo Hammadi Saada .
Nde ordinateeruuji njoli , keɓ-mi miijo haŋkadi waɗde tigille ɗee e majje .

Nde peŋngal FƁPM Liksar sosaa , o woni hoyreejo mum .

Nde rafi oo fooli mo , o natti waawde yahde jamaa , o woytaaki rafi oo ina muusi , o woytotoo ko o nattii waawde yahde juuloyde e wirdoyde jamaa , kala garɗo salminde mo , ko ɗum woni ko o woytanto ɗum .
Nde rawaandu resi dewol mum , ullundu tini ɗuum , yahi fenani ɗuum Nuuhu , e golle rawaandu waɗi ɗee , annabi Nuuhu ɗuurnii ɗuum , ndu haalti ɗimmol e tataɓol , ullundu wiyi annabi Nuuhu yo noddu rawaandu , min kuccondira .
Nde rentini ko leyɗeele Seedeeyaawoo ( CEDEAO ) e Moritani .
Nde rewi ko e haayre woɗnde ɓurnde mawnude ine inniraa Didimos , nde nde taartonoo e waktuuji 11 e hojomaaji 55 .
Nde rokkora fartaŋŋe ɓee jom fannuuji gannde en , ndaña ɗo ndewni konnguɗi mum en haa njettoo renndo ngoo .
Nde sahaa yonti , yimɓe fof ummii : rewɓe , sukaaɓe kam e mawɓe .
Nde sakkitta ɗaɓɓateeɗo makko oo e resnude ɗum e gorko ɗaɓɓoowo oo .
Nde saraama no feewi e nder WhatsApp e Facebook Tee heen sahaaji ko yimɓe finɓe cari nde , woni neldi nde woɗɓe .
Nde seteeji ɗii njettii Mbaañ , ko mbeefeegu yimɓe jaɓɓii ɗumen .
Nde sosiraa ko won’de Fedde jokkere enɗam hakkunde Fulɓe kadi sahaa nde jilla heen pinal .
Nde sukaaɓe Siñcaan mbirtii , ɓe njaɓɓoraa ko kelle teeŋtuɗe .
Nde sukaaɓe ɓe ngarti wuro , ɓe njippi e oto tan ɓe cooynii sehilaaɓe maɓɓe Saada e Binta .
Nde sukaaɓe ɓee naati nder , ɓe tawi toon rewɓe e worɓe ina ndaŋi e yeeso kontuwaar hee .
Nde takkusaan yoni haa baaba Haaruuna juuli , o noddi sukaaɓe ɓee nder suudu makko .
Nde tawno ñalawma kala mo Allah addi omo waawi ñeɗde he ndee sewnde pinal ngal ɓeeɓataa o yarna ɗum yimɓe ɓee tawa kadi kala ndeɓe njari heen e ɓe teskoo heen dakamme e mbelemma keso mo tuuyo jamaanu maɓɓe naamni o .
Nde tawnoo , ceerno siree ko belɗo konngol , baawɗo haala , nde ƴetti " mikoroo " yimɓe motti poofaali .
Nde tawnoo , ciftinen laawol goɗngol , won juɓɓule keewɗe goɗɗe ballitɗe ƴellitaare ɗemɗe ko famɗi fof ko foti he kuuɓal golle majje , so wonii to leyɗe catiiɗe en so wonii he Muritani hee walla e tuŋbuuji men tawateeɗi he jookli winndere ndee fof , so wonii hanki walla hannde , so wonii he alkule walla e ƴellitagol jaŋde ganndiweere , so wonii he jaŋde woowaande walla e mbaydiiji kesi karalleeji , so wonii he hirjo pinal walla e ƴellitgol jaayndiyankaagal .
Nde tawnoo , eɗen nganndi , kala kaalɗo e dow yiɗɓe mum , jeddoowo alaa , hay sinno ko fenaande .
Nde tawnoo , he mbunndi luggere pittaali mon , oɗon nganndi won geɗe ɗe cuuɗa-ɗon .
Nde tawnoo , won jogiiɓe ko kaali , kono mbaawaa haalde , sabu ngalaa ɗo kaali e no kaaldi .
Nde tawnoo 3 ina fecca 60 , haralleeɓe ɓee keɓtinii wonde feere maɓɓe ndee ɓuri feewde e ñeeñɗude !
Nde tawnoo Alla haalataa huunde haa gayna ruttoo yalta heen .
Nde tawnoo Ibraahiim meeɗaani luutndaade yamiroore Allah o woppi ɗoon ɓesngu makko ngu .
Nde tawnoo Muttaar ina faami ɗuum , ñaagii mo nde ɓe ndiwtata luure ngam waawde renndinde doole maɓɓe politik e ner RPM ( Parti du Regroupement Mauritanien ) , jogorɗo wontoyde Heerto Ɓesngu Muritani , hono Parti du Peuple Mauritanien ( PPM parti bajjo ) , gardinooɗo leydi men haa kuudetaa koninkooɓe 10 sulyee 1978 .
Nde tawnoo Siwis , kañum kam , waawii yiilirde pine mum e ɗemɗe mum nder kormagol potal mumen ngal aldaa e jinngere .
Nde tawnoo aadee he muulngo mum , o wayi ko hono no adunayel tokasel ni .
Nde tawnoo aduna ko pooɗondiral koonguuji , te gila Senegaal heɓti ndimaagu mum dawrugol , hooreeɓe tato ardiiɓe leydi ndii ɓee hay gooto e mum en wonaano pullo , kadi fulɓe ɓee ene njogitii wonnde ɗemngal mum en , Pulaar , ko jaɓɓangal walla ngal heɓaani ko ɓe cikki foti won’de jojjannde maggal , haa ɓuri teeŋtude to bannge jaayndeeji , ko wayno rajo walla tele .
Nde tawnoo diiwaan Kaasamaasa ina jookii ko laana ka tan wonnoo mosol ɓurngol newaade ngam waɗde yah ngartaa hakkunde worgo ngo e diwanuuji keddiiɗi ɗi .
Nde tawnoo e oon sahaa hare hakkunde " fuɗnaange e hirnaange " ina wuli jaw , Dental Sowiyet en e Kubaa mballitii ANC to bannge njogitaari .
Nde tawnoo eewnaade ngol-ɗoon laawol ngam mahde ngenndi noototoo ko miijanteeri nguurndam heeriindi , kono meeɗaa wonde waɗɗiinde farlaande e laamu .
Nde tawnoo en njiyii gooto fof hollirii mette mum e no ɗum waɗiraa ni , kadi gooto kala ene jaɓi leñol ngol ene foti daraade saloo ɗum haa yoora yoorda e laalogal .
Nde tawnoo ene waawi jibin’de fitina he nder leydi
Nde tawnoo eɓe ngoongɗinno wonnde ɗemɗe ɓaleeɓe ɗee mbaawa roondaade ganndal , ndeke noon hayso enndaama yahata .
Nde tawnoo eɗen mari karallaagal kesal peewnugol jaayɗe e oon sahaa , keblu-ɗen fof haa timmi , heddii , hol to njogor-ɗen hebbitinde ?
Nde tawnoo eɗen nganndi alaa pinal e adunaaru hee ngal o humpaa , kono sabu neɗɗo oo wonde koɗo makko addanaani mo woppude ko makko ngam ƴeewde ko weli ɗum , alaa , o holli ɗum koko o woni ko , e woni ko makko koo .
Nde tawnoo gooto e amen fof yiɗata ko ɓurde naneede , ɓurde tineede , ɓurde yeeɓeede .
Nde tawnoo hay dental gootal hollitaani salaare mum yo goomu nguu wood , e fawaade no sarɗiyeeji ndernderi njamiriri nii , hiisaa ko suudu nduu yamirii cosgol goomu nguu .
Nde tawnoo hayso jiiduɓe neene gooto e baaba gooto , ko ndenndi koo so feccaama kala heen ɗawaaɗo ( heɓaani geɓal mum ) mettinat .
Nde tawnoo hayso ɗo mago ngoo yahrata ɗoo tawo ene saɗi anndude hol ko woni kuccam maggo e hol ɗo ngo tiindii , kono loowdi ndii ene joofii yeewtere pelɓondiral hakkunde banngeeji ɗiɗi e pinal Senegaalnaaɓe ( Hiirnaange Afrik e kuuɓal ) .
Nde tawnoo heewi ɗo neɗɗo nehi njawdi mum haa fayi fowru ari sonngi ɗum tawa ɗaldaani ɗum hay ƴiyal goloŋloŋal .
Nde tawnoo heɗiiɓe ɓee njiyata ko kanko kaalɗo oo wonaa ko o haali koo .
Nde tawnoo hono Yero en , hono Tijjaani en , mbeeɓanaani en , en ngoyii ɓe haa saɗti .
Nde tawnoo hono maɓɓe mbeeɓaani en , en ngoyii ɓe haa saɗti .
Nde tawnoo huun .
Nde tawnoo huunde kala ene moofti sirlu , sirlu goodegol majjum kono kadi sirluuji guurgol majjum walla mbiyen pirfirli keddogol majjum .
Nde tawnoo jaayndiyankooɓe haalooɓe heen ɓee kaalata tan ko ko laamu nguu gollii .
Nde tawnoo kadi , moƴƴingol nehdi e jaŋde jeyaa ko he paandaale " ƴellitaare duumiinde " Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe ( FND ) , eɗen njenanaa jaŋde ina foti rokkeede keɓe jonɗe ɗe yimɓe fof mbaawi yettaade .
Nde tawnoo ko Saam ɓuri wonde mawɗo e ɓiɓɓe Nuuhu kala , e oon tuma , ɓiɗɗo oo ina yahra e duuɓi teemedde tati .
Nde tawnoo ko almuudo moƴƴo seeremɓe makko mbaɗi e makko ceedtii e makko ka ɗo haala mbelka kono kadi coomka tigilde jamfa kulɓiniika e oon sahaa ɓe mbi’i : " Modiboo Keytaa ko jannginoowo dowrowo , belɗo hakkille kono ngañgu walla Salaare mum tuubakooɓe farayse ina fuŋŋinii suuɗaaki , ko o baɗtam boniijo mawɗo mo hulaani hay dara , potɗo reeneede walla waɗteede hakkille kala e sahaa " .
Nde tawnoo ko enen ndenndi miijo e golle yidde e fayndaare .
Nde tawnoo ko inɗe ɓe njiilotoo , ɓe njiilaaki ko ɓamtata renndo ngoo .
Nde tawnoo ko kayri fuɗɗunoo wolde ndee , wiyaa maa ndi yoɓa .
Nde tawnoo ko leñɗi leydi ndii fof ndenndi ngoni e konu leydi he .
Nde tawnoo ko maa kamɓe ɓe njaɓa ɗuum kadi ɓe kawra ɓe ngoota yoo ngun mbayliigu waɗ .
Nde tawnoo ko o pullo gannduɗo ngoƴaaji renndo ngo , hoolaare , ɗamaawu e jikke mawɗo ina waɗanoo e makko , so tawii Allah rokkii mo ndoole .
Nde tawnoo ko sahaa fawaa ene fuŋŋinii , suuɗaaka .
Nde tawnoo ko ɓe reenanooɓe ɓesnguuji ɗii hakkeeji mumen .
Nde tawnoo ko ɓuri heewde ko he ndiin mbaydi joom mum en ɓe keɓata kabaruuji ma haa mbaawa boomdema .
Nde tawnoo ko ɗemngal woni faawru pinal kala leñol .
Nde tawnoo laamu nguu yowitinoo ko e kalifaandi ( tuggi ndema , haa e awo haa heɓi ngaynaaka e kala golle nafooje ) , murtugol maccuɓe alaa e sago adda kiris ( iiñcuru ) e nder ngalu Waalo ;
Nde tawnoo leydi Ejipti ina yaaji , o waawii hollitde ko Haal-pulaar'en wonnooɓe bannge rewo njillondiri e woɗeeɓe , nde tawnoo pinal Ejiptinaaɓe ko rewrewru wonaa worwordu ko ɗuum waɗi ɓe keddodii e ɗemngal maɓɓe Pulaar .
Nde tawnoo leydi Farayse ina hulnoo semmbe dente kaɓotooɗe laamu koloñaal gonnooɗe tan e ɓeydaade , caggal nde Wolde Adunaare ndee gasi , ñiiɓirde koloñaal ndee ina reenatnoo no feewi ɓe o innirnoo " yimɓe ɓe njiɗaa leydi Farayse " éléments anti-française .
Nde tawnoo mawninoowel ngel wondi ko e kameraa hee , huunde ndee ine waawi waɗeede e kala nokku : fawee dow tele , yeeso oto ( konndiroowo oo tan nanata jamminooje GPS ) , ekn .
Nde tawnoo mbaroodi ko kam woni arɗo seto mum .
Nde tawnoo nehdi ɓiyleydaagu e jikkuuji demokaraasi ngoodaani , wonti laamu neɗɗo gooto ɗo hakkunde ɗoo , banndiraaɓe catii ɗum , rewi heen tirbii , caggal ɗuum jinngere fotnde suddude ko heddii koo .
Nde tawnoo nokku oo ine heewi kaaƴe toowɗe e jolɓitte , ɓe miijii rewnude ka dow , ɓe liggaka toon hakkunde kaaƴe ɗiɗi toowɗe ( ɓurɗe 300 m tooweeki , tee laawol gudroŋ ine rewi nder heen wootere ) , aasiñooruuji ɗii miijii waɗde ka taakaw gooto , ka ɓaggoo e heen haayre , ɓe kuutoroo kadi ɓoggi juutɗi ( 54 meeteer ) asiyee ñiɓaaɗi he kaaƴe toowɗe ɗee ine mballita nanngude ka .
Nde tawnoo noon Allah ko jurmotooɗo tagoore mum , ɗo ɓe ngoni kala , so ɓe njahi haa ɓe puɗɗiima majjude e yaltude keeri jamirooje makko tan , O nela fayde e maɓɓe gooto ummoraade e maɓɓe mo ene siftinaɓe jamirooje makko ; jannginaɓe laawol ( Sariya ) , ñeeñal e neɗɗaagal .
Nde tawnoo noon ko woni ɗoon e liingu koo alaa ɗo woni e nokkuuji goɗɗi gila e maaje haa e beeli , e ko yanti heen alaa cur alaa kajo , gooto fof wonirta ko weliri ɗum , geɗe goɗɗe puɗɗiima naattude heen ko wayi no bonnude gawirɗe awooɓe jeyaaɓe e nokku oo walla nii ammbude ɓe e won e nokkuuji gawirɗi .
Nde tawnoo noon yimɓe fof njiɗdataa neɗɗo gooto , jommbaani wooda dariiɓe ɗah mbiya " min ngonndaani e gardinaaɗo oo " .
Nde tawnoo o ɓulnotonoo miijooji makko ko e binndanɗe annduɓe wi’eteeɓe Spinosa , Marks e Fenon , Bolondee Joop ene hiisinoo ko wi’etee eclectism théorique- ƴooggol ganndal e fannuuji keewɗi- hakkunde fannuuji bi’eteeɗi : situationnism , anarchism , maoism , e trotskism , o ƴoogatnoo ganndal makko politik ko ummoraade e laabi e peeje keewɗe , tawa noon omo salii kala ko woni dogmatism , ɗuum woni jaggitaade tan e miijo wooto , feere wootere , ganndal gootal , sirŋinoo heen , saloo ñiŋooje , saloo goɗɗum ko wonaa ɗuum .
Nde tawnoo omo sellini wonnde Allah luutndotaako podooje mum kadi ko kattanɗo kala ko haaji .
Nde tawnoo omo welnoo hakkille , o janngi kadi binndol gaaci haa o huɓindii ɗum e newaare .
Nde tawnoo pulaar wiy ko : " Ɓakke mahatee ko gila ko kecce " , walla nii " lekɗal ɓuccetee ko gila ko keccol , nde tawnoo so a woppii haa yoorii a wiy aɗa ɓucca ɗum ko tol tawatmaa heen kono a dañataa portingal .
Nde tawnoo seernaaɓe nasraan en ɓee mbiyatnoo ko haala Allah ko tedduka firetaake he ɗemɗe puuyɗe , woni kala ɗemngal ngal wonaa Gerek walla Latin .
Nde tawnoo suka heewi joldude ko e yonta mo wuurdi , hannde e nder teeru pinal men ɗaayii .
Nde tawnoo tergal heen fof won ko teeɗantoo tawa ngala jaɓaani .
Nde tawnoo won konngol mahingol e hakkillaaji men .
Nde tawnoo wonaa enen tan , kono kala ɗo pullo jiɗɗo pinal Fulɓe e ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar woni , ene suninoo no feewi e nande wonnde taƴooɓe njanii kadi he gooto e kanaaluuji Pulaar nder Youtube .
Nde tawnoo wonde magiyanke ko dokke Allah , kono kala meccel ene laaɓndii jaŋde , karallaagal e fannaade .
Nde tawnoo woon heen laaɓndii ko karallaagal toowngal ngal ganndudaa ko cate cinndiiɗe he laamu tan , ko wayno arme walla gollorɗe laamu kalfinaaɗi wiɗtooji toowɗi , mbaawi ɗum en jogaade .
Nde tawnoo yuɓɓo Apple ko uddiingo , wonaa neɗɗo kala , walla karallo fof waawi naatde he maggo haa golloo ko yiɗi koo .
Nde tawnoo ɓe mbiyatnoo ɗeen pine ko pine heefereeɓe ( paȉenne ) .
Nde tawnoo ɓe ngoowii helde paali njuumri ɓe ƴoloo safi safaani fof tan ɓe kaɓɓat paɗe maɓɓe haa tiiɗa ɓe ndadoo petelaaji maɓɓe , ɓe loosana galle laamorgo leydi ɓe kurjina kala luɓanooɗo lefol ngol .
Nde tawnoo ɓuri moƴƴude e haala ko kawraaka , waɗde ɓurata waawde huutoreede e kawraaka ko kelme nanondiraaɗe .
Nde tawnoo ɗee geɗe kala ina kawriti e sago Fuutankooɓe e oon sahaa , Fedde Tooroɓɓe fooli !

Nde ɓe mbirtii wuro adiingo ngoo , ɓe nji'i weendu mawndu , sukaaɓe ina heen lootoo .
Nde ɓe naati e galle hee tann , bojji ɗi puɗɗiti .
Nde ɓe naati gaaras Boomaresee , Hammadi sooynii Eduwaar e baaba mum ina ndarii e damal ngal .
Nde ɓe naati nder galle oo , ko Misel e yummum njaɓɓii ɓe , mbismii ɓe .
Nde ɓe naati saal oo gulaali ngulli , jaɓɓungal waɗi , ɓe mbismaa , ɓe ŋabbinaa to dinngiral too , yimɓe moɗti poofaali .
Nde ɓe nani eewnaango ngoo tan , ɓe ngari to laana kaa , refti heen , Annabi ( JKM ) ɓiyum Kanaan , e konngol Geno e nder Ɓuraana tedduɗo oo wiyi : " naatdu e amen mbaasaa laataade no heefereeɓe nih " .
Nde ɓe nanngi mo , ɓe kumi mo e koyngal , ɓe kaɓɓi e lekki , hoore nde ina weelta .
Nde ɓe nanondiri ɓe kollitoyi ɗum Ceerno Abuu Siraajo Soh gardiiɗo duɗal Hadaa iqal qur’aana , sabu kañum ne ina woowti noddude e nooteede e golle baaɗe nii .
Nde ɓe ndaayi toon , ɓe payi ko to wiyetee Wagadu e nder leydi Mali .
Nde ɓe ndaŋi haa ɓe njotti , ɓe coodi timmbere , ɓe ɗakki e ɓataake hee .
Nde ɓe ndesondiri , ɓoyaani tan ɓe njibidini funeeɓe : Aadama e Hawwa , gorko e debbo .
Nde ɓe nganndi hankadi feere alaa , ɓe nawi mo , kono tawi ko gasatnoo gasii .
Nde ɓe ngarata ndee , ɓe ngardii e Mboonnaaɓe haa e Tulel Barooɓe , sara Ndormbos .
Nde ɓe ngari , ɓe njillondiri e haalpulaar'en .
Nde ɓe ngari haa e nokku ɗo woocetee ɗoo , ɓe mbaabti ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe , ɓe lelni ɗumen e les lekki ngooti .
Nde ɓe ngari kamɓe fof , o saaktini ɓe koyɗol makko , ɓe mbiyi mo : " koyɗol maa to bannge asamaan , ɗuum ko halkaare yimɓe winndere nde , e denndaangal ko wuuri e dow leydi ndii " .
Nde ɓe ngari ɓe ngari e Fuuta ko hitaande 1512 .
Nde ɓe ngarti , tuubakooɓe pawi he maɓɓe kubbe , cisiri ɓe , waawni ɓe yo ɓe ubbu maayɓe ɓee .
Nde ɓe ngasni , joom suudu baaba Demmba rokkiɓe ñiiri kosam kam e kiŋkilibaa .
Nde ɓe ngasni , ɓe tiindii opitaal ngam faabaade ɓe .
Nde ɓe ngasni e sofeer kamiyoŋ oo , ɓe naamnii hol dognatnooɗo oto njaga njaay oo .
Nde ɓe ngasni ɓe njahi to bakannde ɓatakeeji nde , ɓe corni heen ɓataake ɓaɓɓe .
Nde ɓe ngayni ñaamde tan , kala e maɓɓe ngoondunooɗo e ñawu , ñawu mum ɗoon e ɗoon selli , wumnooɓe ngumti , woofɗuɓe celli ndarii e koyɗe mum en , faaɗuɓe mbaɗti nande .
Nde ɓe ngoppaa nde , ɓe mbaɗtaa ko e juuɗe laamu Nijeer , ɓeen ne ndewƴini ɓe haa Ñaame wuro laamorgo leydi ndi e’ wiyde kabaaru bayniiɗo wuro ngo , hay sinno tawii oon kabaaru laɓɓinaani hay batte e mbaydi wellitaare maɓɓe e haalaani hay dara kadi ko fa’ti e ngonka nayo heddiiɓe ɓe , allam yaalam ɓe nguuri , allam yaalam leɗɗe daaɗe maɓɓe ko ko kaɓɓitaa ko ɓooyi , walla ɓe padi kadi ko haa laamuuji dennduɗi bojji ɗi hono Farayse , Nijeer e Maali mbeddoo junngo e jayba njaltina kaalis ko coodtiri yimɓe mu’en .
Nde ɓe njahi seeɗa , ɓe nani woodi ko dilli ɓe cikki ko Bojel kono ɓe tawi ko jihre .
Nde ɓe njahi seeɗa ɓe cooynii sukaaɓe rewɓe nayo : Yaasin , Saarata , Binta kam e Aysata .
Nde ɓe njaɓɓi e leydi Muritani caggal duuɓi , jaɓɓiiɓe e tufnde Rooso ko Hooreejo goomu toppitiingu mooliiɓe Yahyaa wul Wagef , yantude e e yoga e howhowɓe lanndaaji leydi ndii .
Nde ɓe njetti , ɓe tawi wuro ngoo no diidorinoo ina sabbii ɓe .
Nde ɓe njetti leegal Baay Laay , sukaaɓe ɓee goni e yurnaade Ceerno .
Nde ɓe njetti ɓe tawi neene mum Ismaa’iil ene jooɗi sara ɗoon , ɓe nganndi ko kanko jey ndiyam ɗam .
Nde ɓe njettii eɓe ngonti baɗi e bamɗi tuge , annabi Iisaa ndaari ɓe heɓtini ɓe , eɓe ndaara annabi kono ɓe mbaawaa haalde , kono ko haalaa fof eɓe nana ɗuum .
Nde ɓe njettii toon ɓe tawi
Nde ɓe njettii ɓe tawi Jarga ina humaa e manngowi e hakkunde galle hee .
Nde ɓe njettinoo ɗo Baydi tonngaa ɗo , nde Baydi Kacce yiynoo Arɗo Daakaa tan , wiyi mo
Nde ɓe njippii , Eduwaar e baaba mum tawti ɓe , ɓe njaɓɓondiri , ɓe payi damal gaaraas too .
Nde ɓe njippii to leydi , o loowi e majji ngena keewka doole .
Nde ɓe njoli , ɓe ngoni heen haa ngori joggi , yimɓe carondiri .
Nde ɓe njotti Ariweltoo , ɓe njiꞌi naꞌi ooroynooɗi ina njofa e gedduuji mumen , gaynaako ina reggini ɗi .
Nde ɓe njotti polis , ɓe keɗtii mo .
Nde ɓe njottii e nokku hee , ɓe cooynaaki ni ko nanndi e Bojel .
Nde ɓe njowi ɗoo , waɗaa ko seppoo-joloo , gila e hooreeɓe teddungal , bismaaɓe tedduɓe haa e tawtoraaɓe ɓee kala .
Nde ɓe pari , ɓe njaltini kamɓe ɗiɗo fof wuro ngoo .
Nde ɓe peeñata ndee ɓe ngardi ko : maa min njiɗno on Tele e mbaydi ngoɗndi .
Nde ɓe pooftii seeɗa , afo joom wuru ngoo addani ɓe bool maara e teewu .
Nde ɓe pooli Farayse , ɓe compi Laamaandi ( Empire ) Almaañ ñalnde 18 saawiyee 1871 .
Nde ɓe puɗɗii golle tan , feeñani ɓe wonde ina moti ɓe njaajtina losko ngoo he geɗe goɗɗe ɗe ɓe toɗɗananooki .
Nde ɓe uddaa toon , reenata ɓe ko soofaaji .
Nde ɓe ƴeewi kaayitaaji oto ɗii , ɓe tawi keewɗi e majji lajal mumen gasii .
Nde ɓe ƴetti daaɗe ,
Nde ɓe ɓenni ngoon wuru , ɓe keɓi dulndu mawndu .
Nde ɓeen njahi tawi toon ndiyam ngarti kaalaniɓe ɓe payi toon .
Nde ɓinngel laamɗo dewel ɓalewel reedu ngel nani ɗuum tan , woni e foɓɓude ene farfarta .
Nde ɓiɓɓe subalɓe ngari tawi Balla ina wertanaa , " ɓee mbiyi njaggee Balla , kirsee Balla , ɓee mbiyi piyee Balla , ɓee mbiyi njomee mo ƴiyal , ɓee mbiyi njuwee mo hoɗɗaandu .
Nde ɓooynoo , jibnaaɓe ɓe ngoppi mi yo mi yim , kono ɓe njiɗaa mi watta ɗum meccal .
Nde ɓooynoo , woodi haaltuɓe o woni ko Daakaa .
Nde ɓooynoo o wonti hooreejo Suudu sarɗi ( Asaambele ngenndi ) .
Nde ɗeen defte njettii , kamnje fof ɗe mbaɗoyaa to Baytul Hikmah .
Nde ɗi karmini njulaagu ɓaleeɓe ,
Nde ɗi njotti , waandu wi'i laamɗo noodi ɗii : Ee , ɓee tan ngoni besngu maa ngu njogi-ɗaa ngam haɓde e jaambareeɓe am ɓee ?
Nde ɗoo tagofeere kadi ena yaawi yiiloo- banngoo etee ko nde mawnde .
Nde ɗum ɓenni , Aadama jooɗii e dow min-bara kaŋŋe , walla mbiyen daŋkel kaŋŋe , caggal ɗum Aadama ummii darii e dow minbara hee ina jogii e junngo mum sawru ina haayaa kaŋŋe .
Nde ɗuum gasi , seedanteeje tolno goo ndokkiraa , wonande ɓeen almudɓe njeetato ( 8 ) jannguɓe haa kebindii oon tolno .
Ndee .
Ndee annama duunde haawniinde , mugoore , muuyoore ko jaribtoonde saɗne .
Ndee darnde famɗaani , ko nde suusnoore artirde neɗɗo oo e nder renndo .
Ndee deftere ari ko ñawndude jejji baɗaaɗi gam teskee , jaŋngo waasa yejjiteede .
Ndee deftere e wano mayre ko gollal sellunagl wonande kala faalaad`o he6toyde goongaaji tooñaa6e .
Ndee deftere maa wonan jannginooɓe ɓee tuugnorgal ngam yuɓɓinde binndanɗe mumen .
Ndee deftere mulaa ko 1975 to muulirdu NEA .
Ndee deftere muulaa ko " Imprimerie Nouvelle " Nuwasoot he hitaande 1981 .
Ndee fedde
Ndee feere ina waawi huutoreede e nder waktuuji 6 dewɗi e maale gadane ñawu nguu .
Ndee feere jaŋde ine heewi nafoore to bannge kisnugol pinal e neɗɗaagu ɗemngal .
Ndee haalannde bonnde nde Kayis Sayed ƴeesti yerɓinii yimɓe heewɓe haa arti e pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ( ONG ) nder Tuunus e hoore mum haa he caggal mum .
Ndee hare yuumtunde e warngo yimɓe heewɓe nder leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee , hay dara jotondiraano e luure hakkunde Safalɓe e ɓaleeɓe ( sibu ɗoo , ko Pullo e Sooninko mbaɗdunoo ) , kono nde reɓii , haa nde yuumti e pelɓondire hakkunde safalɓe e senegaalnaaɓe , to rewo e worgo fof .
Ndee joɗnde ine himmi , sibu ande fotnoo dottude peeje kese toɗɗiiɗe winndere ndee kala ngam dartinde doostagol keew-guurɗiwol , e wiltinde ɗum , yeru yettaade faandaare wiltinde tataɓal leyɗe e diƴƴe ɗoo e hitaande 2030 .
Ndee ladde ina heewi ndiyam .
Ndee luurnde haawniinde ena joota tago-leydiyanke , yimiyanke e daartiyanke hay nii ndiwriyanke .
Ndee maayde ina jogii maaɗe tati : nattugol kette ɓalndu hattande dillinde koye mum en , dartagol foofaandu e nattugol terɗe ɓalndu nootaade ( woni hay so joom mum sumaama , walla yuwaama huunde ekn , terɗe mum noototaako , ndillataa ) .
Ndee tawnoo en ƴewtidii e yimɓe ɓee , en lamdike ɓe no kuutooroo ɗee mejaaje rendo .
Ndee toɓɓere alaa e sago njaajno-ɗen heen !
Ndee toɓɓere komiin oo ina foti sakkande ɗum feere .
Ndee wonnoo hina heewi ko dañata e yimɓe , sibu Nde wonnoo hina heewi kulle bayɗe no jawdi lakde , pera , kam heddoo , ko ɗuum waɗi , so jawdi ladde ndii ferii , heddotoo tan ko ndi wuro ndii .
Ndee yamre Unicode ena ɓeydaa e mum hakke 22% humpito e yerondireede e yamre ɓennunde ndee .
Ndee yamre betaa nafata ko yiylaade pergitte e caɗeele foti ko e fulo walla e yuɓɓo wanngorde ndee .
Ndee yeewtere heɓiino kadi yaltineede e emisiyoŋ Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar to Rajo Muritani ñalnde 20/12/1989 .
Ndee yirwere nde daaliiji , ɗi semmbeeji ɗi nawdetaake e ɗe leydi nguuraandi hannde ndii , ndesnoo , mari ɗum e potal ceekngal ɓooy e dumunnaaji , haa keɓi rontinde en ndee heewandere pine e ɗemɗe kan e degrewe deenooje maho majje e kuuɓal , ɓaawo enɗam pinewam , ɗemɗewam e guurɗewam keɓɗam ñooteede hakkunde majje .
Ndee yiyannde tuugiinde e jannginirgol ɗemngal neeniwal tawo , ine rokki ɗemɗe winndereeje ɗee himme mawɗo sibu ine wallita tafngo renndooji udditiiɗi , ine wallita nguurdiigu pine e jiyanɗe aduna ceertuɗe .
Ndee yontere fuɗɗori ko hiraande fedde jaayndiyankooɓe galle laamorɗo etee reɓo ngoo woɗɗoyaani .
Ndee ñaawoore ko huunde mawnde wonande Mayram Sankara , jom-suudu Thomas .
Ndee ñaawoore waɗii sabu heɗagol toppitiiɓe wullitande e dow makko .
Ndee ƴiiwoonde , maa nduu mobbooru walla wuubiliiru , yahii haa diiwaan Kiifa Muritani , haa Ndar Senegaal , liɓori heen nanndolla koloñaal Federba .
Ndee ɗoo eɓɓaande , he yiyannde fedde ndee , ari ko ɓeydaade joñde ɗemɗe Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof , e ɓeydaade fawde e majje ɗemngal arab ngal .
Ndee ɗoo hiirde heddiima e daartol wuro Fonndu , ngam weltaare huuɓtodinnde nde sukaaɓe Fonndunaaɓe ngaddani leñol ngol , so jannginde sukaaɓe ɓee ɗemngal mumen , e nehde sukaaɓe ɓee e diine mumen , e tafde sukaaɓe ɓee e pinal mumen .
Ndee ɗoo kanum wonaa fento e fefindo , kono nde fawii ko he ganndal ngal joom mum anndi renndo mum gila nder haa boowal , ruttii kadi tabitiniri ɗum daliilaaji ƴoogaaɗi he defte binndaaɗe he ɗemngal Pulaar , Arab , Engele e Farayse .
Ndee ɗoo tagofeere kadi ena yaawi yiiloo-banngoo etee ko kayre rewi e Supiteer mawneeki .
Ndee ɗoo tagofeere ɓuri fof mawnude etee kayre ɓuri kannje fof yaawde yiiloo-banngoo .
Ndee ɗoon takkere noon , yimɓe heewɓe njaɓaani ɗum , sabu ɗum nannaaki no feewi .
Ndee-ɗoo winndannde ɓurat-noo jogaade goonga ko nde Alajji NJaay jokkondiraa , haaldaa ngam addande renndo ngoo ko woni jaabawuuji makko e ɗee naamne .
Ndee-ɗóó ñawannde , ɗemɗiyaŋkooɓe pulaar cafrii ɗum sabu Yèro Sylla hóllirii e deftere mum wiyeteende Grammaire moderne du pulaar , Dakar , Les Nouvelles Editions Africaines , 1982 , hello 207 , caatagól ɓe caatii kuulal Seŋngoor e oon fannu .
Ndeen
Ndeen , ko laamu tan welanoo uddi enternet .
Ndeen , nde aduna weli , maaje e caalli keewi liɗɗi , en njiytaano liɗɗi maaje kaaɗɗe , subalɓe ena ngummotonoo e gure mumen , koɗoya e ceene , tiima e lugge , ngona e awde fotde lebbi .
Ndeen , o wiyi mi saŋkii ko neenam .
Ndeen , so neɗɗo aandaama , wiyatee ko " kaalanee mo goonga " .
Ndeen , yimɓe njeegomo ( 6 ) cankinooma heen , heewɓe kadi ngaañii .
Ndeen , yiyannde noon o hawraano ɗum e musidɓe makko heewɓe .
Ndeen Ahmadu Tumaani Tuure wonii hoyreejo laamu luɓal yuɓɓini cufal Pr Alfaa Umaar Konaare toɗɗaa sukkiti bawɗi wonde hoyreejo gadano cufaaɗo e potal .
Ndeen Haalirde Ngenndiyankoore leydi ndi habrii maayde makko wirwirnde makko ñalnde heen to genaale Hamdallaahi ɗeɓii finnirde laamu ngu , sabu yiɗɓe makko fof ñaññu mbi’i ko o baraaɗo mbaɗdi ngar mi ngaraa e polisaaɓe wuro ngo , heewɓe ngaañaa ; woodi kadi uddaaɓe e kasooji .
Ndeen Laamaka nanii ɗuum tan , fokkiti yahi to baaba mum Faynusatu , nde o yettii o haali sokla makko , ɓe nanondiri oon hokki mo Faynusatu , ko ɗum woni ɓe kumanaa .
Ndeen Nuuhu yiyii mo tan , wiyi mo " holi aan gorko baaɗo no muumunteewel ?
Ndeen Pr Alfaa Omaar Konaare jooɗiima wuurtini Modiboo Keytaa baaba mum jeytaare laawol ɗimmol , o inniraa galle walla dingiral biyeteeɗo " Memoriyaal " Modiboo Keytaa , ɗum wonnoo ko ñalnde 6 lewru korse e hitaande 1999 .
Ndeen Wullum arii haa faandii ɓe , garde biyeteeɗo Hammadi Siree oo felli .
Ndeen annabi Iisaa nanii ɗuum tan , o ummii , o ɓoornii comci makko soori , o fayi nder saharaa , omo yaha omo ɓoosa hoore makko muuseeki ngam kulol geno toowɗo oo .
Ndeen buɓɓannde noon alaa sikke , ko huunde hoolkisaande , kewnoonde , woppunde ɓarakke jiyotooɗe he nder winndere ndee kala .
Ndeen dallingol farlinoo ko e teetanaaɓe ɓee , jooni noon ngol fawtiima e laamu .
Ndeen deftere dillinii Wadd e wonndiiɓe karim no feewi sabu mayre addude dalillaaji cuuɗinooɗi e seedantaaje celluɗe .
Ndeen diine jippinaama e maɓɓe , eɗen ngandi ko caggal leƴƴi gadinooɗi jogaade diineeji ɗii ɓe ngonnoo , kono ɓe ndartii e njuɓɓudi , gila tan to sippiro ittude e maɓɓe ngonkiiji jaasre aadee , haa e finndinirde ɓe njuɓɓudiiji renndo , ɓe ndewi e ɗee geɗe tan haa ɓe koonii .
Ndeen fedde diiwaanyankoore renndinnoo ko Sudaa Farayse hannde Mali , Senegaal , Hotto Woltaa hannde Burkina Faso e Dawomee hannde Bene .
Ndeen fedde jokkondirii enɗameeje keewɗe to bannge ballondiral nguurndam , kono kadi won yiyrunooɓe nde ko dentel almudɓe arɓe jooni tawi yiɗde mum en ko fooɗanaade e heeroraade teddungal almudaagu , ɓe mbaɗti soowrude fedde ndee : Pellel rofiseeji ( dogɓe leyɗeele mum en mooloyii he leydi Farayse ) .
Ndeen fedde jooɗii ko to leydi Farayse e gardagol Ceerno Abdullaay Lih .
Ndeen fedde ko denndaangal ɓesngu Kayhayɗi ko aldaa e faltaade ɗemngal , hiinnde , maa leegal .
Ndeen fedde ndee
Ndeen fedde reɓii haa caggal wuro Ɓunndu ferlo , jooni nii yettiima Fuuta dartaaki .
Ndeen fedde wonii ɗoon haa e hitaande 2002 .
Ndeen feere woni misiyoŋ DART .
Ndeen feewde jooni , o yaltinii leppi 9 ko jiidaani e leppi ɗiɗi gonɗi e laawol ina korii yaltude " sabu caɗeele nanondiral e fiilooɓe leppi " .
Ndeen fewjannde sariya ko lomtotoonde sariya goodnooɗo gila 2008 , tawi ko sariya juɓɓinoowo Ñaawirde Toownde .
Ndeen fittaandu naatii nder ngaandi , ndu yiiliima e nder heen teemedere hitaande , caggal ɗum Alla jippini gite e yeeso makko o feerti gite ɗee o yiytii hoore makko e ɓanndu makko ina wayi no ɓakkere loonde laaltaande nii .
Ndeen fiɓnde worworde ko e ngardiigu leydi moƴƴu tuugii , kam e hakkeeji aadee , tee Fedde Ngootaagu Afrik ( UA ) ina heɓtini ɗum e nder Jamirooje jowitiiɗe e politikaaji leydi e nder Afrik kam e Jamirooje jowitiiɗe e ngardiigu kellifaangu leyɗeele e awo e dunli .
Ndeen fodoore haa hannde huumnaaka sabu sentere hippiinde leydi ndin gila tati ibriilu 1984 hay huunde anndaa sinaa nyaamugol jawle mayri .
Ndeen geno wiyii nii Maleykaaji ɗii tan , kañji
Ndeen haawniinde ko doktoreeɓe tawii jalɓol mawngol nder ngaandi Ameriknaajo gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 42 .
Ndeen haayre ɓurnde woɗɗude inniraa ko Ultuma Thule ; hakkunde mayre e Naange ko miliyaaruuji 6 e 500 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer ( 6 , 5 miliyaar km ) .
Ndeen hare joofrata ko e poolgu koloñaal en e wolde Miijik ñalnde 31 saawiyee 1933 .
Ndeen hare ko hakkunde yimɓe makko e yimɓe Ansumaan Maane .
Ndeen he hikka 2020 ko duuɓi 112 .
Ndeen hitaande OTAN noddi Poloñ , Cekslowaki e Hongiri yo tawta ɗum .
Ndeen ibliis yiyii sonndu nduu tan , o fayi e mayru , o wiyi " eehey maa sonndu barkinndu , aan kam , to gummi-ɗaa ?
Ndeen jaŋde ine waɗetenoo to duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde ( ine waɗee haa hannde ) , fuɗɗaama to duɗal ENAJM , to Duɗal Toowngal Politeknik ( ESP ) Nuwaasoot , ine yaakoraa maa ɗemɗe ɗee mbaɗtu janngineede e duɗe laamu goɗɗe .
Ndeen jokkere enɗam roondii ko nawtude maayɓe e ko wonaa ɗuum .
Ndeen jooɗii ko Ndakaaru
Ndeen joɗnde waɗaa ko he tawtoreede jaagorɗo kalfinaaɗo jaŋde e nehdi ( ministre de l’éducation national ) Mammadu Talla , ko heewi yeewtama heen .
Ndeen kay ma a taw hay cukalon moƴƴon njahorat heen kisa !
Ndeen ko Arɓe maa Arɗooji ( teelo ko Arɗo )
Ndeen ko nanalla wonnoo , jooni en " njiyii " ɗum walla en " kumpitiima " ɗum ñalnde aset 3 sulyee 2021 .
Ndeen ko ɓurata wonde haaju majji ko dañde seto .
Ndeen laamu cañngu Jeneraal Muusaa Tarawore duumiinde , ɓittere ɓiɓɓe leydi nde juutii .
Ndeen laamɗo Dirmisil nanii ɗum tan , o tikki , o wiyi " sinno wonaano hannde ko ñalngu welnere , maa mi waratno mo bargol muusngol " .
Ndeen laana kaa feewii , heddi hankadi ko omo weltina ɓe laana kaa gasii , e wiyde winndiyanke Kisaayi : ko ɗoon Geno lonngini annabi Nuuhu yo feŋ pontooje e banngeeji laana kaa nay , e kala heen ɗo ponto woni , e ŋeña ɗum , o waɗa heen no annama yiytere nih .

Ndeen mi wiyii mi janngaani tan o haawaa no ngonirtu mi sehil Katante tawa mi janngaani Pulaar .
Ndeen miijo ngoo ɓenndii , o holliti ngo sukaaɓe fuutaŋkooɓe janngatnooɓe to Pir Sañekuru .
Ndeen min ngarii , kiirɗeeli ɗii natti waɗeede gorle , ñiiɓti ɗo am ɗoo , miin Aliiw Demmba .
Ndeen ne dee , ɓeen e rewɓe miijooji Soogel Mayga , reftooɓe e haala makko , so ngannduno mo tigi-rigi , so ɓe ngannduno ɗo o rewi haa o yettii ɗoo , so ɓe ngannduno no o wayi reerɗude e gardagol , maa ɓe ndeentotono no feewi .
Ndeen ne dee , ɗeen golle ene paamnii .

Ndeen ne dee he nder Amerik fulɓe Ginenaaɓe en pota e fuuta Toorankooɓe ɓe walla nii ɓe ɓura ɗum en heewde ko kamɓe ngadii ɗum en arde he Amerik .
Ndeen ngol seŋaama ɗo goddol foti wonde ɗoo , ngol woni e wayloraade seeɗa seeɗa haa ngol wonti goddol gaadorangol , gila e tekkeendi mum , haa e gulɗe mum , haa teeŋti noon e waɗtude nawde foofaandu .

Ndeen noon , balɗe 366 e dow tagofeere Uraanus , tawata ko eɗen njahra e balɗe 178 gaay e dow leydi .
Ndeen noon , hujja maɓɓe heen ina laaɓti , kono heeroraade ɓe oon hujja laaɓtaani hay dara .
Ndeen noon , ko ɗum fartaŋŋe mo maanaaji toowɗi , luggiɗɗi , huccude e ndii ngoodateeri huuɓnundi ndi hakkilo am fawi dow kala ngoɗndi .
Ndeen noon , mi fellitii wontude jaayndiyanke ŋanaa , mo alaa tanaa e waasde yoɓeede e yettinde kabaruuji leñol .
Ndeen noon Nuwaasoot , walla Ndakaaru e Nuwaadibu mbayanta mo ngoni ko ootoo bannge e asmaan nii .
Ndeen noon kam , janngo maa en pele .
Ndeen noon maa ɗuum wallu Fuutankooɓe e waawde tabitinde ɗemngal maɓɓe Pulaar .
Ndeen noon wonɓe ooto bannge leydi ɓee , ( les koyɗe maa , heedtuɓe ooto bannge e leydi ) ngoni ko e jamma .
Ndeen noon yo ɓesnguuji nehe njannginee kuufee , ndewindee .
Ndeen noon ɗum wallitanno en no feewi he caɗeele dental fulɓe njogii hannde ngal : waɗi noon ko ceeraagu e luure keewɗe gaddotoo ɗum en ko seertude ganndal maa faamaamuya he yoga he fannuuji nguurndam walla seertude nafooje dañeteeɗe he huunde renndaande .
Ndeen o anndinii ɓe inɗe maɓɓe , o wiyi : " mbele mi wiyaano on , mbiɗo anndi ko suuɗii e nder asamanuuji ɗii , e nder leyɗeele , e mbiɗo anndi ko puɗɗaton e ko laati-ɗon , oɗon cuuɗii " .
Ndeen o artii e nder leydi hee , o ardinaa rajo Muritani .
Ndeen o dañii duuɓi sappo , taaniiko Sammba Bukari hawri e lajal .
Ndeen o dursii , o jogiima seedantaagu makko e junngo , o woni e fellude " jihaadi " momtugol humambinnaagu e nder Pikini , kadi omo yi’loo golle haa Allah waɗani mo sutura , o naati Galle ARED Goomu Winndiyankooɓe Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ngam hebleede ko fa’ti karallaagal infoormatik .
Ndeen o gaynii ɗum mahde , o lutti ɗoon ñaawoowo goonga e fenaande haa o sankii , o ubboyaa to Palestiin .
Ndeen o jibinii ɓiɗɗo oo to nder luuro too , o yiɗi woppude ɗoon ngam ruttaade to galle maɓɓe , o woppi ɗoon tiggu oo , o ummii omo yaha , o ruŋtii tan , tiggu o hiiwtii bojji .
Ndeen o maayii kadi Israyiilnaaɓe jooɗii ko ina tolnoo e duuɓi sappo , ɓe ngalaa annabi .
Ndeen o saliima , jarani mo yahde egliis ( église ) o wonta toon dewoowo e deenoowo .
Ndeen o ummiima ɗoon o wakkii beelnol makko o lappani wuro ina wiyee Kafriin e nder diiwaan Kawlak , o jaɓɓoraa ɗoon duɗal Pulaar .
Ndeen o waali e nokku hee ngam ƴeewde sirlu mum , nde yahi haa jamma jenngi , Alla holli mo ɓure gonɗe e wuro ngoo .
Ndeen o wiyii nii , o waɗtindi ko sujjude e nder
Ndeen o wiynoo , ndeen teppere makko fawiima e Lewru : " taaɓel tokosel wonande aadee , taaɓal mawngal wonande winndere !
Ndeen o wiynoo ɗuum addanii mo roondaade donngal teddungal so " faamninde kaangol e dagagol naatde e hare so tawii jojjanɗe aadee njaɓɓaama jaɓɓugol peeñngol " .
Ndeen o yettiima o tawi gorko oo na ɗaanii , mboddi na baayi e hoore hee , na fuɗɗoo fiilaade , tan puuyɗo futtini gite , woni e lemaade , haa gite mum kawri e jammbere .
Ndeen o yiyii ɗeen geɗe fof , o fini ummoraade e ɗoyngol makko , omo mugaa ngam kulol .
Ndeen o yiyii ɗum tan , o diirani laana kaa omo nodda , omo wiya : " eehe ymaa doole daɗndooje , njaawee e laana kaa " .
Ndeen o ñaamii Rummaan oo tan , haa yettii nder reedu makko , denndaangal ko muusatnoo mo yalti e ɓalndu makko haa laaɓi cer .
Ndeen o ɓuuɓtiima heen o yarii heen , ko ɗoon o yiytii ngoraagu makko e neɗɗagu makko timmungu e mbaadi makko e ɓalndu makko timmundu , ɓalndu makko waɗti jalbude .
Ndeen oon yiilnii mo e nder asamanuuji ɗii , haa ɗi kawri , Maleyka goɗɗo kadi roondii mo , wanngodii e makko duuɓi teemedere , haa o yiyi kaawisaaji gonɗi e nder asamanuuji ɗii kala .
Ndeen oɗon nganndi pullo ina jogii heen fannu mawɗo , ina winndanaa heen deftere mawnde .
Ndeen pompiyee arii , ndeke alaa ndiyam !
Ndeen pooɗee-nduuree e buklet-baklet heewii hakkunde Modiboo Keytaa e koɗdiiɗo mum Senngoor fedde nde fusi ñalnde 22 Septaamburu 1960 , Modiboo Keytaa heɓi ndimaagu Sudaa Farayse hannde Ndenndaani Mali , tawa ko kanko heɓi fartaŋŋe politik wonde baaba mum jeytaare maa mbiyen hoyreejo gadiiɗo jooɗaade e jappeere caggal duuɓi keewɗi murteende , karwaas e kasoo .

Ndeen sahre ɗo ndaas mi mbootu am .
Ndeen so mawluuda yontii , ko damal gootal woodnoo ngam yottaade almudɓe .
Ndeen so mi yuwii mi yimtoo .
Ndeen tampere fuɗɗotoo ko gila e lewre e jabbere haa heɓi coñal , caggal ɗuum , unee haa conndi heɓee heen , waɗee mburu walla ko waawi waɗeede fof .
Ndeen taƴre naatiri ko , wonaa tan tiimde , kono ko moɗtude leƴƴi berbeer en , rewrude he koomte pinal e ɗemngal ; caggal nde ngonki hesiri joltundi ndii huuɓi tafeede , hono ko innatee capataagu walla aarabam-mberbeegu , caggal nde fitinaaji cakkitiiɗi hakkunde laamuuji pirlitaa ko adii nde njiimaadi tuubakiri ina naata , caggal nde ndiin hetti taƴe leydi kese , nde jeytaare jaɓaa , won yimɓe ngummii njaltinoyi to nder mbunndi kaɓtorɗe mumen ndee-ɗoo eɓɓaande nayeere , ɓe kesɗitini nde , ɓe ngartiri nde e nguurndam kesam pul .

Ndeen tiwaande woni ko o haɗii denndaangal ko joli e nder laana kaa resondirde haa heddii rawaandu .

Ndeen winndannde
Ndeen winndannde ina holliti wonde ko ɓe aanduɓe e ndeen feere , sibu mum yuumtude e ko ɓe njaakorinooka , so garditagol AQMI e njanngu mbaɗngu to rewo Mali nguu .
Ndeen winndannde siftorde , tiitoonde mum ko : " Ngootaagu ngenndi Muritani : kulhuli e yaakaare " .
Ndeen wolde , nde nganndu-ɗaa o luutinooma heen , waɗnoo ko hakkunde 5 e 6 lewru seeɗto 1890 .
Ndeen woni jannginde suka ɗemngal ɗiɗmal ngal wonaa ngal mum .

Ndeen yamiroore fuɗɗii ko e tonngoode 33 ( sulyee 2006 ) .
Ndeen yeewtere ndee huuɓii , naamnde e jaabawuuji puɗɗii .
Ndeen yeewtere noon addii haala mawka e leydi men , sibu wonti ko haala mawka hakkunde hilifaaɓe geɗe caggal leydi leydi Muritani e mo leydi Burkinaa , haa mo Muritani oo wiyi wonde jaaynoowo noddunooɗo mo oo riiwaama , kono caggal ɗuum tawaa woodaani .
Ndeen yeewtere waɗata ko Aaɓnde 6 to AGORA sahnga w16 haa w18 .
Ndeen yeewtere wuuri ko lebbi 19 , hawri e Rajo Ngenndi uddii .
Ndeen ñaawoore fenaande kadi jibini laawgu mawngu sukaaɓe janngoɓe ɓe he nder leydi hee kala , kono Seyku Tuure e laamu mum , huwtorii ko wonno njogitaari mum ko , ɗuum woni sokde , warde , e fiyiide haa ɓakkoo he dow ƴiiƴam mum .

Ndeen ɓe koɓɓi duƴƴal gadanal , gulaali ngulli , yimɓe fof
Ndeen ɓe ngottiima kadi haa waaji maa fooftiima , o ruttii to jakkaa , o hiiri e cokki e jeddi , jom suudu oo kañumne , nde tawnoo ko e maɓɓe jeyaa , defi defti gila law tan ɓallini kañum e wonndiiɓe mum , no naane e jooni tawi ɓe piltinii ɗum haa wiyi cer .
Ndeen ɓe njettiima , hammadi manna ƴeeŋi e lekki banni fetel mum , tan jombaajo Hammadi wonti ginal woni e toɗɗaade cide e booti .

Ndeen ɓe njiyii mo tan , ɓe naati fitina , ɓe ndonki nanngude koye maɓɓe .
Ndeen ɓe njiyii ɗum , ɓe nganndi ko ɗum goonga , tee eɗum foti harteede ko yaaccii .

Ndeen ɓe puɗɗiima

Ndeka noon , ñawndugol caɗeele yimɓe men wonɓe Farayse ko huunde heñoraande ngam falanaade ɓe musiiba dookɗo ɓe oo .
Ndeke " honndu " ɓuri ɓooyde , ɗoo ko Fuuta-Tooro jolni goɗɗum .
Ndeke , " kisal ɓurngal moƴƴude neɗɗo ( haa teeŋti he laamiiɗo ) waawi waɗande hoore mum , ko gaddanaade leydi mum ( woni yimɓe fof ) nuunɗal kam e ƴellitde pinal potal hakkeeji wonande yimɓe fof " !
Ndeke , Teen yahri ko golle hakille e renndiyankaagu Fuuta-Tooro .
Ndeke , dokkugol ɗemɗe men kala hakke mum en , ine wallita koɗdigal moƴƴal e nguurdiigu moƴƴu .
Ndeke , ene gasa tawa so en mballii ɓe haa ɓe nokkii , gooto e maɓɓe fof waɗata ko e hunuko .
Ndeke , etaade hannde daartude koɗki Muritani ko gollal caɗtungal , naamndingal wiɗto e njiylaw .
Ndeke , ko diiwaan leydi Tuunus ndii wiyetenoo " Ifirikiya " .
Ndeke , ko ko famɗi foti siirtaade e dow ko mawni !
Ndeke , ko maa ñaawoore kam e weeyo koolondiral hakkunde moritaninaaɓe .
Ndeke , maa naage ngee mut hedde hojomaaji 8 , tawa noon e oon sahaa , caafe cakkitiiɗe ɗee ko e laawol ɗe ngoni eɗe ngara , eɗen ndaara naange ngee , kono nge alaa ɗoon .
Ndeke , o liggiima gila ko ɓooyi .
Ndeke , so en njiɗii mbiyen , emin njogii dawrugol udditiingol wonannde mo woni kala .
Ndeke , so hono ngaal duɗal sosaama jooni , ɗeen pelle mbaawata tan ko jaɓɓaade ɗum e ɓeydude darnde mbele golle ngaal duɗal ine moƴƴa , sukaaɓe men fof ndaña fartaŋŋe janngirde ɗemɗe mum en neeniije , ɗemɗe ɗee ɓamtoroo heen , leydi ndii kala naftoroo ɗuum .

Ndeke Riisi waawi heɓirde diƴƴe gulɗe ɗee tan ko he nokkuuji seeɗa : rewrude he geec Ɓaleejo , faade geec Mediteraane , haa yettoo Piiltiiɗe ( Océans ) .
Ndeke Santar Aamadu Maalik Gay , gaagaa wonde ɗum dispaaseer gite , nokku keblirɗo mecce , e nokku coftal ɓalli , ko o galle renndo Pulaar he nder Ndakaaru kadi ko o maande ( symbole ) filñitaare ƴellitgol ɗemngal Pulaar , pinal e daartol Fuutankooɓe .
Ndeke TPI ena njogii gese cooyɗe ɗe ndemaaka tawo .
Ndeke Vunndu men ndu vulnaten nduu ari ko ittude wirnaango hakkunde almuvve e seeremve mum en .
Ndeke alaa e sago sehilaaɓe makko , walla dañnooɓe fartaŋŋe anndude mo , ngoya mo .
Ndeke alaa e sago tagopeeje ɓurɗe woɗɗude naange ɗe duuɓi mum en ɓura juutde !
Ndeke alaa e sago ƴeewen nde ɗemngal pulaar woni e faaɗtude .
Ndeke alaa potɗo hiiɗeede e nekkeede e nder renndo , laŋkaaɗo ko jeyi , gammbaaɗo ko tooñaaɗo .
Ndeke annduɓe men ko faati e mahdi ina mbaawi tiimtaade heen ngam mahande en ɗuhorɗe ɗe coklaani wulneede walla ɓuuɓneede , jondiniiɗe e koye mum en .
Ndeke aɗa waawi hoɗdude e neɗɗo e nokku gooto ɗoo e Farayse ( yeru ) , kono so on njeyaaka e leydingootiri , a juulat hannde , kaŋko o juula jaŋngo .
Ndeke balɗe ɗiɗi to Uraanus , ngoni hedde ñalawma men gooto .
Ndeke daakaa ko tuddunde subalɓe awooɓe .
Ndeke daartol ko tinndinoore mbaydi koddigal leñƴi e yimɓe .
Ndeke dokke ɗe ina njogori arde !
Ndeke dottude keerol hakkunde conce , ɗemngal e ñeenal leñol wonaa huunde newiinde sabu ɗee geɗe
Ndeke duko miijooji fotaani wonde waawnere ; ko paamondiral e mo woni kala rimɗande hoore mum e miijanteendi mum e diine mum .
Ndeke en mbaawaa faalkisaade sabu ñaawoore ko ñaawoore , potal ne ko potal .
Ndeke ena waawi taweede heen miliyaaruuji lebbi .
Ndeke enen fulɓe , hersinaaki e men huutoraade helmere ndee : eɗen mbaawi wiyde ɗum meteworit ( walla meteyorit ) so en mbelaama .

Ndeke mi
Ndeke mi faamii hol ko waɗi laamɓe men diiñaade e laamu caloo tellaade !
Ndeke mi famɗinaani hiirde sukaaɓe ndee sabu miɗo anndi hakilantaagal kesal gongal e jolde e maaɓe : yiɗde hoore mum , daranaade pinal mum .

Ndeke nde mbeewa yahi ndee , yiyi jaaɓi ciiñki jaaɓe .
Ndeke ndee feere maa addan en naatde yonta keso wonande wiɗto nder weeyo .
Ndeke neɗɗo yaltaani e mbaroodi maayo mbiyeteendi rekin ( requin ) gaadanteejo hono no sikkiranoo haa e oo sahaa .
Ndeke ngon-ɗen ko e yiylaade anndude ɗo aadee ummii , e hol no nguurndam fuɗɗorii .
Ndeke ngonka renndo e dawrugol ina mbaawi sabobinde ngartam moƴƴam maa mbonɗam .

Ndeke noon , eɗen mbaawi wiyde so fedde Goodal teddinii ɓe ɗoo ɗiɗo , Ceerno Baha e Hamme Lih , ko haani waɗaama kadi haanduɓe heen ne mbaɗanaama .
Ndeke noon , he no ɓe uddiri diiño maɓɓe ñande heen , " ko ɓe fedde udditaniinde kala moritaninaajo he kala leñol e ɗemngal , fellitɓe jokkude ndee ɗoo darnde ngenndiyankoore nder jamyamaagal , haa nde oo ɗoo hujja humtii kala , ɗuum woni : Laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee kala " .
Ndeke noon , kala laamiiɗo leydi ndii janngo walla yiɗi fooɗanaade lefol laamu , maa jaran ɗum yaɓɓude koyɗe mum yaha toon mbele ene heɓe ballal Fuutankooɓe .
Ndeke noon , so oo genndiyanke siftoraama , alaa e sago mi seedtanoo mo e ngaal gollal dimal kollirngal himme e darnde makko .
Ndeke noon almudɓe ɓe e jibnaaɓe mumen potaani wi’de ko betaaɓe e o ɗo bak .
Ndeke noon kala e leñol he waawɓe aran’de ɗe o tottat ɗum en .
Ndeke noon mo woni kala miijo mum ene ɗaɓɓa , kadi ene tijja .
Ndeke noon so santar o jokkii jogaade jeese mum ɗiɗi fof , wonde nokku mo ari ndenndi en , alaa paltoor , kala katojinɗo e ko ɓe ngollata koo so aranii ɗum heɓat heen hakke mum , tawa alaa heedi-heeda , tawa kadi omo jokki wonde galle renndo Fulɓe , ɗuum ko himme Ceerno Bah .
Ndeke noon so tawii Ndenndaandi Gaboo dawrii mawninde ñalawma jeytaare mum ina wayino ko kamɓe njeyi oon ñalawma nii .
Ndeke noon so tawii en ƴettii ñalawma eɗen ciftora mo ko huunde haannde no feewi , kadi fotnde ñemmbeede .
Ndeke noon so tawii ko innde renndinnde , ko innde adannde ndee fóti ɗowde ; so tawii ko ngaddiin haala , ko ɗiɗaɓere ndee fóti ɗowde .
Ndeke o tinaani o maataani tan , haa ndiyam ɓuli les koyɗe puccu makko nguu , ngu ronki daraade , o ruttii to bulunŋe makko tibboore too ( pyramide ) , toon ne jaaƴnde alaa toon , ngam ndiyam huftidinii aduna oo fof , wontii bempeƴƴe , alaa ɗo heddi e dow leydi .

Nganndi noon so
Nganndinal ( ganndal ) ñaawii hafeere eddaaji leƴƴi .
Nganndu-ɗen heen ko seernaaɓe ɓee tuugii ko e Lislaam , calii keeferaagu e ruggooji bonɗi ɗi Hasaneeɓe lorliri safalɓe heddiiɓe ɓee , kañum en e ɓaleeɓe .

Ngati
Ngati , nde ganndal fuɗɗii yaajde , ɗemɗe kese njiɗii naatneede e gannde Ngaandi , tawaa ASCII yonataa .
Ngati Espaañ ena haandi e nawde oo martaba sabu ko kamɓe tan nduumii e heɓde njaltudi maɗndi faayiide e kawre maɓɓe ɗe ɓe petti ɗii duuɓi kala .
Ngati aɗa waawnoo
Ngati baɗe mayri kollitaa ko he dingiral peñcu , waɗde eɗe mbaawi ñaawreede no laaɓtiri .
Ngati ena haawnii so won ko ŋakki heen sabu ko toɗɗe muuɗɗe hakke 300 miliyoŋ e kaalis Oroo !
Ngati fiɓnde ina naamnii ko ɓuri ko goongɗingol naamnii koo .
Ngati ii duuɓi kala , yolnde hakkunde majje ena faaɗta !
Ngati ko hoɗdiro yani e kaa laana , ruuɗotaako !
Ngati ko mi ɓiɗɗo reendo , ndeen noon alaa ko toɗɗotoo renndo ko woorata mi .
Ngati ko ñalnde 19 Microsoft ( jeyɓe Windows ) njaltini yamre hesere ndee , inniraande Internet Explorer 8 e ɗemɗe 27 .
Ngati lekki mum alaa so wonaa ɓe kaɓtoo .
Ngati so radaar paanii , ɓe ngata haa ɓe naata e ƴiiwoonde tawa ɓe tinaani !
Ngati so wiyaama Pulaagu tan go’to e men fof ƴiiƴam mum siirtoto laabi keewɗi , waɗi noon ko jeyeede e leñol ngol .
Ngati teewu bamɗi tugi ɗii alaa rewam e wiyde maɓɓe .
Ngati ɗee-ɗoo golle kaalaaɗe ko kanko woni jaalal tammbingal ɗumen e fannuuji keewɗi .
Ngati ɗemngal wonaa tan nanondirde e wostondirde kumpital nafata .
Ngati ɗiin yontaaji hay gooto ummotaako wiya ena

Ngeel laanel gollinooma
Ngeel tokosel ngel , Alla wallii kam hanki dañii fartaŋŋe waawii tawtoreede ko Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar yuɓɓini ɗoo ko , kañum ne waawii anndude Fedde nde : ɗum noon ko yettere Alla !
Ngeel ñalel noddirtee ko Jarga , ko kanngel ɓuri yooɗde etee ngel dañaani tawo lebbi jeetati .
Ngeel ɓinngel jibidinaa e nofru kala ferƴere kaŋŋe .
Ngel dartii ngel wiꞌi , e konngol gondungol e nehdi e teddungal : Yaafo mi dey jullaare , mi yiyaano ma .
Ngel dey yettaa ko Demmbele .
Ngel eeɓel
Ngel jeyaaka e pottitte ɓurɗe yooɗde nde tawnoo , ko ina ɓura waktu maa mbiyaa fuku oo heediri ko bannge gooto : yimɓe fof paayti Farayse , nde tawnoo jooɗiima 80 hojom ina riddana heɓtaade baalle ɗiɗi .
Ngel leela dañde ɓanndu .
Ngel moyli , ngel jokki laawol .
Ngel saloo ñaamde .
Ngel seeraani e fittande deegowel ngel bolol mum , sibu ko kanngel diwata , ngel fota bolol ngol , haa deegowel ngel waawa woomaade kaaƴe , e tule ceenal , e gaasaɓɓe goɗɗe gonɗe he Mbaañ .
Ngel sifortee ko no " deftel-alla bulewel " nii sibu ɗalduɗe naange ɗee koftortoo ko no bibje nii .
Ngel wiꞌi ko kanngel yuppata ndiyam ngulɗam ɗam e cofel .
Ngel woni ko e maayo Japon .
Ngel yul sakket oo , ngel ñaami lekkon manngo tutanookon , bonni keddiikon kon .
Ngele dey yiɗi tan ko yo en mbele .
Ngemmbee , dadee haa daña semmbe .
Ngenaar ; 3 .
Ngenndiyankaagal makko , jaambaraagal makko , golle makko politik e senndikaalyaagal keɓii hurtiyoyde Modiboo Keytaa kasoo cili keewɗi , kono ɗum fof tagaani mo hollude keeci ( hulde ) .
Ngenndiyankooɓe leñol yoo eere .
Ngenndiyankooɓe ɓee paddoyii ɓe to Fum el Bath ; Koppolaani tini ɗum taartoyii , rewi Rey , yani e paabi Barakna , ɓeen piyi mo baral , kono mbarmin mo tan .
Ngesa baa noon liggey mum feewaani gila adan , ko ɗum tagi heewaani ko dañaa heen liggeede .
Ngeña firti e Pulaar ko giɗli umminooji gorko feewdee debbo walla debbo feewde e gorko fawaade e cellal ngoraagu gorko e ndewaagu debbo fof .
Ngo adorii ko hakkunde sehilaaɓe walla tolnondirɓe e dingire Watsap .
Ngo dañii ko duuɓi teemedere .
Ngo fuɗiima gila 02 nduu lewru , ngo gasata ko ñannde 19 lewru nduu .
Ngo humpitiiɓe jaraale gure njooftinta e " wajjuɓe ndeeni " .
Ngo jogii tan ko yeeso wooto , yeeso fellitɓe , ɓe ngaanaani .
Ngo lommbii tan ko ɗo hakkunde ɗoo .
Ngo takkii ko e wuro subalɓe wiyeteengo Mbaañ .
Ngo teskaaki hakke siwil en riiwanooɓe e golle mum en kam e waraaɓe e ewenmaaji 1989 e caggal mum .
Ngo waɗi ko leeɗe jeeɗiɗi : Haataar , Caskon , Perlel , Neereyel , Jammel , Jam-ɓuri e Siñcaan .
Ngo waɗi ko subaka 28 sulyee 1976 , waktu 3ɓo e hojomaaji 42 , ngo boomi wuro ngo e nder leƴƴanɗe seeɗa .
Ngo woni ko e departemaa Welingaraa nder diiwaan Koldaa .
Ngo woni ko fuɗnaange-worgo Nuwasoot , hedde pooɗteeki 1200 kilomeeteer .
Ngo woni ko hakkunde Bagodin e Woolum Haataar , worgo laawol berkangol hakkunde Ɓoggee e Kayhayɗi walla hakkunde Kayhayɗi e Ɓoggee .
Ngo yannoo ko e laamorgo Turkemenistaan , ngo heli ngo ha ngo ɗiggi .
Ngo yuumti e tuumgol yimɓe 9 jeyeede e wallitɓe warngo ngoo .
Ngo ɓuri ɓadtaade ko Waasetaake .
Ngol Lappol waɗi ko e ballondiral e Fedde wiyateende " Fedde ngam faabaade wonduɓe e rafi ƴiiƴam e Muritani " , kanum e Fedde wiyateende Santé Sud .
Ngol dokkol fawii ko e tuugnorgal ASCII ( American Standard Code for Information Interchange ) woni denndaangal kuule kuutorteeɗe ngam winndude ɗemngal engeleere .
Ngol dé so ari leydi fraysé mbidda yidi tindé .
Ngol etoo ñemtinde tawa ngol muɓɓaani gite , woto ngol ñemtinde ko moƴƴi e ko moƴƴaani fof , walla ko yahdaani e jatti finaa-tawaa maggol , sabu ɗuum ko ko reenatee mooftee , nde wonnoo ko ɗuum woni ɗaɗi leñol .
Ngol heewi toɗɗaade ko neɗɗojeyaaɗo e leñol daaroowo o .
Ngol hirndani Buruuji e Butannda .
Ngol hirndani Garlol ɗo ngol yuɓɓini joɗnde mawnde .
Ngol jokki faade Seeno Busaaɓe , ngol ñaltoyi Haayre Golleere ɗo catal FƁPM sosaa , hade maggol joftoyde Baabaaɓe Looti .
Ngol keerol ngol neɗɗo taccata jookoo nder gawu hee , wiyetee ko wiiwaano wuddere ɓaleere .
Ngol koolol no wi’ee " Fada Slam Wallu Almuudu " .
Ngol laawol , ɓe ngardi ko ɗiɗo e ɗiɗo , eɓe ɓoornii ko wutteeji goobaaɗi goobu " Maali " laaɓtuɗi , eɓe njogii ɓirduɗe e buruɗe maɓɓe !
Ngol laawol noon , kelme ɗee ɓurii teemedere fawnde !
Ngol laawol woni noddude Wagner yo lomto koninkooɓe Farayse ronkanɓe seɓɓitiiɓe jihaadiyankooɓe .
Ngol lefol ko ganni tigi to baŋnge fiyngo mum muumre ( acoustic ) sabu ko gitaar makko kaŋko Maalik woni ƴiyal ngoon fiyngo .
Ngol rewi tawo ko to meer Haayre Mbaar ngam teddinirde ɗum .
Ngol rewi to Muta ( Muta Alla ) , ngol ñaltoyi Wul Yenje , ngol hirndani Kiifa , kono nde ngol ari haa Lahras Jam-Jam , ngol tawi caaɗngol ngol ( Riiɗi ) ine heewi ndiyam ( waame toɓooji ) , ngol waali ɗoon .
Ngol rewri ko Pakistan e Jibuti e Kenyaa e Misra hade maggol joofde Marsey ( Marseille ) .
Ngol salminoyi haakem .
Ngol tabitingol wayi tan ko neɗɗo daroo wiyee yo ƴatto hoore mum walla yo huɗ hoore mum nii .
Ngol waɗata tigi ko to Jowol , so Allah haajii , hayso lajal ngal dottaaka tawo .
Ngol waɗi ko gane-gane , a ngol waawi yettaade 10 m njuuteendi
Ngol waɗi ko yimɓe noogaas njeetato rewɓe e worɓe , ko jiidaa e fiyooɓe bawɗi .
Ngol woni goo ko kippuuji Afrik joy tawtoraaɗi kawgel ngel , heen kippu kala hawii hay so laawol gootol .
Ngol woni go’o ko kaɓirgal ngal aadee feewni , ina etoo taccude weeyo naange .
Ngol woni ɗimmol ko Karl Barry Sharpless ine heɓa nobel .
Ngol yahi Worti , ngol yuɓɓini ɗoon dental ( ɓe kuniima sompude ɗoon Catal ) .
Ngol yaɓɓaama ɗoo kadi jaɓɓungal mawngal , ngol yuɓɓinii ɗoon joɗnde mawnde e yeewtere heewnde faayiida .
Ngol yillii waali , haakem e meer wuro ngoo .

Ngol-ɗoo
Ngol-ɗoo konngol waynii ko e hunuko Maalik Sadleer jaagorgal kalfinaangal ndema e ngaynaaka e tuma nde o ari udditde ngol-ɗoon koolol ñalɗi pinal aynaaɓe .
Ngolɗoo " Dokkitgol muritaninaajo aadeyaagu mum " nooynangol , rewrude e dimɗingol e keɓtingol timmungol , maa addantuno mo heɓtude mbaadi makko fof e ndimaagu makko kala , so wonde aadee timmuɗo .
Ngolɗoo jeɗgol njeenaaje e teddule huutortoo ko coodgu ngam suddude jinngere tuugiinde e jiidigal .
Ngolɗoo keɓtingol ɓurondirngol mbaadiiji gorwori leydi men kesiri ndii , dalliniraa ko konngol " dokkitgol muritaninaajo neɗɗaagu mum " ( repersonnalisation de l’homme mauritanien ) .
Ngolɗoo konngol ko denndangol , ko konngol ganndal ; kono gooto e maɓɓe fof , e ɗemngal mum wiyata ko hoodere siirtatoonde , walla hoodere dogoore , ekn .
Ngolɗoo konngol ɓeydi lolleende Winii .
Ngolɗoo laawol noon , yimɓe mbiyaa ko ɓoggol nawowol kabaruuji gonngol nder geec taƴi !
Ngolɗoo lappol fokkitii kisa ñalnde 16 jolal 22 caggal nde dirtinaa he cili keewɗi .
Ngolɗoo waɗi cili 16 ko wondiiɓe Ceerno Aliw Bah ene poola e ngelɗoo kawgel .
Ngolɗoo ɓoggol maa paroy e hitaande 2023 walla 2024 .
Ngon-ɗaa ko e firtude e bonnude ko njahatno-ɗen .
Ngon-ɗen ko e renndo tonngaango e geƴƴelal gootal , kabrondiral ngal enternet weeɓtini kono ko ɓuri heewde e men ƴoogata kabaruuji mumen ko e pokopokolam ko goongɗi koo ceɗta e men naatat e tewru nduu .
Ngonen e jam .
Ngonka mum ine henaninoo nguurndam .
Ngonɗo nder laana ndiwoowa ngonka hedde kilomeeteruuji 4 , waawa ni yiyde neɗɗo ngonɗo leydi alla e makko famɗitde , en kaalaani ni ko ɓuri ɗoon toowde .
Ngonɗo nder laana ndiwoowa ngonka hedde kilomeeteruuji 4 , waawaa nii yiyde neɗɗo ngonɗo leydi Alla e makko famɗitde , en kaalaani nii ko ɓuri ɗoon toowde .
Ngoo boomii gure Tokiyo e Yokohama , cumuuli mawɗi nduppitii ; fotde 142 000 neɗɗo mbaasii heen pittaali mum en .

Ngool baylogol fawinoo ko e njaaweeki huunde , dille huunde ; fof noon e njaaweendi caafal .

Nguun
Nguun " seedanfaagu " mbinndaangu maa bayyine ko neeɓaani O huniima tee o ruttotaako , waɗde ngaal gollal daartol ngal daartiyankooɓe men hannde poti ummanaade ko yaaccii .
Nguun cumu ñoomre nder ceeɗu pulum , ndeɓoowu nder renndo ngoo fotii waɗaneede faddo-cumu , mbaasen yawde doombel sibu mum waasde yonde sasa , kono njaggiren ɗum ine waawi yulde sasa .
Nguun goomu maa addan en : • Yaltinde goonga e anndude tigi rigi bone baɗnooɗe ɗee ;
Nguun goomu noon wasiyaa ko yo darne ko adii 31 oktoobar .
Nguun laamu nde follaa e ut 2005 , henndu wellitaare fuɗɗii wuttude , woodi dame puɗɗii udditaade , ko e ɗeen corki-ɗen .
Nguun laamu nde follaa e ut 2005 , henndu wellitaare fuɗɗii wuttude , woodi dame puɗɗii udditaade .
Nguun mabyliigu jibinii pinal kesal he nder Orop , ngal ɓe inniri yonta " jibtineede " , ( La Renaissance ) .
Nguun neɗɗaagu keeriingu ina rokka ɓe hakke totteede seedantaagal jeyal tawa ina sinnda doggol timmungol kala binnditaaɗo e sahaaji peccitagol leydi ndii .
Nguun ngalu , caggal ballal Alla , yalti ko e warñeende ɓesngu wuro Fonndu , gila e wonɓe ɗoo e nder wuro ngoo , wonɓe e nder leydi Muritani , Senegaal , Gammbi , Mosammbik , Konngo Barasawiil , RDC Konngo , Gaboo , Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik , Farayse , Belsik , Itali e Espaañ .
Nguun ngalu yalti ko e jiifa Fedde Ɓamtaare Ŋawle e saraaji mum .
Nguun njillu , nehaande daari keewɗi ganndaaɗi , paytunooɗi e nguurndam makko , nawii mo haa leydi safalɓe , to laamanteeri Eli Ben Zekri e to laamɗo sooninke Tunka mo Tiyaabu ( sara Bakkel ) .
Nguun njillu musidaagal e ɓiɗngu yummaagu waɗi ko ñalnde 26 lewru ndu ngon-ɗen ndu , fa'ndaare maggu ko hesɗitinde hoolaare makko teeŋtunde fa'de e Belees Kompaawore go'to e maslooɓe maa ƴeewooɓe no deeƴal duumorii .
Nguun njulaagu tuugii ko e tuugorde newiinde : " haɗ maa wonde ko potno-ɗaa wonde walla ɗo potno-ɗaa wonde ko sabu won neɗɗo goɗɗo heed maa e arsuko maa .
Nguun nokku ena siftina mi njillu am to Mbaañ hitaande 1979 ngam nootitaade e ɓaarle almudɓe ceerno Kodda .
Nguun ñalngu noon ina hawri e ñalnde aljumaa caggal tiisubaar e waktuuji men hannde .
Nguun ɗoon liingu tinaani tan haa liingu ngoɗngu hirɓii
Nguurdam nattuɗam ñalnde 11 Korse e hitaande ndee .
Nguuri ko ngonka caɗtuka .
Nguurndam Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko huunde mawnde heewnde nafoore e leñol ngol e ɗemngal ngal .
Nguurndam ine woodnoo to Mbaañ ko ina wona duuɓi miliyaaruuji 3 e feccere haa 4 , sahaa nde feeñi he Leydi men ndii .
Nguurndam kulle lakde ko ɓuraa doole , kalaa heen peewnitiingel e goɗngel ngel warat .
Nguurndam leñol ngol ne kay ne dartotaako , ko ko jokkata .
Nguurndam makko fof o waɗi ɗum ko he haɓaade humam-binndaagu e majjere rewrude he janngin’de e ƴellitde ɗemɗe ngenndiije Afrik , teeŋti noon e neenewal makko Pulaar .
Nguurndam makko kala , ko haɓanaade leydi ndimɗundi , kam e potal leƴƴi leydi makko e nuunɗal nder renndo .
Nguurndam men kala , wontii hannde ko ɓaŋŋintee , hollude ɗaŋre ndee ngonka mum .
Nguurndam saareyeejam tawetenoo tan ko to Worngo-arabeeri too ( Yamen ) .
Nguurndam ɗam nganndu-ɗen ɗam tawaaka toon tawo .
Nguuɗoo mbayliigu nanondiraangu fuɗɗotoo siyneede ko e hitaande 2011 .
Nguuɗoo njangu mbaɗngu nder ndee nokkuure , ari ko ɓaawo nde leydi Alseri tuumi laamanteeri Maruk warde yimɓe mumen tato siwil en nder lewru 11ɓiiru 2021 , otooji maɓɓe mbommordaa keerol hakkunde Muritani e Alseri .
Ni woni o mo seppa hakkunde felloje ɗiɗi ɗe , o mo waɗa yah-ngarta haa woni laawbi jeeɗiɗi4 taw omo woni to dow fello Al-Marwa to , o nani sawtowol , o wiy yo o deeƴino o heɗitoo .
Nih min noddondiri e ndeen hitaande min cosi Dingaral sakkeeɓe .
Nih woni min paamondiri e dow ɗuum .
Nii Yiilirde maggal arwannde lelorinoo
Nii woni
Nii woni , Jeeriyel Tummbere wonti Hajjirde e wanngorde gila e ngenndiyankooɓe haa e wiɗtooɓe ɓaleeɓe e woɗeeɓe .
Nii woni , e ballal Alla , e caggal yah-ngartaa e jokkondire keewɗe , e ballondiral e musiɗɓe fedde nde , ko hikka Alla newni ɗum .
Nii woni , e hitaande 1935 Almaañ ƴetti kuule laawɗinooje ngañgu yahuud en .
Nii woni , e maayirɗe ut 1890 , Abel Sanndee tafi konu mum , ina heen yimɓe 400 , o tiindii fuɗnaange , feewde Haayre Law .
Nii woni , e nder duuɓi nay fat ( hakkunde 1804 e 1808 ) , e gardagol konu ndoolnungu , Usmaan heɓti laamuuji hawsankooɓe ɗii fof ( Katsina , Sariya , Nupe , Kebbi , Liptaako ) kam e rewo Kamaruun .
Nii woni , e ngalɗoo daawal , 30 tonngoode mbaawi yaltineede .
Nii woni , guubiliiji keewaani jibineede e geec Atalantik worgo walla e Pasifik fuɗnaange worgo , ɗo diƴƴe ɗee ɓuuɓi .
Nii woni , hakindo limmore maayɓe ɓe ina tolnoo e 655 000 .
Nii woni , hay so ɓe njiɗanaano mo , Alla mo wonaa haaside oo , rokkii mo .
Nii woni , he hitaande 1968 , leyɗe winndere ndee nanondiri dartinde peewnugol kaɓirɗe nikleyeer , tee ine famɗi leydi ndi siifaani ngaal nanondiral .
Nii woni , helmere Wuubiliiru ( walla wuubiliiru ŋoriiru ) herorii ɗum tan ko geec iñnjeejo e pasifiijo worgo .
Nii woni , hoohooɓe Tooro fof , wonande gure keewɗe , tuumaa ko kam en mbari Abel Sanndee .
Nii woni , keɓtu-mi moolo , njahdu-mi
Nii woni , kuccan-mi waɗde e ɗowde wiɗtooji katojinaaɗi , kollitɗi caragol e jaajgol saɗeende ndee e ummanaade kadi waɗande ɗum hujjinaango ngam haɓde e sooynaɓooji wiriseeji rewrude e naatnugol feso mum e nder tuugnorgal fesooji gaadoraaɗi ɗii , kam e lelnugol feere ngenndiire kaɓgol e sooynaɓooji wiriseeji e cosgol Duɗal Ngenndiwal Heeño-wiriwal ( Institut National d’Hépato-virologie ) .
Nii woni , mawɗo " geese " ( système ) cañeteeɗe ɗee , nde tawnoo huutorii ko njeenaari e bellitgol bonannde , faggoo caggal ballowal ɗum , tawi woni heen ko yimɓe politik e omdafeer en reftiiɓe , ɓe o sosi , ɗum noon yowitiiɓe e makko banngeeji fof .
Nii woni , min nanngi ñalngu , mbaynii-mi Geloonga , suukara caalli e diiraango mum .
Nii woni , njulaagu kesu fuɗɗaa , nganndiraangu Njulaagu Tatiiru , ngollortoongu nii : julaaɓe oropnaaɓe comoyoo jiyaaɓe to Afrik , ɓe ngaddira ɓe doole ko leyɗe keɗe jiytaaɗe ɗee ( ko ɓe inniri " Aduna Keso " koo ) , ɓe njeeya ɓe toon , ɓe ngartira benefiis keɓaaɗo e warñeede ɓaleeɓe ndi alaa njoɓdi to laamuuji Orop .
Nii woni , o faynaa Luga .
Nii woni , o felliti wuurtinde ko ɓe mbaɗatnoo to galle ceerno makko too koo .
Nii woni , so a ƴeewii dow , laamu nguu ina jogii mbaadi Dowla keso jogiiɗo juɓɓule demokarasiije , kono nder , ngu gollortoo ko kongol laamu e yedditaare goodgol Dowla oo e hoore mum .
Nii woni , soldaat oo yahi haa yettii gorko oo , o yettini oon nelal ngal .
Nii woni , wolde Amerik woɗnde , wolde duuɓi noogaas , joofirii kadi poolgu ɓe Amerik kaɓatnoo , hono talibaa en .
Nii woni , ñalnde 23 dawraa ko wejooji to dingiral Estaad Olempik , e waɗde gollorɗi ko faati e Laamandi Wagadu , ko faati e ɗemngal e daartol e pinal sooninkooɓe , to Galle Mooɓondire ( Palais des Congrès ) .
Nii woni , ñalnde 9/11/2005 , Goomu kumpital yettinii Yiilirde Fedde ndee yiɗde mum ƴettitde Fooyre .
Nii woni , ɓayri eɗen mbaawi yiyde taariindi ndii ,
Nii woni Fidel nedi toon 50 000 " Barbudos " en .
Nii woni Hammee yahi woppi ɓesnguuji miñiraaɓe mum ɗo Barooɓe Jakel ɗoo , fayi Tummbere Gumde .
Nii woni Kataar woni leydi ɓurndi faaɗde , njuɓɓiɓinndi kawgel ngel , yeeso Urugay , 176 220 km2 he hitaande 1930 .
Nii woni Tuubakooɓe ɓee njaggi Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal , e Baydi Kacce , e Mammadu Yero Sal , e Elimaan Abuu Kan .
Nii woni Wiera woni hooreejo gadano toɗɗoraaɗo woote demokaraatiyankooje .
Nii woni asiento rokkaa Purtugeec en , caggal ɗuum Genuwanaaɓe , Holanndee en , Kompaañi Farayseejo to Gine , e Engele en kadi .
Nii woni baaba oo mettini no feewi , yamiri yo o jagge o dummbee , o leeptee kadi leepte caɗtuɗe , tawi o sumirtee ko jeyngol , haa nde o jaɓti fof .
Nii woni cargol hujjinannde nde heedii !
Nii woni diidol portol jogii toon ko mbaadi diidol
Nii woni diidol portol jogii toon ko mbaadi diidol kofingol , yeru no geɗe mbaylortoo so a ƴeewrii ɗum en caggal butel baɗɗo ndiyam nii .
Nii woni e lewru kawle 2010 , o sosi rajo Mbammbiloor .
Nii woni e lewru marse 2018 , Trump ɓeydi kubbal duwaan fotde 25% dow njamndi ( asiyee ) e koymet , sibu ko Siin fof ɓuri waawde yeeyde Amerik ɗee jamɗe .
Nii woni gila ndeen , ko arab tan e farayse seeɗa keddii he janngirɗe leydi ndii .
Nii woni hakkunde 1939 e 1945 , nasiyonaal sosiyaalisma siyni he nder Almaañ kam he nder Orop politik mumtugol yahuud en , e Tsigaan en , e ɓaleeɓe , e jilluɓe , e luuɗeeɓe , e ɗawaaɓe kattanɗe , e kala ko wonaa aryen , leñol " kaaɗtudi ndimaagu " .
Nii woni he nder teeminannde 19ɓiire , nganndinal ( siyaas ) feeñii heen tawi woni faandaare mum ko ɓetde ceerungal hakkunde aadee en , ngam lawaade ɗum , waɗa ɗum en pelle-pelle , tuugaade e ɓetooji ɓalndu ( anthropométrie ) , walla ɓetooji hoore ( craniométrie ) .
Nii woni heen dental fof toɗɗii fotɓe jooɗanaade ɗum he goomu nguu e fawaade he limoore hawraande ndee .
Nii woni heɓi toɓɓe 7 : ko kippu Afrik meeɗaa dañde .
Nii woni ina saɗannoo min huuɓnude soklaaji ɗii , tawi kadi ko soklaaji joofiiɗi nguurndam yimɓe .
Nii woni jaayɗe goodɗe ɗee , jaltooje ɗee , ko keɓi alaa no wayi " .
Nii woni jeewte mawɗe puɗɗii heen , tammbiiɗewiɗtooji keewɗi .
Nii woni jikkuuji Riisi ngarti : luulndagol mum hirnaange .
Nii woni kala leydi ɗo yimɓe amen ngoni , min toɗɗii ɗoon jooɗaniiɗo njuɓɓudi ndii .
Nii woni kikiiɗe oo lommbii hakkunde welde haa neesti e yurminaade haa ɓurti nde tawnoo o renndini ko hanki e hannde e nder dingiral gootal .
Nii woni kippuuji ɗiɗi ɗii tehondiri , fayaa waɗde e pette baalle .
Nii woni laamɓe arɓe caggal makko ƴetti tiitoonde Kaya Magan .
Nii woni lomtii mo e jappeere ndee ko baaɗiiko ; ɗum ko mbele aɓe njenanee lomtiiɗo oo ko e ƴiiƴam galle laamu hee jeyaa .
Nii woni ma en tiiɗtu tee ndañen semmbe huccande mahngo Dowla ɗooftiiɗo sariya .
Nii woni min ngari , min ƴetti mo , min nawi mo Eeleega , annduɓe mo teeŋtini ko kanko tigi woni ɗoon , o wirnaa sara Eeleega .
Nii woni ndi fawaa njoɓdi kaɓirɗe e nguura e kaalis , e kuuge goɗɗe .
Nii woni o dañi fooɗtude e yiɗde makko ɓiyi baaba makko , tokara makko Suleymaani Yero Sammba Bukaar , Tafsiiru Ɓoggel Aamadu Ly mo Jaaba , Ceerno Moolle Mammadu Aali Lih mo Cilon , Elfekki Maat mo Gaawol ( Johnson 1974 ; hello 72 ) .
Nii woni o heɓii jappeere .
Nii woni o nawi Huseynu Tantaawi , gonooɗo kalifu Ndeenka leydi , kam e Sami Annaan , gardinooɗo konu leydi ndii , alteret .
Nii woni o ronki ɓenninde golle makko , min ndartii .
Nii woni o sompi laamu tuugiingu e diine ngu o inniri " Diina " , ngu o feccitii e diiwanuuji joy , tawi heen diiwaan fof ardii ɗum ko guwerneer kooninke e dental ( diiso ) diine .
Nii woni oon ne habri wonde maa woote demokaraatiyankooje mbaɗe e leydi he " ko idii abriil 1994 so leelii " .
Nii woni pellit-ɗen yaltinde tonngoode 31 Fooyre Ɓamtaare .
Nii woni pooɗondire hakkunde leƴƴi to bannge politik goodnooɗe ko adii jeytaare , ɓeydii ŋeerde sabu kuutoragol leƴƴi e laawɗingol keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab .
Nii woni semmbe yerɓo toɓɓe 6 tolnondiri ko e semmbe bommbe atomik mo Amerik werlinoo e Hirosimaa ( 15 ujunere ton TNT ) ; semmbe yerɓo toɓɓe 7 tolnotoo ko e 474 ujunere ton TNT ; semmbe yerɓo toɓɓe 8 , 9 waɗngo jooni ngo , tolnii ko e kalito 336 miliyoŋ ton TNT !
Nii woni tonngol ko yeewtanoo e ñalawma hee koo waɗaa .
Nii woni tummbudu seernaaɓe mawni , daraaki wonti lannda goonga e goonga sabu nootagol heewɓe , toowɓe gannde leydi ndii teeŋti e ummoriiɓe to Fuuta hakkunde ( Yirlaaɓe-hebbiyaaɓe e Boosoya ) wayɓe no Tafsiir Sawa Kudi Kan mo Mboolo Biraan , Siree Ama Aan to Ngijilon , Abdul Qaadiri Kan jeyaaɗo to Koɓɓillo , dokkaaɗo teddungal e teddeendi fiileede lefol gadanol Almaami Fuuta .
Nii woni yimɓe rewo nokku Afrik hirnaange oo woni e ɓeydaade heewde yimɓe e tinde baɗte yooro .
Nii woni ñalnde 11 settaambar 2001 , Putin woni hooreejo leydi gidiiɗo noddude Geoges Bush ngam duwanaade ɗum e semmbinde ɗum .
Nii woni ɓanndu nduu feewnii hankadi kaɓtorɗe ɗe nganndu-ɗaa so wiris koronaa goonga goonga oo naatii ɓalndu joomum , law law paddoo ɗum , mumta ɗum .
Nii woni ɓe cosi Signal , ɓe mbiyi ine reena keɓe huutorɓe .
Nii woni ɓe keɗna ngolɗoo gorol huunde , gorol goɗngol goɗɗum .
Nii woni ɓe ndirti seeɗa feewde hirnaange , caggal duunde ndee , ɓe inniri hoɗorde hesere ndee Laaw Tummbere Jiinge ( tuugnaade e diiwaan maɓɓe iwdi , Laaw e innde nokku mo o hollaa oo , Tummbere Jiinge ) .
Nii woni ɓe tuumi Ceerno Sammba Jaadanaa , nde wonnoo ko jattiniiɗo , caliiɗo tuubakooɓe , jeyeede e ɓeen .
Nii woni ɗe njamiraa tawtoreede e ñalɗi diisnondiral diiwaniyankooji ɗii tuggi 21 haa 24 oktoobar 2021 , kadi e Diisnondiral ngenndiwal ngal tuggi 16 haa 21 noowammbar 2021 .
Nii wooraa fotde balɗe 24 .
Nii ɓuri naya .

Niiwnorde Hubble deŋaa ko he yirlorde lesre ( 600 km hakkunde mum e Leydi ) .
Niiwnorgal JWST ngal ɓurata raddude ko jiiryiire tageefo ( univers ) ɓurɗe ɓooyde ɗee , peeñɗe duuɓi 100 miliyoŋ fat caggal Dulɓere Mawnde ( Big-Bang ) , ko ɓuri jooni 14 miliyaar hitaande .
Niiwnorgal James Webb happani ko nokku ine wiyee Toɓɓere Lagrange ( L2 ) , hakkunde mum e men ko miliyoŋ e teemedde joy ujunere kiloomeer ( ɗanngal ngal ko lewru haa yahdi e naange ) ɗo ngal foti yettaade ñalnde 16 saawiyee 2022 , ngal deŋa toon .
Niiwnorgal James web huutoriima caafe les-boɗewol , maa waaw yiyde kuuje ɓurɗe ɗe Hubble yiyatnoo ɗee famɗude fotde laabi 10 haa 100 , ƴetta nate mum en ɓurɗe laaɓtude kadi .

Njaabtoɗen koye men .
Njaafnii mi haa mbiy mi maa mi waɗ winndannde ɗiɗaɓere mbele mi wayla ngool konngol .
Njaafo ɗon seernaaɓe am , e janngooɓe pulaar , e nanooɓe ɗum ko miijo am tan .
Njaafo-ɗee , ko hakkunde leydi ine wiyee Ikren e Riisi .
Njaafo-ɗon e konngol ngol .
Njaafozon kono ko noon yahri .
Njaajeendi dille ɗee ina wona 500 haa 1 000 kiloomeeteer ( tuggi Nuwaasoot haa Neema ) .
Njaajeendi mayre ko hedde 345 000 km takko Ostarali , kayre woni dental koraay ɓurngal mawnude e winndere ndee .
Njaajeendi mum ko 12948 km2 , ɗuum firti 68% he diiwal ngal fof ko e falnde Podoor jeyaa .
Njaajeendi yitere ndee heewi wonde ko hedde kiloomeeteruuji 30 haa 60 ( heen sahaaji ina yettoo 150 km ) ; ko nokku deeƴɗo ( alaa toɓo , kenal leefkal ) .
Njaatigi ñalawma oo noon ko Mustafa Kan , meeɗnooɗo wonde goforneer , mawɗo galle Ceerno Suleymaani Baal en hannde .
Njaaweeki jirlagol lilluɗe koode cariiɗe e weeyo fawii ko e mooɓre majje , mooɓre heen lillungal fof anndirte ko mooɓe koode ngonɗe e maggal , yanti heen mooɓre duule gaasuuji jawsuɗi gonɗi hakkunde majje .
Njaaweeki yahdu magge ko 72 .
Njaaweendi
Njaaweendi ndi haayre ndee werliraa haa nde waasi saamde e Leydi , wiyetee ko njaaweendi ɓoccital .
Njaaweendi ɓoccital fawii ko
Njaaweendi ɓoccital fawii ko he ñiso kuulel asamaan ɗo huunde ndee werlaa ɗoo : dow Naange ko ndi 617 km nder leƴƴannde ( 2 221 000 km nder waktu kala ) .
Njaawendi misil
Njaay Kan holliri tuubakooɓe ko fasata nder diiwaan Fanay koo fof ko he gardagol Aali Yero Joob .
Njaaɓanten ngol laawol ko damal III jowitiingal e Nokkuuji hurum e ndesaaje leydi ( Espaces vitaux et réserves foncières ) .
Njaggee e lamol dennde , mottee ngol ; ma on njiy , so on mottirii junngo ñaamo , on mottirii kadi nano , dennde nde no yiilortoo nii wonataa gootum .
Njaggen e koye men ( walla mba-ɗen e koye men ) , tagoore wootere ɓurnde en ganndal e karallaagal wona too , e nder dental koode tawa ena jogii lonngorde , ɓurnde lonngorɗe men ɗee moƴƴude , ɓurnde lonngorɗe men ɗee feewde e waawde liñcitde ko famɗi .
Njaggen e koye men ( walla mbaɗen e koye men ) , tagoore wootere ɓurnde en ganndal e karallaagal wona too , e nder dental koode tawa ena jogii longorde , ɓurnde lonngorɗe men ɗe moƴƴude , ɓurnde lonngorɗe men ɗe feewde e waawde lincitde ko famɗi .
Njaggen e lamol dennde nde , ngonen , ngonen e mottude ngol ; oɗon nganndi , so en mottii lamol ngol , dennde nde wonata ko e waɗde yiilioo-banngoo .
Njaggen jooni dennde , njaggiren ɗum ko kañum woni tagofeere men Leydi .
Njaggen miin ne njooɗii-mi ko e galle am , kuccitɗo e galle maa .
Njaggen tan ñalawma gooto e dow Uraanus ko hedde waktuuji men 11 , sabu waktuuji 10 pawɗi hojomaaji 49 woɗɗaani waktuuji 11 ( eɗen mbaawi faalkisaade hojomaaji 11 ŋakkuɗi ɗi , keddiiɗi ɗi ) .
Njaggen ɗo njooɗi-ɗaa ɗoo , ko e galle ma ngon-ɗaa .
Njah mi ngonmi e fiyde piyaanoo Baaba Maal toƴƴi daande mum welnde ndee , o woni yimde .
Njahat mi ko to laamɗo ngam addoyde ko joganii mi ?
Njahat mi ko to laamɗo yoɓnoyaade ñamaande am .
Njahat-mi ko to laamɗo ngam yoɓnaade ñamaande ɓooynde .

Njebbilii-mi , Keddii-mi e yamiroore maɓɓe haa ñalngu nguu ari .
Njeenaaje ɗee ndokketee joom mum en ko e Batu Kuɓtodinngu OMS njooɗotoongu hitaande kala , ndenndinoowu jaagorɗe cellal ko ina ɓura 170 Dowla e Leydi winndere ndee .

Njeeygu ɗeen tumbitte difinoo coggu kaayitaaji ( wonaano huunde saɗtunde ) kono wuurnunoo jaaynde ndee ko yarlitaare terɗe Goomu jaaynde e ko ɓuri teeŋtude .

Njettoor Guurɗo Fa’de e Banndiraaɓe e Sehilaaɓe : Ko adii fof en njettii njettoor guurɗo banndiraaɓe e sehilaaɓe annduɓe mi e ɓe nganndaa kam fof .
Njettoor ena huccinaa e mon kala sahaa sabu ko onon ngoni faarnorteeɓe .
Njettoor keeriiɗo ina haani huccitineede he wiɗtooɓe he winndooɓe jaaynde ndee , haa teeŋti noon e ɓurɗo roonndaade golle ɗee , hono hooreejo jaaynde ndee , hooreejo FEDDE ƁAMTAARE PULAAR MURITANI , ceerno Bookara Aamadu Bah .
Njettoor mawdo fayde emon aan Mammadu LIH e Sammba AN ; sammba , mbodo weltii no feewi e darnde ndaridaa nde , mbodo yaa jokku , Dende Mammadu TOURE
Njettoor ruttiima he baniraagel dewel ngel e kala dariinooɓe he lefol ngol , yoo Geno won ballo .
Njettoor teeŋtuɗo fa’de e musidɓe men daraniiɓe leñol ngol jamma e ñalawma ɓeen ngoni : Mammadu Saalif Mbaay to Neere Waalo , Aamadu Njaay to Juude Jaaɓi , Mammadu Aamdu Lih to Podoor , Aliw Kebe to Nguy , Ibrahiima Saar to Farayse , Saada Jaw to Foonde , Mammadu Bojel , Siley Bah , Kaawu am Sammba Siley Faal , Mariyaam Faal , Usumaan Gaajo Poor-Jenti , mi yejjittaa ɓesngu Neene am rewɓe e worɓe : Diiye Jool , Abuu Jool , Kummba Jool , Sariif Jool , Aawdi Jool , Daayaa Gayi cuddiiɗo makko .
Njeyaa-mi ko Siñcaañ Njaakiri kono ko mi ɗanniyaŋke , njooɗii-mi ko Konngo e wuro wiyeteengo Ponto Nuwaar .
Njibinaa mi ko ñalnde 31 lewru bowte ( décembre ) hitaande 1951 to Waande .
Njiilo ɗee tan maa met nde njiitu ɗon maa meet nde keɓ ɗon on njaaraama .
Njiimaandi ndii to nokku safalɓe ina deestii seeɗa , sibu ndi rewratnoo ko e mawɓe tirbiiji gollantonooɓe koloñaal , ɓe ɓe ɓurnoo jokkondirde , tawi noon , wonande leƴƴi ɓaleeji daande maayo ɗii , ko njiimaandi ŋaddet rewrude e mawɓe kantoŋaaji ɓe laamu koloñaal toɗɗotonoo , fooɗondirtunooɓe e laamaandi ngaadanteeri ndii .

Njiɗ-ɗen ko damal ngal wona damal gostondiral hakkunde mon e Fooyre Ɓamataare .
Njiɗ-ɗen ko suɓaade gooto e ɗii booñuuji , toɓɓo-ɗen morlere wootere tawa ko toɓɓe gonnduɗe e hasre ( woni ɗum ko en naatnat juŋngo tawa en ƴeewaani , njaltinen morlere ) .

Njogi-ɗaa tan ko doole maa , mo mbaaw-ɗaa fof moññu no njiɗir-ɗaa fof ; ɗum noon wayi kono nguurndam jawdi nii to ladde to .
Njogitaaje nguurndiweeje ina mbaawi boomde winndere ndee so mboros tookaaɗo saabiima ñawu kuuɓtodinngu .
Njogitaaje wayliweeje posnooje ina mbaawi kadi raaɓde wertallo yaajngo so mbaɗaama e ɗiƴƴe .
Njogitaari leñol noon ko nehdi e ganndal e mbaydi kuɓtodinndi , ganndal diina , renndo , cellal , faggudu , ndema e ngaynaaka haa to gannde kaaɗi , teeŋti noon gannde kese hannde ɗee Technology ( teknolooji ) , sabu heertooji e ceŋɗe nguurndam ɗee fof hina mbaawi yahdude e ngannde kese ɗee , ɗe ngari ko weeɓtinde nguurndam .

Njuuteeki jirgitte ɗe ena cowoo kilomeeteruuji ujunere .
Njuuteeki ñalawma ena fawii kadi e ŋorol gonngol e dow nokku , walla hol to nokku o woni e dow leydi .
Njuuteendi bolol ngol ko hedde 940 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer ( hiiso nganndaa ko ndi dogata e kiloomeeteruuji nder waktu gooto ) .
Njuuteendi maggol ko 17 000 km .
Njuuteendi makko ina abboo njuuteendi Aadama , caggal ɗum Alla ɓoorni mo wutte Aljanna .
Njuuteendi ɓurɗi famɗude ɗii ko hakkunde 50 e 100 km , njaru mum en ko hedde 13 miliyaar ugiyya men ɓooyɗo oo .

No Alla waɗata , e ballal teeŋtungal musiɗɗo Asmiyyu Sih , keɓ-ɗen yamiroore e mudda ( lebbi tati ) ñalnde 14 suwee 2006 , tuugiinde e sariya 023/91 mo 25/07/1991 , jowitiiɗo e jaayɗe binndaaɗe , mo Maawiyya yaltinnoo e sahaa nde " henndu demokaraasi " fuɗɗii wuttude ndee .
No Alla waɗata , laakta-ɗen muulirde wootere ( Imprimerie Destour ) ina woni ɗo BMD ɗoo , njah-ɗen toon , kaaldu-ɗen e maɓɓe .
No Alla waɗata haa balɗe seeɗa pawtii heen , kaayitol ummorii to jaagorgal kalfinaangal geɗe nder leydi ( waalii fof heɓii ɗum ) wiyde wonde kala to leppata yo reme , leyɗeele dokkooje ɗee ina kuli heege ina jogori waɗde , ɗuum waɗi sahaa ina ara , hay gooto yeeyataa , hay gooto hokataa , nde tawnoo eɓe kuli heege ina jogori waɗde : ɗum firti ko neɗɗo fof yo rem .

No foti goɗɗe he ɗee baɗe kaantoriɗɗe , e hol kiisam majje , ngee tooñannge jogori saabaade so nge fuɗɗoyiima tuugnoreede no doosgnal ñaawirteengal ?

No heddii buy ɓe addaaka tawo .
No heewi hannde sukaaɓe hutortooɓe ɗum e nder jannde maɓɓe .
No heewi wiyeede nii " ene sahee fawee , ene fawee sahee " .
No heewi wiyeede nii , " beeli fof ko njowiiɗi ɗo njowotonoo " .

No konuuji janani mbayi
No laaɓi wonnde yoga e Fulɓe hitanike SLPP , woɓɓe APC , woɓɓe NDA , woɓɓe kadi PMDC ( People's Moɓement for Democratic Change ) , no gasa woɓɓe goo hitanike pelle goɗɗe ko wonaa ɗee ɗoo .
No mawna debbo wi’etee ?
No mbaaw-ɗen goongɗinirde kaaɗoo haala ?
No mbaɗ ɗaa ?
No mbeɗu ngu sanyiraa nih , gorol fof ena taaroo hakkunde mbeɗu ngu ( ena taaroo wuddu mbeɗu ngu ) , ko noon-ne tagopeeje ɗe taardortoo naange , tagofeere fof rewata ko e laawol mum .
No mbeɗu nguu sañiraa nih , gorol fof ena taaroo hakkunde mbeɗu ngu ( ena taaroo wuddu mbeɗu nguu ) , ko noon ne tagopeeje ɗee taardortoo naange , tagofeere fof rewata ko e laawol mum .
No moti o yiilortoo bannge ñaamo nih , wonaa noon o yiilortoo bannge nano .
No naane e jooni , o wiyi gawlo makko e watulaaɓe makko , yo njah , njiiloyoo ɓiy baaba makko oo , ɓe ngartira ɗum , kañum e yumma mum .
No naane e jooni tawi o jaggii ulluundu nduu , o addi peesirgal makko ( Balance ) , o fawi heen ullundu nduu , o tawi ullundu nduu peesata ko kilooji 3 fat , ɓurtaani , ŋakkaani .

No ndeen haalannde fotiri he njuuteendi mum kala , ko noon fotirta he facciro makko .

No o wa'i ?
No paamirten ten , faandaare feere ndee ko niɓɓiɗinde dow gulli leydi too .
No peetel nyifirta tawa lewlewndu ena heddii nih , nguurndam men ɓuri ɗoon raɓɓiɗde so ɗum ƴeewndaama e taggoore waynde no hoodere .
No peetel ñifirta tawa lewlewndu ena heddii nih , nguurndam men ɓuri ɗoon raɓɓiɗde so ɗum ƴeewndaama e tagoore waynde no hoodere .
No pelle karallaagal goɗɗe ɗee nii , baaɗe no Amazon , Apple , e Facebook , Google ina huutoroo Wikipedia nder huunde e gollorɗe mum .
No tawaa e toɓɓere ɗe ɓe yewtata e dow ɗen , alhaali Ukreeniya , Liban e piili faggudu goɗɗi .
No tawaa e ɗii bagiiji , Gude cañaaɗe , wano leppi , gude Bawule , Koddiwaar , Kente walla " Kita " Ghana , " Faso danfani " , Burkina Faso , " Manjak , Senegaal , " Kanvo " Benin .
No wiyretee nii tan " koyngal e leydi , mboddi leydi , kawraani hikka hawra mo wuuri " .
No yaaruno artiri fof ɓe njottodiima ha sudu ñawirdu dowrowdu ( cour suprême ) .
No ñawɗo oo ɓuriri yaawde toppitoreede fof , ko noon ɓurirta waawde e yaawde sellirde .
No ɓuri woɗɗiroyde e nder ladde kala , ɓernde Yero ina ɓeydoo ñawde .
No ɗe kaccirta kalaace ni .
No ɗe kaccirta kalaaceni , kalaace lewre e weñaande e njooju e tammba kum e ɓammgal e ɓaar e yahataa-arataa ɗe mbaltoyaa he jiriile .
No ɗe kettirta tuuba jaambaraagal ɗe eelta kullal makam joolooli , ɗe njabba gulle pale ɗe ngaawa janaale murle .
No ɗe ndaɗɗirta yonto e jamaanu ɗe mberta heen pinal ni .
No ɗe ngoobirta wutteeji joom ñalɗi e ñalaaɗe en ni .
No ɗe njahdirta he duƴƴe hitaande ni , no ɗe nduƴƴirta taaɓe balɗe men ni .
No ɗum fattirta nii , ena saaboo dillugol leydi .
No-woniri-woo-no-woniri , ko Taylor woni lamɗo Afriknaajo arano tiindiiɗo ñaawirde winndere wano ndee , ko yowitii e bonanndeeji wolde maa bonanndeeji weño neɗɗanke .
Noddaa yoo aafto kuraaje ɗee ko lolluɓe to baŋngal coftal hono Haile Gebreselasie mo Ecoppi , Dawiid Bekkam mo Angalteer yanti e Afrik Bŋ Worgonaaɓe ɗiɗo woɗɓe .
Noddaango maɓɓe sakkitiingo haralleeɓe ɓe waɗaa ko sahtu 22H jamma ngam wiyde yoo ɓerɗe maɓɓe ndeeƴ hay saɗeende wootere heɓaaka laana Joolaa ina jokki lummbaade ina seeka bempeƴƴe mawɗe .
Noddaango ngoo fa'ti ko e goomu rewɓe ɓee , mo worɓe ɓee , kam e mo sukaaɓe ɓee .
