Noddumoomi kono mi anndaano ko njogormi wiyde mo .
Nodduɗen , ko Abdallah JOOP suka senegalnaajo gollanoowo hoore mum .
Nofru nanii kadi ko waɗtaaka ndiyam gila e jeewte paayodinɗe , daaɗe boolumbe pekaan belɗe haa e sappotooɓe mumen jirwuɓe e yeeso hooreeɓe teddungal pelle subalɓe e aranɓe Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar Muritani .
Nokku baawɗo wuureede ko nokku ɗo ndiyam ceniɗam woodi , ɗo leydi ndemeteendi woodi e ɗo mahateeji renndo denndaaɗe ngoodi .
Nokku biyeteeɗo Kirime ( Crimée ) oo yalti , heɓi ndimaagu mum , naattoyi to Riisi .
Nokku fof e aduna he , ena jogii ŋorol e jurol dewngol e mum .
Nokku ganndiraaɗo heewde taƴooɓe warooɓe , walla yanooɓe e rewɓe .
Nokku oo , Alla e mum heewɗe leɗɗe , waɗti soowireede ko " wuro-sardiŋŋe " .
Nokku oo ena waɗi cuuɗi keewɗi , keblorɗe e jeewtirɗi tawa wonaa galle sukaaɓe .
Nokku oo jeyaa ko e nokkuuji kormorɗi Japon , wonande dewal biyeteengal shinto , nokku ɗo rewɓe kaɗaa yettaade .
Nokku oo ko ladde mehre , alaa ko wuuri e makko so wonaa kulle ladde .
Nokku oo ko ɗeɓi-duunde joñiinde , hakkunde ndiyam keewɗam .
Nokku oo uddaamaa haa tiiɗi , reenooɓe ngaddaa ɗoon , hade laamu lelnude feere ngasri ɓurnde yuɓɓude e ɓurnde yaajde diiwaan oo fof , sibu hakkunde jiytal ngal e uddugol nokku oo ( yontere wootere ) tawi won koon ngeɗon puɗɗiima wujjeede .
Nokku oo waɗaama jooɗorɗe haa timmi .
Nokku oo woni ko he nder jiiryiirngal Fedannde Malaaɗo .
Nokku ooɗoo ine heewi yerɓude , kono ndeeɗoo yerɓannde ko moolanaande , hono mum wayrii gila hitaande 1 114 .
Nokku ɗo nde yiyanoo e hitaande 1930 nde , nde artata ɗoon ko caggal nde nde taarii naange , ko hitaande 2178 !
Nokkuuji jaangol mawɗi ina mbaɗi nokkuuji ɗo ndiyam fenndii , tee saayataano .
Nokkuuji jom en jawɗeele en to Tafrak Seyna kam e nokkuuji waasɓe kala njaɓnaa miijo wonde ko Siidi waɗata ko moƴƴaani e mum en .
Nokkuuji kollirgol nate e filmaaji ene njokki e yuurnitaade taarik makko , tawa e ɗu , nootoo e mbaadi politik leydi ndii hannde .
Nokkuuji ɗi nanngu-mi ngam fuɗɗaade ɗee kawritte karallaagal ko
Nokkuuji ɗii poti ko tijjaade mawnugol gure mbele yimɓe mum ina ndaña ɗo mahi koɗorɗe mum en , ɗo compi mahateeje mum en denndaaɗe ( jamaaji , jumaaji , janngirɗe , baamuule ekn .
Nokkuuji ɗiɗi ena mbaawi renndude ŋorol kono alaa e sago ɗi ceerta juri .
Noogaas e ɗiɗo ( 22 ) heddiiɓe ɓe , kañum en ndaɗndiri piɗtaali mumen ko ŋabbude e keeci laana ka , nde ka waklitii nde .
Noon
Noon , e hitaande 1475 , Portugeec en kuuɓnani Akan en to El-Mina jiyaaɓe , caggal ɗuum ɓe mbaɗti nawde ɓe to Madeer ( 1452 ) , to duuɗe Kanari ( 1484 ) , caggal ɗuum to Sao Tome ( 1486 ) ; ɗum fof ngam gollinde ɓe e gese gawƴe suukara .
Noon fedde ndee wagginiri kadi " cuɓagol e dewgol tippudi jaŋde keewɗemɗiiri sibu julyultondiral kam e muuyaaɗe demokaraasi ɗaɓɓude he almuɓɓe ɓee margol moƴƴol , ko idii fof , ɗemɗe mum en ɗe muuyni ɗee tawo , kono kadi , margol ɗemɗe mawɗe winndereeje e diiwaneeje ngam waawde yettaade renndo ɓurngo yaajde e waawde jeytoreede no haanirta nii he aduna mo nguuri oo .
Noon kadi , rajo walla tele gonɗo nder wuddere too , hay gooto nanataa ko saaktata , sibu hay onndooji njaltataa nde .
Noon ne doosɗe ɗee mbaylorii : kala jiyaaɗo gaddaaɗo , foti ƴeeŋtineede ko ɗo tufnde Lisbon ɗoo ( 1473 ) , e kala laana tiindiika Afrik ina foti winnditaade ɗo Lisbon ɗoo ( 1481 ) .
Noordi ( goobu ) nguru ɓanndu fawii ko he keewgol melaniin ( huunde wonnde nder ɓanndu ) he ɓanndu joom mum .
Nooro anndi bonannde waandu nduu no foti .
Nooro darii e les lekki kii , taw waandu ŋabbi , o wiꞌi ndu .
Nooro hesɗitini woondoore mum .
Nooro kam nana jokki e ñaagaade e yelaade ballal daddoowo oo .
Nooro naamni mo .
Nooroo nana miijoo wonde heege e ngaanuma mum ngasii , ko hannde fof laaɓata .
Nooroo wi'i mo hade makko yarde yoo ñaaw ko o tawi ɗoo koo .
Nootitiiɓe leydi Caad , Ejipta e leyɗe goɗɗe tawtoraama .
Noppi heɗatooɓe e gite janngooɓe keewdii ndee dillere .
Noppi men ena keɗii
Now , the NASA/ESA/CSA James Webb Space Telescope has captured new images of the planet .
Nulaaɓe galle Baylaa Pereejo Soh to Haawre Damga , nulaaɓe galle Almaami Abdul Qaadiri Kan to Koɓɓillo Jaawɓe , daayira Xaali Amar Faal to Pir Sañekuru e ɓesngu Suleymaani Baal ngummoriingu to Boode Laaw ndokkii ñalawma oo hakke mum haa timmi ko jiidaa biisuuji mawɗi keewɗi , gummoriiɗi to wuro Mbaaleen .
Nulaaɓe ɓee ngaddi otooji ɗii haa ɗo dingiral lammba ɗoo .
Nulaaɗo Bukaar arti Maruk ko e 1716 , ena arti e konu keewngu doole , ngu 5000 harbiyanke , liɓi laamu Gelaajo Jeegi , cankiiɗo duuɓi ɗiɗi caggal mum , ñalnde 04 kawle 1718 e Jowol .
Nulaaɗo oo ne dañii fartaŋŋe jokkondirde e kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi kewu nguu , hono Alasan Yero Njaay .
Nuldalcakkital jiyaaɓe cuuɗingal ummaade Mosammbik faade Beresil waɗi ko e hitaande1862 .
Nuldu to : ibrahima .
Nuuhu ( JKM ) noddi ɓe yo ɓe ndew Alla gooto , yo ɓe mbiy " deweteeɗo alaa so wonaa Alla Nuuhu ko nelaaɗo Alla " .
Nuuhu noddi ɗe kañje kulle ɗiɗi ɗee fof ɗe kuccondiri .
Nuunɗal yamiri ko yo o jaare , o teddinee , o fawee e joɗnde woodannde mo ; hono dow daŋki ɓeen ɓurɓe ligganaade leñol e ɗemngal Pulaar ko nafata ɗum .
Nyaagiimi on banndiraave ko hirondirde e gollaade , wonaa e wallondirde e ubbude golle yimve gollotoove e anyde zum en .
Nyaaku yahat faggoyoo ko faggotonoo ko , itta ɗum e piindi leɗɗe ceertuɗe , renndina ɗumen , waɗa ko waɗatnoo haa wonta juumri , neɗɗo juma nyaaku , yara njuumri welto .
Nyande alet 25 lewru Seeɗto ( avril ) , caggal duuɓi noogaas ko ɓaleeɓe Moritani njaltinanoo leydi mum en .
O
O aani sabu o anndaa hol laawol nawata mo to wuro lekki bukki .
O addii ɗoon kaɓirɗe keewɗe e kuwtorɗe he ko fayti e safaara , ko wayno leece hopitaal ene wonndi matalaaji mum en , jooɗorɗe ( siisuuji ) , taabe e gaŋuuji ngam safrooɓe ɓee .
O adii janngude ko e galle baaba makko e nder Fuuta hade makko yahde Muritani ngam nootitaade e duɗal Seek Faadel to diiwaan Meel walla Maal .
O adii janngude ko to duɗal William-Ponty .
O adii joɗanaade Muritani to Ngenndiiji Dentuɗi .
O adii ko jaarde Geno e ndee duunde no tagorii nii , caggal nde o werlii ndaarɗe makko e banngeeji ɗii fof .
O adii wi’de ko yo dental ngal faam wonde Fedde almudɓe wonaa Fedde dawriyankoore ( politikyankoore ) , nde daranii ko sarde diine islaam e pinal mum ɗo e nder wuro fagguduyankeewo ngo haa ko ɓenni ɗum .
O andinii wonnde si en tuugniima e lomoore njaltudi ndii , cappanɗe jeenay e jeenay piccal jeeɗiɗi kaydiiji wootiraaɗi ɗii , hooreejo Turkiya heɓii cappanɗe jowi e ɗiɗi piccal go’o .
O angisinooma e konu Farayse e hitaande 1939 , e nder taƴre konu tiraayeer Senegaalnaaɓe .
O anndini mo jooni o ñaamataa mo so wonaa ɓe ñaaawee .
O anndini raddooɓe ɓe wonde Wojere nana caggal ara .
O anndini yimɓe ɓee darnde Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani haa teeŋti e paandaale mum 4
O anndini yimɓe ɓee kadi wonde jamma oo waɗaa ko e teddungal makko , kanko Ceɗɗel Bookarel Mbay .
O anndini ɓe caggal nde Almaami duwii , Demmba maa ƴettu konngol .
O anndini ɓe nganndaano wonde so ngamri tiggu yeeɓaama tawat won nannguɗo e balabe mum .
O anndini ɓe wonde ko ɓe gootum hoto ɓe ceertu , ɓe ngona sehilaaɓe .
O anndinii renndo ngo hol ko woni darnde fedde ɓamtaare pulaar : ko janngin’de ɗemngal e diine o .
O anndinii yimɓe duɗe jarriborɗe ɗemɗe ngenndiije sakkitii doosde ko e nder Haayre Golleere .
O anndinii ɓe wonde ko e ɓanndu makko ɗum jeyaa , kono sukaaɓe ɓee keɗaaki mo .
O anndiraa he leegal he fof ko wonde jaroowo sanngara ( konnjam ) manndiloowo .
O anniyii ko ñaamde daddoowo oo e ɓesngu mum caggal nde oon yaltini ɓe e caɗeele .
O ardi ko e koolaaɗo kuuɓal makko ena wiyee Umaar Jeey Horndolde ,
O ardi ko e lappol Nuwaadibunaaɓe e gardagol Muusaa
O ardi ko e yumma makko ina hurtii galle Ceerno wuro Kuufa .
O ardii fedde ndee haa 1980 , nde o toɗɗaa yo o ardo Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije .
O ardii leydi ndi ko gila 1 oktoobar 2005 caggal nde o fooli e woote juɓɓinanooɗe ñalnde 24 sulyee 2005 , duuɓi jeegom caggal nde o riiwaa e laamu e nder wolde ɓesngu .
O ardiima Catal Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani to Kayhayɗi tuggi 1977 haa 1986 e tuggi 1988 haa jooni .
O ardiima dowla Katsina hakkunde 1999 e 2007 .
O ari , omo timmi no Aadama ( JKM ) .
O ari haa o yettii e nokku biyeteeɗo Duunu Baaba Jeey e wuro wiyeteengo Njeeyen hakkunde Njooben e Ñaaŋeen , o hoɗi ɗoon .
O ari haa o yettii galle laamɗo leydi ndii , o wiyi reenooɓe ngenndi ɓee
O ari haa o ɓadtii oon , o tawi oon yiyaani mo , ine jokki e yimde jimol mum .
O ari moolaade to Laamaandi-ndentundi ko he kitaale 1960 .
O ari wuro mawngo ngo o annda .
O arnoo ƴeewde ko so tawii nokku oo ena jogori wonande ɓe ɓural e ɓamtaare .
O artanan en e nafa gude cañaaɗe bi’eteeɗi leppi sañeteeɗe Gine , ngam ɓurten heɓude laaɓi e oo baggi .
O artataa wuro so wonaa naange debdebina .
O arti e Senegaal ngam ɓamtude jaŋde .
O arti e ɓataake jaltinaaɗo hanki e wakannde , ɓatake mo o winndunoo , kanko Porofosoor Laam .
O artiraa Nuwaasoot , to Jaagordu Pinal .
O artiri konngol makko ko he ko o woowi so hollirde yimɓe fof ngoni ko he moojde ngam liɓde mo , o joopii uujankooɓe wonɓe nder Tuunus haa teeŋti he ummiiɓe ɓaleeri Afirik .
O artirii heewɓe he diine Islaam .
O aynii nayi e baali fof gila he Dimis , haa he Wiiɗnde Mboorndi , Mbul he nokkuuji goɗɗi keewɗi .
O bismaa , o jooɗii , o rokkaa konngol .
O bismii
O bismii hoɓɓe ɓee , o jaabii direkteer oo .
O daaklii ɗoon fotde lebbi , omo fadndii jibinegol ɓiyiiko afo Mammadu Ceerno .
O daasaa e mbeddaaji
O dacciti baafe o dogi caggal lewru tan , ñalnde 16 abiril ( seeɗto ) .
O darii darnde Abdul Qaadiri Kan mahnooɗo 33 jumaa gila Horkaƴere haa Dagana .
O darii darnde Suleymaani Raasin Baal , kelnooɗo Muudo Hormo , itti ɓoggol kalfaandi e daaɗe fuutankooɓe .
O darii e kakkunde diyam ɗam omo yiiloo hol deppuɗu bonnanɗo mo ɗoyngol makko .
O dariima darnde maantinnde e geriyaa kaɓotonooɗo njiimaandi koloñaal Portugaal .
O dariima darnde teeŋtunde he wolde ɗimmere , o dartii njiimaandi yimɓe Hitler .
O dariima fotde hojomaaji 20 omo haala e Ceerno Sileymaani Baal ko wiɗtuɓe heewɓe nganndaa .
O dariima haa heewɓe woɗɓe ndokkitaa jawɗeele mum en teettanooɗe .
O dañi heen teddungal e manoore mawnde .
O dañii heen njeenaari .
O dañii raaya e diwgol kam e doggol .
O dañii toon fartaŋŋe ɓeydaade janngude hoɗdu e wammbaaɓe mawɓe , humpitiiɓe , yontanooɓe e oon sahaa .
O daɗay maa o daɗataa tuume ɗee , ɗum ko so juutii si laaɓa .
O diirani dingiral ngam yiiloyaade mo .
O diiri o raaŋani mo , Bojel wiꞌi pureet majji e nder dulndu .
O diisnii won e yimɓe ko wayi no giƴiiko Sileymaani Abdullaay lollirɗo Siley Demmba Jali Joop e miñiiko , jannginoowo lekkon , ena wiyee Usmaan Yero Saar .
O dogi , o mooloyii to Hong Kong e lewru suweŋ 2013 , caggal ɗuum o fayi Mosku ñalnde 31 sulyee 2013 , ɗo o moolaa .
O duñti duɗal taaniraaɓe makko kuɓɓunoo , kaŋko e almuɓɓe makko .
O eeriima Afriknaaɓe nde caakata demokaraasii e duunde ndee kala sabu ko ɗum tan waawi addude deeƴre e ɓamtaare e leyɗeele men .
O eeriima kala pullo yoo gollan renndo fulɓe ngam addude ballal mum .
O eewnii Kodda Aadama Ayse .
O faami ko o e añɓe heewɓe o footi waɗdude .
O faamini mo no waɗirtee .
O faati e lekki banaana , ki o horsini , o woni kadi e ñaamde .
O faatorii duuɓi 57 .
O faccirani arɓe ɓee ɗo yimɓe ndewdanoo e binndol ɗemɗe ɗee
O fada haa waawa wuufaade , o wuufa heen hakke hojomaaji ɗiɗi .
O fadi haa ɓe noddee hakkunde Nde hawwaa resaa siñcaan ndee hol no Aadama waɗi ?
O fawaani heen majaango , o yerƴi bal wiyi e lajal sokku !
O fawi bool oo e hakkunde suudu nduu , o wiꞌi ɓe : Ko joom wuro ngoo neldi hoɓɓe ɓee nguu koɗungu .
O fawi heen " hoto sikkitaare wonane heen " .
O fawi heen : " Jambaaroo oo taƴƴi e nguru nooro oo , kala jogiiɗo nguru nguu yo o hollir .
O fawi heen : '' Hol to nguru taƴanongu nguu woni .
O fawi heen wonde : " Nde majjuno-ɗa ndee , hol to mbalaatno- ɗaa e hol ko ñaamatno-ɗa ?
O fawii e laawol , ballidiiɗo makko rewi heen .
O fawinoo ko e doosɗe diine Lislaam , ɗum waɗi ndi kadi wiyeede
O fawti heen weltaare nde catal ngal jogii e ooɗoo " programme " mo hono mum alaa e yettude halayɓe no diidorinoo e juɓɓugol mum en e nder ngoo ɗoo wuro sabu ko fotɓe ñemmbeede haa teeŋti noon e fedde Tulde Dubbaango e Hartallo e miijo mum en yuumtungo : miijaade addude ɗoo yetne Abuu Hammadi Sih pirɗo deftere Allah teddunde nde e pulaar e yantude e sete lew lewal communication .
O faꞌi to laamɗo Nooro ngam wullitoyaade .
O feewnii kaɓirɗe baawɗe yiyde geɗe goɗɗuɗe mawɗe gonɗe e nder aduna ( lonngorɗe ) , bayɗe no galaksiiji ( deente koode ) , o feewnii kadi kaɓirɗe baawɗe wallude mo yiyde geɗe pamare ɗi njiyyotaako e gite ɓole , ko nanndi e mikoroskop ( longorɗe geɗe pamare ) , baawɗe wallude mo yiyde geɗe gaddooje nyabbuuli , ko nanndi e mikorobaaji e wiirusaaji .
O feeñinii kulhuli makko he wonnde ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde woni ko e maayrude seeɗa-seeɗa , kono o fodii wonnde ma o daro he no ngal wuurdi .
O fellii fiyannde makko , o yahii .
O felliti abbaade ɓe toon .
O felliti halfinde golle ɗee julaaɓe Purtugeec en .
O felliti kadi naatde e jimon rap e Yelaa .
O felliti neldude sete toowɗo yettoyoo Nuwaasoot e ko ɓuri yaaƴtaade .
O felliti woppude dente goowaaɗe ɗee e no liggortoo nih , Bolondee Joop woni e huutoraade e mawninde mbaawka to bannge ñeeñal , te o ɓamti eɓɓoore " mago-tiyaataar e mbedda peññinoowo ngoƴaaji yimɓe ɓee e ko ɓe njiɗi " , tawi e ɗum jokkii e théâtre de l’Opprimé mo Augusto Boal .
O fergiti suka debbo oo yani .
O fiilaa lefol " Teen " ko caggal nde o muuli deftere makko " Rella ou les voies de l’honneur " .
O fiilaa ɗiɗmol he 2020 .
O fiilii jeewte 500 he nder yeewtere makko " Ngalu " yaltoore toon to 2STV kala Hoore-biir caggal waktu go’aɓo , ko jiida e kabaruuji ñallaangal Pulaar Actu , mo ngannduɗaa e ballal makko , sukaaɓe woɗɓe jaayndiyankooɓe worɓe e rewɓe mbaawi yantude e makko ngam tammbaade kala ko fayti he kabaruuji he ɗemngal Pulaar he nder 2STV .
O fiilii leppi ayaawo hade makko sankaade e ballondiral Yahyaa Bah ndeke Abdul wirni kono maayaani tawde kay omo woppi ko ina yeewta leñol ngol .
O filaa ñalnde 29 settammbar 1994 .
O fini , o habri koreeji makko ko o yiyi koo , o wiyi ɓe
O fini subaka gooto , omo wondunoo e ɓiy baaba makko gorko , ɗawaaɗo hakkille , o yamiri watulaaɓe makko yo njaltin oon galle sabu laataade mbuubu e nder kosam ɗam o ñaamatnoo .
O finndini sehil makko Sanngalde .
O firti innde " Hotwolta " , o inniti ɗum Burkina Faso , " Ngenndi Nuunɗuɓe " .
O firti njuɓɓudi Tooro ngaadoranoondi ndi : o liɓi laamu Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal , e dow tuugnaade e ko mo o lomtii oo gollunoo .
O fiyiri reedu Aadama nduu ko haa annda ko soomii heen , nde o annduno ko terɗe ngoni heen , o naati e nder reedu Aadama o woni e yiilaade e nder heen , alaa fof ɗo o yettaaki e nder ɓalndu nduu , nder e boowal fof , so wonaa ɓernde ndee , ɗum ko Alla haɗi mo yettaade ɗoon , ngam ɗum ko galle Alla .
O fodaanii ɗum en maa laamu ngu waɗ feere no ñawndiri ɗeen caɗeele e no humtiraniɓe haajuuji maɓɓe .
O fodii wonnde maa o waɗ kala ko o waawi ngam reende jam e deeƴre he nder Senegaal .
O fooli e daawal ɗiɗmal woote ɗe ( 52 , 02% ) Kummba Yelaa ( 47 , 98% ) .
O fooɗondirta ko worɓe haɗanooɓe ɗaɓɓude daaɗe kodduwaanaaɓe e toɗɗe ɓennuɗe ɗee , gaddunooɗe caɗe mawɗe caggal tuumamuuya wonde nguyka e fuuti ɗe coomi : Alasan Watara et Henti Konan Bedie .
O fooɗondirtunoo ndeen ko e " Union Progressiste mauritanienne ( UPM ) " mo Siidi el Muttaar Njaay , mo Muttaar wul Daddaa lomtii e ballal koloñaal .
O foti totteede ndi ko e Batu Kuɓtodinngu 170ɓu Fedde adunaare cellal fotnde jooɗaade e lewru mee 2017 to Geneef .
O fotiino yaltude e laamu wadda ko adii hannde , kono leelede vuri haaytude .
O fuuntiri mi ko omo huli ladde sukkunde , niɓɓiɗnde heewnde huɗo .
O fuɗɗii gollaade tigi rigi he gese hee ko e feebariyee 2019 , sabu leelde dañde mo gollodii .
O fuɗɗii unde tan , wowru heewi del conndi .
O fuɗɗii waɗde mowluuda ko e hitaande 1902 , e wiyde jinnaaɗo men Alhajji Abuu Kebbee lollirɗo Abuu Diiye .
O fuɗɗii winndu deftere makko adannde ndee ko he nder sahaa mo o wonnoo e winndude deftere makko joofnirnde jaŋde ( thèses de doctorat ) .
O fuɗɗinoo ko e hitaande 2000 .
O fuɗɗorii jaŋde ko Kayhayɗi , jaŋde makko hakkundeere ndee o waɗi ɗum ko to Ekkol Blanchot to Ndar , hade makko naatde Ekkol Kebloowo Jannginooɓe ( Instituteurs ) Sebikotaan to Senegaal .
O fuɗɗorii ko he fedde falnde makko ene wiyee Fedde Dowri Horkoƴere , nde ene renndi he nder mum hakke 29 wuro .
O fuɗɗorii ko he waasde woodeede , caggal mum o woodaa he lohre .
O fuɗɗorii ko jokkondire e banndiraaɓe makko ɓadiiɓe .
O fuɗɗorii ko njillu to Tararsa e Barakna to mooliiɓe artiraaɓe .
O fuɗɗorii winndannde ndee ko " njiyetaake !
O gasni golle deftere ndee ko e hitaande 1972 .
O gasniri jaleeɗe .
O gayni o taganaa haajuuji e kuccameeji goɗɗi , ɗiin taarnaa haaju mo o tagraa oo .
O gaŋŋinii hen duuɓi 27 haa lewru oktoobar 2014 .
O giddi o darii , o rewi e sonndu nduu .
O gollaniima laamu Senegaal e postooji keewɗi tuggude nde o ummitii Farayse he 1959 haa 1988 nde o ƴetti fooftere .
O golliima e luggiɗinde miijooji renndiyaagal , miijmiitiyaagal ( Filosofi ) .
O golliima e ngalɗoo duɗal haa e hitaande 1980 .
O gollodiima kadi e Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije , sibu omo jeyano he Diiso mum ganndeewu ( Conseil scientifique ) , o darii darnde teeŋtunde he Goomu Duɗal ngal sosnoo ngam pirgol diine he Pulaar , ko jiidaa e darnde makko ngam kirjingol jaŋde Pulaar .
O goongɗinaani oon ari ɗoo ko innde ɓiyɓe Malinaaɓe , woni kay ko won wonɓe caggal ɗeen pelle renndoyankeeje ( société Civile ) ngam haa mbaawa yawtinde peeje mum en cuuɗiiɗe .
O goongɗinaano ko Doktoor Kolonel Jean Christophe Jebere winndunoo wiyi wonaa kure mbari Sankara .
O gorko dardaro 6aleejo mo yiiyam pullo , cubballo mo awaani liddi kono awii pinal e ganndal , ko neddo beldo liggodaade , peertudo mo golle ju66ude .
O gorko dardaro ɓaleejo mo ƴiiƴam pullo , moƴƴo ŋari , cubballo mo awaani liɗɗi kono awii pinal e ganndal , ko neɗɗo belɗo liggodaade , peertuɗo mo golle juɓɓude belɗe yeeɓde .
O haalani ɗum Jibriil , ko ɗum ɓe ngaadondirnoo so tawii o heɓii caɗeele yo o haalan ɗum .
O haalanii yimɓe kawgel gadanel ngel e hol waɗdooɓe .
O haalata ko gorko gooto golliiɗo hakke duuɓi 30 he nder Meeri wuro mum en , ene heblanoo yahde fooftere .
O haaldi ɗum e Ceerno Saydu Kan e Ceerno Aamadu Ɓan e wodɓe .
O haali darnde Ceerno Sileymaani Baal e rimɗitinde Fuuta , tinndinooje pattamlame ɗe lelni wonande dawrugol laamanteeri haa e jikkuuji mum ngenndiyankooji potɗi ñemmbeede hannde oo .
O haali darnde nde oon darii , golle ɗe oon gollii e ballal walli fedde ndee haa teeŋti e juɓɓingol oo ɗoo jamma .
O haali e pulaar , o haami e Farayse .
O haali gila pulaar ne winndee e alkule arab , haa alkule Bamaako haa alkule Mbaañ .
O haali haala lefol kesol ngol .
O haali haala lefol kesol pul ngol Jalluɗi yaltini e to ɓulno maggol ummorinoo .
O haali jotondiral makko e Ibraahiima Saar , o joofniri njettoor e duwaaw feewde e pulaagu .
O haali kaa haala ko to Wahigton to o yahnoo tawtoreede batu hakkunde USA e leyɗe Afrik .
O haali kadi e diƴƴe mbonɗe dufeteeɗe e laabi kam e ko woni e sara wuro ngoo fof .
O haali ko e ɗemngal Farayse .
O haali ko e ɗemngal Wolof .
O haali ko goonga .
O haali martabaaji mum .
O haali meɗɓe ardaade fedde ndee .
O haali nafoore wonnde e janngude ɗemngal mum neeniwal , sodorde yaawnde , feɗɗitoore cukalel , waawde heɓindaade ɗemɗe goɗɗe .
O haali ɗoon haala moƴƴa feewde e renndo sukaaɓe ngoo , o hilliti-ɓe kadi ko e darnde ɓe tawi-mo , kono nde maɓɓe ndee ena tiiɗi-mo .
O haali ɗum ko ñalnde 28 nowambar 2017 tawi omo yillii Wagadugu .
O haawaa , puccu ngu wiꞌi mo : " mboomri to njahataa oo waktu ?
O haaɗaani ɗoon , o renndini mi e sukaaɓe raddoynooɓe ɗuggiti ngiyon am .
O halfinaa kuuɓal Hooreejo ( Comité de Transition pour le Salut du Peuple – CTSP – woni " goomu mudda ngam danndo ɓesngu " , e lewru Seeɗto ( Abiril ) 1991 haa lewru Korse ( Suwee ) 1992 .
O halfinanoo e oon guwarnama ko ko faati e teeru e koɗki , o sawndondiri toon e Aamadu Jaaje Sammba Joom Bah , ɓaleejo bajjo jeyanooɗo e Diiso Guwarnama ( Conseil de Gouvernement ) mo terɗe 5 , toŋtunooɗo mo : Nii woni yolnde nde naatnugol Dey wul Siidi Baaba , jaltunooɗo Entente Mauritanienne , e Diiso Guwarnama hee , lomtinaama haa timmi .
O halfini ɓe haa hannde geɗe fedde ndee , nde tawnoo renndi e mayre ko ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe , waaɗiraaɓe maɓɓe e almuɓɓe maɓɓe .
O halfini ɗum en memmbaade geɗe ɗe .
O halfini ɗum gooto e yimɓe makko .
O hamtii , sibu sinno Kolo Muwani , nde hucciti kam tan gooto e deeno wallinirde oo , so woofaano pettal mum , ko Farayse taɓɓittunoo , hootda e welkeende .
O harƴitii e juuɗe oo deenoowo ŋakkaade gacce , oo joofni konngol ngol , nanangol nder batirde hee , nanoyteengol miliyoŋaaji yimɓe e nder aduna hee .
O hawri e nayi ɗiɗi ina ndiddondira e barme maaro defoowo hoore mum .
O hawri e naꞌi ɗiɗi ina ndiddondira e barme maaro defoowo hoore mum .
O hawri e raddooɓe .
O hawri e sukaaɓe raddoyooɓe , o wiꞌi ɓe : Baylo am nana ara caggal ina wammbi kure laañe am , mi rokki on ɗe .
O hawri e sukaaɓe radoyooɓe nder ladde .
O haylitii o woni e hooted Palastiin to o woppunoo Saaratu to .
O haɓi e leƴƴi sanamiyeeji rewo Kamaruun , o haɓi e laamɗo Manndara , o wootiɗini diiwaan Fommbina ( worgo ) oo , mo o inniraa , woni Aadamawa .
O haɓi ɗoon e Berbeer en ngam yiɗde halfude ɓe .
O haɓtiima tuubakooɓe fotde duuɓi capanɗe tati ( 33 ) .
O haɗii tuubakooɓe yahrude yeeso e darnde mum en e keɓtugol Fuuta .
O heblaa heblo seniingo e duɗal keblorgal jannginooɓe Pulaar catal Aksuus , tuggude e nyalnde 11/04/1986 haa nyalnde 11/07/1987 .
O heblaama e fannuuji keewɗi , o yahi heen haa to leydi Alseri laabi ɗiɗo e to Marok , tawi ko e mbaydi konunkaagu .
O heewaani haala .
O heñii , o tawoyi waandu to ñaamata too .
O heɓa walla o waasa heɓde , Idi hollitii haŋkadi dey ko ummitere hesere e dawrugol mum , sabu alaa hannde ko tonngi mo .
O heɓaani arde kono o waɗii nulaaɓe gari tawtoreede .
O heɓi seedantaagal pattamlamal ñalnde 22/07/1987 , finnde hattan laaɓtuɗo waawde jannginde , winndude e wiɗtirde ɗemngal Pulaar .
O heɓi won ɓeen yimɓe , kuutorɗe , ɓe alaa ko nganndani doosiyee o .
O heɓii e fotde ɗo neɗɗo ene fiɓtoo dañde ɓesngu kadi joom-suudu makko o , Saaratu , kanum ne taw tolniima e duuɓi jawtirɗi jibinirgol .
O heɓii toon seedanteeje moƴƴingol ( mention tres-bien ) he kala tolno seedanfaagu mo o waɗnoo , kadi o heɓi njeenaaje ( prix ) keewɗe , yeru , " prix au mérite en sciences par l’Académie de Paris .
O heɓii yillaade gure keewɗe e nder leydi makko , kono kadi uujo nawii mo Nuwaasot wuro laamorgo Ndenndaandi Islaamiyankoori Muritani ɗum wonnoo ko ñalnde 15 lewru Mbooy 1985 .
O heɓti Segu ñalnde 10 marse 1861 , o waɗti ɗum laamorgo makko .
O heɓtii kadi , o jaabtii hoore makko ,
O hiiri ko dingiral haa pecce jamma o fuɗɗii leloyaade .
O hiisii ko saabii ɗum ko , hol to foti heedtude e asamaan o .
O hirjini janngude pulaar , sabu kanko o janngaani ko wonaa pulaar ; yo yimɓe ɓee ƴettu yeru e makko .
O hirjinii Fulɓe he winndude , janngude e janngin’de ɗemngal Pulaar .
O hirsaa , daande makko fayraa Salde-Tebegut mbele Alys jooɗaninooɗo Farayse ina seedoo .
O hokkii aadi ma o reen sarɗiiji dowla oo e kisal ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii e kala ko sarɗiiji demokaraasii njoƴƴini e leydi ndii .
O hollaa wonde nokku jiileteeɗo oo woni ko e diiwaan Kayhayɗi , heedde waktuuji seeɗa wonande jahroowo koyngal .
O holli mi noon , " ɗuum ene waɗi laabi no
O holli ɓe ko o yiyi e nder reedu Fuuta e caɗeele guuraaɗe heen .
O holli ɓe omo teddini dental ɓiɗɓe safalɓe , yo njejjit luure hakkunde mum en , ngonta tamannde wootere mbele ina ndannda , kisa ngam haɓtaade no fotirta nii yiɗɓe yoolde ndimaagu maɓɓe kamɓe kala .
O hollii wonde moolinooɓe ɓee ngarti ko e weeyo mettungo , ena ngonndi ñawɓerndaagu mawngu haa heewɓe ena mbiya " so min ngannduno " Won e maɓɓe nih , e wiyde Ibraahiima Moktaar Saar , nodii heddiiɓe toon mbiyi ɗum'en hoto ngartu !
O hollii won’de ko ɓe fenanɓe mo e oo fannu .
O holliri heen ko no debbo pullo waynoo hanki , gila e ñorogal mum , moorol mum , cacci mum haa e jikkuuji mum labaaɗi .
O holliri leydi Tuunus ko leydi aarabeeɓe , kala mo wonaa Aarabe jaggiraaka ko Tunusnaajo alaa kay ko haali jilliiɗo ɗoon .
O holliri no ñalawma oo lelnira .
O holliri wonde eɓe poti ñemmbeede .
O hollirii darnde lew lewal communication ko heblude sukaaɓe jaayndiyankooɓe , muulde defte pulaar e yuɓɓin’de ñalawma deftere pulaar aduunayaŋkeejo .
O hollirii toon mbaawka makko e galɗugol pinal Muritani to bannge gaaci haa teeŋti e hoɗdu .
O hollirii wonde ko ɓesngu Tuldenaaɓe mbaɗani mo ko wonaa huunde weeɓnde , jibineede e nokku , mawna heen , anndude neɗɗo e jiknaaɓe mum , ruttoo heɓtina golle mum haa jarana ɗum en addude ɗum kam e wom’dii ɓe mum leydi e leydi .
O hollirii won’de so tawii defte mbinndaama e pulaar ko alaa e sago ɗe ndaña janngooɓe , ɗum noon hoto janngooɓe ɓee ngoni ?
O holliti heen ko o giɗo Sankara .
O holliti heen nafoore Afirik ko sosde leydi ngootiri .
O holliti jaambaraagal mum sabu mum suɓaade kuccam jaŋde ɗam wiɗtiyanke kala dogata , Allah e mum jiiɓaade .
O holliti kadi no tawtoregol fedde ndee kewuuji laamu nguu yuɓɓinta yahri , yeru koolol Waadaan
O holliti ko Fuuta Jaloŋ adii darnude laamu diine 1725 .
O holliti ko wonde ɗaɓitgol laana kaa ( type C212 ) , fuɗɗiima gila e hitaande 2007 , caggal nanondiral ñalnde 01 Yarkoma ( Oktoobar ) hakkunde Madiriid e Nuwaasoot .
O holliti mo haala makko ko ko waylaa , waɗtaa ko o haalaani .
O holliti nafoore mawnde nde o tawi e ɗee defte coomɗe ganndal toowngal newnangal kala mo janngaani ɗemɗe ƴellitiiɗe waawde soccondirde e mumen e yowitaade e ɗee defte , allah e ko ndoondii e ganndal .
O holliti wonde Falnde nde ɓe ngardii nde ina rokki debbo himme no moƴƴi , seede mum ko ballal ngal ɓe mballitta hitaande kala rewɓe ngam yuɓɓinde juulde " 8 marsa " yanti heen e oo sahaa eɓe lelni eɓɓaande heeriinde ngam ƴaañde ƴellitaare debbo .
O holliti wonde Pr Abu Bakri Laam ko Jannginoowo mawɗo e nder Duɗal Jaaɓi Haaɗtirdi Seek Anta joop jooɓiiɗo seedantaagal ƴellito ndema ( Diplome deɓeloppement agricole ) , binnduɗo defte 10 , baɗɗo 56 artiikal ( article ) , ɓaarnuɗo 19 almuudo joom metriis ( maitrise ) , 12 joom'en DEA , tato ɓe ( 3 ) doctora .
O holliti wonde Wiɗtooɓe ina keewi kono ina ceeri .
O holliti ɗuum ko juumre sabu e wiyde makko toorodɓe kala ko fulɓe , subalɓe ko fulɓe , lawɓe ko Fulɓe .
O holliti-mo nanndugol hare ɓaleeɓe Afrik Bŋ Worgo darnde ɓaleeɓe Muritani ngam heftude ndimaagu mum'en .
O hollitii caggal nde sabbaa waktuuji potɗi nih , hay baɗte yiyaaka , fartaŋŋe yiytude-ɓe eɓe nguuri alaa no foti .
O hollitii heen miijo tuubakooɓe waɗtude Tooro fof pale-pale , tawa falnde heen fof ko arɗo mo o toɗɗii tan laamotoo ɗum .
O hollitii heen wonde ko heewi e ko ANOCI bayyini e ciimtol kopporeeje wonaa goonga .
O hollitii kadi kaŋko alaa ko o woni hay huunde so yanta oo daranooki , sawndii-mo ena pawi-mo ɗo o woni hannde ɗoo .
O hollitii kadi laabi fergooji ɗii e fawaade e fergooji jeegom ganndaaɗi ɗii .
O hollitii kadi nanondiraama wonde sukaaɓe ɓurata faamde gannde e janngude ko so njannginaama e ɗemngal neeniwal .
O hollitii laamu maa daro ngam addude ballal feewde e yimɓe ɓe caɗeele ɗee keɓtii .
O hollitii nafoore jaayndiyankaagal ngal he ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
O hollitii wonnde ko ɓuri heewɓe e suɓiyankooɓe ɓee ngoni ko he Marok , Tunis , Algeri , Senegaal , Mali , Gine e Muritani .
O hoolnii yimɓe ɓee wonde o haalata ko hakke ganndal e fawaade e wiɗto ; wonaa haa wela maa metta mo woni e Fulɓe maa haalpulaar'en .
O hoori o yamiri yimɓe kadi yo koor .
O hoɓɓi ngaallo , wiyi e gacculi meƴƴu !
O hoɗi ko e yeweeɗe e mijooji .
O hucciti e Ceerno e almudɓe mum en o wiyi " jokkude on daakaa kaa haa joofi hollitii haa laaɓti kulol mon Alla E nder ɗuum , on njokkii tigi golle Al Hajji Mammadu Seydu Bah puɗɗunooɗo kaa daakaa , carka kulol Alla e diiwaan hee kala , mbaɗoowa e nokku ɓolɓolto , les nguleeki kiiski .
O hucciti e lekki ɓurki mawnude , ɓuri toowde , dañi baaji tekkuɗi , ki wayi ko no cehaaki nii .
O hucciti e maɓɓe o yi'i maale maɓɓe ɗee tan ɓanndu ndu dogi .
O huninooma maa o haɓ e seɓɓitiiɓe haa poolgu , ko ɗuum woni gollal makko ɓurngal heñoreede ngal yimɓe fof padi .
O huutoriima humpito makko e leƴƴi ɗii , haa o dañi fuuntude woon heen yimɓe , o soodi woon heen kadi .
O huɓɓii duɗe keewɗe he leydi Muritani , Senegaal , Orop , Amerik e nokkuuje godɗe .
O idorii ko saalaade kalifaandi , o wattindorii turaade , Farayse en mbaɗɗii mo .
O idorii ko yillaade diiwanuuji keewɗi , yiɗde anndude aadaaji safalɓe , donaaɗi e woɗaaji mum en .
O innii kadi yoo pelle fof njokkun golle waasa wiyeede ndee ko e Tabital walla wonaa Tabital Kala fedde ummaniinde golle , yoo Tabital Pulaaku jaɓɓoro-ɗum ballal e semmbinoore .
O inniri hoore makko ko Dragan David Dabic e nder leygal ngal o hoɗi .
O itti seedantaagal laawɗinngal lasgol duunde ndee , o weeɗi ngal toppitinooɗo duunde Jeeriyel ndee , hono Njaay Saydu Aamadu , caggal nde o jaari darnde mum e darnde wuro ngoo .
O jaabii : " Ko nawlum neene am ɓaleejo reedu nuli mi maayo ndaayan yo lawƴoy ndee horde .
O jaabiimi wonnde defte ɗee ko leñol ngol jeyɗum , kadi nana ɗoon jooɗii he nder bakane e kartoŋaaji , ko doombi tan njogiri ñaamde ɗum en .
O jaarii arɓe tawtoreede kawral ngal .
O jaggiraa ko no wage nii e nder annduɓe ɓalliwal , teeŋtini ɗum noon ko o sellaano ko ɓooyi , haa o woofɗi , kono ɗuum haɗaani hakkille makko ɓeydaade yuumtude e soñtude .
O jala haa gite makko ngadda gonɗi .
O janngi cellal ko to Duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde Shanngaay ( leydi Siin ) biyeteengal jooni Shanghaï Fudan University .
O janngi ko nder duɗe Burkinaa .
O janngi toon ko " Lasraare " .
O janngi toon ko heewi , o arti .
O janngi ɗoon duuɓi keewɗi : ko ɗoon o heɓi bakkaa makko , o heɓi lisaas makko e pirtugol ɗemɗe Farayse e Arab .
O janngi ɗoon kadi duuɓi tati , tawi haa hannde , ko kanko wonata gadano e kala kawgel ɓe mbaɗnoo .
O janngidi ɗoon ko e Elimaan Buubakar to MBummba , e Saydu Aljumaa to Halwaar , e Abdarahmaani Soggo Jalte , e Maamuudu Hammaat to Kanel , e Baylaa Pereejo Soh to Haayre , e Alfaa Umaar Saydu Nuuru to Hoore Foonde , e Abdul " Qaadiri " Kan ( mo o jogori wasiyaade yo won Almaami gadano e Fuuta Tooro ; ma en ngartoy heen yeeso ) e Abdul Kariim Jaawanndo to Seeno Paalel , e woɗɓe keewɓe sanne .
O janngii Quraana he seernaaɓe heewɓe kono o heɓi kaayit ( Lijaasa ) ko e juuɗe Ceerno Abdul Qaadiri Lih to Ciloñ .
O janngii duuɓi ɗiɗi e duɗal arab ( mersaa ) ko adii nde o faytata e duɗal laamu .
O janngii e Ceerno Mustafa Umar lollirɗo ceerno Raasin Njaburu kaaw makko Almaami wuro ngoo e oon yonta , caggal ɗum o janngii e seernaaɓe heewɓe to Jaataar , Gakko , Rooso , caggal ɗum o ruttii Ŋoral Gidaala , o woni e janngude sariya e duɗal Ceerno Aamadu Umar Sal kaw makko goɗɗo jannginoowo ekkol , gonnooɗo mawɗo wuro hade mum ruttaade e joom mum e hitaande 1990 .
O janngii kadi alquraana e wuro Siwol e nder falnde Aañameeji Boosoya .
O janngii kadi e Maatam , to diiwaan Ngenaar .
O janngii kadi jaraale e asko subalɓe no feewi , sibu ine heewi so o feŋii hiirde omo yima , kala naatɗo e dingiral hee sappii wiyi mo " Ndoondu woyii " , o askintu joom mum , o jarfa ɗum , o haala baɗte taanum en .
O jannginii e nder diiwaan Kaasamaas e wuro wiyeteengo Jululu .
O jannginii haa 1999 nder duɗe toowɗe to Tuunus .
O jannginii kadi e wuro wiyeteengo Tammbaa Soose , sara Tammbaa Kunndaa .
O jannginii kadi o heblii jannginooɓe pulaar he ɗiiɗoo nokkuuji kala .
O janngoyi duɗal toowngal William Ponty to Goree hade mum artireede Sebikotaan , leydi Senegaal .
O janngoyii kadi Wuro-soogi .
O jarfi Abdul Qaadiri Kan , almaami gadano e Fuuta Tooro , leliiɗo to Juude Guuriiki e nder diiwaan Damga .
O jaɓaani hay wottaade , o wi'i tan ko alaa e sago sehil makko arta .
O jaɓaniɓe golle maɓɓe .
O jaɓataa hay gooto wirna mbeelu makko , hakke ko o haɓaa tee hay huunde waawaa yamɗinde miijo makko e caasal makko murtande ngonka kiiɗal nguuraaka toon kaa .
O jaɓi miijo ngo F .
O jaɓii kadi renndo ngoo wayrii heɗtaade jime ɗee , jimɗi ɗii , ngo heewaani seedaade-mo e dent pine ɗee .
O jaɓɓaama jooɗngal e jaɓɓule sabu tooweendi makko e nder daartol Afrik , daarton winndere ndee no fotiri .
O jeyaa kadi ko e doosɗe yummaaje eɓɓoore wiyeteende ARED , nde Fajeerbeer Jallo Soñaa ardii .
O jeyaa ko Dental dowlaaji Amerik .
O jeyaa ko Kahayɗi .
O jeyaa ko he jagge tawtoraaɗe batuuji cosgol fedde ndee , o darodiima e Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije , o jeyaama he Diiso ganndeewu mum ( Conseil scientifique ) kam he Goomu Duɗal ngal sosnoo ngam pirgol diine he Pulaar , ko jiidaa e darnde makko kirjingol jaŋde Pulaar .
O jeyanoo ko e leegal A ( iloo A ) , heedi mo bannge rewo ko laawol Gamaal Abdel Naseer , bannge fuɗnaange makko ko laawol Mammadu Konaate ( tiindingol kaŋ garde ) , bannge hirnaange ko laawol Charles de Gaulle ( jehre ) , bannge worgo ko koɗorɗe iloo A .
O jeyanoo ko he ardiiɓe konu Burkina .
O jibidinii e oon debbo kadi ɓiɓɓe tato rewɓe ɓeen ngoni ɓeeɗo : Haswata , Saarata e Buhayrata .

O jippii ndaɗɗudi .

O jokki , o wi’i , Allah haalii e " hadiis kudsiy " : Nganndee kam ko adii nde ndewaton mi , so on nganndaa kam , holi no ndewroton mi ?
O jokki e daande makko welnde laaɓtunde nde firo ngo o waɗi e ojooji ngo haa yimɓe ɓe kala mbeltii .

O noddi Elimaan Buubakar Kan , gumɗo gite , mo wumaani ɓernde e hakkille .
O noddi gollodiiɓe makko he nder ñiiɓirde fedde defterɗiyankeeɓe Tumbuktu , nde o tafnoo kanko e hoore makko duuɓi sappo e joy ɓennuɗi ( ko saalii ) , o wiyiɓe : " Miɗo sikki potɗen ko egginde defte ɗee kala itten ɗum en he kuɓeeje mawɗe ɗee coornoyen ɗum en he nder galleeji wuro he .
O noddi jeewo makko oo , o habri mo ko foondu nduu e ndaddo oo kaali koo .
O noddi jihaadi feewde e heeferɓe fof , haa teeŋti noon feewde laamɗo hawsankooɓe , ɓe o yooɓtorinoo waasde tabitinde piɓle diime Lislaam .
O noddi ɓesngu makko fof , gila e debbo haa e gorko , suka e mawɗo , hay gooto o woppaani .
O noddii jaambareeɓe woɗɓe wayɓe no Aamadu Maalik Gay , Tabsiiru Jiggo , Bah Seydi , Saar Aamadu ( konunke ) , Saydu Sih , Mustafa Booli Kan lollirɗo Saydu Kan , Alhajji Tijjaani Aan e Mammadu Sammba Joop lollirɗo Murtuɗo .

O rewi , kanko fof e heewnoode golle e oonɗoon sahaa , haa o naati keblorgal jannginooɓe .
O rewi e mum omo haala , kañum ne yeeƴaaki mo , ina ɓeydii yaha ɗuurnaade mo haa yettii ɗo ɗalnoo annabi Ayyuuba ɗoo yiyaani ɗum , Annabi Ayyuuba kañum ne nanii daande makko yiyaani mo .
O rewi waɗde ko o waɗatnoo haa yettii lekki kii .

O rewni heen ko yettude Fedde
O rewri he gonaangal debbo makko Chantal Kompawre Kodduwaarnaajo , kanko ne o rokkaa kaayit ngenndiijo Kodduwaar .
O rewtini heen ko jooɗaniiɓe leydi Senegaal kam e yimɓe arɓe tawtoreede ñalɗi ɗii .
O riiwi jaagorɗe laamu fof , o dartini golle suudu sarɗiyeeji hade makko mumtude ɗum .
O rokka heen yeruuji keewɗi fawaade he nguurndameeje suufiyankooɓe yawtuɓe , rewɓe e worɓe wuurnooɓe nguurndam ɗiggere e ruuɗaare aduna , ko wayno mawni makko gorko , laamiɗo Juulɓe Muhammad Bello .
O rokki heen sifaaji keewɗi , ngam naamnaade holi e majji ciforteeka ngenndiyanke .
O rokki yeru yoga e elewaaji makko tawtorenooɓe yeewtere ndee , fuɗɗoriiɓe janngude hiisiwal e Pulaar , ko wayi no Umaar Jallo nehooɗo ñaaki , Kaaliidu Maar gollotooɗo e diƴƴe ekn waɗatnooɓe C sukaaɓe adiiɓe heɓde bakuuji mumen nder wuro ngoo .
O rokkidanoo ndiin njeenaari ko e beresiilnaajo ( faraysenaajo heen ) biyeteeɗo Artur Avila e biyeteeɗo Manjul Bhargava ( Kanadaanaajo heen , Ameriknaajo heen ) e Ostirisnaajo biyeteeɗo Martin Hairer .
O rokkii yimɓe humpito heewngo sanne hay so tawii fanniyankaagal makko ɓuri yahrude ko to golle Sheek Muusaa Kamara mo Ganngel .

O ruttii e juuma makko ñalnde Altine 29 lewru Siilo .
O ruttii kadi o wiyi " so tawii Pulaar haaletaake laakara , hare gasaani tawo " .
O ruttii o wi'i : " A fotaa luukde , woyde etee woto saalit .

O saaktii defte sappo e ɗiɗi jime .

O sakkitorii ko siftin
O sakkitorii ko waɗde wasiyaaji wonde Suleymaani Baal ko ngalu ndenndaangu wonande winndere ndee e kala kadi mo o woni ceerno mum , jaɓi rewde e jamirooje makko ko aldaa e puural , dawataa bonngol , dawnataa bonngol .

O sankorii ko duuɓi 40 , sibu o jibinaa ko 1977 .

O sarɗi ñalɗi kollirgol oon filmu , ñalnde hoore-biir , 3 lewru bowte ( aset 3 desaambar ) ko e Nuwaasot , to Galle Sukaaɓe Kiiɗɗo .

O sañani Hawaa ko ine ɓoornoo .

O seediima caɗeele Mandiŋkooɓe pawnoo e Fulɓe Firdu .
O seeraani e yuɓɓinde joɗle ( dente , batuuji ) ɗe limotaako , dente denndinooje yoga ehoohooɓe Tooro .
O seeraano e wasiyaade sukaaɓe jannguɓe ɓee nde naatata konu , njokkira toon hare .
O sifiima geɗe ballitooje faamde haala .
O siftini , o wi’i : Allah haalii e deftere mum teddunde ndee tagiraani yimɓe , jinneeji so wonaa haa ɓe ndewa mo .
O siftini heen owno-owno gonɗo e winndere ndee , ɗo huunde e yimɓe ndartorii waɗde bonanndeeji , o wiyi " Aan Ceerno , a meeɗaa waasde siftinde fiɓnde diine Lislaam mahii ko e deeƴre " .
O siftini ko e hitaande 1492 Kiristof kolombe , awƴi laanel haa haytoyi to duunde Afrik ; ɗum laatii ndiiwgu maa adaa feewde duuɗe kese .
O siftini ɗum wonde e oon sahaa , Wasinton heedannoo ko laamu paltoor .
O siftinii hiirde ndee ko lollini Naamndal toɗɗingal Pullo ( la question peulh ) , o woppaani faayiida gonɗo e deftere nde ganndo men toowɗo oo winndunoo : Ummaade e iwdi Fulɓe to Ejipti ( De l'origine egyptienne des peuls ) .
O siftinii ngonka suka debbo e nder Leydi Muritani , ko kamɓe rewɓe ɓuri keeweendi 52 % , worɓe ina ndaɗi ɓe e fannuuji keewɗi : ɓe keewaani woɗɗoyde e jaŋde , caɗeele gollaade e nder fannuuji karallaagal , caɗeele keɓgol leydi e kaalisaaji ngam waɗde eɓɓooje .
O siftinii wonnde falnde ( circonscription ) 9ɓre ndee , renndini ko leyɗeele 16 Afrik , tuggude he Maghrib haa yettii Hiirnaange Afrik .
O siftinii wonnde so suɓngooji jontii e ɓe noddee kadi ɓe nootoo , kono so yawtii tan Welingaranaaɓe ko yejjitaaɓe .
O siimtani banndiraaɓe , kanko Alasan , ko rewdunoo hakkunde Jalluɗi Jam e Murtuɗo e njennoor Baaba Leñol yennunoo nde haa jarani nde waylude miijo e jogaade fiɓnde laaɓtunde e to bannge .
O siiñti Smara e hitaande 1899 .
O siiñti wuro Hamdallaay ( Yettere Alla ) , o waɗti ɗum laamorgo heso ɗo diiso Diina oo jooɗotoo .
O siŋki ka , o waɗi ka taakawuuji ɗiɗi , won wiyɓe ko tati .
O sogitaama soodtirgol jaaman kaɓirɗe ɗe o wallitori Tiinde Hawtiinde Fottunde ( RUF ) , murtaldu Foodee Sankoo fawtiindu bonanndeeji ɗuuɗɗi e nder leydi Sira Liyon , hakkunde hitaande 1991 e 2001 , gila wargol yimɓe , taƴugol juuɗe e koyɗe yimɓe , hippagol rewɓe , naadugol fayɓe e nder konu maɓɓe e guyaale ɗe limtotaako ɗum ɗoo ko e wiide Ñaawirde Heeriinde fii Sira Liyon , nde Dental Leƴƴi ( UN ) siñci , ngam addugol fawtiiɓe bonanndeeji ɓurɗi mawnude e nder Sira Liyon , ɓe rewnee e laawol .
O sokdaa toon e mawɓe waalde jannginooɓe ndee ko wayno Keytaa Kumannjan , caggal ñaawoore fuunti-funeere ɓe taƴanaa duuɓi jeegoom dummbere .
O soodani rewɓe makko comci jooɗɗi .
O soodi dimaaɗi e na'i keewɗi .
O soodi isaas e almet , o fayi jooɗore tunndu ( perfee ) , o yuppi e hoore makko isaas , o huɓɓi jayngol , ɓanndu makko nanngondiri wonti ooyre wootere .
O sooynaani jikke , sibu nanondiral siifaama toon e lewru ut 2000 .
O sooynii Bookara ine ara , o felli ɗum ; oon jaabtorii fotde piyanɗe nayi walla joyi , fetel mum mocci , dogi suuɗoyii he teheende .
O sooynii Muusaa ina roondii Juuɗe mum .
O sosi Heerto dawrugol o inniri ɗum Party of Prosperity ( Heerto Ɓamtaare ) .
O sosi heerto politigi lollirngo MNC ( Dillere Ngenndiyankoore Konngo ) tawti pelle renndo goɗɗe daraniiɗe jeytaare leydi ndii , ko wayi no ABAKO nde ardii ɗum Joseph Kaza-vubu .
O suɓii Ceerno , Ami e sukaaɓe ɗiɗo ustoraaɓe terɗe : Daam e Koddu .
O taccinii leydi ndii fayde e feccere nayaɓere .
O tawi almuudo kala ina huufi alluwaal mum ina jannga .
O tawi lehel ina waɗi ndiyam , o ƴefti lehel ngel , o yari .
O tawi ndiyam ɗam ina luuɓi haa yarotaako o wiꞌi .
O tawi oon ene jooɗii he colla yimɓe ene taarii ɗum .
O tawi toon , e oon sahaa , ko Ceerno biyeteeɗo Siriñ " Ƴaari " Amar .
O tawi toon gorko biyeteeɗo Ceerno Moodi Muhammed Abdallaahi .
O tawii mawɓe he galleeji mum en seernaaɓe o janngini ɗum en haa mbaawi winndude e janngude Pulaar .
O tawtii koninkooɓe teettirɓe laamu doole e kanuui , hono Kolonel Maamadi Dumbuya to Gine Konakiri jahroowo duuɓi 41 e Kolonel Asimi Goyta to Mali mo duuɓi 39 .
O tawtoraa cosgol Kawtal pelle Winndiyankooɓe ɗemngal Farayse Afiriki Hirnaange .
O tawtoraama batuuji keewɗi nder Tuunus e boowal mum haa arti nde Maalde Aarabeeɓe jooɗii Nuwaasoot he 1997 .
O tawtoraama golwole jihaadi Fulɓe he nder leydi Hawsa o kala , kadi winndi ko heewi he ko yowitii e daartol oon jihaadi e mahgol dowla Islaam mo Sokoto .
O tawtoraama kadi wolde Marekoy Rewo lesdi Mali .
O taƴanaa joñeede nder Seereraaɓe , to wuro Nduut saraaji Tiwaawoon .
O taƴanaama kaaɗdi nguurndam makko nder " kasoo " .
O taƴii yolnde hakkunde jiɗnaaɓe , jom galle e yonta , kono ɗuum firaani canndallaagal , ko renndo men wayi noon .
O teeldu e Ceerno omo welnoo ɗum haa o woowni mo hoore makko .
O teeŋtii kadi golle Abuu Sih Waɗi ɗee ko faayiida mawɗo ko ɗum huunde mawnde fotnde mawnineede sabu ko kodde men ndufi e kosam men .
O teeŋtini jojjugol ummanaade wiɗtooji to bannge biiɗlewal .
O teeŋtini ko needi e diine ngoni ngooroondi tafngo ɓiy aadama , no ngooroondi woniri jooɗorde huɓeere walla ɓalal jogorngal juutde balɗe .
O teeŋtini wonde e hakilantaagal makko pulaar ɓolo yahataa tawi diine oo ina joñaa ko alaa e sago pulaar e diine oo njahda .
O teeŋtinii , kanko fof e addude nguura , ndiyam e kuuraa nder teemedde gure mawɗe nder ɗii duuɓi tati cakkitiiɗe , haɗaani bowlol luulndo ngoo fof ko wiyde ɗomka e heege ine woodi .
O teeɓtii e saayaande ɓinngel mum’en dewel , o salii woppude so wonaa ɓeen njeenamo .
O tennti wonndema o sikka ngal faamondiral waaway waɗude hakkunde maɓɓe e ɓee haɓidaaɓe maɓɓe .
O tenntini ɗun no gassata si naa yewta .
O tentinii wonnde ɓe ƴetti pehe ɗen fow fii ɗaɓitugol ɓee yooliiɓe .
O teskinii kadi wonde hay so jumaa kaa darorii ko e Ŋawle Rewo ne , darnde ndee e ngalu nguu njalti ko e gure ɗee ɗiɗi fof .
O teŋtinii hay sehilaaɓe makko njaɓɓaano sembinde mo e ndiin mbaadi .
O tiindii fuɗnaange , feewde wuro Haayre Laaw .
O timmin konngol tan yimɓe ɓee cuɓii ñalaande ngam senaare wuro laatoo .
O tinaani o maataani , haa o sooynii teefaŋke ine soggi wiige gooburaawe , nge ƴonngo mawngo , e bokol juutngol ine yeeyoyee .
O tooñaama noon ngati laaɓii o jeyaaka heen kono .
O toriima nde Allah teddinta kala beltotooɗo e golle makko haa teeŋti e arɓe e hiirde ndee .
O torike Xi Jinping yo huutor doole mum e dow Mosku fii no accira hare ɗen .
O totti konngol yeewtiyanke men hono Abuu Sih .
O totti ngo baaɗiiko ena wiyee Hammadi Yeenee Giro .
O totti ɓe jippunde e ndiyam ko ɓe lootorii haa ɓe laaɓa .
O tottori mo mesalal cewngal , o waɗdi heen jamirooje .
O tottu maa jawdi , kono hay gooto e maɓɓe waawaani humtude haaju oo .
O toɗɗaa hooreejo fedde Winndiyankooɓe Muritaninaaɓe .
O toɗɗii emireeɓe yo ngardo ɗi : ina hasii ko laamɓe foolaaɓe , jebbiliiɓe ɓee , keewi toɗɗiteede e ngool gardagol .
O tuggidii e innde Alla
O tukkaanii goɗngal ngal waɗi sojoojoo njuga darii e mayri , wooroo ngaari faayaani !
O tumaama " maalde yitde warde laamdo leydi , e pewjugol boneeji ngam iirtude Togooe deecre mum " .
O tuumaa ko ko ɓeya tuumaa koo , waɗtaa heen o etiima buuñde seedeeji mbele ina pena so naamnaama .
O ubbaa ko e wiiduru
O ubbitiri jime makko finaa-tawaji Fuutankooɓe ; Fuuta gila hanki ɓooyɗo jaɓ-jaɓtondiroowo he yontaaji haa yetti mo ciltirɗe mum kawruɗen .
O ummanii kadi golwole keewɗe hakkunde makko e Foode Kabaa Dumbuya .
O ummanii tabitino laabi mbaylaandi ngonka dawrugol , o yaltini dawriyankooɓe sokanooɓe , o fuɗni demokaraasi , o welditini Ecopia e Eriterea .
O ummanii taftaade FDRPE mbele ina wonta yuɓɓo tiiɗngo , natta jogaade mbaydi ndenndinndi heertooji nay ɓurɗi doolnude : Oromo’en , e Amhaara’en , e Tegere’en , e Ɓesnguuji Worgo .
O ummi omo roondii lahal keewngal del ndiyam ngulɗam o yaaɓani cofel .
O ummii , kankone o ñooti tuuba ba haa feewanimbo !
O ummii , o ɓoornii comci Waandu o yahi gese gonɗe caggal wuro ɗee .
O ummii o darii , o fawi koyngal gootal , o fawti ngala , tan o yahi .
O ummii o ƴeewi gorgilaaɗo , oon moosi woni e faamnude mo .
O ummii ɗoon o fayi Kayhayɗi caggal nde o deestii balɗe tati nder wuro makko Fanay-Rewo .
O ummii ɗoon o fayi wuro Daabiya Hoyre Foonde e junngo Ceerno Maamaadu Omar Kan .
O ummitii toon omo woni sukaajo jannguɗo , jaajɗo hakkille , belɗo hakkille , ngam yiylaade moƴƴinde nguurndam makko , o jooɗii ɗo Nuwaasoot ɗoo hade makko jokkude faade Nuwaadibu , ɗo o waɗti gollaade he senaare .
O ummotoo ko leydi men , nokku men Fuuta-Jalon to Gine .

O waalata ko waklitaade " ko o jamma juuti , mate ɗum weetataa ?
O waali ɗoon e nder haayre ndee , caggal ɗuum , o woppi ɗoon tiggu oo .
O waanoo ko no jiirotooɗo nii , kono jooni kam , so tawii ko haalaa koo ina woodi , eɗen mbaawi wiyde o wonnoo tigi ko e jiiraade .
O waawii famminde en tigi rigi e ɗee caɗeele kewɗe .
O waawii yettaade leeɗe naatɗe ɗee , o waawii heɗaade yoga ngam famminde mo caɗeele ɗe ɓe nguuri ɗee balɗe .
O waddi ko e gollanooɓe makko .
O waggini ɓe yo ɓe mbelno walla ɓe mbaasa bonnande Ehel Siidi Mahmuud en , Tajakaant en , Mesuuma en , Iddawaali en , ngaa sabu e miijo makko ɓeen ina mbaawi bonondirde e Idawayesh en .
O waggini ɓe yoo ɓe njogo nehdi e horum e galle mo ɓe payi oo .
O wallifii defte daartol e pentol walla mbiyen miilol hono no o noddirta ɗum ni .
O wallifii jime keewɗe pinndinooje , tinndinooje , jeertinooje , kono kadi kirjinooje ɓiyɓe Afriknaaɓe he kuuɓal , Fulɓe kadi haa ɓuri teeŋtude he gollanaade ɓamtaare .
O wallifiima kadi defte daartol e defte ko yowitii he dawrugol .
O wallifiima kadi deftere pentol woɗnde nde tiitoonde mum he ɗemngal Farayse ko : Les Gardiens du Temple .
O wallifiima kadi he toɓɓere Holno Allah Anndortoo he Science ?
O wallifiima ko heewi hayso tawii suwaa muuleede .
O wallii diine , o faabiima fuutaŋkooɓe .
O waraa ko Almaañ e hitaande 1942 , Almaañnaaɓe mbaɗi mo ko takko Aix-en-Provence .
O wasiyii leyɗe hirnaange
O wasiyii yimɓe fof yo ɓeydu darnde ngam hisnude ɗemɗe sabu mum en wonde ndonaandi/ngalu winndere ndenndaandi .
O wasiyii ɓe ɗum : " Woto on keño etee woto on ndukdu sabu ɗuum bonnat coodgol .
O wasiyiima fulɓe kala nde njokkondirta , paamotira kadi kaɓano dental .
O wasiyiima gooto kala ɗo darii e kala meccal waawi jogaade , yo wood ko golli .
O wattindii ko yo yimɓe mbaɗtu hakkille e pinal mumen e ɗemngal mumen ko ɗuum woni neɗɗaagal mumen .

O wattini ko tuumde Baaba Muusa e yeeso hoɓɓe ɓee .
O wayi tan ko no jawdi nii ) .
O waɗaa cukko Alfaa Umar Konaare laatiiɗo Hooreejo Heerto ngo .
O waɗatnoo ko njeeygu , omo wappondira e tuubakooɓe kañum e filñiiɓe ginenaaɓe ( rebelles en ) .
O waɗdi Baydi e dawooɓe , o wiyi ɓe , so Baydi ɗaaniima tan , yo ɓe tonngu mo , walla ɓe mbara mo .
O waɗdi e Fereer San ( Frère Jean ) , añɓe Bakkaar battamboniiɓe , Muhammed wul Jaher mo Ehel Siidi Mahmuud kam e El Beshiir mo Mesuuma .
O waɗdi heen heñaare ɓurtunde .
O waɗdi heen paɗe mukke ɗe baaba Haaruuna sodannoo mo to Sammba sakke .

O waɗi Seek Hasan nulaaɗo makko timmuɗo feewde e Iddawaysh en , yo tin maa petelaaji ngummoro ɗum en Maruk .
O waɗi capanɗe nay ( 40 ) ngelooba , o hokki ɗum " Sheex " Muhammad Wul Faadel , o wiyi yo o waɗan mo ñaagunde Alla .
O waɗi heen jawdi makko , semmbe makko e ganndal makko haa golle timmi .
O waɗi heen jeewte dingire e hirjinooji ngam noddude Fulɓe yoo ngar njannga kadi mbinnda he ɗemngal mum en .
O waɗi hoore ndee no ɓalndu Ɗaawuus nih , ɗum ko ndiwri njooɗndi so wiifni laaci kii wayata ko no mbeɗu nih .
O waɗi jaŋde makko hakkundeere ko to liisee iñnjeejo Johanesburg , ɗo o heɓi miijooji fedde wiyeteende Mooɓondiral iñnjiyee en Tranvaal e gardo mum ine wiyee Yuusuf Daado .
O waɗi kadi eeraango feewde e Fuutankooɓe , ko aldaa e paltoor , nde mawninta Ceerno Sileymaani Baal e wondiiɓe mum sabu so wonaano kamɓe , Fuuta nattatno woodde , fuutankaagal majjatno .
O waɗi kawgel ko e hitaande 1992 .
O waɗi kawgel ngel , o heɓi berwe .
O waɗi ko soorooji nay .
O waɗi ko weddaade eeraango e denndaangal Nuwaadibunaaɓe haa teeŋti hoohooɓe diine e aada ɓe nootittoo e jaŋde pulaar sabu puɗaar e diine e aada njiydi njahdata .
O waɗi nguurndam makko fof ko e sunnaade e wiɗtude geɗe cuuɗiiɗe e winndere ndee .
O waɗi nulaaɓe e tirbiiji keewɗi , ko nanndi e Tenghaa en .
O waɗi uujiyankooɓe ko woytoraarndu caɗeele ɗe leydi ndii jookii he nder mum .

O waɗi ɗum laabi tati caggal ɗum o wi’i : " ko nih nelaado ( MJKM ) salliginirtonoo .
O waɗi ɗum noon ko e innde Aarabaagal e innde arabeeɓe fof , teenŋte noon e ɓe Moritani ɓe .
O waɗii fannuuji keewɗi to bannge gannde lugge .
O waɗii film nguurndam mum fof haa laaɓi .

O waɗii leppi keewɗi haala e jeewte , kadi .
O waɗira gooto gooto noon , o adoroo fowru .
O waɗti bayyinde binndanɗe he jaaynde Messali Haaj wiyeteende El-Umma .
O waɗti gollaade to defterdu Hachette .
O waɗti heen fayndaare njuɓɓudi leydi Tuunus fawii ko he diine Lislaam .
O waɗti heen o winndi ñalnde 11 marsa : " Fanay-Waalo fof ( woni Fanay Senegaal ) wonani ko oo canndolinɗo , wuro ngoo waɗi ko pooye 117 , heen 108 ko he makko ngondi " .
O waɗti heen o wiyi " so tuubakooɓe njaɓaani haala makko , ko kure ummiiɗe dow pirtata ɓe " .
O waɗti heen seernaaɓe Jolof .
O waɗti hoore makko laamiiɗo juulɓe , o jiimi e Gober e maayirɗe 1817 .
O waɗti wallude Ami .
O waɗti waɗdude nde e Ami Saydu Baaraan Bah .
O waɗtoyi kawgel goɗngel paytungel e karallaagal ndema , e hitaande ndee wootere , o ari hoore .
O weddi ɓiɗɗo oo e ndiyam , ɗum wonti ngaadaaka , ka taciini mo .

O wi'i : ''Sukaaɓe jooni ina njogii hakkeeji .
O wii : So a hawriino e makko sabu dolokkaaji , tenngaade e maktuum mo o ɓoornotonoo , a feccataa sikke wonde oo ko Pullo .

O wii so wonaa ɓeen ndokkamo yoga e gannde lugge ɗe mo ɓeyditoroo e won e cefi mum’en .
O winndanooma e duɗal jaŋde farayse kono o juutaani heen .
O winndataa , o tarataa kono kala ko o yiyi walla o nani laawol gootol , o faaytataa walla yaltataa hakkille makko .
O winndi heen ko " Allah wari Sankara " wonaa kural .
O winndi jime keewɗe he Fulfulde/Pulaar e Hawsankoore ngam hirjin’de wonnde yoo rewɓe njanngine nganndinee diine mum en Islaam .
O winndi kadi ko heewi he ɗemngal Arab ngam felde seernaaɓe ɓe njannginaani ɓesnguuji mum en rewɓe ɗii , e jaabaade kadi heen woɗɓe huccinatnooɓe e makko ñiŋoore sabu ko rewɓe tawtortee waajuuji makko ko .
O winndi ko ene wona defte sappo muulaaɗe .
O winndii defte hiisiwal toowngal e ɗemngal Pulaar .
O winndii defte keewɗe , ganndaaɗe , kuutoraaɗe sanne e nder ɓiɓɓe Fulɓe .
O winnditii e nder duɗal jaaɓihaaɗtirde ina wiyee AL Azhaar .
O winnditii he duɗal Toowngal , o daranii hujjaaji sanɗaaji Afirikinaaɓe wonnooɓe toon .
O wirnaa ko to baamuule gaɗa maayo biyateeɗe MBUULMA .
O wirtii jahdiiɗo makko ɓaleejo reedu oo .
O wiy " Sabu ko waɗi Tunis koo wonaa normaal kadi wonaa ko jaɓotoo he 2023 , ɗo Aduna yahrata ɗo .
O wiy : " Duɗe janngirɗe ɗee , gaagaa ko ɗe goni lewlewal jeynantoongal ɓiyɓe leñol ngol coñce mum en e kelmeendi ɗemngal mum en , ma ɗe ngon kadi jooɓngol ngon ene yeynoo laawbi fayde he janngo maɓɓe .
O wiy kala mo mbaawɗa wonde dee mi nanii sawtowol maa ngol .
O wiy ko gorko ɓelɗo kuɗol sanne , kono kadi o yaawnii o firani joɗnde ndee hol ko woni welde kuɗol : " Ko o kaayanaaɗo binndol , keewɗo ko wallifii " .
O wiy so ɓe ngarii ɓe ngardata ko e bonirantaagal , kirim , e jikkuji boɗi ɗi njaɓotaako .
O wiya kadi : mbiɗo seedoo deweteeɗo alaa so Alla gooto mo alaa denndidiiɗo , mbiɗo seedoo Mohammadu ko nulaaɗo Alla .

O wiyi

O wiyi njillu makko ko wostondirde e Gana kañum e Afrik fof ngam yiytude laabi ɓamtaare duunde men ndee .
O wiyi o ari e maɓɓe ko omo wuli jaw .
O wiyi o waɗaani kuu sabu jaagorɗe leydi ndii njokkii golle , cuuɗi sarɗiiji memaaka .
O wiyi omo sikki eɗen poti naamnaade gooto kala e maɓɓe hol ko waɗi ɗum yiɗde ummaade e leydi ndii .
O wiyi omo sikki so ɓe kuutoriima ɗuum maa wood ko ɗum nafi ɓe seeɗa e naange ngee .
O wiyi omo yiɗi ɓurɓe tampude ɓee ndokkee juŋngo tawa ko ngo laamu , walla-ɓe heɓde ɗo ɓe mbaawaa heɓande ko'e maɓɓe ( discrimination positiɓe ) .
O wiyi renndo fof ina foti ndaartude sifaa mum keeriiɗo no yuɓɓinirta jeyi leydi hakkunde mum , tawa ina tuugnii e pinal mum e finaa tawaa mum .
O wiyi so wuro siñtaama yo rokke cukalel mbele ena yahra yeeso .
O wiyi ummini-mo ko salaade yoo leydi ndii duumo e caɗeele haa demokaraasii puɗɗinooɗo ñiɓaade e mayri waɗti yerɓude .
