O wona e wiyde
O wona ekkol kebloowo ɓiyleydi janngo , potɗo jogaade mbaadi ndiwtundi leñol ngam ustude gallugol e goppugol jaŋde , rewrude e guurtingol peeje jannginirɗe to bannge laabi e mbaadiiji .
O wonaa Pullo , ko o Bellah ( Targi Ɓaleejo ) mawnuɗo Kuufa , nehiiɗo e
O wonata ko e wiyde " oo kam mbaar ɗaanaaki nder taarorde " walla " mbaar gaddoyɗo coktirɗe o majjaani ?
O wonde e sukaaɓe dumunna ngam wallude e kawgel ngel .
O woni e Salnde Tebegut ko duuɓi ɗiɗi doŋ .
O woni e firlaade e leydi , o mo yah e mo arta e mo luuka ngam artirde hakkillaaji yimɓe ɓee e makko .
O woni e leydi ndii , o jaɓɓaa e mayri saɗne .
O woni e miijaade holno o seerndirta koɗorɗe maɓɓe , haa Allah jippini e makko yamiroore .
O woni gardiiɗo duɗal hakkunde leyɗewal jaŋde dowrowre siynaande Nkchtt , ko o neɗɗo baɗtuɗo hakkille mum no feewi ɓosgol leydi Muritani , mo meeɗaa humpeede fiyakuuji mayri .
O woni kadi tergal tiiɗngal fedde syndicat ( gila he UTM haa he CGTM ) .
O woni ko Farayse , o heɓii tawde baaba makko to lopitaal mawɗo ɗo , o duusii mo ɗo balɗe , Alla hokkii mo tawtoreede kadi wirwirnde Baaba makko .
O woni ko Rewo , sara wuro ina wiyee Maal .
O woni ko nokku nanngam .
O woni koroowo jaŋde arab fotde duuɓi ɗiɗi , tuggude e hitaande 1962 fayde e hitaande 1964 .
O woni magiyanke dowrowo ( acteur principal ) he nder mago-doge , " Xale Xaalis " ko jiidaa kadi seriiji Pulaar goɗɗi keewɗi .
O woni toon dumunna .
O woni toon haa e hitaande 1955 , o fayti Senegaal .
O woni toon hitaande .
O woni toon ko juuti o dañataa ko o yoɓiri , o artataa ngam o suusaa ñamaande , etee yimɓe ɓee njiɗii heɓde jawdi mum en kono cuusaa abbaade mo .
O wonie geewaade , surgaaji makko ndewi heen .
O wonii e joɗnde makko ko ɓuri duuɓi sappo hade makko seertude e Wadd .
O wonii e kaan ngonka dumunna juutɗo sanne , ko adii baaba makko Laamaka ina sankoo .
O wonii e nder wuro Konakiri ( Laamorgo Gine ) haa hitaande 1969 .
O wonii e ngooɗoo wuro potde lebbi nay , tuggude lewru siilo haa e lewru seeɗto .
O wonii hooreejo catal Kayhayɗi ko juuti , gila 1977 , haa nde lomtimoo-mi he teddunngal e hitaande 2015 , tawi kanko e hoore makko haali yo goɗɗo lomto mo , tawi o faamii so doole ndonkii yo doole keɓɓo .
O wonii laamɗo Angalteer e Irlanndaa e innde Jacques II , o wonii laamɗo Ekos ( Ecosse ) e innde Jacques VII .
O wonii mo ɓesngu Muritani fof , faarnortoo ngati leñol heen fof ine yiytoo hoore mum ko o waɗata koo .
O wonii toon he sete Genɗi Dentuɗi , o holliri toon jambaraagal makko .
O woniino jaagorɗo e sahaa Seengoor , kadi caggal ɗuum o woni jaagorɗo e saanga laamu Abdu Juuf .
O woniino kadi gardiiɗo jaaynde wiyeteende Peeral .
O woniino kalfinaaɗo ngalu to Liisee nasiyonaal .
O woniri noon haa fowru tawi mo ɗoon e kaan ngonka .
O wonndi e maɓɓe e dow ɗuum ko ina tolnoo duuɓi capanɗe nay .
O wonno ko e ɗaanaade .
O wonnoo ko Lisaa , caggal mum to Njum to Paate Jinnde en , o nani mi waɗtii fiyde moolo , kaŋko ne , o ari o tiri moolo .
O wonnoo ko paabotooɗo , keɓiiɗo nde neɗɗo hollitnoo mo mum haaju mum fof maa nde o tinnoo musidno ina wondi e caɗeele fof .
O wonti nokku hurmanteejo , hare e makko ene harmi ( haɗaa , baɗɗo fof lawol ene fawee e dow mum ) .
O wonti paho sabu noppi cukkuɗi .
O wonti tonngoowo jeewte e konngi .
O wontoyi toon Hooreejo Asaambele Ngenndi Maruk .
O woondi e yanaande makko , maa o waɗ koo hunii ko .
O wootondirtunoo ko e debbo biyeteeɗo Keiko Fujimori .
O woppaani hay iwdi jettooɗe keeriiɗe ɗe Haalpulaar'en keerorii .
O woppaani kadi Hilary Clinton nde oon yilloyinoo Mexico ngam maandin’de wonan’de kala paamoowo won’de ko oon duñi mo nde o yahata Mexico mbela kala ko oon waawnoo dañde toon e juko bamɗi tuge , tawa wonaa kañum tan .
O woppaani kubbal , o duulaaki asakkeeje gese .
O woppaani mi haa mbaaw mi janngude e winndude .
O woppani hare wuurnude e hisnude
O woppi jawe makko e paɗe makko too fonngo maayo ngoo .
O woppidi ɓe ndiyam keddinooɗam e hudusuru makko e sasa ene waɗi tamarooje .
O woppira noon hakke hojomaaji joyi walla jeegom , o yara .
O woppiri mi naalaŋkaagal am .
O wostondiraa ko e 1 027 palestiinnaaɓe dummbanooɓe .
O wulli no diiraango no manaango ni .
O wuura nde toɓaani ndee kadi .
O wuuri he nder Farayse ma won jooni duuɓi cappanɗe tati .
O wuuri ko duuɓi 55 kono golle makko majjataa , maayataa , maa keddo naftoreede e aduna haa ñalnde leydi taggaa , downgu ɓaaraa .
O wuurii heen fotde duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi : o woniino kalfinaaɗo geɗe politik to Ndar , laamorgo leydi ndi ; o woniino kumaandaŋ seerkal Luga ; o woniino kumaandaŋ seerkal Tiwaawoon .
O yaactini Baytul-Hikmah waɗti wiyeede Daar-al-Hikmah .
O yaaw arde maa o wonaa peewnitinooɗo ?
O yaaɓani jooɗaade e jappeere laamu laawol 6ɓol .
O yaaɓani yuɓɓinde woote , ɗe o waɗi feere fof mbele ina mbaawa wonde nuunɗude .
O yahanii ɗum haa to dowla Farayse e waɗde toon
O yahdaani heen sabu ɗum miijo ngo cakkitii-mi haalde ngo wiyi : " Neɗɗo tagata ɗum ko yimɓe , tagtatoo ɗum kadi ko yimɓe , yimɓe renndo ngo o woni ngo "
O yahdi e ƴattooje e kuɗdi haa heewi .
O yahdi he soofaaji 29 .
O yahdi ɗoon e fedde ngenndiyanke Aljerinaajo Mesaali Haaj , wiyeteende " Etoile Nord-africiane – Hoodere Afiri-Rewo " .
O yahi Ndakaaru jokkoyde jaŋde tuubakiri ndii , o heɓi kadi fartaŋŋe yahde heen hay Duɗal Keblorgal Jaaynooɓe biyeteengal " CESTI " ( Centre d’Etudes Des Sciences Et Techniques De L’information ) , o heɓi toon seedanfaagu jaayndiyanke .
O yahi ko idii ko omo heɓa geɗal makko , o ɓelsi heen fotde 850 miliyoŋ dolaar .
O yahi ko juuti haa o yanti laabi celi .
O yahi ladde woɗɗunde , o turi toon suudu wooturu , o hooti wuro , o nawi toon debbo oo kañum tan gooto e ladde Alla e jeereende .
O yahi to Almaañnaajo jogiiɗo lonngorgal , o holli oon hol e bannge e asamaan o , oon foti lonngoraade ; " ƴeewan am ɗum ooɗoo bannge , tagofeere nde ko e ooɗoo bannge e asamaan he foti wonde " Almaañnaajo o ƴeewiri oon bannge , yiyi tagofeere nde !
O yahi to Israayiilnaaɓe , o woni e waajaade ɗum en , omo ñaawa hakkunde mum en ngam seerndude goonga e fenaande , won ɗo o anndiraa e nder Israayiilnaaɓe ɓiy nayeejo , woni heen yimɓe ko noon noddirta mo .
O yahi to wuro wooto wonngo sara hirnaange Lummbol .
O yahii caggal nde o tacci teeminannde no woorunoo , o yahdii e ganndal makko e teskuyaaji makko ɗi nafoore mum en alaa ɗo kaaɗi .
O yahii ko juuti e naange wulnge ngee saasnge .
O yahii kono o naworaani ñamaande leñol Fulɓe kono Fulɓe kam ene njoganiimo tawo ñamaande .
O yahrata hikka ko hitaande 2019 .
O yahratnoo ko duuɓi 33 tan .
O yalti , o yahi maayo , o addi ndiyam mbelɗam haa heewi .
O yalti ko e galle laamotooɓe , ɓe hinnde Deeniyankooɓe , laaminoonde Fuuta Tooro tuggude e 1 512 fayde e 1 776 .
O yalti toon ñalnde 15 morso 1973 , o fektaa to Njuɓɓudi Ñaawoore e Kuuge , o woni ɗoon haa 1977 , o ruttii to ENA ɗo o yalti he hitaande 1979 , o ruttii ɗo o sakkitinoo gollaade ɗoo .
O yaltini heen asakal , o wuurni heen ɓesngu makko haa heddii .
O yaltini ngaluuji keewɗi ngam wallitde annduɓe haa ndaña no mbaɗiri wiɗtooji ganndal e no mballiforii ɗeen ngannde he ɗemngal Arab .
O yaltinii hannde bayyinaango to wuro ngo Bonngo antiri ngoo .
O yaltiri galle laamu oo , ko damecuuɗingel , ngam ruppaade jaaynooɓe e hulde fiyeede .
O yamiri yo jumaa mawka ka laamɗo Kummboro mahnoo kaa , yo woppe , o mahi jumaa kesa ngoɗka .
O yamiri yo ɗi ngon hoɗannde maɓɓe e genaale maɓɓe , caggal ɗuum ɓe nawa toon kaake keewɗe , ko wayi no jawɗeele mooftaaɗe e kaŋŋeeji e kaɓirɗe goɗɗe ngam ndeenka maɓɓe , nde ɓe mahata ɗuum , nde kala ko ɓe nguurdunoo ɓe baɗanii ɗumen to koɗi gila e noodi kaawniiɗi haa e oogirɗe keewɗe ummiiɗe e leydi .
O yamiri yoo ɓe mbar ngel , ɓe keɓta ndonu nguu .
O yamiri yoo ɓe ngulnu ndiyam ɗam .
O yamiri ɓe yo ɓe ñaam liingu nguu .
O yamiri ɗum yoo mah Ka`bah , ma taw tawi ka rappi haa ka firtii sabu welsindaare ɓooynde duumiinde e pusameeje mawɗe , keewɗe , ganndaaɗe e daartool aade .
O yani , ƴiiƴam keccam ina siiworoo baŋ-yoo-baŋ .
O yarni jaadiɗo makko e puccu makko .
O yawti e liisee Ɓoggee e 1995 .
O yaɓɓi e baylo , sakke sefi , o jooɗii e maama labbo " ;
O yaɓɓiti e felo Sayku Umarul Fuutiiyu Taal ƴettunooɗo fetel diine , haɓi e tuubakooɓe , holli aarabeeɓe teddungal Ɓaleejo haa njiyri gite mumen .
O yeccitii , o yi'i jinne kulɓiniiɗo .
O yeewa , kono o sooynii ladde nde ne yooɗi no feewi .
O yeeyii gese , o yeeyii
O yeeƴii keeci makko , tiggu oo noddi mo , wiyi mo : aan neene , oto hulan am ngam oon tagɗo mi ko oon reenata-mi .
O yejjitaani , haa hannde , wonde ciiltirɗi ɗamɗoo nguurndam konunke tawnoo mo ko e wuro Aksuus , ɗo o heɓdi mbelemmaaji ɗiɗi puneeji ɗoo
O yejjitaani ɓittorde ɓohre nde .
O yejjitii tampere nde o wuurnoo .
O yerondiri oon e debbo hannde , debbo tuundi e tumminaali , wela teppere , wela ɗemngal , poppotooɗo , ñaaƴiroowo ɓanndu mehru .
O yeru , ko anndin’de tan , e nder aduna he , huunde fof fawii ko e yowitaare , fawii e ko hol no yiyraa e nokkuuji ceertuɗi .
O yetti Allah e jinnaaɓe , o salmini tawtoranooɓe .
O yetti Baaba Siik , o haalni ɗum yiɗde makko naanude Ceerno lekkol taade o timmini ɗuuɓi jeeɗiɗi .
O yetti Ceerno Laam ko adii kala ko feewti e defte mum : sawru ganndal kam e paalel njuumri .
O yetti Fedde Suleymaani Baal Senegaal sabu fiɓnde nde jogii e yuɓɓinde ñalawma bayɗo hono nii .
O yetti ardorde Fedde Ceerno Sileymaani Baal Ndakaaru wonnde sabaabu garal makko e Boode .
O yetti fedde Jalluɗi Jam sabu tiiɗnaare e jogaade faandaare laaɓtunde .
O yetti kadi FONADH sabu o wii wonde eɓɓaande nde ummanii e oo sahaa nde : " Cemmbingol mbaawka ɓiɗɗo leydi e hisnude jey mum , jeygol e jiimgol rewɓe leydi " ko huunde jojjunde fotnde rokkeede himme , to bannge falnde maɓɓe maa ɓe mballit no haaniri nii .
O yetti yuɓɓinɓe ɗii kiirɗeeli pine , Fedde fuuta .
O yettii wuro ngoo , o fayi to laamɗo too , omo ɗowi mbeewa
O yettinii njettoraaji makko fayde e Abuu Sih e won’diiɓe mum e kuuɓal .
O yettoyii Ejipte ( Egypte ) walla Misira ko e hitaande 1966 , caggal nde o waɗi duuɓi jeegom e laawol .
O yii nyaw kono o addaani safaara .
O yiitiino wonnde e karnal kaso oo , Bolondee Joop faɗɗinooma e yontere adiinde kabaaru saŋkaare " bartagol " makko , te ardiiɓe kasoo ɓee mbaɗii no ellee hay huunde kewaani .
O yillii ko ngootiri e leyɗeele ɗo ɓaleeɓe heewɓe ndahanoo , kaɓɓaa geƴƴelle ngam wuuroyde e macungaagu to Amerik .
O yilliima PK 16 , Dem Dick e Toulel .
O yilliima heen diiwal St .
O yimatnoo koko fayti e maayde ñiiwa .
O yimi haa weli , o yetti , o teeŋtini njettoor feewde e Jalluɗi Jam .
O yimi ko " Mbaañ Sammba , Cile e leydi Hammadi " .
O yimii jamfa ngam teddinirde ngenndiyankooɓe Muritani suuɗiiɓe hannde leppi leydi ngoppi teddungal e hare potal leƴƴi .
O yimti , o fusi ɓoccoonde joyaɓere nde .
O yirlii dinngiral ngal , omo ama haa o yotti to piyoowoo mbaggu oo .
O yiya eɗen ndoga , eɗen njaha , eɗen ndoondoo bahe leɗɗe e nyaayko , eɗen mucca jaɓɓe e jaaɓe , eɗen mbakkoo ɓoti , eɗen ndaasa kooce , eɗen nyaaƴa eɗen laƴa , tabalɗe walla mbaggu fiyee neɗɗo werloo koyɗe dow !
O yiya eɗen ndoga , eɗen njaha , eɗen ndoondoo bahe leɗɗe e ñaayko , eɗen mucca jaɓɓe e jaaɓe , eɗen mbakkoo ɓoti , eɗen ndaasa kooce , eɗen ñaaƴa eɗen laƴa , tabalɗe walla mbaggu fiyee neɗɗo werloo koyɗe dow !
O yiyi
O yiyi Hawwaa ina jooɗii sara makko , ina yalti e wirngo makko nano , Alla ina moƴƴini tagoore mum , Alla ina hokki mo ujunere to bannge jikkuuji moƴƴi .
O yiyi kala sahaa , jawɗeele Fuutankooɓe ina ngaddee toon , etee omo anndi ɗum rewaani laawol .
O yiyi kala sahaa , sagataaɓe worɓe ina ngitteeFuuta , ngaddee , mbaɗee jiyaaɓe .
O yiyi ɓiyɓe soknaaɓe ina ciŋkaa haa njooɗi , ina ngaddee , mbaɗee horɓe .
O yiyi ɗum tan o eewnii mi .
O yiylii nanondiral hakkunde makko he laamaaɓe makko .
O yiyondirii e Mikhail Bogdanof , cukko hooreejo geɗe caggal leydi .
O yiɗi hollude ko ñalawma fof o mo lima ɗum sabu aawaare ɓaƴƴal soto kaaɗki nde Bush woppiri mo kono kadi o mo hamdinii heen sabu wiyanooma laamu makko laatotaako .
O yiɗi naatnude oo debbo dowluɗo he fedde makko daraniinde hujjaaji Ɓaleeɓe .
O yontidaa ko e Suleymaani Baal e Abdul Qaadiri Kan en .
O yooɓotaako ndiyam saka dawrude kacitaari , ko e caaɗngel takkingel sooynde ngesa makko , baɗngel ndiyam keelelam , ceniɗam nannduɗam e ciggeɗam ciiwteɗam o yarata .
O yuurnittonoo ko miijanteendi caggal-koloñaal , jowitiingal e ceertugol pine , miijanteendi njahdundi e ngonka leydi men , so en njiɗaa Muritani wona keeri leydi tan , wona leydi ndi alaa miijo arngo dow leƴƴi walla banngambanngaagu , tawa yaltataa e hakillaaji men wonde , ngootaagu ngenndi ko huunde mettunde yettaade , nde heɓotaako abada , kono ko huunde teeɗanteende , fotnde teeɗaneede e kala sahaa : " hakkille loskoowo jaɓataa waawneede naattude nder lasal ngam haɓoyde e gaño carɗinaaɗo walla goɗɗo .
O ñaagii sagataaɓe annduɓe e alɗuɓe hannde ɓee , nde ŋeertinta dadungal , njokkondira e daraniiɓe ɓamtude ɗemngal e pinal leñol ngol mbele Alla ena walla ɗumen koonoo , geɗe mumen mbaasa majjude .
O ñaagii ɗoon ndiyam njareteeɗam , suka debbo gooto rokkimo ndiyam seeɗa e horde .
O ñaamaani , o yaraani fawtii heen o wondi e yeeweende .
O ñaami heen tann haa ɓernde makko ɓuuɓi .
O ñaawaa , o taƴanaa duuɓi 20 he dummbirdu .
O ñaawaa omo sokee duuɓi nay nder dummbirdu Waalata .
O ñaawaa sokeere kaaɗdi nguurndam makko kono maayde heɓtiimo e nder kasoo .
O ñaawaa ñalnde 16 marsa ( Mbooy ) 1906 .
O ñekki .
O ñiŋi kadi pooɗondiral hakkunde leyɗe mawɗe ɗe , sibu , e wiyde makko , ko telɓinooje deeƴre hakkunde Israayiil e Palestiin : " So Dental Amerik sakkii feere ngam ñawndude luural ngal , Farayse ara sawndina ɗoon feere mum ngam telɓinde ndeya ; Riis enne ngadda feere woɗnde ngam telɓinde ɗeya " .
O ŋati feɗeendu o ficci , o fuɗɗi miijaade hol no o waɗata haa o jagga Bojel kadi .
O ŋoŋi , o woni e dooyaade .
O Ɗuum leeldi mo , o waɗti yeeyde jaaynde wiyeteende Kalaam ( Le Calame ) .
O ƴakki , o yari , o yartii , o hamdinii , o fokkiti , o yahi .
O ƴeendii mo ko juuti o totti mo jogiiɗo duɗal ngal .
O ƴeesi juuɗe makko haa leeɓi naafɗe makko guɗɗi henndu , o salki mbaroodi ndii e hakkunde .
O ƴeetti beeke e makko .
O ƴefti kuɗol , o jooɗii hitaande no woorunoo omo hiisoo , omo hiisoo , haa o yiyti holi sabaabu jahgol Uraanus ena ooñii .
O ƴelliti daande makko o wiyi " So tawii Burkina woni ko he ngol laawol , yo ɓe ƴeewto ko ñohetee koo , sabu ko laawol ngol huccaani he peewal .
O ƴelliti jaŋde Ɓuraana .
O ƴettani annabi Iisaa , ( JKM ) feere bonnde , o felliti warde ɗum .
O ƴetti bolol ooñingol , omo wondi e heege , nomka e tampere .
O ƴoogi loonde ndee , o yari .
O ƴukkitii tan , o wiyi bal oo e nder gaccungol meƴƴu !
O ɓadtii ɗum o naamndii innde mum , debbo oo wiyi mo mbiyetee mi ko Faynusatu , ɓiyum Ekliil gooto e ɓiɓɓe qaabil ɓiiy Aadam , o wiyi oon : aɗa kilifa ?
O ɓami paddorgal , laañal e njuulaawi makko , o waɗɗii puccu .
O ɓenni kadi to galle pinal wuro ngoo ngam innirde mo Galle Mammadu Boolo Dem .
O ɓeydan en laɓɓinande ko woni golle makko e nder yeewtere men ndee .
O ɓeydi heen " Homo Sapiens ko ko majjata , ina gasa ɗoo e duuɓi 100 .
O ɓeydi heen : " min cikkatnoo ko alaa e sago , so neɗɗo ina mawna , ippokamp mum wona e famɗitde , kono ngooɗoo jarribo hollii wonde so neɗɗo ina softina ɗaɗi mum e ɓernde mum , hay so seeɗa , e nder hitaande , ɗuum ina waawi ɓeydude ndeeɗoo hettere ngaanndi " .
O ɓeydi heen o o wiꞌi : " ko ɗoo woni cuuɗi makkon .
O ɓeydi heen wonde kullel anndaa ndiga , ko joom mum foti ɗum reende hade lorde goɗɗo .
O ɓeydii heen , luulndaade laamu makko , fotaani addande won luulndiiɓe yiɗande leydi ndii bonannde .
O ɓeydii heen noon " ko huunde tafaande , tee , waɗɓe ɗum e internet ɓee , mbaɗiri ɗum ko yiɗde bonnande mi , ɗum woodaani " .
O ɓoccitii ɗoon ñalnde
O ɓoli baaji nammaadi , o sañi heen ɓoggol , o anniyii nawtude nooro e ɓesngu mum to maayo .
O ɓoornotoo ko ko wiyetee Pinal ko .
O ɓooyaani ɗoon o yalti , caggal ɗuum o arti e maɓɓe ñalngu ɗimmu , nde ɓe njiyi mo kadi ɓe ɓeydii dañde caɗeele Alla e giɗli , gooto e maɓɓe fof ina haalana goɗɗo oon no giɗli mum e jarabi mum poti e makko , nde fiyaaku ɓeydii e maɓɓe , ɓe njiɗi lelodaade e makko , o salii haa yoori , o yalti nokku oo caggal ɗuum o arti laawol tataɓol o naati , ɓe njiɗi yande makko kadi o salii , o wiyi ɓe : " aaɓnantaako on heɓde mi tawo on mbaɗaani ko njiɗ-mi mbaɗon koo , so on mbaɗii ko njiɗ-mi koo , keɓon ko njiɗ-ɗon koo .
O ɓurata welde huutoraade sibu aɗa waawi hay wadde heen " telecharger , defte Hors ligne , Woni hayso taawii a Alaa connexion , aɗa waawa janngude ɗum no weldu maa fof .
O ɓuri faweede ko he jangtoore Haluna Tarawele , o sili darnde e haala dille dawrugol e koninkooɓe Burkinaaɓe .
O ɓuri jaaloraade noon ko COVID-19 .
O ɓuri jaɓaneede ko e Tararsa , Barakna e Tagante e bannge e Adraar ɗo o felɓondirtunoo e
O ɓuri joofaade e nder haala makko ko nafoore dental kadi o juutnii heen .
O ɓurnoo heewde yande ko he ɓaleeɓe tan , ngam hisde e njoftiigu safalɓe .
O ɓuuɓtii heen o yari heen .
O ɓuuɓtinaani nih , ɗoon e ɗoon o wiyi kam hol no foti coklu-ɗaa e Kaalis .
O ɗaccii golle makko ena daartee .
O ɗaldii en kadi kaɓtorgɗal moxxal : fiɓnde tiinɗnde e soobee e ñiɓre e gollal e hare rimre wondude nuunɗal renndo e ngootaagu ngenndi .
O ɗalii miñiraaɓe : Kayyaa Joob , Maamuudu Joob , Aysata Joob e Demmba Joon ( oon demmba noon ko debbo ) .
O ɗannanii wuro Labe janngoyde to Almameeɓe Fuuta Jaloŋ ngam ɓeydude ganndal makko .
O ɗawaani dewindiiɗo geɗe makko no o naatirnoo e konunkaagu tuubakiri , no o ardunoo e Ndar , no o wonirnoo e Dakaar Banngoo haa no o wuurdunoo e Cees hade makko yahde Alseri e laawol makko gadanol .
O ɗaɓɓiino , gila 2013 , moolaade to Pari , kono Farayse riiwti goɗngol ndeen ɗaɓɓaande ñalnde 19 settaambar 2019 , ñalawma jaltugol deftere makko " Permanent Record " ( Teskorde Wuurnde ) to Farayse .
O ɗaɓɓiri oon nde Amerik ummantoo kam ne feewnude bommbo mum .
O ɗaɓɓiri ɗum nde ɓe mballondirta e yuɓɓinde jeewte almudaagu e nder wuro ngoo .
O ɗowtotaako mo noon e ko o hattanaani walla ko ina safta e makko , ngam konngol Alla .
OLAN ina eewnii nde duɗal men mahtatee e mbaadi ɓurndi yahduɗe e guuraaɗe leydi ndii .
OLAN laaɓndii ko potal pine e ɗemɗe yeeso laabi ñaawoore leydi ndii .
OMVS kañum foti hiisoreede tan ko denndingol doole e leyɗe keediiɗe , ngam huutoraade ngalu maayo Senegaal .
ORANGE .
OTAN jooɗiima duuɓi keewɗi ine woɗɗitii haɓɓere Sowiyet ndee , haa 1999 .
OTAN welltorii ko ko leyɗe Afrik fokkintini .
OTAN wiyi alaa anniya gooto , alaa faandaare wootere , alaa hujja gooto sompude njogitaaje nikleyeer he nder leyɗe naatɗe kese ɗee .
Oba Beneŋ ( laamɗo Beneŋ ) wattini ko haɗde njeeygu jaggaaɓe ( captifs , jiyaaɓe ) .
Obafemi horkiti bal e koyɗe duuñtorde Mosammbik , o luuji fiyannde e gaccungol !
Obama e hoore mum wiyi wontaa yejjitde nde sukaaɓe makko ndewi e gol laawol , no njaatiraaɓe maɓɓe nih , kono kamɓe ɓe ndeftii e maggol ɓe ngarti , fartaŋŋe mo njaatiraaɓe maɓɓe keɓaano .
Obamaa noon jaaraama yoo Geno rooku mo yottin'de payndale ɗee he jam haa winndere ndee kala waɗta ñemmbude ɗum .
Obamaa waɗii ko yooɗi , etee ko nii tan o haani waɗde ngati ko jiyanɗe moƴƴe e hakilantaagal woni ko aduna fof sooyninoo he makko .
Obri Lekonte jaabtii mo ooɗo telegaraam : - " Jamirooje maa fof ciynaama .
Oiseau de Paradis
Oktee ko lime 8 tawa ko "
Oljo-oljo waɗii kono ko himmi , teeŋtinaama e joɗnde ndee , wonde kaaldigal ngal e kuutondiral ngal ko huunde jojjunde no feewi , fotnde duumaade .
Ommbondiraani hay baɗte e innde feere , saka nih ine winndiree fewre .
Omo ana tigi-rigi kabaruuji ɗi o roɓindtoo he men ɗii ?
Omo anndi hay so ɗuum welaani Farmbaal ne , kañum ko Boosoyaajo ; ko jeyi e Boosoya koo jogoraani yahde woppa ɗuum , kono Farba Jowol noon omo waawi waasde Ngenaar yaha , sabu Ngenaar ko jooni jooni yannti e makko kono Ngenaar bannge mum wonnoo Boosoya woni bannge mum , nokku heen fof ko laamɗo mum joginoo Ngenaar noo follii El fekki sabu nuunɗal mum ngati won ko jaɓataa yamirde yoo waɗe .
Omo anndi ko woni ɗoon e kewde koo .
Omo anndiranoo daranaade njiyaagu o suuɗaaki , kadi o taccinii tirbiiji eñnjee no ngoorunoo .
Omo anniyii tiimtaade e gonnooɗo hooreejo Beresiil , hono Luulaa e Hugo Sawes mo Wenuselaa .
Omo ardi e Hammadi Dimbel Jallo ( to Doondu ) , kalfinaaɗo geɗe
Omo ardi e lappol testinngol .
Omo ardi kadi e
Omo doga banngeeji fof ngam renndinde ndi kadi .
Omo fawi juŋngo he hakkille omo yuŋnginii .
Omo fija , omo jala , omo sippira e sehilaaɓe makko .
Omo fooƴi jooni .
Omo foti rokkeede teddundal , o rokkee hurum laaɓɗo .
Omo golla kadi e pelle baarajaagal ( Association caritative ) ko he ngoon yeeso he nder gollondiral makko e pelle Faraysenaaje e Jaagorgal Kalfinaangal Cellal Ɓalli , omo yuɓɓina jonte cellal he nder reedu Fuuta , tawa ko ñawndooɓe ( doktoreeɓe ) ngarata ene cafra yimɓe doofolɓe tawa ko baarajaagal ( alla ɓolo ) .
Omo haala Pulaar laaɓɗo , kadi omo huutondira e yimɓe wuro makko Daabiyanaaɓe .
Omo haalatnoo ɗemɗe nay , neenewal makko Fulfulde , Hawsankoore , Arabeere , e Tamasek ( ɗemngal Tuwaareg en ) .
Omo haalda e hoore makko , omo wiya : ee Geno hol no mbaɗtirat-mi kii lekki haa mi daña heen laana ?
Omo hattani roondaande halitere aadoraande walla nikleyeer .
Omo heblatnoo kadi njillu feewde Sorimalee ngam juuraade wiiduru ɗo ɓalli maayɓe ubbidanoo e hitaande 1990 .
Omo heewi teddungal kadi ko o dariɗoo .
Omo heewnoo mawninde jooɗɗi e moƴƴi neɗɗo , o deƴƴa " ajaaɗe mum ; o bonnitaani "" .
Omo heewnoo yahde Kiifa ɗo o ƴettatnoo njooɓaari tawa o hulaani , walla e keerol hakkunde Barakna e Tararsa , heen sahaaji boom haa to Butelmiit .
Omo hilnii ko faati ko e njeygu kafe .
Omo holli sunaare makko e jowe toosɗe won e men mbaɗi e ko wiyaa koo .
Omo hollira jikkuuji joortaaɗi he ɓiy ceerno no foti siforaade , kono he jaati Zaydi ko jeeyoowo dorog , modduɗo he warhoore .
Omo hucciti e jinne oo , omo ndaara ɗum .
Omo huli Ndakaaru sabu koo nanata e kabaruuji ko .
Omo jeyaa e " akaademi gannde " to Ostraali .
Omo jeyaa e adduɓe miijo e darnde haa Kawtal Janngooɓe Pulaar e Leyɗe aarabeeɓe sosaa .
Omo jeyaa e fuɗɗuɓe jannginde pulaar e nder wuro Ŋoral Gidaala .
Omo jeyaa e jagge Kawtal Janngooɓe Pulaar ( Fulfulde ) to leyɗeele Arab .
Omo jeyaa e jagge cosɗe Catal Rooso .
Omo jeyaa e lelnuɓe politikaaji e peeje ngenndiije kaɓgol e ñabbuuli keewɗi ( SIDA , jontinooje , ɗoyru ekn ) e ko faati kadi e diƴƴe e senaare .
Omo jeyaa e sakkitɓe miijo compugol juɓɓule cellal keewɗe e leydi ndii ko wayi no Nokku ngenndiijo loowtugol ƴiiƴam e goɗɗi .
Omo jeyaa e sosɓe e ardiiɓe OpenAI ( fedde udditiinde toppitiinde ko faati e Ƴoƴre Tafaande ) .
Omo jeyaa e winndunooɓe Wullannde sappo e njeenayo ( Wullannde 19 ) .
Omo jeyaa kadi e jirwintunooɓe " Duɗal toowngal " Fedde nde , e kitaale 1980 , ngal Ibraahiima Demmba Bah janngintunoo .
Omo jeyanoo e jaagorɗe tati cuɓotonooɗe Almaaami Fuuta , sabu makko wonde taanum Aali Duundu .
Omo jeyanoo e sosnooɓe Muritani , mo bone kewkewe 1966 nawornoo .
Omo jeyanoo kadi Njuɓɓudi Ɗemngal arab .
Omo jogii iwdiiji ɗiɗi : kuɓɓugol geɗe ummiiɗe e ɓarakke nguurndam ( petroŋ , ƴulɓe , cuurki laaɗe ekn ) walla ustagol leɗɗe ( maaygol dunli , walla cumu ladde ) .
Omo jogii junngo hattanngo hoore mum , waawngo ñiɓaade he leydi fotde 6 cm , itta toon " santiyoŋaaji " potɗi artireede to Leydi .
Omo jogii njoorto moƴƴo wonnde , Allah jamirɗo Ibraahiim yoo adduɓe haa ɗo woppa ɓe O , won hoddiro mum yiɗi rewnude e makko kanko e ɓiyngel makko ngel .
Omo jogii oto njaga njaay nayeejo .
Omo joginoo daabaa jaawɗo , mettuɗo yahdude saka keɓtaade .
Omo joginoo fotde teemedere jiyaaɗo to ngesa makko ɓesnooje to Mont Vernon .
Omo joginoo rewɓe nayo e ɓesngu worɓe e rewɓe .
Omo jogodii e ceerno Aamadu tijjaani Bah mo Senegaal e aduna kala anndi darnde e yiɗde mum he Islaam e ɗemngal mum Pulaar .
Omo jogori naweede ngam tumeede yitde libde laamu Foor , hooreejo leydi .
Omo jooɗi e sara sudu huɗo wonndu e nokku jaajɗo .
Omo jooɗi omo weltii no feewi , gorko o nana ara ina ardi e ɓernde mettunde e kabaaru muusɗo .
Omo lolliri wonde taƴoowo , walla " saaysaaye " tampinnooɗo ( kamminnooɗo ) yimɓe , gaannunooɗo laamu koloñaal .
Omo luggiɗiinoo e diine lislaam , fawaade mo e Deftere Allah nde .
Omo miijoo , omo miijoo , haa foondu mariyaama ena doga ndaddo , yettii , sorkii e nder wutte makko .
Omo miijoo hol no o waɗata ha o yooɓtoo gacce e mette ɗe Waandu fawi mo .
Omo noddi kadi kala darinooɗo ena haɓoo Maki yoo ɗoofto e koŋngol makko , woppa kala ko waɗatnoo tawa ko yiɗde bonnande Maki .
Omo reendi kattanɗe karalleeje , omo suusi , tee omo reerɗi e humpitaade " .
Omo reggondiri e debbo deenoowo kisal makko .
Omo roɓintonoo defte binndaaɗe walla piraaɗe he ɗemngal Arab kala he yonta makko , gila e defte diine ( hadiis , fiqhu , e tafsiir ) haa e defte daartol , coñce , ɗemngal ( lugha , nahw , sarf ) ; kono kadi defte gannde goɗɗe , ko wayno safaara ( medcine ) , mbewu ( astronomie ) , e aasiñoraagal o renndini ɗum en he nokku gooto no defterdu ni .
Omo rutta-ɓe teddungal etee omo wiya-ɓe ko e maɓɓe o wonndi .
Omo salii haa ɗoon waawi haaɗde kalifaandi koloñaal en ; o seerti no feewi oon bannge e miñiiko
Omo seedtananoo kattanɗe mawɗe e nder hare he .
Omo sooana mi lamɗam ?
Omo sooworee kadi " Katamaawu " .
Omo sooynoo nooro oo ina haya e dow ndiyam ɗaam .
Omo takkaa noon hannde " cuuɗgol maayɗo , yiɗde yerɓinde kisal Dowla , jeyeede he moojobere warngo neɗɗo " ( recel de cadavre , attentat à la sûreté de l’Etat et complicité d’assassinat ) .
Omo tampi no feewi .
Omo tuuma warhoore neɗɗaagu e mumtugoe warngo 8 000 sagata gorko to Srebrenica e hitaande 1995 .
Omo tuumaa kanko ne yiɗde yerɓinde kisal Dowla ( d’attentat à la sûreté de l’Etat ) , jeyeede he moojobere warngo neɗɗo , cuuɗgol maayɗo , e yiɗde soodde seedeeji mbele ina ndeƴƴa .
Omo tuumaa suuɗugol ujune 130 kaalisi dolaar ɗi o huutori e saaha oorngal makko e hitaande 2016 .
Omo waawi kadi yahde nder weeyo , e deŋeede e taarol leydi , caggal ɗum o taccita weeyo hade makko yande e toɓɓannde makko .
Omo waawi ummoraade e sato ( alaa ko neɗɗo woni heen ) e nokkuuji leppuɗi e ñolgol puɗi walla o ummoroo e ndema ( gese ilneteeɗe ) ekn l Gaas biyeteeɗo protoksid asot ( N2O ) heewi ummoraade ko ndema ( engere ) walla kuɓɓugol batte nguurndam , walla e golle mbaylaandi ( isinaaji ) .
Omo waawi woorude noon duuɓi keewɗi hade makko tinde omo
Omo waawnoo salaade , wona ?
Omo walli min no feewi .
Omo wayi no jawdi ndi wayi nii , o ñaamirta ko hunuko , o anndaa comci , sibu ko renndo anndi comci , o anndaa haala , o waawa haalde sabu ɗemngal ( ma en ngartoy heen ) ko ɗum woni faayiida ko kaalaten ko fof .
Omo wayi tan no ñewre wootere e nder barme .
Omo wayla kadi biɓɓe lekki kii .
Omo waɗi wutte makko rommbal ena ɗelka , omo dadii haa wiyi keŋ !
Omo wiyetenoo kadi " laamiiɗo juulɓe " , tiitoonde nde o heɓi e Laamɗo Sokoto .
Omo wiyetenoo kadi Pallaadi Galo
Omo wi’ee dabi Bah .
Omo wiꞌa : " laaraa ooy laara laddee jam .
Omo woni suka tokooso , o daɗi ɓe o janngidtunoo fof , o wonti suka gidiiɗo wonde sanɗa , seernaaɓe makko korsini mo heen .
Omo wonndi e Bookar Gaŋnge ( Boka ) , miñiraaɗo Usmaan Gaŋnge , gooto e ŋanaaji men to baŋnge naalaŋkaagal .
Omo wonndi e sate mawɗo mo ene jeyaa heen jooma-suudu makko , Raabi Seydi , golloowo kadi he RTF , wonndude e musiɗɗo makko Ibraahima Kebe , jaayndiyanke RTF .
Omo woɗɗi hoomteede .
Omo wulla omo haaltoo ellee kaangaaɗo .
Omo yah , omo wayi no tiindii-ɗo e maɓɓe nii .
Omo yahatno e seernaaɓe .
Omo yahra hannde e duuɓi 95 .
Omo yarlitii rokkude ko o jogii e humpito koo , gila e karallaagal mago haa e ñeeñal dingiral wonande kala joom pellital , mo ɓernde mum waɗaani wuddere .
Omo yilloo sahaa e sahaa fof laamɗo Maruk ɗo Marakesh ɗoo , o yiyndira ɗoon e laamɗo Mullaay Hasan ( 1890 ) e laamɗo Abdel Ajiiju .
Omo yima ko yooɗi ɗo o sifotoo gure e yimɓe mum yooɗɓe walla moƴƴuɓe , ɗo o sifotoo ladde , ɗo o sifotoo maaje ( so on miijiima Fallemme , " ɗo maaje ndenndi ceeri " .
Omo yiɗi kadi huwtoraade teddungal e hurum baaba makko e jokkondire mum ngam yoo ñaawooɓe ɓee njaɓɓu e losko hee ubba haala kaa warngo ngoo deƴƴee .
Omo yooɓtoraa joganoode 600 jiyaaɗo e jaggirde ɓaleeɓe no yimɓe leslesɓe .
Omo yuɓɓina kadi heblooji hiisiwal faade e jannginooɓe ngaal ɗemngal .
Omo ƴoƴi haa o maayi , omo waawi welde ƴiiƴam so o wondii he yimɓe , o wona e yimde , e amde , e jaarde nulaaɗo Heen sahaaji o wiya ko o siriif , o innitoroo Abdallaahi wul Ahmeddu " .
Omo ɓoornii cakkaji kaŋŋe e kaalis , ñaaƴe dime , jawe , paɗe mukke e comci cañaaɗi .
Omo ɓoornii comci jooɗɗi basorɗi , o wiyetee ko Sahratu , ko o Fursinaajo , o waɗii gure keewɗe mawɗe , o naati e nokku Haaruuta e Maaruuta ngoni oo , omo tellini sukundu makko keeci makko , omo foppii yeeso haa oolɗi .
Omo ɓoornii ndaala , o haddi wuderee sañaande .

On yettaama on weltaama yo Fulbe Afrik
Onawi mo to duɗal Baaba Moodu .
Onon , ɓe lannda mumen ɓaarii e islaam , noddi nuunɗal kam e potal , holi konngol mon heen ?
Onon haaliyaŋkooɓe , winndiyaŋkooɓe , mballee min heen , ɗum ko noddaango feewde e mon .
Onon kam , kawree e kuɗi mon ngoppon bojji ɗii .
Onon ne on potaani waɗde ko jaasi ɗuum .
Oo " fatwa " noon jokkii haa nii leyɗe ɗee keɓi jeytaare mum en .
Oo , ena fadi kaalis , oo , ena fadi kure e hoore ( maayde ) .
Oo Nuuri jeyaa ko e luulndiiɓe Idiriis Debi , o jooɗinoo ko worgo Libiya nder diiwaan Fesaan .
Oo ceerno peɗɗitiiɗo ɗemngal , baawɗo silo e lelngo konngol fuɗɗii seerndude ɗee kelme ɗiɗi .
Oo darnii suudu ina wi’ee " Debbo , leadership feminin " .
Oo fanu , no jeyaa , jooni e geɗe ñeeñal teskaaɗe .
Oo goomu lollii , sabu golle maakko moƴyii .
Oo goomu wasiyotoo keddiiɗi ɗii .
Oo hooreejo Riisi no holli ndee yotannde nde Ikrene waɗi waawanaaɓe hay e huunde .
Oo hooreejo hollii fahin ɓe yi’ii nokkeli hewɗi palette tiiɗugol ndee hare .
Oo hooreejo kiɗɗo Amerik dariima talaata hanki e yeeso suudu ñaawirdu Miyami .
Oo jaahiya janɗo he galle Senngoor en jokkii tan ko he doggol juutngol aada ndoolndoolaagu e wasre Dowla ummoraade e Farayse .
Oo kabaaru ummorii ko e jaaynde Le Guadian ( to Angalteer ) , ñalnde 20/4/2022 .
Oo kam , kala nde jibini ɓiɗɗo , o wonata ko Annabi .
Oo ko bonɗo mo toppittaako jawdi , anndaa so wonaa rimdude haa tedde ina fiya .
Oo ko hooreejo tataɓo DAD ( 4 mars 1801 – 4 mars 1809 ) .
Oo laamɗo , bonɗo , lenyamlenyo .
Oo mo fija aala bi’eteeɗo woogeeru walla ñaañooru e moolaaru .
Oo ne , nde ɓesngu Burkina laawii , o dogi o mooloyii to leydi Kodduwaar he hitaande 2014 .
Oo ne kay mboɗo waawnoo waasde soowtude innde mum sabu enen fof , en paamii ko Mammadu Sammba Joob , lollirnooɗo Murtuɗo .
Oo nokku ine heewi luure hakkunde leyɗe jeyanooɗe he Dental Leyɗe Sowiyet ( URSS ) .
Oo nokku waɗti 17ɓo nokkuuji Japon binnditaaɗi e ngaluuji Unesco .
Oo paltoor laawɗinaaɗo , mo suuɗaaki moggaaki , woodii 43 hitaande nder Afrik worgo .
Oo sahaa , ena hatojinaa e firooɓe e ɗemngal Pulaar-Fulfulde .
Oo sahaa , golle ɗee ena noddi karallaagal toowngal tawo kono eɗen njiɗi ɗe ngona ballondiral .
Oo sahaa , min katojini ko e wallitooɓe saatotooɓe Ruttorde
Oo sahaa min ɓuri hatojinde ko e yimɓe jogiiɓe Firefox e Android e Jaɓɓorgo Firefox .
Oo sincii koolol " Slam " e nder wuro makko Lugge .
Oo teskuya noon haaɗaani tan e Nuwaasoot , sibu Farayse ina teskii e ɗii duuɓi 2 ɓennuɗi , ñakki ɓeydiima heewde e leydi hee ( e nder winndere ndee e sifaa ɓurɗo yaajde ) hakke laabi laabi tati , ɗuum ko wonanade anndaaɓe ɓee tan !
Oo tolno ko lebbi tati wonnoo , baawɗo waɗeede e doge ɗiɗi , rogere adannde ( lewru wooturu : waktuuji 16 ) e rogere ɗimmere ( lebbi ɗiɗi : waktuuji 32 ) .
Oo waɗaani hay hitaaɗe , o roondi hujaaji galle maɓe .
Oo welemma maɓɓe mo ɓe keɓi e Muritani gila ɓe naati Rooso , Nuwaasot haa yettii ɗo e Nuwaadibu : ko calminaali e bismaali e teddule .
Oo welo-welo fof tan ko yoo gas jooni jooni tan ?
Oo woni musiiba gadano mo hooreejo leydi ndii , hono Dilma Rusef hawri e laamu mum .
Oo yeru , ko anndinde tan , e nder aduna hee , huunde fof fawii ko e yowitaare , fawii e ko hol no yiyraa e nokkuuji ceertuɗi .
Oo ɗoo banndiraaɗo dewbo kettukiyanke ( styliste ) ŋana , ko ɓooyɗo hollirde e ñeeñal mum , ngootaagu pinal Afrik .
Oo ɗoo gonnooɗo junngo ñaamo Maawyaa , tawtorenooɗo warngooji ɓaleeɓe Muritaninaaɓe woni cuɓaaɗo hanki yo ardo Goomu Senii .
Oo ɗoo gorko professeur de droit , gonnooɗo hooreejo jaaɓi haaɗtirde Nkchtt , hunuko mum e noppi mum ɓooyii woogondirde , e ardinooɓe leydi Muritani kala ko o yiɗi ko o haajaa o haalantuno ɗumen , ngati wonde mo nananaaɗo .
Oo ɗoo heen gooto yiytaama ine wuuri , ine heddii 6 .
Oo ɗoo ne sankii ko ñande 11 duujal 1981 .
Oo ɗoo sate toowɗo , ene hollira wonnde ngonka Ginenaaɓe caggal leydi ko ngoƴa laamu nguu .
Oo ɗoo video clip , ko gollal harelleeɓe ɗiɗo , gooto kala e meccal mum e ñeeñal mum , renti wonti gollal gootal ngal he nder mum , kala Afriknaajo ene yiytoo heen hoore mum nde tawoo omo tabitina ngootaagu Afrik e pinal mum .
Oodo " article " , hay mo hebaani yahdé , so jangi tan wayata kono ko toon hiiri ni !
Oon
Oon aadee wiyetee ko Neil Armstrong .
Oon artirani mo 650 yijaaɗo dahaaɗo .
Oon bannge , hay laana wiɗto ngoota meeɗaa neldeede toon , saka juuraade e mum .
Oon bannge kam miijnaani , sabu ko jogaa ko hay sinno duppaama gasataa .
Oon daraniima tigi-tigi haɓaade jontinooje ( malariya , pali ) , huunde feewnitinoonde no feewi Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) sabu yaakoraade maa ɗum waɗan ɗum ngartam njulaagu nder leyɗe gonduɗe e ñawu nguu , kam e faddaade keƴgol toon Dental Dowlaaji Sosiyaalisteeji Sowiyet ( DDSS ) .
Oon debbo woni Naha Mint Hamdi Wul Muknaas .
Oon dee , so wiyaama ko ngenndiyanke , jedduɗo fof ene foti ƴeeweede so alaa ko yawata e hakkille mum .
Oon diskuur noon koddir-ɗen addani koloñaal Belsik en fiɓde wonde oo gorko so miijooji mum ubbaaka law " yiɗde men e ndii leydi laatotaako " .
Oon e hoore mum ɗaɓɓiino e cili keewɗi waɗtude mo e laawol , kono o tiiɗir ɗum hoore .
Oon emon laatiiɗo ko ñawɗo walla ko e ɗanngal yo waɗoy ɗum e balɗe goɗɗe ngam Alla yiɗani on tan ko newaare o yiɗanaani on ɓittere ngam timminon limoore , mawninon Alla e peewal ngal o waɗi on ngal , mbele oɗon njetta-mi .
Oon falsafa politik maa mbiyen philosophie politik ina yaaji hannde o e doŋre Afrik nde kono kadi Ndenndaandi Nijeer daɗaani e oon bone soldateeɓe , sabu kala nde sikkaa jam maɓɓe heɓaama ellee kadi ko ndeen ɓe cimmittoo .
Oon fawi heen kadi wonnde diɗɗal ngal winnditaaki ngam laawɗineede , wonaa he DSS , Polis walla ni hay yuɓɓo wooto halfinaango ndeenka e kisal , ɗuum saabi ngal wonaa laawɗungal he jiyɗe laamu federal ngu .
Oon filma addaniimo ɓeydaade naatde e soɗaade he nguurndam naɓokayaagal , magiyankaagal ; ɗannaade e yiyde e ɓeydaade faamde oon aduna naɓokayaagal e humpitaade nder mum e boowal mum .
Oon fuunti noon , banndiraaɓe en potii ɗum saltaade , jahɗo fof yoo woppe waala boowal mbele so sonngaama ina wonana arooɓe tinndol .
Oon fuur noon laatiima o feewniraa ko kaaƴe ɓaleeje , nde yahi haa laatii ñalngu ngootu , ñalnde heen ko aljumaa ina hawra e sappo lewru aarabeeɓe wiyeteendu rajaɓ nduu , laatiima Rahmata ina juɗatnoo e fuur mum mburu , o juɗi haa heddii mbeɗu cakkitiingu , o tinaani tan haa ndiyam ƴeri .
Oon galle inniree Galle Ñeeñal e ganni Fuuta .
Oon galle min njiɗi ko aawde e mum leɗɗe min nehaɗe tawa janngo e jam lawɓe ɓee ina mbaawi huutoraade ɗum kadi waɗana fedde ndee ngartam .
Oon ganndo mo mbiynoo-mi naane o , o wiyi : wiyeede neɗɗo nde tagaa nde aawdi neɗɗaagal ina waɗaa e mum , ina majjinaa e mum , ina mawna tan ina ɓeydoo .
Oon gawoowo
Oon haaju waɗaa yeeso makko .
Oon habrii wonnde nde diɗɗal ngal tafetee nde , ceŋɗe laamu nguu fotnooɓe tintineede ɓee fof tintinaama , ko wayno DSS , konu Nijerya , e hooreejo Polisaaɓe ɓee , kamɓe fof ɓe tintinaama .
Oon hakke ine woodi gila e maayirɗe teeminannde 19ɓiire , kono won leyɗeele keɓtinaani hakke oo haa e ñalngu hannde nguu , walla ciynaani mo .
Oon holliti weltaare mum e tawtoreede ndee hiirde faayodinde .
Oon honngani mo , o feewi to hebloorde makko .

Oon ko ceerno am .

Oon ne , won ko jolnoo e mum , ngam waɗii saanga gooto , o lelii nder jamma omo ɗaanii haa o yiyi e nder koyɗol makko ilam ɗuufaan , ko ina tolnoo e teemedde tati hitaande , asamaan ina laatii ina waklitii ina saami e leydi , ina laatii koode ɗee ina teɓɓitii eɗe caami , naange e lewru ina ɓadtii koye yimɓe .
Oon ne , yahi to leydi too ko leelaani , nde o yettii to leydi too , o yiɗi nokkude , leydi kadi woondi hono no woondiratnoo Maleykaaji ɗiɗi gadinooɗi ɗii nii .

Oon ne woni e naamndaade haa Allah waɗi min njiyondiri .
Oon ne wooraani mosol ngol o rewnoo kaŋko gadinooɗo haalde oo .

Oon nokku ina waɗi capanɗe ujunnaaje kaaƴe korngiliiɗe sabu jaangol .
Oon nokku ko noppi .
Oon nokku noon , neɗɗo mawnat tan ina ɓeydoo famɗitde .

Oon sahaa ( ñalnde 19 sulyee 1870 ) Farayse ina dikkii diiwaan biyetenooɗo Piris ( Prusse ) oo e wolde .
Oon sahaa , alaa majjuɗo mo kanko Winii , sibu tawi o waɗii kasoo duuɓi e cili keewɗi , o leeɓtaama , o fiyaama , o joñaama , o takkaama fewjude seppooji elewaaji Soweto e hitaande 1976 .
Oon sahaa , en paamaano no feewi ko ɗuum firti , walla en nganndaano baɗte mum .

Oon sahaa tuubakiri fuɗɗiima naatde Senegaal , kompañiiji komersa ( julaaɓe ) en ngari ɗo Ndar ɗoo , ciiñci ɗoon , ina telloo e maayo Senegaal e nder laaɗe cuurki , na njeeya meyliis , jamɗe , suukara , sanngara , ñaaƴe ekn na paggoo maccuɓe e kaŋŋe , kam e ñiiƴe ñiibi , ummaade Waalo Barak , ndewaa Fuuta Tooro haa njettoyo-ɗaa Ngalam ( leydi Soninkooɓe ) .

Ooɗo gaas noon ɓuri gaasuuji ɗi fof hoyde .
Ooɗoo Yonta dee addani TRUMP finnande Huawei , nde tawnoo ko kañum tan tawo e ooɗoo sahaa mo mbinndaten , heblanii ɗum ; daɗi heen sosiyateeji Amerik e ɗi leyɗe hirnaange goɗɗe ɗee .
Ooɗoo biro battano halfinaa binnditgol Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe to Orop .
Ooɗoo debbo tedduɗo , laatiiɗo dono baaba mum , ganndo kuɓɓunooɗo , tawii ko gooto almudɓe yaltunooɓe e duɗal Pir
Ooɗoo fannu heewaani waɗeede walla nii mbiyen alaa tawo ɗo o meeɗi waɗeede e nder Fuuta Tooro so wonaa ɗoon e Ndulumaaji .
Ooɗoo gorko mo njiy-ɗaa , ko kañum aratnoo haa e am , e kala sahaa , soofa e hoore am , saloo rokkude mi ndiyam .
Ooɗoo jooɗaaki ena ŋaala dene ena maɓɓa teŋke !
Ooɗoo kadi adotoo artude ɗo wonno e taarotooɗo jaalal suudu ngal tawi rewoy ko e lemolemol leydi ndi !
Ooɗoo paltoor ina jogii sifaa renndo , ɗum noon omo toɗɗii leƴƴi leydi men kala .
Ooɗoo paltoor ina yaaji , ina huuɓtodini juɓɓule politik e koninkaagu e faggudu .
Ooɗoo parti , mo koloñaal horsinaano , tawtoraama woote toɗɗagol depiteeji e lewru suwee 1951 e saawiyee 1956 .
Ooɗoo sahaa mo jaŋngaton ndee winndannde , diŋiral Djan Sports udditii damule mum ngam jaɓɓaade ujunnaaji , ujunnaaji yeeɓooɓe .
Ooɗoo sarɗiyaŋke Ñooro hollitii wonde ɗum e PDS addantaa ɗum turde geenol ko ari fof muɓɓa gite woppa ɓenna .
Ooɗoo tolno ko daawe ɗiɗi ; daawal I ( rogere adannde ) e daawal II ( rogere ɗimmere ) , fof he nder lebbi jeenay ( fotde 144 waktu jaŋde ) .
Ooɗoo yonta naatii leyɗe mawɗe ɗee gila 2011 , ɓooyaani ko o fuɗɗii naatde Afrik ( Yeru o naatii Senegaal ko ina wona hitaande jooni ) .
Oreer oo ummoto Yaman ko waktuuji jeeɗiɗi pawɗi hojamaaji cappanɗe tati .
Orop hiisii ine roondaa donngal ngam findinde winndere ndee , rokkude ɓesnguuji Amerik e Afrik e Asi e Oseyaani , jaggiraaɗi no daɗaaɗi nii , ɓamtaare e fiɓnde dewal .
Orop ko ko feccii : Farayse , Italiy , Almaañ ena ngonndi e jeytaare Kosowoo kono Espaañ wall Gerees njaɓɓani heftinde leydi kesiri ndii .
Orop waawni njiimaandi kesiri , njiimaandi nehaagu e diine , pawtiindi kadi he dow njiimaandi to bannge faggudu , njuɓɓudi , karallaagal , e konu ngoodnoondi ndii .
Oto Muusaa oo Yani ko hakkunde tali oo .
Oto neene Hawwaa ina koorna , jolɓe e saretaaji ɗii ina poɓɓa .
Oto oo alaa kadi wisit tekinik .
Oto oo dogi haa ɓooyi , Hawo ɗaanii , goggo makko lelni mo e dow mum .
Oto oo na doga tan eɓe ɓeydoo woɗɗude woɗɗude Yaman , ɓerɗe maɓɓe puɗɗii hecciɗde .
Oto waɗatnoo ko waktu e feccere hakkunde gure ɗiɗi ɗee , he sala hee oto waɗata heen ko hojomaaji seeɗa .
Otoo oo heewii del haa amparanti oo alaa ɗo jooɗii .
Otooji saretaaji welooji e jakartaaji ndiira , nawa yimɓe to wuro too .
Otooji tokoosi ndimndaama njogitaaje .
Otooji ummotooɗi Alaseri ɗii takkotoo ko keerol hakkunde leydi Muritani e leydi Saharaa hirnaange gonɗo tawo e tiimaandi kaanaŋkaagu Maruk , hay so tawii Dowla Arab mo Saharaa Demokaratik ( RASD ) hiisi ko e tiimaandi mum jeyaa .
Otooji ɗii mbaɗaa jeyli ko e nder jeereende , waɗii maayɓe kono anndaaka tawo oo sahaa ɗo limre maayɓe ɓee tolnii .

Oya darii ko juuti yiyaani mo , haaɓii , yiylii yiiytaani .
Oɗon ciftora golle Aqmi e hitaande 2012 nde ɓe naati e rewo leydi Maali teeŋti noon e wuro Tumbuktu no anndiranoo wonde ñiiɓirde diine lislaam e worgo saharaa : ɓe nduppi defterɗi desnooɗi defte quraana , gannde , karallaagal ekn .

Oɗon ciftora tuuba Saada ?
Oɗon mbaawi addaneede miijo jojjugol `ɗemngal mahondirowal’ , tawi nii ina laaɓani weeɗooɓe on ngoon miijo wonde tabitgol maggal hawrata ko mooƴgol ɗeya ɗemɗe fof hono no ɗum kewirnoo to leyɗe goɗɗe bayɗe no Farayse , ɓe mana , ɓe manta ngal haa njaɓon ; eɓe mbaawi nii hay waɗde no ngoongɗinir-ɗon wonde ko ngal baɗɗingal , ngal woorotaako , ɓe ndallinoroo konngi muumi bayɗi no " njuɓɓam-gollaagu " , maa " kesamhesaagu " walla " nanondiral " .
Oɗon mbaawi heɓde heen kala ñawu .
Oɗon mbaawi heɓtinirde mo no weeɓi .
Oɗon mbaawi tarde winndannde men ɓennunde ndee ngam ɓeydude faamde oon fannu , kañum e daawe ɗee kala .
Oɗon mbaawi tugnaade e widewoo mon mbaɗno-ɗen e dumunnaaji ɓennuɗi ɗii ngam addude oon faamamuuya .
Oɗon mbaawi wiyde mi oorii ; kono alaa ko bonnata ; gila amin ngoni potton min njaŋnginaa ko farayse ; ɗum tagi hayso amin miijoo ko e ngaal ɗemngal .
Oɗon mbasiyaa yo on njuurno-mo walla kollonèɓe
Oɗon mbiyee tan yo on cood poɗɗe pasooje haa heewa sabu ndee kam jeelaani .
Oɗon nganndi e ɗii yeruuji , gure ɗe kaalɗen ɗee fof ngonaani ootoo bannge e asaman !
Oɗon nganndi eɗen mbaawi ummaade e nokku payen e nokku ɓurɗo woɗɗude , ngummoɗaa e leydi Caad payaa Amerik , ndeftaa Sénégaal e Muritani , ƴaaŋaa Maali , mbaɗaa bafeet paytaa Enndonoosi , ngummo-ɗaa ɗoon paytaa Makka , ndewaa Kameruun ngartaa Gine .
Oɗon nganndi ko fayti e mecce .
Oɗon nganndi ndeen windande sariima no feewi e geese ɗee sabu " The Economist " ko jaayde mawnde , lollunde nde hohooɓe e annduɓe winndere ndee njanngata sahaa kala .
Oɗon nganndi neɗɗo ena banoo ko uuri ( ko nanndi e lati walla cuuraay ) , ena banoo ko luuɓi ( henndu jiiba ) , ena banoo ko woynata gite haa ñitte njalta ( ko poliseeji keewi werlaade e yimɓe murtuɓe ko ) .
Oɗon nganndi neɗɗo ena waawi daraade e naange tawa ena jogii daarorgal , o huccina ngal e naange haa caafe ɗee njana e maggal , o huccina caafal janngal e daarorgal ngal e mbeelu huɓeere .
Oɗon nganndi oon nokku ?
Oɗon nganndi sarɗiiji ndernderi Suudu nduu ina ndokki dipiteeji ɗii mbaawka tafde e nder suudu hee goomuuji ɗi eddaaji tati ceertuɗi .
Oɗon nganndi so a dariima a huccitii Rewo , junngo ma ñaamo heedtata ko fuɗ naange , nano ngo heedta hirnaange .
Oɗon nganndi tagofeere wootere ena waawi jogaade ko ɓuri lebbi sappo ( leydi jogii ko lewru wooturu ndu njiyaten e dow koye men jemma ndu , kono Supiteere jogii ko lebbi 62 ) .
Oɗon nganndi ɗoo , maa Dikko taaro jaalal mum laabi keewɗi , tawa Sammba gaynaani taaraade suudu nduu .
Oɗon njenanaa WhatsApp ɓooyii rokkude sosiyateeji gollondirta ɗii kabaruuji men ko adii hannde , fadaani haa yimɓe njamira ɗum ɗuum .
Oɗon paami kam batte ngonka mbaaka nii ?
Oɗon teskii e sahaa kuudetaa baɗnooɗo ɗo e Moritani oo , holi darnde juɓɓule U .

PULAAGU .
Paabee yoo , paabee , Senegaal nana jalee !
Paalel njuumri ngel nanndi ko e aduna .
Paamen : en mbiyii hitaande e dow tagofeere men leydi nde ko balɗe 365 haa e 366 .
Paamen hay laamiiɗo leydi doole mum keɓnaani ɗum liɓde ɗemngal leydiwal hono no yoga e yimɓe miijorii faamiri nii , saka noon e konngol neɗɗo goɗɗo gooto keeriiɗo yahoowo haaju hoyre mum walla hoyre mum en .
Paamen hay sinno laawol rewii sara galle maa , ko yimɓe fof ndenndi ngol .
Paamen kadi , ko wonataa alaa , woodi tan ko ko etaaka wonneede .
Paamen ko sosto woni ɗoon , sabu Umaar Kan ( yo Alla ɓuuɓan mo ) wiyi ko leppi meeɗnooɗi laamaade e Fuuta fof , tuggude e laamu Jah Oogo haa e filñitaare Seernaaɓe , ndewii e Jiinge so wonaa ɗiɗi : Laam Termes e Laam Taaga .
Paamen noon ɗuum kewata ko hee teeminanɗe jappondirɗi .
Paamen pittanten ko koye men , yo wuro men laaɓ e kala sahaa .
Paamen tan , Ostarali jaggiri ɗeen duuɗe ko no keeriindi mum nii gila ko ɓooyi .
Paamen tan ko ine wona feccere e muus keeceeje njotondiri ko e doostagol walla bongol mbeɗon ƴiyon noorol keeci : yo won sabu duuɓi , walla dirtugol , walla heewde ko roondii teddeendi .
Paamen tan wuro Kahayɗi ko mawngo , ɓesngo , dañde ko ina huuɓtidina wonaa ko weeɓi .
Paamondiren : Unicode kañum ina yaha he yuɓɓooji ɗii kala : Windows , Mac OS , Linux , Android , iOS , ekn .
Paandaale kuuftidinɗe ɗe ko : – Newnande ɓesnguuji doofolli ɗi mbele ina keɓa yettaade tippule safaara ; – Jeytoreede e moƴƴitingol cellal ɓesnguuli nokkuuji ɗi ; – Sosde golle ballondiral hakkunde dowlaaji fawaade e kattanɗe jahduɗe en goƴaaji ɓesnguuli ɗi ; – Jeertinde e bonannde rafi lollirɗo Jabet ( rafi ɓuuɓri ) ; – Ƴellitde safaara e senngo safaruuji e diwanuuji joñiiɗi nokkuuji cafrirɗi ; – Hokkude ɓesngu hakkille moƴƴo ko yowitii e kisnugol cellal mum .

Paraabiriis oo ne helii .

Parti Alasan Watara heɓii keeweendi .
Parti Bagboo jaɓaano tawtoreede woote ɗee ngam hollitde mettere mum e ko mawɗo maɓɓe nawaa Ñawirde kuuge koo .
Partiiji innirooji koye mum en " luulndo hakindiingo " ko wayi no APP , WIAM leeftii no feewi .
Partiiji innitortooɗi " partiiji ɓaleeɓe " ɗii kadi , ko wayi no AJD/MR , PLEJ , MPR , TIMTIMOL , FRUD keɓanni njeñtudi njaakoranoondi ndii ( sababuuji ɗii ina mbaawi seertude fawaade e partiiji ) .

Peeje fof o sakkii , haa o waawa renndinde leƴƴi , e diiwanuuji Fuuta , kam e laamɓe satiiɓe Fuuta , e nder hare nde .
Peeje kuutoraaɗe ngam waɗde wiɗto bonanndeeji to Irak , ko ɗeen peeje kuutoraa ngam waɗde wiɗto bonanndeeji baɗooji to leydi Sudaan .
Peeje ndaɗɗaama no jaŋde ndee heɓɓitoraa e ko fayi .
Peeje peewnugol kaɓirɗe jaŋde e ekko , kam e topirɗe ( logiciels ) peewnirɗe defte janngirɗe e defte daari wonande sukaaɓe , ine ngoodi tee njoɓetaake , tee ine ɓeydoo ñalnde kala huutoreede .
Peeje politik wonande caɗeele keewɗe paatuɗe he jannginooɓe , kam e jaŋde e heblo , ine ɓeydoo limtilimtinde .
Peeje waawnere ɗe laamu nguu waɗata ina kollira no salaade ñaawde ndee ummorii e haŋki oo .
Peeje ɗiɗi ina nganndaa gila e jooni .
Peeral makko , e doole makko , e ganndal makko , jaambaraagal makko , ngaddani mo ko wonde jontaaɗo e nder Boosoya fof , e dañde yiɗɓe , e sehilaaɓe , e nder diiwanuuji Fuuta keewɗi .
Peewnitgol darngo ɗemngal noddi ko laabi ƴettaaɗi ngam kuutoragol ɗemngal ngal , yeru mum ko huutoraade ngal nder ceŋɗe laamu , ñaawirɗe e tippudi jaŋde .
Peewnugol ngol maa yaaw no feewi .

Pekaan e dillere ɗeɓi nanndude .
Pekaan ina daara golwole hakkunde jaambareeɓe subalɓe e koye mum en , walla ɗo mbaɗdata e jinneeji , kam e barooɗe maayo .
Pekaan ine yimee e fiyfiyre .
Pekaan ko doole subalɓe .

Pelle amen ɗee , sabu mum en wonde pelle-baafal hare ngam keɓtingol timmungol ɗemɗe men ngenndiije rewrude e laawɗingol mum en , e kuutoragol mum en he nder denndaangal fannuuji nguurndam leydi ndii , mbaawata tan ko weltaade e ndee feere , so janngingol ɗemɗe Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof to ENAJM , ngam , e yeru , " kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi laamu ine waawaa haaldude , hunuko e nofru , e ɓiɗɗo leydi he nder ɗemngal ngal ɓuri nande " .
Pelle baaɗe no ICAN – Heɓnde njeenaari deeƴre he 2017 – ine kaɓee mbele aɗe ustoo , haa ɗe kaɗtee tafeede .
Pelle biyeteeɗe " madiba " ina keewi , hay caggal Afrik worgo , haa ko Nelson Manndelaa ina miijoo waɗande innde leñol mum ngol , " berwe " ( Brevet ) , woni jeyi keeriiɗo .
Pelle dentuɗe ngam feewnude ngol ɗee , ko ɗeeɗoo : Orange , China Mobile International , Facebook , MTN GlobalConnect ( Afrik worgo ) , STC ( Saudi Telecom Company ) , Telecom Egypt , Vodafone ( Biritaan ) e WIOCC ( West Indian Ocean Cable Company ) .
Pelle jooɗaniiɗe , walla daraniiɗe jiyɗinaaɓe ɓee , ina poti tawtoreede e jeyeede e ngoon wiɗto .
Pelle keewɗe cosanooma , e wiyde makko , kono ɗe ndiwaani aset e alet tawi ɗe maayii .
Pelle keewɗe ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ina njiɗa addude baɗle mumen kono nde tawnoo laamu ngu ina fawi e amen junngo , ɓe cikkata ko guwernama Abdullaahi Wadda o ina heddii haa jooni e hunaare huninoo ko ɓooyi ko .
Pelle ngootaagu Afrik ko wayno Union Africaine e CEDEAO en potiino adaade mbaɗa taaɓannde feewde e suɓaade Pulaar e Swahili ngam yoo ngon ɗemɗe mum en gollorɗe kadi ɓe kirjina leyɗeele Afrik ɗee fof rewde heen .
Pelle rewɓe keewɗe e nokkuuji janngirɗi keertoronaaɗi rewɓe ko kanko innira .
Pelle ɓuje karallaagal kesal , baaɗe no Twitter e Facebook kollitii anniya mum en sompude peeje gollorɗe nder galle ɓurɗe duumaade so Covid ɓennii .
Pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ( ONG ) ina ngoytotonoo ina njiɗi gollaade to bannge laaɓal , hannde ɓe ndañii gollodiiɗo .
Pelle ɗee ine ngondunoo e sete GIZ ( Ballal leydi Almaañ ) .
Pelle ɗee kirjinii ɓesngu nguu fof , haa teeŋti noon kadi , ɗe kirjinii laamu nguu , ɗe ngartiri hakkille mum he DƊNG jejjitanoongal , ngal golle mum ubbanoo .
Pelle ɗee tatoraama he diiwanuuji 14 nder 15 gonɗi he leydi hee , miijooji majje ( laawɗingol e janngingol ) mbaawii feeñde he ciimti diiwanuuji 10 nder 15 ɗii .
Pelle ɗee ɓurnoo dartoraade ko jannginde haalooɓe ɗemɗe ɗee , yeru Ɓamtaare Pulaar heewi jannginde he nder duɗe mum , ko haalooɓe Pulaar .

Peñtu nguu ina foti humpiteede e binndol , ɗakkee ɗo joɗnde ardorde birooji administarasiyoŋ oo woni ɗoo .
Peŋngal Ndeenka e Kisal , Peŋngal Renndo e Faggudu , Peŋngal Ndesndateeri ( Conseil de Tutelle ) , ko kanum halfinanoo fiyakuuj leyɗeele keewɗe ɗe cuwaano heɓde ndimaagu mum en dawrugol ( jeytaare ) , Ñaawirde Adunayankoore , e Hoolaare Kuuɓal Kawtal Ngenndiiji ( Secrétariat des Nations Unies ) ko kanum jogii njiilgu kuuɓtidingu yuɓɓo ngoo , woni koolaaɗo kuuɓal hannde ko António Guterres ( Antooño Gutares ) jeyaaɗo Purtugaal .
Peŋngal ene waawi yamirde dartin’gol jeynge ( cessez le feu ) neldude maageeji-bulaaji ( kooninkooɓe jam ) , hiiɗaare faggudu , walla nii uddo njulaagu ( ammbargoo ) .
Peŋngal ngal ene waɗi terɗe ( leyɗeele ) sappo e joy .
Peŋɗe keeri ɗee poti waɗireede ko no sifiraa e taƴre 3 kuulal 30 gonngal dow ngal , winnditee e nder Palaŋ leydi ( Plan Foncier ) .
Peɗtu mi beremrefol he barkeewi kii , ciftin-mi ɓe ɗoon konngol pulaar ( so duuso lollii haaɗata ko he maayo ) , ngool konngol noon firtiima hannde he Mbaañ .

Pinal Babilon jeyaa ko e pine ɓurɗe yahrude yeeso e winndere ndee .
Pinal Fuuta-Jalon , Tooro e pulpule goɗɗe maninaama e ñalngu nguu .
Pinal hettude e fentude e ƴellitde ŋeeñal ( art ) .
Pinal leñol ngol ɗo tolnii fof , ko ɗoon o tolnotoo .
Pinal ngool leñol , pinal leñol ngol ɗo tolnii fof , ko ɗoon neɗɗo o tolnotoo .
Pine Fuuta ena taƴanaa heen geɗal ngal famɗaani .
Pine e gannde ɗe ɗeen ɗemɗe marnoo ɗee kala tawi njeebaama , ɗemɗe ɗee e koye mum en tawi natti jogaade faayiida mo njoginoo he nder Orop o .

Piɓondiral ngal siifaa e hitaande 2004 : FQML jeyi 80% ( joyaɓe nay ) , Wadi Rawda jeyi 19% , laamu Muritani jeyi 1% ( teemedereɓal ) ; ɗuum hade fof wontude jeyi FQML e hitaande 2010 .
Piɓondiral ngal siifaa ko e les njiimaandi jaagordu Geɗe Faggudu e Ƴellitaare Senngo Yeñtinoowo e tawtoreede Hooreejo leydi hono Muhammed Sheex wul Gaswani e sawndo Batu USA-Afrika ( hakkunde Dental Dowlaaji Amerik e Afrik ) .

Poliis jaggii-mo caggal nde o tawtoraa tottondiral hakkunde makko e lomtiiɗo-mo oo hono Mohamed Saalem Wul Buukka .
Polis arii teskaade no nguyka kaa yahri , wiiño fuɗɗiima ngam yiytude baɗ-boniijo walla waɗ-boniiɓe ɓee .
Polis habri mo wonde hay gooto waasaani fittaandu mum kono waɗii gaañiiɓe .
Polis jaggi goomu nguu e maayirɗe lewru Jolal ( Novembre ) 1971 , balɗe seeɗa ko adii njillu laamu hooreejo Senegaal e leydi Mali ; njillu makko ngadanu e leydi Mali gila nde Federation Mali fusi e 1960 .

Politikaaji ballitooji heblude yimɓe hattanɓe ( annduɓe , haralleeɓe , waawɓe ɓamtude leydi ) poti tuugaade ko politikaaji ɗemngal jaŋde juumtungal ; tee " BM ine foti no feewi wallitde ɗiin politikaaji , ɗum jeyee e sarɗiiji ardinta so ine wallita leyɗeele ɗee ƴellitde kattanɗe mum en " .
Politikaaji jaŋde moƴƴi ɗemngal jannginirgal ine mballita potal nder ekkol e nder ƴettugol gollotooɓe ; kañji kadi ɓuri famɗude fere , tee eɗi ñiɓa no moƴƴi janngooɓe he nder renndo mum en " .

Pulaagu nootiima ñalnde heen , nootodiima e ñeeñal mawngal , ngal faayiida mum waɗtetee coccorgal haa e yontaaji garooji .
Pulaaku ndaare joonin sini neddo ummeke jangay kamka , nde television haali a nanata , nde radio haali a nanata , bindi bindaadi e dereeji a yiata , ndelle anka a waawa faamande adunaru handen du ka .
Pulaar Fuuta-Tooro ɓuri alɗude to bannge defte coñce ( mbaydiiji mum fof ) , ɓuri janngude pulaar e jogaade yuɓɓo mbinndiin .
Pulaar dee ene wiya " so hunuko haalaani goonga tan haalata ko fenannde , te haalde goonga sumataa toni " .
Pulaar dee kadi ene wiyatnoo " ko nafata e ko manata , so ngardii , moƴƴi ko cuɓo ɗaa ko nafata koo " .
Pulaar ene haalee hannde e nder aduna hee ko foti no capanɗe nay ( 40 ) leydi e Afrik , Pulaar woni go'o malla ɗemngal ɓurngal haleede e Senegaal , Muritani , Gine .
Pulaar ene wiy " so fowru faliima sagata tan , tawata yiyi ko e jaɓɓal mum " .
Pulaar heewi wiyde ɗoon ko " dillinde sabaabu " .
Pulaar ina wiya " Foondu woni ko dow lekki , kono hakkille mum woni ko e ñaande " , kamɓe ne , ɓe ngoni ko caggal leydi , kono hakkillaaji maɓɓe fof ko e leydi hee ngoni .
Pulaar ina wiya " wiyeede ‘mo wuuri ɓura’ , ɓuri wiyeede ‘so mawnii maa nattu’" .
Pulaar mo hersi ngal haalde e yiɗɓe oto waɗte .
Pulaar noon ene wiya , " kala ko dilli , tawata ko ko dillini ɗum koo ɓuri ɗum heewde doole " .
Pulaar noon ina wiya " mo waawaa yo woppu , waawɓe maɗa " .
Pulaar noon wiyiino " suutooɓe tiba ɓamdat " .
Pulaar wii dawde bonngol bonaani koni ene finndina .
Pulaar wiyatnoo ko " woondu ko waatoore debbo e kala ñaawoore " .
Pulaar wiyi " Aduna ko laacel jiire " !
Pulaar wiyi " ko hooynetenoo so saamii foti ko hocceede " .
Pulaar wiyi : " ko werlere toowi fof , ko e leydi fayti " .
Pulaar wiyi : " waawɓe mbaɗɗu ɓee , ngalaa ɗo mbaɗɗii " .
Pulaar wiyi : hoodere siirtinooma , Jama Juggal wiyi " ɗum woƴi ko moƴƴuɓe !
Pulaar ɓeydi heen " tumminannde waandu haɗataa ƴiiwoondee toɓde " .
Pulaar/fulfulde ( ff ) wontii hannde gootal e ɗemɗe baawɗe naatneede e kala masiŋ kuutortooɗo gannde kese wano cinnde , IPone , IPad , Windows , Linux e kuutorɗe goɗɗe ɗe en mbaawaa limtude .
Pulaareeje ina ngalɗina yeewtere , etee eɗe kolla pinal e humpito neɗɗo kuutortooɗo ɗe oo ɗo tolnii .

Raamata diwi maɓɓii e makko .
Raamata ndaaraani mo nih .
Raamata ndaari mo no feewi mbaadi makko arti e mum .
Raamata wiyi : ahaa kay , ko mi ɗesɗo faaytude ma .
Raamata wiyi mo : aɗa nanndi e Ayyuuba .
Raamata woni e wiyde , aan kam !
Raamata yiyii ko o ɓoornii koo ɗesi faaytude mo , ɗesi hulde .

Rahmata haalani mo ko waɗata , ndeen annabi Ayyuuba nanii ndeen daande tan , o woyi bojji muusɗi sanne , caggal ɗuum , o hamdinii , o deƴƴi , o jokki muñal makko .
Rahmata ummii fayi to galle mum en , nde o yetti o haalani ɗum annabi Ayyuuba ( JKM ) , annabi Ayyuuba wiyi mo : deweteeɗo alaa so wonaa geno gooto mo alaa denndidiiɗo ; aan , kawru-ɗaa ko e Ibliis kuɗaaɗo oo , aan noon mi woondii so tawii mi sellii e rafi am mo ngonndu-mi oo , maa mi fiye teemedere ɓoggol .

Refti e makko ko ɓiyiiko Aamadu Seeku ( 1811 – 1853 ) , waɗtindii
Refti e ɗumɗoon annabi Nuuhu udditi denndaangal damuɗe nder laana kaa fof , o woppi naange naati e nder laana kaa , ndiwri udditi bibje mumen , kulle ɗee kala ndilli , leɗɗe ngoni e naayaade .
Refti he ɗuum ko e lewru oktoobar , caggal nde MNC renti he nder batu mum mooɓondiral , sanndarmeeɓe ngari e maɓɓe , coori he maɓɓe conndi e kure , fotde pittaali 30 mbaasaa heen , gaañiiɓe heen limotaako ko teemedde teemedde , Lumummba ñaawaa , taƴanaa lebbi jeegom kasoo , mbele batu ngu koloñaal en piɓi waɗdude e ɗaɓɓooɓe jeytaare ɓee ( pelle " modereeji " ) ina waawa jooɗaade tawde Patrice lumumba dummbaama ( kiisaɗo ko ceɓɓitiiɗo ) kono ɗum gasaani .
Refti heen , alaa ko kaaldaten nanondiren , alaa ko pewjidten paamondiren saka tabitiniden , ko en yooɓiiɓe daaɗe men tan eɗen ngulla , eɗen njoofoo ɓe njoofaaki en , eɗen kaɓa , tikkanen ɓe tinanaani en , sabu mumen kanum en jogaade haajuuji e waasde woƴeede en .
Refti heen , kesindagol e ɗoftal haa leydi ndii jaɓaa nder Fedde
Refti heen , ko o cuusɗo no Sammba nii .
Refti heen kadi annabi Iisaa wiyi liingu nguu " artu ɗo ngonno-ɗaa !
Refti heen ko Annabi Nuuhu ñaagii joommum , o wiyi : caggal ɗuum kaawisaaji njalti e laana kaa , ngam sawtawol haala yalti e makka yimɓe ina keɗii , e wiyde laana kaa : deweteeɗo alaa so wonaa geno , ko kañum woni deweteeɗo gadano e battintooɗo , miin kaaɗoo laana , oon mo joli e am daɗa , oon mo salii jolde e am halkoo .
Refti heen ko Nuuhu yaltini njooɓaari ndi joginoo , gila e gawri , gemha , maaro , ñebbe e ko nanndi e ɗeen geɗe , o defi ɗumen .
Refti heen ko annabi Nuuhu sakkitinii joommum ngam hijjoyde joom makko sakkiti mo ɗuum , o fokkiti o yahi Makka , leñol makko ngol nganniyii duppude laana kaa caggal makko .
Refti heen ko annabi Nuuhu uddi baafe damuɗe laana kaa .
Refti heen ko annabi Nuuhu wiyi ɓe : jooni kam , ma a taw on ngoongɗinii ?
Refti heen ko miijo ko mbiyaten " les croyances réligieuses " ko wiyatee diineeji ndeen .
Refti heen ko naamnal " holi ko haɗi en ɓamtaade " ?
Refti heen ko nde Aawaja ɓii Anaka yiyi laana kaa ina woppaa e nder ndiyam no ɗum wayi mo nii tan , o ronki faamde ɗum , o woppi laana kaa heddi omo yaha e nder ndiyam , haa ɗo o haggoynoo fof .
Refti heen ko ndeen Aadama wullitii to Jibriil ngam ñaagaade yo ustane nguleeki naange e kolndam ɗam .
Refti heen ko yaaɓande jiimgol leydi safalɓe , capanɗe joy hitaande caggal njiimaandi nokku ɓaleeɓe oo .
Refti heen ko yimɓe jolnooɓe e nder laana kaa mbaɗtindii ko ronkude huccitde e naange ngee ngam gite maɓɓe kattanaani ndaarde naange ngee .
Refti heen ko yoo konngi kaalaten ɗii tabita e men peeña e golle men , tawi heen gootol ko " wulaango jamma ɗaldetaake gooto " .
Refti heen ɗum joɗɗinaa to laawol Maleyka potɗo ŋabbinde ɗum to joomiraaɗo jom baawɗe OO .
Refti ko geno jippinani annabi Nuuhu ñaayre mawnde ɗelkoore waɗnde fooyre no annama naange nih , ngam yeeynoraade nder laana kaa , e kadi ende holla ɓe waktuuji jamma e ñalawma .
Refti ko nde Aadama ( JKM ) , tellii e dankel mum , o jooɗii hakkude maleykaaji , geno werlii e makko ɗoyngol nde tawno ko ɗum woni to bannge fooftere ɓii Aadama .
Refti ɗon ko WhatsApp , Tiktok , Twitter , Instagram .
Reftu e ko mbi'noo-mi koo !
Reftude heen saɗaani hay dara .
Reinhard Genzel e Andrea Ghez noon ndokkiraa njeenaari ndii ko sabu mum en " yiytude huunde tiɗɗiinde , ɓujere , nder nehaande jiiryiirngal men " , hono Fedannde Malaaɗo .
Remooɓe keblinooma no feewi ngam soñde ko faayodini , mbaɗii kopporeeje ngam soodde geɗe keewɗe : masiŋaaji pompooji diƴƴe , enngere , aawdi , liggini woɗɓe , ɗoofi kuɗooli , kiwi colli , ndawii ñallii kirndii , e wattan pini subaka tawi ko heewi yooliima : ko huunde muusnde , kono tan ko golle Alla .
Renndinde Filosof en e fannoriiɓe ganndeyeewal walla karallaagal , fof denta ene ngollodoo e binndugol deftere wootere ko huunde nde meeɗaani yiyeede ko adii ɗuum .
Renndini ɓe ko Ceemoko yiɗnoo ko renndinde Ɓaleeɓe , ɓeya noon ndaraninoo ko hare lanndaaji nde tuubakooɓe e Ɓaleeɓe fof ndenndi .
Renndo am teddungo , gollal fedde OLAN ina waawi annominireede baɗal Salimata e Susi ngal .
Renndo am teddungo , mi wonaani ɗoo e haalde he dow innde fedde .
Renndo am teddungo , mi yaajnotaako haa ɓura ɗoo e ciftinooje baɗe daartol , maa ni juutnaade e kujjinaali keewɗi celluɗi kollitooji moƴƴere fattamlamre wonnde e ƴellitgol heewandere ɗemɗe e kormagol mum tewingol .
Renndo am teddungo , miɗo ñaago ma nde ngummotoo , ndarano-ɗaa ndee hare ɗemɗe .
Renndo am teddungo , ngoowaandi nehirii en yiyrude jaaɓi-haaɗtiriweejo no neɗɗo potɗo joñaade , o laatoo mo konngi niɓɓi cuɗiiɗi tafo ngo faamotaako hakkunde gorle toowtoreeje .
Renndo fof e miijanteendi [ 2 ] mum Miijanteendi ɓuroori dowlude fawii ko e lannda [ 3 ] ɓurka dowlude , yuɓɓo jiyduɓe ngoƴa njiimi njeñu .
Renndo fof ina jogii gannde mum .
Renndo fof ina jogii nehdi mum .
Renndo fof ina jogii pine mum .
Renndo men hannde ina naatani ɗiin sahngaaji .
Renndo men waawiino ñootondirde ɗi haa yettii ɗo hankati ina jojjani ɗi kormondiral e jokkondiral timmungal so ɗi njiɗii hisde e firtaare .
Renndo nuunɗal , ɗo mo woni kala ene hurmaa he neɗɗaagal mum ; renndo ɗo dewbo ene waawi jogaade wellitaare janngude e gollaade tawa haɗaani ɗum suuraade he reen’de senaare mum .
Renndo ɓamtortoo tan ko he paamondiral e nanondiral denndaangal kinɗe mum .
Renndooji dowri noon ina nganndiraa heewde keeri caabotooɗi gacce e nangtaade , ŋatde e tiiɗeede ɗi ko wayi no barnogol aarabeeɓe dowiyaŋkooɓe ɓiɓɓe mum rewɓe ko adinoo diine lislaamu e naatnude ɗi ni e dewgol Geno heen sahaaji so en ndokkii yeru to Pulaagu , ƴetten harameeji jeeɗiɗi pulaagu , ina jeyanoo kadi e palorɗi gacce to bannge ko memotoo ɓurtungal jombaajo , ina jeyaa e caaborɗe gacce ɗe pulaagu heerorii Saali e Fonngere .
Renndooji mawɗi e tokoosi ndaɗondiri tan ko e janngude e jaɓde gollaade .
Renndooji ndaɗondirta ko e jaŋde .
Renndude diine , naattondiral leƴƴi e pine foti ko ɓeydude ɓadondiral hakkunde leƴƴi Muritani e wiyde makko .
Renndude e makko ɗeen caɗeele ɗe o tijjananooka , ine jibinoya ɗii konnguɗi cemmbinooji mo
Rennduɓe baɗal e konngol .
Required fields are marked
Resndaa golle ɗee ko jannginooɓe ɗiɗo : musee Bah kam e madam Soh .
Resorde ganni ko huunde mawnde e pinal leñol wallore e waawde hiɓindaade pinal mum e daartol mum .
Rewa heen jimol : " Halki pulaar " .
Rewata e ɗee maale ko tuure , ndogu-reedu , puƔe walla uube nduuya e ɓanndu haa hawra , tuyyam ndeer e boowal ɓanndu .
Rewi e makko ko jooɗaniiɗo Senegaal e leydi Belsik , Safi Bah , gooto e gollantooɓe pelle fulɓe .
Rewi e maɓɓe ko Daande Maayo 76 woni Daawuuda Tallan ganndiraaɗo Mc Tooroodo ɗoo e Le Havre .
Rewi e maɓɓe ko Goomu Pinal Jolof .
Rewi heen , ko Mammadu Haasi Mbay , tonnguɗo haala kaa he ɗemngal Farayse .
Rewi heen ko balɗe juutɗe laamu ina hoonti haa nde Abdel Asiis artunoo , caggal deƴƴere juutnde .
Rewi heen ko cukko hooreejo Dental BSA ( pelle njulaagu Buamatu ) biyeteeɗo Muhammed wul Debaag jaggaa , sokaa .
Rewi heen ko garaangal e hitaande 1979 gorko ina wiyee Idi Amiin Daddaa gonnooɗo hoyreejo leydi Uganndaa .
Rewi heen ko jimol : " Baabaaɓe looti " .
Rewo Weendu Jakel nduu ko maayo Senegaal woni toon .
Rewo e worgo , laamaaɗi Muritani e Senegaal , ko koreeji , galleeji gooti ngonnoo .
Rewo wuro maggo ko wuro wiyateengo Haymedaat , fuɗnaange ko Daawalel , fuɗnaange rewo ko Feerella , hiirnaange ko wiyteengo Dabbe , woni yeeso mum ko Dabbaano .
Rewrude e Goomu Dallinannde fedde ndee
Rewrude e Jokkorde pelle pinal
Rewrude e kaɓirɗe les-boɗewol , James Webb " taccii gaasuuji e punndi ngam feññinde koode limti-limtinɗe ɗe niiwnorgal Hubble ronkunoo yiyde " .
Rewti heen ko Tamasek ( 8 , 4% ) , Kanuri ( 4 , 8% ) , Sonngaayi ( 4 , 7% ) , Sapatoore walla Arab ( 1 , 2 ) e Gurma ( 0 , 5% ) .
Rewɓe e worɓe , sukaaɓe e mawɓe , ñaataaɓe ñaantule Fulɓe haa njooɗi ena njogori seppude ñalnde Dewo 12 Yarkomaa .
Rewɓe e worɓe , ñaantiiɓe kaddule Afriknaaje jooɗɗe , e ɓe mbaali e koɗungu ndee hoodere jaayre leñol Fulɓe , mo daande mum ƴelliti Pulaar e pinal Haalpulaar en he kala colla he nder jookli aduna he .
Rewɓe e worɓe yahratnooɓe e duuɓi 65 ( to Farayse ) e hitaande 2022 ndee , ine mbaawi wuurde haa duuɓi 89 ( wonande rewɓe ) walla 86 ( wonande worɓe ) , kono ko jaasi ɗoon no feewi tawa ine celli : 77 hitaande ( rewɓe ) e 75 hitaande ( worɓe ) .
Rewɓe sahre pentee kelle
Rewɓe tato ine njeyaa e nguun goomu .
Rewɓe teenoynooɓe ina naatta wuro ina ndoondi bahe leɗɗe .
Rewɓe ɓee , yoga e mum en mbaɗtetee ko horɓe to bannge ngena ( worɓe " juulɓe " ɓe ina njaha e mum en no njiɗiri ko aldaa e dewgal ) walla ɓe ligginee e nder galleeji , e miijo Daesh sariya lislaam ina yamiri ɗum , sariya renndo adunayankeewo ngoo ( ONU ) hannde hiisii ɗeen geɗe ko no warkoyaagu kuccinaangu e winndere ndee .
Rewɓe ɓee coodi bagiiji nannduɗi , ɓe moriimo jubbi cosaan , ɓe kaɓɓi cuuɗaari maɓɓe .
Rewɓe ɓee keddaaki caggal , Ko kamɓe cañiɗi Daagooje haddinaaɓe , Pittirɗi nokku oo keewɗi , ko kamɓe kadi Peewni ɗi .

Riisi e Orop ine pooɗondira naatgol Ikren he pelle mum en keeriiɗe , dillere ɓadiinde Orop feeñi to Kief , anndiraande filñitere Maydan , haa hooreejo leydi ndii Wiktoor Iyanukowic woppi laamu , Ikren ɓeydii ɓadtaade Hirnaange .
Riisi ine jaangi no feewi .
Riisi tawii wonaa ko sikkatnoo koo woodi .
Riisiy ena wonndi e caɗeele nannduɗe heen to Ceceniy et diiwanuuji goɗɗi .
Robbo googto ko bulaajo baɗɗo diidi daneeje .
Rogere adannda ndee maayi ɗoon .
Rogere adannde ndee , en njiyi Nijeriyaa ena hartoo jaawɗe haa ɗeɓi huɓɓude lajal Kooduwaar e fiyannde ñisnde buɓɓiinde e Palal .
Rogere jeegoɓere : Balla huniima wiyi ina wara Gumaalo .
Rogere jeetaɓere : Koyeera Balla e kootgol mum jeeri .
Rogere jeeɗaɓere : jaaltaaɓe ina yiydee e debbo Gumaalo .
Rogere joyaɓere : ndeenka falo jaaltaaɓe .
Rogere nayaɓere : fitina jaaltaaɓe e hoore mum .
Rogere tataɓere ko laawaare ɓiɓɓe subalɓe .
Rogere ɗiɗmere ndee ko nde Balla ari hoɗii subalɓe .
Rokka woppaave caggal ve no munyiri .
Rokkaa ndii njeenaari ko nganndineeɓe tato ( 3 ) , hono Syukuro Manabe ( duuɓi 90 ) , Klaus Hasselmann ( duuɓi 89 ) e Giorgio Parisi , ñalnde 5 oktoobar 2021 .
Rokkaa njeenaari selliwal ko biyeteeɗo Svante Pääbo mahtiiɗo ADN neɗɗo Neandartaal .
Rokkaa teddungal juulnude waktu uddital ngal ko biyeteeɗo Ceerno Aamadu Tijjaani Bah mo Hoore Foonde , garduɗo e lappol Kalifa Ceerno Ibraahiima Ceerno Aamadu Bookar .
Rokkaaɓe leydi njaha njoɓoya ko farlii e mum en e kaalis koo to sarwiis toppitiiɗo booñ ndenndaandi , ɓe keɓa e ɓeen kaayit seedamfaagal ko ɓe njoɓi koo .
Rokkata mo ngool ɗoon taftagol ko sato makko , anndina mo jaɓaaɗe mum e goɗaaɗe mum .
Rokkeede leydi e nder dingire gonɗe e Leegal E I Mina ( 6° ) , to bannge geec .
Rokki mo oon korsa e ngaal teddungal ko golle makko e wonde mo neɗɗo laaɓtuɗo maa peertuɗo miijooji .
Rokkirde tiitooɗe kabaruuji walla waɗde jaɓ-jaɓti e nder jaaynde jangtaande e ɗemngal Pulaar ko e maɓɓe , kamɓe jaaynooɓe sukaaɓe ɓee fuɗɗii kamɓe Mammadu Demmba Sih , Dooro Gey Boobo Loonde e Abuu Aamadu Abuu Jallo .
Rokkooɓe yarlitiiɓe keewaano , ine limoo .
Role paayodinɗo kadi teskinɗo mo o fiji he nder filma " Mbaku " mo Serif Ace Faati , ene hollira fanniyankaagal makko kadi e pellital makko he kala sahaa ɓeydaade wuurnude meccal makko .
Rondee , feeca hoore .
Roosvelt jaɓi miijo ngoo : ɗuum woni Eɓɓaande Manhattan .
Rutto galle maa , maa mi walle .
Ruulde mawde punndi e cuurki suddi baŋnge e wuro ngoo haa gila natti yiyde , maa lampaaji torso kuɓɓaa .

SONADER , toppitiiɓe ndema , nuldii toon sete , caggal ɗum hooreejo SONADER e Waali Gorgol ngarii toon .
SSPI ( station spatiale internationale ) woni lunde hakkunde leyɗeele e ndeer weeyo ko heen woni .
Sa a jaggi ɗuum a fuuntii hoore maa .
Saa suurtii leñol maa tan a suurtii hoore maa .
Saa wallaani leñol maa tan a wallaani hoore maa .
Saabii leeltugol ngol ko ɓakdi mbeɗu ɗakkal ( disque d’accrétion ) njirlotoondi wuddere ɓaleere Sgr A ndee , alla e mum yaawde , ine timmina jirlal mum he nder hojomaaji seeɗa .
Saabii maayde makko ko nguɗu ( kaaseer ) .
Saabii mi wallifaade nde ɗo winndannde ko yiɗde ruttude banndiraaɓe duwaawu darinooɓe darnde laŋ sara makko e tuma nde o rafaa nde , ko Allah jogii njoɓdi yoo yoɓ ɓe , teddina ɓe ko aldaa e ɓuutdi .
Saabii ɗum , ko to men gooto fof e miijo mun .
Saabii ɗum ko bannge heen fof a heɗortaake hakkillaaji , keɗorte ɗaa ko ɓerɗe .
Saabii ɗum ko geɗe keeriiɗe nokkuyeeje njiimaandi koloñaal kam e ceertugol leƴƴi baawnaaɗi koɗdigal les laamu ngootu , yantude e dokkugol jeytaare ngol heblanaaka , paranaaka , kam e ngonka winndere ndee e oon sahaa to bannge jogaraafi daartol ( géopolitique ) e politik winndere ndee e diiwaan oo e Afrik e Arab .
Saabii ɗum ko omo faawa tuume 34 .
Saabii ɗum ko teskuya laaɓtuɗo baasgol woodde ɓiyleydaagu , kam e baasgol dowla oo wonde jaambuur e nder mahngo leydi ndii , yantude e tasgol Dowla-Ngenndi .
Saabii ɗum noon ko ndu heeyɗii , te ndu alaa ko ndu ñaami .
Saabii ɗuum , ko so e nde waɗa yiiloo-banngoo , nde yiilortoo ko fuɗnaange fayde hirnaange mayre .
Saabii ɗuum ko koode ɗee , kañum en ɗelñat , nuldat caafe , njiyen ɗe e nder niɓɓere ; tagopeeje ɗeene , keɓata ko caafe naange , ngona e jalbude , mbaɗa pooye , njalba e dow asamaan .
Saabii ɗuum noon ko laamɗo salinoo yoɓde saak makkaari ndi ñamlinoo ɓe .
Saabii ɗuum noon ko omo faami nafoore ndee .
Saabii ɗuum tan ko diine , e ko ɓuri heewde , wiyetee ko ummii ko to Joomiraaɗo .
Saada NJaay en ko fuuntaaɓe tan , kono ko Wadd yamiri ɗum-ɗoo kala mbele ɓiyiiko Karim ena laamoo .
Saada e Binta kaalanii ɓe hol to ɓe ngummii , ɓe kaalani ɓe kabaaru oo , ɓe mbaynorii ɓe .
Saada ko gorko gooto keblantonooɗo yannge jam , o soodi tuuba , kono tawi tuuba ba koko juuti : Saada ɗaɓɓi yoo miñiiko debbo ustanɗum tuuba ba , oon salii , Saada haalani yummum , oon jaabaaki , won ko’o jaggunoo !

Saaktooɓe kabaruuji to Rajo Gine kaali wonde ko kooniŋkooɓe urñii e nder rajo , porsi-ɓe yoo ɓe njaŋngu kominikee oo .
Saal oo ena yaajin ena laaɓti .
Saal suleymaani , horeejo fedde jiknaaɓe almudɓe nder diiwan baabaaɓe e jokkondiroowo ardorde fonadh e nokku hee , kolaaɗo kuuɓal Fedde wiyeteende ( A .
Saalif haalanii ɓe , e der yeewtere deeƴnde , yooɗnde ko ñale ngee bonni e nammbu mum .
Saalif joofni haala mum tan , Diboor ƴeɓti konngol , haali ko yooɗi .
Saalif wiꞌi ñalel ngel naatno ko e nammbu makko .
Saar , yoo Allah rokkir on no muñirɗon aan e kala e famille maa fof .
Saar ; Bah e Aan e hono mon en yo GENO sellin doole sembina on .
Saaruuji makko tacciri gaawol ngol dow sala ponooji .
Saba e oo sahaa , e nder lesdi Muritani , haa jooni hina waɗi to pobbi keddii .
Saba fulɓe ko remooɓe e aynaaɓe , e geɗe goɗɗe e nguurndam neɗɗo .
Saba fulɓe ko yimɓe nehooɓe jawdi gila ko ɓooyi .
Saba keewal hinaa adda kisal , hinaa hisna nguura .
Saba so mawɓe haŋki nanii oolaango hinaa ndoga haa ɓadoo tawaa ngullaani ko ɓeewaani ko , so pullo nande nagge mum hinaa ooloo waasa wullu , ndaw ko saɗi .
Sabaabu cumu nguu anndaaka tawo , kono Ceerno gooto jahroowo e duuɓi 72 e almudɓe mum ɗiɗo e ɓiyum , tuumaama heen , nana e juuɗe laamu gila ñalnde 15 abriil .
Sabaabu goodal maggo ko ngam ɓeydaade wallude Kawtal Ngenndiiji waawde addude pewje ngam reende jam e kisal he diiwaan Hiirnaage Afrik .
Sabaabu njillu nguu ko hurmbitde maande laawɗinoore lasgol Ɓarakorde Jeeriyel Tummbere e doggol Ndonaandi Ngenndiiri kam e to doggol Winndere Islaamiyaŋkoore .
Sabaabu oo ko kala ɗo ɓiɓɓe subalɓe tiitortonooɓe laaɗe ngonnoo , ena kawritoyi Madiina , yanngeeji ena mbaɗa toon , gure jeeri e waalo fof ena kawrita , daay-daayre ena yuɓɓinaa .
Sabaabu seppo ngo ko ha laamɗo leydi ndii annda bonannde wawnde jibineede e ɗi halaluuji e jeertinde laamu Amerik e Aduna oo kala , yidde amen jam e kisal nder leydi amen " .
Sabaabu ɓurɗo teeŋtude , gaddanɗo Amerik yande e Irak ko yiɗde jiimde ngaluuji mum petroŋ .
Sabaabu ɗum ɗoo tan , ko ɓaleeɓe na poti fitteede , itteede , e yaltineede Moritani .
Sababuuji goɗɗi ɗii ɓuri , sikke alaa heen , mettude yiyde e faamde .
Sababuuji nayeewu nganndaaka tawo , ko taawilaaji tan ngoodi .
Sabbo duum ndelle sanaa tinnode e jande .
Sabi ko Tigerenaaɓe keedi e Eriterea , ko ɗoon yoga he kareele hakkunde maɓɓe mbaɗatnoo ; ko LFTP gooto ardinoo dawrugol nder Tigere .
Sabinoo ɗum , ko yerɓo ngo waɗnoo ko hedde midi , tawi yimɓe heewɓe ina kuɓɓi jayli ina ndefa bottaari .
Sabu , so waawɓe tarde pulaar keewii waawooɓe tarde Fooyre keewoyat .
Sabu , so ñuuñu ina yiɗi wuurde e dow kisal , radda ko wuurdi tawa nirkaaka ɓittaaka , ngu foti ko woɗɗaade yimɓe .
Sabu 243 ɓuri mawnude e 224 .
Sabu Allah jibinaani jibinaaka , kadi O alaa paso hay gooto .
Sabu Fuuta Tooro ko leydi , Ɓunndu ko leydi , Fuladu ko leydi Jolof ko leydi , Ñooro di Rip ( Siin e Saalum ) ɗum fof , ngootiri heen fof haysinno hannde ko diiwal tan he nder Senegaal ne , hanki ko leydi wonnoo ene waɗi diiwe mum e njuɓɓudi mum ; laamɓe mum en , jaagorɗe e arɗooɓe mum en .
Sabu Makki hay gooto anndaano-ɗum so wonaa nde o suɓii-ɗum hakkunde worɓe e rewɓe , o naatin-ɗum e laamu haa yettii e ardaade ɗowgu Senegaal .
Sabu Pulaar wiyata ko " ko e pelɓondiral miijooji miijo moƴƴo dañatee " .
Sabu aan musiɗɗo Ceerno Aan to Suwoyraat , ɗo ngon-ɗaa ɗoo , a yiyataa wuro Sehilbaabi , a yiyataa Kahayɗi , a yiyataa Jowol , sabu majje woɗɗude ma .
Sabu afo gorko won ɗo heedi e
Sabu alaa tawo feeñanɓe min ene mbaawi fiileede leppi , so Meeriiji , so jooɗantooɓe min suudu Sarɗiiji .
Sabu alaa to tawetee so wonaa he nder Salndu Fuuta .
Sabu ba heewi ko serindaade , fowru noon hinaa yiɗi ko seraandii .
Sabu caggal duuɓi cappanɗe joyi goodal laamu ngonɗen haa jooni ko e ngonka kaaɓniika .
Sabu cute-cute cariiɗe e jookli leyɗeele keewɗe tawi ndentaani e nder leydi ngootiri , ɓesngu ngootu , ardorde wootere , njuɓɓudi laamu ngootiri mbaawataa heɓtineede e ñallunge hannde ngee no Dowla nii , heddii ko joomum en no mbelaa fof innira koye mum en .
Sabu dawriyankooɓe ɓurnooɓe heen anndeede e yaakoreede ɓee fof , hannde , ngonka mumen ene faayni
Sabu defte makko tati ɗee fof mbinnda ko he nder duuɓi joy .
Sabu dingiral e nder reedu Fuuta darinoo ko darnde duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde darii e nder renndo hannde ngoo .
Sabu emin ngoongɗini wonde gartugol mooliiɓe wonnooɓe Senegaal haa e wonnooɓe heen Mali , naati ko e mbaydi mahtaade ngootaagu ngenndi , haa jooni lofiingu ngu sikkaaka .
Sabu ene annda , kabaaru fof bayyinaaɗo , fayndaare mum ko weltinde ɓernde , waylude miijooji e ngonka ngam moƴƴa , njahda e jamaanu .
Sabu ene tawee he mago hee njeeygu dorog , warhoore , loskooji laamu , e hulɓinde ( intimidation ) .
Sabu faamde neɗɗo wallirta mo ɓuri ko haa ɓurɗo ɗum walla ɗum .
Sabu fenaande ene roƴa , goonga hirnda heɓtoo ɗum haa daɗtoo gila future yonaani .
Sabu fowru ko kullel pownubgel no feewi .
Sabu fowru ñaamata ko gilaa hinaa wuuri .
Sabu fulɓe e wonde aynaaɓe , walla wuurduɓe e kulle .
Sabu gaa-gaa loowdiji yeewtere nde wonde pinndinooji , loowɗi ganndal e hummpito yaajngo , kono kadi sabu mayre wonde fartaŋŋe yeeɓiyankooɓe Fulɓe dañde yiyde ɓiyɓe mum en , annduɓe mum en , ɓe cooynotonoo nokkuuji goɗɗi ene ngara ene kaalda e mum en he ɗemngal Pulaar .
Sabu gila hitaande ujunere e teemedde jeenay e cappanɗe jeetati e jeenay , enen fof e ɗena ngoya , eɗen ndonkaa yoo ene ndeƴƴu .
Sabu golle mum maantinɗe he eggude gannde e karalleeje kese he ɗemngal Pulaar .
Sabu gonɗo caggal galle o , ko o yahata ko , ɓuri fooɗtaade , ɓuri woɗɗude e takkiiɗo e suudu ndu .
Sabu haajuuji maɓɓe e Afrik kumtiima .
Sabu haawnaaki , aduna e juutde koyngal , min cafra ɗe kannje
Sabu hannde eɗen njiɗi laamɓe e ardantooɓe men e nokkuuji men , rewɓe jaagorɗe e nder laamuuji men , enɗen njiɗi ɓe peeña e yontaaji men walla e garoyooji .
Sabu hannde ina luukee ko feewti e entreprenariat ( janngude , ligganoo hoyre mum ) .
Sabu hay go’to jogaaki kolaaɗe ɓurɗe kolaaɗe men ɗe jaɓde ndema e nder Senegaal .
Sabu hay so ina yanaa e nayi , hinaa heewi iwrude e hennde huña laaci , waɗaa gaatureeje , mbelee maa nayi ɗi laawo .
Sabu hayso tawii arabeeɓe ɓee ndañaani waawde finde tan mbaɗta Muritani hono njiɗiri ɗum nii ne , sahaa kala eɓe mbaɗa taaɓannde fayde e fayndaare maɓɓe aarabiɗinde leydi ndi .
Sabu he biyɗe Abdullaay Joop , ko adii fof ko laamu Mali tintinaaka wonnde Aminata Dikko walla fedde Kisal ene jogori rokkeede konngol he jonnde he , kadi omo yeddi goongirantaagal Aminata Dikko .
Sabu he yontaaji laamiiɓe juulɓe ( Kalifaaɓe ) teemedannde 7ɓre – 11ɓre , tuma nde abbaasiyankooɓe laamii he dow dowla Islaam nde , ɓe kirjiniino e firde ɗeen gannde Gerek en e eggudeɗe , ɗe mbaɗtaa he ɗemngal Arab .
Sabu hinaa nanndi e yiilaade ballal .
Sabu hinaa njalo , hinaa tiisondiraa haa peete njalta .
Sabu hinaa teskaa so pobbi njuhii kala nanndu heewi ko nootaade .
Sabu hono mbiynoɗen ni , Liksammbuur woni leydi ɓuri famɗude he nder Orop ene janngina ɗemɗe nay , Faransinkoore , Almaare , Lisammburnaare e Engeleere .
Sabu hono no mbiynoɗen ni , Liksammbuur woni leydi ɓurndi famɗude he nder Orop ene janngina ɗemɗe nay , Faransinkoore , Almaare , Liksammburnaare e Engeleere .
Sabu hulde leyɗe ƴellittooɗe ɗee , alaa e sago njiimaandi ɓooyndi ndii ( Farayse ) darna koyɗe .
Sabu ina teskaa haa jooni oon bannge eɗen mankiraa ɗum .
Sabu ina teskaa ngatam heewaani ñaamde lesdi , ko maa ƴeŋŋina haa ɓitta e gayi lekki nde fuɗɗoo ñaamde .
Sabu ina teskaa ɗo yimɓe ngoni fof , lakde faaɗataa .
Sabu jahɗo heen haa woɗɗoyi fof , so yiyii jinnaaɓe mum ene kooltoo cegeneeji , heewi ko ɓernde ɓama ɗum , yiɗa heɓɓitaade , woppa jaŋde wiya ene yiiloyoo liggey .
Sabu jaleeɗe , saabotoo ɗum ko mbelemma .
Sabu jamma alaa ko woni so wonaa mbeelu Leydi .
Sabu jawdi haalantaake haala pinal .
Sabu jillondiral pine keewɗe ceertuɗe cewle , keɓeteengal he kawrital yimɓe iwruɓe he nokkuuji ceertuɗi pottiti he nder teeru waɗi , reende pinal mum ganniwal heddo heen ina saɗti walla mbiyen nii gasataa laataade .
Sabu joom suudu makko oo furotono mo so yiɗi naatde hakkunde maɓɓe .
Sabu joom wuro ngoo rokkino ɓe maaro , Wojere ñaami woppi mo .
Sabu jooɗtoraa ko maccuɓe jeyaaɓe e renndooji ganni hee ngalaa jeyi , jogii jeyi tan ko gardiiɗo renndo ngoo walla lawakooɓe jeyaaɓe e renndo ngoo .
Sabu kala heen ɗaɓɓiɗɗo wootaneede , kala mo werlanaaki ɗum kartal tan o nanngirta ɗum ko gaño .
Sabu kala ko seto mawni , ina saɗtina nguura .
Sabu kala nde barooɗe kaɓi haa heen ngootiri jaɓi , tan ngoɗndi ndii heewi ko woppude , sabu heewaani riiwde so foolii haa poolaandi ndii jaɓii .
Sabu kala seto ngo ɗi njiyi , ɗi taaroto ngo .
Sabu kamɓe fof , hitaande maɓɓe ko nde ngummi-ɗaa damal suudu , taari-ɗaa suudu ndu , haa cawndito-ɗaa kadi damal suudu ngal .

Sabu kan lampa ɓuri leerde e lampa petrol kaa .
Sabu kañum jokkondiri ko e leydi , leydi ko tagoore woodnde , nde majjataa .
Sabu ko Afrik , eɓa njaawi duuftude laɓɓe ɓe mbiya eɓe ndaranoo haakkeeji aadee !
Sabu ko e yaakoraaɓe Senegaal njeya-ɗaa hannde .
Sabu ko heewi e amen nguuri ko e balle pelle ɗe yimɓe ɓe min tawoyi ɓee .
Sabu ko heewi e maɓɓe ko ɓiɓɓe almameeɓe e seeremɓe wuro ngoo .
Sabu ko heyi e debbo koo ko toon tan alla heyni dum .
Sabu ko kamɓe fof ngarata wiyde ko ɓe banndiraaɓe men " tee neɗɗo ko banndum " , waɗde yo en ngootan ɓe .
Sabu ko maa neɗɗo jannga haa waawa nde fuɗɗoo jannginde .
Sabu ko mayru ɓuri heewde ko yanata e kulle .
Sabu ko min mbiyata ko kañum saabii hare amen ndee koo , ko ɓeen ɓuri ɗum tinde .
Sabu ko nduun tan ɗaɗol mum jokkondiri e ɗaɗol ɓernde .

Sabu kosmos walla tageefo , ko leydi e denndaangal kuule ɗe njiyaten e nder asamaan o
Sabu kosmos walla tageefo , ko leydi e denndaangal kuule ɗe njiyaten e nder asamaan oo : naange , lewru , koode , " laawol jeeri e waalo " ( ko njiyaten ena niwɗa e dow asamaan , won wiyooɓe ɗum baawal , eɗen mbaawi wiyde ɗum " dental koode " walla jiiryiirle ( galaksiiji ) no aduna fof wiyata ɗum nii ) e geɗe goɗɗe goodɗe e nder asamaan o ( e nder ndoogu nguu ) .
Sabu kulle keewɗe ina pera maa mbida , maa ngasa , kono demmba heddoo .
Sabu kunuɗe fof coka , ɗemɗe tonngaa , mette ndammbii e deedi , miijooji ndonkaa yaltineede .
Sabu laamu ngu e hoyre mum ina waawi salaade ɗum , kono so tawii ɓesngu ina daranii ɗum , ina waɗti ɗum " reɓendication " mum , sikke alaa ma ɗum laato .
