Sabu leydi Senegaal no wayi ƴellitaade e janngiyaagal nii , hol no jaɓrata eɓɓoore jaŋde ina waɗee , fotnde nii heewde jawdi e moƴƴude yiyannde , tawa alaa jannginooɓe heblaaɓe ?
Sabu leñol mawngol , jaajngol hono no Fulɓe Senegaal ni , sariiɓe he nder wertaango leydi Senegaal fof , waɗde ɗum en he tamannde wootere wonaa ko aaɓnoto .
Sabu ma ustu ko ɓesnguuji maɓɓe katojinta he ndaarde teleeji kaalooji ɗemɗe goɗɗe haa caayora heen ko .
Sabu makko fiɓde o sellini wonnde neɗɗo waawa huɓindaande ganndal kala ko ngal waawi won’de , teeŋti noon e hiisiwal’ tawa oon tigi wonaa ene janngi ngal he neeniwal mum .
Sabu makko wonde karallo mawɗo , ñeeñɗuɗo , labaaɗo kadi laaɓɗo reedu , o woni karallo toppittooɗo kala ko fayti nantinirɗi jeewte e kiirɗeeli catal ngal .
Sabu makko yenaneede , kala ko heɓtii mo ( yo won jam ) hade koreeji , ko hoɗdiiɓe ngadotoo e makko .
Sabu makko yiɗde yo laamɗo Kaaso , e laamɗo Ɓunndu , e laamɗo Saalum , e laamɗo Rip yo mballit mo haɓde e tuubakooɓe , ɗum addani mo resde ɓiyi mo woni kala e maɓɓe .
Sabu maɓɓe laataade " ɗemɗe renndo men " .
Sabu mbaroodi riiwataa njaɓndi so dogii , heewi tan ko woppude .
Sabu miin mi addii daliilu e holi sabaabu ko diine ardintee leñol .
Sabu minen ko min lannda ngenndiiwa , ka ndaɗɗudi mum woni ɓaarorde islaamiyankoore kono kaɓantooka ngootaagu ngenndiiwu wonannde Moritaninaaɓe kala .
Sabu neeniwal woni ko reeni leñol hono no mbiidaa nih he winndannde maa ndee , reeni gila he sirluuji leñol , aadaaji mum , pine mum , ganni mum , tinndi mum , cifti mum , binndi mum , wittooji mum , malli mum , balli mum , karallaagal mum , ekn .
Sabu neɗɗo sahaa miijoto tan taƴa .
Sabu nganndii dañde laamiiɗo pullo , nattii wonde koydol sabu waɗii waɗtii .
Sabu ngayi yiɗi ko ɓesdude deye , kono wonaa ustude , ko ɗuum waɗi ndi riiwataa ɓoosaaji deyi ɗii .
Sabu njuuteendi mum fotde 400 hitaande , hakkunde teeminannde 15ɓiire e 19ɓiire ; sabu njaajeendi mum , sibu ko hakkunde 25 e 30 miliyoŋ ɓaleejo taccinaa ; sabu batte mum to ganndal leydi e renndo , to USA , to Karaybe , to Beresil , e to Afrik e hoore mum .
Sabu o wayrii fijjude e jaldude e gorko o .
Sabu o wiy en wonnde , ngol laawol ɓe kaaɗaani tan he naɓaka ( cinema ) kono e ɓe nawori heen magooji-doge ( les Series audiovisuel ) ɗi ngannduɗaa hannda ene njaaji kadi ene yiɗaa no feewi .

Sabu so a yahii nokkuuji goɗɗi e nder , Afrik , walla duuɗe goɗɗe , maa yiy-toon eddaali pobbi goɗɗi .
Sabu so en mbaɗaani noon ɓe nduppatɗe kannje fof walla ɓe ngujja ɗe .
Sabu so en njaajniima , ene waawi wooda uube jontiraaɗe , wooda fawɓe heen goɗɗum haa likñitoo kisa .
Sabu so en njiɗii yerondirde ɗi : Leydi ndi so waɗtaama e mum ko foti e mayri laabi milioŋ e teemedde tati ujunere ( 1 300 000 ) , naange ɓuri ɗum .

Sabu so fowru riiwii ko wayiino nagge , hinaa waawi ñaamde haa haara , tawaa henge wuuri , .
Sabu so nde arii e taaraade naange , tawde laawol ngol nde rewata ngol ɓuri raɓɓiɗde e laawol ngol Leydi rewata ngol , ko kayre adotoo artude ɗo nde wonnoo .
Sabu so neɗɗo janngi ɗemngal jananal o waawa daɗde e huwtoraade won e jiyanɗe mum en , hayso tawii ɗeen jiyanɗe ene ustamo .
Sabu so on teskiima caggal nde ndu darii , janngo mum ndu ɓeydotoo ko toowde , faɗɗi janngo ( ɓaawo janngo mum ) ndu ɓura toowde , ndu woora noon haa ndu waɗta hiirnude ( ndu waɗta leede dardaade fuɗnaange ) .
Sabu so tawii ko wari-ɓe koo woni manoore dawriyaŋkooɓe naatɓe e kampaañ oo , ndeke ko ɓe jaambareeɓe ngenndi , ndeke kala toɗɗaaɗo ena waɗɗii ɗum artirde inɗe maɓɓe e laaɓal e tooweedi jaambaraagal .
Sabu so tawii ndiyam ɓolam lammataa , sikke alaa " ene anndaa kam , ɗeɓii maayde sahaani hiraande " .
Sabu so tawii orthographe , wóni e pulaar cellugól mbinndiin , fóti ko wallude jaŋngoowo wonaa majjinde ɗum , mbiyen ɗoo jaŋngoowo wallaaka , ɓeydana ngaanumma .
Sabu so tawii ɓe teskiima kadi , oon luulndiiɗo , alaa ko daranii so wonaa hoyre mum , walla ɓalliiɓe ɗum , ɓe teskiima oon luulndiiɗo waɗataa , haalataa so wonaa ko ene addana laamu liggodaade mum , eɓe ngaybina kadi golle mum .
Sabu so ɗemngal woodaano , njubbudi hakkunde hoɗduɓe , e rennduɓe soklaaji waawataano laataade , alaa ko haali noon ñeenñal ngal .
Sabu suka debbo hiirdude e gorko e suudu haa jennga tawa aɓe njanngida geɗe aduna , kono hannde ko aɓe mbonnida aduna wonata , kala nde ɓe kiirdi .
Sabu sukaaɓe ɓe kala poti fotdeeji .
Sabu tawata ko ina barmi barme bonɗe .
Sabu tawata ko pobbi ɗii keewaani , walla ko sonngaa ko hinaa mawni .
Sabu tawi o teskaama jeyeede e ɓurɓe waawde meccal hoɗdu ngal .
Sabu teskaade , tawde ndiyam , leuydi e naange ene ngoodi , so en njaɓii liggaade tan eɗen mbaawi waasde loritaade e ɗanle .
Sabu waasataa luulndiiɗo ko haalaa ɗoo koo .
Sabu waasde worɓe mumen , sukaaɓe mumen , wandiraaɓe mumen worɓe , baabiraaɓe mumen , walla sabu mumen riiweede e gollorɗe mumen e sahaa mo Ibiraahiima Saar sifinoo e yimre nde tiitoonde mum woni " nayi jeenayi " .
Sabu waawa faameede wonnde fotde duuɓi cappanɗe nay e nguurndam makko ɗi o itti omo rokki ɗum en leñol ngol , o wonndaaka cuddiiɗo , o wonndaaka ɓiyɗo , o wonndaaka jawdi omo gollonoo leñol ngol , o maaya tan ɗeen golle fof ngoppe doombi e come ƴakka ɗum en .
Sabu wayi tan ko no wiyde " hay so mi naftortaako , yoo goɗɗo waas tan miin mi heɓa " .
Sabu won to yottatetee ko seedantaagal naamndetee ngam tuugneede e ganndal neɗɗo oo , so ɗuum woodaani noon hay nokku en njahataa .
Sabu yiitere nattii yonde e anndude hol no ngól-ɗóó kóŋngól ngól njiimmi fóti jaŋngireede , maa mi wadda heen anndude doosgal kaalangal dów ngal ; mo anndaa ɗemngal ngal kadi ɓuri aande .
Sabu ƴeewee laana ndiwoowa , so ka diwii haa ka heɓoyii hedde kilomeeteruuji 9 dow , jiyɗo ɗum fof wiyata ko hay so cukalel ena waawi ɗum mofde e naafki .
Sabu ɓe keɗaaki haala kaa , ɓe njiyata ko kanko kaalɗo oo .
Sabu ɓe mbiy ko huunde jogotoo waloor ko maa tiiɗa saɗta heɓde tawa so neɗɗo heɓii ɗum ene waawa ɗum faarnoraade .
Sabu ɓe njahdi toon wona kanko tan yimata , kono kala ɗo ɓe ngari ma ɓe njaɓɓe , kadi tawa yimɓe ɓee njaɓɓortooɓe ko bawɗi , buubaaji , jimɗi e ngamri .
Sabu ɗee ɗoo ɗemɗe tati ko ɗee ɗoo mbaawi jokkindirde en e winndere ndee , kadi ko kañje ngoni ɗemɗe gannde ɓurɗe waawde ƴellitde en .
Sabu ɗeeɗoo gannde kese , eɗen mbaawi wiyde hankati , e nder Afrik , so nayeejo maayii tawi ganndal ngal waañnjitaaka nattii wonde suudu defte duppaandu , e reftaade konngol ganndo gooto biyeteeɗo Aamadu Hampaate Bah .
Sabu ɗo foolaa haa jaɓi ɗoo , tawata ko leefii , tee leefre mbaroodi ko maayde tan firti .
Sabu ɗo nguttete ɗaa ɗoo , woodat wiyɓe ko a jaambaaro , woɗɓe mbiy maa cuusɗo caasɗo , waɗa kadi ɓeyduɓe e yettoode maa helmere " seydi " .
Sabu ɗo ɗe keewi fof , joom mum en keewaani yiyde hokkere .
Sabu ɗuum , miin nde naat-mi e FƁPM , mbiɗo jannga liisee .
Sabu ɗuum , nde ngar-mi e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar , ko mi elew tan , ko mi pullo tan ɓolo .
Sadaat e hoor mum waraa ñalnde 6 Yarkomaa 1981 .
Safaara woodaani , faddungo kadi alaa , kono tan doktoreeɓe Ameriknaaɓe raaɓanooɓe to Liberiya nawtaa , ndokkaama safaara ngonɗo e jarribeede ZMapp , ala e sago ko maa o jarribee e woɗɓe ngam heɓindaade mbaawka makko safrude rafi o .
Safalɓe ene njogii konngol ene mbiya , ngelooba cagateewa , tiiɗba , ɓuri sagata ɓaleejo faayiida !
Safalɓe ngoppii teewu mbaɗtii ñaamde ñiiri e nebam , walla mbaɗɗaas .
Safalɓe njeyaa ko e leƴƴi Afrik ɓurɗi dartaade koloñaal ; kareeli maɓɓe e tuubakooɓe ɓooyii , ɓurii duuɓi teemedde ɗiɗi .
Safalɓe potii anndineede ko rendaaɓe ; ndaa rennduɓe peccat .
Safaɓe seeɗa kadi ina tawetenoo ɗoon .
Safi ba
Safiyatu jaabaaki .
Sagata cemsembilo mo foŋtaaki feeñi , ena dadii dadungal konunke , ena sinndii silaama .
Sagata mo duuɓi 62 to Jowol , giƴum ko cukalel ngel leɓɓi 3 toon to Pulutoon .
Sagataaɓe ngardi e kaɓirɗe , ngardi e keewal , nootitii , mbaɗi gaawi e gammbi ngam ɓoccitde wuro e ɗemɗe ndiyam .
Sago jolduɓe e laana ko ƴeeŋde .
Sago ɓeen tan ko no ene ndañira fof yo waɗe , hay sinno koko duppata leydi amen Durmam Daƴƴel Salndu Gelooki .
Saha kala eɓe mbaɗa baydi yagga .
Sahaa e sahaa kala ko wayi noon ina raadtee e nder goomuuji annduɓe wiɗtooɓe geɗe weeyo .
Sahaa e sahaa kala ɗeen gane ina
Sahaa e sahaa kala ɗeen gane ina njalta e jaañte neɗɗo daaɓaaɗo oo .
Sahaa ena ara nde laamuuji caliiɗi hokkunde wone e leƴƴi ɗii hakkeeji mbiyetee yoo ndew laawol walla kuugal waɗee e mum'en .
Sahaa fof ngel wona e ñuuñde les jimɗi jurminiiɗi .
Sahaa fof noon alkateeɓe ngara nawa taabel makko .
Sahaa fof ɓe ndeftoo e ɓetu nguu , ngam yuɓɓinde ngu .
Sahaa gooto , e yonta Koli Tengella walla e ɓesngu mum , nanngi mo , haɓɓidi mo e wahre huɗo yoorko haa o ɓiici , weddii mo e oƴu noorngal jeynge boɗewal coy .
Sahaa kala , o hirsa ngaari , o nodda welnere e galle makko .
Sahaa kala kullel wirtoo .
Sahaa kala naamnoo Ceerno , eɓe njaawta .
Sahaa kala oto oo jippo laawol ngol ŋabbita kadi tawi hay gooto tinaani .
Sahaa kala topotooɓe ena njokki golle ngam ɓeydude wanngorde ndee yuɓɓude , hisde e welde huutoraade .
Sahaa mo ngon-ɗen hannde oo , barme waɗtii fattude baŋ-yoo-baŋ e nder leydi ndii Alla e kampaañ oo jirwude e addude e Muritani ko meeɗaa yiyeede .
Sahaa nde Israayiilnaaɓe e aarabeeɓe njaggonditunoo tawo ɓalndu e ɓalndu he kareeli jogitaaje " .
Sahaa o , ina deeƴi , kono kadi ƴiiwoonde nde ina lutti larbaade , toɓo heewngo doole .
Sahaaji , ko hunuko luuɓata koo , saabotoo ɗum ko henndu ummiindu nder reedu rafaandu .
Sahaaji goɗɗi ko jaayndiyankooɓe , maa dente dawrugol maa pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ɗe o wiyi ndaranii ko leyɗe janane .
Sahaaji kadi , so ngoon luulndo jaɓii , ɓe mbaajoo ɗum , ɓe mballita ɗum e miijooji moƴƴi , moƴƴinooji golle mumen .
Sahaaji nii , so haala kaa yettiima ɗo foti ñaaweede , omo heewi kadi rokkeede fenaande .
Sahaaji nii , wooda ko min neldi ɗumen , min ɓeyda heen " njokkee golle , ko e mon aduna oo fof waɗi yaakaare " .
Saharaa ko leydi ɓiliindi hakkunde Muritanie e Maruk .
Saharanaaɓe lommbiiɓe hakkuɓe rewo Muritani e Maruk , ɓe Espaañ jiimnoo , kollitii ko Maruk nattii ɗooftaade dartingol jeyli , nanondiral ciifenoongal 1991 .
Saharanaaɓe ɓee keɓti kaɓirɗe maɓɓe ɗe ɓe ngasirtunoo kaŋŋe .
Sahnga 18H45 dognooɓe laana ka nuldi kabaaru fayde e haralleeɓe marin Ndakaaru mbiyi hankadi ka yaltii maayo welngo Kaasamaasa , ka deertiima jooni e maayo haaɗngo ( ocean atlantik ) .
Sahnga mo njettiima e nokku oo , sukaaɓe , mawɓe , rewɓe , worɓe ena mbaɗi gorwoccol ngam naade to saal too .
Sahnga nde Wadd heblata batu toowngu leyɗeele Lislaamyaŋkooje ( OCI ) , o resndi golle ɗee ko ɓiyi makko e heeso jaagorde geɗe caggal leydi fotnoonde ɗowde heblo batu nguu .

Sali , hono no mbaroodi nii , woni e bikkitaade ɗoon ɗo teeyre makko ina jokki wukkitde konngol makko .

Sammba Tuure
Sammba e Murkaldi .
Sammba e goomu mum mbaɗii feere haa ɓoccitii jignaaɓe mumen .
Sammba fof he famɗude njoɓdi , hoɗi , hoɗni ɓiɓɓe yummum en fof he galleeji mum en , o woni njaatigi kala jeyaaɗo he leñol makko e banndiraɓe woɗɓe , gila he almuɓɓe janngooɓe , haa e ndaartooɓe liggeyaaji , ñawɓe arooɓe safraade ekn , ekn .
Sammba kañum ɓoorni doloke mum jurtiiɗo .
Sammba ne ma taaro suudu nduu laabi kewɗi tawa Demmba gaynaani taaraade wuro ngoo .
Sammba noon , kañum , siɓaaki to wonnoo ɗo .
Sammba udditii taaɓal njeeygu , waɗii fitiram gollaagu haa Allah walli ɗum ƴettaa yo won deenoowo biro cafrirɗo jawdi ( CNERV ) .
Sammba waɗtiino arde e nokku hee gila ɓokki kii ko soɓoƴuru .
Sammba yaltini fetel oo e suudu mum tann , jinne oo yani maayi .
Sammba ɗakki nguu e uure nooro , footi heen rip .
Sammba-ne ma taaro suudu ndu laabi kewɗi tawa Demmba gaynaani taaraade wuro ngo .

Sankara .
Sankara fodani ɓesngu Burkina nduñngu mo yo o ŋabbu dow jappeere , sompude potal , haɓde e baasal e buuñaari tuugnorgal makko ko ɗii ñabbuli tati .
Sankara fuɗɗiima batu , kanko e gollodiiɓe makko ɓurɓe ɓadaade mo .
Sankara hucciti e wondiiɓe mum , o wiyi ɓe : " Ndeeƴee , ko miin ɓe njiylotoo " .
Sankara yooɓaa ko ina yahra duuɓi 37 , o soowraa Che Guewara mo Afiriki .
Sankara yooɓoraa .
Sanne
Sanne , gite ko leydi tan biyaa yoo keddo : mbaydi , welde ƴiiƴam e yonteede oo suka waɗaani gulwulti .
Sanngalde jaabii ɓe : " cabbi teemedde ɗiɗi tan na yona .
Sanngalde jokki ina ama , ina holla weltaare mum .
Sanngalde noon , haalani Waandu innde mum tigirigi .

Sanngalde wooɓi heen , tuuti ñebbe et ñammbi .
Santar Aamadu Maalik Gay ( Bopp ) ɓooyi jaɓɓaade dille pine e renndoyankeeje Fulɓe teeŋti .
Sanɗaaji-etijaa en Farayse , eyɓintenooɓe wonde fotde 10 , 000 e 1968 , ɓurnoo wonde , ɓurnoo wonde hare mum en ko nga , nafooje ngenndiiji ɗii , walla nafooje toɗɗiiɗe leyɗeele Afrik kala .
Sappo e goo ( 11 ) dowla ameriknaajo ceegii dental ngal , ngam salaade seertude e jiyɗingol ɓaleeɓe , semmbe faggudu mo Alla ɓolo , mo alaa njoɓdi .
Sappo e njeetato ngaañii gaañanɗe muusɗe , haa njeetato heen njokkitii nder ñalɗi 16 e 17 marsa 1908 .
Sappo e ɗiɗo woɗɓe , ina heen Jilbeer Jendere , gooto e ardinooɓe konu Burkina tuma nde ɓe loppitta laamu he 1987 .
Sappoor en ɓee ko fotɓe teddineede .
Sar ganndal maa Firefox so
Saraaji ɗii ñaantaama haa njooɗi .
Sarifaaɓe e seernaaɓe ummoriiɓe e kala jookli ngardi e ɓerɗe cuniiɗe e jeese ñirɓiniiɗe .
Sariya ina rokki kala cukalel ngel jiknaaɓe mum paggitii moritaniyaagal hakke wonde moritaninaajo .
Sariya jeyi leydi gollorteeɗo hannde e nder leydi ndii oo , naataani hakkillaaji yimɓe ɓee walla won heen kiisorii sariya oo ko garɗo ina teetta leyɗeele mum en .
Sariya ngenndaagu oo ina yamiri ɗum , kono ko e sifaa mo nuunɗaani sibu ko maa hooreejo leydi yamira ( ɗum rokkii mo mbaawka rokkude ɗum mo welaa , e haɗde ɗum mo o welaaka ) , tawi noon fotnoo wonde ko dekere tuugiiɗo e sarɗiiji laaɓtuɗi , potndooji ɓiɓɓe leydi kala .
Sariya yaafuya ƴettaa e hitaande 1993 ngam haɗde ñaawoore warkoyeeɓe ɓee , e daɗndude ɗum en .
Sariyaaji diine lomtii kuule laamu Rom he yoga e geɗe .
Sariyaaji taƴɗi ɗuum walla ñaawooje ngool muumtugol mbaawaa ruttaneede .
Sariyankooɓe ina luurdi e cifagol " dowla Daesh " ; won wiyooɓe ɗum wonaa dowla , ko ɗum tippondiral leƴƴi ceertuɗi e diwanuuji e gardagol ardiiɓe ɗiin leƴƴi jaɓɓe hoofnanaade njuɓɓudi ngootiri , " dowla " o annominiri ko no laamuuji lawakooɓe ndeen .
Sarkosii ena yaakorii e ndii mbaydi kesiri maa lelnu jamaanu keso jotondiral hakkunde Farayse e duunde Afrik .
Sarkosii erriima Dowlaaji Dentuɗi yoo mballu-ɓe yiytude ɗo laana kaa yani .
Sarkozy jeyaaa ko e hohooɓe Farayse ɓurɓe añde arani-en .
Sarwisaaji cunnagol ɗii alaa ko keddi , ɗi njeertinii mo e jokkondire tiiɗɗe hakkunde laamu Abdel Asiis e Tuwaareg en ummaniiɓe ƴettitde wolde .
Sarɗiiji laabi ñaawirɗi gaadoraaɗi ko kañum en tan ciynetee , so tawii kay ɗi luulndaaki sarɗiiji cifaaɗi dow ɗii .
Sarɗiyanke Muritaninaajo wiyi waraaɓe ɓee ko sappo e njeegomo ( 16 ) .

Satigi ñaagii ɓe ballal to bannge duwaawu .

Saydu Kan , kañum , wonnoo ko ɓiy neene , diisndorɗo , gollidiiɗo .
Saydu Kan e sehilaaɓe mum , ko wayno Yero Dooro Jallo , Abuubakri Dem , Murtuɗo Joop , duttagol mum en e joomum , ɗi ndaɗondiraani ko baayaagu e alyatimmagu wonande leñol ngol .

Sebka ( Nuwaasoot ) – Aamadu Siidi Wele 14 .
Seedantaagal Yiilirde ngenndi 2 .
Seedantaagal am ko wiyde ko on tiiɗniiɓe , e daraniiɓe leñol ngol .
Seede majjum ko heewɓe majjii toon , gaññeeje denndaaɗe ( biidi ) keewɗe njiytaama toon .
Seede mum , ko ganndal ɓeto ( ilm al-aruud ) ngal gooto e annduɓe safalɓe ɓurɓe mawnude e teeminannde 20siire , hono El Moktaar wul Haamiduun , heɓi e ceerno jolfo biyeteeɗo Muhammed El Amiin Siisee , meeɗnooɗo wonde kam e hoore mum almuudo baaba mum El Moktaar to Tule ceene Igidi .
Seede mum , ko ina wona duuɓi 10 jooni , ko 5% ɓoggi ɗii ɓe njeynoo .
Seede mum , ko laaminooɓe e tuma nde Muritani heɓi jeytaare mum ndee , ngoppii , e nder daawal jaasngal duuɓi joy , laamu tuugiingu e parlamaan ngu koloñaal ɗaccirnoo en , ɓe lomtiniri ɗum laamu hooreleydaagu .
Seede mum ko fallemme , hakkunde ngaari maayo e jaaltaaɓe , hakkunde Baaba Abdul e Abbaas ( Gellaay tawaaka ) , ngaari maayo ina haɗi yimɓe tellaade : " ndeke tumaranke anndaa ladde , min njoofi ɗo joofetaake , min mbaali ɗo waaletaake " .
Seede mum ko ɓetooji ɗiɗi ɗi Breida kam e jaagordu jaŋde leydi ndii mbaɗnoo .
Seede ndeen ñalnde ko Aamadu Muktaar Caam , Boobo ngenndi , Ɓiyngel yumma , Aysata Sih , Abdul Katante e Abda Kudi e Maariyata Banna .

Seek Anta Joop e
Seek Haamiidu Kan ko ardii fof ko gorko juulɗo , ko jannginoowo o wonnoo , kadi ko o joom martaba toowɗo , patamlamo .

Seek Tijjaan Gaajo diwrii bibje mum keeriiɗe ngam ɗaɓɓude hoolaare ngenndi Senegaal e eɓɓannde " ngenndi " nde o eɓɓani renndo ngoo .

Senegaal dañi ɗiɗi .
Senegaal fof ena anndi maana ekipu mo Bopp , faayiida mum , nuunɗal mum .
Senegaal ne maa wood yahanɓe ɗum ngam tawtoroyeede , ɓeen ngoni Mati Joop , naɓokayanke Senegaalnaajo mo dokimanteer mum " Le Retour " kaaloowo ko fayti he gartirgol ngaluuji lawakeeji Abomey , Benin .
Senegaal ne wi’a " teranga " ko ɗum woni jaɓɓagol koɗo no haaniri non , Mali , " Jatigiya " , Koddiwaar " akwba " .
Senegaal wontii pijirgel e juuɗe cuklon !

Senngo e senngo won ɗo mbaawi addude guumu-gaamalde : seŋngo tugaaje ene sééri e senngo ( cengól ) mbabba !
Senngo kala suɓoo taartotooɗo gori maɓɓe ɗiɗi tawi ina reftireftina konngol gootol haa arta ɗo umminoo tawi foofaani walla fuujaaki yeru : " ɓir-mi ñalel ɓir-mi yumma mum , ɓir-mi koodel to dow too " , walla " mboɗo wuppa mboɗo bula , jontaaɗo ɓoornoo " .
Senngo ɗimmo ngoo ɗaɓɓi ko darnde ɓurnde tiiɗde geɗe PƊJ rewrude e kaaldigal .
Senngoor ɗo adan ɗoo yahdaano e jeytaare timmunde ɗoon e ɗoon , o ɓurnoo yiɗde ko jeytaare ardoore seeɗa seeɗa e daawal duuɓi noogaas .

Seppooji " ɓaleeɓe " wonduɓe e laamu nguu , hono " tukuloor UPR en " , ko seede majjum .

Serpent
Sete Moritani oo , arti ko ñalnde 18/12/2021 ummoraade to Maali .
Sete seppooɓe woɗɓe payi galle laamorɗo leydi Muritani ngam hollitde mette banndiraaɓe muritaninaaɓe waraaɓe .
Seteeji reenooɓe yirlotooɓe mbaɗaa he keeri diiwaan Barakna oo kala , tawi ko baɗɗiiɗi walla jahrooji koyɗe .
Seto mbarooɗe heewi renndinde ko ɗeye ɓurɗe jiidde , sabu seto hina heewi wonde keewɗe , wona joyi maa noogaas , kono ina teskaa heewaani ɓurde ɗoon .

Shingiti e hoore

Sibu , hay sinno Perseverance ine jogii laboratuwaar tokooso gaddanoowo ɗum waɗde silooji garwaniiji , deegowel ngel waɗii heen ko waawnoo fof .
Sibu , he hitaande 1979 laamu Muritani sosii Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ( DƊNG ) , ngam heblanaade ciynugol mbayliigu Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde ( TNJ ) tuugiingu he ɗemɗe ngenndiije , he hitaande 1985 , ngu halfini ɗum hoolkisaade jannginirgol fannuuji he nder ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof he denndaangal tolno jaŋde leslesre kam e jaŋde mawɓe , he nder daawal duuɓi jeegom .
Sibu , o idii fof ko dogde e maslahaa to Burunndi , e lewru feebriyee 2000 .
Sibu Gabon ene jogi ko wawi bhamtude dhum ha nannda e farayse walla america .

Sibu MAA nde ari he laamu hee sappinooma mahde kasooji e hebbinde ɗum en " mufsidiin " en .
Sibu alaa e sago Pulaar e ɗemngal mum yuɓɓinee , helmeeji mum taftee , tuugnorɗe ndañee ; tawa wonaa woni fof e yidde mum , e miijo men .
Sibu denndaangal ɗee jaaɓnirɗe " ɗe njoɓetaake " ɗe kuutorto-ɗen cikku-ɗon noon hol no ɗe nguurdi , hol to ɗe ndañata kaalis ?
Sibu e oon sahaa , wonnoo e rewo leydi hee ko amiraaji safalɓe , hono emiraa Tararsa e Barakna e Tagante e Adraar , cawndondirnooɗi , to bannge worgo , e dowlaaji ɓaleeɓe Tekruur e Ganaa e Jolof , ɗuum woni laamaandi Gidimaka e Fuuta Tooro e Ngalam e Waalo Barak , maantinirnooɗi , e nder jotondire mum en , kaɓɓondire heen sahaaji , kareeli heen sahaaji , tawi teskaaki jeyegol e safalɓe walla e ɓaleeɓe .

Sibu hay sinno wonaa Facebook huutorii keɓe maa , Google nana sakkii les ( Android ) ine huutoroo kabaruuji ( keɓe ) maa , ine naatana ñukkintooɗi he nder telefoŋ maa , ina humpitii kala to mbaaw-ɗaa yahde ; Amazon kadi ine anndi denndaangal ko meeɗ-ɗaa soodde ( ɗumɗoo noon ko wonande soodooɓe he nder Internet ) ; Microsoft ine aafa he masiŋ maa Tippudi Kuutordi ( Operating Sysytem ) tee ine humpitii kala ko ngolloto-ɗaa heen Ɗum noon hay so wonaa Facebook , ko en ñukkindaaɓe baŋ-yoo-baŋ , keɓe men , kabaruuji men inan kuutoree baŋ-yoo-baŋ ; kala ko njahaten , ko mbaɗaten , koko anndaa .
Sibu hay so a ƴettii Google , kañum ne ine anndi ko mbaɗataa .
Sibu huutoraade ɗemngal mum neeniwal he nder ekkagol ina wallita faamamuya , e kuñagol e cilgol .

Sibu maa ɗum battin e toɓooli , ɗum noon e coñal , ndeke e keɓagol nguura .
Sibu momtata bojji ko golle , golle e dow balle .

Sih
Sih Sammba meeɗaa woorde laawol ngol sehilaaɓe mum waaɓe no Kajjata Maalik Jallo daranii hannde ngol , haa nde maayi .
Sih-siiɓe ɓee ko iwdi Tallakoronaaɓe Siñcu bamammbe .
Siidi Mohamed Taayaa , 1990 haa 2005 o toɗɗenooma diisneteeɗo ñaawooje hono conseiller juridique .
Siidi S Jara woni Koroowo gaardinaaɗo ( vérificateur général ) nder leydi Mali .

So en nduttiima e keɓe capanɗejoyaɓiije , mboɗo sikki ko ustaare wonaa ɓeydaare .

So en ngaddaani ko yahdata e hannde oo , alaa e sago ɓesngu men woppat en .

So en ngartii e Alajji NJaay bannge mo o waawri gollanaade fulɓe fof , omo bismaa heen .
So en ngartii e haala puɗɗorino-ɗen , naamno-ɗen kadi " holi peeje pewjaaɗe ngam safrude ndee ñawannde urmbitteende kala nde artii nguu ñalngu potnoongu wonde ñalngu mbelemme , soko ngu golle ɗe peewaani mbaɗtani yoga e ɓiɓɓe leydi ñalawma sunu ?
So en ngartii e kelme gannde kese ɗee , ordinateer kadi eɗem heɓa ɗum : o " hooka " tan o saloo yahde haa wona .
So en ngartii e nder mbunndi-mbunndi ñalɗi pineyankooji ɗi : Ñalnde ñalawma gadano o no paamirton ñalnde 31 lewru Morso ko njanngu Quraana maa mbiyen silku deftere Allah seniinde nde to Galle Tijjaaniyankooɓe ( Galle Seek Tijjaani ) ɗum waɗata ko sahnga waktuuji sappo ( W10 haa W12 ) , rewa heen ƴaaƴo walla defile tuggoowo Debolemmbo ( Ammbaasadda ) Senegaal faya legal Komo , tawa joom mum en kaddotoo ko kaddule gaadanteeje walla aadayankooje e kesam kesemaaje Fulɓe ɗum ko sahnga waktuuji ( W15/W16 ) .
So en ngayniino hebbitinde , kaayitaaji ɗii mbaɗee e keesuuji , nawee e galleeji ( hade Fedde ndee dañde joɗnde ) walla joɗnde Fedde too ( tuggi 1984 ) , ɗo Mediina R ɗoo , ɗi ndenndinee , waɗee tumbitte , tumbitte , saree e nder cate Fedde ndee .
So en njawtii toon , en payii to wayluɓe .

So en njiɗaa yaajnaade tan mbiyeten ko kanko woni gooyal manngal ngal , gooyal goowuuji .
So en njiɗii faamde jeñtule ɗe laati-ɗen ndee yirwere fenndaande gila kadi ko ɓuri ɓooyde e ɗii kewuuji limtaaɗi , nder renndiwal men e sahaa nii haa yottii e nder won mbaykaaji fiɗtiwal men , alaa e sago , hay so ko e mbaadi famardi , ndiisnoɗen daartol men ; yoo won tan nii ngol-ɗoon dottangol e ndee taƴre leydi huufndi en gila nde naatan-ɗen ngal daawal tuma , laatiinde kaatane noknatiwe pasnooje fayannde men dartiweere .
So en njiɗii haalde oo jahɗo mo nawaani heewndu laakara , ena haani njubben he ngonka e jikkuuji makko .
So en njiɗii heewa ne en mballat mo e kattanɗe e doole e mbaawka laawde ko hatojinaa koo , ko timmi koo .
So en njiɗii jaŋtaade daartol Fuuta Tooro e yonta almamaagal , en njaltintu kaɓirɗe e kuutorɗe Sileymaani Baal haa waawi yandinde satigaagal , kolliren holi Sileymaani Baal ; cifo-ɗen no nguurndam fuutankooɓe woorunoo oon yonta , no ɓe njiyrunoo lefol satigeeɓe e no ɓe njaɓɓorii dillere Sileymaani Baal ( kitaale 1771 haa 1776 ) ;
So en njiɗii laɓɓitinde , mbele ko on jokkoode banndiraaɓe-juulɓe ɓe Ejipti , maa njuɓɓudi nanndo salafiyankooɓe , kettuki Sawuudiyankooɓe maa walla ɓurɗon huccude ko e mbaydi ɓurndi wellitaade yeru lannda islaamiyankeewa mo Turki , gonɗo hannde e jappeere ?
So en njiɗii wela en ngaddantu mo kala ko fotata welnude ɗum .
So en njiɗii yaltude e caɗeele , en njiɗondirat , niɗanondiren jam , nafondiren , ndenten , njanngen , liggo ɗen , mo woni kala , junngo mbeeɗen , kala heen jaɓɗo , e mum liggodo ɗen , maw-maw ngitten e koye men .
So en njonndiniima e heen ɗiɗi , ko jibinde annebi e iinnireede simoore e nder deftere Ɓuraana ndee .
So en njonndiniima haysinno ko e aaye Qur’aan pillotooɗo ɗuwaaw Ibraahm ( YKAWM ) duwinoo nde woppata Ismaa’iil e caaɗngol Makkah he nde , " Caaɗngol ngol alaa puɗe takko Suudu Ma Hurmanteeru " , ene holla en suudu nduu woni ɗoon ko adii Ibraahiim .
So en njooɗiima eɗen mbiya haa totte-ɗen geɗal men haa cay/bada en njogoraani heɓde .
So en teskiima , hay gootal e ɗemɗe ɓaleeɓe , Pulaar , Sooninkoore walla Wolof , laawɗinaaka he nder ɗeen kuule .
So en teskiima haa jooni ɗemɗe ɓaleeɓe ɗee kanum en cuwaa tawo laawɗineede he nder doosɗe leydi ndi .
So en teskiima wonnde jarribooji mbananooma he ko ɓenni hakke duuɓi noogaas , 1979-1999 , ma en mbiy mbele fayndaare ndee wonaa woosnude ɓaleeɓe ɓee e jaŋde arabeere tan caggal ɗuum kadi ɓe itta ɗiin jarribooji hono no ɓe ittirnooɗum ko yawti koo ni ?
So en tuugiima e ko haaletee e ko winndetee , ina gasa tawa ko yahdu Asiis .
So en tuugniima e hiisaaji cakkitiiɗi ɗii , ine hulaa no feewi nde yana e leydi men ñalnde 24 settaambar 2182 ( ɗoo e duuɓi 161 ) .
So en tuugniima e seneweb , nokkuɓe he Pape Abuu Soh , gooto e terɗe goomu yuɓɓo dillal ngal , seppo ngoo noon waɗoraani kisa , sabu perefee falnde ndee o holliri wonnde ñalawma hannde o , Hoore-biir , ko ñalawma mo golletaake , ɗuum noon o waawataa jaɓɓaadeɓe ngam heɓde nanondireewol ( mémorandum ) maɓɓe .
So en tuugniima he ɗiin jaayndeeji ko wayno Punch , wiy saabii .

So en ƴeewi
So en ƴeewi leyɗeele aduyankeeje jogiiɗe doole ɗee , woni leyɗeele dentuɗe e leydi Farayse e Angalteer mbaɗtindii ko ɓoortude paaɗe mum en to Afganistaa .
So en ƴeewi ma en njiy leyɗe Orop jiimnooɗe Afrik ɗee kala ngonnoo adan ko he njiimaandi Gerek e Rom , kono nde ɓe cortii he njiimaandi ɗeen leyɗeele ɓe ƴelliti ɗemɗe maɓɓe diiwanyankooje , woni neeniije maɓɓe ɗe ɓe kaalatno he nder diiwe maɓɓe walla mbiyen leyɗeele maɓɓe .
So en ƴeewii sarɗiiji lelnaaɗi ɗii , eɗen keewi yiyrude ɗum no fenaande fawaa e Fooyre nii .
So en ƴeewii ŋori leydi tolnde Farayse , njaaweendi yirlo ngoo ko hedde 1 100 km waktu kala ( 1 100 km/w ) , tolnde gulli too ( rewo e worgo ) njaaweendi yirlo ngoo ko hedde 3 km/w fat , kono tolnde ŋorol peccol ( yeru tolnde Koddiwaar ) njaaweendi yirlo ngoo ko hedde 1 600 km/w .
So en ƴeewrii mo to bannge fiɓnde , en tawat alaa mo o foti mawnude fiɓnde e dow laral leydi ndii .
So en ƴetti yeru he Suwis walla Liksammbuur , heen wootiri kala maa won ɗemɗe tati ene njangee heen .
So en ƴetti yeru tan e defterdu Cordoba ( Kordoba ) ene wiyee ene waɗnoo hakke 400 , 000 deftere .
So en ƴettii jeloode keewal yimɓe , pulfule baawooje wootiɗinde ko pululal Fuuta Jaloŋ ( aɓe millaa he miliyoŋaaji 5 haalooɓe pular ) , e Aadamaawa ɗo haalooɓe pulaar ceɓɓitii , ina keewi calti pulfule .
So en ƴettii wuro Oyem wuro worgo leydi ndi , e nder ujunere , teemedde tati , capanɗe jeeɗiɗi e jeenayi ( 1 379 ) almuudo maa kanndidaa ƴamatnooɗo foomnaade Bak fiya e leydi ko capanɗe jeeɗiɗi e jeegom ( 76 ) tan keɓi heen hawra 5 , 6% .
So en ƴettii yeru William Tyndale ( 1494-1536 ) gadinooɗo firde Bible he ɗemngal Engele o , o wardaa ko duppere .
So en ƴettii yeru tan baɗɗo to maɓɓe too , leydi Farayse , hol ko addani Jacques Chirac e Nikolas Sarkosi noddeede Polis yo njaaɓto naamne kuccinaaɗe e mum en etee ɗum joofi ko kamɓe fof ɓe ñaawaa .
So en ƴettii yeru tan tawi en ngoɗɗoyaani , ɗoo he Muritani , yoga e sosiyeteeji uddii , sarwisaaji laamu ina caɗti yettaade , wuurnooɓe e ndoolon mum en , so wonaa ngolli ñaamataa ( fitiram golleeɓe , restoraaji , yeeyooɓe ko wonaa nguura , jehe ) .
So en ƴettitii yeru ɗo Naange tiɗɗaa haa heƴti e faandu ndu wudduwol mum jaasi kilomeeteer gooto .
So en ɓadiima-ɓe , maa-taw ma en ɓeydo faamde-ɓe haa njiyten heen safaara " .

So jalɓol ngol
So jalɓol ngol maayii , ngol yaltida e jaañte .

So joom mum jalaani ne , keewɗen ko jalnude ɗum .
So joom mum wondaani e rafi jabet ene waawi ɓeydude heen suukara seeɗa , haa yaroo , sabu won no fasirata , ene heewi haaɗde seeɗa .
So joom mum yarii ɗum tan dañat jam .
So joomum en ɓee njerondiraama , yimɓe ina mbaawi ŋabbitde haa to fuɗde tagoore ndee .
So junngo ñaamo mottii , junngo nano weñcitat mottol ngol .
So juutnaaka , ene waawi addude caɗeele heen sahaaji : suudu ndu njiimi ndu so winndiraama suudu ndu njiimi nduu ɓurata feewde sabu ndu gadano oo e ndu baɗtindiiɗo oo ngonaa góóti .
So juutnaaka , ndu relatif e ndu article , so en kaalii farayse , ceerataa .
So ka ɓuriino ɗoon toowde nii , aka waawi majjude e gite maa , sabu ka famɗitat .
So ka ɓuriino ɗoon towwde ni aka waawi majjude e gite ma sabu ka famɗitat .
So kaatane njarii gosi , ndeenduñtooɓe laaɓata .
So kawle mbeetoyii , yarkomaa duñii , ilam wonii e bippitde ko ɗoon woni ɗo golle joom njinndaangu e yahdiiɓe ngarata .

So koode ngonɗe e kommbol maayde kalitii , ɗe njaltinta ko geɗe ñisɗe .
So koohoowo o yiyii ngal seedaamfaagal , o nodda dokkaaɗo leydi yo siif kaayit kunagol mum , ko adii nde rokketee luɓal leydi e mudda , hormaade sarɗiiji parliiɗi e dokkirgol luɓal leydi e mudda .

So laamu Sira Liyon ummaniima haɓaade ngu ñawu , Alla e sago hare ndee yahda e hokkude ñaawooɓe ndimaagu e doole tawa ena mbaawu rewnude terɗe laamu nguu e laawol .
So laana arii saraaji mum ina doga e laawol mum portingol , gawu nguu fooɗa ɗum , ooña bolol mum , laana kaa naata e yiriinde , ka yirloo , ka yirloo , haa ka yettoo wuddu gawu nguu , ka muta .
So leydi Senegaal suɓaama , wadi noon ko eɓe njiɗi teeŋtinde ko waɗdanoo Tenerife ( Espaañ ) e hitaande 2006 , kadi e dawrugol Senegaal no yuɓɓiri caggal leydi .
So leydi ndii fof renndii , jeeri e waalo heɓondirii labangal wontii gootal ko Abdul bookar Kan laamii leydi ndii .
So leydi waɗii yiiloo-banngoo , ko ɗum waɗata jamma e ñalwma ndeggondirde .
So leydi yiyotaako sabu famɗeende , en cuusaa miijaade yiilaade kaaƴe men ɗe , nyiibi ɗi saka noon neɗɗo !
So leydi yiyotaako sabu famɗeende , en cuusaa miijaade yiilaade kaaƴe men ɗee , ñiibi ɗii , saka noon neɗɗo !
So leñol ngol nanii ɗum tan , ɓe njalta e galleeji maɓɓe ɓe ngona e werlaade mo kaaƴe e paɗe ha o waɗta mogginaade .
So leñol waasii ɗemngal mum waasii neɗɗaagal mum .
So lor ɗaɓɓii , kiliifa njuɓɓudi laamu oo , fawaade e yiyannde mum ina waawi raɓɓiɗinde lajal ngal .
So luural ɓilinooma hakkunde ma makko e neɗɗo o hersataano ruttaade e yaafnaade so o faamnaama ko o juumɗo .
So mawɗo leydi arii , jooɗodiima waali wuo en , jooɗodoo kadi e juɓɓule ɗanniyankooɓe jeyaaɓe e nokku oo .
So mbaroodi yaltinaama seto mum , ko heege idatoo tampinde ɗum .
So mbaroodi yanii e seto foolii ngo , idatoo ko yande e deye ɗee .
So mbaroodi yanii e seto foolii ngo , ngordi maggo jaɓii foolaama .
So mboɗo yaha maayo , mi nawora moolo am .
So mbuuɗu nguu nattii yiyeede hedde futuro , mbiyen naange mutii .
So medelaaji paaɗi ɗii mbaɗii kameraaji keewɗi , e oon sahaa yimɓe heewɓe maa mbaaw nande , tawa ko suɓtaaɓe he nder yimɓe heewɓe .

So mi barminii mi haamtoo .
So mi ejii dille mum ,
So mi fuɗɗóriima binndól : Bonko Bonko .
So mi hulaani mi wiya ko ndeen tonngoode ɓuri tonngooɗe Fooyre fof ŋarɗude .
So mi ummiima hannde huccude e ngoo renndo ngo nganndu-ɗaa , en fof , ko aldaa e paltoor , ko en ɓiɓɓe mum , e , rewrude he hakkillo maggo , teskaade njaanjeendi mum , e heewandere eddaaji mum , haaldude e gooto e men kala , addi ɗum , gaa-gaa dallinde ɗum , ko pekkoram ngonka ngonaaka kaa .
So mi waawno tottude jawdi am ndii fof ngam ɓiɓɓe am ɓee celle , maa mi waɗatno ɗum .
So mi wiyaama ko mi senndikaalista tiiɗɗo ñiƴre , ɗuum mboɗo jaɓa .
So mi wiyii rokkude wune noon , sikke alaa wonaa ko heewi naneede koo .
So mi yejjitaani , ko ngolɗo lefol jime pulaar adii fiileede .
So mi yimii .
So mi ɓalliima faandu nduu , alaa ko heedi mi e wuddu ( nehaande ) mum so wonaa ko jaasi 3 km , mi rullinaama , mi jookiima .
So min kooti galle , min njannginat kaaltantu jignaaɓe amen ngam daɗndude koreeji e ñabbuuli keewɗi .
So min njiyii , min cuusna joom mum en .
So minene Sokabhe hande ganndi Bustafa Boli , Murtodho , Ibrahima Sarr senior balalma ene hen sibuma takkade sukabhe bhe .
So naalankooɓe mawɓe wayɓe no Alhajji Baaba Baydi Maal e Usmaan Hammadi Joop walla no sukaaɓe jabbaaɓe heptinaaɓe wayɓe no Raasin Jah ( R .
So nagge barkinii soñca , so ngesa moƴƴi soñca , mayo ne ronkataa fiydude ñalaaɗe coñcuɗe .
So nanondiral peccitagol ngol dañaaka , ko laamu foti feccitaade leydi ndii so tawi deeƴre nder renndo hee ina ɗaɓɓi ɗuum .
So nate ɓosooje ɗee neldaama e laylayti renndo hee , haa yettiima juuɗe amen , min cummbat , min cajoo , sabu amen dañde ko min ndallinirani njaatigeeɓe amen ɓee , mette guuraaɗe sahre amen .
So ndee faandaare yettaaka , tijjooɓe ina ɗaminii dumunnaaji nguleeki ɓurtuki ɓurɗi heewde e juutde .
So ndeen yontii noon , joom mum fuɗɗoo kañum ne ardinde haaju mum oo e dow kala ko wonaa ɗuum .
So ndi wonii e taaraade naange , ko ndeen ceeɗu e dabbunde e demminaare e ndunngu e kawle ndeggondirta haa leydi arta ɗo wonno wona hitaande .
So ndu yiɗiino taccude duunde nde , ndiyam ɗam diwataano mo koppi .
So nduttima ko adii ɗuum , Alla ko jurmotooɗo jaafotooɗo .
So neɗɗo bettii Eli ena holla weltaare mum ko hakkeeji mooliiɓe puɗɗii lijjiteede koo , so haawaaka ne maa miijto ko ɓenni .
So neɗɗo dariima e Duunde Gore , hakkille artata ko e njeeygu Ɓaleeɓe .
So neɗɗo dañii heen wisii e mburu ene wallita e safaara kaa .
So neɗɗo meereejo finii tan naatii he nder layti renndo ƴattiima leñol Fulɓe , yoo sukaaɓe nele ƴattoo ɗum , So jaayndiyanke walla jaaynde finii wiy ene aybina Fulɓe yoo jaayndiyankooɓe Fulɓe e annduɓe men tuubakiri mbinndu njaaboo , tawa ene mbaawi fennude walla suutude oon ayiiba lomtina ɗoon teddungal .
So neɗɗo noddaama e yannge yo o nootoyo , so o yiɗii o ñaama , so tawii ko koorka yarlitaare , walla o duwanoo yannge ngee tan o hoota , ngam konngol nulaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) wiyiinoo : " so gooto e mon noddaama e yannge yo o nooto , so o hooraani yo o ñaam .
So neɗɗo noddii Alla renndidinii mo e goɗɗo o ɗaccida mo e koo renndidini mo ko .
So neɗɗo o heɓii rafi o , ina waawi raaɓde ko yaawi goɗɗo , ƔiiƔam , tuute , waaƔo e ko ummii e dafaaɗo fof ina raaɓa .
So neɗɗo pinal sankiima , ko Enen kala ustoraa , ko neɗɗo galle men maayi .
So neɗɗo remaani , yaha ko ɓuri casol mum woni taƴde jolɗe ina ɗaɓɓoya ko wuurdi .
So ngaal daawal ɓennii , rewata heen ko cargol jaaynde ndee e njeeygu mum , catal Nuwadiibu e gardagol Aamadu Saydu Kan jeyanoo ko e cate ɓurɗe waawde yeeyde Fooyre e yaawde neltirde kaalis , kono kadi en njejjitaani catal Kayhayɗi e gardagol Sammba Gata Bah e goɗɗe e goɗɗe .
So ngal kalitii , ngam bonnat ko taarii ɗoon kala he nder kiloometeruuji keewɗi .
So ngal ɓennii toon , ko ndeen Abdullaay Wade suɓotoo mo yiɗani e mo yiɗi .
So ngarii kadi kolla koye mumen .
So ngel maayii , wuro ngoo wontaa yoɓde ngel .
So ngel majjii , hay huunde lomtotaako darnde ngel darinoo ndee , callalal ngal taƴii .
So ngol gasii feewneede maa ngol newnu kuunugol 4G e 5G , kam e internet waamo toowngo .
So ngol gasii maa ngol maa ɓeydu waamo internet doŋre Afrik ndee , sibu anniya joom en ɓoggol ngol , ko yo waamo maggol ɓurto waamo ɓoggi kuuɓnanooji Afrik internet hannde ɗii fof so ndenndii .

So ngol waraaka , ko toon tan ngol heddotoo e reedu njaatige hee , ngol yaltintaa hoore maggol .
So ngoonga nih , ina woɗɗi ɗuum , ko ɗum daawal muusngal , kaaɓningal naatowal e silsil juutɗo muuseele bonɗe ɗe laamu Senegaal waɗi !
So nguun goomu woodaani , aɗen mbaawi jokkondirde e fedde haɓantooɓe potal ɗemɗe ngenndiije Senegaal to haalirde e ayaawo ngenndi .
So nii nattaani , ene waawi tawa janngo ko " holi ko haɗi en wonde Seneraaluuji , walla ardiiɓe jaagorɗe , ekn " .
So niɓɓiɗii , kala higgeere ina hasii tawata ko jaawle ngoni ɗoon , ɓe pella ɗoon .
So nokkuji ɗiɗi ngonaani e ŋorol gootol , njuuteeki ñalawmaaji majji potataa .
So noon , jom-galle ene waawi winndireede kadi jom galle , e fawaade e ko haalaa dów koo .
So o dañii fijirde , min naatata ko nder suudu mi wiya mo ko nii walla nii .
So o gasnii o haɓɓa ɓoggol e koyɗe mayri walla e koyɗe kullel ngel , o yalta o yamira wonɓe boowal ɓee yo pooɗ .
So o heddiima ɓalndu mehru , ko ndeen o waawata faamondirde e jawdi ndi o reenata ndi .
So o javaani fondation joom suusu makko yuurnee , won ko tunwi heen .
So o jaɓaama heen aɗa waawi fuɗɗaade firde , walla ngonaa e e wootde , woni ƴeewaa ko firaa koo , suɓo-ɗaa heen ko ɓuri hawrande ma , mbele Facebook ina ɗisa ɗuum e ciŋkal mum ( mbele Facebook ina teskoo ngoon firo ngo o sikki ɓuri sellude ngoo , sibu Facebook suɓotoo ko kelme ɓurɗe wootaneede ) .
So o jaɓiino ɗuum o waasatno ngenndiyaagal makko Muritani ngal , o wonta ginenaajo .
So o jooɗiima e nder laana kaa , laana kaa dillaani , yerɓaani , ena yaha yahdu feewdu , o sikkata ko ka ndariika , tawi noon e nder waktu fof a ka yaha ko ɓuri 400 km !
So o seertii e comci noon wayi kono o ruttiima e no tagiranoo adan nii , no mbiyru-ɗen adan , nde neɗɗo feeñata nde .
So o udditaani ne o fawii ɗoon haayre , ɗuum wona eɓɓoore nde laamu nguu fodani joom mum en maa waɗe , foti gasi ko e taweende makko walla ko e laamu woɗngu ngaroowu .
So o ummiima he yahde , yimɓe senngo makko mbiya " yumma yahii , yoo jaaƴo , yumma yahii , yoo jaaƴo " .
So o waawaa haalande ma ko laaɓi , hoto sar .
So o waɗaani , alaa fof ko mbaaw-ɗen e makko , kadi alaa fof ɗo siifaa alaa e sago o waɗana pulaar , alaa fof ɗo diidaa eɗen njogii e makko ñiŋoore so wonaa ko ɓerɗe men ɗee ena calii kala mo ciku-ɗen ena waawi , waɗaani .
So o waɗii ɗuum , Kala ko woni e ladde nde wontat jeyi makko .
So o welaama tan , hannde hannde , jeewte kuuɓtodinɗe jowitiiɗe e koɗdigal hakkunde leƴƴi leydi ndii ina mbaawi waɗeede .
So o woni e nder dingiral , o holla giƴiraaɓe makko ko kanko ɓuri ɗumen jawdi .
So o wottiima kadi o hirndayoo , ko hiraande tan artirta mo .
So o woyii yumma oo ummo .
So o wuurii tan nguura maa dañee .
So o yahii , ɗaccen foondu riddanoondu nduu , nduun ne artira cellal maa .
So o yahii dey a jinndat !
So o yaltii o yima , miin mi suusaa yimde e nder yimɓe .
So o yettiima boowal diwooje o joɗɗintu kaake ɗee tan dow tappi hee , o joloya .
So o yiyataa boowal oto ngal , ina gasa o sikka oto oo dogaani .
So o ñawi o nawamo galle doktoor .
So omo ñoha , o ɗalata ko haa o faya e waɗde mago , tawa ko e tawtoreede arɓe yeeɓde e heɗaade mo fof .
So on kulii waasde nuunɗude , kaaɗee e gooto walla he horɓe mon .
So on luurdoyii daña ko aybinir maa , ngati so fowru riddii sagata yiyi ko e jaɓɓal mum .
So on mballii kam firde ɗum e Pulaar maa mi eto yaajnaade heen laawol goɗngol , e ballal Alla .
So on mbaɗaani ɗuum , ko fitina e e bonannde mawnde he leydi hee mbaɗ-ɗon " Humpiti ndeeɗoo jangtoore ko Tirmisiyu .
So on ndaňii mbaɗdee e makko yeewtere .
So on ɗoofiima kam , mi naamndaaki on njoɓdi , waɗi noon njoɓdi am paw-mi ɗum ko e Alla .
So oto oo ruŋtimaa jamma , hay huunde yiꞌetaake e makko .
So pelle gure , so pelle pinal , so pelle jokkere enɗam , so pelle ngam jaŋde e gostondiral miijooji , kala ɗo mbaaw-ɗen yahde , njiilondiren , njiytondiren , njokkondiren , juɓɓule mbaɗen , miijooji ƴellitooji ngostondiren , kono kadi , tawa en ndugdaani , GOONGA , KAALDEN .
So pesooɗe ngaddaama , maa tawe wonaa 2 e 3 tan cééri , hay 1 won ko sóómi :
So pulaar naatii e Internet hannde ko sabaabu nde mon , sagataabe lenyol , dariibe jamma e nyalawma , doganoobe lenyol e naange , e nder tobo e jaangol won'dude e kala lor .
So puɗi e leydi , wonaa tan nattii moɗde karbon , ko mabɗtii kam en e koye mum en wukkitde karbon , ɗum firti tan ko ɗi njantii e ɓeydooji nguleeki : geɗe tati ine njeyaa e gadduɗe ɗum : cumuuji , ɓeydagol nguleeki e bonnugol dunli ngol rewaani laawol ngam lomtinirde ɗum en jofanuuji jawdi e gese ndema .
So renndo janngaani , ko jannguɓe woɗɓe ngarata laamoo ngo , keedta e faayidaaji maggo .
So renndo janngaani nuskat , wonata ko renndo huutorteengo , nde tawnoo ngo yooltotoo ko e dummbuli humambinnaagal e majjere ɓurtunde .
So rewve Fuuta ina ndeeni maa wollay maa a anndu sabu keer men .
So riiwaama e dental heewi wuurde ko e kedde , ko weeɓaani ko e renndo pobbi so ko kedde .
So sanɗaaji ndillii , Biraam nootiima ; so " Touche pas à ma nationalité " ummiima , Biraam ko dariiɗo ; so luulndo noddii , Biraam ko keɓiiɗo , so haala warngooji e ñaawgol warkoyeeɓe haalaama , ɗum tawrataa Biraam ɗoyngol .
So soofaaji ɓanndu ndonkanii mboros oo , o ɓeydoo naatde haa teeŋti noon he ɓeen ɓe ɓalli mum en ndonkiti sabu ñabbuuli goɗɗi , hono ñawu ɓernde e jabet e nayewu .
So suka yaltii galle fayata ko dingiral e saraaji dingiral , o tawa toon jimɗi e tinndi e daari e cifti e nganiika ( wonannde ekkotooɓe haalde tawi puujaaki ) e ganooje payka e puri e pabbooje , tawi ɗum fof ko mbunndi mbinndi coñce men jaŋtaaɗe ; yanta e pijirlooji men ɗi nganndu-ɗaa ko ɓaggorde heblo sukaaɓe , ina mballa suka no naatiri he aduna e no hisirta e boomooje e moobooje .
So tabiti eɓe njeyaa heen , aɓe mbaawi taƴaneede ko famɗi fof duuɓi 20 nder niɓɓuru , ina waawi yahde noon haa ñaaweede warngo .
So tagoodi tagtiima huunde noon , ndeen huunde wontii goɗɗum .
So tawaama omo wodi heen , woto o hul , ko rafi tan no rafiiji fof nii .
So tawi ZMapp waawii foolde rafi o , ko maa ko heewi feewnee , ɗuum noon naamndii ko ngalu mawɗo .
So tawi eɓɓindiraama e alkamesaare ɓenunde ndee , limoore maɓɓe wonno ko ujune teemɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe jowi .
So tawi mi waɗɗinii e dow mon ko mbaɗɗin-mi e maɓɓe koo to bannge ngena , mi hoddirii e mon ko koddir-mi e maɓɓe koo e goofi , maa on mbaɗ ko ɓuri mawnude e ko ɓe mbaɗata to bannge goofi " .
So tawi welaani mo , hay gooto oo ɗaccata ƴooga ndiyam .
So tawi ɓe caliima , hol no sehilaaɓe maɓɓe ɓee paamirta ɗum ?
So tawii " dokkitgol muritaninaajo neɗɗaagu mum " yiyranoo ko e yeeso toɗɗaade kadi denndaangal leƴƴi ɓaleeji Muritani , maa pellital politik ngal yettotono laawɗingol , no Arab laawɗiniraa nii , e janngingol e ekkolaaji laamu hee , ɗemɗe keddiiɗe ɗee , hono Pulaar e Sooninke e Wolof .
So tawii Laamɗo jaɓii maa Jaaynde Pulaagu .
So tawii a ruttiima toon , njamiraa ko
So tawii aɓe ngonndi e dawaaɗi , kala jaawngal pellangal saami reegi , dawaaɗi ɗii ngabboo ngartira .
So tawii aɗa huuɓni won ɗiin sarɗiiji , aɗa waawi gollaade haa duuɓi 67 walla keɓaa paasiyoŋ ɓurɗo famɗude ngam faddanaade ma baasal .
So tawii battindiiɗo e hoorooɓe oo naatii , ngaal damal uddaama .
So tawii bayɗo no am nih ko hande jibinaa , en kawrii heen e mawɓe wuurɓe haŋki e hande .
So tawii en naatoyii nder mbunndi mbunndi leydi maa en taw kadi ellee ko toon laƴal ɓuri daasiraade ngati alaa fof purgaaɗo .
So tawii en nduttiima e ngooɗoo miijo , eɗen nganndi miijo diineeji men gadani won ko mbelsindi-ɗen heen .
So tawii en njuurnitiima haala ka , ma en nganndu , nde neɗɗo feeñi wonaani hay dara nde , wayi tan kono fittaandu heddiindu e ɓalndu mehru .
So tawii eɓe cabbii e kuugal CC , firti ko ma ɓe keftin ko taƴa .
So tawii fedde ina woodi , waɗa sahaa , goɗɗo arditoo ɗum , mbele renndo ina waawa nawrude ɗum yeeso .
So tawii fereyon gontuɗo ndeelam o yottiima puufri ( détendeur ) arata ko ina ɓittaa no feewi ina yiyloo no yawtiri e nder guccurol he , puufri ndi waɗi ko wuddere faaɗnde fuufa ndeelam ɗam yawta to cuurkol ( évaporateur ) ina wonti henndu , nde wonnoo e dummbo e nder guccurol cuurkol ina famɗi semmbe , ɗuum addanta ndeelam ɗam suurkude wonta henndu .
So tawii fulɓe ina njiɗi Google wona e Pulaar/Fulfulde tan , wonat jooni jooni , fawii tan ko e coftal maɓɓe e heɓaare maɓɓe e yarlitaare maɓɓe .
So tawii galle oo ina waɗi tugaaje tati maa nay ɗe tiiɗaani , so kullel bonnowel arii ko ɗeen tugaaje ñawɗe liɓata rewa ɗoon naata nder galle .
So tawii goonga haalaama , Wadd ɓooyii e hoore laamu nguu sanne .
So tawii hannde , renndo ngo woyii haame , holi to alɗuɓe , yontaaɓe maggol , ɓe min kaari innɗe mumen ngoni : Aliw Arɗo Saajo’en , Siley Gise’en , and Baaba Maal’en ( Oo ngenndiyanke kam etinooma kono holi ko teppi ɗum eɓɓo makko , so uure ina heen yoo haale yimɓe ngannda ) , Kaalidu Jeŋ’en e woɗɓe e woɗɓe .
So tawii ilam hillii Abdul heeɗtii Daabiya ( bannge worgo ) , Ilam seerndii jeeri e waalo Farmbaal heedi ko rewo .
So tawii janngude ɗemngal makko neeniwal ngal faanditanoo heen ko udditde hakkille makko , tabitinde jokkondiral galle e duɗal , ngel ɓeydoo waawde ɗemngal maggel , suusnora ngel kadi lekkol .
So tawii kadi duddu ene moccatnoo deedi ƴuufooji , yo waɗ ko ɗoomtinta ndu mum .
So tawii kadi ko jogiiɗo caɗeele dolgol walla dolngo , omo waawi ɓeydude heen kudduyel njuumri e limoŋ .
So tawii kay leyɗeele jokkondiraaɗe ɗee , kuutoriima ɗum no haanirta nii , sibu eɗen nganndi , yeru tan e Muritani , hey kattanɗe ɓoggol ACE goodngol hannde ngol ine ngoɗɗi huutoreede e naftoreede , ko ɗuum nii tagi haa hannde leydi ndii ruuddata ko e 3G leefɗo boom .
So tawii kay ɗum firtaani fedder ndee .
So tawii ko Yeewtere Awluɓe " Yeela " , nde jibnaaɗo men Salli Gawlo Sek , ndeen ko yontere fof laawol go’tol , ndeen nii boom hiisetaake , sabu ko ngenndiyanke go’to gaddii kisal mayre .
So tawii ko a Ameriknaajo peewnoowo simbisaaji , aɗa hatojini e bagiiji Siin , aɗa waawi soodde oon bagi ko ɓuri tiiɗde , sibu Trump ɓeydii kubbal ngal ( ko ɓurtata e coggu hee koo naatata ko e booñ laamu Amerik ) , walla ƴeewaa jeeyoowo bagi goɗɗo , ɓuri yiɗeede noon ko mo njiidu-ɗaa leydi .
So tawii ko aadi , ko cakkal e pawal ngam suuraare terɗe wonnoo , hannde wontii laɓel dannga jeewo galle ngam suurtaare majje .
So tawii ko almudaagal makko ngay , naatni mo heen ko Demmba Daawuuda to Aañam Liiduɓe to Senegual .
So tawii ko ceeɗu , ɗii keewi ko nanngude lappi ɗii tiindo tufle , e cewle , e gure hiɗi njiiloo ko ɗi mbonni .
So tawii ko connexion baawɗo yaade e réseau sociaux .
So tawii ko debbo desaaɗo kadi gollaaki o naatirta ko ujunnaaje ɗiɗi e teemedde nayi mbuuɗu , o fiyataa lewru kono hitaande maaynde fof omo fiya teemedde nayi mbuuɗu coggu kartal ngal e kala fotde nde tergal Fedde nde jogii omo jogii ko foti noon .
So tawii ko debbo gollanoowo ho’re mum naatirta ko ujunnaje ɗiɗi e teemedde nayi mbuuɗu , lewru fof omo fiya teemedde ɗiɗi mbuuɗu " .
So tawii ko e salligi ngonɗaa , jokku e jamaa .
So tawii ko feere dampirde hesere ndee huutoraa , eɗen mbaawi yettaade toon e nder duuɓi 600 ɗanngal .
So tawii ko goonga maayɓe ene njiya wuurɓe , oon ñalawma Sammba Caam , Tijjani Aan , Alhajji Ngayde e Aamadu Tijjaani Baal en ndañii weltaare .
So tawii ko haaldude sibu Allah nii jimɗi Baaba Maal alaa heen kaasteteengol .
So tawii ko he leydi , a loowat kuɓɓam tan nde gasi fof .
So tawii ko ina daɗoo , daɗa heen .
So tawii ko karallaagal goodangal hannde ngal huutoraa , ko famɗi fof maa en mbaɗ 60 000 hitaande ngam yettaade Proxima B , " funeere Leydi " ɓurnde ɓadaade en .
So tawii ko koyɗe maa ngidii naatde wuddere ɓaleere ndee , geɗel idotoongel kewde ko , sabu caasgol ɓaaƴo ngoo , aan fof , gila e koyɗe haa hoore , a silkitto .
So tawii ko mboombiri , tawa kadi keedo oo ko baaba makko , omo diisnoo mo , so tawii noon ko diwo walla mboombiri mawndi , so wonii keedo oo wonaa baaba makko jibinɗo mo , ngam konngol nulaaɗo ( JKM ) .
So tawii ko neɗɗo , arda hoore , daande hela , walla leltoo e junngo , fokkitoo .
So tawii ko noon ndeke , suuɗaaki wonan’de kala joom hakkille miijtotooɗo wonnde ndee feere araani wallude ɗemɗe ngenndiije kono ari tan ko jokkitde nuskugol ɓaleeɓe e pinal mum he nder Muritani , hono no ɓaleeɓe nuskiraa he nder leyɗeele Arabeeɓe aduna o kala ni .
So tawii ko noon wadde , eɗen mbaawi wiyde garaangal Hooreejo leydi o , Makki Sal he nder Fuuta won nafoore yiyaa heen .
So tawii ko noon yimiyanke oo heɓiri , o heewi ko addirde noon yimre ndee , walla tawa kanko e hoore makko fewji nde .
So tawii ko to Atlantik rewo walla to Pasifik rewo guubiliiji ɗii mbiyetee ko Uragaa ( Ouragan ) ; so tawii noon ko to Pasifik hirnaange rewo wiyee Tifoŋ ( typhon ) .
So tawii ko to bannge diine , ɗaccee jinaa e naafigaacal hakkunde jamaa hade mon wide yoo seleeji amen taƴe .
So tawii ko wolde nikleyeer hakkunde Riisi/DDA ( Dental dowlaaji Amerik ) e kalitgol 4 400 kaɓirgal , maa maaje ɗee njooɗo duuɓi capanɗe keewɗe ngam artude no ngoorunoo .
So tawii ko ɓe Juif , wona ko ɓe njiggiiɓe ɗemngal .
So tawii ko ɓeen ŋakki , holi to Siley Njaay , Yero Umaar Jallo , Abuu Joop , Buubakaar Bah , Hammee Aamadu Lih , Abdullaahi Hammadi Saar , Umaar Barka Baal , Jeewo Sal , Umaar Dooro Kume en ngoni e nder duunde Baaba Aadama nde ?
So tawii ko ɗiin dalillaaji o rokki ndaw ko haawnii , nde haawaani Allah .
So tawii ko ɗum waɗi ɓe wiyde ko mi neɗɗo Alfaa Konnde , ɗum alaa ko mbaaw mi heen , sabu wonaa neɗɗo suɓantoo hoyre mum yettoode mum .
So tawii kuulal 68 no kuulal 93 nii , cosiraa ko yo ñaaw gardiiɗo leydi e sahaa nde tuumaa waɗii " jamfa mawka " ko wayi no : taƴde hettere leydi ngenndi mum yeeya ɗum , yuɓɓinde pollugol laamu ( coup d’Etat ) , sirrande arani en sirruuji jowitiiɗi e kisal leydi ekn ittataa , gardiiɗo leydi so tawii waɗii bonannde nde " sariya denndaaɗo " foti ñaawde , ñaawa ɗum , yeru , so tawii gardiiɗo ina wujja jawdi leydi , walla ina yeeya dorog , ina totta ɓesngu mum jawdi leydi tawa rewaani laawol , ina wara yimɓe ekn tawi ɗumɗoon fof naworaani golle laamu ɗe halfinaa ɗee , ko innde hoore mum e jubbol mum kañum tan , hol ko haɗata ñaawirɗe gaadoraaɗe ñaawde ɗum ?
So tawii laamu mahiingu dow ngoo-ɗoo renndo , dow ko anndaa he maggo gila e njaajeendi ganni maggo , haa e luggiɗeeki daartol maggo e heewandere pine e ɗemɗe ɗe ngo fiɗɗitorii , sinkorii , so ngu innanooma Muritani ko hasiinde daartol , fellitii , e dow hujjaaji niɓɓi , moggaaɗi , mahtaade yirwere maggo ngonkiweere , oon sahaa mbiy-mi en naatanii fekkuru hulɓiniindu jogorndu joltinde tanaaji ɗi en meeɗaano tawo seedaade .
So tawii laatiima oɗon nganndi lewru Ramadaan ko e nder mum ɓuraana jippii , peewal wonande yimɓe e peeñɗi ummoraade e peewal e furkhaana , kala e mon jiyɗo lewru yo hoor ndu .
So tawii leydi ndii gollaaka e oon mudda e ndi waawi teetteede , joomum kadi dañataa rokkeede ndi pandungal .
So tawii leydi ndii heɓtaama , alaa ko joom mum lomtinantee , so tawii alaa ko tawaa e nder lowre ndee , ko wayi no ko aawaa , walla mahdi walla gollirɗe .
So tawii leñol Fulɓe ina yiɗi heƴde e aduna , e wiɗtooji ngonka leƴƴi e adaaji mum en , alaa e sago ndarano ɗum wiɗtude e winndude , e reftaade mbaydiiji pinal men kala .
So tawii min ƴettii ngenndaagu Farayse ko sabu ngonka politik ndiddunooka min e leydi amen kaa , haa arti noon e warngooji 1989-1991 .
So tawii nanondiral heɓaaka , ñaawoowo oo foti ko yowde ñaawoore ndee , ɗaɓɓira ñaawdooɓe ɓee yo ndutto to ñaawirde taƴnde sañ ñawndude ngaal luural gadingal .
So tawii nde o juuti nguurndam fof ɗum ina ɓeydoo ( so mi wiyii neɗɗo noon ko e mbaydi timmundi , ɗum ko yimɓe fof ) , wonaa kaari , walla kaari , alaa ko neɗɗo o .
So tawii neɗɗo
So tawii neɗɗo nde tagaa nde won ko waɗaa e mum seeɗa wiyatee ko neɗɗaagal ( aawdi neɗɗaagal ina e makko ) .
So tawii ngaybintaa koko ɗakkii walla ko ɗakkaa e huunde , oon ɗoon fiyaaku so tawii ko miin waɗatnoo ɗum , ndeen mi suɓotaako wonde rawaandu , waɗi noon baɗɗo ɗum oo waɗata ko ko welaa .
So tawii njiiduɗen miijo ko e oo Fuutaŋke , muynuɗo pulaar , ruttii wóni ɗemɗiyaŋke , bójji men ɗii ene fóti mbaɗtee hakkille .
So tawii noon ko e peccol rewo ( peccol ngon-ɗen ngol ) ɗe njirlortoo ko bannge luutndiiɗo njamkon montoor ( ñaamo feewde nano ) .
So tawii noon ko ko fayti e ngenndiyanlooɓe men , ellee won heen ko ronkuɓe faamde nii ko woni darnde mumen , haa kala ɗo njooɗii , wonaa ko ene kaalana en ko deeƴata e hakkillaaji , alaa , kaalanta en ko holi kanum en .
So tawii noon ko sarɗi bonnoowo dewgal oon jaɓetaake .
So tawii noon ko ñiire dow , ko o moññi koo waawaa fawaade heen , o waɗat korompolle oo he ndiyam pasɗam .
So tawii noon njaabtori-ɗaa ko cinndel , njoɓataa tan ko ko ngoowno-ɗaa yoɓde ko .
So tawii noon won ko tawa heen , kanko jooɗiiɗo e leydi hee , maa o lomtinanaama fere makko , so tawii kay ɓuranaani mo firtude walla ɗoofde ko o aawnoo koo , walla ko o mahnoo heen koo , ko kaŋko defii fere mum .
So tawii noon yimɓe mbaawaa fadde ɗiin duuɓi fof , ɓe mbaɗa ko wiyatee koo " laawɗinal kuɓtodinngal tafangal " .
So tawii noon ɓe njaɓaani , Waali ina foti yettinde Goomu Jeerto masloowu luure jeyi leydi doosiye oo , caggal ɗum o ɓennina to Kiliifa kalfinaaɗo fiyakuuji ndernderi tawa ko e nder pillitol timmungol .
So tawii noon ɓe njaɓii feere ndee , Goomu Jeerto masloowu luure jeyi leydi denndaaɗo mo mughataa siyna ɗum e tawtoreede luurduɓe ɓee .
So tawii o reentiima bonanndeeji ɓurɗi bonde ɗii " .
So tawii o ɗannaaki , ngam konngol annabi .
So tawii on ngootanii min maa min mbadan on fooras , jeynge , iwii jeeri faytii gerteeli .
So tawii on njamirii kam , mi werloo kadi naamnal goɗngal .
So tawii piy-ɗaa ko duuɓi 10 tan , tee a yettiima duuɓi 62 , paasiyoŋ maa famɗat no feewi .
So tawii rewooɓe mi naamndiimaama mi , miin mbiɗo ɓadii , mbiɗo jaaboo kala noddaandu nodduɗo mi , yo ɓe nootito mi , yo ɓe ngoongɗin am , ina waawi wonana ɓe moƴƴere " .
So tawii sarɗi dagnaani ko harmi , walla harminaani ko dagii , ko wayi no salminoyde koreeji makko , walla yaltintaa mo leydi makko , so gorko oo jaɓii , ina waɗɗii ɗum siynude .
So tawii tan en mbaztaani seppude e jaaynude zum , en ngalaa pelle men , ze njeyzen , kaalooje zum , dukooje zum ; nii nattataa .
So tawii tinde heege ina ɓeyda balɗe , onon hoorooɓe nduuɗoo lewru teddundu , ɗum na foti ɓeydande on coftal !
So tawii wallifiyanke gadano oo haalatnoo ko he guurɗeyeewal ( biologie ) , DAS kanum haalata ko he ganndal peskelooji ( psychologie ) , walla ganndal aadee fittiyaagal , hono no o inniri ɗum ni .
So tawii won fedde dillunde heen nde rewaani e binnditagol , ummiinde , ɗo hay gooto fadaano ɗum , ñaafii e boowal hare ndee ko fedde innateende OLAN .
So tawii won goomu jooɗanii ndee dillere to Senegaal , yoo ngu wonan en lalorgal .
So tawii won wardaaɓe ko Aziz , Saar , Eli e woɗɓe paarnortoo hannde , ena foti rutteede caggal , waraaɓe ɓee inɗe mum'en laɓɓitinee .
So tawii won wiyatnooɓe " maayooru warataa kam " enen kam eɗen mbaawi wiyde " maayooru maa ɓeydu balɗe am " .
So tawii wonaa laamu jeyi leydi ndii , omo haɗaa ñaawde jogiiɗo hakke e jeyi leydi hee , walla nii sifaade ɗum , hay so e ɓaartingol e innde joom mum .
So tawii wonaa ɗuum , holi ko waɗi haala kaa haaletaake ñalnde fof ?
So tawii wonaano ɗuum kay , aratnooɓe ɗaɓɓirde fuutankooɓe wootaneede ɓee ene poti faamde , hay so kaalanaaka , wonde dannga yummum Hammaa Yeroowel koko yoolii , waɗde yo waɗ mut-cuppet yaltina .
So tawii wonii noon , cuɓo-ɗon e nder mon Almaami
So tawii wontii jinngere so hare arii moni kala jinnganta ko bandum .
So tawii ɓe keftintaa ko jogori taƴoyeede , ngati ɓe potaani sabbaade e kuugal Conseil Constititionnel .
So tawii ɗum ina e makko , omo yaha omo taftoo , waɗi noon ko aawdi neɗɗaagal ina e makko , ɗum mawna , ko ɗum waɗtata mo neɗɗo .
So tawiino ko Eriteree wonnoo , eɗen nganndi o janngataano nii , saka o hoonoo , sibu mawniiko gorko keddinooɗo toon oo , gumɗo , paho kañum ne , alaa fof ballal dañi toon .
So tawiino ko ndeeɗoo feere hesere , maa ɓeeynirka kaa waaw yettaade toon , arta he Leydi , nder lebbi seeɗa .
So taƴii tan riŋkoo .
So teŋe ɗee innanooma , e so ɗe innanooka , woodanii teŋe yeru makko en .
So timmii laabi tati heewi ko nanngude .
So tugnaama e ɗeen kuule , laamu Senegaal woni ko e fenaande so yiɗii waɗɗinde wolof e leƴƴi goɗɗi ɗii kala .
So tuubaako Faraysenaajo soodii oto oo , ko noon , so ɓaleejo soodii mo wiyii na itta mo e ɗuum , dognataa mo e boli moƴƴi , o yaawa bonde .
So tuugnaama e won ɗeen ɓarakke , ɓe idii feeñde ko e fuɗnaange Afrik kono , so tuugnaama e maantorɗe donteeje ( marqueurs génétiques ) , ɓe idii feeñde ko bannge worgo Afrik .
So tuuse ngalaa , gooto fof naatta , ɗum ina hersinii sanne .
So ummaama ɗoon , ɓe mbaɗta diide lekkon e alluuje ( eyɓino ) .
So waɗtaama e duuɓi , wona sappo e jeegom hitaande ( 16 ) e lebbi jeetati ( 8 ) .
So welii Alla , a wontaa yiꞌi naange ngee .
So wiyaama " fulɓe noototaako , tawata ko a noddaani ɗumen e ko njiɗnoo noddeede " .
So wiyaama Mbaañ , kala gannduɗo , ɓernde mum dogat he Hammadi Kundo , Demmba Kundo , Paate Kundo , Ɓooy Kundo e Siley ndikku , kono aɗen mbaawi feccude ngo he pecce 3 mawɗe ko adii calsaltiri e arɓe koɗi haa paayodini .
So wiyaama hitaande e dow tagofeere Leydi ko balɗe 365 haa e balɗe 366 , ɗum firti tan ko e nder balɗe men 365 haa 366 , tawat leydi ndi taariima naange haa artii ɗo wonnoo .
So wiyaama ko o keñiiɗo , ina gasa , so nawdaama e cukaagu makko .
So wiyaama laaɓal , noddaani tan Komiin walla fedde " Kaédi Développement " , alaa noddi ko yimɓe fof , neɗɗo fof koɗɗo e wuro hee ina waɗɗii e mum daranaade laaɓal .
So wiyaama mawɗo leydi ina ara , yimɓe njalta pitta .
So wiɗtaama fof ina yiytee heen .
So wolde kewii , ɗuum wonaa feere moƴƴere no feewi .
So won ko ñawmaa e ko haalaa heen ko , walla won ko mbeltortoɗaa heen , a ɗa waawi addude yiyannde ma ɗo les ɗo .
So won ne golle ɗee mbayata aɗa mbaawi dartineede .
So won ngootaagu leydi ndii e nuunɗal peeñaani , yeru e
So won toɓɓere ƴiiƴam rufaande , alaa e sago battamboniiɓe golliiɓe ɗee ceddeeje ñaawee .
So won ɗo o ñiŋaa , o haɓtoo , so won ko o jampbitaa , o humta !
So wonaa dee ,
So wonaa dee , ma a taw , etaade ƴeewde ko woni saraaji wiiwaano mum , etaade ƴeewde ɓarakke geɗe moɗaaɗe ngoppi ɗoon
So wonaa dewal Alla e saakde jam e moƴƴere alaa ko o anndiraano .
So wonaa firtaare .
So wonaa gasdoombal , ngal naywataa , gonngal e asde ko gasataa , haa jaɗɗa tawa alaa fof ko waylii e ɓalndu mum !
So wonaa kay so tawii ko ngordi walla gore jiɗɗe yande he seto , laamoo ngo jeyaa ngoo , heewi ko ruttaade
So wonaa ko e kolce bamɗi !
So wonaa kullel ngel ɗi conngingel ɓura mawnude Fowru ina ñaama jiiba e ko dañii fof .
So wonaa o artiroy mo o yaltinnoo galle oo , o dañataa jam .
So wonaa paden haa ngannden to ɗum wattinta .
So wonaa tan , hay so Londres ittiinjulaagu nguu to geec iñnjeejo gila 1812 , kaɗtugol njulaagu nguu nder duuɗebiritannaaje laawɗinaa tan ko e hitaande 1843 , njiyaagu kaɗtaa toon ko ehitaande 1862 .
So wonaa tawi ko jiɗɗo ñaamde mi .
So wonaa yiilaade mo tan .
So wonaa ɗum kay , alaa ko saabii eɓe ɗawa yimɓe e huunde fotnoonde waɗeede e peeñcu .
So wonaa ɗum mi diwta hurum maa .
So wonaa ɗuum , ko ɓuri heewde e muritaninaaɓe wonɓe Farayse mbinndittaako .
So wonaa ɗuum ngootaagu e mahondindiral renndo ngonata ko haala ɓola , haala fenaande ka wattintaa .
So wonaa ɗuum yimɓe mbaɗata ko o ɓoccitiima , maa o artu sabi ko Mahdi .
So wonaani Sidioca , maa wonoy goɗɗo .
So wonaano " Serwal " , en kaalataano hannde haala laamaandi Malistan .
So wonaano karallaagal doktoor , musiiba waɗat .
So wonaano ko o baawɗo golle , o yettotaako ɗoon .
So wonaano ooñagol weeyo ɗuum wonataa !
So wonaano ɗuum , hol no neɗɗo suusirta naamnaade muritaninaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi kaayitaaji goɗɗi ɗi muritaninaaɓe wonɓe e leydi ndii naamnaaka ?
So wonaano ɗuum , ɓe cuurtataa ɗeeɗoo bone , ɓe ndeƴƴa ɗeya
So wonii ko noon , ndeke heddii tan ko pellital laamuuji
So wonna zum kay yimve fof ina nganndi wooteeji ngalaa zo .
So wontii moni e ma66e kala ko maa ( wooteeje ) njonta tan 6e ku66a 4x4 duuji ma66e 6e ngara e6e penana miskinee6e .
So wootere e ɗee maale walla keewɗe e majje keɓtiima neɗɗo ɗoon e ɗoon , joomum ina foti yahde ko yaaccii opitaal , mbele ina yaawa toppiteede , sibu ɓuri moƴƴude fof ko yaawde toppiteede .
So wuubiliiru teskaama tan , Duɗal meteyoo diiwaniiwal karalleewal ngal , ina yaltina waktuuji jeegom kala , ɗerewol feewde e denndaangal sarwisaaji meteyoo oon diiwaan .
So yaajeende hakkille ina newna aduna , ina laatoo kadi njooɓaari laakara , ko maa koo ina seedtini .
So yahdu yontii joɗnde ko ayiiba .
So yahii haa jamma ɓe mbaala leemde defte ɗee he bakane , ɓe ndimnda ɗum en he bamɗi ( mbaamɗi/ndakiwe ) , ɓe naatna ɗum he nder galleeji ɗii he nder niɓɓere jamma he , goɗɗe heen ɓe njolni ɗum en he laaɗe ɓe payri Bamako laamorgo Mali .
So yahii haa kikiiɗe lammba fiya hakkunde wuro .
So yahii haa ɗi ngumtii , ɗi mbaɗtii ñaamde kala ko ɗi conngi , ɗi ngartiranat heen coppi ɗii huunde .
So yahnooɓe ngartii ko yoo mbertane leece , mbertanee jeece mbele ene ndaña no njooɗori , nde tawnoo Pulaar ene hatojini e ɓesngu mum kala .
So yahrii no yiɗiraa nii eɗen mbaawi fiytaade becce mbiyen en njiytii feere reenirde leydi men .
So yawtii wontoyta ko neɗɗo goɗɗo .
So yimɓe fof ine nanondiri e potndugol jerondiral hakkunde piye gollotooɓe ɓee e njoɓdi yahde alateret ɓee , peeje ngam yettaade ngaal jerondiral ine keewi , ine ceerti : ɓeydude duuɓi jahgol alateret e ɓeydude piye gollotooɓe ɓee , walla , ustude paasiyoŋaaji ɓurɓe alɗude ɓee , e yeru .
So yimɓe ndañno hay so ɗuum , maa coftu no feewi , ngontaa tampu fompaade keremaaji walla waɗde ñuulal
So yimɓe ngolli ko tiiɗi yo kaalane gila ina nguuri .
So yimɓe ɓee mballii ɓe , ndarodiima e maɓɓe , eɓe njiɗi lewru fof hayso laawol gootol , wooda to ɗum waɗaa e nder gootal e leeɗe wuro ngoo .
So yiyaama joom mum ena alɗa yaltinte , so saliima haɓete ) ;
So yiɗii noon tagofeere waɗa ñalawmaaji ujunnaje 10 , tawde tan nde taaraaki naange ha nde arti ɗo nde wonnoo , ɗum timmaani hitaande .
So yiɗii tawa ko jannguɓe foorɓe , ko doktoreeɓe , ko mbaawi wonde fof .
So yoga e kulle ɓaartinaama e neɗɗo , tawata ko jikkuuji mumen ine waɗi nannditooje .
So yontannde ndee waawiino faamande hoore mum , kuutorgol mumen ɗee karalleeje kese ko fettinannde Kummba Pullo e ŋoral maayo , maa heñotono ŋoɓoo gila ɓurani ɗoo weejde .
So yoɓete , holi njaru mum ?
So yuppaama , ɓeydee heen kudduyel njuumri .
So ñaaƴo ngo bilaama e dingiral jeytaare e ɗo talaata 17 Juko 2010 feeto walla fijooji ɗi ina njokki to leeɗe e galleeji wuro ngo .
So ñale ngee waalii ladde tan , pobbi kirtoo nge .
So ñawɗo
So ñawɗo ittaama Waalata haa Neema , waɗtaama he dummbirdu wonaa kay naweede Safrirde , faadee haa ndiwoowa ummoo Nuwaasoobt ( fotde waktuuji tati wonan’de diwooje soofaaji ) , ruttoo kadi Nuwaasoot ( waktuuji tati goɗɗi ) , ɗuum hay celluɗo waawaa ɗum muñde .
So ŋuuñii warii daande tan , anndu ɓadiima .
So ƴeewaama bannge worgo leydi ndii , ɓaleeɓe Tuunusnaaɓe ina kiiɗaa toon no feewi , ɓe njaggiraaka nih ko he leydi hee ɓe njeyaa .
So ɓalndu neɗɗo oo yiyii koon tollon nanndukon e tollon wiris koronaa kon , ndu feewna kaɓtorɗe ngam haɓtaade kon .
So ɓe caliima , min cakka peeje no emin keɓira hakkillaaji ɓurɓe heen yaafde koye ɓee .
So ɓe kumdanii mo e ɗiɗo he waktu gooto walla jiiɓiima , anndaaka gadiiɗo e battandiiɗo , kañnje fof ɗe mbonii .
So ɓe mbiyii hannde eɓe tabina ngaal kuugal firti ko ɓe njolaama jamfaade e yoolde laana Joolaa laawol ɗimmol kadi " .
So ɓe mooriima ɓe caccii-ma , gooto kala haɓɓa cuɗaari mum noppi mum haa heewa kaŋŋe , ɓoornoo cakka e jawe kaŋŋe walla kaalis ; tippa e jubbi mum korbuuje kaŋŋe e ñaaƴe dime .
So ɓe naatnii mo dummbirdu , maa kannatuuji pettu , baafe udditoo , o yalta he baawɗe Geno .
So ɓe ndemii , kala benifiis dañaaɗo heen , DYNN ine jogii heen 5% .
So ɓe ndokkii sukaaɓe maɓɓe inɗe Aaraɓeeje , jaɓee tawa wonndaani e tampere !
So ɓe ndoɓindiima kabaruuji nder e caggal leydi , ɓe mbinnda ɗum .
So ɓe nganndii oon , ko ɓe
So ɓe ngarii , ɓe ngitta ko ɓe cokli koo , liikon tokoson kon ɓe njuppoya dow , maaya walla ɓe mbaɗa kon e fuuruuji haa kon kooña , ɓe ndaaƴa kon e keesuuji , ɓe nelda to leydi maɓɓe .
So ɓe ngarta , ɓe ndimnda ceeli teewu ɗi , ɓe paytira wuro .
So ɓe ngasni ɓe ndefto , ɓe ɗaccite Ceerno ko balɗde ɗiɗi tann waɗi , naati e nder Geejawaay , oojoftaani jammaaji ɗiɗi .
So ɓe njettiima , maa ɓe keɓ ɗerewol lomtotoongol binnditol e ɗerewol ngenndiwol , hono no Suleymaan Brehiim , lomto ANAIR e nder Taraarsa .
So ɓe njottiima ko seeɗa ɓe memata e bottaaje maɓɓe , ɓe cabboo kiraaɗe .
So ɓee annduɓe kulii , hol ko heddiiɓe padi ?
So ɓiɓɓe nokku ina njiɗi hoonaade ko maa ɓe njaɓa ñobbude ɓerɗe maɓɓe haa ɗaata , ɓe kaɓa e koongu e feccooru haa ɓe poola .
So ɓoti ŋabbii e cate , koli ndeen baaɗi koota dow !
So ɓurtii ɗoon , nattii ɓallaade goonga , wontii teeɗanɗe .
So ɗe keewii wonta no annama baaɗe ( waande ) " puɗi kalkeer " walla mbiyen " kaaƴe kalkeer " .
So ɗemngal Farayse ngal ittaama he gollorɗe laamu ngu firtata ko ɗiin seefaaguuji ngontata ko meeranteeji ɗi ngalaa hiisa .
So ɗemngal men fecciima hono no hannde nii , ngal waawataa fompondirde he Faraseere , Engeleere , e Aarbeere , kam he ɗemɗe Afiriknaaje ɗe ngal sippirta , hono Hawsaare , Bammbarankoore , jolfeere , Jermaare ( Soŋayre ) , ekn .
So ɗemngal wuuri leñol wuuri .
So ɗereeji ɗii kebbitinaama , won heen ina ngara binndi mumen ina junnitii , won heen ngara tawa binndol mumen laaɓaani .
So ɗi ngiiwtii kadi ɓaleeri , ɗi njara ɗoo , ɗi njaha " .
So ɗiiɗoo fannuuji ɗiɗi pooɗondiri noon , ko dañaatee heen ko , ko ɗum tagata neɗɗo o .
So ɗum alaa , eɓe mbaawi jibinde ɓinngel ngel rafi oo waawi tampinde .
So ɗum alaa , hol feere cakkan-ɗon ɓe ?
So ɗum alaa , o hollii woɗɓe ɓee hol no mbaɗata so mbelaaka ko yahetee e leydi ndii .
So ɗum alaa , tawa ko ko heɓtii leñol am koo tan dogata e mum .
So ɗum alaa heen , ina woodani oo gorko yaltude heen , so welaama , ngam konngol nulaaɗo Alla JKM wiyi : " ɓuri haande huureede e sarɗiiji fof ko ɗi ndagtinir-ɗon terɗe ngena suddiiɓe " .
So ɗum alaa jaggiree ko caliiɗo , wiyee ko gaño gondaaɗo , potɗo haɓeede haa woɗɗitoo walla rewtoo no nehaandi .
So ɗum alaa ndi lappee haa ndi wonta ceeri , ndi waɗee e nder basi , kanaaje , bootuuji , beembe , paali , saakuuji walla e boloŋaaji .
So ɗum alaa ɓe ngaybina ɗum .
So ɗum laatiima , miin e bayɗo no am raɓɓiɗde miijooji , emin mbasiyoo jeyaaɓe e ngoon wuro , kala ɗo mbaawi wonde e Duunde Baaba Aadama hee , nde ngarata tawtoreede .
So ɗum majjere walla so ɗum teyaaɗe wonnoo , ɓeen Fulɓe ene potnoo daraade e no ɗuum wayliraa gila ko ɓooyi .
So ɗum reentaaka ina waawi addude rafiiji mbaꞌɗi no reedu muusooru walla dogooru eko nanndi heen .
So ɗum taggee , habrude Siyaara walla Ñalɗi Pine wuro walla diiwan mon ; so ɗum fijirde Baaba Maal , adviser , walla Abdou Kamara to grand Theatre ; walla ko Kadia Kande e Choupi Mballo mbaɗata hiirde Kolda walla ko mago Yero Soh walla Amadu Jallo waɗanta wuro mon walla falnde mon , naawee toon ɓannginee .
So ɗum waɗi , ma o waaw janngude lossoŋaaji makko jamma e lampa gaas kaa .
So ɗum waɗii , ena hulaa maa ɓeydu kadi mettinde weeyo winndere ndee e ɗii sahngaaji ɗi faggudu woni yuman ngoƴaaji aduna oo kala .
So ɗum yahdinaama e mbayliigu doole kisal e konu , ɗee geɗe maa ittu kuudetaaji .
So ɗum yawtii , golle goomu nguu gadane , ko hirjino feewde e depiteeji ɗii e koye mum en , ko hirjino feewde e gofornoma oo ( laamu nguu ) .
So ɗum ɓennii , Galguumel , miɗo yiɗi heɓde jokkondire maa imeel e telefon .
So ɗum ɓennii , a wiyi e winndannde maa ndee wonde heen baar inniraa ko Ibrahiima Saar mo alkule Pulaar kese ; yiɗde am , ko anndude ɗeen alkule kese hol no ciforii .
So ɗum ɓennii , dental e sikke am wonaa deƴƴude so nanaama ko feewi walla ko feewaani waɗaama e renndo men .
So ɗum ɓennii , ko Aadama woni gadiiɗo daraade e dow minbara ina yeewta ko fayti e dewe Alla .
So ɗum ɓennii , o suɓoo tawtorteeɓe kawgel ngel .
So ɗum ɓennii , ooɗoo ñalawma ko pattamlamo , mo ɓerɗe amen fof njaɓɓodii , minen Fonndunaaɓe .
So ɗum ɓennii , wiyaa nde Aadama fini o tawi Hawaa ina jooɗii sara makko ndee , ɗum wonanii mo kaawisaaji mawɗi sanne .
So ɗum ɓennii aɓe njiɗi dartinde ko laamɓe Waalo e Hasaan en konata maccuɓe na njeeya tuubakooɓe ko .
So ɗum ɓennii banndiraaɓe juulɓe tedduɓe oɗon ñaagaa so on njooɗiima e humde dewle ɓesnguuji mon , e jonɗe ngam innude ɓiɓɓe mon , tiiɗnoɗee nduworo-ɗee ɗemɗe mon neenewiije ɗee .
So ɗum ɓennii e ɗum yaɓɓi hakke jiknaaɓe waawde winnditaade ɓiɓɓe mum en he duɗal ngal mbelaa .
So ɗuum alaa , waasde ummanaade nde ɓuri darnude ɓale , ɗe ngalaa ngooroondi , tawa rewata heen ko fukkaade .
So ɗuum alaa kadi , joom mum yaha awoyde , arta juuɗe ɓole ina sooyi .
So ɗuum alaa sooɗoroo saabunnde , waɗa he juuɗe mum haa ƴufa , yigga fotde hojomaaji 30 .
So ɗuum laatiima , firti ko Siin marii karallaagal ngal Amerik e Riisi fof njogaaki .
So ɗuum laatiima , kaawis maa ɓeydo nanngude min , sibu ɗum firti ko konu men , potnoongu reende min e heedande min e njannguuji boowal , ina huutoree ngam siynude loppitgol leyɗe e nafoore tumanrankooɓe

So ɗuum waawaama faameede ɓurat-en waawde yaajnaade e Ñeeñal e Ganni Magaama , ko ɗuum Ɓuraten yidde haalde .
So ɗuum waɗii , mi heyɗataa janngo , ɓaawo janngo e balɗe garooje ɗee .
So ɗuum waɗii , ɓe laaɓndoo joom ɗiin kompañeeji ngaluuji mawɗi , ko ma ɓe tottee nde ɓe njaɓa udditde .
So ɗuum waɗii , ɓe mballa ɗum en no ƴellitorii haa mbaawa yaltinde ŋari mum en he naatal Senegaal kuuɓnungal .
So ɗuum waɗii ma ɓe cikku ko feluuji , bde ɓura yaawde ummaade .

Sokla mawɗo naatani ceemeedo dewbo o .
Soklaani hankadi waɗde kaske walla keɗorɗi .
Soklaani ko eɗen njumpa heen , kala no haala moƴƴa ina leloroo , ko noon lelniraa .
Soklaani ko oɗon pada haa hiira nde njiyon lewal ngal nih , so tawii tan asamaan ina laaɓi oɗon mbaawi sooynaade ndu hay ñalawma , jamma kam ko yeeɓde haa weltoo .

Sosi
Sosi ngal ko wiyeteeɓe Brian Acton ( gooto e sosnooɓe WhatsApp ) e Moxie Marlinspike ( Hooreejo ) .
Sosi njeenaari ndii ko Suwednaajo biyeteeɗo Alfred Nobel , ganndo ko faati e wayliwal ( Chimie ) cankiiɗo gila 1896 , ine ɗacci jawdi keewndi , tolniindi e 32 miliyoŋ kaalis Suwed ( fotde miliyaar e 100 miliyoŋ uguiyya ) .
Sosiyatee almaañnaajo gooto ine wiyee Holoplot huutoriima ngal he nder saaluuji sinemaa kam e nokkuuji ngamri ( boites de nuit ) .
Sosiyatee toppitiiɗo ngol oo ina waɗi 19 tergal .
Sosiyete walla faggorgal jawdi ngal o darni .
Sosɓe IMT ɓee ndenndini 25 miliyoŋ ngam feewnude ƴeeŋrude Nuwaasoot ndee .

Subaka 21/09/2014 waɗaa ƴaro baali .
Subaka alkamiisa oo , ko silke Quraana udditi ñalawma oo .
Subaka aset 6 u 2016 finiraa ko safaara .
Subaka gooto maa a heɗo ɗum e rajo , aɗa lelii e leecel maa .
Subaka kala amin nganndinee nafoore cellal e darnde nde min poti daraade .
Subaka law , Astu ƴetti bekeeje mum yahdi e Abdu mawnum janngoyde .
Subaka law , yimɓe Lummbol fotɓeyiilde golle gadiiɗe ɗee , pawi sisuuji jonɗi to dinngiral too .
Subaka law , ñalnde 5/5/2006 , nawan-ɗen ɓe " kalkuuji " ( kaayitaaji jaynotooɗi , kolɓooji ɗo jaayɗe ɗee muuletee hade mum en naweede muulirde ngam hebbitineede ) jaaynde ndee , ɓe ndokki en aadi hedde waktu nayaɓo kikiiɗe .
Subaka law yimɓe fof ndiiranii digiral ngal .
Subalɓe ine njogii lowre ɓurnde mawnude nde wonnoo ko kamɓe nganndi maayo .
Subalɓe kala ena nootitoo , ngadda laaɗe mum'en ena ciŋkaa yoo yooɗi araaraay leydeele catiiɗe maayo men : Muritani e Senegaal e ko ɓuri heewde .

Suka debbo oo heɓni mo , ɓe kaaldi haa ɓe kawri , sukaaɓe ɓee ndañii kala ko njiilotonoo e comci .
Suka debbo oo nana foɓɓa , na yima , ina manta moƴƴere njeegu mum .
Suka dewbo juulɗo , ceniiɗo , muurnotooɗo hijaab , kiilniiɗo jaŋde e dewal Allah e taragol defte diine , kono Baaba Demmba ( Umar Akon Jah ) baaba mum Leyla kanum wonaa neɗɗo peewɗo .

Suka goɗɗo oo , perƴe kaŋŋe puɗi ko e ɓernde koyngal ina haɗa ɗum yahde .

Sukaa6e darii6e subaka e kikeed’e jamma e nyalawma , tampaaani kaa6aani , wonkiiji mumen wonki Lenol mumen , wonkiiji mumen wonki Daande lenol tammbinoo golle d’e to bannge nju66udi ndi , hono ma66e wee6aani e nder Rewo .
Sukaaɓe Baaba Maamuudu peccondiri peccon taton ngam weeɓnude coodgol ngol .
Sukaaɓe dingiral ndeen nganndaano baaluuji walla koledaraaji .
Sukaaɓe e rewɓe ngañii , ɓee heen mbaraa .
Sukaaɓe fijoynooɓe ngarti nder wuro ina ndiddondira e borti .
Sukaaɓe fof murtii , gila Fanay-Ñakwaar e Madiina-Fanay haa yettii Dar-Salaam e Teekaan e hoore mum .
Sukaaɓe janngooɓe kollirii tigi rigi mbaawka mumen , gila e jaŋde ɗemngal ngal , haa e jaŋde diine toowɗo oo .
Sukaaɓe maa ɓee fof ma mi fawtan ɓe pawe gonɗe e ɓalli maɓɓe ɗii .
Sukaaɓe maantiniiɓe to bannge coftal ɓalli maa tawtoy ɓe .
Sukaaɓe makko , Muusaa gonɗo Farayse , Sammba Joom e Hasamiyu ( maande giɗli makko ɗo tolnii e sehilaaɓe makko ) , e cuddiiɗo makko Faatu Jaakitee , tawtoraaɓe hiirde ndee , njeddaani ɗuum .
Sukaaɓe naalankooɓe ko wayno Boy Diarra walla Rappeur en ko wayno authentic tawtoraama ñalɗi ɗii .
Sukaaɓe naatirta toon jaŋde ko duuɓi tati .
Sukaaɓe nayo rewɓe , ngardi ɗiɗo-ɗiɗo , ena njogii araaraay leydi Muritani , lommbi ɓe .
Sukaaɓe ndegginaa jahi ladde , yoga e maɓɓe ene ngoya kono won e maɓɓe tiiɗɓe .
Sukaaɓe ngaddi sisuuji , basuuji , bawɗi e kala ko yahdata heen .
Sukaaɓe njenayoo njehii , kono min payaani "
Sukaaɓe rewɓe ɓee kamen kadi peññinii mbaawka mumen .
Sukaaɓe roƴanooɓe boowe denndaaɗe , jehe , laabi ine nguuri e njelaari gila puɗal haa mutal .
Sukaaɓe suusɓe saasɓe .
Sukaaɓe ustoraaɓe terɗe njiꞌii heen ko'e mumen .
Sukaaɓe ustoraaɓe terɗe ɓee keedaani caggal .
Sukaaɓe uujanii gure teeru , heɗdiiɓe hannde e gure Fuuta nattii jogaade softeende e yiɗde dogande ladde nattunde hay fuɗde huɗo .
Sukaaɓe worɓe laɓoo , rewɓe mooro tippoo ñaaƴe dime e ŋeñemeeje kaŋŋe .
Sukaaɓe wuro ngoo fof ndarii darnde tiiɗnde ngam wallude mo .
Sukaaɓe ɓe meeɗaa yahde laamorgo leydi Senegaal , ko ɗuum waɗi ɓe mbeltii .
Sukaaɓe ɓee , ñaagii mi yo mi faɓɓit , ena njiɗi waynondirde e am e duusde mi .
Sukaaɓe ɓee fof ndutti e sagooji mumen .
Sukaaɓe ɓee ina ndusa tuufeeje , rewɓe ɓee ina ngadda ndiyam .

Sukaaɓe ɓee yoo njilloyo kono ngonataa toon haa guurte ɗee ngasa .

Taaniraaɓe men ngoppirii en pinal jooɗngal , eɗen poti hisnude ngal !
Taarii leydi bang-yoo-bang , banngeeji ɗii fof , ko weeyo Leydi ; weeyo ngo ena yaha ha 2000km .
Taarii sorfundu nduu ko ɗeeɗoo leyɗe : Iraan to bannge fuɗnaange rewo , Irak e Kowoyte e Sawuud to bannge hirnaange , Bahreyn e Kataar e Emiraaji Arab dentuɗi to bannge fuɗnaange worgo , Omaan e jookdu Musandam keedi ndu bannge fuɗnaange .
Taariik fulbe mutii e leydi , ganndal suudiima , soldaat lenol wirniima kono golle mum e balle mum nan heddi lenol majjataa haa aabada !

Tabitin ko kaalɗaa ko mbele mbaasaa hersude so en pottii janngo " .
Tabitingol mbayliigu jeyi leydi nguu addanii ɓaleeɓe Muritani ɓeydaade mettinde , e hiisaade ko teettaaɓe leyɗe mum en e dow fenaande , tawi kadi ina ɗawaa e ñamaale kaalisaaji bankeeji kam e peeje ƴetteteeɗe ngam wallitde ndema .

Tagi ceerno oo naatirde ɗoo , ko o yiyii e nder joɗnde ndee , rewɓe ina piiltoo worɓe fodde laabi tati .

Tagofeere Mbaañ noon , newaaka yiyde e yitere ɓolde , tee hakkunde mum e Leydi ko hedde 78 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer .
Tagofeere Uraanus noon yiyotaako e yitere ɓolde , nde yiyotoo tan ko e lonngorɗe .
Tagofeere ko noon wayi , kono e tagopeeje 9 ɗe njiy-ɗen e ndeftere men nde ɗe , alaa hoɗaande yimɓe so wonaa Leydi ndi nguur-ɗen e dow mum ndi .
Tagofeere men nde noon ( Leydi ) so taariima naange haa artii ɗo wonnoo , so balɗe ɗe limaama , wonata koko mbiyɗen ko ( 365 walla 366 ) .
Tagofeere tagiraa ko no annama Leydi nih ; no leydi wayi yaajde nih , no wayi mawnude nih , ko noon tagofeere wayi yaajde e mawnude .
Tagofeere waɗirta yiloo-banngoo kono kewal mottirteengal yiilortoo nii ( so neɗɗo mottii ngal ) .
Tagoodi hoodere , ko no tagoodi naange nii wayi .

Tagopeeje baaɗe nii , won heen , no Leydi men ndii nii , njibinee saraaji koode ɗee , tawa ine ndoondii nguurndam ɓallijam .
Tagopeeje puɗɗi-ɗen yiyde ɗee fof , ena njiyoo e yitere hay so en ngalaa lonngorɗe .
Tagopeeje satonaange ɗee , no Leydi nii , keɓata caafe ko ummoraade e Naange .
Tagopeeje ɗe kaalno-ɗen ɗe fuu , ( fof ) , mbaɗata ko yiiloo-banngoo , taaroo kadi naange , etee alaa ɗo ɗe ceŋii .
Tagopeeje ɗe njanngu-ɗen ɗe , ko kaaƴe e caalli e ceene , e heen e majje ena mbaɗi keneeli ɗi poofotaako .

Tawtoraama ñalɗi ɗii palɗe 5 ɗee fof : Barkewol , Bumdeyd , Geru , Kankoosa e Kiifa .
Tawtoraama ɗum kadi , hilifaaɓe diine e hilifaaɓe aada heewɓe ummoriiɓe e banngeeji kala he nder wertaango Senegaal haa Muritani .
