Taƴi sañ reende ngoƴa jowitiiɗo deeyre e nder renndo ko Kaliifu fiyakuuji geɗe nderndere .
Taƴmi biyee am fayde Senegaal .
Taƴooɓe ɓee ene keewi neldude email cikkaa ko jiɗɗo gollideede tawa koko Engele wiyata " Phising " , ko jawlol , ndaarata ko maawaade kabaruuji ma mbele ene daña no taƴirma .
Taƴre konu ( brigade Kfir ) ina tuddini ɗoon , tawi huunde e koninkooɓe mum ( fotde 1 000 ) kalfinaa ko kisal jiimooɓe wonɓe toon ɓee .
Te
Te alaa e men pewjoowo ko deƴƴinta en , ko aamnotoo tawa kadi ene deeƴa e hakkille .
Te eɗen nganndi ko ɗuum wonno hujja maɓɓe ndeɓe loppitta Diamano FM he juuɗe men .
Te heewaani waɗde ko haalnoo " .
Te kadi kala ɗo o jaɓɓanoo heen , ɓe njiyii teeyangal yimɓe , eɗen nganndi ɗuum ko huunde nde dawriyankooɓe mbaɗtata hakkille , nde tawnoo kala ɗo ɓe njehi ko ndaartoyde yimɓe tan nawiɓe toon .
Te ko noon ɓe poti wayde .
Te mo woni kala e men , so heɓii heɓnataa banndum .
Te nde o artiroyta kartal ngal ndee tawata ko kaalis mo o yeennoo mi oo gasii .
Te so tawii fulɓe ene njiɗi tabitinde ngootaagu mum en alaa sago njokkondiri , cuusa gollondirde e renndude peeje .
Te suɓngooji diiwe e falndeeji 2022 nana cooynee natti woɗɗude .
Te waylude ɗum waaɓataa .
Te ɓeen yimɓe ko jooma en pine , aadaaji , cosaaan e finaa-tawaaji donaaɗi .
Te ɗuum ina naamdi dumunna seeɗa .
Teddeeki ko heddinoo e mayre caggal nde nde sumi e weeyo men ngoo , ko 60 000 kilo !
Teddeendi maggel ko hedde 1 025 kg .
Teddeendi makko ɓurii 200 ton .
Teddiniraa gardagol jamma oo ko Ceerno Aliiw Bah e ballondiral Baal Umaar Hammaat e almuɓɓe diiwaan oo .
Teddiniraa golle ɗee ko Ceerno Abuu Diiye , kalifa Galle Hebbeeɓe Barooɓe Jakel , Ceerno Aamadu Sammba Jallo , gonnooɗo almaami raatib Jumaa Sorimalee , Ceerno Muktaar mo Demmba Atumaani Jah e Ceerno Moodi Aamadu Jallo .
Teddiniraa ngol ɗoo koolol ko Maitre Maalik Sal , dawriyanke gonnooɗo jaagorgal Senegaal kalfinaaɗo ñaawooje .
Teddiniraa ɗiin ñalɗi ko go’to e harbiyankooɓe e ɓiɓɓe Fulɓe ƴettunooɗo jammbere lewi ladde sukkunde wi’I yoo pulaagu winndere yaɓɓu heen , yaɓɓira koyɗe ɓole , oon woni jibnaaɗo men Pr Umaar Bah to Dabbe ( Muritani ) .
Teddungal mawngal o dañii ɗum e ngawlaagu tawi ko senngo diine haa teeŋti e nguurndam Seek umaar Taal mo Halwaar .
Tee , Aali Yero ŋati tan ko maa Chesse tuuba , naata
Tee , aɓe ponndi heen fof , sibu ma ɓe ndaro e haɗde Rajihi remde ɗoon so tawii laamu nguu rokkii ɗum nokku oo .
Tee , caggal ɗuum , jerɓite ine njokki waɗde .
Tee , e ngalɗoo daawal juutngal , mbayliigaaji keewɗi mbaɗii , gila to humpitooji haa e karallaagal ( haa teeŋti e karallaagal kesal ) , haa to kuccam fedde ndee .
Tee , e oon sahaa , ko 25 , 6 km fat wonnoo hakkunde mayre e Leydi .
Tee , eɗen nganndi , gila ko adii jeytaare Afrik , annduɓe men ngenndiyankooɓe , wayɓe no Sheekh Anta en , njeertiniino en , so eɗen njiɗi yahrude yeeso e ɓamtaade yaawnde , ko maa njanngen ( njanngiren ) ɗemɗe men , Sabu hay leydi ngootiri yiyaaka ina ɓamtorii janngirde ɗemngal koɗal .
Tee , ko ELIF gollotoo nde jooni koo , alaa mo ɗum haljini hay gooto e saraaji hee , nanndaani e golle sosiyatee españool oo .
Tee , ko e ñalgu wootu .
Tee , maa laamu ngu wallondir e gollodiiɓe mum to bannge faggudu kam e HCR yantude e jokkere enɗam hakkunde Muritaninaa-ɓe mbele tuugnorɗe ina lelnee ngam naattingol maɓɓe e nguurndam leydi ndi kam e nokkuuji ɗo ɓe ngonnoo .
Tee , maa laamu nguu wallondir e gollodiiɓe mum to bannge faggudu kam e HCR yantude e jokkere enɗam hakkunde Muritaninaa-ɓe mbele tuugnorɗe ina lelnee ngam naattingol maɓɓe e nguurndam leydi ndii kam he nokkuuji ɗo ɓe ngonnoo .
Tee , mettere ndee ina mawni no feewi .
Tee , so ɗeen
Tee , ɓeeynirka mbiyeteeka Express anndinii aadee wonde tagofeere Mbaañ ( Mars ) ine wuuroo .
Tee , ɗee njogitaaje , kam en fof e haɗeede huutoreede , kuutoraama e winndere hee ko famɗi fof laabi nay e duuɓi 40 cakkitiiɗi ɗii .
Tee , ɗeɗn njenanaa yimɓe fof ine njiɗi anndude mbele ɗum fof ko fijirde mehre tan .
Tee , ɗumɗoo fof woni ko he juuɗe leyɗe jeenay ( 9 ) fat , ine heen noon Riisi .
Tee Barak en paamaano mbayliigu potnoongu naatneede e Waalo hakkunde yimɓe , lomtoo macungaagu mbele luure ɗee ina ngustoo , Waalo Waalo en ngonta neɗɗo gooto gaa gaa jamfankooɓe , ndartoo bonɓe , hare seernaaɓe Fedde juulɓe ronkii foolde haa naatna nguun mbayliigu .
Tee alaano kadi goɗɗo mo ene haala .
Tee bonannde majjum ɓurii ɗoon hulɓinaade , sibu ko leydi ɗum boomata .
Tee en ngalanaa ɗuum safaara .
Tee eɗen
Tee eɗen nganndi mbayliigu kilimaa jeyaa ko e geɗe ɓurɗe saabaade uujo .
Tee eɗum waawi huutoreede ngam dampude laaɗe peesooje ko ɓuri ton .
Tee gila ndeen , hiisaaji ɗi ɓe mbaɗnoo ɗii ine ŋelɗi no feewi , kadi ganndal maɓɓe heen ine seeɓi no feewi .
Tee hay huunde waawaa ɗum falaade hankadi .
Tee hitaande kala eɗi ɓeydoo heewde .
Tee huunde fof emin potndi heen .
Tee ina woodi kadi dente goɗɗe ndee ngonaa laamuyankooje jeyaaɗe e nder leydi ndi ko wayi no dental biyetengal junngo e junngo ( main dans la main ) wondude e dental El Fethaa , wondude e yimɓe heeriiɓe tawa ngonaa fulɓe , tawi ina njogii nokkuuji ɗo keblata yimɓe mumen e ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗe ( pulaar , sooninke e wolof ) .
Tee kanko Eric o yahiino haa o waɗti foofirde wuddere yulanoonde e goddol hee .
Tee ko Banke winndereejo ( Banke moñnjaal ) e hoore mum huutorii ngaal kuutorgal wiɗto .
Tee ko cikku-ɗen , wonaa sikkude ne ko yenaneede , so ngaal naamnal dañanaaka jaabawol haa tabitinaa , daande am ko dow , ko e caɓɓitaali ngonaten , gila dawaa dawi haa nde hirndaa hirndi .
Tee ko haawnii , ko kala ɗo taw-ɗaa ɗiɗo e amen ene njeewta , nanataa ko ene mbiya " alaa e sago cafren luure men ɗee , mbele hankadi dental men tabita , sabu ko en daɗaaɓe " .
Tee ko janngo mo woɗɗaani .
Tee ko leyɗe pamare doole ɗee ɓuri tampude heen , gila e yoorooji , e musibaaji weeyo jolooji jooni ( keneeli bonɗi , yergol maaje , kujjitgol gure jiimɗe maaje , toɓooli ɓurtuɗi ekn ekn ) .
Tee ko wayi nii ina yiyee ñalnde kala , gila e mahngo laabi haa e geɗe goɗɗe .
Tee ko ɓe kaali e kuulal 93 Doosgal Muritani sellaani , faamamuya maɓɓe kadi e kuulal 68 Doosgal farayse ina ñawi bof , sabu ngalɗoon kuulal ardi ko e Doosgal leydi Farayse 1958 , etee ngal meeɗi memteede tan ko laawol gootol e hitaande 2007 .
Tee leydi ko yimɓe hoɗɓe
Tee luural ɓooyngal na ɗoon hakkunde Turki e Armeni .
Tee mami haalan on ko heewi e serenbe fiitatoobe becce ina mbiya ko kanum en alla ardini doo diine ko islam be ngonani , ko faati e tobbe baaane nih ko buri heewde e mabbe kaaldata ko haa tama yimbe be tan .
Tee min ceeraani e naamnaade ɗuum , kono o jaɓaani .
Tee nde o seerti jawdi nde , o adii fof ko ƴeewde hol no o wuurdata : O yaltini waaño .
Tee ne dee he nder Senegaal , wonaa pelle biyooje ko ɓamtaare ɗemngal , pinal e tabitinde hurum leñol Fulɓe ummini ɗum ŋakkaɗen , wona yimɓe ne kay ɓoorniiɓe wutte ko kanum en ngoni mawɓe leñol Fulɓe ɗawa ɗen .
Tee o fagganii hoore makko ngalu kaalis ngam tamde kattanɗe makko neɗɗaagu e wellitaare to bannge kaalis .
Tee safaara oo jogotaako hay batte goote e cafrotooɗo oo .
Tee saggittaa ko selli , jaabotaako naamnde .
Tee wonaa miin tan .
Tee wonaa ñalnde 6 ut , ko ñalnde 13 ut , sibu ko o jahnooɗo Farayse ƴeewtoyaade ɓalndu makko .
Tee ɗeen ɗalduɗe
Tee ɗum joofata ko lewru suwee .
Tee ɗuum maa won ko neeɓaani , ko idii nde sikkanoo ndee .
Teemedde e teemedde sagataaɓe naati e mbeddaaji ɗii , eɓe mbinnda e ɓale wuro Ndakaaru ngoo " Senngor , barɗo hoore ; ɓiɓɓe mon nana mbaree , pinee ; warooɓe koye , Bolondee ko guuroowo-majjataa " .
Teemedde tati hitaande noon hiisetee ko waktu gooto e nder ñalawmaaji darnga .
Teemedde teemedde rewɓe e worɓe e sukaaɓe e mawɓe tawtoraama ɗum .
Teemedde ɗiɗi ujunere mbuuɗu e hitaande 1982 , ina waawi tolnaade e miliyoŋaaji ɗiɗi ugiyya hannde : o ɗaɓɓiino hoto oon kaalis waɗe so wonaa e ɗuum : fedde nde ɗooftiima ndeen ɗaɓɓaande , sibu oon kaalis ko mooftanooɗo e konte goworɗo gila ndeen .
Teen Kayhayɗi e Farba Caŋel mo Subalɓe takkondiri ko e Farmbaal Kayhayɗi mo Sedɓe .
Teen Yusuf sokaa Waalata , gollinaa golle kaantare , haɗaa ñaamdu e yardu haa yoga he maɓɓe mbaasi piɗtaali mum en .
Teen Yuusuf Gey , ko mawniraaɗo teddindiranooɗo wonnoo hade wontude esiraaɗo .
Teen Yuusuf Gey e Umaar Kan fof ena kawri wonde nde Sammba yalti ndee , joñtoyii ko Ɓunndu ngam heblude njangu .
Teen Yuusuf rokkii coñce ɗemngal farayse pefol mum gadanol ummoraade e Muribtaninaajo .
Teen jeyaa ko he adiiɓe wallifaade defte , pefi haa jime e mogooji .
Teew e ƴiiƴam ene ngona he nokku tawa ko woni neɗɗo koo , koko woɗɗitii .

Teeŋti kadi e jinnaaɗo debbo no wayi
Teeŋti nde Fulɓe , sabu keewal mum en he nder Senegaal e jaɓde ɗum en janngud , ene tawee he nder kala gollorɗe laamu ngu .
Teeŋti nde seɓɓitiiɓe njooki ɓe to Tummbukutu , he 2018 .
Teeŋti noon nde yimɓe ɓee nganndi kadi ɓaɗondiral hakkunde miñiraaɗo o e mawni mum , kono kadi ɗowtaare e hurum mo Aliw Sal jogii he Makki , gaagaa tan wonde ɗum mawni makko , kono kadi sabu mum wonde gardiiɗo makko to bannge dawrugol .
Teeŋti noon so laamu Bamako waawaani hartaade konu mum he ɗee golle kaantare kuccinaaɗe he muritaninaaɓe wuurɓe nder Mali " .
Teeŋtinaama wonde nguun ñawu ngaroowu e jawdi , ine raaɓa yimɓe .
Teeŋtini ɗum ko naattingol e nder koloni Muritani , diiwanuuji ɗiɗi Hod ɗii , jeyanooɗi e njiimaandi Sudaan farayseejo , ñalnde 5 sulyee 1944 .
Teeŋtinoon e mawɓe diine en ɓee walla laamɓe ganni en ɓee , ɓe yiyannde mum en wonno ko , won e binndanɗe maɓɓe ene mbaɗi jiyanɗe luutndiiɗe diine e aadaaji moƴƴi , walla pelooje maɓɓe e ngonka renndo ngoo ko noddooje fayde e murteende e jaltugol he ɗowtaare .
Teeŋtinta ɗum ko ñalnde diɗɗal ngal gaynata hebleede ndee yimɓe laamu ngu iwruɓe he ceŋɗe limaaɗe dowɗee fof ene tawtoranoo .

Terɗe G20 ko ɗeeɗoo leyɗe : Almaañ , Afrik worgo , Sauud , Arsantiin , Ostarali , Beresiil , Kanadaa , Siin , Koree worgo , Dental Dowlaaji Amerik , Farayse , Inndo , Indonoosi , Itaali , Japon , Meksik , Laamaandi-ndentundi ( Angalteer ) , Riisi e Turki .
Terɗe mayre , jogii karte

Terɗe ɗiɗi catal Kayhayɗi keɓiino tawtoreede batu nguu .
Teskaa noon ko tabitino sariya jeyi leydi oo rokkaani gure daande maayo ɗee ɗiin hurumaaji haa ko won e majje ko jookiiɗe etee heen sahaa nii won e majje mbaawataa yaajtude .
Teskaa noon ko yoga e remooɓe mbaawaa winndude e janngude etee hay kominikeeji baɗeteeɗi e rajo ngam habrude yimɓe , mbaɗetee tan ko e sapatoore walla Farayse ɗum firti ko leƴƴi keddiiɗi ɗi ko ɗawaaɗi .
Teskaama he follooji ɗii , pooɗondiral leyɗeele tuubakeeje he nder duunde Afrik , teskaama kadi ŋakkere dawrugol renndooji ɗii , gila to bannge lanndaaji dawrugol haa e laamuuji ɗii .
Teskaama kadi , e pottital ngal , hay nde diɗɗal konngonaaɓe njowi loggol mumen nde , ko juumre deenoowo diɗɗal Barooɗe Senegaal , hono Khaadim Njaay wonnoo .
Teskaama kadi ɓesnguuji Afrik ( teeŋti nder geece renndo ) ina njahdi e jokkondirde e Riisi ngam haɓde e jihaadiyankooɓe e seɓɓitiiɓe .
Teskaama ko o ɓurɗo moƴƴude e rewɓe ɓe nganndu-ɗaa , kañum en fof ko ɓiɓɓe makko , ɗoo haa ñalnde darnga .
Teskaama noon fiiltiingo ɓurngo famɗude , hono fiiltiingo " fiiltiingo Inndo " ine sowoo laabi noogaas ( 20 ) geec ɓurɗo mawnude , hono " geec Arabi " .
Teskaama noon loppite laamu jolɗe Mali e Burkina ustii doole G5-Saahal .
Teskaama tigi-rigi , ko buri heewde e yelotooɓe ɓee ko sukaaɓe almuɓɓe janngooɓe Qur’aana ummiiɓe e nder diwanuuji Senegaal arduɓe e seerenɓe mumen ɗoo e wuro laamorgo ngoo .
Teskagol ngonka kuuɓtodinka to bannge politik ine himmi no feewi wonande daranagol politik juumtuɗo wonande geɗe jowitiiɗe e Ɗemngal Gadanal Jaŋde .

Teskini e ngalɗoo daawal ko naat-naatondiral teeŋtungal hakkunde yeewtere Rajo ndee e jaaynde winndaande sabu ko heewi ko waɗetee e rajo hee , ina ɓamtee e F .

Tesko
Tesko : So a meeɗaano awtaade " Bindirgal " , aɗa waawi yiyde ƴuulde " GET " yeeso maggal .
Tesko-ɗen Aali Yero wiyaani yo tuubakooɓe njaltu leydi ndii , o wiyi ko yo ɓe tuub .
Tesko-ɗen haa hannde won e cuuɗi Mbaañ ngaskitinortoo ko Hebbiyaaɓe kono wuro ngoo kam woni e leydi Yirlaaɓe .
Tesko-ɗen noon ina woodi Fuuta Jeeri .
Tesko-ɗen tan ɓe naatiri e nokku oo ko e wootere e kenorɗe caggal ɗee , caggal nde ɓe ngitti heɗɗaawo mum .
Tesko-ɗen wonde hoɗɓe arɓe ɓee , hay heen mo anndaano ɗoon neɗɗo , rokkaama jippunde , njaatigi e dookooɓe .
Tesko-ɗen wonde safrirde ena wonnoo e wuro hee .
Tesko-ɗen wonde ɓee ɗoo njoyo holliraaɓe , gooto heen fof ena yooɓii konngol walla ɓataake mo yiɗi heɗnude yimɓe jooɗiiɓe ɓee .
Teskuyaaji mon noon ina coklaa no feewi .
Teskuyaaji ɓurɗi ɓadaade : " rawane o ɓurnoo neyɓude " , " kala ko wonnoo ɗoo e jaggal laamu , walla ko wiɗi yiyeede , ko kam ɓuri yiytinaade toon " , " ɓesngu heɓaani konngol , sibu arnooɓe yeewtere ndee , jeyaaɓe e nokku hee , njowii toon juuɗe , kono ndokkaaka konngol "
Teskuyaaji ɗi gooto e men kala wuurata , kono ɗi , he dokke alla , ko demmbel tan waawi yinaade haa e nder luggere mum en o yaltina toon maanaaji baawɗi wallude en he faamade holi jotondiral men he ɗii teskuyaaji nguurndam , haa gooto men kala waawa yiytaade hoore mum he ɗeen joljole nguurndam .

The Cartwheel is composed of two rings , a bright inner ring and a colourful outer ring .
The Great Red Spot , a famous storm so big it could swallow Earth , appears white in these views , as do other clouds , because they are reflecting a lot of sunlight .
The JWST is the most powerful telescope launched into space and it reached its final orbit around the sun , approximately 930 , 000 miles from Earths orbit , in January , 2022 .

The auroras shine in a filter that is mapped to redder colors , which also highlights light reflected from lower clouds and upper hazes .

The image of the Sgr A black hole is an average of the different images the EHT Collaboration has extracted from its 2017 observations .
The new view captures light bent by the powerful gravity of the black hole , which is four million times more massive than our Sun .
The technological improvements of the JWST and distance from the sun will allow scientists to see much deeper into our universe with greater detail .
The telescope is named after the event horizon , the boundary of the black hole beyond which no light can escape .
These brilliant red hues , located not only throughout the Cartwheel , but also the companion spiral galaxy at the top left , are caused by glowing , hydrocarbon-rich dust .
This galaxy formed as the result of a high-speed collision that occurred about 400 million years ago .

Thomas Sankara gollii seeɗa tiimtateeɗo , o ferii laawol ngol ɓesnguuji Afirik ngoni he rewde .
Thomas Sankara tawaa ina woni he batu , o fiyaa kure jeeɗiɗi , heen gootal ko e keeci , ɗeya jeegom ko he becce .

Tigerenaaɓe e Ecopianaaɓe e Eritereanaaɓe njaggondiri kolliri njiɗaa hare fawaande e mum en nde .
Tigi !
Tigi , ko on itiiɓe e pine limtinɗe keɓɗe wuurde les daaliiji e joomanduuji ɗi itturi njaajndi diwtundi to woɗɗi laamu nguuraangu hannde nguu , kono ɗi meeɗaa farlude e ɗeen pine e ɗemɗe hay gootolingol momtowol pine gootol ngam woodde maa jaalaade .
Tigi , njoofotoomi ɗoo ko kuulal ngal puunti e fenaande cifortoo kuccam jaŋnde ngenndiire tawa , e jaati , ngal waklitta tan , e mbaydi jinngere e koonaagu , ko kuccam yirwere ngonkiwere wuuranoonde he nder renndo men .
Tigi , to waɗtan kareeli baɗɗinooɗi cañɗi daartol men nder njuuteendi mum , to wortorde jaggondire sahaa nii nderiije , en keɓiino hormaade hurum renndo men , hono heewandere ngonkeele mumen .
Tigi tigi galle oo yeewii no feewi sabu ɓee rewɓe ɗiɗo ɓe lomtotooako !
Tigi tigi ko e kummpa muusɗo wonaa hannde e ndii leydi kono so woote ɗee mbaɗaani , mbar maa dumunna garoowo oo addan hakkillaa mijjtaade , ɓeyɗe hawrude ?
Tigi tigi so a huccitaani e Freres Guissé en ena
Tigilde men hesere ndee arii , yettiima ɗoo .
Tigilde yaltoore e Pulaagu ndee noon , ɓurata tiiɗde e yeewde kelme .
Tiimaale mayri koloñeeri ɓooyɗe ɗee njeyaa ko e nokkuuji ɗi keewaani , ɗo neɗɗo waawi sikkude ko kam woni ɗoon mawɗo .
Tiitoonde
Tiitoonde ardinanoonde e kewu nguu ko " dartagol Waalo njiimaandi koloñaal " .
Tiitoonde kaayit oo ko : " Muritani e ballal mum cuuɗingal feewde e rebel Asawaad en " .
Tiitoonde lefol ngol ena yoni hoore mum , naamndaaki fammineeede !
Tiitoonde lefol ɗiɗmol ngol , ko " Soh Pullo Jeeri " .
Tiitoonde makko ko : Miijo Suleymaani Baal : hol no ngo hesɗinirtee hannde oo ?
Tiitoonde makko wonnoo ko : Fuuta Tooro e darorɗe teeminannde 18ɓere e maale filñitere .
Tiitoonde mayre : " Les contes de Dembayal-l’hyène et de Bodiel-le-lièvre " ( Dembayal-Fowru e Bojel-wojere ) .
Tiitoonde mayre wonnoo ko " Duppoowo naatii Elysée " .
Tiitoonde ndee wonnoo ko : " Ƴeewde peeje ngam haɓde e gollingol yimɓe " .
Tiitoonde ñalawma oo ko " Filñitere Fuuta e hitaande 1776 e binndanɗe mum " Ceerno Suleymaani Baal , yahdiiɓe e Almamaagal .
Tiiɗnee , tiiɗee !
Tiiɗno-ɗeen paamnee kam .
Tijjo hannde ngoo waawaa ɓurde waktuuji 24 .
Timmitan am ɗee kelme , Fuutan ( ke ) , tuma ( raŋke ) , ekn .
Tinndi e daari , e baccooje hanki fof , fowru kam nawii heen geɗal mum timmungal .
Tinndinooje e jalniika , jowitiiɗe e nafoore jaŋde kolliraa , pamminaa e nder nguun jammaagu .
Tinndinooje mum ina tawee haa e Yeewtere hakkunde Njobbo Aadama ari e Tapsiiru Jaabira e gorko Pullo mo o wasiyinoomo e wiyoyde Yeroo Sam Pooli .
Tinndol kam firii hoore mum : ko ko tinndata , ko ko tinndinta won ɗeen geɗe .
Tinndol ko fannu nehdi hakkille cukayel nder renndo men .
Tinndol ko yeewtere tinndinoore ko moƴƴi , reentinoore ko boni , loowoonde jikku moƴƴo , hulɓinoore ekn .
Tiwaande 883 kadi yaltinaa ñalnde 11 Jolal 1993 .
Tiwaande weddaa e yoga e howhowɓe mawɓe Serb-en jeyanooɓe e laamuuji Serbiy , hoore maɓɓe ko Milosevic .
To
To Afrik hakkundeejo , fotde nayaɓe tati ( 3/4 ) jiyɗinaaɓe ɓee njeeyetenoo ko hakkunde Kabinnda e Luwannda , yeru to Uwidaa ( Ouidah ) .
To Almaañ tan 169 neɗɗo maayii heen Ile ɗee mbonnii mahaaɗe e ngaluuji keewɗi .
To Anngolaa , Agostinoo Neto ( mo MPLA ) wullitoyii to Fidel Kastroo e hitaande 1975 mbele ina walla ɗum haɗde Apartaayd lamminde Jonas Sawimmbi ( mo UNITA ) .
To Benee , e nokkuuji ɗiɗi : Womee nokku gonɗo e nder Kotonu , koɗorɗe keewɗe kelanooma , haa addani caɗeele hoɗnooɓe heen ɓee , to Gbahutee to keerol hakkunde Benee e Nijeriyaa , toon hoɗɓe toon ɓee ndañiino caɗeele , sabu depitee gooto teetnoode leyɗe mumen , kono noon e ballal Maalde Huuftodinnde Kareeli ngam Leydi e Ndiyam- Hiirnaange Afrik ( MHHLNd-HA ) , ɗiiɗoo nokkuuji ɗiɗi , maanaa Womee e Gbahutee ndañii heɓtude hakkeeji mumen .
To Beylaan won galle keɓɗo sennguuje 11 fat .
To Bilbasi bempeƴƴe ina ƴera
To Farayse , coodgu simme ustaa , njeeygu mum ɓeydaa , nii woni ɓalli rematnooɓe ɗum ɓee maayi , simmotooɓe mbaɗti addoyde ɗum to Virginie e to Maryland ( Amerik ) , ɗo Jacques II rokki mawɓe katolik en leyɗe ndema jaajɗe , ina ndemna heen jiyaaɓe ɓee simme .
To Gine Bisaaw , ko follo moccungo waɗii toon e sahaa nde hoyreejo leydi ndii e jaagorgal mum garwaniiwal ngonnoo he batu jaagorɗe .
To Gine Bisaawo , tawaama caɗeele e nder nokkuuji tati : Saawo Dominngoo , Paradis e Mansaba .
To Gine konaakiri , fawtii heen tan ko lewru , koninkooɓe ɓee ndergiti laamu Alfaa Konnde he mudda mum tataɓo , he gardagol Mammadi Dummbuyaa .
To Mali so en nduttiima gila e hitaande 2013 wiyeteeɓe " jihadist en ( yoga heen ngardunoo ko e pusgu Libi , caggal maayde Kaddaafi , ngardi e kaɓirɗe mum en , njiimi e rewo Mali ko wayi no Kidal en , Tasaliit en ndaaŋani worgo Mali , haɗi ɗum en yettaade Bamako tan ko " pabagol konu Farayse " dartini ɓe e saraaji wuro Seware , woni leydi ndi fecctiima pecce ɗiɗi .
To Mansaba ko sosiyeetee sinuwaa en gooto woni toon gila ko ina wona duuɓi jeetati ( 8 ) ina feƴƴa ladde ina nawa ina yeeyoya leɗɗe ɗee caggal leydi .
To Maruk , laamu nguu fasnii tan ko ɗemngal Aarabeere e pinal coomingal heen Ngu hiisaaki ko ɓuri 50% e Maruknaaɓe kaalata ko Berbeer walla safatoore .
To Paradis ko palestinnaajo gooto tottaa toon ko ina won 750 ektaar , tawi joom en leydi ɓee ngalaa heen ngartam .
To Pennda Saar ne ko noon .
To Saawoo Dominngoo , ko wuro wooto , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa won arooɓe ina ngasa nokkuuji maɓɓe ina ɓama njaareende , haa ɗum addani nokku oo caɗeele .
To Seeno Kunaa , huunde e galleeji keɓi ko sennguuje 17 , tawi potnoo heɓde ko 18 .
To Senegaal , Federba haɓiima ndeen feere .
To Senluwi rewo Senegaal , haa teeŋti e leegal wi’eteengal Get Ndaar , e bi’ol dillooɓe to banŋe awo , golle maɓɓe ɗen no humondiri e caɗeele ɗuuɗuɗe .
To Sinay , Tsahal boomi belinndeeji ( saaruuji ) Misra , caggal juumre mawnde Saadaat .
To asko , SBM ko taanum Soni Aali Beer Mayga .
To bange Republikee en , Sen .
To bannge Ceerno Mammadu Yuuri , fotnoo wonde tiitoonde jolannde mum ko : Ceerno Suleymaani Baal e yiyannde laamu/ Suleymaani Baal ko moƴƴitinoowo , ko wage jiyoowo ko arata .
To bannge Fulfulde , ngal daawal ina waɗi nafooje , ina waɗi kadi ko naftataa ( kaɗooje )
To bannge Ligisayba Gorgol , ngummorii toon ko Ceerno Aamadu Umaar Sih e Ceerno Mammadu Kan , taani mum Ceerno Aamadu Daabiya .
To bannge Muritani , Jeeriyel Tummbere lasraa ndonaandi ngenndiiri ko he yamiroore nde tonngoode 0846 ñalnde 29 juko ( ut ) 2022 .
To bannge Muritani , ari ko Goomu Pinal Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar Muritani , rewɓe Sooninkooɓe adduɓe njeeygu comci goobaaɗi , rewɓe fulɓe adduɓe comci ñootaaɗi e cuɗaaje rewɓe e safalɓe adduɓe njeeyguuji ɗi siilaaji kewɗi e nate .
To bannge Ndonaandi Lislaamiyaŋkeeri , Jeeriyel lasaa ko ñalnde 04 lewru morso ( sulyee ) 2022 .
To bannge OXFAM o wii wonde yoo en njenane eɓe keblani darodaade e kala daraniiɗo ƴellitde rewɓe , e oo sahaa nii eɓen ummini hirjino manngo lollirngo " cultivons " ( ndemen ) teeŋti noon e nder leyɗeele hirnaange Afiriik ɗo ɗum mawnintee hitaande kala .
To bannge Rewo aɗa yiya , haayre Yulnde e Haayre Tekere , so a yawtii kaaƴel Dem Pete .
To bannge Senegaal , daande maayo , Ngenaar ƴetti ko e Cempeŋ haa ari e Wuro Gaawol .
To bannge Senegaal daande maayo , Booseya tuggi ko e Siñcu Jam Jooro haa bannge worgo Neere Waalo .
To bannge Senegaal daande maayo , Laaw tuggi ko e Abdalla Waalo haa Ɓokki .
To bannge Senegaal jeeri worgo , Yirlaaɓe tuggi ko e Mboolo Aali Siidi haa ari e caaɗngol gonnongol hakkunde Siñcu Jonnge e ɗo wiyetee Mbummba
To bannge Senegaal jeeri worgo , diiwaan oo tuggi ko e Duga sara Ɓokki Jawe haa ɗo wiyetee Koylel Tekke sara Jaaba .
To bannge banngorɗe ( peerorɗe ) , huunde e ɓetooji kollitii ndee feccere : Google Chrome 40% , Internet explorer 29% e Firefox 18% .
To bannge binndol ɓe puɗɗoroo ndiidon tokoson , reftude e toɓɓe , goobde .
To bannge bismaango : ɓe ngari ko ñalnde ( mawnde ) woni aljumaa ina hawri e 24 bowte 2022 , waktu 13ɓo saanga juulal jumaa .
To bannge coccorgal ngam laɓɓinde hunuko mum , ɗuum ko huunde yiɗaande sanne e nder waktuuji joy ɗii kala , kono noon so yejjitaama walla waɗaaka , bonnataa salligi , haɗataa neɗɗo juulde .
To bannge daande maayo Hebbiyaaɓe tuggi ko e Rufi Aawdi o haaɗi ko caaɗngol Sawo Taato hakkunde Daawalel e Mbaañ .
To bannge daartol , e wiyde Seek Muusaa Kamara mo Ganngel , Barooɓe mbaɗi ngummorii ko bannge funnaange , e nokku biyeteeɗo Bornu .
To bannge deftere Alla ndee , yo ɓe mbaaw ko famɗi fof cimooje 5 , tawa ko Faatiha ardii .
To bannge duwaaw , neɗɗo waawaa taƴtude ɗeeɗoo maaje caɗeele ɗe o taƴti , gila e caɗeele ɗanle ngam ɗaɓɓitere ganndal , peli won e seernaaɓe Fuuta e wondiiɓe mumen haa bile laamu noppi-boɗeeji e jagge mumen , maayo fof e wune mum tawi joom mum wondaani e duwaaw jaabaaɗo .
To bannge ekkol o janngii haa tolno tataɓo jaŋde hakkundeere ( 3em ) .
To bannge galleeji , ɗiiɗoo teskinii e ñalawma oo , Galle Muktaar Yero Kudeeje Kebe , Galle Elimaan Hammee Kebe , Galle Ceerno Hammee Baro , Galle Ceerno Demmba Gasamma , Galle Ceerno Mammadu Yaayaa Dem , Galle Ceerno Hammadi Mali Sih to Jaarangel , Galle Ceerno Mohammadu Isaaqa to Mbotto , Galle Ceerno Muusaa Sahnuun Kebe to Cilaa e Galle Ceerno Haadii Wele to Waasetaake .
To bannge geɗe ñaaweteeɗe ɗee ko 5
To bannge goɗɗo , eɗen nganndi , e lasli , battingol Ahl al-Shaykh Sidiyya mbattini e laawol Muridaagal Sheex Ahmadu Bammba , keewɗo kam ne almudɓe safalɓe ( Sid Ahmad wul Asmuhu ) kam e yah-ngartaaji batte hakkunde laawol tijaaniyaa ibraahimiyya Kawlak dow Idawaali en hirnaange worgo Tararsa , sarnooɓe ngool laawol ɓee .
To bannge goɗɗo oo , jeyaaɓe e ndaɗɗudi amen , coftanaano ɗuum sabu e sikke maɓɓe en ndiwtii keeri ko yowitii e ndeen toɓɓere .
To bannge goɗɗo oo , mbayliigu jeyi leydi 1983 ina fotnoo wonde taaɓal mawngal , e coktirgal moƴƴal ngam ñawndude caɗeele nguura e nder leydi hee , walla kam wona fartaŋŋe tabitinde kisal nguura , tawa kadi ina ñawnda tooñannge fawaange e hardaneeɓe e jiyaaɓe e jibinannde jiyaaɓe to leƴƴi ɓaleeji .
To bannge hattan , omo nawa 380 juuloowo .
To bannge hooraagu teddungal kewu nguu , toɗɗe njani ko e Ceerno Madaani Taal , Aamadu Muktaar Mboh , gardinooɗo njuɓɓudi Unesco e Galle Baalɓe to bannge Muritani .
To bannge jaagorɗe , ngari e innde laamu nguu ko Mammadu Talla , jaagorgal heblo golle ( ministre de la formation professionnelle ) e Mahmuud Salleh , jiiloowo geɗe gollordu Persidaa Makki Sal ( Directeur du cabinet du Président Macky Sall ) .
To bannge jaaynooɓe farayse ko Njaay Saydu Aamadu nawi raay .
To bannge jagge laamu , ɓe njokkondirii e keewɗe haa teeŋti e biyeteeɗo Seneraal Njaga Jeŋ , teddiniraaɗo ñalɗi ɗii , mo nganndu-ɗaa , golle mum ena ceedtaa no feewi e nder nokku oo .
To bannge jaɓɓungal too : En tawtoraama e innde fedde ɓamtaare pulaar , ko sete fotde otooji nayi njaɓɓoyii ɓe to posto polis naatirde Nuwaadibu .
To bannge jime ko " D’ombres et d’échos " mo Pappa Muusa Sih e " Je suis un ange " mo Pappa Sammba Kan .
To bannge karallaagal , ko ɗum huunde saɗtunde
To bannge karallaagal , naatnude karallagal kesal e nder ndema tawa ina huutoree kaɓirɗe jaaduɗe e kaan ndema , To bannge renndo , newnande remooɓe ɓesngu Moritani kala , teeŋti noon hoɗdiiɓe ɓe ngalaa leydi , e dow nanondiral , heɓde leydi tawa ko ndi huutoraaka .
To bannge kumpital , caaktirɗe kabaruuji , gila e teleeji , rajooji haa e dingire Watsap , taƴondiraani jaayɗe mumen ko ena wona hannde lebbi ɗiɗi .
To bannge lempooji , eɗi peccitii e pecce tati : zakat ( asakal ) , jizya , lempoo mo dhimmi en njoɓata ( kubbal ngal ɓe ngonaa juulɓe poti tottude so ina njiɗi heddaade e leydi hee ) e sadaqa ( sadak dokketeeɗo tawa wonaa e dow waawnere ) , ɗii ɗoon lempooji tan ina naatnana ɓe 70% e dañal maɓɓe , petoroŋ e gaas ko ɓurnoo waɗde yaakaare koo , jibinaani ɗo yiɗiranoo nii sabu yoga e isinaaji ɗii ko bommbardaaɗi .
To bannge leɗɗe e kaɓirɗe cafrirɗe kadi ndoondiima fotde 300 .
To bannge mbinndiin , ceerundal kelmeendi e celluka majje ina famɗi .
To bannge nawliigu bonngu karmungu no mbiru daa nih noon miin njiyannde men ina ceerti .
To bannge ndefu kadi , 100 mbana toggaama .
To bannge njulaagu , Geofencing ko feere njeeygu tuugiinde e anndude aada coodoowo , teskiinde nokku woni oo , gollorteende neldugol neɗɗo mesaas so arii walla yaltii nokku toɗɗaaɗo .
To bannge njuuteendi , ko kanko e jom galle makko Aadama poti darɗe .
To bannge posto , o golliima e ɗeeɗoo gure : Sigaasoor , kawlak e Kommbol .
To bannge saakto : Rajo Timtimol ina heɗtee ɗo e wuro ngoo waktu 14ɓiijo kala .
To bannge teddungal hakkunde Alhajji Aali Jallo e hoɗɓe mum , ko ɗoon tan teddungal haaɗi , ruttii .
To bannge tinndinoore maa mbiyen njalniika , ko goomu pinal catal ngal nootitii .
To bannge tuugnorgal , min njahrata ko daawe tuugnaade e ko ɓuri jojjude e fawaade e kattante fedde ndee to bannge ngalu .
To bannge waɗatnooɓe heblo karallaagal ɗowgol golle ne , ko Aamadu Umaar Jah towni to bannge toɓɓe e to bannge ñiiɓal .
To bannge weertaango , dingiral jumaa ngal ko 600 m2 .
To bannge wonde hakkunde , pulfule Maasina e Haayre e Rewo Burkina ɓuri ɗoon teskinde .
To bannge worgo , Lowre yehii haa Duɗe bagge , Lowre seerti e Damga ko hedde hitaande 1920 .
To bannge ɗemɗiyaagal , gootal he ɗee ɗemɗe fof ko caltol ɗemngal gootal , ɗe ƴellitii gootal fof bannge mum .
To batirdu Sankara , ko kanko kadi halfinanoo ndeenka saraaji mum e kala ko ina dilla ɗoon .
To batte junngo ngoo noon firti ko kattanɗe Alla .
To batte ɓeeɗoo ɗiɗo , adii e dingiral ko Usmaan Hammadi Joop e goomu mum .
To baŋnge Holannda , daartol firlitiima e maɓɓe nde ngal kawral woni laawol tataɓol ko eɓe kawee e wattan kawgel winndere .
To baŋnge pulaagu , Baaba meeɗaa yeebaade ittande-en geɗal haa timma .
To baɗte jimol too noon , e ooɗoo sahaa annduɓe heewɓe kawri so tawii Gellaay janngunoo ko Quraana , o wiyetenoo ko waliyyu , sabu no o yimirta nii , hay gooto yiyaaka ko adii mo e ko sakkitii mo ine yimira noon .
To daande maayo too , laamu nguu , e konu nguu , e doole kisal ngoppi woɗɓe ina owna beeli yimɓe nokku oo , yimɓe ɓe mbiyaani mbaɗaani .
To dow ko laana njirleewa ( njirla ) ERO potka heɓtude konteneer mooftirɗo seedeeji ɗii , artira ɗum leydi .
To e leydi Mandela , Afrik du Sud , moni kala nana noosa .
To garde ngenndi , min njogii ko lietnaa kolonel gooto .
To guddi naage to noonn , ñalawma kuurɗo ko balɗe men 25 .
To gulli leydi too , tekkeendi mayri ine waawi yettaade meeteruuji keewɗi .
To hakkunde Leydi to , woni toon ko aaludere leydi .
To hoodere Jaayre ( Wenus ) -ne ko noon , sabu , so ngarɗaa ko ñalawma , njettotoɗa ko aɗa wont " misuwi " ( bisimilla ma misuwi !
To hoodere jaayre , ma hitaande darto mo wuuri tawa naange fuɗnge toon nge mutaani tawo !
To hoodere jaayre , maa hitaande dartoo mo wuuri , tawa naange fuɗnge toon ngee , mutaani tawo !
To hoodere jaayre , so a dariima a huccitii Rewo mayre , junngo ma ñaamo heedtata ko hirnaange nano ngo heedta futnaange ( wayata ko ad1 a woni e leydi aɗa hucciti worgo nih ) .
To iw-ɗaa too ina woɗɗi , ma mi artu e daartande ma hanki maa e kala sahaa .
To jaambareeɓe cunnotonoo koyɗe arɓe .
To jeeri walla waalo , woni jeereende , ko he ɗiin nokkuuji jawdi lakde heewi wuurde .
To jooɗorɗe metewo , ko ooɗo gaas feewnetee , wuttee e nder paali dalli ( e nder mankaaji ) , ɗalee " haya " e weeyo , weɗoo faya dow .
To karallaagal ñaawooje , buntugol ñaawoore firti ko so nde yaltii daawal nde fotnoo waɗde .
To lemi-ɗaa kala njiyaa gaaɓɗi laaɓɗi , ñamri gite tufam noppi haa waɗii garnooɗo Jowol fof yeewnii ɗum gila nde hooti janngo mum .
To leydi Siiri , ɗee ngoppidii heen leydi Ruusi e leyɗeele ballondiije ɗum .
To mayre , naange fuɗirta ko hirnaange no tagofeere Wenus nii , so ɗum ƴeewdaama e leydi , sabu toon kadi yiiloo-banngoo o weñciti .
To naange to , e nder 100 fof , gaas ndiyameejo ma roondo heen 70 e keewal .
To nde woni too , ina woɗɗi no feewi , sibu annoore ina waɗa 50 miliyoŋ hitaande ngam taccude yolnde hakkunde mayre e Leydi men ndii .
To neɗɗo ɗo woni kala ina nana iidaango majji .
To ngoon senngo , Fulɓe inana kaɓtoo , Fulɓe
To o wonni e dow lekki kii , waandu sooynii ɗi ngara .
To oon bannge , e miijo men , Google pot-ɗen ɓurde rokkude hoore , ndewnen heen Apple , Microsoft , mbaasen welsindaade ko heddii koo kadi .
To oon bannge , eɗen nganndi Unesco kañum taƴii haala kaa gila 1953 nde wagginta leyɗeele ɗee nde kuutortoo ɗemɗe mum en neeniije he ( muuynangal ) nder jangɗeele mum en .
To oon bannge , garaangal 5G maa naatnu geɗe keewɗe , kese , baylooje ko woowaa hannde koo .
To oon bannge , laamu ngu maa waɗ fotde mum haa timma ngam artirde e ngenndi mum en ɓiɗɓe yummiraaɓe men mooliiɓe caggal leydi ɓe .
To oon bannge , laamu nguu maa waɗ fotde mum haa timma ngam artirde he ngenndi mum en ɓiɗɓe yummiraaɓe men mooliiɓe caggal leydi ɓee .
To oon bannge oɗon nganndi pelle pinal ɗee , gila cosaa , keptinaa ( FƁPM 1976 , AMPLCS 1978 , APROLAWO 1980 ) , ndaranii ko yo ɗemɗe ɗee ɓamte , e sahaa mo yoga e pelle politik ( gollotonooɗe he suuɗaare ) ndaraninoo ɗemngal Farayse .
To paa-ɗen ?
To polis , amin njogii gardo ( directeur ) gooto e komiseer gooto e juurnittooɗo ( inspecteur ) gooto .
To sakket to , nelaaɓe ɗiɗo cuɓaama yettinoyde ɓataake ngooɗoo duko .
To sorfundu Biyafara ko hakkunde ujunnaaje 9 haa 12 dahaaɗohitaande kala haa 1840 .
To taabal yeewtooɓe , fotde 11 ceerno ina mbinndanoo e doggol hee .
To tolni-ɗaa e Kungel kala a nanat haacaango pelɓondiral ngal .
To tolni-ɗaa kala a nanat gulaali kiliyaneeɓe ɓee .
To tolnii- ɗaa kala a nanat daande makko , omo wiya : " wooy am , mi lorlii sukaaɓe am sabu jawdi .
To wuro Fanay-Ñakwaar .
To yahaa artaa kalawiɗtooɓe ɓee kala kolliti wonde ɗemɗe ɗee ina njeydi .
To yahaa artanoo kala hawraa batu kuuɓtodinngu ngu jooɗotoo dewo-ho’re-biiru tataɓo e lewru kala , sahnga waktujji tati pawɗi hojomaaji capanɗi tati ñalawma .
To yaltirde , maa en keɓ heen faamu ɓurɗo seeɓde feewde e nduu jiiɓru fattooru , nganndoren heen huunde e sababuuji tammbiiɗi ɗi to ɓurɗi luggiɗde .

Tokara Saar , a jaaraama
Tolno maggo ko toɓɓe 6 , 9 wonnoo , e ngo jaasi yerɓo hannde ngo toɓɓe ɗiɗi , ɓurondiral mawngal no feewi ( semmbe yerɓo hannde ngo ina sowoo laabi 60 semmbe maggo ) , kono kanngo ɓuri boomde yimɓe nde tawnoo eeɓi maggo ko e wuro he ngoni " .
Tolno toowngo ɗo paw-mi ngo ɗoo addanii kam mahde danki miijanteeri ndaɗɗiiki kala golle am paatuɗe e ɓamtaare dow miijo dartoriingo ngardiigu Renndo yeeso geɗe bayɗe no Ngenndi , maa Laamu , walla nii ko innatee Ndenndaandi .
Tolnooji jaŋde ɗii ko tati : tolno gaggaaji , tono lesleso , e tolno hakkundeejo ; ɗii ngoni alaa e sago gooto fof waɗa ɗum en ɗii .
Tommbo-ɗee min e jaaynde faynde , daartol ngol na jokki , hay so engol hulɓinii jaŋtaade !
Tonngee fiyee jinngooɓe ngoodaani .
Tonngiren ɗo ko ngowluno-ɗen nder maanditaare nde Mammadu Demmba Sih ( yo yuurmeende Allah wone he mum ) yuɓɓinannoo mo : Ko ɗam ɓanndu ɗam ƴoogi ɗam ɓunndu ɗam , gollotonooɓe ngollee , aduna daraaki ko ko yirlotoo .
Tonngoode 31 fotnoo yaltude ko e mee 1989 , hawri e ewenmaaji , fuɗɗoode dumunna sunu e caɗeele teeŋtuɗe wonande leñol ngol .
Tonngoode 31 ndee saraa ko e ñalɗi mawningol hitaande 30ɓiire Fedde ndee ( 3 e 4 suwee 2006 ) .
Tonngoode 32 ko noon golloraa .
Tonngoode makko kasoo ko : 46864 .
Toon , ina waɗɗinaa e sukaaɓe yahrooɓe hakkunde duuɓi 6 e duuɓi 16 , janngineede , nder ekkolaaji maɓɓe , binndanɗe paatuɗe e " waawde anndannde banndum " .
Toon , yolnde wonnde hakkunde puɗal e puɗal ina abbo e lebbi men ɗiɗi : ( Hakkunde subaka hannde e subaka janngo e dow mayre , maa abbo lebbi 2 ) .
Toon kam sikkitaare alaa toon tawde kay e teemedere wonɓe toon ɓee , heen 60 ko Hooreejo leydi ndii suɓanii ɗum hoore mum .
Toon ngonataa ko e hayde .
Toon noon ena wuli sanne ; nguleeki maa yah haa 10 000 degere ( e ɓetagol wulɓuuɓndi ) .
Toon nyalawa ɓuri juutde e hitaande .
Toon so a werliima haayre artataa , haare nde alaa ko leydi waawi e mayre hay batte .
Toon to Japon , sariya ina dotti ɗo teddiindi gorko e debbo poti haaɗde .
Toon ñalawa ɓuri juutde e hitaande .

Toppittoo lelnugol tuugorɗe ɗemɗiyaagal jaŋde ɗemngal arab wonande ɓe kaalataa ɗum ko njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije eɓɓaandi les ɗoo ndii .
Torombektomi sakkitii waɗtude huutoreede : ndee feere ko ɓuucaade heɗɗere sukkunde ɗaɗol ngol , rewrude e ɗaɗol cukkingol ngol .
Toromboliis oo ko naatnirde ( pinngude ) ɗaɗol gartol ñawɗo oo huunde saaynoyoore heɗɗere ƴiiƴam sukkiinde e ɗaɗol hoore ngol .
Toteŋ jaabtii mo ooɗoo telegaraam : " Gure Tooro keewɗe , hono Gede , e Njum , e Giyaa , mbaɗdii e waraaɓe ɓe junngo e faandu .

Toɓo toɓani , ilam ilaani .
Toɓɓaaɗe fof ɗe o joofinoo njettodiima no haaniri nii .
Toɓɓe ɗiɗi ngonnoo e ginol golle batu nguu
Toɓɓe ɗiɗi teeŋtuɗe ine potnoo yeewteede heen , hono ko faati e peeje potɗe sakkeede e darnde leyɗe winndere ɗee poti daraade ngam deŋde ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo , kam e lomtinangol leyɗe pamare ɗee baɗte kawjugol ngonka weeyo
Toɓɓere nde ngadduɗen hannde ndee non faati e hakkillantaagal baɗaangal e nder masinaaji no wi’e e ɗemngal faransiire " Intelligence Artificielle " Ɗum non ko eɓɓo yuɓɓinaango ngam ñeemtinde hakkille aaden ( neɗɗo ) pawiiɗo e callalal ( Algorithme ) gede karalle kese jowitiiɗe e enformatik .
Toɓɓere woɗde ndee faati ko he geɗe baawɗe siforeede jaɓɓugol sariya kaɓtotooɗo borjingol jawdi leydi .
Toɓɓere woɗnde tampinnde en , ko gooto fof yiɗde wiyeede ko " ngenndiyanke " , ruttoo kadi waasa faamondirde e nanndo mum .
Toɗɗe ɗee mbaɗtii hoolaare fayde e John Atta Mills e dow lannda John Kufuor , gonɗo e laamu ɗii duuɓi jeenay .
Toɗɗe ɗee nuɓɓinaama ngam suɓaade howhowɓe les meeriyaŋkooɓe ( Freeholders ) .

Tuddunde ine anniyaa sompeede toon he ndeeɗoo sappannde ( he ɗii duuɓi sappo ) .
Tuddunde maɓɓe ɓurnde himmude nder Caad woni ko to wuro Tanwa , sara keerol Libiya .
Tufnde ndee ina heewi nafoore wonande Riisi , kono ko nde farwunde .
Tuggi 1550 laamɓe Konngo e Anngolaa mbaɗti waɗdude ɓuraa waawde yeeyde Purtugeec en jiyaaɓe .
Tuggi 2013 o fuɗɗii saaktude , rewrude he jaayɗe , sirruuji NSA mawɗi , joopiiɗi nanngugol keɓe ko yimɓe kaalata he telefoŋ to Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) , kam e keɗagol jokkondire internet E wiyde makko , alaa ko o waɗiri ɗum so wonaa " haalande yimɓe bone baɗeteeɗo he innde mum kam e bonannde tiindaande he mum " .
Tuggi 8 fayi dow , heewaani waɗde ( laawol gootol hitaande kala ) , kono so waɗii heewi ko boomde .
Tuggi 89 faade hannde , loranooɓe e ngenndiyankooɓe tigi rigi ɓee , meeɗaa deƴƴude .
Tuggi ko Fooyre Ɓamtaare ƴettiti golle faade hannde , alaa geɗal ngal juɓɓule laamu leydi ndii ngittani ɗum .
Tuggi ko e Suleymaani Kan , Bah Mammadu Siley , Saawo Umar Idiriisa , e Aamadu Umaar Jah , wonii yimɓe nayo ngardiima fedde nde .
Tuggi nde firo ngoo fuɗɗaa faade hannde , ko ina abboo e 100 000 konngol pulaama maa " ngootanaama " kono ko foti noon walla ko ɓuri ɗuum ina heddii
Tuggi ndeen , jaagordu nduu felliti abbitaade e miijo dallinannde pelle ɗee , e jaɓde gartirgol jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Tuggi ndeen feewde jooni , iiñcuru mawndu nani e nder leydi hee : njanguuji jihadist en ina jokki , leƴƴi leydi ndii inan peccii ina njanondira , laamu nguu nii ina tuumaa won ɓe wuuranii heen , ɓuri lorde e ɗuum fof ko fulɓe ɓee .
Tuggi ndeen haa jooni ko ɗuum waɗi juulɓe mbaɗti juulde ɗoon e dow haayre ndee , ɗum jeytaa e sunnaaji hajju .
Tuggi noon feccere 2010 feewde ñalawma hannde oo , alaa bonannde nde Al Qayda waɗi e leydi hee .
Tuggi oon ñalawma , o daranii he nder leydi makko ko haɓanaade jeytaare mum mbele ina rimɗa e njiimaandi Belge en .
Tuggi sulyee faade jooni , JW weltinirii leydinaaɓe nate jooɗɗe .
Tuggi tan ɗo ngon-ɗaa ɗo , haa Amerik , haa Sappoŋ , haa Riisii , haa Siin , haa Madagaskaar , haa ɗo mbaaw-ɗaa miijaade e leyɗeele , ko noon ne tagopeeje mbayi .
Tuggi ñalawma 23 mee 2020 , 27 neɗɗo tawaama ina ngondi heen caggal nde wiyaa " gasii he leydi hee " , ɗum firti ko ñawu nguu ko fuɗɗii feeñde e leydi hee , haa e ñalawma hannde oo , 26/05/2020 , fotde 262 neɗɗo piɗaama , 9 cankiima heen , 15 heen cellii .
Tuggi ɗo ngon-ɗaa ɗoo e Afrik haa to Amerik , haa to Ostaraalii , haa Riis , haa Japoŋ , haa , haa , haa cikkaa alaa to haaɗi .
Tuggi ɗo ngonɗaa ɗo e Afik haa to Amérik , haa to ostaraalii , haa Riis , haa Sapoŋ , haa , haa , haa cikkaa alaa to haaɗi .
Tuggude , ɗiɗmiti ɗum ko Gine Bisaawu , hay so tawii juutaani , fayi Gine Konaakiri , hay so tawii ko teŋre kadi waɗaa kuudetaa , arti e Gine Bisaawo , caggal warngo gardiiɗo konu mum , hono Tagme Na Waye jamma 1 fayi ɗiɗi marse 2009 .
Tuggude 17 Seeɗto , Idiris Debi yamiri yoo ndeenka wuro Njamena semmbine .
Tuggude 1963 fayde 1964 , ko diisnondirɗo ambassadeur Muritani to dowla Farayse .
Tuggude 1967 fayde 1975 , ko o biɗtoowo e nder duɗal IFAN ngal .
Tuggude Kayhayɗi haa yettii Sehilbaabi , ƴaaŋan maa gure mawɗe gonɗe e yolnde he , kolonel yahi heen ko gooto , alaa mo yahdi .
Tuggude e 9w30h subaka haa 13w30h caggal midi , darnde ko wootere , dadungal ko gootal , waaƴo ko wooto .
Tuggude e Wuro Funeeɓe , Dumgaaji tati deggondirɗi , Mbooloyel , Ɓoki Jawe , Daabiya Oodeeji , Kiɓɓillo , Taabe dow e les , Cilon , Cilon Tokosel , Kaaƴe-Pawe , Aañameeji , Wuro Moolo , Njaakiri e Asnde Balla haa Jaaba alaa wuro heddiingo .
Tuggude e hitaande 1951 haa e hitaande 1953 , ko o nantinoowo ( interprete ) o wonnoo ɗo Ɓoggee ɗoo .
Tuggude e hitaande 1962 haa e hitaande 1963 , ko kanko woni jonaaɗo jooɗaniiɗo Muritani to Unesco .
Tuggude e koolol 1 haa hikka Baaba Maal meeɗaani luuteede .
Tuggude e ndeen hitaande , fayde ɗoo , ɗo wonaa hannde ɗoo , so wonaa ko ɓeydii e fiɓnde maɓɓe walla e njuɓɓudi maɓɓe , alaa ko yahtiri heen caggal .
Tuggude e weenndoogo haa naange darii e feññaange ( feeñ-naange ) walla kirsal layyaaji , maraysanaaɓe ndarodii ko e ndiyam , hakkunde horsude e weccude .
Tuggude gila e Khalifaaɓe feewɓe ɓee ( Khulafaa’ ar-Raashiduun ) haa yettii laamu Umawiyyah en , yonta heen kala addii ballal mum he ƴellitde pinal Islaam e ɗemngal Arab .
Tuggude he 2STV ɗo Hammee gollata ɗo , Radio Tele Fulɓe , Piindi TV , Amani TV haa Daakaa Media TV , haa e rajooji nder leydi ko wayno RTS Maatam , e hakkunde leyɗeele ko wayno RFI , fof tawtoraama kadi ɓannginii piilngal ngal gila yontaani .
Tuggude he hitaande 2000 ñalngu ngu ene mawninee e nder leyɗeele aduna ɗe kala .
Tuggude nde o dañi ɗokkere , o fiɓi fiɓnde makko wonde so woodii hankadi o sifortee ko ganndo ɗokko kono wonaa gaynaako ɗokko , ndeen fiɓnde meeɗaani rostaade hay leƴƴannde haa ɗo o ruttii e joomiiko ɗoo .
Tugnaa ko e haatumeere lewru .
Tuma nde defte lomtii werlaaji he dow kallu ; nde gannde kam e daarti nafooji , jime e coñce pinndinooje lomtii kornaali e reeno-reeno hakkunde werlaaji e yahooɓe .
Tuma nde duɗal ngal udditta , en tintiniino banndiraaɓe .

Tuubaako gardinooɗo serkal Podoor oo horii tamde diiwaan oo fof e juuɗe mum , sabu baŋ-yoo-baŋ ko piyanɗe , e kure , e conndi , ina kuccinee e tuubakooɓe ɓee , gila e Tooro haa e diiwanuuji saraaji mum .
Tuubakooɓe Daŋana e wondiiɓe mum en mbeltii heen , ngati kulol fuɗɗinooma naatde ɓe .
Tuubakooɓe Farayse , Riis e Engele e Espaañ , e Aarabeeɓe fof ko noon mbiyata ɗum e nder ganndal koode .
Tuubakooɓe Farayse mahi jooɗorde mum en to wuro Hamdallaay e hitaande 1895 .
Tuubakooɓe ina ngaadorinoo , so ɓe liɓii laamɗo , ɓe mbaawnii ɗum naatde e konu maɓɓe , ɓe mbaɗata ɗum e nder konu maɓɓe ko gardiiɗo , hono " ofisiyee " tuubakooɓe .
Tuubakooɓe mballitii Dammel no feewi : ɓe ndokki mo kure , conndi e petelaaji ; kaŋko Dammel o hunanii ɓe maccuɓe ɓe adii honde kala , o foolii !
Tuubakooɓe mbiyi " kala ɗo omo yaha tawata ko omo fiilii kaala haa yeeso makko majji .
Tuubakooɓe nde ngari , won ko ngardi kañum en ne .
Tuubakooɓe pawi he maɓɓe kubbal muusngal fawtii he ko ɓe ngaadorinoo yoɓde .
Tuubakooɓe ɓee , ɓeleeɓe arnooɓe fof mbiyi
Tuubakooɓe ɓee mbeltiima sanne e fiyngo maɓɓe , ngo ɓe
Tuubakooɓe ɓee yiɗde mumen e men yettaaki e men haa ko eɓe mbaɗa jawɗeele potɗe e yiɗde toŋtude ɗemɗe men , ko caatogol ŋakkanɗe karallaagal janngingol tan wuurti ɓe e ɗuum .
Tuug : Mbaydiiji e Coñce Pulaar to hirnaange Afrik ; huunde e jeese worgo-Muritani/ Teen-Yuusuf Gey .
Tuugnaade e ngalɗoo piɓondiral , maa Nanondiral siife wonande mudda duuɓi 20 , kono ɓetteteengal e kala sahaa , kadi baawngal yedditeede so woodii bannge he banngeeji ɗiɗi ɗii baasɗo huuɓnude ko huninoo koo .

Tuugnorgal Siin ngal ina sirlaa no feewi , tee ine sikkaa jotondirde e konu .
Tuugnorgal Winnderewal Nguura ( Programme Alimentaire Mondial , PAM ; walla he Engele World Food Programme , WFP ) ko njuɓɓudi ballal nguura wonande Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe ( ONU ) kam e FAO .
Tuugnorgal ngal maa aaɓnu ƴeewndagol kaɓirɗe e lelnugol peeje wonande lappi jogorɗi yuɓɓineede faade tagofeere Mbaañ ( Mars ) .
Tuugnorgal ñalawma oo haalaa ko e ɗemɗe tati : Pulaar , Wolof e Farayse .
Tuugude 1869 haa 1880 , Alfaa Moolo haɓi ko e koniŋkooɓe Foode Kabaa Dumbuya .
Tuumaa warngo ngoo ko gorko jahroowo e duuɓi 32 .
Tuumanooɓe ɓee ndañaani hakke jogaade keedoowo , keedanoowo ɗum en ñalnde ñaawoore ndee .
Tuumanooɓe ɓee ne , caggal balɗe joyi ( 5 ) kaalis yoɓaa , ɓe mbaɗanaa testa , ɓe mbiyaa ɓe ceertii e Covid-19 , ɓe ngaccaa , ɓe koooti Poor Lokoo .

Ubbaango mum hina nanee to woɗɗi .
Uddaaɓe he ndee jeereende , ceenee , kaɓɓondiree , " puusnee " barille dow haayre , so ñawii kaɗee safaara , fotde noogaas mbaɗee he cuurel gootel Jaŋtotaako .
Uddata yontere ndee Ko gorko mo Bahbahɓe Looti , lolluɗo e innde Mammadu Dem .
Uddital ngal ena tijjaa ko jooɗngal jogori wonde , sabu ko pine e cosaan Afrik ɓe njogori hollirde e dille udditirɗe kawgel ngel , hade kawral ngal fuɗɗaade .
Udditi hiirde ndee ko Hammaat Muusaa Joop kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi fedde ndee .
Udditi yeewtere ndee ko hooreejo Dental ngal , hono biyeteeɗo Mammadu Baro ( e jokkondiral e ayaawo ) .
Udditi ñalngu nguu ko konngol hooreejo FƁPM , hono Bookara Aamadu Bah , ɗo o siftini daartol Ñalngu nguu , kam e nafoore wonnde e janngingol sukaaɓe he nder ɗemɗe mum en neeniije gila e fuɗɗoode , e himme mawɗo mo UNICEF rokki ɗuum , Caggal ɗuum , hooreeɓe teddungal kam e hooreeɓe pelle woɗɓe e jagge tawtoranooɗe ɗee , kam e almudɓe janngunooɓe he duɗe ƴeewndorɗe yuɓɓuɓe e nder fedde Belaa e fedde almuɓɓe Umar Demmba Jallo , mbaawii seedtaade nafoore jaŋde ɗemngal neeniwal .

Uhuhuh
Ujunere neɗɗo mbiyata ko kaŋko janngini mi naalaŋkaagal kono jibinaaɓe e Waande ena nganndi ɗuum , mawniraaɓe amen ɓee ena nganndi ɗuum .
Ujunnaaje ( guluuje ) nayo neɗɗo mbinnditii heen .
Ujunnaaje e ujunnaaje kaaƴe goɗɗe ena ɗoon , ene ngondi e majje , kañje fof eɗa mbaɗi gori-gori , eɗe taaroo naange no tagopeeje ɗee nii .
Ujunnaaje jeegom ( 6 000 ) ndeen to Gadelup , ko 6% yimɓe hoɗnooɓe toon .
Ujunnaaje kanaaluuji Youtube ene taƴee ñalnde kala , konee paatire bannge goɗɗo , hono no piindi e Fouta Vision taƴiraa ni .
Ujunnaaje ujunaaje konteneer nana tan njaha ina ngarta hakkunde leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee .
Ujunnaaje ujunnaaje Afgannaaɓe ndogani boowal diwooje Kabul ngam dogde , won heen jarani ɗum en nangtaade e diwooje konu gonɗe e diwde , hade mum en ɓoccitaade njana he leydi hojomaaji seeɗa caggal ɗuum .
Ujunnaaje ujunnaaje Iraknaaɓe , ɓe alaa ko mbiyi , alaa ko mbaɗi , maayii heen , sibu ɓe mbaɗi tan ko yo bon , yo Alla bonnu , ɓe paltaaki koninkooɓe e siwil en .
Ujunnaaje ujunnaaje koode gonɗe e jibineede ine peeñi he ngalɗoo natal kesal .

Ummbuyi !
Ummee cosen renndo hakkunbdeleyɗiiwo kuuwtoro-ɗen sarɗiiji UNESCO ɗi leyɗeele men ɗee ciifi ngam wiyde : " Min ngoppataa laamu ena wara neeniwal amen " !

Unicode ko tuugnorgal nanondiragal hakkunde huutortooɓe ɗemɗe e nder masiŋaaji loowɗi gannde kese ngam alkulal kala goodngal tawa masiŋaaji fof ena keftina sabu mum jogaade tonngoode heeriide .
Unicode ko ɓamtaare mawnde wonande woottiɗinde jaltingol binndi e masiŋaaji sabu ko kañum lomtii ko wiyetenoo " dokkol kelle " ( code page ) .

WE SALAAM
Wa salaam
Waade no moƴƴi E wadde ko feewi .
Waaji maa hiiri caali Jakkaa haa geeƴe njoni , o reggini Sammba Kaari en , o wiyi ɓe " njahen galle kirtoyo-ɗen " .
Waalankooɓe ñaamataa gundo , sabu gundo ñaamata ko ko ɓuri haaɓnaade .
Waalde ndee ene renndini he nder mum , kaadar en , haala-heɗee en , ƴellitooɓe faggud , remooɓe , aynaaɓe e sukaaɓe rewɓe e worɓe .
Waaliiji Barakna e Tararsa e haakemaaji Ɓoggee e Rooso e mawɓe ronndismaaji Darel Barka e Likseyba e Teekaan e Jidr el Mohgen neldaa tumbitte ɓataake oo .
Waaliiji ɗii e haakemeeji yo ɗow yimɓe ɓee , kadi SONADER maa ɓamte ƴellitee haa jogoo mbaadi ndi joginoo adan ndii .
Waalo Barak heɓi hoore mum tigi-rigi ko hakkunde hitaande 1550 e hitaande 1600 .
Waalo Barak huufi ko huunde e rewo Senegaal kam e worgo Muritani .
Waalo Barak jeyaa ko e diiwanuuji ummiiɗi e pusgu laamaandi wolof en mbiyeteendi Jolof e teeminannde ƳVI .
Waalo feccii : feccere ndee woni e njiimaandi Eli Jommbot mo doole mum ummorinoo ɗum to Baaba mum en safalɓe Tararsa , safalɓe Tararsa bonondirɓe e Faraysenaaɓe , himmiranɓe halfude Waalo .
Waalo noon ko diiwaan kuufɗo yupporde maayo mawngo , rewo mum e worgo mum .
Waamo ( débit ) enternet makko ( ko o jippinta e keɓe e mudda dotaaɗo ) oo heewaani ɓurde 2 Mbps ( megaabituuji 2 nder leƴƴannde kala ) .
Waamo makko pattamlamo to bannge tooweeki , sibu , kanko fof wonde e telefoŋ , maa ɓadoyo walla nii o ɓurtoo waamo leeɓol giiɗal ( fibre optique ) , woni ko ɓuri 1 Gbps ( jigaabit leƴƴannde kala ) , tee njaaweeki makko maa sowoyo mo 4G oo fotde laabi 100 , sowoyoo mo 3G oo fotde laabi 2 500 .
Waande .
Waandu immi dow lekki kii , jippi less , yaɓɓi e laasi nooro , usti gooto .
Waandu ummii darii wiꞌi ɓe so on njiɗii anndude goonga oo , njarnee min ko tuutnata .
Waandu wiꞌi ɓe cabbi teemedde tati .
Waandu woni e amde sabu sabu weltaare .
Waandu woppi banaana oo aaɓani lekki leemunna .
Waasataa tawa ɗeen peeje ene keewi , kono eɗen nganndi heen kam wootere , huutorirteende hakkilantaagal , teeyre e haalde goonga mo sumataa toni kaalɗo , jiiɓataa hakkille kaaldateeɗo , addanoore ɗum faamde jaɓɓitgol oon hakke maa jibinan ɗum nafoore nde jaɓɓugol ngol rokkataa ɗum .
Waasde en ɗum heɓtinde maa laato juumre nde baɗte mum njogori ɓiloyde , e boomoyde , yontaaji garoyooji .
Waasde naatnude he jaŋde Ɗ2 ngal nder literasi e jaŋde fannuuji so wonaa nde janngooɓe ɓee keɓi kattanɗe jonɗe he nder Ɗ1 kam e kattanɗe haala nder Ɗ2 .
Waasde ndiyam ko bone e kala ko Alla tagi .
Waasde nuunɗal ( corruption ) he ndii ɗo leydi he nder politik , fuɗɗii ko gila e duuɓi gadiiɗi alternaas gadano , ene ɓeydi yaha bonde caggal nde alternaas waɗi , kadi ene jokki haa jooni .
Waawde ɓe foolde won dowlaaji ko wayi no Iraak e teettude won e diwanuuji e nder mum en addantaa ɓe wiyde " baalel manna " ngel ɓe cañi ngel e nder yoga e nokkuuji ko Dowla .
Waawi jarabi ko joom fendere .
Waawɓe nii nanngireede no ñaawooɓe .
Waayo e jikko , ɗee geɗe baɗɗiiɗe tawtoree mbele fiɓnde tiiɗa , ina ngoɗɗi dañeede ɗoon !
Waayo mon ko sellungo nde caliɗon fiɓde , jikko mon juumaani ɗo salni on fiɓde .
Waañde poñkon walla soppude lekɗe e nder nokku hee ene harmi .
Waccoore makko wolde ko " Nino " , innde nde o lolliri haa nde waraa nde .
Wadde
Wadde , Njuddu Jeeri , eɗen mbaawi wiyde , ko yeewtere hakkunde Pulaar e ɓiyɓe mum , ɓiyɓe jogoraaɓe ko welsindiiɓe neeniwal mum en walla nii hulanaaɓe wonnde njaɓɓi ko he felo saayde e wontude terɗe baasaaɗe leñol mum en .
Wadde , bonannde ndee ko e am huccinaa , kono mettaani mi so wonaa ko golle Fulɓe mbonnaa sabu miin ko leñol men ngol fof ngollantoo mi .
Wadde alaa e sago go'o ndañen jaayndeeji , rajjoji , teleeji , kelmeendi men wona ngootiri , sagitorde men wona gootum ; pelle men ndetinee e dow kuule e doosɗe laaɓɗe poy .
Wadde en bannge niɓɓo oo heeda e men .
Wadde feere gootolingol ɗemɗe e pine artirta en ko e miijanteeri laamorndi cuɓaandi kono kam engol woɗɗi wonde jojjunde waɗɗiinde yuɓɓo ngenndi hono no laamu muritani yiɗi yo en ngoongɗinir nii .
Wadde haala kelmeendi Pulaar ndii saakiima no feewi .
Wadde hol mo woni oon Gawlo Fulɓe Joom kuɗol kaŋŋe ?
Wadde janngiyaŋkooɓe Fooyre Ɓamtaare ena mbaawi jiñtude tigille ɗeen so ɓe keɓii jaaynde ndee .
Wadde ko beldal e kawral tan moƴƴinta ngondiigu .
Wadde ko naafigaagal boltalal .
Wadde ko sunna sabu nulaado hadaani kadi o wii ko dum teddungal debbo ?
Wadde minen ko e lislaam min jowii .
Wadde noon , kamɓe ne ɓe pelliti ko haɓtoraade jaltugol he boowe , diiñde e seppudi , hollitde weñaare nde ɓe njoganii ndee ɗoo moojobere .
Wadde noon ngol laawol ne hayso jaribo woɗngo ene waɗee ne ene foti wona he nder dumunna dottaaɗo .
Wadde noon wiyde ene Aarabina ɓaleeɓe Muritani ko yiɗɗe nuskude ɗum en e ittude e mum neɗɗaagu .
Wadde o seeraani e ñaagaade Allah nde weltinirtamo rokkudemo ɓiyngel tawa ko husere makko wona ɓuɓɓam gite makko .
Wadde yaltude leydi ko caɗeele mawɗe .
Wadde ɗum ɓurata nanndude ko e jamfa , wonande fedde , innitoraade ɗum wootere haaldateende dow innde renndo ko faati he ndee-ɗoo saɗeende yawtunde to woɗɗi keeri mayre , sahnga nde nde toɗɗii daɗndugol renndooji ɗii e kuuɓal mumen e tanaa momtagol mumen pewjateengol .
Wadi Rowda lomtii nde ɗoon e hitaande 2003 , soodti denndaangal ko heddinoo e mahaaɗe SOMIMA .
Wagner ina waawi addude ngal ballal tawa njoɓdi mum ko oogirɗe kaalaaɗe ɗee caggal nde Hooreejo jaagorɗe Burkina yillii Riisi .
Wagner ko " mersuneeruuji " fotɓe haɓeede no konuuji janani keddiiɗi ɗii kala .
Wagner ko koninkooɓe daraniiɓe haɓeede ina njoɓee .
Wagner so ɓurii ɗoo saraade , addata ko yerɓere diiwal Afrik Hirnaange oo kala .

Waktuuji ɗiɗi pawii heen koksoor oo anndini mo wonde yontannde makko yottiima .

Walla boom , wonaa tan yiɗde dañde fotnoo addande neɗɗo renndinde leydi e asamaan mbele ene wootanee .
Walla boom , ɓe ndaarat ko ƴellittii , yooɗiɓe ko tan , ɓe mbaɗa heen doole maɓɓe fof mbele ɗuum ene ɓeydoo ƴellitaade ko heddi koo maaya , walla heddoo ene lada , hono no ɓe ngoowi waɗirde ni , kala nde arti e ponndugol e ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije leydi ndi ?
Walla daña muusnude hoore mum Alla e tooke mayre moddude !
Walla e geɗa sewɗe .
Walla e ɗi mbaawi renndude jurol kono alaa e sago ɗi ceerta ŋori .
Walla golla , wiyta " sinno mi annduno ko nii wayata , mi miijotanooka ɗum nii saka mboɗo waɗa " .

Walla keewal barooɗe ɗe .
Walla ko hulde haalde huunde jogornde moddinde yimɓe heewɓe hulaaɓe ?
Walla ko ngam yiɗde dallinde ɓe nguuri ko caggal leydi , hono no yiɗaa faamninireede nii ?
Walla ko njoɓdi oon jaayndiyanke woni caɗeele ?
Walla ko nooynaare teyaande walla ko kulol haalde huunde hulaande ?
Walla ko ɓe tafɓe huunde ɓurtiinde ɓe doole , walla ko huunde nde ɓe kuli ine waawi ɓoccitaade ɓe , walla ko huunde nde ɓe njiɗaa naata juuɗe men enen heddiiɓe ɓee ?
Walla maa wondiiɓe mum jaɓru sabu ngenndi ?
Walla mbiyen ko ɓe ittaa koo duuñci jaynge huɓɓatnoonge ɗii lebbi fof e leydi ndii haa yettii e jaltugol dipiteeji e senaatoor'en 48 e laamu e daragol yontere ndee .
Walla mbiyen omo faamnoo konngol biyngol " haɓ e gooto Alla wallu maa " .
Walla mi Faayda mo e Gobi , Umar Hamaad Bukaar Jam Lih .
Walla nananaaɗo konngol e koreeji mum , walla laamɗo nokku oo .
Walla nii dowlaaji mbonna ɗi .
Walla nii ndu bonnii , tawaa ɓee njiyaani ndu nih ko e dille mayru tan ɓe pawii .
Walla nii so eɗen ndarii e oto he eɗen kuccindiri , taaragol oto oo wuro ngo ena nattina en huccondirne na ?
Walla nii wona ko gooto e ɓiyɓe Fulɓe lomtii ɗoon kono tawa ko Haal-Pulaar’en kaɓantee koo e ko ndukata koo wonaa haaju mum .
Walla so en laɓɓitinii ngal mbiyen " mbele en ngadoraaki ɗo potno ɗen sakkitoraade " ?
Walla so tawii ko o daddoyoowo , o huutoroo laañal , mbaangu , maa dawaaɗi raddo .
Walla so ullundu nduu woni ɗoo hol to teewu nguu woni ?
Walla tawa ina asi hoɗa heen .
Walla tawa ko wonɓe e laamu ɓee ngoni ɓe nganndaa ɓe , cikka ko ɓe luulndiiɓe , yiɗɓe heɓtude jappeere mumen .
Walla to bannge dam , gooto e men fof waɗa huunde so kaalis so ɗum kaŋŋe walla nih ko ɗum jawdi ndariindi , kala e men poolɗo ko kañum nawata ko tegaa koo .
Walla won ko woni e waɗde , ko heewi e amen ndonkii faamde ko o woni e dow mum .
Walla wooda doole e semmbe moolanaaɗe Alla , ko nanndi e doole ɓuucatooɗe walla semmbe fooɗa fooɗoondu ɗe kaalno-ɗen ɗee , njana e gootal e geɗe winndere ndee , fusa ɗum , ɗum fetta saroo e asaman , wooda heen ko naati e weeyo men ngoo .
Walla ɓurtugol kaalis baɗaaɗo e kampaañ .
Walla ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe noddiratnoo " les langues barbare " , ko wayno ɗemɗe gontuɗe Engele e Almaare hannde ɗe .
Walla ɗumɗoo jeyaa tan ko he jikkuuji neɗɗo yiɗde anndude ko woni he taariindi mum ?
Wallaahi mi woondi e Joomiraaɗo Toowɗo oo , so won cikkuɗo ena waawi falaade mi golle ndaranii mi ɗee , oon dobiima feɗeen ñamokindu e hitere mum .
Wallaay waɗi ɗum noon ko woɗɗude !
Walli e reende ndimaagu leyɗeele tokoose doofolle e waawde woodde e jogaade ndimaagu mum en dawrugol ne , heewɓe hannde ngoya wonnde yuɓɓo ngoo natti yahdude e jamaanu , teeŋti e no peŋngal ndeenka e kisal ngal sañorii nii .
Wallidiiɓe seneraal , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa wonaani hitaande tawo ko njooɓtorinoo Siidi yiɗde ñawndude oo gagga , ina kersa feeñnikinaade so tawii njiɗii huutoraade ɗum .
Wallidiiɓe tuubakooɓe ɓee mbiyi yo Arɗo oo jaggu Baydi , nawa mo to tuubakooɓe ɓee .
Wallifiyanke oo rokkii heen yeruuji keewɗi ko wayno no Arabeeɓe njiɗiri jaalɗin’de ɗemngal Arab he dow juulɓe kala , rewrude e diine Islaam ; ko kanngal juuldatee , duwortee , janngirtee , Khuɗbirtee hayso tawii joom mum en nanataa paamata ko haaletee he ɗemngal Arab .
Wallitde remooɓe ɓee kadi engere .
Wallitoroo karalleje goodaɗe ɗe ko wayno jogaade anti virus he masiŋ mum , huwtoraade kelmelɓennirngel ( mot de pass ) tekkungel , caɗtungel ñemtinde , e reenaade huwtoraade wifi publik , jogaade email keeroriiɗo liggorgal mum , reentaade naatde he jokkorɗe ɗe a heɓtinaani .
Wallu huutorɓe
Wallude jaaynde ko soodde ɗum so yaltinaama .
Wammbaaɓe ne lomi yolnde .
Waraaɓe heen njettiima ujune-ujune e uujɓe .
Waraaɓe ɓee tolnoyiima e capanɗe tato .
Warngo ƴiiƴiwo oo gorko jaakoranooɗo jolnoo ko ñalnde 15 oktoobar 1987 .
Warngooji
Warngooji siwlɓe no toɗɗaa e nden tefoore .
Warngooji ɗi ndewaani sariya , jaltingol yimɓe e leydi mumen , garjingol e taƴgol terɗe mbele ɗee baɗe luutondiraani e wagginaandu Annabiijo Alla , Muhammad ( MJKNM ) sakkitiindu , e nduun wagginaandu , o wiyiino heen : aarabe ɓuraani goɗɗo mo wonaa aarabe ; oon ne kay ɓuraani mo , tee ne nganndee yimɓe ɓee fof njalti ko e baaba Aadama e neene Hawwaa .
Warnooɓe yimɓe , mbari juulɓe ɓe mbiyaani mbaɗaani , nani ɗoo njaha e haajuuji mum en , hay gooto wiyaani ɗum en qaala .
Warñeende heewnde nana yeeso aasiñooruuji NASA sibu alaa tawo fiisee meeɗi diwde ko wonaa e dow Ngaawe ( Leydi ) .
Warɓe mo ɓee mbiyi , nde o fellaa ndee , ko konngol gootol yalti he hunuko makko " Alla ko bajjo " .
Wasiya battindiiɗo ko kala nde tonngoode fayi e yaltude , ƴeewen konkuraaji e poroseeji dookɗi kabren ɗum renndo ngoo .
Wasiyaaji keewɗi mbaɗaama ɗoon .
Wasiyaaji moƴƴi ine ngoodaa , cifotooɗi ngonka leyɗe ɗee , wonande kadi peeje e kuutoragol ɗemɗe ɗee nder nehdi e jaŋde .
Wasiyaama yo karallaagal kesal ngal huutore ngam jaajtinde jaŋde ndee e ittinde ɗum : duɗe whatsApp , wideyooji nder Youtube , ekn .
Wato wayru yillaade min .
Wattan fof ko Gestapo ( " polis " Almaañ nder Farayse ) jaggi mo he 1943 , o fayraa Dummbirdu Mauthausen to Autriche ñalnde 18 Settaambar 1943 .
Wattan fof ko heewɓe he maɓɓe ubbidaa he gaska ngoota .
Wattindii juuraade toon , ko ɓeeynirka Perseverence , ñalnde 18 feebariyee 2021 , ngam sunnaade mbele nguurndam ñillam ɓooyɗam meeɗii woodde toon , e roɓaade toon kaaƴe potɗe artireede he Leydi ngam loskeede .
Wattindiiɓe anndude mo mbiyi " alaa cefol ngol o anndaa " .
Way ko hono no maaro e teew dammuwol ni , kono mi meeɗani ñaamde ko waynii welde .
Wayata raɓɓiɗde ko no peetel jeyngol nih e yaawde ñifde .
Wayata raɓɓiɗde kono peetel jeyngol nih e yaawde nyifde .
Wayi ko no dakmitaade e ñamri nih , tawa moƴƴaani e cellal ɓanndu mum .
Wayi ko no fooyre nih , ɗo keedtuɗa e mayre fof ko fooyre tan njiyataa , niɓɓere waawataa won’de e nder fooyre .
Wayi ko no gawu ( gaw ) nii , pooɗoowo , ɓuucoo kala ko faandii ɗum , tee wontaa ɓoccito .
Wayi ko no gawu nii , pooɗoowo , ɓuucoo kala ko faandii ɗum .
Wayi ko no hokkude mawɗo Waalankooɓe njeenaari sabu golle Samba Yomb Giile Mbooc , nde o yahdi he nantinoowo makko Samba Fay , yeewtide he Aali Yero Joob .
Wayi ko no nate koode ɗiɗi nii , ine nanndi !
Wayi no " reɓendication " nii .
Wayi tan ko no " Gaulois en " mbayi he Faraysenaaɓe nii .
Wayi tan ko no jolɗo e oto jahoowo nii , so o ƴeewii sawndooji ɗii , o sikkata ko leɗɗe e kuɓeeje e kuuje ɗe oto oo wirtotoo ɗee , ko kañum en ndogata ( noon ɗeɓata wayde ) .
Wayluɓe hannde ina mbiyee eh !
Wayɓe no Jak Chirak , haa heɓi Sarkosi e Marin Le Pen , kanum en njeyaa ko e waalaare ñaamre ndee .
Wazde njettondiren e koye men , njokken golle .
Waɗa heen kulɓinooji , waɗa jalnooji , kono waɗa kadi taƴooji enɗam e gaawooji kusummeeji e nder ɓerɗe , haa nii wooda ɗo ɗum jibini taƴ-enɗamaagal .
Waɗa ɗo ɓiɓɓe yumma ceerndata kiraaɗe e ɗo ɓiɓɓe baaba ceernda galleeji .
Waɗaani maayɓe kono mahateeje keewɗe njaniii , ndammiri cewndi keewndi yahdii e waame .
Waɗata daartol ɓesngu ko lanndaaji tammbiiɗi njeñu renndo e yonta toɗɗaaɗo .
Waɗata mo waɗde noon , tawdi eɗen kaala diineeji maɓɓe ndeen , ko anndude so o heddiima ɓalndu mehru , alaa ko waawi fosaade mo , ko nanndi e seyɗeneeji e ko wonaa ɗum tan .
Waɗata noon ko ɓe ƴeewataa ñalngu winndannde ndee .
Waɗata oon kaayit ko sarwisaaji karalleeji taƴɗi oon sañ , laawɗinta ɗum ko Goomu jeerto luure ko yowitii e leyɗe denndaaɗe e nder Muqataa .
Waɗata ɗum ko surbaaɓe rewɓe ( boombi ) walla seemedɓe heccuɓe .
Waɗata ɗum noon ko so woote njontii , mi wootanirtaa neɗɗo sabu ko jogori waɗande renndo ngoo , ngootanirtu mi mo ko sabu kaaw am , baaba am , mawni am walla kiliifa am ko e makko ngondi .
Waɗde , en ngonaani e famɗinde ɗe , kono alaa e sago kadi yimɓe ndeentoo rokkude ɗe hoolaare nde yuurnittaake teeŋti noon he oo sahaa mo nduu fekkuru hulɓiniindu .
Waɗde , holi ko haɗi ndarto ɗen seeɗa , njeeƴo ɗen haa ciftoren to ngummi ɗen , lemo ɗenaa ngannden ro tolni ɗen , njonngo ɗen yeeso haa nenane ɗen ko e laawol ngon ɗen ?
Waɗde , so laawol rewaama , pot ɗen ko haalande koye men goonga , sabu ko en aanduɓe e majje .
Waɗde , ɗee jokkondire kam e piɓondire kollitaani saka baɗtina e jiyɗe toɗɗiiɗe caɗeele ngenndiije maa ko abbitii e leƴƴi moritaniiji .
Waɗde , ɗumɗoon tawtii kilifaagal wuro ngal o halfinaa ngal .
Waɗde Fedde Ɓamtoore Pulaar ene foti huwtoraade oon fartaŋŋe ngam mahtaade hoore mum he jaɓɓal kesal .
Waɗde alaa , hannde , majjuɗo ko waɗanoo haa saabii nguu ñalngu ene siftoree hitaande kala .
Waɗde annduɓe Exxon idiima ɓe heen duuɓi 15 !
Waɗde beeli kori , ɓulli ɓeeɓi , huɗo majji jawdi eggi , heddii yimɓe ene tammoo ɗe looraani .
Waɗde e hakkille mum njoftaagu , ko ɗuum firtata leyɗeele ; kono jaafogol kañum , mahat leydi e leyɗeele haa tiiɗa .
Waɗde ene heewi o foolee , sabu hay hare ne , ene hatojini e peeje .
Waɗde ene moƴƴi , kala nde njuul-ɗen , nduwo-ɗen " yoo Alla rokku en hakkillaaji poolooji ɓerɗe .
Waɗde eɗen mbaawi wiyde : mawɗo leydi Senegaal rokkii jaaknooɓe yaakaare mawnde e henndu nguurndam , haa ɓe mbaawa anndude hanki maɓɓe , ɓe mbaawa feewnude janngo maɓɓe .
Waɗde eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko leydi potndi hellifeede
Waɗde eɗen poti weeynude ɗeen coñce haa dow , ngam dartaade e foolde gostotooɗe ɗiɗi pinal men e neesu men .
Waɗde firti ko so dental alaa , podle fof njooloto .
Waɗde gure ɗee ne ina cebbina sagataaɓe ɓee e ɗeen golle jibinooje njurum e jokkere enɗam .
Waɗde haa hannde Kirime jeyaa ko he Sowiyet , tufnde Sebastopol kadi ine jokki haa hannde yowitaade e Mosku .
Waɗde hay gooto suusaa felde hay gooto .
Waɗde heddanii en tan ko duwaade e jokkude golle caggal makko .
Waɗde heen jawɗeele maɓɓe kadi e rokkude ɗum faayiida mo ɗum haandi o .
Waɗde huunde ( mahdi ) e galle he , hayso ina waɗa haala .
Waɗde ina haani jannguɓe men e alɗuɓe men cakkana en peeje baawɗe faddanaade ɗee caɗeele kuccinaaɗe e men .
Waɗde jawe ceŋlunooɗe maa ceŋlit goɗngol , kono mballee min duwaade , woto ɗe kaaltu ko ɗe kaalnoo .
Waɗde kay , gonduɗo heen fotaani joñeede e dogeede .
Waɗde kay , hay gooto e men woto aaman waajaade leñol ngol kam e lonnginde ɗum haalde e gollude ko moƴƴi .
Waɗde kay , sikke alaa , so pinal Muritani lollii hannde e aduna hee , ko hoddirooji Alla e golle annduɓe mum .
Waɗde kay , so en kaaldii goonga , ko jaayndiyankooɓe , naalankooɓe , yimiyankooɓe e haaliyankooɓe poti waɗde golle mumen .
Waɗde kay , so kodde belɗe ɓoccitiima e juuɗe joom mum caamii e lahal fedannde wurwaande waɗaa suukara , so oon mettinii haa suniima , foti ko holleede annduɓe , safrooɓe haangaaɓe .
Waɗde kay , so tawii ko ndukaten kook o goonga e men , yoo annduɓe nganndin .
Waɗde kay ko Murtuɗo wiynoo koo , ko goonga , wonde " Polotigi , ko pene tigi " .
Waɗde ko aldaa e jas-jastinere , ƴettaten ko booñ A1 , ngati ko toon jerol ɓaleeje ɓuri mawnude , wiyee ko kanko ɓuri aaɓannde yaltinnde ɓaleere so toɓɓe mbaɗaama .
Waɗde ko kaŋko woni ñaawoowo gadano oo .
Waɗde laamɓe ɓee ko doofolɓe .
Waɗde loritinooɓe e dawde liggoo njoftina ko nguurniri ɓesnguuji mumen fof , hannde ngoni ko e kaayaa-mbeeya .
Waɗde ma a taw , ko ɗum saabii Usmaan Hammadi Joob yimiri doŋre men " Afrik Neenam , ummo koy yontii " .
Waɗde ma a taw mo ndañ-ɗaa e mum haaju ngar-ɗaa ɗaɓɓittde ɗum ballal , ene haani , so a tinii haaju mo dañi , mbaasaa fadde haa noddu maa .
Waɗde maa ngal waawde yiyde to ɓuri woɗɗude he nder sahaaji ɓennuɗi , tawi kadi ɓuri to woɗɗi laaɓtude .
Waɗde mahtaade leñol naamnaaki pelle keewɗe , dente Facebook , WhatsApp , gulaali jamma e ñalawma tan , gooto fof hina haalira bannge , hina haala ko anndi e ko anndaa , anndanaa .
Waɗde mbele dente ɗee ko e kaayitaaji tan e ɗemɗe ?
Waɗde min mbaawaa renndude yeewtere gooɓe jiile , ɗo miijooji potnoo felɓondirireede hakkillantaagal haa miijo moƴƴo yalta heen .
Waɗde min ngonaa faamondirɓe .
Waɗde ndeen ɓe poɓɓii , ɓe ndiwii , ɓe ngamii , ɓe kubii kadi ɓe kuljinorii .
Waɗde ndillinen sababuuji .
Waɗde nduwo-ɗen , mbele yiilotooɓe alɗirde ɗee caɗeele mbaasa dañde sagooji mum en .
Waɗde ngaree kootee " .
Waɗde ngonɗen ko e nder teemedannde waɗtoore noogaas e gooɓiire ndee .
Waɗde o ɗaccaani oon fartaŋŋe ɓenni .
Waɗde piren nde ɗoo : Debbo oo ko Hinndu Mint Ayniina .
Waɗde so en mbaawii yiyde ko woni nder majje walla caggal majje , maa en ɓeydo faamde no ɗeen koode e tagopeeje njibinirtee .
Waɗde so en njawaama , ko enen mbaɗi .
Waɗde so wiyaama won wonɓe e ɓuuɓri , sikke aalaa kay won kadi dariiɓe e naange .
Waɗde tan , eɗen mbaawi golle ɗee pamɗaani kadi naamnii ko karallaagal , ngaal karallaagal ina woodi hay sinno heewaani sabu yimɓe suɓaaɓe ɓee fof ngardi ko sabu humpitooji mu’en no foti fof kam .
Waɗde waɗ mbaawka maa , sabu yontii .
Waɗdee heen limoŋ .
Waɗee jubbanngel korompolle , fasnee haa tuutii .
Waɗetee ko caggal juulal futuro .
Waɗi
Waɗi en wiyde noon ko tuggi lewru saawiyee 2020 feewde jooni , aduna oo fof yerɓii sabu ñawu ndaaɓ-ndaaɓtondiroowu biyeteengu Covid-19 , lollirngu koronaa .
Waɗi en wiyde yoga he caɗeele , ko ine heddinoo yuɓɓo ngo Pulaar dañanaano tawo tappirde .
Waɗi haala hakkunde maɓɓe .
Waɗi laalaaɗe ɗee tiiɗde ko ine mbaɗi molekilde ( mooɓtoore ) ine wiyee " chitine " ( shitin ) .
Waɗi mi ɗum teskaade ko ngati mum hawrunoode e caɗeele jolnooɗe hakkunde Muritani e Senegaal .
Waɗi ngal siforaade noon ko Yuɓɓo naange ( ngo ngon-ɗen ngoo ) heedti ko he saraaji mbeɗu maggal ( mbaadi maggal ko mbeɗu ) .
Waɗi noo ko lowre ndee ko eggunde to koɗnoowo goɗɗo .
Waɗi noon , Biraam ina haljinnoo , ina aannunoo laamu nguu haa ɗoon waawi haaɗde : gila e palee-palee o waɗdata e jiyɗinooɓe yimɓe , haa e darnde makko seedtinde haɓaade tooñanngeeji .
Waɗi noon , e oon sahaa , ko daɗndu mawndu wonnoo hakkunde leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee , tee juutii ko Dental Sowiyet ardinoo Amerk to bannge weeyiwal ( ganndal weeyo ) .
Waɗi noon , ko aan waɗi Mali leydi kormaandi , ndi heewɓe njeeɓatnoo .
Waɗi noon , ko koowooje ko geɗel teeŋtungel nder callalal nguura .
Waɗi noon , ko nofru ine weeɓi yulde .
Waɗi noon , ko won ɗiin mborosaaji tulii ,
Waɗi noon , ko ɓaleeɓe Afrik worgo alaa ko njiyatnoo so wonaa caɗeele e leeɓte ɗe o leeɓtaa ɗee , e muñal makko e ɗii duuɓi ñiɓɓi Apartaayd .
Waɗi noon , ko ɓuri heewde e jannginirteeɓe hannde e Ɗ2 ko seeɗa ɓeydortee e ɗemɗe kuutorteeɗe he jaŋde , he tolno winndere ndee fof .
Waɗi noon , ko ɗo gooto men kala woni ɗoo , tinataa nii leydi ina yaha , ɗuum ne , ko doole ndi dograta .
Waɗi noon , oon arata ko waɗtannde , ko ndeen min ndañata jam .
Waɗi noon , so ka arii haa ka naatii e weeyo leydi ngoo , ka huɓɓat haa ka rowyta , hay so woodii ko yettii heen leydi , ɓuri sikkaneede ko yande e ndiyam ( ko ɓuri tataɓe ɗiɗi leydi ndii ko diƴƴe ) .
Waɗi noon , ɗeen ɗalduɗe
Waɗi noon jeyi ngol ko pelle keeriiɗe baawɗe ardinde nafooje njulaagu , haa ko waɗananooɓe ɗum ɓee , hono ɓesnguuji leyɗe ɗee , ndonka naftoraade ɗum .
Waɗi noon ko , emin piɓi wonde lanndaaji ɗi guurte ngenndiniije , njogii ko jiyɗe paaɗɗe ko feewti ngootaagu ngenndiiwu .
Waɗi noon ko GPS ine he nder telefoŋ maa , kala ɗo ngon-ɗaa ine anndaa .
Waɗi noon ko Leydi ɓuri yaawde yiloo banngo e hoodere jaayre , sabu e nyalawma gooto ( 24 waktu ) tawat Leydi waɗii yiiloo banngoo haa artii ɗo wonno ; hoodere jaayre noon nde hade mayre artude ɗo nde wonnoo , alla e mayre leede yiiloo banngo , ma wonan en hede lebbi 3 .
Waɗi noon ko Leydi ɓuri yaawde yiloo banngo e hoodere jaayre , sabu e ñalawma gooto ( 24 waktu ) tawat Leydi waɗii yiiloo banngoo haa artii ɗo wonno ; hoodere jaayre noon , nde hade mayre artude ɗo nde wonnoo , alla e mayre leelde yiiloo banngo , maa wonan en hedde lebbi 3 .
Waɗi noon ko aduna oo naatanii jamaanu keso , mo mbiy-ɗen empiriyaalisma e sawra porletaariyaa .
Waɗi noon ko alkule 128 ko ɗemɗe leyɗeele gadiiɗe e gannde ɗee tan kuuri .
Waɗi noon ko aɓe poti duumaade e
Waɗi noon ko beeli ndunngu haa hannde koraani sibu hay e kawle hee toɓii e wuro haa heewi , ñalnde aset 2/11/2013 wonnoo .
Waɗi noon ko doole dampugol ɗee njonaani lottude laaɗe goɗɗe ɗee haa njaaweeki mum en ɗoofa ɗum e fooɗo ( ɓaaƴo ) yuɓɓo Naange .
Waɗi noon ko e leñol men mbaawɗen ko sikkitaade mo woni kala , mbawɗen ko tuumde sukoño kala katante , mbaawɗe ko jirgitde ko jeeƴi .
Waɗi noon ko juɓɓule sato Leydi tuugii ko he keewal ciiri e mbaadiiji nguurndam he dow mum : kullel kala guurngel dow Leydi ine jogii darnde e nder yuɓɓo huuɓtodinngo ngoo .
Waɗi noon ko kanko renndini Aadama e Ibliis ngam adaade ñaamde lekki kaɗaaki ñaameede kii .
Waɗi noon ko kayru woni lewru wooturu ndu Alla fawi juulɓe alaa e sago .
Waɗi noon ko maa mbaawen tiɗɗude ɓakdi mum ndii kala e nder faandu ndu wudduwol saatimeeteer gooto , woni tiɗɗen Leydi haa fotta e abbere gawri .
Waɗi noon ko minen , so emin kaala , so neɗɗo ɓuraani heɗtindaande faamataa .
Waɗi noon ko neɗɗo waawi dañde e aduna fof , so cellal alaa heen , neɗɗo oo dakmittaako e ko dañi koo .
Waɗi noon ko o alaa e sago makko .
Waɗi noon ko pinal kala ko keeringal etee ko ɗemngal gootal waawi wuurnude , reende ngal pinal , woni ɗemngal neeniwal .
Waɗi noon ko so Aadama yiyiino geɗe Hawwaa fof ina caami , ndeen Aadama ñaamataa , etee ko kañum ƴeewatee .
Waɗi noon ko so wolde dawii , yimɓe kala ko haɓeteeɓe .
Waɗi noon ko won nan-nanti njettii mi ; ko ɓurmi teskitaade e majji ko ñiŋooje jówitiiɗe e no lelnirmi binndól e Sawru Ganndal .
Waɗi noon ko yamre PHP dognannoonde lowre ndee ko hiiɗtunde haa wooroo .
Waɗi noon ko yiiloo-banngoo mayre ena leeli no feewi .
Waɗi noon ko ɗuum ɓurɗen teskaade , kono so en ƴeewtindiima naange , lewru e koode ma en tawu alaa ko deeƴi , maa wood bi'iɗo : ( aaha hay ɗuum kay ina yaha , tawde ko e soppo-jolo tan woni , ina fuɗa ina muta tan .
Waɗi noon nde o ɗaɓɓanoyta Annabi safaara ndee o ɗaccunoo ɗum ko ina lelii ngam ñawu mbonngu , dillataa daalataa , gilɗi ina njalta e ɓalndu mum , o artii o tawii ina wayi no jam .
Waɗi noon njiy-mi ko ko njiyatnoo-mi so nih nattii e Fuuta tan firtti ko Fuuta nattii wonde ko wonnoo koo .
Waɗi noon ooɗo gaas ɓuri henndu ndu poofaten ndu hoyde .
Waɗi sahaa , woodi ummiiɓe e yo dental jaafondiral yuɓɓine , tawa mawɗo leydi Durmam ndii ene tawee , kañum e huunde e nanndidiiɓe mum ummiiɓe e leyɗeele goɗɗe .
Waɗi sahaa debbo gooto ari e majji , jooɗɗo mo hono mum weeɓaani , mo jom hakkillaaji potɗi ɗaatɗi , gite putte daneeje , kala no debbo wayatnoo e njooɗndam , ko noon o wayi .
Waɗi sahaa gooto , laamɗo gooto ina wiyee " Sheex Nasru Leyyaat " , ina yiɗi kañum ne laamaade leñol mum en ; e oon sahaa , laamu maɓɓe ko laamu Horma ( Horma ko lefol tan ) .
Waɗi sahaa gooto baaba makko yiɗi resnude mo .
Waɗi sahaa gooto o roƴani caaɗngel ngel , o tawi fuɗɗiima horde , ngel ñiddii kadi wuddii .
Waɗi sahaa gooto o yalti omo yahnoo e weeyo tan , haa o yiiyi yeeso makko debbo pattamlamo , moƴƴo mbaadi ina yeeso mum ndammiri ina ayna ndi , o haawaa no feewi .
Waɗi sahaa gooto tan , gorko o fini subaka gooto wiyi , hannde mi maayii mi nattii waawde muñde .
Waɗi subaka gooto debbo o finiri weltaare mawnde , omo heppa ko gorko o artata galle , omo jooɗi kaŋko debbo o omo fadi haa joom galle mokko ara o yaafno ɗum o weldita e mum , o habra ɗum kabaaru belɗo .
Waɗi ñalawma o raɓɓiɗde , ko yiiloo-banngoo Supiteer ɓuri fof yaawde .
Waɗi ñalawma ñalawma , ko naange , ngela buuɗel ngel cooynoto-ɗaa ena wojja subaka e kikiiɗe kiirɗo .
Waɗi ɓe mawnide mo noon , ko anndude wonde laamu ko e dokke Alla jeyaa .
Waɗi ɓe wiyeede noon ko ɓe ngalaano jot femmbude bahe maɓɓe ) .
Waɗi ɗum ko o won ceernal seeremɓe gadduɗo mbaydi hesiri he njanngiin e ganndal diine lislaam .
Waɗi ɗum siforaade noon ko to ndiyam ummortoo too ɓuri faaɗde e tee gooto fof ko maa heeda e bannge mo heɓrata ndiyam .
Waɗi ɗum ustaade ko waasde ko hebbintee koo jarde .
Waɗi ɗuum , ko mbayliigu jeyi leydi nguu ittii mbaadi ngaadanteeri jiilgol leyɗeele ɗee , tawi teskaaki hakkeeji jeyi ɗi ɓaleeɓe Muritani ndoni e njaatiraaɓe mum en , hakke maɓɓe dow leyɗeele ɗe ɓe ngollotoo ko ina ɓura duuɓi ujunere .
Waɗi ɗuum noon ko ngonkiiji ɗii na keewi waɗde joltooji .
Waɗi-mi suɓaade Windows ko ɓurde ɗum heewde huutorɓe e winndere ndee kono ena woodi Mac OS e Linux fof .
Waɗi-mi waɗde tigilde mawnde ko mbele gooto en men fof ena daña kadi dakmitaade ko juuti e mayre .
Waɗi-mi wiyde noon , ko ala e leƴƴi goɗɗi ɗii dewindiiɗe ko mbaɗaten haa tina lowre ndee dartiima , kadi jarana ɗum soodde innde domen pulaagu ( toɓɓere ) com , huccina ɗum e geɗe tufnude ngam bonnande Fulɓe .
Waɗii goɗɗe kebbitinaa to ISERI , tawi musiɗɗo e ballal musiɗɗo men Aamadu Sammba Soh Ko noon wooraa , haa nde tuubaako gooto , biyeteeɗo Filip Marsesin , janngintunooɗo e Duɗal Jaaɓi haaɗtirde Nuwaasoot , rokki Fedde ndee kaalis ( 200 000 UM !
Waɗii sahaa , woodi e maɓɓe wiyɓe min " onon dee , min nanii , jooni , leydi mon ene waɗi demokaraasii .
Waɗii sahaa gooto Israayilnaaɓe mbiyi mo : " waɗ feere ñaagono-ɗaa min geno yo o jippinan min Maleyka keewɗo doole , ngam walla min haa mi ceerta e Amaaliiknaaɓe haa min mbaawa yaltude ɗeeɗoo koɗanɗe barakuuji .
Waɗii sahaa o dariima darnde neɗɗo baɗoowo ko welaa he nder Mali , alaa fof ko daɗata mo toon , rewrude e jotondire keewɗe ɗe o joginoo toon , ngam wallude toɗɗitagol Ibrahim Bubakar Keytaa , nattunooɗo jogaade doole sabu kuufgol mum ngol feewaani iiñcuru leydi mum keewngu sifaaji .
Waɗii sariyaaji goɗɗi memtiiɗi oon sariya gorworo , kono ko ɓuri teeŋtude e ko memtaa heen ko , koko timminta heen fannuuji tan walla wayla laabi no " seedantaagal jeyeede e leydi " heɓretee , yeru dekere mo 82 026 mo suliyee 1976 ittuɗo peewnugol kaayit nasiyonaalitee e juuɗe tiribinaaluuji , waɗti ɗum e juuɗe waaliiji .
Waɗii tonngooɗe keewɗe kebbitinaaɗe to Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije , gila ina woni ɗo Asammbele woni hannde ɗoo , haa nde heɓtoyi e nokku mum ganndaaɗo oo .
Waɗii ɓittaaɓe heen haa nimsiri ko ngardunoo kono nde naati haa njiyi oo aduna , njejjitii caɗeele ɗe ndañnoo e naatgol ngol .
Waɗiino yonta ngol hooninooma leñi ngol hoɗdunoo ɗii fof , yonta ngoɗka ari ngol heedti keeci ngol ardaa .
Waɗiino ñalawma gooto , Waandu e sanngalde ina ɗannadoo .

Waɗnooɓe ko boni e waɗooɓe bone ɓee nana ñaaƴa e boli , paaynaaka !
Waɗooɓe Kawgel ɓee ina mbaawi fuɗɗaade coftal ɓalli mumen janngo .
Waɗooɓe politik Amerik fof ina kawri e ndee feere .

Weeyo ina
Weeɓaani waɗde e cinndel so wonaa keɓanen ɗum jaaɓngal ( App ) keeriiɗo .
Wejo alɗungo , feeñninngo ŋari finaa-tawaa men waɗaama .
Wejo ngoo hollirii gila e goobuuji tawanooɗi e nder wimmbalooji kaaƴe jeereende Sahara , kuutorɗe gila e jamaanu kaaƴe kecce haa e geɗe kesam-hesaagu kollirooje hakkilantaagal e hattan Muritaninaaɓe
Welneere ina lommbi e kakkunde haalulaaji ɗii : bawɗi , jimɗi e kollirgol geɗe ganni .
Weltaare
Weltaare amen ko sukaaɓe Afirik ( Sankara ko he maɓɓe jeyanoo ) e yontaaji garooji yoo ndew laawol Sankara fernoo ngam darnde mum en laatoo , ngam waylude gonal leyɗe men baasnaaɗe , ɗe ngonta leyɗe dañal e nguurndam moƴƴam " .
Weltaare kala ɓiɗɗo Pullo hannde e ngo rendo .
Weltaare ndee ko fedde ndee fiɓiino yaltinde lefol , e ballal Alla , lefol ngol yaltii , nana e juuɗe mayre .
Weltanaade ma e nde winndannde , fotnde , haannde e oo gorko ganndo , ngenndiyanke mo nganndu-ɗa ina waawi tigi " lelaade , ɗaanoo e ɓuuɓol aljanna " hono no mbiyru-ɗaa nii , sabu golle moƴƴe maantiniiɗe ɗe ngon-ɗaa e gollan'de leñol ngol .
Wempeƴere ndee ƴerata ko maa diwta luggere , ara e pokpokolam , hono no neɗɗo hofirta kaayit nii .

Wieraa arti .

Wiide ina nantoo e aadaa sabu ko aada tan yahdaani e miiccatagol .
