Windsor , United Kingdom .
Winii , e oon sahaa , ko njamndi " njarndi " haa heri !
Winii tabitiniino aadi e fiɓnde e giɗli fof hakkunde mum e jom galle mum Manndelaa , duuɓi woni e kasoo koo fof .
Winii totti ɓiyum Zindzi jaabawol Manndelaa ndeen sakkitoore , yo janngu ɗum yeeso ujunnaaje ujunnaaje neɗɗo rentunooɓe nder estaad Soweto : " ko neɗɗo bellitiiɗo tan waawi termondireede !
Winndaa e majje ko wasiyaaji jeeɗiɗi ɗi Suleymaani Baal sakkitnoo wondiiɓe mum ko fayti e suɓngo almaami gardotooɗo Fuuta Tooro .
Winndannde Malal Sammba Gise
Winndannde ndee anndiinii en hol gonnooɗo Omar Bolenndee Joob e hol no o maayiri e kasoo .
Winndannde ndee ina holliti ngaanumma mawɗo keɓtiiɗo laamu Farayse , sabu gallugol feere sakkunoo wallitde MNLA rewrude e Abdel Asiis .
Winndannde ndee ina waggina GBM nde huutortoo yiyannde hesere ndee .
Winnde nde fof , ko googa ko haali Saada e Makki ko .
Winndere fof ina heppi .
Winndere kala tuugnii ko e binndi yo ɗi kisne .
Winndere nde ina foti haɗde ɗum .
Winndere ndee kadi ina jogii toon koninkooɓe kalfinaaɓe reende e humpitde e deeƴnude wuro ngoo e hisnude Palestinnaaɓe wuurɓe ɗoon ɓee .
Winndi , yimi , ŋeñi haa weli jinngii .
Winndiyanke biyeteeɗo Pierre Loti ko ɗo winndi deftere mum " Roman d’un Spahi " , Jean Mermoz ne kay ina juurotonoo ɗoon e diwoowa mum hakkunde 1927 e 1936 : o waalatnoo ko Hotel Poste , e nder suudu 219 .
Winndiyanke oo wiyi , ɗoon e ɗoon haa sonndu yooɗndu ari ina ñaantii e ndu wiyee Ɗaawuus , fulɓe ngalanaa ndu innde , etee ina yaakoraa ko kayru woni mawɗo ndiwri kala ñalnde darnga , ko geno noon ɓuri anndude ɗuum , yo O yaafo en .
Wiris noon ina saɗti foolde , woodi tan ko leɗɗe kaɓotooɗe maale mum : paawle ɗee , ɗojjo ngoo , caɗtugol foofaandu nduu So oɗon teskii hannde , safaara koronaa ganndaaɗo tan ko suraade , suumde hunuko e kine ngam falaade raaɓo-raaɓo ngoo , sooɗaade dañaa e wallitde joomum so ñawu nguu heɓindiima ɗum : newnande ɗum foofaandu mum haa nde seerti heen kala .
Wittooɓe kollitii ɗe njibinaa ko e nder leyɗeele Afrik guurnoode e daawal caru , e hiiɗeende , e ɓitteende hiisnde , wonande laamuuji tuugiiɗi e kalifaandi .
Wiyaa Idiriis Debi dañii 79 , 32 % .
Wiyaa ko he innde Geno Aali Yero yiynoo ɗum he kalwa .
Wiyaa ko leyɗeele keewɗe ena ndarni kaɓirɗe e goomuuji ndeenka ngam yiytude-mo .
Wiyaama , nde annabi Idriisa ɓamtaa dow asamaan ndee , ɓiyiiko Mutawaslaki ko ndeen lomtii mo caggal makko woni e ñaawde yimɓe ngam seerndude goonga e fenaande .
Wiyaama ena jeyaa e ngoo waylo , yiɗde-mo artirde dawriaŋkooɓe e laamu sabu jom jaŋɗeele toowɗe anndiraaɓe " teknokaraat " koriima artirde yaakaare e golle leydi ndii .
Wiyaama kadi ko lekki ina wiyee uwda kii noon ina huutoree ngam yaltinde heen jeynge , firti , e ki waɗiree pofal .
Wiyaama kadi o jippinii haayre jalboore ummoriinde to aljanna , nde ina tolnoo e njaajeendi Kaaba ko ɗum woni nokku lomtindorɗo daneejo ko geno foocci ɗum , ɓeydi njaajeendi leydi , hono no ɗum ardi , o waɗi nder majjum lampaaji kaŋŋe ina njeynoo ngam ɓeydude annoore .
Wiyaama kadi o ubbaa ko e
Wiyaama kadi so tawii o sekanii yimɓe wuro , o fiyondirtaa e mum en , o ummoto tan o soofa e wuro ngoo , kamɓe fof ɓe njoolo .
Wiyaama kadi woni teŋe hakkunde Aadama e Hawaa ko juulde e annabi .
Wiyaama kala deftere nde ɓe piri , ɗereeji mum peesdetee ko o kaŋŋe kala no foti ɓe tottee .
Wiyaama ko ɗuum ɓuri laawde won heen , haa tééŋti e haralleeɓe wonɓe e salndu toppitiindu ɗemɗe genndiije e laamu Senegaal .
Wiyaama ko َadama ɓuri moƴƴude e Hawaa , kono ko Hawaa ɓuri newaade .
Wiyaama misil oo tiirii werlere tawi ine diwi , huunde nde hay gooto meeɗaa waɗde tawo .
Wiyaama o meeɗaa feeñande naange ngee so wonaa ñalnde heen .
Wiyaama omo rotanannoo konu Sayku Umar fof haa haara tawa barme mo o jiimi oo gasaani .
Wiyaama ɓe keɓti ko fetel gooto e gardeeɓe ɓee " pistolet PA " ɓe mbari ɗum kadi ɓe njaaɓani gardoowo goɗɗo oo , oon ne ɓe pelli ɗum ɓe mbari ɗum .
Wiyaama ɗoon kadi ko fulɓe mbiyatnoo jammbel-ƴiiwoonde , laɓal giñci-gañca ( laɓi haayre mbaɗki mbeleendi banngeeji ɗiɗi fof ) , geɗe muukiiɗe ɗe nganndaaka ko nafatnoo , binndi gannde diine ɓooyɗi , kono kadi geɗe kesam-hesamaagu yeeɓaama ɗoon , gila e goobu , cuɗaari , hirkeeji daabeeje , petelaaji , cuuɗi petelaaji , ƴiyal mola ngaaka e taabal mawɗo leydi gadano , hono Moktaar Wul Daddah .
Wiyanoo ñaaƴo ngo fuɗɗotoo ko sahnga waktuuji sappo kono nde tawnoo Liberwil wuro laamorgo ngo ɗeɓii ruudde e puɗɗogol mum , poorjentinaaɓe puɗɗii waɗde ñaaƴo mumen ko hedde waktuuji sappo e go’ sabu ko ndeen Guwerneer diiwaan o hono Gaspaar Naŋ Ellaa bukkitii to biro mum kañum e wondiiɓe mum naati Dingiral Jeytaare ngal , ɓe njaɓɓoraa saato kelle .
Wiyateeɓe ko nano ɓee , ko kanum en ngoni wiyooɓe Farayse waawaa ɓamtaade so liggodaaki e woɗɓe , e so tawii wallaani leyɗeele doofolle ɗee no ɓamtorii .
Wiyde " kala ko gollaa mi alaa heen , waɗaaka barke .
Wiyde " ɓaleeɓe taccinaaka "
Wiyde ene renndina ɗum ɗoo fof he tamannde wootere wonaa ko weeɓata .
Wiyde ina huutoroo doole laamu walla fuuntiiji , alaa heen fof ko wattinta .
Wiyde ine jannginira he nder 7 000 ɗemɗe winndere ndee fof , ko goonga ine hulɓina , kono ngool kulol haanaani .
Wiyde ko goonga walla ko fenaande noon ko tooñde ɓe mbiyaani ɗum mbaɗaani ɗum .
Wiyde mi resaama dewle tati poɗnooɗe wonnde dewngal gootal saabii ɗum komi meeɗaani maayireede hay jom galle gooto ɓe ndosondirmi min ceerti ɓee fof ko caɗeele ndewi hakkunde amen haa ceergal heɓi heen geɗal mun .
Wiyee eelde niwoore
Wiyee kadi yo jaɓ haandaani e ɓural e yettaade e martaba mo leƴƴi goɗɗi ɗii njettii oo .
Wiyee ooɗoo bommbo atomik ko ujunere ton TNT ( kilooton ) walla megaaton TNT ( 1 000 000 kiloo TNT ) ekn Bommbo mo Amerik werlinoo e wuro Hiroshila e hitaande 1945 ko 15 kilooton ɓetnoo .
Wiyeede hannde mboɗo jeyaa e lannda politik so tawii ko goonga haaletee mbayi mi ko hono mo duhaaki tuuba nii .
Wiyetee Muslimu ko ɓe juulɓe kisi e junngo mum e ɗemngal mum " , ( habrii oo hadiis ko Abdullaahi ɓiyi Umar ) , kaŋko Nulaaɗo , o wiyi kadi " Gooŋɗintaa gooto e mon so wonaa o yiɗana musiɗɗo makko ko o yiɗani hoore makko " ( Habri oo hadiis ko Anas mo Maalik )
Wiyetee ko nagge ngee " hookii " .
Wiyeteeɓe caŋkiima e koronaa ɓe , yimɓe heewɓe ina cikkitii ɗum ( koreeji mum en ) : ko wayno debbo gumminooɗo farayse o , curaaɗo fotde balɗe saappo e joy ko caggal nde saŋkii wiyaa " koronaa tawaama e mum " , walla biyaaɗo " saŋkiima sabu koronaa " to PK , koreeji mum e hoddiiɓe mum fof mbii ko oon " wonaano cellunooɗo tan ko juuti " e tee nde yimɓe galle maɓɓe curaa loskaa hay gooto e mum en tawaaka e mum .
Wiyi mo yo o naw sukayel ngel e neene mum ɗo wuro Makka woni jooni ɗo .
Wiyi nih ko Waleer Somee , dawriyanke ŋanaa , tellinɗo hale mum he ñaawoore ndee , ngam seedtaade .
Wiyimo Allah jaɓanii mo layya makko kadi weltiima e ɗowtaare makko .
Wiynoo nih ko Jogiiɗo kuuɓal Ngenndiije Dentuɗe Antoño Guteres ( Antonio Guterres ) , nder ciimtol ngol o waɗani Diiso Ndeenka ñalnde 11 duujal ( mee ) 2022 .
Wiyɓe-mi " Aɗa waawi diwde hay so a alaa bibje " !
Wiɗbtooɓe woɗɓe mbiyi helmere " waalata " nde ummii ko Manndikoore " Wala " waɗtaande he ɗemngal Beerbeer ( Sanaagi ) , firoore " Suudu basal " .
Wiɗo maɓɓe tawaa aanyam Godo ko e ɗiin nokkuuji jeyaa , won nii nokkuuji goɗɗi cuɓanoo , kono ko Godo keewal rokki yo suɓe .
Wiɗtiyanke kisaa-i wiyi : " laatiima Laamaka ko neɗɗo keewɗo tanaa , caɗtuɗo , ko neɗɗo tiiɗɗo keewɗo doole , kanko gooto omo ɗakkitanoo kaaƴe mawɗe tawa yimɓe heewɓe mbaawaa ɗum ɗakkitde , tawa o ɗakkiti ɗum ko e dow haayre .
Wiɗto hollitii sabaabu majjum ko ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ( ƁNW ) .
Wiɗto leydi Mars hollirii won'de ko ndi leydi moƴƴinoori leɗɗe e puɗi sabu kala ko lekki foti hatojin'de ina e mayri .
Wiɗto ngoo jokki , kono , ine jeyaa e ko telɓini ngo , keewgol wiyooɓe njiyii saaysaaye oo , tawi ko he nokkuuji ɗii fof , laawol gootol .
Wiɗto ngoo toɗɗii ko kewuuji baɗɗi e duuɓi 10 000 jawtuɗi ɗii e jotondiral mum en e ɓeydagol nguleeki .
Wiɗto ngoo yaltinii wonde " jooni ɓe ɓuri heewde wareede e nde paltoor woodnoo toon ndee " .
Wiɗtooji e humpito kala kollitii wonde kuutoragol ɗemngal neeniwal ko huunde waɗɗiinde ngam yuumtinde jaŋde .
Wiɗtooji keewɗi kollitii wonde " cukalel ɓuri waawde ekkaade ko he ɗemngal mum gadanal ( Ɗ1 ) So tawii ngel fuɗɗoriima jaŋde maggel he ɗemngal maggel gadanal ngal ( Ɗ1 ) , ko ndeen ngel ɓuroyta waawde ɗemngal ɗimmal ngal ( Ɗ2 ) e waawde marde gannde .
Wiɗtooji maɓɓe ɗii , ɓe mbaɗata ɗum en ko e kullon , nde tawnoo tagooje Alla ina ceerti njuuteendi ko nguurata : won e buubi nguurata ko jonte seeɗa tan , tawi noon won koon kullon diƴƴe ina nguura fotde duuɓi 400 !
Wiɗtooɓe njiytii ɓarakke liɗɗi joginooɗi gable , guurnooɗi ko ine wona duuɓi 440 miliyoŋ , cikkaaɗi ine mbaawi wonde taaniraaɓe men .
Wiɗtooɓe ɓee mbiyi njiytii leƴƴi joy ( 5 ) bakteriiji jotondirɗi e ɓeydagol jaawngol ñawu nguu .
Wiɗyooji kollitii wonde almuɓɓe janngirooɓe ɗemɗe mum en neeniije ine peɗɗitoo he ganndal , ine ɓeydoo yiɗde jaŋde , ine ɓeydoo hoolaade koye mum en .
Wojere deeƴi e ina faddi ko fowru eɓɓata .
Wojere faami ko pewjanaaɗo , alaa e sago sakka feere .
Wojere hee , timmitin konngol ngol .
Wojere ina wi'a : Ooh !
Wojere naamnii hol no daddoowo oo waɗi haa addi ɗoo nooroo e ɓesngu mum e ndii teddeendi .
Wojere wiꞌi mo , mi haaɗaani tan e jaakre , ngondu mi ko najde .
Wojere wiꞌii : " aan e ɓesngu maa kala o mooɓondiri on , hol no ɗuum waawi wonirde ?

Wolde adannde ɗoon , he 1991 , waɗii ko ɓuri 30 000 maayɗo .

Wolde ummiima !
Wolde ɓesngu joli he nokku biyeteeɗo Dommbas oo , ɓurɓe ɓallaade Riisi ɓee ceegii , keɓi jeytaare mum en .

Won binnduɗo " kaaƴe e beeli ndirtii , laabi ubbiima .
Won demoowo gooto wonnoo e gollude ngesa mum ha sumori ladde nde .
Won e " mawɓe adiiɓe " ko iwdi mum en tan nganndi ɗum en , won heen ko diiwaan fof maa leydi fof innitirtoo ɗum en , won heen kadi ina nganndaa e aduna hee fof ; fawii ko e no ɓe ngollirinoo e yonta maɓɓe , gollal potngal reweede maa potngal riiwteede .
Won e amen kadi , njaɓɓaaki miijo ngoo , ko ɗum waɗi ngaraani tawtoreede .
Won e amen ndiiwtaani miijo ngoo , kono mbeltaaki e no ngo tabitiniraa nii .
Won e amen nii , hay so hay dara dillaani , keewi ko werlaade eeraango , ngam dillinde sukaaɓe ɓe nganndaa nii ko yahetee koo .
Won e amen njaɓɓiima miijo ngoo , tee mbeltiima e golle ɗee .
Won e amen paami , ko o beeɗɗo min junngo , ngam min tina , hankadi , ko e leydi hee min njeyaa .
Won e bodle ine njogii , sara kine mum en , " nguddon " mbaawkon yiyde caafe les-boɗewol , walla nguleeki ɓalli goɗɗi ( ko noon ɗe keɓtinirta ko ɗe ndaddata koo ) .

Won e paaɓi ine njiya les-boɗewol .
Won e yimɓe wuro ngoo ngariino ngam semmbinde ɓe .

Won ellaaji njiytanoo e maggal kono ɗi yimɓe neldanooɓe toon , mbaawi safrude .
Won feññinooɓe heen nih ñiŋoore wonde ɗum wonaa fooyre kono ko duɗal , heddii noon ko so ƴeewaama tawde jaŋde aadanteere Ɓuraana , ko fooyre duɗal yomnortenoo alluuje haa almuɓɓe mbaawa dursitaade jamma , so duɗal wonaa fooyre ma a taw ko yumma mum .
Won geɗe kadi ɗe o haali hay gooto faamaani : " ɓeydugol njoɓɗeele gollotooɓe e batte mum " ; " yawaare makko e yimɓe nde o heɓtini , o yeddi kadi ganaagate " ; " basoragol makko ngol haanaani cellal ɓayndu e hakkille makko " ; " cikkitagol Abdel Asiis limooje FMI ɗe o huutortoo ngam dallinde seedantaagal makko " ; " yedditaade hoore mum " e ko wonaa ɗuum tan .
Won gorko gooto huutortonoo gaas ngam defde walla wulnude ndiyam , hawri gaas oo no wiisiraa nih feewaani .
Won he maɓɓe mbaɗɗii ko pucci ina mbeeyna raaye ( araaraayuuji ) boɗeeje , woɗɓe ina njahra koyɗe .
Won heen , horsinnooɓe ɓe mo , walla welanooɓe hare o heɓetee ndee , jeyi mettere mum en , ko o rokkii laamu njiltonoongu heɓde mo ko ɓooyi , hujja no yettorii mo .
Won heen , ko wayi no baaɗiiko Abdul Qudduus , aasiñoor ko faati e mahateeri naati konu , kono sankii ko Waalata to dummbidanoo e musiɗɓe mum enndunooɓe follude laamu e hitaande 1987 .
Won heen e maɓɓe kadi mbaawataa eeltude ñawu nguu so wonaa ɓe ɓeyde dihal insulin kal , wondude e poɗɗe jareteeɗe , wondude kadi e duumaade e ñameele celluɗe , e kadi e softinde ɓalli maɓɓe .
Won heen geɗe nanngaani hakkillaaji renndooji hannde !
Won heen ina njeddondira ko yowitii e politik .
Won heen inniri koye mum en ko " Fuuta Tampii " walla " Makki Yeeƴcito Fuuta " .
Won heen kadi , ngam daɗndude pittaali mum en , e jawdi mum en , ndogi , mooloyii Senegaal e Mali .
Won heen kadi ko teelɗuɓe , ngari tan ko ena mbeelnii aaraaraay leydi mumen .
Won heen ko aranooɓe nguɗu ( kaaseer ) jofe , won heen ko ñawu goddol , won heen ko ñawu calɗi bumsuɗe , tee fof ɓe kuutorii ko ɗaɗol nawowol ƴiiƴam mawngol ngol .
Won heen ko kaalɗen he nder winndannde he .
Won heen ko njiɗaa janngude , won heen ina njiɗi , kono jinnaaɓe mumen ina mbaasi rokkude yaajeede walla hattan walla doole mumen no njanngiri .
Won heen kolliri ko ngamri , njimri e sormatuuji renndo joolaa en , ko wayi Gammbi e Senegaal .
Won heen mbiyi ko " kuutoro-ɗen kaaldigal e jeewtidal " , woɗɓe mbiyi " alaa , won ɗo caɗeele tolnotoo , safrata ɗumen tan ko ngarmi-ngaraa " .
Won heen nduppaa ko ina nguuri .
Won heen ngarda e kaɓirɗe gasirɗe gasɗe .

Won heen nii ɗo enɗam taƴetee .

Won heen noon , mbaɗi ko seppooji , gila e nder wuro Nuwaasoot haa e gure goɗɗe nder leydi ndii , ina ɗaɓɓa nde o ñaawetee , o fawee kuugal ŋeerngal .

Won jappannooɗo ɓe noppi he ɗuum ( njeyaa ko he loranooɓe ɓee ) kono wayi ko no keewal ngal wiyi ko lopppet alaa heen , hay so tawii waɗaaka ñaawoore aadoraande maa wona " ñaawoore sabborde " ( justice transitionnelle ) etee sariya yaafuya mo 93 firtee .

Won wiyɓe enen ko njogi-ɗen , inɗe men ɗe , ko inɗe Allaaji ɓooyɗi , noon wayi !
Won wiyɓe ina jaaki ɗum en mbele Abdel Asiis haaldatnoo ko e ɓesngu ( woni ko ɓuri heewde e yimɓe ɓee ) walla tawii o haaldatnoo ko e hoore mum .

Won wiyɓe ko pinal moofti ɗemngal , won wiyɓe alaa !

Wonaa alaa e sago .

Wonaa ko ɓe cokaa koo , alaa ko muujiiba mo ɓe cokiraa koo .

Wonaa wutte jooɗɗo , wonaa galle jooɗɗo , wonaa oto walla goɗɗum .

Wonande binnditagol e karnal ngenndiwal yimɓe e kaayitaaji kisnaaɗi ( registre national des populations et des titres sécurisés ) alaa no waawi faamreede , so wonaa weleede waɗde paltoor .
Wonande cumu nguu , won wiyɓe ko kuuraa woni sabaabu mum , woɗɓe mbiyi ko gooto e sokaaɓe toon ɓee , buurnii nokku oo .
Wonande fannuuji ngalu e kaalis , feccitaade , peccitagol potngol , ngaluuji leydi ndii , tawa ina waɗta no moƴƴi hakkille e yimɓe joñaaɓe ko ɓooyi , yuɓɓitina tippule bankeeji ngam wallitde , e tolnooji hee kala , compugol e kuuɓtodingol ñamaale , mawɗe e tokoose , ngam ustude baasal e mumtude mbaadiiji kesi jiyɗingol yimɓe kam e ɗawgol leƴƴi e ngalu leydi ndii .
Wonande foksineeruuji siwil en ɓe , safaara juumtuɗo o alaa e sago teskoo denndaangal golle bonɗe ɗe ɓaleeɓe mbaɗanoo tuggi settammbar 1986 haa abriil 91 .
Wonande gorko , ene ɓeyda kattanɗe mum , wonande debbo , ene walla ɗum e falaade muusallaaji e sahaa ellagol .
Wonande gudde ɓaleeje , ndiin
Wonande gudde ɓaleeje , ndiin njaaweendi ɓurii njaaweendi annoore : waɗde haayre ndee waawata ɓoccitaade ɓaaƴo wuddere ɓaleere ndee , ko maa nde ɓura annoore yaawde , ndaa ɗuum aaɓnotaako .
Wonande juɓɓule keɓɗe soobaade e hare ndee , ko kayri tan heɓi feññinde diiñorɗe ngonkiweeje e pineweeje tammbiiɗe kuulal ngal gaa-gaa taranɗe njanngiiniweeje kollitaaɗe ɗee .
Wonande konu nguu e doole kisal ɗee , min ngalaa hay seneraal gooto , hay kolonel gooto .
Wonande militeeruuji daɗɗi e warngooji ɗi , haala ka foti toɗɗaade tan ko warngooji baɗnooɗi e nder tuddule ( casernes ) hakkunde oktoobar 90 e abriil 91 .
Wonande muritaninaaɓe ɓe ngonaa aarabeeɓe , " dokkitgol muritaninaajo neɗɗaagu mum " wontani ɗum en ko " waasde neɗɗaagu mum en goɗngol " , ko joñegol .
Wonande njuɓɓudi laamu nokkuyeeri ( administration territoriale ) , min ngalaa hay Waali gooto ; a min njogii cukko Waali gooto , e haakem gooto , e sukkuɓe haakem tato .
Wonande poostooji keddiiɗi ɗii , amin njogii kalfinaaɗo donngal ( chargé de missions ) gooto to persidaas , ballitoowo gooto ( attaché ) to pirimatiir , hooreeɓe diiso njuɓɓudi ( conseil d’adminsitration ) ɗiɗo e gardo kuuɓtodinɗo nokku dowla gooto .
Wonande sooninkooɓe , eɗen mbaawi rokkude yeru e fenaande fuŋŋiniinde wonande diiwaan Gidimaka oo to bannge keewal depiteeji , sibu teskaa ɗoo tan ko mukaataaji ɗiɗi e ronndismaaji tati , keewal yimɓe mum teskaaka .
Wonande sooninkooɓe , koɗki maɓɓe e leydi hee ina yaajnoo , sibu yettiima lowlowi cahe nannduɗe e Kummbi Saaleh e Waalata e Tiisiit e Shinngiti e Attaar , kono kadi ɓe idiima wattiindiiɓe arde ɗoo ɓee , hono Beni Hasaan en , ko ina wona duuɓi ujunere e leydi hee .
Wonande ɓeen hattanɓe ñaamninde miskineeɓe , oon mo yarlito ɓuri ; ko ɗum kadi ɓuri moƴƴude e mum .

Woni heen ɗaccata ko haa o leloo ngara ngona e bippude koyɗe makko .

Wonnoo daliilu pollugol laamu demokaraasiiwu nguu ko
Wonnoo e diiso Diina ngoo ko capanɗe nayo neɗɗo , hakkunde koohoowo diine e jaggal toowngal konu , diiso wonngo e les njiimaandi makko .
Wonnoo e nguun laamu ko siwil en e gardagol Bah Ndaw , wondude e gardiiɗo jaagorɗe biyeteeɗo Moktaar Wan .
Wonnoo heen ko binndanɗe silo e kabri , ekn .
Wonnoo ko nder boleeru " Burkinaa " nder galle Diiso Nanondiral ( " Conseil de l’Entente " ) .
Wonnoo miijo jibinngo fedde nde ko jokkere enɗam tan kono hannde , PSA huccani eɓɓooji ƴellitooji leñol e kala fannu .
Wonnooɓe nder makka ina ɗaanii walla ina njeewta ke ɓaani fartaŋŋe dadaade lummborɗe ( gilet de sauvetage ) mumen .
Wonta , ndiin lacciri njahnoondi haa suurti , ko maa rufee , pelemiri loowee kadi ngam sotteede .
Wonta kadi maa paden haa ndi gasna sotteede , ni irfee , ndi sikitee , conndi e ceŋle ceernde .
Wonti ko ɓurɗo ƴoƴde e heewde peeje fof adda dallinanɗe mum haa heɓa ko yiɗi koo .

Woodaani !
Woodat fewjuɓe , kaalda haa kawra , kaaldee kadi haa kawree , bayɗo no am waasa yiytaade heen hoyre mum tan waɗa heen ceenal haa herƴa .
Woodde saliiɓe teelɓe ɓe konngi cariiɗe , ɗi ndentaani , ɗum laamu nguu , ina hasii , tawi tombinooma ɗum .
Woodi biꞌɗo : " Ƴoogee e boyli jeeɗiɗe ɗi njiida , lotton ɗum ɓiɗɗo oo e balɗe tati " .
Woodi bonnuɓe mbayla kaa , Almaañnaaɓe naamndii yo o haalan ɗum en waɗɓe ɗee golle .
Woodi e maɓɓe fayɓe Haayre Laaw .
Woodi e maɓɓe kadi , haa hannde , yahɓe Jaaba to diiwaan Hebbiyaaɓe , koɗoyi toon .
Woodi e maɓɓe tedduɓe , ɓe kisal leydi ndii woni ngoƴa mum en dowrowo , ngummanii maslahaa mbele Barakna , e Tararsa e Tagante na mbeldita , ngona senngo wooto , kaɓtoo koloñaal en .
Woodi heen ɓe Koppolaani rullini , heen bannge e galle Emiir ( nde tawnoo ko galle mo cuuɗi ɗiɗi : suudu ummiindu e afo njaatiraaɓe e suudu ummiindu e sammbaajo njaatiraaɓe maɓɓe ) , won e mawɓe wulaad Ahmed , wulaad Nogmaash , wulaad Buseyf , wulaad Aali , won e mawɓe Tiisiksa e Idawaali Shingiti , e Awjeft e won e mawɓe wulaad Ngaylam ndullinaa .
Woodi ko lappi ndu womre , fowru natti anndude ɗo woni , ndu faɗɗii .
Woodi maayɓe heen .
Woodi nii koko luulndii ɗuum !
Woodi siftinɓe ɗanngal huunde e maɓɓe , duuɓi jeenay jooni ( oktoobar 2003 ) , to Biriksel , ɗo ɓe mbiynoo " Maawiya waraani hay gooto , taccinaani hay gooto " .
Woodi sumaaɓe , woodi yoolaaɓe , woodi ɓe leɗɗe tufaa e caggal mum en , njatiroyi fulkuru , yaltinaa , lookaa e tekteki mum en .
Woodi winnduɓe ngam naamndaade ɓe , hol to ngonnoo ɗii duuɓi kala , to ɓe ngonnoo nde haala binndital haaletee ?
Woodi wiyɓe kadi " en njeɗaaka " , nangtii e ko wiyaa Eli haalii koo , njuɓɓuni seppooji ngam seyfitde Eli .
Woodii nih e wiyde makko kadi , soofaaji Ecopia yantuɓe he LFPT .
Woodii ɗo cakkitooje majje teskaa e winndannde jaɓaande ndee , kono won ko teskaaka heen , haa teeŋti noon wonande daawal cabborgal ngal , kam e jannginirgol suka muritanaajo kala denndaangal fannuuji jaŋde ɗii he nder ɗemngal mum neeniwal , kam e baggingol laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije keddiiɗe ɗee Winndannde ndee ine waɗi haa hannde jiiɓooje potnooɗe laɓɓitineede , baawɗe addoyde jiiɓru walla faamreede no moƴƴaani .
Woofɗuɓe ɓee maa njahru koyɗe mumen .
Woon Muritani-naaɓe e nder leydi ndi haa e caggal mayri , walla tumarankooɓe wonnooɓe ɗo e leydi ndi mbaɗaa golle bonɗe ɗe ngalaa daliliilu .
Woon Muritaninaaɓe e nder leydi ndii haa e caggal mayri , walla tumarankooɓe wonnooɓe ɗoo he leydi ndii mbaɗaa golle bonɗe ɗe ngalaa daliliilu .
Woon e seerenɓe ɓee ɓuri hatojinde ko e kopporeeje .
Woon heen boom ene njannga ko ɓuri ɗemngal gootal ngam haa mbaawa reende hurum kala ɗemngal leydi ndii e rokkude kala heen leñol e leñɗi leydii jojjannde mum .
Woon heen ko pelle ngenndiije jogiiɗe peŋɗe e cate he nder keeri leyɗeele mum en , goɗɗe heen nii ko taƴti keeriije denndinɗe dowlaaji keewɗi walla terɗe jeyaaɗe he leyɗeele ceertuɗe ; kono won heen ko goomuuji haralleeɓe jogiiɓe payndaale laaɓtuɗe e jiyanɗe he holno ɗeen payndaale njettortee .
Woondu Ndey Kummba Jah mehru tan ena weli alaa ko haali nde o fiɓi anniya yimde ngam weltinde Fulɓe haa teeŋti e jimol jaaroore jaambareeɓe waɗnooɓe golle tiiɗɗe , ngol o nanngi ngol .
Woondu men e makko , ko haɗde miijo makko maayde .
Woondu men e makko , ko haɗde miijo makko ngoo maayde .
Woondu men e makko ko salaade anniyaaji ɗi o joginoo ɗi mbaasa joofde .
Woondu men e makko ko salaade anniyaaji ɗi o joginoo ɗii mbaasa joofde .
Woorti ɓeydude ceeɓeendi hakkille , tigilde kelme ena adda fannuuji ganndal fof gila e coñce , daartol , ganndal koode , wertaango , dawrugol
Woote njuɓɓinaa o fooli kadi , o fiilaa ñalnde 1 oktoobar 2005 .
Woote ɗe ina ceedtanaa laaɓal .
Wootere
Wootere e dallintooje mum ɓurnde lollude ina wiyee dallintoore Pitaagoor ( Théorème de Pythagore ) .
Woppa haa soofa , haa tuuta , ene yara heen sahaa e sahaa fof .
Woppude ɓe e sagooji maɓɓe noon , wayi ko no suusnude hankadi koninkooɓe hirnaange Afrik fof e huutoraade doole ngam heɓtude laamuuji .
Worgo kono .
Worɓe , rewɓe , sukaaɓe e mawɓe kamɓe fof ngarat .
Worɓe galle ɓee fof noddondiri , noddori ñeeñɓe mumen , ngoppi mo sellaani oo .
Worɓe njeegomo ena nogitii fetelaaji pelli galle oo haa heewɓe wonnooɓe e saraaji mbarmi heen .
Worɓe yoo kaɓane cinndaaɗe mum en , ngaccee min kaɓee e reende seleeji amen kañum e haɓaade nawliigu mon mbonngu karmungo sabu ko Alla wii ko nawliigu alaa e mon baawɗo ɗum .
Woto mbaree min haala e mon jiddo tayan de biyum fof yoo muddit kono dalee faambe cadeele dee mbada do njidiri .
Woto nguddee , ma en paamondir , fenaande haalaaka ɗo .
Woto njejjiten , nyalawma kuurɗo e dow tagofeere , ko ma tagofeere nde yirloo e dow hoyre mum , waɗa yiloo banngo haa arta ɗo wonno .
Woto njejjiten , yirlaade e hoore mum ( waɗde yiiloo-banngoo ) e taaraade huunde ko geɗe ɗiɗe ceertuɗe
Woto njejjiten , yirlaade e hoore mum ( waɗde yiiloo-banngoo ) e taaraade huunde ko geɗe ɗiɗe ceertuɗe .
Woto njejjiten , ñalawma kuurɗo e dow tagofeere , ko ma tagofeere nde yirloo e dow hoyre mum , waɗa yiloo banngo haa arta ɗo wonno .
Woto njejjiten ko sukaaɓe rewɓe e worɓe tawtortee .
Woto tagaaɗo miijoto firtirde miijo mum laawol tagɗo oo .
Woto ɗalen haa maayde jola , heddoo eɗen ngoya mo , eɗen cunoo e maayde makko , eɗen kolla wonde eɗen njiɗnoo mo walla eɗen njotondirnoo e makko jotondiral tiiɗngal .
Woto ɗalen haa maayde jola , heddoo eɗen ngoya ɗum , eɗen cunoo e maayde mum , eɗen kolla wonde eɗen njiɗnoo ɗum walla eɗen njotondirnoo e mum jotondiral tiiɗngal .
Woy dimo , ngooƴam dawaaɗi .
Woy heege e " Munnu Manna " , dampee , dawa , yeeƴotaako .
Woy sole yoo woy nooroo .
Woytantonooɓe MAA ɓee njaabtaama .
Woyyo !
Woyyoo maa sahre , sahre moƴƴere malaande , o xeeri debee , sahre ɓoorniima cakka teddungal .
Woƴi Gellaay ko ceɗɗo jeeri waawaa ndiyam , anndaa maayo e kaawisaaji mum .
Woƴi hannde Njamenaaɓe ko yiilaade no ndaɗndiri koye mum en .
Woƴi ɓe tan ko yooltude hujjaaji ɓesnguuji leydi ndii , kadi ɓe njiilaaki heɓde laamu .
Woɗɓe , wayɓe no Niseriyaa kaaɗi tan ko e haala .
Woɗɓe e maɓɓe ko maa puuntaa keɓaa , ɓeya kollaa haa njiyi ; ngoppi ngonkiiji Aarabeeɓe njaɓi , ɓeya piyaa haa njaggi e ɓoggi , ngoppi ngonkiiji Aarabeeɓe njaɓi .
Woɗɓe kadi ( pelle e teelɗuɓe ) njuɓɓinii jeewte keewɗe e dumunna jawtuɗo oo , paatuɗe heen .
Woɗɓe kadi etiima yamɗinde
Woɗɓe kadi kunii ko mbaawi jippinde .
Woɗɓe kadi lolluɓe ina nodditironoo dillere ndee , hono Ceebele Daraame e woɗɓe wiyetenooɓe " daande bolsewikiyaagal " .
Woɗɓe kadi ɗakka e maa ko heewi ɗakkeede e kala jiɗɗo haala mum haalee .
Woɗɓe kirsaa , koyɗe e juuɗe e noppi
Woɗɓe ma ngabbo ɓeen .
Woɗɓe mbiyi helmere nde ummii ko e Arab , e Baraku ( woni Barke ) woni ko waɗaa barke .
Woɗɓe njaltinaama galleeji kasnoo he yamiroore " polis " .
Woɗɓe ɓee ndiiwaa , walla
Woɗɗii fellotaako , Wonaa Debe toɓɓiJoom bajjal he bajje curangal
Woɗɗondiraani e haala Waalii .
Wuddere ɓaleere portilaande ndee wiyetee ko M87 , ko nde pattamñisre ( kaaɗtudi ñiso ) .
Wuddowol naange ngol kaalaten ɗo ngol , ko fuɗɗaade hakkunde naange ter , fayde to hawngo naange .
Wuddu ( hakkunde ) dille ɗee , ɗo wiyetee " yitere wuubiliiru nduu " ina yiyoo e nate ɗe satelitaaji ƴetti .
Wuddu ko maande piggal ibliis e dow reedu Aadama .
Wuddu maggo ko hedde 25 kiloomeeteer hakkunde mum e wuro ngoo .
Wul Laghdaf fawaani heen sahaajutɗo , o lelnii goomu jaagorɗe makko e ko jaayndeeji laamu nguu mbayyini ñalnde heen jamma .
Wulaad Buu Sbaa en ceeki senngo ngoo , keedani koloñaal en .
Wulaad ben Daamaan en , ɓiɗtaaɓe e lorlaaɓe mbeltaaki ko Boyyaada siifondiri e Koppolaani koo .
Wulaangu ko wooto wonnde ko waɗaa koo ɗooftaaki laawol e doosɗe , etee eɓe naamndii yoo laamu artu e kuwgal Yumansarɗiigol .
Wuldu Seek oo ko takkanooɗo etaade warde hooreejo leydi Muritani ɓooyma , Muhammad Wuldu Abdul Asiis , tuman de wonno e laamu ndee .
Wullaango jamma ɗaccidtaake e gooto .
Wullitaango ngoo rewata laawol tan ko maa hormoo lajal lewru caggal nde jooɗiiɗo e dow leydi hee ɗaɓɓiraa yo ummo e dow mayri .
Wullum kañum yahdi e fetel Hammadi e kure 5 walla 6 .
Wullum suuɗii caggal supoƴuru , jaabtii , fiɗi garde oo .
Wullum taartii tulde ceenal , ari jokkiti Hammadi .
Wumɓe ɓee maa mi feertu gite maɓɓe .
Wune e teddungal mbarñante kono ndañetaake e ɓuuɓri walla e ɗoyngol .
Wuro Alep , anndiraango hannde Halab , woni ko rewo leydi Siiri hannde ndii , dow nokku gebbi leydi .
Wuro Punayel maalik .
Wuro Suwoyraat jaaraama , fulɓe Suwoyraat njaaraama , nde tawnoo e kala fannu kawgel ɓe nootitiima heen ngam softinde e suusnude .
Wuro amen woniri ko bannge funnaange jeeri lommbiri ndii .
Wuro fof , arɗo mum toɗɗaa , tawa ina ɗoftoo laamu tuubakooɓe ( yeru Arɗo Mbantu , Arɗo Daakaa , ekon ) .
Wuro hammadi Kañaaga
Wuro heen kala haaltidi ngam heblanaade ñalawma mawɗo oo .
Wuro lollungo kadi ko Siidi Busid , ɗo suka gorko Tunusnaajo huɓɓunoo hoore ngam salaade baasal e kiiɗal ngal laamu Ben Aali fawnoo he maɓɓe haa jibini waklitere demminaare aarabeeɓe .
Wuro ngo faaɗiri mo .
Wuro ngoo dillat .
Wuro ngoo ena heewi jettooɗe kono ena maantinii heen Joob , Saar , Sih , Mbooc , Sek e Manngaan .
Wuro ngoo ena waɗi Awluɓe tawi iwdi mum en ko Mboolo Biraan e ko nanndi heen .
Wuro ngoo fof dilli gooto kala ina yiɗi wonde baroowo cofel ngell .
Wuro ngoo fof nanondiri ko Waandu woni gujjo mumen .
Wuro ngoo heewi tep hoɓɓe e banndiraaɓe Kalifaaɓe tawtoranooɓe jonnde ndee njamiri yo o wuro heen kala waɗ batu .
Wuro ngoo kala ina haala haala makko .
Wuro ngoo woni yeru moƴƴo .
Wuttatnooɓe ɓee fof keewi tan ko wallitoraade bojji , kaamtaali e caɓɓitaali .
Wutte , tuuba e turki fof ena ranwi tal , miɗo waɗdi heen paɗe mukke oole !
Wutte ine mawni , emin njooɗni ngal pellital ɗuum ko yiyannde KD Sow jannginoowo to ekkol varough Kayhayɗi
Wutte oo , caggal ɗuum hettaama , o ɓoornaama wutte oo , caggal nde o ɓoornaa wutte oo , o yalti wuro ngoo ngam yiiloyaade ko o yoɓiri mo .
Wuurde e woodde ko geɗe ɗiɗi ceertuɗe .
Wuurde haa haaɓa , ɗum ne kadi ina jeyaa e golle annduɓe tuubakooɓe , dadiiɓe laŋ ngam faamde hol ko waɗi so neɗɗo heɓii duuɓi 80 walla 90 solɓitto , maaya .
Wuurde noon kadi wooda , weeɓaani .
Wuurnata ndeen yiɗde kadi ko miijo heeriingo , wonaa sikkeeji walla ɗooftagol laamu .
Wuurni jaaɓnirɗe ɗee ko jeeyle ( piblisitee ) ɗe sosiyateeji mawɗi njoɓata mbele jaaɓnirɗe ɗee ine kollana ɗum en huutorɓe ɓee , ɗum woni enen , ngam jarribaade en haa cooden .
Wuurni murto jihaadiyankaagal ngoo nder nokkuuji ɗo yimɓe ngoppidaa e koye mum ko ɓooyi , kadi addani jihaadiyankaagal Aamadu Kufa e almuɓɓe mum feeñde , ko heedi heeda , banndam-banndaagu , mbuuñaagu nduumiingu , kam e baasgol woodde ñuunɗal nder renndo .
Wuurnude jaaynde e nder ɗemngal ngal alaa fof ɗo laawɗinaa , e sato wayngo nii yoorde , weeɓaani , sibu heewɓe ndokkaani ɗum qiima , mbiyata nii ma a taw , ko toppitiiɓe ɗum ɓee ngalaa haaju .
Wuurnude jaaynde e sato wayngo nii weeɓaani , haa teeŋti noon so tawii fotnooɓe wallitde ɓee , mballitaani .
Wuyɓe ɓee nawii
Xaliilu ko meer/ dipitee kadi ko joom ceede .
Xeewee tan , enen ngoytoo sahaa fof nguleeki naange , tawii noon ngoɗɗeeki hakkunde naange nge to woni to e men ko kilomeeteruuji 149 .
Y Alla sellin doole .
YNG sompii goomuuji jeeɗiɗi tolnondirɗi e calɗi 7 cifaaɗi he nder doosɗe fedde ndee .

YOO HARE JOKKU .
YOO pULAAGU WAD HEEN KO WIYETE CAALI JAKKA .
Yaa Aan Joom amen Yo A Jippin e nder maɓɓe nelaaɗo e maɓɓe , jaŋtanoo ɓe aayeeje ma , janngina ɓe defte e ñeeñal kadi laɓɓina ɓe .
Yaa aan Joom amen , yo a waɗ min [ ɗiɗo ] jebbiliiɓe ɗo ma , e ko ummii e geñgol amen yo a waɗ heen ngenndi jebbiliiɓe ɗo maa .
Yaajirii noon ko e innde wiyateende Duɗe Anndu Diine Maa , e huufireede fedde inniraande ndeen innde .
Yaajtinde " kantijaaji " , so dañaama wuurtinde " enternaaji " ngam ɓeydaade hisindaade janngooɓe ɓee , e wallude sukaaɓe waasɓe ( won ɗeen moɓe ɓesngu joñaaɗe ) kam e jaŋde sukaaɓe rewɓe .
Yaama tawo wonaa kanko e hoore makko fooɗi rawaandu fetel o fawi e becce Sankara , kono waɗɓe ɗum ɓee ko e yamiroore makko .
Yaama ɗo adan ɗoo maa Arabeeɓe ɓee njaɓ newnandeɓe wonde huunde kala he leydi hee haa ɓe ngasa saayde .
Yah , nganndaa sabu emin njiɗi itteede e kumpa !
Yah e pokpokolam ɗam , ndaara maantooɗe koyɗe am ɗee no ciforii , nganndaa no foti baaɗi ngari .
Yah haaldu e maɓɓe tawde ko aan wiyatee koɗo .
Yah hello ngam ɓeydudaade humpitaade ɗi .
Yah laawol maa , goɗngol noon so a rewii ɗoo , ciftoraa mbiɗo haala .
Yah-ngartaa fof alaa ko nawi toon aadee so wonaa ƴeewde mbele toon ine hoɗoo Jokku to hello 8
Yahaani e banngeeji fof : janngirɗe mum e jannginooɓe mum e jiilgol mum e huufo mum e tolnooji janngooɓe mum .
Yahde omo juuroyee seenrnaaɓe e hilifaaɓe diine , tinndinta ko omo hurmii diine o .
Yahdu ndu ina ɓeyda kada mawnugol nokku ( hettere ) teskorɗo gonɗo e ngaanndi o biyeteeɗo ippokamp ( hippocampe ) .
Yahdu ndu ko wooturu , feewndu , wonaa no Oto nii !
Yahi haa woni duuɓi seeɗa , kanko gorko oo , o arti e baabiraaɗo oo , o wiyi ɗum " miin dey mi yiyii debbo mo njiɗ-mi resde haa no feewi " .
Yahnoo toon ko Neel Mastrong e Aldrin , laana maɓɓe wiyetenoo ko " appoloo " 11 .
Yalli ɗum battinan e janngo makko e baŋŋe dawro ?
Yaltini ngolɗoo jangtawol ko jom`en sunnaaji , Haakim e ibnu hibbaan , sellinii ɗum e konngol Umar .
Yamiroore ardoyaade suudu hesuru nduu .
Yamiroore tabitinde ngool cosgol yaltii , kono tan min ndonkii kadi jogodaade heen miiji wooto e darnnde wootere .
Yanaande Ceerno Sileymaani Baal woni ko e ɗeɓi-duunde Jeeriyel Tummbere sara Ɓokki Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi .
Yanaande Sankara ubbitaa , ɓe loski ADN makko ngam yananeede ko kanko woni ɗoon .
Yani e makko ko ypga e konu makko saliiɓe ko o welditi e Isra'el koo .
Yankinaare e nder laamu , ngu Alla luɓiri neɗɗo , yankinaare e nder jokkondiral men e woɗɓe , yankinaare sahnga nde keɓ-ɗen jawdi e yankinaare , e nder denndaangal darnde men , sabu wattan fof , ko en yahooɓe , tee HAY HUUNDE en nawortaa !
Yankinaare makko e deƴƴere makko ndokkaani woɗɗuɓe anndude mo .
Yanti e ndiin kasdi , kasɗo oo ine wersa GIE DYNN 5% pawnaari dañi he bannge kasaaɗo oo , ngam huuɓnude gollagol DYNN e tiiɗtinde kattanɗe mum , woni , ko famɗi fof , 121 800 USD nanondiraaɗe .
Yanti e nduu iiñcuru , wolde mawnde na joli rewo , hakkunde safalɓe ( 1644-1674 ) , hakkunde seernaaɓe " Suwaaya " en e " Aarabeeɓe Hasan " , hono wolde Shaar Bubba , wolde laamu , hare njiimaandi Muritani .
Yanti e ɗum kadi wiyaama e ko ɓenni ɓe ngonaa laaɓɓe juuɗe no feewi e desnde ɗe ɓe ndesndanoo gila ko ɓooyi haa teeŋti noon coodguuji kaɓirɗe dadiiɓe baɗanooɗe e juuɗe maɓɓe tuma nde ruggiyankooɓe tuwaareg’en keedi laamu leydi ndi e fuɗoowe .
Yanti e ɗuum fof , e lewru oktoobar , cumu mawngu waɗii e fuɗɗaange rewo leydi Alaseri , fotde yimɓe 90 mboomiima heen , ko jiidaani e bonannde pooɗe e koɗorɗe .
Yanti heen , " hecci hanki tan , e woote 2009 , kanko waɗantunoo Eli kampaañ " .
Yanti heen , Alla ina waɗi e ñaaki kaawis : njogoram ngori kii wayi seeɓde ko no meselal nii , ɗo heɓi e ɓalndu njarli kii fof ñippat heen , woppa heen kañtuli keewɗi , jibinoyooji ɓikkon keewkon .
Yanti heen , Gaajo meeɗaa yahdude e ndonu laamu ngu Wadd fewjanta ɓiyi mum ɗii duuɓi kala , gila e suuɗnde haa waɗti haaleede e weejnde .
Yanti heen , feere ndee woodi tan tawo ko e leyɗe mawɗe ɗee , ndaa noon nguɗu ɓuri heewde ko e leyɗe pamare doole ɗee ( hedde 70% ) .
Yanti heen , haa e ooɗoo sahaa gartirgol ngol fuɗɗaaki tawo to diiwaan Gorgol .
Yanti heen , he kitaale 1990-2000 sosiyateeji faramasi mawɗi mbaɗti battinde he OMS ( politikaaji mum mbaɗti yooɓtoreede alɗinde yeeyooɓe safaara , mbaɗti lorde paandaale goɗɗe ɗee ) .

Yeeɓooɓe
Yeeɓooɓe ) wonaa yeeɓiyankooɓe .
Yeeɓooɓe ina ngulla ina luukaa haa sooti juuloya , ngaari dañee , arnooɓe fof mbeltoo .
Yeeɓooɓe ɓee na poɓɓa kelle na kuljina , jimoowo hiirde nde ina geewo .
Yegeñ ko deppel ngel siwaa mawnude .
Yegeñ ko innde nde fulɓe inniri , sabu hay so a ƴeewii to wammbaaɓe ina waɗi yegeñ , kono woto njejjiten ko bammbaaɗo mbo hoɗataa , wiyaatee yegeñ .

Yeru hakkunde gure e sahaa ɓooyɗo anndiranoo , so ndunngu arii , laaɗe ina njaha heen .
Yeru he lewru Seeɗto ( Avril ) yawtundu nduu , naalankooɓe mawɓe lolluɓe he nder aduna oo , heewɓe e mum en kanaaluuji mum en Youtube taƴaama .
Yeru ina woodi " fistil dolirgol " ( laawol ɗo ñaamdu rewata : hunuko – goddol – kuuse – tekteki ) , ina woodi fistil " saawdu coofe " Fistilaaji kaaleteeɗi ɗoo ɗi ko fistilaaji " jibinirgol " : ɗum noon toɗɗii ko rewɓe : ko jantondiral " coofirgol " ( saawdu coofe ) e " wuddere ndewaagu " ( kottu ) walla jantondiral " coofirgol " e " kuutol " : ɗum heewi heɓtaade rewɓe ko e caɗeele jibingol .
Yeru jaaynde Le Calame siftinii en ɗee geɗe : " ganaagayte , njeeygu senusi , kaalis Kaddaafi , njeenaari cehilaagal ( hannde wonda e Sudaan , janngo wonda e Kataar , jamma waalda e Sawuud , weeta ñiŋde Orop ) miliyaaruuji 7 Snim , njeeygu ekkolaaji , boowe cofte ɓalli e laaɗe diwooje jeeyaaɗe , caɗeele keɓtiiɗe Attm e Ener , ɓeydagol ñamaande Muritani hakke miliyaaruuji joy dolaar ( 1 800 miliyaar ugiyya ) , santaraaluuji kuuraa , abiyoŋaaji MAI , isin ceŋgol abiyoŋaaji mo seedaaka tawo , leyɗe daande maayo loppitaaɗe , njoldi duwaan paljundi , kitaasuuji teresoor ñemmbaaɗi , kalfingol golle ɓe welaa , njeeygu bannge e leydi ndii " .
Yeru jeyeede e sosnooɓe Dental Magreb Arab ( UMA ) e hitaande 1989 , e jaltugol e Dente Afrik hirnaange ; yeru jaltugol bannginteewol e Dental Faggudu e Ƴellitaare Dowlaaji Afrik Hirnaange ( CEDEAO ) , tawi Muritani ina jeyanoo e sosnooɓe ɗum e hitaande 1975 , ko juuti ko adii cosgol UMA .
Yeru leƴƴannde tuuginoo ko taƴre ñalawma , kiloogaraam ( kg ) kañum tuuginoo ko e muul njamndi kaynaandi joɗɗinanooɗo to nokku ina wiyee Sèvres to Farayse .
Yeru limooje ɗe Fedde wootere daraniinde jojjanɗe aadee mbappitii to woɗɗi limooje duɗal kaal-ɗen down gal .
Yeru mum , ko e hitaande 1998 , o ɗeŋƴaaki haalande Bil Kilinton goonga , tawi ina ari mo njillu , o wiyi : " ngidii-mi fof bismaade ɗooyene e ndiiɗoo leydi ko Fidel Kastroo Mi bismiima kadi ɓiy neene am Muammaar Kaddaafi waɗi mi waɗde noon , ko aada amen ina bonni woppude walla yejjitde neɗɗo ballitnooɗo ma e tuma nde ngon-ɗaa e caɗeele ɓurɗe fof mawnude e nguurndam ma " .
Yeru mum , ko haala Maymuuna Alfaa Sih , gooto e rewɓe ɓe worɓe mum en mbardanoo amdu e hitaande 1990-1991 .
Yeru mum kala nde worɓe subalɓe cooyninoomo ngummoto ndaroo , ngitta laafaaji mum’en mbeeyna , njettamo , mbiya : " SAAR !
Yeru mum ko ko
Yeru mum ko to Kaaƴel Abuu , Murtogal , Hamdallaay e Foonde Maayel .
Yeru mum tan ko yuurnitaade mbaydi lelngo kelme nder pulfule ɗee : " Yontere feƴƴunde , yontere ƴaɓɓiinde , yontere ɓennunde , yontere faltiinde , asawere saaliinde " .
Yeru ooɗoo sunami bettii hiirde naalankaagal mawnde , reggini amooɓe
Yeru poolguuji partiiji ngañgu to Orop e wooteeji cakkitiiɗi ( Farayse ( 13% ) , Itaali ( 29 , 7% ) , Hongrie ( 65 , 8% ) , Autriche ( 24% ) , Pays-Bas ( 10 , 1% ) e Belgique ( 10 , 1% ) ko seede majjum .
Yeru suka pullo , mo naanaani hay " kaay ma ray la " e jolof , hono " ar mi war maa " !
Yeru tabitdo ko e nder galleji mabbe sukaabe mabbe walla taaniraabe mabbe kaddinaaka .
Yeru to Danemark .
Yeru to Kanadaa , nguleeki kii yahii haa 49 , 5°C he lewru suweŋ to wuro ine wiyee Lytton .
Yeru to Londres , laamu nguu heñiima e ittude nanndolla jula jiyaaɓe biyeteeɗo Robert Milligan , hade mum waɗeede no nanndolla biyeteeɗo Edward Colston waɗaa nii , kañum ne ko jiyɗinoowo wonnoo , ka seppooɓe mberlii nder maayo .
Yeru to leydi Farayse , 120 000 almuudo ina kuutoree nde e nder ekkolaaji leslesi .
Yeru tufɗe Saint Petesbuur , Wladiwostok , e Kaliningrad , korngilto so dabbunde arii .
Yeru ɗemngal tafingal e yeeso laawɗinal kuɓtodinngal ko ɗemngal biyeteengal " Rheto-romans " .
Yeru ɗo sakke sakki feere ɗati ɗaatni fiytiraa kiwal .
Yeru ɗoo he leydi Muritani ina foti wallitde yimɓe haa kisna leyɗeele mumen , ɗum woni mo woni kala heɓana leydi mum kaayit jeyi leydi , laamu dartina dawrugol yiɗde heɓtude leyɗeele miskineeɓe , rewata heen ko wallitde yimɓe ɓee e kaɓirɗe e aawdi e engere e haralleeɓe ndema .
Yeru ɗooyene , HCR ina jeyaa e gollodiiɓe ; ANAIR jeyaa e ko ciforto-ɗen ɗo laamu .
Yeruuji ba’ɗi , noon e renndo ngo limotaako , gila e dawriyankooɓe men , wonnooɓe jagge laamu , woni heen haa jooni ko jagge ; kono en ndonkii fellitde haɓde e maɓɓe sabu banndiraagal .
Yeruuji goɗɗi ina ngoodi
Yeruuji mum ko Farayseere e Almañeere , e Engeleere , e Aarabeere , e Españoleere e Portugeere .
Yerɓannde ndee ko mawnde sanne sabu ɓeto mayre tolnii ko 7 e Seel Richter .
Yerɓo doolnungo waɗnoongo e leydi he ñalnde 15 suwee 1896 ( duuɓi 111 hikka ) ko toɓɓe 8 , 5 umminiino wempeƴere ndiyam mawnde , moolanaande ( meeteruuji 25 tooweendi ) , boomi tufnde Sanriku , wari ko ina tolnoo e 22 000 neɗɗo .
Yerɓo leydi Alep ( 1138 – Siiri ) .
Yerɓo leydi Ardabil ( 1997 – Iraan ) .
Yerɓo leydi Ashgabat ( 1948 – Turkemenistaan ) .
Yerɓo leydi Damghan ( 856 – Iraan ) .
Yerɓo leydi Haiyuan ( 1920 – Siin ) .
Yerɓo leydi Hokkaido ( 1730 – Yaabaan woni Japoŋ ) .
Yerɓo leydi Kanto ( 1923 – Japoŋ ) .
Yerɓo leydi Port-au-Prince ( 2010 – Hayiti ) .
Yerɓo leydi Shaanxi ( 1556 – Siin ) .
Yerɓo leydi Tangshan ( 1976 – Siin ) .
Yerɓo leydi ina wiyee doolnii tuggude toɓɓe 6 .
Yerɓo ngoo ine millee hannde e toɓɓe 8 .
Yerɓo ngoo waɗi ko he keerol hakkunde Turki e Siiri , ngo waɗii ko ine tolnoo e 40 000 pawɗe maayɗo .
Yetto e diiwaanuuji Tooro jaɓnooɗi peccitagol men ngol , kabraa ɓe kamɓe ne , wonde haa jooni eɗen keddii e peccitagol ngol , kam e jeewte ɗe Abel Sanndee waɗnoo , e nder lebbi sulyee , e ut 1890 .
Yiilirde adannde ndee waylanooma ñalnde 7/8/1977 , kono ko ɓuri heewde e terɗe yiilirde adannde ndee ko heen keddinoo .
Yiilirde ardotoonde catal ngal , toɗɗaa
Yiilirde mayre ko nii siforii
Yiiloo-banngoo magge haa nge arta ɗo nge wonnoo , wonata ko balɗe men 30 .
Yiiti ɗi ko laana ka Ameriknaaɓe nuldunoo gila 1977 , ka yetti toon ko e Juko 1989 ; duuɓi 12 a ka yaha ka dartaaki , etee kanka ɓuri laaɗe men diwooje ɗe yaawde ɗo woɗɗi !
Yillotoo ɗe ko kalfaandi .
Yimi ŋeñi haa Weli Jinngi .
Yimlɓe ɓee mbayi no bettaaɓe nih !
Yimme wuro ngoo naamnii koɗo oo no foti cabbi Sanngalde foti fiyeede .
Yimre ene weeɓi huñaade kadi so joom mum ene yima , nde tawnoo heewi won’de ko daande mum dow , so goɗɗo heɗiima ɗum ene waawi kanum ne huñoraade yimre nde .
Yimɓe , ko adii fof , mbinndirta ɗemngal mumen ko ngam koye mumen .

Yimɓe Daŋana mbaawnaa yo ngar ubba maayɓe ɓee .

Yimɓe anndiraaɓe fentude penaale pepindii jaabawol ngol jotondiraani hay dara e haala am " .
Yimɓe arɓe yeeɓde wejo ngoo ɓee e wirtotonooɓe ɓee kala ene kirjintenoo nde gooto e mum en kala ɓamata heen deftere nawtora galle mum taroyoo .
Yimɓe ene njokki arde he ɗiin defterɗi ñalnde kala ngam wiɗtude e etaade eggude ɗeen gannde moofta ɗum en he mooftirɗe ( digitalization/ numérisation ) ɗe karallaagal kesal newni hannde .
Yimɓe fof ina ciftora haala maɓɓe 89 , ellee ko hanki tan , to rajo e tele Muritani walla e meetiŋaaji nde ɓe mbiyata taccinaaɓe ɓee kala ko Sengaalnaaɓe Won e maɓɓe kadi ina njeyaa e fuɗɗunooɓe sariya yaafuya 1993 .
Yimɓe fof ina panndinoo mo caggal nde parti makko , hono UPR ɓaafti ko ɓuri heewde e depiteeji e meeruuji .
Yimɓe fof ina panndinoo mo ko faati e manndaa tataɓo , caggal nde o wiyi e nder kampaañ ɓennuɗo oo : " maa en mbaɗ manndaa tataɓo , nayaɓo , joyaɓo , jeegoɓo " .
Yimɓe fof ine nganndi no " kompooji " e " eksameeji " njahrata : ko ɓuri heewde heen , jannginooɓe e ardiiɓe ekkolaaji ndeenataa , walla nii ko kañum kollata almuɓɓe ɓee : ɓurii duuɓi noogaas jooni ko noon , wonande berwe haa e bakkaa fof , hay so tawii mbaadi ndii ine seerti .
Yimɓe fof ko yeedtuɓe haa yamiroore hesere .
Yimɓe fof noon hakkillaaji mum en inani keedti toon , hakkunde goongɗinɓe maa goomu nguu waɗ golle laaɓtude , e sikkitiiɓe mbaawka goomu nguu eɓe ngoongɗinaani ɗum fof .
Yimɓe galle ɓee njiilii mo haa taampi , mbattini yeeynude e rajo e tele .
Yimɓe heewɓe mbaasii heen pittaali mum en sabu mum en wonde daraniiɓe hare wellitaare miijooji e ƴellitaare gannde hakkilleyankooje ( les science rationnelles ) .
Yimɓe heewɓe ngariino nootitaade ngoon
Yimɓe heewɓe tawtoraama joɗnde ndee .
Yimɓe hina mbata lekɗe , hina cuma lakde , hina mbara kullon , ndeke neɗɗo ko sooño , ngo kullon ɓuri hulde .

Yimɓe ina poti waɗtude hakkille e geɗe carata ( partaajata ) , hoto njaajnude penaale !

Yimɓe ngoni e ngaanuma .

Yimɓe njeetato he nder sappo fof ( 80% ) , mbiyat maa woni ɗemngal mum en neeniwal ko Riis .
Yimɓe njenanaaka maa Beles Komawore tawtore ñaawoore ndee .
Yimɓe nokku oo ena mbaɗani nde pente coñciyankooje keewɗe : jeƴirɗe rewɓe , jime , jaraale aynaaɓe , conngi e keroole waañooɓe e raddooɓe potɗi fiileede , winndeede e fireede e ɗemɗe e saakteede .

Yimɓe ɓamdi , kelle rapat-rapat .
Yimɓe ɓe ina noddaa haa jooni , naatirde nde ko ujunnaaje ɗiɗi e teemedde nayi mbuuɗu ( 12 000 fcfa ) e hitaande kala , ujunnaaje ɗiɗi mbuuɗu ɗe ko naatirde teemedde nayi ɗe ko coggu kartal ngal .
Yimɓe ɓe kadi yoo paam Fedde Fuuta wonaa nawtude maayɓe tan hiilnii ɗo e leydi he .
Yimɓe ɓe kawri e ɗuum .
Yimɓe ɓe kollita mo hujjaaji mum en , kolliti mo wonde yiylaade goonga kam e " waasde yejjitde " , e rokkitde waraaɓe ɓe neɗɗaagu mum en kam e lomtinande ɓesnguuji maɓɓe , ko huunde waɗɗiinde .
Yimɓe ɓe kolliti mo denndaangal hujjaaji mum en , kolliti mo caɗeele mum en , e nguurndam mum en muusɗam nguuri ɗam : caɗeele laamu holli ɓe , kam e kiiɗal fawi e maɓɓe , penaale e kaantare , ɗum jiidaa e welmaa mbaɗaa konu ngu woni e mum o , ngañgu e baasgol hormaade aadaaji maɓɓe e donaaɗi maɓɓe , koyeera ñalnde kala .

Yitere neɗɗo fof e waasde hattande yiyde ko seerndi nate ɗiɗi ɗee , gudde ɓaleeje ɗiɗi ɗee ine ceerti
Yitere yerɓannde ndee tolnii ko 10 km wuro ngoo , kadi ko yitere nde luggiɗaani e nder leydi sabu ko 16 km !
Yitere yiyii ñalnde heen geɗe ŋarɗuɗe gila e wejo kaɓirɗe gawruɗe haa e paɗɗondiral ñaantule hakkunde subalɓe .
Yiyande am heen ko jannginde fannuuji ɗii : Eɓɓaande Kisal Taariindi e hol no Sukaaɓe jannguɓe ngalaa golle mballirtee haa mbaɗa eɓɓaaɗe jeñcinooje haa mbaawa wuurnude koye mum en nawora heen woɗɓe .
Yiyannde am yowitii ko he defte Ceerno Murtuɗo ɗe muulaaka .
Yiyannde hirjinoore e hoolkisaare kala tawaaɗi , wiynde maa fof waɗtee he dow ñorgo nganndiwal westoo ɗum seernda hakkunde goonga dallinaaɗo e nani-jaɓi mo tuugnaaki so wonaa he meedinaade he finaa-tawaaji e bidaaji yawtuɓe .
Yiyde hooreejo leydi Senegaal ara he nder Fuuta , tuggude gila ɗo Fuuta fuɗɗi haa ɗo haaɗi , kala ɗo o darii o haaldata e Fuutankooɓe ko neenewal mum en pulaar , wonaa farayse walla ɗemngal goɗngal tawa ko maa nantinee , ɗuum so tawii tan ko alla haaldetee ene wela kala ɓiy Pullo .
Yiyde mo hay duumi mum capantati timmaani ena ñaagoo giƴum en walla miñum en yoo wooɗ ko dokki ɗum kañum alaa golle .
Yiyde sukaaɓe macciɗinaaɓe gollinteeɓe , ine saɗti ; ko waɗtaaɓe kuutorɗe suuɗaaɓe e mbaydiiji ceertuɗi , banndiyaagal , njeeygu dorog , naatneede e konuŋkaagu lawɗungu sahaa kareeli .

Yoga e baayanɗe e sikkeeji mbattinta ko e haggude e ɗee pome , jookaade e ɗii beri haa nde ɓooy firti ɗumen .
Yoga e deeɗoo golle , o gollodii ɗum en ko e worɓe ngenndiyankooɓe ɓe o wuurdunoo toon to Misra .
Yoga e duttorɗe daartol men ngonaa binndaaɗe .
Yoga e duuɗe pasifik gonɗe worgo Ŋorol Kaaseer lolliri ko Oseyani ( Océanie ) , hay so tawii noon Oseyani ina heewi naworde Ostarali e duuɗe malesi ( ɗe Malaisie ) .

Yoga e howhowɓe konu Muritani ena njiɗi yoo Muritani yaltu e hare , heɓtina Saharaa , kono Daddah jaɓaani .
Yoga e jime makko ina kollira ɗum , ha teeqti e : Maayde , Taaree Allah , Jaaroore Allah .

Yoga e maɓɓe jeese mu'en mbayliima haa kulɓinii no bonɗo ŋari nii .
Yoga e maɓɓe ɓerɗe mum en ngalaa e feewnude ko mbaɗata koo ; yoga heen ine ndawa , kono njanngintaa Nde jaŋde moƴƴi ndee , jannginooɓe ine kormaa he nder renndo , hay almuɓɓe ine " njeeɓatnoo jannginooɓe mum en " ; hannde , hay gooto yiɗaa nanndude he " garraaya " !
Yoga e woƴaaɓe dawrugol Muritani ena kaawaa hol ko seerndi Eli e Aziz , sabu sikkude-ɓe mburu fof ko fariñ tan !
Yoga e yimɓe nii ina ciikitii mbar wonaa leydi Farayse sakkii les , sabu yoga e ardiiɓe dowlaaji CEDEAO ko cibooji leydi Farayse , won heen nii ko arduɓe e kuudetaaji , leydi Farayse ina dagnani ɗum en ( Alasan Wataraa to kodduwaar , e Mahammaat Debii to Cad ekn .
Yoga e ɗeen topirɗe ina ngawtoo e ndeeɗoo jokkorde :
Yoga e ɗemɗe hannde , kulanaaɗe momtaade ɗee tawetee tan ko he wuro wooto walla nii tawa ko neɗɗo gooto tan heddorii waawde haalde ɗum en .
Yoga he ko ɓe njogitii ko diine Islaam wonaani so wonaa aadaaji Arabeeɓe .
Yoga he seernaaɓe ɓee njaɓii laamu tuubakiri nder Fuuta e Waalo e Jolof , mbele nokkuure ndee ina deeƴa .
Yoga he soofaaji Tigerenaaɓe ɗekkii konu Ecopia , njantoyi he konu LFPT .
Yoga he ɗii nokkuuji , ɗemɗe hoɗɓe ɗoon ɓee ine naatnaatondiri no feewi , yoga heen ine kaala ɗemngal woɗɓe ɓee .
Yoga heen .
Yoga heen hankadi pawii nguurndam mumen keeriɗam fof , ko e laylaytol renndo so njooɗiima ñalawmaare huurnde ceŋaaki e enternet , koye udda ñalda e miijooji .
Yoga heen hankadi pawii nguurndam mumen keeriɗam fof , ko e laylaytol renndo yeru , miin e galle am min ngeggii hannde , ko e ɗanngal min ngoni , mi waɗtii yiyrude cuddiiɗo am kaalis , mo ummoraaki am ekn .
Yoga heen mberlaa ko he mboorkaaji jeygol tawi ene nguuri , nduppaa haa kooñi .
Yoga heen ndewrata ko e mogooji ngam wejde nguurndam mumen , kono ɗum kala ko no ɓoti ŋabbiri e cate tan , sibu ko lewande gargaaji hannde ɗii laawol mumen janngo mbaɗta ñemmboyde .

Yonta am ina seedii ɗum .
Yonta garɗo fof , ine yimtotonoo ɗum wooda kadi ko ɓeydi heen .
Yonta mo jeloode mum he nder daartol wonno ko gollinde hakkille mum ngam aastoraade ɗum miijooji luggi ɓulnoo heen ganndal .
Yonta mo pinal e ganndal ƴellitinoo .
Yonta nayaɓo oo , hono 4G walla LTE ( Long Terme Evolution ) , suwaa tawo naatde Muritani , kono waamo enternet makko ina sowoo mo 3G oo fotde laabi 10 , ko waamo toowngo , ango yaha haa hedde 150 Mbps , kadi enternet makko ina yaawi no feewi : ko neɗɗo awtotonoo e waktu , maa waaw awtaade ɗum e hojomaaji 5 haa 6 .
Yonta ngoɗka ara kadi ngol jippoo , ngol leesɗa , ngol heedta keeci ( caggal ) .
Yonta ɓiliiɗo hakkunde nde pinal Gerek woni he naange hoore mum , e yonta jibtineede , woni renaissance .
Yontere , ko adii nde miɗo yaha , keɓmi tonngoode Baaba Maal , gooto e ɓurɓe mawnude e naalankooɓe Afriknaaɓe .
Yontere kala sukaaɓe ɓee ina njannginee ɗum fotde waktu , mbele ɓe mbaawaa " waɗtude hakkille e weytaare heddiiɓe " , weytaare yimɓe ɓe ɓe ngondi , heɗaade ɗum en ngam waawde faamde ɗum en no moƴƴi , waasa wiyde ina ñaawira ɗum en faamamuya hoore mum tan , huunde addanoore ɗum janngo e jam ustude hooram-hooramaagu caabotoongu yoorɓerndaagu , e ŋakkeende muñondiral ekn .
Yontere ndee waɗii faayiida no feewi , leƴƴi ɗii fof tawaama , kollitii heen pine mum en , e finaa tawaa mum en .
Yonti ko jolde e nder mayo , yonti ko leppude , awde ko moƴƴi e leñol ; yonti ko suɓaade keele , riiwtude e nefde ɓe nafataa .
Yontii leydi men natta yowitaade e leyɗeele goɗɗe e fannu nguura .

ko Adama Bah
ko Lamartin haali ɗum , oon ko ganndaaɗo .

ko a jiɗɗo najnude mi walla ?
ko a senagaal naajo !
ko bulɗu ko kam yahdi e meenaali baali .
ko cooynotoɗen heen diwaani 10% .
ko deftere luutiire nde jinnaaɗo men , Doktoor Umaar Bah mo Dabbe winndunoo , sankaare yani tawi nde joofaani .
ko doole jaynge manaango ngo tagata ngel .
ko ecaɗeele ngonno-ɗen , ko ɓeydanii en caɗeele goɗɗe
ko fawtii heen leydi ko kuule fuuta tan buraani yimbe leydi ndi kala woto pawden wiide ko senegaal fof jabii edn caloo .
ko goonga tigo o haali huunde e caɗeele ngaynaaka , ko nanndi e caɗtugol nguura jawdi ndii hannde , coodgu " rippaas " jamma e ñalawma , aynooɓe ena poti heen walleede .
ko go’owel ɓetirgal kuule asamaan ) .
ko haala e kawtal ko ina selli nofeewi be liggini ma fulbe ko linotaako .

ko humpito
ko huunde nde etotoɗen sifaade e yuurnaade , tan e nde ɓeydoo wirnaade e haawnaade .
ko jaggude ɗemngal mum , jaggude yitere mum , reeno haalde ko boni e ndaarde ko fotaani ndaarde , walla haalde ko welaani nande , ɗum noon neɗɗo fuɗɗotoo heen ko gila nde naange ummotoo faade e mutal naange , wonndude e anniya .
ko jippaade ɓe njuɓɓudi , aɓe ndeentina noo jawdi yiɗde ɗum haa ɓurta , wonnoo ko huunde e jikkuuji , mbiyen ngonkiiji jaasre aade jeyaa , e rewɓe , e jamfaaji Maanaa , haremeeji jeeɗiɗi ɗi diine tawri Fulɓe ɗii , ɓe ndonki ɗi reentaade , ko heen tuubakooɓe fuunti ɓe , keɓti araaraay maɓɓe .
ko jiɗɗaa fof mbaɗaa kono haydara firtataa sabu no a weliraaka Hoore maa nii ko noon ko mbattaa koo waasirta welde yimɓe ɓee .
ko kalatmi ko mbeɗe anndi ɗum sanne , ɗewonnoo koy remooɓe lowrende jeyaami .
ko kanko addani leƴƴi keddiiɗi ɗii ɓeydaade
ko kanko wiynoo " jaambaaro woyetaake , gollal mum ñeemtinte " .
ko kanko wonnoo gawlo galle Umar Fuutiyyu Taal .
ko kayru reeni nguurndam e dow leydi , faddii ciiñsiiñƴe bonɗe mbaasa firtude nguurndam , yanti heen suma kaaƴe kakindiiɗe ummotooɗe e weeyo njana e leydi mbaasa yottaade men , ko heen keɓeten nafoore foofaandu , heewii ɗo kammuuji ngoni e tagopeeje goɗɗe ɗi en mbaawaa naftoraade foofaandu .

ko wel maa fof waɗ !
ko woni sunna ko noon , ko yettinde nder kine nde so tawii wonaa e nder koorka wonaa .
ko woni weeyo ?
ko yimɓe woɗɓe ɓee cikkata koo ɓe cikkat ɗum tan .

kono
kono anndu xurde hoore moxxaani .
kono dee golle e haawnaade ko luutngo ( oppoosisiyon ) wadata koo buri bode e hersinaade , fotnoobe haalde nan ndeyyi .
kono en mbaawaa tin'de ɗeen dille so wonaa tan kay en cooyni ko jeyaaka e leydi ko wayno naange e koode , ɗuum ɗeɓata waade kono gonɗo e oto no sooynirtoo leɗɗe ina mbirtoo ɗum nih .
kono ena seeɗaa hawjeende maɓɓe kala nde ɓe ɓadii lajal Mosammbik .
kono haa jooni ken daɗaaɓe e Fannuuji keewɗi , ko wonaa geɗel gootel .
kono heɗɗaawo ina woodnoo to bannge sariya , sibu baylugol sariyaaji jowitiiɗi e jaayɗe .
kono kadi , mbar baagal ngal taayataa ?
kono kadi loowdi jaaynde ndee ɓeydiima yaajnaade e fannuuji kala : taariik , cellal , jaŋde , gannde limit-limtinɗe , coftal ɓalli ekn .
kono kala ko Alla sokli wiyata tan ko won !
kono kala ko soñaa heen ko DYNN jeyi .
kono kay won ve ngurndam mum fawii e jabde sodeede , tawi mbaawa hay wadde feere haa fulve wona gootum .
kono ko fawaa sahaa , cakkudi ndii yiyetaaka .
kono maa yooɗ wela yiide jamma !
kono mbaawka ɗemɗe ko ngalu .
kono mbodo haawa baleede wiy yoobe siidi walla asi ina moyyi moyyo ala e mabbe ko puntoowo woodi
kono nde ɗum sellata ko maa teŋe njalta , limee haa timma .
kono ngo hiilnii tan ko yiɗande leydi ndii njanguuji seɓɓitiiɓe .
kono so tawii ko ñaw maayreede keɓtiingu gorko , o mo yamiree yoo safroyo ko ina tolnoo e hitaande , so o sellaani ina ɓeydee heen lewbi jeegom , so tawii ɗum sellaani tee debbo o henenaaki ɗum heddaade heen , dewgal ngal ina waawi firteede .
kono so yimɓe kawraani hay ko pooɗon too heewaani wonnde gootum saha woytaango mumen ena wattee hakkillaaji Walla yaawa naneede ?
kono tan , wattindi ko ɗum yeru e nder ɗeeɗoo joljole .
kono woto njejjitee hay newre junngo ina waawi wirnude naange , so neɗɗo ina hucciti e naange ina fooynoo ko junngu mum heew falnu de nge .
kono yidde men e anniya men ɓe , nganndaa heen hay geɗel gootel .
kono zum fof ko majjere tan .
kono ɗuum fof bettaani , sibu ko huunde jooɗtoranoonde .
koode keewɗe ina cowoo naange laabi ujunnaaje .
kudhol alpha .
kural e goddol pat !

kuutoragol ɗemɗe ɗee he nder ceŋɗe nguurndam leydi ndii kala .
kuutori-ɗon ko leefre e miskinaagu maɓɓe e ñoolegol maɓɓe e farweende maɓɓe ngam jarriboraade ɓe ngalu , kono wonaa yiɗde safrude caɗeele ñoolaaɓe ɓee .
kuɗol Saydu Bah
kééwi winndireede hannde ko neɗɗo oo , gawri ndii , suudu nduu .
l Gaas biyeteeɗo Oson oo , maa rennda e on ɗiin gaasuuji goɗɗi nde jogoo batte ɗe moƴƴaani e weeyo .
l Gaas biyeteeɗo metaan oo ne ina waawi wonde e weeyo fotde duuɓi 14 .
l Gaasuuji kuutorteeɗi e " filitoks " walla e " filsideeruuji " maa kilimatiseeruuji ekn ko neɗɗo woni sabaabu mum en .
laamɗo
labaa !
labbo labanii tugunnde ɓurɗi welde he bawɗi nguurndam , ɗo mbaggu fiyratee lukluru .
laral Pasifik , laral Amerik-hirnaange , laral Oraasi ( Orop-Asi ) , e laral Pilipiin .
lek .
lekki kaa .
lekki kaaloowi , lekki kaaloowi .
leñol ngol ina rewa kala ganndo foɗde soko wona pirtoowo peeje amin ina addana min jaakre ,
lowre maa hay ceeɗu , ena sukki gip aawdi faataato

Ñaagii yimɓe ɓee nde naftortoo ko keɗii koo .
Ñaago Guferneer yo neldu laana cuurki e caaɗngol Duwee , tawa e ka wona heen fotde lewru , walla lebbi ɗiɗi , haa tati .
Ñaagunde nde winndaa ko e balɗe capanɗe tati ( woni lewru ) , ñalnde fof , puɗal haa mutal .
Ñaaki wayi ko no cumu nii , so yeebaama haa jaɓii , haɓde e mum ina metti , ɗum woni , so woppaama haa yeñii no feewi , ine metti haɓde .
Ñaaku yahat faggoyoo ko faggotonoo koo , itta ɗum e piindi leɗɗe ceertuɗe , renndina ɗum en , waɗa ko waɗatnoo haa wonta juumri , neɗɗo juma ñaaku , yara njuumri , weltoo .
Ñaalalpural yiili hoore , ɗuum firti ko alaa .
Ñaamgolliije tati ko nde laamɗo leydi waɗi baɗal mawngal darni calɗi ɓamtaare fagguduyankoore , naatni he Jowol ngalu keewngu ngam heɓɓitaade gollooɓe e miskineeɓe , ende ngu felliti wonde yo gorle koolol ngol won hitaande kala , ende darnde daande maayankooɓe ndarii ngal yooɗnude KOOLOL NGENNDI PINIYANKEEWOL TO JOWOL .
Ñaawooje taƴanaaɗe gullitaali mbaawaa ruttaneede ( waɗaneede " appel " ) .
Ñaawoore " booraaɓe " ina ɗaminanoo maa fuɗɗo ñalnde 11 oktoobar 2021 .
Ñaawoore makko alaa ɗo jogori wuftude so wonaa e sokeede kaaɗdi nguurndam .
Ñaawoore mum noon jooɗii ko ñalnde 25 saawiyee 2023 , caggal dumunna juutɗo nde losko suudu sarɗiiji joofi , joofiri yiytude jawɗeele keewɗe ɗe gardinooɗo leydi ndii fawi juuɗe mum , tawi rewaani laawol , maa wonii ko otooji , leyɗeele koɗki , galleeji jeyal ndenndaandi , kaalisaaji jonɗi e nder limooje bankeeji e geɗe goɗɗe ɗe limtotaako , kono kadi tawaama ko woɗɓe ina njiiɓii e ɗuum walla nii mbiya ko e " pellel " hee njeyaa , ɗum woni won ɓeen ardiiɓe ministuruuji e won e ministiruuji , direkteeruuji , walla yimɓe jeyaaɓe e galle makko , walla samsaaruuji .
Ñaawoore ndee no tijjaa ka nde ƴetta hedde lebbi 18 .
Ñaawoore ndee riiwtaama haa alkamiisa 28 Me .
Ñaawoore ndee yani ko ñalnde 15 saawiyee 2015 .
Ñaawoore ndee yani ñalnde 3 desaambar : ofiseeji tati haalpulaaren ñaawaa warngo , ɓe mbaraa e nder balɗe tati dewɗe heen ɗee , ñalnde 6 desaambar ; nii woni ɓe ndañaani hay hakke yedditaade ( waɗde appel ) .
Ñaawoowo konuyanke Burkina Faso hollitii modduɓe he ngoo warngo yiytaaɓe ko sappo-e-nayo .
Ñaawoowo rokkii yamiroore , teetondiral waɗii , sooti wonii e siirtaade no koowoyel ndunngu nii , sagataaɓe ina tera ɗum ina lotta ina ngulla : " Ummbuyi !
Ñaawoowo teɓɓi Jara tawde o haɗi yiɗɓe liggaade yantude e gollirde ndee , o saliima reftaade ñawoore rewnanoonde e dow hoore makko nde .
Ñaawoowo wutti fiyannde penaltii nde o wiyi e gaccungol meƴƴu ( 1-0 ) !
Ñaawooɓe winndereeɓe ina poti toɗɗeede , ƴeewtoo ngoo senngo , sete moojobere hakkunde-leyɗeele ngam tan yooɓaade nguurndam yaakaare Burkina , yaakaare Afirik , yaakaare winndere ; mbele hono ɗum ina waasa waɗtude nder kala leydi .
Ñaawooɓe ɓee mbaɗti heen ko kala njeenaaje e " galŋauuji " ɗi ɓe ndokkanoo , teettaama , artii e booñ e faawru dowla Burkinaa .
Ñaawooɓe ɓee mbiꞌi ɓe , gujjo mon nani .
Ñaaƴo dadiiɓe ( militeer ) e siwil ngam mawninde maanditaare duuɓi capanɗe joyi jeytaare leydi Gaboo e hitaande 1960 , waɗaa ko to Dingiral Jeytaare maa mbiyen palaas enndepanndaas to Galle Njulaagu maa Fuwaar Minisippaal wuro laamorgo fagguduyankeewo ngo .
Ñaaƴo ngo waɗii faayiida Geno waɗi heen sutura mum fergitere walla taatannde heɓaaka heen , ngo waɗi ko e yeeso teddungal Guwerneer Diwaan Gaspaar Naŋ Ellaa , Meer komin wuro ngo Andre Jules Njammbe , Perefee Falnde Bennje Tomaa Kuwomii , Hooreejo Suudu Diisnordu Falndeyankooru Bennje Georges Muketu , jooɗaniiɗo Konsil Jeneraal mo Farayse , kalifaaɓe diineeji ( juulɓe e kerecee ‘en ) , Mawɓe leeɗe , ardiiɓe koloniiji e woɗɓe e woɗɓe .
Ñaaƴooɓe ɓe tuggi ko to wasorde Kora Wood Gaboo payi wasorde Yarhammu persidaa Lewoo M’Bah e nder wonki wuro ngo .
Ñabbu nguu tawetee , e ko ɓuri teeŋtude , ko e
Ñakki ko koowoyon ciiɓotookon ƴiiƴam , mettukon haɓde , ñookotookon e mbalndi neɗɗo , ina padi haa leloo ngam siiɓaade ƴiiƴam mum .
Ñakku " ARN messager " ( ARN nelal ) : ko taƴel tokosel ittetee he wiris Coronaa oo ( he ARN makko ) , ɗum noon ko taƴel ngel alaa hay tooke goote , ngel naatnee he ɓalndu neɗɗo , woni neɗɗo oo ñakkiima .
Ñakku Moderna ine ɗaɓɓi ɓuuɓol -20°C , mo Pfizer oo ine ɗaɓɓi -70°C .
Ñalaaɗe tati ko ñalaande laamu nde felliti waɗde koolol pinal ngenndiwol to Jowol e ñalaande pine daande maayo nde njaɓɓii koolol mumen e ñalaande Jowol nde sahre Biraan Gaale ɓoornaa cakka teddungal e yommbinaade balɗe tati teddungal e ndimaagu .
Ñalawma cakkitiiɗo walla badtindiiɗo o Pr Abuubakiri Muusaa Laam maa wostondir miijooji e gaboonaaɓe tawa ko jeyaaɓe e dingiral njanngu , kadi ma o soccondir e ɗanniyankooɓe tawtoraaɓe jooɗnde nde .
Ñalawma fof garɗo ina nanee walla ina yiyee ko teeŋtinta ndeen saɗteende " .
Ñalawma gooto , o feliti ɗannaade .
Ñalawma gooto , tawi ɓe naatii e guurte mawɗe ɗee , Aali , nawoowo nelde oo , adanii ɓe ɓataake .
Ñalawma gooto toon ma won lebbi men 8 .
Ñalawma gooto waandu meeɗi wonde kañum tan e duunde .
Ñalawma juulde ko ñalawma mo sukaaɓe mbeltinirtee koltuuji kesi , rokkeede kaalisaaji ( ndewnelaaji ) e dognirgal pucci .
Ñalawma oo gasiri ko tonngugol hooreejo e cukko-hooreejo , natal maanditoore ƴettaa , waynondiraa , tawi waktu 6ɓo fawii hojomaaji 30 .
Ñalawma oo jooni heeda , wuro kala iiñtii .
Ñalawma oo ñallta ko jeewte toɗɗiiɗe ɓamtaare rewɓe , cellal sukaaɓe e kala ko noddi ngurrndam Fuuta .
Ñalawma uddital yontere ndee ko ñalnde Njeslaare 8 Yarkomaa to jirwinirde AGORA .
Ñalawma ɗimmo huccanaa ko kawgel beddagol .

Ñalnde
Ñalnde 03 e ñalnde 04 lewru korse 2006 , Fulɓe Muritani ndañii belaa mo njiɗnoo tawi kadi ko belaa mo Alla welaa , annebi Alla
Ñalnde 1 suwee , nguun goomu wasiyii kuutoragol bommbo oo ko ɓuri yaawde .
Ñalnde 1 ut 2014 , Riisi rokki mo hakke hoɗde toon duuɓi tati , caggal ɗuum ɓeydani mo heen duuɓi 3 goɗɗi ( haa maayirɗe 2020 ) .
Ñalnde 10 lewru bowte filmu oo jogornoo holliroyeede ko to ngenndi Mammadu Sammba Joop , hono Mbaañ , kono hoddiraaka .
Ñalnde 10 mee 1994 , Manndelaa fiilaa persidaa Afrik Worgo .
Ñalnde 12 Duujal ( Mee ) 2007 , ɓe ngullitoyii to Ñaaworde Doosɗe mbele fiilngo ngo ina waɗtee .
Ñalnde 12 marsa o heɓi 58% .
Ñalnde 12 silto 2012 o waɗaa Tergal Goomu kaalis e laaɓal nguurndam renndo e Cukko hooreejo goomu ƴeewgol lewru , haa nde o sankii ndee .
Ñalnde 13 Colte ( faabiriyee ) 2020 , karallo ñaawoojee François Yame’ogo , heɗtii won seedeeji warngo ngo , hono Gilbert Jenndere .
Ñalnde 13 lewru Siilto ( Siilto ) 2001 ka rafaa , rafi motor ka ƴeeŋtinaa e ndiyam sabu caɗeele mekanik e motoor heen senngo wooto .
Ñalnde 15 oktoobar 1993 , daneejo keloowo Apartaayd , hono Deklerk , e ɓaleejo mahoowo renndo leƴƴileƴƴinngo , hono Manndelaa , keɓdi njeenaari Nobel .
Ñalnde 15 seeɗto ( abiriil ) 2022 , fedde ndee waɗii diiño yeeso Jaagordu Jaŋde ngenndiire kam e mbayliigu Tippudi Jaŋde ɗoo he Moritani .
Ñalnde 15/9/2022 NASA habrii wonde deegowel ngel yiytii ɗoon geɗe coftinooje no feewi .
Ñalnde 16 saawiyee ɓe ciiñti Giimi .
Ñalnde 17 desambar 2010 , nder wuro Siidi Busid , Muhammad Busisi , jahroowo he duuɓi 26 tan , ina jogii taabel ina yeeya ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe .
Ñalnde 17 duujal 1987 , o waɗaa hooreejo Suudu Huftodinndu Ñaawirdu Diiwaan Kayhayɗi .
Ñalnde 17 mars 1992 , fotde 68 , 7% raneeɓe leydi ndi ndokki Deklerk hoolaare .
Ñalnde 17 suwee , Tiisiksa fellaa , kulol naati koloñaal en e watulaaɓe mum en haa caaliti .
Ñalnde 17/02/2018 , aafaa ko yeewtere Ceerno Sileymaani Baal , nguurndam e golle .
Ñalnde 18 duujal 1971 o fektaa to Magaama nder Gorgol he posto Binndoowo Kaadi .
Ñalnde 18/07/2016 kadi suka ɓaleejo goɗɗo felli poliseeji kadi wari heen tato .
Ñalnde 19 Jolal 1968 , Liyetenaa Muusaa Tarawore teɓɓii tengaade makko jooɗii e jappeere haa ñalnde 23 Marsa 1991 , caggal guttugol keneeli potal e Afrik , goomu soldeteewu e gardagol kapiteen Ahmadu Tumaani Tuure korkiti juuɗe Jeneraal Muusaa Tarawore e goddi malinaaɓe polli mo kuufi laamu luɓal haa ñalnde 8 korse 1992 , cufal potal yuɓɓinaa Pr Alfaa Omaar Konaare gonnooɗo Hoyreejo goomu Fedde Ngootaagu Afrik tottaa kuccam leydi Mali haa e hitaande 1997 , oon manndaa huuɓi , malinaaɓe ndokkiti mo manndaa goɗɗo haa e 2002 hawrii o fiilaama Hoyreejo Goomu Fedde Ngootaagu Afrik .
Ñalnde 19 lewru nduu ko Rinnjaw yontanoo yilleede .
Ñalnde 19 o demisoni e gardagoFMI .
Ñalnde 19/01/11 , ñaawoore leydi ndii o nanngi mo , ngam ñaawde mo sabu njeenaari , porlugojawdi buur e jokkondirae waɗooɓe bone , tuggi 1971 haa 1986 .

Ɓayri yimɓe fof ina ƴeewa ɓe , aɓe mberwa to Tummbuktu , to Gaawo , to Kidaal !
Ɓayri ɗuum waɗaaka , eɗen poti faamde tan wonde , bonnooɓe Ngootaagu Ngenndi ɓee , wonaa sikketeeɓe ɓee .
Ɓe
Ɓe calmini haa saɗi joofi , ɓe ɓami saakuuji amen , ɓee ngardii , ɓee ngoni caggal , Hooreejo ena sawndii-mi , miin payi nder saal .
Ɓe ceediima e makko wonde neɗɗo deeƴɗo , ganndo gila e Al Quraana haa e farayse e engele sabu o winndii heen defte .
Ɓe ceeraani , gila ndeen , wullitaade aduna oo gila he nder jaayndeeji nder leydi ndii haa jaayndeeji caggal leydi torla mawka ka laamu Mali woni e waɗɗe Fulɓe he nder leydi he , gila he warngooji fenaande , duppude gure Fulɓe , haa e heɓtude jawɗeele mum en walla dummbude ɗum en he dow fenaande .
Ɓe ceeraani e ɗaɓɓude nde wiɗto waɗetee haa anndee hol waɗnooɓe bone , hol taccinnooɓe , hol warnooɓe .
Ɓe ceerii ɓe ngaynii , debbo o wiyi mo maa mi haalane ɗo seeɗa mo heewaani , miin sa yiy o sahaa miɗo metti no feewi , hay miin mi anndaano ko ngonndunoo mi , kono mi anndii ko ngonndu mi hannde .
Ɓe ceki , ɓe ƴetti cabbi ɓe paꞌi to hoɓɓe ɓee eɓe ndukaka , eɓe mbiꞌa ; Ko ɓee hoɓɓe bonɓe ñaayi gese men .
Ɓe ceki no feewi , ɓe njahi suudu ɗanniyaŋkooɓe ɗiɗo ɓe , eɓe njammbita .
Ɓe ceppi , ɓe mbinndi ngam " hollitde mette maɓɓe e haala Eli kaa " .
Ɓe ceŋiima e lowde gollorde ndee , eɓe pira Firefox 29 Aurora e ɗemngal men neeniwal Pulaar .
Ɓe cifii heen ɗo lappol ngol rewata : Ɓoggee-Rooso : nokkuuji gonɗi e laawol .
Ɓe ciftini wonde addunoo mo Biriksel ko yaltinde wullitaango AƁOMM joɗɗinnoo to ñaawoore , ngam ɗaɓɓude " ñaawgol wul Taaya " .
Ɓe cinkii , ɓe cuɗii , ɓe peeñnini ŋariiji , ɓe ngubbiti ngaluuji Pinal ubbinooɗi haa Pulaagu jali haa serkiti sabu faamde ndeke wekkaano mehru .
Ɓe coodi nguura ɓe mbaɗi daawe ɗiɗi , tawi kala heen daawal ko miskineeɓe ɓurɓe famɗude doole ɓee tottetee .
Ɓe cosi jaaynde wiyaa " Le Cri des Nègres – Wulaango Ɓaleeɓe " .
Ɓe cosi ko " initiatiɓe " ( inisiyatiif , ko goomuuji heewnooɗi sompeede ngam hollitde ina wondi e Maawiya ) tawi alaa ko woni faandaare mum so wonaa " luulndaade haala Eli kaa " .
Ɓe cukki mo haa to o yiɗnoo mooloyaade ngam umminde fiyannde feewde he koloñaal en e wallidiiɓe mum , haa ɗo ɓe njookoynoo mo , Belsiknaaɓe mbiyi Moobutu yo halfin mo Moyiis Commbe woɗɗina mo laamorgo ngoo , sabu murtooji puɗɗiima feeñde ina kaɓɓondira e makko .
Ɓe cuuɗi ngal ( kamɓe ardiiɓe COVIRE ) hay ardiiɓe pelle biyeteeɗe AVOMM e OCVIDH ɓe ardiiɓe mum en ngumminoo gila Farayse , ngari Muritani , tawi alaa ko addi ɗum en , so wonaa ɗuum .
Ɓe cuɓii tan ko gure ɗe bommbo fof meeɗaa memde , mbele ɓe mbaawa ɓetde no moƴƴi bonannde bommbo oo so werlaama .
Ɓe eerri yimɓe yoo ɓattito , sukaaɓe ɓee fof ngummii ngari haa njiimi e maɓɓe !
Ɓe enndi diwde , bibje ndonki artude e maɓɓe , ɗum wonani ɓe caɗeele .
Ɓe etii yeewtitde he Aali Yero , biyɗo maa fooga hoore mawɗo koloñaal Daŋana , tuubna mo .
Ɓe etiima rokkude feere maɓɓe mbaadi nanondiraandi , rewrude e fiiltomooltooji e njeenaari , e ballal taƴel ngel yonaani loraaɓe daɗɓe ɓee , kam e ronooɓe ɓee .

Ɓe kaalani
Ɓe kaaldat-mi ɓee ina nganndi koye mum en , aduna oo fof kay ne ina anndi ɗum en .
Ɓe kaaldii yoɓe kawroy to damal suudu Baaba Maamuudu , so ɓe njuulii subaka .
Ɓe kaalii heen halfinde hoyre mum won e miijooji nder diineeji ɓooyɗi , mi haalaani heen haala Islaam .

Ɓe kaawnorii , ko sahaaji , ɓe mantat won e golle ɗe laamu gollotoo , sahaaji ɓe luulndoo ɗum .
Ɓe kabbirani ndii ngaari , ngaari sooyniima ɓe , laana , so a yiyaani oo ngar-mi ngaraa , so a tawaaka oo jaasaa njettii-mi , kelle e kuljinaali Aɓe nanngi e kalaace , aɓe mbakka ngaari jamɗe ina nafoo gaaraaji ina sinndoo kalaace , koyɗe ine kaya ine suddoo baanaaji .

Ɓe kawri .
Ɓe kawri e caɗeele ɗe hay gooto waawaa jangtaade , haa nde ɓe ndañi naatde Adraar .

Ɓe kaɗii kam yimde haa ɓe tampi .
Ɓe keblii almuɓɓe tigi , jeewte seernaaɓe ɗiɗo tedduɓe , Ceerno Adullaay Sammba Joop lollirɗo Kayyaa Joop e Ceerno Aamadu Dooro Sal ɓeydii faayiida hiirde ndee .
Ɓe keblii hakke 72 karallo , dawaaɗi banotooɗi 8 e tonooji 48 kaɓirɗe ngam walloyde e faabu .
Ɓe keblii ngam haɓɓude saretaaji feewde Siiñcaan .
Ɓe keblii nokkuuji ɗo sukaaɓe njanngata ngaadiije ( ordinateurs ) ngam yahdude e aduna kesam-hesaagu .

Ɓe kelii jumaaji keewɗi , ɓe pusi janaale waliyaaɓe , eglisaaji e defterɗi e jaatiiji ( monuments ) daartolyankeeji ; ɓe nduppi defte e ballifanɗe ( manuscrits ) keewɗe joginooɗe faayida mawɗo he daartol pinal aade , walla ɓe ngujja ɗum en sabu maɓɓe anndude ko njaru majje en ɓuri tiiɗde hay muudo kaŋŋe .
Ɓe keppaani , ɓe kaaɓaani haa batu ƴeesaa .

Ɓe kollaa kadi , ngoɗki ɗo wayluɓe Ceerno Sileymaani Baal tafatnoo .
Ɓe kollaa maleykaaji , refti heen ɓe naatnaa to nder aljannaaji .
Ɓe kolli kadi wonnde ɓe ñaagimoomo nde o noddata jeewtidal ngenndi ngal kanko e hoore makko hunii waɗde , kadi e min toroo so ɗuum waɗii yoo jibin nanondiral beldital leyndi tawa ko fawaade he dow doosɗe e laawol kuule ngenndiyeeje .
Ɓe kollii en ko " kamɓe ndenndi fof " sibu maɓɓe jogaade njuɓɓudi ngootiɗndi , njooɗndi .

Ɓe kolliti ko G5-Sahel ko " kuutorgal doole jananiije " .
Ɓe kolliti laamɗo oo wonde cofel arii yoɓnaade saak makkaari ndi laamɗo ñamlinoo .
Ɓe kolliti mo ɓe ngonaa jawdi saka ɓe ngeltee .
Ɓe kolliti no warngo ngo yahrunoo .
Ɓe kolliti weltaare maɓɓe , ɓe ñiŋi laamu Kaboore .
Ɓe kolliti wonde o jeyaa ko e jaale fulɓe sabu makko daranaade e jaɓde tampande leñol ngol .
Ɓe kolliti ɗum kadi ko heewi e jinnaaɓe haa e moƴƴuɓe wuro ngoo .
Ɓe kollitii Muritani jeyanoo ko e jeeɓeteeɓe e demokaraasiiji e duunde Afrik e leyɗeele Aarabeeɓe .
Ɓe kollitii kadi maa mawɗo ɗowgu goɗɗo toɗɗe ngam haɓaade caɗeele leydi ndii , haa teeŋti e cooɗtaari ( corruption ) .
Ɓe kollitii ngenndiyankaagal mawngal , ɓe cuɓii ngootaagu ngam huccitande musibbaaji ummortooɗi caggal , ketɗi goodal Muritani .
Ɓe koyii koyeera njogorka wontude hare hakkunde maɓɓe saɓu maɓɓe añde haweede .
Ɓe kuccini ko leelaani ɓataake caaktaaɗo feewde e gardiiɗo leydi ndii , hono Muhammed Sheex Gaswaani , yiɗde wiyde ɗum wonde oo sariya ummanaaɗo feewde e kiliyaan maɓɓe , rewaani laawol , etee maa ɓe " ndaro kala darnde ngam falaade ɗum , hay so ɗum ɗaɓɓi ko wullitoyaade ñaawirɗe adunayaŋkooje ɗe " .
Ɓe kutti mo , ɓe loowi teewu e nder sasaaji maɓɓe .

Ɓe mballifiima he ɗeeɗo gannde kala :
Ɓe mballitorii kuulal 8 Doosɗe ngaynaaka biyngal " Ngaluuji durngo ko denndaaɗi , ko hakke to bannge fiɓnde " .

Ɓe mbaɗa lanngu ( lasol ) , ɓee kooloya dow , ɓeya kooloya les , ɓe ngona e sammude tawa aɓe nanondiri e nokku ɗo ɓe kawritoyta .
Ɓe mbaɗataa no Riis en mbaɗi e balɗe ɓennuɗe ɗee , so neldude misil ngam helde laana mum en ɓoccitinooka ɗum en .
Ɓe mbaɗdi ɗoon golle paayodinɗe , kaalteteeɗe , sabu jeewte maɓɓe ɗee laataade keɗetenooɗe no feewi e oon sahaa .
Ɓe mbaɗdoyi kiirɗeeli to Kudummba , Adiyaan e to Sigaasoor Kaasamaasa , caggal mum ɓe ɓenni Ndakaaru .
Ɓe mbaɗi heen himme maɓɓe e ngaluuji maɓɓe ngam ƴellitde ɗemngal Arab e eggude he maggal denndaangal gannde goodnooɗe he oon saha .
Ɓe mbaɗi sunnotooɓe ndewi he makko koyngel-koyngel ina ƴeewa ɓe o jokkondirta .
Ɓe mbaɗii kaalisaaji keewɗi ngam faddaade afriknaaɓe , ɓe mahii ɓale , ɓe ndiiwii , ɓe njeenii laamuuji men kaalisaaji mbele ina paddanoo en ɓee " nootiiɓe e Aljanna leyɗe maɓɓe " .
Ɓe mbaɗii ñalawmaaji ngam siftorde e duwanaade mawɓe leñol ngol yarlitinooɓe nguurndameeje mum en ngam ligganaade leñol ngol haa nde Allah nawti ɗum en saare goonga , ko wayno Yero Dooro Jallo , Saydu Kane , Amadu Maalik Gay .
Ɓe mbaɗti wallifaade jime e defte pentol ɗe eɓe peeñina heen co’anɗe maɓɓe nguurndam haa e geɗe renndo , ko wayno dawrugol walla geɗe diineyankooje .
Ɓe mbaɗti ɓadtaade Ibliis eɓe keɗtoo gaaci e bawɗi mum .
Ɓe mbeeyni raayuuji ina mbinndaa " Ɓiɓɓe Muritaninaaɓe mbaraama e dow amdu , eɗen poti dartaade ndee bonande " .
Ɓe mbeeɗi cukko waali oo bayyinaango ɗo ɓe mbiyata dokkal ngal joopii ko " ko nokkuuji mawɗi ndema e durngo , tee alaa ko jogori so wonaa ɓeydude baasal e heege e yimɓe wuurɓe e nokku hee " .
Ɓe mberti juuɗe maɓɓe ɓe ñaagii annabi Idriisa yo ñaagono ɓe Geno toowɗo Oo nde yaafotoo ɓe bakkatuuji maɓɓe , caggal nde ɓe kaalani ɗum fiyakuuji maɓɓe .

Ɓe mbiy yoo wood e maɓɓe nelaaɓe njaha ƴeewndoyoo .

Ɓe mbiyi " seppo ngoo fotnoo faade ko galle Bookara Sule , wonaa galle Eli " .
Ɓe mbiyi , ko kiin ɓe cuurorii , fawtii heen kadi eki uuri ngam eki waɗiree cuuraawi , ɗuum noon eɗen mbaawi innirde ki munnaas .
Ɓe mbiyi , o heɓiino wiyde ɓe nde ɓe ñaldi ndee wonde o woni ko e " jihaadi feewde e raneeɓe e kala wallidiiɓe mum en " .
Ɓe mbiyi : " newuya mo laamu Muritani newnani golluɓe ɗum ɓee ina faamnoroo wonde gollodiiɗo sosiyatee ATERSA , mahɗo huɓeere ndee ( jokkiiɗo e sosiyatee españool Elecnor ) ko biyeteeɗo Hammadi wul Bushraaya , neɗɗo ɓalliiɗo ardorde leydi ndii .
Ɓe mbiyi : " no ndiyam gonɗi makko njupportonoo he leydi , ɗum waɗi waame ngam ndiyam ummiɗam e bojji makko , ngam juutii ko ina tolnoo e duuɓi ɗiɗi " e wiyde winndiyanke oo .
Ɓe mbiyi : " ɓiyi Kummba Muusaa Faal lollirɗo Kummba Mbonno e Demmba Cillo , Mammadu Demmba Sih , noddirtenooɗo e cukaaku mum Mamma Sihyel , o jibinaa ko e hitaande 1974 to Foonde Elimaan Demmba e nder galle mo sukaaɓe nayo worɓe e ɗiɗo rewɓe , jiiduɓe yumma e baaba .
Ɓe mbiyi Allaahu Akbar !
Ɓe mbiyi Eli yettaaki ɗoo !
Ɓe mbiyi Gellaay nehtaanii ɓe no feewi , holli ɓe kadi wonde no ɓe njiɗiri fof , ko noon , kañum wonaa Jeeyo , kono ine jarribaa e pekaan .
Ɓe mbiyi Kompawre e yahdiiɓe mum takkaa ko " yerɓinde ndeenka Dowla " sabi ɓe enndii loppitde laamu ; etee Damiba ko loppitɗo laamu he juuɗe Hooreejo mo ɓesngu suɓii , ndeke ko o " jerɓinɗo ndeenka dowla " .
Ɓe mbiyi geɗe tati ina e neɗɗo : nde neɗɗo feeñi ndee heen geɗal alaa , ko geɗe ɗiɗi ɗee tan o jogii .

Ɓe mbiyi hakkunde Maruk e Senegaal ko jam tan meeɗi ɓilaande ɗoon gila e lasli .

Ɓe mbiyi ɓe njiɗi ko yo laaɓ , gonɗo he fenaande fof rokkee fenaande .

Ɓe mbiyii ko ɗum duuɓi teemedde joy .

Ɓe meeɗaa hulde , ɓe meeɗaa hulde hay dara .

Ɓe meeɗaa ƴellitde konngol ɓe kaali so wonaa ko hujjikinantooɓe maɓɓe kaali , so wiyde ñaawoore fotaani waɗde ngati nde buntii .
Ɓe mɓaɗi lasal maɓɓe , ɓe ñaaƴi , ɓa ngami , ɓe njahdini jaɓɓal baŋngaali haa yooɗi .
Ɓe naamnii innde makko , o wiꞌi ɓe ko Goppaaɗo .

Ɓe naatii galle Kaddaafi biyeteeɗo Bab al-azizia .

Ɓe nawaa to duɗal makko wonnoo .
Ɓe nawdi heen " goomu hakkunde sendikaaji daraniiɗi Ɓaleeɓe Gollooɓe " – International Trade Union Committee of Negro Workers ( ITUC-NW ) .
Ɓe ndaranii ko haɓanaade gartugol leydi Palestiin e juuɗe aarabeeɓe .

Ɓe ndañdi ɓiɗɗo gorko ina wiyee

Ɓe ndeentinii kadi laamu militeeruuji jogori ko addannde Muritani eleede to caggal leydi ko juuti .
Ɓe ndenndi , ɓe kawri e renndinde kopporeeje , ngam soodde nguura e wallite ɓesngu nguu .

Ɓe ndokkii heen yeru filmo Mowgli .
Ɓe ndokkiraa njeenaari ndii ko sabu geɗe ɓe njiyti , paamninooje no " ngaanndi neɗɗo " ( ɗoo ko tippudi ɗaɗi tino : système nerveux ) tinirta wulɓuuɓdi e memo ( memgol ) .
Ɓe ndonki hawrude he haala hay sinno ko yiɗnoode deƴƴinde conndi tawo .
Ɓe ndoondii Mesi , ɓe mbeeyni ɗum , nde tawnoo ko kam woni mbir kippu nguu .

Ɓe ngadii
Ɓe ngadii anndireede ko rewooɓe diine naange , oon ko e diineeji ɓooyɗi jeyaa .

Ɓe ngoni doolal
Ɓe ngoni e awde .
Ɓe ngoni e jaaynude sikkeeji gonɗi e wiɗtooji ɗii , e etaade jaɓnude maa " ɓuuɓol artoy " , e suuɗde wiɗtooji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi kamɓe e koye maɓɓe ko ɗum wonnoo feere nde Exxon rewi ngam suuɗde bonannde geɗe ɗe julortoo ɗee .
Ɓe ngoni e jeeyngal salaade wolde leydi Itali ummanii ngam huuraade e Ecopiya .
Ɓe ngoni e waɗde ko ɓe njamiraa , so ɗooftaade yamiroore hakkunde yimɓe ñalawma , so hiirii ɓe ngona e jangtaade inɗe Geno ɓurɗe mawnude ɗee so hiirii , ɓe ngabbita to dow asamaan too , ko noon ɓe ngoniri haa timmi lewru wooturu .
Ɓe ngoni e woocde haa ɓe ngoɗɗi e nder dunndu hee , henndu mawndu betti ɓe , ɓe ndogtani cukalon kon .
Ɓe ngoni heen haa ñalnde 16 sulyee 1945 , ɓe njarribii kalito bommbo maɓɓe gadano .
Ɓe ngoni ko to Duɗal jaaɓi-haaɗtirde Yale , to DDA .
Ɓe ngoni sehilaaɓe .
Ɓe ngoni ɗoon kadi duuɓi tati , ɓe mbaɗi kawgel goɗngel e hitaande 1934 ngam ɓennude e duɗal goɗngal ɓurngal ngaal toowde .
Ɓe ngonii e kaan ngonaaka ko juuti o artaani e miijo baabiraaɗo oo .
Ɓe ngonndi e sunaare mawnde .
Ɓe ngontaa hulde hay huunde so eɓe njara walla eɓe lootoo e maayo ngoo .
Ɓe ngon’di tan ko reenooɓe ɓe .
Ɓe ngostondirtunoo e Afriknaaɓe ko ɗacce , kaŋŋe e poobaar e ñiiƴe ñiibi e jiyaaɓe .

Ɓe ngummii subaka law , ɓe ndarniti doosɗe ɗee fof , ɓe kaɓɓi sakkeet oo , hade alansaraa yonde .
Ɓe nguni ɗum haa ɗiggi .

Ɓe njahi ha ɓe paandii maayo , miñiraaɗo o seli koyɗe , nde selnoo koyɗe Alla holli ɗum jinne gooto .
Ɓe njahii , ɓe ɗaldii en ko eɗen naftoroo caggal maɓɓe , ko alaa happu .
Ɓe njahii boom ha ɓe ɗaɓɓi nde nomgol fawotoo e jerondiral keeweendi ( proportionnelle ) kam e jedditagol koɗdigal .
Ɓe njahii nde weli yahde nde : tuma nde ɓe ngollata , tuma nde ɓe njiɗaa .
Ɓe njani he konu Ecopia wonnooɓe nder laamorgo maɓɓe Mekele , kam e wuro Dansha , bannge worgo Tigere .
Ɓe njaɓaani arde tan ɓe naata , ɓe taartorii wuro ngoo bannge worgo .
Ɓe njaɓaani ɗum , ko alaa- e -saga maa ɓe ndaroo gila e jooni so wonaa ɗuum , janngo ɓe ngonata tan kadi ko yaɓɓaaɓe .
Ɓe njaɓɓaaama jaɓɓungal baɗngal faayiida ko adii nde ɓe paarnetee boowal natal ummital Afrik ( Monument de la renaissance africaine ) .
Ɓe njaɓɓii mo , ɓe njaɓi liggorndirde e makko e fannuuji ɗi ɓe keedi ɗii : winndiyankaagal , wiɗtiyankaagal e muulde defte pulaar .
Ɓe njeewtidi e makko ko juuti , caggal ɗum ɓe ndeeyi , ɓe nanondiri nanngude mo .

Ɓe njejjittaake haa abada , eɓe poti wuurtineede e nder daartol men .
Ɓe njettaama kamɓe ne kaaɗdi njettoor .

Ɓe njiyetaake e senerooji konu leydi ndii
