Ɓe njogii ko
Ɓe njogii semmbe e mbaawka .
Ɓe njokkondirii e Hooreejo MPSR ( Mouvement Patriotique pour la Sauvegarde et la Restauration " , woni " Dillere Ngenndiyankoore ngam Kisal e Mahtagol " .
Ɓe njokkondirii e naalankooɓe , haaliyankooɓe , magoyankooɓe , hoɗiyankooɓe , awƴooɓe e yimooɓe peekaan gila e ummoriiɓe to caggal nokku oo haa e jeyaaɓe ɗoon e nder diiwaan hee .
Ɓe njokkondirii kadi e Sammba Paam mo Sahel TV , Mohammed Mbooc Tele Muritani e Njuɓɓudi Shingitel e jonaaɗo mum Aamadu Sih .
Ɓe njokkondirii kadi e hoohooɓe aadaa .
Ɓe njol haa ɓe njooɗii tan , oto oo duñi huccani Ndakaaru .
Ɓe njoli ko he laana mbiyetaaka Borgnis-Desbordes , njettiika Fanay ñalnde 16 marsa .
Ɓe njooɓtoraa ko porlugojawdi buur .
Ɓe njooɗi ko ina wona yontere ɓe ñaamaani .
Ɓe njooɗii e galle Alfaa Amar Seydi Yero Buso Bah to wuro Hoore Foonde e nder diiwaan Boosoya .
Ɓe njooɗodiima kadi ñalnde 10/03/2022 ngam hollitde ngoƴaaji mum e winndannde adannde eɓɓaande sariya kuccam .
Ɓe njotti wuro tan , woodi kabruɗo mo wonde musiiba ina joli e ɓesngu makko .
Ɓe njuggi ɗoon laabi keewɗi ko adii nde ɓe poolata Keekuta Soona .
Ɓe njumtini golwole Almameeɓe Fuuta Jaloŋ .
Ɓe njuurnii , ɓe njuurnitii , ɓe tawi no ɓe kaɓirtee nii , wonaa noon : ngenndiyankooɓe ndartorii ɓe ko " hare bettel " ( geriyaa ) , kamɓe ɓe keblanii ko hare kuccondiral , maa hare jawre , ɓe nguddii ko e postooji maɓɓe , aɓe padi yimɓe ɓe nganndaa to ummortoo ɓe , hol nde njanata e maɓɓe ( bettoowo tintintaa ) , no ɓe njanirta e maɓɓe .
Ɓe njuɓɓinii heen kawgon : kawgel jaŋde ɓuraana , kawgel almuɓɓe , coftal ɓalli , kawgel jime ekn
Ɓe noddi ha ɓe tampi , ngal
Ɓe noddi ngenndiyankooɓe Burkinaaɓe e Afirikinaaɓe goongɗuɓe e musiɗɓe Burkina nde mballitta ɓe he ngal daawal kimmanngal daartol leydi maɓɓe .
Ɓe noddii janngooɓe mawɓe ɓee ngam yeewtitde e maɓɓe .
Ɓe nootiima no feewi he joɗle ɗee .
Ɓe o janngigni pulaar limotaako e Muritani , Senegaal e Farayse .
Ɓe o jiydi baaba ɓee ko : Baaba Joob , Seyni Joob , Muusaa Joob , Aamadu Joob , Yaayaa Joob , Faati Joob , Kajjaa Joob e Aminata Joob .
Ɓe paamaani ko waɗi Baudin ena haala ko luurdi e jotondiral moƴƴal gon-ngal hakkunde leyɗeele ɗee ɗiɗi .
Ɓe paamii wonde pellital laamu nguu e yiɗde ñawndude haala kaa ɓenndaani tawo , hay etaade ñemmbude leyɗeele ɗe ɗeen kaantare keɓtinoo , cakki won ɗeen peeje haa ndiwti ɗum ( Afirik bannge woego , Ruwanndaa , Maruk e Gine hannde ) ɗum ina hollira tan tippudi laamu ngardiindi ndii , ko diwti nii laamiiɓe hannde ɓee , ina ngoɗɗoyi he dawrugol leñamleñaagu ngu umminnoo nguu .
Ɓe paamii wonde pellital laamu nguu e yiɗde ñawndude haala kaa ɓenndaani tawo , hay etaade ñemmbude leyɗeele ɗe ɗeen kaantare keɓtinoo , cakki won ɗeen peeje haa ndiwti ɗum ( Afirik bannge woego , Ruwanndaa , Maruk e Gine hannde .
Ɓe pammina ɓesnguuji ɗii " ko woni woote , no woote waɗirtee " .
Ɓe pawii kadi ko e dalillaaji e yurmeende fotnde teskeede so ina woodi .
Ɓe pawti heen " wonande Asiis , moƴƴere yoɓretee tan ko bonannde !
Ɓe pawti heen ko wul Deyd bonni dartagol Tararsa en , fecci ɗum en , haɗi ɗum en wonde tamannde wootere .
Ɓe pawti heen ɗemɗe ko ko njiggondirta tan .
Ɓe pecci ɓe e pecce ɗiɗi
Ɓe peewnii fotde 80 taabal ko jiidaa e kuɗi e defte janngirɗe , ɓe cari e diiwaan hee .
Ɓe pelliti waɗdude maalde .
Ɓe pelliti yettinde jaagorgal jaŋde ndee mette maɓɓe , e haalande ɗum no ɓe njiɗi sariya oo leloroo .
Ɓe pellitii ittude 5% e mbaawka leyɗe mawɗe , ɓe ndokka ɗum leyɗe pamare doole .
Ɓe pellitii kamɓe ne haɓtoraade hare bettel .
Ɓe pellitii wertande podooje seneraal nofru , tawi noon , oon seneraal , ɓuri hannde wonde ngoƴa mum ko welnaade aduna o , ender ɗuum , woodde ko ɗacci , hoto faweede kuuge .
Ɓe penni mo , min ndaɗ-ndi mo e ɓe o wonndunoo e nder laana , min njooli ɓeen yeddunooɓe kaawisaaji amen ngam ɓeen laatiima yimɓe leñol yawtuɓe keeri ( 64 ) .
Ɓe peri kadi Wagadu , eɓe ngondi e yimɓe Jaafunu , ɓe payi to wiyetee Leyyeen walla Layyeen .
Ɓe pewjidiino ko heewi , ko wayi no warngooji ɓaleeɓe Muritani , layyenooɓe , wardenooɓe yarga , ubbenooɓe ine nguuri , ɓe kaŋŋe mumen jawdi ndariindi mumen keɓtenoo taccinaa leydi mumen Muritani peewi Senegaal ɗum kala waɗi e yeeso makko hono kanko Mohamed Lemin O .
Ɓe pini gila gertooɗe na njogga , ɓe kacitii lacceejee maɓɓe haa ɓe kaari .
Ɓe piyi baaruuji maɓɓe ɓurɗi sakkitaade kadi ɓe njubbi e
Ɓe pooli
Ɓe pooltii Emiir , ɓe ngeggi .
Ɓe potti ko e laawol gooto kala haalani goɗɗo oo to yahata .
Ɓe poŋti tillisaaji maɓɓe e dingire .
Ɓe poɓɓanaa , ɓa ngullanaa haa ko ɗoon waawi haaɗde .
Ɓe puɗɗi asde ngoorondi ndii .
Ɓe puɗɗii toon nanngondirde e konu leydi Caad aɓe njaha haa ɓe njettii wuro Maaw nder diiwaan Kanem .
Ɓe puɗɗii wittude ko saabii aksidaa oo .
Ɓe puɗɗiima toɓɓude heen 14 , tuumaaɓe ina moddi he warngo T .
Ɓe tafi njuɓɓudi maɓɓe no yoga e gure Fuuta hanki .
Ɓe takki Mali yiɗde jotondirde e koninkooɓe Riisi anndiraaɓe Wagner .
Ɓe tawi ekon ngoya , ekon tallondira .
Ɓe tawi ko jalɓol tiggii ɗoon .
Ɓe tawi ndu ɗoon ɓe mbari ndu .
Ɓe tawi ɓe ngalaa doole kaɓtaade rewo e worgo kala , ƴoƴre maɓɓe rokki ɓe faamde alaa e sago ɓe maslondira e safalɓe haa yeeso .
Ɓe tawi ɗoon ko subalɓe geygeyɓe ena ngummorii Fuuta Tooro e nokku ɗo wiyetee Horndolde e nder diiwaan Damga Senegaal .
Ɓe teddini mo , ɓe ndokki mo nagge e lonngere maaro welko .
Ɓe teskii ko ndeyri ndii ɓuri heewde sonngude .
Ɓe teskiima baaɗe ɗee ina nguurorii bannge ŋorol peccol , eɗe mbaɗi gudde ɗe 0 , 5 cm keewɗe , julyutondirɗe , no tunelaaji nii , gaaɓnooje gostondiral henndu nder waande hee .
Ɓe tinaani ɓe maataani haa soofaaji naati ina njogitii kaɓirɗe bonnooje .
Ɓe toɓɓaani noppi tan , ɓe toɓɓi ko bannge no woorunoo he nder saal hee .
Ɓe turi mo , ɓe piyi mo haa o forti , ɓe ngitti cette makko ɗee fof .
Ɓe tuumi mo kadi " nguyka " ceede ɗe o halfinanoo , e jotondiral e añɓe dillere waklitere .
Ɓe tuumii Abiy Ahmed yiɗde ustude doole LFTP mo Tigerenaaɓe nder maalde laamu .
Ɓe ubbit mo ngam anndude so tawii ko koninkooɓe ɓee mbarnoo mo walla .
Ɓe uddi CeernoSamba Jaadanaa e almuuɓe mum balɗe noogaas-e-tati , hay gooto naatataa nder tata ka , hay gooto yaltataa .
Ɓe ummanii mbiɗtude e Fulɓe .
Ɓe ñaagii gollodiiɓe ɓee fof nde " ɗooftoo nafooje e ndimaagu Duuɗe ɗee " .
Ɓe ñaagii yo " Guwernoor " Ndar neldu ɓe ballal mbele aɓe paloo bonande Ceerno Sammba Jaadanaa gila e law .
Ɓe ñaagotooɓe Geno jaɓa .
Ɓe ñaami , ɓe njari e nder mbelelmma aljanna .
Ɓe ñaami liingu nguu haa ɓe kaari etee kamɓe arnooɓe ɓee fof ko ɓe ujunere e teemedde tato neɗɗo , ɓe ñaami haa ɓe kaari haa ɓe keddi liingu ngu gasaani e kattanɗe geno .
Ɓe ñalli yiilaade haa hiiri hay huunde ɓe njiyaani .
Ɓe ñiŋi Damiba waasde toppitaade e daranaade haɓaade jihaadiyankooɓe heelnuɓe nder Burkina duuɓi jeeɗiɗi hikka .
Ɓe ƴeeŋii min njonaaka , kono haame amen juutaani nde Skarpa joli .
Ɓe ƴetti sanngara ɓe njari ɗum haa ɓe manndili .
Ɓe ƴettii konngol , ɓe teeŋtini nafoore janngirgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije e dokkugol gooto fof hakke mum .
Ɓe ɓe mbiy e ɓe paamani ɗum en mette mum en e haaɓre mum , nde ndartinta ko yaaccii fitinaaji e bonanndeeji ɗi mbaɗata ɗi , kadi njahra caggal gila semmbeeji iwruɗi caggal leydi , jogiiɓe payndaale niɓɓe , naarde e mum en keeda ɗum en he hakkillaaji mum en .
Ɓe ɓesngu am ɓee ɓuraani , njaasaani worɓe e rewɓe winndere ndee .
Ɓe ɓetat kala ko jaŋngoowo diwi .
Ɓe ɓeydi heen " amin ɗaminii waawde safrirde dafaaɗo amen gadano ndeeɗoo feere " .
Ɓe ɓeydi heen nii " Muritani nii huniima rokkude ɓe hitaande kala hakkunde ujunaaje 10 miliyoŋ haa ujunnaaje 20 miliyoŋ ooro e sarɗi tawa ɓe ndiftotaako tuubakooɓe e nder leydi eɓe ɗaɓɓira lomtinaneede kaalis " .
Ɓe ɓeydii goongɗinde mo , ɓe njaɓi ko o Maadiyyu laaɓɗo ( Mahdi ) .
Ɓe ɓuraani yeeƴaade geɗe jerɓinooje bayɗe no dille Burkina .
Ɓe ɓuri heeroraade ko laaɓal wuro ngoo .
Ɓe ɓuri seftitde fof noon ko yiɗde mo huutoraade nanondiral cuuɗangal ngal e nder woote ɗe o eɓɓi ɗee .
Ɓe ɓuuɓtinaani , ɓe ngoni e ƴeewde hol to ɓe idotoo huutoraade mo .
Ɓe ɗamininoo ko heɓde ballal ummoraade e dental Black Pnther Party daaynooɓe e wuro Alser , waawnooɓe jokkondirde ɓe e Front de Liberation National e leydi Alseri .
Ɓe ɗaɓɓiri tirbiiji ɗii fof yo cujjan ɓe , njaɓa kalifaandi maɓɓe .
Ɓe ɗaɓɓiri ɗum " yo tintin jooɗaniiɓe laamu to Ɓoggee , Baarel-Barka , Likseyba , Teekaan , Jidrel-Mohgen , e Rooso " mbele kadi lamu nguu ina ƴetta peeje kisal jojjuɗe .
Ɓecerindii ɓe ndartini conndi bannge maɓɓe , kono LFPT jaɓaani .
Ɓee , ngaɗii oorngal wote e nder jonte ɗuuɗuɗe ngam ƴamugol daaɗe nijerinaaɓe .
Ɓee ameriknaaɓe ɗiɗo keɓi njeenaari mum en ko altine 4 oktoobar .
Ɓee fof ina tuumaa tawtoreede warngo ngo maa tintude ɗum .
Ɓee halfinaaɓe yo ndaro he ngoo mogo , ƴettaaɓe he nder nokkuuji ɓadiiɗi haa fakiti ko nootortoo dartanaade ɗemɗe , keɓii hollitde e peñcu darnde mumen laŋ e huuɓnude nelal laamu neli ɗumen e nder ndee fuunti-funeere heɓlaande .
Ɓee hee ko ɗoon kooñi , woɗɓe fuɗɗinooɓe dogde , jayngol ngol jawlii ɗumen , no naane ɓe ngonti ndoondi .
Ɓee heen ko jahe , werlirtooɓe tooke haala , won e yimɓe ko memiiɓe .
Ɓee heen mbiyatnoo ko Kaddaafi " alaa fof ko waɗanaani Libinaaɓe " ; woɗɓe mbiyatnoo ko ɓe " cuusaa dillude " ekn
Ɓee heen taƴti maayo payi rewo , cosoyi gure taariiɗe hannde Kasga rewo e worgo .
Ɓee hoohooɓe kala ina njeyanoo e ardiiɓe ɓurɓe yiytinaade kaɓɓondire politik keewɗe baɗetenooɗe ina pirtee , haa arti noon e Mooɓondiral Eeleega e lewru mee 1958 , nde jooɗaninooɓe daande maayo mbaɗi maslahaa mawɗo , so jaɓde dirtinde carɗingol peccugol laamu kam e juɓɓingol laamu tuugingol e Dental ( federaasiyoŋ ) ɗi ɓe mbiynoo alaa sago ngooda ngam reentoraade .
Ɓee hoɓɓe , ko hito pellanɗe Ruusiyasi woni ko ɓe jaɓɓoraa to Kief laamorde leydi ndin .
Ɓee ina mbiya o footaano uddeede , ɓeya ina mbiya ko kanko tooñi .
Ɓee ina njima ɓeya ina ngulla haa hedde w09h15 nde pellondiral ngal ustii .
Ɓee ko hedde 6% wonduɓe he mboros oo .
Ɓee mawɓe tato ndokkiraa njeenaari ndii ko sabu golle mum en paatuɗe he ɓalliwal , hono jiytal biyeteengal " naatnaatondiral kantikeewal " ( intrication quantique ) , silsil ɗo ngabbon ɓakdi ɗiɗon kantiwon njahdata , geɗe mum en fof njokkondira hay so tawii noon ine ngoɗɗondiri no feewi , yolnde waawnde wonde hakkunde mum en fof noon .
Ɓee ndaasi kadi faade to suudu ñawirdu fuɗɗordu .
Ɓee ndawat , ɓeya kirnda , ɓee pecca naange , ɓeya ceeka jammaaji , ene mbasoroo koode " so wonaano minen njeewe-ɗon " .
Ɓee ne ko fotɓe suuɗteede haa ngannden yoolɓe jeytaare [ 4 ] men .
Ɓee njaddani heen , ɓee ene mbeltii heen .
Ɓee njoli ngari haa njettii .
Ɓee payi yanngeeji dow jeei , ɓee njehi haajuuji
Ɓee rewɓe ɓe darnde mum’en teeŋti e nder renndooji Aadee ,
Ɓee sukaaɓe kadi ngummii ko Le Havre Kummba Yumma Men , ɗo fuutaŋke hersaani wonde hoore mum , ɗo wutte haawaani tuubakooɓe sabu ko yiɗɓe ko'e mum'en tan ngoni toon
Ɓee sukaaɓe mbaɗanta ɗum ko ngam hollude mette maɓɓe e ko moƴƴaa koo e nder renndooji maɓɓe .
Ɓee worɓe ɗiɗo , maa Fooyre Ɓamtaare artu e ñaamgolluuje tiiɗɗe ɗe mbaɗi , tawi goram , hay gooto haalataa haala mumen .
Ɓee yimɓe mbeltaaki etee ko aan sabii ɗum .
Ɓee ɓaleeɓe , no firawna en
Ɓee ɗoo , ngardii e peeluuji , ɓee ɗaa , e pittirɗi , heddiiɓe ɓee kamen .
Ɓee ɗoo nawtateeɓe moolinoo ko e falnde Dagana e nder diiwaan Seen Liwii .
Ɓee ɗoo ɓe limtu-ɗen ngardi ko e seteeji teskinɗi rewɓe e worɓe .
Ɓeen , ko ngam waasde yejjitde innde nokku ɗo ɓe koɗnoo ( Bornu ) ko adii nde ɓe perata .
Ɓeen Jajis en ene keɓtinirtenoo e ɓuurnungal mum en keeringal .
Ɓeen calii , e gardagol Sheex Sidiya el Kebiir , ndokki doole ko haɓdiiɓe laamu koloñaal , ɓe Muhammed el Habiib ardii ) .
Ɓeen ceedtiimo ɗum sankaare makko e wirwirnde makko : hay ɓe o haɓatanoo ɓe .
Ɓeen cemmbini mo e ɗemngal , ndarodii e makko e golle .
Ɓeen dey ko yoga e ɓee ɗoo ngenndiyankooɓe arɓe ɗoo hannde .
Ɓeen goni Ɓaleeɓe arɓe gila he uujooji Misra haa yettii dahngooji leyɗe Ɓaleeɓe worgo keerol peccol .
Ɓeen jibini ɗum en ko biyateeɗo Gaysiri ena jeyaa Daawalel Omo joginoo kadi mo o jiydi yumma ena wiyee Faati Berel .
Ɓeen jogiiɓe ndeen yiyannde ene nodda yoo leyɗeele bayɗe no Indu , Japon , Afrik du Sud , e Beresil ɓeyde he nder terɗe peŋngal he , kono won yiyɓe ɗuum e hoore mum ɓeydata tan ko koye piilaaɗe meeteleeji , kono addataa potal .
Ɓeen kala naatataa Amerik so wonaa doktoreeɓe ngaada wonde joom mum wonndaani e ñawu oo .
Ɓeen kanum en ne njaha he nder leydi he ene njanngina rewɓe he nder galleeji mum en tawa kuwtortoo ko binndanɗe makko e wallifooji makko .
Ɓeen keɓaama kadi geɗe mum'en caɗtaani haa wooroo !
Ɓeen ko Alhajji Umar Taal , Ko Diile Faatim Caam , ko Mammadu Lamin Daraame , ko Maba Jakhu Bah , ko Jeeri Joor Ndella Faal .
Ɓeen ko Sooninkooɓe , Seereraaɓe , Fulɓe , Jolfuɓe
Ɓeen ko Tallakoronaaɓe gila e asli .
Ɓeen ko subalɓe waɗɓe ñaam-golluuje tiiɗɗe kadi ngonaa ɓooyɓe ?
Ɓeen ko ɗoon ñalli e Jiinge .
Ɓeen mbiyi ko yoo Farayse udditano leyɗeele goɗɗe e pine goɗɗe , haa teeŋti e leyɗeele doofolle ɗee .
Ɓeen ne ko ɓe laamotonooɓe ngonnoo toon .
Ɓeen ne ngari mbiyi so a yiɗii nuskude , so a yiɗii fuuynude leñol ngadorto-ɗaa ko jumpude ɗemngal mum .
Ɓeen ne njaabtiima mo , mbiyi mo " wonaa kañum en kuufi ngalu leydi ndii , wonaa kañum kalfinta golle ( ndokkata marseeji ) buur .
Ɓeen ngardi ko e canngitaaje ganni .
Ɓeen ngarnoo ko wallude Bakkar heɓtude Taagant , nde
Ɓeen ngonata ko les .
Ɓeen ngoni
Ɓeen ngoni : Ceerno Aamadu Baylaa Lih , Ceerno Aamadu Mammadu Saydu Kan , Ceerno Mammadu Siisee Bah , Ceerno Usmaan Woon , Ceerno Mustafa Tijjaani Bah , elimaan jumaa gadano oo e Ceerno Mammadu Alasan Juuli Soh , elimaan jumaa keso oo .
Ɓeen ngoni : Kadijatu , e Bubakara , e Gañeseri , e Aysata , e Kummba e Faatimata ( lollirɗo Daado ) .
Ɓeen ngoni : Umar Muusaa Sih ( hoyreejo catal ) , Mammadu Jibriil Jah , Haamiidu Mammadu Bah ( halfinaaɓe jaŋde catal ngal ) , Abdullay Bah ( hoyreejo fedde DEKAM ) kam e Abdrahmaani Jallo ( koolaaɗo kuuɓal fedde DEKAM ) .
Ɓeen ngoni ; Aamadu Biraan BAAL mo Peŋgal Pari , Safiyatu JALLO mo peŋgal Maasi
Ɓeen ngoni Abdarahmaani Gasamme , Aamadu Usmaan Kebe e Abdullaay Abuu Kebe .
Ɓeen ngoni Gelongal Fuuta lollirɗo Njaay Saydu Aamadu e Hammadi Aadama Jallo .
Ɓeen ngoni Gormbolle Kaŋŋe ganndiraaɗo Usmaan Hammadi Joop e Alhajji Baaba Baydi Maal .
Ɓeen ngoni sañooɓe e mahooɓe e ɗatooɓe e tafooɓe e sehooɓe ekn .
Ɓeen ngoni wiyooɓe : " ko faraysenaaɓe njeyi Farayse , so ene liggoo yoo liggano Farayse , kono woto ɗaw heen woɗɓe " .
Ɓeen ngoni yimɓe mooftuɓe COVID-19 haa hollini , nawaa he cafrirɗe .
Ɓeen ngoongɗini tan ko wonnde ngoonga oo ko o baraaɗo .
Ɓeen ngummorii ko Halwaar to diiwaan Tooro .
Ɓeen njaɓaani jeytaare ndee sabu ena njiɗi heddaade e leydi mum'en Serbiy .
Ɓeen noon ina keewi e renndo Fulɓe ngo , ko maa koggee ngolooji haa gite mumen ngojja coy , nde ciftora leñol nduttanoo ngol , ŋata juuɗe picca , mbiya caggal nimsa : so nganndiino , ɓe ngarta eɓe njiyloo jinngooɓe .
Ɓeen noon ina mbaɗa ko ɓuri heewde he ko heddiiɓe ɓee mbaɗata .
Ɓeen noon potnoo ko nanndude no lekki e kobjal !
Ɓeen rewɓe ngoni Dilma Rusef hooreejo leydi Beresiil e Angela Merkel hooreejo leydi Almaañ e Kiristinaa Kirshneer , hooreejo leydi Arsaatiin .
Ɓeen sukaaɓe kaaɗaani tan e gollineede , kono kadi ngalaa hakke winnditaade ngam heɓde kaayitaaji keɓtinirɗi jeyegol mumen leydi .
Ɓeen sukaaɓe tooñaaɓe he jaŋde ngoni kadi sukaaɓe tooñaaɓe he nder nokkuuji goɗɗi ( ko wayi to bannge renndo e faggudu , e to bannge goɗɗugol nokkuuji teeru ekn .
Ɓeen tato wellitaaɓe ina jeyaa e mu’en debbo faraysenaajo kono joom galle mu mina heddii tawo e juuɗe maɓɓe , togoonaajo e madagaskaarnaajo njeyanoo ko e sete yimɓe njeeɗiɗo gollotooɓe e galle Areva ruggiyankooɓe ɓe mbiftinooɓe ñalnde 16 lewru Septaamburu 2010 to wuro Arlit e nder rewo ndennndaandi Nijeer .
Ɓeen teskiima mbaawka makko haa ngeɓɓani mo jeyteede , hankadi , e diɗɗal ngal .
Ɓeen tuumi nde ko muɓɓude gite so laamɗo leydi yaɓɓii doosɗe demokaraasi , kono so koninkooɓe keɓtii laamu ende heñoo e wiyde yo laamu artu e juuɗe siwil en .
Ɓeen udditi ulluɗɗi jonɗi , ulli e doombi ɗii , ɗi ngoni e ñaamde doombi ɗii , ɗi ñaami doomi ɗii haa heddii seeɗa e majji , ko ɗum tagi waɗtindii waɗde caɗeele hakkunde doombi e ulluɗi .
Ɓeen woni ko ɓe mbiyata " les elites " , suɓaaɓe walla mbiyen yimɓe dowrowɓe , ko wayno laamɓe e mawɓe diineeji en walla ɓesnguuji seeɗe tamnooɓe ngalu e faggudu Orop fof he juuɗe mum en ɓe .
Ɓeen woodi no kaalirani mo ; tan o eewnitii mi omo jala , o wiyi : Katante miñi am , yaafo mi , mi haaldii e heewɓe
Ɓeen worɓe Ko jaambareeɓe jeyanooɓe he konu Alhajji Sayku Umar Taal mo winndere
Ɓeen yimɓe woowɓe ƴettude fenaande ngostoroo ngoonga , ƴettuɓe murto neɗɗo , mbiya ɗum " peewnitgol " , ƴettuɓe kuudetaa , mbaɗti ɗum kisnugol demokaraasi , ɓeen yaɓɓooɓe ko aldaa e gacce denndaangal doosɗe leydi paatuɗe e juɓɓule e mbaawkaaji ñaawoore e carɗinooje .
Ɓeen yoga mum en dahraaɓe cukaagu , woɗɓe daaƴaaɓe gila entaaka , ɓe warñeende mum en e ƴiiƴam mum en mahraa dañal tuubakooɓe Amerik e Orop .
Ɓeen ɓaleeɓe noon ko uujɓe yamiraaɓe e suuɗiiɓe ɓee , janngooɓe , hay nih ɓaleeɓe Tunusnaaɓe .
Ɓeen ɗoon dey ɓe meeɗaa ɗaccude finndinde min e ko anddanta yimɓe ɓee nafoore .
Ɓeen ɗoon hawaariyankooɓe naamndinooɓe ɗum Annabi Iisaa ko ɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ( 12 ) neɗɗo .
Ɓeenɗoon faabotooɓe kamɓe fof noon ko ɓe capanɗe nayo gorko e capanɗe nayo debbo .
Ɓeeynirka Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) ine foti duñande toon he maayirɗe suliyee 2020 Orop e Riisi kam enne ine tijjaa ɗoo e duuɓi ɗiɗi "
Ɓeeynirka Imaraat kaa naatii he yirlo ( orbite ) Mbaañ , ka leydi Siin kaa , yettiima toon ñalnde alarba 10 mars 2021 , nana yirloo hade mum juuraade .
Ɓeeynirka Parker foti ko e oto tokooso , njaru donngal ( mission ) makka ko miliyaar e feccere dolaar .
Ɓeeynirka ina huutoroo kadi peeje beforɗe , e dampirɗe ceeɓɗe : ballital ɓaaƴo ( assistance gravitationnelle ) , dartingol
Ɓeeynirka ngoɗka Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) ine foti duñande toon he maayirɗe suliyee 2020 Orop e Riisi kam enne ine tijjaa ɗoo e duuɓi ɗiɗi , rewrude e ɓeeynirka inniraaka ExoMars nduñiroyoowa to Kazakhstan .
Ɓeeynirka waɗiraa ko taccude jolɗe mawɗe e gollaade to woɗɗi Leydi e Naange , ko ɗuum waɗi ka hatojinde e kaɓirɗe keeriiɗe .
Ɓeeynirɗe ine mbaawi lotteede ko wonaa ndeen , kono fere mum ɓurata heewde sibu lottoowa kaa ( lanceur ) ɓurata mawnude e huuñƴude e kuɓɓam .
Ɓeeynirɗe weeyo ina mbaawi jogaade mbaadiiji keewɗi ngam huuɓnude donngal kalfinaa ngal
Ɓeeynorka kaa ina nawori kaɓirgal " SWEAP " ( Solar Wind Electrons Alphas and Protons Investigation ) ngam ɓetde nguleeki e njaaweendi e tiɗɗeendi ɗeen kaanabbe .
Ɓeeɗoo fulɓe alaa no mbaawnoo waɗde , so wonaa mooloyaade leydi keerondiraandi , woni Mali .
Ɓeeɗoo jolfuɓe , ɓe nanataa Pulaar hay seeɗa etee ɓe njalti ko e Ceerno Sileymaani Baal .
Ɓeeɗoo njaɓɓaaka , mballitaaka jooɗaade .
Ɓeeɗoo njogori huccondirde ko e Goomu awokaaji keedanooji MAA , ine heen ummoriiɓe haa Farayse , arduɓe doole e ñiŋooje teeŋtuɗe feewde laamu Muritani .
Ɓeeɗoo noon ina keewnoo toon doole no feewi , tee , gila 1952 , ko koninkooɓe ngoni toon e laamu .
Ɓeeɗoo sukaaɓe fulɓe janngooɓe jolfe e farayse kam , kaaytii feɗɗitaade , ɓeydotoo ko uddaade , sabu ko ngel janngata koo fof , ko koɗum e maggel , so ngel woodii waawde ɗemɗe ɗe ngel janngata ɗee , ngel wontoyta ko sokkiññe , ngel reerɗataa e haalde ɗemngal ngal ngel tawri jinnaaɓe maggel , ngel wokkanta ko wontude jolfo walla tuubaako .

Ɓetirgal tuugorgal njuuteendi hono meeteer ( m ) tuugii ko e njaaweendi annoore nder mehum .
Ɓetirgal tuugorgal sahaa , hono leƴƴannde ( s ) tuugii ko e daawaɓal ( fittere , majal ) atomere njamndi mbiyeteendi sesiyoom ( sésium ) .
Ɓetirgal tuugorgal wulɓuuɓndi hono kelwin ( K ) tuugii ko e fiɓiinde Boltzman
Ɓetirgal tuugorgal yiite , hono ampeer ( A ) tuugii ko e dimngal leslesal .
Ɓetirɗe ɗee kala hankadi tuugii ko e piɓiiɗe gorwore tago ( constantes fondamentales de la nature ) .
Ɓeto adanngo ina foti waɗeede ngam ƴeewde hol to golle ɗe njahrata .

Ɓuri haaɓnaade heen fof noon , ko gooto e amen fof wiyata ko ɓamtoowo leñol , kono min ngonaa nanondirɓe .
Ɓuri heen haawnaade fof ko bojji ɗi o ñallata woyde kala nde kew waɗi e wuro ngoo .
Ɓuri heen haawnaade kadi ko daande nanateeɗe e hunuko hee .

Ɓuri heen mettinde ko Ibiraa Almaami .
Ɓuri heewde e mum ko gollaantooɓe laaɓal , cellal ɓalli walla ardotoo ɗum .
Ɓuri heewde e ɗanniyankooɓe ɓe ko julankooɓe kaasamaasanaaɓe , kono kadi ina jeyaa e maɓɓe yilliyankooɓe leyɗeele orop ( Farayse ) , janngooɓe duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde wondude e capanɗe tato e ɗiɗo suka janngoowo e duɗal fukuyankeewal Cikisoor yahatnooɓe koolol fuku to wuro Fatik .
Ɓuri himmude ɗoo ko hollitde feere jiiɓtugol ɓurnde faamnaade , tawa hay sukaaɓe yahroore e hitaande nayaɓere jaŋde leslesre ( e yeru ) ina mbaawi faamde jiiɓtol ngol .

Ɓuri moƴƴude ko ɓuri heewde ko ñaamaten yo a taw ko enen ndemata ɗum , hoto ngonen yowitiiɓe e woɗɓe .
Ɓuri moƴƴude tan ko warde oo saaysaaye bonɗo , tawa ine hunoo yeende , mbele safalɓe leydi ndii , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa ko kam en tan mbaawata fottude e makko , ine mbaɗda idii haaltude mo " .

Ɓuri tiiɗde ko jogaade pellital e wuurde e nder njuɓɓudi njogiindi paandaale laaɓtuɗe .
Ɓuri wonde caɗeele annduɓe hannde , ko kaaƴe ɗe hakkundol mum en jaasi kiloomeeteer kono seɓi 140 m , sibu ko nayaɓal e majje tan nganndanaa huunde , ndaa bonannde majje ina mawni no feewi , sibu , e wiyde annduɓe ɓee " tuggude e oo tolno , kala ɗo haayre ndee yani , semmbe mum ina waawi boomde leydi ngootiri noo wooruunoo " ( leydi ɗoo , yeru Siin ekn , en potndaani e koye men !
Ɓuri woƴnde ndi ko tiimde diiwaan oo fof .
Ɓurii duuɓi 10 jooni ko ɗee pelle ceeraani e ɗaɓɓude hono ko UNESCO ɗaɓɓata gila 1953 koo , so " naatnugol tabitngol ɗemɗe neeniije nder Tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi ndii .
Ɓurii duuɓi nay ko kanko e gollodiiɗo makko , hono Jan Koum , ɓe njeeyti WhatsApp , ɓe njeeyti ɗum Facebook , oon sahaa tawi anndaaka no feewi .
Ɓurii ɗoon bonde , sibu ɓe ngalaano hay neɗɗo gooto e nder HCE ( Diiso Dowla Toowngo ) .
Ɓurii ɗoon bonde nii , caggal nde ɗi koolkisaa to " nokku toppitiiɗo kaayitaaji kisnaaɗi " tawaama won heen dentiteeji ina mbaɗi caɗeele .
Ɓurii ɗoon hannde , sibu ɗo wuro wiyeteengo Tuuluus ( Toulouse ) to Farayse ɗoo , anndiraango peewnugol laaɗe diwooje ( yeru Airbus ) korwe ɗee , korwe goonga goonga ɗee , puɗɗiima addeede ngam feewnude laana-korwal ( inniraaka Hyperloop ) ngadana kaa .
Ɓurnde famɗude ndee waɗaa ko e dow haayre jiimtunde e wuro ngoo .
Ɓurnde mawnude ndee , hono Didymos A , hakkundol mum ko 800 m .
Ɓurngal famɗude ngal woni ɓernde ndee ; ko e maggal caafal annoore loowngal kabaruuji ɗii rewrata .
Ɓurnoo deeƴde e hakkille ko , so taawii ko teppaare foolata udditaare , ɗum holliree haa laaɓa e mbinndiin ; wóni so oo , waɗanee pesooɗe nane ɗiɗi timmuɗe , so ee ne ko noon , tawa yiitere tan ene waawa ñaawde njaŋngiin kóŋngól ; kono elléé ɗemɗiyaŋkooɓe ɓee ko faayndirɓe sarɗiiji wowlaango alkuule e sarɗiiji mbinndiin .
Ɓurnoo duumaade e nguuɗoo goomu njoginoongu Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko Aamadu Malal Gey e Kajjata Maalik Jallo , e Maamuudu Haaruuna Joop , e Aamadu Sammba Soh , e Bookara Aamadu
Ɓurnoo tiiɗde ko laawol rewee haa ndee ñaawoore joofa dow goonga , tuumaaɓe ndokkee fartaŋŋe hujjikinaade , so wonaa ɓe mbakkaaki jaambaraagal e cuusal arde kucccita e ɓesngu leydi mum en " .
Ɓurɓe famɗude gacce ɓee , caakta e Facebook yo nelde kaalis ko coodiri ceŋdi ; Nattugol nguurndam keeriɗam , joom galleeji en ndaɗaani heen yeru , miin e galle am min ngeggii hannde , ko e ɗanngal min ngoni , mi waɗtii yiyrude cuddiiɗo am kaalis , mo ummoraaki am , mbiɗo yiɗi cuddiiɗo am , alaa fof ko waɗantaa kam ekn .
Ɓurɓe fellitde ɓee njahdi e Ceemoko , ɓe cosi " Union des Travailleurs Nègres – Dental Gollooɓe Ɓaleeɓe " .
Ɓurɓe hannde e men himmude ɓee fof , teddiri ko ardinde diine oo gaa goɗɗum , ndeɓe ngolli e leñol ngol tan , ɗum feeñ .
Ɓurɓe suusde deedi ɓe fof mbiyi , maalde nde wonnoo ko faddaade hoyreejo o , boowal laaɗe diwooje wuro ngo fiya e makko kure no Kolonel Baare Maynasaraa wardanoo nii e oon sahaa .
Ɓurɓe waawde wukkitde gaasuuji dammbooji nguleeki ɓee njaɓaani hunaade ustude kuɓɓam ummiriiɗam he ɓarakke .
Ɓurɗi juutde ɗii ina ngona capanɗe ujunnaaje kiloomeeteer ; ko ɗi ɓoggi piɓaaɗi 100 km fof ( baɗɗi ko ina ƴettita siñaal oo so leefii , mawnina ɗum , ɓennina ɗum ) .
Ɓurɗi waawde saraade e sahaa ndunngu .
Ɓurɗo bonde oo kewnoo ko e hitaande
Ɓurɗo doole fof ridda ɓe waawi .
Ɓurɗo heen jartodinde hannde ko lollirɓe Bokku Haram en to Niseriyaa heɓtuɓe won e gure keeɗɗe fuɗnaange rewo leydi ndii ( Dowla Bornu ) , naatta e leydi Kameruun e Niseer , heen sahaaji njilloyoo haa Caad .
Ɓurɗo woɗɗude jaalal ngal fof , ɓurata leelde artude ɗo wonnoo , tawde njaweendi maɓɓe woɗɗondiraani .
Ɓutteendi ɓoggol ngol ko hedde santimeeteruuji 5 .
Ɓuucirtee ko kateteer tokooso .
Ɓuuɓol ngol fuɗɗii .
ƊEe kaaƴe ena mbiyee " tagopewkon " ( sabu ɗe timmaani tagofeere , kono ena taaroo naange no tagopeeje nii ) .
ƊUM FAWAAKI E NGONKA .
Ɗaawuusa wiyi mo " laawol alanaa ma ɗo am ɗoo , kono maa mi addane mo ina naatnu maa e cuuɗiindi " .
Ɗaawuusa yahi to ngooroondi , nde yettii ngooroondi , ndi wiyi ɗum " yah to damal aljannaaji too , maa a taw toon gooto e maleykaaji tedduɗi ɗii , maa wood ko yooɓnu maa " .
Ɗaaɗndi yerwee , reftinee e yulnde haa yettoo ɗo welata furɓodaade e keddam ɗoo .
Ɗaccaani ɗi , haa ɗi maayi .
Ɗacciren wiɗto ngoo fanniyankooɓe fannu oo .
Ɗaccon hake !
Ɗaccon hakke banndiraaɓe .
Ɗaccon hakke musidɓe .
Ɗafti ƴamatnooɓe fof ko Aamadu Tumaani Tuure .
Ɗal boom , hay almameeɓe ɓee nanataa arab .
Ɗal boom , sabu Allah wiyde he nder Qur’aan , " Min nelaani annabi so wonaa tawa ko he ɗemngal koreeji ( leñol ) mum en " , ( Qur’aan 14 : 4 ) ene addana en wiyde ɓayde ɓaleeɓe ko leñɗi jooma en ɗemɗe , tawat nelaaɓe jippinooma he maɓɓe .
Ɗal boom , ɗum ɗeɓii wontude no diɗɗal dartiyankooɓe ni .
Ɗalboom , wiɗtooji ene kollira nii wonnde ene gasa tawa binndol fentaa ko he jookdu Afrik , tawa kadi ko yimɓe ɓaleeɓe puɗɗi ɗum .
Ɗam battinii no feewi e jannguɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaano ɗemɗe ɗee , e nder leƴƴi hee fof .
Ɗamaawu ina wuurna !
Ɗaminaade , so ngal dental dariima , maa wood ko jibini to bannge ngartam .
Ɗaminaare makko yowii ko he dowlaaji ɗi suɓotooɓe ɓe njeyaaka he lannda GOP mbaawi wootde he nder pirimeeruuji GOP , ɗo ngannduɗaa ɓeen wootooɓe he ko ɓuri heewde ko kanko ɓuri yiɗde e Donald Trump .
Ɗaminaare yoo ndenndu anniya njoottoo pewjida ko ñawi fof ƴeewa safrude , ko enen ndenndi fof ɗuum noon ndeenten pewjanen caɗeele men fof ndeen maa en njaaru yeeso taw hay gooto e men heddaaki caggal !
Ɗanngal haa lewru tawi alaa jolɗo heen , keblangol no moƴƴi maa addan Nasa heɓde nate kaawtorɗe kam e keɓe paayodinɗe .
Ɗanniyaŋkooɓe wuro ngoo , caggal nde paami wonde ko dental woni doole , ndentii , tafii njuɓɓudi ŋarɗundi , ndenndinii jawɗeele mumen , mahii safrirde fattamlamre e wuro mumen tawi ko e doole mumen oole ɗo ballal naattungal jillaani .
Ɗawgol , gila ɗo wonnoo seeɗa-seeɗa , haa huuɓtodini
Ɗaɓɓaande winndaa , joɗɗinaa ko kalifu geɗe nder leydi ñalnde 20/04/06 , jokkondire mbaɗaa , kono huunde ndee tehi no feewi .
Ɗaɓɓit-mi ɗuum , njah-mi toon .
Ɗaɓɓude nyaawoore .
Ɗaɓɓugol pirtugol ñawooje peewtuɗe e ɗeen kuule yowataa ñaawoore ndee ( kuulal ngal dogata ko haa nde sariya oo taƴi fof ) .
Ɗaɗi mayre ɓuri ɗum
Ɗaɗi ɗii e baaji ɗii , Duudu Baal ( Kolonel Diƴƴe e Dulɗi e oon sahaa ) , roɓii , no o wiyri , resndoyi cate fanniyankooje to bannge gannde arkewoloosi ( IFAN/ UCAD ) .
Ɗe kaɓɓondirii
Ɗe keewi ko hoƴeede maa mbiyen duppeede .
Ɗe koynii daartol men , hannde ɗe ngummaniima lofde janngo men .
Ɗe kuutortoo ko haala nguurka , haala cañiika , haala mbelka e sahaaji beñiiɗi haala njobotooka mijo e haakkile wonande kaaloowo o e keɗtotooɗo o fof , tawa kadi aka yahdi e nguurndam .
Ɗe laatotoo e gite men ko no annama koode nii .
Ɗe lewre e weñaande e njooju e tammba kum e ɓammgal e ɓaar e yahataa-arataa ɗe mbaamda e jiriile .
Ɗe mbayi ko no rosoor nii , aɗe tiɗɗoo , tiɗɗitoo .
Ɗe mbaɗtaama to Arafaat e El Miina ñalnde 27/10/2018 , kono alaa ko waylii heen e kuuɓal , hay so tawii luulndo ɓeydiima tiiɗtude to Arafaat .
Ɗe mbellitee to bannge ngalu mbele aɗe mbaawa yiilde koye majje , ɗe njogoo ndimaagu to bannge njuɓɓudi kam e mbaawkaaji tabitɗi tuugiiɗi e laawol to bannge ƴellitaare faggudu e cellal e nehdi e jaŋde e pinal , nder Rippoobilik dentuɗo mo feccotaako goodɗo oo , kalfinaaɗo horde dewgol laawol peeje ɗe mbaawka nokku kaa ƴettata e nder ɗiin fannuuji , tawa noon mbaawka carɗinoowa e ciinoowa e ñaawoowa naataani heen .
Ɗe mbinndii dallinannde ngam ɗuum .
Ɗe nawa nan-Alla , ɗe ngartira kabaaru ndimaagu .
Ɗe nawa nan-Allaɗe ngartira kabaaru ndimaagu .
Ɗe ndariima haa duɗal ɗemɗe sosaa , ɗemɗe ngenndiije njarribaa e duɗe laamu .
Ɗe ngeeriima terɗe pelle ɗee nde ɓeydata coftal mum en , yimɓe fof nde noototoo pelle ɗee , haa teeŋti noon e jannguɓe e jannginooɓe nde tawtata pelle ɗee mbele ko sooynaa koo ine laatoroo no ɓuri feewde e yuɓɓude .
Ɗe ngontii no duɗal doosngal walla mbiyen mboorka ɓuuɓtuka ni .
Ɗe njibinii uujooji yimɓe
Ɗe njiytaa ko hedde 1940 .
Ɗe pamɗitat so tawi sukaaɓe ɓee mbiꞌii na ɓoorno ɗe .
Ɗe taarondiri tan ko e Bah e Jallo .
Ɗe tagooje ( hono Leydi , Lewru , naange e Koode ) , gooto e majje fof ena jogii diiwaan mum ; kala ko ari e oon diiwaan , tagoore nde fooɗat ɗum .
Ɗe toŋtee haa ɗe mbaawa huwtoreede
Ɗe ummii ko e koode ɗe nganndu-ɗaa , Alla
Ɗee balɗe boom , haala kaa wontii luural mawngal , so gerewaaji , fitina e nder mbeddaaji e seppooji ɗi njoofataa .
Ɗee baɗe kaantorinɗe , foti ruggireede ko gila to ɗaɗi gubbiiɗi e luurooji , ngati kala ko foogaa e lekki ɗuum woni ko wiltoyta e mum .
Ɗee diiwe gonɗe he nehaande wertaango Fulɓe ina mari jelooɗe teskinɗe wonande pulaar e fuldulde , pulfule Fuɗnaange e ɗe Hirnaange .
Ɗee diiwe ɗiɗi fof njaakorii ko heɓde jeytaare mum en , no Eriterea heɓiri hoore mum gila 27 Abiril ( Seeɗto ) 1993 .
Ɗee dille kewɗe nder reedu Fuuta , Laaw , ina naamndii anndineede .
Ɗee dille noon saabii ɗum en ko dille paɗe Leydi .
Ɗee dille weeyo njirlortoo ko no njamkon montoor nii ( nano feewde ñaamo ) so tawii ko e peccol worgo ngoni .
Ɗee dokke fof ko he Nuwaasoot , jeegom gadane ɗee ko he Nuwaasoot hirnaange ( ɗo leydi ɓuri tiiɗde ɗoo ) , cakkital ngal ko he Nuwaasoot worgo .
Ɗee duuɗe keedi ko worgo Ŋorol Peccol .
Ɗee eɓɓaaɗe dental maa ngontatno dente mawɗe ɗo njogorno-ɗen saayde so en naatii e mum en .
Ɗee geɗe , kam e ko o woni jaagorgal ko , addani mo hormeede , e huleede , gila ender ɓesngu makko , gila e nder Fuuta fof , haa e nder laamuuji catiiɗi Fuuta , rewo e worgo , funnaange , e hirnaange .
Ɗee geɗe fof ko peeje nanondiraaɗe hakkunde leyɗeele ngam nannditinde gollorɗe e lowe geese Winndere ndee kala .
Ɗee geɗe fof ko saaysayeeɓe ɓuñooɓe e geese ɗee kuwtortoo-ɗe ngam duumaade e battam-bonaagu mum'en .
Ɗee geɗe fof ko tuggii 2008 haa e fuɗɗoode hitaande 2010 .
Ɗee geɗe fof kollii en nafoore daartol .
Ɗee geɗe fof ndokkii mawɗo leydi ndii woytoraandu wonde kaaldigal ngal waawataa jooɗaade tawde anniya wonnoo ko renndinde yimɓe fof " won gedduɓe ɗum , won kadi heblotooɓe e geddude " , kono woni goonga oo ko doole ɗe njiɗaa mbayliigu e nder leydi hee , yo ndi heddo e diiñaade ɗo gootel pooltiima waame ɗamamuya peeñnooɗo caggal loskooji parlamaa peewnooɗi e jiilgol laamu ɓennungu nguu .
Ɗee geɗe gaddanɗe yimɓe teskoreede leñol mum en walla tirbii mum en .
Ɗee geɗe hol ko pirtata ?
Ɗee geɗe kala kollitii alaa baawɗo yowitaade e ɗee kinɗe mbele na ngardoo here fooloore jiimooɓe , haa leydi men jeya hoore mum baŋ-yoo-baŋ , haa lorla neɗɗo e banndum iwa .
Ɗee geɗe kala so njahdinaama e pindingol arooɓe daakaa ɓee mbele njikkoo jikkuuji moƴƴi , eɗen ɗaminii ko kewi hikka koo waɗtataa .
Ɗee geɗe ɗiɗi ko tanaa wonande keewal ciiri kooraay guurɗi e Uddoode Mawnde ndee , mooftunde ko ina wona 400 ciirol koraay , e 1 500 ciirol liingu , e 4 000 ciirol wujo .
Ɗee geɗe ɗiɗi ko tanaa wonande keewal ciiri kooraay guurɗi he Uddoode Mawnde ndee , mooftunde ko ina wona 400 ciirol koraay , e 1 500 ciirol liingu , e 4 000 ciirol wujo .
Ɗee golle moƴƴe fof noon , fedde FLHA waɗi ɗumen ko e ŋakkere kaɓirɗe hiisnde .
Ɗee golle noon naamnii ko jaŋde e binndol ɗemngal ngal e kala fannu ganndal newaniiɗo en .
Ɗee golle ɗe nganndu-ɗaa Ceerno men waɗii laabi limti-limtinɗi , hande omo sokli ballal ɓiɓɓe leñol kala nannga heen , ɗoftal kaaw woto mo heddii .
Ɗee heen ko pelle jokkere enɗam goɗɗe heen kadi ko pelle pinal , waɗa sahaa kadi njiyaa fedde renndinnde payndaale ɗiɗi ɗee kala tawa ene golla he pinla kono kadi ene wadda heen jokkere enɗam .
Ɗee jaaɓnirɗe kala , neɗɗo ine waawi huutoraade ngam sarde kabaaru foti ko goodɗo maa pefindaaɗo e tee eɗe kattani loowde nate walla widiyooji .
Ɗee jaaɓnirɗe limtaaɗe jaaɓngal heen kala , wontii boowal pettum peral ɗo neɗɗo huuñcata nguurndam , nder mum boowal mum holla winndere ndee no wuurdi .
Ɗee jagge ɓaleeɓe mbaasii guurdugal mum en bajjal , hono njoɓdi mum
Ɗee jeewte ko o jooɓiiɗo ɗumen kala ɗo o ari e der dental ko ngal waawi wonde fof , hay sinno ko e nder oto taski o woni , ekn .
Ɗee joɗle fof ngoytiima no feewi " fenaande kilimaa " , woni fenaande wuuraande ndee : ko leyɗe mawɗe posnata weeyo , ko leyɗe pamare doole ɗe alaa ko mbonni , ɓuri tinde batte golle leyɗe mawɗe ɗee .
Ɗee jukkanɗe no yowitii e ngeenaaje bonɗe e huutorgol darnde mum fii battingol .
Ɗee kaaƴe , sahaa fof ena pelɓondira , kela , pusa , heen pilta haa naatoya e laawol leydi , haa naatoya e weeyo leydi .
Ɗee kattanɗe konuyeeje ina ngaddani Siin waawde fiyde kala leydi he dow tagofeere men ndee .
Ɗee kaɓirɗe maa ɓet ngesa yiiteewa e sulɗeewa , cifoo pecore semmbiije , mbiɗta bembeƴƴe rajo e ɗe ɓoljam , ɗe ƴetta kadi nate meetelol naange ngol .
Ɗee laaɗe kala ena pooɗondira ɓuraa yooɗde , kono diɗɗe ɗee pooɗondirta ko ɓuraa waawde awƴal , ɓuraa yooɗde daaydaayre !
Ɗee maale ine ngonda kadi e doŋkal ɗoyngol , caɗeele tino , muuseeki mbaawki yuumtude e kaaɗi .
Ɗee naamnde noon ko e jeewte men e nder Rajo Muritani e kitaale 1988-1989 .
Ɗee njiyte ngaddanii Orop dañde jotondire njulaagu kese , heɓde leyɗe kese e ngaluuji kesi ɗi mbaawi naftoraade .
Ɗee pelle mbayi hannde ko no dowlaaji nii .
Ɗee tagooje fof ngoni ko e weeyo , etee ko weeyo taari ɗum en bang-yoo-bang ( bangeeji ɗii fof ) .
Ɗee tippule kadi ine naatnattondira , mbaylondira , ɗe ngonaa uddiiɗe .
Ɗee toɓɓe mbaawii yeewteede no feewi , dalillaaji laaɓtuɗi kollitaama heen , e wattan heblo ngoo , tawtoraaɓe ɓee ɓeydiima faamde no feewi faayiiida jaŋde sukaaɓe , copoƴƴi hannde calɗi ɓamtaare janngo , jaŋde woni " famɗa suura heewa lammina " , ko jaŋde waawi ƴellitde en , eɗen poti daranaade tigi rigi jaŋde sukaaɓe gila e ngooroondi ndii , ɗuum woni les .
Ɗee woote mbaɗiranoo ko artirde laamu siwien caggande konu folli laamu Mammadu Tañnjaa e feebariyee 2010 .
Ɗee ɓarakke liingu nayeewu ine sikkaa " maa sukku yolnde faatunde he no liingu waylorii haa yettii aadee " .
Ɗee ɗemɗe njiidaa nih hay abajada .
Ɗee ɗoo geɗe ndonaandi mooftaa ko e galle Alhajji Hammadi Alhajji Sammba Faati Saar kadi nde kolla-ɗen ɗum ndee ko e tawtoreede Joom Seyni Waddu .
Ɗeen
Ɗeen binndanɗe ngoni ko e gerngal ena wiyee Ruttorde Ganndal .
Ɗeen caafe gulɗe eɗen mbaawi yiyrude ɗum en caafe les-boɗewol , peññinen ɗe he natal , kuutoro-ɗen noorɗe ( goobuuji ) ceertuɗi ngam hollitde caasgol caafe les-boɗewol ɗee .
Ɗeen caɗeele noon , so cafraaka , ɓe min koɗdi ɓee njogor waɗde no keewnoo waɗde nii , so ɓaaftude fof , min keddoo e tammaade ɗe looraani .
Ɗeen caɗeele ɗe min njogii to bannge dawrugol ene paayni min haa ko ɗoon waawi haaɗde .
Ɗeen dille kadi eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko kaannooɗo , so ƴeewraama bannge dartagol njiimaandi koloñaal , to bannge njuɓɓudi e politik e pinal .
Ɗeen doole kaɗi Mali ardineede fedde ndee , mbele leydi ndii ina ɓeydoo seegeede .
Ɗeen doole nderndere e doole boowal ina ɓurondiri no feewi .
Ɗeen duttorɗe ngoni ko he juuɗe laamɓe Farayse , eggini nawi leydi mum en .
Ɗeen geɗe gonooje dow weeyo , alaa ɗo keddata he winndere ndee .
Ɗeen geɗe gonooje e ɓalndu neɗɗo noon , donirteeɗo tan to bannge yummiraaɓe ( yumma faade ɓiyum debbo ) , ina moofti kala mbayliigaaji baɗooji e ɓalli joomum en .
Ɗeen gire ne , mbaɗana fedde , tawi hoolaaɓe gure tokoose taariiɗe ɗumen ɗee ene njeyaa heen .
Ɗeen golle fof ko e innde goomu Caafal .
Ɗeen jime kala ko ceedatooɗe darnde makko he leñol ngol .
Ɗeen kaɓtorɗe hankadi keddoo e ɓalndu joomum , o wontaa hankadi heɓde ñawu nguu , sibu so wiris tookaaɗo oo naatoyii caggal ɗuum e ɓalnduu joomum , kaɓtorɗe peewnanooɗe ɗee paddoo ɗum law , mumta mo .
Ɗeen ko baɗɗiiɗe ngam konngol Alla toowɗoo oo : " tottee rewɓe ɓee teŋe mum`en " simoore rewɓe maande 4 .
Ɗeen leyɗe noon ngoondii ko joftotooɗe Ɗee bone so kajaaka gila e law , hay gooto anndaa ko njibinta kadi .
Ɗeen leyɗeele doolnuɗe ene pewja peeje mum en , lelna kuule mum he nder pelle goɗɗe ko wayno l’OTAN haa nanondira toon ngadda ɗum to YKNg ngam laawɗinde ɗum he dow heddiiɓe ɓee .
Ɗeen leyɗeele kala njiɗaa henndu jeytaare ena wuttee e Orop sabu hulde keeri mum'en fusde .
Ɗeen leyɗeele ne ngoni ko e dow dinndeere woɗnde .
Ɗeen maale , alaa baawɗo ittude ɗemen .
Ɗeen maale fof noon ko caggal nde ñawu nguu fuɗɗii heɓindaade mo sellaani oo .
Ɗeen mooɓe pawondirɗe fof e heewde e mawnude , so waɗdaama e ko njaaweendi ndii ŋakkira e ɓakdi koo , alaa e sago mooɓre woɗnde ɓurnde moolaneede yanta heen , ko ndeen woni ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ŋakkundi .
Ɗeen ngoni
Ɗeen ngoni : Suudu Jasaknaaɓe , suudu Jaaltaaɓe Poongel e suudu Jaaltaaɓe Siñcu .
Ɗeen ngoni : Ñaawoore , muuli ɗum ko ARED , e Firtaare , muuli ɗum ko edition Nanondiral ( 2002 ) .
Ɗeen ngoni ɗemngal Farayse hannde ngal , Italiyankoore , Españool e Purtugees .
Ɗeen peeje e ɗeen nanondire mbaawata siyneede tan ko caggal nde ɗe mbinnditaa e nder karnal hee .
Ɗeen peeje ena jeyaa heen huuyoraade kelme ɗe Fulɓe njoginoo tawa ngoni ko e majjude sabu gollal walla piije ɗe ɗe toɗɗii nattii woodde walla huuyoreede .
Ɗeen pelle e ɓeen yimɓe heeriiɓe ene mbaawi seerndireede e wonɓe e lanndaaji dawrol ɓee , to bannge payndaale
Ɗeen pelle kollitii ina keɓii e yejjitde ɗee kitaale lorla e ƴiiƴam , e piggal e warngooji , e taccingol e kareeli .
Ɗeen peŋɗe ngoni " Mooɓondiral " ngal ngannduɗaa ko batu kuuɓtodinɗo terɗe ( leyɗeele ) Kawtal ngal , ko he mum nanondire ɗee e kuule ƴettatee .
Ɗeen piɓle ngoni : waasde huutoraade fitina , waasde waɗde heedi-heeda , wallude waasɓe , ɗooftaade konngol mum , muñondiral , e beldital e kormondiral .
Ɗeen tagopeeje noon en mbaawaa yillaade ɗum en jooni , sibu en njiyii ko ɓeeynirɗe ɗiɗi fat kattani haa e oo sahaa ɓoccitaade ɓaaƴo Naange , njalti yuɓɓo mum .
Ɗeen tiwaaɗe njiidaani e ɗe Dowlaaji Dennduɗi Amerik fawani heen hoore mum .
Ɗeen yiite neldee Leydi ngam hutoreede .
Ɗeen yiite ɓeeɓataa nde tawnoo ɗo satelitaaji ɗii ngoni ɗoo alaa ko wirni ɗum en Naange , ɗum noon jamma jofataa toon , tee ɗi ngoni ko dow duule , toɓo kadi haljintaa gollagol majji , ɗum noon jeñtingol yiite ngol taƴondirtaa .
Ɗeen ɓure ɗe mbaaw-ɗen tonngude e daaɗe tati
Ɗeen ɓure ɗe mbaaw-ɗen tonngude e daaɗe tati :
Ɗeen ɗemɗe araniyeeje , ko wayno Arab , Engele , Farayse ,
Ɗeeɗoo binndanɗe ene ɓeydana-mi ganndal e humpito geɗe ɗe mi annadaano .
Ɗeeɗoo ena ceerti no feewi e tagopeeje fedde leydi .
Ɗeeɗoo gannde kala ene njanngetenoo ɗoon yantude e gannde Islaam , Qur’aan , tafsiir , hadiis , siira , kalaam e daarto Islaam wonndude e ɗemngal arab ( lugha , nahwu , sarf , e jima ) .
Ɗeeɗoo gese hay sinno won caɗeele njiyaa to bannge ɗowngo majje , eɗe mbaɗi ngartam , eɗe cuuri ɓesnguuji keewɗi .
Ɗeeɗoo geɗe fof ina waawi waasde waɗeede .
Ɗeeɗoo geɗe heɗe keewi e nguurndam barooɗe .
Ɗeeɗoo geɗe kaantare fof ɗe o waɗetee , so o seertii heen o ƴettata ko ndiyam o sulmoo yeeso makko , o juula darɗe ɗiɗi , caggal ɗuum o ñaaganoo ɓe moƴƴere .
Ɗeeɗoo gure kecci garal Maalik Sih e Ɓunndu .
Ɗeeɗoo leyɗe garooje ko e maggol puɗɗii seŋaade e ɓoggol giiɗal : Gine hakkundeejo , Gammbi , Liberiyaa , Muritani , Saawo Tome-e-Perensipe , Siyera Leyon .
Ɗeeɗoo leyɗe ɗe limtu-ɗen dow ɗe , mballitiino no feewi ANC , sibu ko toon luuñcittonoo e nder hare mum e Apartaayd .
Ɗemngal Arab , ɗemngal laawɗungal leydi ndii , kam e ɗemɗe ngenndiije goɗɗe ɗee , hono Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof , gootal heen kala ko ngalu ngenndi ngu muritaninaaɓe kala ndenndi , e nder ɗuum , ina waɗɗii Dowla oo hisnude ɗe e ɓamtude ɗe , e innde yimɓe fof .
Ɗemngal Faraysinkoore ngal Muritaninaaɓe kuwtortonoo gila ko adii jeytaare mum en haa jooni , kadi gonnongal ɗemngal mum lawakeewal ( langue officielle ) caggal nde Muritani heɓi jeytaare mum ngal , kanum sortaama he ɗemɗe laawɗinaaɗe leydi ndi .
Ɗemngal Gerek wonnoo janngirteengal kala ko woni gannde hakkilleyankeeje ( les sciences rationnelles ) , ko wayno filosofii , hiisiwal , mbewu e ñawndiwal , ekn .
Ɗemngal ene jeyaa e ko wallitta jokkondiral e kaaldigal hakkunde hodduɓe , e wonduɓe , e gostondiral miijooji e nder renndo waawngo wonde fo .
Ɗemngal farayse adii pulaar suɓaneede doosɗe to wóɗɗi kono haɗaani mbinndiin mum e leydi Farayse e hoore mum , mi haalaani Belsik , Kanadaa e ko nanndi heen , koko waylotoo haa jóóni .
Ɗemngal ine jotondiri no feewi e neɗɗaagu ngenndi e politik .
Ɗemngal latin wonnoo ɗemngal diine nasraan e ñaawoore ( droit ) .
Ɗemngal lawakeewal ngal ( la langue officielle ) ko Faraysinkoore .
Ɗemngal men yoo won gootal , woni PULAAR .
Ɗemngal noon so maayii pinal e daartol joom mum en majjat , sabu ko ɗemngal reeni pinal .
Ɗemngal woni faawru !
Ɗemngalnoon jokkondiri ko e miijo .
Ɗemɗe Afriknaaje
Ɗemɗe goɗɗe ɗee ngalaa heen .
Ɗemɗe lawakeeje ɗee ko Arabeere e Faraysinkoore .
Ɗemɗe ngenndiije keddiiɗe ɗee , Pulaar , Sooninkoore e Wolof , kanum en ne , maa mbaɗtu janngineede hono no kuulal ngal haaliri , kono maɗe njariɓe haa anndee ɗuum ene waawi wonde .
Ɗemɗe ngenndiije keddiiɗee joom mum en ene mbaawi janngude ɗum en he puɗɗorɗe gootal heen fof he diiwaan ɗo ɓuri yaajrude .
Ɗemɗiyaŋkooɓe pulaar ko ɗuum mbaɗi sabu ko kamɓe ngadii salaade kuulal Seŋngoor ngal ( Yèro Sylla , Grammaire moderne du pulaar , k .
Ɗennɗiraagu ko ko ɓadtondirta , ko ko suusnondirta , ko ko ñifata fitinaaji , ko ko momtata luure hakkunde wonduɓe , foti ko e nder leñol gootol walla e leƴƴi keewɗi guurduɗi .
Ɗeɗɗa ɗaminaare mum .
Ɗi funnaange ɗii ne ko ɗiɗi , gooto fof tooweendi mum ko 17 meeteer .
Ɗi keewi taweede
Ɗi mbaɗa gasɗe , ɗi koɗa heen .
Ɗi mbela kocce , ɗi metta ngaynaaka .
Ɗi mbiyi : " no ɗum wayi welde nih , alaa e sago min naata toon , ngam min nguura nguurndam mbelɗam .
Ɗi mbiyi : senaare woodanii ma joomi amen , minen kay aamnantaako min woofde ma .
Ɗi meeɗaa ɓeteede ɓeto goonganteewo .
Ɗi neldi ɓatakeeji keewɗi fayde leydi wonde laana kaa heɓii paanuuji keewɗi .
Ɗi ngalaa piɓle ( mawninooje siñaal ) .
Ɗi peccaa ko e pelle 5 , fawaade e doole keneeli jahdooji heen e tolno bonannde mum waawi yettaade .
Ɗi peccitaa ko e pecce ɗiɗi
Ɗi peccoo ndu woni fof wooda to tiindii , .
Ɗi poolaa e wolde ɓesngu hee , njiyaagu mumtaa , haɗtaa .
Ɗi tawi ine weli , ɗi loɓɓitii heen .
Ɗi tawi ko ɓesngu Oolo-oolooga fof ena teertii ɗi , ena teertorii ɗi ñaantungal , njimri e ngamri ganni , ena tijjorii ɗi tawtaari ndi fuutanke heewnoo teddinirde koɗo korsuɗo mo yiɗnoo yiyde ko jiidaa e pucci ñaantaaɗi haa njooɗii ena padndii ɗi to naatirde wuro .
Ɗi ñaami mo haa ɗi ŋoli ƴeiyi ɗee .
Ɗi ɓuri horsinde ko comci niɓɓi gulɗi , ɓurɗi heewde taweede e kaake ɗannotooɓe walla e comci tunwuɗi , maa walla e jipporɗe e daabaaji jolnooji yimɓe ( biisuuji , laaɗe njoorndi ekn ) .
Ɗi ɗaɓɓi " jotondire winndereeje kese " .
Ɗiggingol ɗemngal ine jogii darnde nder gollingol .
Ɗiggingol ɗemngal ine waawi wonde sabaabu cuɓagol Ɗ2 winnderewal , hay so tawii noon ine anndaa ɗuum yuumtaani , haa teeŋti noon so tawii fannuuji ɗii fof njanngirtee ko Ɗ2 , ɗo kattanɗe jannginooɓe walla janngooɓe ɓee waawi tolnaade fof noon .
Ɗii COPuuji ɗiɗi njooɗotaako hitaande kala , kono ine ngollodoo ɗo ɓadii he COP gadano oo .
Ɗii duuɓi cappaɗe nayi ɓennuɗi , Siriya ko ko tamaa junngo
Ɗii duuɓi ɓennuɗi , hade lekkol uddude , lekkolaaji leydi ndii fof ina mbaɗa kawgel .
Ɗii heblooji fof noon , mbaɗaa kadi ko he tawtoregol Ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof .
Ɗii keewi ko saraade .
Ɗii keewuuji muusi mo , haa ko ɗum jarani mo , e ndeen hitaande wootere , yahdude e yimɓe woɗɓe , ko wayi no Abuubakri Kaaliidu Bah e Baaba Galle Woon , e nder diiwaan Afrik hirnaange oo ngam etaade dartinde oo musiiba bonɗo .
Ɗii konngi mbayata min ko no wareede nii .
Ɗii laabi sariya luttii woodde ko juuti , haa e nder maayirɗe teeminannde 20siire .
Ɗii leñƴi fof kaɓii cili keewɗi e Ecopia gila he yonta Menelik II , dadde mum Haayle Selaase , Laamɗo laamɓe .
Ɗii leñƴi ngoni koɗɗi hannde e Muritani .
Ɗii miijooji cosi njuɓɓudi mbiyeteendi fedde
Ɗii miijooji potaani teskeede sabu pawaaki e ganndal ; Won wiiɓe fulɓe ngummi ko fuɗnaange .
Ɗii musibbaaji tawtondirɗi mbonnii ko ina wona 200 miliyaar Oroo .
Ɗii njalta ɗii tiindoo , tufle .
Ɗii pijirlooji ko goonga eɗi keewi pelɓondire kam e gaañii gaañii kono battintaa , lomtotoo tan ko muñal e jaafondiral , njurum e jaleede .
Ɗii soklaaji kesi caabii cosgol gese kese e ɓeydugol jiggagol jiyaaɓe heewɓe , fotnooɓe faggoyeede nokkuuji goɗɗi .
Ɗii ñakkuuji kuutorii ko wootere e peeje kese ɗee , hono feere ñakku anndiraande ñakku " ARN messager " .
Ɗii ɓoggi mawɗi ina njara hedde 300 miliyaar ugiyya men ɓooyɗo oo .
Ɗii ɗoo duuɓi , cakkitiiɗi yoolayru ine teskini no feewi to geej Nuwaadibu .
Ɗiin 1 600 ko luwaas mo ɓe njoɓata 120 000 MRO ketaar kala , hitaande kala .
Ɗiin bonanndeeji ɓurɗi mawnude , ko wayi no warde hoore tawa ko teyaaɗe , e jindude e debbo jenano e ko nanndi e ɗeen geɗe .
Ɗiin dekereeji fof , ɓuri himmande heen leƴƴi Moritani ko dekere ƴettaaɗo ñalnde 20 mee 1955 sabu oon sariya holliti ko so laamu yeeytiima ko kam jeyi " leydi ndi alaa ko tawaa e mum e tee alaa joom mum " foti ko addande ɗum daliilu .
Ɗiin duuɓi , Libi uddanaa damule ɓamtaare e faggudu kala haa Kaddaafi jaɓi maslondireede .
Ɗiin fanuuji ngurndam fof mbewni ɓalli men , udditani ɗi jabet e ñawbuuli goɗɗi ɗi en ganndaano .
Ɗiin goomuuji takkaama warngooji 12 neɗɗo e piggal yimɓe heewɓe , yimɓe ɓe ɗi tuumatnoo wonde ñukkindtooɓe laamu Apartaayd .
Ɗiin hujjaaji ngoni , bonnitde laamuuji leyɗe jiimɗe petroŋ , haɓde ɗe terorism lislaam ( Terrorisme ) .
Ɗiin joggaali , kuunaali , meenaali e gofaali ɗi paam-ɗaa aɗa foti heen faamorde piɗgol am ngol .
Ɗiin kaayitaaji ngasiino yuɓɓineede kadi ɗi njogornoo naweede to DREN Worgo ko e ooɗoo subaka hannde .
Ɗiin kooli keewnoo waɗeede tan ko e Gure Ganni rewankooje ɗee .
Ɗiin kulhuli , addani ɓe ƴeewoyde golle ko wayi no rufoyde kurjuru , roondaade njeeyguuji , fittude ekn , ngam yoɓeede daña ko nawti .
Ɗiin leppi inniraa ko pullo gaynaako goo e ɗiɗi .
Ɗiin leƴƴi noon , e fawaade e ɗuum , mbaawaa , etee potaani adaba joñeede .
Ɗiin nokkuuji njogori huɓɓude ñalnde 11 Korse 2010 nde Afrik Bŋ Worgo hawrata e Meksik e balɗe capanɗe tati dewɗe heen ɗee .
Ɗiin nokkuuji tati ko wuro Al Khaliil ( Hebron ) , Duunde Okinoshima ( to Japon ) , duunde ɗo rewɓe kaɗaa yahde , e leegal gootal nder wuro Strasbourg ( Farayse ) ine wiyee Neustadt .
Ɗiin pitti hay worɓe ndaɗaani heen .
Ɗiin satelitaaji ngona e yirlodaadi e leydi ( so a ƴeewii ɗi cikkataa ko ɗi ndillataa ) , ɗi ngona e heɓɓaade cereeli naange , ɗi mbaɗta yiite ( kuuraa ) .
Ɗiin sirluuji ene kollira njuɓɓudi cañiindi , ndi ene teeŋtina taweede caggal ɗiin sirluuji , junngo geno karallo , ñeeñɗuɗo cañoowo ndiin njuɓɓudi , so tawii kay ko wonande goongɗinɗo goodaangal oon geno .
Ɗiin soklaaji noon wonaa waɗde golle ngam heɓirde yimɓe he sahaa suɓngooji e gañamtumaagu .
Ɗiin ñalɗi ndenndintunoo ko jannginooɓe fedde ndee , kam e haralleeɓe jaŋde woɗɓe bismaaɓe heen .
Ɗiin ñalɗi tati baɗooji ñalnde 18 , 19 e 20 Bowte 2009 teddiniraa ko Ceerno Murtuɗo Joop , gorko daraniiɗo ɓamtaare pulaar e fulɓe kaaɗi ngiirndam mum .
Ɗiin ƴeewndooji mbaɗetee ko e dow yimɓe ɓe ngaanndi mum en teskaa nattii wuurde , kono tawi terɗe mum en guurwuure goɗɗe ɗee ine lutti tawo wuurneede .
Ɗiin ɓoggi woni nder mum en ko leeɓol giiɗal ( fibre optique ) ɗi yimɓe kumpitaaki tawo no feewi ko ngoni .
Ɗiin ɓowɗi doondiiɗi mboros oo keewi
Ɗiiɗoo aadaaji bonɗi ( nguyka ) ɗi neh-ɗen he nder hakkillaaji sukaaɓe , ine njeyaa e ko ɓuri bonnude jaŋde !
Ɗiiɗoo dalillaaji jangtaaɗi no mbayi heewde nii fof , hol ko saabii leyɗe keewɗe haa hannde ine cuɓoo PƊJ ɗi njeñtudi mum en jaŋde moƴƴaani , etee njoñoori yimɓe heewɓe ?
Ɗiiɗoo duuɓi sakket feeñii ko wiyetee gese maaro tokoose e nder kolaaɗe fori , ɗo jam sori no ceerno Njaay Saydu Aamadu heewi wiyde , tawi ɓe kuutortoo ko masiŋaaji motopompuuji tokoosi , kono ina teskaa ngatam keewɗam .
Ɗiiɗoo ko galle teskinnooɗi e nder Ɓunndu , ko jiidaa e galleeji daayooji ngam abbaade durngol jawdi walla ɗi caɗeele nguura e nguurndam nawi .
Ɗiiɗoo sababuuji fof ndenti waɗi , nde Makki fuɗɗii ŋabbude e ƴeestaade he nder dawrugol Senegaal haa jikkeeji ndañaa e wonnde omo waawi ardoyaade leydi ndii , Fuutankooɓe ( Fulɓe fof ) pelliti heedde caggal makko ngam jinngande mo e heedande mo sabu enɗam , kono kadi ngam ɗaminaare ma o safranɓe kala ko wonnoo rafiiji maɓɓe .
Ɗiiɗoo ɓetooji garooji njeddotaako .
Ɗiiɗoo ɓoggi giiɗal , kuuɓnuɗi ko ina wona 99% jokkondire winndereeje , ndewi tan ko ɗo ɓoggi telegaraaf ndewnoo e teeminaande 19ɓiire , e ɗo ɓoggi telefoŋ ndewnoo e teeminannde 20siire ( ɗiin noon ko ɓoggi kiri ngonnoo ) .
Ɗiɗi , o artii e jaŋde meccal gila e ko woni binndi haa e ko woni ñeeñal .
Ɗiɗi fof noon ko janngeteeɗi .
Ɗiɗo fof cuuɗoyii ko Kodduwaar .
Ɗiɗo fof njeyaa ko e 19 ɓee .
Ɗo , jaalal suudu ngal lomtii naange nge e yeru o .
Ɗo , kala meeɗɗo rewde ɗo dañii caɗeele .
Ɗo , ko kanko e Saydu Kan nanndunoo ɗoon jikku .
Ɗo Ibraahiim wiy ene hirsa ɓiy mum o , ngam haa siina yamiroore genoyankoore nde tan , malayka ari e makko yamiri mo yo o dartin .
Ɗo Mbuur ɗo , yimɓe fof kaalata ko haala leydi ngonndi hakkunde wuro e cahe , ndokkaani ndi .
Ɗo adan ɗo , pelle daraniiɗe jooltugol hujjaaji ɓe bonanndeeji ɗi njannoo , kollitiino softeende mawnde ngam wallitde ɓe .
Ɗo adan ɗoo , caggal nde stensilaaji ɗii ngasi tappeede , ko raamuuji kaayitaaji coodetee , naaten e birooji eɗen njiyloo ɗo kebbitin-ɗen .
Ɗo adan ɗoo , ngartam mum ina waawi jaggireede ko tafaaɗum , kono so ɓooyii maa nafoore mum yaltu tigi .
Ɗo adan ɗoo , o waɗdatnoo nde ko e Mayram Muusaa Jallo .
Ɗo adan ɗoo , wonnoo miijo maɓɓe tan ko feewnude ko wayi no silipaaji moɗooji luuɓeeki , kono , ɓe miijotonoo ko yeeyde ɗum nder cafrirɗe .
Ɗo adan ɗoo , ɓe ɓurnoo huuñƴude ko e kaŋŋe , e ñiiƴe ñibi , e poobaar ( " abbere Gine " ) , kono nde ɓooynoo njulaagu jiyaaɓe ɓurtii fof .
Ɗo adan ɗoo ko e dingiral tan omo fijira pekaan , omo weltinira giƴiiko en .
Ɗo adan ɗoo ko tumbitte 1 000 wonnoo , wonti 750 , jooni ko tumbitte 500 tan kebbintee .
Ɗo adan ɗoo o wiyatnoo tan ko o ñaawoowo hakkunde goonga e fenaade ; kaaloowo yiyannde makko e no yiyre geɗe ɗee ni .
Ɗo adan ɗoo wonnoo tan ko jam ñalli , jam waali , ekn caggal mum , min tafi njuɓɓudi kuuɓtidinndi ñalnde 01/01/2018 .
Ɗo battirdu Sankara e yimɓe mum jooɗinoo ina mbata , ko kanko halfinanoo ndeenka nokku oo .
Ɗo debbo ñaagotoo seeree , gorko ñaagoo fiɗee yahre , hay ɗuum ne ko yahre bonnde .
Ɗo doɓaale ɗe ndenndintee ɗo , wiyetee ko gerngal .
Ɗo e Farayse to ngonɗen laakngal werlaa e paŋɗe Tabital Pulaagu Farayse ( TPF )
Ɗo hare ndee waɗnoo ɗoo ,
Ɗo hiirde weli he dow garbuus , aɗa fawi telbuus aɗa fali kaabuus , ndifto-ɗaa ngu , ngu waɗa guus !
Ɗo humambinnaagal e majjere ngoni heege wonat ɗoon , ñawu wonat ɗoon , baasal ne wonat ɗoon .
Ɗo huutortenoo bitte jeeɗiɗi ( 7 bit ) ngam sifaade alkule , bitte jeetati ( 8 bit ) mbaɗti huutoreede .
Ɗo idan ɗoo , Leydi ko ɓooɗde jayngol tan wonnoo , ndi jooɗiima miliyaar hitaande hay huunde wuuraano he mayri .
Ɗo jooni enen ɗiɗo ɓee fof , ko en jooɗiiɓe e galleeji men eɗen kuccindiri .
Ɗo kaaƴe ɗee mberletee ɗo ne wiyetee ko Jamra .
Ɗo laana kaa naatata he weeyo Mbaañ , njaaweendi mum ko 20 000 km/w , njaaweendi potndi niilnireede woogo , rewrude e paaraaji , kono kadi juuragol ngol ine waawi hawrude e geɗe bettuɗe , ɗe panndanooka .
Ɗo leɗɗe e koowooje e kulle goɗɗe ɓuri heewde fof , baylugol geɗe maayɗe ɗee ɓurata yuumtude .
Ɗo lujol wuurorii fof , ɓe ñoƴƴa ndeya waalaare mbele fota woto lujol saamde ) .
Ɗo mbaggu fiyraa lukluru .
Ɗo mbelnataa jaasi maa subaka hannde ɗoo , janngito no moƴƴi haala am kaa , sibu ko haala neɗɗo koolkisiiɗo ɗum e nder leydi mum .
Ɗo mbiyaten ka ɓadtiima weeyo Naange ɗoo , tawata ko miliyoŋaaji 6 e 200 ujunere kiloomeeteer ina ɓilii hakkunde makka e Nannge !
Ɗo mi siftina wonde min eerinooma tuma nde mooɓondiral amen gadanal lannda koministe Siniwaa .
Ɗo min nani won dillooɓe fof , min naata kadi e dente mumen , sabu ɗaminaade maa ɗum wonan min fartaŋŋe heɓde toon ko min ndonki heɓde e lanndaaji dawrugol koo .
Ɗo neɗɗo dogata ɓurta , yahra seesa waasa yettaade .
Ɗo ngon-ɗaa ɗoo , asamaan o wayata e maa ko ko jippii e leydi hakkunde ma e gure ɗee .
Ɗo njahraten hannde ɗoo dee , ƴoƴre tafaande waɗtii huutoreede ngam waɗde binndanɗe mettuɗe seerndude e binndanɗe ɗe aadee winndi .
Ɗo o ari fof , o haala ko addi mo , o teeŋtina ɓure jaafagol , o hirjina e ɗaɓɓugol ngootaagu ngenndi .
Ɗo o awƴata ɗo , koyɗe ɗe no njahrata dow e les ina ngarta nii , ɗum ko omo nodda Geno , Geno woni Alla maɓɓe : so o jippinii les o ƴetta doole , mbele omo waawa yettoyaade Geno .
Ɗo o heɓi fooftere makko ɗoo walla mbiyen " alateret " e hitaande 1987 , o yahratnoo ko e garaade " adsidaŋ " .
Ɗo o memi tufnde Jeeri Koli e ndoondaagu , o muti e Taara , o suppitii e Duga , hay maayɓe ndillii e nder janaale mumen .
Ɗo o ruttii e joomiiko ɗo , hooraagu fedde nde wonnoo ko e juuɗe makko .
Ɗo o sankii ɗoo , o woppi ko ɓiɓɓe njoyo , worɓe tato e rewɓe ɗiɗo .
Ɗo o wiꞌata yoo Dembayal nodde tan , ɓe cooynii ɗum ina yahra bannge ina ara .
Ɗo pullo darii wiyi ɓe : " ƴeeŋee , ƴeeŋee , ƴeeŋee ɗoo waaletaake , ƴeeŋee yoo hoto pittaali mbonde " , walla ɗo o wiyata : " ndeen gorbal lasiima , fukkitiima hakkunde maayo , maayo ɓawli wayi no ƴiiwoonde .
Ɗo tawi ɗe .
Ɗo toɓo iwri fof noon yo yuus ko ɗuum mawninta naalaŋkaagal , mo woni fof adda ballal mum ngati eɗen mbiya " maa juuɗe ɗiɗi cooɗondira nde laaɓa " , walla kadi " junngo wooto foɓɓataa " .
Ɗo wuddere ndee woni ɗoo , ko niɓɓere tan
Ɗo wuddere ndee woni ɗoo , ko niɓɓere tan yiyetee ɗoon ; ɗuum woni wuddere ɓaleere yiyotaako , heɗtotaako .
Ɗo yahanoo artaa fof ɓe njaltinii hujja kersiniiɗo , tee ɓe mbonnanii leydi ndii fartaŋŋe mawɗo .
Ɗo yimɓe cikkunoo jam dañtaama , ko ɗoon tigi o waynii .
Ɗo ƴoog-ɗen ɗoo rokkaani limoore ɓaleeɓe dahaaɓe , ɓe Farayse jiyɗini , walla yeeyi en nganndaa ko saabii ɗum .
Ɗo ɓe kaalata ɗoo , Bojel woɗɗaani ɗoon , kono omo nuɗɗinii tan .
Ɗo ɓe njahnoo heen kala , ɓe ndokkaama duwaaw , ɓe tottaa njettordi .
Ɗo ɓe peccitta jeereende ndee ɗo tan , ɓe cooyni ndiwri ene weeya e nokku he .
Ɗo ɓe ɓoorii ɗoo , gooto fof yiyi cakkal ngal sakki ngal , ko hono ngaal heddiiɓe ɓee ne njogii , ɓe paami ko ɓe jibinannde leydi ngootiri , ɓe potaani haɓde , ɓe kaayti haɓde .
Ɗoo
Ɗoo , COP firti Batu terɗe jeyaaɗe he nanondiral .
Ɗoo , en ngondaani e kuulal Seŋngoor ngal .

Ɗoo e ndeen denndaangal kaɓirɗe maggal maa cowto , puɗɗoo gollaade .
Ɗoo e ndeen maa njirlotooka kaa ƴettu nate Mbaañ boowal Utopia Planita , woni boowal jaajngal gonngal to feccere rewo , ngam maantaade nokku ɗo njuurotooka kaa fotata juuroyaade , tawa ko nokku bertiiɗo mo heewaani kaaƴe .
Ɗoo e nder Liberwiil , to bannge golle peewtuɗe e baammuule teemedere ujunere ( 500 000 ) ina pirlitee hitaande kala .
Ɗoo e yontaaji garooji , so tawii en ngummanaaki waɗtude gannde men e defte , so mawɓe men seeɗa heddorinooɓe pinal men gaadanteewal nattii , hay gooto siftortaa hay heen huunde .
Ɗoo ene jari rippude seeɗa : mbele so tawii kuulal yejjitii , won e amdaare wona e juumre , ko fotnoo moƴƴinde binndól ɗemngal , enen winndooɓe ɗemngal ngal eɗen póti yowaade e ɗuum walla potɗen waɗde ko no Semmbéén Usmaan e Seek Anta mbaɗi nii ?
Ɗoo haŋkadi laaɓii Maali hootii .
Ɗoo he Kayahyɗi gese mawɗe mbaɗaama , ɗum woni PPG 1 e PPG 2 .
Ɗoo jooni yimɓe ɓee mbiyi ko kamɓe ɗiɗo njidi yumma e baaba .
Ɗoo jooni ɗo kaalɗen tan ko hol ko baawngal gootal waawi jogaade .
Ɗoo kadi ena wiyee wonde ko Karim addi caɗeele hakkunde makko e Gaajo .
Ɗoo kadi ko jaɓɓal kesal ɓe ngaddi , jaɓɓal debbo pullo giɗo na'i , pullo joom kosam !
Ɗoo kadi leƴƴi keeriiɗi koɗdaaɗi nootitiima heen no feewi , haa wiyaa ko lammba kaa nawi araaraay pijirlooji ɗii kala .
Ɗoo kam alaa caɗeele wayi tan ko naange ena werlo maa caafe ñalawma , aɗa yiya naange ngee .
Ɗoo ko Suudu Allah ko ngel ɗoo sukayel e baaba mum njogori mahde ndu , kadi Allah yeebotaako koreeji mum .
Ɗoo ko dingiral Fulɓe ngal sosiraa ko haa njeewtiden e koye men .
Ɗoo ko yimɓe wuro maa sagataaɓe mum ndentata njaha raddo , ina nganniyii joftude ( ɓe mbaalataa ) .
Ɗoo les e dow pawii tan ko e gonka neɗɗo .
Ɗoo ne kadi , golle NASA njuumtaani .
Ɗoo ne kadi , ko fenaande mawnde .
Ɗoo ne kadi , mbele haa hannde , en ngonaani e yeeso holsere ɗo goobuuji nay ( ɓaleewe , raneewe , oole e woɗeewe ) ɗi nagge waawi jogaade renndinaa e mum , hono kadi no Aamadu Hampaate Bah sifortoo holsere ndurmbeliire nii ?
Ɗoo ne kadi , o sooynaani jikke , sibu nde o yalti kasoo tan , ko ndeen hare o huccani : Ñalnde 26 feebariyee 1990 , o wiyi yimɓe makko " mberlo-ɗee fetelaaji mon , paakaaji mon e silameeje mon e jammbe mon e geec " .
Ɗoo ne kadi , wejo ngoo refti tan ko e sawaawo sahaa oo .
Ɗoo ne kadi awokaaji ɗii njaab-njaabtorii ɗoo .
Ɗoo ne kadi won ko 2STV waɗi heen .
Ɗoo ne ko no mbiiɗen dów seeɗa nii tan : jaŋnginoowo celluka ene waawi taƴande almuɓɓe mum , kono so yawtii ɗuum , taƴgól soklaani .

Ɗoo noon , ndokkaten yeru ko e gawu ndiyam
Ɗoo noon , ndokkaten yeru ko e gawu ndiyam .
Ɗoo noon , njaɓanee kam yettude ngaal pellital cagotinngal ngal Hooreejo Siidi ɓiyi Seek Abdallaahi ƴettunoo .
Ɗoo noon fatere ndee ko raneere , nde tawnoo " caafe naange ɗee ine caasi no feewi " , e wiyde Nasa .
Ɗoo noon heɓɓotoo ɗiin cereeli laseer ko antenaaji
Ɗoo noon ina jojji kolliten wonde emin njogii geɗe keewɗe ɗe min luurdi .
Ɗoo pesooɗe nane e dów oo céérndii en e guumu-gaamalde nde njogornoɗen dañde sinno en mbinndiriino nii , e ɗoftaade kuulal ɗowngal binndól pulaar , wooroo so ene wooroo ɓuri .
Ɗoo tan ina yonatnoo anndude Kagame winndaani oo ɓataake , hay so tawii noon loowdi ndii ina nanndi e njuɓɓundi , ko nde haalata koo ko huunde yaawnde naatde ɓerɗe yimɓe .

Ɗoon e ɗoon kamɓe fof ɓe

Ɗoon jayndiyanke gooto

Ɗoon o maayi ñalnde 4 Suliyee 1944 .
Ɗoon o nanngiri seese junngo makko ñaamo ngoo , junngo am nano ngoo , o wiyi : " Muhammed Lamiin , geɗal ɓurngal himmude potngal waggineede ko ngootaagu ɓesngu Muritani kam e dental kinɗe mum kala .
Ɗoon o toƴƴa daande omo jata dawaaɗi ɗii .
Ɗoon so a sahanaama maa yuus .
Ɗoon tan gacce nanngi nooro .
Ɗoon tan haa yimɓe cooynii gorko nayeejo mo waysaani , ena ara , ena tuggii salamburu , ena weelnii satalla e kurus .
Ɗoon tan hakkille am fayi e baaba .
Ɗoon tan laamu Senegaal suuɗi warngo ngoo .
Ɗoon tan neɗɗo oo gidda ɓama joofordu mum nirka ñuuñu haa wonta ndiyam .
Ɗoon tan o ɓadini mi kuɗol e ɗerewol min puɗɗii .
Ɗoon tann o anndi ko haɗi Jaawel naande noddaango ngoo .
Ɗoon waktu oo tawi en , ɓe totti en 1 000 tumbitere ɗe njoɓno-ɗen coodgu mum .
Ɗoon won ko ɓe ngitti , won ko ɓe ngoppi ɗoon .
Ɗoon woni posto makko golle gadano haa 6 duujal 1971 .
Ɗoon woni suɓngooji Meeriiji e jooɗantooɓe ɓesnguuji ɗii to suudu sarɗiyeeji .
Ɗoon woni toɓɓannde lappol ngol ɓurnde mawnude .
Ɗoon yimɓe ɓee fof kollii jaɓre mum'en , gulaali ena njaaboo , " waawaa wonde " !
Ɗoon ɓernde am boni haa gite am mbeddii gonɗi .
Ɗoon ɗo Sud Quotidien yiyri Mawɗo leydi ndii no dognoowo laana ndiwoowo ka anndaaka ɗo joofoyta .
Ɗoon ɗo daaliiji e joomannduuji ɓooyɗi limtaaɗi korminoo pinal e ɗemngal mo woni kala , nguu laamu hannde dartorii ko hiiɓde pine e ñoƴƴude ndee heewandere ronaande .
Ɗoon ɗo kaalis waawi soodde nguura .
Ɗoon ɗo njooɗoto-ɗaa
Ɗoon ɗo silsil dimɗingol leyɗe fuɗɗii , añam-nguraagu laawɗinaangu , ndonaangu he miijooji koloñaal Orop , ine jokki to Afrik worgo .
Ɗoon ɗo ɗemngal ina jokki winndeede , ngaal ɗemngal majjataa , yoolotaako , leñol mum e pine mum mumtotaako .
Ɗowgu nguu waɗi ko jaybaaji 27 ; kañji kala ena wayi hono ɗi ndokkaa ko terɗe muumaa Aziz semmbinnooɓe-mo nde o ɗaɓɓata jappeere ndee .
Ɗowi nde ko Ceerno Aliiw Bah , jeyaaɗo to Hoore Foonde .
Ɗowi nde ko gollotooɗo ɗoon e jaaynirde ndee ina wiyee Ibraahiima Kebe jeyaaɗo to Nguy .
Ɗowngu laamu laatii tiisngu , ngu yiylata ɗum heerto Maalde Demokaraasi Filñitere Ɓesngu Ecopia ( FDRPE : Front démocratique révolutionnaire du peuple éthiopien ) .
Ɗum
Ɗum , e banngal am ko jaŋfa sabu o jeyaa ko e daraninooɓe pulaar .
Ɗum , ko ko yaltunoo koo tan .
Ɗum Haɗaani miɗi liggondira e Ambassade Almaañ e GIZ , E duɗal am Kaiserslautern ko abbitii e reende Sato .
Ɗum addani Almaañ heɓtude ko heewi e Orop e Afrik hirnange e Riisi .
Ɗum addani huunde e yimɓe goongɗinde ko wiyetee wonde " Abdel Asiis ko jiɗɗo heɓtude leegal Sokojim ngal mbele ina yeewta ɗum , ɓayri e laamu makko , huunde fof waɗtii yeeyeede , gila e karte dentitee , haa e paaspooruuji haa e geɗe goɗɗe , tee ɓesngu nguu uurnaaki nii ɗo oon kaalis naatnetee " .
Ɗum addani mo jeytoreede e terɗe ballitɗe njan’gu Muusaa Tarawore e hitaande 1991 .
Ɗum addani wuro ngo wiyeede " Fanay Galle Allah " .
Ɗum addani yoga e maɓɓe eggude ngabbitii e nokkuuji ɗo Kurde en koɗi e nder Iraak .
Ɗum addani yoga e sukaaɓe ɓaleeɓe jom en seedanteeje jaŋde ronkunooɓe
Ɗum addanii diiwaan oo waasde dunli keewɗi , haa ɗum waɗi sukaaɓe nokku oo ƴetti feere ngam aawde leɗɗe e nokkuuji peƴƴaaɗi ɗii tawa wonaa e ballal laamu .
Ɗum addanta ɓe naamnaade mo : " hol ko saabii sahaa e sahaa kala , Eli ina welee duppude suudu men , hono Muritani ?
Ɗum addunoo eɗen njarlitii jannginde e janngude e duɗe he .
Ɗum bettaani hay gooto sabu eɓe njaɓnoo gollaade .
Ɗum dey ko buleete .
Ɗum dey ko goo jiɗaaɗo .
Ɗum dey ɓuri wiyeede " aadee heddoraa ko duuɓi 100 fat !
Ɗum e hoore mum bonaani .
Ɗum ena luurdi e hohooɓe Orop heewɓe arde e Afrik ena mbiya demokaraasii wonaa ko men , en ciwaa tawo ɓenndande ɗum .
Ɗum ena teeŋti kadi e haakunde Afrik e leyɗeele Orop .
Ɗum ena toowondiri e 7500 dolaar mo Dowlaaji Dennduɗi Amerik perantoo suka kala e hitaande .
Ɗum ena waawnoo falaade won e sukaaɓe wiyde ena kaɓa .
Ɗum ena yiyetenoo gila e mawɓe men adinooɓe .
Ɗum ene feeña e hormaade ko renndaa , reende ɗum , haɗde ɗum bonneede e feewnitde ɗum so bonnaama ;
Ɗum ene holla kadi majjere ɓeen wallitooɓe e wiyde ko Farayse waɗi fof .
Ɗum ene hollira goongɗugol konngol biyngol " Ko ndiyam woni nguurndam " .
Ɗum ene jeyaa e ko addani min faayde .
Ɗum ene jeyaa e ko saabotoo haa won e kabaruuji kulɓina walla njibina sunu e nder ɓerɗe .
Ɗum eɓe luurondiri seeɗa
Ɗum faaɗii sabu heddii tan ko balɗe sappo e nayi ɗoo e kawgel ngel fuɗɗaade .
Ɗum feeñiri ko wolde hakkunde Ukereen e Riisi .
Ɗum filti yani e huɗo , woni e sumde .
Ɗum firtaani wonde joomum won golle maantinɗe gollanii leydi ndii , firti tan ko yo joomum faam ko sehil .
Ɗum firtata ko tagoodi tagtatoondi .
Ɗum firtata ko won gaañiiɓe heen .
Ɗum firtata so tawii ko goonga nde tagaa ɗum nde , mbay-ɗen ko no jawdi nii .
Ɗum firti e ganndal nganndi ko limtooje ɗee ɗiɗi tan kuutortee ngam wostondirde e ngaanndi humpito : limtoore ( 1 ) e limtoore ( 0 ) .
Ɗum firti hannde ko suno e kulol ena heewi e leydi ndii sabu alaa guurɗo meeɗɗo tawtoreede hono ndee boomaare .
Ɗum firti jogori kewde ɗoon ko geɗe ɗe meeɗaaka yiyeede , hay e nder sariya hakkunde leyɗeele , sibu ɗe ngotoyta ko dowlaaji ɗi nokkuuji mum en kujjiti sabu ƴergol ndiyam , nattuɗi jogaade njoorndi .
Ɗum firti ko " kulol eggii tuddunde mum " .
Ɗum firti ko , ɓee almuɓɓe naatooɓe hitaande tataɓere jaŋde lesre he oktoobar 2024 e oktoobar 2025 , maa njokku jaŋde mum en he no woori jooni nii , fotnde ñifoyde he hitaande 2028 .
Ɗum firti ko Google jogori jiimde kala ko faati e karalleeji kese ɗee ( Android wonande alluwon , Chrome wonande peerorɗe , Google Search wonande jiylorɗe ( e nder 100 njiylawu kala , fotde 65 ko kanko kuutortoo ) , e kuutorɗe goɗɗe ) ) tee jogori sukkude e mum ko Apple e fawaade e ko haralleeɓe heewɓe kaali .
Ɗum firti ko Maruk foti ko yaltude leydi Saharaa , hokkita saharaanaaɓe ndimaagu mum'en .
Ɗum firti ko hitaande wootere e dow tagofeere Satuurna , maa fot e duuɓi men 29 njuuteeki .
Ɗum firti ko jaaltaaɓe ɓuri jiidude ko e ngabu , hay so tawii ina bonna falo makko .
Ɗum firti ko jamaa dariima e nder wuro ngoo gila e hitaande 1569 , duuɓi capanɗe jeenay ko adii garal tuubaak e Ndar e hitaande 1659 .
Ɗum firti ko jaŋde hiisa foti ummoraade ko geɗe goodɗe feewde e ko hakkilinaa .
Ɗum firti ko kala e waktu , e ndi doga 106 200 km .
Ɗum firti ko kala heen bannge walla tergal ŋakkungal , lekki ki wuurdataa no foti wuurdude , saka ki daña ko ki foti dañde .
Ɗum firti ko kala nde dañaa toon balɗe 2 , enen ndañaten gaay , e dow leydi , ko ñalawma gooto .
Ɗum firti ko kala nde o yiɗi ittude gooto e mum en , o yaltintu demisiyoŋ siññinnoo oo , o waɗa heen ñalngu ngu o welaa .
Ɗum firti ko kankadi , woytoraandu alaa !
Ɗum firti ko laana kaa so ronkaama yo ka yah , maa ɓe nganndu
Ɗum firti ko leeɓol giiɗal e coomgal ngal e kuurngal ngal fof so ndenndii , tekkeendi mum en ɗeɓata yerondirde ko e tekkeendi leeɓol sukundu .
Ɗum firti ko leñol ngol ena hatojini e sagataaɓe yarlitiiɓe .
Ɗum firti ko loowdi jimɗi maɓɓe yo ɓur abbitaade e soklaaji renndo ngo e leñol ngol e kuuɓal , Yeru , hono no " rappeer en mbaɗata nii " .
Ɗum firti ko naange ngee e ngena ɗoo , kono tawde caafe ɗee ko e laawol goni ena ndoga njettaaki gite men , mbiyaten ko nge fuɗaani , tawa noon ko nge fuɗnge .
Ɗum firti ko nde huccitnaa ko e naange fuɗoowe , nde ruŋtinaa naange mutoowe .
Ɗum firti ko ngalɗoo taabal wonaa kecce .
Ɗum firti ko no petroŋ waanoo heewde faayiida he winndere hee nii , ko noon Keɓal ( Data ) wayi heewde faayiida hannde , walla nii Keɓal ɓurtiima petroŋ , ɓurtiima kaŋŋe heewde nafoore to bannge faggudu .
Ɗum firti ko nokku o hoɗetaake .
Ɗum firti ko nyalawma e dow hoodere jaayre ɓuri juutde e hitaande e dow mum .
Ɗum firti ko rawaandu nduu yoɗaani .
Ɗum firti ko sinno toon ena waɗnoo yimɓe , so cukalel jibinaama toon , so dañii hitaande e dow tagofeere nde , giƴiiko mo o jibdinaa gaa e dow tagofeere men Leydi nde , tawat naywii haa dañii duuɓi 84 .

Ɗum firti ko wuro ngoo jeyaama hankati e ngaluuji winndere .

Ɗum fof , e wiyde maɓɓe , ko yiɗde daɗndude warɓe koye .
Ɗum fof e waade noon , Dey wul Siidi Baaba wattini ko tawtoyde Horma wul Baabana to Maruk .

Ɗum fof eɗen nganndi kabaruuji ɗii ngananooka .
Ɗum fof fawii ko e yowitaare hakkunde nokku e nokku ɗi njiidaa ɓetanɗe .
Ɗum fof fawii ko yowitaare hakkunde nokku e nokku ɗi njiidaa ɓetanɗe .
Ɗum fof fawii tan ko e neɗɗo oo , e no woniri .
Ɗum fof haɗaani , ɓernde makko , e hakkille makko omo waɗti ɗum e golle kam e darnde fedde nde .
Ɗum fof he waade noon , eɗen njaakorii hankadi maa en pooɗtu heen binndanɗe moƴƴe , ballooje leydi ndii ɓamtude jaŋde mum .
Ɗum fof hollitta tan ko LUMUMBA ko gollanii Konngo e ko heerii , e Afirik ko huuɓtidini , majjataa maayataa !
Ɗum fof joofoyi ko Muritani hortaade , siifondiri e Polisario maa yaltu leydi ndii , Maruk meerotonooɗo Muritani e hoore mum ( taaniraaɓe laamɗo jooni oo mbiyatnoo ko tinaani leydi ina heedi hakkunde mum en e Senegaal ) , pawi junngo mum en e geɗal Muritani heɓnoo ngal .
Ɗum fof ko SDL ena hokka wune ɓee worɓe tiiɗniiɓe e golle mayre .

Ɗum fof ko semmbe leñol ngol , doole baawɗe huwtoreede he won fiyakuuji .
Ɗum fof ko soɓde tan naatni mi heen .
Ɗum fof noon holliri tan ko hay ko sariya oo yamiri koo jeyaa e nafooje gure daande maayo ɗee , halfinaaɓe tabitino ngoo kormaaki ɗum , ɓe ngardini tan ko nafooje yimɓe heeriiɓe ɓe ɓe mbammbi , hay nafoore laamu wonaa ngoƴa maɓɓe .
Ɗum fof noon ko mbele aɓe lomtinanee haa timma , e nder nuunɗal .
Ɗum fof noon mawɗo leydi ndii jaɓii ɗuum haa addani goomu toppitiingu heblo kaaldigal ngal fuɗɗaade sakkude peeje no ɗum fof tabitiniraa .
Ɗum fof so huutoronooma no haanirta nii , maa ustanatno en baasal , ustana en yowitaare ko faati e nguura , ƴellita leydi ndii .
Ɗum fof woaɗi noon ko sikkude doole mbaawi goonga !
Ɗum fof yiyaama .

Ɗum haaɗaani tan ndeke e ŋakkeende pellital politik .
Ɗum hawri kadi e ɓennugol sariya kuccam jaŋde .

Ɗum hawri ko he darnde tiiɗnde sagataaɓe leñol ngol , tawi won heen ko jannguɓe ɗemɗe goɗɗe , won heen njanngi tan ko Pulaar .
Ɗum haɗaani hare jokkude .

Ɗum ina addana en wiyde miijo ardunoongo e waame demokarasi gonaaɗo jooni e kitaale 90 nde laaminooɗo Farayse e oon sahaa , hono Faransuwa Miteraa wiyiino e yeewtere nde waɗdunoo e tiimaale mum ( leyɗeele hirnaange Afrik ) to wuro La Baule " ko fayi arde , kala leydi ndi tabitinaani demokaraasi e nder mum liggonndirtaa e laamu Farayse " kono caggal ɗuum , laamu Farayse holliri tan ko demakaraasi danndoowo nafooje mum ina wondi heen , kono kala demokaraasi luulndiino nafooje leydi Farayse , ɓe ngondaani e mum .

Ɗum ina siftina nde yimɓe
Ɗum ittaa ko he ɗemngal Gereknaaɓe ɓooyngal ( gilaa ko adii-daartol ) biyeteengal Koine , ɗemngal denndangal , ummingal e ɗemɗe wertaango Gereknaaɓe fof e oon mudda .
Ɗum jibinanii en , hay so seeɗa , " annama demokarasii " mo nguur-ɗen hannde oo .
Ɗum jibini njangu makko he 2014 .
Ɗum jiidaa e dummbugol , lepte nder kasooji ( yeru to Abuu Garayb ) e warngooji to Abuu Felluja , Najaf e Tal Afaar .
Ɗum jiidaa e goomu wiɗto cosaangu ngam yuurnitaade tolno bonannde nde .
Ɗum jiidaa e kaɓirɗe jahdooje heen , sibu , gila ɓamtu-ɗen golle e hitaande 2006 , ko kaɓirɗe keeriiɗe kuutorto-ɗen , ko e lewru feebariyee ɓennundu nduu tan , Fooyre Ɓamtaare soodani hoore mum ordinateer caggal nde heɓi huunde e kasdi Mattel

Ɗum jiidaa e raddo tumarankooɓe e caɗeele mbinnditagol to Orop e haala iiñcuru politik ndu alaa haddu , e haala kareeli leydi haa e warngooji kulɓiniiɗi , bone ɗe hay gooto meeɗaa yiyde so warngo Pennda Sog e sukaaɓe to Attaar

Ɗum joli ko caggal nde ɓe loski warngo ngo .

Ɗum noon , Siin werliima ɓeeynirka inniraaka Chang’e-4 , ñalnde aljumaa 7 desaambar 2018 , ka juuriima toon ñalnde alkamiisa 3 saawiyee 2019 , w2-h26 subaka .

Ɗum noon , daawal paangal fotata wonde ko momtude haa laaɓa kala añam-nguraagu " .
Ɗum noon , duuɓi 45 jooni , oo sosiyatee petroŋ biyeteeɗo ExxonMobil laaɓaa baɗte kuutoragol kuɓɓam ɓarakke , hono kala kuɓɓam keewɗam ƴulɓere ( carbone ) ummoriiɗam e ñolbugol kulle maayɗe ( yimɓe , jawdi , koowooje , puɗi ekn ) , gubbiiɗe nder leydi ko ina wona duuɓi miliyoŋaaji keewɗi , haa hedde 650 miliyoŋ .
Ɗum noon , e miijo amen , heen mbaadi bonannde fof ina jogii ñaawirɗe keeraniiɗe ɗum , sabu aadee ko aadee tan , sariya addaani ɓurondiral hakkunde maɓɓe .
Ɗum noon , e ngol teeɗanii jeytoreede e nguurndam ngenndi men , e tolnooji hee kala , ɗoon ɗo ngol jeyaa e dariiɓe ngam waɗtude Muritani nokku jam e deeƴre e koɗdigal renndo moƴƴal ngal ngenndiyankooɓe ɓee kala koyɗata .
Ɗum noon , eɗen mberloo naamnal , holi no neɗɗo heɓirta COVID-19 haa wontana mo ñawu becce , no ɗum hemɓirta jofe e terɗe ɓanndu keddiiɗe ɗee ?
Ɗum noon , eɗen poti teskaade gootol kala e leƴƴi leydi men , tesko-ɗen ɗi kañji kala , potnden ɗi , e nder mahngo ngenndi ndii .
Ɗum noon , goomu nguu , heen bannge , ina sokli semmbineede to bannge ɓesngu nguu ; to bannge goɗɗo oo , maa ngu wallit pelle pine darinooɗe gila hanki e hecci hanki ɗee , ngam ƴellitde ɗemɗe ɗee .
Ɗum noon , habru mawɓe ɗeen gure fof , kam e hoɗɓe heen ɓee fof , wonde Guferneer Ndar ( kalfinaaɗo Ndar ) fawii ɓe kubbal gayi teemedde jeetati ( 800 ) joɓeteeɗi jooni jooni , etee ko alaa e sago ɗum yoɓee .
Ɗum noon , henndu ndimaagu wontii hannde mobbooru laamɓe .
Ɗum noon , janngo , wonaa hooreeɓe leyɗe njogori yamirde potɗo haalde walla mo fotaani haalde , jogori yamiroyde ɗuum ko sosiyateeji baaɗi no Google , no Facebook , no Twitter ekn , ko ɗii laylayti renndo ɗi nganndu-ɗen ɗii fof , ko kañji mbaɗtata rokkude yimɓe ndimaagu haalde walla waasde haalde , hay hoohooɓe politik ( en njiyii ɗum hakkunde Twitter e Donald Trump ) , sibu ñalnde kala yimɓe ine ɓeydoo heewde he ɗii laylayti renndo ɗii , kadi heɗotooɓe ko haaletee he ɗii laylayti renndo ine ɓeydoo heewde ñalnde kala .
Ɗum noon , ko caggal nde ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo saabii majjugol ciiri kullon , caggal nde ngol ɓeydi feto geecuuji , e caaygol galaas gulli leydi Wayi tan ko no wiyde wonde ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ina wulna koye
Ɗum noon , ko idii fof : suɓaade e yuɓɓinde Mooɓondiral Mahtagol Muritani ngal ; toɗɗaade e hirjinde dente jonaaɗe potɗe tawtoreede ɗee ; hawrude e doosɗe ɗowirɗe golle mbele pooɗondire baawɗe feeñde heen kala , ina kaaɗa e juuɗe , haa yimɓe mbaawa yettinde ndee faandaare teddunde , daartiyankoore , so nanondirde e geɗe mawɗe potɗe yeewteteeɗe ɗee .
Ɗum noon , ko kuulel asamaan ngel nganndu-ɗaa , Alla e mum ñisde , Alla e ɓakdi mum tiɗɗaade , caasal ɓaaƴo mum ina waawi haɗde kala ko woni e mum ɓoccitaade , gila e ɓakdi haa e caafe , ko ɗe mbaawi wonde fof , yo won caafe jiyotooɗe ɗee ( annoore ) , walla caafe yiite-sulɗeeje ( bempeƴƴe rajo ekn ) .
Ɗum noon , ko kuulel asamaan ngel nganndu-ɗaa , Alla e mum ñisde , Alla e ɓakdi mum tiɗɗaade , caasal ɓaaƴo mum ina waawi haɗde kala ko woni e mum ɓoccitaade , gila e ɓakdi haa e caafe , ko ɗe mbaawi wonde fof , yo won caafe jiyotooɗe ɗee ( annoore ) , walla caafe yiite-sulɗeeje ( onndooji rajo ekn ) .
Ɗum noon , ko mo Joomiraaɗo moƴƴani heewi wa’de noon .

Ɗum noon , naattingol Karabak nder Aserbayijaan ko caɗeele , sibu teskaaki keewal leƴƴi no feewi .
Ɗum noon , ngoon ñiso so woodii , hay lewño waawaa ummaade e mum , alaa ko haali ɓakdi , ɗum noon wonata ko huunde nde yiyotaako ( e gite e kaɓirɗe fof ) .
Ɗum noon , oɗon poti faamde mettere e fitina Muritaninaaɓe , sibu laamu potnoongu wallude ɗum en huccitande caɗeele tumarankaagu , ko nguun laamu leptata ɓe , kamɓe fof e heɓaade haaldeede .
Ɗum noon , peeje limlimtinɗi ine ngoodi ngam faccirde wonde mbaliigaaji ngonka weeyo ɗii ine coomi kataaji mawɗi wonande kisal e deeƴre winndere ndee .
Ɗum noon , so ardiiɓe leydi ndii mbaɗtaani hakkille e nafooje ɓesngu , ma a taw , ñalawma maa ar , CPI toppitoo geɗe ɗee .
Ɗum noon , so ngonka weeyo wayliima tan hay so ko seeɗa , walla so toɓo ustiima seeɗa maa ɓeydiima seeɗa , ine waawi bonnude ɗum .

Ɗum so waɗaama heen ko huunde waɗnde faayiida sanne sabu ko ko ɓeydata no feewi leñol ngol .

Ɗum usti doole Muusaa Moolo mo Fuladu .
Ɗum waawi ummoraade tan ko e laamu mbemjungu , njiñiingu e caɗeele , ina wumbiloo no gumɗo nii .
Ɗum waawi waylireede tan ko e ɗaɓɓaande tottiraaɗo leydi ndii feewde e tottunooɗo leydi ndi oo ; Ko oon , caggal nde yuurnitii doosiyee oo waawi ñaawde so tawii baylugol kuutoragol leydi ndi ina jojji , kadi o toɗɗoo sarɗiiji ɗo ɗum fawotoo .

Ɗum wayi e leñol fof ko no jelde wayi e jawdi nii .
