Ɗum wayrii waɗde gila 1937 .
Ɗum waɗani mo caɗeele sanne , ngam o woowaani ɗuum .
Ɗum waɗi , joom binndi en mbiyi , so tawii en njettiima e neɗɗaagal ko mbiyaten neɗɗo ko , so en keɓii toon , walla so tawii en njettaaki toon , walla so tawii en njawtii toon , ɗoon woni ko wiyetee " thèse Darwin " .
Ɗum waɗi , keewgol pelle pinal ɗe , hay dara bonnataa .
Ɗum waɗi e gannde , kamɓe annduɓe meeɗen , miñiraaɗo o heddiima to cañoowo dow to , mawniraaɗo o jippiima ina yara .
Ɗum waɗi fulɓe men , enenne ga , hirsude dammuwol wayi ko no warde hoyre mum nii .
Ɗum waɗi goomuuji ɗiɗi feeñde e kesɗitingol ardorde fedde ndee e hitaande 1948 , tawi won heen ko " jogorɓe wontoyde muritaninaaɓe " , wattinɓe yaltude fedde ndee , cosi fedde woɗnde wiyeteende " Entente Mauritanienne " ( Nanondiral Muritani ) .
Ɗum waɗi hettere heddiinde nde , tiitoraa ko " Naamndiiɗo jaabaa " .
Ɗum waɗi keddora ɗen tan ko haala kaalaaka .
Ɗum waɗi ko waktuuji seeɗa caggal nde maayde Laasana Kontee noosaa .
Ɗum waɗi ko ñalnde njeslaare 6 seeɗto ( alarba 6 abiril ) 2022 , ñaawooɓe njoɗii he ñaawoore lebbi jeegopm , gila yarkomaa 2021 haa seeɗto 2022 .
Ɗum waɗi maa mi rokke jeenaari .
Ɗum waɗi mo kaawis kono o wasiyii koreeji makko kala , yoo corto haa laaɓa e geɗe neɗɗo .
Ɗum waɗi nde hoore pelle kaɓotooɗe heege , paabotooɗe yimɓe e nder ngonkaaji keñoraaɗi , he nder winndere ndee .
Ɗum waɗi o yejjiti hoore makko .
Ɗum waɗi ñalnde fof ndu ɓeydotoo ko yahde fuɗnaange .
Ɗum waɗnoo ko Arisonaa to Amerik , ko ɗum waɗi wonii jooni hedde duuɓi 5 000 e ko fawi .
Ɗum waɗnoo ko he diiwaan leydi Tuunus hannde ndii .
Ɗum waɗnoo ko ñalnde 13 ut 2014 to Sewul ( Koree worgo ) , e tawtoreede ko ina abboo e 5 000 neɗɗo .
Ɗum waɗnoo ko ñalnde 2 settaamburu 1890 , e nder wuro Haayre Laaw , ender leegal Barooɓe , tawi toɓo ina toɓa .
Ɗum weeɓanii mo , so joopaade hoɓɓe leydi , wonaa kay etaade ñawndude saɗɗa ɓesngu , sompa mbaylaandi ittoori Tunusnaaɓe he heege e ɗomka , naatna ɗum en demokarasi .
Ɗum weli Aadama , kadi ɗum haawi ɗum en , ngam eɓe nganndi ɗo ɓe ngoni ɗoo , neɗɗo alaa ɗoon so wonaa maleyka mo geno neli , ndeke ɓe njaggiri Ibliis ko gooto e maleykaaji geno tedduɗo ɗii .
Ɗum wona .
Ɗum wonaa ko nawata-en yeeso .
Ɗum wonanii kam fartaŋŋe duwanaade ɓesngu oo suka biyeteeɗo Lamin Manngaan , bardaaɗo kure doole kisal leydi ndii to Magaama , mi wiya kadi yo Alla rokku gaañiiɓe ɓee e leeptaaɓe ɓee jam e cellal , haa arti noon e suka biyeteeɗo Baccili , ganntirɗo hannde to opitaal Nuwaasoot .
Ɗum wonanii ɓesngu nguu poolgu mawngu sabu , e hakkillaaji maɓɓe , jeyi leydi ko jeyi denndaaɗo oo tan ( woni jeyi leƴƴi maa galleeji ) .
Ɗum woni " les pulsions interieurs " , ko mbiyaten ɓernde .
Ɗum woni " nature naturé " , hol ko ɗum firtata ?
Ɗum woni fotndude jeyegol mum e Magreb rewrude e Dental Magreb Arab , yantude e senngo Arab rewrude e Dental Aarabeeɓe ( Ligue Arabe ) e jeyegol mum e diiwaan Afrik Hirnaange oo , woni CEDEAO kam e Afrik , rewrude e Dental Afrik .
Ɗum woni giɗli ngonndiigu hakkunde debbo e gorko .
Ɗum woni hitaande men .
Ɗum woni kaawis no feewi .
Ɗum woni ko to simoore " Mariyam " .
Ɗum woni ko to simoore neɗɗaŋke , kaawise1 .
Ɗum woni konngol am gadanol nde naat-mi e saal oo .
Ɗum woni miijo ko ɓuri heewde e haalɓe heen ɓee .
Ɗum woni no mawɗo sunta oo jaɓɓorii kuugal neldugol " doole " to Maali e Gine Bisaawo ngal fedde leyɗeele ndee ɓami e batu mum'en to Abijaa , Kodduwaar .
Ɗum woni wootaneede mbele ardoo " meeri " walla naatoya suudu sarɗiiji .
Ɗum woni yimɓe gure ɗeeɗoo : Wul Jiddu Fulaaɓe , Lubeyre Barinaaɓe e Lubeyra Ifraa , tee , ɓe ndonkii ruttaade e gure maɓɓe sibu woɗɓe ina koɗi heen , ɓe ndoŋkii heɓtude leyɗeele maɓɓe , ɓe mbaawaa hay asde ɓulli e nokku ɗo ɓe tawnoo jiknaaɓe maɓɓe , ɓeen tawnoo jiknaaɓe mum en Ko ɗumɗoo yammini ɓerɗe heddiiɓe ɓee .
Ɗum woni ɓaaƴo mum en
Ɗum wonii sabu dartingol orngal suɓungooji sarɗinkooɓe waɗayɗi ñannde 25 nduu lewru ɗoo .
Ɗum wonnoo ko huunde moƴƴere !
Ɗum wontani min jimol .
Ɗum wontata ko ñalawma gooto to tagofeere Meerkuur , tuggi tan subaka haa subaka arta , walla kikiiɗe haa kikiiɗe arta , maa abbo hedde lebbi men ɗiɗi .
Ɗum wonti kisa reedu leliindu .
Ɗum yahdi ko e ballal ɓe ngaddani Idiriis Debi Itno .
Ɗum yani ko nder horde debbo ɓaleejo reedu oo tawi ina yerwotonoo lacciri .
Ɗum yumtaani ngati ko wayi no Léopold Sédar Senghor njaɓaani rewde e makko .
Ɗum yuumti e wasre laamu to bannge politik ( C ) , wasre nde dente loraaɗe ɗee cifortoo rasisma dowla walla warhoore aadeejo , walla warhoore leñol , fawaade e no juɓɓule winndereeje cifortoo ɗum .
Ɗum ɓeydi kulol Njamenaaɓe .
Ɗum ɓuri heewde ko e ngatam , sabu ngatam ko e kulle conngooje ƴeŋŋina jeyaa .
Ɗum ɓuri noddude ko ɓernde , walla neɗɗaagu .
Ɗum ɓuri teeŋtude fof ko wonande sukaaɓe jibinanooɓe Senegaal .
Ɗum ɓurnoo teeŋtude ko he yonta Meles Zenawi , laatinooɗo Gardiiɗo Jaagorɗe gila 1995 haa maayde mum he 2012 .
Ɗum ɗo ina foti waɗeede , ɗum ɗo fotaani waɗeede .
Ɗum ɗo ko mbaylaagu , so on nanii mbaylaagu ko waylude , woni waylude noon ko ittude huunde ko hiiɗɗi mbattaa nɗum ko hesɗi .
Ɗum ɗo ko pinal hakkille yaltini ɗum .
Ɗum ɗo won ganndal kadi suuɗii toon .
Ɗum ɗoo fof ko haalooɓe ɓe kaaliri noon kono ɗemngal ngal e hoyre mum haaliraaki noon .
Ɗum ɗoo fof ko sabu ko en ñukkindaaɓe , kala ko njahaten ine anndaa , yo won he nder ordinateeruuji men , nder telefoŋaaji men , kala nde nguddit-ɗaa jaaɓnirgal ( whatsApp walla ko nanndi heen ) ine anndaa .
Ɗum ɗoo fof mi haalaniino ma kono ngardinɗaa yiɗde maa .
Ɗum ɗoo fof waɗaa ko e kawral maɓɓe e warñeende maɓɓe ɗo hay ballal gootal yantaani heen .
Ɗum ɗoon addanii yoga e elewaaji jaŋde hakkundeere [ iv ] ruttaade to duɗe njanngatnoo to Senegaal .
Ɗum ɗoon fof ko loskooji mbaawata feññinde ɗum e balɗe payaaɗe .
Ɗum ɗoon noon firti ko dañal feccere e Afriknaaɓe wuurɓe he worgo Saharaa ɓee maa famɗit no feewi .
Ɗum ɗoon noon firti ko kala jogiiɗo jeyi keeriiɗo keɓaaɗo e yonta sariya 60 139 , hay so liggaaka e oon sahaa , kono " tawa batte golle jiytiniiɗe ina tawaa heen " oon jeyi ina heɓtinaa .
Ɗum ɗoon noon ina foti yahdude e juɓɓitingol goomuuji gardiiɗi binnditagol ngol e nder leydi hee kala , mbele leñol kala ina jeyee e goomuuji hee kala .
Ɗum ɗoon noon ine waawi juutde , ine waawi raɓɓiɗde , fawii tan ko he cellal joomum .
Ɗum ɗoon noon ko huunde haaɓniinde e gonduɗo heen o , sibu joom mum ɗo woni fof ko leppuɗo coofe maa kuudi , sibu coofe , walla jaañte ngonata ko e siiwaade , tawa nii joom mum tinaani .
Ɗum ɗoon noon o huccinaani ɗum tan e haɓatnooɓe e Apartaayd , konngol ngol ina joopii kadi kareeli ndernderi hakkunde ANC e Inkata mo Gatsaa Butelesi .
Ɗum ɗoon noon waɗanii mo caɗeele sanne .
Ɗum ɗoon rewrata ko calagol ɗeen leyɗe jeyanooɗe he Riisi ceegoo ndi , ceerta e mayri .
Ɗum-ɗoo fof noon , Ceerno Bacca Bah renndindin ɗum o tonngi ɗum ko he fiɓnde wooteere , ɗuum woni wiyde ko ɗemngal woni daabaa pinal .
Ɗummɗoon noon ko sabu no mahraaa nii .
Ɗumɗoo dee ko yeru kollitoowo fiɓnde tiiɗnde , e golle laatiiɗo .
Ɗumɗoo fof ko tawa en kaalaani " kurjutu " mo ɓe neldata e leyɗe men ( ballal haralleeɓe ngal wonaa Alla meho ) .
Ɗumɗoo ina addana cukalel waawde teskaade e waɗtude hakkille e woɗɓe , waasa tan ƴeewde hoore mum , ekkoo faamande woɗɓe , faamde caɗeele mum en , mbelemma mum en e mette mum en , ekkoo " yejjitde hoore mum " e waɗtude hakkille e woɗɓe walla , e raɓɓiɗinaade mbiyen " haɓde e hooram-hooramaagu " .
Ɗumɗoo ina holliti wonde , no laamu nguu wayi e ɓaleeɓe nii , wonaa noon wayi e safalɓe , sibu , duuɓi ɗiɗi ko adii ɗuum , sariya mumtuɗo macungaagu oo ina yamiri huunde haawniinde , so lomtinande halfunooɓe yimɓe .
Ɗumɗoo ine addani kinɗe keddiiɗe ɗee waɗtude hakkille e kala ko cubalaagu jogii walla ummanii .
Ɗumɗoo ine yerondiri e ko haala koo , so en ƴeewii ciiri kullon majjukon kon e ciiri kullon ndaɗkon kon .
Ɗumɗoo kadi jeyaa ko e kaawisaaji yimɓe
Ɗumɗoo kadi ko nii timmiri e Aadama e sakkitinoore Alla ko kañum woni guurɗo guurnoowo ƴiye .
Ɗumɗoo kam ena weeɓi faamde .
Ɗumɗoo ko bannge njulaagu oo tan .
Ɗumɗoo ko fartaŋŋe mawɗo .
Ɗumɗoo ko hadiis kawraaɗo .
Ɗumɗoo ko huunde teeŋtunde ngam haɗde bone waɗtude e haɓde e majjere , e jejji e kutuya .
Ɗumɗoo ko huunde teskinnde no feewi to bannge ɓeydagol darnde rewɓe e jiilgol fiyakuuji renndo .
Ɗumɗoo ko huunde woƴnde , fotnde ñawndeede
Ɗumɗoo ko mbele ina gaddoo laaɓal e jaamburaagal teskotoongal aadaaji to bannge jeyuuji leydi keeriiɗi , tawa kadi , e fawaade e sariya Lislaam , fiɓnde wiynde wonde " jeyi leydi ko guurnoowo ɗum " ina tabitinee .
Ɗumɗoo ko njeñtudi wiɗto saaktaango he nder jaaynde Science ñalnde alarba 11 jolal ( saawiyee ) 2023 .
Ɗumɗoo ko to deftere Ɓuraana ndee .
Ɗumɗoo miijaaka e nanondiral Ndakaaru , tee ɗooftaaka ɗooyene .
Ɗumɗoo noon , e wiyde parti biyeteeɗo UNAD , " siftinta en ko hafeere Senusi , tee ina ñiiɓna e nder aadaaji laamu nguu , dahgol yimɓe ngam juloraade ɗum en " .
Ɗumɗoo noon ko gacce mawɗe wonande laamu Muritani , sibu ɗuum firti ko ngu waɗatnoo e duuɓi cakkitiiɗi ɗii kala , fuɗɗiima feeñande aduna oo , ko tooñanngeeji : gila e nanngal senaateer wul Ghadda , haa e tooñannge feewde e jaaynooɓe e hoohooɓe senndikaa .
Ɗumɗoo noon ko gila e Nuwaasoot haa e nder gure goɗɗe leydi ndii .
Ɗumɗoo noon ko huunde faaynoore , sibu ɗum firti ko hankadi ko yeeso tan fayi , sabu ɓeydagol he weeyo hee gaasuuji dammbooji nguleeki ( gaz à effet de serre ) .
Ɗumɗoo noon maa newnu kuutoragol laylayti baaɗi no Facebook , Twitter , Viber , Messenger , iChat , e goɗɗi keewɗi ɗo won ɓeen haalooɓe Fulfulde walla Pulaar ngalaano geɗal no feewi .
Ɗumɗoo noon so sakkanaaka feere yuumtata ko e geɗe ɗe moƴƴaani .
Ɗumɗoo woni seede gadano goodaangal " gawuuji ɓaleeji " .
Ɗumɗoon eɓɓaa ko e tuugnorgal biyeteengal Artemis .
Ɗumɗoon fof so renndinaama , eɗen mbaawi wiyde hannde wonde njangu Amerik e leydi Irak , saabiima maayde , walla ganyii walla dognii ko ina wona joyaɓal yimɓe leydi ndi .
Ɗumɗoon ko ngam teddinde " golle ɗe o gollii e nder ɗii duuɓi noogaas cakkitiiɗi ngam ƴellitde tippudi cellal ( loowtugol ƴiiƴam , hare sooynaɓooji wiriseeji , VIH/SIDA e IST ( Piɗe Daaɓrooje Njogoram ) kam e golle njiylawu jahdooje heen " .
Ɗumɗoon noon ( ngool laynugol ganndal ) yahraani bannge gooto tan , rewo faade worgo tan , hono won ɗeen jiyle bannginteeje gostondire pinal e nder senegaal-muritani oo njiɗi hollitirde ɗum nii .
Ɗumɗoon noon , helmere " suukara " ndee wayi tan ko no " oto " , " tele " , " telefoŋ " ekn , kelme ɗe nganndu-ɗaa njoopii ko geɗe gaddaaɗe e men , walla kelme ganndal e karallaagal gontuɗe ngalu ngu wiinndere ndee kala renndi .
Ɗumɗoon noon ardata ko e telefoŋaaji kesi , jahdooji heen .
Ɗumɗoon noon firti ko ɓiɗɓe leydi ndii potndaaka " .
Ɗumɗoon noon haɗaani ɓeydagol ɗawre e joñgol dente renndo keewɗe , haa teeŋti e sukaaɓe , ɓe yoga e mum en ko ɗawaaɓe kuutoragol ɗemɗe mum en ɗe muuyni he nder jaŋde ekkol .
Ɗumɗoon noon ina addana leyɗe winndere keddiiɗe ɗee ɓeydaade yowitaade .

Ɗumɗoon noon ko huunde softinoore " .
Ɗumɗoon noon ko maa niiwnorɗe men ( Hubble walla James Web ) gonɗe he weeyo ɗee ɓeta ɗum .
Ɗumɗoon noon ko wonande hitaande , woni 12 tonngoode .
Ɗumɗoon noon maa bonnu coñal nguura he nder winndere ndee kala .
Ɗumɗoon noon waɗi ko callalal , kullon fof nguuri ko e ngoɗkon kon , hankadi woni e reɓde , haa yettii kullon nguurnokon teewu , nguura fof natti dañeede Woodii noon kullon ndaɗkon heen , sibu so wonaano ɗuum , hay huunde woodataano jooni to bannge nguurndam .
Ɗumɗoon rewata tan ko e safrude bonanndeeji jojjanɗe Aadee , tawi ko cafrugol nuunɗungol , timmungol , ñiiɓngol .
Ɗumɗoon waanoo ko no njeenaari nii ngam mawninde duuɓi 300 nanondiral Pereislaf baɗtunungal Riisi e Ikren leydi ngootiri .
Ɗun ko Bola Tinubu , Atiku Abubakar , e Peter Obi .
Ɗun ko saa’i nde ɓee hoɓɓe hewtunoo .
Ɗuum
Ɗuum , e nan-nanti goɗɗi , ndewi haa Manndelaa seeri mo e hitaande 1996 ( tawi welaaka ) .
Ɗuum , ko tuggude e hitaande 1964 fayde e 1978 .
Ɗuum , ko wolde hakkunde leyɗe ɗiɗi , Armeni e Azerbayijaan , luural ngal faamaaka no feewi , sibu facciraaka no moƴƴi .
Ɗuum Souleymane Faye góóŋɗinii ɗum sabu ko faati e éé , o wii ko waɗetaake pesooɗe ɗiɗ , yoo haaɗe e wootere : " avec l’accent porté sur la première lettre seulement [ ée ] pour des raisons d’économie graphique " , h .
Ɗuum addani Yiilirde Ngenndiire FƁPM waɗde he tuugnorgl mum njilluuji .
Ɗuum addani en yiylaade binndanɗe jowitiiɗe he makko .
Ɗuum addani mo darjeende haa Dowlaaji Dentuɗi ( UN ) piili mo lefol Nobel .
Ɗuum addani neɗɗo politik gooto wiyde " kamɓe fof ɓe takkaama penaale , inɗe maɓɓe mbonnaama , penaale e takke ɗe meeɗaa yiyeede e leydi hee , gila e raddo fenaande laamu wul Taaya raddatnoo Flam en e kitaale 80-90 .
Ɗuum addani ɓe waawde ɓosde ngam yettaade geec ( bannge hirnaange worgo ) ɗo ɓe ekkii ñaamde kullon diƴƴe .
Ɗuum addanta toppitiiɓe jaaynde ndee waawde muulde heen ko heewi , mbele so booñ oo yencinii , omo waawa naftoreede e eɓɓaale keewɗe jogaaɗe , ko wayi no mahgol Galle Pulaar e ko nanndi e ɗuum ;
Ɗuum addi jillondiral mawngal hakkunde fulɓe e jolfuɓe haa teeŋti noon e diiwanuuji Laaw , Dimat e Tooro .
Ɗuum alaa ko bonnata hay dara .
Ɗuum anndiraa ko ƴeewgol koode e gaasuuji gonɗi he nehaande jiiryiire ɗee .
Ɗuum battini no feewi e sato ngoo e nguurndam aadee en waɗtuɓe uujde feewde worgo , haa teeŋti noon feewde saraaji maayo Niiseer ( nder Mali hannde oo ) .
Ɗuum e geɗe goɗɗe ( bayɗe no ballal tuubakooɓe Farayse , maccuɓe e Baadoolo en nootitinooɓe e makko ) , ngaddani Hasan en foolde seernaaɓe .
Ɗuum ena
Ɗuum ena jeyaa e ko rokki ɓe fartaŋŋe mo gure keewɗe ngalaa .
Ɗuum ena jeyanoo e sababuuji daɗɗugol kewu nguu .
Ɗuum ene addana kala Senegaalnaajo teskaade wonnde Fuuta ko hettere he nder wertaango Senegaal , ndeke noon ko nokku jarɗo wattude hakkille .
Ɗuum ene jeyaa e ko addani min , minen Durmamnaaɓe , faamde won ko aaɓnotaako .
Ɗuum ene jeyaa e ko nattini cayɗe waɗeede he nderCiloñ saanga juulde .
Ɗuum ene jeyaa e ko saabii haa won e pelle men ƴefti pellital renndinde sukaaɓe , ngam anndinde ɗumen huunde seeɗa e karallagal jaayndiyankaagal .
Ɗuum fawii ko he geɗe newnooje yahdu to Mars nduu : ko he oo sahaa " Naange , e Leydi , e Mbaañ ndeggondiriri niiyene " .
Ɗuum feeñi ko e ciimtol ngonka hakkeeji aadee e winndere ndee , caaktangol e lewru mars 2018 .
Ɗuum feññinta saraaji huunde ndee .
Ɗuum firti , caggal nde arabeere wonti ɗemngal lawakeewal , ngal dañii jojjannde wontude gollorngal e janngirngal he duɗe leydi ndi .
Ɗuum firti , hayso tawii sappo e joy tergal peŋngal heen sappo e nay nanondirii he dow huunde ngootiri e joyɗii ene waawi salaade , haɗa ɗum ɓennude .
Ɗuum firti , ko kala ɗo o toɓɓi , o fiyat
Ɗuum firti , ko nde o rewi yeeso nguun goomu ndee , o jaɓaani yaafnaade .
Ɗuum firti , soɓe
Ɗuum firti , sukaaɓe ɓee ene poti janngineede ɗemɗe mum en neeniweeje kadi so ɓe poti janngude ganndal tawa ko ɗemɗe maɓɓe ɓe janngirta .
Ɗuum firti , yo neɗɗo salo konnguɗi ñidduɗi , baɗe nefniiɗi wona e mum ngati ko ɗeen geɗe ɓuri waawde teskeede e nguurndam aadee .
Ɗuum firti ko
Ɗuum firti ko so Fulɓe ngoɗɗondirii he koɗanɗe seeɗa tan ene kulandira .
Ɗuum firti ko wuro ngoo kala ina pellitani jokkondiral ngal .
Ɗuum firti o tawii ko ɓuri ko o woppi koo , ɗum noon , ɓe o tawi ɓee ɓuri mo .
Ɗuum firti tuggude gila he duɗe tokoose , hakkundeeje , haa e jaaɓi-haaɗtirde janngirde Arabeere wontata koko waɗɗii .
Ɗuum fof addi ɗum ko haala fooftere ( alateret )
Ɗuum fof dee ittataa , sukaaɓe ɓee fof , ɗo njibinaa ɗoo , nganndaa nii hay goobu guri ɓalli mum en .
Ɗuum fof e waade noon , YNG ndee etiima sakkude peeje ngam gollaade .
Ɗuum fof e waade noon , en potaani sikkude ko Farayse tan " yiilata nafooje " Mali , hono no wakliyankooɓe ɓuuɓri ceeraani e reftoraade nii .
Ɗuum fof e wayde noon , seernaaɓe Fuuta , njahraani caggal .
Ɗuum fof e woodde addanaani ngonka kaa waylaade .
Ɗuum fof ko e dow faandaare wiyde , neɗɗo kala asko e faayiida mo mbaaw-ɗaa jogaade , gollu .
Ɗuum fof ko haa neɗɗo hulaa .
Ɗuum fof ko koyɗi muumo tan .
Ɗuum fof ko mbele aɓe mbaawa " ardinde ballondiral dow daɗndu walla ɓuraa-ɓuraa " .
Ɗuum fof ko ngam haa piye maɓɓe tolnondira e sokla yahɓe alateret ɓee , nde tawnoo fooftere mum en ɓeydiima juutde sibu jooni ɓe ɓuri waawde juutde balɗe .
Ɗuum fof noon heen sahaaji ene jillondira e ko ummorii to Joomiraaɗo ko haa yimɓe ɓee ina mbaawi ronkude seerndude hakkunde ko yimɓe ɓee njeyani koye mum en e ko ummi to Joomirraɗo ko .
Ɗuum fof noon ko jaŋde nde oon waawi janngude toon .
Ɗuum fof noon ko nawlum yumma makko oo fawi mo ɗum .
Ɗuum haawi oon no feewi .
Ɗuum haaɓnii mo e nder ɓernde makko ko tagi Jibril jippaade e makko ngam hollude mo no o waɗata haa o seerta e ndee woondoore .
Ɗuum haaɗaani tan e tutaade leɗɗe leɗɗe .
Ɗuum haysinno ko e ñalɗi pinal Ciloñ walla Njum ene foti won’de , ko hono noon ne kadi so tawii ñalɗi ɗii mbaɗi ko Doori walla Jiboo he nder Burkina Faso .
Ɗuum haŋkadi jonde alaa , fooftere woodaani .
Ɗuum haɗaani , sukaaɓe ɓee , kaɓaama haa nawii ray , e nder nguleeki , e nder njaangol e dow tampere " , e wiyde Ceerno Aliw Bah , hooreejo USE , garnooɗo tawtoreede oo kikiiɗe .
Ɗuum haɗaani Kaaba , nokku ɓittatnooɗo yimɓe e sahaa kala , haa teeŋti e koorka e aljumaaji , wiiɗnude .
Ɗuum haɗaani NASA habrude ñalnde 7 marse ( mbooy ) wonde " ine reeni haayre weeyo hesere nde hulanaaka no feewi buɓɓaade Leydi e hitaande 2046 " .
Ɗuum haɗaani ndi suɓeede yo jaɓɓo kawngel ngel , Ostaraali , e Japon , e Koree Word , e Dental dowlaaji Amerik ngoppaa Ɗuum addii haala mawka nde Sep Blatter gardinooɗo njuɓɓudi ɗowndi Fuku Bal he Winndere ndee ( FIFA ) habri ɗum , hono cuɓagol Kataar .
Ɗuum haɗaani ɓe haggude e daawal goomuuji .
Ɗuum haɗi mo hofde junngo ngoo .
Ɗuum heewii haala e nder dingiral dawrugol no feewi , feññinii jiyanɗe ceertuɗe wonande fanniyankooɓe to bannge sariyaaji .
Ɗuum hesɗitinii ñigaali laamɓe oksidaa , fayde he laamu Putin , mo he biyɗe maɓɓe , seeraani he ɓittude lunndiyankooɓe mum wallani torlude ɗum en .
Ɗuum hina holla leñi ko ko lomlomtondirta tan e ɗowgol e gardagol winndere ndee .
Ɗuum hollii en so koɗo jippinii hono mum ; oon jaasaani .
Ɗuum hollitii wonde won yimɓe toowɓe e laamu nguu moddi e warngooji hee .
Ɗuum ina jeyaa e ko addani parti nazi en ( parti Adolf Hitler ) heɓde laamu rewrude e laawol demokaraasi e hitaande 1933 .
Ɗuum ina jeyaa e ko ɓuri telɓinde ƴellitaare ndema e nder leydi hee , yanti heen ko kuutorɗe gaadanteeje haa jooni kuutortee .
Ɗuum ina jeyaa hannde e caɗeele artiranooɓe nguuri , so ronkude heɓtude jeyuuji mum en , mbele ndaña no guurdi .
Ɗuum ina yahdatnoo e rokkude kala mo o huccondiri ndeereeru , cuusal e hoolaare .

Ɗuum jibinanii yimɓe Oropnaaɓe ndimaagu hesu e wellitaare hakkille ; rokkiɓe lewlewal gaddanngal ɓe waawde yiyrude aduna oo he mbaydi hesiri .
Ɗuum jibini faaɗeende mawnde e nder diiwaan hee , haa teeŋti e wuro Kahayɗi ngoo .
Ɗuum jibini ko ɗo o juutɗo teppiiɗo ( óó ) walla e juutɗo teppiiɗo ( éé ) potnoo wonde fóf , lomtii ɗoon ko óo e ée .
Ɗuum jibinii kadi baylogol e hakkillaaji maɓɓe he tonngude hoore mum tan he miijooji donaaɗi ko aldaa e ñaawtoraade ɗum hakkillantaagal e luggiɗinaade he miijo .

Ɗuum jiidaa e jibinannde nokku oo wonnoonde e ladde tawi artiraani ɗum so wonaa kewu nguu .
Ɗuum jiidaa kadi e leydi fof ngarndi , arda ko sormaat mum e jelogal mum .
Ɗuum kadi haralleeɓe men e haralleeɓe maɓɓe ngolliima heen , ɓooyataa siifee e weleede Alla .

Ɗuum ko aayaare , aayaare fulɓe
Ɗuum ko caggal nde horeejo e leydi oo e hoore mum haali hono ɗuum e " jokkondiral mum e ɓesngu to Attaar " caggal ɗuum e nder jaayɗe goɗɗe .

Ƴah ) .
Ƴamgol am lefol sarɗiyanke ngol ko ɗum malal wonande Farayse , " o wiy tuma nde o hucciti e jaayndiyankooɓe .
Ƴeew kadi Genesis ( 16 : 16 )
Ƴeew ko neɗɗo mahata koo e ko fewjata ko no wayi ɓurde ɗum doole .
Ƴeew ngel kullel no foti famɗude nii , ina maha ndee huunde no wayi mawnude e mum nii .
Ƴeew oo mo firtaani hay huunde ko addi ko !
Ƴeewaa batte mum bonɗe wonande sooninkooɓe wonɓe caggal leydi , haa arti noon to Farayse , ɗo ɓe ɓuri heewde ɗoo , ɗo ɓesngu mum en waawi heɓde ngenndaagu Farayse , sibu ko toon jibinaa , kono ina keddii e wonde muritaninaaɓe e haɓɓaade e muritanaagal mum en haa tiiɗi to bannge renndo e pinal e faggudu .
Ƴeewaa leydi Siin jogii ko miliyaar gooto e teemedde 4 miliyoŋ neɗɗo .
Ƴeewaa noon , Lewru ko yowitiinde Leydi tan ( yowitii , taarotoo ko Leydi ) , tawi noon Mars ( Mbaañ ) kañum ko tagofeere yowitiinde e Naange .
Ƴeewaa noon , hakkunde 1877 e 1977 , fotde miliyoŋaaji jeetati e feccere tumbitere ndeen deftere njeeyaama heen nder leydi Farayse , ɗum firti ko miliyoŋaaji potɗi noon cukalel njannginaama ndeen deftere nder ekkolaaji Farayse , loowaama miijo ko kañum en ɓuri heddiiɓe ɓee .
Ƴeewaa noon , paabi kaɓirɗe nikleyeer ɓurɗe mawnude gonɗe to Amerik e Riisi , ina mbaɗi , heen wooturu kala , fotde 7 000 murtoonde nikleyeer ; en kaalaani ko woni to Siin , to Farayse , Angalteer , Israayiil , Pakistaan , Inndo , Koree rewo
Ƴeewaa noon , yimɓe ina mbaawnoo huutoraade ƴellitaare maɓɓe e njuɓɓudi ɗeen leyɗe ngam newnude golle ɗee .
Ƴeewaa noon hay dara seerndaani bonannde wonnde Irak nde e wonnde Sudaan nde .
Ƴeewaa noon won lappol nelanoo Mali ( Kayes ) e maɓɓe , e lewru ut 2007 , tee ɓeen kabriino ɓe yiɗde laamu nguu artirde ɓe .

ɗo " Dingiral Pinal JAAJE Kamara " .
ɗo e duuɓi sappo paaɗi maa Wamelink e gollidiiɓe mum eto heblude yuɓɓo timmungo mbela ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe ina keɓoo e dow Mars .
ɗo hiirde weli he dow garbuus , aɗa fawi telbuus aɗa fali kaabuus , ndifto ɗaa ngu , ngu waɗa guus .
ɗoon so a sahanaama maa yuus .
ɗum fof ko gaasuuji ceertuɗi fiyaaku , ceertuɗi uurgol walla luuɓgol , walla lammugol , baawɗi baneede e nder henndu ndu poofaten ndu : ko uuri , ko luuɓi , ko uuraani luuɓaani , ko banotaako .
ɗum fof ko geɗe ceertuɗe baawɗe won’de e nder henndu duñooru ndu .
ɗum ko lekki kaaloowi .
ɗum woni gaas .
ɗum woni wiyde " ko en nganndiyankooɓe , yiɗɓe koye men , teddini ɗemngal men , pasnii pinal men " .
ɗuum de ina tuli hakkille , sabu gasataa won'de ko enen tan ngoni ƴoƴɓe , weemtuɓe e ngal boowal ngal alaa ɗo haaɗi .
ɗuum ina heewi tampere kadi hoolnaaki hay dara .
ɗuum ko maayde yaawnde .
ɗuum noon enen fo ngonɗem ko e yirlaade , so gooto e men waawiino ɓoccitaade Leydi tiima ndi , so tawii ko dow peccol ( équateur ) maa leɗɗe , gure , e kala ko woni e dow mayri wirto mbo e njaaweeki 465 meeteer e ndeer majaango ( 465m/s ) .
ɗuum noon ina fotnoo ƴeeweede ko adii naatdiigu .
ɗuum riiwtii konngol wiinooɓe wonde balwaltirɗe ɗe ko ɓooyɗe no feewi , sabu won sikkunooɓe ɗe peeñi ko gila tagofeere nde ina heddotorii kammu tedduɗo deelnoowo ndiyam .
ɗuum waɗii jeddi keewɗi .

" So en teskiima he ngaal kuulal cakkitiingal , ɗemngal Arab ngal , gaagaa wonde ɗum ɗemngal ngenndiyeewal , martaba maggal kadi ɓeydiima sabu ngal wontii ɗemngal lawakeewal hono no ɗemngal Farayse ni .
" So en tuugniima e ko yeewtaa he ndeen fedde udditaniinde ɓiyɓe falnde ndee kala , rewɓe mum e worɓe mum en , maa fedde ndee gollo ko wonaa tan e tabitinde jikkuuji , neɗɗaagal entereeji falnde ndee , kono kadi maa nde gollano ɓamtaare e ƴellitaare diiwal ngal kala .
" So sukaaɓe ngadoriima tawo jannginireede he nder ɗemngal ngal kaalata , paamata no moƴƴi , ko ndeen ɓe ɓurata faamde , ko ndeen ɓe ɓurata yaawde anndude ɗemɗe goɗɗe , ko ndeen ɓe ɓurata ɓooyde he nder jaŋde , ko ndeen jaŋde maɓɓe ndee ɓurata yahdude e pinal maɓɓe e ngonka nder nokku maɓɓe " .

" Wonde Ceerno Ɓuri Weeɓde e Wonde Almuudo "
" Wuddere ɓaleere " ko kuulel asamaan , no Leydi men ndii nii , no koode ɗee nii , ko nokku weeyo ɗo hay huunde waawaa ɓoccitaade , wonaa ɓakdi , wonaa hay annoore .
" Wuddere ɓaleere " walla mbiyen " gawu ɓaleewu " ko kullel asamaan , no Leydi men ndii nii , no koode ɗee nii , ko nokku weeyo ɗo hay huunde waawaa ɓoccitaade , wonaa ɓakdi , wonaa hay annoore .
" Wuddere ɓaleere " walla mbiyen " gawu ɓaleewu " ko kuulel asamaan , no Leydi men ndii nii , no Koode nii , ko nokku weeyo ɗo hay huunde waawaa ɓoccitaade , wonaa ɓakdi , wonaa hay annoore .

" Ɗemɗe ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof maa naatne , ƴellitee , ɓamtee he denndaangal tolnooji jaŋde ndee , gila he nder janngirɗe laamu haa e janngirɗe keeriiɗe fof , ɗe naatnee he nder tippudi jaŋde e heblo , no ɗemɗe jokkondiral e no ɗemɗe janngirɗe nii wonande heen ɗemngal neeniwal kala , e dow ɗaɓɓaande heen ɗemngal kala .
" Ɗiin haaluuji njibinii mettere no feewi he nder ɓaleeri Afrik , kadi yimɓe heewɓe kuccinii e hooreejo leydi o pelooji e ñiŋooje sabu waasde yooɗnude kaan haala .

ANO PULAAGU .
ASB wirni , soko maayaani , tawde ina woppi golle daarteteeɗe e binndanɗe ɗe njejjitaake " Buddaha wul Buseyri , Yaseer Arafaat , Mahmuud Bah ( Kodda Jaariyel ) , Meduun Lo " e goɗɗe ɗe en limtaani , Fondation Habib wul Mahfuud nanndo makko ( yo yurmeende Alla won e makko ) , yarlitiima tonngude huunde e golle makko ɓurɗe maantinde he nder deftere .

ATT a jaaraama .
AUF ( Agence Universitaire de la Francophonie ) worɓe semmbuɓe e darnde
AVOMM : A jaaraama Hooreejo .
AVOMM : E hitaande 2005 , oɗon njeyanoo e pottital Dakaar denndinngal luutndere jogitiinde luutndiinde laamu Taayaa , e dow teddungal Hooreejo leydi Senegaal , M .
AVOMM : Hatanteeɓe IRA haa teeŋti e hooreejo mumen Biraam ɓiyi Abeydi nana ndummbaa e nder kasoo sabu maɓɓe fawde junngo e njiyaagu laabtungu , holi ko Tawasul haalata heen ?
AVOMM : Heewɓe ina keewi naamnde ko feewti e lannda Tawasul wonde ɗum lannda Islaamiyankeewa .
AVOMM : Holi darnde nde lannda mon darii ngam loggitde jiiɓru hakkunde keewal ( fedde laamiinde ) e ɓamdugol luutndere demokaraasiire ?
AVOMM : Holi jotondire mon e laamu Hooreejo Muhammed ɓiyi Aziz ?
AVOMM : Holi yiyannde nde ndokkaton ngonka 20 000 mooliiɗo moritaninaajo to Senegaal , wuurɓe haa hannde e caɗeele mawɗe baasal leydi e baasal ɗereeji jeyeede e leydi kam e mooliiɓe to Mali fadndiiɓe haa jooni ?
AVOMM : Konngol maa e filñitere ɓesnguure to Tunisii e to Ejipti ?
AVOMM : Moriyani mawninii ñalawma 28 jolal 2010 , Maanditaare 50ɓiire jeytaare mum .
AVOMM : On njaltinii ko ɓooyaani koo ko yowitii e caɗeele macungaagu , mbele ɗum jaɓɓaama no haaniri wonannde ɓe ɗuum toɗɗii ɓee kam dente luutndiiɗe-macungaagu .
AVOMM : Seedaama e ko sakkitii koo dille konuyankooje ngam falaade diɗɗe jogitiiɗe jokkondirɗe e Aqmi .
AVOMM : Teemedde konunkooɓe e siwil en mbaraama e tataaji konunkooɓe e nder Moritani e kitaale 90 , AVOMM kam e lanndaaji dawrugol haa pelle jojjanɗe aadee ina naamndii yo battamboniiɓe ɗiin warngooji ɗi ngaldaa e ñaawoore yoo njagge , ñaawee .
AYN : Caggal ballal Geno , kala ko faayodini ko njiy-ɗaa ɗoo e nder wuro Fonndu ko ɓiɓɓe fonndunaaɓe , wonɓe ɗoo e yaltuɓe , ɓe kaalno-ɗen to dow too , mbaɗi .
AYN : En mbaawaa limtidde ɓe kamɓe fof sabu keewal maɓɓe kono maa en njaŋto ɗoo heen huunde ko wayi no Kalifa Ceerno Ibraahiima Ceerno Aamadu Bookar e ceerno Aamadu Tijjaani Bah ɓe Hoore Foonde e miñiraaɓe mumen e Ceerno Mammadu Ceerno Aamadu Neere Bah mo Kayhayɗi e biyeteeɗo ceerno Aamadu Sammba Gañaaɗo gummoriiɗo to Mbuur Senegaal .
AYN : En mbaawaa ɓetde ngalu kuutoraangu e ñalawma hannde oo sabu ena waɗi ko naati heen haa heewi ko tonnganooka , kono tan ɗo njahraten ɗoo e oo ɗoo sahaa to bannge mbaraangu 37 ngaari e ngelooba kirsaama , kirsanaama kewu nguu ko jiidaa e fotde 30 hirsuɓe e nder galleeji mumen , ɓe njowitaaki e baraaɗi kewu nguu .
AYN : Fonndu ena yetta Alla sabu noddiino banndiraaɓe mum , banndiraaɓe mum nootiima ɗum , nootoriima ɗum keewal e peewal .
AYN : Ko mawɗum , eɗen njetta heen Geno no feewi .
AYN : Mahdi jumaa oo roondiima teemedere e go’o miliyoŋ e teemedde ɗiɗi e sappo e tati ujunere e teemedde jeenay e capanɗe joy mbuuɗu e ceede Muritani ( 101 213 950 MRO ) .
AYN : To bannge hoɗdiiɓe renndaaɓe nguurndam , ena gasa wooda ko ummorii toon kono to bannge laamu kam , en cikkaani .
AYN : To bannge jagge laamu , alaa keddiiɗo e diiwaan hee walla e saraaji mum mo tawtoraaka kewu nguu , gila noon e goforneer Barakna ( waalii Barakna ) , goforneer Gorgol , goforneer Saydu Sal , gummoriiɗo to Aksuus , Caam Aamadu Tijjaani gardiiɗo Eteer , Aamadu Hammadi Kan ganndiraaɗo Pelee , gummoriiɗo to Ligisayba , gardiiɗo ko fayti nehngo dariindi e nder diiwaan Gorgol .
AYN : haade kay wonaa luural daɗɗii kadi kattanɗe ngalu e soklaaji aduna ngantinaani , kala ko yimɓe mbaawi darnude e nokku mumen ko Suudu Alla ɓuri , kadi foti ardaade .
Aaaludere nde ina waɗi ɓernde njamndi ɓaleeri njoorndi ngulndi , ko kayri moofti e ndeer luggiɗeeki leydi , ko ɓernde jaggi kala ko woni e dow leydi , sabu ko kayre woni aawdi saayaande pooɗal ( champs magnétique ) leydi , so wonaano ndeen saayaande alaa ko ñiiɓatno e dow mayri , hay henndu ko ɓuri hoyde ko eggatno leydi !
Aada ko hol duum
Aadama ( JKM ) , wiyi Jibriil " miin kay , mi yiyii mo hanki jamma e nder koyɗol .
Aadama Daawuuda Bah
Aadee anndaa ko moƴƴi e mum , anndaa ko boni e mum , aandi tan ko ko yiɗi , ɗuum ndeke , so o ñaagiima Alla huunde , yo o ɗaccu e juuɗe Alla e muuyaande mum .
Aadee en idiiɓe ɓee nguurii e oo nokku coñtuɗo ko ina wona duuɓi 70 000 hade mum en wiyde ina uuja feewde fuɗnaange-rewo duuɓi 130 000 jooni , caggal ɗuum feewde worgo ko ina wona duuɓi 110 000 jooni .
Aadee en meeɗaa wuurdude e dinosooruuji sibu aadee en peeñi ko dumunna juutɗo caggal ɗuum ( hoore aadee ɓurnde ɓooyde yiytaande , inniraande Tumee ( Toumai ) duuɓi mum ko miliyoŋaaji joy hitaande fat ) .
Aadee en wonnooɓe e nokku oo e sahaa idii daartol puɗɗii jogaade koɗorde ñiiɓɗe ko nde puɗɗii waɗtude remde e nehde jawdi ndee , ɗum firti ko ñiiɓgol koɗorɗe ardi ko e jiytugol ndema e ngaynaaka .
Aadee hoto ɓitte e mette yo o itte .
Aadee ko ko nattata woodde e winndere he .
Aadi rokkaa caggal nde yimɓe njuuli calmini ngarti : ko konngol bismaango hoyreejo fedde ndee , timmini bismaango ngoo ko koolaaɗo kuuɓal fedde .
Aadondirɓe e binndi haa mbaɗdi piɓle .
Aahah kay !
Aali Ceerno Baro e ɓesngu mum
Aali Muttaar Bah
Aali Yero , kono nafaani .
Aali Yero Joob jibinaa ko hedde hitaande 1884 to sahre Fanay-Rewo , wiyaa kadi Fanay-Ñakwaar .
Aali Yero Joob ko ceernaajo baawɗo haala , teppitaaɗo ɗemngal .
Aali Yero Joob rewi ɗoon ko he pele Alhajji Maalik Sih ngam hesɗitinde njurum makko he juulɗo hono makko mo koloñaal tuubakiri waɗi he geƴƴelle .
Aali Yero holliti almuɓɓe mum hoto paay ko nanngaa koo .
Aali Yero waɗi nelaaɓe feewde he Dimatnaaɓe nde tawtata mo sabu ko o Mahdi garɗo ummitinde fetel diine .
Aali naamndii mbele ko hono noon ɓe mbaɗirta to diwatee ɗoo .
Aamadu , won’dude e duttorɗe binndaaɗe ; - Yaltinde defetere renndinoore jeewte ɗee
Aamadu DEH e Sala JOOP njaaraama e ndee winndannde .
Aamadu Dem tergal K .
Aamadu Janngii ekkol , o janngii Quraana
Aamadu Jool , wi’de ina haala golwole maa e renndo Fulɓe maa taw ko welde ɗemngal walla aandude e ho’re mum sabu Pulaar wi’i : " so tawii guppoowo aandii e ho’re mum tuuta e juuɗe " enen ne maa taw ko ɗum heɓtii en e oo ngal ɗo ɗanngal ngal artetaake .
Aamadu Jool a wirni kono a maayaani , sabu golle maa majjaaka e dinngiral Fulɓe , Pulaagu ne yejjittaa darnde ma puɗal e mutal .
Aamadu Jool jibinaa ko e hitaande 1961 to cuuɗi men Juude Jaaɓi e nder falnde Podoor ( resiyoŋ Seeliwi ) , baaba makko wiyetee ko Muusaa Jool , neene makko ko banndi mum debbo Lobbaat Faal , wiyetee ko Habii Miñel Faal jeyaaɗo to Cubalel Laawo .
Aamadu Jool ko hebliyanke ( kebloowo ) dowrowo e ɗemngal Pulaar to Galle ARED , Goomu Wbinndiyankooɓe Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije Senegaal , Fedde fannoriinde njanngu mawɓe e ɓamtaare duumiinde e doŋre Afrik .
Aamadu Jum , wejorde Pulaagu .

Aamiin !
Aamiin , seydi Dembele , Aan ne aɗa yarloo aɗa yaafoo , yoo Allah waɗ en yarlaaɓe yaafaaɓe .
Aamiin he duwawuuji di .
Aamiin seydi Bah teskuyaaji maaza ina cemmbina binndoowo ina veyda zum kiram ngamm yidde luggizinde wittooji mum e anyde sooynude yaakaare .
Aan Baaba Baydi , Baaba Debbo , Baaba Ayda Sammba Waddu , gooto e neene am -en ɓe korsinnoo-mi , njettor ɓeeɓataa fayde e maa aan e daraniiɓe lollinde nokku men Fuuta , pinal men Pulaagu e ɗemngal men pulaar .
Aan Joom am , mi hoɗnii huunde e geñgol am e [ ngol ] caaɗngol ngol alaa puɗe ( ndema ) , takko suudu ma hurmanteeru , mbele aan joom am , e ɓe ñiiɓa e njuulu ( kiilno dewal Allah ) .
Aan Ummul Kayri Deh , aɗana e nder oto o , aɗa jooɗii e jooɗorde feŋiinde e oto o ( " siis " ) aɗa hucciti yeeso aɗa hucciti keesi dognoowo oto o .
Aan a wonaa dimo !
Aan banam gorko , so neene maa yiiɗii puus dema haa luurdaa e jom suudu maa walla haa ceerton faam a fotaani jaɓannde ɗum ko way noon .
Aan banndam Danndu hoore maa ndanndo-raa heen leñol maa .
Aan banndam tinno e hoore maa tinnono-ɗaa heen leñol maa .
Aan banndam tinno suur hoore-maa cuuro-raa heen leñol maa .
Aan banndam wallu hoore maa ballo-raa heen leñol maa .
Aan banndam yiɗ hoore maa njiɗo-raa heen leñol maa .
Aan debbo jogiiɗo jom .
Aan kam Demmba hol no ɗum waawi heɓirde ma ?

Aan kay ko a feñaa .

Aaraabeeɓe ɗee uure e teppere !
Aarabeebe ina njaaɓnirna ɓaleeɓe Diine Lislaam .
Aarabeeɓe ; Nijeriya ( nigeria ) 50 millioŋ ; Siin ( Chine ) 53 millioŋ .
Aarabeeɓe ɓe ngalaa diine ngogɗinaani Geno .
Aañam Yeroyaaɓe e Mahmuud Soomaa Jah jeyaaɗo to Daara Halayɓe .
Ababakaar Barahim BA sukka moritaninaajo e Iisa Aamadu ANN ( Hanne ) lollirɗo Paate ANN , senegalnaajo , hertiyankooɓe , yarlitiiɓe , dillooɓe e fannu taariindi , ɓe aran ɗoo ɓe yewta en ko ɓe humpitii e ndee toɓɓere .
Abbaade ardiinooɓe en ɗuum dee so en njiɗii ko maa kawren e haala miijo e feeje fof nden nden .
Abdarahmaan Sih : Wiiɗnde Ñaawoore
Abdel Aziz ñiŋii dawrugol " heedi-heeda " toŋnguɗo ɓamtaare Muritani duuɓi e kitaale .
Abdel Wedduud wul Sheek e Usmaan Kan
Abdu BAh , keer
Abdu Caam ( Aali Caam )
Abdul AataaLeñol pulaar ina won'di e sunaare mawnde tuma nde Abdul Aata gawlo Seek sankii .
Abdul Aɗiiɗu , ooɗoo kapporal , biyoowo ko jeneraal , ooɗoo garduɗo e laamu doole , hay so o feenyaani e warngooji ɗi , omo kam jeyaa eɓe calanooki ɗum , sabu fotde duuɓi noogaas ko kanko reennoo Maawiya , ooɗoo gaddiiɗo ndeeɗoo bonan’de waɗaande e innde capataagal e innde safalɓe fof .
Abdul Bookar Aali Dunndu Segele , ganndiraaɗo Abdul Bookar Kan , ɓurɗo lollirde Abdul Bookar mo Daabiya , jibinaa ko e nder Boosoya , e wuro Daabiya , hedde 1830-1835 .
Abdul Bookar haɗii tuubakooɓe dañde sago mum en e nder Fuuta , e nguurndam makko .
Abdul Bookar nanii haala kaa ete ina anndi ko halfini Farba Jowol koo , ko maasaalahaa mum ( Farba Jowol ina jogii nih hattan halfineede ɗuum ) kono faandaare Abdul Bookar heen ko mbele ina fanndina Ngenaar kañum ne .
Abdul Bookar ne ko jaagorgal Fuuta .
Abdul Bookar salinoo tan ko almaameeɓe e seernaaɓe , e hoohooɓe Fuuta Tooro mballita tuubakooɓe heɓtude Fuuta , e diiwanuuji catiiɗi ɗum .
Abdul Bookar wiymo ko kaa haala yahata .
Abdul Bookara Aali Dunndu sukkii naatotaako

Abuubakiri Jaw lollirɗo Siree Jaw Ho’reejo Fedde Fuuta Catal Poor Jenti arata ɗo e kebungal ngal tawi ina heddii balɗe tati : " nde yahi haa ñalɗi ɗi nanondiraa Yiilirde Ngenndiire nde , nuldii kam ɓatakeeji potɗi sareede e banndiraaɓe fulɓe wonɓe ɗo e nder wuro Poor Jenti ngo , ɓatakeeji ɗi ina tolnoo e capanɗe tati ɓataake pawɗo , hannde noon e o ɗo kikiiɗe Alarba 28 lewru Morso 2010 miin e Mammadu Jallel e Saydu Saar maa min njetto kala potɗo heɓde ɓataake baɗlal , mbele maa ɓe mbaɗ heen juuɗe maɓɓe sabu ko fayaa ko wa’I ko hono wulaango jamma nii , neɗɗo go’to fotaani heen woppideede .

Acte à Libreville , le 20 juin 2023
Ada teddi , kono a nisaano Ada faami , kono a fanginaano Ada waawi , kono a wasoraano A suusnunu yimbe fof hoore maa haa be mbaawa battaade be yooga e gandal maa A feccatno e yimbe fof gandal maa tawa a fuunaani faamamuya hay gooto A waawruno fannuuji kala , gila e ganni men hanki , pine men hande , sooynam men jango .
Adan annduɓe paamaano ko ɗaŋre woni ɗoon , nde niiwnorgal holliɓe nde , ko yiɗɓe ganndal weeyo ngadi faamde ko ɗaŋre suuɗi e ko niiwnorgal ngal neldi ko , ina jeya e maɓɓe cukalel janngowel ina wiye Alton Spenser , ɓe kolliti juumre annduɓe weeyo ɓe , ɓe pammini ɓe tigi ko ɗaŋre nanndunde e ɗaŋre men woni ɗoon .
Addanii Fuuta wonde ndewna Tuubakkoɓe .
Addanimi .
Addata uujooji yimɓe ko geɗe tati ɓurɗe teeŋtude jotondirɗe e mbayliigu kilimaa : Ko adii fof ko geɗe ceɓɓitte , bayɗe no yoorooji walla ile , jogorɗe ɓeydaade heewde e yaajde maa doolnuude sabu ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo , kono kadi sabu ƴergol maaje ngol kaalno-ɗen ngol , kono kadi sabu garjugol leyɗe ndema Ɓeydogol uujooji ɗii kadi , hay heen gootol nanndaataa e goɗngol ngol , hono no anndiraa hannde nii , sibu ko ɓuri heewde e mum en kaaɗata hannde ko he keeri leydi ngootiri ɗo ɗi mbaɗata ɗoo .
Addata ñoofagol e nder keertingol leñol e felɓondirde ɗum e keddiiɗi ɗii , ko baasgol fotndude mbaadiiji leƴƴi cosɗi Muritani ɗii , mbaadiiji potɗi alɗondirde .
Addi Bah , lollirɗo Mammadu Haadi Bah , ko pullo Ginenaajo , jibinaaɗo to Pelli-Fulayaaɓe to Gine Konaakiri ñalnde 25 desaambar 1916 , cankiiɗo ñalnde 18 desaambar 1943 to Epinaal ( Farayse ) .
Addi ɗum kono dewgal amen yawti haa ɓooyti seeɗa , min njaadi njillu salminoyde mawnam gooto nde min njettii toon nde wonnoo oon ena heewi pucci no feewi .
Adii jolde e dingiral ngal ko sukaaɓe Fulɓe waɗooɓe Reggae ena ummii Ruwaa : Taaw Legnol mo Hamadi Hunaare e Yaayaa Caw mo ɓoki jawe .
Adii wonde joom-wuro Seleŋ ko gorko biyeteeɗo Buubu Cukkiri Giro .
Adii won’de laamorde ko Nukuma hade
Adotoo tinde batte ƴergol geecuuji fof ko dente duuɗe Pasifik ( archipels ) , haa arti noon e duuɗe Marshall , duuɗe Polinesi , Maldiif ( geec innjeejo ) e huunde e duuɗe diiwaan Asi ( Filipiin e Inndonoosi ) .
Aduna alaa ko woniri dumaade , jaɓi wuurnude , e hoɗnude kono jaɓaani saasnude .
Aduna e juutde koyngal , waasataa maa ñalawma ar ɓiyɗo Pullo nana innde Murtuɗo wiya holi ngon’ɗo oon , hono no won e sukaaɓe mbiyrata hannde holi gonɗo Koli Teŋella walla holi gonɗo Ceerno Sileymaani Baal ni .
Aduna hannde ko aduna faggudu hesuru .
Aduna ko ngesa men kala ko ndemɗen heen hannde ko ɗuum coñoy ten janngo .
Aduna ko ñalɗi e ñalaaɗe , saanga e saangaaji e nder Afrik bannge hirnaange , suka gorko jontuɗo waɗde hoɗannde , waɗi sahaa gooto a ari e baaba makko o wiyi : " Mi yiyii debbo mo njiɗ-mi resde no feewi " .
Aduna mbo naange woɗeewe .
Aduna o foti ko dogde koyɗe jam no haɓre nde ňifiri ko yaawi – yaawi , kono kay wonaa seŋan’de mo alaa juuɗe juuɗe yo haɓ e joom juuɗe .
Aduna o ko ɓanndu wooturu ndu terɗe 5 , heen tergal gootal ňawataa terɗe goɗɗe ɗe ndaňa jam , kala heen tergal miijingal ɗuum juumii .
Aduna o waawaa wuurdude nii tan , mo weldaani e faranse – weldaani e amerik fof tan laamu mum bonnee ɓiɗɓe leydi mum caree mbaya no kurusu taƳngu ni ňaaƳe caroo , walla no duhol tuuba caawa taƳi ni gude caroo mbeejooru hoɗoo leydi e ɓiɗɓe mum , leyɗe hoɗdiiɓe e pelle potnooɗe surde bone ina ndaara ellee galle mo kuuraŋ mum taƳaa , tawa noon ɗuum mooytantoo ko oon galle .
Aduna oo fof seediima no Ameriknootorii e yerɓannde leydi to Hayiti e doole ardi toon : ko ina wona 10 000 soldaat e laana nikleyeer ( navire nucléaire ) .
Afganistaan , 22/06/11 , persidaa Barak Obama habrii gartirgokonu Amerik ngonnoongu Afganistaan ɗoo e ceeɗu 2012 .
Afirik-Hirnaange .
Afrik , gootal heen kala tawatee tan ko he leydi ngootiri walla nii he
Afrik , ko sabu maggal won’de ɓurngal saraade toon , kono wonaa
Afrik , wonande heen leyɗeele ɗo Islaam yaaji sari ɗee , joom mum en nana njannga ɗemngal Arab maa won duuɓi ujununere , kono haa jooni hay faamu men he Islaam ene fenngiɗi .
Afrik .
Afrik Bŋ Worgo
Afrik alaa neɗɗo fof mo waawa haalde haysinno ko ɗemɗe ɗiɗi ne ,
Afrik ene hatojini e pellital dawrugol gonndungol e ñeeñal e
Afrik ene hatojini e ƴettude pellital dawrugol ngam rimɗinde ɗemɗe mum ; njanngina ɓiyɓe leyɗeele mum en he ɗemɗe mum en neeniwiije .
Afrik ene hatojini e ƴettude pellital dowrugol ngam rimɗinde ɗemɗe mum ; njanngina ɓiyɓe leyɗeele mum en he ɗemɗe mum en neeniwiije .
Afrik fof na sawndii makki sal ina dogda e mum yo riisi e ikren ndokkondir juuɗe pinira jam e kisal , caalli ndiyam ɓuuɓɗam mbelɗam foga hakkunde maɓɓe lomtoo sootiiji jayngol e ɗemɗe jayngol ňaamooje hay leydi .
Afrik fotii yuurnitaade tampaama .
Afrik hirnaange e yonta laamuuji
Afrik ina sawndondiri e makki sal gardiiɗo dental afrik e nguu njillu nde jibinanta afrik kisal ňiiɓngal e kala – kala afrik , wonki yimɓe mum kisal jawdi mum .
Afrik rewrude e maayo Mediteraane inniri " maure " , inniri leydi mum en "
Afrik Ɓamtortaako he Janngirde Ɗemɗe Janane
Afrik ɓiɓɓe maa caɗtiraama nguurndam .
Afriknaaɓe e haɗde ɗum en waawde tabitin’de ngootaagu mum en to
Afriknaaɓe heewɓe e haɓantenooɓe ngam jeytaare Afrik e ndimaagu
Afriknaaɓe woɗɓe kadi maa filmaaji mum en pawe toon , ko wayno " Africa Disco " mo Madagaskaarnaajo biyeteeɗo Luck Razanajaona , e " Là d’où l’on vient " mo dewbo Tunisnaajo Meryam Joobeur ene njeyaa he ngeel kawgel .

Aka foti naworde semmbe jonɗo ngam gollaade e diiwanuuji ɗo caafal naange heewaani , jogaade hattan mawɗo gollinde hoore mum sibu makka woɗɗude nokku ɗo ɗowooɓe ka ngoni ɗoo , ɗum noon yimɓe gollotooɓe heen ɓee mbaawaa jaabtaade ɗoon e ɗoon ko kewata dow koo , walla safrude caɗeele jokkondiral jolooje sabu ngoɗɗeeki walla caafe e nguleeki mbonki e kaɓirɗe jolnaaɗe ɗee , walla e ɓeeynirka kaa e hoore mum .

Al Hajji Abdarahmaan Jah
Al Hajji Njaay wadhii ko bhuri tidde so jogaade tele .

Ala e sago kadi Naange , Lewru e Ngaawe tolnondira rip nde nanngal naango laatoo e dow leydi , ko mbeelu lewru tan yanata e dow wertaango leydi niɓɓiɗa , ɗuum waawata gasde ko e maayirɗe lewru sabu ko ndeen ndu wonata hakkunde Naange e Ngaawe ( Leydi ) , kono kadi wonaa nde lewru maayi fo naange nanngee .
Ala ko ɓuri hono nih anaade sabu kala pinɗo winndira no welira haala ko yidɗi wi’a ko noon woni laawol .
Alaa , baagal ngal ina won'di e tenngaade ( walla faddungo nguleeki ) ngam heɓɓaade nguleeki tolniiki 1400 °C , ndeen tenngaade tekkeendi mum ina tolnii 11 .
Alaa , hannde kam en mbaawa hunndude huɓeere ndee .
Alaa .
Alaa ballal ngal ɓe keɓata ummoraade e dowla goɗɗo kono noon eɓe keɓa balle jonɗe ummoraade e alɗuɓe teelɗuɓe jeyaaɓe e leyɗeele Golf teeŋti noon e jeyaaɓe e galleeji lawakooɓe Arabii Sawudit .
Alaa e men fof kumpitiiɗo ɗum alaa emen fof kumpitaaɗo ɗum .
Alaa e men mo meeɗaani waasde nande ngol konngol ngol haaliyankooɓe e yimiyankooɓe keewi huutoraade ngam siftinde en wonde kala ko dental gasnaani , teelal enndataa .
Alaa e sago , ko nodditorto ɗen koo yiyee men .
Alaa e sago mbaawka ciynoowa kaa feccitee e potal , hakkunde hooreejo leydi , jogiiɗo mbaawka kaa fof , e guwarnama .
Alaa e sago noon ko maa ndokken hooreejo fedde ndee konngol salmondira e banndiraaɓe ko adii nde eɗen naatana yeewtere ndee .
Alaa fof ballal sukaaɓe artiraaɓe ɓee mballitaa sabu ngonka mum en keeriika to bannge jaŋde e golle .
Alaa fof ko ɓe miijanaa ; wonaa wonande jawdi maɓɓe mbaasaandi ndii , wonaa ƴeewde mbele aɓe mbaawi walleede no ɓe njooɗorii .
Alaa fof ɗemngal ko wonaa memtel no waawi fotde fof .
Alaa he men mo haaɓaani jaawgol telefoŋ mum woppude ( gasde ) kuuraa .
Alaa hinnde heerorii leele , ko ɓurɗo waawde ɗum tan , e ɓurɗo welde daande .
Alaa jiɗnaaɗo kay haani ko wallude ɓiɓɓe mun .
Alaa keerol nih kono eɗen mbaawi wiyde weeyo fuɗɗii ko 100 kilomeeteer dow fay yeeso , so en njawtii 100 nde en naatii weeyo , geɗe keewɗe mbayloto , ɓeto nguleeki , ɓitto maayo henndu , kadi bifol henndu , ɗuum noon eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko ɗoon weeyo fuɗɗii , wadde en nganndii weeyo woɗɗaani no feewi , kadi maayo henndu huurngo leydi ngo tekkaani walla luggiɗaani .
Alaa ko Leydi yirlatoo wooda ko wirnii naange wona e jamma , ko hucciti e naange ko wona e ñalawma , ndeen dillere yanti ko banngagol leydi e naange , ngol timmata ko e hitaande .
Alaa ko haali buubi maɓɓe gommbbooji e yeeso maa
Alaa ko jokkondiri hay batte ɗaccitgol Umaar Saharawii , ñalnde Aaɓnde 23 Juko 2010 , e laana ndiwoowa ka Espaañ rokki Moritani kaa .
Alaa lewru ko ko murliɗi waɗi leydi nduuf-ndufoldi e kaaƴe , maaje e caalli , kono tan alaa ndiyam e henndu , jiggatoo annoore mum ko e naange neltira men cikken ko ndu huɓɓooru .
Alaa tampere nde o tampinaani koloñaal Espaañ en to Waad Deheb ( worgo Saharaa ) .
Alaa tawo ko yiytaa ko ɓuri annoore yaawde .
Alaa wonaa koy .

Alasan Borti Jallo

Albert Einstein miijii " gudde ɓaleeje " ina ngoodi ( yiyti ɗe ) ko e hitaande 1915 .
Albert Einstein nde njuɓɓudi weeyo jaaki mbo , o ƴeewtindi o tawi alaa fo ko ñiiɓi , ko dilli foo won ko hoddiraa ina deeƴi ( tawi deeƴaani ) , etee ko feeñani neɗɗo ko wonaani tati e ndeer teemedere e ko woodi ko en nganndaa ( ɓaleeri weeyo ) , kono hakkille jaɓataa jebbilde fey , ndii ɓaleeri kaalateendi ko majjere hakkille tolnii ɗoon , feere fo no waɗi , maa ndi annde , juuta walla raɓɓiɗa .

Aleksi Nawalni ( Alexei Navalny ) lundiyanki Risinaajo ɓurnooɗo toowde sawto he nder luutndiiɓe Putin ɓe maayii hannde , Mawnde ( Aljumaa ) 2 Colte , he nder wuro dummbirngo Arctic , ɗo o dummbanoo caggal nde o ñaawaa lelaade duuɓi .

Aliw Basum , a haalii njooɗka tigi .
Aliw Mbaalo , jibinaa ko hitaande 1943 to saare wi’eteende Kumpaŋoor he nder tunndu Fuladuu , ndu ngenndi Gine Bisaawo .
Aliw manngaan , walla mi wiy-maa tokara , nafata en hannde ko daraade , wonaa woyde , kadi jaambareeji ngasaani , ɓee dariiɓe ina kaɓee jamma e ñalawma , e waɗooɓe seppooji , e ɓee waɗooɓe dawrugol , ina kaala penaale safalɓe mbaɗata e nder leydi moritani , ɓeen ko jaambareeɓe timmuɓe ɓe mbiyetee .
Aliw woni jaalal diɗɗal ngal sabu ko kaŋko jogii duƴƴayru nduu .

Alkamiisa subaka , wuro ngoo ina jiiɓinoo no feewi , ardiiɓe laamu e meer mbaawii yillaade nokkuuji ɗii ngam ƴeewde to bonannde ndee tolnii , caggal ɗum ko otooji konuyaŋkooɓe mbaaawi jolnude yimɓe boniraaɓe ɓee ngam hoɗnoyde ɗumen e ekkolaaji .
Alkamiisa ɓennuɗo ɗoo , potnoo wonde ñaawoore Binta Bah neene mum suka kaddinaaɗo oo .

Allah hokkee munyal ko ɓuri heewde ann ɓiɗɗo adama sabu neyɗi wanaa huunde faamɗude e aduna soomi miijima haa ɓoy e won ko miido ƴii a haakile am ɓoona wana fof aɗi ƴiiɗe de gilli welɗi e jiiwurɗi ɗaak muuɗi won ɗuu ɗii neeɗi hoorsinde ɓo hoorssani hiino waayno ko naatd naaɗo fuuro ƴaaigol suu maa haa hooɲa

Almaami Abdul Kaadiri ( Almaami Fuuta garwaniijo ) jinngani safalɓe Barakna en e hare hakkunde mum en e Tararsa en .
Almaami Usmaan Dan Fojo , nde feri e hitaande 1804 jooɗii to Godu , dognoo ko laamɗo Gobeer biyeteeɗo Yunfa .
Almaami wuro ngoo hono Ceerno Mohammadu Alhajji Abuu Jallo hollitii wonde ena yahra hikka e duuɓi 60 walla e 61 kono meeɗaani yiyde toɓo wayngo hono nii e heewde doole e bonnude
Almaañ fuɗɗii wonde leydi ndi keeri mum ngoɗɗondiraani e ɗi hannde ɗii ko e kitaale 1870 .
Almaañ wonaa ɗee geɗe tan dowliri , andi dowliri kadi heewde annduɓe .
Almaañnaaɓe njaggi mo ñalnde 18 noowammbar 1943 , leepti mo , pelli mo ñalnde 18 desaambar 1943 , sabu makko salaade haaltude .
Almuudo Ngay , ko en haaldunoove a yanataa e rewve kono a janfiima a yanii e amen kono kuzol am ina ara haa e les caabel ma .
Almuudo men Mammadu Lih ƴeftiti tan ko innde yaawtere nde o joginoo e rajo Jamanoo fm mo Baaba Maal e hitaande 1999 to ndakaaru .
Almuɓɓe duɗal he Muritani
Almuɓɓe ekkol oo ina potnoo yahde Doha ngam tawtoreede joofnirgol kawgel , caggal nde kooninoo kawgel ngel e nder leydi ndii , to ɓe potnoo hawrude e almudɓe woɗɓe ummoriiɓe e ekkooji goɗɗi leyɗe aarabeeɓe .
Alpha Amadou Bhouria , hono innde makko winndirtee he Farayse ni , wurii hannde ko to Holland .
Alsan kan jallo lesdi moritani
Alserinaaɓe wonnooɓe e ɗiin otooji barmuɓe , otooji mumen mbonnaa sahaa nde ɓe ndenti eɓe njuula weetndoogo , ko ndeen piyanɗe ɗee mbaɗi .

Angalateernaaɓe naniino dille kaawniiɗe ina ummii koode , nde ɓe keɗtii ɓe tawi ndeka ko dille hoodere maaynde horŋoore ( pulsar ) , kono haa jooni annduɓe njebbilaani nan'de dille tagoore woɗnde .
Angalteer , 07/08/11 , fitinaaji keewɗi mbaɗii e wuro London ; sukaaɓe nanngondiri e halfinaaɓe kisacaggande polis wari toon suka .
Angalteer e Kanadaa ina njeyanoo e eɓɓaande Manhattan , gollinnde ko ina wona 130 000 neɗɗo , ɗaɓɓunde ko ɓuri miliyaaruuji 2 dolaar ( 700 miliyaar ugiyya ) .
Annabi Yuunus haaɗi e jubbannde .
Annabi Yuunus wiyi mo : " ƴettu baaɗoo mbeewa e beyi maa ɗii .
Annama-hoodere nde , ina belloo kala ko ɓadii nde e kaaƴe e gaasuuji jawsuɗi , ende ɓeydoo mawnude , jawsude e jalbude , ɗum yeeri noon duuɓi miliyoŋaaji 50 , nguleeki mayre tolnii 15 miliyoŋ degre , ko ɗoon nde waɗti jappilde ndiƴƴam , doole fooyre nde ɓeydii no feewi , wattan fo annama-hoodere nde wonti naange ngee nge cooynotoɗen .
Anndanoo e winndude ko suwde kuɗol e ngommbidi walla loowde ngol ngommbudi winndiree , tawa ngommbudi ndi wonaa njaawndi momtaade , yahi haa masiŋaaji peeñi , binnditorɗe ( imprimantes ) tafaa haa mbay no leydi , ina ceŋee e ordinateeruuji ngam yuppude binndanɗe e dow ɗereeje ko yaawi , defte carii e aduna haa ɓurti .
Anndinnde catal ngal
Anndinten wonnde ñeeñal no renndini geɗe ɗe neɗɗo tafi walla ɓulnii tawa faandaare ndee ko weltinde e jeertinde yimɓe .
Anndintinen ɗoo wonde hooreeɓe toowɓe sogitanooɓe ɓee fow , wonanooɓe e ñaaweede e nder Sira Liyon ɓee maayiino , ɓurɓe hittude ɓee ɗiɗo ko e joge ñaawirde ndee maayi , wano Foodee Sanko , Hooreejo RUF on , e Hinga Norman , Hooreejo miliisya inneteeɗo Kamajor mo laamu Ahmet T .
Annditinnde wonnde , " Lac Gemme no woɗɗorii Dakar kilo-meeterji 37 .
Anndu saa danndii leñol maa ko hoore maa ndanndu-ɗaa .
Anndu saa suuri leñol maa ko hoore maa cuur-ɗaa .
Anndu saa tinniima e leñol maa koy hoore maa tinni-ɗaa .
Anndu saa wallii leñol maa ko hoore maa mballu-ɗaa .
Anndu saa yiɗii leñol maa ko hoore maa njiɗɗaa .
Anndu yimɓe fof ko waasooɓe e wolde-ɓesngu , tee , ko bannge maa heewi doole koo fof , ɗo wattan ɗoo , maa on mbaawne beldital .
Anndude e timmal jeynooɗo leydi ndii alaa ko tawaa e mum ndii ;
Anndude hoɗdiiɓe nokku oo , ɓe ɗum toɗɗii , hirjinde ɓe , humpitde ɓe eɓɓaaɗe ganniyaaɗe ummaneede ɗoon , e no hebori golloreede .
Anndude iwdi ndii : ƴeewde no moƴƴi lowre ɗo kabaaru oo saaktaa ɗoo ( paandaale mum , ñiiɓirɗe dokkaaɗe heen ) .
Anndude ko woni doole men e huutoraade ɗum .
Anndude sifaa leydi ndi alaa ko tawaa e mum ndii e ɗo ndi darii e ko taariindi kala ;
Anndude tolno huunde e ndeer weeyo naamni ko ndaɗɗudi , njaaweeki huunde nde e dow ndaɗɗudi ndi , e nokku mbo ummi , yanti heen wono ( temps ) mbo yahrata o , yeru ; so a anndii njaaweeki werlaa , a anndii ɗo ummii e nde ummii , aɗa jogi wonirdi ( montre ) aɗa waawi anndude saha kala ɗoo tolnii , so o daraaki e laawol .
Anndude waɗnooɓe bone ɓee ;
Anndunooɓe ooɗoo cakkitiiɗo yahde oo ( Muhammed Abdallaahi Bah ) , ine ceedtii ko o neɗɗo nuunɗuɗo , mo meeɗaa jaɓde fenaande e nguurndam mum , mo meeɗaa jaɓde njiimaandi walla moddude e geɗe ɗe laaɓaani .
Annduɓe etiima faamde ko woni wono kono ellee ɓeydotoo ko jiiɓaade ,
Annduɓe filosofi walla kiintal ( science fiction ) kollitii kulhuli e battane neɗɗo e huutoraade ƴoƴre ñemmbaande , mbela ndeen ƴoƴre loowaande e masiŋaaji jogoraani firtude aadee walla seernda ɗum e ɓalndu mum .
Annduɓe heewɓe ina ngondi e makko e kaaɗoo haala , kono tan wonaa kamɓe fof calii wonde ko ɗum huunde nde waawaa duuñteede .
Annduɓe ina kumpa no TOI 700 d way , mbela ɗaŋre nde ina waɗi ndiyam , walla boom so tawi won ko wuuri toon ?
Annduɓe ine kawri ngal yonataa , alaa e sago peeje ( pewje ) ɓurɗe ŋeerde ƴettee .
Annduɓe jerɓannde leydi kollitii wonde yerɓannde fotnde nih wayri e nokku oo ko ena abboo e duuɓi 200 .
Annduɓe kawraani heen , kono ko ɓuri sikkeede , ko ɓuri lollude ko buɓɓaande haayre weeyo mawnde dow leydi , duuɓi 66 miliyoŋ jooni .
Annduɓe kawrii , " so teddeendi ɓanndu neɗɗo ɓetaama , teemedere kiloo fof , heen cappanɗe jeeɗiɗi ko ndiyam " .
Annduɓe kawrii won'de Leydi heboraani dartaade e ndeer duuɓi miliyaar garooji , kono tan yoo yimɓe tin won'de yiloo-banngoo o woni ko e leefde !
Annduɓe kawrii won'de nguurndam ina foti saraade e ndeer koode Lillungal men , so tawii ko noon ko haɗi men haa jooni yiytude ko wuuri ?
Annduɓe ko faati he kulle asamaan ine katojini he les-boɗewol ngam yiyde koode e jiiryiire gidiiɗe feeñde .
Annduɓe kollirii kadi , korompolle ene cafriree nguru ɓanndu .
Annduɓe koode e ngonka majje ina nganndi won'de eɗe njogii no ɗe puɗɗortoo haa ɗe mboya , ɗe mbewa , ɗe mbaɗa lewlewɗi caasɗi e cagataagal majje , refti heen doole majje wona e ustaade haa ɗe ñifa .
Annduɓe mbewu ɓe Orop e Japon , ina ndenndi lappol ngam wiɗtude ɗaŋre ( Planète ) ɓurnde ɓadaade Naange , ko ndeen woni
Annduɓe sariya nattii haawde en , Muritani ina jogii hannde ɗigginɓe sariya ɓe limtotaako , ɓe mbeefeegu ganndal mumen tacci keeri leydi ndii , yo Abdul Ajiiju faam so tawii ɓeen ndaɗndaani ɗum , wonaa awokaaji ceb-ceb njooltata mo .
Annduɓe siyaas : Carl Friedrich Gauss , Rudolf Diesel , Albert Einstein , Daniel Gabriel Fahrenheit , Heinrich Hertz , Johannes Gutenberg , Robert Koch , Wilhelm Conrad Röntgen , Max Planck , e woɗɓe heewɓe .
Annduɓe to bannge faggudu ina kawri , leydi waawaa ɓamtude faggude mum , ɗoon ɗo ƴellitaani ndema .
Annduɓe weeyo ngoni ko e wiɗtude geɗe ndeen hoodere , nde ɓe njiyti nde hitaande 1967 tawi kadi yiytinde ko ganndo ina wiyee Joosliin Bel , ndeen hoodere woni ko e ɗatal Boyyel ( la constellation du Petit Renard ) , yolnde hakkunde men e ndeen hoodere ko 2000 hitaande-lewndu ( année-lumière ) , ɗuum firti njyaten ko mbaadi mayre duuɓi 2000 caggal , koode korŋooje goɗɗe ina tawee e Lillungal men Fedannde Malaaɗo ( La galaxie de la Voie Lactée ) , ina jeyaa heen Horŋoore Cuddi ( Pulsar des Voiles ) , ndeen jeyaa ko korŋooje ɓurɗe lollude .
Annduɓe wittiyankooɓe njoyo ɓe MIT wonɓe Leyɗeele Dentuɗe Amerik , kollitii nde ɓe njuurnitii keɓe gannde ( données scientifiques ) jowitiiɗe e nguurndam heborɓe hoɗoyde Mbaañ ( Mars ) , ɓe tawi balɗe maɓɓe ndiwataa 68 , warata ɓe ko faɗɗere , ɓe paɗɗoto ɓe ɗiftataa haa ɓe maaya , annduɓe ɓe tuugnii e wiɗto mumen ngo ko e tonngi hiisa ( formules mathématiques ) , ɓulnirɗe Oksijen , ñaamde e kala karrallaagal newnowal jeytaare e dow Mbaañ ( waasde yowitaade e ko ummotoo Ngaawe ) .
Annduɓe ɓee ine keppi heɓde seedeeji ƴettaaɗi toon ɗii haa mbaawa yuurnaade ɗum en Kono maa ɓe muña no feewi dee .
Annduɓe ɓee koolkisii ɗum ko e yimɓe 120 yahrooɓe hedde duuɓi capanɗe jeegom , selluɓe , kono ɓe keewaani dillude .
Annduɓe ɓee taftii heen ko ina wona 14 geɗal .
Anngolaa ( walla Ndongo ) kadi ina yeeyatnoo Purtugeec en jiyaaɓe .
Anniyaaji moƴƴi pottitii tawi faandaare mum en ko wallitde ñawɓe roofolɓe woɗɗuɓe nokkuuji ɗo cafrirɗe ngoni , haa mbaawa loskude ñawu ɓalli mum en , tawi ina paabee e safaara no fotiri fof .
Anselaad ko lewru woɗndu e lebbi Galliire ndu ɗeɓi wayde ko no Oroppaa ni , ala-e-sago baage gasooje haa keɓtoo maaje gonɗe nder lebbi ɗe , neldee toon nde keɓen ko laaɓi , ko ɗuum woni daawal maɓɓe garowal .
Anselad ( Encelade ) ko wooturo e lebbii tagofeere Satirn , nokku ɗo ndu woni ɗo ina ɓuuɓi sanne , kono nde baagal Kasini wirtiindu hitaande 2005 , ngal tiimi e lobbude mayru worgo , ceɓooje ina puufa ndiyam faade weeyo njiyaa e oon nokku , ɗum jaaki annduɓe noon , hol no ndiyam wonirta toon e mbaadi ndeelam !
Anselad lewru Satirn ina waɗi ndiyam !

Arab-Afrik .
Arabeeɓe ko anndiranooɓe waawde jime ( poesie ) kono ko adii Islaam hay ganndal gootal winndanooka he ɗemngal baadiyankooɓe Arabeeri ( Jaziiratul-Arab ) .

Añamnguraagu , paltoor kam e mbaadiiji goɗɗi haala ngañgu toɗɗiika edda nguru ɓalndu ko warhoore mo mumtotaako .
Añanguraagu noon jogiima sifaaji keewɗi he nder daartol aadee .
Añɓe Pulaar en ñaagiima oto njeñ .
Aɓe mbaawi kadi ɓooreede hakkeeji makko fof walla huunde e hakkeeji makko ɓiyleydaagu , siwil e galle duuɓi joy walla ko ɓuri ɗum , fawaade e kuulal 36 dabi kuuge .
Aɓe mbaawi kadi ɓooreede hakkeeji maɓɓe fof walla huunde e hakkeeji maɓɓe ɓiyleydaagu , siwil e galle duuɓi joy walla ko ɓuri ɗum , fawaade e kuulal 36 dabi kuuge .
Aɓe nganndunoo ɗum ɓooyi , aɓe cuuɗi .
Aɗa fotni e mayre maayde maa
Aɗa haandi heen pooƴaa .
Aɗa horsini Firefox tee aɗa jogii yaajeende seeɗa ?
Aɗa waawi tonngande en sababuuji ɓurɗi teeŋtude aksidaaji ɗaɗi nganndiiji ?
Aɗa yaha jehre coodaa – njeeya aɗa humtira haaju ma e haala ɗemngal ngal kono tawa a anndaa luggiɗeeki ɗemngal ngal , so ɗemngal ngal wontii njuɗu a hurmirte sabu a waawaa waklitde kaaliindi ( kelmeendi ) ndi .
Aɗen nganndi tokaraaɓe makko hannde limotaako , kono mi rokka yeru he Murtuɗo Saydu Kan , Murtuɗo Sammba Cooyel Bah , Murtuɗo Aamadu Sammba Demmbele e Murtuɗo Katante leñol Kan .

BAABA MAAL KA MEIUER AN WONI FIERTE FULBE KO AN MIN PAARNORTO I MIN DUONOMA JO ALLAAH JUNU DALDEMA .
BAB
BANNDIRAABE OODO GORKO BALEEJO GORKO MO ARINDENNDI EN GORKO MO YERU MUM NAWDETEE E NELSO MANDELA MO KASO WONNOO YEEWTIRDE MUM FOTDE DUUBI 27 HANNDE WADAAMA E DAARTO NGENNDIYANKOOBE OODO BARAKA OBAMA HAY MO YIYAANI MBAROODI NANII UNNGAALI MURITANI HOL KO FADAA KO BEEDO NGONNOO YERUUJI MEN TEETEN FOTDEMEN YOO GENO JUUTNU KO BARAKA OBABA KO
BARI OBAMA , bilii kiibal baleebe
BBL : Fonndasiyoŋ Emiraaji Arab Dentuɗi wonande Cellal ko miijo laamu Emiraaji Arab Dentuɗi jogii ngam rokkude kaalis ngam difanaade Fedde Adunaare Cellal ngootiri e njeenaaje rokkata ɗee .
BBL : Hitaande kala , Fedde Adunaare Cellal ( OMS ) ina weltina e winndere hee hoohooɓe e juɓɓule ballitɗe ƴellitaare cellal rewrude e njiylawuuji e wiɗtooji e darnde faatunde e cellal renndo .
BBL : Pellital e weltaare wallitde weytaare yimɓe ko huunde nde neɗɗo suɓotoo e ɓernde mum , gollira ɗum ɓernde laaɓnde , joomum waasa ɗaminaade heen hay manoore wootere ummoraade e nokku ɗo ɗum gollaa ɗoo .
BBL : Waɗi-mi rokkeede njeenaari ndii ko ballal maantinngal ngal ngaddu-mi ngam cosgol e gollingol Nokku Ngenndiijo Loowtugol Ƴiiƴam kam e Booñuuji ƴiiƴam e sarwisaaji laboratuwaar , kam e kaɓgol e sooynaɓo wiriseejo , e VIH/SIDA e piɗe goɗɗe daaɓrooje njogoram caggal nde luggiɗinii-mi e fannu ganndal nguurndam toɗɗingal cellal , nomaa-mi Mawɗo Sarwiis laboratuwaaruuji e booñ ƴiiƴam to Opitaal Ngenndiijo e hitaande 1991 .
BBL : Wonande hitaande 2017 ndee , OMS rokkii njeenaaje tati : njeenaari Fonndasiyoŋ Emiraaji Arab Dentuɗi wonande Cellal ndi ndokkaa-mi ndii , yantude e njeenaari Fonndaasiyoŋ Sasakawa wonande cellal ndokkaandi doktoor monngolinaajo gooto , e njeenaari Doktoor LEE Jong wook wonande cellal renndo ndokkaandi njuɓɓudi ina wiyee Brigade médicale internationale Henry Reeve to Kubaa .
BELJIK kalfinaaɗo juɓɓingol suɓngooji hooreejo TPO .
BIDA WELTI E GOLLE HALPULAR EN

Baaba , duuɓi 103 yettere Alla
Baaba Baydi Maal , naalanke winndereyanke o , weltinii aduna kadi hono no o woowi waɗde ne , to New York hannde Aaɓnde .
Baaba Caam noddii wondiiɓe mum ngam yeewtitde e maɓɓe faꞌde e coodgol naꞌi ɗii .
Baaba Demmba salmini , bismi hoɓɓe ɓee , holliri welamma mum e punondiral hakkunde gure ɗiɗi ɗee .
Baaba Demmba wiꞌi mo : " naat e sutura ngudditaa loonde njaraa heen , looto-ɗaa .
Baaba Demmba yetti ɓe , duwii yo ɓe ndutto to galleeji maɓɓe e jam .
Baaba Haaruuna anndini ɓe wonde neene maɓɓe jaɓii ɓe koɗoyoo Eduwaar en .
Baaba Jeeri naji e golle Bojel : Hol no o waɗi haa o ɓoccitii ?
Baaba Jeeri teeldi e ɓesngu mum naamni gooto kala miijo mum heen .
Baaba Maal , naalaŋke senegaalnaajo lolluɗo , hollitii yiɗde mum yoo laamu e yontannde njeewtu haa jiytondira .
Baaba Maal : Fatmata .

Baaba Maamuudu wiꞌi maa tottu coodgu na'i ɗii afo makko Sammba potɗo yahdude e Maɓɓe .
Baaba Maamuudu yetti soodooɓe ɓee wi'i ɓe : " Golle mon timmii , na'i ɗii njooɗii .
Baaba Musa wi'i mo : " Muñ !
Baaba Muusa , joom wuro Lummbol ƴetti konngol , salmini , holli weltaare mum .
Baaba Muusa fiꞌi junngo e hunoko , raŋaani duɗal Baaba Siik .
Baaba Muusa wi'i : " Njiɗ-mi ko o jaŋnga , o seerta e humam binndaagal tee o firta'' .
Baaba Muusa wi'i ko Ceerno majji Ndakaaru , moni kala ina woya .
Baaba Siik ko ceerno karallo e janngingol .
Baaba Siik timminii anniya Baaba Muusa e Ceerno .
Baaba Talla Jaayndiyanke Pulaagu .
Baaba Tammbadu Seekunaa
Baaba bismiima hod’6e mum kono kadi o yejjitaani yim6e makko hanki KO wayi no Ibraahiima Saar en .
Baaba daara ni mi jaambareeɓe yawtuɓe .
Baaba e Daande Lenol ngarnoo KO teddinde leydi mumen Moritani .
Baaba haalii moy’ya , Mansuuru Sek seedtiima hakkunde mum e Baaba Baydi Baaba e yeeso hoohoo6e heew6e .
Baaba ja66aama no feewi to dingiral laad’e diwooje Nuwaasoot to Rewo e woodi boowe .

Baaba makko gollotonoo ko he njuɓɓudi laamu koloñaal .
Baaba oo wiyi mo " wonaa aɗa yiɗi " .
Baabaaɓe Looti .
Baabaaɓe renndinde yimɓe gila e naalankooɓe
Baabiraaɗo o wiymo ko mbiiyɗaa haalanam hol ko njanngu ɗaa e ko njiyɗaa hannde koo fof e heewde .
Baagal : ( Une sonde e farayse ) eɗen nganndi so en nuli baagal ndeer woyndu njiilotoɗen ko ndiyam , ooɗo masiŋ nulaaɗo e ndeer weeyo ne artiranta en ko humpito wadde ko baagal humpito .
Baagal Juno ko battamlamiiwal sabu ko adii fo lappol maggal waɗi ko corfuli ɗiɗi , heen gootol ko ñoosngol Rojju ngam ɓamde nate e wiñde mbaydi lobbudu worgo , ngal ɓadatoo nduun lobbudu ko kala balɗe 11 , refti heen ngal rewata ko e nder saayaande pooɗal Rojju doolnungal kulɓiningal e nder lebbi paaɗi .
Baagal Kasinii ko masiŋ nulanooɗo to ɗaŋre Galliire , maa won hannde duuɓi 20 , ngal waɗii duuɓi 7 e laawol , nde ngal yotti ngal wonii e weeyo ndeen ɗaŋre duuɓi 13 .
Baagal Kasinii ɓaawo nde wam'biti Hiigens jokki wanngaade Galliire ngam jokkude wiɗto .
Baagal Kiriyositi seeraani e neldude nate kollirooje boowe e dow Mars , won heen noon ɗeɓɗe haawnaade ko mbaɗi , ellee maa mbiya ko yimɓe walla waaɓe no yimɓe ngoni toon .
Baagal MAVEN e wiɗto kammu Mars
Baagal MAVEN ngal ina hebori wanngaade e Mars fotde hitaande , heen saha ɓaɗlo leydi Mars fotde 150 km saha goɗɗo woɗɗito fotde 6000 km dow .
Baagal MAVEN yottiima e weeyo tagofeere Mars hecci hanki jamma , woni faandaare ngal baagal ko wiɗtude kammu tagofeere woɗeere nde ngam anndude hol ko waɗi kammu o leefde e ñoortaade haa laaɓi ,
Baagal Oropnaaɓe " Mars express " ne tiimat ɗaŋre woɗeere nde ngam fooynaade walla boom yuurnaade haa nder leydi mayre fotde kilometruuji seeɗa e ballal radaar , mbela ina waawa sooynaade nder toon penndiɗam walla wimmbanuuji baɗɗi mbiinam .
Baagal Rosetta nulanongal to laaciire Curiyumof-Gerasimenko waɗtii sooynaade nde caggal nde ngal taƴi miliyaaruuji 7 kilomeeteer , ngal nuldanoo ko 2 mbooy 2004 , duuɓi hannde 10 ko baagal ngal woni e laawol faade to nde laaciire , e ndeer oon dummunna ngal naati taarol tagofeere Jipiteer , oon nokku naangaani no feewi wadde kuɓɓam weeɓataa , ngam hisnude kuɓɓam maggal , ngal ŋofƴiima e bolol he , ko hanki ngal fini caggal lebbi 31 e laawol , e nde ɓeydii ɓadaade naange ,
Baagal Rosetta wammbitii masiŋ Filay hanki ngam o waawa seŋaade e laaciire he , juuragaol masiŋ o e dow laaciire nde wonaano huunde newiinde , sabu ŋakkere pooɗal ( pesanteur ) , kono tan wayi no yiɗiranoo nih .
Baagal bonngonnge kese ( New horizons ) ko e laawol faade tagopeeyel Pluton woni , ngal ummii Leydi ko ñalnde 19 siilo ( janvier ) hitaande 2006 , a ngal foti waɗde duuɓi 9 e laawol nde ngal yottoo , sabu ngal foti yottaade ko 14 korso ( juillet ) hitaande 2015 .
Baagal bonngonnge kese .
Baagal deegowal ɗeɓata waade kono werlaa nih ( oto ) , waɗi ko biife mbela ina waawa yahde , eɗe ɓurindiri mawnugol .
Baagal goɗngal ngal ne wiyetee ko Messanger , ngal nulaa toon ko hitaande 2004 ngal yottii hitaande 2011 , ngal ɓami nate battamlamiije wertaango leydi ɗaŋre nde ɓaawo ɗuum ngal liɓaa e dow ɗaŋre he 2015 .
Baagal kay-haytowal mbiyetengal Mars Global Surveyor , tiimii laabi ɗiɗi e do won e nokkuuji e ndeer duuɓi tati , nate ɗe ngal ɓami ɗe ina kollira balwartiɗe peeñɗe hade maggal artude !
Baagal ngal ina peesa 610 kg a ngal ɗeɓa fotde no werlaa tokooso , maa ngal waɗ duuɓi 7 e laawol hade maggal yottaade Naange , waɗata ngal leeltirde nih ko peeje ngam ngal ɓeydoo ɓadaade naange tawa ngal yanataa e magge , ɗuum noon ko maa ngal fiiltoo ɗaŋre Jaayre laabi 7 nde ngal waawa ruɓan'de naange .
Baagal ngal inniraa ko gando hiisawal italinaajo ina wiyee Giysep ( Bepi ) Kolombo ( 1920-1984 ) , ko leyɗeele 16 ndenti peewni ngal , nde ngal lottaa faade to mbewu ngal yooɓnaa njaaweeki tolniindi 120 000 km/h ngam ngal waawa ɓoccitaade fooɗngo ɗaŋre men Ngaawe .
Baagal ngal ko pece ɗiɗe , eɗe nawri natirɗe ceeɓde ngam natde wertaango Ɗiiña haa hawra , ngam faamde no ɗaŋe ngaawolinɗe ( tellurique ) tagorto .
Baagal ngal nuldanoo ko e lewru jolal ( novembre ) hitaande 2013 , a ngal peesa tonuuji ɗiɗi e feccere ( 2 .
Baagal ngal waɗii wiɗtooji paayodinɗi no feewi , sabu ngal suuɗtii geɗe ɗe nganndanooka ,
Baagal so ɓoccitiima Ngaawe , ina doga 19 ujunere kilomeeteer e nder waktu gooto , wadde so ɓadoyiima ɗo fay to ala e sago usta njaaweeki mum haa waawa jippaade , ɗuum ko peeje mawɗe ngoni ɗoon , ko adii fo so ɗaŋre nde ina waɗi faandu henndu , baagal ngal ɗaccitat paarasitawal mum fiya faandu usta doole jippagol maggal , so tawii ngal ɓadiima leydi ɗaŋre nde , ɗemɗeme nay jayngol puufa les baagal he ngam haa jooni ustude doole jippagol ngol , kono tan suwaa gasde taw , so heddiima tan a ngal jogori memde leydi , ngal wuttat paali mbuuma ngal , son gal memii leydi ngal ruuya a ngal denkoo haa ngal deeƴa , paali ɗi ɓoomta , ngal soomtoo , ngal reega e leydi he , ɗuum woni golle maggal puɗɗoo .
Baage !
Baage ( sondes ) keewɗe nuldaama toon , kono jaɓɓal neɗɗo gadanal e dow lewru ko ñalnde 21-07-1969 waɗno .
Baage deegooje keewɗe neldaama e tagofeere Mars ngam wiɗtude won e nokkuuji , won heen timminaani golle mumen , ɗeya njoofni , ɗeya ne ko heen ngoni haa hannde .
Baage mbayri jippaade e lewru ko gila 1976 , ko Riis wattindi neldude toon Luna 24 ,
Baajol leydi .
Baal , compunooɗo laamu diineewu Fuuta .

Baal Umaar Hammaat , Sal Sileymaani , Aysata Jaari Sal e mawɓe pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje e koppe .
Baal Umar Hammaat
Baamuule men hannde keewi yimɓe sikkaan-nooɓe maayataa hannde maayataa janngo maayataa haa aduna gasa .
Baari nano e ñaamo .
Baasal so tawii gorko roŋkii tottude teŋe jontuɗe ɗee , ina woodani debbo o yaltude e dewgal ngal ko adii naatdiigu .
Baawɗe Alla !
Baawɗo ɗemɗe – ɗemɗe hay so janngaani ina ɗesi ɓurde jannguɗo ɗemngal gootal haa heɓi heen doktoraŋ , mo janngaani hakke mum ko ko yaɓɓaa e aduna hee tan !

Baañoowo oo wiya

Bah Aamadu Aliwu
Bah Abdullaay Usmaan
Bah Abdullaay Usumaan mawnum cankiiɗo oo , o wiyi en wonnde Bah AbuuUsumaan jibinaa ko e hitaande 1940 to Baabaaɓe looti , kono e kaayitaaji makko woni heen 1942 .
Bakkar wul Suwoyd Ahmed , Maamaari Tagante , ganndo amwɗo golwole e hare fetel , ummanii jihaadi , kañum e Ahmeddu mo Barakna , ɓiyum Usmaan , Wulaad Ahmed en , Kunta en e Sharaatiit en , Ahmed wul Eli lollirɗo Boyyaada yanti e maɓɓe .
Balaade e Beeli cayɗe .
Balla Jeerel ( no subalɓe keewi yanoraade ɓe ) njuɓɓinii ñalawma Alamari

Ballal teeŋtungal no feewi : keblugol eɓɓaande mahdi galle , tee golle na njokki
Ballee koye mon
Ballifanɗe Hiisiwal patamlame ɗe Dr Muhammadu Faalil Sih waɗi he ɗemngal Pulaar , taƴii hujjaaji kala wiyatnooɓe ɗemɗe Afrik mbaawaa faggitoreede gannde toowɗe sabu ŋakkeede kelmeendi njaajndi waawndi saaktude miijooji jiɓiiɗi .
Ballifanɗe Neene Asmaawu ene tinndina no ganndal makko he Islaam way yaajde e luggiɗde .
Ballifanɗe makko he ɗemngal Pulaar :
Ballitgol muulngo deftere Ceerno Daawuuda Sammba Ndonngo nde tiitoonde mum woni " Kayhayɗi "
Ballondiral e jokkere enɗam wonde e wuro hee feeñii e fannuuji keewɗi .
Ballondiral e jurmondiral Ballondiral jurmondiral laaɓondiral deedi ena jeyaa e ɓamtaare leñol , sabu ina ɓeeyda kawral tee kala to kawral alaa jam Heewaani wonnde ɗoon saha ɓamtaare ena tawtoree heen ,
Balwaltirɗe cooynaama ko ɓooyi ina lelii e kaaƴe walla tule ceene tagofeere Mars , kono ndiyam waawata waltude ( waamde ) e won e ngonka , teenkti noon ka Mars ka , sibu teddeeki kammu tagofeere nde e tolno nguleeki mum ndiyam waawataa laataade heen ndeelam , ina waawi noon taweede ina fenndi .
Balwaltirɗe ndiyam kaaɗluɗam e dow Mars
Balɗe 50 o mbo hippii e ngesa ba , 14 edda puɗi o aawi e leydi ñeemtinndi ndi Mars , ( mbeɗa jooɗtorinoo puɗgol leɗɗe ɗe kono me sikkaano maa ɗe njuut balɗe sabu ŋakkere ko moƴƴinta leɗɗe e fatere leydi nde ) ka ko haala Wieger Wamelink .
Balɗe daɓɓe kaɗii Alfaa Moolo yumtinde yiɗde mum
Balɗe nay haa njahdi e naange , ko kaan haala tan haaletee .
Balɗe seeɗa keedi en koorka .
Balɗe seeɗe caggal nde ɓe koni Tumbuktu , Abdel Kader Haydara , baɗɗo nguurndam mum kala he roɓindaade , renndin’de e reende ballifanɗe Tumbuktu he nder defterdu mum ( Defterdu Mamma Haydara ) ndu o ronti ummoraade he jibnaaɓe makko , fuɗɗii ɗaɗɗude peewje e holno o daɗndirta ndii ndonateeri pinal e gannde .
Balɗe tati ko fedde senegaal-naaɓe walloore sukaaɓe ŋakkuɓe hakkile e terɗe ( ASEME ) woni e yillade e renntinnde kaɓirde , jawdi e njeñcundi ngam topitaade jaŋnge sukaaɓe ( 60 ) Hikka waei duuɓi noogaas ( ñande 16 lewru decenmburu 1989 ) ko nde fedde sosaa e dow gardagol Alfaa Loh e dow teddungal Aminata Mbaay ( yo Geno yrmoɗum yaafooɗum )
Balɗe ɗiɗi pawii heen , laamu Burkina Faso nodditi joɗaniiɗo ɗum to Ankara , Jaagorgal kalfinaangal Geɗe Boowaliije noddi jooɗaniiɗo Gaana nder leydi Burkina .
Bamako yiyraani noon .
Bandiraa6e , Won ko Njogiden ks ( cikkumi ) hay gooto Alaa dum e Windere he ; NDENDIRAAGU MIDO EERI WINDOOBE E " PULAAGU " YOO MONI FOF HOKKU HEEN MIJO MUM .
Banke Dowrowo Muritani ( Banke sentaraal ) : lowe ɗiɗi ( 2 )
Banke Winndereejo ( Banque Mondiale , BM ) ine yaltini winndannde faatunde he ɗemngal potngal fuɗɗoreede jaŋde .
Banke winndereejo ine sakkita calɗi golle tati ngam yenaneede piɓle ɗee ine naattinee e kala sahaa nder golle Banke winndereejo oo , ngam ƴellitde e aaɓnude ciynugol ndee yiyannde .
Banndam , anndu , e nder nguu njulaagu , aan ko a kuutorgal tan .
Banndam en njaaraama
Banndam en on calminaama
Banndam en on njaaraama , Caggal yettude Alla e nulaado mum ; ko duwawaan am feewde e leniol juulɓe kala , Yo Alla yurmo mo mo yaafoowo haarna mo Aljanna waɗanoma to firdawsu fooftorde makko Faatimata Bintu Rasuul ittama e yeeweende , Yo Alla waɗ barke o ko woppi koo yaa barke quraan .
Banndam en on njaaraama mi salmonii on ; nganndee kadi Alla tagaaani mbo juumataa kala aade ina juuma ina waawi wonde tawa ko Demmba golli ko ko juumre miin e yiannde am potden ko waajaade Demmba e reentaade hono ko wayi nii sabu sa bonnii bannde tan anne ma wonko bonirmaa haa heewi , kadi so tawii demmba juumi enen woto njuumen sabu so en njennii Demba haa fakiti firti ko enen en nanndii e mum ; e dow niaagaade jaafuya ; waajaade neddo buri yennude kadi nde wonnoo naalanke ko yitere leniol ina haani sahaa fof walleede e reentaade woon e golle .
Bannde en kala celaa .
Banndiraabe Muritaninaabé yontii nde ummoto den ngam daranaade bamtaare bibbe fulbe ; won ko mbido tara e won e situuji ko gede de kaanaani wonde hakkunde bibbe Muritaninaabe haa teenti noon e enen baleebe ; sinndo ko sago nduurnen miijooji men yeewen ko foti wonde darnde gooto e men kala mbele maa en keb gedal men haa timma e nder leydi he 1 so tawii en ndentaani en mbaawataa hebde jojjandi men 2 So tawii ko haasidaagal e mi yidaa tinaa woni ko njokkoden wadde ngandee firti ko en njuurnitaaki tigi rigi cadeele duubi bennudi di 3 Njogo den cuusal waawde haaldude goonga ko yidde udditde yeewtere tan mbele ina wooda do nanondir den haa bamtaare waawa arde e nokkuuji men fuuta e kummbaaru
Banndiraabe daccon hakke mi wonaa kumpitiito Dawrugol leydi Senegaal no tigirigi kadi mi anndaa Makki Sal no feewi so wonaa ko jaayndeeji kaalata e makko saatu nde o woni Mawdo jaagorde Senegaal caggal duum o wonti hooreejo suudu sardiiru ngenndi .
Banndiraabe ngaree teeyen buri ko jiibaten koye men e kaddungal koo .
Banndiraabe teddube bibbe wiyoobe mbiimi wiimi e wimaami , kala do ngondon e duunde baaba Aadama , mido wiya on njuulen mo wuuri , yoo jam e kisal yotto bibbe fulbe , bemta pulaagu , ko wona duum ko , mi eto ruttude on teddungal ngam seedamfaagu mon feyde am , on njaaraama yo Geno bamtu lenyol ngol bamta bamtoobe lenyol ngol , aaaamiiiin .
Banndiraabe teddube ko ardii fof mido salmina-on calminaali teddi , kalat-mi ko yidde am , ngam bataare lenyol am , so njangube pulaar ina kaalda yobe nanodir be paamondira , haisinno kobe leydeele certude , ngaddini jannde mabbe wona ngootiri , ginol jannde mabbe wona gootol , taw wona mo woni kala ina winndira no weldinum , walla ina haalda no weldidum , tiidno den tiddinen anndube men e aldube men , mbele golle men ina njaara yeeso , yo wuur pulaar yo wuur daraniibe pulaar .
Banndiraaɓe , e sehilaaɓe , men caggal men ena ngoppee .
Banndiraaɓe , hikka fedde Adunaare Cellal , kam e Fedde hakkunde leyɗeele Jabet , ɓuri teentinde e ɓesngu ko nde ndeentatoo heɓde nguu ñawu , kadi e hirjinde yimɓe wonduɓe e jabet nde ndewata wasiyaaji ndokkatee to cafrirde too , kadi joowmum en ndewata safaruuji mum en ndokkaa , mbele ina kisa e tanaaji ñawu jabet .
Banndiraaɓe , hol to njejjiten hay sahaa gooto wonde e nder oo aduna kesamhesaagu , oo aduna jiirooji , kala leelɗo jolnude junngo mum , famɗat ko tawi e lahal .
Banndiraaɓe , sehilaaɓe , mussiɓɓe tedduɓe , so leñol yiɗii heƴde e heƴnude pinal mum , so leñol yiɗii heɓtineede e nder leydi , e hakkunde leƴƴi guurdaaɗi , ene foti daraade , dadoo , mbele hakke mum , maa hujjaaji mum walla geɗal mum ene yooltoo .
Banndiraaɓe , sellataa joofnude ngolɗoo ciimtol tawa en nduttaani teddungal fayde e Dental Ndulumaaji Demɓe , Goomu Pinal Ndulumaaji Demɓe , musiɗɗo Saada Manngaan , teeŋti e musiɗɗo Yaayaa Dem e ɓesngu mum .
Banndiraaɓe , taƴgol seleeji ko aadi gummiiɗo e laamu fira-awna sabu mum yiɗnoode dartin’gol jibinegol sukaaɓe worɓe sabu makko sikkude so sele debbo taƴƴaama , joom mum dañataa mbelamma lelnde sabu leloo ko heewi .
Banndiraaɓe , yimɓe tato potaani yejjiteede e ndee bonan’de : Maawiya Old TAAYAA , Ely OLD Mohamed FALL e Gabriel SEMPERE potaani yejjiteede e ndee ɗoo bonan’de .
Banndiraaɓe , ɗumɗoo ko jubbannde tokosere e nguurndam ceemo men , jinnaaɗo men , mawɗo men , musiɗɗo men Yero Dooro Jallo .
Banndiraaɓe Fulɓe maayo koy woni ko e waɗde ndiyam , Baaba haŋkadi wiyaama woni ko e doorde : hakkillaaji nattii wonde e mikkoroo santraal oo , gite kucciti ko e ardude naalaŋkooɓe toh .
Banndiraaɓe e musidɓe , kollitee weytaare mon , kadi ngaddon heen duwaawu yoo Alla wallu en haa njoofnen golle ɗee .
Banndiraaɓe eɗen paami ɗumɗoo fof yahdata ko e pinal .
Banndiraaɓe fulɓe , musidɓe yiɗɓe pulaar/fulfulde , enɗam Fuuta , tuggude e Dagana haa Demmaŋkaani , ñalngu darotoongu janngo nguu ena heewi maanaa e nder ɓerɗe men sanne .
Banndiraaɓe hay gooto haangaaka so wonaa cikkoowo yimɓe fof ko haangaaɓe !
Banndiraaɓe hoddiiBe , e sehilaaɓe for ene njaha ɗuum ko ñande fof sahaa fof wadde meeɗat tan nde woni miin , walla aan .
Banndiraaɓe kala calminaama .
Banndiraaɓe ko kaalat-mi ɗo ko noon ko laawol paytungol e gannde kese lelnaaɗe , laawol diine ko bannge , ngol kadi ina woodi .
Banndiraaɓe ngannden duwaaw laawɗiniraa ko ngam yiɗde fooftinde juulɗo , e deeƴnude ɓernde mum , e newnande ɗum jokkondiral e Alla waktu kala , waktuuji yaajeende , e faaɗeende fof .
Banndiraaɓe on calminaama on njuuraama on mbeltanaama , sabu moni kala addii miijo mum , e ndee winndannde faayodinnde .
Banndiraaɓe tedduɓe , renndaaɓe miijo e sago e hare , mbiɗo torii nde miijtitoɗen kaa Haala Allah * .

Baru mahi galle jooɗɗo mo yimɓe kala kaalata haala mum e nder gurel Jibaa .
Baru ruttii galle mum , tawi sukaaɓe ɓee fof cellii .
Baru woni e siññude , ina ƴeewa no daɗndiri fittaandu mum .
Baru woondi wonde ko kaŋŋe tan yiɗi etee alaa ko jaranaani ɗum .

Batte e sato ( taariindi )
Batte eɓɓaande ndee e sato amen ina soklini min no feewi sibu golle mum ina njahdi e feƴƴere leɗɗe ɓurtunde .

Batte heɓɓitorde nde ina lohi e njaaweeki ki doolnaani , kono so tawii ndi tolniima feccere njaaweeki lewndu njiyaa ko haawni , sabu wono leeltat no feewi , haa ɗeɓa dartaade so njaaweeki ki ɓadiima ki lewndu ki , ɗum addi daartol funeeɓe so oɗon ciftora , gooto joli e ndampoowa ndogoowa njaaweeki lendu fayi dow , goɗɗo o heddi e leydi , caggal dumunna juutɗo , jahnooɗo o arti tawi funeere makko naywi .
Batte mum nii ndiwtii batte faggudu tan , sibu ko geɗe ñiɓiiɗe hankati he hakkillaaji , e miijooji .

Binndi gonɗi e allungel ngel ndeke ko hiisa ɓetatiwal ( tirigonometiri ) , hiisa ɓurɗo ɓooyɗo e feewde ganndaaɗo , duuɓi 1 500 ko adii Gerek en , sikkanooɓe ko kam en penti ngalɗoo catal hiisiwal ( matematik ) toppitiingal hiisa lobbuɗi e njuuteele .
Binnditagol naatooɓe ekkol hikka waɗii caɗeele keewɗe , sabu laamu fellitde sukaaɓe naatooɓe ekkol mbinndittee tan ko he duɗe laamu .
Binnditgol fuɗɗodii Farayse ko dow e ko wonnoo yumma bone ɗe ngoytino-ɗen ɗoo ko ɓooyi , so waɗde wonde yimɓe fof nattii wonde Muritaninaaɓe , ko maa neɗɗo winnditoo nde wonta Muritaninaajo .
Binnditorɗe ( imprimantes ) ko leƴƴi 4

Binndugol ɓataake ciftinoowo hujja fedde nde e leydi ndi ; jokkondiral e Gardiiɗo Gollorɗe topitiinde geɗe mahateeri maa koɗki ;

Bommbo atomik , moobaare yaawnde .
Bommbo atomik Hiroshima e Nagasaki , ko bommbooji ɗi Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( Amerik ) werlinoo e ɗeen gure Japon ñalnde 6 ut 1945 wonande Hiroshima e ñalnde 9 ut 1945 wonande Nagasaki .
Bommbo atomik ko kaɓirgal boomowal ko heewi e fettannde wootere , nde wonnoo hostatee ɗoon ko geɗe ɓurɗe famɗude ( atomes ) kono ko njaltinta e nguleeki ina mawni .
Bommbo atpmik meeɗi weddeede ko e gure ɗiɗe ina to Jappon , yimɓe heewɓe mboomii heen , batte tooke bommbooje ɗe ina e ɓesngu daɗnooɓe maayde heen ɓe haa jooni , rafi ina nguɗu ( cancer ) ina yooɓoo piɗtaali haa jooni tawa ɗuum ko batte bommbo o .

Caafal naange dow ewru
Caafal njaaweeki dogdu mum e nder weeyo ɓolo , ko 300 .

Cagataagal Fooyre : 2005 faayde hannde
Cagataagal jaay ndoƴ , jaay ndoƴ kay boni e surga , moƴƴaani e ñaaɗa waare .
Caggal Apophis ( Apofis woni haayre weeyo sikkanoonde ina jogori buɓɓaade e leydi men ndii ) , jooni ko 500 haayre ngoƴni annduɓe weeyo , sibu mum en hulaneede buɓɓondirde e leydi men ndii .
Caggal Bayyinaango Sappo e Njeenayo ( Manifeste des Dix-neuf ) ngo 1966 e Bayyinaango Baleejo Muritaninaajo Kiiɗaaɗo ( Manifeste du Négro-Mauritanien opprimé ) ngo 1986 e Bayyinaango ngam Hakkeeji Politik e Faggudu e Renndo Hardaneeɓe ( Manifeste pour les droits politiques , économiques et sociaux des Hratine ) ngo abriil 2013 , e Teskorde ( Aide-mémoire ) yowitiinde e jiytagol Jolfuɓe Muritani e laamu hee , e lewru abriil 2014 , DHSM kam ne ina yiɗi addude ballal mum e mahngo Ngenndi Muritani , fawaade e nuunɗal e potal .

Caggal calminaali e njettoor , ko yoo Allah Hebin yimbe hono makko en .

Caggal dummbugol hoohooɓe ɓaleeɓe Muritani e hitaande 1966 caggal nde njaltini kaayit ganndiraaɗo " Bayyinaango Sappo e Njeenayo " , to Nebeyba , nder caɗeele teeŋtuɗe , e hitaande 1986 to Waalata , caggal nde mbayyini kaayit ina wiyee " Bayyinaango Ɓaleejo Muritani Kiiɗaaɗo " , Waalata ɗo laamu nguu yaɓɓi jojjanɗe aadee jaɓɓugol teeŋtungol , juumtungol e maayɗeele won ɓeen dummbaaɓe ; caggal ɗeeɗoo geɗe fof mbiy-ɗen , hankadi jalluɗi ngañgu ngoni tan ko e ɓeydaade bewde .

Ceemoko Garang Kuyaate jibinaa ko 27 abiril 1902 to Seegu , o wardaa takko to wuro-dummbirdu Mauthausen ( Autrishi ) ñalnde 4 suliyee 1944 .
Ceemoko jokki daranaade jeytaare leyɗe Afirik haa ɗuum addani mo sosde jaaynde wiyaa Africa he 1936 .
Ceemoko sosi fedde woɗnde e hitaande 1934 , o inniri ɗum " Solidarité coloniale – Jokkere-enɗam Jiimaaɓe " .

Ci loolu rekk la " ENAJM " ak bepp kureelu njang ak tàggat di nekk ndajem bennoo askan wi ak itam jumtu yu mën jox ñi saytu caytu yi , ak kepp kuy liggéey ci nguur gi , xam – xam ci làkk , aada ak cosaan , ak nekkinu askan yu leen di may ñu joge askan wi nga xam ni ci biiram lañuy liggéeye te di leen yore ni mu gënna rafete .
Ci lu jëm ci duggal njàngum làkki réew mi ci " ENAJM " .
