Cifti : ko laaɓnde daɓɓe ɗe noɗɗo weddotoo kaaldiiɗo mum ngam ƴeewde so ina wiɗti
Ciftinen , e balɗe ɓennuɗe ɗee kadi , heblooji njuɓɓinaama to Nokku dewintooɗo jaayndeeji too .
Ciftinen Kapiteen Ibrahima Tarawele yandini ko gooto he yahdiiɓe mum nder konu Burkina , oon woni cukko-kolonel Paul-Henri Damiba .
Ciftinen Muritaninaaɓe heewɓe ina nguuri nder Mali ɗo ɓe ngollotoo haa teeŋti e ngaynaaka .
Ciftinen e daartol politikSenegaal ko ngol woni guleet ko ina wooda cukko hooreejo e hooreejo jaagorɗe e laamu ngootu .
Ciftinen he wiyde Sekene Moodi Siisoko , daartiyaŋke ŋanaa mo leydi Mali , helemere " afrik " ndee ko leydi Tuunus hannde ndii wiyetenoo noon nde rewo Afrik ngoo fof woni he njiimaandi Ruumnaaɓe .
Ciftinen hooreejo leydi Muritani ko jahnooɗo Washiŋtoon gila ñande aletaare yawtunde ndee , faandaare ndee ko tawtoroyeede lulnde ardiiɓe Amerik-Afrik .
Ciftinen kadi beldital Ecopia e Eriterea jibinii caɗeele nder Tigere .
Ciftinen kadi wonde leyɗe ɓurɗe tinde ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo ɗee fof ɓuri famɗude ko ngukkitta he gaasuuji dammbooji nguleeki .
Ciftinen ko ngol woni laabi 15 ko sarɗiiji yummaaji Senegaal ina mbaylee e nder duuɓi 8 .
Ciftinen noon Safiyatu jeyaa ko leydi Gine Konaakiri , ko naati e peŋgal ngal TPF wonaani lebbi 2 .
Ciftinen tan , lebbi seeɗa hade ɗuum , Microsoft naatniino Tamasig e topirɗe mum , yeru e Windows 8 .
Ciftinen tan Mammmadu Mariyam Sek lollirDo Abdul Aataa gawlo lelaaki sabu en teskiima darnde mako e uddital Jumaa Galle Ceerno Muntagaa Taa , njan'gu ngu fof ko e balDe 2 ndeke alaa baawDo foodondirde e geno .
Ciftinen tan ko e batu hilifaaɓe ñalnde 16 saawiyee 2014 laamu nguu ƴetti yamiroore hasde Rajihi leydi ndii .
Ciftinen tan ndee haayre alanaa en tanaa sibu bolol mayre ine anndaa , tee maa en nganndoy law so tawii en mbaawii haytinde nde , e hol no foti kaytin-ɗen nde ?
Ciftinen tawo Farmbaal Kahayɗi ko kañum wonnoo mawdo diiwaan Kahayɗi , kadi ko jaggal mawngal e konu Abdul Bookar Kan ngati e oon tuma hade Boosoya e Ngenaar renndude ko Faarmbaal heedi bannge rewo , Abdul Bookar heedi bannge worgo .
Ciftinen wonde sippirooji ɗii ko jeetati ngonnoo .
Ciftinen ɗoo wonde kuule Seŋngoor ƴettunoo paatuɗe e binndugól ɗemɗe ngenndiije ngaddiino luure keewɗe e oon sahaa ; ɓurnoo heen teskeede ko cówgól alkuule .
Ciftol ko huunde udditoore hakkille cukalel .
Ciftoren Baal Aamadu Tijjaani
Ciftoren Sankara waranoo ko 15 Yarkomaa 1987 .
Ciftoren daartol sariyaaji jowitiiɗi e juɓɓitingol jeyi leydi e Moritani
Ciftoren tan wonde ko e hitaande 1861 , wolde ɓesngu fuɗɗii he Amerik .
Ciiftoren kadi ko ngol waɗti laabi ɗiɗi howhowɓe Parti Socailiste mo Senegaal ena ƴettana Saharaa darannde e hare mum e Maruk .
Ciimti ene kabra en wonde Ka’abah Mahi ɗum ko Baaba Aadama nde jippi e dow leydi nde , won wiyooɓe kadi ko Malayka .
Ciimti koloñaal kollitii batte ndee hare , wolde hakkunde doole konu koloñaal he sete yimɓon seeɗa ndewkon he Ceerno Aali Yero .

Ciimtol ñalɗi ɗii kadi yaltinii ɗee geɗe teeŋtuɗe
Ciiñsiiñƴe lorlooje ina weeyo so naati e ɓalndu neɗɗo yoornat ɗaɗi , adda uube mawɗe e ndeer ɓalndu , ngam falaade ɗee ciiñsiiñƴe , laana ka e comci ɗi peewniraa ko ko tammbotoo oon lor waasa yottaade neɗɗo .
Ciiñsiiñƴe naange ina mbaawi niɓɓiɗin'de gite , rafiiji nguɗu ( cancer ) ina waawi heɓtaade neɗɗo , ruŋkude ɗoyngol e yeeweende fo ina mbaawi addude caɗeele goɗɗe .

Cofel cikku-ɗaa maa heɓ ndeen ñamaande .
Cofel fawtii e laawol , fotti e jaambaaro gooto , oon wiꞌi mo : Cofel to njahataa aan e sasa maa mawɗo ?

Coftal ɓalli : Biden ine ndaarda fuku e Ghazwaani to Wasiŋtoon
Coftal ɓalli ngal foti waɗeede ko e fannuuji keewɗi : diwgol tooweendi e njuuteendi , daɗndu , berlagol ekn .
Cofte keewɗe adunayankooje paɓɓaama walla nii kaaytaama ( fuku koyɗe , cofte ɓalli , batuuji mawɗi hakkunde dowlaaji ekn ) , to bannge politigi geɗe fof ko jowaaɗe , dingire politigi ko eggaaɗe maa mbiya hannde laamiiɓe ngalaa luulndiiɓe , ma a taw ko " ko ɓuri sasa yanii e woyndu " .
Coftingol cate jillaaɗe ɗee : Ɓoggee , Baabaaɓe , Seeno Busooɓe , Garlol , Fonndu , Likseyba , Kayhayɗi , Jowol , Sehilbaabi , Kiifa , Barkewol

Com
Com , Abuu Haaruuna Cuun kañum fof e heewreede rokkii en huunde sahaa mum ngam jeertinde renndo ngo e waylo-waylooji kuufɗi en ɗi .
Com Gaboo rokkude konngol jibnaaɗo men Abuubakiri Jaw lollirɗo Siree Jaw Ho’reejo Fedde Fuuta Catal Poor Jenti mbele omo haalana banndiraaɓe holi to ɓe njahrata e kebungal maɓɓe paytuɗi e ɗi ɗo ñalɗi pineyankooji baɗooji ñalnde 31 lewru morso haa 2 lewru Juko 2010 to Liberwiil wuro laamorgo politik leydi Gaboo .
Com bismo ɗo e sahaaji garooji Ho’reejo Fedde Almudɓe musiɗɗo men Basiiru Bah njeewtiden e makko pa’ndaale peeñɗe , cuuɗiiɗe , ɓadiiɗe e goɗɗuɗe dental ngal .
Com enen wiyooɓe mbi’i mi , wi’i mi e wi’i maa mi , en kaalii en ngaynii mbiy-ɗen : " jeddi ɓoli ngittataa yawaare " .
Com naaton e Fedde nde mbaɗlon min hirjinde , kadi njogano-ɗon min catal humpito .
Com sabu ɓe ciftorii harbiyanke leñol hono gorko mo Juude Jaaɓi e Cubalel en mbiyii Mammadu Habii ganndiraaɗo Aamadu Jool mo wirnaare mum waɗi hikka duuɓi tati .
Com suɓiima waɗande yilliyankooɓe mum daartol politikyankeewol leydi Mali haa teeŋti noon e golwole o ɗo gorko biyeteeɗo Moodiboo Keytaa baaba mum jeytaare Mali .
Com tawa ɓe njeewtata ko ko fa’ti e nafooje Pulaagu , sabu e wi’de makko Fulɓe ngalaa so wonaa pulaagu , haa ko ɗum tagi kala ko pulaar walla pulaagu ummini en paɗɗoto paɗe men laatoto-ɗen maccuɓe ndaro-ɗen e naange e jaangol haa ɗeen pa’ndaale keɓee .
Com tawi mo .
Com yillii ɗum ngam loskude ko fa’ti e kebungal maɓɓe toɗɗingal ñalɗi pineyankooji baɗooji to Liberwiil tawa teddiniraa ko jibnaaɗo men Pr Umaar Bah mo Dabbe Muritani cankiiɗo ko ina tolnoo e duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi .
Com ɗe ɗo jime garooje : Binndol , Leñol Am , Potal Leƴƴi , Goobu Allah , Dewgal Ladde e Nguurndam

Coñce !
Coñce coñce !
Coñce e ñeeñal leñol ngoni denndaangal gannditirɗe leñol , ko ɗe maande e maantorɗe , paarnorɗe , e beltorɗe leñol maa renndo jiidungo aadaaji e goowaaɗi e tawaaɗi .
Coñce ene cifee e ciiri ɗiɗi ceertuɗi
Coñce kay !
Coñce men e kuuɓal potaani woorde podooje e paandaaje leñol ngol , eɗe poti jaɓde yiɗde ɓesngu men , ɗe njahda e miijooji men e kala sahaa , ɗe tuugnoo e diine Lislaam .
Coñce noon ina waɗi binndaaɗe ina waɗi jaŋtaaɗe .

Cuurki sumi , niɓɓere lomti
Cuɓagol jaɓɓe e daawe teeŋtuɗe ngam laawɗingol Fulfulde
Cuɓo-ɗen gorko ganndo , nuunɗuɗo , mo jiirataa jawdi aduna ngam alɗude walla resande sukaaɓe mum
C’est pour ce situation que l’Unesco a signé un harmonie en tenant la Certificat nationale gabonaise pour le container de son soft d’fierté à la naturel et au luxe .
C’est seulement ainsi que l’ENAJM et toutes nos institutions d’enseignement et de formation seront des creusets de l’unité nationale , et des outils aptes à procurer à nos administrateurs , magistrats , journalistes et à tous les professionnels de la " chose publique " les connaissances linguistiques , culturelles et sociologiques qui leur permettront de se lier aux populations au sein desquelles ils travaillent , et de gouverner plus efficacement .
C’est sur cette communiqué que moi-même mettons un aboutissement à cette billet de la tassé locale ce cerbère .

DHSM ina ɗaɓɓi lelnugol piɓondiral cosgol ngenndi Muritani kesiri ngam mahde Dowla-Ngenndi goonganteejo , rewrude e dimɗingol lanndaaji renndo lesɗinaaɗi , e potal renndo kam e potal to bannge hakkeeji e fartaŋŋeeji , enen fof e seertude ngonka renndo , gaa gaa leƴƴi men , e tirbiiji men , ngam renndude ɓiyleydaagu tuugiingu e doosɗe Rippoobilik , kam e doosɗe Dowla nuunɗal e demokaraasi , renndude wellitaare , e nuunɗal , e beldital ɓiyngu yummaagu e ƴellitaare to renndo e faagudu .

Daar al-Hikmah wonaano tan galle firooɓe gannde ene lemminee , kono ɗo sakketɗoo wonti ko hono no duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde ni , ɗo ɗeen gannde kadi ene njannge .
Daari : Daarol ko ciimtol huunde woodnde ɓemmunde ko ɓooyi .
Daarol Nelson Mandela , dum ko gollé !
Daarol haalata ko golle baɗnooɗe e hol no ɗe laatorinoo .
Daarol ina heewi abbitneede e jawdi nehaandi , ko wayi no nayi .
Daarooɓe ena ndowlini cuusal Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi , ena mawnini ƴoƴre mum e kaɓɓagol mum e wune , no ɓe kaalirta geɗe tati ɗe o seertataa : fetel makko Buseelarwaay , ndimaangu makko Ummulatuum e lekki makko ( Ɓokki Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi ) .
Daarti gummiiɗi e laamuji feewtude e heɓegol jeytaare Afrik ina tonnga sahaaji dew-rewe wellitaare ndee e yeeso jaggitagol nafooje leyɗeele araniije ɗee , tawa ko ardiiɓe hesɓe leyɗeele jiimanooɗe ɗee nguurni ɗuum , mballiti e ɗuum , ina heewnoo yiyeede tuggude e kitaale 1960 .
Daartiyankeeɓe ɓee ene luurdi e hol cosɗo Baytul Hikmah .
Daartol Annabi Elyas’aa
Daartol Annabi Sam’uun
Daartol Barooɓe Jakel .
Daartol Nguurndam Nulaaɗo Allah he Pulaar/Fulfulde
Daartol annabi Yuusaa
Daartol dey hollitii haa laaɓti wonde kala ɗo miijooji añamnguraagu e ndoolndoolaagu tuddinnoo , ko boomaare lomi ɗoon yolnde : Almaañ , Japon , Irak , Libi , Siiri Ɗoo e Muritani , pelle keewɗe jojjanɗe aadee ceeraani e ɗaɓɓude ñawndugol batte taccingol e warngooji kitaale 1989-1991 , ɗe ceeraani e woytaade ngonka " hardaneeɓe " ( Dillannde jojjanɗe hardaneeɓe , IRA ) e jeertinde e " joñgol jaawngol , kulɓiniingol ɓaleeɓe e njuɓɓudi laamu nguu , e konu nguu e janngirɗe kese ɗe konu sompi , ɗo ɓiɗɓe senerooji e koloneluuji ngoni e tuteede ngam lomtoyaade jiknaaɓe mum en " .
Daartol fedde mon ko teeŋtinoowol ko taɓɓitde so tawii hatanteeɓe ndariima .
Daartol haalata ko golle baɗnooɗe , e hol no de njahrunoo haa ɗe laatii .
Daartol juuragol Wojere kaaƴe e dow lewru .
Daartol ko fannu ganndal jaŋtotooɗo dille jawtuɗe , sifoo nguurndam , goowaaɗi e gañaaɗi , donaaɗi e jiggaaɗi yimɓe ɓennuɓe , ngonka laamaaɓe e laamiiɓe , jotondiral maɓɓe e jotondiral maɓɓe e yimɓe heediiɓe kam e laamaaɗi keediiɗi .
Daartol maa nde haalaa fof ɓerɗe ngenndiyankooɓe na njaɓan maa
Daartol seto-naange e inɗe geɗe mum
Daartude ganndal way kono tagde haala kesa e ndeer ɗemngal nih , ko yirbude walla dimmbin'de ɗemngal haa konnguɗi kesi ndañee , mbela ganndal faamee ko maa ngal uura ganni ɗemngal .

Daranaade ndimaagu e nafoore ngenndi mum .
Darnanii ɓesnguuji waraaɓe ɓee ko hujjikintooɓe Me Prosper Farama , e Me Guy Guy Hervé Kam , e Me Benewende Sankara .
Darnde , golle e yiDde Baaba Maal fayde e lenol ngol alaa faayoore .
Darnde Fedde " Goodal " he Hare ngam Ɓamtaare Ɗemɗe ngenndiije e Ƴellitgol Pinal Fulɓe .
Darnde Gellaay e nder coñce Pulaar ine laaɓti no feewi ( ɗaccu boom miin mo mbiy-ɗon yo mi yeewtan on hannde oo , mi jogoraani dañde caɗeele keewɗe faamondirde e mon ) e faayiida darnde makko ndee ɗo tolnii e hol ɓesnooje ganndal makko e jimɗi makko ngaddani pinal men .
Darnde Kasganaaɓe na seedtini e kareeli maa
Darnde biyeteeɗo Yahyaa wul Mkaytiir , kalfinaaɗo jofle e nder ANAIR , alaa ko ɓeydi so wonaa tooke sibu makko daraade e jiiɓde hakkunde artuɓe ɓe e hoɗdiiɓe mum en , o haala ɗo huunde , o haaloya goɗɗum to .
Darnde makko haaɗaani tan e Keer , nde o arti ɗoo e Muritani kadi o jokkii darnde makko ngenndiyankaagal , e haɓde e humambinnaagal e nder Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani .
Darnde maɓɓe hannde ko yoo laamu nguu woppitmo walla so won bonannde ɓe tuumimo ɓe ngaddamo he yeeso ñaawooɓe .
Darnde tan woni feere !
Darnga aadee ɗeɓii daraade nde mboorka Toba to Inndonoosi
Darnude heɗɗooji to bannge sariya hoto ko wayi noon waɗtude ;
Darorɗe feebariyee , kolonel ɗannanii Gorgol e Gidimaka .
Darorɗe lewru Jolal hollitii kadi ɗo Ecopianaaɓe diiwe mum fof mbaɗti seppude caggal nde leyɗeele Amerik e Orop njamiri yoo yimɓe mum en njaltu Ecopia fes .
Dartinde e softinde njuɓɓudi fedde ndee tawo , e yaajtinde ɗum , haa teeŋti noon e cate ɗee haa mbaawa tammbaade paandaale kese dottaaɗe ɗee ;
Dartinde fuuntiiji e ɗawgol ɓaleeɓe e ekkolaaji militeer Nuwaasoot ( Liisee e ekkol Politeknik Toowɗo ) e Ekkol Konuuji Attaar ( EMIA ) kam e Ekkol Ngenndiijo Njuɓɓudi ( ENAJM ) .
Dartinde loppitgol leyɗe e juuɗe ɓesngu ngu teeŋti noon ɗo rewɓe ndaranii gollal njeñu ;

Dartini golle ko juulal tiisubaar .

Daŋana , hono Chesse wonde " biyeteeɗo Aali Yero , dognooɗo kasoo , yiyaama ɗoon e
Daŋe ɗiɗe gadane ɗe ina waawi tawa eɗe nguli no feewi , sabu eɗe ɓadii naange majje , eɗe keɓa fotde laabi ɗiɗi haa nay ko leydi heɓata e naange e nguleeki ( walla lewndu ) kono ina sikkaa waasta ɗo ɓuuɓi e dow majje sabu ɗe kollata naange majje tan ko yeeso woot , ɗuum firti ko jamma e ñalawma lomlomtondirtaa e dow majje , heen bannge ko jamma haa cay , goɗɗo o ko ñalawma haa cay .
Daɓɓito leydi : glissement de terrain
Daɗndugol hurum gure ko huunde nde sariya oo teskii sabu ko huunde nde laawol Maalik yamiri hay so tawii toɗɗaaki njaajeendi mum hol to haaɗata , faanditaa e ɗum ko mbele e ɗum daɗnda wurankooɓe ɓee e caɗeele ɗe eggiyankooɓe arooɓe ina compa koɗorɗe mum en saraaji ɗeen gure , ngam renndude e mum en durnirɗe ustiiɗe e tee kuuɓnaani soklaaji waali wuro en .
Debbo ameriknaajo , ɓaleejo iwdi Afrik , gidiiɗo naatde ñaawirde haaɗtirde DDA .
Debbo arani desondirɗo e moritaninaajo ina wawi ɗaɓɓude wonde moritaninaajo caggal duuɓi joy nde dewgal ngal humaa .
Debbo ene wonda heen tawa tampinaani ɗum
Debbo gooto tawaama hakkunde maayɓe ɓee ina wulla : " min mbaasii worɓe amen e sukaaɓe amen .
Debbo jeewo oo naywii , tee gorko oo ena wa’i no nattii waalde to mum .
Debbo ko maa mbaɗlitoro-ɗaa muñal .
Debbo ko pamaro doole yiɗi ko mooftowo e kisal .
Debbo labbo : -cakka uurka , ndowla , koɗi uurɗi , gowe , baata , cuuraawi , ɗaɗi uurɗi ( ɗaɗi uurɗi ɓuri waawde huutoraade ɗum ko ɓesɗo walla jombaajo .
Debbo ladde ene yiyi mette , debbo ladde ina yiyi mette .
Debbo ladde haame ko ngondu-ɗaa ko teelal .
Debbo ladde ina yurminii e gonal .
Debbo ladde ɗo yummiraaɗo aldaa e gondal .
Debbo nayeejo o naamnii mo : " Ɓinngel am to njahataa e ndee yolnde an tan ?
Debbo oo ganndal cellungal , ɓe ceedtii won`de ɓe ndesondirii dewgal cellungal tee ɓe naatdii ɓe mbirnodii .
Debbo oo wiꞌi mo yoo ummo ɗoon , ruttii yerƴi mo o yalti galle oo .
Debbo yiɗi ko teddungal .
Debbo ƴoogii he jehreende , Alla addani mo ƴiiwoonde .
Deede guubiliiiji goɗɗi ɗii ina kuutoroo peccitagol pelle goɗngol .
Deegowal ( rover ) " Wojere kaaƴe " waɗi ko biife jeegom , teddeendi mum ko 120 kg , so tawi yuɓɓi no haanirta nih ngal foti yottaade lewru ko hedde 15 e ndu lewru , ngal juuroo e dow nokku mbo meeɗa yilleede , a ngal reega heen ko foti no lebbi tati e njaaweendi 200 meeteer e ndeer njamndi ngootiri ( 200m/h ) , oon nokku ina naangi , ɗuum noon ina moƴƴi sabu maa loow alluuje kuɓɓam haa jokkondiral deegowal ngal e jooɗiiɓe leydi ɓe waawa laataade , ngal nulda nate e wiɗtooji goɗɗi fotde dumunna ngal wonata toon .
Deegowal ngal kiloogaramuuji 140 ɗaanna gila ndeen ( 03 siilo ) , ko e 10 siilo ngal fin'dina , waɗi noon ko ɓuuɓol mawngol woni toon , ndeen ngal fini , ngal adii fo ko ɓamde natal laana njolnunooka ngal ka .
Deegowal ngal maa ɓam ɓeto taariindi ɗo ngal jippii ɗo fotde hitaande Mbaañ ( balɗe men 687 ) , teddeendi magga ina abboo e 310 kg , a ngal waɗi kaɓirɗe 9 , tawa ɗeen kaɓirɗe mbiɗtata ko leydi ɗaŋre ndi , yanti heen ina waɗi ngasirdi mbaawndi asde ko foti no meeteruuji ɗiɗi nder leydi he , ɗuum noon ko mbela e ɓe keɓa leydi ndi fuunaani kadi ndi yiyaani naange , ko leykal kiskal baakal noon haan'di e hisnude kulle guurɗe walla batte majje .
Deegowel " Zhurong " ko mobel tafraaɗo loskude Mars ( Mbaañ ) : engel jogii biifi ( koyɗe ) 6 .
Deegowel Perseverance ngel jogii ko koyɗe 6 .
Deegowel Perseverance ɗanngal NASA feewde Mbaañ
Deegowel Siin ƴettii nate mum gadane Ñalnde 19 mee 2021ummoraade Mbaañ .
Deegowel ngel ndottanaa golle mum ko e ɓalɗe 90 dow Mbaañ , woni lebbi mum tati ( balɗe Mbaañ ɓuri balɗe Leydi juutde seeɗa ) .
Deengol falo jaaltaaɓe .
Deente koode ɗe , kanyum en kadi ena ɓurindiri .
Deente koode ɗee , kañum en kadi ena ɓurondiri .
Deerel ngel wona e ƴuufde .
Deestagol partiiji keewɗi
Defte e binndanɗe kuutoraaɗe
Defte kammuyankeeje gaadanteeje ɗe ene kabra en wonnde Allah fodaniino Ibraahiim ma O jippin e mum barke haa heewa ; O hebbina geñgol mum haa fota no koodee mbay e kammu walla no njaareende way e ceene tufɗe maayo ni heewde .
Defte ɗe no moƴƴi njeeye leyɗeele
Defte ɗe o winndi :
Defte ɗee ne mbaɗi ngartam haa wonaa seeɗa , maa min eto hebde e majji so yaajeende waɗi , tawii Allah ne welaa
Deftere Ganndal Nokku , hitaande joyaɓere , duɗe leslese .
Deftere Ganndal ƴiye jokkorɗe e liggorgal ( Ostéologie – artrhologie et physiologie : tummbitere 1 e Tummbitere 2 ( tuggi 1980 haa 1985 ) .
Deftere Ndeenka Yumma e ɓiɗɗo .
Deftere Sheek Muusaa Kamara
Deftere jime Pulaar .
Deftere ndee haalata ko mawnugol suka e mahngo neɗɗaagu aade .
Deftere ndee muulaa ko he ballal Miijorde Fulɓe Winndere , ko goomu denndinɗo annduɓe fulɓe heewɓe seertuɓe fannuuji , pelle pulaar , e hatanteeɓe leñol ngol fottitooɓe he nder lowre whatsapp , ngam daɗɗude pewje e hol no leñol Fulɓe yahrata yeeso .
Deftere Ñabbuuli jalɓi .

Demmba Idi Njaay
Demmba Jah waɗii golle coofɗe kaantorinɗe , so ammbude daande leñol mo Baaba Maal to cilon .
Demmba artii kadi ngam ittude kaɓirɗe mum so ɓe ngoppaani yimɓe ɓee njola e dingiral hee .
Demmba ena caggal wuro ( saare ) ene sawndindiri e maɓɓe .
Demmba hiiwtii woyi , hakkille oo yahi e ko fadi mo ko tawi saabii ɗuum ko juuta noppi .
Demmba hono Bamum Nafi ni , miilaa ko he nguurndam Fuutankooɓe , to Mammadu Jah heewi ƴoogde miijoojo mum .
Demmba juumii , yoo yaafno Leñol ngol , o tuuba
Demmba seydi Jallo ina wonndi e jom suudu mum .
Demokaraasi firtaani keeweendi njaltundi e woote ina jiima ko heddii koo .
Demokaraasi firti ko reende farwuɓe tawo , ko reende waasɓe , ɗawaaɓe e ɓiɗtaaɓe , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa ko kam en ngoni ɓurɓe heewde , ɓe daaɗe mum en nanetaake , gaa-gaa guri ɓalli mum en e leƴƴi mum en e tirbiiji mum en .
Denndaangal duuɓi ɗi Annabi Nuuhu dañi ɗii , tuggi nde o jibinaa haa o nelaa , ɓernde makko meeɗi muusde seeɗa ko e nder laamu Tuubiin nguu .
Denndaangal fannuuji ɗii njanngetee ko he ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee , he tolnooji ɗii kala .
Denndaangal humpitooji e wiɗtooji baɗaaɗi , jowitiiɗi he jaŋde tuugiinde e ɗemngal neeniwal , ine kollita wonde sukaaɓe ɓuri yaawde janngude ko e ɗemɗe mum en neeniije .
Denndaangal jime makko ko kirjinooje , pindinooje wonii to bannge jojjanɗe Aadee , jaqde ɗemɗe ngenndiije , darnde ɓiɓɓe leydi , diine , ekn .
Denndaangal kaayitaaji almuɓɓe waɗooɓe kawgel hikka 2015 ngam naatoyde hitaande adannde e rogere ɗimmere wonande duɗe falnde ndee kala , dennaaɗe e teelɗuɗe .
Denndaangal kuule maa ƴette ngam newnude ngool gartugol ɓiɓɓe yummiraaɓe men e nder leydi mum en .
Denndaangal leƴƴi cosɗi Dowla Muritani ko bellitiiɗi , potɗi to bannge hakke e to bannge faayiida e ndimaagu .
Denndaangal leƴƴi ɓeeɗoo Muritaninaaɓe , ina jogii hakke e peccitagol potngol ngaluuji ngenndi ndii , hakke fotndeede to bannge cellal e nehdi e jaŋde e heblo e golle e kumpital e geɗe kumpitirɗe e ƴellitgol ɗemɗe e pine majji , kam e daarti majji .
Denndingol kelle jaaynde nde e teppugol mum ruttoo e goomu o , kono nde wonde golle ɗe ko keewɗe , ɗum heewi waɗeede kono ɗoftal nii ( doggere ) mbele ina joofnee ko yaaƴtii sabu so lewru maayii maayaani tawata ko cate e janngooɓe nde ɓee mbaɗtii eeraade .

Dille Leydi e Lewru , e batte majje e ngonka men
Dille baɗnooɗe he nder Senegaal tuma nde lunndiyanke , Usmaan Sonko jaggaa ndee , jibinii kulhuli mawɗi he nder leydi ndi , haa ɓuri teeŋtude noon e wonande laamiiɓe ɓee e wonndiiɓe mum en .
Dille jahduɗe e waabiliire ndee koliirii ko heewi e geɗe wuro ngoo .
Dille weeyo ko diiraali e ŋurmaali koode ( naangeeji ) e geɗe weeyo goɗɗe , ɗeen dille maa cuuɗtu ko heewi e gonaangal geɗe weeyo ɗuum wonana en ganndal , ina jeyaa kadi e ko sunnatee dille nguurndam boowal leydi , ma en kumpito so tawii won ɗo tagoore woɗnde woni e nder weeyo hakkunde koode , sabu so tawii waaɓe noon ina ngoodi maa ɓe eto jokkondirde e woɗɓe ngam humpitaade .
Dillere ( mouvement ) lewlewal ko dillere filosofi , coñce e ganndal ƴellitiinde he feccere wattindiinde he teemedannde 17ɓre .
Dillere ( mouvement ) pinal anndiraande renaissance ndee haaɗaano tan e wallifaade jime e winndude defte pentol he nder ɗemɗe Orop , kono kadi ɓe tafi pelle e goomuuji ngam firde gannde Gerek ɓooyma e artirde pinal wellitaare hakkille .
Dillere ndee haaɗaani tan Amerik , nde yettiima Orop , haa nii Afrik , ngam momtude kala ko ina siftina koloñaal .

Doole denkannde haayre nde yooɓii piɗtaali ko heewi e kulle he , ko heddii koo higgu , punndi e cuurki jokkitiri seeɗa seeɗa haa ɗe ngasi , jooni ko ƴi'e majje tan njiitatee e lookli duunde baaba Aadama , to Niseer , Espaañ , Siin e nokkuuji goɗɗi .
Doole henndu ne ina ɓulnire kuɓɓam kono tan henndu ne way tan kono ndiyam nih ko maa ndu yaha nde doole mayru waawa heɓeede , ñalnde ndu dawaani fo kuɓɓam heɓetaake .
Doole ittateeɗe e ndiyam ɗe ne ko maa ndogojam dañe , uddooji mahe , nde ɗeen doole mbaawa huutoreede , ɗuum kadi batte mum bonɗe ina ngannda e taariindi gila e puɗi haa e leyɗeele ilatnooɗe .
Doole jamma oo ne ko hiirde diine .
Doole makko , haajuuji makko e kaalis makko fof o waɗii ɗum e darnde ɓamtude leñol kam e gollanaade Ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar .
Doole ndañen fooled mbaawen .
Doole ɓitto kammu fawi ko e tooweendi , ɗe ɓuri doolnude ko e leydi aɗa ɓeydoo toowde eɗe ustoo , doole ɓitto e tolno hello maayo ( la pression au niveau de la mer ) ko 1000 hektopaskal , ɗuum woni teddeeki ko ina abboo e kilograam gooto e dow teemedereɓal meetere naykiɓɓal ( 1 kg/cm² ) !
Doordooro ngoo fuɗɗortoo ko wejoodu ( Foire ) golle ndema e ngaynaaka ñamndeMawnde 25 Seeɗto 2008 e subaka kala ñalɗi dewwɗi heen ɗii .

Doosgal leydi Ecopia ngal 1994 , waɗi Ecopia ko leydi " Federal " denndingal dowlaaji pawiiɗi he leñƴi .
Doosgal leydi ndii ine holliti , he taƴre 4 naatirde mum : " ɓesngu Muritani ine heɓtini , tee ine hollita keewal pine mum , ngooroondi ngootaagu ngenndi e mahondiral renndo kam e ko jokkii e mum , hono hakke jogaade ko heerorii .
Doosgal leydi ndii wiyi wonde " ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee gootal heen kala ko ngalu ngenndi ngu muritaninaaɓe kala ndenndi , e nder ɗuum , ina waɗɗii Dowla oo hisnude ɗe e ɓamtude ɗe , e innde yimɓe fof .
Dow Leydi ndiin njaaweendi ko 11 , 2 km nder leƴƴannde kala ( 40 000 km/w ) .
Dow o ko ɓal-ɓaligal haa hippi e lewru , naange ina sooynee , Leydi ina sooynee yanti heen huunde e koode .
Dowla Muritani , cosaaɗo e hitaande 1960 , caggal keɓgol koye men e ummaade en e tiimaandi leydi Farayse , lelnii sariya juɓɓinoowo laabi laawɗinaaɗi jeyegol neɗɗo e nder leydi Moritani ( sariya mo tonngoode 61112 nyande 12 sulyee 1961 ) .
Dowla Muritani feri ko kappanɗe ɗiɗi : heen wootere tuugii ko e ndema inniraaka PNDA ( Programme National pour le Développement Agricole ) walla mbiyen Tuugnorgal NGenndi ngam Ƴellitaare Ndema e happannde ɗimmere wiyeteende PNDE ( Programme National pour le Développement de l’Elevage ) hono Tuugnorgal Ngenndi ngam Ƴellitaare Ngaynaaka .
Dowla Nijeer ko leydi mawndi to bannge juuteendi e njaajeendi werto mayri ko miliyoŋ , teemedde ɗiɗi e capanɗe jeegom e jeeɗiɗi ujunere kiɓɓal , wiyaama nii endi sowoo leydi Farayse fotde laabi ɗiɗi e yimɓe mayri ko sappo e tati miliyoŋ tuugnaade e binnditaagol hitaande 2005 .
Dowla ina gaddii reende jeyi keeriiɗo no wiyraa e nder kuulal 2 , sariya 83 127 ñalnde 5 suwee 1983 " Dowla ina heɓtini , etee ina gaddii jeyi telɗuɗo tuugiiɗo e sariya lislaam , potɗo wallitde ƴellitgol faggudu e renndo leydi ndii " .
Dowla kala e nder winndere nde ina hatojini e anndude yimɓe mum hiiseteeɓe wonde njeyaa ko e fatere leydi ndi dowla oo tiimi ndi .
Dowlaaji Amerik Dentuɗi
Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik njaltinii kominikee ngam hollirde DDA njaɓaani njangol laamu toɗɗaangu e doosɗe demokaraasii .
Dowlaaji Orop keewɗi
Doŋe ɗaŋre men Ngaawe e daartol majje .

Dr Alhuseynu Bah

Drépanocytose ko rafi ƴiiƴam .
Duko ngoo heewii to binndi , kaalirɗe , ayawooji e kabaruuji kolce-bamɗi .
Dukooji e ko yowitii e hol ko foti wonde identitee leydi Muritani , ko duko fuɗɗiingo gila he kebungal jeytaare Muritani ndimaagu mum dawrugol .
Duleendu ne ko keneeli ɗiɗi kawrata , ɓuuɓndu e wulndu , ɗi pilfiltundira ɗi laatoo duleendu , doole mayru fawii ko e mooɓre keneeli ɗi .

Duuɓi 20 caggal ɗuum , e hitaande 1914 , ko adii wolde winndereere adannde , ko nii aduna siforinoo : Farayse e njiimaandi mum , Ndenndaandi ndentundi , Espaañ , Purtugeec , Peyi-Ba ( Pays Bas ) , Belsik , Almaañ , Itaali njiimi ko ɓuri heewde e ngaluuji winndere , tee , he miijo mum en , ko kam ndaɗi heddiiɓe ɓee , ɓuri ɗum en finde .

Duuɓi 50 caggal maayde filosof , dartiyanke Senegaalnaajo , Umaar Bolonndee Joop he nder dummbirde , fotde 50 neɗɗo , gila e dawriyankooɓe , toowaganndal’en , e naalankooɓe Senegaalnaaɓe e woɗɓe jeyaaɓe he leyɗeele keewɗe ceertuɗe , ciifii ɗaɓɓaande eeraago ( ene tawee ɗo ) fayde he laamu Senegaal ngam doosiyee makko uddite .

Duuɗe Deeƴngo ( Pasifik )
Duuɗe Salomon , walla mbiyen duuɗe Sileymaani , ko dowla jeyaaɗo e Melanesi .
Duwaaw fayde giɗo leñol
Duwaaw ko noddude Alla ñaagoo ɗum moƴƴere , nde wonnoo Alla ko moƴƴo , jogiiɗo , dokkoowo , jiɗɗo ñaageede , kala mo ñaagotaako Alla rewaani Alla , sabu ma o ñaago ko wonaa Alla .
Duwaaw ko siftorde Alla , e hollirde lohre mum e sokla mum fayde e joomi mum , wondude e mantude neemaaji makko , Alla toowɗo o wiyi : " Ciftoree kam mi siftora on , mantanee kam ( neemaaji ) , hoto njeddito-ɗee kam " .
Duwaawu men hannde ko dañde ko dañde no ñawndir-ɗen ɗee caɗeele .
Duwanaade banndum juulɗo ɗo tawaaka , maa Alla jaabano oon rokka mo kanko ne hono ɗuum .
Duwawuuji kumirteeɗi dewgal ine keewi sanne .
Duwawuuji men faade e Kajjata Muusaa , jom suudu makko , faade e sukaaɓe makko , faade e denndaangal koreeji makko , faade e sehilaaɓe makko e musiɓɓe makko , faade e denndaangal ɓoggeenaaɓe e Muritani no diidorinoo .

E WIYDE MAKKO
E aayaawo kabrirɗe keɓen .
E aduna hee fof , wonnduɓe e jabet fannu 2 ɓuri e heewde en wonnduɓe jabet fannu 1 .
E alluwal ɓennungal ngal , mi wiyiino wonnde ɓeen wonnduɓe e jabet fannu 1 , ɓalli mum en in ŋakki insulin sabu baggol mum en memeede .
E balɗe jawtuɗe ɗee , won ko kewi e Nuwaasoot ko heewɓe tinaani walla paamaani ko woni tigi rigi .
E binndol walla mbiyen e haala , toɓɓe daawirgal Richter alaa ɗo kaaɗi , kono , e ko tabiti , yerɓo leydi meeɗaa ɓurde toɓɓe 9 , 5 ; woni doole yerɓo leydi waɗnoongo to Sili e hitaande 1960 , umminnoongo wempeƴere moolanaande ( tsunami ) .
E biyɗe jaaynde Punch , gooto e terɗe DSS mo nelaaɗo maɓɓe jokkondiri hollitii wonnde o jaggiraa ko sabu tafde ngaal diɗɗal reenooɓe , sabu ene hulaa ɓe ummina fitina he nder leydi ndi .
E bi’ol hooreejo Ahmet Yener goomu wooteeji Turkiya , njaltundi ndii hollii wonnde ko Resep Tayyip Erdogan hikkii yeeso caggal woote waɗaaɗe ɗen ka daawal ɗiɗaɓal .
E daarti nokku oo , Maalik Gallu Bah ko gooto e siñcuɓe wuro Tummbere Jiinge ngoo .
E darorɗe 1995 , sankaare mawɗo parti kominist e konu ANC ( Umkhonto we Siɗwe = fedde baafal ngenndi ) , hono Joe Slovo ( tuubaako daneejo ) , waɗanaa feeto ngenndiyankeewo .
E darorɗe lewru saawiyee 2013 , lowre internet " alakhbar " habriino wonde laamu " Muritani rokkii jamirooje ngam winnditaade saharaanaaɓe , naatna ɗum en e etaasiwil ɓetguuro Muritani " .
E darorɗe teeminannde 17-ɓiire , gure subalɓe keewɗe gonɗe e yupporde maayo Niiseer , ngonti jehreeji mawɗi jiyaaɓe .
E deeƴde nge hakkille , ngel jogii miijo wullude ngam yiilaade faabu : Jullaare ar faabo mi .
E der ɗuum , ɗo wuro mawngo woni fof , waɗanaa ko fedde nde sukaaɓe cappanɗe njeegomo , yahrooɓe e sappo e jeetati hitaande haa duuɓi cappanɗe tati .
E dille sanɗaaji 1968 tawi omo jannga e duɗe hakkundeeje Bamako .
E diwanɗe tati , waandu rutti e duunde ndee hodno ndee .
E dow Ngaawe , carfe naange cooroto e faandu henndu he haa mema leydi nduuya peewta dow to weeyo , kono huunde e nguleeki carfe ɗe haggat e faandu henndu ndu ɗuum wiyetee hido-faandu henndu ( effet de serre ) , so ɗum alaano ɓuuɓol doolnatno e dow leydi haa wonoya -15 degre selsis !
E dow Yumma-njenaare , yaama kadi e dow wooturu e lebbi Rojju baage nani njiyloo anndin'de men ko woni e dow ɗee ɗaŋe , mbela meeɗiino wuureede walla boom so tawii won ko wuuri e majje jooni .

E dummbuli luggi sagataaɓe njooliima .
E dumunna jawtuɗo oo Riisi addi konu keewngu ( fotde 100 000 soldaat ) he saraaji keerol Ikren ngol .
E dumunnaaji battindiiɗi e nguurndam makko ɗii , o daraniima ittude luure gonnooɗe hakkunde makko e won yimɓe e yaafnaade denndaangal pergitte ɗe o dañdanoo tuggude e nder ngenndi makko Fuuta Tooro haa to nder leydi Senegaal tawi saabinoo ɗum ko waasde faamondireede .
E fannuuji goɗɗi , kala ko yowitii e jaŋde e pinal koko dartii : ekkolaaji e duɗe jaaɓi-haaɗtirde uddii , jumaaji nattii juuleede , nokkuuji beytorɗi e pijirlooji pine ( nokkuuji fuku bal , sinemaaji , galleeji pine ekn ) haala mum en haaletaake , kono eɗen teskoo ɗiin nokkuuji kala ko nokkuuji ɗi yimɓe heewɓe nguurnoo sabu dañal ummotoongal heen .
E fartaŋŋe jaltugol tonngoode 200 jaaynde men " Fooyre Ɓamtaare " , miɗo yiɗi addude seedantaagal-am he ndee jaaynde nde nganndu-ɗaa faayidaaji muuɗum e renndo men ngasataa .
E fawaade daartiyankooɓe e wiɗtooɓe Maasinankooɓe , wuro Hamdallaay ina waɗnoo­ 116 mawɗo galle , 740 duɗal jaŋde Quraana , 60 " Haafiz " Quraana , 120 reenirde " alyatimaaɓe " , 100 deenɗo Quraana jeytoraaɓe e Batu Mawɗo , 60 leegal ina e nder wuro ngoo , ­ 74 jofnde , Jumaa baawɗo nawde juulooɓe 3 000 , ­Calliginorɗi 3 000 .
E fawaade e Portokol Hebron mo 1997 , wuro ngoo ina feccaa e leeɗe ɗiɗi .
E fawaade e deggondiral abajada , leƴƴi jeyaaɗi e leydi hee , kiisaaɗi ina njeyaa e cosɗi Dowla Muritani ko : Wambarankooɓe , Biidaan en , Haalpulaar en ; Hardaneeɓe ; Sooninkooɓe e Jolfuɓe .
E fawaade e ko o seedtii , geɗe goɗɗe ina ngaddana en faamde no moƴƴi hol ko kewnoo nde o joñetee ndee .
E fawaade e ko ɓenni koo , eɗen mbaawi wiyde hooreejo leydi rokkaaka hurum kaaɗtudi ; so o waɗii geɗe e sifaa keeriiɗo , tawi ko geɗe ɗe ngalaa he donngal ngal doosgal leydi taƴani mo ngal , hurum alanaa mo ɗoon .
E fawaade e konngol jaggal falnde ndee , Marselin Kisammbo , garɗo nootitaade e kasaara oo : ɓuri 230 maayɗo e fawaade e 105 gaañiiɗo " .
E fawaade e ɗee ɓure memotooɗe limtaaɗe ɗee , kam e baɗte faggudu jaakoraaɗe he wuro Ɓoggee e saraaji mum ɗee , e kulhuli paatuɗi e jeyi leydi , kam e bonanndeeji baawɗi heɓtaade taariindi kaaɗɗi e juuɗe .
E fuɗɗoode , goomu oo etiima yiilaade hol no foti innirde jaaynde ndee , inɗe keewɗe cakkita

E geɗe ɗe limtu-mi ɗee , keewɗe heen njowitii ko e fannuuji nguurndam .
E goɗɗe kadi ɗe cuwaano tawo muuleede : Tuubaak-Ɓaleejo , War-hoore , e Seydal .
E haala makko , haa jooni : so tawii duɗal njanngu darnaama ɗo e Galle Seek Tijjaani ina jannginee diine islaam , ɗuum ko huunde waɗde faayiinda ; kadi juulɗo fof ina foti weltaade heen , yeru faayiida o tan ko nde Allah tellini wahyu e Nulaaɗo mum nde , O wi’i mo ko : Janngu !
E haala winndiyanke oo , nde joomiraaɗo yamiri oo Aadama ( JKM ) , yo yaltu faya Arafaat , Aadama yalti fayi toon , darii toon , o tinaani tan haa Hawaa feeñani mo ɗoon .
E hakkunde teeminannde XVIIɓiire , kompaañi neerlanndeejo Inndo hirnaange ( Compagnie néerlandaise des Indes occidentales ) ina heewi doole .
E hannde oo ina tawee wonde , wonaa tan diɗɗe Oropeeje mbaawi fawde kuuge , kono ngoo wullitaango ko winndereyankeewo iwngo e capanɗe limtinɗe miliyoŋaaji aadeeɓe dartoriiɓe wonde ñaawooɓe , nder mbunndi njiyaagu mumen .
E hiisa maɓɓe , 125 ndiwoowa , so mbaɗii yah-ngartaa seeɗa he ceeɗu , maa mbaaw ustude fotde 2°C hitaande kala he nguleeki kii nder diiwaan hee fof : huunde mawnde no feewi .
E hitaande 1479 Españool en ndartini lappi mum en feewde Afrik .
E hitaande 1776 , ko tuubakooɓe mbiyata Rewolisiyoŋ Tooroɓɓe koo , fooli e Fuuta e gardagol fedde juulɓe mo mawɗo mum en , hono Sileymaani Baal .
E hitaande 1807 , Dentaldowlaaji Amerik e Laamaandi Ndentundi laawɗinii karmingol njulaagu ɓaleeɓe .
E hitaande 1815 Usmaan Dan Fojo toɗɗii ɓiyum biyeteeɗo Muhammed Bello yo lomto ɗum .
E hitaande 1883 , o ñaagii ballal tuubakooɓe Farayse mbele aɓe curana mo njanguuji baabiraaɓe makko Bakari Demmba e Dikkori Demmba .
E hitaande 1903 , doole goɗɗe koɗii nokku oo : Biritaannaaɓe keɓti Kano ( feebariyee ) , e Sokoto ( marse ) .
E hitaande 1931 o heɓi seedamfaagu walla sertifikkaa pirimeer , o naati duɗal njanngu hakkundeewal biyeteengal " Terrasson de Fougere " hannde duɗal Askiyaa Mohammed , duuɓi tati pawtii heen , o ɗannanii Ndakaaru Senegaal o winndii e duɗal toowngal biyeteengal William Ponty , O waɗi toon duuɓi ɗiɗi omo heblee e fannu janngiyankaagal maa dabiyaagal njanngu .
E hitaande 1938 , o nanngi wirdu e juuɗe Alhajji Saydu Nuuru Taal .
E hitaande 1945 koloñaal Farayse sosi fedde wiyeteende MICUMA ngam fuɗɗaade aggito kiri .
E hitaande 1953 beresilnaajo biyeteeɗo Marcolino Candau arditii OMS ko ɓuri duuɓi 20 .
E hitaande 1956 , o woni meer wuro Bamako , kadi o toɗɗaa nulaaɗo suudu sarɗiiji leydi Farayse yanti heen o toɗɗaa cukko hoyreejo nduun suudu .
E hitaande 1960 fayde e hitaande 1961 , o naati duɗal jaŋde toownde wonande Afrik e Malgaas ( Afrique et Malgache ) , ngal ɓe mbiyata C .
E hitaande 1962 , caggal caɗeele keewɗe , ɗe o dañdi e seernaaɓe Fuuta , Alhajji Mahmuud fayti ko to leydi Kameruun , nootaade e bismaango Aamadu Ahijoo , laaminooɗo leydi ndii e oon sahaa , ngam jokkoyde toon golle ɗe wonnoo e dow mumen .
E hitaande 1977 , no Seeku Aamadu
E hitaande 1980 , iiñcuru mawndu waɗi e leydi he sabu caɗeele nguura , woppaani haa liɓi laamu Luwis Kabraal e nder kuudetaa militeer ƴiiƴiiwo .
E hitaande 1984 doosɗe leydi kese ngootaa , leydi ndi arti e njiimaandi siwil en .
E hitaande 1985 , laamu Apartaay wiyi Manndelaa , ina waawi woppitde ɗum e dow sarɗi .
E hitaande 1989 , Muritani jaggondirii e Senegaal jaggondiral muusngal .
E hitaande 1989 njiimaandi Riisi yahii haa Almaañ fuɗnaange , e hitaande 2019 ine woɗɗi ɗoon no feewi , sibu nde naattoyii no feewi faade fuɗnaange .
E hitaande 1990 , ceerno Mammadu LOH yahi to fuuta tooro ngam nootitaade e duttagol jiɗnaaɗo makko gorko e joom mum ( yo Geno wele jiɗnaaɗo o ) nde o arti , o artidi e ngoƴaaji muusɗi mo , e ngaan sahnga o holliti Kawtal Janngooɓe Fulfulde e Winndere ( fedde wontunde Tabital Pulaaku Farayse ) to fuuta ko jananinkooɓe ɓe ngonaa fulɓe ɓultotoo ( ittata ) ngaluuji fulɓe , tawi njaggirta walla keɓirta ɗiin ngaluuji ko nyeenyaagu mumen ko wayino sehngo lekɗe waɗta ɗum baafe , mahngo kuɓeeje , baafe jamɗe , feewnitooɓe otooji e geɗe bayɗe noon , alaa heen ko ɓiɓɓe fulɓe toon mbaawani koye mum en .
E hitaande 1993 , o waɗaa cukko-kuuɓal FNGD , o ardii catal mum toppitiingal deeƴre .
E hitaande 2002 Jeneraal Ahmadu Tumaani Tuure paabinooɗo malinaaɓe e ndoolndoolaagu Jeneraal Muusaa Tarawore ari ƴamtude lefol laamu ngol o rokkaa hoolaare nde haa hitaande 2007 , oon kadi hesɗitinaa haa 2012 wona hankadi aadi makko e leydi ndi timmii haade wonii kuulal ngenndi ngal ina salii neɗɗo ƴamta walla rokkee lefol laamu cili tati deggondirɗi .
E hitaande 2006 , MCM ( catal FQML ) fuɗɗii golle , ina woppanaa duuɓi joy yoɓataa lempoo , yoɓataa njoldi .
E hitaande 2008 ( hanki tan ɗum noon ) , David Eltissaakti Faawru keɓe mawndu yowitiindu e njulaagu ɓaleeɓe rewrude e atalantik : The Trans-Atlantic Slave TradeDatabase .
E hitaande 2009 , yeewtere Tufnde Ganndal sosaa , Mammadu Demmba halfinaa nde .
E hitaande 2015 ɗoo tan jaaynooɓe wiɗtooɓe njiyti kaayitaaji ndernderi sosiyatee oo , kollitooji wonde sosiyatee oo ine anndunoo , gila e maayirɗe kilaake 1970 , jotondiral gonngal hakkunde kuɓɓam ɓarakke e ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo .
E hitaande 2017 , golle ƴeewngal kuuɓtodinɗe ngummanaama he winndere ndee no diidorinoo , ngam ƴeewde gudde ɓaleeje ɗiɗi , hono M87 e Sgr A ;
E hitaande 2018 ndee , Siin yeeyii nder Dental Dowlaaji Amerik fotde 558 miliyaar dolaar kaake ( ko ɓuri heewde heen ko kaɓirɗe elektoronik ) .
E hitaande 2019 , eɗen ciftora , " natal gadanal , natal goonga-goonga wuddere ɓaleere " hollanooma .
E hitaande 2020 , maa NASA werlo pelmotooka ( impacteur ) ka ñiso mum tolnii e 300 kg ngam tawtoyde , e nder lebbi 18 , kaaƴe ɗiɗi weeyo jirlondirooje ( wootere heen kala ine yirloo woɗnde ndee ) , miijaaɗe ina coomani en tanaa .
E hitaande 2023 deppi hina e lesdi hee , kono ko heewi e kullon mbidii , sabu bonee sooño e yimɓe .
E hoore ɗun hari Dura Bari no fiju garli makko welɗi .
E innde Goomu kooninkeewu ndaraniingu kisal ngenndi ( CMSN ) , Lietnaa Kolonel Mohammed Khuuna wuld HAYDALLA .
E innde catal ngal e innde am heeriinde , e min njetta : Sal Suleymaani ; Baal Umaar Hammaat ; Aysata Jaari Sal ; Mikaayiilu Haruuna Bah ; Abdaramaani Joop ; Ajiiju Baal ; Abdul Jah ; Hawwaa Abdullaay Sal ; sukaaɓe wonnduɓe e amen gila fuɗɗoode haa joofnirnde .

E jooni jooni o kam hay go’to weltaaki e njeñtudi puɗɗaandi heɓee ndi , haawnaaki e lofu cakkitiingu ngu , saatotooɓe ɓe njolbina juuɗe seeɗa walla kine saakitaaji mumen , mbele heewɓe ina mbaawa ɓooɗde peeroo paya gaɗa maayo .

E ndeer deftere makko JOWONDIRAL KEERTINGAL ( relativité restreinte ) ; Eynisteyn ñootondiri gannde dille goowaaɗe ( mécaniques ) e kuɓpooɗal , ɓaawo ɗuum o yaaɓani eggirgal hakkunde daɗɗuɗe ɗuum naamndi ko heñaare ( accélération ) walla ruudde ( décélération ) ngaal ganndal woni JOWONDIRAL KUUƁTIDINNGAL ( relativité générale ) loski ko ɓuri heewde e gannde , pooɗal ko heen jeya .
E ndeer lewru silto ( September ) , tawi ndu feccini deegowal Kiriyoositii yottii haayre Sarp , ɗo ngal woni ɗo ina sikka leydi ngonndi ɗoon ndi ko ɓooyndi , ɓuri hay haayre nde ɓooyde , ko ɗoon masiŋ o asi ngam nokkude huunde e leykal haa waawa wiɗteede , ƴeewee mbela eɗen kumpitoo no nokku o waano tuma de haayre nde ƴuuŋi .

E nder aduna men hannde oo ( 1989 ) , wuuri e dow tagofeere men Leydi nde ko miliyaaruuji 4 neɗɗo , pawɗi miloŋaaji ( gila e tigguuji haa e mawɓe nayeeɓe oskos , debbo yoo , gorko ) .
E nder batu kuuɓtodinngu e darorɗe hitaande nde , Yiilirde Ngenndiire Fedde nde hollitii jooɗnde nde keɓal teemedere ( 100 ) dingiral walla parsel to wuro Njaay Loh e Sanngalkaam .
E nder binndanɗe hee , sukaaɓe ɓee ekkintee ko janngude , faamde e heɗaade ngonka woɗɓe .
E nder demokaraasii , ene woodi kadi senngo woɗngo , tawi wonɓe e mum ɓee , wonaa mo woni fof waawi faamde darnde mumen e golle mumen .
E nder duuɓi 20 jawtuɗi , nde wonnoo annduɓe ina njanananoo ɗaŋe goɗɗe mbaasata woodde , ɓe njaaɓani yuurnaade asamaan ngam yiytude ko woni toon e ɗaŋe , ɓe njiytii heen ko heewi , ko ɓuri heen heewde noon ko paali henndu tan no Rojju nih ( Jupiter ) kono won heen ko leydi tigi woni e majje , waɗi ndiyam e kammu ( atmosphère ) mum timmuɗo , won heen ina nguli ngonotaako goɗɗe ina ɓuuɓi haa ɓurti .
E nder duuɓi ɓennuɗi ɗii , ɗum ƴettii mbaadi kesiri , fawaade e pellital laamu nguu e wellitde juulde ndee nder leydi hee , fedde lorɓe ndee abbiima he ndiin mbaadi : ɗum ina addana en siftorde Kayhayɗi e hitaande 2017 , Aksuus 2019 cuusal ngal rewɓe maayraaɓe ɓee kolliri toon .
E nder duuɓi ɗiɗi tan , nayo he ardiiɓe hirnaange Afrik ngittaama he gannginorɗe mum en , e gooto daɗɗo he folleede .
E nder fedde laamiinde nde , SLPP , gila e hitaande 1996 haa 2007 , Fulɓe heɓii heen geɗal mum timmungal , ngam jaagorɓe Fulɓe no heewi e laamu ngu , hakkunde jaagorɓe njowo haa njeeɗiɗo , gila fedde SLPP nde laamii e hitaande jantaande dow nde .
E nder ganndal koode , hoodere ko tagoore werlotoonde caafe gulɗe , hokkoore caafe gulɗe .
E nder gorol " asteroyid " ngol ( hono gorol kaaƴe gonɗe hakkunde Supiteer e Maars ) , heen e majje ena nganndaa , ena innaa , mawneeki mum en ena ɓetaa : heen haayre wootere mawneeki mum ko 740 km , nde wiyetee ko Seeres ( wonaa Seereer dey !
E nder heen , ɓe njuuriima kadi rawda Suleymaani Baal , udditaa , ɓe mbaɗi duwaawu , ɓe kollitaa adii waɗde ɗoon maande ko Duudu Baal , kolonel diƴƴe e dunli ( oosefooree ) , caggal nde yani , Jiingenaaɓe e gardagol Njaay Saydu Aamadu mahi yenaande ndee e ballal Fedde yiɗɓe Sileymaani Baal to Itali , ñalnde 1 mee 2008 .
E nder hitaande ndee wootere , caggal nde o arti Muritani , o waɗaa diisnondirɗo karallo ( conseiller technique ) to Duɗal Muritani ngal wiɗto gannde , ngal ɓe mbiyata IMRS ( Institut Mauritanien de Recherches Scientifiques ) .
E nder hitaande wootere , koronaa-wiris warii fotde miliyoŋaaji ɗiɗi neɗɗo he nder winndere ndee .
E nder jaaynde nde o hetti e hitaande 1943 ina nwiyee " Yiytere Keneduguu " " L’œil de Kenedougou " , o ñiŋii heen ko aldaa e suuɗaare aadaaji men bonnuɗi en diine ko wayi no : seɗɗaagu , toorodaagu , ngawlaagu , cubalaagu .
E nder kaa ngonka , leydi Farayse habrii wonde ina hebori ustude soldateeɓe mum ko ina abboo e feccere ( ko 5 000 ndonkani , mi anndaa so 2 000 ina kattani ) ma a taw nii ɗuum ina jeyaa e ko saabii gardiiɗo jaagorɗe Mali wiyde " Farayse woppii min e yolnde " .
E nder kaan ngonka tiimtagol e aadaaji , ɗooftagol jiimaaɓe ɓee laamu nguu , fawii ko e kulol ɓe njogii e doole laamu nguu .
E nder kitaale 2007 haa 2008 jokkondire goɗɗe mbaɗaa .
E nder kitaale 80 , hakkeeji aadee njaɓɓaama ɗo no feewi .
E nder konngol lomto gardiiɗo OXFAM INTERMON o , holliti ko wonde ñalawma 15 oktoobar oo foti mawninireede kono juldeeji goɗɗi dokkiraaɗi rewɓe no ñalawma 8 marsa nii sabu ko ɗuum Fedde Dowlaaji Dentuɗi faanditii heen ngam ɓeydaade ƴaañde ƴellitaare rewɓe e nder aduna oo kala ; O manti no feewi darnde Njuɓɓudi Rewɓe laawɗinooɓe ( Réseau des Femmes Parlementaires ) teeŋti noon e wonɓe ɗoo e moritani ɓe darnde mum en e ƴellitaare haqqeeji rewɓe e winndere nde humpani hay gooto , seede mum hannde ko ɗiɗo e maɓɓe inan ɗoo hannde tawtoraa ngam teddinde jonnde men nde .
E nder konngol maako udditirgol , hooreejo Fedde nde , hono Mammadu Siley Bah wiyi : " hiirde nde ina teddi , hiirde nde ina weli , sibu eɗen njogii ɗo neɗɗo jiɗɗo ngootaagu leƴƴi Muritani , hono Ahmed wul Hamsa , hooreejo kominotee irbeen Nuwaasoot " .
E nder laamu Maaouiya O .
E nder lebbi jeegom haa hitaande ɓe ƴeewndaa .
E nder lewru seeɗto ( abril ) nduu njangu waɗii ceɓtam rewo leydi Muritani , ɗo ndi heerondiri e Ndenndaandi Sahara bannge hirnaange .
E nder leydi Senegaal ndi , waawi huutoraade sarwiis oo tan e ooɗoo sahaa ko Tigo e Orange .
E nder leydi hee , teeŋti noon e wuro Mosuul ɗo ɓe mbaɗti laamorgo maɓɓe , ɓe ngonaa juulɓe ndañaani heen jam : kereceŋ en , leƴƴi jeyaaɗi e Turkmen en , shabaak en , yeziidi en , ɓe kolliti ɗum en ko poti suɓtaade e nder geɗe tati , tuubde ngonta juulɓe walla njaɓa kubbal ( 250 dolaar/hoore kala tolno e 60 000 ugiya ) walla joomum en egga so wonaa ɗum daaɗe mum en ndemee .
E nder leydi ndii , Fooyre Ɓamtaare woni jaaynde wootere , wajjere yaltoore e ɗemngal ngenndiwal ngal wonaa Arab .
E nder leydi ndii , kominikeeji ena njana waktu kala ngam " semmbinde " laamu kesu nguu .
E nder ndee yeewtere , mbismotoɗen ko Aamaadu Lamiin NGOOM , lollirɗo Dokta .
E nder ndee yeewtere en njaɓɓoto Elhaj Umaar BALDE , badoowwo " Slam " , jeyaaɗo Gine .
E nder ndeeɗoo deftere fattamlamre , jinnaaɗo men Abuu Hammadi Dem lollirɗo Mammadu Huley etii tawo ko haalande janngoowo nde , no nguurndam njulli siforinoo hanki , hade mum arde e caɗeele mum e jaŋde lekkon farayse , jaŋde quraana e taraabuya mum e baaba mum , ceerno mum hono biyeteeɗo Alhajji Umar Deh mo Gudduɗe .
E nder ndeeɗoo tonngoode : " Ganaagayte , Mameer , Asiis , Hamed Umaar , ANAIR , Feere Mesawuud , " Cukalon laaɓa juuɗe " , ciftorgol Umar Bah Mboyna e Tijjaani Aan , laaɓal e nder diine Lislaam
E nder ndiin mba’di fotde capanɗe nayo e go’o debbo e gorko keɓii takkaneede medayuuji kaŋŋe ( 5 ) , kaalis ( 15 ) e jaka ( 21 ) e juuɗe jooɗaniiɗo Mawɗo leydi hono Guwerneer diiwaan o Gaspaar Naŋ Ellaa e Perefee Falnde nde Tomaa Kuwomii .
E nder nduu lewuru Abiril 2009 , Fooyre Ɓamtaare jokkondirii e suka debbo naalaŋke ŋanaa , ganndaaɗo nder leydi Senegaal e Muritani , haa e caggal duunde Afrik to Farayse e Almaan e Engelteer e Beljik Oo suka debbo woni Pennda Budal Saar .
E nder ngenndi men , eɗen poti haɓtaade e mbaaydi ndegiindi e kuuɓtodinndi nduu henndu bonndu .
E nder ngoon iiñco-iiñco , Bolondee Joop felliti , kaŋko e sehilaaɓe heewɓe , ummaade Farayse ngam janngude hare wonndude e njogitaaje .
E nder nguurndam Alhajji Mahmuud Bah , hay so binndol ngol yaltinaani , ena laaɓi kam wonde geɗe tati ena laaɓti heen : fiɓnde , duwaaw e jaambaraagal .
E nder njanguuji ɗi ɓe mbaɗata e won gure ɓe ngonaa juulɓe so ɓe pooli ɗum en ɓe mbaɗtata ɗum en ko jiyaaɓe , ɓuri heen heewde ko leñol yezidi en jiidaani e yahuud en , shabaak en e kerecee en .
E nder noddaango hee , ɓe naamnima heen naamne keewɗe : " Mbele en ngoppat masiŋaaji kebbina jaaynirɗe men kabaruuji fenaande ?
E nder oo ɗoo yeru , njaggu-ɗen hoyre men ko en tagofeere , njaggaten suudu ndu ko naange .
E nder oon kaalis neene am , heɓii mahande min dingiral ( terrain ) mo baaba am woppunoo ngal , mbele emin ndaña ɗo min mooftii .
E nder peccugol hikka ngol , muulirde ngenndi ndee , heɓi ko 40 miliyoŋ MRO ( ande heɓatnoo haa 60 miliyoŋ ) .
E nder renndo fulɓe , denndiraagal ko huunde nde heedtinaaka caggal e nder nguurndam , feeñiroore e mbaydiiji keewɗi :
E nder sahaa daɓɓo wojere felti .
E nder sahaaji garooyooji KO laamu Moritani e hoore mum tammboytoo golle d’e kala , yo en kawroy heen .
E nder sarɗiiji leydi Gaboo , ko mawɗo Senaa leydi ndii hono sokna Rose Francine Rogombe gori ardaade .
E nder tagopeeje 9 ɗee fof alaa ɗo yimɓe no men nii njiyaa , alaa ɗo nguurndam ɗam nganndu-ɗen ɗam yiyaa so wonaa e Leydi .
E nder tagopeeje ɗee fof , ko tagopeeje ɗiɗi tan yiiloo-banngoo mumen weñcitii ; ko e majje tan naange fuɗirta hirnaange so ɗe ndaardaama e Leydi , hono Wenus e tagofeere Uraanus .
E nder winndere nde no diidorinoo , ko leyɗe nay tan kuutortoo ooɗoo sarwiis ; e nder Afrik ko Senegaal ɗiɗmiti Ganaa .
E nder wiɗtooji e ɗemngal Pulaar , o wallifiima defte joy ( 5 ) e Pulaar .
E nder won e nokkuuji , jaaynde ko ɗerewol kabrowol , jaaynowol , jeewtowol , sahaa nde wona finndinoore .
E nder woote cuɓagol hooreejo leydi jawtuɗo o , Sidi wul Sheek Abdallaahi huninooma , so ɓennii , maa yuɓɓin diisnondiral ngenndiyankeewal peewtungal e Jaŋde e nehdi e heblo leydi ndi .
E nder yeewtere fowru wi'i lella : haande ma mi holle ko a meeɗaa yi'ide .
E nder yeewtere hee , sahaa fof dañat ko ɓe lommbi heen .
E nder yiiloo-banngoo mo mbaɗaten o , so en njahrii noon eɗen taroo suudu ndu haa en ngartii e damal suudu ngal , ɗum wonii hitaande .
E nder yontere eɗen njogii balde jeeɗiɗi .
E nder ñalawma gadano oo , gollordu nduu udditiri ko konngol Mammadu Saar koolaaɗo fedde FONADH , caggal nde o bismii gollidiiɓe fedde ndee e denndaangal tawtoraaɓe gollordu nduu , o holliti ko wonde sabu himme mo leydi jogii e nder nguurndam aadee , ko ɗum saabii hannde pooɗondire leydi ina jeyiaa e ko ɓuri teeŋtude e luure gonɗe e nder ngenndi hee hannde , haa ko e ɗum saaboo iñcuru e nder renndo hee .
E nder ɓeen sowɓe e ndeen moobaare ina jeyaa debbo gooto ina wiyee Mariyaama Juuf , ko oon korɗo Allah go’to Allah rokki fartaŋŋe jaŋtoraade ɗemngal mum e oon jamma ɓaleejo mo yaawataa yaltude e hakkillaaji men .
E nder ɓetirgal doole yerɓo leydi biyeteengal Richter , so jerɓe leydi ɓurondirii toɓɓere wootere , yeru , heen yerɓo wonii 7 , ngoya wonii 8 , ina wayi no yay ( amplitude ) yerɓo 8 ngoo ina sowoo laabi sappo yay yerɓo 7 ngoo , kono semmbe yerɓo 8 ngoo , ina sowoo laabi 30 semmbe yerɓo 7 !
E nder ɗiin kulhuli politikyankooje Pr Alfaa Konnde haalii , haala njamyama o wi'i : " haade wonii ko Belees Kompaawore Hooreejo leydi Burkina Faso woni kalfinaaɗo ɗaɓɓande ginenaaɓe jam , kala nde o noddi min hade makko joofnude konngol makko tawata ko min jettiima , ngati ko kanko woni jiɗanɗo Gine deeƴ , potal e ƴellitaare .
E nder ɗiiɗoo duuɓi , hono 1885 haa 1890 , Diiwaan Tooro wonnoo ko iiñcere mawnde .
E nder ɗiiɗoo duuɓi 15 ɗi o yalti kasoo , innde Mandelaa jeyaa ko e inɗe ɓurɗe darjude e winndere nde .
E nder ɗum Abuu Haaruuna Cuun wallifiima deftere coñce pulaar faayodinnde , nde woni nii hannde o ko juuɗe Fedde nde wonaa laamuyankoore fannoriinde njanngu ɗemɗe ngenndiije wiyeteende ARED/GOOMU e haawnaaki nde heɓa muuleede e sahaaji garooji .
E nder ɗum fidaawu waɗaama to genaale Mbaawu ( Ndakaaru ) sabu heewɓe e maɓɓe ko ɗoon lelii .
E nder ɗum min keɓii fi’de ko ina abboo e capanɗe tati e ɗiɗi ( 160 .
E nder ɗum o rokkii yilliyankooɓe Lowre Pulaagu .
E nder ɗuum , kalifu kaalisaaji hono Caam Jommbaar e kalifu ƴellitaare dowri hono Barahim wul Mbaarek nulanooma to Ɓoggee ngam etaade jaɓnude yimɓe diiwaan Erkiis e Ɓoggee ɓee yo ngoppu sosiyatee Sawuudnaajo oo , hono Rajihi rema 31 000 hektaar ndokkaa ɗii , tuggi Tararsa haa komin Buhdiida ( 18 kiloo hade maa yettaade Eeleega ) .
E nder ɗuum , kamɓe jaambureeɓe wallitnooɓe Siidi ɓe , ɓe ummini jeeyngal e nder galleeji , ɓe takki mo yiɗde ñaawde ɓeen warnooɓe koye .
E nder ɗuum , ko politikaaji gaawooji ngañgu ɓuri yaajde e politikaaji yoga e leyɗe , politikaaji dagnooji paltoor e joñgol leƴƴi ɓuraaɗi keeweendi .
E nder ɗuum , ɓesngu nguu ina ɗamininoo maa batu hilifaaɓe njooɗinoongu ñalnde alkamiisa 5/09 wood peeje ƴetti .
E nder ɗuum joɗnde teeŋtinii geɗe garooje ɗee
E ndew-mi takkon naalaŋkaagal , o yaltini leppi makko ɗiɗi gadani ko 1992 .
E ndiwii e firo men hee damal II dekere oo , sabu ngaal damal joofotoo tan ko juɓɓule dokkaaɗe mbaawka yiilde geɗe jowitiiɗe e leydi to nokkuuji dowri .
E nduun wejirdu , wejo ngoo uddiri dame ko ɗereeji kaalis meeɗnooɗi huutoreede e nder leydi ndii gila nde Muritani natti huutoraade ceede Seefaa .
E ngaal ɗanngal , o yahdi ko e gawlo makko , diisnondirɗo makko Sew Malal e dookoowo makko ena wiyee Dunguru .
E ngal ɗoo pottital , ko wayri yiyeede seedaama sabu diɗɗal Barooɗe Senegaal yaltinii takke mum , holli mbaawka mawka .
E ngarndiika lefol ɗiɗmol ngol , o wiyi omo " yaafnoo yimɓe pinal ɓee sabu eɓe kaɗtii Ibraahiima Moktaar Saar e fannu mo ɓe nganndunoo-mo oo so daranaade ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ɗee , haa teeŋti e ɗemngal pulaar " .
E nge woɗɗi leydi fotde 150 miliyoŋ kilomeeteer , ko ɗuum waɗi nge famɗirde en e cooynam , kono ɗuum firtaani ko leydi ɓuri nge mawnude .
E ngol jaagol Sittoor Nduur , hewɓe mbiyi o wonndi ko o weltaaki e ko Makki Sal totaanimo jappeere meeri mo Fatik , o wona meer ; wotɓe mbiyi ko omo ɗaminii suɓeede , jaagorgal e ko fayi arde .
E ngol laawol , musee Bah anndinii maa ɗum saɗtu no feewi .
E ngolɗoo lappol tataɓol , hooreeɓe leyɗe Gine ɓee , hono Umaru Siisokoo Mbaaloo mo Gine Bisaawo e Kolonel Mamadi Dummbiyaa mo Gine njoɗodiima e hooreeɓe lappol ngol , ɓe njeewtidii e maɓɓe geɗe keewɗe jowitiiɗe e caɗeele guuraaɗe e nder Afrik , ɓe kollitii weltaare maɓɓe e darnde lappol ngol , tee ɓe mbiyi wonde ma ɓe ndaro mbele faandaare ndee ina yettoo .
E ngoo bayyinaago yaltungo haŋki , Al Kayidaa hollitii wonde ko kañum'en moofti dahaaɓe ɓee .
E ngoo wuro , ñalnde 23 Marsa 2019
E ngoon bayyinaango ɓe ceyfiti jamfa laamu Abdel Asiis waɗnoo oo , kam e wiyde ɗum kam tan ina yuɓɓina woote ɗe nanondiraaka , kam e " sinemaa njuulu Kayhayɗi " .
E ngoon miijo , eɗen teskoo " Farayse ko ko halfunoo en .
E nguuɗoo ndiiwgu ɓaleeɓe , yimɓe ɓe paara tan ko to Senegaal , walla to MAALI .
E njillu makko to Afrik Baŋnge Rewo , o wiyi Farayse wonaa jogorɓe dumaade e ñiɓde peŋɗe konu mum'en e nder Afrik .
E noddaango Flam , denndaagal pelle moritaninaaɓe , jooɗaniiɗe neɗɗaagal e nder leydi Farayse ngarii tawtoreede ngooɗoo seppoo .
E nokkuuji jillaaɗi ɗii , tawaama caɗeele keewɗe ko wayi no yimɓe ɓe leyɗe mumen teetaa , gila e leyɗe demeteeɗe haa e koɗeteeɗe , sabu won egginaaɓe tawi gure mumen ko kaŋŋe yiytaa heen , tee kamen ndonkii hoɗneede e nokku moƴƴo , yanti heen kadi ɓe tottaaka ndaamordi moƴƴiri .
E nokkuuji keewɗi ɗi o darinoo ne , yimɓe ɓee ngoytiima ko woni caɗeele mum en e ngoƴaaji mum en .
E oo aduna tato Keɓataa heen ganndal E oo ɗo aduna mo ngon-ɗen tato keɓataa ganndal e makko .
E oo alet hannde 26 lewru 03ɓuru hitaande 2023 .
E oo aset 25 lewru 03ɓuru 2023 , hitaande 2023 ngaduɗen ko toɓɓere ko faati e gollande hoore mum , mbele rewɓe ina mbaawani ɗum ?
E oo kikiiɗe aljumaa , Ekipu fuku juuɗe ( Basket ) mo Bopp waɗii no woownoo waɗde .
E oo sahaa , ko leyɗe joy tinaa ina njogii tuugnorɗe feewnude
E oo sahaa aɓe njokki e meetaade e ɓetde e hiisaade bolol mayre .
E oo sahaa kam eɗen njaakorii ko logginoo loggitiima : hooreejo leydi toɗɗiima gardotooɗo goomu njuɓɓinoowu kaaldigal ngal , hono Yahya wul Ahmed Waghef , ( cortiiɗo e luulndo gila Ghaswani ari e laamu ) mo won heen cifortoo ko " wojere " kono luulndo nattii haŋkadi jogaade woytoraandu , Biraama fusiima sabu luulndo jaɓanaanimo koo ɗaɓɓi koo ( ɓe nanngaani ɗemɗe mum en ɓee nii mbiyi " so o yiɗii yo o tawtoy sehil makko keso mo o faggitii oo " , Mes-uud e nannalla battindiiɗo , arii tawtude " banndiraaɓe mum " .
E oo sahaa ko peeje ɗiɗi ɓurɗe teeŋtude ngoodaa to bannge peewnugol ñakku
E oo sahaa nde min mbinndata ndee winndannde , min kabraama wonnde leydi Senegaal artirii jooɗaniiɗi ɗum to Maruk haŋki .
E oo subaka dewo , 05 lewru mbooy hitaande 2006 , fulɓe mbaasii sagata mo ndewaani ñamaande .
E oo ñalnde ñalluɗo 1 duujal ( mee ) 2016 Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani e Fedde Sifaa Hanki e Dental Orop ngarii timminde aadi e naamndoraade Jeeriyel Tummbere ko seedtinoo tuggude e teeminannde 18ɓere .
E oon dumunna noon , pekaan ine heewi faayiida e nder leƴƴi ɗii kala , walla kinɗe ɗee kala , sabu eɗen nganndi nguundam leñol ngol ko ko yuɓɓinaa tan , hinnde fof ine jogii fotde mum e golle mum ɗe heerorii mbele leñol ngol ina wuura .
E oon jamma toɓo ngo , ina yahdi e henndu wuttirooru doole , laana ka ɓeydii wuuraade , yimɓe ɓe ngam ɗuhaade henndu e toɓo ndogi tawtoyi yimɓe joɗiiɓe e bannge guuriiɗo o , ɓe iirtondirii toon .
E oon kikiiɗe ɓeydii-mi laaɓeede woni goonga tan ko wonde moƴƴo suɓoo faggaade moƴƴuɓe caggal nde anniyaaji kesɗitinaa gooski ki juulaa e gardagol ceerno Mammadu Bookar mo Kayhayɗi waktuuji joy pawɗi 50 hojom , Ñokkaan naatnaa e suudu mum , wirnaa , wirnii gite yiɗɓe e sehilaaɓe .
E oon mudda won wiyɓe ko leeɓte njippinoo e yimɓe , ngam heewde ɗum en bakkatuuji .
E oon sahaa , Abel Sanndee ne , ina jokki e siynude feere mum , e feccude Tooro .
E oon sahaa , Nooro yahi e pokpokalam ɗam ndaarii banngeeji kala .
E oon sahaa , debbo gardiiɗo gannde weeyo to NASA , hono biyeteeɗo Lori Glaze , wiyiino " en naatii jamaanu keso ɗo kattan-ɗen hankadi daɗndude koye men he buɓɓondiral e haayre weeyo waawnde bonnannde en " .
E oon sahaa , juurotoongel tokosel ara juuroo hawngo wiiduru nduu , ine jolni jerƴowel ñillel .
E oon sahaa , tawi min miijiima waɗtude
E oon sahaa , tuggi 1980 haa e lewru feebariyee 1989 ( tonngoode 30 ) , yaltinde ɗereeji sappo keppondiraaɗi , hay gooto anndaa ɗo tampere mum tolnii .
E oon sahaa , ɗo naange arti e waynaade , ena sura walla ena forla caafe mum cakkitte , punndi njofoori e kaɗooje mutoowo ena mbaɗdi iirtilloo .
E oon sahaa gooto e caggal mum , guubiliiji bonɗi , uragaaji IRMA , e JOSE e HARVEY e MARIA ina mbooma leydi Amerik e duuɗe Saint-Martin e Saint-Barthélémy , e Kubaa , Dominique , Guadeloupe ekn
E oon sahaa ina woodnoo njeenaari teddundi , korsinaandi , tottetenoondi baañoowo cuɓaaɗo e nder maɓɓe , tawi ko sabu jaambaraagal mum , muñal mum e peewgol mum junngo , tawa kadi sifaa mbaawka mum ina softina , ina hirjina haa teeŋti noon sukaaɓe .
E oon sahaa ko caɗeele mawɗe to majji jaltinaaɗi seto ɗii .
E oon sahaa mo Ganaa naatni ngadaniri , Burkinaa jooɗiima !
E oon subaka maayo ngo finnaani engo deeƴi hawri kadi ko ñalnde ndeen waɗtata ka laabi walla cili tati ko ka waɗata yah ngartaa hakkunde Cikisoor e Ndakaaru caggal nde haralleeɓe fannu o keɓi hoolaare wonde hankadi bone makka mekanik fuuyii .
E oon tuma , laamaandi Gaabu tawi fuɗɗiima deestaade sabu kareeli ndernderi .
E oon yonta , tawi leydi Farayse naatanii jooɗaade Jeeri Kaasamaas ( Haute Casamance ) .
E oorngal ( kampaañ ) woote ɓennuɗe ɗee , mawɗo leydi oo , e cili keewɗi , ngam dallinde pirtugol senaa , takkii senaa oo wonde " sabbundu muuɗnugol " .
E ooɗoo dumunna fof kadi , Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe to Farayse ceeraani e woytaade caɗeele kawrata ngam winnditaade , sibu maɓɓe ɗaɓɓireede addude kaayit biyeteeɗo " kartal koɗaagu " ngal leydi Farayse rokkata tumarankooɓe huuɓnuɓe sarɗiiji koɗaagu e leydi mum .
E ooɗoo nokku oɗon mbaawi yiyde ɗo ɗemɗe keewɗe njahrata e firo mum en : Pulaar fuɗɗaaki tawo , ɗum noon ndado-ɗee !
E ooɗoo sahaa , eɗen eɓɓi yillaade cate ɗee , e yettaade nokkuuji keddiiɗi ɗii ngam sompude heen njuɓɓudi ( cate walla peŋɗe ) .
E ooɗoo sahaa , renndo ngoo koko natti jogaade njoorto he laamuuji ɗii , koninkooɓe teettii gannginorɗe ɗee he juuɗe siwil en fawaade he caɗeele ndeenka .
E ooɗoo sahaa , terɗe mayre ko noogaas , kaɓirɗe mayre ko beenuuji ɗiɗi e peeluuji e ratooji e burwetaaji
E ooɗoo sahaa kadi ko e duko wonaa : hol no nguun goomu foti suɓireede ?
E ooɗoo sahaa mo njahraten duɗal ngal bilaama , heddii ko raakde ɗum e waɗde heen kaɓirɗe : jooɗorɗe , geɗe janngirɗe , gila e defte haa kaɓirɗe goɗɗe Ballal mo woni kala ine hatojinaa : so mbuuɗu mum , so kaɓirɗe mum , so defte mum ekn .
E ooɗoo sahaa saretaaji tati ɗii fof ko bonɗi , ɗum noon ɗomka ina dooki wuro ngo e nguuɗoo ceeɗu ngulngu .
E ooɗoo sahaa ɓur-ɗen heewde nande tan ko haala ñakku Pfizer e Moderna , peewnaaɗi to Dental Dowlaaji Amerik .
E ooɗoo ñalawma noon , o gollotoo ko e gollordu heedooɓe ( awokaaji ) , gollordu keedoowo ganndiraaɗo Mine wul Abullaah .
E raɓɓinaade mbiyen ñalɗi Ndulumaaji mbaɗii faayiidaa haa juuri .
E raɓɓiɗinaade yeewtere ndee roondii ko ɗee toɓɓe : - rokkude yiyannde e luure paytuɗe e iwdi fulɓe haalpulaar'en ; - holi ko Fulɓe kaali e iwdi mumen ; - holi njiiɓtirten hakkunde maɓɓe - hollirde nate laɓɓinooje iwdi maɓɓe , gile Misra haa ɓe njettii to ɓe njettii ɗoo
E renndo Fulɓe
E sahaa hannde oo , en nder ordinateruuji 100 fof , heen 90 ko Windows kuutortoo , 8 heen ko Mac OS , ko jaasi 2 kuutortoo ko Linux .
E sahaa mo njahraten hannde oo , ko ina ɓura 90% e kaaƴe mawɗe ( woni ɗe hakkundol mum seɓi kiloomeeteer ) keɓtinaama , njanngaama , tee hay wootere e mum en alanaa en tanaa e nder teeminanɗe garooje ɗee .
E sahaa mo njahraten oo , tawegol toon ɗee geɗe ɓalliije firtaani alaa e sago maa maaɗe nguurndam tawe toon , tawe ko kullon nguurnokon toon ngoppi ɗoon .
E sahaa nde Belees kompaaworee ardii Burkinaa Faasoo ndee , jotondiral e won e hoohooɓe Tuwareg en murtuɓe ɓee e won e jihaadiyankooɓe , diftotooɓe tuubakooɓe ina ɗaɓɓa njeenaaje humpaani hay gooto , hay so tawii ina anndaa darnde teefankaagal ( yiilaade heen kuttirɗi ) ɓurnoo heen wonde gollal makko , ɗum ina falaninoo mo njanguuji jihaadiyankooɓe .
E sahaa nde lajal parlingal e gollugol leydi ndii joofi walla nde lajal aawre leydi ndii no siforaa e kuulal 91 gonngal les ngal , huuɓi ;
E sahaa nde o liggotoo to Farayse ndee , so o artii waɗti omo teskoo so o yahii he supermarcheeji he , ñameele sukaaɓe ɗe o yiyata ene njeeyee he nder Senegaal ɗee fof tawata ko gittoyaaɗe caggal leydi , alaa heen ko feewnaa he nder Senegaal , o wiy o miiji wonnde ɗum ɗoo dee ko fartaŋŋe mo nguppuɗen nafoore mum ene wirtoo en .
E sahaa nde tottirgol leydi e mudda ndii wonti dokkal pandungal ;
E sahaaji garooji , eɗen poti waɗtude rokkude " Jeenaaje Murtuɗo " paytuɗe e Yimiyaagal , Kumtambinndugol , Ngootaagu Ngenndi , ekon .
E sifaa keeriiɗo , mbeɗe jogoo dakamme mawɗo so mi janngii kelle paatuɗi e daartol , walla ganndal weeyo , ganndal taariindi , walla kadi celluka pulaar , ekn .
E sifaa kuuɓtodinɗo , koorka alaa
E sifaa kuuɓtodinɗo , yimɓe hoɗɓe e boowal Muritani hannde
E sifaa laaɓtuɗo , lappol ngol ko ɗee geɗe yettini joɗle ɗee
E siftinde banndiraaɓe won Weendu Maraysa ndu kaalaten nduu woni ko e ngalluure Ligisayba to diiwaan Gorgol , sara Jiinge Jeeri .
E siftinde wonde ɗowi njuɓɓudi ginol golle ñalawma oo ko jaayndiyankooɓe ɗiɗo : Hammee Aamadu Lih e Mayram Selli Kan .
E siftinnde mbiyen ndeɗoo fedde sosi ɗuum ko Aminata Mbaay gotnooɗo cilidiiɗo ñawatteɓe ( anwooka ) , caggal nde o dañii biɗɗo dafaaɗo hakkile , ɓeydi ɗuum kadi e oon sahaa hay safrorde wootere yahraari ko faati e cafrugol ɗawaaɓe hakkile e terɗe .
E sikke am , ngol tonngol ena waawi kadi winndireede nih
E subaka noon e subakaaji huunde fof waylii wonande gurel amen , nde waɗɗiiɓe puccon , ɓe koppeteeji , wakkiiɓe petelaaji catii gurel amen , ɓe curi nay , remooɓe yoo sippooɓe alaa daɗoowo .
E talataare saaliinde ndee , hooreejo kiɗɗo Amerik " Donald Trump " noddaama e yeeso suudu sariya .
E teeminannde 18ɓiire ( teeminannde limiyeer ) , geɗe ummortooɗe Amerik ɓeydii sokleede no feewi to Orop , haa teeŋti noon e suukara ummortonooɗo Sen Dominnge , ɓeydiiɗo feewneede sabu gollingol ko ina abboo e 550 000 jiyaaɗo .
E teeminannde sappoɓiire , luure nderndere puɗɗii jolde .
E teeminannde ɓennunde ndee , won annduɓe taƴatnoo ko kette njogoram baaɗi , walla njalnoroo ɗum cereeli cewɗi bayɗi no caafe x .
E tolnooji ɗii kala , so almuɓɓe ine njiɗi janngude fannu goɗɗo , ine njamiraa , sibu jaŋde ndee yahdata ko he ngoƴaaji maɓɓe .
E tonngol , eɗen mbaawi wiyde wonde ko coñce e ñeeñal ngoni peeñirɗe leñol .
E tonngol , miɗo ɗaɓɓiri suudu men teddundu nduu , nde ƴettata kuulal ɗaɓɓowal e laamu nguu nde ƴettata sarɗi ittoowo kartal koɗaagu e binnditagol hee , sibu ko kaayit janano mo fotaani jeyeede e sarɗiiji binnditgol yimɓe men to Farayse .
E tonngol Seedantaagal Yiilirde Ngenndiire yaltoore ( seedantaagal galle fedde , 2003 ) hollitaama ko ɗo haala Galle fedde nde yahratnoo , e oon sahaa .
E tonngol haala , nder winndere ndee , ardiiɓe leyɗeele ɗee ko ruŋtiiɓe hakkeeji aadee .
E tonngol tan Abdul Bookar laamiima duuɓi 56 ko e farmbaal tan nani " waɗ " , " mi waɗaani " .
E tonngol wiyaama ko suka debbo gooto ina wiyee " Sainte Barbe " ( walla BARBARA ) mawɗo oogooɓe , jiɗaaɗo haa ko alaa ko foti .
E tonngoode Fooyre 208 ɓiire nde decembre 2021 , en tawii heen miijo biyɗo ko Pulaaku ɓurani ɗum diine , Pullo ko gardinɗo pulaaku fawi heen kala goɗɗum .
E tuugnaade e ciimtol liyetnaa Houmaire , gardinooɗo catal Rooso , Wullum waɗii bonanndeeji garooji ɗii : " Ñalnde 25 saawiyee 1950 , o yanii e kippu PTT ( poosto ) peewnatnooɗo ɓoggol telefoŋ hakkunde Eeleega e Misriyya , o ɓoli ɓe haa ɓe laaɓi , o ullii he sooynde ;
E tuugnaade e geɗe keewɗe , gila e Doosgal leydi ndii , haa e njeñtudi golle Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije , kam e binndaaɗe e sariyaaji winndere ɗi Muritani siifi ( Bayyinaango huuɓtodinngo jojjanɗe Aadee , Nanondiral Afrik wonannde Jojjanɗe Aadee e Ɓesnguuji ekn .
E udditgol mooɓondiral nayaɓo Tawassul , lannda jogaaɗo jikke , miɗo jogii mbelamma e suutde mi konnguɗi feewde e banndam’en rewɓe e worɓe renndaaɓe faandaare , e ummannde to bannge dawrugol , tawa miɗo rewra e winndude on oo ɗoo ɓataake , ngam yelanaade on puɗɗorogol golle ngal ɗoo mooɓondiral e jam , ko noon ñaaganortoo-mi on Alla keɓgol wune e golle ɗe ngon-ɗon e dow mum ɗee .
E wallondirde e Afrigen , ANLoc siynii eɓɓannde mum naatnude ɗemɗe keewɗe e gannde gaanndi .
E wasiya fayde e leñol
E wattan heblo ngoo , rewɓe ɓee tiiɗtinaama , keɓii kaɓirɗe ngam waawde sarde ɗiiɗo miijooji e nder gure maɓɓe .
E wejirdu ɗiɗaɓuru , ɗum woni wejirdu dumunniiru nduu , kaawisi banngotooɗo , so taƴtii damal , ko doggol pille maantiniiɗe to bannge koɗki , baɗnooɗe e Muritani , gila nde neɗɗo fuɗɗii hoɗde heen , ko ena tolnoyoo e duuɓi miliyoŋ , haa arti e duuɓi 2000 , ko adii daartol kereceŋ-en .
E weltaare , Ceerno Aliw Bah , ko noon ne , Habii Gay Saar , gardiiɗo yilirɗe Bopp holliri " ko weltaare tan , mo woni kala e amen hollirii jambaraagal mum , neɗɗaagal mum .
E wi'de Pr Alfaa Konnde lofu ɗimmu ngu foti ƴaañaade ko hakkunde waylaare e jokkol , e nder nggon miijo lanndaaji politik keewɗi ndoganii lannda makko " so tawii mi yiyii yimɓe ginenaaɓe tawa ko yontaaɓe baŋ yoo baŋ , joom en gannde 'en ( cadres ) , ardiiɓe lanndaaji politik ina njantina doole mu'en e am , mbaawat mi tan ko weltaade " .
E wiide rajo Farayse RFI , no naane subaka gila waktuuji jetati ( 8 ) nande alarba , Kpatcha Naasimbee jaggaa .
E winndannde faynde njaaɓanten ko " DOKKAL LEYDI PANDUNGAL " , mbaawen timminde ganndal men ko yowitii e fannu ɓurɗo himmude e sariya jeyi leydi mo toŋ .
E winndannde ɓennunde , en kaaliino ko fayti e Wolde Ɗacce .
E winndannde ɓennunde ndee , en ngardiino e daartol men haa ɗo kaalaten Bakkar wul Suwoyd Ahmed , mo ciforino-ɗen Maamaari Tagante , ganndo mawɗo golwole e hare fetel .
E wiyde COD , " won toɓɓe ɗe o jaɓaani haalde to Neema : – hol battane RAJA ?
E wiyde Fenner , ko en nattooɓe woodde sibu en keewii haa ɓurti .
E wiyde Gurmo Loh , " MAA wonata hannde Muritaninaajo naatɗo juuɗe Polis , gidiiɗo jogaade hakke e awokaa gila he daawal gadanal losko fuɗɗorgo Polis , tee ɗuum ko hujja mo awokaaji Muritani meeɗaa seerde e laajaade , haa teeŋti he laamu MAA .
E wiyde Hoyreejo ndeen Fedde hono Nasaardiin Haydara : " ɗi ɗo yeruuji ɗiɗi , eɗen mbaawi wiyde laamu ngu fellitii jamfaade hoolaare walla ɗamaawu waayeeɓe ngenndi , ngati so tawii ngu fellitii faabaade sukaaɓe ɓe e sahaaji garooji jogorɓe heɓde ndiin ndaamordi ina pota limaade e peɗeeli juuɗe .

E wiyde Muusaa Jallo deenatnooɗo Thomas Sankara " warngo Sankara e yahdiiɓe mum ko moojobere fewjaande Hooreejo Kodduwaar Hufuwet Boñi , jagodin Farayse , wonnoo ko he nehaande moojobere ndee " .

E wiyde Pentagon lottannde jooni ndee , ko hoolkiso " aadoraango " , alaa " tanaa soomi " wonande Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) e yahdiiɓe mum .
E wiyde Putin " ko njogitaari ndi hono mum woodaani , cemmbinoori kattanɗe konuuji men , kisnoori Riisi he musibbaaji ummortooɗi ɗum boowal , ngaddanoori ñaññuɓe gijoytooɓe leydi men miijtaade no feewi " .
E wiyde Suleymaan Mammadu Kan , hooreejo Fedde ndee , " innde fedde ndee e daartol coomingol e innde ndee , ina peeñnini haa laaɓti yiɗde amen siftinde ko woodnoo ngam ɓeydaade udditde hakkillaaji yimɓe e mahde dental jaajngal nder Muritani , leydi ndenndinndi leƴƴi keewɗi , ngam kadi wallitde hisnude ngootaagu leydi ndii " .
E wiyde Tunusnaajo Kensa ben Asuus , " ɓuri heewde he woɗɓe yilliiɓe Tuunus ko janngooɓe e gollotooɓe golle muusɗe , kala ko Tuunus naftortoo to faggudu e to pinal .
E wiyde annduɓe , sifaaji ɗiɗi maayɗeele ina ngoodi : maayde kilinikeere e maayde ngaandiire .
E wiyde annduɓe ɓee , " yupporde wiiduru nduu ine waɗi wallere heewnde , seertunde e kaaƴe ummoriiɗe e joortugol kaaƴam ( lave ) tawaɗam he fonngo wiiduru nduu " e geɗe keewɗe goɗɗe gaddanooje faamde tagoodi Mbaañ .
E wiyde dawriyanke Kaliilu Sidibe , ɗee kewkewe pirtataa jotondiral e koɗdigal leyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee .
E wiyde makko , ko ɗoon kadi o fuɗɗii waɗde taaɓe makko garwaniije njanngu ɗemngal neeniwal Pulaar e lewru Duujal haa heɓi lewru Yarkomaa e hitaande 1986 , ko ndeen hitaande kadi Allah nawti mo cuuɗi maɓɓe Nabbaaji Siwol .
E wiyde makko , leydi Muritani " waasii neɗɗo ganndunoɗo Muritani no feewi , gannduɗo Muritaninaaɓe , laaɓaaɗo ko kewnoo he leydi hee , gannduɗo caɗeele dookɗe ɗum " .
E wiyde makko Fulɓe ngummi ko Endo , ɓe njalti ko e leƴƴi Darawidiyee sabu wiɗtooji kollirii to bannge ɗemngal jeydigal hakkunde ɗemɗe maɓɓe e Pulaar , Wolof , Seereer .
E wiyde makko haa jooni Nijeer ko leydi lollirndi ngaynaaka , sabu endi oorna ko ina tolnoo e capanɗe tati e jeegom ( 36 ) miliyoŋ allaadu ( beyi , baali , nayi e gelooɗi ) so rentii ndeen limoore tuugnaa ko e binnditaagol ooroori ( 2009 ) .

E wiyde maɓɓe njonngu nguu ardi
E wiyde ooɗoo koohoowo , konuuji Siin nana ɓalloo no feewi Ostarali sibu alaa ko heedi ɗi e Ostarali so wonaa 2 000 km , ɗumɗoon noon , e wiyde makko , ine foti dartineede ko ɓuri yaawde .
E wiyde tuubakooɓe , e fawaade e kabaruuji ɗi birigajee garde rokki ñalnde 26 abriil 1950 : " Wullum ine joginoo wallidiiɓe laaɓtuɓe : tilliisa gooto to Meel , tilliisa to Lebwera ( fuɗnaange Meel ) , tilliisa to Letfatar ( to hardaneeɓe Ehel Baarikalla en ) , kam e sehil makko tiiɗɗo biyeteeɗo Ahmed wul Aleya wul Lagalal to Kiifa , mo o wujjidnoo fetel to Ayyuun , oon woni ballitoowo mo he kure e conndi " .

E wiyde ɗee karte , leñol aadee en feccitii ko he pecce keewɗe , fawaade ko geɗe donaaɗe , ko wayi no noordi nguru ɓalndu , ceerungal ɓurngal yiytinaade .
E wi’de Ceerno Mammadu Wat , haa jooni : o ɗo silke foti ko waɗeede ñalnde fof so ronkaama haa ronkaama yoo yimɓe ɓe ndentu dewo ( alet ) kala mbaɗa duwawuuji ndañen ko moolori ɗen Allah sabu eɗen njogii ɗo almudɓe yoo Allah yaw ɓeyda tawa ko huɓindiiɓe deftere nde , tee paamon kadi alaa ko juulɗo jogii ko ina mooloroo Allah so wonaa duwaawu , haade wonii ko noon tiiɗno ɗen mbaasen welsindaade ndiin njogitaari ndi Allah yooɓni en .

E ɗee caɗeele nguuraaɗe so en toppitaaki janngo e jam ngonaten ko duusooɓe , kono en ngonaa durseteeɓe nde wonnoo ganndal alaa , katantaagal ɓolal waɗataa en laamɓe , waɗataa en jaagorgal haa nii e ardaade , hay huunde en mbaawa gollaade no haanirta .

E ɗii duuɓi jawtuɗi , fedde jojjanɗe aadee wiyeteende Fonadh ndee , yuɓɓinii golle keewɗe jowitiiɗe heen .
E ɗii duuɓi jeenay ( 1980-1989 ) ko tonngooɗe 24 njaltinaa ( ina waɗi heen diwaaɗe : tongooɗe 8 , 15 , 17 , 18 , 25 , 27 ) : jaaynde ndee yaltatnoo ko laawol gootol lebbi tati kala .

Emin ngoongɗini wonde , bonnude bagi ngenndi e renndo ngootaagu leydi men , sabu nikñude teemedde teemedde moritaninaaɓe , sabu tan jeyeede ɓe e leñol maaniwol , ko huunde bonde .

En kaaliino , mbiyɗen addani Swahili
En kaaliino dow won'de ko kostugol atomaaji jibinta kii nguleeki moolanaaki , ko geɗe ina wiyee notroŋ ullatee e nder aaludere ( noyau ) uraniyoom ( uranium ) nde feccoo pecce ɗiɗe heen feccere fo kadi jibina notroŋ ɗi ngona ɗiɗi , ɗi naata kadi e gaaluuɗe goɗɗe ɗe petta , ɗe njokkira noon haa mooɓre uraniyoom nde hawra , kala nde aaludere fetti ko jaynge mawnge jibinta e ciiñsiiñƴe lorooje kala tagoore .
En kaaliino waɗde koɗorɗe to lewru , ɗeen koɗorɗe e miijo annduɓe kebori won'de ko paali tekke guttateeɗi , nde wonno huunde wuttateende ina sowoo , ɗuum waɗi rimndude ɗum nawa ina weeɓi , so tawii ɓe njottiima to Lewru , ɓe njaltina paali ɗi ɓe nguttaɗi haa ɗi petoo , tawa ko e werde ɗi mbaɗaa , tooweendi majji ina wona taakaw gooto , so ɗi nguttaama haa ɗi petii , mbildi tekkundi mahee e dow majji tawa mahiraa ko leydi Lewru , haa paali ɗi kawra , ɗuum maa daɗnduɗi e kaaƴe denkotooɗe e lewru tawa ko weeyo ummi , daɗnda ɓe kadi e ciiñsiiñƴe naange lorlooje , dame paali ɗi kam ko jamɗe celluɗe e ɓale , yaama ni ko arata ɓe koɗa e wimmbanuuji e boli nder leydi Lewru .
En kaaɗaani e heɗtaade dille tagoore woɗnde tan , hitaande 1972 baagal Piyoonyeer 10 neldaama to weeyo , ina rimndi nulal yimɓe ngam habrude tagoore woɗnde ( so tawii ina woodi kay ) eɗen ngoodi e dow wootere e ɗaŋe Lillungal Fedannde Malaaɗo , nulal ngal ko alluwal ina siifaa natal debbo e gorko e mbaydi yuɓɓo-naange .
En kabranooma wonnde Kaber Wul Hamuudi ena yiyletenoo gila ñalnde kuudetaa oo .
En keɓii jokkondirde e gooto e mawɓe remooɓe hono Ibraahiima Aamadu Njaay ɓurɗo anndireede Usmaan Ɓalewel to Jiinge .
En keɓii kadi fartaŋŋe tawtoregol hilifaaɓe laamu ko wayi no nulaaɗo jaagorgal toppitiingal ko fayti e karalle kese e toppitiiɗo ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
En kiisaaki boom wonde mbayliigaaji kilimaa ɗii maa caabo kareeli e ndoolndoolaagu , tee hannde geɗe kisal njeyaa ko he ngoƴaaji mawɗi he jeewte paatuɗe e baɗte ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo he dow aadee .

En majjaani e hitaande 1989 haa 1991jawDeele ma66e , jey ma66e , galleeji ma66e , ngaluuji ma66e , palasuuji ma66e fof ke6taama .
En mbaawa gollaade tawa en kaaldaani , en mbaawaa yahde tawa en tafaani konu mawngu , tawa fof en ndentaani .
En mbaawa haalde pine Nijeer tawa en njubbaani e ko wiyetee ɗemɗe neeniije walla mbiyen ngenndiije .
En mbaawaa haalde nguurndam oo neɗɗo , sibu kala ko omo golla ko sabu Alla , o rewi ko Lislaam , ko o jankinaniiɗo aduna , ɗum saabii ko heewi e nguurndam makko anndaaka , sibu o anndinaani .
En mbaawaa jaŋtaade ɗoo denndaangal toɓɓe ɗe wallifiyanke oo yeewtata he nder deftere mum ndee , nde tawnoo alaa ko o heddi ko o memaamni e renndo fulɓe e kuuɓal , Fuutankooɓe haa ɓuri teeŋtude .
En mbaawaa waasde rewrude e Goomu Kaaldigal , Goonga , Ñaawoore , Ciftorgol , e Beldital , feere jarribaande e leyɗeele keewɗe ngam wallitde diwtude caɗeele teeŋtuɗe , e sellinde ñawannde jaɓɓugol ɓurtungol jojjanɗe aadee baɗnongol e leydi men .
En mbaawaa yettinde yeewtere ndee kala e binndol sabu wonaa tan nii kaaloowo e binndoowo ina ndaɗondiri , kono kadi ɗo ɗo ngon ɗen " batiri " " ordinateer " men wafoyii .
En mbaawaaa gasnude haaldude golle fedde fuuta waɗde ko jumol tan wonata .
En mbaawtaa faamde iwdi Lilluɗe koode ɗo ɓakdi ɓaleeri tawaaka , kadi so wonaano kayri ɗiirtagol weeyo ɓurat ɗo yaawde .
En mbeltaniima Allah , en mbeltaniima fuutankooɓe nootitii ɓe e jammaagu nguu , kono kadi en nduttii teddungal sukaaɓe men kaadruuji ( cadre ) yuɓɓu ɓe e fedde wootere ngam nafoore leñol .
En mbeltiima no feewi e ndeedo hiirde wadnde faayiida , sabu demmba njaay ndillaandi ko naalaŋke mawdo e nder leñol fulbe , kadi onon banndirabe dañbe tawtoreede be , on njaaraama , ko dum woni ko nafata naalaŋke nawra dum yeeso , so yimbe nootaade hiirde mum , e soodde leppi mum .
En mbii dów wonde haralleeɓe lelnuɓe sarɗiiji binndól wolof kañum en taariima ɗee-zóó caɗeele : E saggitorde Arame Fal e wallidiiɓe mum , jóg , wóni ummaade e wolof , winndiraa ko fesoode nanre ( hello 102 ) ; réy , wóni ko mawni , winndiraa ko fesoode nanre ( hello 180 ) .
En mbiyaani woto ɓe calmite hankadi , so ɓe calminii en , kono eko cikku-ɗen , gila ɗee caɗeele koronaa njoli , eɓe potnoo daraade kam e ɗiiɗoo fannuuji tati
En mbiyataa eɗum waɗi mukñaa , kono eɗen nganndi kam laana ka njaru teemedere oroo fat , ko njarka .
En mbiyi Gellaay e pekaan ngontii innde wootere , sabu ɗuum , so pekaan feccaama e hakkunde , heen feccere ko kanko tan jeyi , sabu pekaan ko jimɗi subalɓe gaadanteeji kañum e ko Gellaay waɗti heen e ñeeñal mum e hakilantaagal mum .
En mbiyii jeynoo pekaan tan ko jeeyɓe .

En nganndaa so won magooji Fulɓe , Senegaalnaaɓe walla leyɗeele goɗɗe , njogori jeyeede e tawtorteeɓe ngol ɗoo koolol gadanol , kono tan so huunde umminaama wiyaama ummini ɗum ko haa ɓeyda julyultondiral hakkunde Afriknaaɓe e koye mum kadi e hakkunde mum en e yimɓe jeyaaɓe he jookli goɗɗi , so Fulɓe ngardaaki potaano jaɓde heedneede heen caggal .
En nganndii ndeka huunde won no yiiratee tawa wonaa noon way , won no sikkirtee tawa ina woɗɗii ɗuum , won e geɗe neɗɗo etotoo faamde cuuɗoo caggal huyooy e niɓɓere kono neɗɗo e ŋatde ngam heɓde ganndal wattan fo suuɗtoto haa waya no lewru 13 .
En nganndii wonde reende taariindi ina defii moni kala .
En ngardii haa ɗoo e Balla Jeerel , en njiyii no Gellaay yimiri , hol no o holliri Balla , omo usta faayiida mum ko adii nii nde naatanta golle .
En ngardiino e daartol hee , haa ɗo Federba dañi yamɗinde , hay sinno ko seeɗa , njulaagu Faraysenaaɓe e maayo Senegaal , haa ɗo Farayse faami wonde njogoraani deeƴde so tawii keɓaani Tagaant e Adraar .
En ngardiino e daartol Ɓunndu Kummba , jatti Fadduɓe , diiri Girooɓe , bannaandu Buubu Maalik Sih haa e garal Fadduɓe e nder nokku oo .
En ngartii kadi e caɗeele ɗe juulɓe winndere ndoŋkaa yoo njaltin e diine : ɓee njuula walla koora hannde , ɓeya jaŋngo , ɓey ɓaawo jaŋngo .

En ngoyii haa gite ɓuutii .
En njejjitaa kadi to bannge coftal ɓalli hono Sippiro , leñol ngol waɗii heen faayiida mawɗo , ɗoon ɗo ɓe mbaawi ittude mbiruuji Nuwaasoot ngam mbaɗda kawgel hakkunde mumem .
En njejjitaani golle ɗe o gollaninoo Umaar Bah Mboyna tuggude e ñalnde sankii , ñalnde 8 lewru mbooy hitaande 2012 , haa ɗo o abbii ɗum ɗoo , o dartinaani mawninde ñalawma mo ɓe ceernoo oo .
En njettii Alla nde O rokki pulaar annduɓe wayɓe no Ibraahiima saar en , eɗen ñaago yo Alla ɓeydan'en annduɓe , sabu alaa ko waawi ɓamtaade gah ganndal , Alla suɓnunoo annabi Sulaymaani ko gannde e laamu e ngalu kono o suɓii ko ganndal , nde o fanndini ganndal ngal Alla rokkima fof nde wanno ko gannal reenata laamu ngu e ngalu ngu , oɗon ñaaga yaafuya .
En njettii Allah , en teskiima jeewte pulaar keewaani e 2STV , holi ko jibini ɗuum ?
En njettii bajjo , ko heddii e lappol hee ɓuri ko ɓenni koo newaade .
En njettii banndiraaɓe fof , kono njettoor keeriiɗo feewde e catal fedde sabu darnde maɓɓe timmuunde .
En njettii geno kaaɗtudi , nde o newnanii en haa mbaaw-ɗen huuɓnude aadi hakkunde men e fedde DEKAM ( Dental- Kawral- Musiɗal ) kam e terɗe jaayndiyankooje habrirde " ayaawo fm " to Suwoyraat .
En njettii noon Joomiraaɗo nde addunoo ɓe , ɓe ngolli ko nafata , nawti ɓe , caggal nde ɓe ngolli yoga e ko ɓe ngaddiranoo e Aduna .
En njiyii , ko Berbeer en ɗaɓɓi , keɓi ɗuum .
En njiyii hannde oo , no wuurduɓe coodgu no mbayi tampude .
En njiyii he kartal hee Siidi Busid woni ko nehaande Tuunus .
En njiɗaa ko heɓtii Muritaninaajo baraaɗo ko ɓooyaani koo to Anngolaa , mo nganndu-ɗaa naattiino jogaade kaayitaaje Muritani , heɓtoo ɓe .
En njokkondirii e Usmaan Kan , mo nganndu-ɗaa kañum ine jogii yiyannde woɗnde , nde o faggii e jaŋde makko to Almaañ , kam e jaŋde makko e ɗemngal Pulaar , nder duɗe ƴeewndorɗe Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije .

En pamii tan ko tuubaako waawi batde !

En puɗɗorii ma innde Allah jurmotooɗo jurmittooɗo , Allah biyɗo e nder Deftere Mum Teddunde nde " *Ee Hey mon yimɓe , Min tagii on ummaade e gorol e dewol , Min mbaɗii on leƴƴi e kinɗe haa ganndondiron .
En tant qu’organisations à l’avant-garde de la lutte pour la reconnaissance pleine et entière des langues nationales à travers leur officialisation et leur usage dans tous les rouages de la vie nationale , nos associations ne peuvent que se féliciter de la décision d’enseigner les langues Pulaar , Sooninke et Wolof à l’ENAJM , pour permettre , entre autres , à " l’administrateur de s’adresser directement au citoyen dans la langue qu’il comprend le mieux " .

Ene anndaa hannde , nyaaki e mooƴu , kanyum en fof , ena njogii e nder renndo mumen , rooheejo debbo ( laamɗo debbo ) , ena njogii mahooɓe , ena njogii konuyankooɓe haɓeteeɓe faddotooɓe anyɓe , yarlitdtooɓe yo maay kono laamɗo maɓɓe memataake , gooto fof ena anndi ko fawii e dow hoore mum .
Ene anndaa hannde , ñaaki e mooƴu , kañum en fof , ena njogii e nder renndo mum en , rooheejo debbo ( laamɗo debbo ) , ena njogii mahooɓe , ena njogii koninkooɓe haɓeteeɓe , faddotooɓe añɓe , yarlitdtooɓe yo maay kono laamɗo maɓɓe memataake , gooto fof ena anndi ko fawii e dow hoore mum .
Ene anndaa kay , no yimiyanke oo wiynoo nii " laamuuji ndewii ɗoo , ndewtii ɗoo , kono mbaylaani gonal men e dunyaa " .
Ene gasa tawa e ngol winndannde men wonata ko naamne mehe .
Ene gasa tawa ko ɗum addi konngol " keɗoro ɗee kam hakkillaaji , woto keɗoro ɗee kam ɓerɗe " .
Ene gasa wonnde taw a meeɗaani wittude , ko fayti e ɗum walla hakkille maa meeɗaani arde heen kono kam a wiyataa a meeɗaani nannde haala " connexion gratuit " ene haalee .
Ene gasa ɗum nafta e won e ngonkaaji .

Eɗen ciftina banndiraaɓe wonde wuro Ŋoral Gidaala hawriino e caɗeele mawɗe e lomtingol mawɗo wuro caggal nde ceerno Abderahmaani Ndonngo nanondiraaɗo , jamyamo ( lomtinooɗo Mustafa ñannga ) ruttii e joom mum e darorɗe kitaale 2000 .
Eɗen ciftina tan , ñalnde 23 noowammbar Ardorde leydi ndi fellanooma , caggal nde njeñtudi woote depiteeji bayyinaa .
Eɗen ciftina tan Biraam e Jibi Soh e yahdiiɓe mum en nannganoo ko ñalnde 11 noowammbar 2015 to Rooso , caggal nde lappol maɓɓe umminongol Ɓoggee ñalnde 7 noowammbar 2015 jaggondiri e sanndarmori .
