Eɗen ciftina tan darnde Jokkorde pelle pinal ko wallitde kala ko ine ɓamta ɗemɗe men , e jokkude e daraade mbele hujjaaji paatuɗe e ɗemɗe e pinal leƴƴi ɗii fof ine ñawndee , haa arti noon e laawɗingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof .
Eɗen ciftina tan he nder haalannde nde o waɗi kanko hooreejo leydi Tunis Kaysi Sayyid o wiy : " Ma feere ƴette ko leelaani ngam dartinde garaangal he nder Tunis , ɗanniyankooɓe Afriknaaɓe ɓe naataani he dow laawol .
Eɗen ciftina tan laamu Tunis ƴettiino ko ɓe noddiri " feere heñoraande " ngam yaltinde ɓaleeɓe Afriknaaɓe to Tunis , ɓe e konnguɗi maɓɓe : " So ngarii ngardata ko e waɗboniyaagal , kirim , surpitaare e jikkuuji ɗi hay gooto waawa jaɓde .
Eɗen ciftina tan ngalɗoo damal nanondiraaka he ñalɗi diisnondiral hee , sibu ngal yeewtaaka nii .
Eɗen ciftina wonde , nduun egguru waawnere ɓiɓɓe Moritaninaaɓe waɗnoo ko hakkunde 1989 e 1991 , nde Ibilisa tunngi mbaggu , capaato serkiti , hardaane leewi e dow ɓaleeɓe moritaninaaɓe ; heewɓe taccinaa feewde Senegaal , ko heddii koo faaraa Mali .
Eɗen ciftina wonnde koolol gadanol ngol waɗnoo ko he 11 Korse ( Juin ) 2022 to Hotel Pullman mo Ndakaaru .
Eɗen ciftina ɓesngu nguu ko Pulaar walla Fulfulde haali e ndema : " So neɗɗo wammbaani naange , woni turaaki remi , roondoo nge , woni yahde ina jiggoyoo ko wuurdi .
Eɗen ciftora , e hitaande 1969 ameriknaaɓe tato njippiima he lewru , njaɓɓi he lewri mum .
Eɗen ciftora NASA neldiino ñalnde 24/11/21 ( lebbi sappo jooni ) laanel ine wiyee DART ( laañal ) ngam hoolkisaade karallaagal deenirgal Leydi men , so tawii kaaƴal weeyo tiindiima e men ( ko buɓɓondiral haare weeyo e leydi men halkunoo kulle biyeteeɗe dinosooruuji ) .
Eɗen ciftora Senegaal ene joginoo njuɓdi ngoɗndi ko fayti he naɓak ( cinema ) ene wiyee Les Rencontres Cinématographiques de Dakar ( RECIDAK ) kono ene wayno koko maayi ni nde tawnoo Senegaal tan e hoore mum alaa he naɓaka ko yaaji ko ene waawa tammbaade ndiin njuɓɓudi , kadi maa taw laamu nguu jaɓaano waɗde heen doole ɗe ene cemmbina ngoon yuɓɓo .
Eɗen ciftora wonnda momtunoo pinal Gerek kanum e pinal Rom ɓooymaa haa majji melew he nder Orop ko jaalanoode diine nasraan he nder Orop .
Eɗen ciiftora ko e lewru Yarkomaa 2009 Seek Tijjaan Gaajo tellii e jappere mum to Jaagorde halfinaande geɗe caggal leydi .
Eɗen cikki ina moƴƴi ɓeyden e ɗeeɗoo cakkitte wonande peccitagol laamu , coftingol e tiiɗtingol wellitaare nokkuuji fuɗɗanoonde e hitaande 1986 rewrude e cosgol kominaaji , hay so tawii nde boosii law .
Eɗen cikki kam wonaa ndeen maalde Saaluu Jiboo faalaa waɗde , hay sinno tawii en njiyii dadiiɓe ɓiltunooɓe leydi e ngolo ɓalewel persidaaji joginooɗi karwasuuji ina piya ina tonnga , yeruuji ɗiɗi e Afrik haa jooni ina poti hollude yimɓe won heen ndeenaani konnguɗi mu’en en mbiyii Jeneraal Robeer Geyi mo Kodduwaar e ko ɓooyaani ko kapiteen Muusaa Dadiis Kamara mo Gine Konaakiri , nde ngari e jappeere nde alaa fof mo saatani ɓe hello kono nde ɓe ndesndanoo faandu ndu tan , ɓe tawi endu weli , ɓe mbiyi ko hay go’to haandaani e mayru so wonaa kamɓe e ɓesnguuji maɓɓe , ɓe njejjitii pulaar wiyi : " rennduɓe peƴtat " .
Eɗen eewnoo kala sukaaɓe e sagataaɓe rewɓe e worɓe nde mballata no mbaawiri fof ngal jaalal ɓamtaare ɗemngal men .
Eɗen inna beldital , yanaaɓe e njeenaari mum'en kono so en kaalaani haala waɗtam-boniiɓe , wayi ko hono eɗen ngoppana sukaaɓe men gacce e mette nih .
Eɗen kaalatnoo wonde Ñaawirde Kuuge Winndere ina jogori waɗtude hiisaade loppitgol leyɗe janane walla bonnugol sato no warhoore nii , potɗo ñaaweede , no warkoyeeɓe heddiiɓe ɓee nii .
Eɗen kawri wonde , ɗee caɗeele fof ko laamu tekki roondii ɗum en .
Eɗen keewi yiyde jamma pooye jaawɗe ciirtatooɗe e weeyo , mbiyen ko koode ciirtatooɗe .
Eɗen keewi ƴeewde koode e nder jamma mbo bojel ayni nde wonnoo ko ndeen ɗe ɓurata laaɓtude e heewde , kono cikkaten ko eɗen mbaawi renndin'de e majje tamannde mbaɗen e sasa walla jayba , so eɗen keɓatnooɗe .
Eɗen kuli tan nguuɗoo ñawu ari ko wuurdeede no jontinooje nii , sidaa , jabet kono ñaagiɗen Alla tan ko yoo rokku en ganndal e ƴoyre no mumtirɗen ñawngu no ɗoyru nii walla came walla so roŋkaama kam tawa eɗen kanndoongu , bonannde maggu haaɗa ɗo jaɓi .
Eɗen mbaawi rokkude heen yeruuji keewɗi , kono ma a taw en njubbat tan .
Eɗen mbaawi udditde duɗe keeriiɗe ( écoles privées ) e jannginirde heen sukaaɓe men ɗemɗe mum en neeniije
Eɗen mbaawi werde noppi keɗtoɗen dille maɓɓe , so tawii eɓe ngoodi eɓe njahri yeeso ma ɓe caak bempeƴƴe rajo baŋ-yoo-baŋ e nder weeyo , ngam heɓɓaade ɗeen bempeƴƴe beɗi keɗorɗi tafaama caraa e dow leydi , kala wempeƴere rajo ummiinde weeyo daɗataaɗi , eɗi ceeɓi eɗi mbeli nanɗe .
Eɗen mbaawi wide nii ko ñaw ngu ina woodnoo ko ɓuri ko haletenoo heen ko , ɗum noon waɗi ɗum ko sarwissaji toppittiiɗi safaara ina ŋakkira kaɓirɗe loskooje goodal ñaw ngu e yimɓe .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde , o waɗii kala ko o wiynoo , o diidi laawol peewal e nuunɗal , kono ndeke ɗuum welaani goomu kooninkooɓe-julaaɓe ummanii ɓe law-law , polli laamu makko e oo beetawe niɓɓo wonande Muritani kala , beetawe 6 ut 2008 .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde , tagofeere ko aduna tan , no aduna men nih .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde Sileymaani Kan dawliima .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde kadi wuurni Fooyre e daawal 2006 haa 2013 ko yarlitaare , tee e ngalɗoo daawal hay kaɓirgal gootal Fooyre joganooki .
Eɗen mbaawi wiyde nii , wonaa naamnal gootal , soko naamne keewɗe , ceŋondirɗe , jogiiɗe faandaare wootere , ɗe jaabawol mumen toɓɓi toɓɓere wootere .
Eɗen mbaawii wiyde , wasiya ɓurɗo teeŋtude baɗaaɗo he ñalɗi hee , ko hesɗi e ko woodnoo koo , ko naatnugol jaŋde karallaagal kesal e tolno Duɗal Keblorgal jannginooɓe , kam e teeŋtingol jaŋde fannuuji , fawaade e soklaaji almuɓɓe .
Eɗen mbasiyoo leñol men nde salotoo ɗaweede e kala eɓɓaaɗe nokkuuji men eɓɓi , yaawde ɓe tinde e waasde yaawde tinnde fof .
Eɗen mbiya lewru walla naange nanngaama so tawii en nattiiɗe yiyde e saha nde foti yiyeede , wonaa nanngeede foti wiyeede , foti wiyeede ko wirniima sabu woodat ko reɗɗii hakkunde lewru e naange lewru wirnoo , wooda kadi ko reɗɗii hakkunde leydi e naange , naange wirno .
Eɗen mbiya pelle baɗooje , e pelle goɗɗo , gonɗe e leydi moritani , kaɓantooje ndimaagu ɓaleeɓe , e salaade penaale pependaaɗe , ɗe safalɓe moritani jogitii gila haŋki haa hannde , enen fof ngannden sago men ko wooto , mbaɗden junngo e faandu-gollal mem e darnde mem wona gootal , ɗu woni sodorde ɓamtaare meeɗen ko yaawii .

Eɗen ngandi leydi ena mawni e koye men .
Eɗen nganndi , enen fof e famɗude ganndal e oon fannu , kabaruuji mbayi e Haalirde wonii ko Rajo walla Tele kono ƴiyal keeci wayi e neɗɗo nii , walla mbiyen no lamɗam wayi e ndefu , so ŋakkii tan tekmat ñaamotaako .
Eɗen nganndi , he tolno laamu nguu , jaŋde mawɓe waɗetenoo tan ko he nder arab , ko fayi arde ko he nder ɗemɗe ɗee fof nde waɗoytee .
Eɗen nganndi , ko mbiyaten ñalawma ko , fawii ko e yiiloo-banngoo ( yiloo-banngeyoo ) mo leydi ndi waɗata e dow hoore mum .
Eɗen nganndi , so mawnikinaare wonno neɗɗo , alaa mo fottata e mbedda , saka reggondira e mum .
Eɗen nganndi , ɗo adan wolde ɗoo , konu Almaañ huutorii ko bettere e gunndagol jaawngol .
Eɗen nganndi Haalpulaar en ene mbiya : Mo yiyanaaka hulantaake , walla so feccere dawii ko tawaaɓe monotoo , ndeke noon , hayso tawii laamu Senegaal ene yaltina ngaluuji keewɗi ngam ƴellitde pine leydi ndii e ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee , rewrude he jaagorɗe kalfinaaɗe ɗeen geɗe ne , so feccere dawii alaa e sago tawa daraniiɓe leñol Fulɓe ene tawtoraa .
Eɗen nganndi balɗe 366 ko hitaande men ɗo , ndeke ɗum fotnoo firtude ko hitaande ( balɗe 366 ) to Uraanus , timmaani hitaande ɗo men ɗo , tawde wonata tan ko balɗe men 178 ( feccere hitaande ) !
Eɗen nganndi boom , e lewru mars 2009 , nde o ummanii yuɓɓinde wooteeji lajanooɗi e 6 suwee 2009 , ( 6/6 ) , o waɗii feere haa huunde e loranooɓe ɓee ciifondiri e laamu nguu nanondiral cuuɗingal , cuuɗangal , gaddungal duko mawngo , sibu denndaangal pelle jojjanɗe aadee e ko ɓuri heewde e pelle politik leydi ndii ñiŋii ngaal nanondiral , sibu , e miijo mum en , ngal huutorii ko baasal yimɓe ɓee ngam jarriboraade ɗum en kaalis , mbele haala kaa yejjitee .

Eɗen nganndi hannde , so woodii e bannge e leydi ndi nguur-ɗen e dow mum ndii , gonɗo e ñalawma , bannge goɗɗo oo , wonata ko e jamma .
Eɗen nganndi hikka ko'e doggol ɗee cuɓaama gile kuraaje ɗee ngaraani : Itali , Beresil , Almaañ , Angalteer , Espaañ , Arjentiin , Afrik Bŋ Worgo , e Holannda .
Eɗen nganndi jokkondiral pelle pine tati ɗee ( Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar , Fedde Ɓamtaare Sooninke e Fedde Ɓamtaare Wolof ) ina waɗi dallinannde ko faati e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee , tee njoorto moƴƴo ina jogaa heen .
Eɗen nganndi kadi , Donald Trump , gila nii wonaani hooreejo Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) , seeraani e joopaade leydi Siin , no kaaɓanɗo yiyde geɗe peewnaaɗe Siin ina naata leydi mum nii .
Eɗen nganndi kadi , he ñaldi kuuɓtodinɗi ɗii , darnde pelle ɗee ina laaɓti , tee teeŋtinii ko dañanoo he ñalɗi diiwanuuji ɗii .
Eɗen nganndi kam kirso – kutto ( buuse ) neletaake e jofnde ɓesɗi .
Eɗen nganndi kam ndiyam heewi ummaadi ko ɗo toowi yaaɓana ɗo lesɗi waɗa waraango , doole waraango ngo fawii ko e keeweendi ndiyam ɗam e lesɗugol ɗo kuccam majjam , henndu ne yahdu mum fawii ko e tolno ngoleeki e ɓitto ( pression ) , so naange wulii hawrii e ñalawma kiiɗɗo ( mbo alaa henndu ) gaasuuji ɗi eggat paya dow sabu nguleeki , ɓitto ustoo e oon nokku , gaasuuji goɗɗi gonɗi seraaji nokku o ndaaŋana mbo ngam lomde yolnde nde ɗiya paatuɗi dow ngoppi nde , ko ɗeen dille e lomlomtondire njibinta henndu .
Eɗen nganndi ko ina tolnoo jooni e hitaande , luulndo ɗaɓɓiino yo gollotooɓe politigi kala njooɗodo ngam nanondirde e peeje kawraaɗe ngam yiilanaade leydi ndii laabi no ƴellitorii caggal teskaade iñcuru bonndu ndi leydi ndii wuurnoo caggal duuɓi sappo ngardiigu mbonngu .
Eɗen nganndi mbeɗu walla nyorgo , eɗen keewi hippirde ɗum kore men ( walla tummbuɗe men ) kosam , ngam haɗde buubi njuuraade heen .
Eɗen nganndi mbeɗu walla ñorgo , eɗen keewi hippirde ɗum kore men ( walla tummbuɗe men ) kosam , ngam haɗde buubi njuuraade heen .
Eɗen nganndi so Leydi waɗii yiiloo-banngoo no kewal moti mottirtee nii , haa artii ɗo wonnoo , ɗum wonata ko ñalawma kuurɗo .
Eɗen nganndi tan noon , ko ɓurti heewde fof rufat .
Eɗen nganndi ñiso lewru e naange ina ɓerna diƴƴe geec , ko noon kadi ngo ƴernirta laral Leydi men ndi .
Eɗen ngoowi wono walla sahaa no feewi nde wonnoo ko ko jiiɓdaa e hakkillaji men , eɗen nganndi kadi kala ko yawti artataa , hay so ɗo , ɗo mbinndatmi ndee winndannde ɗo , so mi juumii e mbinndiin konngol mi waawtaa ruttaade e naane nde njuummi nde mi haayta juumde , wonataa !
Eɗen njaafnoo banndiraaɓe noon sabu ngolɗoo ciimtol ena fotnoo yaltude gila e lewru feebariyee maayndu nduu , kono ko caɗeele caabinoo ɗum .
Eɗen njaakorii tan maa pelle goɗɗe ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ɗee ñemmbu hono oo yeru moƴƴo .
Eɗen njaakorii tan so ɓe njahii
Eɗen njaakorinoo maa ɗii ñalɗi , gaa gaa ko aadoranoo koo ( Duɗe , tolnooji , loowdi , heblo jannginooɓe , wallifo ekn ) , maa mbaaw teskaade kesam-kesaagu , teskoo kadi humpito dañaango e yolnde hee , kam e kuccam kesam fedde ndee , ngam lelnude laabi ɓurɗi kadi moƴƴude .
Eɗen njaha , Eɗen ngarta , kono haajooni , k'en aanɓee .
Eɗen njenanaa heɓdude fof laawol gootol wonaa huunde weeɓnde , kono , so ɓesgu nguu fof dariima he nder dillere ɓiyleydiire he tolno gure ɗee , leydi ndii , diiwaan oo , eɗen mbaawi heɓde fof .
Eɗen njenanaa tan Riis en ine nangtii he kaan haala kunanooka , tee , ɗo adan ɗoo , ka ɗooftanooma .
Eɗen njetta Alla baɗɗo haa gellaay Aali Faal hawri e oo jamaanu , mo siyaas e karallaagal toowngal mballi haa kaɓirɗe kese ngari ina nannga daaɗe ina moofta gannde mbaasa majjude , sabu ɗuum , Gellaay ko jaalal mawngal e nder jaale ɓurɗe himmude e nder coñce Pulaar , walla mbiyen tan nder pinal haalpulaar en .
Eɗen njetta Goomu Fooyre Ɓamtaare , haa arti noon e gardiiɗo ɗum oo , gardiiɗo mo tampataa , njool , liiftiiɗo , kono dariiɗo , mo yanataa , caɗeele ɗee fof e heewde .
Eɗen njetta denndaangal musiɗɓe , e banndiraaɓe walluɓe fedde nde heɓtude galle mum , gila adan haa e wortorde .
Eɗen njetta denndaangal ɓesngu Moongel nde waawi yuɓɓinde ɗiiɗoo ñalɗi haa mo woni kala dañi heen weltaare .
Eɗen njetta ngaddu winndannde o -woni haadii Aan , sikke alaa so ɓaleeɓe moritani mbaɗii seppooji e hollude , e metter mumen Aduna ka , ɗe mbaɗetee e nder leydi mumen , ko huunde moƴƴere ɓe mbaɗi , kadi ndee ummannde wonaajooni nde ummanaa , nde ummaama ko ina tolnoo jooni e duuɓi 30 , eno dartol nggol wiy-ri en .
Eɗen njogii hatanteeɓe yiɗɓe ɗemngal ngal e leñol ngol , kono yogo heen so a yuurniima ngonka mumen to bannge jande ko hummam binndaagal ɓuri heewde e mumen , ko pellital ngal tan ɓe njogii .
Eɗen njogii seernaaɓe , halifaaɓe diine ɓe ndokkuɗen geɗal kurmiɗen , kono kadi ɓe laamu leydi Senegaal nguu hurmorii , sabu mum anndude ɗo pawɗen seernaɓe men .
Eɗen njokka nguuurndam baaba Aadama ( JKM ) fawaade e winndiyankooɓe adiiɓe .
Eɗen njokka yaltinde deftere nde musiɗɗo men Umar Abdalla Wele wallifii , yowitiinde e ganndal weeyo .
Eɗen njoofnira ndee winndannde , wasiyaade banndiraaɓe fof nde ñeemtintata ɓe , mbaɗta hakkillaaji e dental , nanngondiral , muñondiral , cuurondiral e jokkere enɗam , e kala ɗo mbaawi wonde e duunde baaba Aadama hee .

Eɗen poti dartaade seeɗa e ngal ganndal keewngal faayiida .
Eɗen poti faamde kadi , laana ndiwoowa so fayii to naange ena ƴeewa ɓetde nguleeki mum , yettotaako tawa taayii wontii henndu ko yaawi !
Eɗen poti heɓtinde golle potɗe maneede baɗaaɗe e daawal gadanal ngal ( gartirgol hoore mum ) , sibu ɓeen tuusaama kolce ɓirooje , udditanaa mangasiinuuji nguura e farmasiiji , ngaddanaa masiŋaaji cokkooji e unooji , e gurupaaji kuuraa , ngasanaa boyli e foorasuuji ekn .

Eɗen poti hirjinde koye men ngam moni kala ene sooda jaaynde ndee , mbele kala tonngoode yaltunde ene waɗee jiiro .
Eɗen poti wallitde Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e goomu mum toppitiingu pinal ngam waawde yuɓɓinde golle halfinaa ɗee teeŋti noon e ko faati e juɓɓingol kiirɗeeli pinal , ekn .
Eɗen teskii , wonande partiiji luulndo gaadoraaɗi ɗii , hisni heen doole mum tan ko Tawaasul , mo meeɗaa geddude woote .
Eɗen teskii ñalawmaaji potaani to bannge njuuteeki , saanga ceeɗu eɗi njuuta so dabbunde ari ɗi ndaɓɓiɗa , ko saabii ɗuum ?
Eɗen tesko haa e kelmeendi ndaɗɗiindi , yeru inɗe terɗe ɓanndu neɗɗeo , ceerundal ina woodi hakkunde pulfule ɗe .
Eɗen teskoo boom , e woote senaa kala , coodgu daaɗe konseyeeji ɓeydoto .
Eɗen teskoo kadi jokkondiral ngal hooreejo suudu sarɗiyeeji waɗdi e jokkondiral pelle tate ɗee , tee o tottiiɓe ko ɓura kelme teemedde joyi ngam ɗe pire e ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee , yantude e goomu ɗemɗe ngenndiije cosaangu e nder suudu sarɗiyeeji e gardagol Kajjata Maalik Jallo , wonndude kadi e jamirgol firo ɗemɗe ɗee e nder suudu sarɗiyeeji ; ɗeeɗoo maale fof ina kollira wonde laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee ngoni ko e laawol .
Eɗen teskoo kadi kippuuji ɗiɗi mawɗi ɗi ndañaani yettaade hay nayaɓal , ɓeen ngoni Espaañ e Almaañ .
Eɗen teskoo limlebbi noddi ko limde duuɓi .

Eɗen teskoo noon dille mawɗe gadduɗe
Eɗen teskoo ñaawooɓe ɓee ɓurtiima ko dowla yiɗnoo koo so dummbude ɓe duuɓi 30 tan .
Eɗen ñaagoo Allah Towɗo oo , yo way no wayatnoo !
Eɗen ɓeydoo woɗɗitaade naange tan , weeyo ina ɓeydoo ɓuuɓde , ɗuum waɗi tagopeeje goɗɗuɗe ɗe ko penndiiɗe , so wanaa tan won heen keɓooje nguleeki e batte hamo-ɗiirto pooɗe mawɗe .
Eɗi njogii hakke dañde peeje nuunɗuɗe ngam ñawndude luure e kareeli ɗi mbaawi dañdude e woɗɓe , hakke e ñawndugol jaawngol ɗeen luure maa kareeli .
Eɗi njogii hakke dottude hol ko foti wonde doŋngal yimɓe feewde e leñol heen fof .
Eɗi njogii hakke e diisneede e jeyeede no haanirta nii e kala mbayliigu jeyi leydi tawaangu ina hatojinaa , haa teeŋti noon e joopagol e lelnugol geɗe gardiiɗe , kam e peeje , wonande moƴƴingol leyɗe ndema ɗi ngaadorinoo gollaade .
Eɗi njogii hakke e jeytoreede no haanirta nii e lelnugol tuugnorɗe faggudu e renndo , haa teeŋti noon so tawii ko kañji poti yiilde ɗum en nder kominaaji majji walla mukaataaji majji maa wilaayaaji majji nder tuugnorgal bellitgol nokkuuji .
Eɗi njogii hakke e jogaade e ƴellitde , haa caggal leydi majji , jotondire e gollondirde e yimɓe ɗi njiidi leñol walla goɗɗi , haa arti noon e geɗe diine e pinal e faggudu e renndo .
Eɗi njogii hakke e waasde falteede , tee hay huunde waawaa dallinde njiimaandi gootol e majji dow keddiiɗi ɗii .
Eɗi njogii hakke e waasde waawneede saayde ender leñol goɗngol , walla " waawneede naattude " , walla pusgol pinal majji .
Eɗi njogii hakke faamde e faameede e nder ɗemɗe majji , haa arti noon e nder njuɓɓudi laamu e ñaawoore nder Muritani .
Eɗi njogii hakke heɓde denndaangal mbaadiiji jaŋde laamu , ko aldaa e paltoor gooto ; hakke e jaŋde worworde wonande sukaaɓe majji , e tuma nde njiylotoo gannde gidiiɗe , tawa janngintee ko e ɗemɗe ɗe sukaaɓe ɓee muuyni , rewrude e peeje juumtuɗe .
Eɗi njogii hakke heɓtinaneede ballal keeringal ɗi ngaddi e ngalu leydi hee , so keewal leƴƴi e pine cosɗe Ngenndi Muritani .
Eɗum waawi soomde tanaaji ko goonga .
F .
FACT ina jogii fotde tuddule tati nder Libiya to gure Jebel Sawda e to Al-Jufraa e to Dulaki .
FACT ko Maalde ngam Lomtondiral e Nanondiral nder Caad ( Front pour l’Alternance et la Concorde au Tchad ) .
FACT ne bayyini ndeen ko kam huurii e diiwaan BET ( Burgu – Ennedi – Tibesti ) , jooni reftata heen ko Kanem .
FAFD ( Federation des Associations du Fouta pour le développement ) walla so en noddirii ɗum innde mum Pulaar nde , ko Kawtal Pelle Fuuta ngam Ɓamtaare .

FLAM ina haani xeewde ceerno bayzo no ñaaza Jallo nih loota zum sabu valel ngel laavaani tawo : so moxxanaama flam dampee , so lammiraama flam woytee .
FLAM yejjittaa ndee hare , ene nodda kadi kala kaɓantooɗo fenaande yantude e mum , haa fenaande iwa e ndii leydi .
FOOYRE ƁAMTAARE , abonnez-vous à sa version .
FULBE YETTII ALLAH
Faabu fuɗɗiima ummoraade e leyɗeele doolnuɗo hono Dowlaaji Dentuɗi ngam ustude tooke bonannde ndee e miskineɓe leydi ndii sabu ko ndi mbaasndi no feewi .
Faalkisaare laamu e nehgol jikkuuji bonɗi he nder renndo : Ine anndaa wonde jiknaaɓe , e almuɓɓe , e ardiiɓe janngirɗe , e horooɓe ɗum en , kam en fof ko nanondirɓe yo almuɓɓe fof paasne , golliiɗo e mo gollaaki fof .
Faam noon ɗuum ko kul-ɗaa , ko heen mberloto-maa-mi .
Faama Mbay : Caggal tinndinoore ndee ko Faama Mbay to Mbaañ naati dingiral .
Faamde nguurndam dow Ngaawe !
Faamori , wonaa dawrugol
Faandaare , yimɓe toɗɗaaɓe , faayiida e njuɓɓudi ndee winndannde ;
Faandaare Fonndasiyoŋ Emiraaji Arab Dentuɗi wonande Cellal ko difaade njeenaari ndi OMS rokkata neɗɗo walla njuɓɓudi maa yimɓe heewɓe walla juɓɓule keewɗe golliiɓe golle ceedtinɗe ƴellitooje cellal .
Faandaare Joɗnde COP21 e lewru desaambar 2015 to Pari ko haaɗnude ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo e 2°C .
Faandaare bellitgol ngol ko jerondiral mbaawkaaji ɓurngal moƴƴude e denndaangal leydi ndii tawa ina ɓallina ɓiɗɓe leydi ndii ƴettugol kuule e nokkuuji ɗo tabitintee ɗoo , ina wallita tabitingol demokaraasi ɓalliiɗo yimɓe , kono kadi ina ƴellita kellifuya e horo ɓiyleydiiwo dow ngardiigu nokkuyeewu , rewrude e kalfingol nokkuuji ɗii huunde e mbaawkaaji laamu .
Faandaare deegowel ngel ko waɗde wiɗtooji ganndal : hay nokku ɗo ngel juurnaa ɗoo suɓiraa ko sabu sikkeede wonnoo ko e hawngo weendu walla maayo ɓooyngo gila e fuɗɗoode Mbaañ .
Faandaare diiwaan Saŋe ko daranaade ƴellitde jaŋde e nder komin mum , mbele nafoore ndee ina yettodoo denndaangal gure sappo e ɗiɗi ɗee ( 12 ) , gila e ɓurɗo famɗude haa e mawnude , ɗo hay wooto yawetaake , ɗawetaake .
Faandaare lappol huuɓtodinnde lappol ngol ko tiiɗtinde kattanɗe jagge pelle ɗee he nokkuuji ɗii mbele aɓe mbaawa sarde no haanirta nii dallinannde laawɗingol laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije e naattingol mum en he nder Tippudi nehdi e jaŋde Muritani
Faandaare majjum : ko ɗum hujjinannde wonande pine e ɗemɗe pulaar , soninke , e wolof e nder leydi ndi , feewde e ardiiɓe e taƴooɓe hattan leydi ndi , to bannge dawrugol ( politigi ) , e fawaade e ngonka demokaraasi mo ngon-ɗen e mum hannde o , kadi e dow ko mahata maa tiiɗtinta potal e ngootaagu leydi ndi e leƴƴi ɗi .
Faandaare ndee ko rentinde ɓiɓɓe seɓɓe diiwaan oo mbele eɓe
Faandaare ndee winndannde ko ngam yenaneede wonde Golle Banke winndereejo he Nehdi e Jaŋde he nder winndere ndee , ine mbaawi wallude leyɗe ɗaɓɓuɗe ɗum seertude e caɗeele bonɗe ɗe PƊJ ɗi moƴƴaani ngaddata e nder jaŋde sukaaɓe Winndannde ndee haalaani denndanngal calɗi politik jaŋde .
Faandaare ndee yiyannde hesere ko wallitde ɓamtaare politikaaji e golle baɗeteeɗe he nder ɗemɗe jannginirɗe , nde tawnoo politikaaji paatuɗi he ɗemngal jannginirgal pawii ko e ngonka leydi kala .
Faandaare ngal pottital paayodinngal ko yuurnitaade golle golle Moɗilla
Faandaare njillu ngu ko tabintde ngoodaagu maayo haalateengo ngo , wiɗtude cabbuli nguurndam e ƴeewtaade mbela toon ina hoɗo , kadi daartol lewru ndu maa wiɗte , nokkuuji potɗi suɓeede ngam baage mbaawa juuraade heen njiilee maantee .
Faandaare ɗimmere ñalawma oo kadi wonande leydi Muritani ko hollirde defte muulaaɗe , jaltuɗe e nder ndeeɗoo hitaande 2015 dariinde tawi ko ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii mballifii ɗe .

Facciro kelme gaariiɗe ɗee , coomiiɗe e ndee winndannde
Facebook , youtube , twitter , viber , e Imo , haa teeŋti noon e WhatsApp .
Facebook ine reerɗi e Afrik sibu ine anndi afriknaaɓe ceŋaaki e internet no moƴƴi , sibu hannde ko nayaɓal e maɓɓe tan ceŋii heen .
Facebook jibinaa ( sosaa ) ko e hitaande 2004 to duɗal jaaɓihaaɗirde Harvard to Dental Dowlaaji Amerik .
Facebook ko laylaytol renndo nder internet gaddanoowol huutortooɓe ɗum " waawde jokkondirde , e wostondirde nate e fotooje e wideyooji e piille e dokimaaji kam e neldondirde mesasuuji e naatde walla sosde goomuuji walla kadi huutoraade jaaɓɗe keewɗe " .
Fad mi etto mi ƴeewa so maa mi waaw .
Faggudu maggo yowitii ko e ndema e ngaynaaka e njulaagu kono ƴelliti ngo haa ngo dowli ko ɗanniyaŋkooɓe maggo ( 365 sagata ) .

Farayse ( 60 euro )
Farayse , 14/09/11 , ñaawoore wullitaango laɓɓinii Dominique de Villepin .
Farayse , 15/01/11 , Marin le Pen lomtii baaba mum e gardagoparti biyeteeɗo Front National , parti ganndiraaɗo añamnguraagu .
Farayse , 16/10/11 , François Hollande toɗɗaama yo won kanndidaa parti sosiyaalist e woote hooreleydaagu 2012 .
Farayse , 2/05/11 , Ñaawoore wullitaande Dominique de Villepin , kaɓdiiɗo Nikolaa Sarkosi , sabu mum takkeede fewjande oon e kitaale 2000 .
Farayse , 21/06/11 , Yvan Colonna ñaawaama tataɓokasoo kaaɗdi nguurndam , sabu warngo perfee biyeteeɗo Claude Erignac to Ajaccio ( Duunde Kors to Farayse ) .
Farayse , 22/11/11 , sankaare Danielle Mitterand , cuddiiɗo François Mitterand , meeɗnooɗo wonde hooreejo leydi Farayse .
Farayse , 25/09/11 , Partiiji nan-nani kooniima e woote senaa , poolgu ngu ɓe mbayri dañde ko ina wona duuɓi 50 jooni .
Farayse , 29/06/11 , Goppitgojaaynooɓe ɗiɗo Faraysenaaɓe , Hervé Ghesquière kam e Stéphane Taponier , dahanooɓe ñalnde 30 desammbar 2009 to Afganistaan , kamɓe e nantinoowo maɓɓe hono Reza Din .
Farayse , Olannda e Beljik .
Farayse , ngaddani ndi hormeede e teddineede e nder winndere ndee .
Farayse , tawi ko o kawanooɗo cuɓe leydi Farayse , haalanaani ɗuum ceerno BASUM .
Farayse .
Farayse ine fuɗɗoo janngeede he hitaande ɗimmere jaŋde lesre no ɗemngal jokkondiral nii , mbele kadi ine wontoya ɗemngal janngirgal won ɗeen gannde siyaas he nder tolnooji caggal jaŋde lesre .
Faraysenaajo mo iwdi Senegaalnaajo , woni dewbo ɗiɗaɓo mo filma mum jeyaa e naatɗi he pooɗondiral ( en compétition ) he koolol Cannes , .
Faraysenaaɓe , no doole mum en potirnoo , ndaranii riiwde Engele en e Holanndee en e diiwaan ARGIN e SORTENDIK ( diiwaan Nuwaadibu hannde o ) .
Farba Habiibu Njaay
Fari Seen siinci ɗo ko adii nde Fari Soh ina tawta mo kañum e e koreeji mum .
Farilla jeegoɓiijo oo : ko senaare woodani Alla Toowdo oo , siftini yimɓe ceertugol juuɗe e koyɗe to bannge salligi ngam juuɗe , o wii , ko yoo loote kono koyɗe moomete , hoore kadi moomete kono geɗel heen fof ko farilla fawaade ko Alla yamiri ɗuum .
Farilla joyoɓo oo : lootde koyɗe ɗiɗi ɗee haa heɓa kolɓuli , e fuɗɗoraade koyngal ñaamal rewna heen nanal , ko ɗum ɗuri tabitde e golle nelaaɗo Alla ( MJKM ) .
Farilla nayaɓo : ko moomde hoore , ɗum noon ko leppinde juuɗe mum e moomde e dow hoore mum , fuɗɗoraade e tiinde haa hoƴƴudu , ruttina ɗum ɗo wonnoo .
Farilla tataɓo oo : ko lootde juuɗe haa heɓa poloŋtoŋi ngam ko ɗoon woni feccere junngo .
Farilla ɗimmo oo : ko lootde yeeso laawol fuɗɗoraade dow tiinde fayde les waare , caggal ɗum ko leppinde noppi mum , fuɗɗoraade e gudde ɗee haa caggal nofuru njaajeendi mum .

Farmbaal wiy bismilla !
Fartaŋŋeeji ciirɗi golle kam e keblugol cukaagu .
Fast ko rajo-lonngirgal ɓurngal mawnude e aduna , ɓooyaani ko ngal gasi maheede to leydi Siin .
Fatmata ko jimol Baaba Maal jaltungol ko ene wona hitaande jooni kono ngol haastetaake .
Fatraaji ɓuuɓol mawngol to Orop .
Fawaade e darnde mumen e faamde dumen gollal ngal kuufi ngal .
Fawaade e haala jaayndiyanke , fanniyanke Tunisii hono Nikkolaa Boo hay joom suudu makko sokna Leylaa Taraabelsii yiyaaka sara makko to opitaal to .
Fawaade e julyultondiral aduna oo , ñawu nguu fuɗɗiima naatde
Fawaade e konngol Alla Toowɗo Oo no wiyiri " minen min nelii Nuuhu faade e leñol mum , jeertin leñol maa ko adii nde arata e maɓɓe leeɓte muusɗe ( 1 ) " .
Fawaade e njiknaagu , walla jibineede e moritani walla neheede heen .
Fawaadee no Ɓuraana tedduɗo wiyri : " siftor , deftere Idriisa oo laatiima sehil ko annabi ; min ɓamti mo e nokku toowɗo " .
Fawde kuugal sariya e kala jedduɗo golle njiyaagu sabu mum wonde warhoore aadeejo .
Fawtanii min e ɗee caɗeele , ko ardiiɓe amen ɓee ronkude jooɗodaade pewjida ko nafata .
Fawtii e nduu iiñcuru , wolde mawnde na joli rewo , hakkunde safalɓe , wolde
Fayndaare ansiklopejiyankooɓe wonno ko nehde e finndin’de rewrude he udditgol damuɗe gannde kala haa yaaja , tawa ene newanoo kala aadee waawde janngude e faggitaade ganndal ; riiwtude humambinndiyaagal , ƴellitde karallaagal e fecciram-gallagu ngam haa wona sabaabu ɓamtaare faggudu ndu ene addana kala neɗɗo waawde wuurde nguurndam newiɗam .
Fayndaare men e ndee winndannde ko sikkude ndee fedde ina foti wonde yeru laaɓtuɗo , nde wona ñemmbeteende , mbele dente fuutankooje kala ɗo mbaawi wonde , ina mbaasa haaɗde tan e min ndentii , min ndenndinii , min ñaamii , min lemii .
Fayndaare ndee , o wiy : " Ko waɗde Senegaal ñiiɓirde e nokku ɗo hettooɓe mago-doge Afriknaaɓe kawritta ngam ƴellitde njuɓɓuɗeele gollondiral ( reseau ) fanniyankooɓe Afriknaaɓe e hakkundeleyɗeele , ngam newnude caragol golleeji ɗi , e liggondiral hakkunde leyɗeele ceertuɗe .
Fayndaare ndee ko bayyin'de kabruuji ɓurɗi jojjude e Afrik , roɓindo jaayndeeji e bismaade ngenndiyankooɓe gila e dawrugol haa e naalaŋkooɓe .
Fayndaare ndee ko daraade e haɓanaade leyɗeele keɓteteeɗee , aawdeele ɗe moƴƴaani , dunli peƴƴeteeɗi e diƴƴe bonneteeɗe , mbele ɓesnguuji men ina nguura nguurndam ceniɗam , tawa ɗi njowitaaki e woɗɓe .
Fayndaare tuubakooɓe Farayse ko ɗaftude Hollanndee en e Engele en e nder Pooɗondiral hakkunde maɓɓe ngam jiimde Muritani e Senegaal e fooɗtande hoore mum , kañum tan , ɗawa heddiiɓe ɓee e kongol maccuɓe e faggaade ɗacce ( 1713 haa 1763 ) .
Feccere 1 : ɓurɓe semorde , ɓe kolliraani ko raafaaɓe , tawa noon ko wonduɓe he mboros oo ;
Feccere 2 : ko soomɓe mboros oo tawa fuɗɗiima yaltude , poofirɗe mum en njaggaama .
Feccere 3 : Ko ɓee ngoni hollirɓe ina ngondi he maɓɓo e paawle e ɗojjo haa natti waawde waɗde hay dara .
Feccere 4 : Pr Wilson wiyi ko ɓee ɓurata tampude ngati aɓe ngondi he maɓɓo-becce e paawngal e ɗojjo tawa ina nawdi he ñabbuuli goɗɗi hono " taasiyoŋ " maa " jabet " ñabbu rewam , ñawu ɓernde , ñawu jofe , ekn .
Feccere adannde nde ina yaha fotde hojomaaji 40 tawa ndartaaki , balɗe tati nder yontere kala .
Feccere sakkitiinde ndee ko ɓaleeɓe jeyanooɓe e konuuji ɓaleeɓe kaɓɓondirnooɗi
Feccere yimɓe wuurnooɓe hanki e sutura , huutortooɓe whatsapp maa facebook mbaɗti ko wejde nate mumen ɓooyɗe , ine pillanoo winndere ndee callalal jikingal e ɗeen geese no nguurnunoo e duuɓi paaltiiɗi .
Feccere yimɓe wuurnooɓe hanki e sutura , huutortooɓe whatsapp maa facebook mbaɗti ko wejde nate mumen ɓooyɗe , ine pilloo no nguurnunoo e duuɓi paaltiiɗi .
Feccere ɗiɗmere nde , joomum en ngonata tan ko e fooccaade , ina ndillikinoo seeɗa .
Fedannde malaaɗo ine waɗi koode ɓooyɗe no feewi , sibu ko gila sahaaji tageefo ɓurɗi niɓɓiɗde , walla mbiyen tan ɗe peeñdi ko he tageefo , ko ine wona jooni 13 , 2 miliyaar hitaande .
Fedde ARDAG Haaƴre-Golleere
Fedde Alianza por La Solidaridad e GOBIERNO DE ARAGON e ballondiral fedde nde wonaa laamuyankoore wiyeteende ARDM , keblii heblooɓe , ko ina wona sukaaɓe rewɓe 30 , ummiiɓe e kominaaji ɗiɗi : komin Jowol e komin Neere Waalo .
Fedde CEDEAO e UA ( Dental Afrik ) ina ngetoo ñawndude ɗeen caɗeele kono ndonkanii , maa mbiyaa ɓe mbattinta ko e laawɗinde ɗum , yeruuji mum ina keewi kono ko naññi yimɓe ngol laawol , ko kiisgol kuuge CEDEAO ƴetti feewde e leydi Mali ɗee , batte mum ɓuri bonde e ɓesgu hee , tawde ko ndi uddaandi alaa ko naatata alaa ko yaltata !
Fedde Ceerno Sileymaani Baal jooɗiinde to Ndakaaru yuɓɓinii hikka koolol joyaɓol ñalɗi Ceerno Sileymaani Baal ñalnde 16 , 17 e 18 e gardagol Seneraal Usmaan Kan , hooreejo fedde ndee e nder wuro Boode Laaw e ballondiral Boodenaaɓe .

Fedde Dental Tijjaani Aan
Fedde Dingarel Sakkeeɓe e gardagol Maamuudu Aamadu Daraame
Fedde FONADH e Eɓɓoore Concordis ballondiral Ammbasad leydi Angalteer keblii rewɓe sappo ummiiɓe e gure joyi ( Boowel 1 , Boowel 2 , Gurel Gobi , Garli e Jekituuba ) .
Fedde Fuuta rokki teddungal maa mbiyen hoolaare yoo ɓanngin yeewtere nde ko go’to daartiyankooɓe men tawa kadi ko esiptoyanke gorko pullo biyeteeɗo Pr Abuubakiri Muusaa Laam jannginoowo dow rowo to Duɗal Jaaɓi Haaɗtirde Seek Anta Joob to Ndakaaru .
Fedde Fuutankooɓe wonɓe Gaboo ina nganniyii yuɓɓinde ñalɗi pineyankooji pattamlami puɗɗotooɗi ñalnde 31 lewru Morso haa yettoo ñalnde 2 lewru Juko e hitaande nde ngon-ɗen nde .

Fedde Kaaɗtudi doole keneeli
Fedde Keew-piniire ngam Kuccam Ndowrowam ( FKKN ) noddirteende e farayse AMAM ( Association Multiculturelle pour un Avenir Meilleur ) yuɓɓinii , e gardagol Ummu Suleymaani Kan , hooreejo fedde ndee , koolol tataɓol ñalɗi gostondiral e naatondiral Pine to dingiral keewal pine ( espace de diversités culturelles ) , sara Faawru Jaatiiji Ngenndi ( Musée National ) , tuggude e ñalnde 19 haa ñalnde 21 lewru mbooy 2015 e nder Nuwaasot laamorgo Leydi Muritani .
Fedde Leyɗeele Hirnaange Afrik ( FLHA ) wiyateende CEDEAO ɗeɓiino wayde no muɓɓat heen gite mum nii , sabu faamde ko dillini sukaaɓe koninkooɓe ɓee koo .
Fedde Mars One toppitiinde fergo faade Mbaañ dirtinii fotde duuɓi limtinɗi nawde yimɓe to tagofeere woɗeere Mbaañ , sabu lappol kadanol ngol jolaaka ( ngol alaa yimɓe ) fotnoo yahde ko hitaande 2018 waɗtaama hitaande 2022 , so tawii ko lappol jolangol ( nawrowol yimɓe ) haaytii waɗde hitaande 2026 ko 2031 hebori ummaade .

Fedde Siiñtu Ɗeyba

Fedde Tulde Dubbaango e Hartallo jooɗiinde ɗoo he Nuwaadibu yuɓɓinii yeewtere diine e nafoore binndugol defte pulaar ɗoo he Nuwaadibu Daande Maayo , Lobbudu yurmeende .

Fedde Woolum Neere

Fedde fulla e Taande e gardagol Saydu Sih
Fedde ina wi'e Mars One ina yiilo hoɗnude yimɓe e dow aduna keso , hono tagofeere Mbaañ ( Mars ) , ndeen tagofeere ina waɗi geɗe keewɗe nannduɗe e aduna men kono tan alaa foo ko wuuri toon , kadi ala hay leɗɗe , ndiyam ina woodi kono ko penndiɗam , yanti heen henndu cuytam ( oksijen ) heewaani toon no leydi nih !
Fedde innitorteende diine islaam e Magreb Arab woppiti ɓe ko ñalnde jamma Naasaande 24 Colte ( Alkamiisa ) jofi Mawnde ( Aljumaa ) 25 .
Fedde maayraaɓe e alyatimaaɓe pellitii kam enne ruttaade ɗo nanngunoo , ina he ɗuum , fawaade e peeje e mbaawka mumen e mbaadi ndi cuɓii mawningol 28 noowammburu .
Fedde mon KJPF woni Kawtal Janngooɓe pulaar fulfulde sosaa ɗo e Mantes ko hitaande 1983 e tawtoree Ceerno Murtuɗo Joob e Ceerno Abuubakry Dem ko ɓe mawɓe lenyol fulɓe nduwanii Catal Mantes La Jolie .
Fedde nde jokkondirii e denndaangal arooɓe ɗoo e jimelaajuuji ( punewaaguuji ) ekn .
Fedde nde wallitii 18 000 € he nder safaara ngenndiyanke men Mammadu Sammba Joop Murtuɗo ( Muritani ) .
Fedde ndee asii woyndu to wuro Dongol Dumbiya to Gine Konakiri , woyndu to wuro Kelol to Senegaal , woyndu to wuro Ngappuru nder diiwaan Gorgol to Moritani .
Fedde ndee heɓii heen manoore mawnde sabu hollirde darnde mayre e ɓamtugol ɗemngal Pulaar .
Fedde ndee ina foti , gaagaa golle pittugol e jaltingol mbalis , waɗde jeewte e rajooji e whatsap , heblooji e tinndinooje ngam famminde yimɓe ɓee faayiida daranaade laaɓal , mbele jikkuuji ina mbayloo .
Fedde ndee neldii ambilaas to wuro Dimat Jeeri , to Senegal e to wuro Tuuge to Gine Konaakiri .
Fedde ndee yaltinii wideyooji kollitooji wonde ɗum wonaa huunde hesere , tee , ɓurii duuɓi teemedere jooni , ɓeto baylagol nguleeki kii ine hollita gaatuleeje , so diwtugol hakindo aadoraango ngoo .
Fedde ngam guurtingol Wuro
Fedde ngam guurtingol Wuro Hamdallaay hormaango ngoo ( Association pour la Réhabilitation de la ville Sainte de Hamdallay ) , sera Mooɓti , yuɓɓinii kawtal manngal e lewru Mbooy ( Marsa ) 2019 to wuro Bamako ngam wuurtinde Teeminannde ɗiɗmere gaafgol Laamaandi Fulɓe Maasina ina wiyee kadi Laamaandi Diina Hamdallaay .
Fedde wiyeteende Airbus Espace woni ko e feewnude masiŋ baawɗu wurbude ( tufde ) penndiɗam ( glace ) ngonɗam dow Orop ɗam haa waawa heɓde maayo suuɗiingo ndder ngo .
Fedde wiyeteende Space X ina ummanii nawde yimɓe to weeyo ngam njillu e humpito e dow njoɓdi , ɗuum waɗi ɓe ndañi jahoowo joom kaalis , miliyaadeer Japonaajo , oon yoɓii kaalis keewɗo mbela o nawe laana mbiyateeka Liwre Mande ( BFR ) .
Fedde yimiyankooɓe e winndiyankooɓe Pulaar , lollirnde Konngol e Binndol ina ɓeɓii addude ballal mum e ciynugol ɗiiɗo mijooji wonande ooɗo musidɗo e ngenndiyankooɓe woɗɓe wuurɓe e maayɓe wonii ko ɓe Muritaninaaɓee , wonii ko leyɗe goɗɗe ɓe njeyaa .
Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani , e innde catal Nuwaadibu , e denndaangal banndiraaɓe e musidɓe , ina nduwanoo jiknaaɓe men baaba Abdarahmaan Idiriisa Mbaay e neene Huley Baydi Jah .
Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani ( FƁPM ) yuɓɓinii ñalɗi jaŋde ñalnde 10 e 11 abril 2021 , ɗo joɗnde mum mawnde ndee he nder Nuwaasoot .
Fedde Ɓamtaare ɗemngal Wolof yuɓɓinii koolol innirangol " Koolol Waalo " tuggi 6 haa 7 ut 2016 to Rooso .
Fedde Ɓamtoore Pulaar Senegaal ( Association Pour la Renaissance du Pulaar ) gila nde tafaa tuma nde Senegaal woni he weetndooga mum jeytaare , kuccam mum wonnoo ko ɓamtude ɗemngal Pulaar e pinal Fulɓe he nder Senegaal , rewrude he noddude fayde he ngootaagu Fulɓe Senegaal he kala ɗo ɓe mbaawi jeyeede he nder wertaango leydi Senegaal .
Fedde Ɓamtoore Pulaar Senegaal e hirjino fayde he ngootaagu Fulɓe
Fedde Ƴellitaare Muritani ( Association pour le Développement de Mauritanie – ADM ) anndiraande Fedde Halayɓe ( Ɓoggee e Diiwaan ) yuɓɓinii kiirɗe ɗiɗi pinal e naalankaagal to Galle Sukaaɓe Ɓooyɗo ɗo e Nuwaasoot , ñalnde alkamiisa 5 e aljumaa 6 suwee 2008 .
Fedde Ƴellitaare kayhayɗi ferii laawol
Fedde Ƴellitaare kayhayɗi walla fedde " Kaédi Développement " ferii laawol .
Feddu beenu ga ni siito , i ga fanqene jamaanen xannun toŋonde do i ronde jamaanen killun su di , o feddun nan katta sewono ti ke anniye wutte , ken ga teŋana jamaanen xannu ( Fulle , Sooninke , Wolofo ) xaranŋunde ken xaranra noxo ken ga katono marandan deemana jokkindanlenmaaxu i do jamaanen renmen naxa mefaamuye kanma .
Federba siññondiri kaayit bayɗo noon e won e mawɓe Barakna , ñalnde 10 suwee 1858 .
Feenyii e mooɓondiral ngal Ngaddamngaddinaagu e Ndoolndoolaagu , ɗuum fof noon jibinii miijooji
Feere : ko innde seekaande e baɗal fewjude ; keewal mum ine wona peeje maa pehe .
Feere Singapuur ndee tuugii ko e daawe tati janngingol hiisiwal " ko woodi , ko eyɓinaa , e ko hakkilinaa " ( Concrète , image , et abstraite ) .
Feere adannde ko kalitinde sara haayre ndee aaludere nikleyeere ( ogive nucléaire ) ngam haytinde nde .
Feere amen ko feere huɓtondinnde .
Feere feso aadoraande ndee ɓuri anndeede e hoolkiseede .
Feere ndee ina yuumti sanne , kono ina waɗi ɓalli ɗi njaɓataa nde .
Feere ndee tan , ko yoo Afriknaaɓe ndarnu koyɗe , janngina ɓesngu mum haa waawa huutoraade ko jogii e ngalu , haaɗna dihal mum e ceŋlon mum , waasa waɗtude yaakaare mum e leyɗeele doolnuɗe , ɗe kiilnaaki so wonaa ko nafata ɓesnguuji mumen .
Feere ndee tuugii ko e kuutoragol laser ngam ɗakkitgol pecore tokoñille .
Feere tataɓere ndee ɓurdi keddiiɗe ɗee ko waawde siyneede e ko yaaccii tee alaa batte cawndiiɗe bonɗe e men .
Feere wootere ngam mahde mbaadi ngootiri , tuugiindi e ɓiyleydaagu , ngaroori dow leƴƴi ɗii fof , ko heɓtinde mbaadiiji keeriiɗi denndaangal leƴƴi leydi men , tawa noon eɗen ndeentoo waɗtude ɗum leñamleñamaagal .
Feere woɗnde riiwtoore goodal ɓakdi ɓaleeri ina joga , ndeen feere woni wiyde eɗen majji sirlu dille lilluɗe beɗiije , walla no paamirɗen mbaadi jirlagol majje ni feewaani , kono ɗuum suwa taw yaltinde en e jaakre he .
Feere ɗiɗmere ndee , ko neldude sara haayre ndee njowiitiikon ( satellites ) mbele fooɗo mum en ina kaytina nde .

Fenaande dogi fay e ndiyam he memi ɗam wiyi haɗam ɓuuɓi , haɗam heli lootaade .

Fenner noon , ko e ngolɗoo konngol tan nanngtii " ko idii hannde ɓurnoo " , " sukaaɓe tokosɓe yonta men hannde o kawroyta ko e aduna caɗtuɗo no feewi " .
Feranooɓe mars ɓe koɗata ko e cuuɗi baaɗi no turi nih , ko kamɓe toppittoo no ɓe keɓiri ndiyam , henndu foofaandu ( oksijen ) e ñaamde , sibu ko maa ɓe ndema ko ɓe ñaami , yanti heen alaa jahndotooɗo boowal ɓoornaaki wutanka ( combinaison ) mum , sabu tagofeere nde haa hawri ko jaareende , kammu mum ina hoybi kadi waɗi diyoksid de karbon ( CO2 ) henndu sumaandu , nafataa ɓe to foofaandu kono leɗɗe kam in mbaawi naftoraade ndu so keɓii lewndu ( lumière ) , nguleeki heewaani toon ko ɓuuɓol ɓuri doolnude , wadde nguurndam toon ko caɗtuɗam wonata , kono so tawii ɓe poolii caɗeele ɗe , maa ɓe laato aawdi yimɓe e dow tagofeere Mars .
Fergo aadee to tagopeeje goɗɗe , ɗanngal e ndeer wono ( yahde e ndeer sahaaji jawtuɗi walla garooji ) , neɗɗanka-jamndanka e batte mum e nguurndam aadee , rimɗin'de aadee e geɗe teskeeɗe won'de nguurndam waawaa laataade so wonaa ɗe tawee ( foofaandu , ñaamde e yarde ) e ko nanndi heen ko limotaako .

Firo e pulaar
Firo maanaa ( faandaare ) ina heewi e ɗemngal ngal nde tawnoo ina woni e ɗemɗe fof .
Firo ngoo jokki
Firoojo deftere Allah , Al-Qur’aanaare teddunde nde , puɗɗiima heewde he ɗemngal Pulaar .
Firti goomu keɓtintoongu ko kala goomu maantinirngu noordi mum , walla leñol mum , walla iwdi leñol mum walla njogoram mum .
Firti kadi ko faandaare LPT ko duusirde ɗemngal neeniwal jaŋde farayse duuɓi 3 gadani , haa suka oo timmitinanee mbaawka mum e ɗemngal waawa janngude farayseere ndee no haanirta nii , mbele ina daña njeñtudi moƴƴiri e jaŋde mum .

Fiyannde Aali ko hare waɗnoonde ñalnde 15 mars 1908 hakkunde Aali Yero Joop e almudɓe mum bannge , e konu koloñaal Farayse e wallidiiɓe mum bannge goɗɗo oo , yeeso ɗo birooji Perfee Daŋana ngoni hannde ɗoo .
Fiyooɓe mburu e defooɓe ene mbaawi kadi ɓeydude heen korompolle ngam uurnude ñaamdu nduu e alɗinde ɗum .

Fiɓnde 1 : Jannginde sukaaɓe he nder ɗemngal mum en gadanal ( Ɗ1 ) , fuɗɗoraade Sarwisaaji Jaŋde e Jaɓɓo Cukaagu Tokoosu , ko famɗi fof duuɓi 6 gadani jaŋde leslesre ndee .
Fiɓnde 2 : Huutoraade Ɗ1 he nder jaŋde fannuuji janngeteeɗi ɗii gaa-gaa taro e binndol .
Fiɓnde 3 : Naatnude jaŋde Ɗ2 ( ɗemngal ɗimmal ) no ɗemngal tumarankeewal tawa ine teeŋtini heen kattanɗe haala .
Fiɓnde 4 : Jokkude jaŋde he Ɗ1 caggal nde Ɗ2 wonti ɗemngal dowrowal jaŋde .
Fiɓnde 5 : Jokkude e sifaa duumiiɗo , yuɓɓinfde , ƴellitde , yahdinde e moƴƴinde ciynugol politikaaji Ɗemngal Jannginirgal , e dow tuugnaade he ngonka e paandaale leydi .

Fooyre fooynii , ganndal layii , pinal laaytii
Fooyre hanki , e hannde
Fooyre heɓataa jeeyle keewɗe rokkeede jaayɗe jaltooje he ɗemɗe goɗɗe ɗee .
Fooyre ina lewlewta lewru kala .
Fooyre kadi waawii fiɗɗitaade e wuurtude e ƴellitde ɗemngal Pulaar .
Fooyre n’a fait que ressusciter de sa longue agonie des années où quand écrire était une subversion , exprimer ses idées une offense à un ordre qui a horreur de l’encre qui éveille les consciences .
Fooyre ronkii tawo yo jaggire no jaaynde timmunde nii , hono no jaayɗe jaltooje he Arab walla Farayse ɗee nii .
Fooyre sosaa , yaltini tonngoode mum adannde , ko e lewru noowammbar 1980 .

Fooyre tonngoode 221
Fooyre uddii tonngoode mum 100
Fooyre Ɓamaare tonngoode 110 yaltii hannde 25 abriil 2013 .

Fooyre Ɓamtaare ( FƁ ) : Porfesoor , jam weeti .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare ( FƁ ) : Sokna Kajjata Maalik , aɗa waawi haalande min maanaa Goomu depiteeji ngam ƴellitaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije ngu cos-ɗon he nder Suudu sarɗi nduu ?
Fooyre Ɓamtaare , jaaynde wootere wajjere yaltoore e Muritani tawi ko e ɗemngal ngenndiwal , nde nganndu-ɗaa jeyaa ko e jaayɗe ɓurɗe duumaade , ina sokli ballal yimɓe fof .

Fooyre Ɓamtaare : A fiilii leppi walla a suwaa ?
Fooyre Ɓamtaare : A wonaa gawlo .

Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Aɗa anniyii fiilde lefol goɗngol , tataɓol ?
Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Aɗa dana wuurde e naalaŋkaagal maa ?
Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Aɗa jogii diɗɗal maa , walla ko a gooto ?

Fooyre Ɓamtaare : En paamii wonde caɗeele jookre ina njeyaa e ko addani on daraade e himmirde kono hol to ndew-ɗon haa ndee safrirde ŋarɗunde mahaa haa joofi ?

Fooyre Ɓamtaare daɗndii binndol Pulaar e jaaynirgol haa heɓnii ɗum hannde e tolno ɓurngo toowde ɗo jaayle mawɗe binndeteeɗe dowliyankooje njettii .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani e denndaangal terɗe mum ina nduwanoo denndaangal Wuro Jowol Sahre , teeŋti e ɓesngu makko kaŋko Alasan Borti Jallo cankiiɗo oo , suddiiɓe makko , ɓiɓɓe makko , enɗam makko , sehilaaɓe makko haa e gollidiiɓe makko sabu ngal ɗoo baasal .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare e denndaangal Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani , ine ndenndi sunaare e banndiraaɓe Sammba Dooro Soh , gootal e jagge FƁPM gidiiɗe .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare e denndaangal terɗe Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani , ine mbiy maa Abdullay , a tuɗɗiima leppi teddungal , yo Alla yurme , yaafo maa !
Fooyre Ɓamtaare fulanii on nanondiral ngal .
Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko jaaynde lewriire humpitoore , findinoore .

Fooyre Ɓamtaare noon , gaa gaa hitaande adannde ndee ( 2012 ) , meeɗaa seerde e nduu woondu .

Fowru anndi Bojel fuuntii ɗum kadi .
Fowru dogi haa woɗɗii lekki kii , dartii , fooɗtii no feewi , moomi hoore sabu muuseeki .
Fowru dogi ronki yiyde dunndu ɗo suuɗii .
Fowru fadaani o firlitoo .
Fowru fuɗɗi ɗaanaade ina hara .
Fowru heewi jibinde ko he ngaska .
Fowru hina loppita ko barooɗe conngi .
Fowru hinaa heewi gaatureeje .
Fowru hinaa yana e jawdi lakde , kadii hinaa biftoo e wuro , walla wiido walla ko nanndi heen .
Fowru jaaki no feewi sabu siftorde no tawrunoo Bojel ina weela e lekki nii .

Fowru ndaari leydi tan yiyi ɓikkon mbaroodi ina kooyni takke , ina kooñi .

Fowru riddi rawaandu haa rawaandu naati nder wuro .

Fowru waylii haa foti no abbere maaro .
Fowru wi'i mo , alaa e sago , to a yiɗaa too ko toon njahataa .
Fowru wiꞌi !
Fowru wiꞌi mo , waɗde so a yiꞌii lekki mawki , toowki kii maa wullu no feewi .

Fowru woni e miijaade ko foti haalande wojere .

Fulɓe Mali ngalaa hannde ballo .
Fulɓe Ngaree nden nden ndeen ten , ngonen neɗɗo gooto .

Fulɓe dado-ɗen yontii
Fulɓe e hoɗdiiɓe mumen yiɗɓe pulaagu ɓetanii kikiiɗe ɗee hakke mumen haa juuri .
Fulɓe ene mbiya " Neɗɗo so hoolaama , yo o tottit !
Fulɓe ina keewi wiyde ñalɗi ko tati , hanki hannde e janngo , ɗuum fawii ko e naange , tawde jamma e ñalawma ina lomlomtondira eɗen mbaawi feccude wono ( temps ; time ) hono noon , kono kadi so en mbelaama mbiyen sahaaji ko tati , ko yawti , jooni e ko arata .
Fulɓe ina mbiya : " teŋkooɓe poti ko toŋtondirde , kono wonaa toŋkondirde " , ko ɗum nii ɓuri heewde e leñol ngol kala ɗo keew-ɗen , ko dukooji , duko ruttooji e ɓiɗngu baabaagu .
Fulɓe kala na nyaagoo Geno yo Ceerno Aliw MBAALO juut balɗe malee , o sella , o hisa , ngam nguurndam makko , ko nguurndam lenyol .
Fulɓe ko leñol goongɗinngol iwdi koyeera neɗɗo , ko cuusgol gacce .
Fulɓe ko leñol mawngol , ɓooyngol , ɗuum ko huunde anndaande , daartol hina seedtoo ɗum .
Fulɓe koddir tan ɗe meeɗiino hecciɗde hawri heen .
Fulɓe mbiyi : " so tawii neɗɗo waɗii , golle moƴƴe yettete , so waɗii golle bonɗe yoo yennee " , ndeke noon ardiiɓe galle 2STV woppooɓe jolfuɓe ina leewoo gila subaka haa hiira tawa alaa fof ɗo ejataa sawto pulaar , poti ko haalaneede goonga ngati pulaar hersinaaki ñaaƴirde e nder winndere .
Fulɓe njaltinii ŋari e pinal , peeñninii keewal mumen e nder Jali mawngo e diiraali e ɗee kikiiɗe .

Fuur gorwittooɗo ( Four rotatif ) : Conndi ndi defee e ndeer fuur gorwittooɗo mbo nguleeki lewlewndu mum tolnii 2000°C , kono defata conndi ndi haa hooña ko 1450°C , ndi fenndoo ndi wonta kaaƴe boɗeeje coy sabu nguleeki , kaaye ɗe mbiyetee ko klenkeer ( clinker ) so en njiɗi mbiyen ɗe cumaaɗe .

GENO KAM WAWI
GIE-DYNN jiimi ko 2 033 ha .

GUMMU ZEN GILA LAW CALOZEN WONNDE ARANI EN E NDER NGENNDIIJI MEN YOO WON HARE MEN KUZI E ZEMZE MBINNDEN NGAL MEN KAALEN NGAL MEN JARANA EN NJEEYEN PITTAALI MEN COOTI REN NDIMAAGU MEN SO YIZI NGONEN KEDDE JAM ZE CALO NEN WON NDE KEDDE JALEEZE ÑEMMBEN 6EEN DARI NOO6E HANKI E HECCI HANKI 6E INZE MUMEN MBINNDIRTE ALKULE KANNE KAALIS CIFTO REN ABDUL BOOKAR KAN WONNDU DE BAYDI KECCO PAAM LAAMTOOR SIDI SAL KO ÑANDE 10 SILTO 90 KONO KADI SIBAA SAAR GOROOJE TATI COOTI RAAZE NDIMAAGU KO YIDDE HOLU DE HANKI 6ENNI KONO KO HANNDE HAALTATE HANNDENE TAARIK MUM KO JANNGO SIIMTOYTE NDEKE NDARONO ZEN FODDE MEN NGAM KE6EN NDIMAAGU MEN PERGITE MBA PUUJOOJE YAAFUYA ZA66AAMA KUZUL USMAAN GAAJO MO GUDDUZE NDUYET6E
Gaa gaa koorka ñalnde kala kaa , lewru koorka nduu ina
Gaa gaa luurdunooɓe ɓee , hono Ibn Khaldum e yonaaɓe Feeralla e diiwaan , ina tawtoranoo joɗnde ndee yonaaɓe ɓeeɗoo ( ƴeew doggol tawaaɓe cinndangol ngol )
Gaa gaa tolnooji jaŋde , ñalɗii ɗii ndippii he huunde e geɗe , gila e rewindo , ɓeto , laabi jaŋde , haa e wallifo .
Gaa gaa ɗuum , hoohooɓe laamu heewɓe e jom jawɗeele en muritaninaaɓe ina ndokkaa boowe mawɗe sara gure , e dow jeyi gure walla teelɗuɓe tawi rewaani laawol .
Gaa-gaa balle ɗee won’de paayodinɗe e gootal heen fof waɗeede ɗo haani , so en teskiima ma en njiy wonnde , huunde ndee ene sara ; fulɓe taweteeɓe he fedde hee ɓe gooto heen fof won ko yahi to jeyaa to .
Gaaci sooninkooɓe koɗi haa jirwi , gorko sooninke yalti , woni e ñaaƴde haa yiyi kañum ne ko ɓennuɓe ɓee njiynoo koo , waɗiri no yawtuɓe ɓee nii , yahi .
Gaagaa geɗe jowitiiɗe he uujanɓe Tuunus , pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje teeŋtinii toɗɗaa tan ko ɓaleeɓe .
Gaagal ganndal luggal ngal wallifiyankee oo jogi he pinal leñol Fulɓe , aadaji mum en , e daartol mum en , o hollirii kadi he nder deftere hee won’de mo kumpitiiɗo pine keewɗe e aadaji mum en , yantude e won’de mo dewindiiɗo toɓɓe ɗe dukooji mum en ɓurii iiñcude hannde he nder batuuji ( circles ) annduɓe e jaayndiyankooɓe he nder aduna he .
Gaanti ko haala mbeñiika , potka jiiɓtireede hakkille .
Gaas karbonik ( CO2 ) e gaas biyeteeɗo metaan walla won ɗiin gasuuji ummotooɗi e " filtoks " , walla ɓuuɓnooji ( gaasuuji filsideer ekn ) walla kadi ko wiyetee Oson ko , ko gaasuuji gaddooji " seer " ɓooyooji no feewi e nder weeyo ( hakkunde duuɓi 20 e duuɓi 50 000 ) , tawi yoga heen ko aadee saabii ɗum en .
Gaas ɗiɗaɓo e keewal , ko gaas eliyoom : ooɗoo-ne , e nder 100 fof , ma o roondo heen 29 e keewal .
Gaañiiɓe ɓee nawaama safrirdu Bukaawu , laamorgo falnde ndee , hedde 70 km rewo wuro Sannge ngoo .
Gacce ko kuwgal hakkilantewal ngal renndo fawatnoo e aaƴaare ngonka haa baɗtina tawa umminaani fitina .
Gacce maa semteende ko yaɓɓude keerol gootol maa keeri renndo , gaddanooji joom mum ustaare to bannge neɗɗankaagal e renndo , ko wayi no rewde e ko renndo ngoo rewaani , haalde ko renndo ngoo nefata , weejnude ko renndo ngoo suuɗata , suurtude ko renndo ngoo suurata , waɗde ko renndo ngoo salii añi , wonaa noon kala ko saabotoo gacce to pulaagu , saaboo ɗum to renndo wonngo , renndo fof e keeri mum e gacce mum .
Gacce mbarataa e Senegaal .
Gacce ne ko helmere Fulfulde mahiinde e keewal , to ngaddiin Fuuta Tooro , to ngaddiin Aadamaawa , wontoyta ko semteende , wona so neɗɗo wiyaama semtii , firta o dañii gacce .

Ganndal e Jaambaraagal mbirniima
Ganndal e gollal Ñande alkamiisa 12 marse 2020 , hiirde mawnde yuɓɓinaama he nder wuro Kahayɗi , tawi tammbinoo golle ɗee ko sagataaɓe wuro ngoo , anndiraaɓe diine e almudaagu .
Ganndal huurtii mbirniindi nannge naange keborɗe aroyde , jooni annduɓe weeyo ina mbaawi anndude nde nanngal naange fuɗɗotoo , ɗo waɗata , ɗo niɓɓiɗta e nde gasata , ɗuum waɗi njiyaa won heen ina ɗannanoo ƴeewoyde nanngal naange .
Ganndal leydi .
Ganndal makko e hoyre yoo ɓeyde .
Ganndal ummii ko e taariindi men ( enen yimɓe ) , taariindi men ko huunde nde ngoowɗen heddi ko hol no ɓulnortoɗen heen ganndal , kala ko ngon'duɗen , ɓooyduɗen , ngoowɗen heewaani jaaknude men , so a tawi sakke ina saña leppi mum , a naamndiima mbo no o sañirta , o haalanma gollal ngal no moƴƴirta e inɗe kaɓirɗe ɗe o huutorto ɗe fof e pulaar , waɗi noon ko huunde nde o tawri taaniraaɓe makko , njanngini mbo haa o ɗiggini .

Ganndo e witiyanke o : O woppii wiɗtooji limtinɗi , o waɗii firooji keewɗi .
Ganndo gooto ina wiyee Lamartin wiyi " neɗɗo , sahaa e sahaa fof ina tagtee , ina wonta goɗɗum " .
Ganndo goɗɗo ina wiyee Eynisteyn riiwti miijo Niyuuton o feññini won'de mboni kala e wono mum bannge , wono wonaa huunde renndaande kuuɓal , alaa , mboni kala huunde kala heerori wono mum .
Ganndo ina wiyee Lorens holliri won'de ndeka jahgol wono e ndeer kala ndaɗɗudi ina seerti , won heen ɗo yaawi , won heen ɗo leeli , Eynsteyn holliti won'de fiɓnde hakkunde daɗɗuɗe ñiiɓɗe ko njaaweeki lewndu , ɗuum joopii ko jowondiral hakkunde daɗɗuɗe ɗee kala fawii ko e njaaweendi lewndu , o addi heɓɓitorde ( facteur ) ( 1-v1 v2/c² ) o sellini ngoon miijo .
Ganndo jeyaaɗo Nederlande woni ko e etaade rukkude leɗɗe lewndu ( lumière ) mbela eɗe lomtoo potooji jaynirɗi laabi ko fay arde .
Ganndo kadi lolluɗo biyeteeɗo Abu Yuusuf Ya’quub al-Kinndii , jaɓananooɗo he waawde filosofi , safaara ( medcine ) , hiisaweeje ( mathématiques ) , mbewu ( l’astronomie ) , géométries .
Ganndo mawɗo ko faati e ɓalliwal ( fisik ) , biyeteeɗo Stephan Hawkings sankiima ñalnde alarba 14 marse 2018 .
Ganndo yahii , defterdu sumii !

Gardiiɗo ( recteur ) duɗal ngal , profesoor Muusa Loh , kanum ne hollirii wonnde ngol ɗoo innirgol kesol , maa wallu e rokkude waɗde inniraaɗo ndaarorgal .
Gardiiɗo jaagorɗe , Mullay uld Muhamed lagadaf ƴeftii konngol o wiyi : " Fawaade e eɓɓooji mawɗo leydi Moritani Muhamed uld Abdel Asiis , ma en ƴellit ɗemngal Arab , min ñiiɓnangal e liggorɗe , witto e kala gandal e kuuɓal leydi ndii , sibu Arab ko ɗemngal diine men e nulaaɗo men Muhamadu ( SAW ) en potaani yeebaade ngal walla fondude ngal e ɗemɗe godɗe !
Gardiiɗo kuuɓtidinɗo ekkol Haayre Golleere , Demmba Umaar Gey meeɗnooɗo gollaade duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije , teeŋtinii nafoore fuɗɗoraade ɗemngal mum neeniwal .

Gartal makko hawri ko e cosgol Muritani : toɗɗagol jooɗantooɗo Muritani e Suudu sarɗi Farayse .
Gartirgol njuɓɓudi mbaandi no Duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije ndeen ko huunde wallitoore ɗemɗe ɗee ƴellitaade , sibu wiɗtooji he ɗemɗe ɗee , defte , heblooji maa mbaɗe heen , toŋta ɗemɗe ɗee .
Gartirgol punndi Mbaañ
Gartirgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee he nder jaŋde leydi ndii ko darnde addi ɗum , ko huunde fotnde toppiteede , daranee mbele ine siyniree no ɓuri feewirde , haa waawa naftude sukaaɓe men he nder jaŋde mum en .
Gartugol dewngol e tuugnorgal ballal ganndirangal " Tuugnorgal keeringal Naattingol Jaawngol walla PSIR " : ngal toɗɗii ko fotde 34 000 neɗɗo .
Gartugol juɓɓinangol e nder nanondiral tat-tatiwal 2007 ( nanondiral hakkunde banngeeji tati ) : tuggude saawiyee 2008 haa desammbar 2010 , fotde 20 484 neɗɗo ngartiraama heen .

General Abdel Aziiz
Geno joom baawɗe nula malayka yoo ƴoog ndiyam ngonɗam e dow Ngaawe ( Leydi ) o ñeɗa ɗam ha ɗam horsa , hay waadere o woppataa e dow mayri , ndeen kala cooyniiɗo murlal ngaawe , yiya ngal yooɗaani , sabu ngal furɗat , sabu wertaango leydi ɓuri heen doolnude ko ndiyam , ndiyam ɗam ( maaje kaaɗɗe , caalli , beeli , maaje belɗe yanti henn diƴƴe penndiiɗe to lobbuli ) ina abboo e 70% e wertaango Ngaawe .
Geno toowɗo oo wiyi : " mbele a yiyataa ɓee hoohooɓe ummiiɓe e Israayiilnaaɓe caggal Muusaa ?

Gese maɓɓe ngonata ko e kuɓeeje daarorɗe toowɗe , ɗe njyataa Naange , ko lampaaji tan , e ndiyam ndogojam e nder ɗeen kuɓeeje , aɗam waɗa yah-ngarta ngam yarnude puɗi aawnateeri maɓɓe ɗo leydi tawaaka , ndiin mbaadi ndema kam jarribaama to duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde Arijona , ɗiin puɗi ina mballa hoybin'de nguurndam e dow lewru nde wonno eɗi ciiɓoo cuytam ( Gaz carbonique ) ɗi cuurka Oksijen ko neɗɗo sokli e foofaandu ko .
Geɗal goɗngal ngal ko yakawere ƁALEERE !
Geɗal nayaɓal ngal
Geɗal nayaɓal ngal : Tawde guurtol jirlol ( axe de rotation ) Leydi ko guuringol , waɗa saha naange ɓura tolnaade bannge rewo leydi , ñalawma leyɗeele gonɗe ɗiin nokkuuji juuta , aɗa ɓeydoo abbaade rewo tan ñalawma ina ɓeydoo juutde , jamma ɓeydo raɓɓiɗde , haa ngaraa won e nokkuuji naange mutata toon lebbi jeegom .
Geɗal tataɓal ngal
Geɗal tataɓal ngal : kala ko ina yirloo e hoore mum , tawata ina waɗi guurtol ( axe ) goodngol ( no gaarayol wuurtirtee e ñaayre kurus nih ) walla koddirangol ( potndangol ) ngool woodaani kono wiyee so woodno ko ɗo rewata !
Geɗal ɗiɗmal ngal
Geɗal ɗiɗmal ngal : Leydi koko waɗata yiiloo-banngoo ( ɗuum woni yirlaade e hoore mum ) , ngool jirlagol addani jamma e ñalawma lom-lomtondride , ina hiira ina weeta ɗoon ɗo leydi jokki yirlaade e hoore mum .
Geɗe ceedtotooɗe huunde e daartol leydi ndii ( senngo daartol ) – Kaawniiɗe njuɓɓudi hettere leydi nokku oo – Puɗi , diƴƴe , ndiwru e kulle ɗeɓ-duunde ndee , belɗum yiyde teeŋti e ndunngu ( saanga ile nde mawni e Maayo Senegaal ) .
Geɗe garooje ɗee nanondiraama hakkunde banngeeji ɗii
Geɗe goɗɗe ɗe kiintaaɗe
Geɗe kaawniiɗe ina ngaanni yimɓe hannde e leydi hee .
Geɗe keewɗe kawritɗe ena newni baɗgol Tummbere Jiinge walla Jeeriyel Tummbere wootere e ɓarakorɗe banngorɗe ɓurnde faayodinde e jeejegol Maayo Senegaal , bannge Muritani
Geɗe nannduɗe e koode , walla e naange , ene mbaawi wuurde ( woodde ) duuɓi miliyaaruuji .
Geɗe ngalɗoo niiwnorgal fof ko ɓujeeje ( ɓurtuɗe to bannge mawnugugol ) .
Geɗe tati ina njeyaa e jaawnuɗe golle julaaɓe jiyaaɓe oropnaaɓe : caɗtugol kaŋŋe e ñiiƴe ñiibi walla pooɗondiral hakkunde poobaar e ojji ummoriiɗi Inndo ; baɗtugol gawƴe suukara remeede to Beresil e to Antiiy ; cuɓagol joom gese en jiyaaɓe afriknaaɓe .
Geɗe tati no ɗaɓɓaa e ɗee golle : 1-Seeɓde , anndude ko yiɗi e no yahrata haa yottoo e faandaare mum .
Geɗe teskinɗe jowitiiɗe e nguurndam yimɓe , jawdi , sato ngoo ekn , ina jannginee toon .
Geɗe ñeeñaaɗe : laana , awƴal
Geɗe ñeeñaaɗe : mukke , bot , taƴee-hulee , deymaat , balluuje , sikaare , makatuumru , wana , kufa , jemmbeŋ , ɓerɓerol , daɓɓungol , fannuuji gaalo , sasa , dannga , kalbe , jaaɓirɗe .
Geɗe ñeeñaaɗe : wowru , unugal , luwgal , lahal , tuntuleere , karaŋ , jooɗorde , bereteewal , golirgal .
Geɗe ɗiɗi ine njeyaa e newnude jaggugol Wullum : 1° ) njeenaari ujunnaaje noogaas ( 100 000 francs ) e 2° ) jowgol njoɓdi ardiiɓe haa nde Wullum nanngaa fof .
Geɗel gootel kam en puɗɗiima yananeede ɗum : weeyo woni ko e jaŋtaade hoore mum e ndeer mbaadi neɗɗo .
Geɗel ɗiɗaɓel ngel , ko njiyaten cikken asamaan ko ko ñippii e leydi koo , ɗum fuuntat gite tan !
Gganndo ina wiyee Niyuuton ( Newton ) hollirii e miijo mum won'de wono jokkondiraani e hay dara yahata ko haaju mum , dograta ko njaaweeki ngooti wonan'de huunde kala e mboni kala e ɗo waawi won'de fof kadi , ko heen o tuugnii ngam anndude tolno kala ko dillata e dow leydi haa boowal leydi , so o anndii nde ɓami yahde ɗo ummii e kuccam mum yanti heen njaaweeki mum o anndat ɗo foti tolnaade .
Ghazwaani : " Mi fadaano e luulndiiɓe ɓee , yiɗande leydi ndii njangu ceɓɓitaagu "
Gigabit/leƴƴannde ko ɓetirɗe keeweendi kabaaru .
Giirtondiral gadanal ( Préhomogénéisation ) : Leppi nawata keletine kaaƴe ɗe les caali jillondiral , waɗta ɗe joowre , joowre nde noon ɓamirtee ko les so ina yaltinee caali ki .
Giiɗawal ( Optique )
Gila 2008 , ina farlininanoo e gollorɗi e njuɓɓudi laamu rewindaade e ɓetde nadorɗe gollotooɓe mum en dañɓe hakkunde duuɓi 40 e 74 e nder wicitaaji cellal poti waɗeede ɗii .
Gila 2010 njanguuji nattii e Muritani , diftagol tuubakooɓe nattii haa ɗum addanii leyɗeele Hirnaange ɗee ( Farayse , Ameriik ekn ) hiisaade Abdel Ajiiju no " kanndorgal tiiɗngal baawngal falaade bonannde Aqmii e nder diwaan o " .
Gila 2012 , Leyɗe Saahal teeŋti e Mali e Burkina e Niijeer ngoni ko he ƴiiƴe ɗe seɓɓitiiɓe caabii .
Gila 2015 e fuɗɗoode daawal gadanal fiilngo M .
Gila 30 Settaambar nde Kapiteen Ibrahima Tarawele loppiti laamu to Burkina , ngoƴa mum kimmuka ko huccitde he jihaadiyankooɓe sanndolimɓe gila he hitaande 2015 .
Gila Abriil 1989 Muritaninaaɓe taccinanooɓe maayo Senegaal e dogɓe tiindii Maali nan nguuri e araniyaagal e nder cukkon e caalon wondude e heege e ɗomka e yowitaare e sadakeeji ummoriiɗi e leyɗe tuubakooɓe walla ummoriiɗi e Fedde Adunankoore toppitiinde mooliiɓe ( HCR ) .
Gila Amerik felliti yaltude nanondiral Wiyen ( Vienne ) paatungal e nikleyeer hakkunde leydi Iraan e leyɗe hirnaange , sorfundu persiiru ɓeydii lollude .
Gila Ceerno Suleymaani Baal , haa Sayku Umaar Taal , Ceerno Hamme Baaba Talla , haa hannde , fulɓe ko " ardiiɓe-heetɓe caggal " E ndaw ko haawni !
Gila Muritani heɓi hoore mum , Dowla keso oo darii tan , ngootaagu ngenndi woni ngoƴa dowrowo sosnooɓe ɗum ɓee .
Gila Ndakaaru haa Ndar e Paris to leydi Farayse .
Gila Perseverance yettii yupporde ndee , fooftere alanaani NASA e deegowel Perseverance kam e elikopteer Ingenuity .
Gila Sulyee 2008 , nde jom koode en ngummanii ittude Siidi wul Seek Abdallaahi e laamu , caggal nde Wul Waagef haali ko fayti e ñawndugol gagga warngooji to yahnoo to Kayhayɗi , tuggi ndeen , faade hannde , Muritani ronkii deeƴde .
Gila dawaa dawi , a meeɗaa fewjude ko feewaani .
Gila duuɓi keewɗi , Omar Bolondee Joop wonii sewnde ƴoogirgal miijooji wonande harbiyaŋkooɓe ( militants ) e jom ñeeñe ( artistes ) en .
Gila e darorɗe kitaale 1980 ko ɗii ɓoggi giiɗal lomtii ɗoon , tammbii yah-ngartaa enternet .
Gila e e oon sahaa njanguuji ɗii ndartaaki sabu e deesammburu 2007 , tuubakooɓe tato wanngotooɓe ( tuurist en ) mbaraama e saraaji Eeleega .
Gila e fuɗɗoode Wojere haɗi mo ñaamde tawi omo heyɗi .
Gila e fuɗɗoode ɓe mbaawii rippude e konngol eddaagu ( genre ) , ɓe mbaawii laɓɓinde ceerndungal hakkunde debbo e gorko fawii ko e mbaadiiji ɗiɗi : debbo e gorko ina ceerti to bannge tagoodi , ɗuum ko Alla waɗi ɗuum , e ceerungal ngal yimɓe tafi fawaade e golle .
Gila e hitaande 1953 , UNESCO ine semmbini jaŋde he nder ɗemngal neeniwal he nder duɗe leslese .
Gila e kitaale 2012 , internet leyɗe baaɗe no Muritani rewatnoo ko e ɓoggol giiɗal biyeteengol " Africa Coast to Europe ( ACE ) " , hono ɓoggol " Daande maayo Afrik feewde Orop " .
Gila e tooñde ɓe sabu losde lannda maɓɓe ka o ɓeeltiri laɓel dannga makko , haa e hollude Micheal Steele won’de kamɓe ɗiɗo fof ko ɓe ɓaleeɓe : ɗoon laaɓti e renndo ngoo hay sinno ko ŋiñi ŋañalde ɗum haaldiraa .
Gila fenaande fuunti goonga haa ɓoornii comci mun .
Gila haala ɗemɗe puɗɗii hatanteeɓe ɓe ina njokki golle mum en e ina njananaa ko e muñal e peewal fof waawi heɓeede .
Gila habraa wonde dahaaɓe ɓee ngoni ko e juuɗe Al Kayidaa , laamu Farayse umminii doole mawɗe fayde Nijeer ngam " yiytude-ɓe ko curi yaajtaade , feere kala " .
Gila hare Idiriisa Sek e Abdullaay Wadda silti haa Idi yalti lannda Pds tafi mo mum hare fayti ko e Makki Sal !
Gila iiñcuru Mali nduu fuɗɗii , fedde Kisal ndee seeraani e waɗde loskooji he kala ɗo njangu waɗi he nder diiwe e gure fulɓe ngam waawde saaktude kaabaaru laaɓɗo wonndude he dalilaaji .
Gila jihaadiyankooɓe naati Mali caggal firtaare leydi Libi nde Kaddaafi waraa .
Gila jóóni , mbiyen kam no Sawru Ganndal winndiraa nii , ko goonga , won ɗo luulndii sarɗi laamu nguu ƴettunoo e 14 oktoobar , 1980 ; ndeen ko Seŋngoor laaminoo leydi ndii .
Gila kaaƴe ko kecce , ndiyam seeraani e eggude leydi ruuya faya dow e mbaydi cuurki , so toowii rennda fiya duule toɓa haa toɓa marmballe , so ndiyam ɗam yanii e leydi waɗata ko waameeji ndogana ɗo ɓuri lesɗude , caalli , beeli e maaje mawɗe .
Gila kuudetaa janndinɗo Aamadu Tumaani Tuure , gonnooɗo hooreejo toɗɗaaɗo
Gila laylayti renndo ngari , ene naɗti seerndude Jayndiyankooɓe e " aayniyankooɓe " .
Gila leydi Santarafrik fuɗɗi , Mali rewii heen , jooni ko Burkina Faso lomi yalnde : waylude jaɓɓal nder jotondire maɓɓe e leydi Farayse .
Gila losko ngoo fuɗɗitii he 2015 , maa tolno e teemedere neɗɗo keɗtaama .
Gila nde Amerik e Orop pooli Serbiy , Kosowoo waɗtaa e njiimaandi fedde Leyɗeele Dentuɗe ( ONU ) .
Gila nde Pennda Madam wirnii haa nde pulaagu waasi Kajjaa Joob ; ko Accaa Wele haɗnoo min yeeweede he naalaŋkaagu Pulaar to senngo rewɓe .
Gila nde Yiilirde Ngenndiire ɓami golle murn e hitaande 2003 , e gardagol Hooreejo fedde , Umar Idiriisa Saawo , nde yuɓɓinii ɗee golle garooje
Gila nde fannuyankooɓe karalliiwal njiyti laylaytol renndo , jaaɓnirɗe ballitooje sarde kabaruuji seeraani e soseede ko wayi no , instagram , Snapchat , Tiktok , Twitter , Pinterest , whatsapp ekn .
Gila nde haɓɓere PDS ɓami laamu senegaal e juuɗe PS , abullaay wadda mawɗo haɓɓere nde gadiiɗo won’de laamɗo o , o naatni gardiiɗo leydi ndi e teddeendi teddundi tawi na waawnoo waasde waɗeede .
Gila nde laamu Wul Taaya yeddatnoo haa jebbilii heɓtinde ɗum hay so haalaani ( nde wiyata " so tawii won Muritaninaaɓe ngoni caggal leydi sabu sabaabu baawɗo wonde kala , aɓe mbaawi artude " ) , haa yettii nde persidaa Siidi wul Sheex Abdallaahi heɓtini geɗe ɗee , felliti ummanaade artirde heddinooɓe Senegaal e Mali , e ballal HCR , gartirgol ngol waɗi ko e daawe keewɗe
Gila nde o yaltini miijo ngoo , woon annduɓe ngoni ko e golle , nde tawnoo paamii eɗum wona .
Gila nde ɗum hebletee nde , wonnoo fayndaare men heen ko yettinde ɗum hooreejo leydi ndi junngo e junngo , hade mum sareede .
Gila ndeen , haa e ñalawma hannde oo , lewru kala Fooyre Ɓamtaare ina yalta , so wonaa e noowammbar e desammbar 2010 , tawi eɗen keblantonoo ɗanngal caggal leydi , ɗanngal kaaytungal kisa .
Gila ndeen , haa e ñalawma hannde oo , lewru kala Fooyre Ɓamtaare ina yalta , so wonaa e noowammbar e desammbar 2010 , walla noowammbar 2018 , saawiyee 2019 , sulyee 2020 , sabu caɗeele muulirde ngenndi .
Gila ndeen annduɓe ganndal leydi e piiltiiɗe ndottii tuugorɗe ngam seerndude hakkunde geec e fiiltiingo .
Gila ndeen faade hannde , baage ceeraani e nuldeede to weeyo ngam wiɗtude e yillaade ɗaŋe , laaciije e kaaƴe goɗɗe kayhatooje e luggiɗeeki weeyo , ko wattindi ko ko baage deegooje nuldaa to Yumma-njenaare , ndeen ɗaŋre ɓuri yilleede e ɗaŋe goɗɗe ɗe fo .
Gila ndeen haa hannde Afrik foof nimsi ne woya haajooni deƴƴaani .
Gila ndeen haa hannde jam ne yilee jam ne ndaartee toon , kono kam haajooni artaani .
Gila ndeen haa joni o woppitaaka , kadi yimɓe makko nganndaa ɗo o heedi .
Gila ndeen haa jooni , Maki woni ko e hare hakkunde mum e yiɗɓe yoo telo e jooɗnde Mawɗo Suudu nduu .
Gila ndeen kinɗe laamotonooɗe Waalo natti jogaade simaa .
Gila ndeen pelle nannanɓe ɗee ( les mouvements de gauch ) , gila he nder Senegaal haa e caggal leydi , ene njokki daraade ngam yoo losko nuunɗungo waɗe mbele sabaabu maayde makko ene laɓɓine .
Gila ndeen pewje e miijooji denndinaa mate ɗiin elewaaji ine ngara njokka jaŋde mumen e nder duɗe jaaɓi haaɗtirde ɗe Ndakaaru , Cees e Ndar .
Gila ndeen ɗanniyankooɓe Afriknaaɓe heewɓe njaltinaama he galleeji mum en , nana ndar-ndarna he lawbi .
Gila neɗɗo yiyti neldude baage to weeyo hedde kitaale 1950 , o neldii toon ko ina abboo e 200 baagal .
Gila ngal jippii e dow Mars 25-01-2004 haa jooni ko ɗuum ngal dogi ,
Gila njeenaari ndii fuɗɗii rokkeede he hitaande 1901 , DDA heɓii heen 400 galaŋ , Ndenndaandi Ndentundi ( " Angalteer " ) heɓi heen 138 ( fat !
Gila njeenaari ndii waɗti rokkeede capanɗe njoyo e ɗiɗo ( 52 ) gorko ɓe ndañaani duuɓi 40 ( ɗuum na jeyaa e sarɗiiji hee ) keɓii ndi .
Gila o naati Fedde Ared Goomu o yaltaani , so wonaa nde o hooti e Joom makko ñande njaslaari 6 lewru Korse 2008 to Ndakaaru , wuro laamorgo Senegaal , caggal nde o lelii e rafi cellal .
Gila o naati e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e nder kitaale 80 haa yettii ñalawma o yalti aduna , o meeɗaa lohde e nder catal ngal .
Gila o toɗɗaa alaa ko woni darnde makko so wonaa jiiɓde hakkunde artuɓe ɓe e laamu ngu .
Gila oktoobar 2020 Jokkorde pelle ɗee seeraani e yiɗde winndude dallinannde hesere faatunde e ngonka majje , sabu teskaade darnde jaayɗe he nder kumpitgol yimɓe e yiytinaare pine e ɗemɗe men fof .
Gila salaatu , Pennda yahi lawƴoyde horde mum .
Gila tuubakooɓe paami luure hakkunde ɓiɗɓe galleeji laamotooɗi Waalo , ɓe ngoni e urɓude hakkunde majji ; ɓe mballita oo mbele ina hisnana ɓe faggudu maɓɓe , ɓe ŋaafta oogaa sabu hollitii won salaare .
Gila wolde ɓuuɓnde joofi , ngaska hakkunde Riisi e Hirnaange meeɗaa fotde nii yaajde .
Gila ñalnde Hoorebiir , 15 Seeɗto , leydi Sudan woni ko fitina bonɗo , tawi alaa ko saabi ɗum so wonaa pooɗondiral laamu .
Gila ñalɗi diisnondiral ɗii ɓenni , cabbino-ɗen ko haa Jaagorgal jaŋde nodda pelle ɗee ngam hollitde ɗum en eɓɓaande sariya kuccam jaŋde Muritani .
Ginaari / Ginal

Gollaade e niɓɓere
Golle Goomu dallinannde ndartaaki hay sahaa gooto .
Golle amen ngonaa tan fuku juuɗe tan ( basket ) , alaa , amin mballa yimɓe e safrorde gite , jaŋnde karallaagal , jaŋnde eɓɓooji , haɓanaade ɓamtaare , habtaade basal e kumam-binnaagu .
Golle binnditagol foksineeruuji e gollotooɓe e laamu loranooɓe e kewkewe 1989 , puɗɗanooɗe gila 2010 alaa ko njibini tawo ;
Golle e jaambaraagal e ganndal maa keddiima
Golle gonɗe e siyneede ɗee puɗɗiima lorde no feewi nguurndam yimɓe nokku oo : leydi ndokkaandi ndii naattii haa e nokkuuji koɗorɗe , haɗtii yimɓe ɓee hay golle faggudu e renndo ( hay ekkolaajo ndaɗaani heen ) , laabi e lappi taƴii , uddaama , hay remooɓe nattii dañde ɗo ndewi ngam yahde gese mum en walla yillaade gure cawndiiɗe .
Golle goɗɗe kaantare ina njeyaa e darnde Daesh e nder aduna hee , yeru warngooji kuuftidinɗi ɗi ɓe mbaɗi e sahaaji golwole jolnooɗe e nder leydi Iraak e Siiri kuccinaaɗi maa wonii ko e soldateeɓe dahanooɓe walla siwil en , teeŋti noon e jeyaaɓe e leñol yezidi en walla sunniyaŋkooɓe luulndiiɓe Dowla maɓɓe oo .
Golle kikiiɗe ɗee ɓamtoyi ko hedde 18w30h .
Golle maa haasideeɓe ubbu haande min piɗɗitat
Golle maa kay haa abada ko min siimtoove , nyeemtinoobe .
Golle maa moxxii ; aan , Ibraahiima SAAR , ngol ciimtol addanii ve njahaano ve , anndude no hiirde nde yahri .
Golle maa njooɗii Ceerno Ibraahiima .
Golle maa peewii Madiina Bah
Golle maɓɓe e maggol yoo cokle .
Golle maɓɓe ko yuurnaade ko laamiiɓe ɓee e luuldiiɓe ɓee ngollotoo koo .
Golle maɓɓe ngasii , defte maɓɓe keewii , nguddaama wonaa ko moƴƴi , wonaa ko boni alaa fof koɓe mbaawi ɓeeydude heen .
Golle mon njoozii .
Golle mon njuɓɓii sanne !
Golle ngaal Duɗal caytoranooka nii he nder eɓɓaande laamu nguu lelnunoo , hollitaande he nder ñalɗi diisnondiral juɓɓinanooɗi e nder lewru oktoobar ( kawle ) 2021 .
Golle njuɓɓudi ANAIR nokkuyankoori ndi : e min cunii no feewi ko ngalu ngu ndiiɗoo njuɓɓudi halfinaa ngam wallitde artiraaɓe ɓe , alaa ko battini e nguurndam mum en hay batte .
Golle pulgol ( pirgol e Pulaar ) Facebook , ko golle yarlitaare Fulɓe fof .
Golle puɗɗii ko ñalnde 26 bowte hitaande 2013 .
Golle ɗe kersinaaki nana njaŋtee caggal maa
Golle ɗe ko doge ɗiɗe , rogere adannde nde ko hannde fuɗɗi , ko neldude bey-weeyngal ( satellite ) TGO ( Trace Gas Orebiter ) ngam banaade faandu henndu mars ƴeewa so tawii ina waɗi gaas ina wiyee Metaan ( méthane ) , ina hawraa oon gaas heewi yaltude tan ko ɗo kullon nguurkun ngoni , sabu ɗo e dow ɗaŋre men nde ko ina abboo e 90% e gaas o ko e kulle guurɗe ummatoo .
Golle ɗe ko nuldude nate laaciire nde , e wiɗtude mbaadi memtinaari mayre , gila e diƴƴe haa e leydi , kaaƴe e geɗe goɗɗe gonɗe e haayre walla hoodere laaci nde , ɗuum maa addan men faamde no aduna o siforinoo gila leydi e naange e ko rewi mum woodaani ,
Golle ɗe kuuɓata ko e lebi 18 , baagal ngal wonaa gartowal .
Golle ɗe lekkol mbaɗta ɗee , winndete e nder jaaynde yaltoore laabi ɗiɗi e nder hitaande .
Golle ɗe tiimaandi añi tiimtaandi hersinaa
Golle ɗee ko jokkuɗe haa jooni , sagataaɓe ɗoftal ngal mboni kala udditii konte ( compte ) e ndeer lowre Mozilla locamotion ko heen jokkata golle firo ngo , hay ɗuum ne ko ɗo ɗoftoowo o waawi won'de fo , yoo Internet heɓe tan , golle ɗe ko e jiiroo mawɗo wonaa , yaama ɗe ngasa ko neeɓaani , haa pulaar wellitee e kaɓirɗe kese .
Golle ɗee nana mbaɗee e nder niɓɓere ɓurnde fof hulɓinaade , sibu alaa fof kiliifa laamu haalani min ko ɗuum woni .
Golle ɗee noon puɗɗii ko gila alarba , nde hiirde mawnde Pekaan renndini Hammadi Ayse Jool e Aadama Sih e Gurmo Sih e Sammba Duungel e Koylel Joop .
Golle ɗee timmata ko e balɗe men 687 ; ɗuum woni hitaande to mars , kono ɗuum firtaani ko ɗoon haaɗnatee , ina waawi jokkude haa ɓura ɗoon juutde , sibu baagal Oportiyuuniti ina jokki golle jaggal duuɓi sappo ko yottii tagofeere nde .
Golli tuubakal ko jom lati heɓata e ñaaki .
Gollinde sukaaɓe e dow mbeddaaji lemlemi gonɗi e semmu , teeŋti e laabi celi ine waawi saabaade paatagol joom mum .
Gollingol sukaaɓe ko renndinde denndaangal golle pakitɗe kiiɗooje sukaaɓe e cukaagu mumen , kuccam mumen , ndimaagu mumen , neɗɗaagu mumen , faljo jaŋde , kaƴƴingol ɓanndu nduu ekn .

Golwole BonɗeWolde Koree ( 1950-1953 ) : Tataɓal yimɓe Koree Rewo nayii heen , fotde miliyoŋaaji 8 haa 9 , e nder lebbi 37 fat .
Golwole ɓurɗe teeŋtude ɗe tuubakooɓe ngummini feewde e makko ko ɗeeɗo garooje : e nder lewru sulyee 1862 ; e nder lewru saawiyee 1863 ; e nder lewru sulyee 1864 ; e nder lebbi uut e settaamburu 1877 ; e nder lebbi feebariyee e maarse 1881 : ndeeɗoo wolde noon ɓuri fof bonde e wulde , nde anndiraa ko wolde Ndirboja .
Gonduɗo e muusalla reedu ko keew-ɗen wiyde estomaa koo , kañum ne ene foti reentaade yarde ko waɗaa korompolle .

Goo : hakkunde nde ngal fuɗɗii diideede faade nde ngal lottaa wonii duuɓi 25 , sibu ɗum fuɗɗii ko e hitaande 1996 .
Goo he Alfaa Hamadi Moodi .
Goo he Alhajji Maamuudu Bah , jibinaaɗo 1904 , mo winndiyanke biyayeteeɗo Muhammad Mustafaa Kan fotndi he hitaande 1984 e Alhajji Umar Saydu , walla e Abdulqaadir Kan , Almaami Fuuta Gadano .
Goo he Faakuru Kummba Tannjaa .
Goo he Sammba Gelaajo Bookara Tabakali mo innde mum ɗakkii he innde Jowoool haa ɗo njahraten ɗoo .
Goo ko goomu rewɓe ngu jillaani hay gorko gooto ine heɓa njeenaari Nobel ganndal , ɓeen ko Faraysenaajo biyeteeɗo Emmanuelle Charpentier kam e Ameriknaajo biyeteeɗo Jennifer Doudna sabu mum en yiytude kaɓirgal molekileewal " binnditirgal ganol nguurndam " .

Google e Wikipedia
Google jeyaa hannde ko kuutorɗe Enternet ɓurɗe mawnude .
Google newnanii en golle : Google rokkii en fartaŋŋe firde ɗum kam e hoyre mum e denndaangal ɗemɗe winndere nde e rewrude e tuugnorgal mum biyeteengal " Google in Your Language – GIYL – ( Google e ɗemngal ma ) .
Google propose des pages pour sa traduction dans toutes les langues dans sa section " Google in Your Language – GIYL- ( Google dans votre langue ) " .
Goomu 1 : Humpito Senegaal e Mali e bellitgol jiilgol jeyi leydi e nder nokkuuji ( meeriiji ) : hol no joom mum en naatirta heen e hol ko wonata heen ballal pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ɗe Senegaal e ɗe Mali .
Goomu 2 : Tijjagol luure e peeje maslugol majje .
Goomu 20 ( G20 ) woni hooreeɓe leyɗe 20 ɓurɗe alɗude e winndere nde ndentii ñalnde alkamiisa 24 e aljumaa 25 settammbar 2009 to Pennsylvanie ( Amerik ) , e nder wuro wiyeteengo Pittsburgh ngam yiylaade maslahaa paytuɗo e jiilgol kaalis winndere nde .
Goomu 3 : Juurnitagol sariya jowitiiɗo e jeyi leydi e sariyaaji ciynooji ɗum : jerondiral et peewnitgol juɓɓule e sariyaaji ngam cemmbingol jam e nder renndo .
Goomu 4 : Jojjanɗe aadee , jiilgol fiyakuuji jeyi leydi e kuutorogol jawdi ngam ƴellitaare to bannge faggudu e renndo .

Goomu losko suudu sarɗiyeeji , toɗɗanoongu gila e maayirɗe lewru saawiyee 2020 , ina foti joofnɓude golle mum , artira ɗum e nder ciimtol jahndugol e hawraande sifotoonde holi peeje potɗe ƴetteede e fawaade e geɗe peeñɗe e losko waɗaango ngoo .

Goomu nguu , e nder golle mum heɗtiima yimɓe tato ardinooɓe jaagorɗe he laamu Muhammed Abdel Asiis , heɗtiima yoga e jaagorɗe gonɗe hannde e golle kam e iwɓe heen fof , e kala jogiiɗo ko ina foti naamneede he ɗee geɗe .

Goomuuji parlemaa : commissions parlementaires .
Goomuuji ɗiɗi ɗii kala ɓeydima waawde teskaade won ɗeen geɗe , ko wayi no laawol rewnoo , walla yiytude ɗo joɗɗinnoo huunde , e yeru .
Goonga aanndi e hoore mum , teeli baŋnge mun .
Goonga foɗii hoolaade fenaande ɓe ɓuurti comci maɓɓe ɓe ngoni e yinaade , haa ɓooyi seeɗa tan fenaande yalti e ndiyam he ɓoornii comci goonga , yehi laawol mum .
Goonga goonga , sariyaaji lelnaaɗi ko yowitii e jey leydi e Muritani gila dawaa dawi , ciynirtee tan ko e heen fannu , tawa fannuuji ɓurɗi himmude ɗii memaaka , ko ɗum woni ko hulɓinii heen sabu eɗen nganndi ɗum saabiima luure keewɗe e nder leydi e kareeli ƴiiƴiiji , yeru e hitaande 1991 to wuro Sillaa haa ɗum yooɓii fittaandu , to wuro Nguurjaan ( diiwaan Dar el Barka ) e wuro Njorol ( sara Ɓoggee ) e maayirɗe kitaale 90 , haa ɗum jibini dummbugol sagataaɓe nokku oo e kasoo Eeleega .
Goonga nih , kanko Jacob Zuma ko o neɗɗo niɓɓiɗɗo , kono gardiiɗo yiilirde " suddiɓe " to galle laamorɗo oo , wiyiino e jaaynde " The Star " , alarba ɓennuɗo , " suddiɓe ɓee kala poti , hay gooto ɓuraani goɗɗo oon , sabu ko noon doosɗe leydi ndii mbiyi " .
Goonga nih heɗɗaawo njaaweeki ina haɗa en yiyde ngonka weeyo hannde , sabu alaa ko yaawi haa ɓuri lewndu ( lumière ) , etee ko lewndu addanta men kabaruuji kala ko woodi e nder weeyo , kono kadi lewndu njaaweeki mum diwaani 300 000 km/s , ɗuum firti ko kala ko woɗɗi men ko mbaadi mum duuɓi keewɗi caggal yottotoo en , en mbaawa anndude no way e o saha mbo ngonɗen , walla jooni-jooni , wadde so en koddiri won wonɓe e weeyo goɗɗuɗo tawa eɓe njahri yeeso to ganndal , so ɓe neldii men wempeƴere humpito maa waɗ duuɓi ujunnaaje walla miliyoŋaaji nde yottoo men .
Goonga nii gonaangal Idi Amiin Daddaa e leydi he ina wontannoo laamu ngu tuuba horde , kono nde tawnoo e laamu makko omo rokkunoo diine islaam geɗal , laamu leydi felliti ruttude mo ndeen ɗoon moƴƴere .
Goonga oo tan , ko ɓee sukaaɓe koninkooɓe , koko puɗɗii meeɗde laamu , kaaraani tawo , waɗde ɓe nganniyaaki ummaade he jappeere ndee jooni .
Goonga woni ko e yahde , kono kala ko yahata won ko dari , walla ɓurandira njaaweendi , koode e naange , alaa heen ko yahata no cikkirten ni , ko leydi worwitto , jamma e ñalawma lomlomtondira , sabu birnagol naange , gorwitagol ngol ina timma kala jamɗe 24 , ɗum firti ko ɗo njooɗiɗa ɗo aɗa yiilo fotde1600 km/h .

Guurtol ( diamètre ) ko 1 392 530 kilomeeteer , ina sowo guurtol Leydi laabi 108 .
Guurtol Leydi ko koddirangol , ngol ummii ko rewo ngol fayi worgo , etee ngol wuurtu leydi , wonaa dow mayri ngol rewi , no paamirton .
Guurtol yiiloo-banngoo leydi ko guuringol seeɗa e dow dinngiral tagopeeje , fotde 23 .

Haa gasa boli men njahen .
Haa goree ellee wonaa bojel ganndiranooɗo ƴoƴe e tinde hoore mum .
Haa hannde , e wiyde makko , ngam riiwtude ndeen faayre e haɗde nde jaalɗaade , Muritani ena foti daraade darnde laŋ e daɗɗuɗe peeje tabitɗe gaddotooɗe ƴellitaare deftere e taro e wallitde e semmbinde jogiiɓe coftal hannde wallifaade defte .

Haa hannde dee ndutto-ɗen he daartol .

Haa hannde to njahraten ɗo , alaa tagoore woɗnde ummiinde e ɗaŋe goɗɗe jokkondiri e yimɓe !
Haa he kitaale 2000 , Tuunus ko yawtirde tan wonnoo fayde Orop , kono hannde ina he uujɓe jooɗiiɓe ɗoon sabi yottaade Orop inan tan ɓeydoo saɗtude .
Haa jooni NASA ina woniri waɗde lulnde to weeyo ɓadiingo lewru , tawa lulnde nde ko ƴaaŋtirde feewde to ɗaŋe goɗɗe , teŋti ɗaŋre Mbaañ huccanaande jooni nde , won wiyooɓe waɗde ndeen lulnde alaa nafoore sabu yahnooɓe to lewru ko yawti njotti tan njippii e dow mayru tawi ƴaaŋaani hay nokku , kono tan miijiiɓe yoo nde waɗe ɓe kollitii nafoore mayre , so tawii woodi ko kewani yahooɓe to lewru e caɗeele ɓe mbaawa mooloyaade to mayre ngam daɗndude pittaali maɓɓe , kadi maa nde won damal faade to ɗaŋe goɗɗe .
Haa jooni de en cuwaa haljitde , hoodere woɗnde ina e ndoogu he to ɗatat Mawngal dawaaɗi ( constellation grand chien ) , ko ndeen woni mawngal koode , ko koodal moolalangal mawnude sabu ma ngal won hakkunde laabi 1 800 e 2 200 mawneeki naange .
Haa jooni kadi ñalawma oo ena ŋakki anndeede e jookli keewɗi , haa teeŋti e leyɗeele mem Afrik ɗo laamuuji keewɗi njiɗaa nande haala hakkeeji pine e ɗemɗe ena kaalee .
Haa jooni ko Opportiyuunitii ɓuri juutde ko reegi e dow Mars , sabu yahi e dow leydi Mars ko ina abboo e kiloometruuji 40 , 25 .
Haa jooni ko fureeji 79 yiitaa , kono hino waawa ka ndee limoore ɓeydoyoo .
Haa jooni ko kanko haalata o wi’i wonde ceerno ɓuri weeɓde e wonde almuudo , sabu almudaagal ko huunde saɗtunde wonde ngati ko ɗum adotoo kadi ko ɗum sakkittoo .
Haa jooni ko laaɓndal faade e Abuubakri Muusaa Lam mbele fulɓe wonɓe suudaan ɓee ina mbaawi heddaade e daliilu maaɗa oo ?
Haa jooni ko yeewtere taabal annabi Iisaa ( JKM ) , hono ganndiraaɗo Sadi wiyi hono biyateeɗo Kaaba El-ahbaari wiyi " nde yahi haa laawol Iisaa ( JKM ) ngol feeñi haa laaɓti , ɗum sarii e nder winndere ndee , wonti hankadi ko ɓuri heewde e yimɓe nannooɓe ɗum ɓe ngoongɗinii diina mo o addi oo , ɗum fiiltiima diina yahuud en to woɗɗi .
Haa jooni mbaylaandi ronkaama .
Haa jooni ngam hoybinan'de yimɓe teskaade koode , ndoogu fecca ko pece ɗiɗe mawɗe , laalagal rewo e laalagal ɓaleeri ( worgo ) , diidol ceerndugol ɗeen laalaaɗe woni peccol .
Haa jooni ngarten e Yumma-njenaare , ndeen ɗaŋre woni ko e nokku moƴƴo hakkunde mayre e naange , kadi e nde jogii faandu henndu , kono tan ndu tekkaani no feewi , ɗuum waɗi ndu waawaa dammbude nguleeki no haanirta ni , ɗuum waɗi hakindo nguleeki toon ko -60 degre ɗuum ko ɓuuɓol mawngol , wadde ndiyam ndeelam woodataa saka wooda ko wuuri heen .
Haa jooni noon sariya oo ina jokki heen so tawii renndooji ɗii njiɗaa feccitaade leyɗeele mum en , eɗi mbaawi sompude koppeeji , walla sosiyeteeji tawa eɓe ngollodoo leydi ndii .
Haa jooni to bannge kebungal ngal Fedde Fuuta Catal PoorJenti batii ɗo e galle am ñalnde Hoore Biir 24 lewru Morso ndu , fa’ndaare nde wonnoo ko sakkude peeje no sete walla goomu kakindiingu no ummorii ɗo faya Liberwiil tawtoree ñalɗi ɗi .
Haa jooni to bannge maanaa ( faandaare ) Huwde to aadamaari e to fuutaari waɗaaka gootum tee ko gootum !
Haa jooni yimɓe mbaawi tan ko etaade ustirde muusalla kaa ɓooso-cafroowo , kono , ko fayi , maa safrooɓe mbaɗtu feewnitde mbeɗon kon , haa kon mbilta , kon mbaya no kon mbaynoo .
Haa juóóni ko noon neɗɗo o , gawri ndi , suudu ndu .
Haa jóóni e toɓɓere diidel-jókkirgel , won winndirooɓe mbiimaami , njahanmaami , pijirmaami nii yenne : mbii-maa-mi , njahan-maa-mi , pijir-maa-mi , e fawaade e caatagól MAPE .

Haa nafta hannde , riiwta ɓiɗteende ,

Haa saabii dartingol jeewtanɗe maa .
Haa sukaaɓe leñol am ngama .

Haal pulaar en mbii " hul ko haalaa " .
Haala , kuɗol wolla ciftor hakkille waawaa sifaade ɗee golle so wonaa nde yitere seedanii hoore mum .
