Haalannde hooreejo leydi Tuunus fuɗɗiima jibinde geɗe ɗe moƴƴaani sibu wonii heen gollatnooɓe ko ɓooyi ndiiwaama tawa aldaa he ndaamordi .
Haalannde ndee teeŋtinii weltaare ɓiyɓe Ginenaaɓe ɓee sabu yiydeɓe laamu maɓɓe ene ari jaɓɓaadeɓe to boowal laaɗe diwooje to , hayso tawii e ɓe ngonndunoo he tampere e mette ngam no ngonka maɓɓe wayno to Tunis he ɓalɗe jawtuɗe ɗee ne , no ɓe njaɓɓoraa nii suynii mette maɓɓe , rokkiiɓe mbelemma artude he nder leydi maɓɓe .
Haaliyankooɓe heewɓe keɓii wi’de Ben Ali e galle mum ɓooyataa toon sabu diine islaam o ina foŋŋaa no feewi e nder leydi ndi tee ina anndaa ɓe ngonaa juɗiiɓe e dewal Allah no feewi .
Haalooɓe mbiyi " nehtaare maa daɗndu Siin , surpitaare maa yool Orop , kono welsindaare maa boom Afrik .
Haalooɓe pulaar mbi’i : " hakke yahataa , ladat " , tinisinaaɓe heewɓe mbi’i ko hakke mu’en woni e yi’de mo , ko ɗum waɗi Allah fiyi mo e kaalisaaji ɗi o wujji ɗi fof so o reentaaki njogori ko muuɗeede caggal makko .
Haalpulaar en ene mbiya : " Kala nde hooree sakkii e les ɓuuɓri won ɗo hoore daranii ɗum he naange " , ndeke noon so en njiyii pinal Fulɓe e ɗemngal Pulaar ene ƴellitoroo e woon fannuuji , ko sabu darnde e golle ɗe kaaɓetaake ɗe pelle bayɗeno GOODAL ni , e nannduɗe e mum en , gollanta leñol ngol ngam salanaade ngol daɗeede .
Haame warii kam kay hanki , njiɗnoo-mi ndeeɗoo yeewtere tawi ko hanki nde waɗaa , sibu arɓe ɗo hanki ɓee , mbiɗo yaakorii ko ɓuri heen heewde ngannda Fedde nde .
Haame warii mo dañaano taweede , kono haame ɓuri warde ko nanɗo mo araani .

Habraama kadi o neliino e laamiɗo ( empereur ) Baysantiin ( Byzantine ) wonnde yoo oon yamirmo o nelda toon annduɓe ( ulamaa’ ) ngara pira denndaangal gannde nafooje gonɗe he nder leydi mum .

Hadafi aduna oo , fof ne seeɗta nii ɗum ko Laamɗo jiɗɗo jiɗnooɗe leydi mun yiɗi Afrik wonnoo , kono hannde yeehii artaani artataa .
Hadafi yehii wontaa artude ko goonga kono hay gooto e maɓɓe wiytaa leyɗe " libi " hannde ɓuri walla samori , nde hadafi laaminoo ndee .
Haddii tan ko balɗe ɗiɗi hade dowla New Hampshire ( DD Amerik ) toɗɗaade mo jogorɗo daranaade lanndaaji ɗiɗi pooɗondirooji yahde Galle Daneejo .

Hade Baaba e wondiiɓe mum jolde e dingiral ngal , sukaaɓe Le Havre fooɗantooɓe paɗɗugol e ndee yiirde joli laawol gadanol .
Hade Kopernik , annduɓe mbaɗno ko leydi woni wuddu denndaangal tagoore , asamaan ko mbildi koode ina ceŋaa heen lewru e Naange ina njaha heen , ɓe pecci geɗe nguurndam ɓe mbaɗi ɗe nay , leydi , ndiyam , henndu e jayngol , ko noon waaɓe no Aristot paamirno Aduna .

Hade ɗuum , eɗen poti faamde , e nder winndere hee ,

Hakkillaaji fof ndogii e holko addani Ndillaan innirde lefol ngol " Rewo " mbele ko wonnoode mo pettoowo fugu to Nuaadibu walla ko dewgal makko e ndaanaan mo Oolo'ooloogo walla ko teddungal makko e Murtuɗo Joob dokkuɗo mo teddungal e catal Yommbol e hitaande 92 ?

Hakkille hol to keedtu-ɗaa ?
Hakkille hol to keedtuɗaa ?
Hakkille na waasa won’dude e ƳoƳre , kono ƳoƳre alaa ko waawi won’de so wonaa ƳoƳre hay sinno ina ɗesa mettude faamde haa e jaɓde .
Hakkille robot ko coɗol jamirooje ɗe neɗɗo loowi e mum mbela ina golla e dow njuɓɓudi , sabu robo waawa waɗde ko yamiraaka , jooni woni faandaare annduɓe ko rokkude robooji ndimaagu to miijo mbela ina njeytaare e waɗde ko mbela , mbela ɗuum ina moƴƴi e aadee ?
Hakkille waawa jebbilaade won'de alaa ko woodno , alaa wonaa ko aaɓnotoo , way tan kono mbiyaɗaa ɓalal nani woto yawtu ngal , alaa ko woni ɓaawo maggal hay dara , ɗuum addantaama jaɓde , sabu ina tuli hakkille , feere foo no mbaɗɗa maa humpito ko woni caggal ngaal ɓalal , so a humpitiima ko woni caggal maggal a haaɗata ɗoon tan ,
Hakkille yuurniima weeyo haa to ɓuri woɗɗude , jaɓaani haaɗnude ɗoon , o yuurniima memtinaari o fecci o fecciti haa o yottiima ɗo ina naamndoo doole mawɗe ngam feccoo , Keloori gaaluude mitte ngonndi hakkunde Farayse e Siwis , VLHC ( The Very Large Hadron Collider ) , ɗuum fo e waade noon hakkille jaɓaani ngel geɗel feccotaako .
Hakkunde 1945 et 1964 , dowlaaji 5 – DDA , Riisi , Siin , Laamaandi Ndentundi , e Farayse – peewnii bommbooji nikleyeer doolnuɗi .
Hakkunde 1989 e 2006 noon , mbayliigu mawngu waɗii to bannge karallaagal , kuutorɗe kese juumtuɗe njolii , newnooje golle , kono ɗaɓɓuɗe humpito majjum .
Hakkunde 31 bowte e 1colte 1960 sappo e nayi ( 14 ) leydi Afrik Farayseyankoori keɓii jeytaare ko ina wona hannde duuɓi capanɗe joyi maa feƴtere teemedannde ( demi siecle ) .

Hakkunde Alaseri e Farayse noon fuɗɗorii ko ustugol leydi Farayse tolno ( 50% ) e ko yamirtunoo naatgol alaserinaaɓe e leydi mum ( visas ) , jiidaani noon Emanuel Makron nde wonde " wonaa nannguɗo ɗemngal mum no feewi " ( huunde ɓurnde wasiyeede e sarɗiiji dipolomasi ) won ɗo wiyi e nder jeewte mum " Alaseri e tippudi laamu mum mbaɗtii e nder hakkillaaji mum en wonde pergitte jolnooɗe hakkunde leyɗeele ɗiɗi ɗee ko ñamaande nde ɓe njoɓnittoo daañaa " .

Hammadi Jah ( Pullo Hannde )
Hammadi Jah : Addani leydi ndi won'de loopal , to fuɗɗoode leydi woodaano , ko mooɓondiral e pelɓondiral kaaƴe e googondiral majje wulniɗe haa ɗe caayi , eɗe mahondira haa ɗe mahi leydi , haayre ɓadiinde fo fooɗee yana heen , leydi ndi ina ɓeydoo mawnude e murliɗe e wulde duuɓi miliyoŋaaji limtinɗi refti heen ndi woni e ɓuuɓde haa wertaango mayri yoori waɗi diƴƴe e henndu .
Hammadi Jah : E oon tuma leydi ko loopal gulngal pattowal wonnoo , ɗaŋel goɗngel yani e mayri ndi dalƴi woodi ko ruuyi e loopal he fay dow , ko ɗuum wonti lewru .
Hammadi Jah : Kaaƴe kay ko kecciɗnooɗe sabu ko loopal gulngal ɗe ngonno e fuɗɗoode .
Hammadi Jah : Ko noon tigi , walla tawa ko kedde kaaƴe doɓindaaɗe .
Hammadi Jah : Lewru ko helitin'de e leydi , ko ɓooyi Ɗaŋre Ngaawe ko loopal leydi e jamɗe gulngal , ɗaŋel kayhaytowel felmii Ngaawe woodi ko ruuyi e loopal he murliɗi joñii , ko ɗuum yoori woni lewru men nduu ndu cooyneteɗen e mbewu .
Hammadi Jah : Loopal gulngal wonnoo , jooni kay ɓuuɓii yoori .
Hammadi Jah jooɗiiɗo ɗoo r Bruxelles .

Hay so tawii Daesh woni ko e yaajnaade seeɗa seeɗa e nder leydi Iraak , e nder nokku leñol Kurd en to Siiri , ƴaañaade e sunniyaŋkooɓe tawa ɗo ɓe ñiɓii heen fof ɓe compa juɓɓule " dowla " ( hay so tawii wonaa ɗe ONU heɓtini ɗee ) , ɓe toɗɗoo hoohooɓe ardiiɓe ɗum .
Hay so tawii en koddirii wonde keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab ngol joopii ko ɗemngal Quraana , ina moƴƴi ciftinen wonde , tuggi njaatiraaɓe men haa yettii yontannde men , hay gooto fadaani haa ɗemngal Arab tan laawɗinaa e Muritani nde fuɗɗii janngude Quraana e nder ɗemngal Arab , walla waɗti janngude Arab ngam ɓeydaade faamde nelal kuuɓtodinngal gonngal e Quraana tedduɗo oo .

Haŋkadi Taarek Buwasiisi , duppunooɗo hoore mum to Tuunus saltaade yawaare , wontii raay denndaangal hiiɗaaɓe e leyɗe Aarabeeɓe e winndere ndee kala ; Muhammed Buwasiisi ko maande hare ndimaagu , raay hiiɗaaɓe , haa ko , e leydi Farayse , omo miijee innireede laawol walla boowal maantinngal .
Haŋkadi binnduɗo kala yoo waɗ heen kelmeendi mbele yimɓe ena ɓeydoo faamde , hay so wonaa e gannde kese !

He " Pottital Leydi to Rio " e hitaande 1992 , daawal mawngal taccaa : ko ndeen fuɗɗii hiiseede wonde kisnugol keew-guurɗiwal seerndotaako e Ƴellitaare duumiinde .
He 1931 , o ari Marseille yuɓɓinde gollotooɓe " dokkeer en " .
He 1945 caggal Wolde Winndereyankoore II gasi , leyɗeele keewɗe tawi ene pusi haa memi leydi gila e mahateeje mum en haa e faggudu mum en , woɗɓe boom ko ɓuri heewde e sagataaɓe mum en kalkinooma he ɗiin baasiiji .
He 1977 nde baaba makko rutti he jooma mum , o hooti Fuuta , o jooɗtoyii toon .
He 1988 UNESCO ɓeydii Tumbuktu he doggol ko ɓe mbiyata " Ndonateeri Aduna " ( patrimoine mondial ) ko , kadi he 2012 sabu hareeji e golwole baɗooje he diwaan o ɗe ɓe ɓeydi ngo kadi he doggol " Ndonateeri Aduna hulanaandi boomaare " .
He 1998 , taw Mamma ene yahra tan he duuɓi jeeɗiɗi ko ndeen naɓokayanke Leyla Sih heɓtini e makko wonde jom dokke e talent , so en kaalii tuubankoore .
He 2011 Aamadu arti he big screen , caggal nde o ɓeydii he karallaagal .
He 2019 kadi , ko adii nde suɓngooji ɗi mbaɗata , heblo wayngo hono noon kadi waɗaama fotde ñalawma kuurɗo ñalnde 19 Siilo , 2019 , to Meeri mo Madiina Gunaas , Geejawaay .
He 2022 , o winnditii doosɗe leydi kese teskoraaɗe waɗtude mbaawka fof he juuɗe makko .
He Cowogol & Kosamɗingol Aadee , Ceerno Mbaay wonaa tiitoonde hesere tan o ɓeydani ɗemngal Pulaar , kono o ɓeydii jaawre mawnde he gerngal kelmeendi Pulaar .
He Fooyre Ɓamtaare tonngoode 217 , en njiyii laanel Perseverance ƴettii to Mbaañ kaaƴe e punndi , kono heddii ko artirde ɗum he dow leydi men ɗoo , mbele annduɓe mbaawa ƴeewtindaaɗe ɗe , haa anndee ko ɗe coomi .
He Nder tintinoore ɓamdaandee , laamuuji leyɗeele tati Saahal , Burkina , Mali , e Nijeer kollirii pellital mum en yaltude Fedde Faggudu Leyɗeele Hiirnaange Afrik ( CEDEAO/ECOWAS ) .
He Siilo ( Janvier ) 2013 , nde Soldateeɓe Farayse ndiddata waɗboniyankeeɓe ɓee njaltini ɗum en Tumbuktu , taw ɓeen nduppi ko ene aɓɓoo he 4000 ballifanɗe , kono sinno wonaano feewre Abdel Kader Haydara denndaangal defte e wallifooji Tumbuktu kooñatnoo ko he oorngal Jihaadiyankeeɓe , ndoondi mum weɗoo he nder seenooje Sahel .
He aljumaa hanki Beyoncé yaltinii album mum keso " Renaissance " , caggal nde o jooɗi duuɓi jeegom o yaltinaani album .
He ballal masiŋ , darnde jannginoowo nattat wonde darnde jogiiɗo ganndal tan , kono ko kanko gaddii ƴoƴre nder njiylawu e denndinngol gannde ;
He biyɗe yuɓɓo halfinaango dummbirɗe Risi ngo , Nawalny rafaa ko caggal nde arti yahndoyaade ñalnde Mawnde ( Aljumaa ) nde , o fekkoraa to dummbirde to he wuro ene wiyee Kharp , he nder diiwal Yamalo-Nenets hakke 1900 kilomeeter , fuɗnaange-rewo Musku .
He daawal gadanal nde Wiliyam Ekong loowi loggol mum , njoorto waɗiino maataw maa Super Eagles , ƴettu kadi oo ɗoo kuppu waɗtana kippu ngenndi Nijeryaa o kuppu mum nayaɓo , kono ɓooytaani he daawal ɗiɗaɓal caggal nde ɓe ngarti fooftere Farank Kesi ( Frank Kessie ) naatni loggol woni potal ko adii nde Sebestian Haller ɗimmitta loggol kawgu .
He deftere hee , Ceerno Mammadu Saalif Mbaay , ene werloo ɗeeɗoo laaɓnde , kadi omo adda heen jaabawooli ñeɗaaɗi he lugge maaje ganndal-guurɗe ( Guurɗewal ) e ganndal safaara ( medicine ) .
He duuɓi jawtuɗi ɗii pelle nodditortooɗe Jihaadyankeeje ( Al-Qa’ida e Da’is ) mbonni ko heewi e ndonateeri pinal aade to bannge Fuɗnaange-Ɓadiiɗo e Worgo Afrik .
He eɓɓooje o joginoo , omo miijotonoo mahde defterdu , walla nokku janngirɗo Pulaar , bittirɗo pinal pulaagu .
He fawaade he ngonkaaji to bannge daartol , cellingol pulfule ina waawi jogaade jaɓɓe ceertuɗe .
He feere adannde ndee , ko deegowel goɗngel fotnoo artiroyde ko ƴettaa koo .
He filñitere 2011 , leydi Tuunus yahriino tigi yeeso nder hare feewde e añamleñamaagu e ndoolndoolaagu he waawnere .
He gasnirde ndee yiyannde raɓɓininaande , eɗen mbiya tan wonde FSI ina waawi wonde , nder mudda kakindiiɗo maa juutɗo , so tawii kay dente e yuɓɓooji bayɗi no FULCOM maa Tabital Pulaaku ( Pulaagu ) e pelle pine Pulaar/Fulfulde naatii heen .
He gollorɗi diiwanuuji ɗii , hujjaaji men paatuɗi e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee , kam e naattingol mum en nder TNJ leydi ndii , paamaama , ɓenninaama kadi nder nanondiral tawaaɓe ɓee he nder gollorɗi 10 nder 15 ɗii .
He hitaande 1960 , o yahi to Fuuta Tooro , ngam ɓeydoyde jaŋde makko to saare wi’eteende Podoor .
He hitaande 2017 , GOODAL yuɓɓinii lulnde ɓalɗe tati to Duɗal Ceerno Sileymaani Baal , ngam heblude jaayndiyankooɓe e animaatoor en gollirooɓe ɗemngal Pulaar , e karallaagal roɓindo , hiñde e caaktugol kabaaruji .
He jaŋde lesre hee , suka muritaninaajo kala janngirta fannuuji gannde ɗee ko he ɗemngal mum neeniwal , e dow teskaade ngonka nokku mum e jojjanɗe kisnugol mahondiral renndo .
He jiyanɗe Muhammadu Soh , duɗal ngal innitireede wallifiyanke Inta Aanniide o , ene waawi wallude he baylugol sikkeeji ɗi yimɓe ɓee njogii he ko yowitii he jaŋde woɗɗitiinde ( enseignement à distance ) .
He jiyɗe Bacca Bah , ko ɗuum tigi heɓtii Fulɓe e leñɗi Afrik ɓaleeɓe caggal nde ɓeen naati he diine Islaam .
He jonte jawtuɗe ɗee toɓɓere nde Fulɓe Senegaalnaaɓe ɓurnoo waawde dukde he nder layti renndo ( reseau sociaux ) he ko no Fulɓe pecciraa , mbaɗaa ƴele hono leñɗi keewɗi ceertuɗi ni he nder Senegaal .
He joofirɗe ñalɗi diisnondiral paatuɗi e jaŋde leydi ndi e lewru oktoobar ( kawle ) e noowammbar ( jolal ) 2021 , ciimtol kuuɓtodinngol diisnondire juɓɓinanooɗe ɗee ine mbaɗi toɓɓere he toɓɓe ɗiɗi ɗe pelle pinal ɗee njiɗnoo heɓde ɗee so " naattingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof nder tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi ndii " , e nder heen waɗde " cosgol njuɓɓudi laamu kalfinaandi ɓamtugol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( ko nanndi e Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije goodnongal ngal ) " .
He keblungal mawninde duuɓi teemedere ko naɓakayanke Senegaalnaajo o , Usmaan Semmben jibinanoo , jaagorɗo toppitiiɗo Pinal e Ngaluuji daartolyankeeji , Pr Aliw Sow habrii maa Senegaal sos festuwaal keso ngam mawninde naɓayanke Senegaalnaajo lolluɗo o , Semmben Usmaan .
He kitaale 2000 dille ɓalliiɗe leyɗe hirnaange peeñi he nder huunde e leyɗe jeyanooɗe e Sowiyet , ko wayi no Ikren walla Jeorji : Riisi nootii heen .
He kitaale ɓennuɗe cakkitiiɗe ɗee , ko pelle pinal Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof keewnoo mawnininde ñalawma oo , kono hikka , sabu haɗde woodnde ndee , sabu ñawu covid-19 , fedde fof yuɓɓini pottital ko to joɗnde mum tan , kono kam ɗe mbaaɗii yaltinde bayyinaango ngam teeŋtinde ɗaɓɓaande laawɗingol ɗemɗe Pulaar , Soninke e Wolof , kam e naattingol mum en nder Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde leydi ndii .
He ko nganndu-ɗen , so neɗɗo naatii ɓuftorde , naatii walla sakkiima les ndiyam , ine foti yiggude kala nokku e ɓanndu mum haa laaɓa .
He ko ɓuri heewde addanta Haalpulaar en yarde mone ko woppude joom haajuuji en ndawa law haa mbafoyaa nde puɗɗo wiyde ene kiirnda , heddo ene mbiya woysaayoo njaƴcodaaki e huudinooɓe .
He kuccondiral makko e jaayndiyankooɓe , o hollirii ene jeyaa e sababuuji gaddanɗimo yiɗde jeeyede he suɓngooji hee ko ngam yiydemo wonnde Faraysenaaɓe wuurɓe caggal leydi Farayse ɓe , ene keɓe caɗeele no feewi e heɓde jojjanɗe mum en haa teeŋti e ko yowitii e safaara walla jaŋde sukaaɓe mum en .
He kuuɓal , ɓe inɗe mum en njangtaa he warngo hee ko 22 .
He lappol pelle pinal ngenndiije njuɓɓinnoo tuggi 14 haa 28 sulyee 2022 , ngam hirjinde yimɓe ɓee e daranagol hujjaaji mum en to bannge pinal e ɗemɗe , en keɓii fartaŋŋe yillaade gure teeru e dowri keewɗe .
He lebbi 18 jawtuɗi ɗii , geɗe keewɗe , ɗe njaakoranooka , njolii to bannge karallaagal .
He lewru 10ɓru 1750 , ɗerewol eɓɓoore yalti ene sifoo ko jogori won’de loowdi deftere ndee ngam ɗaɓude yimɓe hunotooɓe ene coda nde so nde yaltii , kadi kala binnditiiɗo yoo fuɗɗo 60 livre , mbele eɓe ndaña ko ɓe muuldi deftere ndee .
He lewru Abiriil ɓennundu ndu , ICG hollitii hare naatii he " suudu ndu alaa damal " .
He lewru Colte 2021 , nde Aji Saar , yalti wiyi mawɗo lannda PASTEF , Usmaan Sonko heɓtii ɗum ndee , coow o mawnii sanne he nder Senegaal , yimɓe lannda ka e jinngooɓe mum en mbiy ɗum ko pewje laamu Senegaal e hooreejo mum Makki Sal , ngam helde koyɗe o mbir dikkotooɗo-mo mo o suusa hawrude he dingiral geew .
He lewru Saawiyee 1931 , Maalde haɓattoonde leñol Ɓaleeɓe feƴtii .
He lewru mee 2021 , HAPA ( Ardorde Toownde Jaayɗe ) jokkondiri e pelle pinal ngenndiije ngam habrude ɗum ine anniyii ɓamtude ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( FƁPM , AMPLCS e APROLAWO ) he nder jaayɗe leydi Ndii .
He lewru sulyee 2020 , Fooyre yaltiniino winndannde tiitoriinde " Loskugol tagofeere Mbaañ ( Mars ) Ɓeeynirɗe tati ( 3 ) nduñii e mudda gooto " .
He maayirɗe hitaande 2020 , jokkorde pelle ɗee fellitiino toppitaade geɗe ɗiɗi ɗe sikki ɓuri himmude e sahaa oo
He manndaa Makki gadano , hakkunde makko e Fuutankooɓe ene welnoo no njommbaw ni , nde tawnoo ɓe ndañi koko ɓe meeɗaano dañde , ɗuum woni hooreejo leydi Pullo , mo ɓe mbaawi faarnoraade .
He mbayliigu woɗngu , waɗaangu 1968 , he kuugal mum 68-065 wayliri ɗum hono ndaani : " Ɗemngal ngenndiyeewal ngal ko Arabeere .
He miijo Jokkorde pelle ɗee , jaŋde he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije he denndaangal tolnooji fotaani fawaade e ɗaɓɓaande , foti wonde ko pellital laamu , tee ine foti laaɓtude no feewi hoto gooto fof faamrude ɗum no weliraa So artii e ciynugol ngol , jannginirgol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof fawoytoo ko he tolno heblo mum en ( gollal kalfinaangal njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi ƴellitgol majje hono no Ɗuɗal ɗemɗe ndeen ngal nii ) , fuɗɗoroo jaŋde lesre , caggal ɗuum hakkundeere e toownde .
He miijo am , waasde faamde maandaa dingiral addanii en yaawde wosteede e ɓelsude neɗɗaagu men .
He ndee teeminannde 20siire , leydi Farayse sakkii peeje fof haa welda he seernaaɓe ( e laabi mum en ) .
He ndee ɗoo yolnde fatamlamiire , sikke ala , wonaa duusooɓe e hirjonooɓe tan ɓe njogino heen , kono kadi won darinooɓe lang ene paddooɓe e yuumtin’de ɗeeɗoo golle .
He nder Aduna Allah oo kala hannde , juulɓe ene mawnina ñalawma juulde Taaske1 walla mbiyen Juulde Layya .
He nder Afrik noon , nokku mo kala leydi
He nder Fuuta Tooro , hanki juulde taaske ene mawnintenoo hakke yontere .
He nder Interwiiw juutɗo mo Goransson waɗi he jaaynde deadline .
He nder Senegaal , hayso tawii audiovisuel Pulaar suwaa yaajde tawo , ko fuɗɗaa dañeede koo , gooto heen kala , nana feññina ɗo ɓuri fannoraade .
He nder Senegaal yimɓe heewɓe ene njiyira Gabrielle Kane ko tuubaak-ɓaleejo .
He nder cappanɗe jawtuɗe ɗee ( 1960-2020 ) ene teskaa pelle keewɗe cosaama heen ngam daranaade ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde e ƴellitaare pinal Fulɓe .
He nder cinndol gardungol he sariya kuccam hee , ɗo kuulal 88 paatungal he " kuule cabborɗe keñoraaɗe " ruttinta ɗoo , jokkorde pelle pinal ɗee ine ɗaɓɓi
He nder darnde ngam ɓamtugol ɗemɗe ngenndiije , ine waɗi sahaaji ɗi golle tesketeeɗe ngollaa , nafoore mum en filti haa he nder leyɗe catiiɗe : sahaa nde Duɗal Ɗemɗe ngenndiije woodnoo ɗoo e Muritani .
He nder deftere makko sakkitiinde yaltude , nde tiitoonde mum woni " NGATAMAARE " , waɗnde cappanɗe joy yimre , Mammadu Abdul Sek ene jaŋtoo heen no fuɗɗorii winndude jime Pulaar , kadi e sababuuji gaddanɗi-mo wallifaade yoga e jime makko .
He nder deftere mum Soundjata ou l’épopée mandingue , Jibril Tamsiir Ñaan ene siimtana en konnguɗi gawlo Manndingkoojo , Jali Mammadu Kuyaate , oon ene wiya : " Komi gawlo .
He nder ganndal siyaas , ine wiyee wonde duuɓi leydi men ndii ko miliyaaruuji 4 hitaande .
He nder gollingol , heblo mecce , dokkugol golle , ƴettugol he golle , ciynugol nanondiral golle walla ceekgol gollotooɓe , kala paltiiɗo neɗɗo sabu leñol mum , edda ɓalndu mum , goobu ɓalndu mum , iwdi mum , teppol mum , njogoram mum walla ngenndaagu mum , ine fawee kuuge cifaaɗe e kuulal 14 ooɗoo sariya .
He nder jaɓɓotonooɓe Makki he nder Fuuta ɓee heewɓe heen ko sukaaɓe , hatojinɓe e dañde ñemtinirɗo , nde tawnoo ko noon hakkille cukayel mahiraa .
He nder jeewte dawrugol Afirik haa teeŋti e mo Hirnaange oo , innde Ceemoko Garang Kuyaate ina yaha ina arta , ɗemɗe ina ndaadtoo .
He nder jonte ɗiɗi ɗee sukaaɓe ɓee njanngii he mum ko heewi e finaatawaa Fulɓe , kadi ɓe keɓii faamu moƴƴo e holno Fulfulde winndortoo e holno tarortee .
He nder laaɓndal-am e jaabowol-ma hakkunde makko e BBC o wiy ɓe puɗɗorii Lionceau ko seeɗe tan .
He nder lappol ngol en ndewii he nokkuuji keewɗi , kañji kala ɗi teskiima haala men , ɗi mbeltiima e sifaa njettori-ɗen ɗi oo , so ardude he mbaadi Muritani nder kuuɓal mum , sifaa teeŋtinoowo ngootaagu hakkunde leƴƴi men nay ɗii : jolfo , capaato , sooninke e pullo ine cawndondiri , ine kaala e innde yimɓe fof , he nder ɗemɗe men fof .
He nder lebbi sappo e ɗiɗi caggal nde sariya kuccam oo jaɓaa , senngo laamu ngo ɗum toɗɗii ngoo ine foti lelnude winndannde sariya heeriinde dottoore laabi ɗowirɗi tuugorɗe jaŋde ɗemɗe ɗo tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi ndii foti tuugnaade he daawal juutngal kam e laabi potɗi teskeede he nder kuule cabborɗe , potɗi , kam en fof , yuɓɓondirde e politik ɗemɗe hono no hollitiraa dow ɗoo nii .
He nder leyɗeele Islaam , juulde ko ñalawma weltaare ; ñalawma mo woni kala ene ɓoorno ɓurɗo yooɗde e hesɗude e comci mum .
He nder maayirɗe nduu lewru Mbooy , FACT ummi worgo Libiya haa Kaaƴe Tibesti .
He nder ngaal daawal maa en mbaaw ( eɗen poti ) ɓeydude hirjino mbele ɓesnguuji ɗii ndaranoo
He nder oo wuuku-waaka e woysaayoo mo limtagol yimɓe Senegaal jibini , ene feeñi heen wonnde Fulɓe Senegaal ngalaa dental walla kam mbiyen ngalaa gardiiɗo .
He nder oo ɗoo video clip eɗen njiya heen Baaba Maal ene renndina jimɗi e gaaci Fulɓe , kooraaji e balafonji manndinkooɓe , sabareeje e ngamri Jolfuɓe , kono tawa fof ene renti woni duƴƴal gootal , duƴƴal gaaci Hiirnaange-Afrik .
He nder tonngoode 1449 " Jeune Afrique " 12 oktobar 1988 , Francis Kpatindé jaŋtiima no Teen Yuusuf ruttorii .
He nder winndannde ndee , Goori Jool koolaaɗo kuuɓal Fedde Fulɓe Itali ene habra wonnde
He nder winndannde ndee , Goori Jool koolaaɗo kuuɓal Fedde Fulɓe Itali ene habra wonnde :
He nder worgoori Nigeria , haa jooni Nana Asma’u ko ñemtinirɗo , ñemmbeteeɗo .
He nder yeewtere mum , " Debbo Afrika " , Sali Jah jaɓɓiima koɗo tedduɗo kadi hoodere he nder mago Pulaar , oon woni Raki .
He nder yeewtere mum , " Debbo Afrika " , Sali Jah jaɓɓiima koɗo tedduɗo kadi hoodere he nder mago Pulaar , oon woni Raki Jallo ɓurɗo anndireede innde mum magiyanke " Jeylaa " .
He nder ñalɗi maɓɓe Pinal ñaantule fulɓe e cuɗaaje mum en kolliraama heen .
He nder ɓaleeri Afrik ko he bannge rewo e hakkundeere leydi Mali ɓeen waɗboniiɓe ɓurnoo hawnude .
He nder ɗii lebbi jeetati jawtuɗi ko ngoo loppito woni ɗiɗmo nder Burkina .
He nder ɗuum , jannginooɓe maa njuɓɓine he nder eddaaji keewɗi : wiɗtooɓe , haralleeɓe , halfinaaɓe Ɗowo Golle , ekn .
He ndiin ɗoon mbaydi kadi , fedde Goodal tawtoraama , he noddaandu jaagorgal kalfinaangal nehdi e jaŋde toownde , jakkaa ( forum ) ɓaɗnooɗo to Hotel Radison Bleu , ñalande 15 Yarkomaa , 2020 .
He ngal natal jooɗngal mbaadi , " Calɗi tago " njaltii he mbaadi mum en kala ; ine njalba , ine cinkii noorɗe .
He ngolɗoo laawol nde tawnoo ko demokaraat en ɓee laami , pooɗondiral heeewaani he nder suɓngooji maɓɓe gadiiɗi , ene wayno ko Joe Biden tan woni kanndidaa maɓɓe haysinno dee ɗuum haɗaata ko maa ɓe mbaɗa suɓngooji gadani ɗii ngam heɓde delegeeji ɓe ene cuɓoyoomo he mooɓondiral maɓɓe suɓngoyeewal ( convention ) .
He oo sahaa mo laamu Muritani haɓɓitii wonnde maa wara kala ɗemɗe ngenndiije Afriknaaje ngonɗe he nder leydi Muritani ngam yiɗde jaalɗinde ɗemngal Safaroore ; to leydi Senegaal laamu nana waɗa kulol e cuusol jannginde Wolof he nder duɗe laamu he dow faalkisaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije keddiiɗe ɗee , Dr Muhammadu Faalil kanum tinndinii en wonnde en potaani sabbaade he ɗiin laamuuji mgam ɓamtude Pulaar .
He oorngal gadanal hee , talibaan en ndiiwaa he laamu , laamu Hamid Karsai lomtinaa ɗoon e mudda .
He ooɗoo sahaa , ko DDA Amerik tan fuɗɗii juuraade toon , laabi jeetati , fuɗɗoraade he lappi ɗiɗi " Viking " .
He ooɗoo ñalawma 21 colte ( feebariyee ) 2022 , wonanii pelle ɗee hesɗitina noddaango mum feewde e laamu nguu , nde siynata , ko ɓuri yaawde nanondire ñalɗi diisnondiral ɗii .
He renndo ngo alanaa rafi depression innde , kadi ɗo caɗeele renndoyankeeje keewɗe ngonooje sabaabu uddogol hakkille ngonaa jeewtirteeɗe , mbele maa Demmba waaw heɓtude hoore mum , arta he hakkille mum ?
He sankaare Muhammed Abdallaahi Bah : " Wullannde Sappo e Njeenayo " waasii kadi gooto e winndunooɓe ɗum !
He timmooree kampaañ o jannginooɓe ɓee mbaɗii ɓeto walla ɓetu , hono ngaddinaaji mbaydi , ngam ƴeewde yalla sukaaɓe ɓee paami ko ɓe njanngi koo faa wooɗi ( moƴƴi ) .
He tolno jaŋde lesre , wonande sukaaɓe ɓe arab wonaa ɗemngal mum en neeniwal , yo woppire no woori jooni nii ( mbayliigu ngoodngu nguu ) .
He tonngol daɓɓol , balle keewɗe mbaɗaama fayde Ndakaaru nde ndiyam naati e galleeji ; fayde Gine nde heɓi caɗeele ; sakkiti ko Mali , 5 000 € fayde he fulɓe yanaaɓe toon ɓee , fedde Sileymaani Baal wonnde Itali ɓeydii heen 1 000 € , fof hawri 6 000 € .
He tonngoode 199 Fooyre Ɓamtaare , en kaaliino ko faati e ɗanle faade tagofeere Mbaañ ( Mars ) , haa teeŋti noon e juuragol toon ɓeeynirka Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) mbiyeteeka Perseverance ñalnde 18 feebariyee 2021 .
He tonngooɗe Fooyre Ɓamtaare paaɗe , maa en naat he daartol oo nokku , daartol duuɗe Antiiy , ngol waawaa seerndeede e daartol Afrik .
He tuma nde o jooɗɗinatnoo José Mario Vaz he nder ñaawirde ngenndi ( Conseil d’Etat ) ndu fayndaare mum ko ñaawde luure .
He tuma ɗo Zaydi woni he caɗeele waɗbonaagu , omo waajtoo hoore makko , ɓernde makko ene yiɗi aaltademo e artirdemo he peewal , ko ndeen o fotti e Leyla .
He winndannde mum yaltunde hanki lowre kumpital dakarleaks , habrii wonnde mawɗo galle emedia invest , Maamuudu Ibraa Kan mo Ɓokijawe , ene .
He wiyde maɓɓe , ko laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee kala tan , woni hannde damal mbele tabitinde potal e deeƴal hakkunde jibinannde leydi ndii , nder hurum leyyi e ceerungal pine .
He yimre arab waɗananoonde koolol ngol , jimoowo oo ina wiya heen tawi ko Jowol haalata ɗoon : " ko miin woni mo ceerundal ( ɗemɗe e pine mum ) alɗini ɓesngu mum .
He yonta laamu Blaise Compaoré , ñaawoore warɓe Sankara enndaaka .
He yontere yawtunde ndee , ñalnde Njeslaare ( Alarba ) , kanndidaa lannda PUR he suɓngooji 2024 , yilliima falnde Welingara , diiwal Koldaa , wonndude e .
He ñalawma hannde oo , Mbaañ ( Mars ) woni tagofeere ɓurnde ƴameede e tagopeeje yuɓɓo naange .
He ñalɗi diisnondiral ngenndiiji ɗii , miijooji men mbaawii jaɓeede he nder gollorɗi 8 nder 12 ɗii .
He ɗii duuɓi , " meer " Fanay ina yuɓɓina hitaande fof " siyaara " to dingiral ɗo hare ndee waɗnoo ɗoo .
He ɗiiɗoo lebbi , binndanɗe men pawotoo ko he dewle sunna Nelaaɗo mo jam e kisal ngoni oo .
He ɗiiɗoo lebbi ɓennuɗi , duko ummiima hakkunde leydi Farayse e leydi Mali e Alaseri haa ɗum annominiri no aadoraaka to bannge ɗemngal potngal wonde hakkunde dowlaaji ko anndiraa dipolomaasii .
He ɗum haalee he jaayɗe , kono yimɓe keewaani waɗtude heen hakkillaaji mum en .
Heblo jaaynooɓe e karallaagal ɗowgol golle , fuɗɗinoongo ñalnde 24 lewru marse 2013 joofii ñalnde 19 lewru mee 2013 heedde 12w00h to duɗal keblorgal biyetengal ENAJM ( Duɗal Ngenndiwal Jaayndeyaagal e Ñaawooje ) , caggal lebbi tati kiɓɓi .
Heblo ngo gasii ko ñalnde 21 lewru ɗiɗaɓuru 2022 , ko to jooɗorde HAPA , kewu dokkirgol seedanteeje ɗee yuɓɓinanoo .
Heblo ngoo noon ko ngo duumatoongo e wonande ko ɓe kaali , yanti heen , maa defte jowitiiɗe e heblo ngoo keble e ko fayi arde .
Heblo ngoo waɗi ko ñalnde 19 e 20 e 21 lewru jeeɗaɓuru 2022 to Nuwaasot , he nder jooɗorde HAPA .
Heblude e ƴaañde kala coftal jotondirngal e ciynugol faandaare men feewde e dokkugol leydi ndemateendi , ngalu men e nder ngenndi he , qiima .
Heblude polis kam e ñaawoore , mbele ina mbaawa huuɓnude ko fawii e mum en koo , ngardoo hare haɗoore duumagol njiyaagu kam e paltooraaji renndo donaaɗi e njuɓɓudi renndo ndaɗaandi .

Hecci hanki tan , ko kasoo takkiiɗo ardorde sanndarmori , sumi .
Hedde 9 lewu mbooy , o jokkondirii e Umar Siisoko Mbaalo gardiiɗo fedde faggudu CEDEAO .
Hedde hitaande 1906 , ko ndeen laamaandi Muritani sosaa hay so laamorgo mum heddii ko Ndar .
Hedde hitaande 1955 ganndo wertaango leydi biyeteeɗo Edward Bullard yaltini keeri doŋe ɗe e nder ordinaateer tawa o rewni ko e hiisa , ko ɗoon o feññini wonaa tan so doŋe ɗe kiɓɓondiraama to tufle wontat mbuuɗu , alaa hay nder maaje kaaɗɗe ( geec ) ina waɗi keeri hakkunde doŋe ɗe .
Hedde kitaale 1980 jannguɓe Malinaaɓe ngummanii wuurtinde darnde makko , ɓe cosi dillere inniraande " groupe des mouvements de lutte Tiemogo Garan Kouyaté – dental dille hare Ceemoko Garang Kuyaate " .
Hedde waktu 22 jamma , horeejo catal ngal udditi hiirde ndee .
Heddi hankadi ibliis ina fanndoo , ina ƴeewa holi jogorɗo arde ɗoon , holi damal ngal oon jogori naatirde .

Heddii e yiylaade jawdi ngam mahde nokku ngu , hawri e happu yiilirde fedde nde gasii , woɗnde ƴettitii ceerno Sammba TUURE arditii goomu ngu .
Heddii ko annama-ɗaŋe ( planètes naines ) ɗeen ngoni : Seres , Pluton , Makemake e Hawmeya
Heddii noon ko ciimtol goomu losko ngol kam , alaa e sago addee he yeeso dipiteeji ko adii uddugol daawal batuuji ngalɗoo , sabu lajal mum ɓurngal juutnde yawtataa lebbi jeegom .
Heddiiɓe ɓe alaa ko ɓuri ɗumen sunaade e rafi cellal makko ngal , sabu ɓe ɓurnoo reerɗude ko yiyde mo omo dewñinaa e yeeso ñaawooɓe .
Heddiiɓe ɓee , miijo mum en ko so jeyaaɓe e partiiji luurduɗi ngonii toon , ina hasi ko ɓe nanondiri fof maa ɓennu tawa wondaani e caɗeele , hay so tawii noon e ɓe njaɓi wonde wonooɓe heen ɓee sarɗi tan ko hoto ɓe njeye he juɓɓule gardiiɗe partiiji maɓɓe ( feere Tawaasul ) .

Hee debbo nayeejo mbele aɗa waawi haalande mi ɗo maayo ndaayaan heedi .
Hee ñaalalpural jooɗngal kaar , miɗa anndi aɗa jogi kattan , te aɗa hoyi .
Hee ɗee balɗe mettuɗe , ñalnde alarba 14 deesambar 2022 , hooreejo Ndenndaandi Gaana sarii haalannde haawnde yimɓe .
Heedde kitaale 2004-2005 , tawi ko adii ɗum , Mammadu Demmba Sih anndondirii e biyeteeɗo Muktaar Yedaali , jaayndiyanke coftal ɓalli , waɗti waɗdude e mum ciimti coftal ɓalli e Rajo Muritani .
Heedooɓe yontaaɓe , hay huunde ŋakkaani !
Heege fuɗɗiima saraade nder Tigere , Kononawirus ina yooɓoo piɗtaali , diwooji cariima he gese .
Heen COP gooto , ko Batu Jeydaaɓe e nanondiral , ko njuɓɓudi ndowrowri njooɗotoondi hitaande kala gila 1995 ngam ɓetde ciynugol ko hunanoo wonande kilimaa , e jaɓnude kadi darɗe goɗɗe paatuɗe heen .
Heen bannge ko seernaaɓe .
Heen goomu fof , caggal nde diisnondiri , hollitii njeñtudi golle mum , kono batu nguu hawri ko yo suɓte e nder ɗum fof wasiyaaji sappo ɓurɗi himmude tawa ko ɗiin caaktetee e nder joofnirde gollordu nduu .
Heen gooto , ene jogii Lannda keɓtinaaka , kono min mbayrii nande dille mum .
Heen naamnal woni " holi ko waɗi , kala ko ari , min luurdat heen , tee alaa e amen yarlittooɓe ngabboo e ɓeya ?
Heen sahaaji o joopotoo ko julankooɓe tokosɓe ɓe o wiyata ina moofta njeeygu mum en mbele ɓesngu ina heyɗa , murta .
Heen waalaare fof ina jogii dalilaaji mum , adiiɓe ɓee kolliti ko sariya baɗɗo goomu nguu " njaambureewu " foti tan ko siyneede sabu ina teskaa , he kitaale 2006-2007 , nde ɗumɗoon siynaa , addanii Muritaninaaɓe haa e caggal leydi , heɓtinde wonde ɗiin wooteeji ko laaɓtuɗi .

Heewi hannde e men , caliima fayde e dente fulbe , sabu hulde dhumen moneede
Heewi wonde noon ko cofru wordu .
Heewii e leydi ndii ko yeeyooɓe walla yelotooɓe njoopaa sabu mum'en hebbinde laabi NDakaaru yah-ngartaa walla ɓe ñiiɓa e nokkuuji ɗi ɓe njamiraaka .
Heewii kala nde ngar-mi Nuwaasoot , konngol terɗe Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar ko " haa goram hol no Sammba Gata Bah waɗi ?
Heewii ko wiyaa worbe keewaani jaban'de gorko so wonaa nyade o maayi kono ngoo hello hollii won'de so neddo gollii tan haalete ete yimbe fof pen'datah : lutti ngo addaniikam fahmuya ko tagi ko kanko Makki teddiniraa e lewru Août 08 to Bruxelles udditde Koolol Tabital pulaagu hay sinndo o gantini o danyaani arde .
Heewɓe Emen ena mbiya ɓamtaare leñol , ɓamtaare leñol , ɓe ndewa heen ɓe ndeftoo heen jamma e ñalawma subaha e kikiiɗe ,
Heewɓe ceedtiima wonde hare Pr Umaar Bah jamma e ñalawma wonnoo ko yoo pulaar fuutankooɓe njaalo laatoo leñol daringal , cirŋiingol jooltowol hujjaaji mum .
Heewɓe ceeraani suurtude " feere fuunti nde o huutorii e ɗii duuɓi ɗi o laamii " : " njuulu Kahayɗi ngam hippude bone warkoyeeɓe " , " sariyaaji njiyaagu ngam ɓeydaade heedande jiyɗinooɓe " , " hare feewde e bonnooɓe jawdi ( mufsidiin en ) ngam ɓeydaade waaraade jawdi leydi " .
Heewɓe e sehilaaɓe makko kadi pooliino e fannuuji goɗɗi .
Heewɓe e wuro ina cikki ko waasde mo dañde joom galle ndee saabii ɗum .
Heewɓe e yahdiiɓe Manndelaa mbiyatnoo ko " ɗum waawaa wonde " , so ɓe cifoo De Klerk , ɓe mbiya " oo gorko ko keñiiɗo no feewi , ɗum waawaa gasde " .
Heewɓe e yimɓe hannde ina koddiri won'de won ɗo nguurndam woni e ndeer weeyo he , e dow tagopeeje goɗɗe , sahaaji boom geɗe diwooje ɗe nganndanaaka ina peeña e nokkuuji keewɗi e dow leydi , ngoon miijo ganndal riiwtaani ngo , kono tan alaa ko heɓaa heen ko laaɓi taw !
Heewɓe ine njaakorii feewii e ngalɗoo karallaagal .
Heewɓe kabri ji'igol laaɗe diwooje kaawniiɗe mbaadi ko ɗe peewniraa ko anndaaka ɗo men ɗo , refiti heen njaaweeki majje ina hulɓini , tawa kadi ko ɗe mawɗe ɗe ngalaa dille , won wi'iɓe nih , won'de yimɓkon tokoson ɓe ko'e mawɗe ina njippoo e laaɗe he , etee wonaa e nokku gooto ɗuum yi'a wonaa kadi e sahaa gooto , e ɗum ɗeɓi jaaknude annduɓe .
Heewɓe kootii nganndaani hol toɗɗaaɗo paɗɗuɗo fulɓe Farayse !
Heewɓe ngoyii mo , ceedtiima he makko geɗe moƴƴe
Heewɓe noon ina ndonki faamde ɗee dille fof sabu " tan " ɗee golle , haa arti noon e gulaali won ɓeen seernaaɓe , ɓe nganndu-ɗaa alaa ko meeɗii haalde e boneeji baɗeteeɗi ñalnde kala e leydi hee .

Henndu alaa to weeyo boowal leydi , ndu haaɗi tan ko e dow leydi , hakkunde men e lewru , naange walla koode alaa henndu sabu alaa gaasuuji , wonaa kadi ɗaŋe ( planètes ) fo mbaɗi keneeli .
Henndu bonndu fuɗɗinoondu e hitaande 1986 jokki dartaaki haa joofoyi e kitaale bonɗe 1990-1991 , e ɗiin sahaaji FƁPM suɓtii ko nuɗɗinaade mbele ina ruppoo henndu nduu , haa ɓenna tawa fedde ndee ina hisi , kono ɗum haɗaani Hooreejo fedde ndee , hono Umar Idiriisa SAAW , e koolaaɗo kuuɓal Abdullaay Haaruuna Sih e Yaaya Mammadu Bah nanngeede ina loskee .
Henndu ina heewi e dow leydi ɗo toowaani , kono en ɓeydoto toowde tan ina ɓeydoo famɗitde , to dow kaaƴe ɗe kiloometruuji tati tooweendi , eɗen tina caɗeele e foofde , henndu weeɓndu weldu foofde ndu ko e wertaango leydi takkii ndu ɓuraani 30 kiloomeeteer dow , mbela keerol ina woodi hakkunde maayo henndu ngo e weeyo ?
Henndu kine am gasii e maa .
Henndu ko waame mooɓre ( masse ) gaasuuji ummotoo e nokku paya nokku goɗɗo , yahdu ndeen mooɓre woni henndu , way kono ndiyam no dogirta e dow leydi ni wiyee maayo waɗii waraango , so tawii keneeli eggii nokkuuji tiindiima goɗɗi won ko waɗi noon .
Henndu nduu ina ummina bempeƴƴe , ɗe nganndu-ɗaa kam en ɓuri henndu wuubiluuru nduu yaawde , sibu aɗe mbaawi daɗde ndu fotde 1 000 km ( bempeƴƴe ɗee ina njahra e Nuwaasoot , tawa henndu jibinndu ɗum en nduu , yahrata ko Neema ) .

Heɓɓe njeenaari wayliwal

Heɗoɗen jantoore mawnde nde Mammadu Umaar SO waɗani en e dow mun .

Hiirde Pinal Daakaa Subalɓe
Hiirde nde fusi ko sahnga waktu 22ɓo eko fawi caggal duwaawu Ceerno Bookara e Ceerno Saydu Bah e juulal geeƴe .
Hiirde ndee Jokki haa jamma oo woɗɗi Hay gooto yonaaka tawo Baaba , alaa e sago mbaɗten Ko leelaani .
Hiirde ndee fuɗɗorii ko hoɗdu , ko cewɗi ceniiɗi belɗi e ɓernde , muusɗi e miijo sabu ko ɗi nawtuuji to Fuuta e Kummbaaru .
Hiirde ndee mawnii kono naywaani Haa sahnga 4 : 00 subaka yimɓe ena cooda biyeeji ena naata !
Hiirde ndee uddira ko ngamri ( Balee ) .
Hiirde ndee waɗii faayiida .
Hiirde ndee ɓamtoyi ko w 23 : hj 20 .
Hiirii min njiyaani tawo ko dille e RTS1 .

Hikka , 28 nowammbar , ñalawma jeytaare Muritani hawri ko he sankaare Siidi wul sheex abdallaahi gonnooɗo hooreejo leydi Muritani tuggi 19 abril 2007 haa 6 ut 2008 .
Hikka , he nder 13 heɓɓe njeenaari Nobel ndii , heen njeetato ( 8 ) ko ameriknaaɓe .
Hikka , kawgel fuku bal , kewu ɓurɗo lollude he winndere ndee , fuɗɗiima ñalnde 20 noowammbar ( jolal ) , tee joofoyta ko ñalnde 18 desaambar ( bowte ) 2022 .
Hikka , noddaaɓe ɓee ena mbaɗi faayiida no feewi .
Hikka , raay fuku bal winndere , kewu ɓurngu lollude he winndere ndee , fuɗɗiima ñalnde 20 jolal , tee joofoyta ko ñalnde 18 bowte 2022 .
Hikka , tiitoonde Ñalngu nguu ko " Semmbinde keewal ɗemɗe ngam naatnugol he nder jaŋde e renndo " .
Hikka jokkorde kadi pelle pinal tati ɗee mawninii ñalawma neeniwal .
Hikka kadi , Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani mawninii , ɗo joɗnde mum ɗoo , Ñalawma winndereejo Ɗemngal neeniwal , ñalnde alet 21 feebariyee 2021 .
Hikka kadi , cumu muusngu waɗii to Daakaa Madiina Gunaas ñalnde 12 mars 2017 .
Hikka kadi , jaayɗe leydi ndii mbeltaaki e peccugol kaalis ballal laamu ( miliyoŋaaji 200 ugiyya gadano oo ) wonande Jaayɗe jaambureeje ɗee .
Hikka kadi , kala nawɗo raay maa heɓ ko ɓuri ɗuum , sibu jaasataa 42 miliyoŋ dolaar .
Hikka kadi wayi tan ko no wayatnoo : idii takkaneede galaŋuuji ko sehilaaɓe wiyeteeɓe senerooji pollodiiɗi laamu ut 2008 : Muhammed wul Haadi , Felikse Negri , Wul Muhammed Sanaagi .
Hikka kadi ñalawma oo ari ko caggal juɓɓingol ñalɗi diisnondiral paatuɗi he mbayliigu Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde leydi ndii .
Hikka ko haawnii waɗii e kawgel fuku ngel : ardii leyɗe kippuuji jaggondirɗi e kommbaa cakkitto oo , hono Almaañ e Arsaatiin , ko rewɓe .
Hikka ko sukaaɓe Siñcaan poti jaɓɓaade arɓe kawgel ummiiɓe e lekkolaaji ngonɗi sara mum .
Hikka ne , fuɗɗorde
Hikka ne , juulde ndee won no fotaani yahrude : woni
Hikka noon ñalngu 21 feebariyee nguu ari ko caggal juɓɓingol ñalɗi diisnondiral diiwaniyankooji e kuuɓtodinɗi , jowitiiɗi e mbayliigu Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde Muritani , ñalɗi joofirɗi lelnugol ciimtol kuuɓtodinngol , peeñinngol huunde e geɗe kollitooje wonde
Hikka waɗi duuɓi 45 ko neɗɗo yaɓɓi e dow lewru , ko hakkunde 16 e 24 lewru korso ( juliye ) 1969 , laana Apollo 11 , keblaaka e ndeer duuɓi 10 , nawi worɓe ɗiɗo jippini ɓe e dow lewru .
Hikka waɗi duuɓi 45 ko neɗɗo yaɓɓi e dow lewru .
Hikka waɗi duuɓi 50 ko aadee fawi koyngal mum e Lewru .
Hikka waɗti duuɓi 10 ko UNESCO ( Fedde Leyɗeele Dentuɗe toppitiinde gannde e pine ) fuɗɗii mawninde ñalnde 21 Colte hitaande kala ngam hirjinde winndere ndee e teeŋtugol ɗemngal neeniwal .
Hikka ɓe cuɓii ko gay kokkaaji ɗiɗi pinal e renndoyaagal Pulaar , woni Ceerno Aliw Bah ( Wuro Soogi ) hooreejo kiiɗɗo USE e Hamme Aamadu Lih ( Mbooyo ) jaayndiyanke 2STV .
Hilan faala nde deftere .
Himme majjum ina mawni no feewi wonande ngenndi ndii , haa ko en mbaawaa jaɓde won ɗeen peeje dagnirɗe ñawndugol gagga ndonaandi aadeeri ɗe ardiiɓe leydi ndii tan njiɗi heñoraade e waawnude yimɓe .
Himo sogitaa fii tuume 11 , ɗen fof ko hakkunde bonanndeeji wolde e bonanndeeji weño neɗɗanke ( crimes against humanity ) .
Hina teskaa so ɓiɓɓe mum ndiwii haa mawnii , ko ɓuri heewde so gori ɗii puɗɗiima sonngaade tan , ndiiwete njaltinee seto ngoo .

Hiraande galle Gowerneer
Hirjinde ardiiɓe diine kam e hoohooɓe aadoraaɓe , ngam softinde ɗum en e wallitde jikkuuji e golle jahooje e mumtude haa laaɓa baɗe njiyaagu .
Hirjinde yimɓe leydi ndii kala , mbele ina ndaranoo muumtugol baɗe njiyaagu , mbaɗta ɗum e hoore geɗe potɗe daraneede .
Hirjino darnde teeŋtunde : Ɓayri dallinannde ndee saroriima nii he nder ñalɗi diisnondiral , he nder laylayti renndo ɗii , jokkondiraaɓe ɓee fof njokkondiraama , heddinoo yo yettaade ɓesngu nguu fof , nder gure mum en , nder galleeji mum en , ngam habrude ɗum en e heɗaade ɗum en , ngam anndude nii mbele ine njahdi e ko pelle ɗee ɗaɓɓata koo Aɗe mbasiyii noon nde yimɓe fof ndarantoo jooltugol hakkeeji mum en , haa teeŋti e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee fof e janngirgol mum en nder duɗe laamu

Hirjino pelle ɗee e ɓesnguuji mum en .
Hitaande , e dow Leydi ndi nguur-ɗen e dow mum ndii , ko balɗe 365 walla ena wona 366 .
Hitaande 1755 , filosof ina wiyee Emmaniyel Kant hollitiino won'de seto naange fotata iwide ko e duulal gaasuuji , nde lonngirgal les-mboɗirka ( infrarouge ) Spitser feewnaa goongɗinii ko oon haalnoo gila yontaaji ɗiɗi e feccere caggal .
Hitaande 1890 , ko hitaande teskoraande iiñcuru to bannge dawrugol e nder reedu Fuuta Tooro fof , teeŋti e hakkunde oo .
Hitaande 1890 ñalngu sappo settaamburu
Hitaande 1894 ganndo koode gooto yaltini natal wertaango Mbaañ ina feññini heen ɗiin gammbi walla caalli gasaaɗi .
Hitaande 1903 fuɗɗorii ko nanondiral hakkunde Koppolaani e won e mawɓe Wulaad ben Daamaan en : yoga e maɓɓe ngonti watulaaɓe koloñaal en .
Hitaande 1975 , ko deftere Fulɓe ɓe Jolof , o " wallifii " .
Hitaande 1976 baagal Wiking etiima yuurnaade batte nguurndam e dow Yumma-njenaare kono ronkii heɓde heen ko laaɓi , hannde weeyo ɗaŋre nde no way ni waawaa huufde nguurndam , kono duuɓi miliyaaruuji 4 caggal weeyo ɗaŋre nde ɓurnoo saɓoran'de nguurndam .
Hitaande 1996 wiɗtooɓe ameriknaaɓe kollitii won'de njiyi batte nguurndam mikrobaaji e haayre siirtiinde ummiinde Yumma-njenaare yani e leydi , kono annduɓe heewɓe njeddii ngoon wiɗto , nguurndam woodata tan ko ɗo ndiyam ndeelam ɓooyi wejaade , balwaltirɗe keewɗe ina e dow ɗaŋre he kollirii won'de ndiyam keewɗam dogii heen ko ɓooyi .
Hitaande 2018 , ko hitaande 2018ɓiire yonta men ( e limlebbi gereguwaar ) .
Hitaande e dow Meerkuur , ko balɗe men 88 .
Hitaande e dow Wenus , ko balɗe men 224 , ndeke hitaande e dow Wenus ko hedde lebbi men 7 .
Hitaande fof so nduuɗoo lewru arii hooreeɓe dowlaaji aduna o e dipolomat en ene kawritoyaa toon ngam yeewtidde he caɗeele ɓurɗe soklinde aduna o he .
Hitaande fof so nduuɗoo lewru arii hooreeɓe dowlaaji aduna o e dipolomat en ene kawritoyaa toon ngam yeewtidde he caɗeele ɓurɗe soklinde aduna o he ngaan saanga kadi ɓe mballondira e pewje ngam no ɗe cafriraa .
Hitaande kala , Ceerno ina heɓaraaya kañum e elew bi'etedo Buso .
Hitaande kala , he lewru oktoobar ( yarkomaa ) , njeenaaje Nobel ine ndokkee annduɓe golluɓe ko ɓamtata ganndal he nder winndere ndee .
Hitaande kala , waylowaylooji weeyo keewɗi , bonɗi , ina kewa e nokkuuji gonɗi hakkunde ŋori leydi men ndii , waylowaylooji ganndiraaɗi " guubiliiji " .
Hitaande kala fotde 80 wuubiliiru ŋoriiru ( cyclone tropical ) ina jibinee e leydi men hee dow diƴƴe gonɗe e nokkuuji gonɗi hakkunde ŋori leydi .
Hitaande kala saaktude ciimtol horo e ɓeto ko heɓaa e hare muumtugol baɗe njiyaagu .

Hojomaaji seeɗa , balɗe seeɗa jonte seeɗa lebbi seeɗa , duuɓi seeɗa .
Hokkude daɗndugol ngaluuji pinal e keewal ɗemɗe , faayiida , rewrude e guurtingol Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije , ngam kadi ƴellitde gostondiral e kaaldigal hakkunde leƴƴi ; ɗum fof noon fawaade e hakke faggaade ganndal e hakke neheede e janngineede , kam e hakke jogaade sifaa keeriiɗo mo teettotaako .
Hokkude ndiin njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi potal fartaŋŋeeji e haɓde e paltooraaji , yimɓe yonɓe e kaɓirɗe katojinaaɗe nder golle muumtugol baɗe njiyaagu e baɗe jokkiiɗe e mum .

Hono Abdullahi Ibnu Umar ( MAWM ) wiyi : " Annabi ( JKM ) wiyi : " ɓuraana e koorka fof e ina mbeltini maccuɗo Alla ñalnde darnge .
Hono Abii Amamata wiyi : " mi arii e nelaaɗo Alla mo jam e kisal ngoni e mum oo , mbiy-mi : eehey maa nelaaɗo Alla !
Hono Abii Hurayrata ( MAWM ) wiyi , hono nelaaɗo Alla mo jam e kisal ngoni e mum ( JKM ) oo wiyi : " Alla toowɗo o wiyi kala gollal ngal neɗɗo gollii ko kañum jeyi so wonaa koorka , o wiyi ɗuum ko miin jeyi , ko miin kadi yoɓata ɗuum .

Hono no Aamadu Hampaate Bah wiyata nii e nder Afrik , so nayeejo sankiima , ko defterdu sumi .
Hono no Belee Gudee heewi wiyrude , Hooreeɓe Farayse ko beyuwe , ɓe ngalaa sehilaaɓe sibu ɓe keewi ko " mettaade " ( " lécher " ) , so ɓooyii ɓe " ngoppa " ( " lâcher " ) , wattan fof ko ɓe " calka " ( " lyncher " ) .

Hono no aadoranoo nii , yeewtere ndee ko suɓaande , huuɓtodinnde ngonka hannde .
Hono no aduna oo fof nii , Pelle pinal ngenndiije , hono ARPRIM , AMPLCS , APROLAWO ine mawnina hitaande kala , duuɓi keewɗi jooni , oo Ñalawma ngam semmbinde laamu Muritani waylude Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde leydi ndii , haa tuugnoo he jaŋde denndaangal ɗemɗe men ngenndiije .
Hono no kala almuudo he ganndal Islaam he nder renndooji juulɓe ɓaleeri Afrik ni , Neene Asmaawu fuɗɗorii jaŋde ko janngude Qur’aan haa o reeni deftere Allah nde , caggal ɗuum o naatani janngude defte sariya e ɗemngal Arab e defte suufiyankooɓe haa teeŋti he Qaadiriyyah laawool ngol ɓe mbirdatnoo he ngaan tuma .
Hono no konngol biyngol " Nguu laamu teettii en fof : ndimaagu men , wellitaare men , ñaawoore men , cellal men , dunli men , boowal men diwooje , nokku men bellitaaɗo , tufnde men , oogirɗe men ( hay ceenal ) , ekkolaaji men .
Hono no mbiyno ɗen nii , en mbaawa haaldude ko fedde GOODAL gollii gila nde nde sosa fayde jooni .

Hono no mbiyɗen dow nii , Mammadu Sammba Joop Murtuɗo kañum remii lowre mum he ngesa pulaagu .

Hono no njiyirɗen ɗum nii , nde dillere pinal hesere anndiraande " renaissance " addunde mbayliigu patamlamu he nder Orop , reworiɗoon haa yetti he jookli aduna ɗii kala ndee , jibini ɗum ko waɗtude huwtoraade ɗemɗe Oropnaaje ɗe ngannduɗaa ko ɓuri heewde he nder Oropnaaɓe ko ɗeen nanata kadi ɗeen ɓe kaalata .

Hono winndiyanke Saalabi wiyi : " ko refti e ɗuum , ko Geno toowɗo Oo , lonngini Aadama ( JKM ) , yo eggu leydi , faya Makka , o wanngoo e suudu nduu , naamndoo ɗum yaafuya , O yaafoo ɗum pergitte mum .

Hono winndiyanke Sadi wiyi : ñalnde Annabi Ayyuuba ɓuuɓtii e sewnde haa selli ndee , ñalnde heen ko ñalngu njalbungu .

Hoodere : seto-naange ina jogii hoodere wootere to hakkunde seto to , ndeen hoodere mbiyaten Naange , ko faandu jayngol duppowol cuuytam ( oksijen )
Hoodere Horŋoore ( Pulsar ) .
Hoodere jaayre jooni , nyalawma mum gooto ma won nyalawmaaji men 243 ; ( hedde lebbi men tati ) .
Hoodere jaayre jooni , ñalawma mum gooto ma won ñalawmaaji men 243 ; ( hedde lebbi men tati ) .
Hoodere ko punndi e gaasuuji cariiɗi e weeyo mooɓondirta ngonta ɓooɗde wootere , ngaal mooɓondiral jibina jaynge ki nguleeki hakindiiki to fuɗɗoode , kono ina ɓeydoo ɓooyde tan , tamondiral ngal ina ɓeydoo ɓittude e tiiɗde , nguleeki ki doolna haa wonta hoodere ( naange ) , ɗeen gaatureeje ina cooynee e weeyo he , ɗe ceerataa e waɗde , sabu koode ceeraani e tageede .
Hoodere laaci ko kedde tuufeeje tago aduna men , naange e ko rewi e mum , ko kaaƴe ɗe lappol mumen ɓadii naange , won e sahaaji so ɗe njottiima oon nokku ɓadiiɗo naange ɗe pasa ko woni e majje ko ruuya ruŋkitoo naange e mbaadi laaci njuutki , ko ɗuum addani nde wiyeede hoodere laaci walla laaciire .
Hoodere meeɗii siirtaade ena suma gasni haa yani e leydi , waɗi ɗoon ngaska ; ɗo nde yani ɗoo , njaajeeki ngaska kaa ko 1 200 meeteer ( diraaji 2 400 ) , luggeeki kii 200 meeteer ( 400 dira , ɓuri woyndu ) .
Hoodere nde hettanaama innde woni Trappist-1 , ɗaŋe ɗe ne ko Trappist-1b , Trappist-1c e Trappist-1d .
Hoodere siirtiima .
Hoodere wiyeteende Pulsar walla horŋoore ko kedde hoodere maaynde , ko bempeƴƴe rajo ummotooɗe mayre waɗi nde yiyteede , dille mayre ko dille cañiiɗe juɓɓuɗe maa mbiyaa ko tagoore woɗnde ƴoƴnde neldata ɗe , dille ɗe eggata e hoodere he ko e mbaadi carfal , ɗe naata e weeyo ɗe caroo ,
Hoohooɓe nokkuuji ɗii kala njokkondiraama : waaliiji , haakemaaji , haa teeŋti noon e meeruuji gure ɗee : meer Ɓoggee e sukkuɓe mum , meer Baabaaɓe e sukkuɓe mum , meer Haayre Mbaar , meer Kayhayɗi e sukkuɓe mum , meer Sehilbaabi , meer Kiifa , meer Barkewol ( tawtoraaɗo batu kuuɓtodinngu nguu ) .
Hoohooɓe politik leydi Madagaskaar ciifondoriino nanondiral ñalnde 6 ut 2009 , to Maputoo , laamorgo leydi Mosammbik , ngam yaltinde leydi mum en e iiñcuru politik naati ndu gila nde Rajoelina , e ballal konu leydi ndi , heɓti laamu e juuɗe Marc Ravalomanana .
Hoohooɓe politik ɓe ( ɓeen ngoni Andry Rajoelina ( duuɓi 35 ) , Marc Ravalomanana ( duuɓi 59 ) , Albert Zafy ( duuɓi 82 ) e Didier Ratsiraka ( duuɓi 73 ) ) kawritii kadi ñalnde talaata 25 ut 2009 to Maputo , laamorgo leydi Mosammbik , ngam feccitaade terɗe guwarnama e mudda o .
Hoohooɓe woɗɓe tawtoraama batu ngu ko wayno nulaaɓe laamu , dipiteeji e senateeruuji , ardiiɓe pelle ɗe ndi ko wayno : – Sokna Ghaliyata Mohamed el Vdhih cukko gardiiɗo sarwiis toppitiiɗo ƴellitaare debbo to Ministeer toppitiiɗo fiyakuuji Renndo , Cukaagu e Ɓesngu ; – Cheikh Mohamed ould N’diaye Gardiiɗo keeri e fiyakkuji leydi to Ministeer toppitiiɗo fiyakuuji ndernderi leydi ; – Sokna Maria Kasado nulaaɗo Jonnde Dental Erop e nder Moritani ; – Amadou Seydi DJIGO lomto gardiiɗo fedde OXFAM INTERMON ; – Soknaaɓe Hapsa Yaaya Kan dipitee e Iselmha mint Abdel Maalik senator .
Hoolaare kam alaa heen kono pulaar wiy mbo suusaa bone laamotaako , pellitɗo aanaani , amerkinaaɓe ko fellitɓe yahde toon hay so bone waɗat , NASA ko fedde maɓɓe toppitiinde geɗe weeyo , eɓe njogii ko ina abbo e 38 neɗɗo hebliiɓe yahde to lewru heen 12 ko rewɓe , alaa fo ko ɓe njannginaaka e geɗe weeyo , gila e lummbaade e maggo haa e heblaade e juuragol walla e jippagol e dow ɗaŋe walla lewru , yanti heen mbaawka huutoraade kaɓirɗe weeyo e masiŋaaji mum , ko ɓe waawɓe muñde hoɗde ɗo faaɗi ko ina abboo e lebbi 6 ɓe kaaɓaani .

Hooreejo leydi ina woni e kampaañ : ɗoo omo jippii e ndiwoowa konu
Hooreejo leydi ndi hono Siidi wul Seek Abdallaahi huccitinii e ɓesngu ngu ñalnde aljumma 29 suwee 2007 , konngol mum gadanol caggal nde ƴetti golle ñalnde 19 abriil .
Hooreejo leydi oo , e nder konngol mum , hollitii wonde ine laaɓani yimɓe fof wonde Pinal ine wallita no feewi ƴellitaare faggudu , renndo , e politik leyɗeele , " ko pinal laynata , renndo aadee en , rokkata ɗum maanaa e faayiida " .
Hooreejo leydi saaktii laawol ngol loowdi mum arata les ɗoo
Hooreejo suɓngo ( President du jury ) kawgel goomu ngenndiijo ngam deftere ( Prix Cénacle national du livre ) Abdullaay Raasin Seŋngoor , hollirii .
Hooreejo suɓngo ( president du jury ) kawgel goomu ngenndiijo ngam deftere ( prix Cénacle national du livre ) Abdullaay Raasin Seŋngoor , hollirii doggol tiitooɗe defte miilol/pentol e jime cuɓaaɗe ngam jeyeede he finaal koolol 2023 mo ngoomu nguu yuɓɓini .

Hooreeɓe cate nder leydi : Catal Poor-Jentii : Abu Bakri Jaw ganndiraaɗo Ciree Jaw CoɗayCatal Farause Wiil : Ceerno Aamadu Aan KanelCatal Oyem Saydu Mawluuda Sih FonnduCatal Lammbarenee Haamiidu sammba ganndiraaɗo Demmba Soh PeteCatal Muwanndaa : Sayku Umar ganndiraaɗo Sammba Aaw
Hooreeɓe leydi Senegaal ɗiɗo hiiɗɓe ɓee , Abdu Juuf e Abdullaay Wadda , njantii e yimɓe heewɓe werliiɓe konnguɗi mum en he dillere wonnde Senegaal ndee , tawi saabii ɗum ko dirtingol suɓngooji kebornooɗi waɗde he nduu ɗoo lewru .
Hooreeɓe leyɗeele Afrik , jaagorɗe , pelle renndoyankeeje , nelaaɓe fedde kawtal dowlaaji , toowa ganndal en e hilaafaaɓe diine , ɓeen fof ene njeyaa .
Hooreeɓe leyɗeele Afrik , jaagorɗe , pelle renndoyankeeje , nelaaɓe fedde kawtal dowlaaji , toowa ganndal en e hilaafaaɓe diine , ɓeen fof ene njeyaa e ko ene wona sateeji teemedere garɗi nootitaade batu ngam yilaade jam e deeƴre he nder Afrik .

Hoto Hay gooto e mon woppu yimɓe ɓattiima ɗum ñawna nguur ndam mun .
Hoto haallullaaji maɓɓe , ena wonndi e nan nanti addan on luurdude e yimɓe ɓe kawru no ɗon walla bonnude hakkunde mon e ɓeen .
Hoto hay gooto e mon woppu yimɓe ɓattiiɓe ɗum ñawna nguurndam mun bonna hakkille mun , walla nii mbaɗa feere haa pirta dewgal mun .
Hoto jam hay gooto e maɓɓe , cikka ko goɗɗo oo , ɓuran maa ɗum kañum walla ko goɗɗo oo , ɓur ɗaa yidde e kañum .
Hoto kaben e koye men , ndeen gaño daña sago mum .
Hoto mbaree mawɗo nayeejo , hoto mbaree cukalel , hoto ɓooree

Hubbel : Gital men e loggiɗeeki asamaan
Hubble dañii duuɓi 25 hannde
Hubble ko lonngorgal men to weeyo , duuɓi hikka 26 a ngal yuurnoo ko ɓuri famɗude e kulle weeyo , kala ko yiya e nder niɓɓere weeyo ko kanngal holliri , kono nde wonnoo ngal fuɗɗiima ɓooyde e hecceede to bannge karallaagal , NASA e ESA pewjii lomtin'de ngal lonngorgal kesal ina wiyee JWST ( James Webb Space Telescope ) , ngal ɗo lonngorgal kesal lottetee to weeyo ngal fuɗɗoo gollaade e Yarkomaa ( Oktoobar ) hitaande 2018 .

Humi mbeewa e laaci ko majjere .
Humpitaade binnduɗo oo : waɗde njiylawu jaawɗo ko faati e binnduɗo oo haa annda mbele omo woodi , mbele omo anndiraa nuunɗal ekn .
Humpitde , hirjina ɓesngu nguu mbele ina semmbina dawrugol dowla oo e kala ko feewti e mooɓgol denndaangal kattanɗe ngaluuji men to bannge leydi ndemeteendi , fawaade e yuɓɓinde njilluuji ngam faccirande yimɓe ɓee peeje ɗe jaagorɗe laamu ƴettata ngam siynude dokkitgol leydi ndemateendi qiima .
Humpitde loraaɓe ɓee , mbele aɓe ngannda hakkeeji maɓɓe , ɓe ndaranoo ɗum en .
Humpito Mali e bellitgol jiilgol jeyi leydi e nder nokkuuji ( meeriiji ) : hol no joom mum en naatirta heen e hol ko wonata heen ballal pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje .
Humpito Senegaal e bellitgol jiilgol jeyi leydi e nder nokkuuji ( meeriiji ) : hol no joom mum en naatirta heen , e hol ko wonata heen ballal pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje .
Humpito kadi ina rokki en , haa hannde , wonde cukalel puɗɗoringel ɗemngal mum neeniwal so faytii e ɗemɗe goɗɗe ɓurata yuumtude hakkille e puɗɗoringel ɗemɗe koɗe .
Humpito makko e laamu e parlamaan
Huseynu Jaw : Beylaan
Huufde jiyɗinanooɓe , haa arti noon e sukaaɓe , reena ɗum en e kuutoragol to bannge faggudu walla kala golle coomɗe tanaa , maa baawɗe telɓinde nehdi mum en walla ñawnude ɗum en , jugginde ƴellitaare terɗe mum en , maa hakkillaaji mum en , maa telɓinde ɗum en to bannge diine e hakilantaagal e renndo , tawa noon ina teskoo farweende maɓɓe heeriinde e kimmugol jaŋde ngam seerndude ɓe e yowitaare .
Huufi nde ko sukaaɓe waawɓe winndude .

Huunde e ayaawo Ceerno Aamadu Tijjaani Bah
Huunde e dokke ɗe Al akhabar limti ɗee
Huunde e gure mawɗe maa kujjit .
Huunde e hooreeɓe teddungal fedde ndee , ko wayi no Sammba Joom Bah , Hammadi Sukki Mbooc , Mammadu Siley Bah , Umaar Idiriisa Saawo , e Aamadu Umar Jah , kam e hoohooɓe woɗɓe , ko wayi no Doktoor Alasan Jah ɗemɗiyanke , e yimɓe heewɓe woɗɓe , nootiima e kewu nguu .
Huunde e jaabawuuli
Huunde e jikkuuji Mammadu Demmba Sih
Huunde e maɓɓe ko seereraaɓe jeyaaɓe e idiiɓe hoɗde e
Huunde e sukaaɓe ene cuuɗoo ngam hulde naatneede .
Huunde e taƴe ciimtol ngol
Huunde e wasiyaaji nafooji yimɓe
Huunde ena waawi wonde les , wona dow tawa woni ko ɗo gootel .
Huunde fof hon ɗo yowitii , wonaa ko neɗɗo sikki fof wona goonga .
Huunde haawniinde , mettunde faamde .
Huunde heeriinde waɗii he ngol koolol tawi ina toɗɗii coñce .
Huunde jarnde teskaade ɗoo kadi ko ɗemngal Faraysinkoore ngal ɓaleeɓe ɓee njanngiratnoo kadi liggortoo ngal kanum samminaama , yaltii he nder kuule ngenndi ɗe .
Huunde kala ina yahratnoo no yuɓɓi haa ndee yontere yawtunde , kono nde jamma ɗimmo e dow lewru fuɗɗii naatde , siinnaaɓe kolliti won'de baagal maɓɓe ina heɓi caɗeele mekanik , ɓe nawti ɗe noon ko to weñaare nokku mbo baagal jippi e dow lewru o .
Huunde nde nganndu-ɗen e nokkuuji men , jeyaande e sato Fuuta , nder jeeri e to pooɗe .
Huunde woɗnde teeŋtinoore darnde Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko wonde nde wootere ñiiɓnde e jaayle Pulaar nder winndere hee .
Huunde woɗnde teskinnde he ngal ɗoo piilngal ko tawtoreede Media Pulaar he mbaydiiji mum kala .
Huunde yurminiinde , huunde nde famotaako .
Huunde ɓurnde ŋarɗude e noddude pinal e ganni he ɗii ñalɗi ko fijirde wiyeteende Cayɗe nde .
Huutoraade Pulaar e Almaa .
Huutoraade jaŋde ɗemɗe muuynaaɗe ɗee e faamamuya e jaŋde ɗemngal Arab e Farayse ngam newnude paamondiral nder duɗe hee , kam e newnude paggagol ganndal , sibu jeddi naattii woodde wonde , cukalel so fuɗɗoriima jaŋde e ɗemngal ngal waawaa no feewi , ɗuum ina bonna jaŋde mum , haɗa ɗum yahrude yeeso .
Huɓeere ndee ko ko feeci gila dow haa les .
Huɓeere toge 5 hoɗnunde gollotooɓe ONU heɓii bonannde mawnde , ko e mayre yoga e pelle ballatnooje Haytii e ɓamtaare koɗi .

Ibaa Gaya Joob
Ibliis kuɗaaɗo oo , kañum ne yaltinaa-ma dental maleykaaji , o waɗtaama seyɗaani goɗɗitinaaɗo yurmeende .
Ibn Khalduun , he nder deftere mum Muqaddimah , ene wiya ko Qur’aan adii won’de deftere winndaande he ɗemngal Arab , hayso tawii Ibn Ishaaq ne ene wiya , he nder deftere mum Siira ( daartol nguurndam Nelaaɗo ) wonnde , Warqa Ibn Nawfal ene winndatnoo defte ganndal nasraan ( christianisme ) he ɗemngal Arab , ɗe o firatnoo ummoraade he ɗemngal Ibraaniyya ( Hebreu ) .
Ibnu Nadiim ene wiya he nder deftere mum al-Fihrist , wonnde woon e firatnooɓe ko wayno Ibnu al-A’sam e Saabit Ibn al-Qurra ene njoɓetenoo gooto e mum en kala ko ɓuri 500 dinaar lewru fof .
Ibraahiim woppaani ɓiyngel mum gorel ngel kanum e neene mum tan e ndee yeeweende yejjiti ɗum en .
Ibraahiim yahdi e joom-suudu mum lemmbo o , Haajiratu , e ɓiyngel maɓɓe Ismaa’iila .
Ibraahiima Aamadu Njaay ( IANJ ) : Ina heewi ko saabii ɗum : ko ardii fof ko toɓo bettungu , ooɗoon sahaa heewaano toɓde , ndiyam ɗo ummirii ɗoo wonaa ɗoon ɗam ummortonoo , ko waame tan gummiiɗo jeeri , toon toɓi haa heewi , waame ɗee njuppii he waalo hee , ɗum woni gese ɗee njoolii .

Iisaa .
Ikreen heɓti hoore mum hakkunde 1917 e 1922 , hade mum artude he njiimaandi Dental dowlaaji sosiyaalist sowiyet en ( URSS he Farayse ) , ko mbiyatno-ɗen Riisi koo .
Ikreen ko dowla ( leydi ) ngonndi he nder Orop bannge fuɗnaange , ɓiliindi hakkunde Dental Orop e Riisi .
Ikren ine himmani Riiri no feewi , sibu ko ɗoon woni mbootu " Rus’ de Kiev " , woni " muuɗaandi Kiew " .
Il importe de souligner que de 1979 à 1989 , la Mauritanie a connu une expérience réussie d’enseignement de toutes les langues nationales arabe , pulaar , sooninke et wolof aux enfants des diverses communautés mauritaniennes .

Ina Jokki ( Hol ko woni hoodere ?
Ina anndaa kadi laaɓal salligi ina heewi nafoore e neɗɗo , so neɗɗo ina wonndi e salligi wonaa bone garɗo e mum fof yettoo mo , ngam seyɗaani alaa e makko geɗal .
Ina e sahaaji so baggel keekuta jaawara mo Njofaan Jookee e nder diiwaan Booseya honngii , dawaaɗi ɗii fof njerminto , ngona e laawaade , ɗi taaroo mo .
Ina e salligi farillaaji e jookli dewondirɗi , tawa ina heen goonga mum oo , so tawii heen gootel ŋakikii tan ko heddii koo feewataa , ɗum noon mbaɗten hakkille e ko arata ɗo ko : 1- farilla gadano o : ko anniya , goonga mum tigirigi oo , ko yiɗde huccitande faade e gollude , ɗuum yahdude mbelamma Alla toowɗo oo , waɗi noon ko ɗum golle ɓernde .
Ina famɗi e men mbo yiyaani hoodere ina siirtoo jamma , ko hoodere mbiyeten kono wonaa , ko kaaƴe naatata e faandu henndu taariindu leydi ndu ( Atmosphere ) , nde wonnoo ɗe naatirta ko doole ɗe cuma haa ɗe ndooyta dow wonan'de kaaƴe kakindiiɗe ɗe , mawɗe ɗe kam ina ndenkoo e leydi denkanɗe mawɗe haa wonana kala ko woni e dow leydi firtaare , duuɓi miliyoŋaaji 65 caggal won e kulle guurnooɗe e leydi pirtorii noon , kaaƴal ngal kilometruuji 10 tekkeendi denkinoo to Meksik ( Mexique ) waɗi wiiduru mawndu ina wiyee Chicxulub , fiyannde nde e heewde doole waɗdetee ko e miliyoŋ bommbo atomik , ɗuum firti yoga e maale nguurndam e dow leydi , mboorkaaji puccitii cumuuji carii e Aduna , nafi tan ko ndeen tawi neɗɗo feccinaani woodde .

Ine fawee kuugal cifangal he kuulal 15 ooɗoo sariya , kam e ngootiri e mbaadiiji cifaaɗi he kuulal biyangal ngal , kala kuutoriiɗo paltoor , maa ngañgu walla ndoolndoolaagu walla cerindagol faade e goomu walla renndo walla e terɗe mum , sabu edda ɓalndu mum , goobu mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum , walla leñol mum en walla huunde e mum en .
Ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi ɗiɗi ( 2 ) kala gollotooɗo laamu , mo nganndu-ɗaa he nder golle mum , faltiima neɗɗo sabu leñol mum , edda ɓalndu mum , iwdi jibinannde mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum , walla haɗi ɗum ko aldaa e daliilu naftoraade hakke mum walla wellitaare nde waawi teeɗanaade fawaade e laabi sariya kuutorteeɗi .

Ine foti kadi winndeede he sariya hee : " He tolno jaŋde leslesre , cukalel muritaninaawel kala foti ekkoraade gannde ɗee fof ko he ɗemngal mum neeniwal " .
Ine foti teeŋtinen wonde , tuggi 1979 haa 1989 , Muritani dañii humpito yuumtungo he nder janngingol sukaaɓe leƴƴi men he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije leydi ndii fof , hono arab , pulaar , sooninke e wolof .
Ine gasa tawo rokkude anndinoore hawraande " nguurndam keeriɗam " ɗeɓa saɗde , kono won wakar piiltotooɗo neɗɗo , joopotooɗo nguurndam mum keeriɗam foti ko haaɗtineede , dammbee nder cuuɗi , tawi fusanaaka ɓale .
Ine jeyaa e baɗte majjum , joñgol sukaaɓe ɓe arab wonaa ɗemngal mum en neeniwal , he won ɗeen golle teeŋtuɗe he nguurndam leydi , ko wayi no wonde ardiiɓe njuɓɓudi laamu ( guweneeruuji ekn ) , ñaawooɓe , jaaynooɓe , daartooɓe ekn ( maale mum ko kawgel naatgol Enajm )
Ine jeyaa e jimɗi ɗi o reftii walla ɗi o fenti ɗiiɗoo : Fallemme , Ngaari e Ndillaan , Seeku Bali , Balla Jeerel , Hammee Birom Moodi Kome , Lappol makko e daande maayo rewo ( gila Gede haa Loobaali ) , walla e maayo Duwee .
Ine jeyaa e kullon kon ngonka mum moƴƴinoytee , ene njoopaa he nanondiral ngal , ko wayi no " kooba e yeende geec , e woylel , e ngabu " e won eddaaji puɗi nattuɗi heewde .
Ine jeyaa e paandaale koolol ngol jokkondirde sooninkooɓe wonɓe e winndere ndee , ƴellitde pinal e ɗemngal maɓɓe , e semmbinde kadi faggudu maɓɓe Ɗee geɗe kala ine njiyee e koolol hee .
Ine jeyaa he dalillaaji majjum , njaru ɓurtungo wolde ndee , gila to bannge jawdi haa e yimɓe maayɓe toon .
Ine jeyaa he dallillaaji dallinannde pelle pinal ɗee , hollitde wonde janngingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee maa wallit ngootaagu ngenndi ndii , sibu suka muritaninaajo kala maa janngu ɗemngal goɗɗo oo , ɗemngal gooto haali fof tawa goɗɗo oo ine faama ɗum .
Ine jokki e tonngoode faande
Ine jokki tonngoode faande
Ine sikkaa Siin hoolkisii ɗum ko he ceeɗu ɓennungu nguu , tee ko jooni ɗum tinaa .
Ine teskee e humdanteeɓe pasiraagal hakkunde debbo e gaorko .
Ine wayi no haa hannde peeje ɗee fof ko goote , sibu wonande feere ɓooynde ndee e hesere ndee kala , ɓalndu neɗɗo hollete wiris oo ( no o woorunoo tawa tooke makko ine ustaa walla kusel keɓtinirgel ittangel e makko ngel tookaaka ) mbele endu waawa feewnande mo ( kanko wiris oo ) kaɓtorɗe baawɗe warde mo , kaɗa mo wiltude he ɓalndu neɗɗo .
Ine wayi no wonande jannguɓe ɗemɗe goɗɗe ( haa teeŋti wonande humpitiiɓe alkule lateŋ ) , alaa ko waylii e no woorunoo adan nii , sibu alaa ko haalaa heen , ko tolnooji ɗiɗi tan
Ine wela en artirde ɗoo huunde e diskuur makko oo
Ine winndaa he cinndol hee , " wonande jaŋde gaggaaji " : " pijirlooji jannginooji e pindinooji mbaɗetee ko he ɗemɗe ngenndiije arab , pulaar , sooninke e wolof " , " ekkagol gannde e faamde e haala waɗetee ko he ɗemngal arab , so ine hatojini wallitoree ɗemɗe ngenndiije keddiiɗe ɗee " ; " ekkagol alkule arab e huñaade ngam wallitde jaŋde lawɗunde ɓuraana tedduɗo oo " ,
Ine winndaa he taƴre 1 Tiitoonde V : " Jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije " : " arab ine jannginiree sukaaɓe ɓe kaalataa arab no ɗemngal jokkondiral nii e no ɗemngal jannginirgal fannuuji goɗɗi nii .

Jaagarɗo Malinaajo kalfinaaɗo Ndeenka , Saajo Kamara , habrii wonnde laamu hakkundeewu Mali heeɓi kaɓirɗe koonunkooje keewɗe iwrude leydi Siin , tawi heɓiraa .
Jaagordu Ñaawooje Burkina ( dowla Burkina ) yiɗnoo ko yo ɓe taƴane ko famɗi fof duuɓi 30 nder dummbirdu tawa ɓe njiyataa naange .
Jaagorgal Heblo mecce e Pinal e Kumpital , ngal o yahdunoo toon , kañum ne hollitii wonde " sompude peeje kisal juumtuɗe " ko huunde heñoraande , tee " yimɓe fof ina cunii no feewi e ko kewi koo " .
Jaagorgal jaŋde ngenndiire haɗtii jannginooɓe ɓoornaade wutte nder janngirɗe
Jaagorgal kalfinaangal jaŋde teeŋtinii wonde humpito Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije maa teske nder golle hee ; ko noon kadi wonande yimɓe humpitiiɓe gollantooɓe hannde ƴellitaare e heblo he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Jaagorgal kalifinaangal Pinal e Cukaagu Siise Mintu Boyda teeŋtini haala mawɗo makko nde o holliti ko " ɗemɗe kalateeɗe e leydi ndii kaɗii Arab ƴellitaade " .
Jaagorɗe Muritani e Senegaal e sosiyatee biyeteeɗo Polychangda Engineering Co Ltd ciifondirii , ñalnde alkamiisa 23/03/2021 to Rooso , nanondire puɗɗagol golle e huufo golle sala Rooso .
Jaagorɗo Pinal e Ñeeñe , nde ƴetti konngol , caggal nde salmini jamaanu nguu , jaari dariiɓe haa ñalawma oo ŋarɗi , holliti wonde ko suɓngo tiitoonde ñalawma oo tan e hoore mum ena gasa rokkude ayaawo ƴellitagol famamuya mo gollotooɓe e dingiral pinal ngal njogii e batte dookɗe hannde deftere ummoraade e karallaagal kesal .
Jaagorɗo Senegaal kalfinaaɗo geɗe jokkondiral caggal leydi e Senegaalnaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi , Aysata Taal Sal , yaltii he deƴƴere mum .

Jaayndiyankaagal Mammadu Demmba Sih
Jaayndiyanke Paalga ( jaaynirgol Burkina Faso ) , Useyni Ilbudo , hollitii hare hakkunde maɓɓe waɗii maayɓe banngeeji fof .
Jaayndiyankooɓe heblananooɓe ɓee ko Mammadu Hammadi Njaay lollirɗo Bosko he ɗemngal pulaar e Mammadu Gey he ɗemngal wolof e Kaliilu Jagana he Sooninkoore .
Jaayndiyankooɓe heblatenooɓe ngummii ko jaayɗe ceertuɗe , gila jaayɗe laamu haa e keeriiɗe ko waynoo jaaynde FOOYRE ƁAMTAARE ekn .
Jaayndiyankooɓe ɓe mberlima mo laaɓndal ko fayti he duko 7 miliyaaruuji conketeeɗo he jaayndeeji ɗee balɗe o , Kanko dawriyanke o , o wiy wonnde gila 2000 haa hannde leydi Senegaal njaaɓaani tolnaade fotde ko noddittoo ko , ɗuum woni wonde leydi demokaari , leydi sariya ( ñaawoore goonga ) e fiɓnde .
Jaayndiyankooɓe ɓee mbasiyaama nde mbaɗtataa hakkillaaji , ceɗaa ceɗtaa ko ngaddantaa rennd ngo , ndeento kala ko ina addaa caɗeele hakkunde renndooji .
Jaaynooɓe ndeeɗoo jaaynde daraniinde ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije , mbaɗii ko ɓuri haala ɓola .
Jaayre Ngenndi yaltinii yimooɓe heewɓe nanaaɓe hannde tawa haŋki ko amatnooɓe e diɗɗal ngal .
Jaayre ko ɗaŋre ɗiɗmere e seto-naange so a ummiima to magge , ɗo nde woni ɗo e nde foti waawde huufde nguurndam kono haɗi ko faandu henndu mayre ina tekki kadi sukki , ɗuum waɗi ko dammbotoo e nguleeki ina ɓurti , hakindo nguleeki e dow mayre ko 400 *C wadde ndiyam ndeelam wonataa toon saka wooda ko wuuri toon .
Jaayɗe leydi ɗee noon ceeraani e limtude " jiibaaji laamu Abdel Ajiiju " .

Jacques Stuart ( e Engele James Stuart ) jibinaa ko 14 oktoobar 1633 , sankii ko 16 settaambar 1701 .
Jacques Stuart , jogorɗo wonoyde laamɗo Angalteer oo , sosi , e hitaande 1672 , kompaañi biyeteeɗo " La Compagnie royale d’Afrique " .

Jalɓol teelngol ina waɗi leƴƴi ɗiɗi baawɗi wuurde e reedu

James Webb natal
James Webb ƴettiri natal ngal ko kameraa les-boɗewol : eɗen ceedoo e maggal caafe beetndogal ( beetnooje ) to gulli tagofeere ndee , kam e Fatere Woɗeere Mawnde , hono wuubiliiru mbaawndu moɗde Ngaawe ( Leydi men ndii ) .
Jamfa Barak Yerim Kodde Mbooc na maantini e oon sahaa : caggal tuubgol makko , seernaaɓe e wondiiɓe mum en koolii mo , mbaɗi mo " Mbuur Jullit " ( laamiiɗo juulɓe ) , jarabi ngalu naati mo haa tuubaako biyeteeɗo De Mudirinoo loowi mo mbonɗam , yeeni mo , seerndi mo e banndiiko en .
Jamfa alaa e dawrugol
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Aa haa , mboɗo siftora ngaal pottital , ngaal nanondiral kam e jeewte mum .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Fotde amen wonnoo ko ñaagaade caggal nde toɗɗe hooreyankooje laamu ɓenni , nde kaaldigal waɗetee .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Hay so en njiɗaa dey , ɓeto ngoo ko bonngo .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Hono no nganndir ɗon nii , min njaltinii ngool ɗerewol , yanti heen min njuɓɓini mooɓondiral mawngal to galle sukaaɓe kiiɗɗo oo ɗoo Nuwaasoot ngam hollitde ɗum ɓesngu Moritani .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Ko mbaaw ɗen wiyde e ɗum ɗoo , ko ceddeeje baɗaaɗe e dow moritaninaaɓe , e dow jaambureeɓe .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Lannda amen Tawasul ɓooyii yeewtude ndee yeewtere , miin e hoore am mi haalii e mum e nder batirde ngenndi , tuma joɗndeeji hoolaaɓe ndeen batirde , e wiyde mi e pellital daartateengal Hooreejo Siidi ɓiyi Seek Abdallaahi e artirde taƴtinanooɓe moritaninaaɓe e ñawndude caɗeele maɓɓe ko miijo fuɗɗoode ngootaagu ngenndi men .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Mboɗo sikki , henndu hesuru demokaraasii ko ko wutti e feccere doŋre ndee , ko maande moƴƴere .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Mi yettii on e oo fartaŋŋe mo ndokku ɗon mi .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Minen ko min luutndere .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Tawasul yaltiniino yeeynaango mum ko yowitii e ɗee nangɗe , e nder maggo min kiitorinooma ɗeen nangɗe , min naamndinooma ne kayne yo ɓe ngoppite ko aldaa e yowre ɓeen hatanteeɓe jojjanɗe aadee .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : To bannge amen , emin keelɗunoo e ko yowitii e ngal naamndal .
Jamiil Wul Mansuur : Ɗo , mboɗo yiɗi hollitde wonde minen ko min lannda dawriyankeewa moritaninaawa jogiika ɓaarorde islaamiyankeewa .

Jamjinaade e reentaade .
Jamma 14 mars Aali Yero fecci jamma nder lewlewal 13 , yalti
Jamma 30 jofi 31 ut 2021 , hay koninke Amerik gooto waalaani Afganistan .
Jamma O ko niih sifortoo
Jamma a Jofii niɓɓe curii gite , binnde njofii pittaali njebbilanii ɗoyngol .
Jamma altine 26 jofi talaata 27 silto ( settaambar ) 2022 , aadee waɗii ko meeɗaa waɗde gila tagaa koo , ɓeeynirka lappol DART ngol NASA buɓɓiima haayre weeyo , ngam selnude ɗum laawol mum .
Jamma e ñalawma fawi tan ko e yiiloo-banngoo leydi
Jamma eɗen njiya koode e nder ndoogu ( asamaan ) , kono tawa ɗeen koode pettii , pusii , cariima e weeyo hakkunde koode , no faandu moññortoo nii , walla no manka fettirta nii , natti woodde gila en njibinaaka .
Jamma gadano oo ko aadi hakkunde fedde ndee e sukaaɓe leegal Jamaa Annoore .
Jamma gadano oo ñalnde Mawnde 30/01/2023 ko to kloob ( club ) snim .
Jamma noon , so en ndaarii asamaan oo e gite men ɓole , en mbaawataa seerndude tagopeeje men kokkaaɗe caafe haa mbaɗti ɗelñude , e koode kokkooje caafe ɗelñooje , mbiyen noon " mburu fof ko fariñ " ( fof ko koode ) !
Jamma oo fuɗɗiima woɗɗoyde kono hiirde ndee naywaani tawo .
Jamma oo ko Sifaa hanki Pinal hannde heerorii ɗum e gardagol Umaar Haaruuna Waar .
Jamma oo ko gooto , ɗiɗo ɓee fuu padi ko janngo .
Jamma oo udiitiraa ko al Qur’aan e sawta ceerno Aamadu Sal , caggal mum ceerno Mammadu Bookar Taal rokki duwaawu , nde yeewtere ummanaa .
Jamma oo ñalnde heen waalaa ko e hiirde diine haa ngoriiji njoggi .
Jamma sappo e goo , ko hiirde pinal yuɓɓinaa , gila futuro juulaa tan haa waalaa waklaa .
Jamma ŋoŋaa ɗaanaaka !
Jammaaji kammu hikka
Jammaaji keewɗi ɗi ɗaanaaka tuma nde keblat-mi ndee tigilde , ko e mon ngittat-mi guut am !
Jamminooji Leydi ( Coordonnées terrestres )
Jamñallee mon wiyooɓo mbiimi e mbiimaami ; Alla em weltaade e ooɗo kabaaru belɗo mironkini anndu holkombinndan mi onon banndiraaɓe ardiiɓe dariiɓejamma e ñalawma mbele ma ngal men ɓamto yaara yeeso Mi yetti on fodde baawal am sabu ina wayini ko mbaɗatonko ko miin tan mballa tonni sabu ko kanngal tan njiiran mi yeeso am kadi mboɗo wiya on yoo golle njokke mbaason heɗaade haala Luuji bonɓe e sarooɓe kadi faame ko onon ngoni jaalal leñol Hono mon weeɓani e ooɗo aduna hannde sabu ndeereeru dañal aduna kono ɓe ngannda woni dañal ko ɗumɗo ɓamtude Leñel honono mbaɗa tonni balɗe juuɗe e battade moƴƴe e mon e hono mon en ; kadi njokke golle naam nal mbele ordinateer wannde Alluwal Pulaar ina woodi so ina woodi hono heɓorto kadi mbele Alluwal pulaar ina woodi sabu miin so mboɗo winnda e Ordinaateer ko mami yiilo yo Alkuleɗe e nder mayre ndemi fuɗɗa winndude ko yetter Alla noon sabu hayɗuum ko Alla e Mon waɗimi ɗum danñde koye mon ndanñmi waawde wadde ɗum mbelam koko waɗi mi ngada benñweñ haami ronnki anndu holko pon mi winndu njaafo ɗon mi wonto foti waɗeede toɓɓe eko nanndi heen komi donnkuɗo wadde sabu njiimi koyi AlluwaL español mi salmini kala biyoowo mbiim to woni eno woniri fof mi ñaagima on yaafuya sowonko feewaani wallani e binndi he Bah Hammaat to saragosa Espaañ

Jean-Louis Mas : Ina waɗi heen sababuuji cellal , ko ɓuri heewde cuuɗiiɗi , ko wayi no taasiyoŋ ( ŋabbugol taasiyoŋ ) , jabet , ɓurtugol kolesterol , walla kawjugol dille cuuɗi ɓernde ( anévrisme ) .
Jean-Louis Mas : Maale ɗee ina ceerti fawaade e diiwaan ngaandi memaaɗo oo , kono kañje kala ɗe ngardata ko peral .
Jean-Louis Mas : Nder 80% , ko maayde ɗaɗi ngaanndi ( infarctus ) caabotoo ɗum tawi heɗɗere ƴiiƴam won ɗo sukki ɗaɗol nawol ƴiiƴam hoore ɗoon e ɗoon .
Jean-Louis Mas : So tawii ko maayde ɗaɗi ngaandi sabu cukkam ɗaɗol , so joomum pinngaama e ɗaɗol gartol ( veine ) safaara caaynoowo heɗɗere sukkunde ɗaɗol nawol ngaandi ngol , tawi ko e nder waktuuji 4 haa joy caggal peeñgol maale gadane ɗee , ina waawi sellinde ɗeɗew tataɓal e ɓe ɗum heɓtotoo ɓee .
Jean-Louis Mas : Wonande ɓe meeɗaa heɓde ɗum walla meeɗnooɓe heɓde ɗum fof , deentagol ngol tuugii ko e jiytugol geɗe baawɗe saabaade ɗum kam e ñabbuuli gaddooji ɗum ( taasiyoŋ , jabet , kolesterol , ñawu ɗaɗi , kawjol dille ɓernde ) , safaara mum en e tewaare nguurndam moƴƴere .

Jiilgol moƴƴol fiyakuuji ndenndaandi : ɗum noddii hormaade jeyi ndenndaandi , haɓaade forlooɓe jawdi dowla , feccitaade e nuunɗal jawdi ndenndaandi , haɓaade waasam-ngollaagu sagataaɓe ekn Ɗee geɗe fof noon luulndo holliri ko so tawii mawɗo leydi ndii qirraaki jaɓi ɗum en , alaa ɗo fayaaa tawo , etee hay so tawii o tawtoraaka kaaldigal ngal , maa o toɗɗoo neɗɗo e jaagorɗe laamu nguu potɗo jooɗonaade mo toon .
Jiilgol moƴƴol kariyeer gollotooɓe e ñaawoore , haa teeŋti noon to bannge pektugol .
Jiilirɗe Fonadh he nokkuuji 5 ɗii : Ɓoggee , Baabaaɓe , Kayhayɗi , Sehilbaabi , Kiifa ;

Jiiryiirngal Fedannde malaaɗo , ko jiiryiirngal jirliwal baɗngal ko ine abboo e 200 haa 400 milyaar hoodere , e ko famɗi fof 100 miliyaar tagofeere .
Jiiryiirngal mawngal kala ine jogii wuddere ɓaleere pattamñisre he nehaande mum .
Jiiɓru 89 e batte mum e ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndi
Jiiɓru mawndu na naati e galle mo laamɓe Taraarsa en njaltata oo .
Jiiɓru nder kinɗe tamɗe laamu nguu : mi siftina on ndeen , Barak , hono laamɗo Waalo , yaltata ko e galleeji tati : Loggaar , Joor e Teejekk .
Jiiɓru nder ngalu Waalo : maccuɓe ko murtuɓe , na caltii kalifaandi muusndi pawiindi e daaɗe mum en , na caltii ko konetee ina njeeyee tuubakooɓe koo .
Jiiɓru politik hakkunde laamu lorloowu ngu e ɓiɗtaaɓe ɓee ;

Jirlagol leydi e hoore mum ina wallita keneeli dogde , forla ɗi e dow won e nokkuuji e kuccam .
Jirlagol leydi naange
Jirlagol lilluɗe koode e koye majje anndirtee ko e batte Doppler , so oɗon teskitii , so on cooyniima werlaa nawoowo ɓe cellaani ( ambulance ) ina ara , piipaali werlaa o njaawat , so o yawtii ɗi leelta no lefol rajo ƴakkangol ni , hay mbo yiyaani werlaa o so baylagol dille ɗe tan anndat o yawti , ko baylagol piipaali ɗi woni batte Doppler e nder hito ( sawtu ) .
Jirlagol lilluɗe koode e koye majje anndirtee ko e batte Doppler , so oɗon teskitii , so on cooyniima werlaa nawoowo ɓe cellaani ( ambulance ) ina ara , piipaali werlaa o njaawat , so o yawtii ɗi leelta no lefol rajo ƴakkangol nii , hay mbo yiyaani werlaa oo ina waawi anndude so o yawtii e fawaade e baylagol dille ɗee ; ko ngool baylagol piipaali ɗii woni ko wiyetee batte Doppler e nder hito ( sawtu ) .
Jirlagol ngol ina ɓeydoo yaawde haa ruulde nde mabbi waati no mbeɗu sabu pooɗal , ruulde nde jokki ɗehaade e werbiɗde , nguleeki e nder mayre jokki doolnude , to wuddu ruulde werbiɗnde to jaynge ruppitii , yaynii way no annama-hoodere , ko ndeen hebori wontude Naange .
Jirwere tuddunde koloñaal jawɗi e damɗi ina kuttaa
Jiytal mawngal waɗaama he ɗee balɗe , paatungal e cellal
Jiytal mawngal waɗaama he ɗee balɗe , paatungal e cellal , ngal huunde e annduɓe kiisii ko waklitere .
Jiytal ɓarakke to Israayiil
Jiytondiral e reesoo sosiyoo , watsap , facebook , skype , ekn .
Jiytugol aññeere ɓooynde , sibu ko he yonta firawna biyetenooɗo Ramses 2 , laaminooɗo Misra hakkunde 1279 e 1213 ko adii jibineede Annabi Iisaa , mo laamu mum yanhnoo haa Kanaan ( ine jeyaa heen Israayiil hannde oo ) , e leyɗeele Palestiinaaɓe e haa to Libaan , Jordaani e Siiri .
Jiyɗo ngel fof , sikka e ngel famɗi , sikka ena waawi mooftude ɗum e nder suudu walla ena waawi huufde ɗum e dow puccu .
Jiññini mawngal beeli .
Jiɗɗo ɓeydaade humpitaade ko fayti e ndeeɗoo deftere , yo yah ɗo :
Jogiiɓe gooto e kaayitaaji dow ɗii ;
Jogiiɓe kaayit juddu e kartal dantitee Ranvec ;
Jogiiɓe kaayitaaji keccuɗi Ranvec ;
Joginooɗo laamu e ɗii duuɓi sappo e go’o haa sappo e nay , woppii walla woppinaama laamu welaaka , caggal nde ronki yultinde feere mum bonnde , so wiyde ina wayla Doosgal leydi ngam laamtaade goɗngol , hade mum ruttaade ɗoon e ɗoon , dartini ndee feere bonnde .

Jokkol ( lien )
Jokkol ( lien ) : ko huunde waawnde nawdema to njiɗɗa yahde e internet , so a dobiima e jokkol he jokkondirma e nokku o , wadde ngol konngol ina yuɓɓi .

Jokkondiral artuɓe to Barakna
Jokkondiral e Doktoor Amina Njaay
Jokkondiral e Gardiiɗo Gollorde laamu Toppitiinde Jey Leydi ( Direction des Domaines ) mbele ciynugol eɓɓaande nde ina yaawa .
Jokkondiral e Kalifu Toppitiiɗo Gollorɗe e Koɗki e Daabaaji , kam e Diisnondirteeɓe mum , nyande 29/09/1994 ;
Jokkondiral e Meeri ina wayi no woɗɗaani , ko goonga komiin alaa doole , kono eɓe poti heptinde ndeeɗoo fedde , mbele Kayhayɗi ina wela yiyde .
Jokkondiral e codgu : Hamadi M'Bodj junior .
Jokkondiral hakkunde Goomu Caafal e gardagol ceerno Jaalaalu Diin Bah , e Yiilirde ngenndiire Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani to joɗnde fedde ndee Ɓamtaare ñalnde 3 feebariyee 2018 e ñalnde 8 feebariyee 2018 .
Jokkondiral hakkunde Goomu Caafal e gardagol ceerno Jalaalu Diin Bah e Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Muritani
Jokkondiral kadi e Kalifu keso toɗɗaaɗo yo Toppito Gollorɗe e Koɗki e Daabaji , ngam humpitde mo jokkondire jawtuɗe ɗe fof , e ɗaɓɓirde mo ciynugoi miijo lomtinaneede fedde nde galle mum , haa teeŋti e rokkeede leydi ngoɗndi , ɗo waawi wonde fof e Diiwaan laamorgo ngo .
Jokkondire : ( 1 ) 513 886 7628 / ( 1 ) 646 352 1068
Jokkondire e Gardiiɗo Gollorde laamu Toppitiinde Jey Leydi ( Direction des Domaines ) e Haralleeɓe mum e wallidiiɓe woɗɓe , dariiɓe laŋ sara Yiilirde Ngenndiire , ngam wallude ɗum heblude denndaangal kaayitaaji doosiyee potɗo yettineede Jonnde Halifaaɓe laamu nguu , ngam tabitinde lomtingol galle oo .
Jokkondiroowo ngenndiijo PARIIS kam e kalfinaaɗo catal Tararsa e Barakna ;
Jokkorde hakkunde pelle pinal tati ( Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani ( FƁPM ) e Fedde Muritaninaare ngam Ɓamtaare Ɗemngal e Pinal Sooninke ( AMPLCS ) e Fedde Ɓamtaare Ɗemngal Wolof he Muritani ( APROLAWO ) ) yuɓɓinii yeewtere jaaynde ñalnde altine 21/9/21 ɗo joɗnde Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani ( Socogim PS , Nuwasoot ) .
Jokkorde luulndo ( COD ) , kam e ko ɓuri heewde e jaayɗe kollitii ko waɗaa toon koo , " wayi ko no fijo nii " .
Jokkorde ndee tawtoraama no haanirta nii ñalɗi diisnondiral caggal nde njooɗodii e Jaagorgal jaŋde ñalnde 3 ut 2021 , nde o habri joɗnde ñalɗi ɗii .
Jokkorde ndee ɗoo ko yeewtere Pulaar nde o waɗdi e Soulaymane Gollo ( AADI Pulaar ) he DakarBuzz .
Jokkorde pelle pinal
Jokkorde pelle pinal ngenndiije
Jokkorde pelle pinal ngenndiije , hono FƁPM , AMPLCS , e APROLAWO , suniima nde nani terɗe Diiso Ngenndiiwo Jaŋde ( DNJ ) toɗɗaama , tawi hay heen gooto jooɗanaaki ɗum heen .
Jokkorde pelle pinal ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof ( FƁPM , AMPLCS , APROLAWO ) nanii , rewrude e jaayɗe , kurmbitgol , ñalnde alkamiisa 15 oktoobar 2020 , tumbudu heblo he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije wonande doge " ñaawoore " e " njuɓɓudi laamu " , to Duɗal ngenndi ngal Njuɓɓudi laamu e Jaaynugol e Ñaawoore ( ENAJM ) .
Jokkorde pelle pinal ɗee ine wasiyii nde ooɗoo sariya kuccam sakkitta " laawɗingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof haa laatoyoo ɗemɗe dokkooje denndaangal fartaŋŋeeji ɗi ɗemɗe ngenndiwal goɗngal ngal , hono arab , ɗokkata ɗii " .
Jokkorde pelle ɗee , caggal teeŋtingol heɓaare mum wallitde oo silsil no doole mum potiri , ine ɗaɓɓi he laamu nguu nde waɗata heen yimɓe e kaɓirɗe e ngalu katojinaangu ngam moƴƴinde golle ɗee , ine ɗaɓɓa he denndaangal dillooɓe heen ɓee nde ngaddata heen ballal mum en mbele ko huccanaa koo ine laatoo .
Jokkorde pelle ɗee ine ɗaɓɓi he denndaangal woƴaaɓe ndee Eɓɓaande , tuggan maa ko adii fof pelle pinal ɗee , nde ɓeydata darnde e pellital nder hare haɓetee ngam yettinde hujjaaji goɗɗi ɗii , haa teeŋti noon e laawɗingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof .
Jokkorde pelle ɗee ine ɗaɓɓi nde taƴre dow ndee lomtinirtee ndeeɗoo taƴre " Arab ine jannginiree denndaangal sukaaɓe ɓe arab wonaa ɗemngal mum en neeniwal no ɗemngal jokkondiral nii " .
Jokkorde pelle ɗee ine ɗaɓɓi nde taƴre dow ndee lomtinirtee ndeeɗoo taƴre : " He jaŋde lesre hee , suka muritaninaajo kala janngirta denndaangal fannuuji ɗii ko ɗemngal mum neeniwal e dow teskaade ngonka nokku mum e jojjanɗe kisnugol mahondiral renndo "
Jokkorde pelle ɗee ine ɗaɓɓi nde taƴre dow ndee lomtinirtee ndeeɗoo taƴre : " Ɗemɗe ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof maa naatne , ƴellitee , ɓamtee he denndaangal tolnooji jaŋde ndee , gila he nder janngirɗe laamu haa e janngirɗe keeriiɗe fof , ɗe naatnee he nder tippudi jaŋde e heblo , no ɗemɗe janngirɗe nii e no ɗemɗe jokkondiral nii " .
Jokkorgol ɓoggol giiɗal waɗi ko neldowel giiɗal e keɓɓotoongel giiɗal , leeɓol giiɗal ina jokkondiri hakkunde mum en .

Jokku golle giɗo .
Jokku golleyo musidd`o
