Jolal 3ɓiiwal yeewtere Afrik ngam jam , batu mum hakkunde leyɗe fuɗɗiima hannde ñalɗi 17 , 1ɓuru e nder Nuwaasot , maa duumo fotde balɗe 3 .
Jolal follooji ɗii he nder Afrik hirnaange , to Mali e Gine e Burkina Faso ina hollita ŋakkere suɓngooji hoyreleydaagu , sabu faawaade he dow mbuuñaari e ardinde geɗe keeriiɗe ekn .
Jolo adanngo : He maayirɗe 2020 , sabu caɗeele koronaa , yimɓe heewɓe e winndere ndee njiytii gollaade cuuɗi mum en he ceŋol ( en ligne ) .
Jolo joyaɓo : kesamkesaagu paatungu e ƴoƴre tafaande , hono masiŋaaji janngooji haa mbaawa , e yeru , ñemtinde nate yimɓe anndaaɓe , walla darjuɓe , kuutortooɗi ko anndiraa " jaŋde masiŋ " ( machine learning ) walla " jaŋde luggere " ( deep learning ) .
Jolo nayaɓo : newagol deestondiral
Jolo tataɓo : senngo cellal jeyaa ko he ceŋɗe ɓurɗe famɗude ko naftorii karallaagal kesal .
Jolo ɗimmo : Wonaa gollotooɓe tan njogori naftoraade ɓure golle-ceŋol ( golle he weeyo ) .
Jolɗe nattii woodde , woodi tan ko jehre huuɓtodinnde ɗo kala jeyaaɗo he silsil jaŋde waawi ferde bolol mum ngam woodde ( ko he maayo wooto hee yimɓe fof tuuɓata )
Jom gacce ko tampuɗo sibu maa yi'ii ko foti naamndaade tawi ɗuum ina moofti ganndal hersa naamndaade ɗuum ko tampere .
Jom ɗaɓɓaande oo ina foti heɓde seedamfaagal ( récépissé ) .
Jom-suudu oo ( teskoɗéé diidel-jókkirgel ngel ) ene fóti seerndee e jom suudu nduu ; kóŋngól gadanól ngól ko innde renndinnde ( jom-suudu makko ) , ɗiɗaɓól ngól ko e ngaddiin haala ( jom suudu nduu alaano ɗoon ) .
Joni heddi ko mate farayse jogoraani jangeede sabu woƴiɗum ko artirde dahaabe mum taw ina kisi .

Jontaaɗo yoo socco sabu mooso bettat .

Joom haala , walla binndi maa nate añamnguraagu ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi tati ( 3 ) e alamaan teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) haa teemedde tati ujunere ( 300 000 ) ugiyya , so tawii baɗe joopaaɗe ɗee ndewri ko kala feere kumpital peeñcu , hay enternet ; hay so tawii noon lowre ndee ɗuhaa ko caggal leydi , yo a taw tan haala njoopaaka kaa saaktaa ko he Muritani .

Jooni kadi , O artanii jeyi makko goɗɗo : Mammadu Sammba Joob , loolirnooɗo Murtuɗo .
Jooni kadi , addani ndu waɗtude haaleede , ko luural hakkunde Amerik e Iraan , sabu ko ɓuri heewde e laaɗe mawɗe doondiiɗe petroŋ ummoraade Irak , Kowoyt , Bahreyn , Kataar , Abuu Dabi , Emiraaji Arab dentuɗi , ko ɗoon dewrata feewde leyɗe hirnaange .
Jooni kadi , e balɗe battindiiɗe he golle goomu losko nguu , gardiiɗo dental UPR noon huccitinii kadi ɗaɓɓaande hesere , ina yiyloo yo suudu sarɗi yamir goomu nguu , yo ɓeydane toɓɓe ɗiɗi e golle mum .
Jooni kadi , so en cawndinii nate ɗiɗi ɗee , maa en tesko eɗe nanndi no feewi : haawnaaki , ko ɗuum woni ko yaakoranoo , sibu kuule ɗiɗi ɗee njiidi edda , njiidi mahdi .
Jooni kam en puɗɗiima yananeede ɗum no way mawnude ni waasataa wooda ɗo nguurndam woni ,
Jooni kam eɗen paami tan wooteeji paaɗi njowitii tan ko he darnugol CENI sabu no sariya wiyri ko nguun goomu foti toɗɗaade nde silsil woote ɗee fuɗɗotoo , hol no doggol wootooɓe lelnirtee , hol no kartuuji dantitee kesɗinirtee ( tawde lajal majji koko joofi ) ekn Ɗum noon beeli njowii hannde ko he darnugol CENI , ko sifaa maggu hebori gaddaade laaɓal e wooteeji paaɗi .
Jooni kam ko waawi heen wonde fof , ñaawoore ndee yowaama fotde balɗe sappo e joyi e dow ɗaɓɓaande hillanooɓe tuumaaɓe ɓee , etee wiyaa ko hakke maɓɓe , etee ɓe njaɓanaama ɗuum .
Jooni kay haala gasi , ƴeewen daɗɗude peeje no njaggir-ɗen mo kadi .

Jooni kay yo ɓe njokku wiɗtude haa ɓuren heɓde heen ko laaɓi .
Jooni kewe e motiiji keewaani e diiwaan men o , kono dene kam ena ngoodi tawo .
Jooni ko Jam Min Tekki joli e diŋiral !
Jooni ko haala ɗanngal DART ( laañal ) , woni laanel weeyo ngel NASA neldi ñalnde 24/11/21 ngam hoolkisaade karallaagal deenirgal Leydi men , so tawii kaaƴal weeyo tiindiima e men ( sabu hay gooto e men yiɗaa dañde ko dinosooruuji ndañnoo ) .
Jooni ko niiwnorgal kesal , biyeteengal niiwnorgal James Webb , ( JWST ) lottaa ñalnde 18 desaambar 2021 , ngam fuɗɗaade lomtaade golle niiwnorgal biyeteengal Hubble waɗatnoo .
Jooni ko niiwnorgal kesal , biyeteengal niiwnorgal James Webb , werlaa ñalnde 18 desaambar 2021 , ngam fuɗɗaade lomtaade golle Hubble waɗatnoo .
Jooni maa laana ngoɗka , hono SRL ( Sample Retrieval Lander = juurotoonel ƴettirgel seedeeji ) , neldee to Mbaañ , joɗɗina toon deegowel potngel heɓde seedeeji ɗi Perseverance ƴettunoo ɗii , wondude e fiiseeyel ( fiisee tokooso , hono Mars Ascent Vehicule ) potɗo diwde , nawa seedeeji ɗii he jirlol Mbaañ .

Kabaaru : Emin nganniyii udditande on ɗoo damal jowitiingal e jeyi leydi , sabu amen teskaade eɗum jeyaa e ngoƴaaji ɓesngu leydi ndii hannde , teeŋti noon e hoɗɓe daande maayo mawngo ( Maayo Senegaal ) .

Kadi , e duuɓi cakkitiiɗi ɗii , njiylawu safaara maggu waɗii
Kadi , e oo sahaa mo mbinndaten , laaɗe jeeɗiɗi ( 7 ) nani njirloo Mars walla ine njuurii he mum ( ummoriiɗe DDA , Orop , e Inndo ) .
Kadi , o wiyi o wonndaani e feere laamɗo janɗo oo wiyde ena yanndina howhowɓe larme toowɓe sabu ko ɓeen toppitii kisal leydi ndii haa teeŋti e hare e saram-boomaagu ( terrorisme ) .
Kadi , sunami yerɓo leydi ina " tintina " , woni ina tinee
Kadi , yimɓe tato , ɓe o waɗi jenerooji , o waɗi ɗum en e laamu makko ko warɓe yimɓe , haa ndakmitii , tee cuuɗaaki e kuɗel , moggaaki e leggel .
Kadi baage ɗiɗe ina mbiyee Woyaajer ina nawori beɗi baɗaaɗi saggitorde timmunde ngonka men e dow Ngaawe , ɗeen baage kam njaltii seto-naange .
Kadi ferɓe ɓe ina pota hatojin'de e kunte kese ( pièces détachées ) ngam waylude kala ko hiiɗɗi e masiŋaaji maɓɓe , ɗuum naamndii ko kaalis haa way no leydi , maa wonoy ko famɗi fo milyaaruuji 4 .
Kadi gila hitaande 2000ɓiiri laamu senegaal ko ko heɓi ňugga gooto fof ɗo tolnorii haalat ko hebaaka – heblanaaka , ɗuum nanngee waɗtee konngol laamu , tawa noon won’de e laamu wonaa ɗuum woni won’de laamu , kono noon gooto fof femmbude tiinde mum tan ina haala e geɗe leydi ɗe ayninaaka surnoyaaka .
Kadi hade makko wiyde omo juula mayɓe , yoo haalan yimɓe hotoɓe ngoni .
Kadi hay konngol laamɗo senegaal waynoo kono hiira Ƴeewee maayirɗe koorka ni , laamɗo leydi ndi so ina haalatnoo yeeynete fadee so arii o haala heɗee finee dawree yeewteede .
Kadi kala haaju ene jogii hollitteeɓe ɗum e noddeteeɓe heen .
Kadi ko heen .
Kadi ko nanetee caggal leydi ko daande wootere ; yoo leydi ndii rutto e doosɗe , laamu kooniŋkooɓe heftinaaka !
Kadi ko njiilaw safaara patdotooɗo rafi o wonaa , tawa ina walla ɓanldu neɗɗo riiwtude rafi o gila heɓindaaki mbo .
Kadi ko njiilaw safaara patdotooɗo rafi o wonaa , tawa ina walla ɓanndu neɗɗo riiwtude rafi o gila heɓindaaki mbo .
Kadi ko wolof haannoo abbaade e Fulfulde , kono wonaa Fulfulde haani abbaade e wolof .
Kadi laamu safalɓe Moritani sulmii tan ko maa ɓaleeɓe fof njaɓa won’de hardaneeɓe ( maccuɓe safalɓe ) .
Kadi mbaasen hulndirde naatde e caltuɗe nokke ɗe , paamen pulaar oo ko gootum .
Kadi mi wiya wonde hakkunde njiimaadi e neesu , yolnde ɗoon ndee ko haaɗtorde ; wonde , so nule konuweeje ɗee kala ndentinaama , caggal ɗee tuugne konuweeje binndaaɗe kala , caggal ɗee jamirooje jaagoriije nuldaaɗe kala , hay siinde neɗɗankeere wootere heɓetaaka heen .
Kadi musiiba me koko mawni am Mammadu Alasan BAH , wiyata ko Musiiba Pullo ko , ko o munyanta gozzo ko o munyantaa zum banndiiko .
Kadi nde ɓe njokki wiɗtude ɓe taw hay Naange ina woɗɗi won'de wuddu tageefo , ko nge hoodere ɓadiinde tan , ko ɗum waɗi nge mawnude e jalbude , nge lommbi ko e nder lillungal koode moolanangal ina wiyee Fedannde Malaaɗo , mooɓngal ko ina abbo e 400 miliyaar hoodere ( walla naangeele ) , nge woni sera e lillungal he , a nge woɗɗi won'de to wuddu maggal .
Kadi nganndaa wadda alaa sehil , gila o jooɗii fa'de hannde hay gooto anndaa ɓe o haɓi no poti , tee aan ko Saada waɗ ma ko ngonɗaa ko , woto yiɗde laamu tan addane wonde jiiɓoowo .
Kadi omo huli hoto yimɓe ɓee cikkude so o woppaama ko sabu kaawisaaji Alla ,
Kadi sahaa fof oɗon kaani siftorde , kala golle ɗe ɓurɗaa ittande geɗal , ko ɗeen golle ɓuri heewde barke ko ɗeen golle ɓurata ɓamtaade kadi aɗa waawi heɓde heen nii kaa sikkaano walla kaa ɗamino-nooki Ekn .
Kadi so on paamii , ɓurnoo wonde sabaabu dartingol lowre ndee ko hoɗnunooɓe en ɓee mbaɗtii yoɓnaade ko diwi sariya .
Kadi so wontii to ɓadondiral ɗemɗe ɗee , hakkunde wolof e pulaar ko wolof foti abbaade e pulaar .
Kadi so yahaama haa to lewru , sulɗaane mayru ina lohi , sabu maa wonoy jeegoɓal sulɗaane Ngaawe , ɗuum firti so tawii neɗɗo peesata e dow Ngaawe ko 60 kg , e dow lewru o diwtataa kilooji 10 !
Kadi won woɗɓe peewniriɗe tebbuuli nayi , bamɗi tugi e baali ngam yeeyde ina ñaamee !
Kadi ñiiɓirde ndeya , pulaagu .
Kadi ɗum jeyaaka e sariya kuccam jaŋde ɓenninaaka e suudu sarɗi ko ɓooyaani kaa : kañum adii fuuf sariya kaa .
Kadii ko deppi suuɗatoo yimɓe ñalawma koo fof so njeelii , cuuɗotaako .
Kadii nduun heewi wiyeede ko yegeñ .
Kajjaa Lih , yonteede e hellifeede !
Kajjata Maalik Jallo
Kajjata Maalik Jallo ( KMJ ) : Fooyre Ɓamtaare jaaraama rokkude mi fartaŋŋe faccirde banndiraaɓe ɓee geɗe ɗee .
Kala Muritaninaajo moolinooɗo maa waaw artude e leydi ndi .
Kala Muritaninaajo moolinooɗo maa waaw artude he leydi ndii .
Kala amiiru mo o toɗɗii yo ardo gooto e diiwanuuji ndii laamaandi fulɓe njaajndi , o rokkii ɗum wellitaare jaajnde ngam ardaade nokku mum .
Kala ballitɗo haala mbonnitoowa luulndiika aada diine Ndenndaandi Lislameeri Muritani , ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi joy ( 5 ) .
Kala banndiraaɗo jogiiɗo
Kala baɗɗo ko heewɓe mbaɗaani , tawi ko e moƴƴere , maa dañ kadi ko heewɓe ndañaani e moƴƴere .
Kala caaktuɗo , sari , walliti walla rokki kelme baawɗe faamreede no yiɗde bonnande walla umminde bonannde to bannge hakkille walla ɓalndu , semmbinde walla aawde ngañgu , ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi tati e almaan teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) haa teemedde tati ujunere ( 300 000 ) ugiyya .
Kala cukalel ngel ɗemngal mum neeniwal woni arab , ine foti janngude ko famɗi fof gootal e ɗemngal ngenndiije tati ɗee ( Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof ) .
Kala danyzo yejjiti amen yoo Allah haaznu zoon danyal mum , etee ina jogani amen nyamaande .
Kala dokkoowo sarwiis , walla kuuɓnoowo nafooro mum , faltii neɗɗo sabu edda ɓalndu mum , goobu mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum , ine fawee kuugal kasoo lebbi jeegom ( 6 ) haa hitaande ( 1 ) kam e alamaan capanɗe joy ujunere ( 50 000 ) haa teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) ugiyya .
Kala duwaaw moƴƴo laaɓɗo ko jaabeteeɗo sikke alaa heen , kono noon ko Alla anndi no jaabortoo , ene ɓurirta moƴƴude e ñaagiiɗo o .
Kala duñɗo he ngañgu faade e goomu keɓtintoongu ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi tati ( 3 ) e alamaan teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) haa teemedde tati ujunere ( 300 000 ) ugiyya .
Kala duñɗo he paltoor , he ngañgu , he ndoolndoolaagu , ayiiba e ƴattooje sabu iwdi , edda ɓalndu , walla leñol , ngenndaagu , jarfiri ɗum jaaynde walla peeje kumpital goɗɗe , ine fawee kuugal kasoo hitaande ( 1 ) haa duuɓi tati ( 3 ) kam e alamaan teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) haa teemedde tati ujunere ( 300 000 ) ugiyya .
Kala e men tawaaɗo dabbunde koko tawetee ceeɗu , tawee kadi hay Demminaare .
Kala gannduɗo pinal Afriknaaɓe e kuuɓal , Senegammbinaaɓe ( Gammbi , Guinee , Mali , Muritani , e Senegaal ) haa ɓuri teeŋtude , ene anndi darnde ngawlaagu he yuɓɓo renndooji mum en .
Kala giɗo Pulaar yo o mante .
Kala gontuɗo moritaninaajo , caggal lajal duuɗi sappo , ina waawi ɓooreede moritaninaajo so tawii
Kala gooto e resomdirɓe heddaade .
Kala heen Duɗal meteyoo diiwaniiwal karalleewal ina reena , e nder deedal halfinaa ngal , denndaangal dumbitorɗe ŋoriije , gila ɗo puɗɗotoo ɗoo haa ɗo caayata ɗoo .
Kala heen galle mo neene maɓɓe wagginnooɓe , ɓe njottima ɗoon ɓe tintini yahdu ɓaɓɓe .
Kala heen ɗo Baaba Maal fiji , ena waɗee paɗɗondiral ngam toɗɗaade miis Daande Leñol e ngoon wuro .
Kala hitaande wonduɓe e ñawu jabet fannu 2 ina ɓeydoo heewde e nder aduna oo .
Kala hoodere walla tagofeere wonnde e weeyo , ooñat weeyo seraaji mum haa naɗɗiɗa , ko ɗuum waɗi kala ko ɓadi heewi ko yortaade yana heen so tawii yaawaani no feewi , so tawii ko huunde yaawnde wirtoto hoodere walla tagofeere nde ɗo ɓadi kono kuccam mum wayloto .
Kala huunde huymboore e nder ndiyam , waɗtinta ko e haggoyde e tee ne wonaa ɗo haggi fof woni ɓural .
Kala jaggunooɗo konngol gila e hooreejo Tabital Pulaaku , Buuba Ba ( Pullo mo Kameruun ) haa tottan maa Hooreejo fedde fuuta , daande ko wootere : Ko weltaare e weytaare wonde ɓiɓɓe fulɓe nde oo ganndo naati leydi ndii .
Kala jibinanooɗo he 1987 , hannde yahrata ko duuɓi 34 .
Kala jiɗɗo deftere pulaar ina waawi jokkondirde e ndeeɗo tonngoode
Kala jiɗɗo yiide Merkiir , so tawii kammu ina laaɓi , hannde caggal mutirɗe naange seeɗa , so on ƴeewi hoodere ɓurnde laaɓtude nde ko Jipiter , les mayre koodel ina lewña , kayre , lewru e Jipiter tolnondirta rip .
Kala ko Demmba wiiya waaDi yedinaaki , ngam mbiDo aandi mo gila omo yeya kerem-galase to Cilonye , Baba Maal ko teeyDo , so wonaano ko gardinDo hakkilemako kankone waaDate no Fatu Metu waaDiini .
Kala ko dañaa , ko ko renndaa .
Kala ko ena waɗa won to fuɗɗii , won to ummii , won ko umminiraa .
Kala ko fawinoo e dow Leydi filta no kure faade fuɗnaange e njaaweeki kulɓiniiki , daɗata e ngoon filto tan ko heedɓe coɓɓuli rewo e worgo Leydi , ɓeen kam ina waawi tan pilta njana ɗo ɓadi , walla boom pergito !
Kala ko jogii fuɗɗoode jogoto woortoode , kala ko jibinaa meeɗat nde maayi , Njaana walla Naange e seto mayre daɗataa ndeen fodoore , ɗo e duuɓi milyaaruuji 5 haa 7 naange koko nattata , rooyta ñifa .
Kala ko laana ka nawi e kaake , ko ɗe mbaawi won'de fo , kilogaraam gooto nawirte ko 1 .
Kala ko leƴƴi ɓaleeji mbaawnoo kewnude hono dennɗiraagal alaa heen e waawde wuurtinde enɗam walla jokkude ɗam .
Kala ko neɗɗo ena haala yoo haal ko Waɗata .
Kala ko nganndu ɗaa so a haalii a waɗataa a wonaa baɗoowo , tinno woto haal , sibu saa haalaani haydara bonnataa .
Kala ko nguleeki mum ɓuri ɓolum kaaɗtudi ( -273 , 15°C ) , ko wuuri e ko wuuraani fof , ine yaltina caafe les-boɗewol , hay siis mo njooɗi-ɗaa oo .
Kala ko njiɗɗaa , min coodtirii ɗum biigi e dimaaɗi e ƴiiƴam sagataaɓe .
Kala ko potnoomi haalde so ko Allah a haalii kono no tokara ma wi'i : .
Kala ko waawi umminde mo e kala waawi wonde caggal makko ne , eɗen mbaawi wiyde , belaaɗo e mettaaɗo kala hannde hakkillaaji ene njowii e Gabrielle Kane , kadi omo nanndi e pawɗo koyngal makko ɗo tiiɗi .
Kala ko woni e kammu he , gila e tagopeeje haa e lebbi , haa e koode mum , fof ena ndilla , ena njaha .
Kala ko woodi ma nattu haa heddoo joomiraaɗo .
Kala ko ɓamaa toon e nate e wiɗtooji hisnete , ngam neltiree leydi , neldugol ngol ko waɗata e laawol ko jamɗe 4 e hojomaaji 25 nde yottoo men !
Kala ko ɓurti heewde rufat , holi no ceerndirten yiylaade tineede e hisnude nguurndam mum keeriɗam ?
Kala laaɓndaaɗo so ana nana ɗemngal wolof , yoo o wiy o nanataa ngaal ,
Kala marsandiis naatoowo leydi njananndi ina fawee kubbal duwaan , fawaade no dottiraa e nanondire njulaagu hakkunde leyɗe ɗiɗi julondirooje ɗee .
Kala mbonka en kaalaama .
Kala mo dañi belaa weltoo .
Kala mo janngaani zemngal neene mum , sikke alaa , 6amtotaako .
Kala mo jogii humpito seeda e daartol baleeebe e nder leydi amerik , so tawii buraani tiidde gonngol , gite mum joogat gonndi hayso ko seeda yaa jogoro jam , barak Oboma yaa jogoro jam , yoo alla feewnane , buubnanmaa laamu ngu , woto gano dan sago mum e maada ko puddudaa ko yoo alla saran en dum e aduna hee fof
Kala mo ndee winndannde haaƴii hakkille mum ; o
Kala mo pele mum kuuɓi , ñaamɗe ngasi , ruttoo e joomi mum !
Kala morlere ɓurnde mawnude mooɓre ɓurata yaawde boyde e jalbude ɗo wonti hoodere ɗo , nguurndam hoodere no Naange men nge ni ina abbo e duuɓi miliyaaruuji 10 .
Kala nde Naange tiimi e hoore beƴ , nguleeki heewa e oon nokku , ceeɗu ara .
Kala nde faarmata dañi ɓoccitaade , o yahat genaale , o juuroo yanaande neene makko omo woya .
Kala nde jaŋde haalaa noon , hakkillaaji men ngadotoo dogde ko e ɗemngal janngirteengal ngal .
Kala nde naange heedti e bannge e tagofeere , bannge tagofeere heddiinde nde wonata ko e jamma .
Kala neɗɗo goɗɗo , yo o won sooninke walla alaa , jaɓɗo loowdi ooɗoo dokimaa ina waawi yantude e fuɗɗuɓe ɓee ,
Kala nokku baɗɗo lamolamongal , so toɓaama ndiyam jookii roŋki waamde to maayo , so ɗam ruuytii faade dow lamɗam heddoto yimɓe ngarana ina lamsindroo , walla nawa toon jawdi mumen ngam mooɗtin'de .
Kala nokku kadi ɗo o darinoo , o udditii ɗoon huunde ko wayno opitaal , duɗal , kallu gudoroŋ , poŋ , walla kam huunde ko wallata e ɓamtaare falnde ndee .
Kala paltoor tuugiiɗo e jeyegol walla baasgol jeyeede he leñol , egga ɓalndu , ɗemngal ine haɗaa .
Kala pawaaɗo kuugal sabu yaɓɓii ngolɗoo laawol sariya ine waawi kadi haɗeede huunde e hakkeeji mum fof to bannge ɓiyleydaagu , siwil e galle fotde duuɓi joy walla ko ɓuri ɗum , fawaade e kuulal 36 dabi kuuge .
Kala tawtoraaɗo , hollirii ganndal mum .
Kala tawtoranooɓe jaltugol tonngooɗe gadane jaynde men FOOYRE ƁAMTAARE ina ciftora ɗiin ɗereeji bellelli puɗɗoriiɗi natal ŋaro , leɗɗe cukkondiraaɗe haa nanndi e duɗal jayngol .
Kala to nanɗen [ mbellema ] neema , e ɓamtaare , woɗɗi ɓatti k'en yahooɓee .
Kala to tolninda , aɗa sooynoo caggal majji ina ranwi haa nanndi e ndoondi .
Kala ñalawma jawtuɗo ndu ɓeydoo toowde , yeeso yaynaango ngo ɓeydoo wirnitaade men , mbiyen lewlewal mawnii haa timma , Ko noon yahrata haa heedta fuɗnaange men , yeeso ngo wona kadi e wirnaade haa ko yiyetee heen ko famɗitoya , so tawi en nattii sooynaade ndu mbiyen lewru dawaani .
Kala ɗo dille mbaɗi doole ina tawa , doole kadi ko kuɓɓam tambi ɗe .
Kala ɗo neɗɗo lemii e taariindi walla neesu ( nature ) so o ndaartindiima no moƴƴi walla o luggiɗiniima heen miijitogol makko , ma o yiy heen walla o tawa heen kaawise walla kaawniiɗe .
Kala ɗo njahru-ɗaa daande ko wootere ko woy heege !
Kalaas !
Kaleen ko addi en ɗoo koo .

Kalfinanooɗo geɗe taariindi e nder laamu
Kalfingol gollodiiɗo baaɗo nii , ndema ngalɗoo kolongal ine waawi udditande diiwaan oo fartaŋŋeeji kesi ;
Kalitannde moolanaande nder weeyo : buɓɓannde haayre
Kalitgol kaɓirɗe nikleyeer maa yaltin cuurki e ƴunndi ( ɓaleeri ndi cuurki leɗɗe , cumu ekn njoɗɗitina he nokku ) haa heewa nder weeyo , palotoondi caafe naange jonɗe .
Kalito bommbo nikleyeer
Kalito bommbo nikleyeer ina waawi addude " higgu nikleyeer " , ummina punndi keewndi haa ɓurti , mbaawndi wirnude naange , ɓuuɓtina leydi duuɓi keewɗi , rontina heegeeji huuɓtodinɗi , sibu , e oon sahaa , remde nguura saɗtat no feewi .
Kalmbaan ( labbo laana )
Kamala Harris yettiima Ghana hanki he fuɗɗoode njillu makko Afrik .
Kamaruun , to kawgel joofnirgel ngel waɗata to , hono to Karaŋ Ngenndiije Afrik
Kamaruunaajo dilloowo he naatnaattondiral uujɓe wonɓe wuro Esfaksa to Tuunus , won ko haali nder geece renndo .
Kamiyoŋ gumminooɗo Mali na rimndi bagaas haa teddi oo , yaniri ko bannge nano .
Kammu ( atmosphère )
Kammu ( atmosphère ) leydi heɓi mbaadi mum bulɗundi ndi ko e lewndu ( lumière ) naange , annoore walla lewndu naange koko ranwi tal , endu soomi denndaangal gommbule ( couleurs ) ɗe gite men mbaawi yiide , so oɗon teskitii tim-timol ko mbaadiiji lewndu keewɗi mbertaa ɗoon , ɗeɓi waadi ko no taggitde lewndu nih .
Kammu Merkiir koko ñoortii ko ɓooyi , waɗi noon ko pooɗal mayre doolnaani yanti heen nguleeki keewki doole e dow mayre , ko heddii ko keneeli naange njokkiti , kedde kammu ina woodi e dow mayre kono ñiiɓaani .
Kammu ko henndu fawiindu e dow leydi huuri ndi haa ndi hawri , ina wayno ko maayo henndu ngonɗen , etee ko e luggere mum koɗɗen , no liingu wuurdi e ndiyam nih , neɗɗo ne e kulle njoorndi noon nguurdi e ndeer henndu so wonaano kammu alaa ko waawata tabitde e dow leydi to bannge nguurndam .
Kammu ko pece joy pawondirɗe
Kammuuji ɗi ina ceerti sanne , ɓeto henndu yoorndu e leydi waɗi ko fotde 78 , 08% diajot ( diazote ) 20 , 95% Oksijen , e geɗe goɗɗe ɗe keewaani , kammu Mars noon 95 , 32% e mum ko cumaandu ( Dioxyde de carbone ) , kammu ndu ina hoyi tee fofotaako .
Kampaañ woote ɗee jogori worteede ko ñalnde Mawnde 24 lewru nduu , mbar maa hakkillaaji kuccan haŋkadi hare karte jogornde hurmude ñalnde 26 ndee walla ?
Kamɓe feewnuɓe ɗum ɓee , ɓe mbiyi ko heen ɓe ngoni jooni duuɓi keewɗi .
Kamɓe fof ko nawaa Kaasamaas .
Kamɓe fof so wonaa RTS ( rajo e tele ) mo leydi Senegaal , heddiiɓe ɓee kaɗaama naatde .
Kamɓe fof ɓe ndewatnoo ko sanamuuji joy ɓurɗi anndeede e oon saanga , ɗiin ngoni garooji ɗoo ɗi : waddu , sawaa-u , Yaaguuta , yaaguuga e Nasra .
Kamɓe hooreeɓe leydi Senegaal hiiɗɓe ɓee , ɓe teeŋtinii noddaandu maɓɓe fayde he sukaaɓe ɓe .
Kamɓe hooreeɓe leydi hiiɗɓe ɓee ɓe noddii Senegaalnaaɓe , teeŋti noon e sukaaɓe ɓee nde ndartinta seppooji ɗi , kadi dawriyankooɓe ɓee yoo nootitoo he kaaldigal ngenniyeewal ngal , kono ɓe mbiy ɓe kaaldii kadi e hooreejo leydi o , Makki Sal , nde waɗata feere mbele suɓngooji ene mbaɗa ko ɓuri yaawde e yaaccaade , e nde noddata he yeewtere yaajnaande ngam beldital e kawrital leydi ndi .
Kamɓe winndunooɓe Wullaango 19 , aɓe na njahraa gooto gooto : yo Alla yurmo ɓe , yaafoo ɓe .
Kamɓe ɓeen waɗboniyankooɓe , Salek Wuldu Seek , e Muhammadu Wuldu Chbih , fof ko ñaawanooɓe warngo .
Kamɓe ɓeeɗoo doktoreeɓe ( kippu doktoor Martinod ) ɓe cafririi hono nii 13 ñawɗo haa celli ɗeɗew , hakkunde 2009 e 2017 .
Kamɓe ɗiɗo kala ɓe mbeltii .
Kanada , potka ƴeeŋtude ( woppeede ) hedde 2024 .
Kanel Joop e Usmaan Gannge njooɗnii , mbelnii .
Kanhanɓe Moodi Nalla en kadi ummii ko e safalɓe Lemtuuna en .
Kankadi fof hebletee ko gila neɗɗo ine woni galle cuuɗi mum en , so weetii ine ɗannoo .
Kanko " 5G " oo so o arii , maa on njiy antenaaji mbayloo seeɗa , tawa njokkondirta tan ko e kaɓirɗe ceŋiiɗe .
Kanko Aali Yero Joop , o jibinaa ko e hitaande 1884 to Fanay , o janngi Quraana ko e Ceerno mawɗo ina wiyee Alfaa Muusaa Sih , ɗoon e nokku hee .
Kanko Baaba Maal nde o ƴefti konngol nde adorii ko salminde renndo ngo gila e worɓe haa e rewɓe ; o yetti kadi Seriif Seek Umar Aydara kono e nder haala makko o teeŋtinii jam ; yo Allah addu jam e aduna o haa teeŋti noon e Senegaal sabu jam maa dañee nde jamaa juulee .
Kanko Doktoor Usmaan Jaawo , o woytiima waasde taweede Welingaranaaɓe he nokkuuji leydi ndii ɗo peeje ƴettetee ɗo .
Kanko Kyélem de Tembela , o haaliino gila he lewru Oktoobar , o wiyi " Burkina maa yuurnito jotondiral mum e leydi Riisi " , o teeŋtini " Maa min eto sarde jotondire amen feewde e leyɗe keewɗe , haa min njiyta jotondire naftooje ledi amen Burkina .
Kanko Muhammed Abdallaahi o sankii ko ñalnde aset 4 feebariyee 2023 .
Kanko Nuuhu ko o ɓiy Laamaka , ɓiyum Muta-wassila , ɓiy Annabi Idiriisa ( ɓe jam e kisal ngoni e mum en ( JKM ) .
Kanko Svante Pääbo golle makko kuccunoo ko yiɗde anndude hol ko ndon-ɗen e ɓeen njaatiraaɓe majjuɓe .
Kanko Tuubin , no o wayi bewde e hulɓinaade nii fof , ellee ko ndeen Annabi Nuuhu ( JKM ) ɓeydii suusde reedu e waawde waajaade , haɗaani noon , hay e nder laamu Tuubiin , kala nde ɓe nani Nuuhu ( JKM ) ina waajoo , e kala birtiiɗo mo omo waajoo , ƴetta peɗeeli juuɗe mum sukka e gudde noppi mum ngam hoto nande ko o haalata koo , hono no Alla siforii ɗum e Ɓuraana nii .
Kanko annabi Ayyuuba , nde ɓe ngoɗɗitinaa wuro ngo ɓe ngonnoo ngoo , baasal kadi ɓeydii heƴde e maɓɓe , ngam annabi Ayuuba heyɗii no feewi caggal ɗuum , kanko Rahmata o waɗti ko taƴde e leeɓi sukundu makko , o yeeya ɗum , ko heen ɓe ndañata ko ɓe ñaami , ndeke annabi Ayyuuba tinaani ko o waɗata koo haa waɗi dumunna gooto annabi Ayyuuba noddi Rahmata , o wiyi ɗum : aan kam , hol to keɓ-ɗaa ko aɗa ñamnina en ?
Kanko dewbo antarporonoor o o wiy o ɓooyi yiɗde kala ko fayti he ndefu , kadi o ɓooyi yiɗde anndude holno confitiir en e ko way noon feewnirtee .
Kanko diisnorɗo jaagorɗo o , o eeriima Senegaalnaaɓe e yoo njeynu ko’e mum en innde hesere nde , ɗuum woni ɓe njaɓa rewde nde .
Kanko e Sammba Ganndega , mo o yaltidi UGOVAF , o naatdi e goomu muritaninaaɓe ( Njawaar Saar , Jeeri Sidibe , Dey wul Siidi Baaba ) , ɓe cosi , e 1950 " Entente Mauritanienne " , ɓe ngardini ɗum Horma wum Baabana .
Kanko e denɗiiko , mawniiko Aali Saajel Kiiɗe , ɓe ɗannii ɗanngal juutngal ngam janngoyde Fiqhu , Hadiis e celluka .
Kanko e sappo-e-ɗiɗo yahdiiɓe makko pellidaa tawi aɓe ngoni e batu .
Kanko e wondiiɓe makko e ɓe na e yamiroore Farayse
Kanko fof e haweede laabi tati deggondirɗi , Nikki Haley ene jokki siforaade pooɗadiral mum he Trump , wonde mahgol naayaare ( fooɗtude yimɓe naayoroo bannge makko ) he dow laawol makko fayde pirimeeruuji Karolin Worgo jogorɗi waɗde ñalnde 24 Colte .
Kanko fof e heewnoode duuɓi e wonde mawɗo karciiji konunkooɓe , jahru fannu karallaagal otooji daɗɗo , haɗaani mo , nde jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije ari e leydi hee , sooynaade nafoore wonde heen ndee e ittande nde geɗal timmungal e nder nguurndam makko .
Kanko hooreejo leydi oo , o heɓtinii ko kanko tigi wonnoo sibu o wiyi " ɗum waɗnoo ko gila 2006 , miɗo sikki .
Kanko laamiɗo Fulɓe Lagos , Muhammad Bammbaaɗo , o siftinii wonnde , he nder Aduna hee , ma won ujunaaje jeegom ( 6000 ) ɗemngal ene haale heen , kono keewɗe e majje ngoni ko he maayde e majjude .
Kanko lietnaa Houmaire o siimtanii Guwerneer Muritani to Ndar no geɗe ɗee kala njahri nii , haa teeŋti no Wullum wardaa nii , o ɗaɓɓi e mum nde rokkata wulaad Biri en warɓe Wullum ɓee njeenaari ndii , ko jiidaa e rokkude ɗum en kaɓirɗe tawaaɗe e Wullum ɗee , hono ko fodonanoo kala nannguɗo Wullum nii .
Kanko maabo oo noon e ko haalaa , ko Aamadu Hampaate Bah en mbiyi , ko kanko woni cubballo .
Kanko mawɗo fedde Mars One o riiwtii kulhuli wiɗtiyankooɓe MIT , sabu e wiyde makko ɓe keɓindaaki denndaangal geɗe jowitiiɗe e yuɓɓannde fedde nde ngam wuurnude yimɓe to Mbaañ .
Kanko noon , doktoor makko to wiyiino mo wonde " o seerti hankadi e giɗli e golle " , kono , Eric wiyi " o juumii " .
Kanko oo suka debbo , o jibinaa ko Kaliforni tawi jumma makko ina dogi Eriteree ina mooloyii to Dental dowlaaji Amerik hedde 1980 .
Kanndidaa PUR , Aliw Mammadu Jah , fodanii Welingara ma o waɗɗum oogirde faggudu .
Kantoŋ Dimat-Worgo waɗtaa he kantoŋ Foos Galojina to Waalo .
Kapiteen Ibarahima Tarawele hunii ko toppitaade tan gollanaade geɗe cabborɗe , ɗiɗmel ngel ko yuɓɓinde suɓngo he hitaande 2021 , tataɓel ko ɗoftaade kala ko nanondiranoo gila he ndernderi haa he boowal leydi ndii .
Kapiteen Ibrahim Tarawele ardiima loppito laamu ñalnde 30 settambar 2022 , o wuurii loppite ɗiɗi ko adii nder lebbi jeetati .
Kapiteen Tarawele fuɗɗorii konuyaagal ko he golwole hakkunde maɓɓe e seɓɓitiiɓe to Mali .
Kara mulle e jeejeeli
Karallaagal kesal : wasiyaama yo waɗte fannu janngeteeɗe he nder tolno DKJ .
Karallaagal kesal ina walliti annduɓe weeyo hannde e humpitaade tago koode ( naangeeji ) , no ɗe tagortoo haa ɗe mboya , hol ko rewi e majje haa yuɓɓa waya no naange e seto mum nih .
Karallaagal kesal to bannge safrude ñabbuuli addanii aadee waawde riiwtude won e rafiiji donateeɗi , kono ɗuum heewno waɗeede ko gila ɓiɗɗo ina woni e reedu , so tawii safrooɓe njiɗi humptaade rafiiji donaaɗi keborɗi heɓde neɗɗo e nguurndam mum , ɓe keewi ko ittude e dihal giƴiraaɗo caawɗo cukalel ngel , ɓe mbiɗta e majjam rafiiji donaaɗi keborɗi tampinoyde ngel , ɓe cakkanaɗi feere safaara , ɗuum wayata ko no yuwtude gi 'al nih , cukalel ngel daɗndee ɗiin rafiiji kaaɗdi nguurndam mum .
Karallaagal waɗii taaɓal kadi : Eɗen nganndi ɓooyaani ko karallaagal waɗti huutoreede he nder fuku bal , ko nde ko wiyetee VAR koo ( Video Assistant Referees he Engele ) , hono " ballitorogol wideyoo nder ñaawoore " , naati heen ndee tan , hedde 2018 .
Karamoko am waɗdii e ngay
Karamokoo , karamokooy am
Karlet mo laamu nguu waɗi oo e nanondiral e luulndo juɓɓingol kaaldigal , hollirii leefgol dowla oo sabu mum jebbilanaade " hinnde " e waasde teskaade muuyaaɗe keewal ɓesngu ɗum ko aada mo manaani dowla etee woɗɓe ina mbaawi ɗum ñemmbude .
Kartal Ecopi e diiwanuuji mum
Kartal Fuuta Tooro .
Kartal Haut Karabackh
Kartal kollitoowal boli njulaagu ɓaleeɓe
Kartal pulfule fulɓe
Kartal teskorgal e okteeji maggal .
Kartal ɓurngal toowde limoore fo ɓuri heewde looɗe ƴoogooje , so tawii neɗɗo yiɗi waɗde heen ko jimi walla defte haa e nate , ɗeen geɗe kala mooftirtee toon ko mbaadi ( 0 walla 1 ) sabu ordinateer faamataa ɗum ko haala walla natal walla goɗɗum , o anndi tan ko o resndaama kaɓɓe limoore 0 e 1 .

Kasoo .
Kasooji en uddaama .
Kataar leydi njuɓɓinoori ɓurndi famɗude : Njaajeendi wertallo Kataar ko 11 586 km2 fat ( Muritani ine sowoo ndi laabi capanɗe jeenay ) .
Katantaagal mballondiren nanondiren .
Katante , a jaaraama ngati a haalii goonga .
Katante leñol wi'i : ko wujaa so neyɓii wi'etaake haanaani kadi sayku umaar bah wi'en naalaŋkaagu wa'i e leñol ko no laalo wa'i e lacciri so leñol saƴƴii laalndortee ko naalaŋkaagal ; Ɗuum noon oto en pamɗin naalaŋkaagu ko kañum tammbii pinal eɗen miijoo ɗoo mawɗo naalaŋkooɓe hono Baaba baydi korsuɗo aysata sammba buubu yaasin wad
Kawgel Afrik Baŋ 2010 waawatano welde tawi Nelson Manndelaa tawaaka !
Kawgel Hapa e ɗemɗe ngenndiije
Kawgel daartiyankeewel wonande Afrik .
Kawgel dabbunde : Kawgel ngel yuɓɓinaa ko he lewru bowte : goo ko ɗum waɗa , sibu kawgel ngel yuɓɓintenoo tan ko he naatirɗe ceeɗu .
Kawgel ngel fuɗɗiima waɗeede gila rawane ( 2022 ) tawa jey sabaabu oo ko yiɗde hirjinde sukaaɓe Senegaalnaaɓe he taragol defte , kadi e ƴellitde coñce .
Kawgel ngel woppaani hay gooto e sukaaɓe ɓee .
Kawgel wallifiyankooɓe Coñce Senegaal , suɓaaɓe ɓee nganndaama .
Kawgel winndere fuku ena wayi no hurmii hannde to Afrik Bŋ Worgo caggal nde fedde huufnde geɗe fuku ( Fifa ) yuɓɓini kuraaje kawre ɗee .
Kawral Ngalluure
Kawren he ko ndi wonaa koo : ndi wonaa diineyankeeri , ndi wonaa gollal jokkere-enɗam , ndi wonaa fiɓnde riiwtude keeri majjere , ñawu , laam-ndoolaagu , ndi wonaa yaajtinaare Geno , ndi wonaa laynol laabi ñaawoore ; jaɓde laawol gootol , ko aldaa e fiɓre saloyaade baɗtine ɗee , wonde baɗal ɗoo ngal ko ngal tumaranke e taƴoowo , ko ngal julanke e joom-laaɗe , ngal ndeereeru e ndool-ndoolaagu , diiñingal e mbeelu mbon-wonu nguu neesu ngu , e won sahaa e daartol mum , yenanaa ko potngu yaajtinde e winndere hee fof kihondiral paggorɗe mum luurduɗe .
Kawtal Jaŋnggooɓe Pulaar Fulfulde woownii-en golle paayodinɗe gila hannde araani .
Kawtal Jaŋngooɓe Pulaar Fulfulde ena noddi yeewtere mawnde to nokku Mantu ( Farayse ) ñalnde Hoore-Biir 24 Dujal 2008 sahnga w20 h30 .
Kawtal janngooba pulaar fulfulde a winndere he .
Kawtal jaŋngooɓe Pulaar Fulfulde ena yuɓɓina ñalɗi tati mawɗi desanaaɗi pinal fulɓe .
Kawtal mawngal ena jogori wadde ñannde 30 lewru Korse faayi 1 er lewru Morso .
Kawtal ngal waɗii jeewte 15 .
Kayhayɗi , rewɓe sappo keblaama he ñootol
Kayhayɗi ñalnde 26/11/1982
Kayis Sayed holliti miijo ngoo ko he batu Diiso Kisal ngenndiwal .
Kayis Seyid , jibinaa ko 22 Colte ( feebariyee ) 1958 nder wuro Tunis .
Kayndo .
Kañje ɓetirɗe ɗee , ɗe tuuginoo ko e geɗe tago .
Kaŋko Hamuudi o innii e tele Al-Jazeera wonnde laamu kesu nguu fawaaki e doosɗe , wadde ngu jogaani fotde ardaade leydi ndii .
Kaŋko e jannginooɓe rewɓe e worɓe eɓe njuurnoo siwooji ɗi min njardata ɗii .
Kaŋko fof e jibineede e mawnude e galle quraana , galle annduɓe
Kaŋko laamɗo Afrik Bŋ Rewo , Taboo Mbeki o hollitii wonnude-mo e Sarkosii e oo fannu keso sabu jeyaa e sikke makko ko e ittude njiimaandi Farayse e dow leyɗeele Afrik .
Kaɓagol baɗe paltoor ine waɗanaa ñalawma ngenndiijo .
Kaɓdiiɗo men ko oya !
Kaɓee e makko , njaltinee mo so o jaanndiima
Kaɓirgal nikleyeer ko bommbo pattam-semmbiijo baawɗo lottireede to woɗɗi no feewi .
Kaɓirgel ina e baagal he wiɗtata ko baɗte keneeli naange e kammu Mars , mbela ko ɗiin keneeli lohni kammu o walla ?
Kaɓirɗe : alluwal , waata , laɓi , meselal , tufirdi , ɓaatane , gawde , lakunte , cekkiri , cawgu , muul , loocol muul , karlemme ( naafige ) , buyaade , kafa , naakaade , kelloori .
Kaɓirɗe : jammbere lawlawre , serem , sawta
Kaɓirɗe bawɗe sompeede e leydi e oon sifaa kiisetee ko njantii e jeyi laamu .
Kaɓirɗe nguurndiwal e wayliwal
Kaɓirɗe nikleyeer ina caɗi feewnude , sibu na ɗaɓɓi oogirɗe caɗtuɗe heɓde , kono kaɓirɗe nguurndiwal e wayliwal ina mbaawi , kañum en , feewnireede ko weeɓi .
Kaɗooje : diiwe ɗe pulfule mum en toɗɗaaka ina mbaawi jaggirde ɗum ko jinngere , caloo ko hawraa koo .
Kaɗooje : ɓayri ko doosɗe mahaaɗe , ɗum alaa tawo faggo binndanɗe maa defte tuugneteeɗe ( celluka e caggitorɗe ) baawɗe huutoreede jooni-jooni .
Kaɗooje goɗɗe : nde tawnoo noon nehaande dawrugol , pinal e faggudu dente Fulɓe woodaani , ndeke holi fulfulde suɓeteende , holi jelooɗe tesketeeɗe ( keewal haalooɓe , coftal mum en , goodal binndanɗe tuugneteeɗe , tolno jaŋde , tolno yuɓɓo mbinndiin , wonde hakkunde , ekn .
Kebloowo oo waawii famminde rewɓe tawtoraaɓe heblo ngoo ɗeeɗoo toɓɓe
Kedde ruulde nde roɓindaa yerwaa woni tagopeeje ( ɗaŋe ) ɗe : Merkir ( ɗiiña ) , Jaayre ( raam ) , Leydi ( ngaawe ) , Mars ( mbaañ ) , Jupiter ( rojju ) , Saturne ( fommo ) , Nupton ( paamte ) e lebbi muumen .
Keddiiɗo oo ko boneejo baɗɗo pate daneeje .
Keedo ina jogii ñaawooje baɗɗiiɗe huurde , ɗeen ngoni : 1 .
Keeferal ina fiyi ceŋi kono pellitɗo aanaani
Keeri Damga : To bannge Muritani , Damga tuggi ko e Saŋe Loobaali to fuɗnaange e to Siiwre to bannge hirnaange .
Keeri Dimat : Diiwan Dimat tuggi ko e caaɗngol Duyee haa jumaa Dagana .
Keeri Halayɓe : To bannge Muritani , Halayɓe tuggi ko Ganki Baaba Duunde walla Ganki Jeeri haa Njorol ;
Keeri Hebbiyaaɓe : Tesko-ɗen ooɗoo diiwaan Hebbiyaaɓe ɓuri famɗude e diiwanuuji Fuuta Tooro fof .
Keeri Laaw : To bannge Muritani , Laaw tuggi ko e Abdalla Jeeri haa Wabbunde sara Wocci .
Keeri Ngenaar ko nii ciforii : To Bannge Muritani , Diiwaan Ngenaar tuggi bannge fuɗnaange ko " Yuman Yire " , ari haa e Jowol rewo , haaɗi ɗoon .
Keeri Tooro : To bannge Muritani , Tooro tuggi ko Ŋoral Gidaala haa Ŋawle rewo ; To bannge Senegaal daande maayo , ko tuggude e Paate Galo haa Duwee ; To bannge Senegaal Jeeri worgo , tuggi ko e wuro Doɗel .
Keeri diiwanuuji ɗii ko nii lelorii
Keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab garngol e duumaade e leydi hee , ɗeɓi wayde ko no ardinde ƴellitaare neɗɗaagal arab e dow mbaadi leƴƴi keddiiɗi ɗii , jeyaaɗi kam enne e Ngenndi Muritani .
Keew-dontiwal ko keewal donte goodɗe he nder kala ko wuuri .
Keew-guurɗiwal keeringal sifotoo kañum ko ciiri nguurndam .
Keew-guurɗiwal yuɓɓo satowal sifotoo ko keewal juɓɓe , mbaadi mum en , walla ciiri tagooje guurɗe heen .
Keewal mon ena tijjaa , keewal men , onon , enen fulɓe !
Keewam ciiri nguurndam
Keeweendi yimɓe mbiyata koode ko ina pamɗi , ko ganndal ari jooni ko holliri won'de ko ngoɗɗeeki koode ɗe tan addani ɗe famɗude e jiyɗe men kono ko ɓuri heen heewde ɓuri naange mawnude laabi ujunnaaje !
Keewɗeɗaagu winndere ndee waawaa wonde so wonaa ɗemɗe neeniije ɗee toppitee , ndaranee , kaɓanee sabu ko kañje ngoni tambiiɗe pine , gannde , ko kañje ngoni kadi yaakaare hannde .
Keletine kaaƴe ( astroïdes ) : Keletine kaaƴe kayhaytooje hakkunde Mbaañ e Rojju ina ngabboo e milyaaruuji jonɗi
Keletine kaaƴe kayhaytooje e weeyo , wiyaa ko kedde kaaƴe mooɓondirnooɗe haa ngonti leydi , lewru e denndaangal ɗaŋe gonɗe e setonaange , ɗeen kedde ina tawee hakkunde Mbaañ ( Mars ) e Rojju ( Jupiter ) ɗe mbaɗi ɗoon ko paftol jaajngol eɗe ndeggondiri , maa ɗe ngon ujunnaaje jonɗe , mawnugol majje alaa ɗo darii , won heen ko tokoose ina tomoo e junngo goɗɗe ɗe ko mawɗe haa tolni e kiloometruuji ujunere tekkeendi .
Kelle Allah naamndetaake so ine mbeli !
Kelle jirwuɗe kollirii weltaare poolgu Aali .
Kellifuya tan .
Kelme tokaraaje , ko kelme nannduɗe gowlaali gooti , maa nannduɗe binndol , kono ceertuɗe maanaaje .
Kelmeendi ina jeyaa he ko ɓuri rummbude e seertude .
Keloori ( concasseur ) : ko masiŋ keltoowo kaaƴe mawɗe ɗe haa pamɗita tolno e 80 mm so mawni , leppi-nawooji ( transporteurs à bandes ) keɓɓoo kaaƴe ɗe nawa to caali iirtundiral , kiin caali ko eddaaji ɗiɗe kaaje kawrata toon , hollalde e wujoori , ala e sago ɗe ngiirtondiree haa ɗe mbaawa naan-naatondirde waɗee joowre les caali ki .
Ken moxo baane ya ni , xaranra ke do xaranŋundidingiron su gan xawa ñiini kapen daaxa do surumaadu beenu ga marandaano , kiitaano , xibaarikinnaano kun do soro su ga xidimene jamaanen gollen da , do xannun tuwaaxunu , wulliyu do jamankafon gollu , i ga katono jokkindenlenmaaxun tapa jamaanen renmun naxa , i kun beenu ga ni golliñanlenmo , a do i na kato toorini moxosiri .
Keneeli naange e ciiñsiiñƴe magge jawsuɗe , kaaƴe kayhaytooje e weeyo tawa ndogata ko e njaaweeki kulɓiniiki , ɗuum fo haɗaani aadee neldude baage diwooje e deegooje to ɗaŋe goɗɗuɗe ,
Kerooje ina peccoo e pecce ɗiɗi : feccere conngi ( jimɗi waañooɓe ) e feccere yimoore dawaaɗi raddo .
Kesum kadi ɗum meeɗaa yiyeede , ko woote waɗteede laawol tataɓol .
Kesɗitine ɗe jaaɓdaani
Kewkewe jolnooɗe he nder Muritani e kitaale 89 wemjinaani mo , sabu kanko fof e darodaade e leƴƴi ɓaleeɓe ngam haɓtaade leñamleñaagu ɓurniingu dowla Muritani , o seeraani e reentinde ngenndiyankooɓe ɓaleeɓe nde mbaasata wiyde ina kuutoroo leñamleñaagu ngam haɓtaade ngu dowla nguu .
Kewu fof ngu jooftinaaka e senegaal seŋaaki e yiiloo-banngoo hitaande aduna nde laamu senegaal dawantaaɗo ɗuum dawol laamuwol – dawol accinoowol ɗum golle denndaaɗe renndo ngo .
Kewu koolol ngol hurmbitaa ko kikiiɗe alkamisa 19 ndee e yamiroore nulaaɗo Jaagorgol Pinal e Ñeenal biyeteeɗo Mohammed Adnaan wul Beyruuk .
Kewu nguu rokkaama faayiida timmuɗo .
Kewu nguu waɗaa ko e Nuwaasot , to Faawru Jaatiiji Ngenndi e nder Deftordu Ngenndiiru ( Bibliothèque Nationale ) e ballondiral e kalifu Pinal e Ñeeñe , Goomu UNESCO e Fedde Muritani daraniinde muulgol e caaktugol ngam laaɓtinde darnde e nafoore deftere e ɓamtugol pinal aadee .
Kewuuji galle , jeewte keeriiɗe , caɗeele pooye , ekn wonti hannde geɗe bejeteeɗe e laylayti renndo .
Keñiiɗo ko tampuɗo heɓataa ko yiɗi kala ɗo naati heppan gandal heppantaake .
Keño-ɗen njiiloyo-ɗen debbo goɗɗo joodɗo ndokken nooro oo .
Kibaaru iwruɗo Pari hollitii wonndema Seneral Arafan Kamara , miniteeriijo toowɗo leydi ndin , laatinooɗo Ministre de la Défense ( jaagoraaɗo ndeenaaku leydi ) fuɗɗude e lewru maarasi 2007 haa e maayuhu nden hitaande ( e nder guwernamaa Lansana Kuyaate on ) faatike hannde saare Pari , leydi Faransi ka o wonnoo e nyawndaade .
Kiintal ko daartol tolno gannde e ko fay arde , e tuugnaade e ko heɓaa ɗiggineede e ganndal , e ko lelnaa dañanaaka tuugnorgal laaɓtungal , so en njiɗii mbiyen ko kiintal ñiklata ganndal haa waawa yottaade won e nokku , wadde ko kanngla woni ɗowirgal yimɓe feewde ko hesɗi e ndeer gannde kala .
Kiintal noon ɓuri heewde ko e binndol , walla waɗee lefol ina yeeɓee , ko geɗe kaawniiɗe jaltuɗe aada keewi heen waɗeede ngam fooɗtude yimɓe e yeeɓde walla janngude , kono wonaa huunde ferindaande alaa , kiintoowo heewi tuugnaade ko e ko fanndinaa e ganndal , belloo ko woni e wiɗteede , ɓeyda heen geɗe jirwinooje haa mbaawa fooɗtude janngooɓe maa yeeɓooɓe no haanirta nih .
Kiintal walla ganndal kiintanagl ( science fiction )

Ko cagataagal mawngal aaɓni jaltingol ndee tonngode 200 Fooyre Ɓamtaare .
Ko caggal njeñtudi peeje cifaaɗe e nder kuulal 63 gonngal dow ngal e tayre adiinde ɗum , haakem ina waawi salaade ɗaɓɓaande ndee , winnda ɗum feewde e ɗaɓɓunooɗo oo walla noon saakta ɗaɓɓande ndee mbele kala jogiiɗo heen hakke , hakke mum ina yaltinee .
Ko caggal ɗiiɗoo wasiyaaji sappo , hooreejo FONADH , hono Saar Mammadu ƴetti konngol ngam yettude denndaangal tawtoraaɓe nduuɗoo gollordu e gollidiiɓe wallondirɓe e Fonadh haa ɗii ñalɗi mbaawi yuɓɓineede , ko wayi no UE , PNUD , OXFAM intermoon/Coopération espagnole , haa teeŋti noon kadi o wiyi e Gardiiɗo OXFAM ɗoo e Muritani , hono Sokna Mariyam Baro , sabu gollondiral ngal alaa happu piɓdangal e Fonadh .

Ko duuɓi capanɗe joy njahru-ɗaa , ko cagataagal nganndira-ɗaa .
Ko e Jolal hitaande 2010 ngal ɓadii lewru ina wiyee Anselaad , nduun ko wooturu e lebbi Galliire .
Ko e Rosetta woni baagal gadingal nuldeede e laaciije , sibu ko way noon meeɗaa waɗeede , faandaare annduɓe ko wiɗtude ko woni e koode laaci , ina annda kam ko ɗe moofti ko yiƴƴi ko e tagagol Leydi walla seto naange , ɗuum noon son gal wiɗtii ko woni hee ko maa en keɓ humpitoo mbaadi geɗe mahɗe Leydi , tagopeeje hay aawdi nguurndam ina waawi yiiteede heen .

Ko e fotde geɗe 92 Geno tagi tagoore ndee , ko ɗee ngoni geɗe tago ( Natural elements ) .
Ko e hitaande 1968 fellitaa won'de doŋe ɗe ko kiɓɓe ngonnoo , ɗo ɗi ceertata ɗo ko mboorkaaji pusata ina mberloo loope gulɗe boowal , ɗo doŋe kawrititta ɗo maaje egga , doŋe ɗee taggoo , heen laral roondoo nder leydi , goɗngal ngal faya dow , ko e ɗiin nokkuuji kaaƴe toowɗe puɗata hono Himalaya to Enndo , addi ndeen haayre ko pelɓondiral hakkunde doŋre Enndo e Asi , Enndo seŋtii ko e Afrik ko ɓooyi yaaɓani Asi , nde yottii lare leydi ɗe ngoni e sortaade faade dow , ko ɗuum woni kaaƴe nanaton ɗe .
Ko e hitaande 1984 , tawi omo yahra e duuɓi 48 , Manndelaa ina yahra e 66 hitaande , ɓe ndañi yiytondirde caggal duuɓi 21 goɗɗondiral .
Ko e hitaande 1995 o takkaa war-lenâagu ( genocide ) e bonanndeeji wolde ɗi ɓe mbaɗi Korwasiy e Bosniy kaŋko e wonndiiɓe makko e oon sahaa e gardogol Radco Mladic .

Ko ene wona hikka duuɓi 70 , gila nde wallifannde UNESCO arawannde ndee yalti , binndannɗe goɗɗe keewɗe e defte keewɗe mbinndaama he ko yowitii he toɓɓere nde ; batuuji keewɗi njooɗiima , kadi nanondire keewɗe e wasiyaaji keewɗi mbaɗaama heen ; jarribooji keewɗi kam e annduɓe fanniiɓe tabitinii ɓural mawngal gonngal e huwtoraade ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( neenewiije ) nokkuure ndee ngam jannginde ( nehde ) renndo mum en .

Ko feewti e toɓɓere adiinde ndee , Ceerno Muusaa Mammadu tonnganii batu nguu faayiida ñalɗi ummoraade diiwanuuji haa ñalɗi baɗɗi to laamorgo leydi , o hollittii darnde jooɗaninooɓe pelle pine ɗee , faayiida gonɗo e naattingol ɗemɗe ɗee he tippudi jaŋde e nafoore wonnde e fuɗɗoraade janngude kala cukalel ɗemngal mum neeniwal , hay sinno yimɓe fof ina kawri e laawɗingol ɗemɗe ɗee , ina gasa won taaɓannde dañaa .
Ko feewti e toɓɓere ɗimmere , goomu yimɓe njeeɗiɗo suɓaama ngam tafde yiilirde , nde ɓe ngarti , yimɓe fof kawri e suɓngo maɓɓe , batu ngu rewii laawol , waɗaani luure , waɗaani duko , yiilirde nde ko nii lelorii
Ko feewti e ɓiyleydaagu , hol ko woni ɓiyleydi ?
Ko firo Dowla ɗaɓɓi koo , Daesh woni ko e renndinde ɗum : en njiyii e winndannde men ɓennunde ndee hol ko woni miijo " dowla " o e peeje mum gollorɗe .
Ko firti Interpol ?
Ko firti TNT ?
Ko firti coñce ?
Ko foti teskeede e ɗee geɗe ɗiɗi hono Nokkuuji hurum e Ndesaaje leydi ko nii foti faamreede
Ko foti teskeede koo – tee ko ɗuum heddotoo he daartol – ko kattanɗe neɗɗo oo waawde teeɗananaade leydi mum ko toowi , ko muñal makko kam e waawde mo rewde laawol kellifuya e nehaagu .
Ko fulɓe kaali koo e fowru ina heewi .
Ko fulɓe ummoriiɓe diiwaan Fuuta Tooro oo ciiñcunoo e diiwaan hee e maayirɗe teeminannde XIVɓiire .
Ko ganndal ɓalliwal toppitiingal ko faati he annoore e yiyngo kam e geɗe toɗɗiiɗe caafe jogiiɗe huunde nannduɗe e annoore ( caafe les-boɗewol , dow-wiyolee , bempeƴƴe daɓɓe , dow-hitooji , ustoron ekn ) .
Ko gaylinke gooto ina yettee waan tinndannoomi ngol : Meeɗii wadde sahaa gooto kulle ladde fof mbiyaa yoo ngar ina ndokkee daaɗe , ɗe mbaddi toon idaa ngarɗo fof rokkee daande mum yaha , sakkiti yettaade fof ko ngira ( ngirja ) ba tawi ina heddii daaɗe ɗiɗi mba labii heen wootere ba yalti tan ba hawri e yahre tan nde wiyi ko ndee ndañɗaa ngirja baa wiyi ko ɗiɗi keddino labiimi ndee heddii wootere tan yahre miin kam mi haayti tawde nde maa ka labiiɗo maa heddiinde ndee bon sifaa miin kan mi yaafiima ko ɗuum taki kuulle fof ina njogii daaɗe haa heddii yahre
Ko geɗe ɗiɗe , hidrojen e okisejen ɓuuɓnaa haa ngonti ndeelam mooftaa e paali tiiɗɗi kisnaaɗi ciyam , heen geɗal fo noon loowa ko bannge mum , ndeelam ɗee geɗe ndañotaako so wonaa e ɓuuɓol mawngol , -253°C wonan'de hidrojen e -183°C wonan'de oksijen .
Ko geɗel jibinowel nduun lewndu sañdetee e aawdi leɗɗe ngam rokkudeɗe ndiin mbaadi njalboori , haa yimɓe mbaawa yiirude ɗo ndewi jamma , ndeen fooyre wonaa wulnde , kadi naamndaaki ɓulndi ( générateur électrique ) , wadde kuɓɓam alaa heen geɗal !
Ko gila e nguurdam makko ɓe kuɓɓi Jeeyngol , hannde o maayii kono kam haajooni haɓena mbadda e maggol ngol ñifaani .
Ko go'o e daartol ɗemngal men pulaar naatneede e resorde humpito ɗemɗe winndere wiyeteende CLDR ( Common Locale Data Repository ) nde fedde Unicode hesɗitinta hitaande kala !
Ko golle ngoni cokcirɗe aduna
Ko golle tan mbaawi coktude ndeen wahannde .
Ko gonduɗo heen foti waɗde : Tawaaɗo ene wondi e rafi oo
Ko goomuuji joyi ndarnaa .
Ko goonga , a jaaraama
Ko goonga , caɗeele koɗdigal ɗee mbaawaa tan haaɗtineede e pelɓondiral hakkunde leƴƴi .
Ko goonga , e ñalawma njahraten hannde oo , hakkillaaji ndeeƴtii seeɗa , haa annduɓe mbaɗtii miijaade ɓetde baɗte wolde nikleyeer nder winndere men so kewii .
Ko goonga , geɗe ɗiɗi ine njeyaa hannde e ngoƴaaji aadee en ɓurɗi mawnude .
Ko goonga , junngo gooto ko waawi waɗe , ko ɗiɗi ɗee camorta .
Ko goonga , neɗɗo feewnii laaɗe diwooje , masiŋaaji e kaɓirɗe keewɗe baawɗe wallude mo e nguurndam makko .
Ko goonga , o haɓii e jikkuuji keewɗi ngam waylude ngonka fuutaŋkooɓe haa e leƴƴi koɗdaaɗi ko wayi no kalfaandi , kiiɓal e njeeygu jiyaaɓe ɓaleeɓe teeŋti e wiyeteeɓe heen ko juulɓe , kono njiɗ-ɗen naayoraade ɗoo ko to bannge darnde nde o darii e ƴellitgol diine , jamiroore mum e kaɗe mum .
Ko goonga Biraam waɗii ko fotaano waɗde , kono ɗuum ina famɗi so ƴeewdaama e warngo juulɓe ɓe alaa ko mbaɗi !
Ko goonga Jiɗnaaɓe mon e yimɓe ɓattiiɓe , on ena njogee mon geɗal ndokkeeɓe geɗal maɓɓe haa timma , oɗon poti hollu-deɓe " neehdi , ɗoof taa deɓe e yaŋkinaare Eko nanndi heen .
Ko goonga Pullo fof ko mo men , kono ko maa ndokkondiren hoolaare hakkundeeji men nde mbaawen suusondirde .
Ko goonga Tele " piriwee " addi ɗum ko julaade kaalis , kono , alaa e sago , o waɗtora ɗemɗe kaaleteeɗe e nder leydi ndii , kadi o fotnda ɗe , walla hay sinno o waɗaani eeɓol Amara hakkunde majje , o waɗa no puuyɗo anndirtaa .
Ko goonga e nder leydi njiylotoondi ferde , demokraasi kevtirgol laamu doole wonaa huunde yizaande , kono koko tijjano tan jofi .
Ko goonga en ngostondirii miijooji , en ndenndii humpito e weltaare , kono kadi won ko heddii ko potzen waztude heen hakkillaaji : Veyden laabi ganndondiral mbele azen mbaawa jokkondirde haa vura zoo .
Ko goonga en tinataa birnagol ɗii ciiri fof , sibu jaayɗe kaalataa ko ɓuri heen heewde .
Ko goonga follo wonaa huunde yiɗaande , kono teskaama ɗiiɗoo follooji renndooji leyɗeele ina jahdi heen , ko gulaali e luukaali e kuljinaali e araarayuuji ngam hollitde weltaare mum en .
Ko goonga hiirde ndee waɗi ko ñalnde teddungal Saydu Kan to wuro Pari , kono haɗaani yimɓe nngarii e keewal hay so saal oo heewaani haa ɓitti !
Ko goonga jam woni nafoore men .
Ko goonga leñol mawngol bayngol hono no Fulɓe nii , haysinno ko he nder Senegaal tan , wiyde ene dañana ɗum en fedde wootere renndinnde ɗum en kanum en fof , walla neɗɗo gooto kaaloowo he innde mum en kanum en fof , hono no Lebu en nii , so en ndokkii yeru , wonaa ko waawi laataade .
Ko goonga nde fecciima e ballal laamu nguu rokkunoo jaayɗe keeriiɗe e hitaande 2012 .
Ko goonga ndi mbaadi ɓamde nate meeɗiino waɗeede kono wayaano ni ɓadaade ɗaŋre nde , ɗuum noon ko jaɓɓal mawngal to bannge anndude geɗe cuuɗiiɗe e nder Rojju .
Ko goonga neɗɗo feewnii laaɗe diwooje , masiŋaaji e kaɓirɗe keewɗe baawɗe wallude mo e nguurndam makko .
Ko goonga ni en mbaawaa taƴde won ko wuuri toon , kono e nder maaje kaaɗɗe ɗe leydi ɗe , mboorkaaji ina tawee e nder lugge majje , tawa ɗiin mboorkaaji ina njaltina nguleeki mawki e nder ndiyam he , ɗam ñifataa nguleeki ki sabu doolnude ki , sera ɗiin nokkuuji niɓɓiɗɗi lugiɗɗi kulle ina tawee toon e puɗi ko toon tan mbaawata wuurde , hakke no ɗiin nokkuuji mbay lugiiɗde naange yiyetaake toon , wadde ko e niɓɓere dewus ɗi ngoni .
Ko goonga nii , ɗe mbarataa , ɗe ñawnataa ɓalndu neɗɗo , kono aɗe owna hakkillaaji .
Ko goonga nii silooɓe politigi heewɓe miiji ko hare ɓilotaako hakkunde Alaseri e Maruk sabu enɗam keewɗam ina ɗoon , yeru leƴƴi takkondirɗi e keerol hakkunde leyɗeele ɗiɗi ɗee ( ellee leƴƴi daande maayo Senegaal ) , jiidaani e nafooje goɗɗe keewɗe gonɗe ɗoon ko wayi no gaas e geɗe kuɓɓam ekn .
Ko goonga nii weeɓaani kono waɗ feere haa gooto e maɓɓe fof waɗa e ɓernde mun ko kañum ɓuran maa goɗɗo oo ,
Ko goonga nii weeɓataa , kono so en denndinii peeje men , mbiɗo sikki ma en paw e makko junngo .
Ko goonga noon " jiiryiire ɗiɗi ɗee ine ceerti no feewi , ñise gudde ɓaleeje ɗiɗi ɗee ine ngoɗɗondiri , kono he saraaji wiiwaano majje ine nanndi no feewi " , e wiyde gootal e terɗe Diiso ganndeewo EHT .
Ko goonga noon , " barooɗe " men ɗiɗi mbaaltiima hikka : Senegaal hootii law , Kamaruun hollaani ko tiiɗi .
Ko goonga noon en mbaawaa wiyde en njiyii wuddere ɓaleere ,
Ko goonga noon natal ngal laaɓtiraani noon fof , sabu cuddi
Ko goonga noon nguurndam aadee ina seerti e nguurndam kullon .
Ko goonga noon Ɓeeynirka DDA Amerik juuroriima no eɓɓiranoo nii he dow Mbaañ , ko goonga kadi hay so DDA juurnii toon laaɗe laabi jeenay , ɓe meeɗii ronkude ɗuum he hitaande 1999 .
Ko goonga seernaaɓe men , ene teddi umminde he nootoyaade batuuji haysinno alaa ko leñol ngol jaranaani ɓe , kono so ɓe teddiniraama kadi ɓe pamminaa-ma fayndaare nde , e ɓe mbaawi lomtinde ɓiyɓe walla almuuɓe , sabu hoto en njejjit ene jeyaa e ɓeen almuuɓe , jaayndiyankooɓe , porofesoor en jaaɓihaaɗtirdi e hujjiyankooɓe ( avocat ) tawa kala ko leñol ngol nanondiri so ngartirii e maɓɓe ma ɓe mballu e daranaade ɗum .
Ko goonga suɓaade ɗemngal gootal he
Ko goonga wonnde Afrik ene heewi
Ko goongo , kuugal pawangal e Mali ngal ene muusi e ɓesnguuji ɗii , kono ɗum fotaani bettude Asimi Goyta , caggal nde sukki noppi mum ngam salaade nande ko haaletee koo , wonti paho mo nanataa ko haajaaka .
Ko haawni , ko e oon sahaa , Sitoor Nduur kañum ne firti aadi hakkunde mum e Makki Sal .
Ko hannde , 24/07/12 caggal waktu 12ɓo ñalawma , HAPA e Goomu kalfinanaangu yiilde ballal laamu rokki jaayɗe e lowe internet keeriiɗe , bayyini njeñtudi golle mum .
Ko hannde e beetawe he masiŋ o fuɗɗii nuldude nate laaciire nde , ɗuum hollirii kulhuli won'de masiŋ o yottii e dow laaciire he ko ina ajji woodaani ,
Ko hannde kikiiɗe jinnaaɓe sukaaɓe ɓee kaalata ko pelliti ɗanngal Ndakaaru ngal .
Ko hannde woni lawol 11ɓowol ɓiɓɓe leydi ndii no seppude sabu hollude mettere ɓernde maɓɓe ko faati e alhaali hesɗintingol foftere golle .
Ko hare ndee waɗata koo fof , yimɓe wuro ngoo ko nuɗɗininooɓe
Ko hawrani-mi so fewjaama mi waɗa , ko hawranaani-mi so fewjaama mi wiya mi waɗaani .
Ko haŋki 25 Seeɗto Baaba Maal hurmini doordooro naalaŋkooɓe innitaande Festival Blues duu fleuve .
Ko haɗi kaas o rufde ?
Ko he 1983 o teetti mbaawka laamu he juuɗe Seneral Jean-Baptiste Ouédraogo .
Ko he 2023 o wiyi : " ujjujooji Afirknaaɓe Ɓaleeɓe ko moojobere ƴiiƴiire nder ɗee darorɗe teeminannde 21ɓiire , ɗi fayndaare mum laatii waylude ngonka renndo ɓesngu Tuunus , ngam waɗtude ndi leydi Afrik tan , ubba jeloode mayri leydi Aarabaagal e Lislaam " .
Ko he hitaande 1959 , o yalti ngenndi Gine Bisaawo , o yahi to ngenndi Senegaal , he saare wi’eteende : Mediina Elhajji Aali Caam , o woni ɗoon he juutɗe miñiraaɗo neene makko , neene gootoneene makko , ko ɗoon o fuɗɗii jaŋngude defte ñaawooje diine Lislaam ( Sariya ) he duɗal ceerno Alfaa Ibrahiima Baalnde .
Ko he hitaande 1959 njiimaandi Belge en fuɗɗii faamde wonde ummandere feewtunde e jeytaare woni ko e mawnude , ɓe pelliti noddude denndaangal pelle jogitiiɓe ngoon miijo he batu , so wonaa Lumummbaa ( sabu , e miijo maɓɓe , oon ko ceɓɓitiiɗo ) kono pelle noddanooɗe ɗee kala mbiyi njooɗodtaako e maɓɓe " maa Patrice Lumumba tawtoree !
Ko he laamu Haarun al-Rashiid , ( laamiiɗo duuɓi 23 , tuggude he 786-809 ) dillere ( mouvement ) pirgol gannde he ɗemngal Arab ɓeydii doolnude .
Ko he lappol Artemis 1 wonaa gila 16 jolal 2022 , ñalnde fiisee mum gadano lottaa ñalnde 16 jolal ( noowammbar ) 2022 .
Ko he lewru Juko ( Aout ) 2017 Aamadu felliti ɓeydaade yaajnaade e fanniyankaagal mum , he ndeen hitaande kanko e Magiyanke ŋanaa o , Yero Soh , ɓe puɗɗi waɗdude jeewte he nder tele privée gadano he nder Senegaal o , woni 2STV , he yeewtere wiyeteende " Hayo " .
Ko he lewru saawiyee 2021 dallinannde ndee fellitaa hebbitineede , goomuuji 3 cosaa ngam sarde nde e waɗde jokkondire .
Ko he maayirɗe kitaale 1980 miijannde keew-guurɗiwal wonti ngoƴa mawɗo , nde teskaa , faamaa , ko neɗɗo bonnata e/walla sarata yuɓɓo satooji goodnooɗi .
Ko he maayirɗe lewru feebariyee 2022 , Sih Haamiidu sosi goomu ngam heblanaade mawningol ñalawma oo gorko wirninoo .
Ko he ndee hitaande o fuɗɗii luurdude e heerto kominist en Farayse ( PCF ) .
Ko he ndee hitaande o juuroyii Sheek Ahmadu Bamba tawi ina joñaa to deebaaye Sawt El-Maa ( Daande Weendu ) nder Muritani .
Ko he ndeen yontere o ƴetti sariya firtude diisneteeɓe ngalluuje ( meeriiji ) , jooni ko kanko toɗɗotoo fotooɓe ardaade ngalluuje nder Tuunus .
Ko he nder galle geñgol Ɓuuɓa Ndiyam he nder Labe , kawrital mawngal waɗi hannde Hoorebiir 22 , Morso 2023 , ngam mawninde ciifgol deftere joyaɓere winndaande he nguurndam o toowa ganndaljo , jannginoowo fanniiɗo Alhajji Ibraahiima Kaba Bah .
Ko he ndiin mbaydi Fedde AIDES yuɓɓini heblo " jaayndiyankooɓe renndo " tuggi tati lewru deesaambar 2021 haa 6 lewru mars 2022 .
Ko he nduu ɗoo lewru , ñalnde 11 Korse ( Juin ) 2021 waɗata duuɓi sappo e go’o ko Mammadu Sammba Joop , ɓurnooɗo lollirde Murtuɗo walla Baaba Leñol , hooti saare ngoonga .
Ko he ngal daawal ɗemngal Fulfulde woni hannde oo so en njuurnitiima kaayitol ngol FULCOM sari ngol .
Ko he ñalawma makko battindiiɗo he nder Senegaal , Luswig wiyi , dañi fiildude lefol e Baaba Maal , gaacol udditirgol filma Black Panther ngol .
Ko he ɗe sakket ɗee mbaawɗen limde fedde GOODAL ( Goomu Daraniingu Leñol ) , gollonooɓe hannde ɗemngal Pulaar ko waɗi faayiida he nder leydi Senegaal .
Ko hedde 1485 Purtugeec en idii soodde jiyaaɓe mum en adanɓe to Konngo .
Ko hedde waktu 7 e hojomaaji 34 subaka , laanel ngel weeyi fotde meeteruuji tati tooweeki , ka deŋi ɗoon fotde leƴƴanɗe 39 , hade maggel juurtaade he wertallo Mbaañ .
Ko heddi ?
Ko heddi ko ko onon ndokkata heen miijooji mon , sabu enen fo ko en yimɓe ( woɗeeɓe ɓe , ɓaleeɓe ɓe .
Ko heddii e jime jaltinooje yiɗde yimiyankooɓe ɓennuɓe ɓee majjii , walla tawa nana heddii e mawɓe waañatnooɓe , ɓe laawol Tijjaaniya deentinoowol e kala sahaa deƴƴini .
Ko heddii e kawre ɗe kuraaje toɗɗii ko nih lelorii
Ko heen koode pettata , ko punndi e gaasuuji woni e niiwo ngo , ko e mooɓondiral ɗeen geɗe koode tagatee e ballal pooɗal .
Ko heewi e ko wiyeetee hannde ko ngaddinaaji ko ko faaɗtinta ɗemngal tan .
Ko heewi e masiŋaaji hannde nawataɗi ko ndeelam kuɓɓam ( yeru petrol , keroseen , .
Ko heewi e men cikkata hoodere siirtatoonde ko koode ɗe njiyaten e asamaan jamma ɗee , ko kañum en teɓɓittoo , ciirtoo mbaɗa laasi ( mbaɗa wicco ) .
Ko heewi e yimɓe cikkata jippaade e dow lewru ina newi , alaa de , weeɓaani , hitaande 1969 e lewru Morso 20 mayru , gorko biyeteeɗo Neyl Aarmostrong e jahdiiɗo makko Adwin ina kebotonoo jippaade e dow lewru nde ɓe ƴeewtindi ɓe tawi eɓe ngoɗɗi ɗo ɓe poti tellaade ɗo fotde kilometruuji 7 , ndeen ɓe ɓadiima leydi lewru , Neyl yuurni tawi ɓe keborno yan'de ko e haayre mawnde , ko ɗoon o haaƴti laana ka , tawi ɓe ɓadiima lewru fotde 152 meeteer , o haaƴtika to wertaango ɓurngo fotde e leydi lewru he , ko ɗoon ɓe njippi eɓe kisi .
Ko heewi heɓaama etee ngummiɗen koɗo woɗɗi .
Ko heewi ina haalee heen , ko ɓuri jaalaade ko ndiyam ummii ko e weeyo , haayre ndiyam moolanaande yani e leydi , ilni ndi haa ndi hawri , oon saha tawi ko e ndi wuli no feewi , ɗam ƴeri faade dow , toɓooji nduumii ko juuti haa ɗam waawi deeƴde e dow leydi , tawi laral leydi dow ngal ɓuuɓi waawi huufde ndiyam e mbaadiiji kala e ballal kammu .
Ko hesɗi kadi ngol laawol ko mago " Le fils du Khalif " , he jolal 2 mum yaltata ko Big Weltaare TV wonaa Piindi TV to jolala 1 ngal dogatnoo to .
Ko heɓi Sanngalde e Wojere ko waɗi Pulaar wiꞌde : Kala ko tonngu dasi , artirta ko koyɗe joomum .
Ko hikka waɗi duuɓi noogaas ko yimɓe ndiwanoo , ittaa e Fuuta mo Moritani .
Ko hikka waɗi duuɓi tati ( 3 ) haa yahdi e naange ko musiɗɗo men , ɓiyi Neene men Aamadu Jool suddii leppi leydi .
Ko hitaande 1995 ɗaŋre nde jeyaaka e yuɓɓo-naange fuɗɗi yiyteede e juurnirgal ndoogu to Farayse , gila ndeen yimɓe ceeraani e yiytude ɗaŋe goɗɗe .
Ko holɗe e ɓataake ɓuraa holleede e nder ngal ñeeñal bi’eteengal Croûte ?
Ko holɗe sosi nduu suudu ?
Ko holɗum haana waɗeede hannde ngam haa oo musiiba ustoo walla acca few ?
Ko hono nii ɗum wayi , hay so noon , so goonga , ɓanldu lewru tagoraaki no daarorgal nii .
Ko hono noon kameraaji les-boɗewol niiwnorɗe baaɗe no niiwnorgal James Web ngollortoo ngam yaltinde nate weeyo .
Ko hono noon waandu waɗiri , haa e bannge gooɗo oo .
Ko hono ɗee kuuge pawetee ciynetee so tawii faltaa ko goomu , walla renndo maa terɗe mum , sabu leñol mum , edda ɓalndu mum , iwdi jibinannde mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum en walla huunde e mum en .
Ko hooreejo leydi jooni oo huninoo he kampaañ suɓngo hooreejo leydi e hitaande 2018 ; Pellitgol Suudu sarɗi huuɓnude nantingol he denndaangal ɗemɗe leydi ndii , e suɓaade yo pelle pinal ngenndiije ɗee yo ngon gollodiiɓe mum suɓaaɓe he nder ciynugol ndee feere ; Pottital baɗdanoongal e jaagorgal Jaŋde , e Heblo Karallaagal kam e Mbayliigu Jaŋde leydi ndii ñalnde 12 feebariyee 2020 , nde pelle pinal ɗee totti mo Dallinannde mum en , ñaagii mo jeyeede e DNJ ngoo ; Cosgol Goomu parlemaa daraniingu Ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije ; Konngol jaagorgal Jaŋde leydi ndii e kewu juutagol golle nguun Goomu sarɗooɓe , ñalnde 10 settaambar 2020 , nde o wiyata wonde " jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije jeyaa ko calɗi kimmuɗi mbayliigu jaŋde paangu nguu " ; Naatnugol jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee kala to Duɗal Ngenndi ngal Njuɓɓudi laamu e Jaaynugol e Ñaawoore ( ENAJM ) , kam e gollodogol mum juumtungol e pelle pinal ɗee e nder ɗuum ;
Ko humpito ñalnde kala jaaynirɗe leydi Muritani , keeriiɗe ɗee kam eɗe laamu ɗee kala , hollitaani ko haalaa e doosgal dow ngal .
Ko huunde heewnde arde tee waɗa kulhuli mawɗi wonan'de neɗɗo , nde wonnoo ina hulɓinii hay ƴeewde ɗum waɗi ɗum teskeede .
Ko huunde nde meeɗaa waɗde , heddotoonde he daartol .
Ko huunde saɗnde jaɓde , alaa feere woɗnde .
Ko iddi fof , Kataar 2022 , heewii haala : Yimɓe fof ine nganndi Kataar anndiraaka wonde leydi mbaawndi bal .
Ko idii fof , gollotooɗo kala ine jogii hakke ( mo laawol heɓtini ) yahde fooftere ( yahde alateret ) .
Ko idii fof , jettagol maayo wulngo .
Ko idii fof ina moƴƴi ganndaa , wonde hannde , ko Amerik e Siin ɓuri leyɗe fof heewde doole to bannge faggudu .
Ko idii fof ko daartol ɓooyngol , kono kadi ko daartol jiiɓingol , he oo diiwaan keewɗo kaaƴe , ganndiraaɗo Nagorni Karabak , biyeteeɗo kadi Haut-Karabak ( Karabak Toowɗo ) walla kadi Nagorno Karabak .
Ko idii fof yahdu Adraar weeɓataa , sibu wul Ayda ( Emiir Adraar ) wuuranii ko Maa el Ayniin , ngenndiyanke mo hono mum weeɓaani .
Ko idii ɗum , e hitaande 2011 pelɓondiral waɗii toon 7 000 maayɗo .
Ko ina abboo e 1 711 neɗɗo ina tuuma won'di heen hannde , heen 1 070 tabiti ko oon rafi ngon'di .
Ko ina tolnoo e 2 000 neɗɗo tawtoraama wirwirnde Mammadu Demmba Sih , hakkunde ɓaleejo e boɗeejo , ganndo e humambinne , mawɗo e suka .
Ko ina tolnoo jooni e duuɓi ɗiɗi , loowdi kala nde o haali ko wiyde won ñukkintooɓe ngam yoolde Tuunus , doole ummiiɗe caggal leydi .
Ko ina wona 4000 fulɓe ina koɗi e Fuuta .
Ko ina wona duuɓi jooni , meer komin Fanay jooni oo ina yuɓɓina , kam e yimɓe
Ko ina wona jooni duuɓi sappo ( e hitaande 2009 ) , en
Ko ina wona lebbi 5 hannde , Fooyre Ɓamtaare ina yaltina heen binndanɗe keewɗe , ngam wallitde faamamuya caɗeele jotondirɗe e jeyi leydi .
Ko ina ŋakki lewru seeɗa , en keɓɓiino kabaaru ummoriiɗo to ministeer toppitiiɗo cellal nder Muritani ina hollita wonde " koronaa gasii heen " , ma a taw nii ɗum ina jeyaa e ko addani laamu hoybinde won ɗeen kuule ko wayi no : " couvre-feu " , restoraaji udditeede , kam e nokkuuji jeeyirɗi , jamaaji ekn Kono , ellee maa mbiyaa ko ɗum mboros koronaa oo fadnoo .
Ko ine tolnoo e capanɗe njeeɗiɗo neɗɗo , rewɓe e worɓe , ngoongɗinii mo , ɓe njahdii e makko ngam o wattindi ko yaltude nokku mo o wonnoo oo , o soorii gure leƴƴi maɓɓe omo wiya " eehey mon leñol am ndewee Alla ngoppon sanamuuji " .
Ko ittata walla firtata moritaniyaagal neɗɗo
Ko jaayndiyankooɓe mbiyatee " jogiiɓe konngi ɓeen ɓe ngalaa konngi " .
Ko janngo Muusaa foti yahde Tammbaa .
Ko jellaaba woni ɓoornateeri maa
Ko jiidaa e setooji subalɓe gummoriiɗi to Nuwaadibu , Suwoyraat , Rooso , Ɓoggee ,
Ko jiidaa e werlaaji tokoosi , alla e majji heewde ; ɗi limotaako .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum , garal hooreeɓe
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum aɓe mbaɗa Ƴellitaare renndo : ekkolaaji mecce nder ndema kesa e ngaynaaka .
Ko jiidaa e ɗuum gollotooɓe he ngesa baa : ko idii fof ko jom en gese ɓee idotoo ƴetteede heen so tawii ine njogii hattan ɗaɓɓeteeɗo oo .
Ko jiidaa kadi e geɗe biyeteeɗe aywo-goonga ( réalité virtuelle ) e ɓeydo-goonga ( réalité augmentée ) , geɗe jogorɗe wayloyde no feewi fannuuji baaɗi no jaŋde , e golle , e jotondire renndo , ɗanle , njeeygu tokoosu , geɗe gaddanooje en faamde nafoore nawdugol karallaagal e ɓalliwal .
Ko jiiloowo hulnde ndee ( administrateur de la chaîne ) e hoore mum sosi ɗum , jeyi ɗum teemedere e nder teemedere ( 100% ) ; oon woni gorko mo Wudduru e Lewe Njaayɓe , wuddu gesel Tamarooje , Alhajji Ibaraahiima Njaay lollirɗo Alhajji Njaay , pullo fuutanke , lawake e nder wuro mumen .

Ko jooni hare ndimaagu fuɗɗii

Ko jowol woni wuro ngo nganndu-ɗaa , so a naatirii ɗum hirnaange kaalaa sooninkoore , so a arii hakkunde kaalaa pulaar , so aɗa yalta kaalaa safroore .

Ko kaal-ɗon a Aamadu Jool koo ina selli ko o daraninooɗo pinal leñol fulɓe .
Ko kaalnoo-mi naane : ɗoo jooni cabbi capanɗe tati e tati ( 33 ) ɗe ko pirtata ?
Ko kaaɗoo ngonka addani laamu jogaade jiyanɗe kese pawiiɗe e ɗeeɗoo geɗe , to bannge politigi ko heɓtinde jeyi leydi ganni mbele eɗum tiiɗtina ngootaagu ngenndi , to bannge faggudu huuɓnude soklaaji men to bannge nguura , ustande en jiggagol nguura caggal leydi .
Ko kabaaru moƴƴo sibu , ko adii fof , batiriiji kuutorteeɗi hannde he otooji dogrooji yiite ( ko yeru tan ) ko kaaɓanaaɗi nde tawnoo ko kuutortoo koo , hono lithium ( liciyoom ) ine waawi jooɗaade ujunnaaje ujunnaaje hitaande waylaaki .
Ko kalfinaaɗo kaalis oo , mooftata geɗal lekkol ngam safrude caɗeele ɗee .

Ko kam ɗaldaa e golal .
Ko kameraaji jaggooji les-boɗewol ( kameraaji nguleeki ) kuutortee nder kanndaaji ngam ɓetde nguleeki ɓalli ( yeru , nguleeki ɓalndu ine ɓeydoo so neɗɗo faawngii ) .
Ko kanko Dirmisil adii ɓiɗde won e puɗi o yaltini heen sanngara , ko kanko kadi adii waɗde fijirde tege , ɗum firti ko ngaddaa kaalis mi adda kaalis yimɓe men ɗiɗo cippira , liɓɗo heen fof nawa ko tegaa koo , liɓaaɗo oo waasii kaalis mo tegnoo oo .
Ko kanko al-Mansuur woni Khalifah ( Laamiiɗo Juulɓe ) gadiiɗo hirjin’de juulɓe yoo njanngu gannde ( sciences ) kadi kimmirana ƴellitde ɗum en rewrude he firde defte binndaaɗe he ɗemɗe Gerek , Syriac , Faaris e Sanskrit ( Indo ) .
Ko kanko haalata haa jooni o wi’i kadi : " So tawii dañɗo e maggol fof wostete , hoto Allah rokku ɓe sagooji maɓɓe " .
Ko kanko kadi woni nokku bajjo loowtugol ƴiiƴam leydi ndii .
Ko kanko wiynoo : " Miin ne mi addi_i baallal am e pinal leñol am , e ɗo keedtu-mi ɗo : conce Tafsiiru Jiggo , Njool Pulaar , oon ne ko mawniraaɗo , musidɗo miijooji e golle wonnoo .
Ko kannko gooto , bajjo , anndi tee fellitta holi ndeen e hol fotɓe winnditeede , tee , e ooɗoo sahaa , yimɓe ina ngoytoo no feewi caɗeele binnditagol .
Ko kañnje fof eɗe njogii pegge ( wootere fof ena jogii beɗi ena taaroo ɗum ) .
Ko kañnje fof ɓuri heewde lebbi
Ko kañnje fof ɓuri mawnude
Ko kañum en kaani wallude ɓiɓɓe mumen haa cafra caɗeele mumen , e dewgal haa mbaawa danñje heen no muñiri caɗeele gonɗe heen fof .
Ko kaŋko wonnoo mawɗo Serb-en jeyaaɓe e Bosniy , saliiɓe yoo Bosniy heɓtu hoore mum sabu maɓɓe yiɗde heddaade e ndenndaandi Serbiy .
Ko keew-den wiyde neddo kala ko nelaado , so tawii nelal ko ko yettintee do alaano .
Ko kewata e weeyo ina woƴi aadee en feewi .
Ko kewi jooni saka ngool koyɗol na wiyee laatiima goonga ?
Ko kewnoo nguu ñalngu
Ko kewu mawɗo , puɗɗaaɗo ñalnde 12 desammbar 2009 ɗiiɗoo duuɓi 350 mawninirtee .
Ko keɓe ƴoogaaɗe e coñal Hubble renndinnoo ngadani nganndinal waɗde taaɓe mawɗe he ɓalliwal weeyo , ko wayi no teeŋtingol goondaangal gudde ɓaleeji pattam-ñise hakkunde won ɗeen jiiryiire walla goodaangal ɓakdi ( matière ) ɓaleeri .
Ko ko adii takkusaan banndiraaɓe bismaaɓe ɓee puɗɗii nootaade inɗe mum en les 28 tilliisa darnaaɗo .
Ko laamu e sarwisaaji mum kalfinaaɗi ko yowitii e jiilgol leydi poti darnude keeri hakkunde jeyuuji keeriiɗi ɗii e nokkuuji hurum ɗii e sahaa gooto .
Ko laaɓani en goɗɗum koo , ko diwaan saahal oo ina jooɗtoraa hannde to banngeeji wiɗtooɓe ko diwaan keewɗo ngaluuji tago , gila e oogaaɗe baaɗe no jamɗe , kaŋŋeeji , peteroŋ , iraniyum ekn , ngelɗoon geɗel battindiingel nii ko huunde nde dowla Farayse fawi junngo mum to Nisseer , rewrude e sosiyetee ganndiraaɗo AREVA .
Ko laaɓi heen tan , ko ɓe compii araaraay ndimaagu , ɓe njandini laamu satigeeɓe , laamu kaaɓananoongu e Fuuta , sibu ɓiɗtere bonnde e lorla mo mette mum ngalaa ɗo kaaɗi , laamu ngu mawɓe safalɓe tafatnoo ina taftoo , kamɓe Fedde Tooroɓɓe ɓe kolliti ɓe caltiima njiimaandi safalɓe , ɓe caltiima muudo hormo , ɓe caltiima ko Haalpulaar en konetee , mbaɗtee maccuɓe , njeeyee tuubakooɓe koo .
Ko laaɓi ko tan so tawii kusummaaji taariik ina keddii tawo hakkunde Alaseri e Farayse , guuranaagol Farayse leydi Maruk e wolde Saharaa hebbiti ko keewngal kono kadi naatgol " heɓi dawna Wagner " e nder diwaan Saahel yiiraaka no feewiri wonande Farayse e yoga e leyɗeele hirnaange ɗee , hay Amerik .
Ko laaɓti tan , ngalɗoo kuulal ɓuri joopaade ko leyɗeele waalo ( daande maayo senegaal ) sabu ko ɗeen ɓuri jogaade faayiida e waawde yeñtinde , leyɗeele rewo leydi ndii ko ɓuri heewde e mum en wonaa baawɗe naftoreede .
Ko lefol koddirangol e ndoogu , lommbungol lappol Ngaawe wanngotoo Njaana , njaajeendi ngool lefol diwaani 18 degere , ko e hakkunde maggol Ngaawe yahta .
Ko leydi tan walla lewru wirnata naange e weeyo men ɓadiingo , so tawii leydi heedii hakkunde naange e lewru , mbeelu leydi yanoya e lewru wirna ndu , ndu niɓɓiɗa , wiyee ndu nanngaama .
Ko limtu-ɗen ɗoo kala ko seeɗa e bonannde jihadist en ummanii e nder aduna hee kala , teeŋti noon gila nde Daesh feeñi , holliri yiɗde mum hoonaade e aduna hee kala , haa ko woni faandaare mum koo tabita heen .
Ko maa 10 mars 1908 nde Aali Yero arti e wuro mum Fanay .
Ko maa ndenten nde ɓuren .
Ko maa ngondaa e muñal .
Ko maa o yahi to opitaal gooto to New York e lewru
Ko maa o yahi to opitaal gooto to New York e lewru settaambar 2018 , nde eskaneer feeñnini ko wayi no cinndel nii nder bannge ñaamo ngaanndi maako .
Ko maantini kadi e ngalɗoo daawal , F .
Ko maayi ene jibina ko wuuri
Ko maayo henndu fawotoongo e dow won e ɗaŋe , ngoo maayo henndu fawiingo e dow ɗaŋre Ngaawe ( woni Aduna men o ) ina seerti e maaje keewɗe , sabu ko e maggo poofaten , ɗaŋe goɗɗe baaɗe no Raam ( jaayre ) walla Mbaañ , ina njogii maaje keneeli kono ina ceerti e ngo men ngo , sabu en naftortaako e foofde e majje , refti heen maayo henndu ngo ina daɗnda en e bone weeyo , ko way no kaaƴe kayhatooje e ciiñsiiñƴe Naange lorlooje .
Ko mahaa haa toowi fof firtee , wiyee feewaani , goɗɗum aafee kadi , jooni noon no wayi wayde fof ko ngaannuma doofolɓe .
Ko mbaawka mawka wonan'de Orop nde ɓe nuldi baagal kayowal e ndeer weeyo , ngal ɓe inniri Gayya ñalde Alkamiisa jawtuɗo o .
Ko mbaroodi ngordi heewi ardaade seto , jogoo laamu e kisal seto ngoo .
Ko mbaroodi woni kullel jaɓayel ngoo jaɓo .
Ko mbiiɗon ?
Ko mbiyaten koode ciirtatooɗe ko , wonaa koode , ɗum wayi ko no annama ɗooɗe nii , walla kaaƴe nii , walla jamɗe tawa noon ɗum mawnaani .
Ko mi asiñoor jaltuɗo Almaañ .
Ko mi cukalel ngel jiɗnaaɓe njoyo .
Ko mi ɗomɗuɗo , miɗo yara .
Ko miin Yero Soh to Kayhaydi , guurdo hannde to Modena , Italia .
Ko miin e Maalik e Aamadu Labbo koddunoo he suudu ngu kaggu ngootu : Hoddu Maalik , pakket sigirat Aamadu e deftere am vuraana fotde hitaande .
Ko miin tigi malaa .
Ko min dariiɓe e ubbitde daartol maa .
Ko min ngoni e golle darnude wejorde ndee , tawi saal oo heewii yimɓe caggal amen !
Ko min ñaagii on wonaa gulaali e luukaali ;
Ko naalankaagal diɗɗe naalankooɓe .
Ko naange mooɓi ko ɓuri heewde e duulal fuɗɗoode ngal , 99 .
Ko naange rewnii Leydi e denndaangal tagopeeje catiiɗe nge , ko ɗuum addi innde seto-naange , ko kannge noon mooɓi yoga e ko woodi e seto ngo .
Ko nanndude nde , woowondirde nde , anndondirde nde ; ndeen so pullo yahii ladde ina rewi e jawdi ( aynoyii ) seertat e comci .
Ko nde Jilbeer Jenndere yooɓii Sankara , o tiiɗtini Kompawre dow jappeere laamu Burkina Faso .
Ko nde a waawaa yovde njoganizaa amen .
Ko nde ɓe njoti jamñaaƴo nde Hawo fini , wayi no koyɗoowo nii .
Ko ndee rogere woni 80ɓiire nde HCR yuɓɓini , gila nde nanondiral nawtugol mooliiɓe ɓee siifaa hakkunde laamuuji ɗiɗi Senegaal e Moritani e tawtoreede HCR , e jolal 2007 .
Ko ndee yiilirde ɗowi fedde ndee haa heɓtinaa e ndeen hitaande wootere 1976 .
Ko ndee ñaawoore fadaande hikka duuɓi 34 hebori anndinde ɓesnguuji waraaɓe ɓee ɗo goonga tolnii , hollita darɗe tuumaaɓe warngo ɓee haa njooɓii koninke waklitere Burkina .
Ko ndeen Alla yamiri Jibiriil yo yah to nokkannde leydi ndaneeri too ngam ndeen ɗoon nokkannde ummii ko e ɓernde leydi , ko e mayre kadi Annabaaɓe tagaa .
Ko ndeen Chesse neli mawɗo tunndu Fos-Galojina , Samba Yomb Giile Mbooc , kam he nantinoowo mum Samba Fay , yo ɓe njah ɓe etoo deeƴnude Aali Yero .
Ko ndeen Faatima Mbay wiynoo , nde jaabotoo naamnal jaaynde wiyeteende Le Calame naamndinoo ɗum , wonde : " To bannge amen , minen awokaaji , kaaɗoo haala gila e fuɗɗoode ko ko rewindaa , min ndenndinanii ɗum kaayitaaji keewɗi sabu emin nganndi yoga e waɗɓe bonannde ɓee , kam e loranooɓe ɓee , fof inan resaa .
Ko ndeen Fuuta wonti nokku deeƴɗo , kisɗo , ujunaaje ujunnaaje remooɓe hiiɗanooɓe e laamuuji jolfuɓe catiiɗi ngari , koɗti e Fuuta .
Ko ndeen dadiiɓe ɓee , hono polis , puɗɗii yottaade .
Ko ndeen darnde jokki haa he sahaa hannde mo njaltinten tonngoode 200 .
Ko ndeen haawniinde woni kadi ?
Ko ndeen innde kadi o mawnidi .
Ko ndeen kadi o wiyi " noddaango am feewi ko he leyɗe ƴellitiiɗe nde mballata Diiso Kisal Genɗi Dentuɗi hulɓinde ɓeen yiɗooɓe loppitirde laamu doole ; ɗum wontii hankadi ñawu rewam " .
Ko ndeen laamu Muritani holli mettere mum .
Ko ndeen miijo arani ɓe yiɗde yaajtinde ndii laamaandi jam e diiwanuuji ɓurɗi ɓadtaade , ko wayi no Waalo , Jolof e Kayoor .
Ko ndeen o yotii wuro laamɗo .
Ko ndeen sukaaɓe men yimooɓe RAP ɓee naati diŋiral ngal .
Ko ndeen tan ENAJM e denndaangal juɓɓule jaŋde e heblo ngonata nokkuuji mahooji ngootaagu ngenndi , ɗi ngona kadi kuutorɗe baawɗe rokkude halfinaaɓe njuɓɓudi laamu ɓee , ñaawooɓe ɓee , e jaaynooɓe ɓee , e denndaangal fanniyankooɓe " geɗe ndenndaandi " , gannde paatuɗe e ɗemɗe , e pinal e renndo , gaddanooje ɗum en waawde jokkondirde e yimɓe ɗo ɓe ngollotoo ɗoo , kam e waawde ardaade gardagol juumtungol .
Ko ndeen tan leydi men waawata hollitde mawnugol mum e kattanɗe mum waawde ñawndude caɗeele mum tawi ƴoogi ko ɓure mum ɗe heerorii .
Ko ndeen yiyannde kadi Aliw Sal tabitini caggal nde suudu diisnordu doosɗe ndu firti oon dekkere e kala kuule ɗe suudu sarɗiyankooɓe nduu lelnunoo ngam dirtinde lajal suɓngooji ɗi .
Ko ndeen ɓe mbaawata anndude ko woodaa e ko ŋakki .
Ko ndeen ɓe njaggi Jibi Tokosel Sih , e Kummba Faati yumma mum Aali Yero , e mawniiko debbo , Ayse Faati Joob , ina yahra he duuɓi 35 .
Ko ndeen ɓe pelle daraniiɗe jojjanɗe aadee njaltinoo bayyinaango tiitoriingo : " hoto ngostoro-ɗen hakke yiytude goonga e siftorde , kaalisal " .
Ko ndeen ɗi jahdi , ɓooyaani tan ɗi njetii to ladde serewunde ton .
Ko ndeer ngoo weeyo njeyaɗen , e ndeer gootal e lilluɗe he ngonɗen , tawde ko noon , ko haɗata leydi dañde hono mum ?
Ko ndeeɗoo yiyannde fattamlamre addani Tomaa Sankara mo
Ko ndi fawaa koo fof e teddude , haɗaani mbaylaandi leydi ndii dartaade , leydi ndii ɓamti ƴellitaare mum , haa daɗtii Angalteer .
Ko ndi ɓadinoondi naange haa nguleeki mum ina fattina ndi walla ko ma fuɗɗoode tagoodi mayri jogoo oon sifa nde aaɓnoo ?
Ko ndii mbaydi ngonka wayletee walla waylotoo e dowu hoyre mum .
Ko ndiin leydi , caggal nde leydi yerɓi yimɓe heewɓe mbaasi heen piɗtaali mumen , ko ine qiimee e ujjunaaje teemedde tati fiɗtaandu halkiindu .
Ko ndiin njuɓɓudi woodnoo e laamu senegaal , tawi kadi jahɗo heen fof yahani ko leydi ndi e dowu yamiroore laamɗo leydi ndi mo leydi ndi ardini hoyre mum o .
Ko ndokkive ko ve ngoni ko
Ko neɗɗo mo sellaani ena woytoo , doktoor ara e makko , naamndoo mo : " ko ngonnduda ?
Ko neɗɗo waɗata juumre kono diine meeɗaa waɗde juumre .
Ko ngaal nanondiral addi haa Espaañ walli Moritani e ka ndiwoowa ngam haɓtoraade uujgol nder suuɗo-suuɗoondu ( immigration clandestine ) , tawo njaru makka ko maanditorgel tan , teemedere kopporeeje Oroo , kono hay ndiga jotondiraani ɗum e hafeere Umaar Siidi Ahmed Wul Hamma nde , ( lollirɗo Umaar Saharawii ) .
Ko ngal jikku yiɗde e teylaade hoore mum
Ko ngam hirjinde aduna oo kala e ñawu Jabet , mbele ngannda maale mum , e safaruuji mum kam e tanaa mum , mbele ndeentoo , maa cafroo ɗum .
Ko ngam yiɗde waylude he hakkillaaji ɓeen yimɓe jogitiiɓe ndeen yiyannde nde alaa ɗo ɓaari waɗi , Ceerno Abuu Sih , wallifaade ndee ɗoo deftere , tawa ko fawiinde he wiɗto laaɓngo , tuugnaade he al-Qur’aan , Hadisaaji Nelaaɗo e defte kammuuje ɓooyɗe ɗee , ko wayno Aadi gadano ( Ancien Testament ) , e Aadi Keso ( Nouveau testement ) .
Ko ngol juutngol , baangol no lefol nii , daɗngol gane gane , koyel tokosel baɗngel ko wayi no nanngɗe 4 nii .
Ko ngol waɗi ɗiɗmol ko Goomu ndariniingu rewindo jaayndeeji ene yuɓɓina kawgel , tawtina heen ɗemɗe Ngenndiije Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof .
Ko ngol waɗti go'o ko Espaañ nawata raay e kawgel winndere , ko ngol waɗti go'o kadi ko eɓe njaha wattan .
Ko ngol woni go’o , caggal jihaadi Al Hajji Umar Taal ,
Ko ngol woni ɗiɗmol ko Siin ina nelda ɓeeynirka to Lewru .
Ko ngol ɗoo woni laawol gadanol Malinaaɓe meeɗi yiyude dewbo mawɗo leydi maɓɓe keso o .
Ko ngool koyɗol woni : Ko wage miijinoo tafde korwe jolnooje yimɓe e kaake , jaawɗe ( ɓurɗe diwooje yaawde ) , dogooje dow leydi ( dow faɗo henndu ) walla nder leydi maa ndiyam , tawa kadi ngonaa posnooje henndu poofaten nduu , ɗum noon kormiiɗe sato .
Ko ngool koyɗol woni ?
Ko ngoonga waasataa ɗo añɓe ɓamtaare Pulaar ngoni , kadi so joom mum ene mbaawnoo palarto ɓamtaare ɗemngal ngal kala no doole mum en potirno .
Ko ngu ñawu cariingu hannde he winndere ndee kala .
Ko ngunndu-ɗa ?
Ko ni ɗate ɗee lelorii e lefol he
Ko nih kam to bannge ganndal mbewu ɗum siforii , ko heddii ko fawii ko e mbaydi nokku o , so tawii ko ɗo wertaango leydi fortii tawa alaa kaaƴe toowɗe e kaɗooje goɗɗe , ko ɗoon ɗee doge ɓurata laaɓtude e weeɓde teskaade , teeŋti noon nde alaa cuddi .
Ko nih min njokkondirtee
Ko nii , Federba dañiri yamɗinirde , hay sinno ko seeɗa , njulaagu Faraysenaaɓe e maayo Senegaal ( kareeli ɗii ndokkii mo faamde , alaa ko famɗi , tee Faraysenaaɓe njogoraani deeƴde so tawii keɓaani Tagaant e Adraar .
Ko nii Mooɓondiral ngal yahri , yimɓe caakii kooto yiilirde hesere waɗaaka alaa ko kadi ko sakkaa ko
Ko nii facciro o waɗani mi ngoo siforii " Enndepanndaas , ko ɓiɓɓe
Ko nii geɗe ɗee ciforii , ko hare , ko wolde hakkunde GAFAM ( wontuɓe dowlaaji ) e Dowlaaji leyɗeele ɗee ( ɗi mbaawka mum en woni e ustaade ñalnde kala ) .
Ko nii mbaawkaaji ɗi peccitortoo e oon sahaa : Orop jogii 32% e daaɗe ɗe , tawi teddeendi mum e faggudu winndere nde ko 25% fat .
Ko nii noon njeñtude golle ɗee siforii
Ko nii o tawiri mo : omo hofii no sammunde , o leltini noppi ɗii e ɓanndu , omo siñña .
Ko nii woni Aamadu Jool ƴettaa e Fedde ARED Goomu ina hebla jannginooɓe dowrowo haa mo woni kala heɓtini cagataagal makko e nder Fedde nde .
Ko nii woni no pot-ɗen waɗde ngam faddaade denndaangal pellitte gannabayiije , ceerndooje , ngoɗɗondira leƴƴi leydi men .
Ko nii ɓee ngenndiyankooɓe njahri .
Ko nii ɗi ciforii
Ko nii ɗum aaɓniraa : ko kameraa , gonɗo he telefoŋ hee , rewata e yeeso maa , toɓɓa noppi maa , werloo heen sereendu hito , ndu yanataa so wonaa e noppi maa .
Ko njamndi mbaɗni pooɗowal ( ina fooɗa jamɗe , nikel , kobalt e krom ) tawangal wonaa jiggangal , waɗata ko saayaande nde yiyotaako huuɓtidina njamndi sulɗaane ndi , ɗuum rokkata ɗum doole bellaade ko ɓadi , e ndi waɗi ceɓe ɗiɗe rewo e worgo , nde ceɓal huccitinaa e hono mum fo dampondirat , so luutondiraama fooɗondira .
Ko njiyaten e natal hee ?
Ko njiyaten jamma ena niwɗa e nder Asmaan ( haa e ñalawma ena woodi kono ko jalbugol ñalawama , sabu naange , haɗata en yiyde ɗum ) , ko mbiyaten " laawol hakkunde jeeri e waalo " koo , ko deental koode , walla galaksi .
Ko njyaten jamma ena niwɗa e nder Asmaan ( ha e nyalawma ena woodi kono ko jalbugol nyalawama , sabu naange , haɗata en yiyde ɗum ) , ko mbiyaten " laawol hakkunde jeeri e waalo " ko , ko deental koode , walla galaksi .
Ko non kadi seppo ngo feƴƴiri e nder gure goɗɗe nder Faransi hono " Nantes " , " Brest " , " Nice " , " Marseille " e " Clermont-Ferrand " .
Ko noon , keɓtugol islamiyankooɓe laamu , waawnii tuubakooɓe hirnaange etaade dognude leydi ndii afganistaannaaɓe hulanaaɓe njoftiigu taliban , sabu mum yooɓtoreede gollananoode konuuji jananinkooji .
Ko noon fowru daasiri lella haa to ladde serwubde too .
Ko noon hello asamaan ngo waɗaa haa hawri , ina famɗi ɗo hoodere yiyotoonde woni waɗdaaka e ɗatal , ɗate ɗe noon won heen ko e lappol naange ngoni , goɗɗe wonaa heen ngoni , kono heen ɗatal fo ina waɗi sahaa nde feeñata , goɗɗo huroyoo .
Ko noon kadi , gargol jiyaaɓe hesɓe heewɓe to Antiiy ustiri coggu maɓɓe to remooɓe gawƴe suukara , noon ne kadi peewnugol suukara ɓeydorii yaawde , usti coggu suukara e aduna hee , ɓeydi kuutoragol mum to Orop .
Ko noon kadi , gollondiral enndanoongal waɗdeede e antampiris maruknaajo biyeteeɗo AQUAMAG , yuumtaani caggal termondiral juutngal e hitaande 2022 ndee fof .
Ko noon kadi , ñalnde 16 saawiyee 2021 , NASA wonnoo ko e hoolkisaade motoraaji fisee ɓujo , doolnuɗo , baɗiraaɗo jolnude laana weeyo mbiyeteeka Orion , ngam ruttaade dow Lewru .
Ko noon ne kadi fedde politik wiyeteende AJD/MR yaltiniri bayyinaango ñalnde 19 marse 2013 ngam hollitde ina " wondi e ko Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi ɓee ɗaɓɓi koo , tee ina ñiŋa kala feere yiɗnde waɗtude won ɓeen Muritaninaaɓe yimɓe ɓe ngalaa ɗo njeyaa " e siftinde binditol ngol " fotaani wonde kuutorgal paltoor e yiɗde joñde huunde e muritaninaaɓe " .
Ko noon ne kadi min mbaɗtirta e jeyi amen , min ɗaɓɓa e kala ɓiyleydi nde waɗata hono noon , duwaawu moƴƴinoowo jikke , baawdo jaaɓeede , umiiɗo e kuɗol gooto e jaaynooɓe men lolluɗo , cuusɗo , hono Abdullaay Siree Bah , tuma mawningol hitaande capanɗe joyaɓiire jeytaare leydi men , nde waɗi winndannde tiitoriinde " Le pays de nos rêves " ( No njiɗ-ɗen leydi men waya ) : " Miɗo anndi noon , duuminooɓe e neema kala coftantaa waylo waylo mo ngummani-ɗen o ; hooram hooraagu ɓooy falaade yiɗde men nuunɗal renndo ; maa jingere e heedi heeda ɓooy haɗde ɓiyngu yummaagu hakkunde ɓiɗɓe Muritani ; maa miijooji leñam-leñaagu e keeriiɗi gila hanki , ɓooy haɗde mahngo janngo men denndaaɗo oo .
Ko noon ne kadi ngal yejjitiri ó , óó e é , éé .
Ko noon ne kadi njiimi , njiiɗaa , njiiɗen .
Ko noon ne kadi oo-ɗoo , oo-ɗaa , e ko wayi noon , potaani renndineede .
Ko noon ne kadi ɓe ndeftorii binndanɗe diine ɗe ɓe njanngunoo e nder duɗal ngal .
Ko noon tan nii waawnoo wayde , sibu gila e kitaale 1950 , nde Muttaar wul Daddaa ɗaɓɓi yiyndirde e Maamuudu Sammba Booli to Ndar , battane " baaba ngenndi " nganndaama gila ndeen .
Ko noon tigi , Sayku Umar Bah : Jamma jamma , accaa cuuɗu !
Ko o celluɗo fiɓnde e nder ko o ummaninoo kala , maccuɗo haaju makko .
Ko o debbo jiɗnooɗo teddungal e hurum .
Ko o ganndo Pulaar to haala , binndi , coñce , jikkuuji e ganni .
