Ko o jannginoowo Feliyankaagal ( philosophie ) he duɗal laamuyeewal tolno hakkundeejo ; ko o kebloowo kadi he duɗal safrooɓe e ŋarwinooɓe renndo e fannuuji , ganndal renndo e fittiyaagal e pinal leñɗi .
Ko o karallo ko fayti de yiite ( elektirisitee ) .
Ko o keɗtotanooɗo , cuusnooɗo goonga : alaa mo o aamannoo haaldude goonga .
Ko o kuutorteeɗo ngam o timmaani .
Ko o ngenndiyanke tiiɗaaɗo pinal mum , iwdi mum , pasniiɗo Pulaagu e ɗemngal Fulfulde , o daraniima ɗum e cukaagu makko , e cagataagal makko , e mawngu makko e ɗo o lelii e rafi cellal ɗoo haa o ruttiima e Joom makko .
Ko o sankii koo , yimɓe heewɓe , ardiiɓe winndere ndee , ceedtiima e makko golle moƴƴe , gila e gardiiɗo FNGD jooni oo , hono Antonio Guterres , haa e hooreejo Riisi , Hooreejo Farayse , e woɗɓe .
Ko o wiyinoo ko laatiima .
Ko o ɗaaniiɗo mo anndaa finde .
Ko oon sahaadaddoowo gooto yottii wiꞌi : " aan nooroo hol no mbaɗɗaa haa ndiyam ɗam woɗɗir ma nii ?
Ko oon ñalawma , laamɗo mo Faraysenaaɓe paarnortoo hannde , ganndiraaɗo Napoleyon Bonaparte , neldunoo konu ngu 3 410 neɗɗo , umminoo wuro Brest ( Farayse ) ine tiindii Gadelup ngam artirde toon njiyaagu .
Ko oto maɓɓe njoli oo dogi kala , ɓe jawa ɗum sabu kumpa mo ɓe ngondi oo .
Ko pulaar haala kono wonaa mboni kala faamata ka haala , kono tan ko pulaar !
Ko pullo biyeteeɗo Al Hajji Umar Taal sompi laamlaamu Tukuloor nder bannge e leydi Mali hannde ndii .
Ko rafi doneteeɗo
Ko reɓata ina ňaama aduna o oroo e amerik na tawaa heen .
Ko reɗɗotoo koo ko woni ?
Ko saabii yimɓe ina pooɗanoo hoɗde to weeyo tawee ?
Ko saabii ñalɗi ina ɓurondira juutde ?

Ko sahnga miniwii baar battano oo fiyaa haa weli .
Ko sahnga waktuuji tati kikiiɗe yontaaɓe ɓee naati Le Havre : Djiby , Aliw
Ko sakkitii yiyteede heen ko ɗaŋe tate ina ndewi e naange majje woɗeere coy , hakkunde men e ngoon seto ko duuɓi 40 lewndu ( années lumière ) , yiyti ngoon seto ko lonngirɗe ESO gonɗe Cili ( Chili ) , ɗaŋe ɗe njerondirte ko e Raam ( Jaawyre ) walla Leydi ( Aduna mbo ngonɗen o ) , jooni caggal ngoo raddo lobbo heddii ko yuurnaade mbela ɗeen ɗaŋe won ko wuuri e majje walla , ko adi fo ala e sago ɗe mbaɗa ndiyam ndeelam e nde miijee won ko wuuri toon , tawde ɗe ngoɗɗiraani noon fo naange majje , kadi yanti heen nge wonaa wulnge no naange men nih , ina waawi tawa eɗe mbaɗi diƴƴe .
Ko sappo e go’o neɗɗo cuɓaa , ngam ɓe ngona terɗe Goomu suɓngoyankeewu ngenndiiwu njeytiingu .

Ko seerndi geec e fiiltiingo
Ko seeɗa nganndu-mi ɓure e jaambaraagal maa
Ko selli ko , koko ɓaleeɓe mbaɗaa e Moritani ko janŋtotaako , janŋtodtaako !
Ko silaama wonnoo njogitaari ndi ngoowno-ɗaa
Ko sooynete no so saami ne haani jocce Nde tawno dumdo wona bulet do men do min nduwiima yo Allah nawrudum yeeso beyda cellal e semmbe e baawal sabu darnde mon e golle mon maantiniide de mbadanton renndo fulbe yo Allah yob on moyyere inchallah ko yeeso tan faya
Ko sooynetonoo yettiima !
Ko sukaaɓe ngontoya mawɓe , lomtoytooɓe mawɓe janngo .
Ko sukaaɓe worɓe wuro ngoo poti feewnude ɗum e gardagol mawɗo wuro ngoo .
Ko sunaare jeese ngarti no goobiraaɗe boru .
Ko tagata Burkina ɗaɓɓude ballal Wagner ?
Ko tagofeer ɓurnde ɓadaade naange , sabu hay dara heedaani nde e mayre , refti heen ko kayr ɓuri famɗude e tagopeeje seto naange ,
Ko tagoodi mawndi .
Ko takketee koo e ko saaktetee e rajooji koo nganndinta ko ngonka leydi ndii , njaajeendi mum e sifaa ko ɗaɓɓoowo ndi oo hebori gollude e mayri .
Ko teskaa , ko so ɗaɓɓitgol wootaneede yontii , ene waɗi ɓe ɗum jarani huunde fof .
Ko tesketee e Winii ko wonde mo debbo tiiɗɗo , joom fiɓnde , dartoriiɗo no doole mum potirnoo Atartaayd .
Ko teskini koo tan , ko sifaa dokkirgol leydi ndemateeri ( concessions rurales ) annomini tan ko teettugol leyɗeele remooɓe sabu sarɗiiji pawaaɗi e jogiiɓe e maɓɓe leydi ina caɗi huuɓnude
Ko tin-mi ko ko hono duum waali toon .
Ko tokkiti ngal dow ko caɗeele puŋŋiniiɗe kaɗooje ciynugol pellital ngal , ma en ngartoy heen so Alla jaɓii .
Ko toolii mon on fow yo Alfa Bali
Ko toon o anndinoyi koreeji makkon kullon ladde wonde , ko nooroo boni koo fof , ko daddoowo ɓuri jaasde .
Ko toon o ñalli , omo wondi e jaakre , tampere e gacce .
Ko tufnde [ v ] wootere woodi to Hudallaay ngam yarnude 1470 fittaandu gonɗi e nder 400 fooyre , tawi noon nanondiral tattatiwal ngal wiynoo ko eɓɓunoo ko fooraas jarnoowo 1000 neɗɗo .
Ko uumaali ŋuuraali e gofaali fa'de makki ; hannde noon ina wi'ee ceerno o ñifii jeynge wadda nodditii watulaaɓe mum yo ngoppu kala ko mbaɗatnoo kanko o woppii ƴeewee tan o ɗoo duudu wadda mo jaŋngaani jaŋde dowrowre ina njooɗii jappeeje ina piya lofuuji fenaande mbele makki ina joñoo .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof , e tuugnaade e sariya lislaam , ko lomtintee koo teskotoo tan ko kuutorɗe baawɗe naftoreede caggal nde mahdi ndii firtaa .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof , hannde , haala ina heewi heen , haa arti noon e internet : aɗa tawa heen wiyooɓe wonde ko Amerik dillini leydi Hayiti , ko kam yerɓinnoo leydi to Siin ( Chichuan ) , to Japon , ko kam kadi duppitnoo wuubiluuru to Farayse e hitaande 1999 .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof , ngalɗoo nanondiral ine soklini hirnaange : " Dowlaaji Deeƴngo ( Pasifik ) ine njogii nanondire kisal diiwaniije katojinaaɗe ; etagol konu Siin naatde he nokkuuji guurwuuri ine mbaawi bonnude kisal Pasifik no diidorinoo " .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof banndiraaɓe eɗen mbaawi wiyde Gine suwaa tawo suppitde hoyre e nder ngo ɗo maayo kaawisaaji noodi e piyooji .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof cifti-nen , ko waktuuji seeɗa tan caggal nde Umaar Saharawii ( tuumaaɗo ko e koyhoyi hawjinooɓe ɓee jeyaa ) waɗtaa e juuɗe Mali , tan AQMI ( catal fedde islaamiyankoore alqaayidaa e nder Maghreb ) , kañum neh wuppiti espaañnaaɓe ɗiɗo , Rok Paskaal e Albeer Filalta ( Vilalta ) .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof e wiyde kabaaru ɓadiiɗo kaaldigal maɓɓe ngal hakkunde Aqmi , laamu Maali , Farayse e Nijeer wiyaama ruggiyankooɓe ɓe hono Aqmi ngam ngoppa ɓe , keɓii barjiteede maa weeɗeede kubbal paayodinngal , hay sinno tawiino e jooni jooni o ɓe njaɓaani haalde holi no foti ɓe ndokki e kaalis e holi dokkuɗo oon kaalis ?
Ko waawi heen wonde fof inɗe maɓɓe mbonii heen no feewi , tee kadi nijeernaaɓe ɓeydiima maayde kulol reedu e hoolkisidaade goongɗugol ko ɓe mbiynoo maa siwil ‘en keɓtu laamu ngu e darorɗe hitaande .
Ko waawi heen wonde fof laamu ngu ko ko felliti waylude tippo njanngu leydi ndi , mbele Gaboo ina yahda e waylowaylo jamaanu o .
Ko waawi heen wonde goonga fof , hannde wontii Daartol .
Ko waawi heen wonde kala , Dji ( Jii ) Barkham , juɓɓinɗo mago ngoo o ene fodani yeeɓooɓe mum ko mawni : " Min ngartiri ko jeewte ( dialogues ) keewɗe maana , magiyankooɓe waawɓe fanniiɓe , e nate jooɗɗe laaɓtuɗe .
Ko waawi saabaade oo musiiba fof , ine jeyaa heen nokku oo e hoore mum , sibu ko o ladde waɗnde leɗɗe , e koɗorɗe huɗo .
Ko waawi wonde heen kala , so tawii ko o maayɗo , ko gooto e ñiibi dawrugol Afrik yani .
Ko waawi wonde kala ko yo goonga ardoo , sabu leydi so ina jogori ɓamtaade ko ngootaagu foti tawo sompeede jooɗoo calɗi potal ñiɓee haa ñiiɓa , ɓuuɓri kisal hunndee , huura leydi kala , tawa wonaa ɓee ngona e jam , ɓeya ina tammoo ɗe looraani ; kono wooyi !
Ko waawnoo heen fof , so heewii , he nder lewru , hoolkiso Ingenuity koko dartintee , ngam woppude Perseverance toppitoo gollal mum ɓurngal teeŋtude ngal , so yiylaade ɓarakke nguurndam dow Mbaañ !
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , Abdel Asiis biynooɗo ko ɓooyaani koo tan ( jokkondiral e ɓesngu to Attaar ) wonde " doosiyee ndonaandi aadeeri uddaama " , yo anndu o uddaaki tawo , ko hannde fof o ɓuri ŋaɓɓitaade !
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , Maamuudu Sammba Booli fotaani walla waawaa tuumeede ŋakkeende ngenndiyankaagal , sibu nde kabaaru siyani mo wonde Horma wul Baabana jamfiima , o waɗaani hannde haa janngo , o wiyi oon gonnooɗo jahdiiɗo makko , wonde ɓe mbaawaa jokkude e wallitde ɗum so tawii fellitii yantoyde e Maruk ngam haɗde ndimaagu Muritani .
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , Nasa e Nokku Orop toppitiiɗo weeyo ( ESA ) e Njuɓɓudi Siin toppitiindi weeyo ( CNSA ) ine mbaɗti hakkille no feewi he goodgol penndam ndiyam he Lewru ( Nguurdam aaɓnotaako ɗo ndiyam alaa ) .
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , Wenusuelaa e Boliwi e Nikaraguwaa ɗaɓɓii batu Goomu Kisal Fedde Ngenndiije , ngam sunnaade batte " corkagol " konu Amerik e nder leydiHayiti .
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , eɗen nganndi kam UPR-naaɓe njogoraani fiytaade becce , sibu poolgu mum ko poolgu ngu aldaa e manoore !
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , ina sikkaa tan , haala mbaaka nii , ina ɗaɓɓi nanondiral jaajngal hakkunde yimɓe leydi ndii kala , hono no waɗiranoo e ñalɗi diisnondiral nde Siidi wul Seek Abdallaahi laaminoo ndee ( tuggi 20 haa 22 noowammbar 2007 ) , ñalɗi joofirɗi e nanondiral ngal yimɓe mbeltinoo e mum , kono ngal kuudetaa Abdel Asiis haɗi siyneede .
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , ñalnde 10/11/2014 , guwerneer Tararsa , hono Iselmu wul Siidi ( gonnooɗo mawɗo rondismaa Jidrel Mohgen e hitaande 1989 ) winndi Kawtal ɓataake , ngam tintinde ɗum wonde seppo ngoo ko haɗaango sibu , e wiyde mum " ɗooftaaki sarɗiiji katojinaaɗi ngam juɓɓingol mum " , ina winndi heen " Oɗon kaɗaa jokkude ngoo seppo e nder wilaaya Tararsa " .
Ko waawnoo heen wonde fof , ɗumɗoo ina addana en ƴeewtaade hol ko haɗata Muritaninaaɓe waawnaaɓe wuurde caggal leydi jeyeede e leyɗe ɗiɗi .
Ko waktu 2ɓo kikiiɗe seppo ngoo dartii , yimɓe ɓee mbaynii , ndokkondiri aadi ina njokka hare haa potal waɗa e leydi Muritani .
Ko wanannoo yimɓe nguumu-ngaamalde , Dowla Amerik , rewrude e sarwiis mum ñukkintooɗo ( CIA ) taƴii mbabba e hakkunde : ɓe mbiyi wonde " Muritani ina fiɓondiri e Al KAYDA ( Aqmi ) gila e hitaande 2010 , aadi wonde Moritani yanataa e tuddule maɓɓe konu e nder leydi mum , kamɓe ne maa ɓe ndartin njanguuji maɓɓe e nder leydi hee " .
Ko wari haako fof maayda heen : barɗo Maamaari Tagante daɗataa , danndataa .
Ko way noon walla boomaare wonnde so heɓii ɗaŋre men nde ina waawi won'de firtaare wonan'de aadee e dow leydi , yimɓe ngasa haa laaɓa , tawa kedde muyen ngalaa , kono so tawii woodi hoɗɓe to weeyo walla e ɗaŋe goɗɗe yaama ɓeen kam ndaɗa ngonana yimɓe aawdi kesiri .
Ko waynoon waɗde kadi waɗta , addanii Fulɓe ɓee laaɓndaade koye mum en mbele ko ɗum aksidaa walla ko feere añɓe leñol ngol yiɗɓe faddaade ɓamtaare ɗemngal Pulaar e pinal Fulɓe ?
Ko waɗi daaka #medinagounass haŋki koo nguu .
Ko waɗi hakkunde Saalif e Yero ko e jam tan sakkitii .
Ko waɗi koo yerondiri ko e diwnugol gadanol laana motoreewa ( ka motoor nawata ) he dow Leydi men ɗoo ñalnde 17 desaambar 1903 .
Ko waɗi laamdo Nooro sikki ko baaɗi keewdi goni e duunde ndee ?
Ko waɗi so leydi ena yiiloo , kuɓeeje e kaaƴe njanataa ?
Ko waɗi wuro ngoo alaa ndiyam ?
Ko welame mawɗo e tin'de mammadu lih ɓamtii yeewtere mum hanki e rajo Diamano fm .
Ko weli ɓe ko ɗuum wel maa
Ko weltaare am heewi e berndam haawatti rufde , mi weltaniima NDILLAAN e lefol kesol ngol kono mbeda andin ma e ngol metti hebde to dakar kay fuuta e kumbaaru , minen neh emin njidi dande heen ngam walludema e darnde mah ngam weltinde lenol ngol nande kala .
Ko weltaare am mawnde e ɗee gannde kese .
Ko weltaare mawde finde subaaka hawra e Fooyre Ɓamtaare he telefoŋ mum ngam janngude winndande Pulaar e finaa-tawaa pulaagu .
Ko weltaare mawnde ndañɗen hannde nde pinɗen keɓɗen tintinoore Fouta Vision wonnde ɓe keɓtii kanaal maɓɓe Youtube .
Ko weltaare tan haa jooni , hay huunde alaa ko beydetee heen so wonnaa yoo Geno sellin doole semmbina kala ngenndiyanke ; sabu ko e lowre maa ngon-dhaa
Ko wojere adii yarde , tuuti maaro e teewu .
Ko wonaa deftere makko jime , Ngatamaare ( Korse 2022 ) , waɗnde 50 yimre , o wallifiima kadi defte nay pentol ( Miilol ) mulaaɗe : Bii Tato ( 1992 ) , Tenngaade ( 1994 ) , Dono Woɗaaɓe ( 1995 ) , e Ngañgu Gilli ( 2004 ) .
Ko wonaa ɗum ko , ko 515 koninke pullo ( Haalpulaar ) .
Ko wonaa ɗum ko , ko arɓe e ngoo seppo ɓe , njimii , ngullii , luukii , cekkii ngam yiɗde riiwtude ndeeɗoo fenaande wonnde e Senegaal .
Ko wonaa ɗum ko , ɗemɗe kaalaaɗe toon ko Seereer , Sooninke , Wolof , Pulaar e ɗemngal Fareyse .
Ko wonaa ɗum ko ko eɓɓooji ndema biyeteeɗi Goana ɗi , ndaro-ɗen darnde laŋ hoto kolaaɗe men teeteede , mbaɗen eɓɓooji ndema paayodinɗi rewo e worgo mbele Fuuta ina seera e yowitaade e diiwanuuji goɗɗi walla caggal leydi .
Ko wonaa ɗum ko nde tawnoo Modiboo Keytaa ko neɗɗo jiɗɗo jam , yiɗani Afrik jam darinooma ñippi cumu walla fitina hakkunde ɓiɓɓe yumma hoɗdiiɓe Marok e Alaseri e ngal ɗoon pottital politik waɗanoo ko Bamako wuro laamorgo leydi Mali hanki Sudaa Farayseyanke .
Ko wonaa ɗum koo , enen fof eɗen nganndi , e sahaa hare , haa teeŋti e hare waɗnde nanngondiral , ko ɓurɗo heewde fitina oo heewi folleede .
Ko wonaa ɗum o hollitii jooɗnde nde pa’ndaale joyi laaɓtuɗe nde Fedde nde eɓɓi foɗɗoraade
Ko wonaa ɗuum , kaɓirɗe gaaci safalɓe biyeteeɗe ardiin e
Ko wonaa ɗuum kadi , resorde Google wiyeteende " Google Drive " ina woodi e ɗemɗe Afrik , hono Afrikaan , e Swaahili e Sulu e Amharik ( ɓurngal heewde haaleede to Ecopi ) ko ina wona lebbi jooni .
Ko wonaa ɗuum ko , maa waɗ mbaylaaji ngam miijtaade e hol ko woni kuccam mago-doge .
Ko wonaa ɗuum koo , depitee Kajjata Jallo seyfitii ngaal nanondiral cuuɗingal cili keewɗi nder Asaambele , yeeso hooreejo hilifaaɓe .
Ko wonaa ɗuum koo , o naamnaama ko faati e ko o huutorii ngalu leydi ndii , kanko e jaagorɗe makko e nder kampaañ mo ɓe mbaɗani UPR oo , o jaabii " ɗum ko haala tan , yimɓe ina ndefta heen " .
Ko woni Ebola ?
Ko woni Facebook ?
Ko woni goonga koo tan , ko demokaraasi ine woɗɗi en tawo , etee ina jeyaa e ko haɗi ɗum tabitde , leefgol juɓɓule gaddotooɗe ɗum , tawde wonii ko fotnooɓe reende ɗeen juɓɓule keewi felɓaade ɗe .
Ko woni heen goonga ?
Ko woni hoodere siirtatoonde ?
Ko woni jaabtawol tuumaaɓe ɓe ?
Ko woni manaango ?
Ko woni weeyo , to ngo fuɗɗii ?
Ko woni yiɗde maa kala keɓaa .
Ko woni ƴoƴre ?
Ko woodi koo ko neesu mbiyeteengu Oropiyankeewu , neesu hirnaangeyankeewu , hono no teeminanɗe ɗiɗi laamu ngaluyankeewu cehiri ngu , ngu hattanaani ñawndude caɗeele ɗiɗi mawnasɗe ɗe nguurndam maggu jibini : saɗeende liggam-miskinaagu e saɗeende njiimaadi ; haa so o noddaama e ñaawirgo " hakkille " walla e ñaawirgo " ngaanɗeeri " , oo Orop maa jogo mbaasndoolu hujjikinaade ; etee , omo ɓeydii haa jooni mogginaade caggal nguu naafigaagu wasɗungu haa o nattii jogaade fartaŋŋe waawde fuuntude .
Ko woodno hade ndeen ?
Ko wune mawɗo min ndañi " ɗum hollirii ko dental woni goonga .
Ko wuro Kayhayɗi o naatnaa duɗe laamu koloñaal .
Ko wuuri seertiri e ko wuuraani ko e
Ko yaakoranoo , tee fotnoo wonde , ko nde SNIM felliti ƴettude ngalu potngu nii heewde ( ina wiyee yettiima miliyaaruuji jeetati ( 8 ) ) , yo a taw ko huɓeere yooɗnde , ɓeydoore faayiida laamorgo leydi ndii , huɓeere feewnde , tiiɗnde , sabu njaru mum , feeñninoore baawal halfinaaɓe golle ɗee , haa gollooɓe mbaawa hoolaade , njiirondira huɓeere ndee ngam waɗde heen birooji mum en
Ko yeeso fayi !
Ko yeeso tan fayi
Ko yettere alla sabu eɗen njogii haalooɓe .
Ko yiyoto ( ko feeñani gite e masiŋaaji ) ko ɓuraani 5% e ko woodi andanaaka , nde majjere nde mawni , ɓe nginniri ɗum Ɓakdi ƁALEERI ( matière noire ) , ko majjere aadee tolnii ɗoon , ina anndi huunde ina woodi sabu yi'i batte mum , kono anndaa ko mahira !
Ko yiytaa jooni jooni koo teeŋtinii Afrik woni mbootu winndere sibu e fawaade e wiɗtooji kesi , caaktaaɗi ko ɓooyaani , ina gasa tawa innama aadee ( leñol men ngol ) idii feeñde ko to hirnaange leydi Botswana .
Ko yontere tan fawii heen , jombaajo makko heɓtii .
Ko yowitii e annabi Nuuhu noon , kañum e koreeji mum njoli ko e laana mumen , etee ko kañum fof adii jeertinde yimɓe ɗumɗoon .
Ko yowitii e nde wooteeji ɗii kala puɗɗotoo , hawraa ko ɗuum yo woppire CENI ( Goomu Ngenndi Jaambureewu toppitiingu Wooteeji ) toɗɗoo ɗum .
Ko yowitti noon e ko innirɗen " Ndesaaje leydi " ina wayi no oon fannu kam alaa ɗo tabitina tawo .
Ko zemngal neene joo mum 6amtata
Ko ñalnde 01/07/1751 , tumbbitere adannde Encyclopedie mo Diderot e d’Alembert yalti .
Ko ñalnde 11 abril elikopter-yel ngel fotnoo enndude diwde , kono ɗum dirtinaa haa 19 abril , sibu caɗeele teskanooma he laanel hee e nder hoolkiso sakkitinoongo waɗeede ngoo .
Ko ñalnde 26 Jolal 2021 , laamu Ecopia wiyi heɓtii laamorgo Tigere , Mekele .
Ko ñalnde 27 abriil biyeteeɗo Biraam wul Daa wul Abeyd duppunoo huunde e defte tuugorɗe laawol Maalik , ngol yoga e juulɓe Muritani e leyɗe hirnaange Afrik e Magreb tuugii ngol .
Ko ñalnde 28 Siilto 2006 waasaa fittaandu wootutu e ɓurɗi sirŋinanaade ƴellitaare renndo fulɓe , potal e ndenndaandi Muritani , gorko ceedaaɗo ko nafoore leñol tan woni darnde mum !
Ko ñalnde Mawbaare 4 Korse lewru
Ko ñalnde Talaata 12/04/2022 Abdulay Ali Malal Jallo , gardiiɗo Radio Tele Fulɓe naati ñiiɓirde CNRA yuɓɓo laamuyankeewu halfinaango rokkirde siññaaluuji Tele e reende kuule mum en he nder Senegaal .
Ko ñalnde alkamiisa 15 oktoobar 2020 waktu 10ɓ° , jaagorɗo nuunɗal wondude e jaagorɗo geɗe ndernderiije wondude e jaagorɗo golle laamu ( fonction publique ) ngari to ENA ngam udditde golle heblo ngoo .
Ko ñalnde sappo lewru suwee , caggal jaɓɓungal otooji , pucci e motooji , ñalɗi ɗii ngudditaa e gardagol Joom wuro Mbaañ e hoohooɓe mawɓe .
Ko ñande 13 lewru septembre ndu ngon-ɗen nduu , suka debbo biyeteeɗo Masha Amini jahroowo duuɓi 22 , jaggenoo .
Ko ñande naasaande 6 lewru korse 2007 musiɗɗo men Aamadu Jool nganndiranooɗo " Peti " Jool wonande Juude jaaɓinaaɓe ɓe o janngidnoo " ekkol " , Mamma Habii wonande dewol makko to Cubalel Laawo wuro neene makko jeyaa .
Ko ñiiɓi , e ko nelaaɗo Alla waɗatnoo to bannge konnguɗi e golle tawa wonaa huunde waɗɗinaande , wonaa kadi añaande so tawii neɗɗo yejjitii ɗum .
Ko ɓaleeɓe tan koɗnoo e oo nokku fof hade aarabeeɓe arde
Ko ɓe Siidi wul Seek Abdallaahi idinoo artirde e saawiye 2008 ɓee tan keɓi
Ko ɓe njaɓataa tabitinee e jaŋde Farayse e aarabeere e ɗemɗe goɗɗe , teskoraaɗe guurɗe ɗee , hol fof ɗo fawii eɓe njaɓa tabitinde ɗum ɗoo e pulaar , tee ɓe ɗaanotaako muk ha ɓe koyɗa waɗde yeru majjum e ɗeya ɗemɗe .
Ko ɓe puɗɗii gollaade , ɓe mbaawii waɗde ɗeeɗoo golle keewɗe faayiida
Ko ɓe ɓamti e dampowal he ina heewi , gila e hoggo ngo haa e looɗe kuɓɓam , yanti heen cereeli e geɗe goɗɗe meeɗnooɗe yahde to weeyo , woni ko ɓe kaljiti walla ala-e-sago ittee ko tenngaade nguleeki , korwe yiite et geɗe goɗɗe memnooɗe ndiyam geeci nde artaa e dow ɗaŋre nde .
Ko ɓee hoɓɓe bonɓe ngujji en .
Ko ɓee jiwɓe ɗoo holli conci .
Ko ɓeeɗoo mbaawi ɗaɓɓude wonde moritaninaaɓe , hitaande ko adii kellifuya mum en : – cukalel jibinangel caggal leydi , tawi yummum ko moritaninaajo , baaba mum ko arani .
Ko ɓooyaani en kawrii he winndannde Pulaar juutnde nde Porof .
Ko ɓooyaani ko , laamu Muritani ƴettii kuule kese ngam ittude ɗemngal Farayse he ɗemɗe kaalateeɗe he nder Batirdu Ngenndi he , ɓe lomtiinii ɗoon ɗemɗe ngenndiije Muritani , woni Pulaar Sooniŋkoore e Jolfe ( Wolof ) yantude e Arabeere .
Ko ɓooyaani ko Baagal kasinii gayni kuɓɓam mum , nde wonnoo ko kaŋjam yiiltatnoo baagal ngal , so ɗam gasii wayata ko no puccu ngu alaa labungal , ngal waawataa yiilteede no haanirta ni , wadde ndeen a ngal waawi yan'de walla felmaade goɗɗum .
Ko ɓooyaani ko en tariima winndannde he www .
Ko ɓooyaani ko ne to Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik , jimoowo lolluɗo ina wiyee Maykel Jakson ( o wuuraani jooni ) , ñeemtinaama e mbaadi lewndu ( annoore ) waɗi fijirde mawnde heewɓe nootiti heen , ellee tan mbiya ko kanko yimata , ƴeewee jokkol ngol
Ko ɓooyaani koo , halifaaɓe laamu nguu ina keewi wiyde wonde " doosiyee ndonaandi aadeeri uddaama !
Ko ɓooyaani koo kadi , Mammadu Saar , hooreejo Fonadh wiyii : " Ko min jokkuɓe hare .
Ko ɓooyaani koo lannda mon siifii nanondiral e lannda Ba'si Sirinaawa , ɗuum jibini kulol e nder renndo ngoo , mbele aɗa waawi jubbande en e loowdi ngaal piɓondiral ?
Ko ɓooyi so neɗɗo yiɗii tonngude huunde , diidatnoo ko e kaaƴe walla leɗɗe , waɗa maantoode mum , yahi haa ɓooyi ngommbudi yiitaa o waɗti huutoraade ɗum , daraaki ɗereeji mbaɗti feewnireede leɗɗe , huunde nde ɓeydii tan feewde e newaade wonan'de aadee .
Ko ɓosaa e Muritani gila Maawiiyaa yani ena heewi .
Ko ɓuraa sikkeede e jebbileede , koode ciirtatooɗe naatooje e weeyo leydi , ɗe njiyaten jamma ɗee , ngummotoo ko hakkunde tagofeere Supiteer e tagofeere Maars .
Ko ɓuri 200 000 neɗɗo jeyaaɓe e leyɗeele 140 njarlitiima feran'de Mbaañ , kono heewɓe ɓe ngonaa ɓeen ina njogii kulhuli e majjum , kono kadi ƴaaŋgal mawngal e ganndal fisik ina wiyee Gerard't Hooft , keɓnooɗo njeenaari Nobel hitaande 1999 , semmbinii yuɓɓo fedde Mars One .
Ko ɓuri 390 000 haayre kayhaytoore yiytaama e weeyo he , kono ko jogori heen yan'de e leydi ko ina limoo e peɗeeli juuɗe , etee ɗeen kaaƴe ngonaa mawɗe noon fof haa ko ina addana men faayre , ko maa haayre tolnoo 150 m walla ɓura nde booma .
Ko ɓuri bonxde fof ko liggoree , woni waɗeede sawru ferordu aɗa liɓana goɗɗo , so gasnii woppu ma , honde pineten e oo aduna !
Ko ɓuri faaynaade koo , ko harbiyaŋkooɓe tumaraŋkooɓe ummortooɓe leyɗeele goɗɗe , Fedde Dowlaaji Dentuɗi ( ONU ) ina qiimoo ɓe e 15 000 aadee ummiiɓe e 80 leyɗe goɗɗe e nder duuɗe ɗee kala : gila e leyɗeele golf , Orop , Ameriik haa Siin E nder hitaande 2015 , duɗal gootal karalleewal ko yowitii e dokkirgol sirruuji hollitii wonde soldateeɓe tumaraŋkooɓe ɓee tolnoyiima e 31 000 neɗɗo feccitiiɓe e ngooɗoo yeeso : 8 240 neɗɗo to fuɗɗaange hakkundeejo , 8 000 e Magreb , 5 000 e nder Orop hirnaange ( heen 1 700 ko faraysenaaɓe , 760 ko Almaañnaaɓe , 760 ko enngele en ) ko heddii koo ummorii ko wonnoo Dental Sowiyet ndeen ( 4 700 ) e 280 ummiiɓe Amerik bannge rewo .
Ko ɓuri hakkille won'de laaɓgu woodaani , heewii ɗo yiɗde humpitaade naatni neɗɗo ɗo yaltata , kono so on nji'i ganndal ɗo tolnii hannde , ko laaɓeede hakkille e golle won e geɗe neesu ( nature ) , neɗɗo ko ñemmboowo tan , ko yi'i kala maa etoo faamde no woniri , no gollirta waɗa feere no huutori , yelli feewa walla bona , ko ɓuri jaalaade ko o ŋata haa waya no o yiɗiri nih .
Ko ɓuri heen yooɗde ko sukaaɓe jibinaaɓe e Farayse , rewɓe resaaɓe e nayeeɓe , wonɓe e Farayse fof ngarii e ngoo seppo , ngam renndude ngoƴa .
Ko ɓuri heewde e artunooɓe e " gartugol ngol heblanaaka " walla e rewrude e PSIR ( fotde 50 000 neɗɗo ) ndañaani heɓtude kaayitaaji mum en , tee alaa fof feere sakkaa ngam ñawndude ɗuum .
Ko ɓuri heewde e koode ciirtatooɗe njaaweeki mum en ko kilomeeteruuji e kala leƴƴannde !
Ko ɓuri heewde e men ena nganndi hoodere jaayre ( ene wiyee kadi Wenus ) .
Ko ɓuri heewde e nokku biyeteeɗo Babilon oo wonnoo ko e leydi Irak hannde ndii .
Ko ɓuri heewde e semmbeeji FACT ko Caadnaaɓe ɓe leñol Goraan , leñol Hisen Haabere .
Ko ɓuri heewde e timtimi ɓooyataa e asamaan , ina wona heen fotde feccere waktu , timtimol ɓurngol ɓooyde e yiyeede waɗi ko jamɗe 6 dow ( 06 heures ) .
Ko ɓuri himmande en e ndee winndannde ko yiɗde laɓɓinande kala ɓiɗɗo leydi hol no neɗɗo jeyirtee e leydi Moritani ?
Ko ɓuri saɗtude waɗde ko haɗde masiŋaaji ɗi dartaade , tawa huunde kala ina yaha no haanirta nih e no yiɗiraa nih , ko ɗuum woni ko saɗi , sabu kala masiŋ ina bona daroo nde tijjaaka ( ɗaminaaka ) .
Ko ɓuri sikkeede , gaa gaa ko kewnoo he nokku ɗo buɓɓannde ndee waɗi ɗoo , hono ujunnaaje ujunnaaje kiloomeeteer taariiɗo ɗum , ɗo fof sumi haa royti ɗoon e ɗoon .
Ko ɓuri yaajde , hon wiyooɓe dillugol Leydi fawii ko e dillugol paɗe leydi : duunde Afrika ndee fawii ko e annama dinndeere nii ; diindeere nde ena yaha ( hay so nde yahrata ko seesa ) etee nde fayi ko bannge rewo , fayde Oorop ( leyɗeele tuubakooɓe ) .
Ko ɓuri ɗum bonde , gardiiɗo leydi hannde oo fof e hunanoode ñawndande ɓe caɗeele kaayitaaji , yimɓe fof ina nganndi wonde alaa ko laatii heen hannde .
Ko ɓuri ɗum bonde nii , to Maal , Barakna , gardiiɗo nokku mum binnditgol nanngaama , ina ankitee , sibu miijeede etiima winnditaade yimɓe njoyo wiyaaɓe ko Sengaalnaaɓe " .
Ko ɗee geɗe ngoni winndere , ko wonaa ɗee geɗe ko boowal ɓolal .
Ko ɗee kuuge kadi pawetee so tawii paltoor oo waɗaa ko he dow goomu , walla renndo , walla he terɗe mum , sabu edda ɓalndu mum , goobu mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum walla huunde e terɗe mum .
Ko ɗee ɗoo naamnde ɗiɗi pattamlame ngoni ɗe Ceerno Suleymaani Baal yooɓinoo e nder nguurndam mum fof .
Ko ɗeen geɗe ɓalliije ngoni ?
Ko ɗii dalillaaji ngaddani UNESCO wiyde wonde " semmbinde keewal ɗemɗe ngam naatnugol nder jaŋde e renndo " , alaa e sago rewra e jaŋde tuugiinde he ɗemngal neeniwal gila e sukaaɓe gaggaaɓe .
Ko ɗii galleeji ɗiɗi njibini teemedere e noogaas galle ngonɗo e wuro ngoo hannde .
Ko ɗii-ɗóó dalillaaji fóf ngaddani mi naŋtaade haa tiiɗi e pesooɗe ɗiɗi nane no fééñiri e Sawru Ganndal nii , sabu wowlaango ñaawi ko pesooɗe ɗiɗi , te ɗuum luural alaa e ɗuum ; ko ɗuum ndéwmi haa timmi ; mi waɗaani no wiyaaɓe yoo piy ɓóggi teemedere , ngari haa e capanɗe jóy , kaaɗi ɗoon sabu yurmaade larbeteeɗo oo e hulde huftude nguru kééci mum !
Ko ɗiiɗoo kabaruuji ɗi ngoodaani ngoni ko anndiraa hannde FAKE NEWS ( Engeleere ) walla INFOX ( Farayseere ) , walla KABAARU FENAANDE ( Pulaar ) .
Ko ɗo tuubakooɓe Farayse kalfiri leyɗe catiiɗe maayo Senegaal .
Ko ɗoo lappol ngol joofiri , ngol dawti ñalnde 28/7/2022 faade Nuwaasoot .
Ko ɗoo ngaccirno-ɗen winndannde men
Ko ɗoo nguurndam Laamaka baaba mum Nuuhu haaɗi .
Ko ɗoo woni maayo ndaayaan , minngel am .
Ko ɗoo yimɓe ɓee mbaynondiri , gooto fof hooti ena weltii , joftodoyi e : Jalluɗi Jam nawii ray !
Ko ɗooftagol ñaawoore ndee hinnde njuɓɓudi laamu lawakeere , addani nde wonde ñaawoore edda ɓalndu , ñaawoore leñol e tirbiiji e lanndaaji .
Ko ɗoon Aali Yero Joob ruttii he joomi mum tawi omo yahra he duuɓi 24 tan .
Ko ɗoon Basiiru Bah ho’reejo Fedde Almudɓe ƴetti konngol ngam sitinde jooɗnde nde ko tagnoo Fedde nde soseede e mawluuda , jamma jibineede Nulaaɗo men ( MJK ) e wi’de makko ɓe teskiima wonde wuro ngo ina waɗi almudɓe , etee hay go’to anndondiraa e goɗɗo oon .
Ko ɗoon Delafos ne rullini hoore mum e wilde nde o sañiri .
Ko ɗoon Faarmata yiiloyi maayo ndaayan e jamma hee .
Ko ɗoon Gelongal Fuuta lollirɗo Njaay Saydu Aamadu naatani
Ko ɗoon Goppaaɗo jokki laawol mum ina yaha .
Ko ɗoon Konngol artiraa haa e yeeso Cubalaagu , Yari maayo noddaa salaali waɗaa .
Ko ɗoon Konoo Baraaji , Meer Kayhayɗi naati kewu nguu , yetti
Ko ɗoon Sammunde jooɗii miijtii , hakkille makko yahii e to o rewdunoo e Wojere fof .
Ko ɗoon Waandu , e caaysayaagal mum , wiꞌi kañum ko koɗo woni innde mum .
Ko ɗoon Wojere wiꞌi joom wuro oo : hade mon fawde e am kuugal , mbiɗo ñaaagi noddon ñaawoɓe .
Ko ɗoon baaba Jeeri noddi ɓesngu mum , debbo heen e gorko ngam yiiloyaade Bojel .
Ko ɗoon calminten baaɗiraaɗo , ɓiɗɗo , almuudo hono Alasan Jallo , mo darnde mum seedtini e fannuuji keewɗi to bannge ɓamtaare .
Ko ɗoon cofel ruŋtii tawde haaju mum humtiima .
Ko ɗoon daande Hammaat Joobel seri , jamaanu moɗti poofaali , heɗtii .
Ko ɗoon daddoowo fawi kaɓirɗe mum .
Ko ɗoon e Piir , nder leydi jolfuɓe , jannguɓe haalpulaar en heblaaɓe e miijanteendi jihaadi cañi miijo dowla tuugiiɗo e Lislaam jogorɗo layde e nder diiwaan hee kala , e nder teeminanɗe keewɗe , gila e yonta almuraabit en haa yettii dillere Tubanan e teem XVIIɓiire .
Ko ɗoon futuro e geeƴe fof njuulaa .
Ko ɗoon gooto e maɓɓe kamɓe seppatnooɓe ɓee wiyi : " laamu nguu ko ko sukki noppi ena salii nande ko min kaalata koo kono so sokaaɓe ɓee ena lutti e kasoo , IRA luttat e mbedda .
Ko ɗoon kadi o heɓi alateret , o waynii , kanko e ɓesngu makko , a fayti wuro maɓɓe Ligiseyba Gorgol e hitaande 1987 .
Ko ɗoon kadi o waɗi eeraange feewde e wiyeteeɓe ko yontaaɓe leñol
Ko ɗoon neene Aysata noddi heddiiɓe ɓee ngam ɓe tiindoo to waandu joofii ɓe too .
Ko ɗoon o heblii haa o heɓi seedantaangal e ɗemngal makko neeniwal Pulaar , ñalnde 22 morso ( sulyee ) , hitaande 1987 .
Ko ɗoon o laatii joom faayiida , mo seeraani e suɓeede ngam yahdude e yimatnooɓe leele , noddetenooɓe haa Ndakaaru , laamorgo Senegaal .
Ko ɗoon o nehii , o naati jaŋde alquraana .
Ko ɗoon o wiꞌi mo : " yah lawƴoy horde ndee to maayo ndayaan jooni jooni Baaye oo etii naamnaade mo hol to maayo ndaayan heedi .
Ko ɗoon suka debbo gooto yettii-mi .
Ko ɗoon tan Fowru balli noppi bojel juutɗi ɗi , o weddii ɗum to huɗo koo ɓuri sukkude to .
Ko ɗoon tan fowru felti wiꞌi ngel : Cofel to njahataa aɗa taaɓoo ɗee laayɗe ?
Ko ɗoon tan nooroo yettini mo haala kaa ngam o rokka ñaawoore makko .
Ko ɗoon woni ɗo Demmbele Aamadu Sammba wiyata " celle ƴellitiima haa safrooɓe ceeki deedi .
Ko ɗoon yimɓe wuro ngoo puɗɗii koɗungu mumen .
Ko ɗoon yimɓe ɓee nduwondiri , mbaynondiri , huunde e seteeji ɗii dawti .
Ko ɗoon ɗo Gaawo ɗoo o naati jaŋde leslesre .
Ko ɗum addani Dental Pelle Ngenniije daraniiɗe Jojjanɗe Aadee ( FONADH ) e ballondiral e OXFAM INTERMON ( Gollorgal Espaañ ngal wonaa laamuyaŋkoore ) yuɓɓinde ñalnde 15 oktoobar 2016 ñalawma mawningol oon ñalawma e leegal Sokkojim P .
Ko ɗum addani fedde politik wiyeteende UFP yaltinde bayyinaango ñalnde 13 marse 2013 ngam " ɗaɓɓirde laamu nguu nde ittata denngaangal paddooje e sarɗiiji kaɗooji binnditagol , ko wayi no parlingol seedewol koɗaagu to Farayse " e " e wondude e hujjaaji Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe Farayse " .
Ko ɗum addani gooto e maɓɓe wiyde " laamu nguu ina foti nattude farlinde kartal koɗaagu e seedewol binnditagol 1998 .
Ko ɗum addani mi ɗaɓɓirde ma laɓɓitinande yimɓe kaa ngonka , kaalanaa min peeje ƴettu-ɗon ngam yaltinde ɓe e kaa ngonka mbonka , ndeeƴnaa ɓerɗe amen .
Ko ɗum addani ɓe daraade hannde e ñiŋde ndee feere nde laamu nguu ƴetti " yiɗde ɗawde ɓe ngenndaagu maɓɓe " , e gardagol Fedde Muritaninaaɓe Gollotooɓe to Farayse ( OTMF ) , yuɓɓinnde jeewte e seppo ngam ɗaɓɓude potndugol sarɗiiji wonande muritaninaaɓe fof , sibu , e wiyde Haymuut Bah , karallo ko faati e sariya , gonɗo Farayse ko ɓooyi " ɓiɗɓe leydi ɗiɗo mbaawaa ñaawreede sariyaaji ceertuɗe .
Ko ɗum addani-mi wiyde ko tagtatoo neɗɗo ko , ko gila e nehdi renndo .
Ko ɗum addi rogere tataɓere ndee , hono mettere subalɓe fawiinde e cubalaagu .
Ko ɗum cikkuɗa , waandu jabiimo .
Ko ɗum haani wonde jelogal maa .
Ko ɗum inta aanniinde .
Ko ɗum njiɗan-ɗaa leydi maa ?
Ko ɗum tagi , he duuɓi ɗiɗi paaɗi ɗii , Jokkorde pelle ɗee ine foti
Ko ɗum waɗi , e nder hiisa , so fof ɓetiraama kitaale men ɗe , hade Pulutoon taaraade naange laawol gootol haa arta ɗo wonnoo ( alla e mayre woɗɗude naange ) , tawat Leydi men ndi tariima naange laabi 248 ; Ɗum firti ko hitaande wootere to tagofeere Pulutoon , ko duuɓi men 248 .
Ko ɗum waɗi , e nder hiisa , so fof ɓetiraama kitaale men ɗee , hade Pulutoon taaraade naange , laawol gootol haa arta ɗo wonnoo ( alla e mayre woɗɗude naange ) , tawat Leydi men ndii taariima naange laabi 248 ; Ɗum firti ko hitaande wootere to tagofeere Pulutoon , ko duuɓi men 248 .
Ko ɗum waɗi , eɗen mbiya ɓesngu nguu , so e ngu felliti haɓde e mawngal ñabbuuli woni heege , yo ngu toppito demal woni PAAFAL , ngu sawndina ɗum CAAFAL woni ngaynaaka hono no leƴƴi aduna ɗii fof nii .
Ko ɗum waɗi , hay gooto yaawnaaki , kala ko aɗa haala , ardin miijo .
Ko ɗum waɗi Alla jangtiima daartol makko e nder Ɓuraana tedduɗo oo , e ko laatiino e yimɓe makko e ko jippinoo e yeddunooɓe mo , e mette ɗe ndañnoo ko wayi no : ilam ɗuufaan e hol no o daɗndiri ɓe , e wondunooɓe e jom laana en ɓee , tawi jiidaa e ko jangtaa he nder deftere Alla ndee ; ko wayi no cimooje garooje ɗoo ɗee : simoore Iiraafi , simoore Yuunus , simoore Huud , simoore Muuminuun , simoore Anmbiyaay , simoore yimooɓe , simoore Njambala , simoore Saafaati , simoore aktaribati .
Ko ɗum waɗi FLAM e pelle moritaninaaje seppude nyande 25/04/2009 e nder wuro Paris ngam waasa yejjiteede ooɗoo musiiba e ndeeɗoo boomaare , nde boomaa ɗum ɓaleeɓe Moritani , boomaare , nde woppaani hay ɓaleejo gooto .
Ko ɗum waɗi duɗe tati cuɓaama ngam gollondiral e mbaydi eɓɓoore ndee : Duɗal Siñcaan Sammba Cillo , Duɗal Tulde e Duɗal Gurel Saŋe .
Ko ɗum waɗi eɗen cikki laamu fotnoo tawo ko farlinde peccitagol leydi tawo " haa labbo fof dardoo e tunnde mum " caggal ɗum ɗoon noon yiɗɓe fof ina mbaawi ƴeewde hol no liggortoo leyɗeele mum en tawa kam jotondiral hakkunde maɓɓe nattii fawaade e ɓurondiral .
Ko ɗum waɗi nde ɓe njottii ndee , ɓe ñaagi ɗo ɓe njippi e ko ɓe ñaami .
Ko ɗum waɗi pelle Afrik CEDEAO e UA neli laaminooɗo Nijeriyaa hono Olusegun Obasanjo yoo ar Dakaar o rewindoo woote ɗee .
Ko ɗum waɗi pot-ɗen anndude wonde cellal ɓanndu yowitaaki e neɗɗo gooto tan .
Ko ɗum waɗi yimɓe ina poti anndude neɗɗo ina waawi
Ko ɗum waɗi ɓe potaani faaydeede e luulndiiɓe walla wonduɓe e laamu .
Ko ɗum waɗi ɓe ɗali ndeen ɓenni .
Ko ɗum ɓuri himmude e jiyanɗe kese ɗe laamu jogii hannde feewde e leydi ndemeteendi e nder waalo sabu teskaade dawrugol ɓennungol ngol ɓuri annominde kono dawrugol loppitgol jeyi waali-wuro en hoɗɓe daande maayo .
Ko ɗumɗoo addi mettere mawnde huutortooɓe ɓee ( huutorɓe ɓee ) e duñde won heen wagginde goppugol WhatsApp e kuutoragol jaaɓnirɗe goɗɗe baaɗe no SIGNAL .
Ko ɗumɗoo tan waawi addande leydi men daraade darnde seedtinde hakkunde leyɗe , ɗo waawata hollitde neɗɗaagu mum e keeriiɗi mum ummoriiɗi ɗum e nokku mo Aarabeeɓe e Afriknaaɓe ndenndi kam e ɓure diine lislaam .
Ko ɗuum addani Israayiil laawaade haa Benyamin Natanyahu wiyi wonde " ndee feere alaa ko firti " , usti piye mum e UNESCO laawol mum nayaɓol e ndee hitaande wootere .
Ko ɗuum addani Muhamad Bazum mo Niijeer wiyde " G5-Saahal maayii " caggal nde Mali uddi baafe mum .
Ko ɗuum addani NASA ummanaade sakkande nde haayre feere , sibu so nde buɓɓiima e Leydi men hee , ande waawi bonnude ko heewi .
Ko ɗuum addani dillere " #ExxonKnew " ( " Exxon ine anndunoo " ) feeñde ngam suurtude bonannde mum .
Ko ɗuum addani joɗnde 26ɓiire Mooɓondiral Kuuɓtodinngal Teddeele e Ɓetirɗe ( 26e Conférence Générale des Poids et Mesures ( CGPM ) ) jooɗinoonde tuggi 13 haa 16 noowammbar 2018 , waylude tuugorɗe ɓetirɗe yummaaje ɗee kala , rewrude e woote mo alaa luulndiiɗo denndaangal tawtoraaɓe joɗnde ndee .
Ko ɗuum addani luulndo wiyde " waɗdaani woote e UPR , waɗdi woote ko e laamu " .
Ko ɗuum addani maaje mawɗe ɗe haaɗde , ko ɓuri heewde e kaɗeeki majje ko lamɗam maa abbo e 77% ko heddii ko kaaɗeeki geɗe goɗɗe ɗe njiydaa e lamɗam .
Ko ɗuum addani min naatande haaldude e woɗɓe , gila e muritaninaaɓe ( tawo ) , kono alaa e mum en joginooɗo mbaawka tammbaade golle ɗee .
Ko ɗuum addanta ñalawmaaji ɗi njuutde won e nokkuuji e ndeer won e sahaaji ,
Ko ɗuum annduɓe ɓee peewniri batiri keewɗo ɓure : go’o omo moƴƴi he taariindi : so o werlaama , he nder lebbi ɗiɗi walla tati , tawata ko ɓuri feccere he makko ñaamtiima ( bakteriiji ñaamata mo ) ; ɗiɗi ( 2 ) , batiri oo ine waawi hebbineede laabi ujunere bonaani ; tati ( 3 ) , shitin ine heewi he dow leydi men ndii , sibu omo tawee kadi he pedane pobbi , he nder koowooje , walla he nder kedde ñaamdu ; nay ( 4 ) , batiri oo sumataa ( huɓɓataa ) .
Ko ɗuum fedde wiyateende KARITAS faami , nde ummanii golle toŋtugol sukaaɓe mbele ndaña golle e nokkuuji mumen , njooɗoo .
Ko ɗuum kadi jeyi sabaabu dentugol sosiyeteeji 8 , tawi ine jeyaa e mum en Facebook ( Amerik ) , e Orange ( Farayse ) e China Mobile International ( Siin ) , ngam sowtude ɓoggol giiɗal nder geec , ɓoggol inniraangol " 2Africa " , tuggi Laamaandi ndentundi ( Royaume Uni ) , rewra Purtugeec , ara fiiltoo Afrik haa hawra .
Ko ɗuum kadi woni miijo Axel Kahn , gooto e faraysenaaɓe annduɓe ndoniwal ɓurɓe mawnude , sibu o wiyi ñakku Siinuwaajo Sinopharm tuugiingu e " peeje-ɓooyɗe " , peewniraangu wirisaaji cammitaaɗi huutorii ko karallaagal ɓurngal newaade , ɓurngal yaajde ngam feewnude ñakku .
Ko ɗuum nii jey sabaabu gaddanɗo Baaba Maal yiɗde Goransson Ludwig ara Fuuta .
Ko ɗuum nii jeyi sabaabu leydi Siin ne daraade hannde ngam ruppaade ndeen yowitaare e añde daɗeede .
Ko ɗuum saabii gila ndeen haa hannde , yimɓe ɓuri yiɗde e yaawde jaɓde ko fenaande , yimɓe ɓuri horsinde ko penoowo , ko fenooɓe hannde njogii heɗatooɓe , sibu ɗaminaare .
Ko ɗuum saabii kuutorɗo keewɗe jooni kañum enne gabbiima yimɓe ɓee , mbela ena mbaasa woppeede , njejjitee genal mum’en yooloo , e ɗeen kuutorɗe eɗen mbaawi limde heen teleeji , rajooji , e defte ekn .
Ko ɗuum sabii , jooni ko gooto , gooto tan njiytaa jogiiɗo .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , haralleeɓe kisal he inernet , ceeraani e jeertinde yimɓe udditde jokkorde ( lien ) mo njananaaka to ummii , walla naatnude kabaruuji ( information ) ɗo laaɓaka .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , he nder diiño yawtungo ngoo , fedde OLAN ndee duƴƴiri ko ɗii ɗoo konnguɗi
Ko ɗuum waɗi , hikka , kawgel ngel yuɓɓinaa e ɗemɗe kaaleteeɗe e leydi ndii fof ( Arabe , Pulaar , Sooninke , Wolof e Farayse ) .
Ko ɗuum waɗi , o gidaa , o mugaa , o woni e siññude , joortaade ma mi yoɓto ko o waɗanoo mi e bonannde koo , maa mi leeɓtii mo , maa mi sokii mo , tawde mi wonii jooni Hooreejo Leydi Afrik di Siid .

Ko ɗuum waɗi eɗen eɓɓa geɗe kese oo sahaa .
Ko ɗuum waɗi gila feebariyee 2020 , pelle ɗee ine ndarii e sarde dallinannde ndee : waɗde jokkondire , e waɗde jeeyngal ngal dartaaki .
Ko ɗuum waɗi hinaa heewi yande e mbabba so oordii e nayi .
Ko ɗuum waɗi nde Nelaaɗo Alla ( Mjk ) faami sirlu e ɓure gonɗe e jaŋde , waɗi eeraango nde yimɓe njanngata , nde ɗaɓɓoyta gannde hay so tawii ko haa Shiin ɗe ngoni " .
Ko ɗuum waɗi waɗde haɓɓere lanndaaji luutndiiɗi , e dow feere tawassulu , ko feere henaniinde min no feewi sanne ; etee , eɗen nanndi , tuugaade e humpitooji men , ko ɗuum woni ɓurngol haande ngam tiindaade e laawol waylowaylo , ɗamaawu jogaaɗo e denndaangal dente leydi men .

Ko ɗuum wiyetee " peelelaagal karalle " : sikkude wonde karallaagal kesal ine waawi ñawndude caɗeele men fof .
Ko ɗuum wonat udditirde beeygol he dow Wakanda .

Kodduwaar e Gine kawrata e nayaɓal , Nijeriyaa e Ganaa .
Kodduwaar e Nijeriyaa kawrii ñamnde 21 Soolo e pelɓondiral ɓuji ngal yiɗɓe fuku kala padatnoo .
Kofi Annan , Gananaajo gonnooɗo Koolaaɗo Kuuɓal Fedde Ngenndiije Dentuɗe hakkunde 1997 e 2006 oo , maayii ñalnde aset 18 ut 2018 .
Koken ɗo yeruuji goɗɗi , ƴeewen e koye men mawneeki lewru e naange : kala jiyɗo naange walla lewru e gite mum , wiyata ko no ɗum wayi famɗude nih , yimɓe tato ena mbaawi ɗum roondaade !
Kokken yeru ko fayti mutgol naange e hol no neɗɗo yiyrata caafe naange e nder hojomaaji 8 cakkitiiɗi ɗii , tawa noo nge alaa ɗoon .
Kokken yeru ɗiɗaɓo
Kokken ɗo yeru goɗɗo .
Kokken ɗoo yeru : so neɗɗo yettoraama , yiɗii naatde taarorde saɗne , wiyaama yo fad hojmaaji 5 haa gonɗo nder taarorde ndee yalta , walla yo o fad , haa gaddoyɗo coktirɗe taarorde ndee arta , hojomaaji 5 ɗii leelirat mo , o sikkata nii yaa taw ɓetirgel makko waktuuji ngel , yaa taw daraaki .
Kokken ɗoo yeru goɗɗo : en kaaliino mbiy-ɗen Leydi waɗirta yiiloo-banngoo ko no kewal moti mottirtee nii .
Kolees : duuɓi 3Liisee : duuɓi 3Jojjugol naatnude he jaŋde hee fannu ganndondiral pine .
Koliyaaɓe fof coɗiima a yari .
Kollen boli ɗi tagopeeje 9 ɗe taardotoo naange , tagofeere fof ko e bolol mum ( laawol mum ) rewata ena taaroo naange .
Kollen ɗo Puluton e lewru mum .

Konngol hooreejo FƁPM
Konngol hooreejo leydi ndi e ɓesngu he ko huunde himmunde e oo sahaa sabu ko jaabtagol ngoƴaaji ɓesngu .
Konngol hoyreejo fedde : mawɗo fedde nde caggal calminaali e innde fedde nde innde fuutaŋkooɓe , o bismiima laawol goɗngol hoɓɓe ɓe ndenndaangal banndiraaɓe nootitiiɓe e hiirde nde .
Konngol kiintal tafaa ko 1853 e kuɗol Wiliyam Wilson , kono ngol fuɗɗii huutoreede tigi-tigi tan ko ummaade e 1927 fay hannde , oo fannu ɗowirɗo gannde ina waɗi nafoore sibu o heewi hollude yimɓe ko battande gannde , so moƴƴe so bonɗe , yimɓe mbaawa heen heɓde teskuya peewnita kala ko fay heen ɗo feewaani .

Kono nde tawnoo sahaaji , hay neɗɗo ene nannda e kullel , won e amen , woƴi ɗumen tan ko koye mumen .
Kono nde tawnoo so aadee woppidaama e sago mum ene heewi boyde , walla ama haa yalta dingiral , ko ɗuum waɗi , hay leyɗeele bellitɗe jaayndiyankooɓe ɗee ne , ene mbaɗi kanndal , woto gooto fof tan finde wiya ene jaayna , tawa anndaa no jaaynirta , anndaa ko foti jaaynude e ko fotaani jaaynude .
Kono nde wonnoo , wonaa miin wonaa aan wonaa goɗɗo hay gooto e men timmaani ken juulɓe , ken juulooɓe , kono ken juumooɓe .
Kono ndee wolde nde Abdul Kadeer umminnoo wonaano wolde hakkunde haalpulaar en e jolfuɓe , kono ko kaɓɓondiral hakkunde juulɓe yiɗnooɓe mbayliigu , Kayoornaaɓe , Waaloaaɓe e tooroɓɓe , ngam haɓde e laamuuji seɓɓe .
Kono ndeeɗoo hare jokki tan ko kareeli goɗɗi ɗii , e mbaydi kesiri .
Kono ndu woɗɗaani e kiin lekki .
Kono nduuɗoo iñcuru sudditii geɗe keewɗe , teeŋti noon e luural puɗɗinoongal feeñde hakkunde leydi Mali e Dowla Farayse : soldateeɓe Mali ina njawi , maa cikkitii nii , ballal leydi Farayse ngal , sabu bonannde jihadiyaŋkooɓe ɓee ustaaki e leydi hee , walla mbiyen nii ko ko ɓeydii , sabu alaa ɗo ɓe njettotaako he leydi hee , etee " lonngorɗe arme Farayse ina mbaawi yiytude hay metelli duɓooji e dow kaaƴe " walla tawo ɗe njiyata tan koko ɗe njiɗi yiyde , etee malinaaɓe ina ɗaɓɓi nde Farayse hormotoo ɗum e nder jotondire dowlaaji ɗiɗi ɗii .
Kono ngon wulaango yantude e gullitaali Aduna o kala , gila e laamuuji nuunɗuɗi , pelle adunankooje , pelle jojjanɗe aadee , pelle politik alaa ɗo keɗtaa sabu laamu caabinoongu ɗum dari ina yedda ko aduna fof anndi .
Kono ngooɗoo yuɓɓo ñawndaani caɗeele ɗemɗe winndere keddiiɗe ɗee : ɗuum addi cosgol Dental pelle ( Consortium ) Unicode .
Kono ngooɗoon losko e njiilawu maslahaa potaani diwde lajal lebbi ɗiɗi tuggi nde Waali oo heɓi doosiyee luural ngal .
Kono ngoƴaaji goɗɗi ina ɗoon , ko way no lohgol naange sabu ngoɗɗeeki , ko yottotoo e ciiñsiiñƴe ko waawataa nafde puɗi ɗi no haanirta nih , kono ɗuum kam ina waawi fewjaneede gite kuɓɓooje ( lampaaji ) tawa ɗe keɓata yiite ko e alluuje naange ( panneaux solaires ) .
Kono noon , ataliyee ɗiɗmo o hawrii e caɗeele teeŋtuɗe sibu kittugol ooɗoo gagga warngooji .
Kono noon , leyɗe jillaaɗe ɗee kala ina njogii caɗeele .
Kono noon dewgal ina waɗɗii e dow oon kattanɗo ɗum , tawde omo huli yande he ko harmi , so on kulaani noon yande he ko harmi , dewgal ko sunna he dow makko , ngam konngol nelaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) wiyi " eehey sagataaɓe , kala he mon kattanɗo dewgal , yo res .
Kono noon kadi enen ne hay so mbabba hani tan wiyee yo han pulaar !
Kono noon kadi sariya oo feeñi ko e yonta yooro mawngo , e caɗeele nguura , murtooji remooɓe ( hardaneeɓe ) keewɗi poɗantooɗi jeyi leydi teskaama e nder leydi hee , jibinɗi fitinaaji mawɗi , yeru to Qabra ( diiwaan Barkewol , 1980 ) e Mabruuk ( diiwaan Tamsaket , 1981 ) , jiidaani noon laamu , sabu mum yiɗde ummanaade eɓɓooji keewɗi to baŋnge ndema , ina hawra e caɗeele keewɗe palotooɗe ɗum , ( ɗum woni jeyi ganni oo ) .
Kono noon mo yiɗi ñulɓe , muñat cuurki .
Kono noon so tawii daaroggal ngal ndaarirtaa , Aduna ngal ena niɓɓiɗi ɓernde maa ena niɓɓini Aduna oo fof niɓɓiɗirte , hay ñalawma nanngirtaa ɗum ko jamma a waawa taa seerndude ko weli e ko metti , ko feewi e ko feewaani huunde fof nanngirtaa ɗum ko caɗeele .
Kono noon to fuuta tooro waɗtaama huwi – waɗii – gollii – yaltii – taarii " ko gollude ko haalaaka woni ɗoni ɗoon , ko yaltude wuro yaha ladde , ko taaraade suudu , yalin’de ndiyam ko haňde , coofe ko sifaa ko haňaa ko , sabu won kaňe goɗɗe ngoodi ɗe mbayaani noon .
Kono noon ɗum wanaa bifirɗe , ko noppi am .
Kono o jannginaani , sibu ɗoon e ɗoon o naatnaa konu koloñaal kanko e sehil makko mo o meeɗaa seertude hono porfesoor Hasan Sek ( gonɗo kalifu e cili keewɗi e laamu sosiyaalist en ) .
Kono o jaɓii yo ɓe mbirnu tuma nde kaaldu-mi e makko .
Kono o kam belɗo beltinɗo kala pooɗantooɗo ndimaagu , hannde oo suka ɓaleejo mo 47 wonii 44 laamɗo Amerik ; Martee literkiŋ koyɗol maa wontii goonga a tawaaka , Malkom X , Bob Marlee Mandelaa , Jumo keñataa jom Keñaa e woɗɓe ɓe mi limtaani , hannnde kala ɓaleejo ina tini won ko ɓeydii e mum ; hannde winndere ndee kala ina ndaarma ; monaaɓe e hooƴaaɓe kaɓɓi ɗaminaare ko e maa , haa winndere ndee deeƴa jam duumoo , potal timmungal e ngootaagu yooltee , yoo geno won baɗlo aamin
Kono o majjiraano laamu Farayse , sibu ina rewindii yah-ngartaa makko .
Kono oo Hammadi Sih dariiɗo hannde darnde Pulloori Galo Haawa jirwinii yeewtere ndee , Maamuudu Soomaa serkiti Bara Bulle e Eede Tonngo Maayel Jiboo .
Kono paamen tan , geɗe keewde paytuɗe e naange ɓetiraa ko hiisa , etee ko hiisa luggo ɓetirtee .
Kono paamen tawo hol ko woni hitaande .
Kono pulaar wiy : Kala ko wari haako mayda heen .
Kono sammunnde maayaani .
Kono so debbo e gorko wonduɓe heen ndesondirii , ene mbaawi dañde ɓinngel ngel rafi oo tampinta
Kono so en tiiɗnaaki maa en kele .
Kono so en ƴeewii , njuuteeki nyalwma to hoodere jaayre mbiyɗen ko balɗe men 243 .
Kono so neɗɗo yiɗii reenaade sarde fenaande , hol no waɗata ?
Kono so wontii ko kaɓe bayɗe no haɓre riisi e ikren ndee aduna o haɓata , ko ɗuum wontata ngoƳa yimɓe ɓee , ndeen maa majjere nde e baasal ngal peewnito e aduna he haa ňiɓa takke tiiɗa .
Kono tan , e miijo amen , ndee feere hesere ine luurondiri e hoore mum , sibu ko toɗɗii " kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi laamu " e " ñaawoowo " koo , ɓuri toɗɗaade kadi ko jannginoowo e cafroowo , kam e denndaangal mecce jowitiiɗe e mbaawka laamu .
Kono tan , e miijo annduɓe ko faati e weeyo , sikkannde nde buɓɓoo en ine famɗi no feewi , kono ine woodi .
Kono tan , e nder ngoo weeyo moƴƴanngo Ngootaagu Ngenndi – mbaɗanaangu seppo e gardagol Hooreejo leydi , Ñalawma fooftere joɓeteeɗo , Inniraa mbedda gonnooɗo e innde maande mawnde aarabeeɓe e afriknaaɓe e ceer-mond – so gooto e ɗiiɗoo koleneluuji 9 ɓeydananooma garaad , maa sukkatno kunuɗe ɓee bonnooɓe Ngootaagu Ngenndi , hono Ibraahiima , Sammba e Gurmo .
Kono tan , gila ndeen , Inndo e Pakistaan , e Israayiil , ɓe ciifaano tawo nanondiral ngal , peewni gooto fof kaɓirgal mum .
Kono tan , haa hannde , jinnaaɗo men Abuu Hammadi woppaani , wappaaki , wappitaaki janngoowo ndeeɗoo deftere haa o anndini ɗum nguurndam ɗam o wuurti caggal alateret makko , no o yahrunoo to dowla Farayse to duunde Orop , no o yahrunoo Makkatal Mukarram ngam fawtoyaade doosgal joyaɓal diine men , Lislaam cuɓaaɗo haa e njillu , ngu o waɗnoo to Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik ngam juuroyaade ɓesngu makko ngonnoongu toon .
Kono tan , so tawii ko nde jibinannde wuro ngoo waɗti ummitaade Ndakaaru walla e nokkuuji goɗɗi ngam arde yuɓɓinde mowluuda e nder Barooɓe Jakel , fuɗɗii ko e hitaande 1975 .
Kono tan dee won ko teski ɗen .
Kono tan feccaaka sikke , wonde won geɗe ganndaaɗe ballitooje ñawu nguu .
Kono tan ndeen kam neɗɗo hoyɗaani woodde saka tawee .
Kono tele Senegaal-naaɓe e tele miskiineeɓe , tele ɗe ngoŋka e nguurdam ko wayno jam , caɗeele , mbellemma mettere .
Kono to Abidjan , weeyo ngoo ena teddi no feewi e dow faayre hol no toɗɗe ɗee ngogori yahrude .
Kono to bannge Republiyankooɓe ɓee haysinno ko Trump yaakooraa ne , haɗaani kanndidaaji keewɗi cuutiino juuɗe mum en mbiy ene njiɗi suɓeede wonde mbir lannda republiyankooɓe he woote mawɗe ɗee .
Kono to bannge ciiñtugol , adii e nokku Seleŋ oo ko horndoldenaaj biyeteeɗo Sama , caggal nde Makam Paate holliti no tawri nokku oo .
Kono to bannge coñce , holi ko heblanoo to jimɗi e ngamri ?
Kono windere Talla nde fusii uure ndee .
Kono won goɗɗo mo a hulaani waynaade
Kono won wiyɓe so caɗeele ena njogori waɗde , wonaa to fitina yimɓe kono ko ŋakkere mawnde e nder njuɓɓudi toɗɗe ɗee .
Kono wona e leyɗeele men worgo ɗee tan ɗemɗe teppaa !
Kono wonaa ɗuum Anthony Blinken haali .
Kono wonaa ɗuum tan woni dille Leydi .
Kono wono kam ko waawi ɓetireede fo ko ko yahta tan yeeso , ruttaade kadi alaa , kala ko yawti artataa , ko arata ne ina yeeso tan !
Kono woto ngoɗɗitoɗen ɗeen ɗaŋeeje sabu won ko ɗe ndewni ko jari waɗtude hakkille .
Kono woto njawo-ɗen koye men , ƴeewen ñuuƴi e mettelli !
Kono woto njawoɗen koye men , ƴeewen nyuuƴi e mettelli !
Kono woto njejjiten , mbabba ko kullel ngel fulɓe nehi .
Kono wuurni Fooyre Ɓamtaare , gaa gaa Goomu Kumpital ɗe keewaani no feewi e ooɗoo sahaa , ko won ɗeen cate Fedde ndee potɗe yetteede : Catal Arafaat ( Nuwaasoot ) , Catal Nuwaadibu , Catal Kayhayɗi , Catal Likseyba Gorgol [ En ɓennataa ɗoo en innaani , njettani , Hammadi Sukki Mbooc e Sammba Gata Bah : mawɓe ɓe tampataa , ɓe coftal mum en ɓurtii ngal sagataaɓe ] , yantude e terɗe teelɗuɗe .
Kono yahde toon ɗaataani , sibu Jipiteer ina won'di e ciiñsiiñƴe bonnooje kala ko abbiti e elektronik , ɗuum noon wadde ko maa sakkanee feere hisnude masiŋaaji baage jahooje toon ɗe , kadi annduɓe ɓe ina poti laɓɓinde baage ɗe kala ko ina tunwina Orop e geɗe guurɗe e Leydi , so woodi ko ittaa e leydi ko wuuri ( so yiɗii tawa ko famarde ) ɗuum ina addana wiɗto ngo waasde rewde laawol , kadi ko bonnata ɓuri ko feewnata .
Kono yimre cayɗe weeɓaani faamde .
Kono Ɗuum kam eɗen mbaawi wiyde koɓe tappina koye maɓɓe tan .
Kono Ƴeewen hitaande e dow tagofeere hoodere jaayre : hitaande toon ko balɗe men 224 !
Kono ƴeewen noon , so mbuubu sooyniima cukalel ngel duuɓi 2 , wiyata " kooni ko o neɗɗo juuti balɗe !
Kono ɓaawo hitooji ɓurɗi ɗuuɗude ɗin e suɓngo sakkitiinde nde , ñannde 8/09/07 limtaama , yilaaji hollii wonde fedde Salaare APC nde no heedi yeeso fedde laamiinde nde , SLPP , ittiri hitooji heewɗi , si yaarii non , ko laamu APC darotoo hikka , ko Liyonaaɓe faaliraa non !
Kono ɓuri haawnaade fof ko ballal Iraan : Eey , Iraan heedani ko Armeni .
Kono ɓuri yiɗde ko ko wayi no edi e cawi e koobi e ndabi e tewdi e lelli e njawi e jeleŋŋi e bille e girji e jamali e koloŋi e dumsi e jeŋki e njabaaji ekn .
Kono ɓurondiral mawngal teskaama hakkunde majji .
Kono ɗaminaaka wonnde maa maayde Nawalni , jibin seppooji mawɗi , sabu caakagol lundiyankooɓe ɓe , teeŋti kadi e sabu kanko gonnooɗo hoodere maɓɓe jaayre o , gumminatnooɗo ɗiin seppooji o wirnaade .
Kono ɗeen leyɗeele biyeteeɗe ko kattanɗe ɓuri woƴeede ko dille gonɗe nder mum en , hono hare hakkunde Ukereen e Riisi .
Kono ɗo amen , emin nanngitii e oo ñalawma .
Kono ɗoo kadi heddii , ko so ngalɗoo kuulal ina deeƴna ɓernde , yo a taw sifaa e peeje ƴetteteeɗe ngam loskude haa tabitina " batte jiytiniiɗe " ɗee , ina ndewa laawol .
Kono ɗum firtaani ko ɓe heborɓe daɗde boomaare , alaa sabu kennebbe keewɗe doole , duleeɗi e ƴiiwooje ɓaleeje coomɗe majo-majo , ndergitta ko heedi e dow Leydi ko , cumuuji caroo baŋ-yoo-baŋ !
Kono ɗum fof ko waasnoonde hiisaade tuddinɓe e nder tanndalle ɗiɗi ɗee ( luulndo e wuuraniiɓe laamu ) , tanndalde wuuraniinde laamu ( keewal mum en jaɓri tan ko sabu gardiiɗo leydi ndii jaɓii ) ndee kam bettaani sabu gila e fuɗɗoode ɓe ngonanaani ɗuum , sabu ɗum wonaa e nafoore maɓɓe sabu ɓe njiɗaa ko yiɗaa wayleede koo waylee , sabu maa wood ko bonnani ɓe ( heewɓe e maɓɓe ko ceŋɗe laamu ɓennungu ) .
Kono ɗum haawaani en sibu eɗen nganndi , mawɗo Sileymaani Kan jeyaa ko e fuɗɗuɓe jaŋde pulaar he nder Muritani .
Kono ɗuum alaano caɗeele nde URSS woodnoo ndee , sibu e oon sahaa , leƴƴi mbaawaano iccitaade .
Kono ɗuum fof yonataa e waawnude balaas njulaagu oo , sibu won geɗe goɗɗe naattata heen , ko wayi no santaas weccudi .
Kono ɗuum haɗaani njulaagu nguu jokkude e suuɗaare , duuɓi capanɗe .
Kono ɗuum ko maa yaada e muñal e fellital tummungal , sabu yolnde ndee ena juuti laawol ngol ena ñaaɗi , tee nde ɓuroyɗaa woɗɗoyde heen fof ko noon ñaande ndee ɓeey dor too e maggol .

Konu1 .
Koo ɗoo kadi Gellaay hollirii wonde cubalaagu wonaa tan yettoode ndee walla wiyde ko hinnde nde jeyaa , cubalaagu ko ganndal tawo .
Koode cooynateeɗe e asamaan ɗe fof ko naangeeji ɓoli , so wonaa koode 8 ɗeen ko ɗaŋe ( planètes ) , tawde ko naangeeji ɓoli won heen ɓuri naange men mawnude e leerde , goɗɗi njaasi nge , ina foti wooda e ɗiin naangeeji ko rewnii ɗaŋe no naange men nge nih , tawa ɗeen ɗaŋe ina mbaɗi gonɗe e nokkuuji baawɗi huufde nguurndam , ɗiin nokkuuji ngoni ɗi ɓadaaki naangeeji haa nguleeki duppa huunde kala , ngoɗɗaani kadi haa huunde kala fenndo yoora kos .
Koode ndoogu ko mawɗe kono ko tokoose e cooynam , ɗe ceŋaaki e asamaan , ɗe lumboto e weeyo yaajngo luggiɗngo ,
Koode ɗee , tagopeeje ɗee e naange ngee , gootel fof lommbii ko e weeyo mum , weeyo mum woni njiimaandi mum : kala ko naati heen ko ko fooɗetee , tagoore ndee fooɗat ɗum ; kala ko yalti e diiwaan fooɗngo tagoore nde , waawataa yande e tagoore nde .

Koolaaɗo ciinugol Fonadh uddiri batu ngu ko yettude tawtoraaɓe ɓe kala e hirjinde rewɓe dowri wonɓe e nokkuuji ɗo eɓɓaande hesere nde hebori siineede ɗo nde cirŋintoo ndaroo laŋ mbele eɓɓaande nde ina waawa jaaƴoyaade mbele e nde waawa filliteede e nokkuuji goɗɗi .

Koolol Jowol 2023
Koolol Magodoge Afriknaaɓe " Dakar séries " Ko tuggude 2 haa 6 Duujal to Ndakaaru .
Koolol baɗnongol to wuro wiyateengo Helsinki ( laamorgo leydi Finlande ) e hitaande 1962 .
Koolol gadanol magooji-doge Afriknaaɓe ( Festival panafricain des séries télévisées ) ene jogori fuɗɗaade tuggude ñalnde 2 haa 6 Duujal ( Mai ) to .
Koolol gadanol magooji-doge Afriknaaɓe ( Festival panafricain des séries télévisées ) ene jogori fuɗɗaade tuggude ñalnde 2 haa 6 Duujal ( Mai ) to Dakaar lamarngo leydi Senegaal .
Koolol hikka ngol fof e waɗde e sahaa mo ruggiyankooɓe Aqmi urii ñaaki mbaɗti sajjitaade hoɓɓe jeyaaɓe leyɗeele Ngootaagu Orop .
Koolol sooninkooɓe to Nuwaasoot , Muritani
Koolol winnderewol sooninkooɓe jeeɗaɓol , hono FISO , udditii to estaad olempik Nuwaasoot ñalnde alarba 22 feebariyee 2023 , e tawtoreede Hooreejo leydi ndii , kam e Mawɗo jaagorɗe e jaagorɗe keewɗe laamu Muritani .

Kooniŋkooɓe ɓee cosii goomu ena wiyee conseil consultatif , toppitiingu toɗɗagol hooreejo lomto Laasana Kontee .
