Mbaydi 2 : doolnude " ziyaara " wuro
Mbaydi ma ko faaro maa .
Mbaydi ngadanndi ndii , ko rafi daaɓoowo arii , ko ɓuri heewde e fuutankooɓe koko ndonki faamde ɗum , haa addani ɗumen salaade rewde tiindinooje biyaaɗe ɗee , woni reentaade kala ko ngaadorinoo waɗde ( yahondirde hakkunde gure , salmondirirde juuɗe , waɗde dente e nder yanngeeji e kewuuji goɗɗi , sirƴude , haaktaade walla ñittaade ɗo welaa fof e no weliraa fof , ekn )
Mbaydi tataɓiri ndii , ko aratnooɓe e maɓɓe ene ɗaɓɓa wootaneede mbele laamoo fof , koko ndungtii , ene muɓɓi gite , ene cukki noppi , mbayi no tinaani ko geeƴ oo diirata koo .
Mbaydi ɗiɗaɓiri ndii ko , ngam reentaade daaɓondiral ngal , gooto fof wiyaama yo heddo e galle mum .
Mbaylaari ndi Barak Obamaa addaninoo Ameriknaaɓe e aduna oo kala fuɗɗiima yiyeede .
Mbayliigaaji he kuule Muritani ngam ƴellitde ɗemngal arabeere ɗii ene nduusondira e mbayliigaaji to bannge tippudi jaŋde e nehdi he nder leydi Muritani .
Mbayliigaaji kilimaa maa mbaɗtin kadi no feewi e ndema .
Mbayliigu 1999 : Ɗuum fof haɗaani laamu fusde DƊNG he hitaande 1999 e uddude duɗe seeɗa janngintooɗe ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee haa laɓi e hitaande 2005 .
Mbayliigu 1999 fellitaa ko he keñe ɓurtuɗe .
Mbayliigu kesu nguu foti tuugaade ko he jaŋde ɗemɗe neeniije , gila he duɗe gaggaaji , jaŋde lesre , haa ɗo ɓuri toowde , fawaade e humpito e heblo , sibu ko hakke wonande sukaaɓe ɓee fof , jaŋde gaddotoonde potal fartaŋŋeeji .
Mbayliigu ngonka weeyo maa baɗtin e cellal renndo , yeru , caragol won ɗiin ñabbuuli daaɓooji bayɗi no jontinooje , maa waylo no feewi : ɗum noon ɗiin ñabbuuli maa njetto e nokkuuji daɗnooɗi he mum en sibu ɓowɗi ngaddooji ɗum en ɗii eggat ummaade won ɗiin nokkuuji faade goɗɗi .
Mbayliigu ngonka weeyo maa baɗtin no feewi e yuɓɓo sato , tee ɗeen baɗte mbaɗtina kam enne e yimɓe , rewrude e sifaaji keewɗi : yeru ƴergol maaje , yeru he nokkuuji jiimɗi e maaje , haa teeŋti noon gonɗi e jupporɗe .
Mbayliigu nguu ine foti teeŋtinde darnde jannginooɓe , gila e heblo mum en , haa e ngonka mum en to bannge nguurndam , ngonka mum en he nder jaŋde , kaɓirɗe mum en .
Mbayliigu nguu siynaa tawi hoolkisaaka haa anndee ine yaha walla yahataa .
Mbayliigu pinal e ƴellitaare ganndal : Jubbannde he Daartol Encyclopédie .
Mbaɗen coñce he daaɗe cooji he nder cabbuli e cooji e ɗeeleeli he nder gure .
Mbaɗen coñce he daaɗe cooji he nder cabbuli e cooji e ɗeeleeli jillotooɗi gure .
Mbaɗten hakkille e ɓesnguuji men , sukaaɓe tokoosɓe hannde nani mbakki caawli mumen ina ɗannoo , njaha naata he ladde ALLAH e njereende .
Mbede weltii e ko njiimi darnde wiyoobe mbiimi y alla nowru dum yeeso .
Mbedo duno galle Saykou Omar Tall
Mbeelu ( spectre ) njuuteele wempeƴƴo ( longueurs d’ondes ) ina feccoo e pecce tati : heen feccere ko mbeelu ngu yiyotaako tolnondirnde e caafal dow-wiyolee , ( Ultra-violet ) heen feccere ko mbeelu njiyotoongu tolnondirngu e noorɗe/goobuuji timtimol , feccere heddiinde ndee ko mbeelu ngu yiyotaako tolnondirngu e les-boɗewol ( infra rouge ) .
Mbeewa yahi .
Mbekku Bah resii Idawaali mo o dañdi Alasan Ba meeɗnooɗo
Mbela hakkille ( ƴoƴre ) ina jaɓa jookeede ?
Mbela ko neɗɗo tan woodi e ngoo weeyo yaajngo , ngo koode e tagopeeje ɗe limotaako ?
Mbela ndiyam wona ndeelam ɗaŋre nde ɗam woni nde fotaani ɓadaade Naange no feewi , fotaani kaddi woɗɗude haa ɓurta , so woɗɗii no feewi ndiyam fenndoto haa yoora wonta ɓooɗde , so ñoosiima e naange no feewi wawña haa wonta cuurki faya dow .
Mbela nguurndam woodi tan ko e mbaadi ndi ngandirɗen ɗam ndi ?
Mbela omo faarnorii ko oo woni koo pullo walla ala
Mbela safaara o rafi ina woodi ?
Mbela won ko fuɗata e leydi Mars .
Mbela won wuurɓe to Mars ?
Mbele Afrik heddoto e huwtoraade ɗemɗe
Mbele Ameriknaaɓe e leyɗe goɗɗe jiylotooɗe yahde lewru ɓee ngoni ko e heblude " eggugol aadee faade ɗaŋre woɗnde " so tawii Ngaawe nattii hoɗaade ?
Mbele Blaise Compawore maa tawtore ñaawoore nde ?
Mbele Internet gratuit ne woodi Internet taw hay mbuuɗu a yoɓaani nde welmaa fof ene weldu maa fof .
Mbele amin mbaawi ndarnude leɗɗe tammbatooɗe mbildi ndii ?
Mbele fulɓe wonɓe kameruun ɓee ina mbaawi heddaade e daliilu maaɗa oo ?
Mbele gabrielle ko juulɗo
Mbele ina woodi woɗɓe nannganooɓe janninooɓe ɓe ?
Mbele ko lewru ɓallittoo leydi sahaa e sahaa koo fof ina waawi saabaade yerɓo leydi e no won heen mbiyri nii ?
Mbele ko ngelɗoo partiyel ngel woɗɗaano miijooji federaaliiji Seengoor jibini pelle innitirtooɗe hakkeeji ɓaleeɓe e leydi ndii hannde ɗii ?
Mbele ko noon pot-ɗen hannde siforaade " kaaldigal ngenndi " urɓetenoo ngal oo dumunna fof , wonde wontii ƴiiwoonde saaynde , walla mbiyen tan ko e keneeli demminaare tan jeyanoo , kono ƴiiwoonde fadtanoonde ndee yettaaki tawo .
Mbele ko wolde woɗnde fuɗɗittoo he damal Orop ?
Mbele maa en mbaaw hankadi yilloyaade tagopeeje " puneeje leydi " ?
Mbele maale ɗee tan njonii ngam anndude neɗɗo ene wondi heen ?
Mbele omo faarnorii Pulaagu ?
Mbele safaara o rafi ina woodi ?
Mbele won kaɓirgel goɗngel seŋetee he telefoŋ hee ?
Mbele wonaa ko ɗuum woni ko orop e amerik mballata ikren e kaɓtorɗe ngam huccondirde e riisi ?
Mbele wonaa ɗuum woni ko Nelaaɗo Alla , ( mo Jam e Kisal ngoni e mum ) wasiyii juulɓe nde wiyata : " Goongɗingol neɗɗo timmataa so wonaa nde o yiɗani banndiiko , ko o yiɗani hoore makko koo " .
Mbele ñaawde ɓee ina joori weeɓde ?
Mbele ñaw ngu ina safroo ?
Mbele ɗum firti ko maa ƴoƴre tafaande heɓto aadee to bannge ƴoƴre ?

Mbinndiin : kelme tokaraaje
Mbiruuji ɗii fof e waalde ɓetondirde e gubbondirde , lammba kaa waɗoyi ko kikiiɗe janngo , ñalnde 7 siilo 2023 to Dingiral Ngenndi .
Mbiy-mi kala vizzo pullo danyzo renndi e fulve yoo Allah vesdanzum haa heewa .
Mbiy-ɗen njuuteeki ñalawma e dow tagofeere men Leydi ndi nguur-ɗen e dow mum ndi ko waktuuji 24 .
Mbiyaten naange fuɗii , ko nde njiy-ɗen mbuuɗu naange ngee fuɗnaange ; nge mutii , nde nattu-ɗen yiyde mbuuɗu nguu .
Mbiyen jinnaaɗo men Abuu Hammadi Dem wuurii , maa o wuur , kadi o maayataa haa bada e nder ɓerɗe ngenndiyankooɓe Leñol ngol .
Mbiyen tan humpitooji keewɗi ndañaama toon , gila e jotondiral hakkunde pelle daraniiɗe ɓamtaare ndema haa e ngaynaaka e jojjanɗe aadee .
Mbiyen ɓesngu Kawral Commune Saŋe Loobaali , gure mum 12 e cate mum 10 ɗee paamii , ndentii , ndadiima , ndariima , ndaraniima ko heewɓe e adinooɓe mbaɗaano , ko sakkitiiɓe njogori ñemmbude so ummanaade Ɓamtaare nokku mumen .
Mbiyeten tan waɗde ko haaleteenoo adan koo , ko jeeyngal wonnoo , " ko piyanɗe gaɓɓule ɓurnoo heen heewde " wonannde Ministeer laamu ngu toppitiiɗo cellal haa ko ina sikka e nder aduna oo fof , ko kuule ƴettaaɗe e nder leydi he mbaawi falaade raaɓo-raaɓo ñaw ngu , kono ngannden tan mboros gonduɗo e " niɓinirki " sappantaake !
Mbiyɗen Leydi waɗata ko yiiloo-banngoo e hoyre mum , kadi wona e taaraade naange .
Mbiyɗen ɗi ngala hakkillaaji , ɗi pewjataa , ɗi mbaawaa miijaade ?
Mbiɗo joginoo nimsa , mbiɗo jogii cukalel tokosel , ko ngel tawtoranooka duɗe jariborɗe ko , heddiiɓe ɓee fof , yettere Alla , tawtoraama duɗe jariborɗe , ko heen njanngi .
Mbiɗo mi yaha tan sabu pellitɗo aanaani .
Mbiɗo sikki joom wuro oo ko jejjitɗo maa .
Mbiɗo yenenaa a nimsataa ɗum .
Mboni e men foi na anndi sooti ( kemoryel , janngooyel ) walla nani ɗum , sooti ko koowoyel pooynowel jamma , fooyre nde ko caggal nde woni , ina heewi yiyeede ladde ina lewña , so memaama wonta peete saro , ndeen fooyre wonaa wulnde sabu ngool jayngol wonaa ganndangol ngol , hay peete ɗe ina kulɓina esi ɗe ngonaa cumooje .
Mboni fof so waɗii ko haqqe baawɗe mum e fannu mo heedi o ; en ndenndinii maa wood ko heɓaa e njeeñcudi .
Mboni kala e men , ko e yahdu hulɓiniidu njaaweendi woni , kono tinɗen heen tan koko mbaɗanten ko'e men ko , so en njahru koyɗe , mbaɗɗiɗen , walla en njol .
Mboorkal ngal moofti ko aaludere kañum ne ko jamɗe taayɗe ɓuri heen heewde , kadi ko ngaal laral ɓuri deelɗude e wulde , so ngal yiyatono gite men kaɗtanta ƴeewde ngal sabu jalbude ; nguleeki maggal ina tolnoo e 4300 degre .
Mboros COVID-19 ɓuri yaawde warde ko nayeeɓe .
Mboɗo seedtoo wonde jaaynde Fooyre ko ñemtinirgal potngal waɗteede hakkille no feewi to batte finndinde e to batte sarde taro ɗemngal Pulaar .
Mboɗo sikki ko ardii kala , ko waɗɗii e wonde en Moritaninaaɓe , ko haɓanaade keeri men , huuɓnude kisal men enen e hoɓɓe men .
Mbunndi mbunndi haala kaa , hay so tawii haalaaka , ellee ko cikkitagol ma a taw won e maɓɓe keɓii ngenndaagu ngoɗngu , ɓooroowu joom mum en ngenndaagu Muritani .
Mbuuɗu mawngu njiyeteengu e lewlewal
Me Gurmo Loh kam fuɗɗiima wiyde " awokaaji faraysenaaɓe ɓee ngari ko waɗde tuurisma ŋoriijo ñaawoore " .
Meer Baabaaɓe , Abdullaay Mammadu Bah : " ciftoren darnde makko e nder kitaale caɗtuɗe ɗee , o felliti woppude fof ( o woppi hay galle gooto mo o fagginoo to socogim ) ngam yahde to o waawnoo haɓtaade e suurtude bonnandeeji kitaale 90 Ko ɓuri haawnaade he makko kadi , ko salaare makko jawdi aduna .
Meeɗiino e sahaaji jawtuɗi , gorko gooto , ñawu heɓi mo .

Mehre mehre hakkunde doge !
Mehre woppaani wiige e wiinde .

Memtinaari ina feccoo e pecce ɗiɗi
Memtinaari woni kala ko yiyotoo , ko memotoo , wallo ko tinotoo .
Memtinaari wuurndi ( Protoplasm ) , walla rigi wuurɗo , ko kañum mahi ɓalli kala ko wuuri : So puɗol walla ko kullel .
Merkiir ko hoodere teskaande e kammu ko ɓooyi , nde yahrata e kammu ko no Fecca yahrata nih , soppoo-joloo , waɗa saha nde heeda fuɗnaange goɗɗo nde heeda hirnaange , nde wonnoo noon e nde famɗi , yiide nde weeɓaani , yanti heen nde wonaa toowoore no feewi , nde heewaani woɗɗude weetndoogo walla mutirɗi naange , ɗo nde welata yiide ɗo taw nde yooloyiima .
Mesii noon , hankati so welaama ine waawi fooftoyaade , sibu dañii he fuku koyngel kala ko pettoowo waawnoo heɓde heen to bannge mbaawka e to bannge dañal .
Metaan , kenal nguurndam
Metaan jiyaaɗo to Mars o ko e punndi leydi tagofeere he ummoto , teeŋnti e wiiduru ina toon ɓe inniri ndu Gaal , deegowal nulanongal toon hono Kiriyoositi heɓiino heɓɓaade kaal kenal e oon nokku , kono Kiriyoositi jogaaki ko ina walla ɗum humpitaade goodagol nguurndam pamaram ( bakteri ) toon .
Metaan ko kenal keewngal ummaade e ko waɗi wonki , kono kadi a kal ummoo e kaaƴe , ko ɓooyaani ko metaan yiitaama e dow Mars kono suwa anndeede so tawi ko kulle guurɗe ngoppata kal walla ko kaaƴe leydi Mars ndi .
Mette Nuuhu feewde e leñol mum
Mettere ɓiɓɓe subalɓe woni mettere jaaltaaɓe .
Mi Liggiima e Fedde SCA , ko Fedde mawnde mbaylaandi e nder Wuro Manhaam gila 2003 haa 2009 .
Mi Salminii on buy
Mi abboo haayre Jiinge .
Mi anndaa so tawii janngiyankooɓe Fooyre fof ene nganndidi to leydi amen heedi e duunde baaba Aadama hee , kono emin njogii caɗeele to bannge dawrugol .
Mi añataa ngol haa laakara .
Mi de salmina fulbe to ngoni e mbedu leydi fu .
Mi duwaniima Ibraahiima SAAR e galle mumen fof .
Mi duwaniima leñol ngol fof he ndee ustaare , teeŋti e Ceerno Kayyaa Joob , Mammadu Saar , Mammadu Aamadu Lih , musidɗo am , giɗo leñol ngol hono sokna Sala Maamuudu Jaaltaaɓe mo Mbaañ e joom galle mum Muusaa Elimaan Joob wonɓe Tuluus .
Mi faamii jaabow maa , mi weltiima heen no feewi .
Mi haala ko woni e am ko en un'doo6e 6e naafze njiyataa henndu
Mi haalantaa on rewɓe , ɓe kootone mum en ɗuggitaa e noppi mum en , njahdi e kette teewu , e woɗɓe leldaaɓe e geece worɓe mum en , ɓeɓɓe mum en e esiraaɓe mum en .
Mi haalataa fellaaɓe , mbaraa , hitaande 1987 , hono Seydi BAH , Saydu SIH , Aamadu SAAR .
Mi haaldaani ɗum yiɗandeɓe kono sinno ko leydi Farayse ɗum waɗnoo hay Makki sal ko ɗuum waalata haalde mi haalaani #RTS teleeji goɗɗi e ko nanndi heen .
Mi heɗtiima widewooji e ojooji yiɗɓe yuɓɓitin’de haala Farba Ngom kono pulaar ena wiya so konngol rufii hoccataako .
Mi hokka on yeru : So aɗa joli e Oto , tawa Oto o ena doga doole , so yimɓe e leɗɗe walla jawdi ena ndarii sara laawol ngol ( sara kallu o ) tawa ko yeeso Oto o ɓe keedti , so aɗa ndaara ɓe , cikkata ko kamɓe ndiiranta Oto o , njiya leɗɗe dariiɗe ena mbirtoo Oto o eɗe payi caggal .
Mi hokka on yeru : e nder laana ndiwoowa ndiwka , so a ka yaha yahdu feewndu ka yerɓaani , so neɗɗo ena yaha e nder makka , ( e nder laana ka ) , wayata ɗum ko no yahata ko e dow leydi nii .
Mi hokku tan yeru mbele eɗen ceernda limgol nyalawmaji e jotondirde ɗum e hitaande .
Mi hokku tan yeru mbele eɗen ceernda limgol ñalawmaji e jotondirde ɗum e hitaande .
Mi hulaani ma , ko ɗuum Sammba jaabi nooro oo .
Mi jaaboo Alaa
Mi jaɓii kono hol no ɗum yahrata ?
Mi meedaah sikkude Kaawiraado ina ja6a yandinde baaDum .
Mi meeɗaa seerde e haaweede , so miɗo jannga ciimti golwole hakkunde leƴƴi baɗooje e leyɗe goɗɗe , hol no yimɓe wuurdunooɓe e jam , mbattinirta warondirde no jawdi nii .
Mi nanii ngenndiyanke mawɗo e nder leñol ngol ina manta mo , ina jaara mo belngol ( Mi haalataa ɗoo innde ngenndiyanke oo , kono o jeyaa ko e ɓurɓe yaakoreede e leñol ngol ) , kono miin mboɗo ronki anndude holi to ndee jaaroore fawii ?
Mi nduñii min payi Pari .
Mi neldii duwaawu , mi ñaagiima duwaawu .
Mi raaŋana haayre tekkere .
Mi reenti geese pulaar sabu suwaa hay fuzzaade hoyre-am-hoyraagu e baztondiral hakkille peeñii ina heewi ndoostii-mi .
Mi reenti tan !
Mi refta e konngol haaliyanke jiynooɗo ko faamaani , haawaa huli wiyi " ko woni ko ɗum haawnii haaɓnii no suudu wiinndu , niɓɓuru , ruŋtiindu wuro , yulndu e wuttulo " .
Mi riiwtaani ko minyi am Aliw KONTE haali e nuunzal e ganndal Seek Tijjaaane GAAJO ko .
Mi rokkima fetel mo tawataa e les ɓokki kii .
Mi salmini on banndiraa6e am ful6e njafodon en ngala clavier fulfulde kono ko welamma wadimi ngado beño ngam yiidemi binndande pulaar e nder ngo hello sabu heewi ko naati hannde e nder kelle he kono ko pine lejji ( ethni ) goddi tan yiyata walla yiiloto .
Mi salminii , mi juuriima .
Mi salminii fof on njaaraama
Mi salminii kala kaɓantooɗo ɓamtaare ɗemɗe ngenndiije e jojjannde aadee he winndere .
Mi salminii on bandiraabhe .
Mi salminii on buy wonaa seeɗa .
Mi salminiima Mammadu Abuu Lih ah yaafo Caam .
Mi salminiima mi ɗa weltni maa sanne
Mi salmonii on mi yettii kaaddi njettoor sibau darnde mon e leniol hee , miin mi naatii e KJPF gilo 2006 kono maa won jooni lebbi 3 mi ronkii udditde site so tawii wonko waylaa heen tiinno dee kumpitee kam .
Mi seeraani e miijtaade e majjum , miin fof e waasde wonde tergal e laamu , ko mi liggotooɗo jambureejo e jannganaawu , fotde duuɓi capanɗe nayi , ngam haɓanaade ɗemɗe ngenndiije yo keɓ geɗal mumen e nder janngirɗe laamu , haa e denndaangal gollorɗe mum goɗɗe .
Mi waawaa yejjitde golle laamu Senegaal , golle HCR [ fedde daraniinde mooliiɓe ] , caɗeele ɗe min ndañi e woowtude nguurdam kesam ɗam , mette keɓaaɗe e ɗooftaade kuuwle ɓittooje pawiiɗe e mooliiɓe Hay gooto siiftoraani mooliiɓe ɓee sabu ko bonandeeji ɗii tan yimɓe ngoƴanoo .
Mi weltiima e golle ɗee no feewi ,
Mi weltike fota !
Mi weltoriima janngude ko yowitii he darnde naalaŋke men Pennda Budal Saar .
Mi wiya on tan Alla heboraani neldude en malayki , o heboraai en neldude jinneeji kaɓanee en .
Mi wiyiino e alluwal ɓennungal ngal , wonnde ɓeen wonduɓe e jabet fannu 1 ina cokli waɗteede Insulin e kala ñalawma , so ɗuum alaa nguurndam maɓɓe laatotaako .
Mi yaafiima ma e ɓernde ɓuuɓnde sabu aɗa nanndi mi e cofel kirowel jodgingel fayiida .
Mi yamirii hade naange ngee mutde , yoo ɓesngu am nguu moɗe .
Mi yejjittaa haalde rewɓe deedi en , ɓe deedi mum en ceekaa , ƴeewde no ɓiɓɓe lelorii e deedi mum en , ko jiidaa e worɓe senaaɓe , walla tappaaɓe , tawa alaa ko mbiyi , alaa ko mbaɗi , so wonaa won’de ɓaleeɓe tan .
Mi yettii Ibrahiima Saar e tiinnaare mum feewde e leniol ngol e denndaangal banndiraabe daraniibe bamtaare Pulaar .
Mi yettii kala karallo mo wazaani ganndal mum vellel gajjal , kono mi teenqtina njettoor fayde he tokara am Ibraahiima walla Muusaa Saar , mo Geno yezi ganndal , karallaagal e coftal gon'dungal e yananeede ko yonta mum laavndii .
Mi yettii on hatanteebe lenyol .
Mi yii mo , a salminii mo , en kóófniima ɓe , ko nii póti winndireede , wóni ceera haa laaɓa e kóŋnguɗi gardiiɗi ɗumen ɗii .
Mi yiyi mette haa ko ɗoon haaɗata , mi waasii kala ko njoginoo-mi e nder balɗe haa keddoraa-mi tan ko comci ɗi ɓoornii-mi .
Mi yiyii e ndee winndannde , nde abdul bookar wari el fekki , o lomtini ko farba jowol , ɗiɗo fof koy ngenaar njeyaa , mbbele o seerndu rewo e worgo , walla holno ɗum wonirnoo ?
Mi ñaagiima yaafuya ngam wonɗo njuummi ; ( jamma e wittude ganndal e ɗemngal pulaar ) .
Mi ñiŋa ɓe kolñaal husni feewde e maa haa njanfi maa .

Micheal Steel , ɓaleejo gardiiɗo lannda Republicain en e haala daɗaani kure laañe Obama .
Mido duwono ma he sankaarejiknaado o .
Miijiyankooɓe : Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz ( ganndo kadi ko faati e hiisa ) ; Emmanuel Kant ; Johann Gottlieb Fichte ; Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel , Friedrich Engels ; Karl Marx ; Friedrich Nietzsche ; e woɗɓe heewɓe .
Miijo Manndelaa : Ko Manndelaa wiynoo " baasal ɓurtungal e ɓurondire nefniiɗe ngoni musiiba ɓurɗo bonɗe e nder yonta men hannde ; kam e njiyaagu e paltoor " .
Miijo adanngo : ko caakagol he weeyo cuurki e punndi keewndi ( buɓɓannde ndee ko mawnde , doolnunde ) sabu mawneeki haayre ndee e njaaweendi mum ( ine wiyee kalitannde ndee ine sowoo laawi miliyaaruuji 5 kalitannde bommbo atomik Hiroshima ) : ɗum addi caakagol he weeyo punndi e keletine kaaƴon ummiiɗe e haayre hee e leydi ɗo buɓɓii ɗoo , ɗuum suddi naange , higgu moolanaaɗo huurii e Leydi ndii dumunna juutɗo , fotde lebbi keewɗi ; saabii baɗte bonɗe he dow nguurndam : Puɗi ( leɗɗe e kuɗooli ) natti yiyde naange , njoori ( fotosentees natti aaɓnaade ) .
Miijo mawningol Innde Nelaaɗo
Miijo men e nder taƴre e dekere o
Miijo men heen
Miijo men ko yowitii e ngalɗoo damal , panndo-ɗen haa ngal uddee nde mbaawen silde sariya oo ko yowitii e oo fannu sabu eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko ɓuri tiiɗde e sariya jeyi leydi mo toŋ 83 127 ñalnde 5 suwee 1983 ko ɗoo fawii , sabu ma a taw ko ɗum ɓurnoo himmande tabitinooɓe sariya oo .
Miijo ngoo nde addaa e 1980 , annduɓe heewɓe luulndiima ɗum , teemedde teemedde winndannde mbaɗaama heen , kono yimɓe heewɓe ine ɓeydoo jaɓde miijo ngoo ñalnde kala .
Miijo pelle pinal he eɓɓaande sariya kuccam
Miijo suɓngo jontaaɗo Fulɓe , e wiyde Yaayaa Habooy Dem , ummorii ko e musiɗɗo Ibraahiima Muktaar Daree Saar .
Miijo waɗde ɗii ñalɗi ummii ko he ɓiyɓe Ciloñnaaɓe wonnooɓe Ferayse ene denti he fedde wiyeteende Thilogne Association et développement ( Ɓural Ciloñ ) .
Miijo yuɓɓinde lappol he nder leydi ndii ummorii ko he joɗnde Mooɓondiral 7ɓiire FƁPM , nde cate ɗee ngoytii meeɗaa yilleede he duuɓi 20 cakkitiiɗi ɗii .
Miijo-ɗen , miijo-ɗen e nder mbunndi .
Miijooji cakkitaama , holi no gagga galle oo ñawdortoo ?
Miijooji e diineeji kewɗi ngoodii ko adii hannde .
Miijooji e jiyle politik ine mbattina e politikaaji ɗemngal jaŋde ( PƊJ ) .
Miijooji e wasiyaaji e kuule teskinɗe wonande gagga hardaneeɓe , gagga jibinannde jiyaaɓe nder leƴƴi ɓaleeji ; wonande kadi paltooraaji taweteeɗi e leƴƴi ɗii kala , hono paltoor feewde e won ɗeen kinɗe renndo lesɗinaaɗe , ko wayi no fitiram golleeɓe ( wayluɓe , lawɓe , sakkeeɓe ) , kam e kinɗe awluɓe e wammbaaɓe ( kinɗe awluɓe kala : yimooɓe , huutortooɓe kaɓirɗe gaaci ) .
Miijooji keewɗi ndokkaama heen , kono ko miijooji ɗiɗi ( 2 ) ɓuri
Miijoɗen , miijoɗen e nder mbunndi .
Miijtaade aan e hoore maa : hol no kabaaru oo wayi e maa , mbaasaa yondinaade e tiitoonde hee , taraa winndannde ndee haa laaɓa , haa paamaa ko nde haalata koo no moƴƴi .
Miijto no feewi e ko kaalan maami koo .
Miikaa Sammba Saajo : Feruga
Miin , Bah Shariif , ɓinngel yummon e diine Lislaam , refti woni mo ndenndu-ɗon lannda dowrugol , miɗo jogii njoorto e nder njuuteendi ngal ɗoo mooɓondiral , ma on ɗoof Jullaare fergittunoonde en ndee .
Miin ?
Miin Talla , mi fuɗɗiima haaɓde kaa ngonka .
Miin Talla noon mboɗo famɗi ganndal haa ko ɗoon waawi haaɗde ; kono mbaɗtee kam e laawol , so mi moyii !
Miin de si wonaa weltanaade on sabu ndee darnde nde darani on
Miin deh , miɗo e pele maɓɓe haa Mantu-Laa-Jolii ñalnde 12 Jolal ; ñalnde bilo , ñalnde soobo-yoobo , ñalnde kelaa-killegaa .
Miin den ko mi kurka coftan do hannde oo wittirde ngaandiire ( oordinateur ) haysimi heewaani heen ganndal ne , mido heen heewi yidde subu hannde oo ko duum buranmi wittirde , somi dañiino ngaandiire wootere tawannoo ko hakke hakkunde am e leñol ngol maa tummi kono mi alaa ordinateur .
Miin dey naat-mi Nuwaasoot ko e hitaande 1973 , mi hoɗii duuɓi keewɗi e bolokaaji ( bolok manifel e bolok ruuj fof ) , mi yiyii mahaaɗe ɓooyɗe keewɗe e wuro hee ( kuɓeeje ministeeruuji , opitaal mawɗo , e ekkolaaji mahaaɗi e leydi hee gila e kitaale 1960 , mi meeɗaa seeɓde yitere haa njiy-mi e mum en gewol .
Miin e mon gila subaka haa jooni , woni miijo mon tan ko safrirde mi heege mon , kon jamfanteeɓe .
Miin fof e yenaneede " naamnal jaabortaake naamnal " , mberliti-moo-mi
Miin haajooni meɗa woya Hadafi mi deƴƴaani .
Miin jannginoowo ?
Miin kam , ko mi nanatnooɗo Abuubakri Muusaa Lam .
Miin kam , so haalde goonga , mi gasnaani janngude winndande Ceerno Abuubakri Muusaa Lam ndee .

Moɗal : noddii ko moɗata , ɗuum ko innde tafaande , nde tafana ko huunde wonnde to weeyo e won e nokkuuji hakkunde jiryirɗe , kala ko ɓadiinde nde bello nde toɗɗo ( moɗa ) , koode ( naangeeji mawɗi ) ndaɗata doole ciiɓagol ndeen huunde , hay lewndu ( lumière ) daɗata , so tawi eɗen ɗaɓɓana ndeen huunde innde e nder pulaar so en mbi'i moɗ en ɓeydi heen al woni moɗal en njoopiima ko moɗata kadi famɗaani ( ko e fedde ngal jeya ) , ( Black hole ( engele ) , Trou noir ( farayse ) , ( arab ) ) , so en pirdii ɗum konngol konngol mbiyen wuddere ɓaleere ngo firo ko adi fof ina juuti kadi feññinta golle huunde nde .
Moɗal ko batte kamondiral yakawere e ɓoodde ( énergie et masse ) , hay lewndu daɗataa pooɗal maggal , moɗal heptinirtee ko taariindi mum , ko murlal moɗowal kala ko ɓadii ngal , gila e koode haa e goɗɗum , ko woppaani lewndu kam woppataa hay huunde , waɗi ngal wiyeede moɗal walla wuddere ɓaleere ko humpeede annduɓe geɗe maggal , sibu alaa ko yaltata ko ina holla , ko naati kala majji , so wonaa cereeli ɗiɗi ciiñsiinƴi Gamma ɗiin ne njeyaaka e maoɗal ko batte doole maggal .

Muritani .

Muritani : Mammadu Bookar Bah lomtiima Ibraahiima Moktaar Saar he hoore lannda AJD/MR
Muritani e njanguuji Al Qaydaa
Muritani ena wonni hannde e njuɓɓudi laau ndi meeɗaa yiyeede .
Muritani goɗɗi ina koɗtinee e gure daande maayo ɗo ɓaleeɓe Muritani ɓurnoo
Muritani heɓi hoyre mum ko ñalnde 28 Noowamburu 1960 .
Muritani ina daña yahde tawtoreede joofirde kawgel Karaŋ Ngenndiije Afrik
Muritani ko leydi njillundi , baaba mayri ko nokku Aarabeeɓe ,
Muritani ko pullo ina wiyee Takko Kan .
Muritani rewrude e diiwgol ɓurtungol , jaawnugol nawgol mum en alateret rewrude
Muritani taƴondirɓe e iwdi mum en , ngonti hardaneeɓe .
Muritani tuumii FAMA ( konu Mali ) warngooji ɓiɓɓe muritaninaaɓe .
Muritaninaaɓe daraniiɓe jojjanɗe aadee
Muritaninaaɓe heewɓe nootitiima e noddaago ngoo : rewɓe , worɓe e sukaaɓe , ɓee ngummiima Sinsinaati , Kolumbus , Niw-yorko , Filadelfiya e Washington , gooto kala ardi e pellital yiɗde hollude hay gooto huccittaa e pine walla ɗemɗe ena mbaree tawa ndillaani .
Muritaninaaɓe heewɓe tawtoraama batu nguu , gila e ummoriiɓe he pelle renndo , haa yettii nulaaɓe laamu e hooreejo leydi oo e hoore mum , tawtoraaɗo batu hooreeɓe leydi , jaagorgal Taariindi e Ƴellitaare Duumiinde , jaagorgal Petroŋ , e Yakawere e Oogirɗe , Hooreejo Diiwaan Nuwasoot .
Muritaninaaɓe moolinooɓe artuɓe e leydi hee haa hannde keɓtaani kaayitaaji mum
Muritaninaaɓe waraaɓe to Mali
Muritaninaaɓe wonɓe caggal leydi ndii , haa teeŋti noon e wonɓe Farayse ina ngondi e caɗeele binnditagol teeŋtuɗe ( ɗaɓɓireede kartal koɗaagu ) caggal nde Ammbasadeer Muritani to Pari winndi laamu Farayse , ina hollita ɗum wonde paaspooruuji ɓooyɗi ɗii nattii huutoreede , tee ɓe mbaawaa kadi heɓde paaspooruuji kesi ɗii .
Muritaninaaɓe wuurɓe leydi Amerik ceppii ñalnde Aaɓde 10 Duujal 2010 yeeso jooɗorde ( ambassade ) Muritani wonnde Washington DC , laamorgo DD Amerik , yiɗde holirde metere nde be njogii e haala gardiiɗo jaagorɗe leydi maɓɓe Mohamed Wul Mohamed Lagdaf haali ñalde " mawningol ɗemngal Arab " .

Murtuɗo haaɗaani tan e hirjin’de wonnde yo en mbinndu janngen he ɗemngal men pulaar , kono o wallifiima ko heewi e no o habriri en saanga nde o ari Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik 2006 nootitaade noddaandu Pulaar Speaking Association of the USA .
Murtuɗo ko dar-daro , ɓaleejo , jom semmbe , tedduɗo ƴiiƴam , baawɗo konngol , eeltanaaɗo tafngo gowlaali he ɗemngal pulaar .
Murtuɗo wayniima , ɗaldii en golle loɓɓe , mawɗe : geɗe binndaaɗe gila e conce ha e yoga e gannde .

Musidɓe Fulɓe , en ɓooyii tijjaade

Musidɓe tedduɓe , Fulɓe yontaaɓe e ɓe ngonaa Fulɓe nanooɓe ngal , onon fof on calminaama kadi teddungo .
Musidɓe tedduɓe , Miɗo yetta musidɗo men Baaba Talla e winndannde mum fattamlamiire nde o addani renndo ngoo ɗoo e lowre men .
Musidɓe tedduɓe , on calminaama haa ɗo saɗi duƴƴi e fownde !
Musidɓe tedduɓe , tawde jaŋde wonaa sara e nguurndam aadee , ko ɗuum waɗi yimɓe e laamuuji ceeraani e sakkude peeje no ngittaniri nde geɗal mayre , mbele ende toŋta ɓamtaare men .
Musidɓe tedduɓe enen fof waastaa
Musidɗo , baaɗiraaɗo , giɗo am
Musidɗo men " Motreal " wiyi ko goongɗinaani ko haalaa e winndannde ndee .
Musidɗo men Abuu Haaruuna Cuun fuɗɗii wonde ɗanniyanke ko e hitaande 1980 , felo makko nawi mo haa Ndakaaru wuro laamorgo politik leydi men Senegaal .
Musidɗo tedduɗo , Haadii Aan a jaaraama e ndee winndannde .
Musiiba bonɗo , so ɗii kuudetaaji puɗɗitiiɗi e Afrik hirnaange , caggal daawal deeƴre seeɗa .

Musiɓɓe tedduɓe , e miijo UNESCO , Nehdi e jaŋde tuugiindi he ɗemngal gadanal walla ɗemngal muuynangal foti fuɗɗoraade ko gila e gaggaaɓe , sibu ko ndeenka kam e nehdi e jaŋde gaggaaɓe woni ngooroondi jaŋde .
Musiɗɓe , eɗen njiɗi artude seeɗa e Jokkorde pelle pinal ɗee
Musiɗɓe miin Abdullaay jahwo :
Musiɗɓe tedduɓe , Humpito woɗngo ine woodi , ɓurngo nii ma a taw ɗii humpitooji kaalaaɗi , yuumtude .
Musiɗɓe tedduɓe , hare ngam potal to bannge ndimaagu ɓiɗɓe leydi ndii nder dowla ɗooftiiɗo sariya maa yahda kadi e kaɓagol njiyaagu e sifaaji mum fof , gaadanteeji e kesi fof .
Musiɗɓe tedduɓe , miɗo yiɗi , e innde dowla oo renndude sunu e denndaangal ɓe ɗii bonanndeeji njettinoo he ɗiiɗoo sahaaji niɓɓi .
Musiɗɓe tedduɓe , yoo ngaanndi huɓɓu !
Musiɗɓe worɓe e rewɓe , yahdiiɓe am korsuɓe : E udditgol mooɓondiral nayaɓo Tawassul , lannda jogaaɗo jikke , miɗo jogii mbelamma e suutde mi konnguɗi feewde e banndam’en rewɓe e worɓe renndaaɓe faandaare , e ummannde to bannge dawrugol , tawa miɗo rewra e winndude on oo ɗoo ɓataake , ngam yelanaade on puɗɗorogol golle ngal ɗoo mooɓondiral e jam , ko noon ñaaganortoo-mi on Alla keɓgol wune e golle ɗe ngon-ɗon e dow mum ɗee .
Musiɗɗo Haaruuna Rasiid Lih , ina winndi deftere tinndi ko ɓooyaani ko .
Musiɗɗo Mammadu Maamuudu Baal udditii batu nguu , jubbi e ngonka catal ngal .
Musiɗɗo am , daɗndu am e ɗeen leeɓte , mbiɗo anndi ko a moƴƴo .
Musiɗɗo am yurmo mi hoto faw am ko ɓur-mi hulde koo dey .
Musiɗɗo men Njaay Haamiidu addii ɗoo laaɓndal paayodinngal , peɗɗinoowal ngaanndiiji .

Mutuɗo ina joginoo jeese limtinɗe : eɗen mbaawii xeewde neɗɗo o , yimiyanke o , ganndo e wittiyanke o , janngiyanke , dawriyanke o , juulɗo o .
Muujibu joɗnde ndee ko diisnondirde e jaaynooɓe ɓee , wostondirde e mum en miijooji e ƴeewde hol ko ɓe mbaawi gollodaade e fedde ndee ko naftata ɗemngal ngal , haa teeŋti noon e gootiɗingol kelmeendi kuutorteendi .
Muujibu lappol ngol ɓurnoo yowitaade ko he caaktugol dallinannde pelle pinal ɗee mbinndunoo e hitaande 2008 , faatunde he ɗaɓɓugol laawɗingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije pulaar , sooninke e wolof , e naattingol mum en he nder Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde leydi ndii .
Muulde defte Fulfulde ngam janngin’de yonta hannde Ɗemngal ngal hoto ngal maayde , ko huunde nde Hooreejo ( Sarkin ) Fulɓe Lagos gaddii .

NASA ine heblaninoo geɗe nay ( 4 ) : fof feewa ; feewa seeɗa , wooda ko ŋakki , walla galla .
NASA noon ina werti noppi mum haa njaaji , nde tawnoo parlemaan Amerik ko ko taƴanoo ɗum faandaare gila e hitaande 2005 : " jogaade kattanɗe yiytude ɗoon e hitaande 2020 fotde 90% kaaƴe weeyo ɗe njaajeendi mum en seɓi 140 meeteer .

Naamnal : Njiɗɗa wiide lewru ko loopal ummii ko leydi ?

Naange , ɗaŋe e ko ɗe ndewnii e lebbi , lefol kaaƴe kayhaytooje hakkunde Mbaañ e Rojju , yanti heen lefo Kiwiper fo jeyaa ko e seto-naange , seto ngo noon woni ko e gootal e cate Lillungal men Fedannde Malaaɗo ( galaxie de la voie lactée ) .
Naange alaa tagoore ko nge taarotoo nder Satonaange saka kitaale ena kaalee toon .
Naange caabii .
Naange e hoyre mum ena waɗa yiiloo-banngoo no kewal moti nih .
Naange ina fuɗa
Naange ko balɗe 14 Leydi , o jooɗoo balɗe men 14 o yiyaani Naange , woni jamma
Naange ko hoodere nde duuɓi miliyaaruuji 4 e feccere , naanagal magge yottotoo en ko e minitaaji jeetati , ɗuum firti so nge ñifi ko maa caggal oon dumunna nde tinen .
Naange ko hoodere ɓadiinde , ko ɗum tan seerndi nge e koode goɗɗe ɗe , nge duppata ko gaas ina wiyee hidrojeen haa wanta gaas goɗɗo ina wiyee heliyoom , wadde ko heliyoom woni ndoondi koode walla naangeeji , ɗo e duuɓi milyaaruuji seeɗa garrji , so naange gaynii hidrojeen mum , nge wonata ko e fetaade , nge ɓuuta haa nge tolnoo ko ina abboo cowe 200 fotde magge adan .
Naange ko hoodere ɓadiinde men no feewi , ko kayre yaynantoo men ɗaŋre men , nge woni ko hedde hojomaaji 8 lewndu ( so nge ñifii nde tinenten ko maa hojomaaji 8 pawɗi seeɗa njawta ) , naange ina ɓuri leydi mawnude fotde laabi 109 , ɗuum firti ko so en koddirii naange foti ko no fuku kongel ''ballon'' nih , leydi fotata ko no abbere gawri ni .
Naange ko hoodere ɓurnde fof ɓadtaade en .
Naange ko hoodere ɓurnde ɓadaade men e koode asamaan , refti heen ko Proksima Santoor ( Proxima Centaure ) ndeen ne naanagal ( annoore ) mayre yottotoo en ko caggal duuɓi 4 .
Naange ko murlal jaynge heewnge doole sabu tolno nguleeki e ndeer magge ko 16 miliyoŋ degre , e nge ɓuri Leydi teddeeki cowe 333 400 !
Naange men nge , ( walla hoodere ɓurnde fof ɓadtaade en , nde nginnir-ɗen ɗum " Naange " nde ) taarotoo ɗum ko tagopeeje ɗe kaalno-ɗen ɗee .
Naange nder weeyo , walla heen sahaaji lewru .
Naange ne jeyaa ko e dental koode moolanangal ina wiyee Lillungal Fedannde Malaaɗo , ngaal lillungal ina mooɓi ko ɓuri 200 miliyaar hoodere , keedɗen ko sera e lillungal he .
Naange nge njyaten e dow koyemen nge , ko deental keneeli keewɗi ( gaasuuji keewɗi ) : ene tawee heen henndu ndiyameeru ( gaas ndiyameejo ) wiyeteendu " hydrogène " e ɗemɗe tuubakooɓe , gaas biyeteeɗo eeliyom , gaas asot , gaas ƴulɓe ( gaas Karbonik ) , gaas nafnuurndam ( gaas oksiseen ) .
Naange seeraani e yaynaade leydi , ɗo ciiñsiiñƴi magge ngadii duƴƴaade fo ko ɗoon ɓurata wulde , oon nokku woni mbo mbeelu sortotaako nde naange woni e hoore .
Naange tolnotoo ceɓtol-naange rewo ko 20 walla 21 morso ( juin ) , tumbude rewo wona e ceeɗu , worgo wona e dabbunde
Naange tolnotoo ceɓtol-naange worgo ko 21 walla 22 bowte ( décembre ) , tumbude rewo wona e dabbunde , worgo wona e ceeɗu .
Naange tolnotoo peccol , laawol goɗngol ko 22 walla 23 yarkomaa ( septembre ) , tumbude rewo wona e ndunngu , worgo wona e demminaare
Naange tolnotoo peccol ko 20 walla 21 Mbooy ( mars ) , tumbude rewo wona e demminaare , worgo wona e ndunngu .
Naange yoornata ko hollaka .
Naanmnde ɗe , ko naamnde keewɗe faayiida , eɗe ɓeydana en kadi faamde ko haalaa ko e ko winndaa ko .
Naanndataa e to koɗno-ɗon ɗoo , kono maa on mbaaw sabbaade toon .
Naatgol makko ñaawirdu toowndu nduu , waylataa jerondiral doole nder mayru .

Nafoore : hay pulfulal gootal woppaaka yejjitaaka , ko ɗoon maasalahaa ɓurata weeɓde .
Nafoore ne kay ene woodi he nguu-ɗoo njillu
Nafoore wonnde e baɗgol jawdi he nder ndema e tippule nguura jibinooje golle ceniiɗe , kam e ƴellitgol mahaaɗe , jettagol jehreeji e jeñtingol nguura ɓeydotoongol , ɗum fof ngam yettaade kisal nguura kam e nguura moƴƴa ;

Nana Asma’u , dewbo Pullo kaɓananooɗo Wellitaare dewbo duuɓi 100 , ko adii dillere Feminisma
Nana Asma’u huwtoriima won’de mum eeltanaaɗo ɗemngal ( omo haala ɗemɗe nay ) e haayaneede binndol ngam wallifaade jime keewɗe e firde ballifanɗe baaba makko Seyku Usmaan ummoraade he ɗemngal Arab , o waɗti ɗum en he Fulfulde walla Hawsankoore .
Nana Asma’u jibinaa ko 1793 , o inniraa ko Asma’ bintu Abuubakri Sidik , ko sabu huruum he oon dewbo saahibe addaniɓe noddirdemo " Neene " ngam añde soowtude innde mum .
Nana Asma’u walla Neene Asmaawu , sabu ko noon woni innde ndee tigi , ko dewbo pullo lolluɗo he nder daartol Afrik kam e daartol diine Islaam .
Nana Asma’u waɗi ko ɓuri heewde he nguurndam mum ko he janngin’gol rewɓe e rokkude ɗum en nehdi Islaam .
Nana wona balɗe jooni , kolonel hebbinii jokkondire e almameeɓe e annduɓe , ina heen fuutankooɓe .
Nani , a wiyataa a jeertinaaka .
Naniraama ganndo gooto ina wiyee Kisaayi o wiyi " hono Unuku ɓiy Aawaja laatiima ko gooto e ɓiɓɓe Aadama , ko jom gite luuru laaraaje , ko o neɗɗo bonɗo ŋari sanne " So ɗum ɓennii hono Saharata ko debbo ƴoƴɗo , ceeɓɗo no feewi , ko kanko jibini Aawaja caggal nde o jibini ɗum ndee , o jooɗtiima ko ina tolnoo e duuɓi teemedere o saŋkii .
Nanndolla persidaa 26ɓo leydi Amerik , hono Theodore Rooswelt , ittaama he naatirde Ganniiru daartol sewlo , sabu mum dowlinde " koloñaal e añam-nguraagu " : nanndolla kaa maandinnoo ɗoon ko Rooswelt ine waɗɗii puccu , ine wondi e gorko ɓaleejo e amerannjee gooto ina yaha sara maɓɓe .
Nanngal Naange ko woni ?
Nanngal Naange walla Lewru .
Nanngal lewru ne wonata tan ko nde ndu timmi , ndu waawaa nanngeede darorɗe walla maayirɗe mayru .
Nanngal naange waɗata ko nde lewru reɗɗii hakkunde Ngaawe ( Leydi ) e Naange , kañje geɗe tate ɗee fo ɗe tolnondirat e diidol gootol .
Nano faade ñaamo : Ibraahiima Ngaye , Usmaan Kan , Ameriknaajo
Nanondiral Feeralla e Koylal
Nanondiral Madagaskaar toɗɗiima daawal juutngal , sibu woote maɓɓe potata waɗoyeede ko ɗo e maayirɗe 2010 ( daawal lebbi 18 ) .
Nanondiral Muritani toɗɗii ko dirtingol woote ( potnooɗe waɗde 6/6 mbaɗtaa 18/07 ) e compugol guwarnama e mudda ( mo mudda mum diwaani balɗe 15 ) e baylugol CENI ( e nder balɗe 15 ) e juɓɓingol woote Nanondiral baɗirangal " yo en ceertu heen tan !
Nanondiral kisal hakkunde Siin e Duuɗe Salomon ɗee , laaɓtaani , kono kam angal eɓɓi won ɗeen geɗe jamirooje gargol toon he duuɗe hee koninkooɓe Siin .
Nanondiral maɓɓe , ganndirangal nanondiral Maputo , toɗɗiima geɗe keewɗe : Ko idii fof , ko hakilantaagal maggal , winndannde nde ɓe ciifondiri , ɗo won ɗeen ɓure potɗe ɗoofteede cifaa ( ko anndiraa " charte des valeurs " : " piɓondiral paarnorɗe " ) , caggal ɗum ina waɗi nanondiral jowitiingal e " yolne hakkunde nde " ( Charte de la transition ) , woni doosɗe leydi e mudda yolnde hakkunde nde ; caggal ɗum ina waɗi " nanondiral politik Maputo " joopingal piɓle polilik ɗe ceŋɗe nay luurduɗe ɗe njaɓi ; caggal ɗum ina waɗi " nanondiral 1 Maputo " jowitiingal e niilnugol bonanndeeji kewkewe 2002 ; ina waɗi kadi " nanondiral 2 Maputo " kaalowal ko fayti e Marc Ravalomanana ; ina heen kadi " nanondiral 3 Maputo " niilnowal ñaawooje pawanooɗe e hoohooɓe politik laamu Ravalomanana .
Nanondiral ngal dogata ko duuɓi 20 , so tawii yiyaama ngartam ine heen .
Nanondiral ngal ine gaddii ɓesnguuji waali-wure en , anndiraaɓe reende 80% keew-guurɗiwal goodngal he Leydi hee , waggini kadi moƴƴitingol 30% leyɗe doostiiɗe , usta fotde feccere tanaa coomiiɗo he warñaame ( pesticides ) .
Nanondiral waɗde dañaaka .

Nde ngel ari e yaahde to laamɗo too , ngel fergitii e jullaare haa o ɗeɓi yande .
Nde ngon-mi gardo nokku ngenndiijo senaare ndee ( centre national d’hygiène ) mi waawii gollaade ngam waɗtude Nokku Ngenndiijo Senaare oo Duɗal Wiɗtooji paatuɗi e Cellal Renndo kam e ƴellitde laboratuwaaruuji cellal renndo tammbinooɗi ko ɓuri heewde e tuugnorɗe cellal .
Nde njanngumi mi welti haa ngoymi sabu nan allaaji biyeteezi e zaniyankooxe wonde ko wostaave tawmi ko fenaande .
Nde o arti Muritani , o ligganiima leydi makko he ceŋɗe keewɗe .
Nde o arti Nuwaasoot e hitaande1969 , o naati e diɗɗal Ngenndiwal Nalankooɓe Muritani , tawi omo nawdi hoɗdu ganni e hoɗdu tuubakooɓe fof , woni Gitaar .
Nde o arti e galle hee , yummum kullon kon totti mo ɓoccooɗe joyi .
Nde o gayni ɗoon , ko cukko-hooreejo Mammadu Mbay , arti he luggiɗinaade kam e ngonka golle fedde .
Nde o haalani mo ko ɓe no foti coodi ɗum , o haawa kadi no miñiiko oo waawri kaaldigal .
Nde o heɓi duuɓi jeeɗiɗi , o naɓaa jaŋde Al-Qur-aana to saare wi’eteende : Ñantiida Fulɓe , ɗuum ko he hitaande 1950 , o woni toon fotde duuɓi seeɗa , o ittaa toon , o naɓoyaa tin ( kadi ) jaŋde to saare wi’eteende : Kaataba Alfaa .
Nde o joofni , o fawondir mikkon nooro kon e dow makko , o haɓɓi kon ha woni wahre .
Nde o loppiti laamu he 1983 e ballal ɓesngu Burkina , o takkunoo ko galaŋ " kapiteen " .
Nde o naamnaa miijo makko e ko mawɗo CENI oo heɓtini wonde won ŋakkere teskaa e woote ɗee , so baasgol won e yimɓe ɗooftaade sariya sibu " won e golle njahdataa e politik " ( yeru koninke fotaani waɗde politik , kalfinaaɗo golle e laamu , fotaani huutoraade oon tiitar e nder politik , yeru jaagorgal , walla guwerneer ekn .
Nde o renndini jaagorɗe laamu Burkina nde ɓe keɓti laamu ndee , o wiyi ɓe : " mbeɗe anndi yoga e mon kecci mi , min ɗaɓɓaani ko kewi koo , kono ko alaa-e-sago min mbaɗa ɗum " .
Nde o ronki foolirde ɓe fetel o abborii urɓude luure hakkunde maɓɓe .
Nde o rowi ka ɗo haala paayodinka go’to e almudɓe ɓe kala rokkaa deftere Allah nde yoo dursito ko ni woni silke o fuɗɗii sa’nga waktuuji sappo e joyi ñalawma ( 15h ) , nde ɓe njoofni dursito wiyaa yoo Ceerno Ɓan to cuuɗi men Kuñekaari ( Mali ) yo sakkit duwaawu go’to kala fiɓa anniya mum aduna e laakara duwanoo Fedde nde mbele ɓerɗe maɓɓe ina njiyondira ngona go’te , juulɓe ɓe coña ɓesnooje jogorɗe jibineede e nder pa’ndaale toɓɓaaɗe ɗe .
Nde o ruttittoo omo woni he laawol hootde , jaagorɗo kiiɗɗo kalfinanooɗo kuɓɓam e yakawere o , huccindirii e jaayndiyankooɓe .
Nde o sooynii sukaaɓe ɓee ta , o wulli o eewnii ɓe .
Nde o ummi Jowol o feewi ko Bulli , o wirtii Jaajebinne , o yettii Seelibaabi ko adii ko omo toɗɗee ekonom Liisee Rooso , o feewti kadi Koleysa Kayhayɗi , haa o yettooyii Ayyuun .
Nde o wiyaa wonde luulndo ngoo sosii goomu wiɗto ngam anndude mbele ko kanko haaldetee ɗoon , o jaabii " mi nanii haala nguun goomu wiɗto , miɗo fadi ngu haa hannde .
Nde o woppitaa ñalnde 11 feebariyee 1990 , tawi renndo Afrik worgo bonii : maayde walla warde , rufde ƴiiƴam , waagaade neɗɗo , denndaangal geɗe neegre ñiɓiima e aadaaji ɓesngu Afrik worgo ; ko ittata ɗum e oo neesu ina saɗti sanne .
Nde o yettini ɓe toon tan , wojere wiꞌi daddoowo oo : " gorko moƴƴo , ko kaal-ɗaa e oo teewu keewɗo ?
Nde o yottii tan , o ɓoorti wutte oo , o lappi mo lohi haa o haaƴii .
Nde oo sooyni Sammba tan , o waklitii o hocciti e mum .
Nde oɗon cuɓoo fof , toɗɗo-ɗee gorko ganndo , gollotooɗo
Nde paandaale maɓɓe laabtani ɓe to bannge ɓileydaagal tacci-keeri , gollidiiɓe ɓee ( ɗanniyaŋkooɓe men e wallidiiɓe mum en to leydi farayse ) , ummanii renndinnde jawdi e kaɓirɗe ɗe liggorii ɗum , woni kaalis , ƴeewndorɗe cellal ɓalli , loskirɗe ƴiiƴam , leɗɗe safaara ekn geɗe ɗe ɓe keɓata e pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje to farayse e teelɗuɓe yarlitiiɓe faabaade roofolɓe ; SOS diabète e hoore mum ñonngaani doole mum e ɗaɓɓirde hono ɓeen jeyaaɓe e leydi hee ko wayi no Jaagordu halfinaandu cellal , Aldismed , Amid e Farmasii Fuuta maa wonii yamiroore ummanaade ngaal gollal walla dañde e mum en kaɓirɗe .
Nde pin ɗaa fof ɓooyngol maa e oo aduna ina ɓeey-doo juutde tee nguurndam maa ne ɓeey-doo raɓɓidde .
Nde pompiyee yottii , rewɓe ɗiɗo e worɓe ɗiɗo njippii ina mbeelnii cekke .
Nde puccu nguu sooynii hunuko nooro oo ina udditi haa yaaji , ngu hiji .
Nde raddooɓe ɓee njanata e Waandu , Sanngalde ina suuɗinoo e sofoƴuru , ina yeeɓa .
Nde sariya kuccam ummanaa , ɗe cakkitii heen , he cili ɗiɗi , miijooji majje heen , ɗe mbaɗi jokkondire keewɗe mbele winndannde addannde ndee ine waylee haa yahda e ciimtol kuuɓtodinngol ñalɗi diisnondiral ɗii .
Nde senngo laamu , e gardagol hooreejo leydi oo hono Muhammed wul Abdel Ajiiju yuɓɓini seppo mawngo ñalnde alarba 9 saawiyee 2019 , ngam , e wiyde maɓɓe , haɓaade " haala ngañantumaagu kam e seɓɓitaare " , yimɓe heewɓe , haa teeŋti e senngo luulndo , njaɓaani tawtoreede ngoon seppo , sibu , e wiyde mum en , " ko laamu nguu wiyi ina haɓoo jooni koo , ko ɗuum gollata ko ina wona jooni duuɓi sappo " .
Nde takkusaan juulaa , hawri e fadtiranooɓe ɓee ngarii , sippirooji ɗii puɗɗii .
Nde takkusaan yoni , Ndoorel yetti yimɓe ɓee , wiꞌi ɓe eɓe mbaawi dartinde haa subaka .
Nde tawnoo Maamuudu Sammba Booli juutii balɗe , tee jaɓaani haalde , ɗum wayti hankadi no daarol nii .
Nde tawnoo alaa ko yaltata e wuddere ɓaleere , hay annoore ,
Nde tawnoo alaa ko yaltata e wuddere ɓaleere , hay annoore , ko ɗuum addani ɗum wonde huunde nde lewñataa , wonaa tan wonande caafe jiyotooɗe , kono hay caafe yiite-sulɗeeje .
Nde tawnoo e oon sahaa hoyreejo leydi ndi hono Saaluu Jiboo ko yahnooɗo koyngal caggal leydi maa taw ko ɗum jibini ndeen faayre haa ɓe mbiyi ko kuudetaa wonaa e meereede ɗoon .
Nde tawnoo hannde naamndaa-mi ko haalde njiimaadi e neesu , njaaɓanen fenaande maamaare huufnde keddiiɗe ɗee kala .
Nde tawnoo laamu nguu naatnii ngalu ummortoongu e dokke tuubakooɓe , ɓe mbiy-ɗen ngalaa tawo doole , na njuloo , na njiɗi hisnude njulaagu mum en , na njeena , ndokka njoldi e kubbal , ɗum waɗi kareeli keewi hakkunde ɓiɗɓe galleeji laamotooɗi ɗii .
Nde tawnoo noon hokkere ndee hawii hanndiima e diiwanuuji men hee , ko ɗum waɗi nguura saɗtii , hay jaŋde sukaaɓe nii lohii .
Nde tawnoo noon ko e renndo e renndooji ɓurɗi hokkude himme oo jikku biyeteeɗo gacce , toɗɗi-ɗen ɗoo ko pulaagu .
Nde tuubakiri ari ndee , tawi ko laamu Waalo nduumiingu e macungaagu , yimɓe kaɓii ngu , maccuɓe murti njiɗi ɓooraade kalifaandi .
Nde tuubakooɓe ngari tawi ko Waalo ina woni e jiiɓru mawndu
Nde tuubakooɓe njandini laamu Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal nde , ɓe lammini ko Siidi Abdul Jibi ( ɓesngu Hammadi Ngay , lomlomtondirtunooɓe e ɓesngu Decce ) .
Nde tuubakooɓe teskii ndee darnde , ɓe mbiyi ɓee ngonaa ɓaleeɓe sabu ɗii hakkillaaji baawɗi jogaade laamu njiydaa e hakkillaaji ɓaleeɓe .
Nde waandu nani ngool konngol , ndu herkite jaleeɗe , ndu wiꞌ i mo : Miin ñaamakam ?
Nde wakkutuuji sappo keedi , Sincaannaaɓe njolli e dingiral hee .
Nde weeti nde KO galle ( Maison des sourds-muets ) faad’u6e e d’awaa6e d’emd’e hurmbitaa , udditaa e ballal Ong " Silent Work " mo Demmba Bah e joom suudu mum , golle ma66e njee6aa .
Nde wiɗtooɓe njiiti ngal ganndal , peeje goɗɗe ittaa heen ngam waawde safrude won e rafiiji caɗtuɗi , naamndiiɗi wuurtaneede terɗe ñawɗe walla dappuɗe tawa ɓalndu nefataaɗe .
Nde wojere faami wonde daddoowo woni ko e fewjande ɗum tan feewnitii .
Nde wolde adunaaare ndee joofi , o arti Ndakaaru , ɗo guwarnama Afrik hirnaange jooɗinoo , o waɗaa e nder njuɓɓudi koloñaal hee , jaggal to kabine Komiseer Toowɗo , caggal ɗum to Meeri Ndakaaru , hade makko fekteede to ardorde Kaalisaaji to Ndar .
Nde wonata dumunna tawi yimɓe nootitiima e fedde ndee no feewi , min kawri yo
Nde wonata majaango ɓaawo nde kaljit-ɗaa ,
Nde wonno Leydi woni ko e nokku potɗo huufde ndiyam , diƴƴe ina carii heen 75 % e wertaango Leydi ko ndiyam , ko heddii ko ko njoorndi , waɗi noon , ko goonga teddeeki kammu ina heen , kono ko ngoɗɗeeki hakkunde Leydi e Naange saabii ɗuum , Leydi woni ko e nokku baawɗo nehde nguurndam .
Nde wonno Naange ina mawni no feewi kadi ina heewi doole kala ko roondi nge so reenaaki ko e magge yanata , way ko no faade e gaw walla yor-yor ni , ala e sago feere sakke hade baagal ngal sokkade e Naange , ko ɗuum waɗi lappol ngol juutde .
Nde wonno neɗɗo ko e leydi waɗanaama sababuuji nguurndam mum , won heen ko ŋakkata e dow leydi neɗɗo tina haa wontana mbo lor , kono won heen ko maa neɗɗo yilloo weeyo boowal leydi tan nde hattoo ɗum .
Nde wonnoo Afrik alaano haɗde yeebanooma .
Nde wonnoo Leydi ko ko roondi , so ndi yirliima ala e sago dimngal mayri yirlidoo e mayri !
Nde wonnoo Nijeriyaa ena faami teeŋtugol kawral ngal , ɓe puɗɗii hartaade ko nde liital wutti fuɗɗorɗe kawral ngal .
Nde wonnoo doŋe ɗee ɓosirta ko seese fotde 20 cm ( fotde felo tan ) kala hitaande , en mbaawataa teskaade nduun yahdu walla tin'de ndu , kono tan so e ƴeewtiima wertaango leyd no doŋe ɗee lelorii ni ma en paam koko renndunoo ko ɓooyi , ɗum fotndaa ko e duuɓi milyoŋaaji 200 caggal ,
Nde wonnoo e am ɗum ɓuraa .
Nde wonnoo fowru ko Bari yettaa , yiɗaa ko laaɓi .
Nde wonnoo fulɓe ko yimɓe yiɗɓe kulle , kaadi ko teddinɓe kulle lakde e ngoka mum en .
Nde wonnoo goram Saarel ko baawaaɗo , o yetti tan cuddiiɗo makko Njenngudi wiyi mo , ƴettu fehre cuuraay ndee , mbaɗanaa mi heen ƴulɓe .
Nde wonnoo guurtol ( diamètre ) Lewru jaasi laabi 400 ngol Ngaawe kadi yanti heen Naange ɓuri lewru woɗɗude Ngaawe ( Leydi ) fotde laabi 400 , ɗuum waɗi kala nde Lewru reɗɗii hakkunde men e naange e ndu waawi wirnude nge haa nge majja jamma lomtoo .
Nde wonnoo ko felɓondiri fo heewi ko yaltin'de jayngol , kaaƴe pelɓondiɗe ɗe caayi ngonti loopal murlal gulngal , kala ko ɓadii ngal , ngal belloo yana e maggal , ngal jokki ɓeydaade mawnude , ko noon tan haa ɗaŋre Ngaawe tagii haa feewi , e nder nduun iiñcuru , ɗaŋel yani e Ngaawe ko heewi e loopal gulngal dalƴi serindii ina yirloo haa muriliɗi , ngaal woni lewru .
Nde wonnoo ko kanngol tawaa .
Nde wonnoo ko kullel kulngel reedu no feewi so jamma arii yiɗaa ɗo sukki no feewi .
Nde wonnoo ko ɗaɗi njinngata hakillaaaji fof owii e ndee dillere Kono tan pelooje keedti ko e senngo Saada .
Nde wonnoo lewru woni ko e taaraade Leydi , so ndu wonii e feeñde hirnaange ( darorɗe lewru ) ko cooynotoɗen e yeeso fooynaango ngo ko seeɗa , sabu ko heewi e maggo koko runkitii en , waɗa ciirel tokosel mbiyen lewru dariima .
Nde wonnoo mbaroodi jeyaa ko e kulle gorooɗe , ndi heewaani hoɗde e ngaska .
Nde wonnoo mbaroodi jeyaaka he kulle ɓurɗe waawde dogde , ko ɗuum waɗi hina yiɗi wirnaade haa ɓadoo , diwana walla birgitanoo ko raddata koo , tee heewi wonde tan ko immal , kono heewaani juutde , sabu wonaa kulle dogooje .
Nde wonnoo pellitɗo aanaani , jiylotooɗo majjere wiyetaake haaɗ ɗo , njalten seto-naange payen to naangeeji ɗi ngasataa e ngoo weeyo sabu koode ɗee kala ko naangeeji ɓoli , waɗde waasataa ɗo wootere e majje rewnii ɗaŋre huufnde nguurndam .
Nde wonnoo tagofeere men ina yooɓii tenngaade pooɗal , yoga e ɗeen bempeƴƴe caasɗe njottotaako leydi , kono kala ko woni weeyo heɓat geɗal mum e bonannde .
Nde wonnoo tagoore ndee fof fotndaaka .
Nde wuro Jibo yanaa ñalnde 24 oktoobar ɗo fotde konunkooɓe 10 mbaraa , addanii laamu Burkina yaaccoraade haaldude e Riisi/Wagner .
Nde wuro Maraysa aandi e ndiyam noddi wuro Jiinge ngam faabeede .
Nde yahi haa Saharaa wonti moraande , hedde 380 ko adii
Nde yahi haa o heɓi nder dulndu , o hawri e sammba gaynaako ina yiiloo ko jawdi mum ñaami .
Nde yahi haa weeti nde , jamma sappo e tata6o o KO hiirde wad’aa to ( la case ) ndee hiirde siiftinii en hanki e finaa tawaa Fuuta , jammaaj mum hanki , jammaaji dingire boombi e sagataa6e , oo d’oo jamma Baaba weltiima heen , ellee kadi KO ndeen o 6urnoo softude sabu nokku o nootaama tigirigi e keewal e peewal .
Nde yahi haa woni lewru , debbo jeewo oo funii ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo .
Nde yahi haa ɓooyi , fedde wiyeteende MORAK siifondiri e laamu Muritani e hitaande 1997 .
Nde yahi haa ɓooyi Jaaltaaɓe oo e Elimaan e Jaagaraf e Farba njoli ko e motoor njanti e laaɗe ɗee .
Nde yeewtere ndee joofi woodi ɗo ɓe tonngondiri .
Nde yehi haa Boosoya e Ngenaar ndennti nanondiral waɗi ; Abdul renndini Boosoya e Ngenaar fof ardini Farba Jowol , ndeen o ardinii Farba Jowol , farmbaal mettini heen wultini Abdul Bookar haala ka .
Nde yimɓe wuro ngoo cooyni cofel ngel ina ara tan , ɓe ndiiri me njaaɓani laamɗo ngam haalande ɗum .
Nde yimɓe wuro ngoo njottii , ɓe paami wonde ko saaƴaango ngoo tan heewi doole kono alaa caŋkiiɗo .
Nde yimɓe ɓee
Nde yimɓe ɓee nani njenaari ndii , gooto kala ina wi'a e daande dow .
Nde yiytaa ko he lewru silto 2022 , he nokku ine heedi worgo Telaawiiw .
Nde yottaa laamorgo Beljik , Farayse holliti waawaa jaɓde Safiyatu jeyee e ƴamooɓe ngardiigu ngam
Nde ñaaawooɓe ɓee njotti e dingiral ngal , dental ngal kala jooɗii ina heɗoo .
Nde ñaawooɓe ɓe njottii , Wojere ñaagii yoo ɓe njarne ko ina tuutna ɓe ko ɓe ñaamnoo koo .
Nde ɓe calmini haa ɓe kaljiti , joom wuro ngoo , hono neene Hawwaa bismii ɓe , siftini ɓe nanonndiral kakkunde gure ɗiɗi ɗee .
Nde ɓe kirtii haa gasi , nayeejoo oo wallini Faarmata les leeso .
Nde ɓe kirtii haa ɓe ngasni yummum kullon kon totti mo mesalal cewngal .
Nde ɓe naati e saal hee , sukaaɓe ɓee ɓuri dañde kaawisa sabu njooɗndam .
Nde ɓe nduttii e diŋiral , pooɓne ɓamti hakkunde maɓɓe .
Nde ɓe ngaccirondiri hakke , ɓe nduwi , Saalif totti Yero Jaarga , nawi galle mum .
Nde ɓe ngarti fooftere , Mosammbik wayi no haŋkadi lelnii njogitaaje nih !
Nde ɓe ngarti wuro , goggo Pennda holli neene Kuro ko ɓe coodi koo .
Nde ɓe ngasnata haalde tan puccu tellii kam e pooƴndam mum sabu heege .
Nde ɓe njaltata , yummum Njole ɓuucii Ceerno e tiinde , seeki tekkere e wudere mum .
Nde ɓe njalti , ɓe mbiꞌi ko Ceerno ƴetti kawgel ngel .
Nde ɓe njalti , ɓe naatni bagaas oo e oto baaba mum Eduwar ɓe kucci Mermoos .
Nde ɓe njettii galle Saalif ɓe calmondiri , o bismii ɓe .
Nde ɓe njettinoo , ɓe mbaɗi ko o wiynoo ɓe .
Nde ɓe njooɗii haa ɓooyi , fowru yiꞌi wojere ina ɗeɓi ɓuubde seeɗa .
Nde ɓe njotti Sakkal ndee tawi ko luuma oo fuɗiima heewde yimɓe , soodooɓe ɓee nana mbaɗa yah-ngartaa .
Nde ɓe njottii Kawlak , Muusaa dartii e estaasiyoŋ hee ngam ƴettude esaas .
Nde ɗum fof ɓenni , o yaafnii Saalif , o anndini mo wonde ko kaŋko tooñi .
Nde ɗum gasi , almaami yamiri yo gooto kala duwo e diine mum .
Nde ɗum haalaa , tawtoranooɓe ngoni ko e foɓɓude e hellude sabu mum en weltaade .
Nde ɗum tinaa , wayi ko no musiiba mawɗo kewi e leydi hee nii : ina famɗi fedde politik walla ceerno walla koohoowo mo ñiŋaani ko o waɗi koo .
Nde ɗum waɗaa nde , biyeteeɗo Mammadu Yero Sal , hono pooɗondirtunooɗo lefol eLaam Tooro Sidiki Sal , wonti kaɓtotooɗo tuubakooɓe , kadi o yiytondiri e Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal , e Baydi Kacce , e Abdul Siidi Bah , e Aali Siidi Bah , e ngenndiyankooɓe woɗɓe salinooɓe kalfaandi tuubakooɓe .
Nde ɗum ɓenni , o arti e baaba makko tataɓol , o wiyi ɗum " miin dey mi yiyii debbo mo njiɗ-mi resde .
Nde ɗumɗoo fof joofi , yettinde ɗum jaagorgal laamu kalfinaangal kaalis wondude e natal eƴɓo ( plan ) ngesa baa , sifaa faggudu nduu e jotondiral mum e renndo ngoo ; hol ko wiɗto waɗaango yowitiingo e jeyal leydi ndii jibini , eɓɓaande kasdi leydi ndii tawa ina dottanaa lajal , seedamfaaguuji jeyal leydi yimɓe ɓee walla renndooji ɗii , tummbutere kaayit jowitiiɗo e nanondiral e dow leydi hee e bayyinaango habroowo wonde renndooji ɗi ɗum toɗɗii ɗii fof njaɓii etee ciifii ngo .

Ndeke , hoto Fulɓe paayondir añɓe mum
Ndeke , ko gollotooɓe ɓee njoɓata lewru kala paasiyoŋaaji nattuɓe gollaade ɓee , hono yahɓe alateret ɓee .
Ndeke , ko mbiyno-ɗen ko fayti e njuuteendi hitaande wootere to tagofeere Uraanus ma fot e duuɓi men 84 , ko goonga , sabu laawol ngol tagofeere Uraanus rewi ngol , ngam taaraade naange haa nde arta ɗo nde wonnoo , ɓuri juutde e laawol ngol leydi rewi ngol ngam taaraade naange .
Ndeke , tawde naange ngee e koode ɗee e tagopeeje ɗee e lebbi ɗii , fof ko nii ngoniri e weeyooji mum en , taarii weeyooji ɗii ko weeyo alaa mo jeyi , weeyo ɗo teddeeki alaa , ɗum noon , mboɗo sikki en paamii alaa ɗo ɗe ceŋii etee alaa ɗo ɗe caamata , alaa ɗo ɗe njanata .
Ndeke BARI OBAMA ko e mawbe he jeyaa .
Ndeke banndiraaɓe tintee !
Ndeke cumu nguu sumii ɓikkon mbaroodi haa kooñi .

Ndeke hoolaare mawɗo leydi Muritani e Wul Muhamed Laghdaf meeɗaa wuuraade gila o ardini-mo jaagorɗe leydi ndii .
Ndeke ibliiss woppiraa ko jeynge daña geɗal , aljanna daña geɗal , ɗuum noon keddagol ibliis ko ngam no heefereeɓe leeptiraa , yurmeende geno heddoo e goongɗinɓe geno toowɗo Oo , maa geno weltano ɓe ngam salaade ɓe ɗooftaade ibliis .
Ndeke mbanndiraaɓe Fulɓe ɓe jehri e waalo haa e mbaalwaaldi , yontii nde caltoto ɗen keeri hakkunde ɓiɓɓe leñol men .
Ndeke mo cikkaten o wonaa oon woni baasɗo .
Ndeke mo cikkaten oo , wonaa oon woni baasɗo .
Ndeke neɗɗo ena jogii ɓetirgel sahaa e nder hoore , ceertungel e ɓetirkon kaɓɓakon e juuɗe men kon , pawingel e ngonka neɗɗo oo .
Ndeke noon , woɗɗude wolde haɗataa nde naneede , innde Baal Aamadu Tijjaani heddiima giƴum kala yonta .
Ndeke noon Fulɓe Senegaal wonaa pelle walla dente ŋakkiri en , ŋakkira ɗen ko kaaldigal hakkunde dente men e pelle men , e renndude peeje e dawro he kala ko toɗɗii leñol ngol he kuuɓal .
Ndeke noon Fulɓe ene poti addude balle mum en ngam wuurnude Tele ɗe .
Ndeke noon teskondirde ndee e ittondiral geɗe ngal ene walla en e waawde tafde ngootaagu Fulɓe winndere .
Ndeke noon yontii ko banndiraaɓe Murtuɗo e sehilaaɓe makko humpitiiɓe to ɗeen ballifanɗe mooftaa ɓee , nde njaltinta ɗum en kolla leñol ngol .
Ndeke so Burkina yantii he senngo Riisi ina waawi gasde , hay sinno e oo sahaa , alaa baawɗo hollirde dallillaji dariiɗi Wagner inan nder Burkina .
Ndeke so en paami , so en ndokki ɗemɗe men e pine waloor mo ɗe kaandi o , eɗe mbaawi wuurnude ko ɓuri ko ngawa e ngaynaaka men waawi wuurnude ko .
Ndeke so en paamii , so naange fuɗii , ma en njooɗo hedde hojomaaji 8 tawa en njiyaani nge , eɗen pada haa caafal ngal ara e gite men .
Ndeke so tawii fayndaare yeewtere Njuddu Jeeri , ko fooɗtude yahnooɓe mbele ene ngarta , yo ɓe ɓeydu heen hirjinde tawtaaɓe ɓee ne yoo njaɓ jaɓɓaade .
Ndeke won ɗo pobbi ngonnoo e sara makko ina ndadda mo kanko ne .
Ndeke ɓiɗɓe fulɓe ronɓe ko ƴoogaa to woɗɗi e kelle taariik , ko faggaa gila e sahaaji toowɗi laamuuji men , gila e sahaaji mbelwelo wellitaare fergooji men , gila e sahaaji jokkondire men e renndooji goɗɗi , ngal ɓural foti ko mawnineede , nguu ngalu foti ko yeñtineede , wiɗtee , wiñee , mbele mbaasen roondaade gacce ɓolaare teddungal men , mbele janngo ɓesnguuji men ina mbaasa ɗokkude ndaarɗe , ƴura geeni , mbele janngo araaraay ɗemngal pulaar ina ɓamtoo , weɗoo haa to dow kammu mo lesɗataa , seedtoo pinal men , ɓamtaare men , ndimaagu men e wellitaare men .
Ndelle anka a hettinanke du !

Ndenten ɓuri ceeren .

Nder kareeli ɗi , LFPT naworii heen Eriterea sabi mum en jinngande Ecopia .
Nder konu Ecopia fof , ko ina ɓura feƴtere ko he leñol Tigerenaaɓe , teeŋti tuddinɓe rewo ɓee , ɗuum ko gila he hare hakkunde Ecopia e Eriterea .
Nder leydi men , 21 feebariyee hikka hawri ko e cosgol Duɗal ngam Ƴellitaare e Jaŋde Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ( IPELAN ) , daawal kimmungal ngam faltude palal gadanal palingal yeeso tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi men ngal .
Nder ngaal daawal galleeji seernaaɓe mawɗi gonɗi e nder diiwaan oo nootitiima e kewu nguu ko jiidaa e gure garɗe .
Nder ngonka nguurndam ñalnde kala , so haalooɓe pulfule ceerɗe pottii , so ɓe ngalaa ɗemngal ngal ɓe mbaawata faamondirde ( yeru ko wayi no Farayseere maa Engeleere ) , ɓe keewi ko fotondirde pulfule maɓɓe , mo-woni fof uddita pulfulal mum mbele aɓe mbaawa faamondirde .
Ndew-ɗen binndi haa ngon-ɗen rimɓe .
Ndewen tan haa nganden to ɗum jogori yuumtude .
Ndeysaan ñarapura , oon ñalawma ɓesngu Nooro wattiniima yoftonaademo Ko ɗum waɗi , hannde hay gooto yidɗa gollaade moƴƴere .
Ndi mbaadi ndañirdi jaynge ina waawi huutoreede e geɗe moƴƴe jamyame keewɗe , ko way no yaltin'de kuɓɓam ( électricité ) e neldude masiŋaaji to weeyo e geɗe goɗɗe , kono tan ko maa dummbee e paali mahaaɗi tiiɗɗi baawɗi daraade hay so leydi yerɓii walla waame ndiyam yanii e majji , so ɗuum alaa so ɗi pusii ko tooke bon'ɗe carotoo e taariindi he wonta lor , kadi ɗeen tooke ngonaa jaawooje nattude sabu naamndii ko duuɓi teemedde nde ɗe pirtoo , hono ko waɗi Ceernoobiil to Ukran e Fukusiimaa to Jappon ɗuum waɗi won e pelle ñaagiide seertude e kala ko yowitii e ngal karallaagal .
Ndiftungu to Fulɓe
Ndii ngaari pinal alaa ko heyɗata so wonaa coñce e binndol .
Ndii njogitaari jeyaa ko he fedde misilaaji ɗi Putin hollitnoo e hitaande 2018 no misilaaji " ɗi hay huunde waawanaa " .
Ndii njuɓɓudi maa sosoye ko leeli fof lebbi tati caggal caaktugol ooɗoo sariya .
Ndiin cukkiri won'di ko sulɗaane doolnuɗo kadi e dille , ko ɗuum addani nde wiyeede hoodere horŋoore walla woytotoonde , ko bempeƴƴe rajo iwata e mayre caroo e weeyo , kala keɓɓiiɗo ɗeen bempeƴƴe nanat goytaali walla korŋaali mayre juɓɓuɗi jaawɗi maa mbiyaa ko tagoore woɗnde neldata ɗeen dille .
Ndiin teddeendi woni ko laamɗo o ɓoornotoo paɗe mum yahana hoyre mum kala huunde e leydi ndi , so huunde nde ko geɗal makko walla ko geɗal jaagorgal haa ni yotti hay e geɗal kaliifa diiwaan .
Ndiiɗoon leydi tottiraandi , gollugol mum foti wonde tan ko e fannuuji golleteeɗi e nokku hee tawa tuugii ko e deftere sarɗiiji .
Ndiwri keewndi ( ko nanndi e baawe ) , so dabbunde arii , jaangol ɓurtii haa ndiyam waɗtii fenndaade to Oorop ( to leyɗeele tuubakooɓe ) , ndiwat toon ngara e Afrik , ndi rewata ko dow , ko ɓuri Kilmeeteruuji 7 dow heen sahaaji ) , tawa ndi majjani , ndi ara gah e Afrik .
Ndiyam ceniɗam : ko famɗi fof , tuddule 20 e nder tuddule 24 gonɗe e Brakna ɗe ina ngondi e caɗeele ndiyam .
Ndiyam e dow Ngaawe
Ndiyam e dow leydi ɗeɓata waade kono ɗerewol coomirangol ''ballon'' ɗerewol ngol daratoo darnde ndiyam , ballon o wona leydi , wonɓe weeyo boowal Ngaawe cooynotoo ɗaŋre nde ko ina bulɗi hakke no ndiyam ɗam wertorii e mayre , kono nganndee koy ɗam diwaani 0 .
Ndiyam e dow mars ko huunde hatojinaade sanne , sabu maa woode feranɓe toon ɗo e duuɓi sappo walla noogaad paaɗi , ngam ɓe ngonana aadee aawde e dow tagofeere woɗeere .
Ndiyam ina boowal leydi ( weeyo ) , dow tagopeeje , e kaaƴe kayhaytooje e ndeer weeyo , ɗuum addani neɗɗo fooɗanaade weeyo ngam hoɗoyde e dow tagopeeje ko arata .
Ndiyam ina tawee e mbaadiiji 3 , ɓooɗde ( haayre ) , ndeelam e henndu ( cuurki ) , ɗam fuɗɗotoo fenndaade ko 0°C , ɗam wonta haayre so nguleeki jokkii ustaade , ɗam wontata henndu ( cuurki ) ko 100°c , hakkunde 0°C e 100°C ɗam tawatee e mbaadi ndeelam , oo waylo-waylo noon fawi ko e ɓittigol kammu ( pression atmosphérique )
Ndiyam kaaɗɗam ɓuri saraade e leydi sabu maa ɗam wonoy 97 .
Ndiyam ko geɗe ɗiɗe ndenndi laati ɗam , mittere Oksijen , e mitte ɗiɗe Hidrojen ,
Ndiyam ko mahre sariinde e dow leydi haa e boowal leydi , teeŋti noon e nder ko wuuri , sabu alaa ko wuurata nguurndam ɗam ngannduɗen ɗam tawa ndiyam heƴaani heen , neɗɗo tan ina waɗi ndiyam ko ina abboo e 65% e teddeendi mum , ndiyam in mooɓi ko ina abboo e 72% e wertaango leydi , 97% e majjam ko kaaɗɗam , ko heddi koo woni mbelɗam ( caaɗli , beeli e ilameeje )
Ndiyam ko soppoo-joloo waɗata hakkunde leydi e kammu , so naange wuli , hello ndiyam maaje dow ngo suurka yanta e waaƴo puɗi , cuurki ki ƴeɓa ( roondoo dow ) , nde wonnoo dow ina ɓuuɓi , cuurki ki renta fenndo , wonta duule ( tedda ) toɓa , saroo e dow leydi , kadi refta ɗo rewno wonta duule .
Ndiyam waawaa muk taweede ina woni ndeelam e dow Mars , sabu tolno nguleeki e ɓittugol kammu ina lohi toon , so haayre ( ɓooɗde ) ndiyam wulnaama toon suurkat kono taayata ( deeltotaako ) !
Ndokkaa jom suudu maa kadi geɗal mun haa timma ,
Ndoondoolaagu feewde e rewɓe , ko wayi no piile , waawnude debbo ko yiɗaa , kaddingol sukaaɓe rewɓe , ɗuum fof ko waasde hormaade jojjanɗe rewɓe .

Ndu firlitoo , ndu arta hirnaange ɗuum noon timmata ko e balɗe 29 pawɗe seeɗa

Ndu sereendu maa wallu en yaynaade geɗe pamare , tolniiɗe mittere tawa kadi ko e sahaa daɓɓo , kadi maa wallu en e wiɗtude golle geɗe jaawɗe , ko nanndi e moɗmoɗtondiral diƴƴe e ɓaki , yanti heen feññin'de mbaadi ñonkotooji ( virus ) , mahngo ɓakdi gila e jamɗe haa e geɗe goɗɗe e maral mum .

Neɗɗo baawɗo wonde fof e e ciirol ngol o jeyaa fof omo foti jogaade gacce ballooje mo e waawde heddaade e ɗooftaare doosɗe mahɗe tammbii renndo e nguurndam e diine , so wonaa ɗuum baɗtane bonɗe ina ndooki joom mum e aduna e laakara
Neɗɗo e peeje mum waɗii ko ina heɓɓoo manaango gila memaani leydi , ko ɗum loocol njamndi toowngol waɗde e ɓoggol njamndi faya nder leydi , loocol ngol ñiɓee daroo , so tawii manaango arii rewa heen faya nder leydi taw lorlaani hay gooto .
Neɗɗo e peeje mum waɗii to weeyo to -fotde 400 km dow- lulnde mahiraande jamɗe e geɗe goɗɗe , jooni ko cuuɗi guttateeɗi njoli , faandu heblete e dow leydi , feewnee haa yuɓɓa sowee neldee to weeyo , so yottiima to lulnde to wuttee haa fetoo , wona nokku baawɗo hoɗeede , hol ko ɓuri ndee feere feewde ?
Neɗɗo ena waawnoo hoɗde toon , waɗa kuɓeeje e taakawuuji , rema gese , wuuraa e dow mum no wuurdi e dow leydi nih , sinno tan toon ena wuurotonoo !

Neɗɗo gonduɗo e jalɓol teelngol ina waawi waasde yaltinde
Neɗɗo gonduɗo e jalɓol teelngol ina waawi waasde yaltinde hay maalal gootal .
Neɗɗo heɓii nokku e ganndal ɗo ina waawa ittude ɗum e leydi nawa ɗum to weeyo , to lewru , to ɗaŋe gonɗe e seto-naange , tawde hakkunde men e lewru kam ko salndu e palal , yanti heen ɗaŋre Mbaañ ( Mars ) ina heɓoo .
Neɗɗo hoddira feeñi ko gila duuɓi miliyoŋaaji 4 caggal , ɗum firti ko naane e nguurndam leydi .
Neɗɗo ina foti reentaade kala gonduɗo e o rafi , waasa mbo ɓadaade nih .
Neɗɗo ina foti toppitaade laaɓal ɓalndu mum , sooɗaade juuɗe mum kala saha waɗa heen saabunnde .
Neɗɗo ina humpitii ŋakkere nde o tagdaa to golle semmbe e ronkudembo golle juutɗe hay so ngonaa naamndiiɗe doole , ɗuum waɗi mbo yowitaade e peeje makko ngam o seerta e ndeen ŋakkere , won ko ɓalndu hattanaani , won ko hoyre hattanaani kadi , kono peeje ɓennduɗe kam ceeraani e ɓulneede tafee mbela golle ina njokka .
Neɗɗo ina sooma Jabet fannu 2 e nder ɓanndu mum duuɓi keewɗi tawa male mum peeñaani .
Neɗɗo kadi waawata faamde hay huunde e jaɓɓal am , yoo won to baŋŋe kaɓtagol , yoo won to baŋŋe ɓinngu-leydaagu , so o yoomnoraaki ɗum lewlawal ngoo-ɗoo miijo .

Neɗɗo lawƴat ɗum haa laaɓa , waɗa he nokkuyel laaɓngel , yuppa heen ndiyam laaɓɗam , njareteeɗam .
Neɗɗo mo mbela ɗaa , belaaɗo ma , sago maa ko yiyde ɗum ene moosa , hay ɗuum ne ko so a ronkii jaleeɗe mum .
Neɗɗo mo rafi oo heɓindii ene tina e ɓanndu mum muusallaaji baylotooɗi , bayooji no ndeɓat nii .
Neɗɗo moƴƴo , pinɗo , malaaɗo , so tawii ɗemngal ena hiiɓa , añɓe ena ndarii jamma e ñalawma ngam yiɗde warde ɗemngal ma neeniwal , aɗa haani daraade caloɗa , kono wonaa aɗa wallita ɓeen .

Neɗɗo noon mo ngelooba ɓurani ɗum neɗɗo ɓaleejo , so waɗii oon ɓaleejo ɗeeɗoo geɗe , ɗuum haawnaaki !

Ngaawe : Terre
Ngaawe jeyaa ko e seto-naange , rewniinge ɗaŋe 8 , ina mbanngoo e magge .
Ngada e alkabeere .
Ngadortoomi ko WhatsApp mo yimɓe ɓee fof nganndi oo , mo yimɓe ɓee fof njogii o , walla nii mbiyen ko ɓuri heen heewde .
Ngal aldaa e kiram .
Ngal daawal e ɓamtude geɗe kuutoranooɗe ko battamlamiiwal sabu maa weeɓno yahde to weeyo boowal ngaawe , teeŋti noon wonan'de sooynotooɓe feran'de Yumma-njanaare walla Mbaañ .
Ngal daawal toɗɗii ko ɗemɗe laawɗinaaɗe e fawaade he mbaydi cellingol denndaangol , ko adii nde ɗe carotoo to weertaango haa ɗe mbaawi huutoreede nder leyɗe ceertuɗe , haa nih ɗe njibini calti goɗɗi .

Ngal jeyaa ko e mbaadi mbattindiindi e naalankaagal leñol ngol .

Ngol woni goo ko kippu Afrik ine yettoo feccere joofirde , woni jeyeede e kippuuji nay ɓurɗi woɗɗoyde he kawgel hee .
Ngol ɗo jimol keɗee .
Ngol ɗoon ɗerewol nih saraama e hoohooɓe laamu nguu wonɓe e nder diiwe ɗee haa nih ardiiɓe jaŋde , nde ɗooftotoo ndee yamiroore ummoriinde e Jaagorgal jaŋde ngenndiire .
Ngolɗoo bellitgol njuɓɓudi laamu ina waɗi ɓural , so wallitde toppitaade geɗe keewɗe , ceertuɗe , nder ngonkaaji ɗi kala dental nokkuwal heerorii , nder jokkorɗe goodɗe e tolnooji ɗii kala , gila to tolno ngenndi haa e wilaayaaji e mukaataaji e kominaaji e hakkunde kominaaji ; rokka ɗum en safaruuji ɓurɗi yahdude e ngonka mum en .
Ngolɗoo keertingol neɗɗaagal Arab ina laawɗinaa e sariya gorworo oo , gila e Doosɗe leydi 22 marse 1959 , e doosɗe leydi 20 mee 1961 , rewrude e baɗgol Arab ɗemngal gootal ngenndiwal , oon sahaa ko Farayse tan wonnoo ɗemngal laawɗungal .
Ngolɗoo ma a taw woni tataɓol waɗde , ko muritaninaaɓe ina njooɗoo ko foti nii juutde ngalaa enternet , gadanol ngol ko caggal woote hooreleydaagu 2019 wonnoo .
Ngon-ɗen ko e renndo tonngaango e geƴƴelal gootal , kabrondiral ngal enternet weeɓtini kono ko ɓuri heewde e men ƴoogata kabaruuji mumen ko e pokopokolam ko goongɗi koo ceɗta e men naatat e tewru nduu .
Ngonka Tooro ko adii hitaande 1890
Ngonka fuɗɗii waylaade ko he 2018 nde " wooteeji " ngalluuje paɓɓitaa , e deestagol Gardinooɗo Jaagorɗe ndeen Haile Mariam Dessalegn .
Ngonka gollooɓe e duɗe ɗee gila e ɗowooɓe ɗe , jannginooɓe haa e mineebaraaɓe gollooɓe e majje .
Ngonka jannginooɓe , njoɓɗi mum en , e faayiida mum en nder renndo , moƴƴaani .
Ngonka jeyi leydi e nder diwanuuji tati e Muritani : Brakna , Gorgol e Trarsa .
Ngonka leyɗeele Hirnaange Afrik to bannge politigi ina faaynii hannde : seɓɓitiiɓe jihaadiyankooɓe inan leewoo he nder diwaan Sahel oo , ina pusa gure , ina njooɓoo pitaali miskineeɓe , soldateeɓe inan polla laamuuji mum en ( garduɗi heen sahaaji nii e laabi " demokarasii " ) , lomtoo sabu woytoraade wonde ɓeen ardiiɓe ndonkii tabitinde kisal e nder leyɗeele mum en , ellee maa mbiyaa ko wonaa ɗuum wonnoo haaju maɓɓe garwaniijo e nder dowla baawɗo wonde fof .
Ngonka weeyo ( kilimaa ) ɓeydiima faaynude
Ngonndirɗon hannde ko jomanuuji kampaañ wona , haa ɗuum waɗi won heen kala to yimɓe ena kawrita ena cofta taweede toon , ngam yiilaade ko ɓe mbaawi toon dañde ko ena nafa yimɓe maɓɓe .
Ngonɗen ko e maayo henndu , etee ko e luggere mum ñiiɓɗen , so tawi en payi dow , en ɓeydoto toowde tan eɗen ɓeydoo yaltude maayo henndu ngo ( kammu ) , haa ceerten ( cuppitoɗen ) e maggo , toon so neɗɗo buumaaki haa hawri yooɓi henndu seertat e fittaandu .
Ngoo hello ngo Farayse uddi hannde daartol mum ko teskingo sabu lannda Sosiyaalist en mbayrii laamaade hoore leydi Farayse gila e François Mitterant .
Ngoo miijo heɓɓaade cereeli naange gila dow weeyo ko ɓooyngo ,
Ngoo miijo ina waawi wonirde e oo sifaa
Ngoo renndo buɓɓotoongo na buɓɓitoo e ɓale oo aduna ina buɓɓondira nii hay e hoyre mum haa woɗɓe ina mbuɓɓa ɗum , haa
Ngoo wallifo ine heewi nafoore he ɗemngal , tee ina wallita humtaaɓe e binndol ko ɓooyaani dañde ko tari e faggaade ganndal goɗngal .
Ngoo weeyo e yaajde , ngoo weeyo e luggiɗde , ngoo weeyo mooftungo koode ɗe limotaako e lilluɗe moolanaaɗe .
Ngoo wuro , siinci ngo ko seerereeɓe ɓee .
Ngoo ɗoo miijo wiingo won'de ndiyam ummii ko weeyo boowal Ngaawe ina deeƴi e hakkille , sabu annduɓe njiytii kaaƴe kayhaytooje e lefol Kiiper ( La ceinture d'Edgeworth-Kuiper ) , ɗeen kaaƴe ko ndiyam penndiɗam ɓolam , hakke no ɗiin nokkuuje mbay ɓuuɓde , ndiyam yoorat kos , ɗuum noon so woodii e majje caytuɗe , ɗo njanoyi fo ŋakkataa ndiyam .
Ngoo-ɗo feeto hitaandeyankeewo aynaaɓe maa agaaɓe Fulɓe , Tuwaareg e Bororoo heewi waɗde ko sahnga ciltirɗi ndunngu tee ngo duumotoo ko balɗe tati tawa nootoo e ngal ɗoon pottital fineyankeewal ko remooɓe , aynaaɓe e ƴellitooɓe pine Nijeer e wondude e seteeji gummiiɗe e leyɗeele koɗdiiɗe ko wayi no Nijeriyaa , Caad , Kameruun e huunde e leyɗeele Magereb Arab .
Ngool dartagol ina haani , sibu jotondiri ko e jojjanɗe gorwore , tee dartagol maɓɓe ko jamyamol , kaaɗngol e juuɗe , tawi faandaare mum ko fooɗtude hakkillaaji ardiiɓe leydi ndii tan .
Ngool guuragol Leydi waɗi won e nokkuuji e dow mayri to bannge coɓɓuli rewo walla worgo , naange ina wirnoo ɗum en lebbi jeegom kadi wirnitoo ko foti noon , kala gonɗo toon sooynoto naange e asamaan ina yaha ina arta tawa mutaani fotde lebbi jeegom , caggal ɗuum nge wirnoo ko foti noon ko e jamma tan ɓe ngoni .
Ngool guurtol ko guuringol fotde 23 , 5° e dow dingiral tagopeeje , ɗuum addi waylo-waylo weeyo ( ceeɗu , dabbunde , demminaare e ndunngu ) .
Ngool jaɓgol foti ko waɗaneede kaayit tottee ɗaɓɓuɗo leydi ndii oo , oon hollitoya ɗum Noteer keɓtinaaɗo .
Ngool konngol , nde haalaa ndee , e no haaldaa nii , ina soomi maanaaji keewɗi : ko idii fof ko hollitde wonde aadee taƴtii yolnde moolanaande to bannge ganndal e karallaagal nde waɗi haa koyɗol laatii goonga , kono kadi ko ngam hollitde Dental Sowiyet wonde Amerik woni yeeso fof .
Ngool lappol ko koode ɓole ( walla naangeeji ɓoli ) , denndaangal ko cooynotoɗen e koode , ko e lillungal he jeyaa , ɗe ɓadi tan ɗe laaɓti , goɗɗuɗe ɗe ne ko naanagal majje heddi fiy lappol , ngol cooynotoɗen e ndoogu ngol .
Ngool lefol kuɓpooɗal gonngol hakkunde 400 e 670 nm woni lewndu no paamirton , ko ngool soomi denndaangal gommbuɗe njiyeten e taariindi men , njiyen ɗum ina wojji , ɗum ina ranwi , goɗɗum ina oolɗi , wonaa nguun goobu woni e majjum kono ko ndeen wepeƴere e lefol lewndu ruttaa haa ɗuum waawi yiyreede e nguun guubu , wadde so en njiɗii mbiyen lewndu yooɓii ko goobuuji ɗo yanii fo rokka ɗum goobu .
Ngool loocol wiyetee ko paddol-manaango , addi ngol ko ameriknaajo ina wiyee Benjamin Franklin hitaande 1760 , heewɓe cikkatnoo oon sahaa ko pooɗirgol manaango , njogii heen kulhili , kono hannde ina famɗi nokku mbo waɗaani ɗum .
Ngoon eeraango ko ngam heƴnude pulaar ( fulfulde ) e kaɓirɗe kesam hesamaagu ɗe wanngorde FireFox woniri liggoraade ko fay arde , nde wonnoo fulɓe mbi'i wullaango jamma woppidtaake e gooto , ɗuum waɗi sagataaɓe fulɓe nootaade Ceerno Ibraahiima Saar e ngesa ba o lewani leñol ngol ba , ko ba njaajba noon kono doole e mabba gollaama no haanirta nih , nde wonnoo lewɗo ngesa ba ina won'di e pellital mawngal woto pulaar heed caggal , o simmini heen woɗɓe mbela ina waya no ɗoftal nih golle ɗe njaawa gasde ,
Ngoon foolotiro gasiri ko poolgu laaɓngu , 2-0 wonande Farayse ngam yawtude timmoode kubeeri winndereyankoori hakkunde mum e leydi Argentine .
Ngoon maayo ronkaani waɗde kulle hay so ko pamare no feewi .
Ngoon miijo Aarabaagal tan , ko waawnude leƴƴi ɗi ngonaa Arab

Ngoonndide .
Ngooroondi yahdi e Ibliis haa yettii lekki ki Aadama ngoni kii , ngooroondi wukkiti ɗoon Ibliis .
Ngootaagu Fulɓe he limtagol ( recensement ) Senegaal feññinii en ngalaa gardiiɗo .
Ngootaagu ngenndi : ina nawori jojjanɗi aadee kala , gila e warngoonji , taccinaaɓe , batte njiyaagu , ɗawaaɓe , faltaaɓe ekn jiidaani e geɗe jowitiiɗe e jaŋde e pinal ;
Ngootaagu ngenndi firtaani wontude gootel , wontude gootum .
Ngootaagu ngenndi kam e gagga renndo , haa teeŋti e caɗeele njiyaagu e ndonaandi aadeeri ( warngooji ) , ko ɗuum wonnoo ngoƴa dowrowo yarham mum hooreejo sidoca .
Ngootaagu ngenndi ndi e mahondiral renndo ngo ina ɗaɓɓi nanondiral hakkunde moɓe ɓesngu men kala , nanondiral tuugotoongal e ɗooftagol piɓle potal , e nuunɗal e ndimaagu .
Ngoowka men e ordinaateeruuji kuutortoɗen hannde ɗi ina ɓeydoo tan mawnude , hay so yoga e men ina majji no ɗi ngollirta ,
Ngooɗoo firo hitoyeewo waɗaa ko he MP4 ene wonndi e karambol taratoongol .
Ngooɗoon wullitaango ina addana tottiranooɗo leydi oo yowaneede silsil ƴettaaɗo ngam riiwde ɗum e leydi hee .
Ngoppen mawnikinaare e yawaare hakkunde men .
Ngorwito-ɗen lappol ngol , haa ceedtinen ko puɗɗi-ɗen haalde koo .
Ngoƴa goɗɗo o ko lohgol pooɗal ( gravité ) Mars , ɗuum ina battina e foofaandu leɗɗe kadi e jahgol ndiyam e ndeer majje , mawnugol puɗi ɗi leelta waaƴo majji ustoo .
Ngoɗɗeeki hakkunde Leydi e Mars ñiiɓaani ɗo gootel , nde wonnoo laabi majji ina ceerti , ko Leydi heedi Mars e Naange , wadde ko kayri ɓuri ɓadaade , ɓuri yaawde jirlol e Naange , refti heen lappi majji ngonaa beɗi potɗi , ɗi mbaɗi ko corfuli ɗiɗi , wadde ina waɗa sahaa ɗe ngoɗɗondira no feewi ( 400 miliyoŋ kilomeeteer ) , goɗɗo ɗe ɓadondira ( 55 miliyoŋ kilomeeteer ) .
Ngoɗɗeeki mayre naange ko : 57 910 000km .

Nguu jammaagu ne udditiraa ko Qur’aan e sawta ceerno ceekh umar taal , caggal ɗuum ceerno abuu mokhtaar taal duwii , konngol arti kadi e Mariyam kan mo meeri swrtt , haamiidu bah mo catal , e aali siree wañ .
Nguu mbayliigu maa addan ñaawoore hisde e kuutoragol ngam haɓde e woɗɓe , walla to bannge piggal politik walla polis maa konu ; nde hisa e jaawondireede e politik e kuutoragol laamu luulndingol fiɓnde Dowla sariya , kuutoragol dallinirteengol deeƴre renndo e kisal Dowla walla , ko wattindii koo , jedditagol diine walla bakkodingol .
Nguu mbayliigu tuugorɗe ɓetirɗe waɗtii golloreede

Nguun batu woni dowrowu to bannge lelnugol kuule yuɓɓo ngo .
Nguun goomu wallitii en no feewi , gila to bannge jeeyngal nder sarɗiyankooɓe haa e jokkondire e jaagorɗe laamu , haa yettii ballal teeŋtungal ngam tawtoregol ñalɗi diisnondiral paatuɗi he TNJ .
Nguun mbayliigu ine foti ñawndude caɗeele teskaaɗe ɗee , bonnuɗe jaŋde ndee .

Nii raddooji ciforinoo , ko nii Fuuta wuurdunoo , ko nii kadi waañooɓe , karamoko en kam e raddooɓe koɗdirnoo .
Nii woni , Jokkorde pelle ɗee , gaa gaa geɗe jawniiɗe kam e jilɓooje gonɗe he sariya kaa , kam fof kadi e sunaade ko Parlemaan oo waasi teskaade huunde e wasiyaaji baɗanooɗi he nder winndannde sakkitiinde ndee , ine heɓtini wonde gooto he hujjaaji ɗiɗi ( 2 ) dowrowi dallinannde pelle ɗee jaɓaama , hono naattingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke , e wolof he nder Tippudi Nehdi e Jaŋde leydi ndii , no ɗemɗe jannginirɗe e no ɗemɗe jokkondiral nii , ko jiidaa e cosgol " njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi ɗowde ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije kam e ciynugol jaŋde ɗee ɗemɗe " .
Nii woni , aɓe ndewi ɓe ngoppaani , haa ɗum wonti hujja mo murto ngo jogori huutoraade haa liɓi laamu makko .
Nii woni , caggal duuɓi 10 darnde , e pellital e ŋatgol e fiɓnde ndee , e hitaande 2002 , politik ngenndiijo loowtugol ƴiiƴam lelnaa , Nokku Ngenndiijo loowtugol ƴiiƴam kam e booñuuji ƴiiƴam cosaa e nder wilaayaaji leydi ndii fof .
Nii woni , caggal nde nanondiral ronkaa dañeede , piyanɗe eggi
Nii woni , doosgal leydi ngal ina rokki hooreejo leydi oo hurum e mudda nde " roondii donngal ngal " .
Nii woni , e fawaade e darnde , e soklaaji , e yiɗde leñol ngol , kadi e fawaade e ngonka e mbaylaandi leñol ngol , ngol feccitii hoore maggol e kinɗe , tawa wooteere heen fof won ɗo heedtani dental ngal : ɗum woni ko mbiyaten Maabuɓe , e Sakkeeɓe , e Wayluɓe , e Lawɓe , e Subalɓe , e Wammbaaɓe , ekon .
Nii woni , e hitaande 1914 ndi haɓɓondiri e Otris e Hongiri , ndi yaaɓani heɓtude e jiimde Farayse .
Nii woni , e hitaande 1963 , capanɗe keewɗe jagge ɓaleeɓe ɓe mbeltanooki e Mooɓondiral Eeleega , rentunooɓe nder fedde Union Générale des Originaires de la Mauritanie du Sud ( UGOMS ) woni Dental Kuɓtodinngal Jibinannde Worgo Muritani , mbinndi kaayit , totti ɗum Muttaar wul Daddaa hooreejo Dowla , ina ɓiya heen : " Minen ɓaleeɓe Muritani , amin mbasiyoo Mooɓondiral ngal e Parlemaan oo e Hooreejo dowla oo , nde ƴeewtotoo jooni jooni juɓɓule dowla oo , ngam waɗtude juɓɓule Federaal ngam jaabtaade yiɗde ɓesngu nguu " .
Nii woni , e maayirde lewru ut 1890 , Abel Sanndee tafi konu mum , o mooɓi fotde yimɓe teemedde nayo ( 400 ) , ittaaɓe e yoga e gure Fuuta , e gardagol Arɗo Gede , hono Aali Buubu .
Nii woni , e ooɗoo sahaa , ɓe peewnii fotde 22 comcol , tuggi kawase haa e simbisaaji " moɗooji keneeli naafɗe " ekn
Nii woni , e raɓɓiɗinaade , tonngol daartol oo galle mo duuɓi capanɗe tati e goo ( 31 ) hikka .
Nii woni , eɗen ciftora , tuugnorgal gadanal njanngiin he fedde hee , lelnaa ko e hitaande 1978-79 he nder Catal Nuwaasoot .
Nii woni , he teeminannde 19ɓiire , " ganndal " laawɗininii miijiyeeje leñameeje , sari ɗum en .
Nii woni , nguu ndimaagu ñaawoore ina foti wonde ngoƴa gadano mahooɓe leydi ndii .
Nii woni , taƴondire hakkunde ɓiɓɓe yumma ngam gardagol emiraaji safalɓe ina mbattintunoo e ɓaleeɓe Muritani , walla mbiyen haalooɓe ɗemɗe Sudaan ( Haal-Pulaar en , Soninkooɓe e Jolfuɓe ) huufɓe maayo Senegaal ; aɓe naatatnoo heen , wooda mo ɓe keedani heen , fawaade e enɗam , walla e nafooje walla e kaɓɓondire njogadanooɗe .
Nii woni , wonande 2017 , ndokkaa-mi Njeenaari Fonndasiyoŋ Emiraaji Arab Dentuɗi wonande Cellal .
Nii woni , wondude e hakkilantaagal mawngal , lannda seernaaɓe , e gardagol Suleymaani Baal , fooɗti lawakooɓe aada to bannge Fulɓe ( teel : pullo ) ( Joom , Arɗo , Kamalenku e Seɓɓe ( Farba , Bummuy ) .

Nii woni Laawankooɓe ( ummoriiɓe Laaw ) njondinii e lewde kolaaɗe jaajɗe , egginoyde galleeji mumen e ñiiɓde hankadi e Tummbere Jiinge heedde 1894 .
Nii woni cate ngudditaa .
Nii woni dente nokkuuji ɗee njogoo konseyeeji toɗɗaaɗi , ɗe njogoo neɗɗaagu to bannge njuɓɓudi e sariya .
Nii woni e daawal feccere ɗiɗmere teeminannde 15 ɓiire ndee , Purtugeec en ɓeydii mammude .
Nii woni feccere he winndere ndee halfaa , Afrik no diidorinoo feccitaa hakkunde leyɗe Orop e mooɓondiral Berlin e hitaande 1885 .
Nii woni ko maananondiral waɗi hakkunde leyɗe Orop e hitaande 1841 kam e ciifgol NanondiralBruxelles e hitaande 1890 , nde laaɗe konuuji gooto e Dowlaaji jeyaaɗi enanondire ɗii , ndokkaa mbaawka faddaade e dartinde laaɗe tarafikooje jiyaaɓeleyɗe goɗɗe .

Njaggen Oto , ( njolen heen ) mbiyen ko kañum wonani en leydi .
Njaggen e koye men suudu ena woni hakkunde wuro ter
Njaggen jooni neɗɗo ena jogii heeɗelde , walla haayre .
Njaggen jooni suudu huɗo murliɗndu ; ngummo-ɗen ɗo damal suudu ɗo , eɗen mbaɗa yiiloo-banngoo eɗen taaroo suudu ndu .
Njaggen jooni wuro , mbiyen ko kanngo wonani en naange .
Njaggen kadi miin mboɗo mi nder oto mboɗo jooɗii e jooɗorde feŋiinde e oto oo , mboɗo hucciti e maa .
Njaggen kadi waktuuji 22 woɗɗindiraani e waktuuji 24 , ndeke woɗɗindiraani e ñalawma men .
Njaggen yolnde " t " sahaa ɓetiraaɗo ɓetirkon men sahaaji , kon kaɓɓu-ɗen e cammeeje juuɗe men ɗee .
