Njuɓɓudi jaaynde ɗimmuru Fooyre ( 1982 – abril 1985 )
Njuɓɓudi laamu Daesh
Njuɓɓudi mbaawka politik ndii wonaano ngootiri , tamiindi , wonande leydi ndii kala .
Njuɓɓudi sippirooji Senegaal renndini ko diiwaan Fuladu e Daande Maayo bannge Senegaal .
Njuɓɓudi toppittoondi keblugol e ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( ko wayi no duɗal ɗemɗe ngenndiije goodnongal ngal ) he nder jaŋde leydi ndii ;
No Maalik waawri hoddu , laa6aa gitaar , weliri daande , selli ko yimata ; ko noon o jogorii jikku labaangu he ngon'diigu .
No Mali nih , Burkina wuurii loppite laamu deggondirɗe , ndeke konunkooɓe Burkina ina katojini e balle e leyɗe ɗo ɓaggii haa mbaawa hisde .
No annoore yiyotoonde ndee nii , nde njiyraten gite men ñalnde kala ndee nii , les-boɗewol jeyaa kañum ne ko he mbaadiiji caafe sulɗeyiiteeje ( rayonnement électromagnétique ) .
No colli e leyɗeele en kiwaama .
No geɗe ɗee njahri nii mbettii ɓe no feewi , sibu ɓe ɗamininoo ko maa ɓeen paddano ɓe AQMI , kono ko ko luulndii ɗum kewi , sibu ko AQMI jiimi e ko ina tolnoo e 90% e rewo Mali hannde .
No gonduɗo heen foti nanngireede
No haaliyankooɓe ɓee keewi wiyde nii " so won leliiɓe e ɓuuɓri no gaññeeje , wallaay won daraniiɓe ɗumen e naange no jullaaje " .
No heewaa wi’eede wonnde ñeeñal ko geɗal toowngal ngam jeertinde e haɓugol tooñe .
No heɗoraade ɓernde wayi bonde fof noon , ellee ko haaldude ɓernde kadi ɓuri bonde .
No kaaƴe suukara telsi haa nannda .
No karawal haa laaɓi ndi fiɗtaama .
No keewmi wiyde nih tan , gila telfoŋ Android ari haajuuji keewɗi kumtii , ɗiya kumii , jooɗi-nooɓe heewɓe ngummii , ummi-nooɓe heewɓe njooɗii , golle mum’en ndaarii taw alaa ko mbaawi heen haydara .
No laaɓal waꞌi e ɓanndu , ko noon diyam waꞌi e taariindi .
No mbiirunóómi dów seeɗa nii , keñe potaani addande en wiide eɗen nduña laana tawa won ko ka waawi nawde góɗɗum .
No mbirunoomi hikkaa welii mo wuuri 6ura , Yo allahu hokku on juutde balde e maleede ha mo wuuri 6ura , ko dum tigi woni yide hoyre mum No mawni am Sayku Umar Bah wiy tan Njokken Golle
No mbiyno-ɗen nih , faɗo Fotosfeer ngo ɓuri tigi ɓuuɓde e paɗe goɗɗe ɗe .
No mbiyno-ɗen nii , heen e majje ena mawni ngasata sumde haa njettoo wertaango leydi , haa njana e njaareendi .
No mbiynoɗen nih , naange ena waɗa yiiloo-banngoo no tagopeeje nih .
No mbiyruɗen dow nih , ndeen baagal ngal heɓɓiima cirƴam ɗam , ngal tawii heen ndiƴƴam ( hydrogène ) ɗam microbaaji kuutortoo e nguurndam mumen .
No nduu ŋuuñirta nii noon , jiidaa e no ndu ŋuuñiratnoo .
No oon wonirnoo debbo moƴƴo nehiiɗo keewɗo gacce .
No paamirten , so annoore waawaa yaltude wuddere ɓaleere : so
No paamirten , so annoore waawaa yaltude wuddere ɓaleere : so a huɓɓii toon lampa , gonɗo boowal yiyataa annoore kaan lampa sibu nde yaltataa wuddere ɓaleere ndee , ɗum noon ko niɓɓere wonnoonde toon ndee tan yiyetee .
No paamirten ten , faandaare feere ndee ko niɓɓiɗinde dow gulli leydi too .
No pulaar winndirtee , no janngirtee !
No sukaaɓe fedde makko nii , o naati jaŋde Quraana .
No tagofeere nde tagorii nii , mbele ko noon Asamaan oo tagorii ?
No winndere ndee he kuuɓal mum nii , 21 feebariyee kala , pelle pinal ngenndiije , hono FƁPM , AMPLCS , APROLAWO , he dow ndeenka UNESCO , kam enne ine mawnina Ñalawma winndereejo ɗemngal neeniwal .
No winndere ndee he kuuɓal mum nii , 21 feebariyee kala , pelle pinal ngenndiije , hono FƁPM , AMPLCS , APROLAWO , he gardagol UNESCO , kam enne ine mawnina Ñalawma winndereejo ɗemngal neeniwal , ngam semmbinde kuutoragol ɗemɗe neeniije he nder ekkol , ngam semmbinde keewal ɗemɗe e pine , ngam kadi tiiɗtinde ngootaagu ngenndi ndii .
No yaadu way fof ɓuranii en jonnde
No yahde lewru way weñaade ni , ko noon ummaade toon arta way saɗtude , alaa heen fo ko weeɓi , sabu so tawii laana ka jippii ko e nokkuure nde fotaani walla no ka jipporii ni feewani , ɗuum ina waɗa caɗeele ngam ummitaade toon haanirta ni , kono tan karallaagal e peeje moƴƴinooje ina njokki fewjeede ngam yawtude ɗeen caɗeele .
No ɗam dogiranta leslesi ni ɗam soggora lamolamongal leydi e kaaƴe faade maayo haa yuppoya e maaje mawɗe , nde wonnoo so ɗam ruuyii faatude dow ɗam hattanaani naworde lamɗam sabu nisde , lamɗam ɗam heddoo e maaje he , tawde ko noon ndiyam woori ko yah-ngartaa tan ala e sago lamɗam ɓeydoo e maaje he .
No ɗum waawi ardude fof , gollotooɗo laamu dokkirɗo leydi ndii tawi rewaani laawol , walla ballitɗo gollal ngal hay so tawii ko e juumre , kuule nehdi ina mbaawi faweede mum kam e ñaawooje no sariya lelniri nii .
Nobel rokkude njeenaari Nobel 2018 ndii wiɗtooɓe ɗiɗo ko faati e paddorɗe ɓalndu ,

Nofal Siinnaaɓe keɗotongal dille koode

Nokku O ko : 801 Dean street , Brooklyn , NY .
Nokku ciftorɗo to bannge daartol biyeteeɗo Jeeriyel Tummbere walla Tummbere Jiinge ko nokku kadi banngorɗo hono no winndiyanke biyeteeɗo Teen Yuusuf Gey hollirnoo ɗum nii : " ñalnde fof Muritani dañi naftoraade denndaangal kattanɗe mawɗe ɗe mari to bannge banngorɗe , sikke alaa ko Jeeriyel Tummbere wontata hajjirde , sulɗaane yiilotooɓe dakmitorɗe .
Nokku gooto ine woodi to Ikren , mo Riisinaaɓe ɓuri fof haɓɓaade , oon woni Kirime ( Crimée ) .
Nokku goɗɗo oo , woni tataɓo oo , ko leegal Neustadt nder wuro Strasbourg to leydi Farayse .
Nokku kaddungal sukaaɓe ala e sago feewnee haa yooɗa .
Nokku mo koɗ-en oo hol e Fuutaaji ko o woni ?
Nokku mo koɗ-ɗen oo wiyetee ko Fuuta Tooro , diiwanuuji makko ko jeenay ( 9 )
Nokku o ina heewi gebbi , ko heen ndiyam ɗam rewata faya dow e mbaadi cuurki penndiɗam , nde wonnoo wertaango lewru Anselad ndu ina ɓuuɓi tigi ( -200°C ) , ko ndu muriindu penndeɗam ( glace ) haa ndu hawri , tekkeendi glaas o maa won kilomeetruuji 30 haa 40 , e les mum maaje ndiyam ina toon njooki , sabu nguleeki e teddeeki ko fawi e dow majjam ko yanti heen pooɗal Satirn moolanangal waawata tan ko deelɗin'de kaaƴe ndiyam .
Nokku oo ko nokku pottital hakkunde lare leydi keewɗe .
Nokku ɗo o yirlotonoo ɗoo ine heewi leɗɗe , ine metti yahde , ine heewi cewle ndiyam , pele neɗɗo mbeeɓaani maanteede ɗoon ;
Nokkuuji hurum ko nokkuuji catiiɗi gure ñiiɓɗe tawa ko nokkuuji ɗo nguurndam aadee aaɓnotoo .
Nokkuuji jeegom dewrewi , nokkuuji jeertingol guubiliiji ŋoriiji ina ngoodi ngam timminde ndeenka geecuuji ŋoriiji sawndo Ostarali , e nder nokkuuji kaldinaaɗi ɗo ɓiri ɓallaade .
Nokkuuji keewɗi he nder Afrik , ko wayno Fuuta Tooro ni , ko Islaam naati heen jooni wonii duuɓi ujunere , kono haa jooni joom-mum en ene ŋakkaa faamde diine Islaam no moƴƴi , nde tawnoo ɓe kaalantee ɗum ko he Arabeere .
Nollitere ganndal lislaam ko duɗal ngal ɓeduuɓi 40 fayi dow , tawikadi ko janngunooɓe haa ɓaari sariiya walla njiyi deftekeewɗe he yiyanndeAlmaami Maalik .
Nomgol nuunɗungol ardiiɓe njuɓɓudi ( Waali , Haakem , sarɗooɓe , halfinaaɓe kisal ) tawa ina teskoo geɗe maantinɗe mbaaɗe no ɗowgol moƴƴol golle halfinaa , ngenndiyankaagal , kattanɗe .
Noogaas e nayo ɓe ko ko keblee no nguurdata e nokku mbo ala sababuuji nguurndam , alaa ko ñaamete , ko yarete , ko foofate !
Nooro fuɗɗi faamde waandu nduu funti ɗum .
Nooro oo ñaami mawne en rewɓe ɗiɗo .
Nooro wiꞌi : " ko daddoowo wammbi ɓiɓɓe am , haɓɓi min haa tiiɗi roondi min .
Nooro woondi e pittaali ɓesngu mum wonde wontaa tampinde jawdi makko e mesngu makko .
Nooroo ɓalli daddoowoo oo ñuumbanii ɗum : " heɗto mi no moƴƴi musiɗɗo am , aɗa mawni , aɗa fayi .
Nootagol : Ko adii yooɗde e jamma oo ko nootagol yimɓe ɓee : hooreejo Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar , musiɗɗo Aamadu Umaar Jah , gardiiɗo lannda dawrugol AJD/MR , musiɗɗo Ibraahiima Muktaar To bannge pelle pine , eɗen cikki tan alaa fedde waalnde e Nuwaasot tawi ko dilloore e pinal nde araani ngam yoɓde teddungal hakkunde mum e ndee ɗoo fedde ngenndiyankoore jokkoore enɗam , tiiɗaande hoore mum wiyeteende Jalluɗi Jam .
Norwees , 22/07/11 , jannguuji ɗiɗi , ƴiiƴiiji mbaɗii to Osloo kam e duungeUtoya .
Norwees , Feelanndo ɓuri zóó fóf heewde pesooɗe e toɓɓe kono haɗaani ɗumen muulireede defte , te boom njoɗndam so fóóɗóndirii e cellal , ko cellal foti ɗaftude , wonaa kañum haani sooyde !
Noteer kala belsindiiɗo sarɗiiji cifaaɗi e nder ooɗoo dekere ko kañum deftotoo kaalis pawiiɗo e ɗum oo .

Nulaaɓe Cate , haa teeŋti e ummoriiɓe nder leydi
Nulaaɓe Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Abuu Aamadu Joop e Abuu Umar Kan to Lugge Sayɓooɓe
Nulaaɓe Fooyre Ɓamtaare : So tawii laamu yantinaani heen juuɗe mum mbele Fonndunaaɓe tan ena mbaawi kañumen tan runngaade oo kaalis fof , gila ko mahraa jumaa oo haa e ko waɗiraa nguu ɗoo kewu ?
Nulaaɗo ( JKM ) wiyi : " oon jiɗɗo resde mo alaa jawdi yo o ndaartu hay sinno ko feggere njamndi ɓaleere , o teŋira ɗuum " Habri ndeeɗoo jangtoore ko hawraande .
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Aliiw Demmba , mbiy-ɗaa ƴettu-ɗaa naalaŋkaagal maa ko e Caanngol Geloonga , hol ko nawno maa toon e hol no ɗum ardunoo ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Aliiw Demmba , naalaŋkooɓe heewɓe ɓuri yiɗde wonde ko e gure teeru , kono aan cuɓi-ɗaa ko nokkuuji bayɗi no Siiwi , Wodobere e Bow walla nokkuuji luuñtitiiɗi gite e noppi no ɗoo e Wiinnde Ɓokki nii ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Caggal calminaali e koofnaali feewde e maa e rewrude e maa feewde e wuro Fonndu e kuuɓal , hol no oo ñalawma ñalluɗo 28 lewru siilo 2022 wayi e mon ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : E hilifaaɓe diine nootitiiɓe ɓee , hol heen ɓe mbaaw-ɗaa rokkude en inɗe mumen ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Hade men artude e ko nganndiraa-ɗaa koo , so naalaŋkaagal , hol to wuro Waande heedti e nder Fuuta ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Heewɓe ena koddiri wonde ko Alasan Demmba , funeere maa ndee adi maa e naalaŋkaagal , kadi naatnu maa heen .
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Hol nde puɗɗi-ɗaa waɗtude yimde e hakkunde yimɓe e hol ko addunoo ɗum ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Laaɓtinan banndiraaɓe janngooɓe Fooyre Ɓamtaare alhaali maggol !
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Mbele Fonndu dañii balle gummoriiɗe ɗum e laamu walla e hoɗdiiɓe mum renndaaɓe nguurndam ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Mbele won jagge laamu walla dawriyaŋkooɓe nantuɗe inɗe mumen ngari heen ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : Seydi Njaay , jamaanu keewngu , ngu en keewaani yiyde walla nande e uddite jumaaji bayɗe hono nii yiyaama tuggude e haŋki fayde hannde e Fonndu , hol ko saabii ɗum ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : So en paamii rafiiji kaɗɗi hannde gure keewɗe ɓamtaade biyeteeɗi luure ɗii , njettaaki on tawo , onon Fonndunaaɓe ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : hol ko kewu hannde nguu roondii e ngalu ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : hol no naalaŋkaagal ardi e maa walla hol no ƴettir-ɗaa naalaŋkaagal ?
Nulaaɗo Fooyre Ɓamtaare : jooni yettano en jumaa oo , gila e mahdi makko , weertaango makko , kattanɗe makko to bannge waawde nawde yimɓe haa e ngalu kuutoraangu nguu .
Nulaaɗo dariiɗo , Gabo
Nulaaɗo dariiɗo to Liberwiil , Gaboo
Nulaaɗo dariiɗo to Magaama
Nulal ONU ngam deeƴtinde RDC ( Monusco ) waɗii e juuɗe laamu nguu " helikopteer gooto e ambilaasuuji ngam rusde gaañiiɓe ɓee to safrirdu Sinuwaaru Bukaawu hablaniindu jaɓɓaade ɓurɓe gaañaade ɓee .
Nuuhu ( JKM ) wiyi : miin , mi wonndaani e kaaɗi mi wonndaani kadi e baasal , hay ñamaande wootere kadi mi alaa , ngon mi ko mi nelaaɗo ummiɗo e jom winndere .
Nuuhu ko gorko mo Alla hokki semmbe e dow worɓe , wonaa mo woni kala suusi yettaade mo , rewɓe e worɓe fof .
Nuwaadibu .
Nuwaadibu : awooɓe njeeɗiɗo njooliima ɓaawo juwgol laana maɓɓe , to geej Nuwaadibu e no hollitiri catal toppitiingal awo .

Nuwaasoot ñalnde 28 feebariyee 2021
Nuwaasot ko sahre lofiinde e mbooko lamɗam , hoɗnde koɗki nduumiiki e dow jinnde hakkunde jiibaaji gamotinɗi ɗo buubi caɓata , gilɗi ɓuñata , gila e bamɗi , beyi , baali , dawaaɗi , ulluɗi , gertooɗe e kankaleeje , jonne kedde ñameele , biifi haa e laalaaɗe werlaaji .
Nuwaksoot , reenooɓe dummbirde wonnooɓe he golle mum he damal dummbirde mawnde Nuwaksoot , ɗo waɗbonyankooɓe salafiyankooɓe cokanoo , mbaraama hanki jamma 5 Mbooy 2023 .
Nuwassoto , 20 Oktooburu 2020
NuweSelannde , 22/02/11 , leydi yerɓii to wuro ɗiɗmo leydi ndii , wiyeteengo Christchurch .
Nyaawoore joomiraawo alaa ko taggɗo haalata heen , ɗuum waɗi eɗen mbi'a yo Alla yume mbo yaafoo , o loxtinana e waaɓe no makko haa heewa , yo Geno ɓuuɓnu aljanna mum
Nyald’i 12 e 13 nduu lewru teskaama no feewi sanne e nder winndere nde kala kono b’uri tineede
Nyalnde aab’nde nde ( altine ) kikiid’e to jippinde makkoBaaba e sehilaa6e mum y’eftii konngi kam e goomu nju66udi ndi , mawd’o jaayndiyankoo6e umminoo6e Senegaal 6e Buubakar Bah haalii o hollirii kadi ind’e ma66e , Umar Waddu y’eftii konngol ngam jaarnaade goomu nju66udi ndi e gardagol Aliw Saar Meer .
Nyande 12 welnere nde KO e nokku jood’d’o , ceniid’o tinaad’o teskaad’o ena wiyee Ambasadoor " oo d’oo jamma daneejo , beld’o , jirwud’u yontaa6e gila to bannge laamu haa yettii waalii Wuro en , haad’aani tan e Pulaar en , walla Sarakullee6e walla Jolfu6e walla Safal6e Ranee6e e 6alee6e hay Tuubakoo6e ngariino nootaade Baaba Maal kam e Daande Lenol , oo d’oo jamma wiyaa KO " soirée de gala " ad’a nyaama ad’a woob’a mbeld’am ad’a yee6a KO yood’i gaaci beld’i e daad’e beld’e ena ked’tee ena siiftina KO 6ooy kono kadi ena tagmaa miijtaade janngo maa .
O .
O Abdel Jelil jeyenooma e haɓotooɓe Siidi O Seek Abdallah nde yoga e lanndaaji kollitnoo yo o artu o joofna manndaa makko , o holliti foti huccaneede ko holno leydi ndii foti yaltirde e nduu fekkuru ko wonaa haalde yo SiDioka artu e jappeere laamu .
O addimo koy diiwaan demeteeɗo o wonee holludemo yimɓe remooɓe yiɗɓe demal yimɓe wurɓe e ndema mum’en kadi hoɗɓe e gese mum’en .
O addiraa Podoor ko sabu makko ɓooyde e nder Senegaal , e sabu makko anndude jikkuuji leƴƴi ɗii fof , ko sabu makko waawde taƴde enɗam , e waawde seerndude leƴƴi ɗii , e ko nanndi heen .
O adii jannginde ko to Magaama , o rewi Mbut e Kayhayɗi , kono o ɓooyii Jowol he kitaale 1953 , haa o tutii ɗoon poƴƴaali deftiyooji he pele makko , hono no wayɓe no Joob Saydu Haamiidu mo Raj Moritani , Ngayde Alasan ( gonnooɗo hooreejo Rajo Moritani ) , Wayga Abdullaay hooreejo kuuɓal " CNSS " , Joob Abdul Hammee gonnooɗo jaagorgal cellal , woniino kadi hay jaagorgal njulaagu , e ko nanndi he ɓeen , ɓeen ngasdataa ɗo .
O ardinaama sete muritaninaaɓe tawtoranooɓe Koolol Winnderewol 2ɓol Ñeeñal Ɓaleeɓe to Lagos Nijeriya hitaande 1977 , omo wondi e winndiyanke ŋanaa , Jibiriiru Sakariyaa Sal .
O ari e Nuwaasot , o woni e ɗaɓɓitde kawgelaaji ngam waɗtude gollaade .
O ari tawtoreede mooɓondiral Eeleega jooɗinoongal 2 haa 5 mee 1958 ko omo yooɓii humpito mawngo ngo o dañnoo e UGOVAF e Entente e BDG .
O da a sinma , ke faraaxunde da i genmanlenbalaaxun koyi baawo , ke be ga genme maranda , kiitaana , ken wa genme xaranŋundan do jaarandan do golliñanraqu su ga dowulan maraye .
O dikkii laamu nguu yo yaltin " jiibaaji ɗii e kagguuji mum , mbele gooto kala ina heɓtina ɗi mum , ngu woppa ko ngu weeynata ɗee beeyuwe .
O etii wootiɗinde " dokkeer en " Ɓaleeɓe to Marseille e to gure Afirik hono Ndakaaru e Abidjan .
O fawi heen lohi kewɗi , omo juurtoo kosaam .
O fawti heen : " mbaɗtee hakkille wonde kaddugal ngal duumoto balɗe sappo e jowi etee hadiiɓe ɓee ngonii teemedere .
O feewnii kaɓirɗe baawɗe yiyde geɗe goɗɗuɗe , mawɗe , gonɗe e nder aduna ( lonngorɗe ) , bayɗe no galaksiiji ( deente koode ) , o feewnii kadi kaɓirɗe baawɗe wallude mo yiyde geɗe pamare ɗe njiyotaako e gite ɓole , ko nanndi e mikoroskop ( lonngorɗe geɗe pamare ) , baawɗe wallude mo yiyde geɗe gaddooje ñawbuuli , ko nanndi e mikorobaaji e wiirusaaji .
O felliti yaltude weendu ndu ngam yiiloyaade ko o ñaami .

On njaaraama

On njarama e kabaru ji di ndoka ton min ngam findin de fulbe e pinal mumen
On njettaama onon kala hokkuɓe ɗoo miijooji mum'en .
On nji'i no neɗɗo tafirata terɗe mum , gootal gootal , hol to ɗum fai'i so wonaa NEƊƊANKA-NJAMDANKA .
On nji'i seto-naange no mooftiri geɗe ɗe ngaldaa , gila e ɗaŋe joorɗe pamare haa e goɗɗe mawɗe tawa ko paali henndu mehru , jiidaani e keletine kaaƴe kayooje e laaciije .
On njiitiima ko'emon , e nder ko'emon
On njinngii !
On njooɗnii haa yooɗi , hay fus ŋakkaani , on njettaama golle mon ɗe mbaɗaton ngam ɓamtude leñol .
On weltaama KJP on yettaama sanne sabu softere mon , e wadugol kon ko janta .
On weltanaama , on yettaama .
Onon Kadi Thierno Nouhou min weltanike on , ɓay minen kadi e min faala anndude yimɓe ɓe no watti yiile e ko min gollata ko .
Onon kala adduɓe ɗoo miijooji mon , jiyanɗe e wasiyaaji mon , miɗo wiya on njettaama .
Onon on njiyi farankofonii ƴetti ko Butoros Gaalii jeyaaɗo to Ejiipt , kañum ko aarabe , njanngata ko Engalee , mbaɗi ɗum gardiiɗo .
Onon wiyooɓe jaɓɓe wooteeji ɓee ko jaasɓe , mbele on nganndaa dawrugol ko laabi celi !
Onon wonɓe caggal leydi ( ɓe ngonaani e Muritani ) , kala jiɗɗo nde lewru maayi fof , min nelda ɗum tonngoode Fooyre Ɓamtaare e mbaadi pdf , ina waawi neldude 6 000 UM .

Oo fannu Jabet , cuɓagol ñamri mum , kam e waɗde coftel ɓalli ina riiwta ɗum law .

Patal ɓalewal e dow Naange

Peccitagol ngardiigu lowe binndol tuggi abril 2021
Peeje cafrirɗe ɗee ko ɗiɗi .
Peeje ciinirɗe njeñtudi kaaldigal ngal – Bayyingol kaayit joofnirɗo jowitiiɗo e toɓɓe paamondiraaɗe ɗe tawa kala tawtoraaɓe ina ciifa ɗum .
Peeje fergo faade Mbaañ ( Mars ) ina njokki .
Peeje jannginirɗe hiisiwal to Faryse ( ko e ɗiin jaŋde Muritani tuugii ) ina ñeeñɗi haa ɓurti , hay jannginooɓe e koye mum ina kawra e caɗeele faccirde ɗi , tawi noon feere Singapuur ndee ina salii kuñagol winndannde tawi faamaaka .

Peeje maɓɓe bonɗe pirten .
Peeje men tan laatoo .
Peeje ruttaade to Lewru
Peeje tati ine ngoodi ngam ruppaade oo musiiba .
Peeje ɗawgol ɗee tuggi ko e ɗawre to bannge politik kam e politik ƴellitaare e peewnugol leydi ( aménagement territorial ) rewrude e taƴngo keeri njuɓɓudi laamu e kominaaji , ngo rewaani laawol , ngo teskaaki softeende yimɓe , haa yettii jedditagol ngenndaagu ( deni de nationalité ) e kaɗgol ɓiyleydaagu to karnal etaa siwil .
Peewnirgol Dispenseer e PMI Tulde ;
Peewnitgol ekkolaaji Tulde , lekkon 2 , lekkon sooninke , lekkon 3 , lekkon 4 e nder duuɓi ;
Peewnitgol yuɓɓo kelmeendi noddi ko ɗemngal ngal he hoore mum , joopoo yuɓɓo binndiin e cellingol binndi , laawɗinde gowlugol , celluka e kelmeendi , tonngude kaan celluka nder defte tuugneteeɗe , kesɗitingol kelmeendi e rewrude he sosngo kelmeendi kesiri ngam fulde miijanɗe ɗe ɗemɗe mawɗe kuutortoo , hono Engeleere e Farayseere e Aarabeere .
Pegge Jupiteer ko njiytaa ɓooyaani , sibu ko he 1979 tan , jiidaa e pegge Saturne ganndanooɗe ko ɓooyi .
Pekaan jeyaa ko e jimɗi awooɓe hoɗɓedaande maayo ina nannga liɗɗi , na mbaaña barooɗe maayo .
Pekaan sifotoo ko cubalaagu no wayi , ina tinnda nguurndam cubballo no foti siforaade hakkunde mum e fasiraaɓe mum walla hakkunde mum e kinɗe goɗɗe .
Pelle amen ɗee , sabu mum en wonde pelle-baafal hare ngam keɓtingol timmungol ɗemɗe men ngenndiije rewrude e laawɗingol mum en , e kuutoragol mum en he nder denndaangal fannuuji nguurndam leydi ndii , mbaawata tan ko weltaade e ndee feere , so janngingol ɗemɗe Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof to ENAJM , ngam , e yeru , " kalfinaaɗo njuɓɓudi laamu ine waawaa haaldude , hunuko e nofru , e ɓiɗɗo leydi he nder ɗemngal ngal ɓuri nande " .
Pelle fulɓe ene keewi kadi ene carii hono no Fulɓe carorii he nder aduna hee kala ni .
Pelle limtilimtonorɗi ene cabbaa ɗoo e ndakaaru e ñalawmaaji ɗii .
Pelle pinal ngenndiije , Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar he Muritani ( FƁPM-ARPRIM ) , Fedde Ɓamtaare Ɗemngal e Pinal Sooninke ( AMPLCS ) e Fedde Ɓamtaare Ɗemngal Wolof he Murtani ( APROLAWO ) , mawninii , no keewnoo waɗde hitaande kala nii , Ñalawma Ɗemngal Neeniwal , ñalnde altine 21/2/22 e ñalnde 26/2/22 kala .
Pelle pinal ngenndiije ɗee
Pelle pinal ngenndiije ɗee , sabu mum en yenaneede jojjugol rewde jaŋde tuugiinde e ɗemɗe keewɗe sabu " julyultondiral e muuyaaɗe demokaraasi ine mbaɗɗini e sukaaɓe ɓee marde , gaa gaa ko idii fof ɗemɗe mum en neeniije ɗee , marde kadi ɗemɗe winndereeje e diiwaaniije ɗee , mbele aɓe mbaawa jeyeede e renndo ɓurngo yaajde , ɓe njeytoree kadi no haanirta nii e aduna mo ɓe nguuri oo " .
Pelle pinal ɗee ne , ine mawnina ñalawma oo hitaande kala , ngam semmbinde laamu Muritani nde lelnata TNJ tuugiinde e ɗemɗe men neeniije , ngenndiije ɗee kala .
Pelle pine ngenndiije : FƁPM/ARPRIM , AMPLCS , APROLAWO
Pelle ɗee kolliti " kaɓɓagol mum en e wasiyaaji ɗi Goomu Afrik Jojjanɗe Aadee e Ɓesnguuji waɗnoo e abriil 2000 , e batu mum njooɗinoongu Alsee , kam e wasiyaaji ɓurɗi laaɓtude kadi ɗi Goomu Fedde NGenndiije Dentuɗe kalfinaangu haɓde e añamnguraagu e paltoor ( CERD ) waɗnoo e settaambar 2004 , yantude e tonngi ciimtoowo mum kuɓtodinɗo , keeriiɗo e hitaande 2007 "
Pellital dowla oo waɗde leydi no jeyal denndangal e dow tiimaandi laamu , ɗum firti ko leyɗeele kala , gaagaa jogiiɗe seedantaagal won jeyɓe ɗum en ( jogiiɓe kaayitaaji ) walla leyɗeele ɗe sariya mo 60 139 ñalnde 2 ut 1960 heɓtinnoo wonde ko jeyaaɗe , keddiiɗe ɗee fof ko laamu tiimi ɗum en .
Pellital e coftal e cuusal maccuɓe e baadoolo en salaade tuubakiri e yiɗde huuñcude misibbaaji mum , addani ɗum en waawde ardaade koye mum en , walla dañde hinnde ardiinde ɗum en haa taftoo no poolirta koloñaal en .
Pellital men huɗaaɓe poolen .
Pellitɗo aanaani , jaabaaro , haaju hollaama Alla .
Pelɓondiral hakkunde doŋe leydi e ɓittondiral ɗo ɗe kawritta to addata leydi yerɓude , ɗuum waɗi won e nokkuuji ina anndaa tan ceerataa e yerɓude , ko way no Jappon .

Pennda Budal : Ahaa kay .
Pennda Budal : Alaa !
Pennda Budal : Alla ko moƴƴo , ko mawɗum Njeeygu jimɗi ɗi heewaani nafoore ngati nguykaaji ina keewi heen .
Pennda Budal : Eey !
Pennda Budal : Fof kono joom mum yiyri .
Pennda Budal : Hee !
Pennda Budal : Ko miin tan fentanta hoore am jimɗi am .
Pennda Budal : Mbaɗtu-mi naalaŋkaagal meccal ko e kitaale 89-90 .
Pennda Budal : Mbeɗe liggodoo kadi e Ummu Sih mo nganndu-ɗon .
Pennda Budal : Mbeɗe yetta Fooyre Ɓamtaare Njokkee golle , jaaynde mon ina heewi namiri Yo Alla sellin doole .
Pennda Budal : Mbeɗe yiɗi dey kono mi suwaa tawo bismeede toon .
Pennda Budal : Mbiyetee-mi ko Pennda Budal , njettetee-mi ko Saar , njeyaa-mi ko Doondu e Cammalle , nder Ndenndaandi Senegaal , nder diiwaan Maatam , nder tunndu Maatam .
Pennda Budal : Mi alaa diɗɗal ngal keerorii- mi .
Pennda Budal : Mi yilliima yoga e diiwannuji Senegaal , teeŋti e Kaasamaas .

Pennda Muusaa Bukari Yero jibinaa ko Ŋawle , leelaani o teskaa e yonta makko no debbo diwtuɗo aadi , tuugnaade e dokke ɗe o jogii ɗe njeddotaako e ganndal cuuɗingal e peeñngal pawangal e njanngu mbafoyngu .
Pennda SAAR heɓi e nguurndam mum ko biɗɓe ɗiɗo , o saŋkii ko Ndar .
Pennda Sammba Jula " mbiyetee-mi ko Pennda Sammba Jula , njeyaa-mi ko Tulde Kayhyɗi , galle Sammba Wullu en .
Pennda hollirii he jimɗi mum bagginaali naftooji .
Pennda waklitii ina hoota , fawii e laawol juutngol .
Pennda yahi balɗe tati , wirtii dulɗi e beeli ɗi oyo wirtinoo ɗii , hono no baaye oo waɗirnoo nii .
Perel-Tuppe .
Perseverance juurnaa ko e wiiduru mbiyeteendu Jozero .
Persidaa Muttaar wul Daddaa , neɗɗo mawɗo e jeytaare leydi men , kam fof e woɗɗude jiyle e daranaade cosgol Dowla Muritani , dañaani heeroraade innde baaba coso .

Piilngal Gaswaani hooreejo leydi : ko Gaswaani heppaa walla ko Asiis haaɓanaa ?
Piilngal fuɗɗorii ko diskuur Abdel Asiis , ɗo o holliti ko o waɗi e duuɓi 10 ɗi o laamii ɗii .
Piilngal ngal sinkoriima tawtoreede ɗum mawɓe leñol Fulɓe , annduɓe e yontaaɓe leñol ngol , ko wayno Dr Fari Silat Kah , hooreejo Tabital Pulaagu/ARP Senegaal , Mammadu Lih hooreejo Ared , Hajja Jinnda Dem , wallifiyanke he ɗemngal Pulaar kono kadi daraniiɗo Resorde Pinal Fulɓe ( Ecomusee Peul ) mo Aañam .
Pinal e Finaatawa
Pinal e udditde duɗe Pulaar
Pinal jaalinoongal he Tumbuktu ko pinal Islaam kadi kala ko janngetenoo he nder duɗe Islaam he aduna hee , ko wayno Azhar , Qayruwaan walla Zaytuun , ene janngetenoo ɗoon .
Pinal leydi ene siforee aadaaji mum , donaaɗi mum , goowaaɗi mum , kono kadi gaaci mum .
Pinal leñol men kollen .
Pinal noddi ko neɗɗaagu , neɗɗaagal .
Pinal wayi kono yertere mawnde nii , so a feƴƴii maa wood ko taw-ɗaa to nder to .
Pine pawii ko e binndi yoo tinne .

Piren pecce raddooji
Pirtagol Uddoode Koraay Mawnde ( la Grande Barrière de Corail ) .
Pirtagol tottirgol leydi sabu baasgol tottiraaɗo leydi ndii hormaade sarɗiiji joofaaɗi e ooɗoo dekere .
Pirtiima biidle laatiima .

Piɓle mawɗe ɗo sariya oo tuugii

Piɓondiral yolnde hakkunde nde : Alaa ko woppaa ɗo .
Plente sabu takkere fenaande ( diffamation ) e jamfa toowka
Pluton ko tagofeere famarde ɓurnde wuɗɗude e tagopeeje seto-naange , nde yiitaa ko hitaande 1930 ; sabu weñaade laawol banngagol mayre naange e famɗude nde , hitaande 2005 nde riiwa fedde tagopeeje timmuɗe ( no Leydi e Mars nih ) , kono ɗuum addanaani nde yeebeede .
Pobbi ɗi njani e dow makko ina ŋata .
Pobbi ɗii ina mooytoo ngam hirɓude mo .
Podanaaɗo darjeende laamu Fuladu
Polikaaji bonɗi paatuɗi he ɗemngal jannginirgal ine mbonna jaŋde , ine haɗa heɓde , ine kaɗa nuunɗal , ine kaɗa juumtugol e keƴgol he nder renndo .
Polinesi firti ko " duɗe keewɗe " .
Politik Annderee Buruu ko waarude conndi e kure , tawi kadi ina urɓa hakkunde Yerim Mbañik e kaaw mum , hono Malikuri .
Politik keso laamu nguu ngam ɓamtugol ceŋɗe jeñtinooje , politik keptinoowo darnde yimɓe nokkuuji ɗii nder ƴellitaare faggudu ;
Politik koloñaal Farayse en mbiy-ɗen adii halfineede yo yuumtin ɗum ko Koppolaani .
Politik wadhiraa ko haa feewna renndooji kono wonaa haa seernda ; politik ardiibe Muritani hannde e hanki be ko politik legnam legno oon politik noon kartal waawaa heen laamaade ko aduna ina seedii tan alaa ko haalata kono enen fof eden nganndi ko kolonel o artata e laamaade .
Politikaaji suuɗo suuɗoondu nafataa , yontii nde anndetee hol waɗnooɓe bone , mbele ñaawee ; anndee kadi ɓe mbaɗaano hay huunde ngoppee ndeeƴa .
Pollee kala almaami mo njiy-ɗon ngalu mum ena ɓeydoo , keɓton jawdi mum fof
Pon Weendu Booseyaabe
Poolgu ngu soomaani manoore .
Poolgu nguu fof e muusde haɗaani leydi ndii ummitaade law , ndi woni e ƴellitaade ƴellitaare yaawnde to bannge faggudu .
Pooye Pelle Pulaar kuɓɓii , hoto docotte ŋakku !
Pooɗondiral ceŋɗe ɗee won ko firata so ƴeewaama .
Pooɗondiral laamu hakkunde leƴƴi to bannge politik reɓi haa naati e konu e doole kisal , hade mum yettaade , e hitaande 1989 , denndaangal ɓesngu Muritani .
Pooɗondiral leyɗeele Afrik e fuku koyngel hitaande 2012 ( CAN 2012 ) : Barooɗe teddungal ngartirii tedddungal , e ɗii ñalɗi udditirɗi pooɗondiral leyɗeele Afrik , so hawde diɗɗal Cewɗi RD Konngo loggi nayi e ɗiɗi ( 4 -2 ) .
Pooɗondiral ngal ko nii lelorii e ñalawma gadano oo ( woni première journee )
Pooɗowal ngal wonaa jiyetengal kono batte maggal e jamɗe ina laaɓti , ngal maantinortee ko diidi doole , eɗi mbaawi falaade walla soortaade , doole ɗee puɗɗotoo ko ɗo pooɗowal ngal waawi bellaade ɗo .
Poppokeldu : Ko keer-heerɗi kammu , tuggi ko 500 km haa 1000 km , sahaaji ina yaaja haa heɓoya 10000 km .
Porfesoor Baydi Buubu Loh ( P .
Porfesoor Baydi Buubu Loh ko doktoor cellal , jannginoowo kadi e duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirde cellal Nuwaasoot .
Porfesoor adii jannginde ko e nder wuro Ndar to ekkol Duval .
Porfesser Baydi Buubuu Lo heɓii e lewru mee 2017 ɓennundu ɗoo nduu , njeenaari Fedde Emiraaji daraniinde Cellal ( Fondation des Emirats pour la santé ) , ndi Fedde andunaare cellal ( OMS ) rokkunoo ɗum ñalnde 1 feebariyee 2017 e joɗnde mum 140ɓiire jooɗinoonde to Geneef .
Porkireer dowla ine waawi fellitde ɗoon e ɗoon nawde barkoyo añamnguraagu oo to laawol , hay so tawii tooñaaɗo walla tooñaaɓe ɓee ngullitaaki .
Portigaal , 06/04/2011 , sabu caɗeele faggudu e kaalis , laamu Lisbon ɗaɓɓirii DentaOrop ballal .
Pot-ɗen faamde tawo , ko fayti e yande , so a yiyii so a werliima haayre , nde yahataa dow asamaan , nde artata ko e leydi ( so a ruuɗaaki hoore maa helat ) , hon ko waɗi noon .
Pot-ɗen tawo ko wiɗtude hol no njiimaadi gollortoo e neesɗitde honoweejo oo , e ɓociɗinde mo no maanaa gadano helmere ndee nih , e nuskinde mo , e finndinde e makko ƴuɓte ubbinooɗe , e gite-yitilaagu , e neegre , e añam-leñaagu , e yowitoyankaagal neɗɗaagu ; hollirde wonde , kala nde leggal daande taƴaa to Wiyet-Naam , nde yitere solaa toon tawa gaay e Farayse ina jaɓee , kala nde cukalel dewel yanaa toon , tawa gaay e Farayse ina jaɓee , kala nde Madagaskaarnaajo yargaa tawa gaay e Farayse ina jaɓee , won panndal neesuwal woni e teddirde ñisre mum maaynde , won yortere faruwere woni e laataade , won ñawannde woni e aafaade , won sewnde fiɗo woni e ƴerde ; wonde to wattan ɗee kawre kodaaɗe , ɗee penaale lollinaaɗe , ɗii njannguuli deƴƴaaɗi , ɓee dummbaaɓe haɓɓaaɓe lorlaaɓe , ɓee ngenndiyankooɓe torlaaɓe , to wattan oo mawmaw leñiwo coftinaaɗo , to wattan ɗii piytaali-becce , maa tawe toon raafulde soɗiinde e nder ɗaɗi Orop , kan e garal leelngal , kono ngal luutataa , ɗaaygol doŋre ndee .
Potal fartaŋŋe : Caɗeele mawɗe goɗɗe ine ngoodi sibu sukaaɓe ɓee potaani fartaŋŋeeji he nder jaŋde hee : ɓee ine njannginee he ɗemngal mum en neeniwal , heddiiɓe ine he ɗemɗe koɗe he mum en tawi ko he duɗal gootal : nuunɗal alaa ɗoo

Promoteur du Pulaar au Paradis !
Pucci ɗii ene ndeggondiri eɗi ndoga e nokku jaajɗo .
Puccitagol follooji ɗii walla laygol mum walla nii mbiyen dabbundere hirnaange Afrik , ina famminaa en galɗugol duunde ndee .
Puccu ngu jusii haa tolnii e makko , wiꞌi mo yoo ŋabbu .
Pucel .
Pulaagu .
Pulaagu ko peerndam njaajɗam , cariɗam , caakiɗam e oo aduna gila ko ɓooyi fayi hannde , njahduɗam e sahaa , loowɗam pinal mawngal , jettingal kala to peerndam ɗam tawetenoo , teeŋti noon to bannge pinal ɗakkingal e to pinal catingal ; njɗ-ɗen wiyde e to pinal ɗakkingal ko ɗeen geɗe jeyaaɗe e pine tawa ko taweteeɗe e kala tergal ngal pinal mum askitinirtee pulaagu , gila to Geno e ɗemngal e cañu mum haa e sinko , moorol , tuppo , ɓoornungal , ñaamdu , pijirlooji e naalankaagal , to bannge pinal catingal ne , woni ɗeen geɗe keertiiɗe pinal ngal to bannge nguurdiigu , sato , taariindi , gila e yimɓe ( hoɗdiiɓe enɗam , banndiraagal , koddigal cuuɗi , kinɗe , leñɗi e leyɗeele ) haa e lekɗe , kuɗeeli , weeyo e diƴƴe , mbiyen tan ni kala ko jotondiri e Pullo to miijanteeri e memanteeri .
Pulaagu ko pinal , ganndal , cinkal e ñarorgal kam e taariinde Fulɓe soomori hay hoddiiɓe mumen ;
Pulaagu wuurtii e oo kikiiɗe teddungal !
Pulaar ( fulfulde ) ko ɗemngal , won ko ngal moofti tawi ko heewi e ɗemɗe ngala , kono kadi won ko ngal ŋakki ko goɗɗe njogi , woni ngoƴa men hannde ko mbela pulaar ina waawi roondaade gannde kese ?
Pulaar , ardii Ko Raki Bookar Bah , rewi heen ko Sooyaa Mammadu Wat
Pulaar Speaking Association ( Psa ) ko fedde nde ɗaniyankooɓe fulɓe cosi e hitaande 1989 , nde lawɗinaa e 1990 e dowla Niw York .
Pulaar ene wiya " gosoraaɗo seerataa e laawde " , kono ellee Pulaar fotnoo wiyde ko " gosoraaɗo woto aaman laawde " .
Pulaar ene wiya " so jawe ceŋlii ceŋlitii , kaalti ko ko kaalnoo " .
Pulaar ene wiya " teeldoynooɓe mbaɗdataa tawti nodda " .
Pulaar ene wiya , " dañɗo seeɗa siftor maa , so hebbinii yejjittaa ma " .
Pulaar ene wiya , " so ko hooynantenoo saamii yoo hocce gila fittooɓe ndegginaani " .
Pulaar ene wiya , " waɗde waɗta , ko e weleede Alla , kono goonga ene tawaa " .
Pulaar he nder diiwaan hee kala mbela maa ngal won ari-ndenndiyeewal
Pulaar heɓii hannde fartaŋŋe naatneede e Unicode .
Pulaar ina heewi wiyde addunoo njelaari ko baasal .
Pulaar laami , alaa mo renndi nguun laamu .
Pulaar mo haali ngol hoto ɗale yo o mante .
Pulaar noon wiꞌi bone ficcat laaci yoo reente .
Pulaar so noddii alaa e sago daree !
Pulaar speaking association joggiima jeloode mum
Pulaar speaking ina yahra e duuɓi 21 , nde dilat-noo ko e mbaydi jokkere enɗam , pinal ina wondi e karallaagal sagataaɓe dariiɓe lang calii moɗeede e ndii leydi seertundi e kala fanu e to samme oo ñaametee to .
Pulaar wi'i ko feere mahata huɓeere !
Pulaar wi'i ko leeli fadaani jam , tee kala ko o mo waɗa kam yo o reeno kawral hakkunde ɗee leyɗeele ɗiɗi sabu ina waawi jibinde musiiba bonɗo .
Pulaar wiy : Weetii , weetaani , won ko heddii e jamma !
Pulaar wiyi "
Pulaar/Fulfulde e Swahili/Kiswahili .
Pulaar/Fulfulde tan woni ɗemngal kuuɓnungal leyɗeele Hiirnaange
Pulaar/Fulfulde won’de ɗum ɗemngal tokosal he ko ɓuri heewde he nder leyɗeele ngal tawetee ɗe , ittaani so en ƴeewrii ngal to bannge wertaango Afrik , alaa hay gootal e ɗemɗe koɗdiiɗe maggal ɗee ngal ene nawdee e maggal to yaajde e heewde haalooɓe .
Pulaar/Fulfulde yaajde .
Pulaareeje ko haala nguurka , ndaɓɓa , ndottaaka , loowoowa maanaa , e nder yoga e jeewte .
Pullo kirsaama , nduppaama , njargaama , cukalon e rewɓe horiiɓe , nayeeɓe rewɓe e
Pullo ɗoofaa ko e helmere fulɗude ;
Puluton , hitaande e dow mum ko balɗe men 90700 .
Puluton ɓuri abbitaade e tagoodi ko tagopeeje leñol leydi .
Pulɗuɗo ko jaambaaro dokko mo fenataa , mo futtintaa gite so ina haalda e maa pullo fenataa .
Puraali e giddaali keewɗi e dewgal .
Puri : ko piyruɗi yeruuji .
Purtugees walla Españool , ko kanum en ngoni ɗemɗe lawakeeje he
Putin , wiyi hay huunde waawanaa ɗum .
Puuyɗo kam ina foofti sibu kala ko waɗi sikkata ko ina feewi anndaa ko metti mi annda ko metti on annda ko metti ɓe hoore mumtan .
Puɗal naange e mutal mum ina waɗi geɗe jarɗe teskaade
Puɗi ɗi ɓe kebori aawde ɓe keɓa heen ko ɓe ñaami ɗii tan maa puuf Oksijen keewɗo ala e sago feere dañee ngam waasa ɓurtude , ngaal karallaagal ina ŋakki , no wiɗtiyankooɓe ɓe mbiyri .
Puɗɗagol jarribo janngingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee yimɓe ɓe kaalataa ɗeen ɗemɗe , so leelii e lewru oktoobar 2024 caggal ƴeewndo e gardagol njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi ƴellitgol ɗemɗe ngenndiije e caggal nde ɓeto tuugiingo he ganndal e gardagol he haralleeɓe heɓtinaaɓe holliti juumtugol jarribo ngoo ;
Puɗɗoro-ɗen e nokku taariiɗo en oo .
Puɗɗoroɗen e nokku taariiɗo en o .
Puɗɗoroɗen puɗal , jamma fuɗɗotoo runkitaade ko nde asamaan fuɗɗii fooynude fuɗnaange , ndeen fooyre ko batte ciiñsiiñƴe naange e lare henndirdu dowrowe , nde wonno ngaan saaga tawata ko naange wirnitiima e ɗiin nokkuuji , cooynoɗen fuɗnaange ina yayni seeɗa , ko ɗuum wonata

Raay fuku winndere
Raay fuku winndere 2022 to Kataar joofrii gaƴƴondiral keddotoongal he daartol , hakkunde Arsantiin e Farayse , ñalnde alet 18 bowte 2022 .
Raay fuku winndere hikka , ine waɗi geɗe teskinɗe : Kuccondiral koode ɗiɗi Meymaar e Mbappee , jettagol Afrik feccere joofirɗe , taɓɓitgol Arsantiin .
Rabudayday ( mbelamma ha wadi joowal ) .
Radco MladicHannde , so Karadzic jaggaama , ena wayi no heddii e yiyletenooɓe ɓee ko Seneraal Mladic gonɗo ɗ suuɗaare haa hannde .

Raddo ñogo .

Rafi oo ko doneteeɗo e jinnaaɓe ɗiɗo ɓee fof
Rafiiji ko eddaaji ɗiɗi , donaaɗo e jolɗo , woni jolɗo ko keɓtiiɗo neɗɗo e nguurndam mum tawa saabii ɗum ko kullon ngoɗkon , donaaɗo o noon heewi ummaade ko e jiɗnaaɓe cukalel ngel , ala e sago ngel heɓa oon rafi , sabu ɗo o fuɗɗii ɗo ina juuti .
Rajo Gine habrii e subaka hee wonde ɗowgu leydinii fusaama !
Rajo-lonngirgal ngal mahaa ko e wiiduru , njaajeendi maggal ko 500 meeteer , ngal way kono tumbude mawnde nih , so dille weeyo keɗaama ko dañetee heen ?

Rassemblement politique à Ngoral Guidala
Rawaan Ngom ( jolfo ) ena jeyaa to wiyetee Paal .
Rawaandu ine jeyaa e kullon ndewnaari ɓurkon hoontude he neɗɗo .
Rawane ko sukaaɓe sappo Sincaanaaɓe tan njahnoo to kawgel baɗnongel Nawel .
Rawane nde mago-doge Zaydi le Fils du Khalif fuɗɗii dogde he nder Piindi TV waɗii iiñcuru mawndu he nder renndo Fulɓe teeŋti noon e yeeɓiyankooɓe magooji Pulaar .

Reedu laana jiyaaɓe
Reende e lomtinande e ɗoftude jiyɗinanooɓe haa keɓta neɗɗaagal mum en , coɗtoo e renndo hee .
Reende laaɓal , puɗi , ndiyam ɗam e ko nanndi heen , ina waɗii moni kala .
Reenen mbinndudi pular fottanaandi ndin
Reeni ganndal ko binndol , binndol ne ko felo ɗemngal sabu kala ko winnda hisnat geɗe ɗiɗe
Reentaade ñaamde ko niini no feewi walla ko heewi lamɗam ;
Reewmi quotidien ɓuri ñukkindoyaade , nde holliri wonaa meere artiri Meeter Usmaan Ngom e laamu nguu : ko teemedere miliyaar ɗe ngomyel artiri e ɗanngal mum sakket to Iran woni yuman nodditgol makko .
Refti heen , ɓiɗɗo oo ƴeestii , mawni , lolli nder winndere
Refti heen Leydi koko taaroto Naange , hawridinta taaraade naange ko e hitaande , njaaweendi mum ko 30 kilomeeteer e ndeer hojom ( 30km/s ) , ɗum firti ko ɗuum woni njaaweendi njahaten tawde ko dow leydi ngonɗen ,
Refti heen en potaani dummbude haalde gannde e ndeer duɗe tan , so en njiɗi ɗe caro e ndeer renndo men eɗe poti haaleede banngeeji kala , gila e ndeer galleeji haa gese walla ngaynaaka , ko ɗuum hirjinta yimɓe e dañan'de ganndal feere no haalira haa faame , konnguɗi kesi njola ngam aynude gannde ɗe e ɗemngal he .
Refti heen ko konngol bismaango njaatige fulɓe hono Bah Sammba Aamel e innde denndaangal fulɓe Nuwaadibu .
Refti heen ko suraade nder koɗki mum .
Remooɓe ngardii , ngardini
Rendez-vous au forum de discussion sur la traduction de Google :
Renndidiiɓe makko aduna ne kay kollitii wonde ASB ko neɗɗo jankiniiɗo , palkisiiɗo geɗe aduna , mooɓaani jawdi , guufnaaki e nder wutteeji mbasaŋ jaaduɗi e paɗe marakiis ina wiya yimɓe " ngaree njeeɓee kam " , wonaa soorngo fof soomata neɗɗaagu , no haaliyanke gooto wiyiri ni " ASB ko nguru boy loowtaangu kaŋŋe " .
Renndinde kaalisaaji ɓe mbaɗiratnoo kampaañ ɗii ɓe nelda ɓurɓe tampude ɓee , mbele ndaña no poofiri .
Renndini ɗum ko Bookara Aamadu Bah
Renndo Fulɓe fof no diidorii ena bismaa yoo aawto Firefox , aafa ɗum e nganndi ngam huutoraade sahaa kala .
Renndo arii e keewal
Renndo heewngo tawaama kuraaje ɗee !
Renndo waawaa mahaade tawa alaa ɗemngal
Renndo waawaa mahaade tawa alaa ɗemngal ari-ndendiyeewal , ngal jooma mum en kala ene nanondira heen .
Renndooji goɗɗi ɗi ngonaa fulɓe ne ina njogii teskuyaaji baaɗi noon , ɓe ndenndina faɗo koode wooda ɗo ɓe ngannumini ɗum ɓe inna .
Renndoyanke faraysenaajo Wincent Geisser , karallo ngonka leyɗe Magreb hollitii " haala ngañamtumaagu feewde he uujoyankooɓe e Ɓaleeɓe Tunusnaaɓe " ina woodnoo ko adii hannde .
Rentaade dente ko wayi no inɗeeli , ndiftungaaji , jaalo , jamaaji e kala ko ina renndina yimɓe nder nokku uddiiɗo .
Resorde Pinal Fulɓe Aañam-Godo
Rewam aarabingol Muritani he dow leñɗi ɓaleeɓe , haalpulaar’en , Jolfuɓe e Sooninkooɓe , ko bone mo famɗaani , nde tawnoo noddi ko maaygol neɗɗaagal ( identite ) maɓɓe , gila e ɗemɗe maɓɓe haa e pine maɓɓe .
Rewata e ɗee maale ko tuure , ndogu-reedu , puƴe walla uube nduuya e ɓalndu haa hawra , tuyyam ndeer e boowal ɓalndu .
Rewi e ngaal gollal ko yeewtere gooɓe-jiile , ngam siftinde renndo ngoo payndaale joofaaɗe he ɗee golle , e hesɗitinde eeraango fayde e banndiraaɓe fof , mbele nokku oo mahee ko adii nde ñalawma oo ene arta , e ballal Joomiraaɗo .
Rewi heen : " Eeh maa ɓinngel leydi " .
Rewi heen ko fedde ngatamaara ƴiiwni ngam hollitde Fulɓe Gabon njejjitaani iwdi mumen : eɓe cifo ndunngu e jime maɓɓe Tabital pulaagu nodddi ko gootaagu faggi ngawlaagu haɗii ceeraagu .
Rewi heen ko joɗɗingol haayre adannde ngam mahngo K-B Pulaar e gardagol mawɗo falnde Mbaañ , woni Haakem Mbaañ , walla mbiyen Préfet .
Rewi heen ko wolde ƴiiƴiire , ɗo koninkooɓe ɓaleeɓe waaɓe no Iñaas ( Ignace , jibinaaɗo to Gadelup ) e kolonel Delgeres ( Delgres , jibinaaɗo to Martinik ) , e ballal gadelupnaaɓe ndartii dartagol jooɗngol , fotde lewru , ko ina tolnoo e 4 000 koninke ɓe Napoleon Bonaparte neldunoo toon ngam artirde njiyaagu , e gardagol senerooji ɗi njaj-njajtaani warde ko ine tolnoo e 6 000 gadelupnaajo , hakkunde maayɓe e wolde , waɗaaɓe yargo , fellaaɓe e taccinaaɓe .
Rewindo : ko adii fof , rewindo ko geɗal kimmungal he nder jaŋde , sibu so ɗum alaa , gooto fof gollortoo ko no weliraa .
Rewindtooɓe ngalu : Moodi Galo Kulibali ( Kanel ) Abdul gelaajo Kan ( Siwol ) Alasan Mbaac ( Siiñtu Garba ) Ibraahiima Aali Bah ( Boyinnaaji )
Rewo Mali , kori wolde ndee fuɗɗitaako ?
Rewo Toggere Baragel fotde km 20 ,
Rewɓe : moorol : -cettal , -korbu , -ƴiyal , -seedere , cokdi : -allaadu , -pempudi , -jaalumbeeje ( giye walla meselle )
Rewɓe Fanay rewo ndartiima " mehaari en "
Rewɓe Piindi he Hoddiro
Rewɓe Waalo Barak ina nganndiranoo jaambaraagal ; e ngoon yeeso , bartagol rewɓe Ndeer e hitaande 1820 ngam ruppaade kalifaandi ina heewi jangteede .
Rewɓe e worɓe ina poti dañde darnde e nokkuure maɓɓe .
Rewɓe ngamii waŋgo e rippoo haa wuli !
Rewɓe sahre caccee , puuɗee juuɗe , jawe koyɗe e juuɗe .
Rewɓe ummorinooɓe e kominaaji Aéré mbar , Daar el barka , Jowol e Neere waalo ƴettii konnguɗi kolliti caɗeele mum en ɓurɗe teeŋtude ko waasde taƴde hattan leydi ndemeteendi , ŋakkireede kaayitaaji ceettotooɗi jeygol mum en leydi walla hay dañɓe heen ɗo ngollii ngalaa kaɓirɗe gollorɗe walla jawdi mballoori ɓe gollaade kono ɗum fof tenngiti ɗum dow ko huccitde e leyɗeele maɓɓe ɗe ɓe nguurdunoo ina loppitee e juuɗe maɓɓe ina tottiree julaŋkooɓe nder leydi walla caggal leydi ( ŋonande Dar el barkanaaɓe ) .
Rewɓe ɓee e worɓe ɓee kala ndogi faaboyaade ɓe .
Rewɓe ɓee ina e pelle ɗee kala .
Rewɓe ɓee limi fof : basalle , ñambi , pompiteer , suppome , karoot , laaj , bineegar , poobaar , nebam , e goɗɗum .
Rewɓee so ndesaama , walla ɗumen no njooɗorii , e cuuɗi mumen ndeena ɓesngu munen cuura jom galleeji , mumen .
Riisi alaa ɓe heedani he ko feeñi .

Riisiire ekn ) .
Rimɗunooɓe kank ngontii hannde jiyaaɓe .
Risi , Alexei Navalny , ɓurɗo ŋatde e lundiyankooɓe Putin o maayi hannde he nder dummbirde .
Robo ( woppu-liggoo )
Robo ko jamɗe cañondiraaɗe ngam waɗde won e golle e dow njuɓɓudi e njaaweeki ki neɗɗo hattanaani , hade neɗɗo yiitude kaɓirɗe geɗe mum foo gollirta ko junngo meho , haa o waɗti huutoraade kaaƴe ngam taƴde walla helde won e geɗe , nde o yiiti jamɗe golle makko ɓeydii newaade .
Roger Penrose of Britain , Reinhard Genzel of Germany and Andrea Ghez of the US won the Nobel Physics Prize October 6 , 2020 for their research into black holes , the Nobel jury said .
Rogere 1 : yiili rogere addannde nde ko Hammaat Muusaa Joob ɗowi ɗum .
Rogere adannde ndee , ɗo Gellaay sifotoo Balla .
Rogere ɗimmere : Yiili rogere ndee ko Hammee Aamadu Lih .
Rogere ɗiɗmere nde ko neldude toon baagal deegowal ( rover ) , ɗuum waɗata ko e nder hitaande 2018 , so ɗum laatiima maa wonan Oropnaaɓe e Riisnaaɓe yaɓɓannde arwaniinde e dow Mbaañ , ko Amriknaaɓe neldatnoo toon baage deegooje .
Rojju , Fommo Mbuun e Paamte fo ina ngoɗɗi naange kadi ko ɗaŋeeje keneeli ɓoli , ɗeen mbaawaa huufde nguurndam .
Rojju , fommo , mbuun e paamte ko paali gaasuuji mawɗi , ɗi keedi ko wattan seto naange , Pluton noon nde wonnoo lappol mum nanndaani e lappi ɗaŋe goɗɗe ɗe , kadi ina famɗiri won'de ɗaŋre , nde yaltinaama e ndeen fedde hitaande 2006 .
Rojju ina rewnii lebbi keewɗi , Oroppaa ko heen jeyaa , nduun lewru ko muhiindu penndiɗam haa woorti , kadi cirƴe ndiyam moolanaaɗe ina njalta e lewru faade weeyo , wadde nder mayru ina wuli fotde ko saaynata penndiɗam ɗam ha ɗam wonta mbiinam walla maayo .
Rojju ko aduna kaawniiɗo mettuɗo ɓadaade saka won'de , sabu dingiral duleeɗi moolanaaɗi mawnude , won heen e majji aduna men o ina heƴa e yitere majji hakke no ɗi mbay mawnude , so oɗon teskii , kala nde njiyɗon natal Rojju ma on taw heen ko wayno buuɗal iirɗungal , ngaal buuɗal ko duleendu mawndu , ndu fuɗɗiima duuɓi teemedde haa jooni e ndu yirloo , kono ndeka wonaa kayru tan wuubotoo e nder Rojju .
Rojju yummum duleeɗi , baammum duleeɗi .
Rokkaa Njeenaari Nobel faggudu ko yimɓe tato " adduɓe miijooji kesi paatuɗi he jehre liggey , kolliti hol binndanɗe baawɗe fooɗteede he jarribooji nguurndam " , e wiyde ñaawooɓe ɓee .
Rokkaa ndii njeenaari ko debbo ameriknaajo ine wiyee Louise Glück sabu binndanɗe mum jime ceetdanaaɗe jeyeede e ɓurɗe maantinde nder coñce Amerik yontannde .
Rokkaa ndiiɗoo njeenaari , ñalnde 5 oktoobar 2020 ndee , ko Biritaannaajo biyeteeɗo Michael Houghton kam e Ameriknaaɓe wiyeteeɓe Harvey Alter e Charles Rice , sabu maɓɓe yiytude wiris fiɗo heeñere C , ñawu caabotoongu kooñndam kam e nguɗu heeñere , mbaroowu hitaande kala fotde 400 000 neɗɗo nder winndere ndee .
Rokkaa njeenaari jam ko jaaynooɓe ɗiɗo , hono debbo biyeteeɗo Maria Ressa e Riisinaajo biyeteeɗo Dmitiri Muratof , sabu " darnde maɓɓe e cuusal maɓɓe wonande wellitaare haala " , tawi ɓe kulaani kasoo , ɓe kulaani haɗeede haalde , ɓe kulaani bonniteede e aybineede .
Rokkaa njeenaari wayliwal ko Almaañnaajo biyeteeɗo Benjamin List e Biritaannaajo David MacMillan sabu golle maɓɓe ngam tafngo kuutorgal kesal peewnirgal molekile ( molécules ) .
Rokkaa njeenaari Ɓalliwal ko biritannaajo biyeteeɗo Roger Penrose kam e almaañnaajo biyeteeɗo Reinhard Genzel kam e debbo ameriknaajo biyeteeɗo Andrea Ghez .
Rokki ɓe oon belaa ko Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e ardorde mum .
Rokkude joom sardiŋŋaaji en no ceertiri e coñanteeri mumen njogornoondi ñolde walla wuɗde
Rokkude tippudi ñaawoore ndii yimɓe heblaaɓe yonɓe kam e ngalu njonngu .
Rokkude tippudi ñaawoore ndimaagu to bannge njuɓɓudi e ngalu .
Rokkude wasiyaaji fawaade e ɗaɓɓaande mum en , juɓɓule gollotooɗe e dokkitgol qiima ngalu leydi men ndemateendi .
Rokkude yeeyooɓe e teefankooɓe fartaŋŋe yeeyde neemoraaɗi mumen .
Rosetta , baagal laaciire
Rosetta ko baagal ngal 3000 kilograam teddeendi , an ngal wam'bi masiŋ goɗɗo ina wiye Filay , so tawi ngal ɓadiima laaciire nde , ngal wambita oon maisiŋ juuroo ŋootiloo e dow mayre , haa waawa wiɗtude mbaadi memtinaari mayre , refti heen maa as fotde 30 centimeeteer heɓa ko woni ndeer laaciire ko mbela ina anndee , ko gollaa heen fo neltirtee ko baagal Rosetta yawtina to annduɓe jooɗiiɓe Leydi , ɗee golle foo noon mbaawaataano laataade so wonaano beɗi kuɓɓam baaɗi bibje nih .
Rosetta wambitii ɓinngel mum e dow laaciire

Roɓtetee ko doɓaale ( roɓaande ) .
Rts wonaa potal !
Rudolf Jesel ( Rudolf Diesel ) woni gadiiɗo feewnude cowoori-cuurkoowi ( moteur thermique ) kono nde o woni e ƴeewtindaande mbela ina feewi , ndi fetti jamɗe naati e makko haa o ɗeɓi heddaade heen , kono nde o sellunoo o jokku golle , hannde nafoore mayri limotaako , ko hakkille makko salii fooleede .

Ruwanndaa ( 1994-1995 ) : hakkunde temeddee joy ujunere e miliyoŋ e wolde ɓesngu .

SUMEYLU BUUBEY MAYGA , JAAGORGAL GARNIWAL KESAL TO NDENNDAANDI MALI
SUNAARE NEENE PULAAGU KO O NEENE JIBINANI FULBE NGO MAAYO GANNDAL , FULBE NO NAFTORO NGAL NGANDAL , NGANDAL PULAAGU .
Sa riwi gertogal a ñaltoyii polis wona kus tan mbiinoɗa .
Sa yanaan e mum o yanat e maa .
Saa añii leñol maa tan ko hoore maa ngañ-ɗaa .
Saa danndaani leñol maa tan a danndaani hoore maa .
Saa tinnaaki e leñol maa tan a tinnaaki e hoore maa .
Saa wuuri kaa kalfaaɗo so ɓiye ari wona jiyaaɗo .
Saabii koronaawiris 2019 ko mboros ganndiraaɗo " covid-19 " .
Saabii ɗum ko dokkirgol leydi ngol rewaani laawol , walla mbiyen nii heednaaɓe heen ɓee , mbaɗi tan ko " welmaa dagoo " , haa ko jiiɓru mawndu naattii e jeyi leydi hee .
Saabotoo ñawu dennge ko mboros jeyaaɗo e leñol
Saada Njaay mo Makki Sal yaltini e kasoo tumaa nde o tuumaa nguyka e laamu Abdu Juuf .
Saada Sammba Jah : Murtogal
Saada felliti urlande hooremum , o feewni tuuba ba haa ɗo feewata ɗum ɗo , o wallini o ɗaanoyii , yimɓe lelii haa mbaklatii e dow mbalndi , yummum Saada siftori ɗaɓɓaande ɓinngel makko ngel , ko o jurum deero , o ummii o usti kamne tuuba Saada ba , o wallini , o lelii hombo weltii o wallii koddayel makko !

Saalif Siley Soh
Saalih Al-Hasan , koolaaɗo kuuɓal Miyetti Allah Kawtal Hoore , fedde nde Bello Boɗeejo ardii nde , kanum heɓii haaldude e jokkondiraaɗo maɓɓe o , kadi tabitinii wonnde hooreejo mum en nangaama , tawi kadi ko DSS e yimɓe konu Nijerya , nanngi ɗum .

Saar Hammadi Demmba
Saawo Umar Idriisa
Saayni faandaare nde Ceerno Maalik Gallu joginoo saatu nde ferande Tummbere Jiinge ndee ( yoɓtanaade Ceerno mum ) ko kewkewe mawɗe baɗnooɗe to funnaange Fuuta Tooro : ko adii fof pellal Kayhayɗi e lewru morso 1890 ngam yaltinde habdiiɓe tuubakooɓe , daaklinooɓe ɗoon , Abdul Bookar Kan ( mo Boosoya ) e Aali Buri Njaay ( Burba walla laamɗo Jolof ) , rewti heen ko dillere waɗnoonde to Horndolde ( sara Maqaama ) e siilto 1890 haa saabii warngo Siik Mammadu Maamuudu e njoɓtiingu ƴiiƴiwu njannoongu e yimɓe nokku oo .
Sabaabu maayde Umar Bolonndee Joop , caŋkiiɗo ñalnde 11 Duujal 1973 to dummbirde Gore , haa jooni ene ŋakki laaɓde , walla boom mbiyen ko ɗuum won e yimɓe njogitii .
Sabaabu nde faamde kaan ngonka , jibinannde wuro ngoo , ko woni e wuro hee haa e wonɓe ladde , pelliti renndinde doole mumen , e wallitde wuro ngoo .
Sabaabu nde golle makko politik Bolndee Joop riiwaa e leydi Farayse o faatiraa Senegaal , e maayirɗe 1967 .
Sabaabuji Nguun Mbayliigu
Sabbo Alla e jeejeeli .
Sabii ɗuum ko so ñawanɗe ɗee jettiima jofe , ɗe nattat waawde nawde " oksijeen " lawƴoowo ƴiiƴam haa waawa yaltinde " gaas karbonik " .
Sabu
Sabu Fulfulde ina daɗiri wolof kala daɗal !
Sabu alaa ko o ƴettata pulaar omo dallinoroo ɗum to wolof .
Sabu egginaaɓe ɓe tan ; ko 200 000 neɗɗo faaraaɓe Senegaal e Maali , kamɓe fof ko moritaninaaɓe , ɓaleeɓe .
Sabu ene wiyee so ñawu aybinaaka weeɓataa safrude .
Sabu haŋki fulɓe hinaa njogii noo no mbiyata eddaaji kulle ɓe ngondunoo fof .
Sabu hol ko woni hoodere siirtatoonde ?
Sabu hoyre maa a yiɗaa .
Sabu kala ko wonaa goonga koko firto-too ko goonga tan wattinta .
Sabu kala ko ɗanniyankooɓe diiwan Maatam mbii ene mbaɗa e gure mumen o wiyata ko waɗtaake .
Sabu keewgol rajooji Pulaar hannde yejjitinii en wonnde , won nde ngoyatno ɗen rafi kaalirɗe hono no ngoyirten rafi teleeji hannde ni , kono eɗen ciftora ko " Diamano FM " adii wonde rajo Fulɓe kaaloowo Pulaar he nder Senegaal , kono nde en njogoraaki ɗum jogogal moƴƴal ngal ngongo haandi ngal , ngo loppita he juuɗe men , Pulaar oo werlaa ladde , heddii eɗen ngoya njananaagu .
Sabu ko adii fof neɗɗo koñum taw haani adaade weleede hoore mun nde fuɗɗoo welde woɗɓe , neɗɗo ko maa yiɗa Hoore mun nde woɗɓe puɗɗoo yiɗde ɗum , neɗɗo ko maa hoolnoo hooloo hoore mun nde woɗɓe puɗɗoo hoolaade ɗum .
Sabu ko e nder balɗe ɗiɗi tan ɓe poti jaɓɓaade yimɓe ɓe kala .
Sabu ko en waasɓe tawaaɓe .
Sabu miin ko Mali ngonmi , kono so a yi’ii ɗoo jolfo tan tawata ko ina haawnii boom haa ɓurti , alaa noon ko saabi ɗum so wonaa tan waasde anndeede ɗoo !
Sabu moƴƴere endimaagu ko dokke Allaa .
Sabu mum faamde jojjugol lelnude tippudi nehdi e jaŋde keewɗemɗiiri , sibu " julyultondiral kam e muuyaaɗe demokaraasi ɗaɓɓude he almuɓɓe ɓee margol moƴƴol , ko idii fof , ɗemɗe mum en ɗe muuyni ɗee tawo , kono kadi , margol ɗemɗe mawɗe winndereeje e diiwaneeje ngam waawde yettaade renndo ɓurngo yaajde e waawde jeytoreede no haanirta nii he aduna mo nguuri oo .
Sabu ngenndiyankaagal maa
Sabu pulaar ɓuri ɗum ngaddinaaji , ɓuri ɗum kelmeendi , ɓuri ɗum haalooɓe , ɓuri ɗum kadi anndeede e afrik , ɓuri ɗum anndeede e winndere ndee fow .
Sabu so geɗee jahrii no haniri niiko teddungal wuro .
Sabu suynude mette warngo maa ko leelaani .
Sabu teskaade gollal makko , e darnde makko maantinnde , addani batu mooɓondiral Fedde Ɓamtaare Pulaar e Moritani suɓaade mo e hitaande 2003 , waɗi mo hooreejo Teddungal gadano Fedde nde .
Sabu teskaade no Fulɓe mbiyata ni : " Lekɗal ɓuccetee ko gila ko keccal " , waɗi eɓe njiɗi naatnude he nder ɓerɗe sukaaɓe fulɓe yiɗde ɗemngal mum en Fulfulde e teddin’de ɗum kam e ñaaƴrude Pulaaku mum en gila e ɓe ngoni famarɓe , tawa so ɓe mawnii ɗuum ene mahoo e maɓɓe .
Sabu teskaade noon , mawɓe e sukaaɓe ene keewi luurondirde e ronkude haaldude , ɓe njuɓɓini kadi hirjinooji ngam mawɓe e sukaaɓe mbaawa haaldude , yeewtidde et wostondirde miijooji , kanum e fewjidde no nopoti gollododaade haa ɓamta nokku mimen .
Sabu warngo maa e warngo wondiiɓe maa
Sabu yiyaama yiytaama won e leyɗe faranse e amerik mballata ko luutndiiɓe laamu ngu , won e leyɗe kadi ɓe mballata ko laamiiɗo , waɗde amerik e faranse wonaa leydi ɓe mballata , ɓe mballata ko neɗɗo e sitem mum , ko ɗuum waɗi leyɗe ɗe na pusee e yeeso joomum en tawa heen gooto e ɗum weli ɗum !
Sabu yiɗde kadi yerondirde kitaale men enen wonɓe e dow tagofeere leydi e kitaale dow tagopeeje goɗɗe ɗe , kitaale ɗee fof ɓetiren ɗum en ko kitaale men .
Safaara keeriiɗo wonande paawngal dennge woodaani .
Safaara rewrude e jokkondiral weeyo ( yeewtere-weeyo , iimeel , telefoŋ , walla jaaɓɗe telefoŋ-ƴoƴɗo woni smartphone ) waawii huuɓnude soklaaji to bannge safaara nder galle .
Safaara woodaani , faddungo kadi alaa , kono tan doktoreeɓe ameriknaaɓe raavanooɓe to liberiya nawtaa , ndokkaama safaara ngonɗo e jarribeede ZMapp , ala e sago ko maa o jarribee e woɗɓe ngam heɓindaade mbaawka makko safrude rafi o .
Safaruuji politik ine ngoodi kono ciynetaake no haanirta nii .
Safiyatu JALLO mooytii yahi Buruksel wiyi ceerno BASUM ko ƴamoowo ngardiigu TPO e innde
Safiyatu jeyee heen e alaa e sago .
Sagata jaado oo , koh musitdo , koh gido , koh ndeendiyangke .
Sagataaɓe fulɓe heewɓe ina eto firde gannde kese e pulaar ndaña heen caɗeele sabu ronkude dañan'de won e geɗe walla golle konnguɗi e ndeer ɗemngal he , waɗi noon ko won e maɓɓe tawa keɓindaaki ɗemngal ngal walla kadi tawa ko ɓe njiɗi waɗtude pulaar ko ɓe ɗigginaani ɗum no feewi , jiintude ganndal e ndeer ɗemngal goɗngal naamndi ko humpitaade ngaal ganndal no feewi e waawde ɗemngal jiintete ngal ngal , won e haala so tawi a wi'i aɗa firda ka konngol konngol tan a ñoortat faayiida makka ka natta faameede walla ka faamire no feewaani .
Sagataaɓe ina njogii jimol teeyngol e jimol ñaaƴirgol e jimol mogo
Sagooji maɓɓe dañde kaɗen .
Sagooji maɓɓe e Fulɓe oto ɓe ndañ .
Sagooji ɓerɗe kawren .
Sahaa fof direkteer ina ƴeewtoo so tawii njeeygu nguu alaa ella .
Sahaa kala wooda e njulliiji ɗii guummiiɗi naayoo , rewɓe ɓee ne ngama .
Sahaa mo kaalaten ɗoo oo , ko sahaa jokkondirɗo e ngonka neɗɗo , sahaa jokkondirɗo e neɗɗo , e no woniri e hoyre mum .
Sahaa ne ɓenna tan , aduna ena anndina en ken mee-ɗaa anndude , ena holla en ken mee-ɗaa yiyde , ɗuum ko aduna way noon .
Sahaa njilluuji am nder janngirɗe laamu ɗee , mi teskiima gollotooɓe e laamu heewɓe haa teeŋti e jannginooɓe ɗooftaaki ɓoornanteeri kaandi waɗeede e sahaa nde ngoni golle .
Sahaaji kadi ko muuso reedu .
Sahaaji ɗi lom-lomtondirat tan e tumbuɗe rewo walla worgo
Sahde ( préchauffage ) : Conndi ndi sahee e nguleeki tolniiki 800°C hade mum waɗeede e nder fuur .
Sahnga wirwirnde , debbo laamɗo , biyetenooɗo Elizabet , to leydi Anngalteer , ndeen yahii haa alaa ko heddii so wonaa ɓirnegol makko , ɓernde am hecciɗii e konngi cakkitiiɗi , ɗi mawɗo diine e laawol Iisaa oo liɓi ɗii , ko adii nde ɓanndu debbo oo wirnoytee .
Sahre ndee kadi , ko sahre Satigi Demmba Atumaani Jah .
Saint Germain felli Waalo pellugol bonngol , boomi yoga e Waalo-Waalo en .
Saint-Louis ( Senégaal )
Sainte de Hamdallay ) , sera Mooɓti , yuɓɓinii kawtal manngal e lewru Mbooy
Sakkaade nafata ko soppitaade coɓoƴƴi ko adii nde ena remee walla caggal demal .
Sakkeeɓe : ñobba guri , ñoofta guri , wonaa foosiri ko arɗo
Sakkitde miijooji e peeje no jiilgol leydi ndii foti yahrude mbele dañal jotondirngal e leydi ina ɓeyda ñootondiral renndo ngoo , tiiɗtina ngootaagu ngenndi ndii , daɗnda ceŋɗe renndo ɗe ngonka mum en farwi e nder renndooji remooɓe .
Sakkitii heɓde konngol e ndeen ɗoon jooɗnde Alliyankoore ko musidɗo men Ceerno Yaayaa Bah to KayHayɗi ( Muritani ) .
Sala kaa waɗi ko laabi ɗiɗi cawndondirɗi ( jahol e gartol ) , heen laawol kala otooji 4 ine mbaawi sawndirde he mum .
Sala mbeeyka , njiiloowa
Sala to Barkeewi Senegaal suɓaa , ardinaa nde .
Salaamu alaykum man doomu senegaal laa juy yengu ci lakku wolof , ma beggoon nu ma def ngir jang alpulaar yan teere ngeen may wax ngir ma wunt ko , ndax alpulaar day lakk wu ma neex lool ?
Salamata Ɗaahaa Ñaŋ " miin mbiyetiimi ko Salamata Ɗaahaa Ñaŋ , njeyaa-mi ko Gurel Saŋe .
Salamou aleikoum , on jaraama no feewi .

Samba Dooro Soh , dawliimaa waynaaki .
Samba Dooro Soh , minen ɓadiiɓe ma , gahgah innde maa aadi Samba , amin noddirtuno maa innde maa waccoore , Joggo .
Samba Dooro Soh Joggo
Sammba , jamma oo juutirat mo sabu omo heppi dañde kaalis .
Sammba Dooro Soh , Joggo
Sammba Dooro Soh jibinaa ko hedde 1945 , o mawni ko he falnde MBuun .
Sammba Gata , " a tuɗɗima leppi leydi , leydi tuɗɗii ma leppi teddungal "
Sammba Gata , a maayii , defterdu sumii .
Sammba Gata , duuɓi 45 ko a tergal caasngal ɓamtugol Pulaar .
Sammba Gata Bah
Sammba Gata Bah , wonaani tawo jonte tati ko nan-mi haala maa , tuma nde naat-ɗaa opitaal safaara ɓerɗe mo Nuwaasoot .
Sammba Gata Bah e Aamadu Lih cuddiima leppi teddungal , ko ɓe ngenndiyankooɓe suusɓe , saaɓe , daraninooɓe ngootaagu leydi Muritani .
Sammba Gata Bah ferii laawol , hollii yeru potɗo ñemmbeede , hono no Aamadu Maalik Gay , Tijjaani Aan , Yero Dooro Jallo , Mammadu Sammba Joop Murtuɗo , Saydu Kan , Jibriil Hammee Lih e woɗɓe heewɓe , yo Alla yuurmo ɓe , yaafoo ɓe kamɓe e maayɓe juulɓe , Aljanna wona hoɗorde maɓɓe .
Sammba Gata Bah hooreejo teddungal FƁPM
Sammba Gata Bah jannginii pulaar , winndii defte , jokkondirii e pelle ɗe ngonaa laamuyankooje ngam heɓande catal Kayhayɗi balle , o hirjinii jaŋde pulaar gila nde metti , yeeyii jaayɗe : ko kanko e hoore makko tammbotonoo jaayɗe Fooyre Ɓamtaare , e koyɗe makko o sooroo wuro ngam yeeyde ɗe .
Sammba Gata Bah ko gorko newiiɗo , mo alaa fitina , gorko nuunɗuɗo , jom njuɓɓudi , ɗooftiiɗo kuule e sarɗiyeeji FƁPM , ɗooftiiɗo yiilirde ngenndiire .
Sammba Gata Bah ko ɓesɗo , o dañii sukaaɓe sappo e go’o , kono ko heen njoyo nguuri hannde .
Sammba Gata Bah to Kayhayɗi , jibinaa ko e hitaande 1939 to Tiisiksa ( Diiwaan Taagaant / Muritani ) .
Sammba Gise , Muusaa Abuu Ñaŋ , Caam Adama Alasan , Gedaa Sylla , Haaruuna
Sammba Jibi Bah e Abuu Jah
Sammba Joom Bah
Sammba Kehe Jallo
Sammba Yomb Gile Mbooc abbii ɓe , woodi ɓe jaggi heen .
Sammba dañii kaɓtorgal .
Sammba e wela daande
Sammba ena damal suudu ene sawndindiri e Dikko
Sammba fonndii , foti e mum rip .
Sammba heeñii , ƴettoyi fetel .
Sammba ina anndi hay gooto waawaa ɓoornaade jawe mum e paɗe mum .
Sammba ko gorko belɗo wondude , konngol haali fof , yimɓe cuumoto jaleede .
Sammba nuldaama kaalis keewɗo , hawri ko o alaano hay ko o wottii .
Sammba taƴi seeɗa e nguru nguu , tottiɗum jadiiɗo mum .
Sammba wiꞌi : " tottam loonde nde alaa ndiyam .
Sammba wiꞌi ina waawi jippinde yimɓe ɗiɗo .
Sammba yeccite e jahdiɗo mum , balli saak oo , yaltini heen nguru nguu .
Sammba ɓamti laawol mum ina yeha .
Sammun jaaki no feewi kono faami ɗum ko feere Wojere .
Sammunde weltii ina sikka jooni Wojere larbee cabbi muusɗi .
Sammunde yiɗi ñaamde kono Wojere girñitii wiꞌi : Koo maaro wonaa aan addanaa ɗum .
Sammunnde e Wojere koortiima sabu laawol ngol na juuti no feewi .
Sammunnde fawi heen : " ñalnde heen mi haalii haa tampu mi kono haɗaani mo ñaamde fof .
Sammunnde heddodii e heege mum .
Sammunnde naatoyi e ngesa ɓadiiba , o ñaami toon faataata e makka haa reedu nduu heewi .
Sammunnde wiꞌi ɓe : " so o feltii tan on keɓtintu mo .
Sankaare Amadou DIOLE
Sankaare Bookara Saar hannde alkamiis 8/12/2022 .
Sankaare Mbaay Mammadu Abda
Sankara mawɗo maaya walla kumpa
Sankara yooɓaa ko 1987 .
Sanndarmaaɓe Muritani jaggii 40 ɗanniyanke , tawi ko sifaa suuɗsuuɗoondu hade maɓɓe yaaɓande doŋre Orop .
Sanndarmori1 .
Sanngal fuɗɗii leewaade sikki yoftiima .
Sanngalde heddi nguru ɓolu .
Sanngalde ummii yiɗi naatnude junngo mum , kono Waandu wiꞌi mo : Koo maaro wonaa ko maa .
Sanngalde waaldi reedu mehru , heege findini ɗum pecce jamma .
Sanngalde yeddi haa tampi , wiꞌi ɓe ɗum wonaa kure lañe .
Sanngalde ñaami toon ñebbe e ñammbi haa ɓernde mum ɓuuɓi .
Santar Aamadu Maalik Gay ( Bopp ) ɓooyi jaɓɓaade dille pine e renndoyankeeje Fulɓe teeŋti noon he Fuutankooɓe .
Santaraal , Daakaa Dowlaaji Dentuɗi Amerik e Daakaa Kodduwaar .
Sappi gesel Alla .
Sappo e goo hooreejo leydi tawtoraama piilngal Gaswaani : Makki Sal ( Senegaal ) , Rok Kirisiyan Kabore ( Burkina ) , Alasan Watara ( Koddiwaar ) , Aadama Baro ( Gammbi ) , Jose Mariyo Was ( Gine Bisaaw ) , Alfaa Konnde ( Gine Konaakiri ) , Denis Sasu Ngeso ( Konngo ) , Ibrahim Bubakar Koyta ( Mali ) , Muhammadu Isufu ( Niseer ) , Barahim Gaali ( Sahara ) e Idiris Debi ( Caad ) .
Sappo e goo lewru suwee 2009 haa sappo e goo lewru suwee 2022 , waɗii duuɓi sappo e tati ko Mammadu Sammba Joob lollirɗo Murtuɗo ruttinoo e Joom mum .
Sappo-e-nayo ɓee fof ina nguuri , heewɓe he maɓɓe ngoni ko Burkina .
Sarde ganndal he kala fannuuji mum tawa ko he mbaydi yaajndi hono no Encylopedie eɓɓirnoo ɗum ni , ko yiyannde hesere kadi wonndunde e himme toowɗo .
Sariya 2018-023 paatuɗo e tuumgol paltoor
Sariya gadiiɗo ƴetteede e oon yonta , ko sariya mo toŋ 60 139 ƴettaaɗo ñalnde 2 ut 1960 mo nganndu-ɗaa , alaa ko seerndi ɗum e sariya koloñaal Farayse ƴettanooɗo e hitaande 1904 tuugiiɗo e wiyde " leyɗeele ɗe alaa tawaaɗo e mum en , ɗe ngalaa joom mum en , ko laamu jeyi ɗum en " .
Sariya jeyi ganni
Sariya jeyi leydi mo 83 127 ina holliri wonde " kala jeyi leydi mo wonaa jeyi neɗɗo teelɗuɗo walla jeyi njuɓɓudi , hiisaa ko woodaani " ; ɗum firti ko jeyi leydi ganni tuuginooɗo e jeyi denndal ( leƴƴi maa galleeji ) heɓtinaaka e leydi hee .
Sariya jowitiiɗo e jiilgol fiyakuuji ngaynaaka ko kañum toɗɗotoo mbaadi kuutoragol nokkuuji hurum wonande jawdi ngarndi folindaade .
Sariya kuccam : nde laamu ummanii winndude sariya kuccam jaŋde , ngu holliti ɗum pelle ɗee ñalnde 10 marse 2021 , pelle ɗee kollitii mbeltaaki he ko fuɗɗaa koo , ɗe mbinndi no ɗe njiɗiri sariya oo leloroo , ɗe ndokki ɗum jaagordu jaŋde , ɗe cari ɗum kadi .
Sariya kuccam jaŋde
Sariya memtotooɗo jeyi leydi mo toŋ .
Sariya mo toŋ 83 127 ñalnde 5 suwee 1983 jowitiiɗo e juɓɓitingol leydi e sifaa jeyi mum .
Sariya mo wonaa binndaaɗo , kono ko nanondiraaɗo gila dawa-dawi : ko sifaaji ganni no leydi jeyretenoo , so yiɗii noon wona to safalɓe walla to leƴƴi ɓaleeɓe .
Sariya oo ina foti timmitinireede dokkugol pelle daraniiɗe haɓaade ɗum ɗee , mbaawka wullitaade sibu mum en jeyeede e loraaɓe .
Sariya yaafuya 1993 oo fof e bonde , ina heddinoo mosel ngel yimɓe mbaawnoo huutoraade , so wullitaade caggal leydi , yimɓe ina mbaawnoo wullitaade to ñaawirɗe winndere ndee .
Sariya yaafuya 93-23 mo 14 suwee 1993
Sariya ɗiɗmo battindiiɗo ƴetteede oo , ko mo toŋ 83 127 ƴettaaɗo ñalnde 5 suwee 1983 .
Sariyaaji caggal jeytaare Moritani ( caggal 1960 )
Sariyaaji e jamaanu tuubakiri ( tiimaandi farayse ) .
Sariyaaji goɗɗi keewɗi ƴettaama caggal oon sariya : dekere ƴettaaɗo ñalnde 20 suliyee 1900 addii sarɗiiji kesi wonde " leyɗeele ɗe alaa ko tawaa e mum en , ngalaa jeyɓe ɗum en ; leyɗeele keɓaaɗe caggal tiimgol Senegaal , ko jeyi laamu farayse " .
Sarkosii e njillu mum to MBeki Mawɗo leydi Farayse Nikolaa Sarkosii hollitii yiɗde-mum yoo nanondire hakkunde Farayse e leyɗeele Afrik mbaɗte .
Sarr
Sarɗiiji ummagol guubiliiji
Satelit heɓɓoo carfal ngal saakta ngal e mbaadi njaajndi e nokkuuji toɗɗaaɗi , ɗiin satelitaaji ko e nokku keeriiɗo ngoni dow , sibu oon nokku , kala ko waɗaa toon , ɗo tiimnaa ɗo ko ɗoon tolnotoo sostata , yirlodtoo ko e leydi tawa woppaani ɗo tolninaa e leydi ɗo , yeru mbiyen ooɗoo satelit tolninaa ko hirnaange Afrik , ko heen tan jiimata haa cay .
Satelitaaji e fiiseeji ina njaawi yettaade ndi .
Satuurna hitaande mum ko balɗe men 10759 .

Saydu Haamiidu Bah
Saydu Kan walahi lenol fulbe waasi do katante mo alaa nando mum .
Sayku Umar Bah ( yoo yurmeende Allah won he mum ) meeɗi ene waɗa yeewtere , omo haala Pulaaryankooɓe gollaniiɓe ɗemngal ngal , haa o inni Mammadu Abdul Sek .
Sayku Usmaan Ɓiy Foodiyo ko gooto e mujaddid en ɓurɓe teskeede e nder daartol Islaam haa ɓuri teeŋtude noon e nder ɓaleeri Afrik .
Saytaan ( Seyɗaane ) ɗaɓɓi soklinirde ɓernde Ibraahiim gaa kirsugol sikkaaka dañaa mum o ; o ɗaɓɓi jirgitde e ɓernde mum co’anɗe njurum rewrude e ciftingol ɗum giɗli e korsa hakkunde jibnaaɗo e ɓiyɗo mum , kono ɗuum leefnaani hay seɗe e semmbe Ibraahiim kam e pellital mum e ɗowtaade sago Allah .
Saŋe e suudu fowru10 .
Seedanfaaguuji huunde e bismaaɓe , hono : Mhefuud , tiimɗo tuugnorgal EƁƁAANDE AM , JANNGO AM
Seedantaagal Abdullaay Mammadu Bah
Seedantaagal Mohammed Lemiin wul Siidi Mawluud " Sago sakkitiingo he pottital battanal e hooreejo leydi cankiiɗo oo "
Seedantaagal Usmaan yook ( John Holmes )
Seedantaagal Usmaan Ñaan , hooreejo catal Kayhayɗi
Seedantaagal e jaaynde Fooyre Ɓamtaare
Seedantaagal jeyegol e leydi walla tummbutere sosngo so tawii ɗaɓɓoowo oo ko jogiiɗo neɗɗaagu keeriingu ( fedde , sosiyetee ) ;
Seede goɗɗo ɗee battinooje palpaltondirɗe : laabi diine e kaɓɓondire/taraabiyaaji keewɗi jaltuɗi heen .
Seede ko kaalɗen koo , ko e hitaande 1984 , kiliifa laamu kalfinaaɗo fiyakuuji nder leydi hono Yaal Abdullaay Hassan , ( yoo Alla ɓuuɓan mo ) winndii ɓataake jirlotooɗo ( circulaire n° 00051 du 14 abiriil 1984 ) feewde e laamiiɓe diwanuuji nder leydi ( guwerneeruuji , perefeeji ekn ) o wiyi ɗum en " Mbeɗe yiɗi mbaɗton hakkillaaji e kuule ɗe laamiiɓe diwanuuji ƴettata paatuɗe e dokkirgol leyɗe demeteeɗe tawi jeyaaka e mbaawkaaji mum en .
Seede njamndi cakkitto kiloogaraam lomtiniraa fiɓiinde Plank ( Constante de Plank ) .
Seeede mun ko mawɗo gooto debbo jiɗɗo suhaaɓe jeewtanoowo , suhaaɓe baajotooɗo ɗumen jogiiɗo heen kadi coftal manngal .
Seegunkooɓe e wuro Nukuma e ndee hitaande .
Seek Haamiidu Kan jibinaa ko ñalnde 2 Seeɗto ( Avril ) , 1928 , to wuro Maatam , he nder Fuuta Tooro .
Seek Haamiidu ene lolliri kadi sabu deftere mum pentol Inta Aanniinde ( L’Aventure ambiguë ) nde o winndi tawi omo jannga to Farayse nde muula 1961 , hitaande rewnde heen ndee , 1962 o heɓi njeenaari " Grand Prix Littéraire d’Afrique Noire " , e Grand Prix des Mécénes .
Seek Maa el Ayniin , ngenndiyanke mawɗo e taariik Afrik
Seek Sammbu e Aysata Siriif
Seek Tijjaan Gaajo hollitii haa laaɓi wonde o darii ko e seŋngo lanndaaji luutndiiɗi sabu makko yettude darnde Bennoo Siggil Senegaal ( dental luutndiiɓe ) haɓantooɓe heftude laamu e juuɗe Ablaay Wadd .
Seek Tijjaan Gaajo jaggiranoo ko hono gooto e ɓurɓe waawde jotondiral hakkunde leyɗeele .
Seek Turaad Kamara resii debbo leñol Dew El Haaj en ;
Seek e Jibi Gise ngari ena tanndila gitaruuji mum'en .
Seek tijjaani so waɗii lannda ndaw ka foti , sabu koo neɗɗo ganndo , koo neɗɗo koolaaɗo , koo neɗɗo nuunɗuɗo , kadi koo ganndaaɗo e Aduna hee fof .
Seeku Aamadu hawri e konu Fuutankooɓe .
Seeku Aamadu jibinaa ko e hitaande 11776 to wuro ina sara Mopti ina wiyee Moolangol .
Seeku Aamadu nde o waɗaa hooreejoo Batu Mawɗo .
Seeku Aamadu ngam mballa mo so omo foti ƴeftude sarɗiyeeji .
Seeree ɓooree debbo ladde ina yiyi mette .
Seernaaɓe ɓee na peccii e pecce 4
Seerndude mitte ɗe saɗtaani , so kuɓɓam ( électricité ) rewnaama heen tan ɗe ceertat , Oksjen yaltira bannge ( + ) , Hidrojen bannge ( - ) , Oksijen woni henndu naftortoɗen foofaandu , Hidrojen noon ina huutoree ko heewi .
Sehil am gooto tiiɗɗo , Kayhayɗinaajo , ine wiyee Kadeer Soh , wiyii kam wonde , lewru kala ngaratno-ɗaa ko haa Liisee Kayhayɗi aɗa yeeya jaaynde Fooyre Ɓamtaare .
Sehil am ko ɗii gulaali ngoni ?
Semmbinde nomgol rewɓe ɓaleeɓe e hardaneeɓe , no rewɓe safalɓe nomretee nii , e nokkuuji hee kala .
Senegaal , 6 haa 11/02/11 , Batu Renndo Adunankeewu 11ɓu jooɗii to Ndakaaru .
Senegaal .
Senegaal : Kawgel coñce e jime , koolol 2 .
Senegaal : Makki Sal wiy ƴamtaani happu tataɓo .
Senegaal alaa ɗemngal ngenndi , njogiɗen ko ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Senegaal e gardagol Rugi Baabalih Sal , ( toTiggere Siree ) , hooreejo Catal
Senegaal hannde ko gulaali , kuljinaali , e kornaali werlaaji kiiri toon , tawi saabii ɗuum ko leydi ndii fof yaltude ene holla weltaare mum en he kawgu ngu sukaaɓe Senegaalnaaɓe fettiyankooɓe fugukoyngal dañi to Ejipta .
Senegaal ko leydi heɓndii jeytaare mum kono wonnoo ko e njiimaandi koloñaal kesiri ( néo-colonial ) .
Senegaal so yantii e wonanɓe Saharaa , Alla e sago metta Maruk sabu ena ɓeydana Saharaanaaɓe doolnooɓe , ena ɓeydoo naatnude Maruk e juukre nde waawoytaa yaltude .
Senegaal teeŋtinii ɗeen golle hirjino murtugol ɗe Aali Yero waɗata , sibu ina
Senegaalnaaɓe e Fuutaŋkooɓe ngoni sabu ko kamɓe o yiɗi maninde Alla e
Senegaalnaaɓe fof ene keppunoo nande ko hooreejo leydi Makki Sal jogori haalde he oo diskuur mo o ɓooyi fodande leydi .
Senegal ) .
Senegal ina sokli hannde hono gadio walla macky ngam no njiiru den golle ma66e e ko 6enni ko ko 6e nuundu6e ko6e goongiyankoo6e e kadi e6e nganndi hannde kala ko woni nder laamogo too duum noon yoo Allah wallu6e e kadi waasde yejjidde lenyol ngol ko huunde tiinnde en hannde
Seneraal Diwisiyoŋ e Seneraal Birigaad .

Sereendu Laser ɓurndu doolnude hoɓɓitaama ñalnde 01 silto 2017 , e taweede leyɗeele Orop 11 e leydi Riisi , nduun sereendu waɗaa ko leydi Almaañ , maa ndu wallu en e wiɗto seeɓngo luggiɗngo e geɗe pamare tolniiɗe e mittere ( atome ) , sereendu ndu ina seeɓi kadi ina yaawi , ndu fuɗɗotoo gollireede ko e 15 silto .
Sereendu Laser ɓurndu doolnude huɓɓaama .
Sereendu laser ndu ina lewña laabi 27 000 e nder leƴƴannde wootere , wadde njuuteeki bempeƴƴe lewñanɗe ɗe ngonata ko hakkunde 0 .
Sete GIZ ( yimɓe 3 )
Sete Moritani umminoo ɗoo e Nuwaksoot ko ñalnde alarbo 17/11/2021 ngam tiindande Kawlak to Senegaal , ko toon o hawriti e sete Senegaal , ɓe padi seteeji leyɗe goɗɗe ɗee , ɗeen kawritoynoo ko Maali , ɓeen ngari ko ñalnde 19/11/2021 caggal tiisbaar , kamɓe fof ɓe njawtidi to Gammbi , ko toon ɓe tawi Gammbinaaɓe .
Seto-naange ina yirloo e Lillungal he haa arta ɗo wonnoo e duuɓi 250 miliyoŋ , wadde ko seto-naange woodi feewde hannde , ngo waɗii jirlanɗe 20 haa 21 .
Seto-naange jeyaa ko e Lillungal ( galaxie ) Lappol Kosam , ngo woni ko e catal koode Baawngal , a ngo woɗɗi wuddu Lillungal ngal fotde 28 000 hitaande-lewndu , a ngo joñii laral hakkundeewal Lillungal ngal fotde 50 hitaande-lewndu .
Seto-naange ko yuɓɓo mooftungo geɗe cariiɗe ɗe keborɗen limtude les
Seto-naange walla yuɓɓo-naange ko dental tagopeeje e geɗe goɗɗe jowitiiɗe e naange .

Seydi BAH !
Seydi GISE , zeezoo binndanze , ko veydooje ganndal e pinal , sanne .
Seydi Mbaay tawde ko Aarabeere njaŋngu-ɗaa , hay gooto waawaa wiyde ko a gaño aarabeere !
Seydi SAAR , a jaaraama e habrude oozoo wakaru moxxo , mo heewve e janngoove Pulaar hannde mbaawaa faamde nafoore mum , walla , so ve paamii , ve nganndataa ko golle men ; enen havantoove ngal zemngal ngaddani zemngal men yettaade zo .
Seydi SAAR am ALLA lonnginiima goonga ngartudaa kaaldaa mbo , yoo ALLA wad heddiibe bee yi'oobe goonga njaba'nanoobe goonga ndeggina ndako mbaawen foolde he ndee wolde babtaare leñol .
Seydi Saar so jiŋngol ina woodi a jiŋngii .

Sheex Tijjaan Jah
Sibu , ko o misil mo faddotaako , heɓɓotaako , ko kanko jogori reende kisal Riisi
Sibu , so en tuugniima e hiisaaji baɗaaɗi , hakkunde 150 e 200 kullel ladde ine natta woodde , ñalnde kala .
Sibu Hadafi yanii , yehii maayii , nde tawnoo wonnoo ko gaño mum’en
Sibu Hay gooto e men majjaani wonnde hannde , connexion internet koy nguurdam men jeyaa , haajuuji men e hammuuji men fof ko ɓuri heen heewde ko heen kumtaten Ene ɓattondira woɗɗondirɓe ina itta kumpa ene ɓeeyda kadi ganndal wonande ɓeen yaaruɓe oon bannge haaɗaani ɗoon tan ene gasa taw ittataa yeeeweende kono kam alaa jeddi wonnde ina usta yeeweende .
Sibu baabiraaɗo gooto keewɗo jawdi no feewi , so en njiɗii mbiyen galo meeɗiino wiyde ɓiyum mami holloye yimɓe waasɓe tampuɓe ena ngoodi e oo aduna .
Sibu e ɓataake moo winndi , jaagorgal toppitiingal ndeenka e jam nder leydi Muritani hollirii suɓnjooji ɗii koko mbaɗata ñande 6 lewru juin etee " kampaañ " oo fuɗɗotoo ko " alkamiisa 21 me e saanga fecci jamma .
Sibu gila nde hadafi waraa , maayi yehi , o yahaani gooto o nawori leydi " libi " haajooni artaani .
Sibu hay gooto e men andaa mande maayata , nguurdam men wonaani e juuɗe men hay gooto e men anndaa no foti balɗe heddii e nguurdam mum .
Sibu hay miin wonaa ñande fof keɓatmi ɗum kono mi meeɗaani aamde heen .
Sibu ina winndaa he Ciimtol kuuɓtodinngol ngol : " Denndaangal ɗemɗe men ngenndiije poti so en tuugniima e tiitoonde leydi ndii , hono : teddungal , musidal e nuunɗal .
Sibu nguurdam ko laawol kono ena juuti alaa ɗo haaɗi , hay so tawii alaa maayɗo wuurti , laahara alaa jaaɗo addi , alaa jaaɗo arti .
Sibu ñande fof eɗen njiya eɗen nana kaari yehii , kaari kay saŋkiima haŋki hannde , walla jooni jooni .
Sibu Ɓe cikkan-noo ko kala e men taawaano demal , coñal kam wonaa luutateeɗo .
Sibu ɓe mbiyi aɓe njenanaa ko " ko mbayliigaaji jooni jooni e dottugo laje daɓɓe , wondude e paandaale mawɗe laaɓtuɗe ɗoo e 2030 , mbaawi addande en huuɓnude jojjanɗe paatuɗe e weeyo " .
Sibu ɓeen kam ko yaaɓe to artetaake .
Sifaa Hanki Pinal Hannde noon ina yetta cukko meer Bahbahɓe , hono Miikaa Faal e goomu tiyaataar Bahbahɓe e musiɗɗo Goori Njaay .

Sih Sammba udditanɗo ɗemɗe ngenndiije damal suudu sarɗi
Sih Sammba wayniima jooni , e ooɗoo alet 8 siilo 2023 .
Sih Sammba waɗi jaŋde mum leslesre fof ko Ɓoggee , ko ɗoon o heɓiri sartifikaa e hitaande 1959 , o tiindinaa to Kolees keso Saafiyee Koppolaani ( Xavier Coppolani ) ko idii ine wonta Liisee Rooso .

Siilo 2009 .
Siimtani ɗum Fooyre Ɓamtaare ko Maamuudu Haaruuna Joop
Siin , leydi mahaaɗe ɓujeeje , kaawniiɗe .
Siin abbiima Leyɗeele Dentuɗe Amerik ( USA ) , e Riis to wangaade e weeyo , alet jawtuɗo ɓe ndampii baagal maɓɓe ngal ɓe inniri " Wojere kaaƴe " faade lewru , ndampoowa ( lanceur ) ndoondiika baagal ka , yaltii kammu ( Atmosphère ) leydi e ndeer ko jaasi njamndi ( heure ) , ɗuum noon ko mbaawka peeñka wonan'de Siinnaaɓe , sabu hisde e ngaal daawal naamni ko karallaagal mawngal , kammu leydi ko maayo henndu , kala ko ina doga e mum won e njaaweendi wulat haa ɗeɓa sumde , jiidaani e looɗe kuɓɓam ndampoowa ka , so siyii seeɗa ko jaynge hawridinta ka e ko ka roondi , wona bonan'de mawnde , ciftoree ndampoowa Celennjer mboomnooka yimɓe 7 hitaande 1986 to Amerik .
Siin haalaani ko jogori feraade e ndee eɓɓaande , kono , e
Siin ina anniyii " mahde " ( werlaade toon ) tawtirde
Siin ina darjiri kadi wonde leydi ɓurndi waawde posnude
Siin ina deppisoo miliyaaruuji keewɗi kaalis mum e
Siin kadi werlinooma e lewru abril ɓennundu nduu , wulnde adannde Jipporde mum weeyo ( station spatiale ) , tee ine ɗaminii maa nde hoɗo ɗoo e 2022 , woni e duuɓi ɗiɗi so heewii .
Siin neldude ko adii , gila e lewru mee 2018 , satelit jirlotooɗo Lewru ɗo ɓadii ,
Siin nuldiino toon baage beeyooje ( ɗe tellotaako ) ɗiɗe Cang e-1 ( Oktoober 2007 ) e Cang'e-2 ( Oktoober 2010 ) , etee eɓe pewji jokkude yahde toon duuɓi garooji teeŋti neldude toon yimɓe .
Siin saaktaani tawo feere jogori huutoroyaade ngam neldude
Siin ñonngii ɗoo yolnde juutnde ngam heɓtaade Riisi e Amerik ɓe weeyiyeeɓe mum lemmini humpito mawngo nder duuɓi e kitaale he nder ɓittugol weeyo .
Siinnaaɓe naatirii wiɗtude geɗe weeyo doole , ɗum noon ina waawi ko fay arde humpito heso heɓee e ngaal ganndal .
Siinnaaɓe nuldii Wojere kaaƴe to lewru .
Siino mboni fof poular ina jaraani ndum kasso wala kasanké no Mamadou samba Diop wiyaano nii mbeda siki ndemde goddé nde mbuurata een .

Siiseh Bari .
Sikkanoo ko kaa haala hankati ko ngoppaaka , laamu nguu haaytii teettude leyɗe daande maayo mawngo ina totta ɗum jananinkooɓe .
Sikke alaa , Aliw Sal ene jeyaa e yiɗɓe Makki , goongɗinɓe wonnde mawɗo leydi oo gasnii hankadi , kadi ene foti waɗde feere yaltira no ɓuri yooɗirde .
Sikke alaa , Baaba Maal ko kollirɗo mbaawka mum he dingiral naalankaagal gila ko ɓooyi .
Sikke alaa , FLHA lollirnde CEDEAO , dariima darnde tiiɗnde , waɗi golle jooɗɗe , maantiniiɗe , haa safri caɗeele leydi Liberiya , leydi Gine Bisaawo , haa e ko sakkitii koo , leydi Gammbi ɗo ndeen fedde darii haa Yahya Jamme jaɓi ɗaccude laamu caggal nde gañaa e wooteeji wiyi ene heɓtira doole .
Sikke alaa , batte Bayt al-Hikmah kaaɗano tan he Baghdaad laamorngo Abbaasyankeeɓe ngo , kono gure Islaam mawɗe ɗee kala cosii Bayt al-hikmah mum en .
Sikke alaa , faandaare amen e konngol Ngootaagu Ngenndi ngol
Sikke alaa , hannde won taaɓanɗe
Sikke alaa , haralleeɓe e oo fannu kollirii en " Paandaale kabaaru ɓurɗe teeŋtude ɗee ko humpitde , rewi heen ko jannginde e tinndinde , refti heen ko weltinde " .
Sikke alaa , heewnoo yuɓɓineede kooli tan ko gure ganni rewankooje .
Sikke alaa , kala daraniiɗo ɓamtude leñol ngol , amin dardii e mum .
Sikke alaa , kala leydi ndi ñalawma mum ari , heewi ko
Sikke alaa , kewuuji bayɗi nii ko huunde ŋakkunoonde ngam waawde duusde ƴellitaare mawnde e ñeeñal ngal gollooɓe hitonatewol Afriknaaɓe kolliri he ooɗoo fannu .
Sikke alaa , maa won jooni duuɓi sappo e joy , HAPA ene yuɓɓina hitaande fof kawgel ngam suɓaade jaayndiyankooɓe ɓurɗo ŋarɗude golle to binndol , to haala walla to ayaawo ( naɓoka ) .
Sikke alaa , mi yeddiino ɗum haa njooɗii mi e leydi , sabu am sikkunoode , caɗeele men wonaa dental , ko ngardiigu .
Sikke alaa , neɗɗo tawaaka nde seto-naange tagatee kono won e ƴeewtindo e juurnitagol ndokkata annduɓe eɓɓin'de no ngo tagiraa , etee tawa ko ɓe eɓɓini ko ina ɓadii goonga no feewi .
Sikke alaa , oo gorko dazndii pittaali keewzi he jamma ka heewve mbaaldi vuutanduru mbelemma .
Sikke alaa , ooɗoo rafi koronaa jilliiɗo aduna oo , sifinii en ko Pulaar wiynoo , " mbaawataa seerndude giɗo e gaño , ko nde ndañ-ɗaa caɗeele " .
Sikke alaa , ɓiɓɓe leñol so tinii leñol mum en woni ko e yahtirde keeci , potaani jebbilaade pada haa gorlal mum en arta , poti ko etaade anndude hol to lohre maggol ndee heedi , ndaroo ndadoo cirŋinoo ngam tiiɗtinde ndeen lohre , ƴetta pewje ( peeje ) no mahtorii leñol mum en gila ngol yirbaani , ngol ɓeydoo saɗde mahtaade .
Sikke alaa Baaba Talla woyata ɗoo ko mette fulɓe kala , kono hoto ɗeen mette ngaddan en jiiɓaade .
Sikke alaa Murtuɗo ko dawriyanke kaɓantenooɗo yooltuɗe jojjanɗe kala ñoolaaɓe , doofolɓe , haa ɓuri teeŋtude e ɓaleeɓe Muritaninaaɓe ko ɗuum rokkunoomo innde makko " Gawlo Miskineeɓe " .
Sikke alaa NDILLAAN jeyaa hannde ko e naalankoove men vurden hevtinde .
Sikke alaa danndaangal peeje cakkitaaɗe e ɗii ñalɗi maa mballit jaŋde he nder Fedde ndee ƴellitaade .
Sikke alaa jimol ngol ina weli , ina sañi , ina waɗi kaadi maana .
Sikke alaa ko fay arde maa neɗɗo hoɗoy to weeyo , sabu jooni ngaal boowal ngal alaa happu ina huccanaa no feewi haa ɗeɓi wontude jiirondiral hakkunde leyɗeele mawɗe ɗe .
Sikke alaa mi laabndotaako ngenndiyankoobe hol no wayi e mum en .
Sikke alaa mo tinanaani neɗɗo , waawataa yurmaade ɗum saka faabaade ɗum .

So en ƴeewtiima no moƴƴi ma en tesko naange ina abboo rewo sahaa , sahaa goɗɗo kadi abboo worgo , ɗuum kadi fawii ko e guuragol guurtol ( axe ) leydi , ngol daraaki loy , ko ndi nguuriindi seeɗa , ɗuum waɗi waylo-waylo weeyo woodde e dow mayri , ndunngu , dabbunde , ceeeɗu e demminaare , so on njuurnitiima binndannɗe men e blog he ma on taw toon no ɗum woniri .

Soklaaji renndooji ɗii
Sokna Ghaliyat Mohamed el Vdhih hollitii weltaare mum nde teddiniraa udditgol ooɗoo ñalawma e innde Ministeer kalfinaaɗo fiyakuuji renndo e mbaadi kuuftidinndi teeŋti noon e rewɓe dowri sabu darnde ndeɓe ndarii ngam gaddanaade en kisal men to bannge nguura .
Soknaajo a jaaraama nde njogi daa cuusal haalde muuseeki kaddungal addata e debbo e wonde dum aada gila jamaanu firaauuna en .

Sosde ( i ) lobugel haaliyankooɓe walla winndiyankooɓe tawa jime mumen ene njaltinee heen ; e ( ii ) lobugel naalankooɓe mbele janngiyankooɓe men ene ƴellitoo e kala njimri kesiri njaltundi ( he ɗemngal pulaar/fulfulde ) ; tawa tonngoode fof ene adda winndannde jimol walla tayre njimri kesiri ;
Sosde njuɓɓudi njaambureeri , ndi jiidaa e juɓɓule laamu goodɗe hannde ɗee .

Sukaaɓe Malik Daf ɓe , kawirii no newi he finaal hakkunde mum en Gambi , loggi ɗiɗi e ndiga ( 2-0 ) .
Sukaaɓe heddiiɓe ɓe o dañi ɓee lala ngari ko ɓalli mumen ina mbaɗi perƴe kaŋŋe ɓutte .
Sukaaɓe noddiraa gooto gooto ngam fonndaade paɗe e jawe ɗe , Kono ɗe keƴaani hay gooto e maɓɓe .

Sukaaɓe rogere goo duɗal leslesal
Sukaaɓe tokoosɓee ɓee , ɓoggol mumen foti ko e feccere meeter .
