Suleymaan Kan 01/07/2016
Suleymaani Baal faati Haayre Laaw , to Ceerno Basmoor Lamin ( Saako ) mawɗo ( inawoodi Ceerno Basmoor Lamin tokooso : ko oon njannginoyta Sayko Umaar Saydu Taal ) .
Suleymaani Baal ko ganndo dowrowo , pinɗo , jiiliiɗo , kumpitiiɗo fannuuji keewɗi .
Suleymaani Baal noon naati ko e Fuuta , woni e waajaade e tinndude e urɓude mbele Fuutaŋkooɓe ena ɓooroo e kalfaandi , ena caltoo kiiɓal laamu Satigeeɓe , ena ngarta e deftere Alla e sunna Mohammadu .
Suleymaani Baal sakkiti miijo no kaan ngonka fotata haɓireede ngam sompude mbaylaandi tuugniindi e diine Lislaam .
Suleymaani Baal ummii Jañnja Wari , o rewi Ɓunndu , o fayi Maal .
Suleymaani Baal wiyi mo : " Ceerno , njaafo-ɗaa mi dey , mi tawii jooni ndiyam ina woni heen ; tilliisa fof mi yahii , mi ronkii dañde heen ndiyam .
Suleymaani Baal ñallinaani wallinaani , ko ngoon eeraango yooɓii , ngoon faɗo ɓoornii haa ñalnde hooti e joom mum e hitaande 1775 to Tummbere Jiinge , wirnaa e ɓarakorde Jeeriyel Tummbere .
Sulɗaane ( aimant )
Sulɗaane ina heewi nafoore , ko adi fo ina huutoree ko ɓooyi ngam weemtinde wonɓe e laana ndeer maayo geeci , so njahi haa nattii sooynaade powle ko rewordi ( boussole ) kuutortoo joopanooɓe rewo , hannde noon sulɗaane ina huutoree e geɗe ɗe limotaako , eɗen mbaawi heen jubbude ( ( kaalirɗe ( haut parleur ) , cowooji kuɓɓam ( moteurs électriques ) , safaara , e laana pooɗowal ( train à lévitation ) ) )
Sulɗaane jiggaaɗo : njamndi ɓooyndi takkaade e haayre sulɗaane , ina fooɗa kono ɓooydataa heen
Sulɗaane mahdaaɗo : woni haayre sulɗaane , tawatee ko e ndeer leppi leydi mbaɗndi njamndi .
Sulɗaane tutaaɗo : njamndi so worwaama gaarawol kire , kuɓɓam rewnaa heen ina laatoo sulɗaane haa nde kuɓɓam iwi fo .
Sulɗaneeji ko tati

Suudaan , ƴiiƴiho bonɗo baaɗo no Mu'amaar Kadafi , mo Libi e puydo tataɓo
Suudaannaaɓe ina kaala arab loogguɗo ɗemngal mum en asliwal ngal walla fulɓe suudaan pulaar maɓɓe logga ɗemngal araab e ɗemɗe suudaan goɗɗe , ko hono noon ɗemɗe goɗɗe ɗee ne loggirta pulaar , e leyɗe goɗɗe ɗee fof ko noon .
Suudu ginol-golle ( Salle de contrôle ) : Daawe njawtuɗen ɗee kala toppittee ko to suudu ginol-golle , ko rewnintooɓe golle ɗe no njuɓɓiri ngoni toon ina tiimi e ordinaateeruuji kollirooji njuɓɓudi golle ɗe .
Suudu heblo ayaawu e yuɓɓin'de ko hebori yeeɓeede ko , ɗeen golle ndenndinee mbaɗtee carfal nuldee dow to satelit caaktoowo .
Suudu mawndu ñaawirdu leydi ndin lamndike yo tefoore uddite fii anndugol sabu oo masiiɓo .
Suudu sarɗi jaɓii
Suudu sarɗi ɓenninii sariya kuccam jaŋde ngenndi ndii .
Suudu sarɗiiji Senegaal yawtinii eɓɓo kuulal dagnoowal goodaangal cukko hooreejo e nder sarɗiiji dowrowi Senegaal .
Suukara oo ɓurta e nder ɓalndu .
Suɓateeɓe ɓe geɗe keewɗe ina ƴeewe e mumen , muñal , cuusal , hakilantaagal , heewde peeje , waawde wallude e wuurdude e ndeer renndo won'dungo e caɗeele , e geɗe goɗɗe ɗe en mbaawa limtude ɗo !

TNT ( trinitrotoluène ) ko kalito ( explosif ) jiytaaɗo e hitaande 1863 .
TOI 700 d ko ɗaŋre boowal seto-naange , ɗuum firti ko Naange woɗnge nge wonaa nge ngannduɗen nge nde rewi , haa hannde eɗen njahra e ko ɓuri 4 000 ɗaŋe boowal seto-naange jiytaaɗe , kono nde ɗoo yiytaande ngol won ko heerori .
TOI 700 d woni ɗaŋre nde niiwnorgal TESS ngal NASA adi yiytude e nder cukkiri koode , ngal yowa to weeyo ko hitaande 2018 ngam yiylaade ɗaŋe boowal seto-naange nannduɗe e Ngaawe .
TPO wiyi kala leydi njiɗndi
Taala sillaa Ƴamatnooɗo laamu ko e ɓurɓe moƳƳude jiyanɗe e konnguɗi fayde e leydi ndi kono mo senegaal nootaaki noddaandu mum Kanko taala sillaa o haaliino ɗum e wiyde mo mawɗo wadda ko joom galle baɗoowo ko fof en potnoo waɗde e galle o ; wadda ɓoltata jummo rugga weddoo e barme tawa keednaaɗo e barme ina darii na darodii e mbaawka mum .

Taarik seeɗa : Aarabeeɓe hade Nelaaɗo , innde ndee firtunoo tan ko wiyeede dowrinkooɓe , ɓe ngalaa faggudu , ko ɓe njoginoo seeɗa tan nii ko yuɓɓi e renndo maɓɓe , ko renndude ɓe diineeji walla Allaaji ɗi ɓi ndewi .

Tabital Pulaaku Beljik waylii yiilirde mum nden .
Tabital Pulaaku Europe hino weltori tinnugol ( hollitugol ) on batu muuɗum to Paris , ñannde 31/05/08 .
Tabital Pulaaku Farayse jaɓɓii miijo e eɓɓo ceerno o , huccani ɗaɓɓude leydi , tuugnorɗe lelnaa , ɗeen tuugnorɗe ena jeyaa heen ; ƴeewde nokku mo woɗɗaani laawol mawngol , nokku danyotooɗo ndiyam e nokku fulɓe gadiiɗo hoɗeede walla ɓurɗo ɓooyde e nder leydi Senegaal .
Tabitinde e reende nanondire dañaaɗe hakkunde gollodtooɓe to bannge jeyi leydi fawaade e sariyaaji goodɗi ɗii , mbele jiilgol ngaluuji leydi ndemeteendi ina waɗee e nder kaɓɓondiral .
Tabitinde e ƴellitde jaŋde tuugiinde e ɗemɗe muuynaaɗe sabu mum en wonde codorgol keɓtinangol to bannge karallaagal jaŋde , sibu ko ɗemɗe ɗe sukaaɓe mbaawi ko adii na naata ekkol , ballitooje cukalel faggaade gannde gila law .
Tabitinde kuule sariya jowitiiɗe e mumtugol njiyaagu e toppitagol kala wullitaango , ko aldaa e sarɗi , ɗoon e ɗoon , ummanoo ñaawde ɗum ko yaaccii , e darnde , haa nde porkireer felliti yettinde ɗum walla waasde yettinde ɗum ñaawoowo cunnotooɗo ( juge d’instruction ) .
Tabitingol hakke mo hooreejo leydi rokkaa waawde yedditaade mbaawka carɗinoowa e fusde asaambele ngenndi , maa addan ɓesngu rokkiteede mbaawka mum ñaawde hakkunde ɗiiɗoo mbaawkaaji ɗiɗi .
Tabitingol hoolaare Hooreejo leydi wonande won ɗiin mbaawkaaji ɗi o heerorii , gaa gaa mbaawkaaji guwarnama , maa waaw rewrude e mbaawka carɗinoowa njogiika hattan ittude mo .
Tabitingol kujjinagol guwarnama yeeso parlemaa , maa addan mbaawka carɗinoowa waawde horde guwarnama , e luulndaade politik mbaawka ciynoowa , sibu ina waawi liɓde ɗum rewrude e ɗaɓɓaande goppugol golle ( motion de censure ) walla caggal nde guwarnama ɗaɓɓi ɗum rewrude e ɗaɓɓaande hoolaare ( question de confiance ) .
Tabitingol sariya 83 127 mo 5 suwee 2003 e nder leydi he
Tabitingol sariya 83 127 mo 5 suwee 2003 e nder leydi hee : ( ina jokki )
Tafde labangaal ŋiiwa tiiɗani tiiɗi ko sengonoy de ɗum
Tafii konu duppal laamɗo mo waɗaani ko feewi
Tafngo konngol kesol fotaani selde ɗe peeje garooje
Tageefo , ko ɗum tuubakooɓe mbiyata " kosmos " ; eɗen mbaawi kadi wiyde ɗum " winndere " e sikke am .
Tagegol Baaba Aadama ko nii siforii : fawaade e no Diine Lislaam wiyiri ɗum e tuugnaade e ganndo lislaamiyaŋke gooto ina wiyee Saalabi e deftere mum , ɗo wiyi : " nde Alla yiɗi tagde Aadama ndee , o wahyii leydi , o wiyi ɗum : mbiɗo yiɗi tagde duumotooɓe e dow maa .
Tagofeere Maars e Leydi kañum en ɗesi fotde njuuteeki ñalawmaaji ( hedde waktuuji 24 ) .
Tagofeere Mbaañ noon , newaaka yiyde e yitere ɓolde , tee hakkunde mum e Leydi ko hedde 78 miliyoŋ kiloomeeteer .
Tagofeere Uraanus yiytaa ko hitaande 1781 .
Tagofeere Wenus nde noon ( " hoodere jaayre " ) , jirlagol mum weñciti .
Tagofeere ko aduna tan , no aduna men nih ; heen sahaa aduna o ɓura aduna men , heen sahaa jaasa aduna men mawnude .
Tagofeere ko tagoodi no Leydi nih , tawa woniri e weeyo asamaan o ( kammu o ) ko no leydi e lewru e naange e koode ngoniri e weeyo nih .
Tagofeere noon , ko tagoodi keɓoori caafe , ko tagoodi ndi hokkaataa caafe kono ko kokkateendi caafe gulɗe .
Tagoore ndee ko hulɗiniinde kaaɗtudi .
Tagopeeje " puneeje leydi " woni tagopeeje jeyaaɗe e yuɓɓooji goɗɗi , taartotooɗe koode goɗɗe , no Leydi taartortoo Naange nii , ɗum noon ko tagopeeje ɗo nguurndam , ine gasa , wooda heen ɗo tawaa he wootere he mum .
Tagopeeje , Lewru , Leydi , naange e koode kañum en fuu alaa to ceŋii !
Tagopeeje Supiteer , Satuurna , Uraanus e Neptuun kañum enne mbaɗi ko fedde mum en walla leñol mum en bannge : ɗe mbiyetee ko tagopeeje leñol Supiteer ( walla tagopeeje fedde Supiteer ) .
Tagopeeje e lebbi mum en ( walla jowitiiɗe mum en ) .
Tagopeeje e lebbi mum en , Naange , Koode , Deental koode ( galaksi ) fof ngoni ko e weeyo , e baawɗe tagɗo ɗum en oo .
Tagopeeje goɗɗe ɗee , tagorii ko no leydi nii , tawetee toon ko ceene , kaaƴe , caɗli e tule , ena waawi tawa geɗe goɗɗe ena toon , tawa ngalaa gaay e leydi , walla geɗe ngona gay e leydi , tawa ngalaa toon .
Tagopeeje leñol Supiteer ɗee fof ena njaawi yiloo-banngoo .
Tagopeeje ɓurɗe fof mawnude ɗe ( Supiteer , Satuurna , Neptuun , Uraanus ) ñalawmaaji mum en ɓuri raɓɓiɗde .
Tagra-ɗen ko punndi koode

Talaata 2009-05-05 - Ko lowre politik ɓuri remeede e ngesa jaayndeeji Senegaal e alkamiisa oo .
Talaba en , yumma mum ummii ko e fulɓe ;
Tale ɗee noon ?
Tammbaa Saar : Caggal ndee ɗoo tinndinoore , ko suka naalanke tokooso ena wiyee Tammbaa Saar holliri ko joginoo .
Tan aaccaaare debbo o taƴi , kono fof ɓuri muusde debbo o ko sehil mum mo o wiyi omo resa o .
Tan fowru tawi ɓe ɗoon , aɓe ngawa .
Tan ha o sooynii Malayka ɗo nokku Zamzam ( Ɓunndu jam-jam ) ɗoo ene aastoroo ɓunndu nduu teppere ( walla wibjo ) mum , haa ndiyam fuccitii e nokku hee .

Taw koy telfoŋ mun gooto .
Taw si ndee he6oto ñannde goo e Pulaar wonande hono am mo anndaa binndol Faransiire so ko 6ale walla danewol ?
Taw si oo alhaali battinan e nguurdam dawro Donald Trump ?
Tawa eɗen talloo deedi korƴooji ina muusa heege woni mawngal ñabbuuli e dow leydi ndimri , moƴƴoori kala ndemri !
Tawa ko o ñaagotoo ko harmaani , ko taƴata enɗam alaa heen .
Tawa konnguɗi mum ŋeñaaka haa wonti faaro .
Tawa mi diwii Alkabaa , mi yantoya Ngesa Ñiiwa .
Tawa tooñde goɗɗo alaa heen .
Tawa wonaa huɗde hoore mum walla ɓesngu mum walla jawdi muuɗum .
Tawa ñaamde makko e yarde makko e koltu makko fof ko ko dagii , ko harmi alaa heen , mo wayaani noon Alla ƴeewataa duwaawu mum .
Tawaama , yeru , ɓeydagol nguleeki ina ɓeyda fitinaaji yimɓe kam e fitinaaji hakkunde goomuuji .
Tawaama kadi mbuuñaari ina yaaji nder laamu makko , gila e jaagorɗe laamu haa heɓi mawɓe konunkooɓe – wiya jaagorgal ndeenka mahii nder wuro mum galle mo hono mum alaa he leydi hee fof .
Tawaaɓe duttagol ceerno ñalnde 11/06/2009 to Nuwaasoot e mooftegol makko ñalnde Mawnde 12/06/2009 to Mbaañ ɓee kabrii en won’de toɓo e ɓuuɓol mbaɗii heen haa yimɓe ɓee teskii ko ɗum yurmeende Geno nde o jaɓɓorii gooto he jiyaaɓe makko suɗnooɓe nguurndam e koɗdigal aduna .
Tawassul , lannda men oo , mo nganndu-ɗaa jokkogol mum e Lislaam wonaa kumpa hay gooto , ina foti , ɓeydaade daraade no feewi sanne e haɓde e ɗii goopi diwtuɗi aada , pawndirɗi , farla e kala lannda goongɗuɗo , gonɗo e leydi Muritani , nde feññinta darnde mum laaɓnde e ngoo ɗoo woywaango , nattungo waawde fadtireede , heppanaango .
Tawde Leydi ko tagofeere rewnde e hoodere mum ( naange ) , no naangeeji mbay heewde e ngoo weeyo nih , ala e sago puneeje mayri wooda , heddi kay ko njiiten walla mbaasen yiitude , ko yiitaa e tagopeeje boowal seto naange ɓurii 1 800 , kono ko jooni wootere e nannduɗe e leydi yiitaa !
Tawde Muritani hanki innde mum waccoore ko rewo , Demmba Njaay Ndillaan innirii lefol mum kesol ko Muritani .
Tawde en njettiima ɗoo , eɗen mbaawi wiyde , Waalo waalo en hay so ndartiima tuubakooɓe no doole mum en potnoo , ndartoraaki no haanirta nii , tawa ko neɗɗo gooto , gaa gaa janfanteeɓe .
Tawde en paamii lewndu ko lefol goobi , etee timtimol yaltataa ɗo lewndu tawaaka , wadde timtimol alaa ko woni so wonaa lewndu heltaandu haa mbaadiiji goobuuji mum fo peeñani men , so tawii naange neldii lewndu mum faade leydi , son du hawrii e baade ndiyam , ɗe kelta ciiñsiiñƴe naange nge , ko ɗuum saakata lefol lewndu ngol haa mbaadiiji maggol feeñana e timtimol .
Tawde henndu so wulii hoyat , faandu ndu yaaɓana asamaan e nder sappoɓal hojom ( 1/10 seconde ) , e nder ngool ŋabbugol henndu wulndu feewde asamaan , doole no ndu yahrata dow nih siiɓoroo kala ko ndu hawri , ndu hela kuɓeeje , ndu nawora leɗɗe , faayiida haala ndu etoo naworde ko ndu hawri kala , ko e ngoon saanga bommbo o sooynatee ina way no fedannde fowru ( champignon ) .
Tawde ko maa ɗemngal siimta ganndal nde ngal winndo , ala e sago ɗemngal ngal dañana kala kaɓirɗe e golle ganndal konnguɗi baawɗi joopaade e feññinde ngaal ganndal e mbaadi laaɓndi , tawa so neɗɗo janngi ngal duuɓi teemedde caggal ina waawa faamde ngal .
Tawde ko ndiyam huufi nguurndam ɗo ɗam woni fo ina haani wooda ko wuuri ɗoon .
Tawde ko noon , cofel a ɗalat njahden .
Tawde ko ɓuri heewde jaggi ko yo o yaltine wuro , baaba Jeeri wiꞌi yo o yaltu wuro ngo .
Tawde kuutorɗe limoore informatik ko ɗiɗe tan , etee limoore alaa ɗo haaɗi , ala e sago feere dañee no limraa , ɗuum waɗi annduɓe informatik tagi cuuɗi jeetati , ɗo ɓolum e goo lomlomtondirta haa tonnga limoore .
Tawde mbiinam ina e Anselad waasata tawa won ko wuuri heen , kulle pamare walla mawɗe , won biinooɗo e annduɓe he won'de ndiyam puufaɗam boowal ɗam ko lammuɗam etee a ɗam waɗi tufeeje nguurndam .
Tawde ndiyam dañataa deelaade e dow Mars , ko fotata waɗde ɗee balwaltiɗe jiyaaɗe ?
Tawde ngon ɗen ko e lowre inniraande " Kaalden Goonga " , ene jojji , mi haalana on goonga .
Tawde ngon-ɗen ko taƴre juutde balɗe alaa e sago ndutto-ɗen kadi e faamnude ko woni hitaande ( en paamniino , kono njɗ-ɗen ko hokkude yeru sabu yeru ena walla no feewi ) .
Tawde ngonɗen ko taƴre juutde balɗe alaa e sago nduttoɗen kadi e faamnude ko woni hitaande ( en paamniino , kono njɗɗen ko hokkude yeru sabu yeru ena walla no feewi ) .
Tawde noon duuɓi nduun lewru woɗɗondiraani e duuɓi aduna me ( Leydi ) ko haɗata ndu waɗde ko wuuri e ndeer ndiyam he ina saɗi sabu e dow leydi won ɗo kullon njiita e nokkuuji ɓurɗi luggiɗde e ndeer maaje leydi , ɗo lewndu naange feccinta yottaade !
Tawde noon ɓe ngaynaano jaŋde , alhaali waɗi ko ɓe kawritta heewaani .
Tawde o raaɓataa , gonduɗo heen , eɗen eɗen mbaawi waaldude e mum , ñaamdude e mum , ɓoornaade comci mum .
Tawde penndagol ndiyam lammuɗam yaawaani ko ɓuuɓol doolni fo !
Tawde puɗɗori-ɗen ko naamnal , njoofniren duwaawu .
Tawde sooynaade ɗaŋre weeɓaani , haala haalaaka wonɓe heen , wadde hol feere cakkaten mbela gannden won wuurɓe e ngoo weeyo luggiɗngo ?
Tawde tiitoonde winndannde ndee ko " kaalden goonga " waɗde , ene moƴƴi kaalden goonga .
Tawde tuggi leydi haa dow goɗɗuɗo ko hennde , ala e sago tedda , ko ɗuum woni ko mbiyaten ɓitto kammu ( pression atmosphérique ) ,
Tawde wonii feso yiytaaka tawo , tawa ko yeeyeteengo , haɓotoongo
Tawde ɗiin nukkuuji ina mbaɗi ko waɗi woŋki , ɗaam nguurndam ina seerti e ɗam men ɗam no feewi , ɗuum wontii lowre nguurndam woɗnde , ndeen lowre noon waasataa woodde e ɗaŋe goɗɗe e nder seto-naange e boowal muuɗum .

Taƴde so tawii maale ŋabbugol
Taƴe cuɓtaaɗe he eɓɓaande sariya kuccam jaŋde
Taƴgol keeri nokkuuji ɗii ɓurngol moƴƴude wonande njuɓɓudi nokkuuji ɗii kam e njuɓɓudi nehaandi ndii , tuugiindi e geɗe laaɓtuɗe ( keeweendi yimɓe , ko nokku oo heerorii ) .
Taƴooɓe ko meccal ɓooyngal , joom mum en ndaratonoo ko he hakkunde jolɗe ( yolnde ) ene paddoo julankooɓe walla ɗannotooɓe ene keɓta jawɗeele mum en .

Tengiti ngal dow fof noon , ko murto kewngo to Libi ngo .
Tengiti ngal dow nder leyɗe hono Burkina e Gine e Mali naatii tigi nder mbunndi-mbunndi ɓiyngu-baabaagu nder hare leyɗe Fuɗnaange e leyɗe Hirnaange to Orop e to Ameriki .

Terɗe Goomu horo
Terɗe Goomu kesu suɓngoyankeewu ngenndiiwu njeytiingu ngoondii kihiiɗe hanki yeeso Diiso doosɗeyankeewo , hade maɓɓe ƴettude golle maɓɓe .
Terɗe Goomu toppitiiɗo leydi ina poti ɗoftude haakem e nguun njillu .
Terɗe fedde Sifaa Hanki Pinal Hannde , nulaaɓe fedde Timtimol , fedde Pinal e Ɓamtaare , fedde Gayi Duumaali , fedde Daraniiɓe Leñol , fedde Dental Doole , fedde Lewlewal Pulaagu , fedde Pellital Arafaat 7 , Duɗal Mawɗo Maalik Sih , Duɗal Lewlewal Baduru , Duɗal Jalaalu Diin Bah , e Goomu Muñal , luutaaka jamma oo .
Terɗe fedde ɓamtaare pulaar catal Nuwaadibu e gardagol cukko hoyreejo hono Bah Muusaa Mammadu , yantude e Sih Jibi Aamel , Bah Sammba Aamel , Sih Najiiru , Abdul Gey , Limaan Sammba Jah , Alasan Sal , Mariyam Ndonngo e Aamadu Kebbel Joob .
Terɗe konu e kisal baɗnooɗe ko rewaani laawol hakkunde 1 saawiyee 1989 e 18 abriil 1992 jowitiiɗe e geɗe kewnooɗe e nder konu hee , caabinooɗe golle koninkaagu e baɗe fitina bonɗe .
Terɗe yiilirde nde ko nii siforii
Teskaa ko gadiiɗo e nokku fof , ko kam jeyi ɗum , walla lewɗo nokku fof , ko kam jeyi ɗum ( jayngol e jammbere ) , walla noon keɓtirɗo ɗum doole mum .
Teskaa ko leydi ndema ina rokka fartaŋŋeeji keewɗi , kono kadi ina heewi caɗeele .
Teskaama hannde e nguuɗo laamu yoga e sgataaɓe ɓe leñol ngol yaakorno eɓe ndartii hannde darnde gertooɗe e nder gallle , foccude , joggude , ko aldaa e gollude , ɗum noon mbiyen ɓe kes walla kus .
Teskaama koowooje baaɗe no dugun-dugure , ñaaku , ndefton-alla ine ustoo he taariindi men no feewi .

Tesko : Ɗum fof e waade noon , Fooyre Ɓamtaare fof e heccude jaayɗe ( binndaaɗe ) leydi ndii fof ( sibu nde jibinaa ko 1980 ) , Fooyre Ɓamtaare fof e wonde jaaynde wootere , wajjere yaltoore e ɗemngal ngenndiwal ngal wonaa Arab , Fooyre Ɓamtaare fof e heɓtinaneede kuuɓnugol sarɗiiji jaaynde hellifaande , haɗaani , ko nde ɗawaande e kala ko faati e coɗgol jeeyle ( insertions publicitaires ) .
Tesko ɗen wonde baaba makko , hono Bookar Aali Dunndu Segele , ina jeyaa enootoyinooɓe noddaango Al hajji Umaar Taal , nde o haɓetenoo e wuro Farabanna .
Tesko-ɗee kadi no moƴƴi , Ceerno Iisaayanke oo , alaa fof ɗo soɗi innde Queen ndee e nder haala mum , haa ɗoo .
Tesko-ɗen , e wiyde Dooro Gey , Boobo Loonde , Mammadu Demmba Sih waylii ko heewi , kadi addii ko heewi e dokkirgol kabaruuji e ɗemngal Pulaar .
Tesko-ɗen , seppooji keewii he dumunnaaji jawtiɗi ɗii nder gure Burkina-Faso haa nih ɗii ñalɗi altinee e talaata jawtuɗi .
Tesko-ɗen : Tesko-ɗen Ndenndaandi Mali ko leydi mawndi njookiindi e nder jeereende Sahara e diiwaan Afrik bannge hiirnaange to bannge werto wiyaama njaajeendi e njuuteendi mayri ko : miliyoŋ , teemedde ɗiɗi , ujunaaje nayi e capanɗe jeetati ujunere , teemedde joyi e capanɗe jeeɗiɗi e nayi ( 1 248574 ) Kiɓɓal maa km2 , keewal ɓesngu mayri walla mbiyen poppilaasiyoŋ ko sappo e nayi miliyoŋ ( 14 000000 Hbts ) innama aadee caggal binnditaagol kuuɓtidinngol ministeer " habitat " pannoriiɗe mahngo koɗorɗe leydi ndi e hitaande 2009 maaynde nde .
Tesko-ɗen e ɗeeɗoo jeese jeenay , kala heen ɗo denɗiraaɓe mbaɗdi walla luural joli hakkunde mumen , so ɓe tintoyii nimsa mawɗo jolanat ɓe haa tuubabuya heƴa heen so tawii kay ɓe ngonaa yimɓon
Tesko-ɗen e ɗiin dummunnaaji , fulɓe ɓurnoo waawde huutoraade ko fetelaaji ɗi eddaaji ceertuɗi , fawaade e ko waañetee : ina e ɗiin fetelaaji ɗi ɓe innirnoo : bulannde buuta , ko fetel ñiibi , lonka goro , fetel Gabi , lonka dewo , fetel koobi e jawi , loosi goro , fetel tewdi , loosi dewo , fetel bille , garde ko mo jaawle , hawli mo pooli , ekn .
Tesko-ɗen ina woodi e diiwaan Damga hee ɗo wiyetee Lowre .
Tesko-ɗen kadi ɓuri waawde haalde ko fayti e Wagner/Riisi fof ko Amerikinaaɓe .
Tesko-ɗen ko hikka waɗti duuɓi 16 ko Ceerno Mammadu Hammadi Sih ena mawnina ooɗoo ñalawma .
Tesko-ɗen ngal ɗoo kuulal kesal wiyi ko mawɗo leydi ndii ina waawi rootaade won geɗe e donngal mum aamra ɗum cukko hooreejo oo .
Tesko-ɗen no moƴƴi :
Tesko-ɗen noon goomungu woni ko e les njiimaandi Kawtal Janngooɓe Fulfulde e Winndere ( fedde wontunde Tabital Pulaaku Farayse ) Ceerno o jokki golle , caggal nde nokku ngu danyanaa kaayitaaji laawɗuɗi , tawi ko ceerno Ibrahiima Umar KAN ( Katante Lenyol ) ardinoo fedde nde yahi to nokku ngu aafi tuufeere adannde ngam darnude nokku ngu , e tawtoreede jagge .
Tesko-ɗen noon ina woodi Fuuta Jeeri .
Tesko-ɗen tan wonde koolol tataɓol Fedde AMAM , hay so hawrii e pergitte to bannge ne , waɗii nafooje laaɓtuɗe sanne .
Tesko-ɗen to Fuuta-Jaloŋ ina woodi kelmeendi teddungal ndi jiydaa he kelmeendi ñalnde kala , jotondirndi he terɗe ɓanndu ( ɓalndu ) neɗɗo maa geɗe golle gaadoraaɗe ñalnde kala .
Tesko-ɗen wonde Batu nguu fotnoo waɗde ko 8 haa 20 jolal 2020 , kono sabu caɗeele COWID ngu dirtinaa haa jolal 2021 hade maggu waɗteede he jolal 2022 .
Tesko-ɗen wonde Seleŋ sosaa ko e hitaande 1450 , caggal jibineede Annebi Iisaa .
Tesko-ɗen wonde jettooɗe Soh e Jah ɓuri yaajde ngesa denɗiraagal e nder Fulɓe .
Tesko-ɗen wonde wuro Seleŋ ngoo , mawniino , heewiino faayiida kono ngo fusi ko e hitaande 1933 .
Teskono no moy’y’i Baaba Maal Neene Mum KO Moritaninaajo , Rewo e worgo fof poti e makko .
Teskotoo wonde hay gooto alaa e leyɗe hee , kadi ko ɗe belsindaaɗe ko Goomu jeertotooɗo , ñaawoowo luure jolooje hakkunde dente , jowitiiɗe e leydi , ɗum ɗoon noon ko e sahaa nde Goomu oo joofii wonde ɗeen leyɗe ko nafooje ndenndaandi .
Teskoɗee : enen ( yimɓe ) e dille men keewɗe ɗe fof ko ceɓɓet Lillungal men ngonɗen , ɗeɓata waade ko no gaɗa wuro nih , kadi ɗo ngonɗen ɗo ina famɗiri ko heddi ko , haa ɗeɓaa wiyde ko punndi mum nih !
Teskoɗee : inɗe tagopeeje ( ɗaŋe ) gonɗe e natal ɗe ko gooto e sagataaɓe leñol ngol keɓrumi ɗe , o mbo wiye Gantanke Jallo , o wi'i ko ni fulɓe biyatno ɗee koode , eɗen njetta mbo , eɗen kadi ñaagi nde o ɓeydotoo laɓɓinan'de en ngaal ganndal .
Teskoɗee kala nde huunde wiyaa nani yaha , won ko darii laatano ko yahata ko ndaɗɗudi ( repère ) , walla tawa kañum e ndaɗɗudi mum ina ɓurondiri njaaweeki .
Teskuya goɗɗo wonande ndeeɗoo tagoore ko naykiɓɓe gonɗe e nguru nguu fof .
Teskuyaa e wasiyaaji paatuɗi e jaaynde Fooyre Ɓamtaare
Teskuyaaji : Jaaynde ndee ina rokki yimɓe heewɓe fartaŋŋe heɓde kabaruuji kimmuɗi ɓurɗi ɓadaade ngonkaaji maɓɓe .
Tewaare e waasde rokkude yimɓe juuɗe maa maɓɓondirde ( ɓuucondirde he mum en ) , kala ko ɓe mbaawi wonde ngati alaa ɗo mboros oo wonataa .
Teŋe ko e daande gorko pawii , eɗe mbaɗɗoo so tawii naatdiigu waɗii , so o seerii mo hade maɓɓe naatdude , heen feccere fukkiima , heddoo feccere e makko , ngam konngol joomiraaɗi wiyiino : " so on ceerii ɓe ko adii nde ndentaton e maɓɓe leeso tee tawii on parlaniino ɓe , ina woodani ɓe feccere ko parlan-ɗon ɓe koo .
Teŋe woni ko debbo ina tottee ngam dagnande gorko oo dakmitaade he makko .

Tiitoonde kawtal ngal ko Teeminannde

Tiitoonde ñalawma 21 feebariyee hikka oo ko " janngirgol ɗemɗe keewɗe jojji ngam moƴƴingol jaŋde " .

To bannge faayiida , setooji gummoriiɗi
To bannge faggudu , dañal " dowla " oo fawii ko e ɓulli petoroŋ e gaas ɗi ɓe tiimi jooni ɗii , lempooji e kubbe ɗe ɓe parlini e ɓesngu nguu , jiidaani e bayti e korkitgol kaake janane ( keɓtugol bankeeji , tarafik petoroŋ ekn ) .
To bannge fiyooɓe bawɗi e sabareeji Muritani e Senegaal ko ɓee ɗoo : Dembel Gay mo Duungel , Mammadu Saydel Caam mo Duungel , Umaar Jaw jeyaaɗo to Niimaa Baasuuji , Muusaa Gey to Ƴella , Aamadu Ceedel Jallo ummiiɗo to Jowol Worgo , Jaari Kanndee mo Koldaa , Yuunusaa Bah mo Koldaa , Demmba Siisee mo Koldaa , Usmaan Gay to Duungel e Umaar Jaw jeyaaɗo to Kundel .

To leydi Ecoppi ngaska ina toon ko loopal gulngal woni heen ina fatta , kaan ngaska hollirii won'de laral leydi e oon nokku ina sewi , ina huyfiɗi , ɗuum waɗi kaan nkaska hollirde ko woni e nder leydi , ka ɓooyii , kono ɗo e duuɓi miliyoŋaaji garooji maa , nukko o wontu maayo haaɗngo , allaadu Afrik ndu seŋtoo yahra bannge .

Tolli .

Tolno nguleeki : so doolni ko 123 °C so famɗi ko -77°C
Tolno nguleeki e dow ɗaŋre fawii ko e tekkeendi faandu henndu huuriindu e dow mayre , sabu ko faandu ndu dammbata nguleeki ki e dow ɗaŋre he .

Tolno tataɓo : Duɗal keblorgal jannginooɓe ( DKJ ) .

Tolno ɗimmo ko Duɗal Keblorgal jannginooɓe .

Toɓo heewngo nsiyam to Kayhayɗi
Toɓo ngoo heewi ; ngasa Baru ba fof barkini .
Toɓɓe keewɗe njumpaama he heblo ngoo , jaayndiyankooɓe hebletenooɓe ɓee piitiima daaɗe ko yowitii he reportage , waɗde heen ekkorde ngam ƴeewde so tawii jaayndiyankooɓe ɓee paami , haa e nguurndam hakkunde renndooji , ko fotataa wonde heen darnde jaayndiyanke .
Toɓɓe ɗiɗi teeŋtuɗe ( he nder toɓɓe keewɗe goɗɗe ) ine potnoo yeewteede , hono ko faati e peeje potɗe sakkeede e darnde leyɗe winndere ɗee poti daraade ngam deŋde ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo , walla nii ustude ɗum haa waasa yettaade 1 , 5°C , toɓɓannde eɓɓanoonde he Nanondiral Pari he hitaande 2015 , nde piɓondiral Glasgow he hitaande 2021 wiynoo aaɓnotaako yetteede , ngal annduɓe GIEC ( Goomu annduɓe hakkunde dowlaaji ko faati he kilimaa ) hiisii haa hannde en mbaawaa huuɓnude .
Toɓɓere faayiida ɗemngal he nder nehdi ( jaŋde ) , ko toɓɓere duketeende gila nde leyɗeele Afrik , Asii , e Worgo-Amerik ( Amerique du Sud ) gonnooɗe he les njiimaandi koloñaal keɓti ndimaagu mum en dawrugol .
Toɓɓere tataɓere winndannde ndee yaltini , ko hollude wonde " juumtugol jaŋde ine fawii e cuɓagol ɗemngal jaŋde moƴƴal ngal " .
Toɓɓere ɓurnde teskinde noon woni jogaade mago ngoo cuusal joofaade toɓɓe gooreteeɗe ( des sujets taboux ) fuɗɗoraade gila he tiitoonde filma o , e jaɓde renndinde helmere ceerno e helmere dorog he nder yumre konngol wootere .
Toɓɓere ɗimmere jeyanoonde he ngoƴaaji Jokkorde pelle pinal ɗee , ko Ngonka Ɗemɗe ngenndiije nder jaaynirɗe laamu .
Toɓɓere ɗimmere teeŋtunde yaakoranoonde maa mooɓondiral ngal wood ko daɗɗi he mum ko maantini , faati ko he lomtinangol leyɗe pamare doole ɗee caɗeele ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo , ngol nganndu-ɗaa ɓuri saabaade ɗum ko leyɗe mawɗe ɗee .

Tuggi 1980 , Banke moñnjaal ine wirni OMS , tee Banke moñnjaal ɓuri rokkude hoore ko golle heeriiɓe , wonaa laamuuji .
Tuggi 1980 haa 1983 ko musiɗɗo Aamadu Malal Gey joginoo karallaagal ngal , hade men heɓtude ɗum e hitaande 1984 .

Tuggi 2010 haa darorɗe 2012 , ɓuri maantinde ko dille renndo : dille sukaaɓe e sanɗaaji e gollotooɓe e hare politik .
Tuggi 2013 haa jooni , won bayliigu waɗi : Fooyre waawii soodande hoore mum kaɓirɗe ( ordinateer , muulirde , ekn ) , caggal nde waɗti heɓde ballal ummoraade e laamu ( gila 2013 ) hay so tawii noon , ko ɓuri heewde heen ko nde heɓata koo ine yawnii .
Tuggi 6 haa 26 jolal 2022 , hooreeɓe dowlaaji , jaagorɗe , meeruuji , yonaaɓe pelle renndo , ardiiɓe juɓɓule golle ( antampirisaaji ) kawrii to Sharm El-Sheex , to Misra , he Batu Dowlaaji Dentuɗi paatungu he mbayliigaaji ngonka weeyo ( COP 27 ) , kawrital winnderewal mawngal jooɗotoongal hitaande kala ko faati he kilimaa .
Tuggi jeeɗiɗi haa sappo e joy lewru Feebariyee 2023 , Fedde Sifaa Hanki Pinal Hannde waɗii lappol to Khabu e Selibaby ( Diiwaan Gidimaka ) , to Kayhayɗi e Maghaama ( Diiwaan Gorgol ) , to Bahbahɓe e Ɓoggee ( Diiwaan Barakna ) e to Rooso ( Diiwaan Trarza ) ngam hirjinde ko fayti e oorafi gonɗo e nder men biyateeɗo e Farayse Drépanocytose " DEREPANOSITOOS " .

Tuggude 1965 fayde 1967 , ko kanko woni jiiloowo catal Muritani to IFAN e nder wuro Ndar .
Tuggude 2012 haa nder 2015 Aamadu Big Weltaare wuuratnoo ko to leydi Arabi Sawdiyya , kadi o huwtoriima oon fartaŋŋe ngam waɗde hijjoore makko , o wanngiima suudu Kaaba o juuri yanaande Nelaaɗo Allah ( Sallallaahu alayhi wa Sallama ) .
Tuggude e 12w30h haa 14h45h , ko yeewtere Sammba Siree Gorel e Gelongal Fuuta lollirɗo Njaay Saydu Aamadu , caggal nde ɓe lori ɗoon leɗɗe nay .
Tuggude e baaba mum jeytaare leydi ndi hono hamani Joori haa heɓi ko ɓooyaani Mammadu Tannjaa tokkaama yoo tedda paɗe en ɓe cooɗo juuɗe mu’en haa laaɓa e politik keddoo e tuddule mu’en ina ndeena kisal leydi ndi .
Tuggude e hitaande 1961 haa e hitaande 1962 , ko o gardo gollo laamu ( directeur de la Fonction Publique ) .
Tuggude he ñalawma mo Aminata Dikko , Cukko-Hooreejo Waalde Kisal , seedtii e yeeso Goomu Ndeenagu mo Kawtal Leyɗeele , haa jaagorgal Abdullaay Joop takkimo wonnde balloowo jooma en " peeje cuuɗiiɗe " , ko biyaaɗe bonɗe ngoni e huccineede he makko he nder laytiiji renndo ( reseaux Sociaux ) haa addaniimo dogde o suuɗoyi .
Tuggude nde o dañi ɗokkere , o fiɓi fiɓnde makko wonde so woodii haŋkadi o sifortee ko ganndo ɗokko , kono wonaa gaynaako ɗokko , ndeen fiɓnde meeɗaani rostaade hay leƴƴannde haa ɗo o ruttii e joomiiko ɗoo .
Tuggude waktu sappaɓo haa sappo e ɗiɗo ko ɗoon ɓe njoggini , eɓe ngondi e magaafonuuji maɓɓe , eɓe tilloo daaɗe : ndimaagu !

Tummbudu adanndu nduu resndaa ko ko fayti e batte e ƴellitagol ɗemngal Pulaar e ooɗoo sahaa gonaaɗo
Tummbudu ɗiɗaburu nduu halfinaa ko sunnaade no ɗanniyankooɓe men mbaawata wallondirde e remooɓe men haa mo woni fof daña yiytaade heen no haanirta nii caggal nde ndu tonngi caɗeele e ɓure gonɗe e fannu heen fof .

Tutaade leɗɗe ina jeyaa heen .
Tuubaako biyeteeɗo Toteŋ ( " Tautain " ) , hono kalfinaaɗo geɗe politik to Ndar ) , neldi Obri Lekonte ooɗoo telegaraam : " Hoto mbardiree Baydi Kacce ɗeɗɗere , hoto pellee mo , kono taƴee daande makko mbele omo waasa naatde aljanna , mbele kadi , kala ɓe o waɗdunoo junngo e faandu ina ngitta e hakkillaaji mum en wonde so mbarii tuubaako , ma naat aljanna !
Tuubakooɓe , nde tawnoo ina peertani nafooje mum en , nguuranii laamɓe Waalo e Hasaan en , mballitiri ɓe petelaaji , kure e conndi .
Tuubakooɓe ina njenanaa ko Maa el Ayniin fewji ndee feere .
Tuubakooɓe keɓtii Waalo Barak , ngoni ko e raaŋande Fuuta Tooro , mbele ina njettoyoo toon e to maayo Niijeer ( maayo Joliba ) .
Tuubakooɓe njiɗi huutoraade mawɗo " kantoŋ " Teekaan , Njaay Kan .
Tuubakooɓe pilñitii mbiyi ngoo warngo yo ƴiiƴam ron .
Tuufeere ɓurnde famɗude e memtinaari wiyetee ko Mittere ( Atom )
Tuufeere ɓurnde famɗude mahnde ɓalndu huunde wuurnde wiyetee ko ɓinnde ( Cell ) .
Tuugnaade e haalde ɓe goonga , baaba Jeeri yaafii ɓe kamɓi ɗiɗo kala .
Tuugnaade e humpitooji e wiɗtooji keewɗi , tawi won heen ine pacciraa he nder winndannde wiyeteende " La langue maternelle ça compte , la langue locale , clé d’un apprentissage efficace " , ( " Ɗemngal neeniwal ine teskini , ɗemngal nokkuwal woni coktirgal ekko yuumtungo " , tee ɗiin humpitooji e wiɗtooji kala tonngol mum en gootol : jaŋdesukaaɓe ɓuri yuumtude ko he ɗemngal mum en neeniwal .
Tuugnaade e ko yawti ko , nguurndam ina foti woodde to koode , heddii ko mbela ƴoƴre ina toon ?

Tuugnorgal ko hebori golleede e mayri koo , tawa golle ɗee ina toɗɗaa .

USTAARE LEÑOL !
Udditaare amen ko feewti e jokkondire jaltuɗe , wonaa tan jeyaa ko e dawrugol amen , kono timmitinat ɗum e mbaydi ndi gaa mum alaa .
Uddital jumaa Ŋawle waɗii faayiida saɗne .
Uddital ngal waɗii faayiida no feewi sabu yimɓe ɓee ngarii e keewal .
Udditde duɗe Pulaar nder leeɗe wuro ngoo kala e galleeji seerenɓe
Udditde konte ena hokku-maa hakke naatde jaabaade naamne e taƴtaade binndanɗe , tee maa wallu-min rewindaade e jaarde-ma e golle ballitte maa .
Udditgol duɗe jarriborɗe gadane he ɗemɗe ngenndiije ko leeli fof he udditgol ekkolaaji oktoobar 2024 ;
Udditi heblo ngoo ko Hoyreejo HAPA hono Hasan Meddu .
Udditi yeewtere ndee ko gardiiɗo Jokkorde ndee he muddo , hono Hasan Gay , hooreejo APROLAWO , he nder ɗemngal Wolof .

Umaar Al Hajji Maamuudu Bah
Umaar Alasan Jallo
Umaar Alhajji Bah : Caggal cafroowo mo laamu addani min oo , kala ko woni ɗoo ko ɓiɓɓe Siñcaan mbaɗi .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : Eey , nde safrirde ndee udditaa haa gasi , mawɓe safrooɓe arnooɓe ɓee naamndiima dañde ɗoon e wuro hee ŋarwinoowo , deenoowo e gollotooɗo jarlitooɗo .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : Ko adii fof , ena waɗnoo toɓɓe goɗɗe ko wayi no feewnitde duɗe njanngu , waɗde fooraas walla mahde caaleeje jamaa e genaale , kono njuɓɓudi ndii e kuuɓal hawri tan ko e mahgol safrirde ndee .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : Ko adii fof , ko maa ciloyo-ɗen to woɗɗi seeɗa .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : Ko adii fof ko yettude denndaangal banndiraaɓe , woɗɗuɓe e ɓadtiiɓe suusnunooɓe min e wallitnooɓe min e peeje juumtuɗe .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : So woodii , ballal ngal min keɓi e laamu ko e sifaaji tati : - Heptinde safrirde ndee e yantinde nde e doggol cafrirɗe laawɗuɗe diiwaan oo walla e leydi ndii .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : kaɓirɗe gollorɗe ɗee e dimndugol mumen daroyiima e miliyoŋ pawɗo seeɗa e tuugnaade e ɗerewol qiimo ngol cafroowo oo winndi .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : mbiyetee-mi ko Umaar Alhajji Paate Bah .
Umaar Alhajji Bah : mi salmitiima kadi mi ruttorii e maa duwaaw , aan e ardorde jaaynde ndee e denndaangal tampanooɓe leñol ngol gila to ɗemngal maggol , pinal maggol haa to kisal maggol e faggudu maggol .

Usumaan Muusaa Caam
V1 : ko njaaweeki hakkunde ndaɗɗudi e ko yahata ko ( njaaweeki birtagol laana njoordi ka wonan'de dariiɗo e leydi o )
V2 : ko njaaweendi moyloowo e ndeer laana ka wonan'de laana ka .
Ve ngayniri seppo ngo ko wiyde yimɓe ɓe yoo kebano seppo wonngo ɗoo e lewru , walla lebbi ɗiɗi .

WELTAADE E PULAAR
WON KO HAANAANI !
Waajaade fuuntankooɓe nde ɗowtotoo jamirooje safrooɓe ɓee ndokki ɗee ( ɓe mbaasa yiyrude ɗum no ko miijooji laamu nguu ɓe luulndii nguu ) ;
Waaju e Noddaandu ( Da’wa ) Seyku Usmaan fof e wonde haa jooni sanɗa jokkuɗo e yiylaade ganndal e wonde ceerno joom fosinaaji ne , haɗaani ɗum wonde baajotooɗo e noddoowo e nder diine Islaam .
Waalde ( fedde ) Sukaaɓe Daraniiɓe mawninde Finaatawaa he nder Burkina Faso ( Association des Jeunes Promoteurs de Finaatawaa au Burkina Faso ) darnaama gila he lewru Bowte ( Decembre ) 2018 , darni ɗum ko sagataaɓe Fulɓe janngooɓe Duɗal Jaaɓihaaɗtire Joseph Kizerbo to Wagadugu .
Waalde ( fedde ) Sukaaɓe Daraniiɓe mawninde Finaatawaa he nder Burkina yuɓɓinii he nder lewru Silto ( septembre ) 2021 , kampaañ ngam janngingol sukaaɓe pulaar/Fulfulde .
Waali ina foti yettinde Kiliifa Fiyakuuji Ndernderi pillitol ciynugol ngol caggal balɗe jeetati nde ciinugol ngol joofi .
Waalo Barak jeyanoo ko njiimaandi kaananke Jolof .
Waalo Barak ko diiwaan kuufɗo yupporde maayo mawngo ( maayo Senegaal ) e nder geec , bannge hirnaange rewo Senegaal , saraaji Ndar .
Waalo Waalo en e mawɓe mum en fernooɓe , o wiyi ɗum en
Waalo e Shaar Bubba
Waalo jaggiraa ko no mbootu ɗemngal e pinal jolfuɓe , caggal nde leƴƴi koɗnooɗi e diiwaan Njaajaan Njaay , mo Jolfuɓe ummii e mum oo .
Waande fof ena seedtii , kala nanɗo moolo am tawata ko nder
Waandu giddi e ɗoyngol ina wondi e kulol .
Waandu huli , naamnii ko ɗum woni .
Waandu jokki laawol kañum e laacel mum gurmel .
Waandu naamnii sehil mum ko kewi .
Waandu saay- saay oo ko noon waɗiri .
Waandu weltii no feewi , yani e lekki mango , fuɗɗi ñaamde heen .
Waandu wiꞌi o haalaani goonga , oon ko gaño mum tan .
Waandu wiꞌi ñaalalpural mi feewnitiima e maa .
Waandu wullii ha tampi kono haɗaani bileejo oo taƴde laaci kii .
Waasataa tawa won wuro ganni worgankeewo jogorngo kadi suɓeede ngam waɗteede e juɓɓinanteeɗe kooli .
Waasde waade no yimɓe ɓee .
Waawdemo ruttaade he ngal ɗoo pinal ɓooyngal , ngal iwdi mum ene askitinee gila e pinal misra ɓooyma , mahtoo ɗum e mbaydi yahdundi e jamaanu tawa kadi hanki oo hay huunde heen faataaki he mum , ko ɗuum addani Baaba Maal won’de naalaŋke mo hiiɗɗataa , haastetaake .
Waaye yaakaar nanu ni , beeste bii ëmb na ñakk làyam , ndax li war ñi ci caytu gi ak àttekat yi , moo war jàngalekat ak fajkat bi ak ñepp ñee liggéey ci nguur gi .
Wabside weliyan masin
Wadd : mi yaha ?
Wadde en paami won'de Okte gooto ko haɓɓere bituuji jeetati , so ordinateer ina hiisoo wonaa bit gooto huutortoo maa ɓur ɗoon kay , etee ko laawol gootol , way tan kono lefol ngol gaaraaji jeetati heen gootol fo ina yottina 0 walla 1 , so ordinateer heɓii ndeen haɓɓere tonngooɗe golla nde laawol gootol .
Wadde ena waɗi daawe ɗiɗi ɓurɗe teskinde e lewru nduu ,
Wadde enen njayaɗen ko e dental koode moolanangal ina wiyee Lillungal Fedannde Malaaɗo , ngal way ko no mbeɗu ni , ngal waɗi calti no koyɗe yaradel ni , ko e gootol e calti he seto-naange lommbi .
Wadde hol ko njiɗɗen ?
Wadde hol to Yero Siila , Mammadu Njaay ( Iniwersitee mo Ndakaaru ) , Ibirahiima Moktaar Saar , Saajo Bah , pelle Senegaal , Muritani , Gine , Maali , Burkinaa , Sera-lewon , Gaana , Niger , Nigeriyaa , ekn , ngoni ?
Wadde ina gasa ko fay arde ƴoƴre neɗɗo siiɓee e ngaandi loowee e robo , kala ko wonnoo e hoore he jiinte e hoore robo he tawa hay so robo o naamndaama no wiyetee innitortoo ko neɗɗo mbo ngaandi ciiɓaandi ndi , ɗeɓata waade tan ko no ittude neɗɗo teew e ƴiiyam watta mbo jamɗe e ɓakdi ngoɗndi , ɗuum noon so laatiima maa wonan neɗɗo nafoore to bannge juutde balɗe haa ɗeɓa wonan'de mbo nguurndam haa cay , teeŋti noon so tawii o loowaama e wilela ( avatar ) .
Wadde janngo , Aaɓnde 29 Koorka foti tijjeede lewru ena faañana juulɓe
Wadde jombaani tawa Oroppa ina waɗi kulle ndiyam , ko waawi heen won'de fo ma en nganndu , ko woni yeeso daɗaani gite .
Wadde kala ko poɗɗen wadde e moƴƴere hannde hoto pawen ɗum e janngo kala ko mbaawɗen wadde hannde e moƴƴere hoto mbiyen haa janngo sibu janngo koy junngo Alla woni .
Wadde ko maa ɗee geɗe tawee , de timtimol waawa laataade , naange , waadere ndiyam e jiyɗe ( gite men ) , timtimol heewi yaltude tan ko subaka haa beetawe , walla kikiiɗe hakkunde takkosaan e futuro , waɗi noon ko oon sahaa lewndu welata hetude haa timtimol feeña heen , carfe naange ɗe njanata e baade ndiyam ɗe ko ina nguurii seeɗa , ɗuum waɗi timtimol arataa naange-e-hoore .
Wadde ngaan saanga ganndal maɓɓe wirnitaaki e ngonka Ngaawe e nder ngo tageefo mooɓngo geɗe ɓurɗe Ngaawe mawnude to woɗɗi , ko maa annduɓe njookti ngonka men e nde lowre faaɗnde hakkunde leydi e asamaan , ɓe ƴeewtindi ɓe cunni , ɓe tawi ndeka tageefo alaa ɗo haaɗi , tawde Ngaawe ina famɗiri won'de wuddu huunde nde alaa ɗo haaɗi , ala-e-sago ƴeewte , ɓe tawi ndeka Ngaawe jeyaa ko yuɓɓo ngo Naage jogi , etee ina famɗi so waɗdaama e Naange e yoga e ɗaŋe ɗe nge rewnii .
Wadde noon , mi werloo laaɓndal ngalɗoo : Mate njiimaadi waɗii jotondiral tigi-rigi ?
Wadde oon tuma lewru nduu yiyotaako .
Wadde tawde en mballaaka fotannoobe wallude bee ko waratbe .
Wadde tonngirɗe limoore woodat tan ɗo kaaɗi , to fulɓe ko joy , to tuubakooɓe ko sappo , to leƴƴi goɗɗi won tan ɗo haaɗnaa .
Wadde wono way kon waraango nih , jogii ko kuccam ngootam ruttii alaa , etee alaa ko mbaawɗen heen , haa ooɗoo sahaa kam en ngalaa feere no nduttoriɗen e ko yawti , kono tan en cakkii peeje no ɓetirɗen ɗum , gila ko ɓooyi yimɓe tuugnii ko e naange ngam ɓetde wono , jamma e ñalawma renndinaa woni ñalngu timmungu , ñalɗi limaa haa timmi jeeɗiɗi kaaɗnaa ɗoon wiyaa yontere , ñalawma fo hettanaa innde , ɓaawo ɗuum yimɓe kuccani ko ɓuri oon dumunna juutde , ɓe ƴeewi ɓe tawi lewru ne ina gasa ɓetiree wono , so dariima haa maayi wiyee lewru timmii , hitaande ne ko maa ndunngu arta nde timma , wiyee kaari heɓii duuɓi nanngam , ɗuum ko heen fawii .
Wadde ɗum holliri won'de won ko woni e weeeyo ngo ko nisi haa ngo naɗɗiɗi , tawde anndaaka wiya ɓakdi ɓaleeri .
Waddu ko jimoowo pekaan kadi .
Waktu jonɗo kala e rajooji kaalen .
Waktu puɗal e mutal naange fawii ko e nokku gonaaɗo e dow leydi , ɗuum noon nokku kala ina anndaa nde wirnatoo naange walla nde yiyata naange , nde wonnoo ɗaŋre men Ngaawe ( woni leydi ndi ) ko ko murliɗi , naange mutataa wirnoto tan , ko jirlagol Ngaawe addanta jamma e ñalawma lomtondirde .
Waktuuji joyi e feccere njonii .
Waktuuji tati ina hakkunde men ɗoo he Muritani e Kataar .
Waleer Some hollitii nder jeewte keewɗe , o heɓtinii he soofaaji yimɓe tato .
Waliyu tiiɗaani ɗo nelaaɗo waali
Walla gite maɓɓe muɓɓaama .
Walla kadi hay sinno aɗam yoni to batte keeweendi majjam , ɗam wonndaani e semmbe waawde yettinde suukara e nder terɗe ɓanndu .
Walla no njuumri haa ɓura .
Walla so tawii ko njuɓɓudi wonnoo walla fedde , pusgol mum ko adii nde lajal gollugol leydi ndii joofata ;
Walla tottiranooɗo leydi ndii e muuda kañum e hoore mum , ko aldaa e waawnere , hollitta yaafiima tottirgol ngol , winnda tottirnooɗo leydi oo .
Wallaahi , Sammba ko neɗɗo juumtuɗo , ko ngalu tiiɗngu .
Wallaahi ko a gorko hannde a nattii wonde Almuudo ngay , a wontii Cerno ngay
Wallaay almuudo ngay , ko a saaysaaye !
Wallahi nezo fof jogii ko kartal mum tan .
Walletaake e baagal .
Wallifo jaŋde firti ko wallifo tuugiingo e tuugnorgal njanngiin , waɗiraango huuɓnande jannginooɓe e janngooɓe he duɗe fedde ndee defte janngirɗe .
Wallifo ngoo waɗi ko fannuuji ɗiɗi : " wallifo jaŋde " e " wallifo wellitaango " .
Wallifo wellitaango , kala jiɗɗo winnda : gila e fedde haa e teelɗuɓe , ko wallifo ngo fedde waawi wagginde , walla ngo woɗɓe mbeletee mbinnda , gila e defte daartol , ganndal leydi , dewal , ndema , hiisiwal , ɓalliwal , coñce , ñeeñe ekn .
Wallitde mbele denndaangal ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee ina ngona ɗemɗe laawɗinaaɗe , ɗemɗe jaŋde , ɗemɗe gollorteeɗe , ɗemɗe ɓamtaare nder renndo ;
Wallitde rewɓe ɓe e kaɓirɗe e jawɗeele ɗe ngollorii .
Wallitde tigi rigi mbele jam e deeyre ina wona e renndo hee ngam ko ummanaa koo waawa jaaƴoyaade .
Wallitde to bannge ngalu rewɓe gollotooɓe te dowri golle njeñu
Wallitooɓe Aseri en ( Aserbayijaan ) : ko idii fof ko Turki sabu jiidigal to bannge diine ( ko juulɓe ) .
Wannda Sykes , jalniiɗo mo hoore colel cumi ŋorñel , koɗo Obama gadanol e galle daneejo , buleet kadi ko hikka woni hikka noppi , fuɗɗori ko ŋurɓitde Obama e jikku mum harlindirde juuɗe e becce , ngam wiyde Obama : " alaa fof ko cuuɗataa sabu mi soklaani yiyde enɗi ɓernde ma " .
Wannda sykes wanndiima haa loŋi Rush Limmboo nde oo wiynoo ina ñaagii Bajjo gooto nde laamu Obama toobata , Wannda won ko jaabii : o ñaagiima nde ɓooƴe Rush Limmboo ñoofotoo Yoo won mbo ɗum nanngi mbo wonaa miin sabu alaa jiɗɗo humpitaade ɓooƴel ɗokkel : Mobutu Seseko waddii e Munkarun e Nakiirun cuuɗo cuuɗongel nde o humpitinoo .
Wanndu ɓamti ŋamiri mum .
Wanngorde e nder banngorɗe
Wanngorde ko hello yiilirngo e ndeer geese , eɗe keewi , FireFox ko heen jeyaa , ko goonga woni muuya majje ko huuɓtidin'de winndere , kono ko huunde nde weeɓaani , enen kam FireFox yottiima men e ballal Ceerno Ibraahiima Saar ,

Wasiya yo jaaynooɓe ɓee njuɓɓu ;
Wasiya yo jaaynooɓe ɓeydu heblo mum en ;
Wasiyaaji : So tawii faamaamuya am oo ko goonga , Fedde ndee , renndo ngoo haa e janngooɓe ɓee ina poti sowde semmbeeji mumen , mbele nde waɗta yaltude kala yontere .
Wattan nguurndam koode mawɗe cowtooɗe Naange laabi 8 walla 10 ko wontude ruulde mawnde yaajnde sabu ɗe pettat ɗe cara yoga e geɗe gonɗe majje haa piya ruulde mawnde , ko heddi ko hamondira no aaludere ni to ɓernde hoodere to , haa famɗita tolnoo e kilometruuji capanɗe goɗɗuɗe seeɗa tawa kadi ina waayi mooɓde heen ko foti no Naange .
Wayi tan no jimoowo oo heewi wiyde nii " Kosam rufa gila fenndaaki , walla ƴiiwoonde saaya gila duule ndentaani " .
Wayli constitution leydi ndi mbele ina daña jooɗaade e jappeere haa buutufal wutta , caggal nde manndaa mum ɗimmo huuɓi .
Wayliwal : kuutorgal kesal tafgol molekile
Wayliwal : rokkaa Nobel wayliwal ko ameriknaaɓe ɗiɗo Carolyn Bertozzi e Karl Barry Sharpless e danemarkenaajo Morten Peter Meldal sabu mum en ƴellitde ganndal wayliwal , njaajni ɗum he faanuuji kesi .
Waylo-weeyo ko batte banngagol Leydi e naange , e wuuraade guurtol jirlol ( axe de rotation ) mayri rewo-worgowol fotde 23° e dow dingiral tagopeeje ( plan écliptique ) , wonan'de gonɗo e Leydi naange ina ummoo rewo feccita peccol roondoo worgo , heen bannge kala ko maa yottoo ceɓɓetol ( rewo walla worgo ) nde arta , nge waɗata ɗuum ko e ndeer hitaande .
Waylo-weeyooji ( saisons )
Waylo-weeyooji Leydi e ndeer hitaande ko nay ( Ndunngu , ceeɗu , dabbunde e demminaare ) , ko way noon ina to Mars kono yuɓɓaani no ɗo nih , sabu banngagol mayre e naange ina lookliɗi ( excentrique ) no feewi .
Waylo-weeyooji ɗi ko ni njahrata
Waylowaylooji weeyo ina mbaawi sabobinde ɗeeɗoo ƴiiwoole keewɗe ndiyam , en nganndaa ko aroyta , eɗen poti reentaade nokkuuji ilatnooɗi , hoɗde heen tawa wonaa e yamiroore harralleeɓe koɗki fotaani wonde .
Waylude Diiso Toowngo Ñaawoore , njuɓɓudi kalfinaandi horo e toɗɗagol e pawgol kuuge dow sarɗooɓe , tawa wonata heen ko sarɗooɓe toppitiiɓe ñaawde ( magistrats du siège ) e sarɗooɓe toppitiiɓe tabitingol sariya ( magistrats du parquet ) kam e hoohooɓe hattanɓe ɓe ngonaa sarɗooɓe , tawa toɗɗii ɗum en ko hoohooɓe jaambureeɓe , tawa noon ina wondi e sarɗi , so suudu sarɗi jaɓde ɓe .
Waylude hakilantaagal jaŋde ronaande he kalifaandi , nde alaa ko heblata so wonaa foksineeruuji ɗi ngalaa ko mbaawi feewnude , ɗi alaa ko pentata .
Waylude kaan ngonka , e ɓe kuli , way ko no helde suudu mbuɓɓutu ni .
Waylude loowdi jaŋde ndee haa yahda e soklaaji leydi ndii to bannge faggudu e ƴellitaare .
Waylude tippudi nehdi e jaŋde , woɗɗitina ndi politik , mbele ekkol Muritani ina wona ekkol ñiɓiiɗo e nokku mum to bannge renndo e faggudu e pinal .
Waɗa sahaa kadi ɗum weñcitoo ,
Waɗaa ko to Nuwaasoot , ñalnde 21 suwee 2018Muhammed wul Abdel AsiisMawɗo jaagorɗe : Yahyaa wul HademiinJaagorgal Ñaawoore : Muktaar Malal Jah
Waɗaa ko ɗoo e Nuwaasoot ñalnde 5 suwee 1983 .
Waɗanee so hawrii e goodal .
Waɗani mo tergal kesal ngal ko doktoreeɓe gollotooɓe e opitaal gooto to Pari ( Farayse ) , ina wiyee ( AP-HP ) .
Waɗata naange ummoraade fuɗnaange roondoo hirnaange ko jirlagol Leydi e hoyre mum , ɗuum woni yiiloo banngoo mbo ndi timminta e nder jamɗe 23 hojomaaji 56 e majanɗe 4 ( 23h 56mn 04 s ) , ɗuum woni ñalawma kuurɗo e dow ɗaŋre men , tawde noon ko bannge gooto tan ndi worwitortoo , naange ne ko noon tan waawata yahrude , ummoo fuɗnaange roondoo hirnaange haa wirnoo .
Waɗde , ko adii nde dewgal ene humee , yoo ɓe mbaɗ nebbiso ƴiiƴam maɓɓe , ngam ƴeewde so ɓe ngondaani e rafi oo .
Waɗde Muritaninaaɓe wonde caggal leydi ina paayi hannde , sibu ɓe ngalaano caɗeele e nder leyɗe Afrik ɗo ɓe ngonnoo ɗoo .
Waɗde Pulaar Ɗamngal Afriyankewal , janngirteengal ka duɗe , haray no labaa sanne , miɗi wltori wonndude Alkuke latin , on jaaraama , yo Allah laatin .
Waɗde Pulaar/Fulfulde Ɗemngal Afrik Winndereyeewal
Waɗde daawe nguurndam Fooyre ine peccoo e daawe ɗiɗi maantinɗe : – daawal gadanal : 1980-1989 ; – daawal ɗimmal : 2006 – 2021
Waɗde duɗe gaggaaji , tawi njanngintee ko Pulaar
Waɗde eɗen mbaawi wiyde ko mbaydi demokaraasi kesiri woni e hebleede , kadi maa taƴondire hakkunde leyɗeele aduyankeeje goɗɗe mbaɗ .
Waɗde feere haa ɓe nimsa ;
Waɗde feere mbele gollodiiɓe leydi men kala e nder winndere ndee , ina naatna e sarɗiiji dokkugol balle mum en " keɓgol njeñtudi tabitndi , ɓetotoondi nder hare baɗe njiyaagu " , natta haaɗnude ɗii sarɗiiji e ɓamgol kuule ɓole , ɗe ngandu-ɗaa tabitintaake boom .
Waɗde fulɓe mbiyi : " So go’oo bonii , limoore aayiima " .
Waɗde kay , eɗen poti tiiɗnaade .
Waɗde ko ɓuri ko hoolkisanoo he dow Leydi koo : ɗuum waɗaama nde elikopter-yel ngel diwi laawol mum tataɓol ndee .
Waɗde njahden na waawi mi heɓa toon ko moƴƴi e am .
Waɗde noon ma en laaɓndo hol ko saabii ko waɗanoo ko yaahaani kadi goɗɗum ko waynoon ene tafee ?
Waɗde noon yilliiɓe wonɓe Tuunus ina ngoɗɗi waawde " lomtaade " ɓesngu Tuunus , helmere nde añamngureeɓe kuutortoo to leyɗe Orop haa arti he Farayse .
Waɗde o safrotaako , o raaɓataa
Waɗde reende ndiyam ɗam ina waɗɗi moni kala .
Waɗde so en njiɗii wula , en nfdokkat defoowo fartaŋŋe dañde ko wulniri .
Waɗde so en paami , caggal nde Senegaal tawi naɓaka ( Cinema ) mum ɓamtaaki noon fof , ene yiɗi wallude magooji-doge mum .
Waɗde so tawii en ngumkinaaki , en paaɗkinaaki , en muumɗikinaaki , en majjikinaaki , en mbemjikinaaki , wonaa kumpa men , wonde ko enen tekki ndoondii caɗeele men .
Waɗde wiɗto jaambureewo , yaajngo , e nder leydi hee kala , ngam ɓetde ɗo njiyaagu tolnii e renndo hee , e anndude sifaa baɗe goɗɗe gabbitiiɗe heen .
Waɗde wiɗto yowitiingo e jeyal leydi nokku oo e renndooji catiiɗi ɗum e dow gardagol taƴɓe sañ nokku oo e wallondirde e jaagorgal laamu to bannge kaalis ko yowitii e geɗe karallagal e kaɓirɗe .
Waɗde yannge jeyaa ko he sunna dewgal ngam konngol nulaaɗo Alla ( JKM ) wiynoo , tuma nde Abdarahmaan bun Awfi resi : " waɗ yannge hay so dammuwol gootol .
Waɗi baagal Kasini liɓeede e ɗaŋre Galliire ko mbela lebbi ɗaŋre ɗi ina kisa , sabu baagal ngal ina gasa tawa na nawori mikrobaaji ummiiɗi e Ngaawe , so tawii ngal yanii e wooturu e lebbi Galliire en ndaaɓat nduun lewru , ndu waɗa mikrobaaji ɗi njeyaaka toon
Waɗi en limtude ɓee fof ko oon dumunna kinɗe ɗee mbaylaaki .
Waɗi heewɓe waasde faamde golle maɓɓe noon , ko wonaa laamu tan ɓe ñiŋata so bonnii , walla ɓe mantata so moƴƴinii .
Waɗi jokkondiral ngal ko Bookara Aamadu Bah
Waɗi jokkondiral ngal ko Gelongal Fuuta , lollirɗo Njaay Saydu Aamadu
Waɗi konu fayde e maa , yo a yaltu e tata ka Fuuta mahan maa
Waɗi mi haalde ndii cuuɗiindi ( oo awra ) ko daňde en weeɓoore ( fartaŋŋe ) janngitde e duɗal gootal tawi njooɗodaaka ko ɗuum waɗi kala ko jannginta – janngin’de ummini ɗum so binndi mum so nate mum ina foti waaweede addeede e kelle ronndo ngo moƳƳore , mbaasen tonngaade e ko aduna o fot tonngitii ko .
Waɗi noon , ko wiyde ine jannginiri cukalel jahrowel ɗoo ( he duuɓi 4 ) he ɗemngal ngal wonaa ɗemngal mum neeniwal , alaa ko firti .
Waɗi noon ko " huunde fof ko ko yowitii e goɗɗum ɗum " : so a wiyii " huunde ine doga " , ƴeewdu-ɗaa ɗum ko e " goɗɗum " .
Waɗi noon ko dumunnaaji ɗi ngonaa gooti , wono jolɗo e laana o ɓuri leelde , o heddii e cukaaguu .
Waɗi nyalawma nyalawma , ko naange , ngela buuɗel ngel cooynotoɗaa ena wojja subaka e kikiiɗe kiirɗo .
Waɗi saha gooto haayre kay-haytoore ummii weeyo , denkii e leydi , jaynge saaki , mboorkaaji puccitii , cuurki ruuyi , asamaan ɓawli kurum , duuɓi limiti-limtinɗi naange yiyetaake , maaje laawi mbaɗi bempeƴƴe mawɗe , ina paaydee e ƴiiwoole cooynam .
Waɗi sahaa gooto , mboɗo lelii haa nder jamma , daande moolo
Waɗi ɓe neldude faandu to lullnde to ko ngam jarribaade no wayata so seŋaama e lulnde he , mbela ina hattani faddaade keletine kaaƴe guubatooɗe e nder weeyo , tawa so ɗe njanii e suudu wuttaandu ndu , fustaa ndu , mbela kadi e ndu hattani faddaade ciiñsiiñƴe naange lorlooje mbela hoɗɓe e mayru ina kisa , e geɗe goɗɗe potɗe hawran'de hoɗooɓe heen .
Waɗii duuɓi jooni ko yimɓe mbaawi yoɓrude cogguuli mum en rewrude e internet , woni tawa a tottiraani kaalis junngo maa .
Waɗii faayida sanne .
Waɗii faayide e nafoore mawnde .
Waɗii faayide sanne !
Waɗii faayiida sanne , ellee ko ko hooynantenoo , foti ko hocceede , teddinee , hormee , gollee haa ɓura ɗoo ŋarɗude .
Waɗii heewɓe kam kalkaama .
Waɗii sahaa gooto , o wiyi Jibriil " aan kam , to Hawaa woni , kanko kam omo wuuri walla ko o maayɗo ?
Waɗii sahaa gooto debbo e joom galle mum ina nguurdi .
Waɗiino jamanuuji , hedde 1987 , diɗɗal sanɗaaji janngatnooɗi e duɗe Qur’aana ceertuɗe , sukaaɓe rentuɓe njiidi miijo , kawriti e yiɗde rentude , caggal won ko njanngi , wooda ko ngummanii .
Waɗiino sahaa gooto Saarel ine heɗotonoo njaru , sara ŋoral daande maayo .
Waɗiino sahaa gooto he 2019-2020 , taƴooɓe ene kippotonoo he dame lowe ( sites web ) kompañeeji Ameriknaaɓe , kaɗa joom mum en naatde .
Waɗiino ñalawma gooto Bojel yahi ngesa baaba Jeeri ina wujja .
Waɗiɓe innirde baagal ngal Wojere kaaƴe , ɓe ndeeni ko ganni maɓɓe , so oɗon teski ɓaleeri ngonndi e lewru , ndi won e men mbi ko ''fatiilan'' winndaa ɗoon , kamɓe ko wojere ɓe nji'i , eɓe njoganii nde tinndol .
Waɗtannde e daaɗe mawɗe ɗe oolel mum dillintinoo hanki deeƴal laddeeji men , nattii .
Waɗtu Ruttorde Ganndal ndee e ɗemngal maa ngam wallude en haa wallitorde Firefox ɓeydoo huuɓde !
Waɗtude boyli e foorasuuji no kuutorɗe denndaaɗe nii , ndee feere kadi ƴoogaa ko sariya lislam e nder laawol Maalik sabu ngool laawol yamiri ko kala ko yowitii e diƴƴe , leɗɗe joorɗe e durnirɗe ko huunde fotnde renndeede .
Waɗtude mo taamakuru roondo-kaake ina saɗti tigi
Weetii , worɓe e rewɓe ina ñaantoo , Saada girbii tuuba mum , ɓoornii , fof yowii !
Weetii weetaani won ko heddii e jamma .
Weetndoogo 15 marsa 1908 , Aali e yahdiiɓe mum njettii jipporde koloñaal Daŋana .
Weetndoogo laaɓngo noon , tawata ko niɓɓere yahii haa laaɓi , yimɓe mbaɗtii sooynaade to woɗɗi , tawa naange suwaa fuɗe .
Weetndoogo ƴoƴngo , ko nde fuɗnaange ɓuri yaynaade , ciiñsiiñƴi naange puɗɗii heltaade faade leydi , kono tan laaɓtindaade ko woɗɗi weeɓataa sabu niɓɓere .
Weeyo !
Weeyo alaa dow walla les , ko neɗɗo woowi ko , ɗuum ina adda jiilol .
Weeyo boowal Leydi ɗaataani .
Weeyo boowal leydi ko nokkuure nde alaa henndu , heewnde ko lorata , gila e ciiñsiiñƴe naange bonɗe haa e ŋakkere pooɗal ( sulɗaane ) , ɗuum waɗi lulaade toon naamndii ko karallaagal ceeɓngal , ɗeɓata waade kono hoɗde e nder ndiyam nih , seerndi ɗum tan ko ndiyam yiylotoo ko siyde naata nder hoɗorde he , to weeyo noon ko henndu tigi yiylotoo ɗo rewi haa heɓa boowal , ɗuum noon ala e sago ndu haɗee yaltude so ɗuum alaa ko maayde yaawnde hulɓiniinde wonan'de neɗɗo sabu wonaa roŋkude foofde tan warata mbo , alaa , o silkitto haa o hawra , sabu ndiyam ngonɗam e ɓanndu ɗam ruuyat fasa suurka haa laaɓa .
Weeyo deeƴaani , ko dille mawɗe ngoni heen , kala hoodere ina woni e yahdu e njaaweeki mawki , tagofeere men ( Leydi ) waɗnde leyɗeele e maaje , keneeli e duleeɗi kulɓiniiɗi , woni ko e dogdu tallu mbir-mbir , soppoo-joloo .
Weeyo e wono
Weeyo e wono pettidi laawol gootol , weeyo jokki ɗiirtaade e yaajde , wono jokki yahde
Weeyo fergo ngoo e koɗoygol makko to Tummbere Jiinge ena jokkondiri e kewkewe dawriyankooje baɗnooɗe e nokku hee e hitaande 1890 .
Weeyo fuɗɗii ko dow laral henndu muurngal leydi ngal , ngaal laral ko woni ?
Weeyo ina waɗi Gudde ƁALEEJE , kannjene ɓawliniɗe ko majjere neɗɗo , kala ko ɓadiiɗe daɗataa ko ndeer fay !
Weeyo ina yaaji kadi ina heewi ko moofti e ngaluuji ( kaŋŋeeji e kaaƴe dime .
Weeyo ina ɗiirto no dalli nih , ina ooño , sabu ko ɓuri lewndu yaawde woodaani , wonaa heɓotaako alaa !
Weeyo ko boowal jaajngal , ngal alaa dow , ngal alaa les , alaa hirnaange saka fuɗnaange , rewo walla worgo !
Weeyo ko boowal puɗɗingal gila duuɓi miliyaaruuji 13 pawɗi seeɗa , ngal fuɗɗodii ko e wono ( temps ) , ɗuum joopii ko ngal woodaano hade ndeen !
Weeyo woni tan ko e ɓeydaade yaajde , no faandu wuttateendu henndu , annduɓe mbi'i maa ɗiirtagol ngol yah haa fusa kala ko woodi e ndeer winndere !
Wejirdu tataɓuru nduu fayti ko e fitiram-gollaagu .
Wejo ngoo jeyanoo ko he porogaraam mo Toronto Nuit Blanche 2016 Art Festival yuɓɓinnoo .
Wejo ngoo waylii kallu biyeteeɗo Hegarman street he nder wuro Toronto , Kanada , waɗti ɗum maayo ngo 10 , 000 deftere ɗe rokkunooɓe ɗum en Salvation Army ( fedde walloore miskineeɓe ) .
Wejo ngoo waɗi ko e nokkuuji tati : 1 .
Wela metta ko ñaam-golluuje maa njaŋti maa .
Welsindaade ɗemɗe Afriknaaje haa
Weltaare Ibraahiim mawni henn sanne .
Weltaare am ko , ko uurngol piindi kooli cardon e leñolngol , YO GENO juudnu balde mon moyina battande mon , OO hada añbe sagooji-mumen e mon kam e kala biy biyoowo mbiimi ya barke kosam jinnabe men .
Weltaare e joɗnde ndee e njettoor feewde e Fedde ndee sabu miijaade ndee joɗnde ;
Weltaare e naamnat
Weltaare e teddungal e duwaawu feewde e ardiiɓe jaaynde ndee kam e Fedde ndee , sibu " Fooyre wonii duɗal , humpitii , findinii " .
Weltaare fulɓe e makko
Werlaaji 19 e tututaaji 9 lomtiiɗi dimaaɗi seɓɓe haŋki njoofi
Werlaaji maɓɓe mbaɗata ko biife 12 , mbela ɗanngal maɓɓe e dow lewru weeɓa , newo , ɓe mbaawa wiɗtude ngaluuji gonɗi e dow lewru e aastaade ɗi , ndiyam ɗam kam ko penndiɗam , nokku ɗo ɗam tawatee ɗo wulnetee haa ɗam suurka , masiŋaaji ɓama cuurki ki ndeelɗina ki haa wonta ndiyam .
Wertaango Merkiir ko gasɓalle e jolloɓɓe mawɗe , ɗeen ko batte kaaƴe moolanaaɗe jannooɗe e dow tagofeere he e ko yawti , wertaango ngo ina ɗeɓa waade no ngo Lewru nih .
Wertaango Ɗiiña ko gasɗe ɓole batte joɓɓi kaaƴe mawɗe jannooɗe e mayre , tawa ɗe ummii ko weeyo .

Winii Manndelaa , jom suudu Nelson Manndelaa sankiima ñalnde altine 2 abriil 2018 .
Winii jibinaa ko e hitaande 1936 to wuro wooto e nder diiwaan Transkei nder Afrik worgo .
Winii kadi ina wellitii to bannge miijo , o wonaano neɗɗo deftotooɗo miijooji ɗi o wondaani .

Winndere ina yaaji sanne , kono hakkille ina reerɗi , so wiyaama winndre fuɗɗi ko duuɓi 13 miliyaar e huunde caggal nde fettande mawnde waɗi , tawa kadi huunde kala ko heen ummii , hay wono ( temps ) , hakkille kam haaɗaani ɗoon , sabu maa naamno ko adii ɗuum ne no waano , ko woodnoo ?
Winndere ko faawru daartol
Winndere men ine moofi hannde ko ine ɓura 13 000 njogitaari nikleyeer keblaaɗi , mbaawndi werleede he nder winndere men .
Winndi ooɗoo dokimaa ko hoohooɓe e jagge sooninkooɓe , tawi faltaaki jeyaaɓe e pelle politik gonduɗe e laamu walla e luulndo , jiiduɓe miijooji ko faati e ɗawre leñol mum en ɗawaa ndee .

Winnditde sukaaɓe tuggi duuɓi 6 haa waɗooɓe tolno 6 jaŋde lesre .
Winnditorde ( imprimante )
Winnditorde 3D ko masiŋ tafoowo geɗe ɗe kuutortoɗen e nguurndam men , jamɗe otooji , pijirkon sukaaɓe , telefoŋaaji , faayiida haala ka huunde kala , en njawti jamaanu sehde huunde haa waya no njiɗirɗen nih , jooni ko yuppirde seeɗa-seeɗa haa timma no yiɗiraa nih .
Winnditorde 3D walla boom TAFIRDE : ndiiɗoo mbaadi fo ɓuri haawnaade e baanjitooje , sabu ko nde tafoore mahoore ñeemtinoore kala ko woode , so yiɗi tawa ko jamɗe feewira walla boom teewu !
Winnditorde laser : ko sereendu laser ( un rayon laser ) toɓɓatee e ɗerewol , conndi ngummbudi yuppee heen kala ɗo sereendu ndu rewnoo conndi ndi ɗakkoo ɗoo , wulnee ndi taaya ndi yoorda noon e dow ɗerewol he , ko ndeen ɓuri waawde huutoreede hannde e ndeer gollorɗe , kadi ko kayre ɓuri yaawde e yuɓɓude ko winndata , refti heen , mbaadiiji binndi fo e ɗemɗe kala ina yuppa , hay nate e geɗe goɗɗe in mbaawi jiinteede e ɗereeji .
Winnditorde nde meselle : kañum woni taanum binnditorɗe fo , ko meselle 9 haa 32 ( looci jamɗe ) waɗi , heen meselal fo so tappiima e lefol ɓaleyol ina heeda ɗe e ɗerewol he , battina toɓɓere famarde e dow ɗerewol he , ko koon toɓɓon ndentata timmina alkulal .
Winnditorde sirƴoore ngommbudi ( imprimante à jet d'encre ) : kayre nde siryat ngommbudi e dow ɗerewol ngam yuppude binndi e nate , ina huutoree no feewi hannde .
Winndooɓe , ena ngoodi hay wittooɓe yimooɓe , fof eɗen jogii Haalooɓe e daarooɓe fof ena tawee 'emen' kono ellee so en ndendinii fof nanatee tan koto gootel .
Winndude e ndee toɓɓere , walla naatde e ngal damal , wonaa huunde weeɓnde nde alaa pergitte e giye , sabu ɓooygol , e wonde ɗum kadi geɗal renndoyankewal ngal pulaagu tan heertoraaki .

Wolde Afganistaan ( 2001-2021 )
Wolde Afganistaan , tuggi oktoobar e noowammbar 2001 , ko hakkunde Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ( DDA ) e ballal konuyankeewal Haɓɓere Rewo ( Alliance du Nord ) e leyɗe hirnaange goɗɗe ( Laamaandi Ndentundi , Farayse , Kanadaa ekn ) , bannge , e laamu talibaan en bannge goɗɗo oo .
Wolde kippuur , wolde misilaaji
Wolde mawnde ummiima hakkunde Riisi , bannge , e leyɗe Hirnaange ( Orop e Dental Dowlaaji Amerik ) , bannge goɗɗo oo .
Wolde sompoor Foor Podoor wufti e gardagol kapiteen Federba caggal hare hakkunde makko e fuutankooɓe .

Won e annduɓe ɓurani ɗum en ko yoo yimɓe koɗne e ɗaŋe ko way no Lewru walla Mbaañ , ɗuum ko ngam dañde wertaango yaajngo mbela baylirɗe ( usines ) ina mbaawa waɗeede toon , haa ɓe mballitoroo ñiiɓde e ɗiin nokkuuji ko juuti tawa ɓe ngalaa haaju e rutanaade leydi .
Won e awooɓe malinaaɓe daakiiɓe to Weendu Maraysa he nder ngalluure Ligisayba Gorgol Muritani waɗtuɓe waɗde awo bonngo , fotngo ƴeewteede .
Won e moɗe njaltata ko e mabbugol koode cuwiiɗe naange laabi 20 haa 25 mawneeki , ɗeen mbiyetee ko yir-koode , ina woodi kadi moɗe moolanaaɗe goɗɗe cowotooɗe naange laabi miliyaaruuji , kono no ɗe ngardi anndaaka taw , ina waawi kadi tawa moɗon ina keddii e weeyo he tawa ko njiƴƴukon e tago winndere .
Won fotndunooɓe ɗee koode ina poti woodde e weeyo ngo tawi ko wiɗto maɓɓe e hiisawal holliriɓe hono noon hade maɓɓe yiyde ɗe ŋaas hitaande 1967 , ina jeyaa e ɓeen annduɓe Wikii e Baad hitaande 1933 , jaŋde maɓɓe e wiɗto maɓɓe holliriiɓe won'de koode korŋooje ina poti woodde e weeyo he , ɗe puɗɗi sifeede ko laaɓti ko 1939 tawa ɗe njiyaaka taw , kono ganndal kam yaltinii sifaa majje .
Won fotnduɓe heen wuro fo wayata kono faandu werbiɓndu jirlatoondu , waɗata ndu yirlaade ko haa yimɓe mbaawa daraade e nder mayru , kadi ko joɗɗinaa fo waawa deeƴde , ko jirlol ngol addanta geɗe gonɗe e wuro ɗe waasde dalƴude caroo ( yeru lottundu so haayre lommbaama e mayru ndu yirlaama , nde ɓoccitaako so wonaa nde heen ceɓal woppaa ) , daarorgal mawngal ɓommbal rentina ciiñsiiñƴe naange ɗo gootel ngam heɓde yakawere ( énergie ) .
Won haaliyaŋke gooto wiyatnoo " so neɗɗo yontaama ena foti naamnditaade hoore mum naamnde ɗiɗi
Won heen miijiiɓe seŋde ngaandi neɗɗo e robooji , neɗɗanka-njamndanka .
Won kadi annduɓe wiyɓe yaama ɗaŋe ɗe ndirta ɗo ngoni ɗo ɓeydoo woɗɗitaade naange so wonii e fetaade , kono ɓuri sikkeede kam ko ɗe pirtoto .
Won ko foti haaleede e jaŋde ko heewi ko wonaa wutte , kono kam mbiɗo yooɗni ndee yiyannde ɗuum ko konnguɗi gooto e jannginooɓe ɓee .
Won ko haawnii , Muritani heerondiri ko e tuddule jihaadiyankooɓe no Maali nii , ina wiyee kadi yoga e soldateeɓe Aqmi ( jeyaaɓe e senngo Moktaar bel Moktaar lollirɗo Ɗokko ) njeyaa ko e Muritani .
Won ko neɗɗo nanata e gaaci Demmba Njaay ko nanataa ñalnde kala : ko duƴƴo woŋngo jirwuɗo , dillinoowo sukaaɓe , laawa mawɓe !
Won ko ɗuum firti
Won lannda ngoɗka ka kaayitaaji mum keɓtanoo haa wayi no nattat woodde , caggal ɗum , kaayitaaji ɗii ngartiraa .
Won magiyanke gooto wonnoo leydi Italie ina wiyee Polisinel .
Won nawdooɓe mo e Albert Einstein e Isaac Newton , kono won wiyɓe kadi hono Einstein weeɓaani dañtude .
Won nii galleeji kadi perɗi e Ɓunndu , payi nokkuuji goɗɗi .
Won sikkuɓe kadi ko leyɗeele Amerik wɗata ko waynoon tawa yiɗaa yimɓe nganndanaɗum hay dara , sabu ko e kaɓirɗe jeyaa , waɗi ɓeen wi'ide noon , kala ɗo ɗum meeɗi yi'eede heewi ko ɗoon-e-ɗoon konu ara taaroo nokku o , haɗa heewɓe yottaade .
Won sooynotooɓe lewru cikka ko daarorgal , walla mbeɗu .
Won teskiiɓe kadi wonde won ɗiin partiiji ɓalliiɗi laamu , ko wayi no UDP e KARAMA ekn .
Won waraaɓe ubbaa , ɓe hay gooto tinaani , alla kadi e maayɓe ɓe heewde , ko heewi tinaaka , limaaka , yiyaaka .
Won weendu yiytaa to soɓɓunde worgo leydi , nduun weendu fawii e dow mayru ko penndiɗam ( glace ) fotde kilometruuji 4 tekkeendi , ndu wiyetee ko Wostok ( Vostok ) , lewndu ( annoore ) naange waawaa yottaade ndu , ko niɓɓere e ndiyam e ɓitteende doolnude woni e weendu he , ɗuum fo e waade noon kulle ina nguuri toon .
Won wiynooɓe kadi ko hono ngoon jarribo kaɓirgal yerɓo leydi ( arme sismique ) saabinoo yerɓannde leydi to Siisuwan ( Siin ) .
Won wiyɓe alaa , neɗɗo sahaa e sahaa fof ina taftee ( tagtee ) ina wonta goɗɗum .

Won wiyɓe pulaar wiyata suukara ko " suukara " tan .

Won wonirdi ( montoor ) woni Amerik ndi waɗtatee e waktu ko duuɓi miliyoŋaaji 100 caggal nde ndi dogi , etee ndi faljata ko hojom gooto ( 1 seconde ) caggal ɗii duuɓi fof .

Won yahruɓe yeeso no feewi to bannge yiɗde moƴƴinde gondigal , jurmondiral , moƴƴondiral hakkunde aadee en .
Won yuurniiɓe mbelemma aduna , kono naataani .
Won ɗiin fannuuji eggugol jeyi feewde e juuɗe goɗɗe , ɗi huunde e mum en limtaa e nder sariyaaji jeyi leydi , alaa e sago mbinnditee .
Won'di tan ko fooyre nde wonataa yaajnde kadi nde doolnaani no potooji nih !
Won'di tan ko maa woode huutoriiɓe ngaal ganndal ngam tabitin'de won e mbaadiiji aadee e dow goɗɗi , ko wayno suɓo ngummbudi ndiyam gite e mbaadi sukndu !

Wonande caggal jaŋde lesre

Wonande lowe 1 , 4 , 5 et 8 , ko famɗi fof ina poti waɗde etasuuji 5 , jiidaa e mahdi les ndi ( woni R+5 ko famɗi fof ) ;

Wonande ngolɗoo laawol , haala ngañgu firti ko kala haala peeñcu ngijotooka walla ƴattotooka , njalkitoowa , walla mbonnitoowa goomu sabu leñol mum , goobu nguru ɓalndu mum , iwdi leñol mum walla ngenndaagu mum , sabu si’i walla njogoram mum .
Wonande ooɗoo sariya , paltoor firti ko kala ceerungal , joñgol , ɓittugol walla ɓurnangol paandingol walla ngol faandaare mum waawi wonde firtude , walla bonnude , walla reɗɗude keɓtingol , walla naftoragol hakkeeji aadee e wellitaare worworde , nder potal , tuugnaade e sariya .
Wonande pelle pinal ɗee , laawɗingol ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof firti tawo ko
Wonande sagataaɓe heewɓe harbiyankooɓe sirŋiniiɓe , nguun njillu laatiima waadere ɓurtunde , jaɓɓogol hooreejo leydi Farayse ko tooñannge ( ceknorogol ) tigi .
Wonande soninkooɓe , no ɓe ɗawraa nii ɗooftaaki hay doosɗe ɗe mbinndaaka dottooje geɗal kala leñol heewi rokkeede e nder juɓɓule pinal e faggudu e dipolomaasi e koninkaagu e ñaawoore .
Wonande teskittooɓe defte gadane gummotonooɗe Ejipt ko wayi no " Sammba e Kummba " ; e defte Celluka Pulaar , keewɗe heen omo jeyaa e winnduɓe ɗum en , won heen nii ko kanko waɗi ngardinaaji mum en , e sahtooji mum en .
Wonande toɓɓere adannde ndee , hono darnde laaɓtunde waawnoore leyɗe mawɗe ɗee ƴettude kuule teeŋtuɗe to bannge deŋgol ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo , ko ɓuri heewde e tawtoraaɓe joɗnde ndee ine njawi no feewi ko yahraa heen yeeso , tee e miijo maɓɓe , alaa kuule laaɓtuɗe ƴettaa ngam ɗuum .
Wonande toɓɓere ɗimmere ndee , caggal coppule keewɗe , e dirtingol uddugol joɗnde ndee ñalawma no woorunoo , nanondiral dañaama ngam sosde booñ lomtinangol " bonanndeeji e baasal keɓtingal " ɗi ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo saabotoo he leyɗe parwuɗe .
Wonande toɗɗagol jooɗantooɓe leydi men to leyɗe goɗɗe , teskaade mbaadi leƴƴi-leƴƴinndi leydi men Muritani .
Wonande ɓe ngalaa RTS1 , ena waawi jaggeede e lowe keewɗe : ABACAST - SUNUKER - CRIDEM - Saydu Bah , hooreejo KJPFOɗon ñaagaa nde tintinton ɓadiiɓe on sabu wona neɗɗo kala tinata ko wayi noon .
Wonande ɓe nganndaa no tigilde jiɓtirtee , miɗo waɗi ɗoo widewoo
Wonande ɓe paamaani , nokku o hucciti ko e Afarko , juutiri bannge hirnaange haa yettii jehre kapitaal .
Wonannde Fenner , en mbaawaa daɗde ndeeɗoo fodoore : mbaaw-ɗen tan ko leeltinde huunde nde woorotaako .
Wonannde jiknaaɓe sukaaɓe ɓee , " hujja laamu nguu ko hujja puuyɗo , mo nannaaki , sibu aɓe mbaawnoo dañande ɗum feere , ɓe mbaasa taƴde goddi ɓeeɗoo sukaaɓe jooɗtoriiɓe ngalɗoo ɗanngal ngal koyɗatnoo ko ina wona lebbi nay .
Wonanoo ko he maayirɗe hitaande 1905 .
Wonde gacce kuwgal ngal renndo fawatnoo e gaaƴiiɗo , ngam artirde ɗum e laawol tawa fitina ummaaki , e haɗde jaɓɓugol keerol renndo gaddanoowol joom mum ustaare to bannge neɗɗankaagal e renndo mum , saabinooma hedditinde neɗɗo e renndo mum e hormaade keeri e waawde wuurdeede e reende pinal mum , haɗde nguyka , fenaande , taƴ-enɗamaagal e warhoyreeji nder galle , nder cuuɗi haa e nder leydi diwta nii keeri , jibinoya fitinaaji kittuɗi safrude .

Woni Iwdi Pulaagu ko Saydu Feƴoor ( Soyako ) jibinaaɗo to wuro men Fuuta-Tooro ena wiyee Fanay , diiwaan Podoor .
Woni bone oo ko Orop waawaa hillaneede , wonaa to baɗte neɗɗaagu , wonaa to baɗte diinaagu .
Woni e nokku taariiɗo yitere ndee ko duule mawɗe ( kaaƴe ) ɗe tooweeki mum waawi yettaade 12 haa 15 km .
Woni faandaare Mars One ko neldude yimɓe to mbaañ ɓeen ngonana aadee en aawdi e dow ndeen tagofeere woɗeere , kono nde feere seeraani e loskeede e ñiŋeede , tawa kadi ñiŋooje ɗe ko celluɗe ɓaggiiɗe e ɗo tiiɗi .
Woni faandaare feewnude ɗi cuuɗi guttaaɗi ko ngam janngo e jam so tawii neɗɗo yaaɓanii hoɗde to weeyo , walla lewru haa to Mbaañ ( Mars ) ni , ina waawa huutoraade ɗi cuuɗi , hoɗa e majji , ɗi kisna mbo kala ko ina lora mbo , kadi ko cuuɗi keblaaɗi haa gasi alaa ko heddotoo so wonaa wutteede ɗi petoo , ɗi ndaroo , ɗuum ɓuri wiyde ina mahira suudu jamngel jamngel , tuufeere tuufere to weeyo , haa nde gasi fo .
Woni faandaare ngol lappol ko anndude no Ɗiiña tagira , wertaango mum , geɗe mum ndernderiije , faandu mum henndu kadi wiɗtude saayaande pooɗal ( champs magnétique ) mum , ɗum fof ko haa ɗaŋe ñoosiiɗe e Naange mbaawa humpiteede ko ɓuri laaɓtude .
Woni faandaare ɓetde wono e ndi mbaadi ceeɓndi ko mbela wona tuugnorgal kaɓirɗe cokluɗe ɗuum , hannde mboni kala ina waawi anndude ɗo woni e dow leydi , gila GPS ari huunde kala ina waawi joopeede ɗo woni so waɗii juumre ne ɓurataa hedde meeteer , waɗi noon ko bey-weeyɗe ( satellites ) GPS fof ngon'di ko e gonirɗe ( horloge ) sahaa fo ko maa ngaaltee ɗe mbaɗtee e tuugnorgal he so ɗuum alaa so GPS toɗɗiima huunde ɗo foti won'de maa en taw huunde nde ina woɗɗi ɗo toɗɗaa ɗo kilometruuji keewɗi , ɗuum noon feewataa , addanta gonirɗe ( horloges ) bey-weeyɗe ɗe woppude tuugnorgal ( woppude waktu ) ko njaaweeki ndi ɗe njahata e dow weeyo ki ɗiirtata wono haa seerta e tuugnorgal ngal .
Woni ko miijo pelle pinal cakkitnoo ngam moƴƴitingol eɓɓaande sariya ndee , nde neldaa to Diiso Jaŋde Ngenndi ( CNE )
Woni sabaabu winndude mo ndee ɗo deftere , Ceerno Aamadu Sammaba Demmbele wiyi en : " Ko ngam rokkude denndaangal jannguɓe pulaar fartaŋŋe janngirde ngal gannde goɗɗe e alɗin’de humpito maɓɓe to bannge gannde tabitinteeɗe .
Woni sirlu ɓuuɓol walla nguleeki wiimtatooki e ɗiin masiŋaaji ko henndu ( gaas ) ina dummba e nder guccurol ( tuyau ) , nduun henndu wiyetee ko fereyon ( fréon ) , adatoo heɓɓaade ndu ko pompre ( pompe ) siiɓoondu dammpa ndu nde guccrol ndeelol ( condenseur ) , nde wonnoo ndu dummbete toon e ɓitto saɗtungo ( haute pression ) ndu rentat haa ndu wonta ndeelam ( liquide ) , gontugol mayru ndeelam waɗata-ndu wiimtaade nguleeki , so oɗon teskii caggal frigooji koko wulata , ɗuum ko batte nattugol fereyon won'de henndu wonta ndeelam .
Woni ɓinnde fooɓre ko ɓinnde waawnde wiltude haa jibina ɓinɗe goɗɗe ɗe njiidaa mbaadi , no paamirton teewu , heeñere , ƴiyal e raɗo , ɗee geɗe foo ina tawee e neɗɗo yantude e won e kulle , kono nde tago fuɗɗutoo e ndeer reedu ɗii eddaaji fo ngalaa , woodi ko aawdi ina wiyee ɓinnde-fooɓre ko biltogol ndeen ɓinnde addata ko timminta tagoore ko , terɗe , ƴiiƴam , ngaandi , ƴiye e denndaangal ko woni e neɗɗo ( walla kulle ) .
Woni ɗoo ko huunde e taƴe cuɓtaaɗe he winndannde eɓɓaande sariya kuccam , hollitaande Diiso Toowngo Jaŋde ( HCE walla mbiyen CNE ) he lewru sulyee 2022 .

Wudduwol Kepler-186f ɓuri ngol Leydi seeɗa , etee ina waɗi kammu ( atmosphère ) baawɗo tammbaade ndiyam e mbaadi ndeelam .

Yah ɗoo ngam ɓeydude humpito
Yah-ngartaa jokki hakkunde Senegaal e Farayse haa nii e nder leyɗeele goɗɗe , haa .
Yahdiiɓe makko politigi teskiima e makko yiɗde leydi makko , semmbinnde dental ɓiɓɓe leydi kala e daranaade tooñaaɓe e ñoolaaɓe e ɗawaaɓe e jojjanɗi mum en .
Yahdiiɓe maɓɓe heddiiɓe ɓee ngoppitaama .
Yahdu naange : ko batte yiiloo-banngoo Leydi tan , nji'en a nge fuɗa , nge seeka kammu , nge muta natten nge yiide tawa ng wirni men tan ,
Yahdude e heesndaade rewɓe dowri e darnde mum en e ɗaɓɓugol kaayitaaji seedamfaaguuji jeygol leydi ;
Yahiino nih haa wallitooɓe , joom’en kopporeeje ɓee njogii sikkitaare wonde laamu Senegaal waawataa darnude doosgal kaɗtowal njelaari ndii ender mbeddaaji ɗii .

Yaltata ko to Big Weltaare TV
Yaltii e yeewtere Ɗalhata Bun Abdellaahi wonde gorko gooto naamndii Annabi ( JKM ) , o wiyi " eehey maa nelaaɗo Alla , habru am ko Alla farlini e dow am to bannge koorka ?
Yamiroore Kiliifa fiyakuuji ndernderi ;
Yanaande makko nana sara Gaani , nder falnde Teekaan , to Tararsa .
Yankinaare : Neɗɗo yo dinko , Alla jiimta e mum ;
Yanti heen " ɓe kaali ko e inɗe maɓɓe e nder nafoore maɓɓe , ɓe njamiraani hay gooto , yo won yimɓe walla pelle ngenndiyankooje walla adunankooje haalde e inɗe maɓɓe " .
Yanti heen , ene moƴƴi , so ko wayi nii arii , njoñen lure men , ƴeewen ko nafata en koo .
Yanti heen , galaŋuuji takketeeɗi ɗii , alaa boom ko nafata joomum en , so wonaa ma a taw , hollitde wonde laamu ina tini ɗum en .
Yanti heen , heewɓe ngoongɗini ko " laamu nguu gollortoo ko sawru gumɗo ; ngu anndaa ko ɓuri hatojineede e ko waawi fanndaade : yeru mum ko Abdel Asiis ƴettii fotde 15 miliyaar ugiyya ngam sosde gure ɗe koɗaaka e nder ladde tuulaa heelaa ; tee oon kaalis ina yonatnoo e feewnude wuro Nuwaasoot " .
Yanti heen , jom en kaɓirɗe ɓe ANAIR gollondirta ɓe njaɓataa diisnondirde e naftortooɓe ɓe .
Yanti heen , maa mbiyaa ɗemɗe winndere ɗee kala , kelme kuutortoo ngam joopaade " suukara " ɗee kala njiidi ɗaɗol .
Yanti heen , mo anndaano pinal diiwaan oo fof maa anndu , sabu wejooji , seppooji e kiirɗeeli pine juɓɓinaaɗi toon .
Yanti heen ala e sago kammu ( atmosphère ) kala heen ɗaŋre anndanee mbela ina waɗi Oksijen , Ajot e gaasuuji goɗɗi keblooji nguurndam , wiɗtude ɗuum saɗtaani nde wonnoo naange nge ko woɗeere nde wulaani sanne , yide mbeelu ɗaŋe ɗe e mayre saɗtaani , e nder mbeelu he noon geɗe kaalaaɗe ɗe mbiɗtatee nganndanee .
Yanti heen feewinraa ko geɗe ɗe ɓalndu nefataa , wondi tan ko maa o sinnde korwe kuɓɓam , ko kanje nawata ɓernde nde , kono eɗe njuuti balɗe .
Yanti heen kadi , ndeen hinnde njuɓɓudi laamu lawakeere wonti hinnde njuɓɓudi laamu koninkaagu ngaadanteeri caggal kuudetaa 1978 e denndaangal daawal ngal konu laamii ngal , rewrude e silsil nanondiraaɗo e nder goomuuji koninkaagu dartingol , caggal ɗum goomuuji kisal ngenndi , hade mum wontude hinnde njuɓɓudi reenooɓe ngaadanteeri caggal cosgol BASEP .
Yanti heen kadi o ñaagiima njaatige makko nde eerotoo Alhajji Sellu Daleen Jallo e Pr Alfaa Konnde , ɓe mbaɗda jooɗnde wo'tere o waajoo ɓe , kadi ɓe mbajondira e koye maɓɓe mbele fitina ina waasa waɗde ñalnde 19 Septaamburu 2010 .
Yanti heen tampere e faaɗeende , sabu alaa fo ko jogii teddeendi toon , huunde kala hoytat haa weeya !

Yeewtere " HIIRDE "

Yeewtere yoo jokku
Yeewtere ɓennata ko alet kala sahnga waktuuji 19 e Farayse ( waktuuji 17h to afrik e waktuuji 13 to Niiw-Noorko ) .
Yeewtini ngo noon ko mo woni fof waɗde e ɓernde mum wuurdi ko e banndum en .
Yeewtiyaŋke oo adii tawo joofaade ko firo jaŋde , firo renndo hade makko mutde e dummbugol nafoore jaŋde e nder renndo e uddirde yeewtere ndee wasiyaaji .
Yeeyeede walla rokkireede neɗɗo jeyaaɗo e leydi hee walla jogiiɗo neɗɗaagu keeriingu ( fedde walla sosiyetee ) sarɗaandu e Moritani so tawii kay kanko tottiranooɗo luɓal e mudda oo , o gollinooma e leydi hee ko ina waawi qiimeede ko feccere ko o fotnoo waɗde heen fawaade elajal duuɓi joy no siforaa e kuulal 57 gonngal dow ngal .

Yerbannde : secousse
Yero Dooro Jallo yiyi aduna ko e nokku biyeteeɗo Beyi Lugge , e nder falnde Magaama , diiwaan Gorgol Muritani .

Yero arti e ngenndi mum Senegaal ko e hitaande 1981 .
Yero e miñum njettiima jooni sara weendu mawndu , hay gooto waawaa nande sabu ŋaakaali paaɓi .
Yero waawataa yiiloyaade Jarga tawo sabu toɓo muusngo ngoo .
Yero ƴeɓti konngol , weltanii Saalif kam e joom suudu mum Diboor .
Yero'en njettii ɗo ndu woni e yarde ɗoo tan ndu dogi , ndu naati e ladde .
Yeroba ngappu felo woroore timmunde ko ñaagunde Bajjo gooto nde kala ceemeeɗo garɗo e yonta mum ñaagotoo , kono kadi fendere ko duwaaw jaabaaɗo kala sagata .

Yeru goɗɗo , so en ndaarii Lewru jamma , cikkatten ko ndu takkiindu e asamaan walla ko ndu seŋiindu heen .
Yeru goɗɗo , so neɗɗo jolii e laana ndiyam haa woɗɗoyii e nder geec , haa nattii yiyde ŋore geec ɗee , asamaan wayata e gite makko koko ñippii e ndiyam hakkunde makko e ŋore geec ɗee nii , o sikkata asamaan o ko ko hippii e dow makko banngeeji ɗii fof ( bannge-yoo-bannge ) no horde hippirta cofel nii .
Yeru goɗɗo kadi : naange ngee leernirta tagopeeje ɗee e lewru nduu ( walla lebbi ɗii ) ko nii : no neɗɗo wonirta ootoo bannge e huɓeere nii , poosa fooyre ( poosa " lammpa " ) e neɗɗo goɗɗo gonnɗo dow huɓeere ; oogaay bannge e nder mbeelu huɓeere ndee , neɗɗo tataɓo ena heen darii , o yiyataa lammpa kaa , kono omo yiya neɗɗo gonɗo dow huɓeere ndee .

Yeru jooni , so en ƴettii nguura men : wiɗtooji ganndal baɗaaɗi kala ine kollita wonde keew-guurɗiwal ine moƴƴi he nguura .
Yeru mo ƴeftuno-ɗen adan oo , nde kaalaten hakkunde gonɗo dow huɓeere e gonɗo les mbildi , ko fayti e lampa kaa , ɗuum ko dow leydi gon-ɗen .
Yeru nayaɓo oo fayti ko e kooli baɗeteeɗi e gure ganniyankooje , ɗe kew-kewe keewɗe kewi e mumen e sahaaji ɓennuɗi .
Yeru so en ƴettii defterdu Mamma Haydara , woni ndu kaal ɗen joom mum , Abdel Kader Haydara , dow too ndu , ene tawee heen deftere Quraana winndaande gila he teemedannde 12ɓre , taw winnda ko he laral ( parchemin ) nguru liingu ; ene winndiraa ngummbudi bulaari jalbundi ene ñakkaa ( wisaa ) conndi kaŋŋe .

Yeru sottilo ( clonage ) walla ñemmbude kulle guurɗe ko ganndal kesal , jarribaama haa yiyaa , kono won miijotooɓe sottilde neɗɗo no woorunoo , mbela ɗuum ina moƴƴi e aadee ?
Yeru tataɓo oo ko , ko waɗii sahaa , ene woodnoo fedde yimiyankooɓe , kono ko yimooɓe e ɗemngal ngal laamu amen suɓii yo won laawɗinaangal .

Yiiloo banngoo ko dillere nde leydi waɗata e waktuuji 24 , ɗuum firti ko e ndeer oon saha ndi timminta yirlande wootere , huunde walla nukko kala e leydi arta ɗo tolnino .
