Yillo faawru nate
Yimiyanke o : Omo lollirnoo lefol ngol o adinoo fiilde e duuɓi 1970 .
Yimiyankooɓe mawɓe to bannge jaarooje Nelaaɗo mo jam e kisal ngoni e mum wayɓe no Mammadu Buubu Jallo , Manaama Joop , Alasan Waddu to Joomanndu e Muusaa Joop e reenɓe quraana e ñaawooje mum wayɓe no Abdarahmaani Gasamme , Aamadu Usmaan Kebe e Alhajji Ceerno Muktaar Alhajji tami hiirde ndee e juuɗe haa ngoriiji njoggi , fajiri feeri .
Yimooɓe njimii sahre Hammee Moyya Farba e Faakuru Tannjaa ceerno ceɗɗo galammbo , " debboo weddinooma baagal mum he jehreende .
Yimre dawaaɗi raddo
Yimɓe ceeraani e yi'ide kaawisaaji e ooɗoo aduna , teeŋti noon , ko yi'etee anndaaka to ɗo ummi , won heen ni foseteeɓe wontana ɗumen caɗeele haa mbaasa heen hakkillaaji mumen ,
Yimɓe cikkan-nooɓe wonde bonɗo hannde wona moƴƴo janngo , alaa ko foti weeɓde alaa ko foti kadi newaade .
Yimɓe eggunooɓe galleeji mum en , ina njokki e lulnde nde yaawataa arteede .
Yimɓe fof ina ceedii leydi Tuunus woni ko he iiñcuru mawndu , teeŋti to bannge faggudu e to renndo e to dawrugol .
Yimɓe fof ina nganndi hannde oo , Debi ina heewi tawo nafoore : hannde so Debi yahii , baafal Caad udditaniima seɓɓitiiɓe , ko diiwaan Saahal oo fof udditantoo seɓɓitiiɓe e jihaadiyaankooɓe .
Yimɓe fof ina nganndi wonde boofɗugol Faatel ngol haɗaani mo gollude Golle ɗee lollinii lekkolaaji ɗiɗi ɗii .
Yimɓe fof ina nganndi yaafuya e beldital mbaawaa dañeede ko idii nde won ɗeen geɗe ndañantee jaabawol , geɗe ɗe ñawndaaka haa hannde e Muritani .
Yimɓe fof tinii wonde nguleeki ɓurtuki kii eggii .
Yimɓe heewnooɓe , wiyde maayɗo fof darnga mun dariima maayɗo fof yooliima majjii maayii .
Yimɓe heewɓe kaalii he nder batu waɗanoongu .
Yimɓe heewɓe ndarii e hirjinde ɓiyɓe leñol ngol yoo calo fecceede e sareede , nde tawnoo alaa ko waawi faameede he ndee ɗoo feere so wonaa ko miijiɓe ɗum ndee , fayndaare mum en ko ustude leñol Fulɓe e held edoole mum en .
Yimɓe heewɓe nootiima e batu hee , haa arti noon e yontannde hannde , haawaaɓe , ɓe nganndaano no enɗam mum en wayi yaajde e nder leñol goɗngol ngol , hakkunde fulɓe e safalɓe .
Yimɓe heewɓe ɓamii konnguɗi , gila e wallifiyanke o , Ali Ben Kamara , e juɓɓinɗo kawrital ngal o Aysatu Bah , yimɓe galle makko , tawtoranaaɓe laamu nguu e annduɓe mawɓe ko wayno Mawɗo Bonataa Jeŋ , kanum en fof ceedtiima ko heewi he Alhajji Ibraahiima Kaba Bah .
Yimɓe ina nganndi tan , jotondiral hakkunde Amerik e Wenusuela ( Vénuzuela ) welaani , gila Kolommbi jaɓi jaɓɓaade konu Amerik e leydi mum .
Yimɓe ine ɓeydoo ñalnde kala yeneneede faayiida keewal ɗemɗe e pine he nder renndo , haa teeŋti noon e sahaa ɗo pine e ɗemɗe kulanaaɗe majjude ɓeydotoo heewde ñalnde kala .
Yimɓe kala njaɓii wonde plaŋ oo ina yooɗi no feewi .
Yimɓe kumpitaaki no feewi " COP " goɗɗi paatuɗi he taariindi .
Yimɓe luutndiiɓe ndeen feere ɓe ene njeertina wonnde kulhuli mum en ko wonnde fayndaare laamu nguu wonaa wallude ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee kono ko yiɗde ɓeydaade nuskude ɓaleeɓe leydi ndii ɓe ngannduɗaa ko he ɗemngal Farayse njanngata kadi ko heen ndañi seedanfaaguuji mum en .
Yimɓe mawɓe ngarii e kewu nguu ko wayi no Ammbasadeer Afrik Worgo , seto ardorde Dowlaaji Dentuɗi , joom-suudu Ammbasadeer Gana , cukko Meer Tafarak Seyna , gardiiɗo Farankofoni catal Muritani , koroowo jaŋde lesre Falnde El Miina Nuwaasot hono Mohammedu Paate Jallo , Jah Abdarahmaani e wayɓe no Alasan Saar en , ekn .
Yimɓe nattuɓe tinde maale usto ŋakkeende suukara nder ɓalndu
Yimɓe noogaas ndaaɓaama toon kono hay gooto nanaaka waasii henn fottaandu mum .
Yimɓe sikkan-nooɓe nguurdam mum’en kam wonaa haŋki wonaa hannde fuɗɗii , kadi wonaa nih hay janngo gasata .
Yimɓe wiynooɓe wiyaɗnooɓe .
Yimɓe wuro Daŋana fof ndenndinaa yo ngar njiima e teŋre Aali
Yimɓe wuro Njamena puɗɗii hulde , ngoni e renndinde ñaamdu , e egguude tiindoo bannge worgo haa nder Kameruun .
Yimɓe wuro ngoo fof piɓii anniya wallude ɓe haa ɓe ngegga Sappoor pompiyee'en njetti ko subka law .
Yimɓe wuro ngoo ngaani no feewi .
Yimɓe yenana-nooɓe yimɓe jaggirnooɓe , mayde kam ko nan nanti tan enen fof ken arɓe ko goonga , kono jooni jooni hay gooto e men wonaa jahoowo .
Yimɓe Ɓe ceera-taano e wiyde so leewru koorka dariima .
Yimɓe ɓe deenataa no moƴƴi tolno suukara nder ƴiiƴam mum
Yimɓe ɓe fof e weltaade e yettude Allah ko remooɓe e julankooɓe ɓe ɓuri hamdinaade , ngati hay gooto e maɓɓe anndaa to jogori yeeyoyde coñal mum e oon sahaa .
Yimɓe ɓe jabet mum en waawni ( jibini ñawu ngoɗngu ) .
Yimɓe ɓe suukara heewi ŋakkunde e ƴiiƴam mum en , walla/e ɓe
Yimɓe ɓe tanaa oo waawi heɓde ko ɓeeɗoo
Yimɓe ɓee kalakaawa ganndal makko to bannge safaara .
Yimɓe ɓee ɓamii naatde gila beetawe baggo .
Yimɓe ɗiɗo .
Yimɓe-ɓee kay kala no keɓi e maa koɓe njiiyloto-noo , ɓe njejji-tiima .
Yitere JWST ɓuri yitere Hubble seeɓde cowe 6 , hakke no yitere nde way seeɓde e nde hattani yiyde ko foti no mbuubu ñaaku e dow lewru .
Yitere ngaari .
Yitere satelit MSL ina tiimi mars dow , ko kañum halfinaa ƴeewtaade boli ɗi ngam yiilaade ɗo ɓuri ɗaatde , baagal deegowal ngal waawa rewde heen haa yottoo e dow jam , kuccam maggal ooɗoo saha ko nokku KMS-9 , kono ngal hebori joofoyde ko les haayre mawnde 5500 meeteer tooweendi ina wiye Sharp walla Seeɓnde so en piri konngol ngol , faandaare nde ko ŋabbin'de baagal ngal e powle les-lese ɗe , toppitiiɓe kiriyoositi ɓe njogii ko funeere baagal ngal ɗo e leydi , eɓe njarriboo funeere nde e nokkuuji gabbiɗi e mbaadi leydi kuccam kiriyoositi ndi , ɓe mbaawa anndude caɗeele keborɗe heɓeede ɓe cafraɗe .
Yiyannde am e " ñamaande leñol "
Yiyannde woɗnde nde , mboɗo sikki Alhajji Njaay wiyataa e nder Senegal fof alaa pullo baawɗo huccitde e mikiroo haala ko heɗiyankooɓe ɓe paamata .
Yiyde Ɗiiña e ndoogu weeɓaani , waɗi noon ko ñoosagol mayre naange , kala jiilatooɗo nde , ko mutirde walla puɗirɗe naange ƴeewata nde , ko nde koodel pamarel ɓadingel naange no feewi , ko saanga caggal futuro seeɗa nde feeñata hirnaange , waɗa sahaa nde huroyoo nde waɗta yiyeede weetndoogo hade naange fuɗde , nde arataa e hakkunde jamma fes .

Yoga e Hal pulaar en ngannda Demmba , owaaDi ko jikkumako , ngam so mbi mbiimi allah wurtiiDum eko wuurta ko , ko ni tan wayata .
Yoga e aadaaji maɓɓe ɗi paggiti ɗen eɗen njogitii ko diine Allah tawa ko huunde reɓnde haa naati he diine he kono wonaa heen jeyanoo sabu ko ɗoon diine o tawi ɗum .
Yoga e alluwon ine kuutoree jooni ngam yeeɓde filmuuji ɗo neɗɗo welaa kala nder galle .
Yoga e binndanɗe mako hannde nana piraa ene mbaɗtaa he ɗemɗe Oropnaaje haa teeŋti he Engele .
Yoga e caɗeele binndol Pulaar he informatik ñawndaama ko ɓooyi , haa teeŋti nde denndaangal maaɗe binndirɗe Pulaar/Fulfulde naati he Alluwal Unicode he kitaale 2000 .
Yoga e ko Ceerno Boy to Woodoɓere winndunoo e jime , ko kanko lollini ɗum en e aduna he .
Yoga e koode walla denndaagal koode cooynotoɗen ko naangeeji ɓoli , etee won e majje dewniiɗe ɗaŋe no naange men nge nih , no ɗe ɓurondiriri mawneeki nih ko noon ɗe mbaadi to nguleeki , won e majje ɓurɗe naange wulde no feewi , won kadi e majje jaasɗe naange nguleeki , won e majje ɓurɗe naange jalbude won e majje kadi ko boɗeeje ,
Yoga e maɓɓe teeŋtinii jojjugol gootiɗingol kelmeendi kuutorteendi
Yoga e men hannde kuutortoo ko lahal njamndi ( parabole ) ngam heɓde teleeji keewɗi , ɗuum newotanooko so ɗee geɗe tawaaka
Yoga e teddiniranooɓe gollordu nduu ƴettii konnguɗi ngam yettude Fonadh e gardiiɗo ɗum , ko wayi no gardiiɗo gollondiral e Espaañ , nulaaɗo dental oropnaaɓe ( U .
Yoga he jimɗi : Naalaŋkooɓe heewɓe ƴoogata ko he dingiral .
Yoga heen hannde ina mbayi no mbay-mi nii .
Yolnde bettunde e nder darnde makko politik : 1966
Yolnde hakkunde Ɗiiña e Naange ko miliyoŋaaji 60 kilomeeteer , enen hakkunde men e Naange ko 150 miliyoŋ kilomeeteer , ɗum noon wadde baagal ngal tawde ko Ɗiiña fay ina foti waawde muñde nguleeki caɗtuki ko ina ɓura 300°C teeŋti noon alluuje maggal kuɓɓam ɓameteɗam e Naange , ɗeen kam maa nguleeki majje tolno 400°C , kono kaɓirɗe gollotooɗe e maggal ɗe mbaawi gollaade tan ko e nguleeki tolniiki hakkunde 0 e 40°C , ɗeen caɗeele fo ndañanaama peeje keelɗuɗe .
Yolnde nde baagal ngal hebori yahde nde , ina sowoo laabi 38 yolnde hakkunde men e ɗo ngal huccani to , hay ɗuum ne ko nde ɗaŋre Ɗiiña lusoyi caggal Naange , kono ma ngal yirlo Naange fotde laabi 18 hade ngal yaaɓan'de Ɗiiña ngal heddo e weeyaango mayre ngam fuɗɗaade wiɗto .
Yonaaɓe gure jeyaaɗe e komin Wul Birom Oolo oolooga e Daarel Barka e Ajuweer ndiinnii ñalnde alkamiisa 22 ut 2013 damal biro perfee Ɓoggee ngam salaade dokkal 31 000 ha ngal laamu rokki soyitee Sawuudnaajo gooto biyeteeɗo Al Rajihi .

Yonteende tagofeere Mars fawii ko he dalillaaji keewɗi
Yontere faatiinde ndee , paawngal doogol rifti ( La fièvre de la vallée du rift ) teskaama ine ari e gelooɗi nder nokkuure Budarka , falnde Ayyuun , diiwal Hod bannge hirnaange .
Yontere ndee fuɗɗotoo ko Hoore-Biir 4 Yarkomaa ( October ) 2008 sahnga waktuuji tati kikiiɗe ( 15h ) .
Yonti kala laamiiɗo biyoowo mbiymi nde ɓe nganndinte en ngalaa ko ɓuri leñol ngol , etee alaa ko firti leñol so wonaa ɗemngal ngal .

aan e maggo tan nganndi .
abriil .
adannde , mbuuɗu lewoongu , lewru huuɓndu , mbuuɗu niwoongu , nayaɓere
adannde ndee ko yiɗde neɗɗo banndum , heɓtina ɗum , hormoo ɗum , teddina ɗum , yiɗana ɗum ko yiɗani hoyre mum ;
addana en tuumde ɓe wondude e ɓee miijiyankooɓe , jogiiɓe laamu nguu .
addani yumma makko Kummba Hammadi
addi dum ko berliskooni haalimo e barak obaama haali ka moyyaani liydi ndi ina mettiini haan no feewi .
adii fof , eɗen poti anndude lewru nduu wonaa lewñooru .
aduna .
aduna ko medii yetetee ko nattii mamadou lih beydou liggade sabu ka ngenndiyanke Aan e denndagal wondiibe ma so tawii ko alla yeewtere ma welii no feewi kono jokku golle aan e wondiibe ma ceerno amadou haran ina salmin ma a jaraama
aduna koo , ko ɗuum woni ko ɓur-mi jaggude : woni yiɗde hoore mum , anndude
aduna o yi'i yahdii6e hesɓe hoyreejo leydi Moritani Muhamed uld Abdel
aduna ñiɓaaki koko ɓaarii , ellee en njejjitii nguurdam men wonaani meeɗaani wonnde , e juuɗe men , ko arata janngo en ngan-ndaa to janngo tawata en eɗen kumpaa .
afriknaaɓe e lislaam hay so tawii noon aarabaagal ngal ɓuri laaɓtude ko
aga baali , joom karta , tuuba caaya , paɗe taƴee-hulee , joom paftol dadol , joom jammbere : agagɓe ɓe ngari ko ena nafii ngafeeji , ena ndewnii dawnaaji .
ajaaraama ceerno ibraahi sarr e golle maa dee min mbeltii ma no feewi ngam ko kumpittaa min koo ko faate fugu keygel to to anngola ajaraama sabu min nattii humpeede hen sabu a wadii hen ndar nde maa yoo geno yo6e
ajaaraama sanne ngam nde min mbaasi zaweede oo ñalawma so tawiiko goonga min tawaaka oo ñalawma kono alaako min kumpa heen sabu 6ee jaambaree6e darii6e dadii6e jogii6e himme 6e cooynaani jikke yarritii6e 6e ngaldaaye yedditaare golle mon mbazi ngartam ngam leñol ngol seere kumpa ko goonga so wonaano golle haaloo6e ndexxat kono kadi so wonaano haaloo6e ma aduna oo humpanno sabu ko golle ngadoto haala haala wattindo haaleede ceerno ibraahiima saar so goonga mbiza wela alla mbiza welema sabu nju66ude golle ma yoo geno rokke mbaawka e cellal duumingal
ajaraama ?
ajaraama cerno ibiraahima saar e winndan nde maa ndee e nyaldi pinal jogor di wadee hamin mbii yoo geno yettin fandaare ndee ka di ahaalii e wiide yoo yim6e mbattu haqqil laaji dii ejannde duum ina foti yeweede sabu jannde waawi yettin de en to yidaa fayeede too duum non waa 6en kalan lenyol en 6ayde haalaama mo mbattu hen haqqil laaji mumen
akki metti ɗum ko waɗi ɗannagol hooreejo mbo meeɗaa jooɗaade mettaani ɗum .
alaa baawnooɗo toon nomeede e oo garaad , wonaa to Konu walla to Sanndarmori , ɗo
alaa fof ko ɓuri mettude alaa heen fof ko ɓuri welde so wonaa to ɓuri heewde muñal e yankinaare ?
alaa gummoriiɗo toon sabu goɗɗugol kono catal maɓɓe jokkondirii e biyeteeɗo
alaa ko mbaaw ɗen heen koy waylo waylo jamaanu ɗum jeyaa .
alaa ko mbaawden wiyde tan so wonaa so jaayndiyanke ina waawne yoo habru kabaaru dum doon fenninii potal hayso ina e ndiin leydi laabaani dum noon yoo allaahu faabo miskineebe kabe bibbe fulbe mbele jam e deeyre ina wona toon to leydi gine konakiri bone ne tunngaa muritani gasaani duunde bibbe fulbe so oo kabaaru yantii heen toonne kadi ko fulbe ngoni toon dum noon en mbadii doo joomiraado jom bade e baawde o e kadtan de yoo faabo

alla fof ko haalete
allah rokkuma ko njiɗɗa haa njettinaa faandaare ma e leñol ma .

baa .

caggal calminaali , mida wiya yoo MBAJJIRI yurmo-mo yaafoo-mo kanko e denndaangal maayBe juulBe yoo GENO heYnuBe e moYYe mum .
caggal calminaali teddudi faade e malik paaate soh amin njetta darnde nde ndaridaa ngam yellitde pinal fulfulde haa caaktudaa demngal men pulaar to dowlaaji orop jokku golle fuuta fof yi ii golle maa yoo Allah wallu
caggal caminaali ko neldudede duwaaw faa
caggal caminaali ko neldudede duwaaw faade e musiddo mn ibraahiima saar e sunaare jinndo men sinnaa baydi nang yo allah yurmomo yaafoombo yo toon buranmo malaykaaji yurmeende kebboomo hedda barke makko e men fabbina caggal makko ko juuti denndaanga banndiraabe haayre laaw ene duwanoomo .

en .

en etaasiwil e nder binnditagol ngol .
en mbeltiima , en mbeltodiima alla itti yeeweende 6i66e ful6e , danniyankoo6e haa laa6i , 6aade gorko mo mbooye he6ii halirde tawa ene waawi hedeede e nder winndere yoo alla yaw 6eyda , mamadou amadou ly , mine e maada gil ; a , jam jamaanu fm faandaare moyyere haa seneweb , yoo alla sellin doole , yoo alla 6amtu darii6e ine 6amta pulaa , pulaar ine wiya , jiilotoodo to waali e jiilotoodo mo waaldi so kawri uddu suudu ren dintaa dumen , njokken golle
en nganndoytaa haa abada .
en njetti banndiraa6e men kawtal jangoo6e pulaar fulfulde e winndere he , fedde nde nganndu da , en mbaawa haldude golle mum e lenyol pulaar , yoo alla 6eydu bade e baawde , en njetti won6e sabaabu ha watti holleede e ayaawo rts1 , yo6e njokku golle , miin noon mi feewni comci am mbudo tiindi mantu la joli , so geno ja6i , ko wonaa duum ko yoo kjpf , naa6e tiinno mbele aysa gisse ine , watta haalde pulaar no haanirta ni , njikken golle
en njettii alla jiitondiral wadi

fERUM .

faaburu wiyi ko ndiyam kono wiyaani pasɗam .
faade bannge goɗɗo .
faade hannde , ko duuɓi 58 .
faam min ceerani e jaŋngude kabaruuji ma .
faamii ko heewi ko jooɗi-ɗaa e nokku maa juuldude , ko miin woni a
faayiida Ndenduraagu , rendo , e politiki
faltaaki diiwaan Ko yiɗde wiyde tan yimɓe leydi ndii ndenndii heen weltaare ,
famminde mo so dañaama , yoo ɗaccit-ɓe ɓe mbirna yaay ko yaawi .
famɗi fof hedde 4% mahru .
famɗude ɓee .
fartaŋŋe yuɓɓinde ndee yontere e lowre Pulaagu .
fawaade e ciimti keewɗi , ko kayri fof ɓuri yahrude yeeso e ngalɗoo karallaagal ,
fawaade e pooɗondiral ɓaaƴiwal ( attraction gravitationnelle ) .
fawaade e teskuya won ɓeen " mbaadi kippu oo yahdaani e mbaadi ardorde leydi
fawaade e won ngool millugol , eɗum ɗaɓɓi ngalu moolanaangu : fotde miliyaaruuji
fayaa , sibu maa lonngorɗe ɓurɗe seeɓde peewne , yanti heen won onndooji kesi
fayti e Wiɗtooji weeyo to leydi Farayse " ɗum alaa caɗeele to bannge karallaagal ,
faɗo adanngo ngo wiyetee ko Fotosfeer : ko ngoo-ɗoo faɗo nuldata en caafe naange ɗe njiyaten ɗe .
febariyee hitaande kala , ko ñalawma winndereejo ɗemngal neeniwal , mo UNESCO dotti e hitaande 2000 .
feccere e men walla nii , mbi’en ko ɓuri heewde e men , hannde ko heen ñallata , kiira heen won heen kam ena mbaala heen ,
fedde ndee , teeŋtini wonde ko cukaaku woni calɗi ɓamtaare caggal nde holliti keɓagol
fedde yidde lenôl
feewi " .
feewi ( nokkuuji ndema , beeli , moraaɗe ekn .
feewnude robinaaji cebooji , hippa suturaaji ;
felliti nawde ɓuyum oo .
fellude .
fenaande alaa kosde !
fenaande ene jogi koyɗe ko dogiri kono alaa dote ko jooɗiri
fenaande joki heen wiyi hay maayo ngoo hannde ena weli , Waddi heen moosaali .
fenaande jokki heen wiyi kooni ko oo , ñalawma hannde weli , wulaani haa ɓurti ɓuuɓaani kadi haa ɓurti .
fenaande kala ko heewi doole , fotataa e goonga , so a yiyii hannde cappaato muritani ina foodanoo potal ko anndude fenaande yawtataa , huunde noon so tawii won rewbe heen ina njiilo waasataa nde yiita , Ibraahiima saar ko e yiilotoobe he jeya ko noonkadi waraabe be .
fenaande wiyi goonga jam waali

fijirde ndee .
finaa-tawaa Fedde subalɓe hakkunde leyɗeele , e sukkuɓe hoolaaɓe kuuɓal ɗiɗo
finaa-tawaaji men .
finii , o wiyi omo yaha balɗe tati tan ngam joom suudu makko ena heɓtii .

fiyannde aali yero joop
fiɗde ko ñalawma , teeŋti noon subaka law , walla mutal naange .
fof , mbele jaanduyaagal ina natta , macungaagu mumtee haa laaɓa .
fof , ɗo kala garɗo tawat-maa aɗa jogii kurus maa .
fof e lohde ina wiya : Arab , Pulaar , Soninke e wolof ko ɗemde ngenndi
fof e newunde .
fof ko maaldiiɓe jihaadiyankooɓe ngam siftorde daartol laamaandi Maasina nder teeminannde
fof ko ɓe worɓe njeegomo , eɓe piya gitaar e mbaggu .
fof njaggiri Tuwareg en fof ko e MNLA njeyaa .
fof peeñninta maale ñawu nguu .
fof ɓe ngoongɗinii Geno ko gooto , Yuunus ko nelaaɗo geno .
fof ɗi cujjani geno toowɗo oo , e konngol geno toowɗo oo , " sinno wonaano kanko o
fooɗondiroytee too , to Kamaruun e lewru suweŋ 2019 , ɓe cooynataa jikke , maa ɓe
forli forli ñande fof .
fotaani waɗde ko jirgitta ɓanndu makko ko wayi no liggeyaaji muusɗi , ngamri muusndi walla coftal ɓalli keewngal diwaali e denkaali .
fotaani ɓoornaade comci paaɗɗi
fotde 17 miliyoŋ ampul ) , tawi njaru mum ko hedde 23 UM wonande kala
fotde capanɗe hojom , njaaweendi majje ina waawi yettaade 800 km waktu kala ,
fotde lebbi 31 .
fotde ujunaaje noogaas fittaandu .
foti huccitde , gila e dawrugol haa e jeeyngal e bayyinde golle bonɗe baɗeteeɗe
foti ko saakteede e nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee .
foti ko suusneede e walleede haa hakkillaaji makko ngarta .
foti ko takkeede e nokku ardorde diwaan oo , muqataa e meeri mo ɗum toɗɗii oo .

gaynaako nayi , joom hudusuru , joom sumalle boloŋ walla bidoŋ

gaynude ko wonɓe toon ɓee
gaññeeje mon ko min juurotooɓe elaawol ngol perɗon ko min rewooɓe caggal min ngonaa yahtirooɓe ; yewtere ngenndiire min ngonataa dey hulooɓe ; min mbaasii on kono golle mon baɗle mon min mbaasaani ; rewo e worgo haydara seeraai , ko ɓesngu ngootu pinal gootal fa'ndaare wootere mo fooɗaaki ɗum kay nuunɗaani miijo mum moƴƴaani ; mo añii jam wondi ko feewaani , yo yumma potal ajjanoo funeeɓe mum ko leelaani
geno .
geno e baawɗe mum ; hoɗdu bayɗi a woniino suudu a haɓiima e baade kaaɗdi nguurndam maa goomu pulaagu com ina nelda duwawuuji keeriiɗi e fa'de ɓesngu fulɓe kala .
gese cela salminde .
gese e ko nanndi heen .
geɗal gadanal nagal : ko deftere Alla teddunde ndee , ngam Alla toowɗo o wii : " eehey mon goonɗinɓe , so on ngummiima faade e juulde , lootee jeese mon e juuɗe mon haa heɓa polontunŋi , moomon koye mon e koyɗe mon haa heɓa kolbuli .
geɗe keewɗe cattu-nooɗe , walla ɗe meeɗaani wooɗde , ngoodi ɗuma kadi newii , yoolori ko heewi e kuutorɗe ɓooyɗe .
geɗe laamuuji e renndooji .
gido aduna ko nii mo moni kala ina sabbii ngun nalngu .
gila Moritani hebi jeytaare mum , feede hannde oo ko Leñol gootol tan laamtoo , kadi heen laamiido fof , lamminta tan ko koreeji mum !
gila omo yahra e duuɓi 12 .
girip ?
gite e leydi kunuze e kaaxe
golle e darnde afriknaaɓe ina cabbaa hik
golle ma ina njoozi , yoo alla wallu , anne hamme gadduz kabaaru oo , a tinniima sabu ina moxxi anndee .
golle mon jibini nafoore
golle mon joodi yo wuur bamtaare pulaar ha cey
golle ɗee bayyine ɗoo e lebbi sabu ko heddii koo ena heewi .
golle ɗee njuɓɓii
gollooɓe e renndo siwil , wonaa hoohooɓe jaambureeɓe .
gollortoo .
gonngal hakkunde ñaamdu e ɗoyngol .
gonɗe e saraaji Baabaaɓe Looti .
gonɗi e wertallo ( nokku ) leyɗe biyeteeɗe ko leyɗe Arab , yeru nder Muritani ,
gonɗo e Daande Maayo Senegaal , rewo e worgo mo anndaa ɗum walla nanaani ñalaaɗe
googɗini leydi ndi ko leydi Aarabeeɓe , ɓalee6e ko arɓe tan ngardi ko e
goomu ngatamaare fof ene welti ene yidi tawterede nde yontere pinal pulaagu onon fof on calminaama innde mon e jettoode mon on jaraama
goonga kadi maa ɗee kuutorɗe mballit ganndal gonngal e Wikipedia ngal yettaade ɗemɗe
goonga kañumne wiyi fenaande jam waali , ndeen ɓe calmondiri haa saɗi joofi .
goonga ndaari maayo ngoo no ndiyam ɗam way deeƴje nii , tawi kadi ko fenaande haali koo ko goonga ko noon woori dimmbini hoore mun wiyi kadi ena woodi fenaande a haalii goonga .
goonga ndaarimo ko juuti , haalaani haydara , yehi ndaaroy tawi noo wiyrinii ne woodi arti wiyi fenaande a haalii goonga ko noon woori hannde kay ko ñalawma belɗo .
goonga tan wattinta
goonga yari maayo a felli yani huttooɓe ngari so Geno jaɓii nyaamooɓe peddataa .
gootel ceera nde koorata e nde njuulata .
gooto e mabbe fof ene jogii besngu caggal mum .
gooto e maɓɓe ardiiɓe konu ɓee cuɓaaki .
gooto e men kala , Ena joogii no ndaardata Aduna oo , gooto e men kala ena jogii no Yiirata Aduna oo , taw jidaa e goɗɗo oo ɗuum fawii tan koy jikkuuji men golle men , pellital men Haa e Miijooji men , e Anniya men .
gooto e men kala ko nulal tan addi ɗum yoo fiɓ janŋtoyaade ,
gooto ena wiyee Seydi Kummba fiyata moolo oo , njooɗii-mi .
gooto miijotonooka wonde ina woodi nokku no woorunoo ɗo hay neɗɗo gooto e won e
gooto raafoor ( ballal ) 100 tiraayeer ittaa Ndar , ngaddaa Daŋana .
gootol ( ƴettooɓe lekki mum en laawol gootol ñalnde kala ) .
gorko goɗɗo ari e makko wiyi mo : " ee annabi , miin ne dee mi yiyii ko haawnii
gorko mo cicago illinoise firtaani aadi
gorko oo , so o yiɗii ina ɗannodoo e debbo mum , so wonaa tawa ɓe carɗondiriino waasde ɗannodaade gila e kumal .
gostondire , njeeyguuji kuɓeeje mahaaɗe e leydi ndi mahanooka tawo ;
goɗɗi , ko wayi no ustagol walla ɓeydagol ñaamɗe , joom mum wona e seɗaade ceɗagol
goɗɗi ngoodi , beeyooji e koye men , ɗi en meeɗaa sikkitaade , ɗi en nganndaa , tee
goɗɗo kuutortooɗo paddorɗe balndu .
go’o e Muritani , Gine bisawo , Madagaskaar , Gine Konakiri , jiidaani e ko waɗi NISEER koe ko tommbaa e leyɗeele goɗɗe ko wayi no Kodduwaar en Hay so ɗum fof ina haawnii ne , ( sabu sikkanoo ko oon jamaanu diwtaama ) kono ko ɓuri haawnaade fof kodarnde gardiiɗo e ngaal daawal U .
gudditirɗe golle ñalawma oo e mbaydi laawɗundi .

gure Senegaal kala , mi salminii on calminaali tedduɗi .

guɗɗotoo ena wayloo hitaande kala .
ha 90% e rafaaɓe ina canko , kala heen malaaɗo sellude , daɗi maayde ina jogoo hattan raaɓde fotde lebbi ɗiɗi , wadde o mbo foti reeneede ɗo hisi ngam hisnude woɗɓe .

haa e haaliyankooɓe e yuɓɓinde ɗiiɗoo

haala maa , ɓe mbiyi ko a moƴƴo e tee ko a jiɗɗo daraniiɗo leñol ngol .
haala mun haaletaake cikkaa ko enen Fulɓe njey ɗum .
haalande ladde !
haalatee tawa goɗngal ngal haaletaake ɗoon , Fulfulde noon ene
haalatnoo go golle mbaɗaten e firooji gannde kese e Pulaar haa teeŋti e

haalee he kala ɗo gootal e ɗee ɗemɗe ene haalee .
haalee he leyɗeele keewɗe ne , kala heen leydi ɗo ngal tawatee , so
haalnoo ñalnde o nanngetee ndee , laatiima no o wiyrunoo nii , e baawɗe Alla .

hakkillaaji kawri hannde oo ena wiyee Maamuudu Mammadu Gise to Ɗalhaya .
hakkille maa .
hakkille ɗowi hoyre mum ɗowaaka , kala ɗo njiiɗa hakkille ina ɗowaa neɗɗo wonaani e sago mum .
hakkunde dawrooɓe e ɓe ndawraani addi ɗum'en ko waasde tugnaade e
hakkunde leyɗeele , caggal nge ngaddu-ɗen dalillaaji laaɓtuɗi " .

haŋkadi nattii waɗɗaade lewru yiyee ngam anndee dariima .
haŋkadi nde ganndal tugnaa ngam anndude lewru nde darotoo .
haɓaade huunde firtaani fiyndireede e fellondireede tan , ko alaa e sago jeewtidal laawɗinee hakkunde seɓɓitiiɓe suuɗiiɓe ɓe e laamuuji leyɗe maɓɓe ɗe e tawtoreede wallidiiɓe jeewtidal ngal : hilfaaɓe diina heɓtinaaɓe ɓe e pelle diina mawɗe aduna o e pelle adunaaje dokkaaɗe laawɗinal aduna o e hilafaacɓe laamuuji duuɗe goɗɗe ɗe .
haɓaade ɗee mette .
haɓde e humambinnaagu ;
haɗaani jeyaaɓe e majji ( ɗiin dowlaaji ) jokkude julaade ɓaleeɓe e suuɗaare .
haɗi nafa kono ɗi mbelaanimi sibu wonko ɓuriɗi moƴƴude .
he golle memotooɗe
he taaniraaɓe mum en gila e ganni , ko kamɗe moofti pinal e daartol
hebata ko wodbe ko .
heblooji limtinɗi .
heblude ɗemɗe men e ƴellitde ɗum en haa mbaawa janngireede/janngeede he tolno duɗe hakkundeeje , e duɗe toowɗe .
heddi ko demmba jaah ko jom suudu mun defno nyebbe ha benndi hippi ina faadi ha demmba jah yetto nyaama aminata yaya jaah moytiima nyaani ko dum laawi demmba jah sikkakno ko baaba maal e yimbe mum nyaani .
heddi ko gooto fof yo anndu so bantaani lenyol mum e denngal mum hol mo dantanta dum .
heddi ko neddo fof ina juuma ha waada ko moyyaani .
heddi ko yo yimbe be kaalko woodi ko .
heddii ko ina foti waliteede no ƴellitorii !

hol sabaabu e mo wiya : ko kanko tan woni cheickh , o wonaa arani ko jom doole e mo jogii jawdi dum fof haanaani , hol ko saabii Mintu Taara geddi , fof yo en paamne e mum kono wonaa tan wiyde wonaa goonga a addataa ko laabi nden kala ko wiyaa ko heen heddetee
hol zo ndewataa haa fulve njibinmaa njannginmaa pijja e maa ngonda e maa haa mbaawaa huunde mbiyaa a alanaa fulve nyamaande .

humpitiiɓe kaalani jamaanu nguu ko addani weendu nduu wiyeede Weendu Bees
humpitirde woɗɗuɓe , ɓe ndañaano tawtoreede .
humpito dañaango he nder leydi men e kitaale 80 rewrude e Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije ; haralleeɓe jaŋde fof ine kawri , he nder winndere ndee , he konngol gootol , wonde ko ɗemngal neeniwal woni " coktirgal ekkagol juumtungol " ;
humpito yuumtungo janngirgol ɗemɗe men neeniije pulaar , sooninke e wolof , ngo Duɗal Ɗemɗe Ngenndiije waɗnoo he Muritani hakkunde 1979 e 1999 , ngo ɓeto ummoriingo boowal ( Breda-Unesco ) e ɓeto ndernderiiwo ( Jaagordu jaŋde leydi ndii ) , ceedtii juumtugol mum , mbasiyii kam en fof kuuɓtodingol jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije nder ekkol .
humpitooji e wiɗtooji baɗaaɗi e nder winndere ndee , paatuɗi e ekkitaare rewrude e ɗemngal neeniwal , kam en fof ko ɗuum kolliti : wonde sukaaɓe ɓurata feɗɗitaade e jaŋde ko he nder ɗemɗe mum en neeniije ;

ina defii mo limoore e balɗe goɗɗe .
ina e jam .
ina hawni nofeewi
ina heddi walla fuddaaki tuggi hitaande 1960 ha 2008 kot wono tan woonihay mbatte waylaaki e sikke am .
ina heewi e fulbe sikkoobe pulaar ala ko waawi nafde ko majjeere mawnde .
ina jooɗinoo tan , haa o ɗaanii les lekki kii .
ina leppi , wonaani tawo moraande .
ina makki wone potal sabu hay yimbe toddabe be ko sappo ko gooto woni baleejo wadde ina makki wonde pootal
ina mbaawi neldude walla heɓde ɓatakeeji binndaaɗi tawi njoɓaani hay fiftiin ; aɓe mbaawi nii jaabjaabtondirde e binndol ( chat ) e yimɓe ɓe ɓe njokkondiri .
ina njahda e harbiyankooɓe Dan Na Ambasagu .
ina seedtoo , ɓee almuɓɓe njawtirii no haaniri kawgel ngel .
ina sowoo laabi 20 njaaweendi hito ( dille ) , omo hattani naatde e tippule
ina ummina fetel feewde e laamu Farayse .
ina waawi yande e Leydi .
ina walla
ina waɗi koomte e mbaydi ɗiɗmiri , ko wayno : nde o resata debbo ngam yaakoraade oon ko juulɗo no makko , haa feeñana mo ( oon ko katolik , walla dewoowo jalaŋeeji e .
ina waɗɗii gorko lelodaade e debbo mum hay so laawol e nder kala lebbi nay , hay so o ronkii rokkude mo fotde makko heen , ngam konngol Alla toowɗo oo " ina woodani ɓeen woondooɓe ɓattataako suddiiɓe mum`en happu lebbi nay .
ina yiɗaa nde gorko newnanta joom suudu safroyde walla juuroyaade mum ɓe gooto e banndiraaɓe ɓe ndagantaako ɗum en resde mo e yahde jenayse e salminoyde banndiraaɓe mum so tawii yahdu nduu lorlataa gorko oo .
ine cemmbina laamu nguu nde siynata ko ɓuri yaawde wasiyaaji ñalɗi diisndondiral ɗii , e tuugnaade e sariya kuccam laaɓtuɗo , nanondiraaɗo .
ine fawee kuugal lewru ( 1 ) haa hitaande ( 1 ) kasoo e alamaan capanɗe joy ( 50 000 ) haa teemedere ujunere ( 100 000 ) ugiyya , kala duñɗo e paltoor e ngañgu walla e doolndoolaagu faade e neɗɗo sabu leñol mum , edda ɓalndu mum , iwdi mum , ngenndaagu mum , walla iwdi leñol mum , nder batu walla e nokkuuji denndaaɗi ;
innaa lillaahi wa innaa ileyhi raaji uun , yo allah yurmo6e yaafoo6e , haarna6e aljanna , ko yurminii wadii , kono en nduttiima e hoddiro jooma badoowo ko welaa eno weliraa edo welaa , en toriimamo yo o wadan en jam e kisal .
innaa lillaahi wa innaa ileyhi raaji uun bandiraawo teddudo mi do niagomaa munal sabu ko dum woni aduna .
innde am ko Aadama Bah .

janngo .
janngo Mawbaare ( talaata ) etee ko ɓuri heewde koo dawrii hannde .
jaŋde alkule arab maa ƴellite ngam janngingol al Ɓuraana tedduɗo oo kam e kattanɗe kuñagol lawɗungol ;
jaŋde gannde e kattanɗe paamgol e kaalgol waɗetee ko he ɗemɗe ngenndiije ;
jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije ( pulaar , sooninke e wolof ) maa naatne he janngirɗe mecce ( duɗe keblirɗe jagge laamu , duɗe heblo karallaagal e mecce ekn .
jaɓande gorko mum so tawii yiɗii dakmitaade e mum , ngam ɗuum ko jojjanɗe gorko e dow makko .
jaɓataa waalde ladde hay gootol sabu wonde deenoowo jinnaaɓe .

jokkee golle .

jooni .
jooni kam so en njiɗii mbiyen haajuuji men e hammuuji men fof ko heen woni .
jooni noon a waawa immaade ɗo so tawi bibje maa ɓiltaani .
jooni noon haɓe njogii sehil maɓɓe gooto ɓattiiɗoɓe , ɗuum ena haawi ɗum no feewi felliti naandaaɓe .
jooni noon ndeen hol to min koɗata ?

kadi , rajo walla tele gonɗo nder wuddere too , hay gooto nanataa ko saaktata ,
kadi baɗdaaɗo golle tiiɗɗe e golwole kaawniiɗe , ɗe nganndu-ɗaa , hay mo wonaa
kadi e wiy-deɓe ko maa arab jaŋngee alay sago ko fenaande , kadi yiɗde-ɓe marde ɗemɗe keddiiɗeɗe .
kadi fulbe keewi yettude neddo ko nde yalti aduna wiiye ko sagaata wonno .
kadi gooto fof ko hannde haade jakgo neddo ina footi tinnaade e diine mum e dengal mum e lenyol mum sabu ko ligga fof ko ko halteete
kadi haɓeede e wolde , ɓuree doole , yaha mooloyo nokku goɗɗo , wonaa wulde , wonaa dogde , alaa ko sakkoyde feere , no waawirta foolde oon kaɓdiiɗo .
kadi ina woodi e leydeele be julaata aljuma .
kadi kala ɗo almuudo baaba makko e almudɓe makko ngarii ngam mawninde ñalawma o daairaaji rewɓe mbaɗii cente cente ngam renndu e makko ɗii ƴalɗi ɓure .
kadi ko min ngendiankoobe music rap pulaar .
kadi ko puɗɗoowo , ko jimoowo , kadi eɓe lomlomtondira e kala sahaa e
kadi mbodo yetta aysa giise ko ekkitaade addi wawde jokkel golle .
kadi njogor-ɗaa suddaade .
kadi so tawii ko dazzuve zum ve nysi zum , hoolaare na heen .
kadi yimɓe ɓe laamuuji ɓaleeɓe njiyɗintunoo caggal golwole , njeeya ɗum en .
kadi ɓe meeɗaa dugdude hay sahaa gooto ina haawnii ena yurminii kadi ina jalnii .
kala ; - Laawɗin’de gese njiylaw e wiɗtooji kese ; - Yuɓɓin’de ciimtol jumɗungol
kala baawɗo waɗde ɗum dañat heen baŋnge , waɗde a dañii , kono haa yeeso ko laawol
kala doondiiɗo teewu
kala doondiiɗo teewu , buubi ndewa e mum .
kala e lor en kollaama .
kala gilisemi mum ( tolno suukara nder ƴiiƴam mum ) ;
kala heen alDunoo6e ngontii doofolbe " miskineebe " mi haalaani pittaali baasaadi heen Dii .
kala huunde ñisnde no feewi , ko wayi no hoodere walla wuddere ɓaleere ina wayla
kala jagudo demmgalam maami jagu dum
kala jawdi ndi o heɓirnoo tooñannge , so o saliima accude laamu , ndenndee kaɓon
kala jibinaaɗo tawi baaba mum ko Moritaninaajo ; – kala jibinaaɗo tawi yumma mum ko Muritaninaajo , hay so tawii baaba mum alaa ɗo jeyaa , walla to jeyaa anndaaka .
kala jiɗɗo ardonoyaade en Tabital Pulaagu Orop yo haal .
kala kala e ndaɓɓa hay gooto yiyaani yiilirde ( Bureau ) makko e ɓe o wondunoo so ena ngoodnoo .
kala ko bittaa hakkunde fulla e taande hay so njamndi maa meed bikkitaade girnitoo .
kala ko ɓamtaare Pulaar ene jara min coodi .
kala mo foolaani baasal mun foolaani Aduna mun fooftaani e Aduna mun , Heewɓe waaɓe no am nii ?
kala mo wyni miskiino ma alla woynu dum .
kala naange fudnge mutat kala do sukki serwat te alla rokkata o lubat paamenne kay so yontii ohebtat te aduna wona haa bada kono ko haa balde cinkiraadi golle e balle saada ndiaye faam dee mo wari cayaadi mum cayaadi janan'di nkata dum te paamaa laamu so rokkiima tuuba .
kala nde leñol wuuri bamtii , pinal mum layi .
kala neddo walla kala lenol dummbangol e dow hakke mum walla fodde mum maa daro teeta haa laaba .
kala noon leñol walla galle mo o waawi jeyeede !

ko adii fof mbodo yetta geno sabu makko rokkude hannde ɓiɓɓe fulɓe hakkillaaji daraade hannde ndeeɗo darnde ngam yooltude hakkeeji mum en golle mon njooɗi paayodini njokken golle poolgu nana waɗa ɓaadi wonti eɗen njogi ɗee lowe pulaagu mbiimi ekn e ardiiɓe mum ɓe tampata kaaɓata ŋoŋata ko dariiɓe tan on njaraama dey

ko adii fof min mbeltiima e tabital pulaagu belsik e kal to 6i66e ful6e ngoni ibrahiima saar ja raama mi hediima haalamako kadi belsik nde tawno mbodo joodi onon fof on njaraama

laamu muritani wii yoo taccunoobe ngartu .
laamu safalbe wawa wailaade legnam legnamagu ko yimbebe cikkat taan , yimbebe poti ko habaade dum .
laamu – daňal e martaba ina wujja hakkille ɓiɗɓe mum , gooto heen fof na sikka so alɗii ngalu wuro tan walla martobini walla ɓadiima laamu hay so laamaaki ɗuum yahdataa e won’de ko wonnoo koo , sikka ɗuum aaɓnotaako e nder ngenndi mum , tawa kala ko gollaa e ɗee ngenndiije ko hakkille e ganndal ɓiɗɓe ngoo renndo , hay sinno kadi ko goonga wonaa kanɓe tan .
laamuji he .
laamuuji .
laamuuji jokkuɗi jiyɗinde yimɓe mum en e dow nafoore mum en heeriinde .
laamɓe Waalo e kala ɓe nguurndam mum en yowitii e laamu lorla , keeranii Hasaan en .

lelnugol feere e wonorde tuugorde wonande jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije tati ɗee ;
lelnugol laabi karallaagal jaŋde baawɗi wallitde moƴƴitinde jaŋde/jannginirgol ɗee ɗemɗe e tuugnaade e doŋle e golle e paandaale ɗe heen ɗemngal koɗal kala dottanaa he nder tippudi nehdi e jaŋde leydi ndii .
lelnugol laabi karallaagal jaŋde baawɗi ƴellitde jaŋde/jannginirgol Pulaar , Sooninke e Wolof , tawa ine teskoo keeriiɗe e soklaaji kala heen goomu njoopaangu .
lelnugol peeje karallaagal jaŋde baawɗi moƴƴitinde janngugol e janngirgol ɗemngal arab teskotooɗi ko kala heen goomu njoopaangu heerorii walla ko sokli .
lelnugol tuugorgal jaŋde ɗemngal arab he tolnooji tippudi nehdi e jaŋde ɗii kala ;
lelnugol wonorde tuugorde wonande jaŋde ɗemɗe koɗe , haa teeŋti noon e farayse e engele ;
lenol fulbe ko lenol galdu ngol jurmoniingol sabu ronkudedum nafde hooremum

leydi , nde ndu yiyee .
leydi .
leydi Maali gila hitaande 2002 , leydi ndii horiima yiytude laawol
leydi Muritani njoftii to Dakaar ( Hotel Marie Lucienne ) to Point E .
leydi fof njeyi .
leydi ndi , haa teŋŋti e Jolof .
leydi ndii fof ngarii e maɓɓe , ɓe ngoni e wiyde " oo ko penoowo " .
leydi ndokkiraandi ndii yo o taw ina yahdi e eɓɓo juɓɓule tawa kadi ina winnditaa e Karnal leydi .
leydi ngootiri kono alaa ɗo woni ɗemngal lawakeewal .
leydi njooɗanii Muritani , ɓoornotoo ko wutte e jahdiije mum , turki , mukke ,
leyol ngol nana caggal mon .
leyɗe mawɗe ngoongɗiniino ko wiyetee " Semmbe Naange " koo , ina gasa tawa hannde
leyɗeele Hiirnaange Afrik , kadi ene rokkaa daraja ɗemngal
leyɗeele joy , en tawat ɗeen ɓuraani ɗemɗe joy .
leyɗeele ko ɓuri ɗiɗi , ɗal boom , ko ɓuri heewde e ɗemɗe
leyɗeele ɗe limtuɗen dow ɗee ni , ene walla e wuurnude kadi e
leñam leñamaagu so iwaani alaa fof to njahten
leñol gootol .

maa Arɗo Maayo Ngaddooru " Eggirgol Coowagol " Saahal , ɗum woni lappi hakkunde
maa Geno won ballo .
maa en kaal ko ngolluno ɗen taw kadi wonaa e tayaaɗe ,
maa jaŋde farayse tiiɗtine no ɗemngal jokkondiral nii ngam wontoyde ɗemngal janngirgal won ɗiin fannuuji siyaas caggal jaŋde lesre .
maa meeɗaani sooyde .
maa rewree e dokkannde walla mbiyen heɓɓitirde ( relais ) .
maa walla , e joofirde , rewrude e binndi ɗi caaktaaka , kono neldaaɗi walla dokkaaɗi yimɓe heewɓe .
maa wonii e tawtoreede yimɓe heewɓe , he nder nokku mo wonaa denndaaɗo , kono udditanaaɗo huunde e yimɓe jogiiɓe hakke rentude ɗoon walla naatde ɗoon ,
maa wonii luural ngal ko luural jeyi dental no kuulal 7 mo sariya 83-127 ñande 5 suwee 1983 .
maa wonii rewrude e binndi muulaaɗi walla alaa ;
maa wonii rewrude e nate walla maaɗe ɗakkaaɗe , dokkaaɗe walla jeeyaaɗe , jeeyeteeɗe walla bejaaɗe yeewo yimɓe fof ;
maa woot njiiɗo heen ko feewaani ɗum maa woot kadi jiiɗo heen , ko feewnitaaki ɗum .
maa yahde .

mawnam Katante Leñol a waɗii ko haani , so yuɓɓinde ngol daartol he oo Ceernaajo , ko heewi ko kaalɗaa he makko koo mi seediima ɗum e seeɗa mo min ngondi he njillu makko he nder Amerik , omo sooda mburu he gawri o nawa dum park o hokkayaa ndiwri , miin e hoyre am o wagginiinomi-ɗum , saanga nde min njeewtidta ko yowiitii e ganndal mbirniindi , min meedii bismaademo to galle Seek mo New York ngam o wada yeewtere faatunde hi diine Islaam , kono nde yahnoo haa sahaa oo yonti yoga e ardiibe nokku nguu , eewniimi wiy odon ngadda oo he nder galle Seek min ngaddaa jeewte makko ko njofotoo , tee khilfeeɓe nanɗoon njippii ɗuum yooɗaani , nde wonnoo goranam heewɓ he e diiniyankoobe leñol ngol njaggiri ngennyankaagal ko huyweraagal , kono nde oo juumo ɓaleejo doori yeewtere mum !

mbeda yidi jokkondirde e mon ?
mbee-ɗaa junngo maa yimɓe fof , goytii-ɗoma fof , e birtii-ɗoma fof ,
mbele doosde Moritani ene ndokkibe nguudoo ndimaagu ?
mbele miijooji men mbaawa yahdude .
mbele miin won miijo too-ɗomi .
mbele miin won neɗɗel gootel tan mo hakkille mun woni e am
mbele nguurden he dow jam , potal , nanondiral e yaajeende .
mbele yoo oɗon manta ( neemaaji makko ) !
mbelemma oo do jamma , haaniino ada tawaa , sabu hay gooto waawa haalde no mbelemma oo foti heewde e pittaali bibbe fulbe e kaanoon jamma , tawa wadi dum , ko sukaabe jibinaabe doo e leydi farayse , banndiraabr mbadten hakkillaaji , sabu noddetete noodo yoo ar , so wadtii noddude , ina haani nooteede , eden ñaago alla yoo coboyyi ngontu maamaaji , mbiifnanoo leñol meeden , yoo njabeeri wontu basaale , jibina yumta beynda , riiwta joote e cadeele leñol meeden , yoo sukaabe ngontu mawbe , dariibe dadiibe fellitbe , daranaade leñol meeden , sukaabe on njaaraama , on nduwanaama , yoo alla won ballo , o yettina faandaare moodon , e leñol moodon yaara yeeso , maa moyyu sabu en njiitoon , katante leñol , woni Ibirahiima umar kan , yoo alla jaabo duwaaw aamiin , yaa barke murtudo joob .

mbido nelda besngu umar bango duwaaw endee ustare , mbido wiya ardiibe leydeele afirik , dum doo wonii waaju , sabu battande laamdo , e laamu mum , ko juuti fof , kodoo tan wadtinta , oodo jaado do , hol ganndudo no foti miyoŋaaaji ngonandimo e leydeele tuubakoobe , ko fonnoo wonde ngalu leydi , totte wodbe yoo kuutoro , alaa ko wadi gabon hollaa hadaa sonaa umar bango , mi haada do , sabu hersude ceernam sayku umar bah

mbiya keɓii sago mum’en , mbarii gaño mum’en poolii kadi kaɓdiiɗo mum’en , keɓii poolgu kolla aduna oo , fof weltaare mum’en .
mbiyata ko " Blues " ummiiɗo e jeerennde !
mbiyeteendi Fuuta Tooro .
mbiyi : " Ena njiɗi " .
mbiyi fof iwataa .
mbiyi moomi hol mo wiymaa yaa fellu puccunguu matee kaa kaangaaɗo .
mbiɗo roŋki faamde seeɗa , sabu e winndannde maa ɓennunde-nde , a wiy-no nde el fekki follaa nde , ko siree dara lomtii jooɗoyii ngijilon .
mbodo nelda besngu fulbe julmo wuuri yo alla rokku en wattuude ni mo wuuri taw besngu ngu ina beydi ustaaki .
mbodo nelda ceerno ibrahiima saar e besngu saar sarbe fof duwawuuji e sakkaare jinnaado o yo alla yurnomo yafoomo yo alla harnuuma aljanma yo alla wat barke ko acci mbodo wiiyma fedde fulbe itali ina ndendi e ma sumaare ina nelduuma duwawuuji yo alla yommo moyyere .
mbodo nelduma duwaaw jinnaado men deebo yo alla yurmomo yaf00m0 yo njuude mojje njabbo mo .
mbodo nyaago yo nalakkoobe be tinnondir sabu ko kanbe ngooni darorgal lenyol ko hanaani ot won hakkunde mayye sabu so annduube e alduube e nalakkoobe pecciima yimbe tanpat yo alla addu kawral hakkunde bosngu fulbe demmba wan
mbodo salmina daraniibe dude pular haloobe e dunde adama he on njaarama mi salmini kala daraniido dum an geelel konte mi salminima
mbodo setto e maalik paate soh sabu mbodo anndii mo o yettinoo ma itali laabi didi o weltiini fulbe o walli lenyol fulbe yo Alla sellin doole
mbodo sikki so neddo waadi ko moyyi ina footo manteede so waadi ko moyyaani ina footi yenneede .
mbodo suuni nofeewi e haala kalaaka e saada njaay ka mi anndamo mi anndanaamo kono mbodo anndi wuro koli ko yimbe susbe gonno jiggoobe jabareebe mantaabe sabu so fuuta haalama tan wuro kooli ina haale mi sekkaano pullo fof ha tekti e ngijilonnaaji ina golla de golle ina hawni .
mbodo wiy liduube sibis o sooda ko 856 .
mbodo wiya saada njaay liingu koyngal hoto woppinmo liingu junngo , kono makki kam o jamfiima dum , abdulaay wadd ko mboddi sappantaake , omo fotno miijaade makki ko endam makko , hayso wonaa ko yaltinimo kaso ko .
mbodo yafni jinnaabe e ceernaabe e mawniraabe ko haala ko so ina oonyi walla won mo fewnitaaki dum .
mbodo yetta Aminata jah walla wan .

mi , sal mi n ii on
mi .
mi Aamadu mido weltii faa buri haadi wala .
mi gaynira aɗa foti andinnde jom suudu maa wonaa aan tan o haani ɗooftaade e rokkude needi , alaa hay Jinnaaɓe maa ko heen jeyaa .
mi haalaniino ɗum huunde e hooreeve leyɗe , kono ɓe calii heɗaade mi , jooni noon
mi haaɗii ɗoo haa gonngol .
mi haɓɓa moolo am , mi hoota .
mi jaarnii ma rewbe e worbe dariibe e nder tobo ina ceppa ngam yo demde leydi Senegal keb hakke mum en e Aayaawo e Habrirde leymum en ; feloore e gacce ngalla e mabbe , kono tan ngannden neddo jogii dum ko daande , so nde tayaama tan joomum maayat , dum noon alaa e sago yimbe be naata e dawrugol mbada lanndaaji , ngam mbaawa laamaade keba doole , e oon sahaa ndeen mbaawata timminde hare mum en ngam fonndude demde leydi Senegal to Aayaawo e to Habrirse .
mi jaarniike ndee yontan'nde e dar'nde mum , jallungol fudii uuri , yoo geno wallitir cellal e kisal kuupti'ndinngal , so doole ndonkii yoo doole kebbo , so peeje keewii , yoo yahdu e pellital ha jibina bural .
mi leliima law , gaay e Waala-Fenndoo .
mi meedi winndude mbodo wiy mbodo haawa e haala safalbe muritani hannde ka wiyde ko wadano ko moyyani kadi mi harni so warde yimbe e dow fenaande tacci na mbonno leydi .
mi niaagi ALLAH nde juunnata haa juuta amina
mi salmini bandiraab be fof , bido jokka hajoni kon-gudi bido naagi haa jooni tan minen reewbe yo min tinno no feewi min baasa rokkude haalobe be ko kaali .
mi salmini denndangaal genndiyankoo6e men do6e mbaawi wonnde fof yo jam e kisal e cellal yo won e ma66e de tawno en baawa danyde kene mbuura demngal men en mbaawa danyde kene mbuura aadaaji men e pinal mel oon jaraama pulaagu com e mbiimi com yo allah yob moyyere de ndaranidon pulaagu e demngal men yo allah semmbin doole mon kalla ko jiddando kooye mon yo allah rokku oon onn jaraama
mi salmini kala garowo pulagu com gunmiko e darde so tawi mi yiti nokk0 6atakeji men
mi salminii dennaagal pulagu miweltaniima denndaagal pulagu kalado pullo waawi wonde e nder adunahe misalminii dum on njaarama
mi salminiima ceerno katante lenol seydi saar e feccude mah e bandiraabe men e ustaare jinnaado men o yo geno yurmomo yaafoomo kanko e maaybe julbe amen
mi salminima thierno ibrahim mbodo douwono ma é oustaré youma méne mbo nimsani é besgou moum yo allah towdo o harnou mbo aljana kagko é maybé dioulbé amin yo waliré no moungirda an et bandé ene
mi salminnii on ono ardiibe ndeedoo fedde so hono nii ina wada e kala sahaa lenol fulbe yaarat yeeso .
mi salmonii on mi weltaniima onon kala daraniibe bamtaare leniol mi yettii dum kaaddi njettoor nde wonnoo ko bibbe leniol ngoni jaale leniol ko jambe tambatoo en caldi bamtaare dum noon njokkee golle yo Alla sellin doole miin kala gollonoowo pulaar komin wallodiibe haa bada .
mi serata é douwadé sabou anedou dé mi kalla gourdo ko mayo wo adouna ko djillou tan addy méne do goto fof ko kotowo yéne nawor barké dandowo méne é diahanama
mi tawii demngalam ko ngalu .
mi waasa daɗde e ndeen hare .
mi waawa waasde haalde e naagaade alla nde yurmorto yaafo goggo kemmbu julla mo sukaabe wuro wiyatno buula .
mi weltii ma sanne yo alla sellin doole adda kawral .
mi weltiima e haala ka kaldon e nalakkoobe fulbe sabu e hitaande 1993 to leydi itali mbodo ceerno saydu kan yo alla yurmoomo yafooma kakko e kal maybe juulbe mbodo nanndooma hannde fulbe fof mgonti yimoobe owiykam lenyol so ina banto ko ma heewa jiyinyakkoobe .
mi weltiima e hiirde Demmba njaay ndillaan he no feewi sanne mi tawtaraaka kono tawaabe cimtiniikam no yahri ; sabu paamen banndiraabe Demmba njaay ko ngenndiyanke , ko naalenke dariido potdo walleede haa no feewi sanne ; paamen ko hoodre e nder koode lenol men , sabu fulbe mbiy nde pittataa galle janana , fittu galle maa tawo , Demmbo yoo Geno nawruma yeeso rokku maa balde juutde e battande moyye aamiin yaa Rabbi
mi weltiima no feewi e ko mbadoko ena wadi fayiida no feewi jokke golle
mi weltiima no feewi kono mi wayriima sehilam noddam
mi weltiima sanne e lowre men ndee .
mi weltima et golle de mi do farnarro yon mbi do farna ro hooram
mi weltima hande no feewi sabu pame mecal ala jeydo ko bawdo tan naftorto njange njangine ngopene fecoru
mi weltima he odo site walihi
mi wiino mi haalata kono mi waawa nyande 25 .
mi winndi hen yimre gar gar ha guppen hol ko dum wooni ko tew cafngu tan wonno modi tew yakkaani dille keewi nder reedu .
mi yafniima fulbe fof
mi yafniima kala dendiraado yo alla addu kawral e lenyol fulbe .
mi yattii Geno nde hokki en hono Ceerno Katante ngal seedantaagal ngal oseetii Mammadu sammba joob ina selli ko Ceerno Murtoɗo Joob ko wujo hefataa maayo laɓɓintaa ina wa i no ko mbuubu waawanaa e keewal geec yo Geno heɓbinan leñol ngol hono Katante en yoo Geno yurmo yaaɓe yaafoobe haanaɓe aljanna o jaabanoo en duwaawuuji Sala Maamuudu Joob to Mbaañ

miijo-ɗaa miicco-ɗaa haa ɓooya mbi-yaa alaa .
miijojo maɓɓe tan ko he ngonka maɓɓe Burkinaaɓe , ɓe mbellitaani
miijooji maɓɓe he ngonka maɓɓe Afriknaaka e ngootaagu mum .

mum .
mum e yahdude e fedde ndee haa ɗo Geno haaɗni .
mum eggineede ñalnde 21 Mbooy ( marsa ) fayde gurel tokosel ina wiyee

naange , lewru , koode , " laawol jeeri e waalo " ( ko njiyaten ena niwɗa e dow asamaan , hon wiyooɓe ɗum baawal , eɗen mbaawi wiyde ɗum " dental koode " walla " galaksi " no aduna fof wiyata ɗum ni ) e geɗe goɗɗe goodɗe e nder asamaan o ( e nder ndoogu ngu ) .
naange , miijo ngoo ina waawi laataade .
naange ko geɗe ñiiɓɗe , koolniiɗe , ɗe leeltataa , ɗe njaawataa .
naange ñalnde fof , jamma e ñalawma fof , woni balɗe 365 hitaande ɗee kala .
naange ɓurɗe mawnude hannde , to Inndo e to Siin , njeñtinta ko hakkunde 1 , 3 e
naangiire ( centrale solaire ) julorteende ɗoo e hitaande 2050 .
naata e jumaa hee , bannge maa nano .
naatgol kallu-lahaa , aksidaa ɗaɗi ngaandi .
naatgol mboros oo e ɓalndu , ɗum feeñirta ko no maale girip nii : paawngal hoore
naati wuro Kayhayɗi .
naatnude e hakkillaaji heddiiɓe ɓee wonde laamu koloñaal nguu ko laamu leefngu .
nafoore : kala donkuɗo nafde jom suudu mum haydara , ina woodani debbo o muñande mo , so ronkaama caggal ɗuum , ina woodani mo ɗaɓɓude ceergal e dow laawol ñaawooɓe ( sahabaaɓe heewɓe kaalii ɗuum .
nafoore heewndi ina e winndande ma a yettaama e e humpito ma !

ndaareede , haa waya no nanndooji mum colaaɗi , ene mbaɗaa e ñorgo .

ngal .
ngal Fedde MSAS/Maliwatch yuɓɓinta duuɓi ɗiɗi kala .
ngal jaaborgal kalfinaandal pinal , wiy-demo ko ɗemɗe ɓaleeɓe kaɗi ɗemngal arab mawnude haa ɓura ɗo ko fenaande , sabu ɓaleeɓeɓe ina njannga Arab , ɓe calii ko waɗteede Aarabeeɓe .
ngal rokkaa daraja ɗemngal lawakeewal ( statut
ngal sabu so ƴeewaama , aarabeeɓe ngonaani 25% e kuuɓal juulɓe , yeru
ngalanaaka jaabtowol , kono yimɓe ina njenanaa aɗum weli Dowla Mali .
ngalu e ustude liigunde ;
ngam haɓde e laamu Mali .
ngam heefde ko wuɗi koo , rajo ngam ustude ñawannde ndee e warde celule ñawɗe ɗee ,
ngam heɓɓitaade bempeƴƴe ( onndooji ) e keɓe ɗe ɓeeynirka kaa wostondirta e
ngam hurmbitde golle ɗee .
ngam jokkidde golle e luggiɗinaade e peeje .
ngam juulee ñalnde Mawbaare 30 ( 4 Korse 2019 ) .
ngam juuraade Seek Ahmadu Bammba Mbakke , gonnooɗo kañum ne e ndeenka e
ngam neldeede leydi men .
ngam o woni jaagorgal caggal leydi ( ministe eteraase ) fotde duuɓi 10 , hay ella gooto yiyaaka e makko .
ngam tawtoreede jamma mawnin'de nguurndam sayku umaar taal , kaa jamma , ko jamma maayo ganndal , ko jamma maayo dañal , ko jamma maayo cellal , ko jamma yaajeende e kala baŋnge , ɗum noon hotomo maŋki , teeŋti e juulɓe wonɓe e duunde Amirik .
ngam waawde faccirde miijooji luggi kadi e wiɗtireede gannde kese e
ngam waɗde haa caɗeele goodɗe fof ena ndoɓinndee , ñawndee ko yaajtii .
ngam yiytude iwdi kabaruuji ( gannde , haala , ekn ) dokketeeɗi e Wikipedia .
nganndi cereeli Naange ko dokkal Alla , ngal soodetaake , ngal ɓeeɓataa .
nganndondira , eɓe ngoowondira , eɓe ngoodondira ngam darodaade e dadodaade e
nganndu-ɗaa , goodal mum en laatii tigi ko caggal tabitgol Dowla oo caggal

ngar , won garɗo ɗoo ina addi fenaande mawnde .

njeewtinoo-mi e jaayndiyaŋke Angalteernaajo ena wiyee Colin Baker .
njetto mawɗo faade mussiƴo men ibrahiima saar , ibara , mo wonaa hasside hay sahaa gooto , ɓetti mette leñol werlee e peñol , seydi saar njokke golle , miin non mbudo , ñagoo so ine newii , nde mballataa ko wayno aamen , nde pirantaa leñol ngol , ko waɗatee GAZA KO hol saabi ƴum , elle mi suwaa tawo yiide aɗa waƴi heen mbinndanɓe , sabu minen mi njangi tan ko pulaar , ɗuum min calminii min njuuriima
njettoor am e makki sal
njettoor am fayde e mon
njettoor fa'de giɗo leñol sabu golle paayodinɗe ɗe mbaɗ ɗaa hono nde ɗoo deftere ; sabu won ko jogoraani yejjiteede e nguurndam ; sabu ɓee waraaɓe e kala sahaa ina poti mawnineede e siiftoreede , sabu ko maayan ɓe leñol , hannde , jaŋngo golle mon ko min haalooɓe .
njettor e duwaaw
njiytaa , hono onndooji ɓaaƴo ( ondes gravitationnelles ) , gaddanoyooji en waawde
njiɗii faamnde ummandere siriyanaaɓe e ɗii lebbi , alaa e sago mbaasen
njiɗmi ko gine 2 gana 1 gana adato nanude
njogii fiyngo ko kamɓe tan keerorii : wanngo , rippoo , mbalax , kono eɓe
njokkee golle , muñon tampere , maa wood biydo ko on kuywe !
njokken golle .
njokken golle wonaa ɗoo tan foti haaɗde haa to Muritani , en ɗamtindaaki , hay e orop sabu ko ɗoo njeyeɗen waasataa wiyɓe mi haaɗnii lamɗam
njokku weltinde Muritaninaaɓe kala .
njoorto mawɗo ena sooynaa e makko
njooɓiima ko ina ɓura 600 000 fittaandu .
njuulee mo wuuri
njuɓɓinii yeewtere fattamlamre e nder Nuwaasot e gardagol Alasan Jallo ,
no Beles Kompawoore , Linngani e Haari Sonngo e laamu .
no O feewniri on , mbele yoo oɗon manta ( neemaaji makko ) !
no aduna oo waynii ko noon tan njiirataamo , firti ɗum njiyataa heen koTagoore Waɗnde faayiida kadi ñande fof maa yiyi heen ko ena ɓeeyda kulol maa Allah subhaanahuu , wataalaa .
no feewi nde ñawɗo oo diisnotoo doktoor mum , mbele ina ƴeewtanoo mo safaara oo
no jomiradoo hinno yaafamo !
no koloñaal jaasɗo heewnoo waɗde nii , no waɗnoo Mammadu Daraame , walla Jeeri
no mbaaw-ɗaa waade ko mbaaw-ɗaa haalde e ko mbaaw-ɗaa wadde , fof maa woot kaalɗo heen .
no saraaji Bordoo walla e naɗde Rhône hedde wuro Lyon ( ɗum fof ko to Farayse ) ,
no wayde fof
noddaandu Tabital pulaagu Liberwiil Gabon o ari nootitaade .
noddaango , sukaaɓe e mawɓe , rewɓe e worɓe ummiɓe e nder wuro Daara ngoo ,
noddirde Annabi Yuunus Jom Nuun .
noddirde am ena ñifi .
noddiriɓe , o wiyi so tawii eɓe njogii naamnde .

seydi njaay jokku golle fulbe fulbe ne caggal ma
seydi saar , yoo alla 6eydu ganndal ,
seydi saar ; a hollii so won dariibe ina yefta pulaar ina mnadta e demde godde , won ngabbube dow asamaan ina yetta demde gogde ina mbadta e pulaar haa nafoore e semmba maggal yahra yeeso .
seydi saar a gollii kono kala ko ada haala yaataw ina woodi .
seydi saar a haali googa sabu ina annda hakkunde muritani walla seneegal e makka tinmaani nyalawma .
seydi saar a weltanaama e ballal ma baɗngal fayiida de tawno fulfulde nde ina foti wattude heen hakkilaaji mumen no feewi ko kalɗa ko miɗo yadi heen hankadin en poti ummaade e jonnde tee mo njiɗa fof ina naŋti e ɗemngal mum ina nanti e pina tawa enen ne ko haaɗi en naŋtaade eko jeyɗeen ko ɗum poɗɗen wattude hakkilaaji no feewi en mbaawa dañje keene ɓura ɗemngal men e adaaji men e pina tawa men tinno ɗen e ɗemngal men mbeele ina yaara yeeso

sibu , nde Aali Yero nanngetee ndee , heɓii wiyde wonde maa " dame kasoo oo uddit
sibu e jamaanu men hannde telfoŋ ene jeyaa e geɗe ɓurɗe ɓattaade en ene jeyaa kadi e geɗe ɗe ɓur ɗen waawde huutoraade .
sibu e oon jaamaanu yimɓe ina ngandu noo ceergal tan woonaani feere , kadi safraani caɗeele ( dewgal ) .
sibu en mbiyii wonde " wuddere ɓaleere " yiyotaako , kono ko ganndal yowito kuɓtodinngal

sikki alaa so tawii jabbal waylaaki , ko yeeso tan fayaa .
sikkude .

taw hay mbuuɗu yoɓaani so tawii

tawi heen ɗiɗo ko hardaneeɓe ( tonngoode 22 e 23 e doggol " Konu " garowol
tawi kadi ine teskii : gallugol politikaaji kuutoragol won ɗeen ɗemɗe nder nehdi e jaŋde companoondi ko ɓooyi , ngam wallitde ɓamtaare faggudu e renndo , gallulol ngol denndaangal gollooɓe he nder jaŋde ceedtii ; baasgol aaɓnaade jettagol paandaale Jaŋde wonande yimɓe fof ɗoo e hitaande 2015 , haa teeŋti noon e nder Afrik kam e leyɗe Arab , so wonaa tan , ma a taw , he leyɗe ɗo ɗemngal neeniwal janngooɓe ɓee woni ɗemngal jaŋde ; ɓeydagol yimɓe faamde nafoore keewal ɗemɗe e pine he nder renndo , ɗo ɗemngal neeniwal reeni pine kulanaaɗe majjude .
tawi noon hay Maawiya e hoore mum yahiino haa wiyi " jiɗɗo fof yo artu " , ina foti mettude yimɓe fof sibu , kaan haala diwtaama ko ɓooyi , gila nde Maawiya haali konngol mbiy-ɗen ngol , caggal ɗum Siidi wul Sheek Abdallaahi felliti artirde ɓe , Abdel Asiis ari , jokki ngool gartirgol
tawi tooweeki majje alaa no foti , sibu ko hedde desimeeteruuji seeɗa .
tawii .
tawii tan kala maayɗo ko yanaande mum , ko caɗeele mawɗe oo ɗoo ceernaajo addani en .
tawta jaaynde haaleteende ndee , fuɗɗanoonde gila e cosgol fedde e hitaande 1976 e jirwingol Jibi Hammee Lih en , Aamadu Umar Jah e Mohammadul Habib Soh .

Ñaawirɗe kuuge : jurisdictions pénales
Ñaawoore Abdel Ajiiju
Ñaawoore Thomaa Sankara
Ñaawoore ndee fuɗɗiima gila e 25 saawiyee , heewii dille sabu yimɓe laamɗo gadiiɗo oo ngarii e keewal ( banndiiko en , watulaaɓe makko e kala ɓe o waɗatnoo ñalaande ) hay so tawii naatgol e suudu ñaawirdu nduu saɗtinaama no feewi .
Ñaawoore tuubakooɓe : Goomu korgol e ñaawgol , caggal nde jooɗii , hawri ko Baydi Kacce gooto tan waawaa warde Abel Sanndee , sabu e miijo maɓɓe , Baydi ko nelaaɗo tan , etee alaa waawɓe nelde mo so wonaa hoohooɓe Tooro , hono saliiɓe lelnande Tuubakooɓe daaɗe .
Ñaawoore yanii , goonga heɓtiima fenaande
Ñaawoowo najii , sabu ko neɗɗo haalata koo , ko hakke mum , sabu neɗɗo ko jeyaa fof , jeyi mbalndi mum , comcol mum e ɓanndu mum .
Ñaawoowo oo : Aan kam neɗɗo , holi ko saabii aɗa wara ñuuñu ?
Ñaawoowo oo hucciti kadi e ñuuñu .
Ñaaƴo wutteeji ( Binta Jallo )
Ñakki ko koowooje metteɗe haɓde sibu cuuɗotoo ko e nokkuuji ganiiɗi .
Ñakku ( feso ) aadoraango , hono feso huutertenoongo haa oo sahaa ngoo : he ndee feere , ko wiris mo tooke ( doole ) mum leefɗinaa , walla mo tooke mum cammitaa naatnetee he ɓalndu neɗɗo , mbele so yiyii wiris oo ine feewna kaɓtorɗe .
Ñakku Siin nguu ne no wayi ?
Ñakku kesu nguu , yeru ngu laboratuwaaruuji Pfizer e Moderna peewni nguu , mbiyeteengu ñakku " ARN messager " .
Ñakkuuji Siin ɗii ɓuri newaade mooftude sibu ɓuuɓol ɗaɓɓi ngol ɓuri hakindaade sibu ko hakkunde degreeji 2 e 8 celsius .
Ñalaande sooynanoonde ndee yontii .
Ñalawma 2 settaamburu 1890 , tawi ko eɓe ngoni e nder wuro Haayre Laaw .
Ñalawma Alamari e Kayhayɗi Ceɗɗaagu laawiima
Ñalawma Lewru e jamma Lewru
Ñalawma Suleymaani Baal dañii jamaanu sibu tolnoyiima e 1 200 aadee ko jiidaa e fedde yuɓɓinnde ndee .
Ñalawma alet hannde oo , neene Kuro ko nelɗo sukaaɓe ɓee yoo mbaynayoo .
Ñalawma deftere al ɓuraana he pulaar
Ñalawma gooto , Baru ina jooɗii e hakkunde galle mum , rewɓe makko ina taarii mo .
Ñalawma gooto , Goppaaɗo ladi haa les ɓokki kii , ɓaggii e fooɓre ndee .
Ñalawma gooto , caggal nde faarmata ñalli gollude haa kikiiɗe , o tampi haa o yejjiti lawƴude horde wootere .
Ñalawma gooto goonga e fenaande meeɗiiɗo hawrude , kamɓe tan ɗiɗo goɗɗo tawaaka tawtoraaka .
Ñalawma gooto o yahii haa nder ladde , omo haaltoo .
Ñalawma gooɓe jiile yuɓɓinanooma e nguurndam Ceerno Suleymaani ñalnde hoore biir ( altine ) 4 noowammbar ( jolal ) 2017 to CICES Ndakaaru e gardagol Seneraal Usmaan Kan .
Ñalawma hakkunde leyɗeele deftere e jojjanɗe wallifo mawninaama e leydi Muritani ñalnde 23 abriil hitaande 2015 e gardagol Jaagorɗo Pinal e Ñeeñe , sokna Hinndu Mintu Ayniin e dow tiitoonde : deftere Muritani e cappanɗe karallaagal kesal .
Ñalawma juulde layya , ko ñalawma kirsugol layyaaji , ñaamgol teewuuji juɗaaɗi e defaaɗi ; ko ñalawma mo mawɓe njuurondirta , ñaagondira yaafuya , kadi nduwondira moƴƴere .
Ñalawma o fof e hawrude e lewru koorka , Allah addu higgu mum ɓuuɓol haa ñaaƴo ngo huuɓi caafal naange ina mooftaa e nder duule ɓaleeje cirƴooje baade e kala sahaa e nder boowal ñaaƴo ngal .
Ñalawma o waɗanoo ko e teddungal sarɗiyanke Alhajji Farba Ngom kono o araani arnoo e innde makko ko Sarɗiyanke ; Aliw Demburu Lella oo ɗoo sarɗiyanke haalii heen mbaɗka faayiida ; golle ɗe kala ardii ɗe ko Ceerno Muntagaa Bah o yooɗnii haa yooɗi sanne : Aadama Sal rokkaama heen konngol sabu darnde makko e ñalɗi ɗi kala ; Saalif Keytaa gardiiɗo Fuwaar o ƴeftii konngol ngam jaarde renndo ngo e yettude Seriif Seek Umar Aydara ; kanko o addii heen ballal mawngal ; Uddi golle ɗe ko Seriif Seek Umar ; sakkitnoo duwaay o ko Sariif Ɓiy Muhammadel Habiib ; yimɓe ɓe caakii ko hedde waktuuji sappo jamma .
Ñalawma oo .
Ñalawma oo hurmbitiraa ko njillu ɗowaangu .
Ñalawma oo ko ñalawma daartolyankeejo , sabu addiɓe ɗoon ko siifondirde e Baabakar Jaañ hooreejo CNRA ngam keɓgol siññaal mo ene addana Tele Fulɓe wonde tele keɓtinaaɗo , laawɗuɗo , kadi baawɗo jaggeede he nder galleeji tawa wonaa Youtube tan .
Ñalawma waawaa muusde haa heɓa tuma mo
Ñalawma ɗemngal neeniwal
Ñalawma ɗemngal neeniwal mawninteeɗo he nder winndere ndee ñalnde 21 colte ( feebariyee ) hitaande kala , ko ñalawma mo UNESCO dotti gila hitaande 2000 .
Ñalawma ɗimmo o , ko Pr Abuubakiri Muusaa Laam ɓannginta yeewtere fa’tunde e iwdi Fulɓe , nde fuɗɗotoo ko tuggi waktuuji sappo e jeeɗiɗi kikiiɗe haa heɓa waktuuji noogaas waktu Afrik Hakkundeejo .
Ñalawma ɗiɗmo o woni 4 mbooy , lofu naatana sagataaɓe tawtoraaɓe ɓe ngoni e firde e loowde pulaar e ndeer wanngorde FireFox , so en njiɗii mbiyen ñande heen pulaar haalaama winndaama no feewi e ndeer Agence Universitaire de la Francophonie , ko meeɗaa waɗde e mum ko gila maha , kurka gooto pullo ina liggoo e nokku he wi'i ( ko ɓammi liggaade ɗo ko , ko hannde njiimi banndam en , ɗuum ko weltaare mawnde , ɗuum noon maa mi waɗan on ko mi meeɗa waɗde to bannge restorasioŋ )
Ñalde o yimdi e Baaba Maal ngam mawninde manditaare jibinannde Daande Leñol to Ndakaaru , leydi Senegaal , Madiina woppi jaŋde , o tiindii Dowlaaji Denduɗi Amerik yiɗde wontude naalaŋke tawa ko e mbaadi karallaagal .
