Ɓaawo hitaande ko baagal weeyo Juno fuɗɗii gollaade , jooni ngal nuldii ko laaɓi e kabaruuji Rojju , nde annduɓe tiimi e ko ngal neldi ummoraade e Rojju , ɓe ƴeewtindii ɓe tawi ko duleeɗi moolanaaɗi ngoni e lobbuli ɗaŋre ɓurnde mawnude e yuɓɓo-naange .
Ɓaawo min janngii ɓataake mawɗo Tijaan Mbaalo fii limgal e keeweendi haalooɓe Fulfulde , men tawno ndee toɓɓere LIMGAL FULƁE , maa keeweendi Fulɓe , ko e toɓɓe ɓurɗe himmude ɗe pot-ɗen daranaade , ɗuum waɗi min meeɗii waɓɓude e TPI yo immano ndee toɓɓere , eɗen nana limooje janteteeɗe ɗe njaɓnaaki , yimɓe men kadi ko ɗeen ɓe pillotoo e binndi e haala maɓɓe , hulɓinii heen ko geɗe ɗiɗi
Ɓaawo ɗum ko ciimtol golle fedde ndee hooreejo yaaɓani , o arti e huunde he ko gollaa , pergitte kam e kuccam .
Ɓaawo ɗuum huccanaa ko toɓɓere ɗimmere batu nguu , so Galle ( boowal ) Fedde ndee .
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri ( matière noire )
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri e kaawisaaji mum ɗi ngasata .
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ɓakdi niɓɓiɗndi , joopii ko ɓakdi ndi feeñirtaa bempeƴƴe kuɓ-pooɗal no ɓakdi ngoowaandi ndi ni , alaa ndi tiniraa e ndi woodi tan ko batte mayri e fooɗngo
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ɓakdi niɓɓiɗndi , joopii ko ɓakdi ndi feeñirtaa bempeƴƴe kuɓ-pooɗal no ɓakdi ngoowaandi ndii nii , ndi tiniraa e ndi woodi tan ko batte mayri e fooɗngo .
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ɓakdi ŋakkundi fuɗɗi haaleede ko e ɗemngal ganndo Siwisnaajo biyeteeɗo Jwiki hitaande 1930 , nde o wiɗtatno dille lilluɗe koode jonɗe jeyaaɗe e ɗatal Tolli ( constellation de la chevelure de Bérénice ) , o teski won'de njaaweeki majje ina ɓurtiri ɓeto makko no feewi .
Ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ɓakdi ŋakkundi fuɗɗii haaleede ko e ɗemngal ganndo Siwisnaajo biyeteeɗo Jwiki e hitaande 1930 , nde o wiɗtatnoo dille lilluɗe koode jonɗe , jeyaaɗe e ɗatal Tolli ( constellation de la chevelure de Bérénice ) , o teskii wonde njaaweeki majje ina ɓurtiri ɓeto makko no feewi .
Ɓaleere-Muritani ndee , sibu , denndaangal leyɗe Arab gonɗe e Afrik ɗee , tuggi ɓurndi
Ɓaleeri : -fetel , -kural , -gaawal , -denngere , -yeeɓru , -silaama , -jaasi , -laɓi , -ngoobaan , -tufirdi , -cañal , -gitte , -buyaade , -jammbere , -sakaade , -serem , -sowta , -jalo , -labangal , -alkabeere
Ɓaleeɓe , remooɓe , waañooɓe , waali wuro en hoɗnooɓe ɗoon gila
Ɓalewol mon yumɗi wano fina .
Ɓalewol ɓanndu am no dahaa .
Ɓalli koloñaal en ngulii , maayɓe keewii .
Ɓalliwal : rokkaa njeenaari ndii ko faraysenaajo ine wiyee Alain Aspect , e ameriknaajo John F .
Ɓamtude Pulaar .
Ɓamtude juuɗe mum saanga nde duwotoo .
Ɓamtugol ( leydi ɓeydaama heen ) diik tulde palotooɗo ndiyam mayo e nder ɗum ɓe ngaddi masiŋ nokkoowo ( Sarsoor ) Nuwasoot
Ɓanndu heewndu ( ɓuɗtitgol pakitngol ) ,
Ɓanndu ina sooma ñawu jabet duuɓi jonɗi tawa maale mum peeñaani .
Ɓanndu joom mum sooyɗa .
Ɓarakorde Tummbere Jiinge walla mbiyen Jeeriyel Tummbere ko ɗeɓi-duunde ɗo ɓarake Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi , Ceerno Suleymaani Baal e Ceerno Maalik Gallu Bah tawetee ko aldaa e sikke .
Ɓarkke ɓooyɗe liɗɗi
Ɓataake Pool Kagame feewde e Kamaruunnaaɓe
Ɓataake binndaaɗo luurduɓe ɓe denndaaɗo tawa eɓe ɗaɓɓi jowgol feere nde sabu ɗaminaade dañde feere nanndiraande hakkunde maɓɓe .
Ɓataake caaktaaɗo feewde e laamu e gollodiiɓe
Ɓataake faade e Renndo Muritani Woodaani konngol kattanngol jaŋtaade hurum , hiisa , njeeɓoor e hoolaare mawnde nde njogii-mi faade e Renndo .
Ɓataake faade e renndo Muritani
Ɓataake feewde e Tawtorteeɓe Mooɓondiral nayaɓiiwal Jeyaaɓe e lannda Tawassul
Ɓataake feewde e Tawtorteeɓe Mooɓondiral nayaɓiiwal Jeyaaɓe e lannda Tawassul :
Ɓataake huccinaama e laamɗo leydi Muritani Mohamed Wuld Abdel Asiis ; jaagorgal Amerik kalfinaangal jokkondiral hakkude leyɗeele e pelle jojjanɗe Aadee gonɗe e Amerik .
Ɓataake mo o nawi toon ene waɗi siifannde makko kanko tan gooto o , so Ceerno Basiiru , Ceerno Madaani , Ceerno Ahmad Tijjan Bah , Ceerno Seykh Tijani Baro , arɗooɓe men mawɓe , e gooto kala e mawɓe pelle Fulɓe Senegaal , ko wayno Goodal , Kisal Deeyirde Senegaal , ekn .
Ɓayri aybuɓe ina keewi , ɓe hay gooto waawaa haɗde ɗum en hebbinde deedi mum en , annduɓe ɓee miijii wonde wiyde ina haɗa yimɓe ( jogiiɓe ko ñaami haa ɓurti ) ñaamde haa kaara , ko huunde saɗtude , sibu ko wayi no jalluɓe e kankanɓe e Wele en , njaɓataa ndee feere haangaande , ɓe tampintaa heen nii koye maɓɓe , joofataa !
Ɓayri en cakkitii ittugol senaa , eɗen cakkita kadi cosgol gollal Cukko Hooreejo leydi .
Ɓayru Debbo Hydre femme
Ɓayru Gorko .
Ɓe Ceerataa , Wallifannde hesere Demmbel Sal yaltii nana he jeeyirɗe Defte .
Ɓe Ceerataa , ko tiitoonde deftere pentol yaltunde jooni , nde wallifiyanke dowluɗo o , Demmbel Sal fawi kadi he juuɗe tarotooɓe coñce .
Ɓe Ceerataa , ko tiitoonde deftere pentol yaltunde jooni , nde wallifiyanke dowluɗo o , Demmbel Sal fawi kadi he juuɗe tarotooɓe coñce Pulaar .
Ɓe Ceerataa , nde wallifiyanke Demmbel Sal yaltii
Ɓe Ceerataa ko deftere pentol walla miilol , hono no wallifiyanke o suɓii noddirde ɗum ni , etatoonde sorde he nder hakkille mo nde aywinta o , Nafisatu , mbele ma o ƴoog toon miijooji mum e co’anɗe mum , ngam o waawa faccirirde ɗum kaa ngonka mum peeñka he guural :
Ɓe cafroo haa ɓe cella yoo sale .
Ɓe calii Aali Yero ubbee .
Ɓe coodii naꞌi noogaas e ɗiɗi ngam heblude ñalaaɗe kaddungal kam e yuɓɓo mawngo ngoo .
Ɓe cuɓtii falnde Ɓoggee , ɓe peri heen lappol keborngol yillaade gure sappo denndinɗe haalpulaar en e safalɓe .
Ɓe jahi ko juuti haa njottii Ariwelto e ɓe ngondi e tampere maɓɓe .
Ɓe kollirii wonnde maɓe cos cate he nder falnde ndee fof ngam haɓe ɓura waawde hirjinde e famminde yimɓe ɓee ko hol saabi yimɓe ɓee ene poti rentude ndaroo mbele Podoor ene wonta diiwal ( région ) .
Ɓe kolliti " kaɓɓagol maɓɓe e silsil Ñalɗi Diisnondiral Ngenndiiji juɓɓinanooɗi 25 settaambar 2007 , sibu mum en wonde nanondiraaɗi , baawɗi wallitde beldital ngenndiwal , fawaade e jeewtidgol yimɓe fof e peeñningol goonga e deftingol njuɓɓudi laamu ndii e konu nguu e kisal leydi ndii laawol , ɗum ittee , woɗɗitinee juuɗe waɗooɓe e fewjooɓe warhoore e fitinaaji añamnguraagu hakkunde leƴƴi "
Ɓe kolliti e oon ɓataake ko ngonka leyɗe komin Teekaan , e faayre mawnde nde ɓe ngondi sibu maɓɓe hulde hoto ɓe ɓoleede leyɗe maɓɓe ndema , ɓe ɗaɓɓiri mo ballal e ɗuum .
Ɓe kolliti wonde sariyaaji winndere ɓuri sariyaaji leyɗeele doole , ngari ɗum en dow , haa arti noon e sariyaaji joom mum en ƴettanta koye mum en ngam yiɗde " yaafaade koye mum en , hono ko laamu koninkooɓe Muritani yiɗi waɗde koo " .
Ɓe koɗdi koɗgol njooɗngol .
Ɓe kuutortoo ko pinngu ngam naatnude nder keeci joomum too penndam ( tawi ɓe ceekaani hay huunde ) .
Ɓe lomtinii he nokku seppongoo waɗde haalande ( declaration ) ngam hollirde geɗe limtinɗe ɗe falnde ndee jogii e nafoore , ko wayno ndema , ngaynaaka , njulaagu e mahanteeje goɗɗe renndoyankeeje , yantude e yimɓe falnde nde kadi e njaanjeendi mum .
Ɓe mbaawii yeewtude e jojjande aadee ( Droits de l’homme ) e jojjanɗe debbo ( droits de la femme ) .
Ɓe mbaawii yiyde Nanondiral kuuɓtindingal jojjanɗe aadee , e nanondiral CEDEF keeringal e ngonka rewɓe .
Ɓe mbaawii yiyde ko feewti e dallinande , hol no dallinortee .
Ɓe mbaɗi feere afo fewji ndee .
Ɓe mbaɗii dente , ɓe ndenndinii ngaluuji ngam rewindaade njanngu e nder Commune Saŋe Loobaali .
Ɓe mbaɗii golle ngenndiyankooɓe , ɗe daartol jogori teskaade e nder jamanuuji sabu faamde konngol Martin Luther King biyngol : " woto naamndo ko leñol maa , wuro maa walla leydi maa waɗantu maa kono nde fin-ɗaa fof ƴeew ko pot-ɗaa waɗande leñol maa , wuro maa walla leydi maa " .
Ɓe mbaɗii golle ngenndiyaŋkooɓe , ɗe daartol jogori teskaade e nder jamanuuji sabu faamde konngol Ibraahiima Saar biyngol : " aduna ko jamanuuji e sahaaji , jamaanu ko maa feewnee , sahaa ko reenee .
Ɓe mbi'i wonde ladde ndee lewaama sabu leɗɗe keewɗe maayii .
Ɓe mbismaa , ɓe njippinaa .
Ɓe mbiyi " inisiyatiif " maɓɓe oo ko nokku diisondiral e ndeenka , mo alaa ko woni faandaare mum so wonaa " daranaade ɓure renndo men " .
Ɓe mbiyi " ndeen min ndokkii doombi yowiti oo , he nder jonte seeɗa min teskiima ñawu nguu dartiima tem .
Ɓe mbiyi : " So oɗon nanatnoo Oolo-oolooga .
Ɓe mbiyi heen " biro amen , mo haralleeɓe mum ndewindii golle mahngo ndee huɓeere mawnde e daawe mum kala , e ballondiral e aasiñooruuji SNIM , ina deeƴna ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓee , sibu alaa fof huunde tammbiinde mahdi ndii waɗi ɗii gebbi dowrowi " .
Ɓe mbiyi heen " lebbi keewɗi jooni amin ngondi e jaakre e najoore mawnde nde min njiyi peŋɗe ina ñiɓee , fotde ujunnaaje keewɗe hektaar gese amen ina kullee ( gese amen ndema e durnirɗe ) ɗe min tawri taaniraaɓe amen .
Ɓe mbiyi kamɓe annduɓe , nde neɗɗo feeñi nde , yahi haa ɓooyi ƴeestii seeɗa seerti e jawdi .
Ɓe mbyi ko ɗoo woni aadi duusondiral men .
Ɓe nanondirii waɗde batu ngoɗngu ngam suɓaade terɗe goomuuji 5 ɗii .
Ɓe ndaaŋani gure ɗee e wallondirde e mawɓe mum en , waali wuro en e meeruuji kominaaji ɗii .
Ɓe ndeftoo kadi harameeji jeeɗiɗi ɗii ɓe pawa heen
Ɓe ndewni heen ko Laam Tooro Sidiki Sal .
Ɓe nduttondiri teddungal e yeeso yimɓe kala .
Ɓe ngalaa hay kaayit gooto , fotɓe heɓtinireede jinnaaɓe mum en walla koreeji mum en .
Ɓe ngamii haa ɓe mbeltii , ɓe mbeltanii Gise en weltaare nde waawaa
Ɓe ngidda ɓe ndaroo , kadi ɓe njooɗtoo ɓe tawa wonaa kaŋko .
Ɓe ngonaa ansaar ad’diina ( wallooɓe diina ) ɓe ngonaa jihadiiɓe ( tiiɗnaniiɓe ) diina , kanɓe kay ko ɓe lojooɓe diina e renndo ngo diina o wuuri ngo .
Ɓe ngoni e waɗde ɓerɗe ɗiɗi kono ɓe tawi noppi ɗii taƴaaka .
Ɓe ngostondirtunoo jiyaaɓe ɓee ko e laamɓe afrikanaaɓe , ɓe ngostoroo jiyaaɓe ɓee marsandiis ummoriiɗo Orop e Mediteraane ( bagiiji , gemha , jawe , ñaaƴe weer , sanngara , jamɗe , paakaaji ekn ) .
Ɓe nguurtee kaaɗi koye maɓɓe ndilla yoo yiɗe .
Ɓe njiyti ɗoo ko feere mawnde , waawnde moƴƴitinde nguurndam yimɓe heewɓe .
Ɓe njokki laawol maɓɓe eɓe njaha .
Ɓe noddii kadi denndaangal ardiiɓe lanndaaji dawrugol , foti ko bannge lunndo ngoo walla ko to bannge laamiiɓe ɓee , e daraniiɓe geɗe renndo ( société civile ) nde ngarata nootitoo tawa ko he dow yeewtere ngoongɗunde wonndunde e fiɓnde tiiɗnde , mbele suɓngooji hooraagu leydi payɗi waɗde ñalnde 15 Bowte ( Décembre ) 2024 ene mbaɗa he dow mbaydi laaɓtundi , udditaniiɗi mo woni kala , tawa guli e jeddi ngoodataa heen .
Ɓe o yiɗnoo " danndude " njani e makko , kalki mo , njantoyi e ngenndiyankooɓe .
Ɓe peewnii kolaaɗe , ɓe mbaɗii heen giriyaasuuji , ɓe coodii kaɓirɗe gilnooje , ɓe ndokkii pelle rewɓe ngalu ngam mbaɗa booñ " res-restu " mo aldaa e pawnaari .
Ɓe pewjata ko lulaade toon ko juuti kono nde wonno neɗɗo ko ñaamoowo , jaroowo poofoowo , ala-e-sago ɗeen geɗe pewjee no keɓiraa hade maɓɓe yaaɓan'de toon , wonaa kay yahrude noon tan tawa peeje cakkaaka , to duɗal jaaɓi haaɗtirede wuro Milton Keynes to Angleteer almuudu ina toon yiylo no ndiyam heɓortoo e njamndi mbiyeteendi Ilminaayt ( ilmenite ) , nde wonnoo ndiin njamndi ina sarii to lewru , so ndi wulnaama ndi suurkat Oksijen , ɓe peewnira ɗum ndiyam so ɓe njantini heen Hidrojen , ko goonga ko ina ɓura peeje 20 ɓulnirɗe ndiyam ina ngoodi kono ndee ɗo feere fewjeteende to duɗal ngaal ɗoon ɓuri famɗude waɗo-waɗo .
Ɓe pini , mawɗo gorko gooto ina jannina ɓe tinndi , cifti , Haala e holno ɓe poti huutoraade leɗɗe .
Ɓe pini ɓe ɓuftii , ɓe njuuli , ɓe ɓami comci maɓɓe jooɗɗi , wuro ngo weltii .
Ɓe taartorii wuro ngoo bannge worgo .
Ɓe teskiima won'de e ɓe cooynoo won e kuule weeyo , huunde wootere no ɗiɗe ni , ɗuum firti ko , eɓe cooyno lillungal gootal no ɗiɗe ni , waɗi noon ko e nder yolnde hakkunde men e ngaal lillungal jiyrangal noon won ko woni heen e mooɓre ɓakdi ko fotata naɗɗiɗin'de weeyo ngo , kala ko rewi heen selat mooɓre nde ɓenna , to Jowondiral kuuɓtidinngal ( relativité générale ) , ngool celol alaa ko daɗata ngol e ngeɗon weeyo hay pooyton ( photons ) .
Ɓe ɗiɗo kala , ɓiyɗo o e baaba mum , njahdi fayde e nokku goɗɗitiiɗo caggal wuro ngoo ha ɓe ngari e nokku ganndiraaɗo hannde Mina o , ɓe pelliti gollaade ɗoon yamiroore nde .
Ɓee ena kaamtoo nde ɓeya ndokkaani ɗum'en hakkeeji mum'en , ɓeya ena njattinii e Salaare mum'en leydi ndii ko ndenndaandi .
Ɓee mbiꞌi yoo yaltine wuro ngoo , ɓeya mbiꞌi yoo fawe alamaan .
Ɓee miijiyankooɓe puɗɗii mumtude denndaangal jagge ɓaleeɓe
Ɓee ne ndeena kisal makko , heddiiɓe ɓee ina ndoodanii mo ngaluuji ɗi .
Ɓee rewɓe ɗiɗo ngoni rewɓe jeegoɓe e jeeɗiɓe heɓde njeenaari Nobel Wayliwal gila 1901 .
Ɓee waali-wuro en ina njogii hakke tawtoreede , e timmal , e nguurndam politik e faggudu e renndo e pinal nder Muritani .
Ɓee ɗoo ɓe payɗen innude ene njeyanoo e goomu suɓngo he .
Ɓeen eɓe mbeli heɓtinde sabu kufune maɓɓe sokolaajo Yeewtere wuro kala hande yowitii ko e darnde goomu laaɓal .
Ɓeen heednooɓe oon bannge pelliti waɗde jaaynde nginniri ɗuum Caafal .
Ɓeen njahii : Joom jeyi heɓtii jeyi mum .
Ɓeen so a wi’ii yoo naŋngu e oo daliilu maaɗa , hol to paaruɗaa ɗumen ?
Ɓeen yimɓe noon njogii hakke feccitaade tan ko e nder lajal duuɓi ɗiɗi tuggi nde peccitagol ngol winnditaa e nder Karnal leydi , no siforaa e kuulal 40 gonngal down gal .
Ɓeeynirka " Parker Solar " diwii : Ñalnde alet 12 ut 2018 , NASA werliima laana ɓeeynirka naange ( mbittoowa ) mbiyeteeka Parker potka etaade taccude weeyo naange .
Ɓeeynirka Luna ka Riisi
Ɓeeynirka Parker Solar Probe : Ɓeeynirka Parker Solar Probe ko ƴeewirde weeyo Naange .
Ɓeeynirka Parker woni laana mbajja ka Nasa meeɗi innirde ganndo guurɗo , hono ganndo ko faati e ɓalliwal kuule asamaan ( astro physique ) biyeteeɗo Eugène Parker jahroowo hannde e duuɓi 91 .
Ɓeeynirka Perseverance kaa naatanii asde tagofeere ndee ngam ƴettude nduufdi mum ( mbaañiri ) potndi artireede he leydi men hee ngam yuurnitee , mbele ɓeydo-ɗen humpitaade .
Ɓeeynirka ina heewi naworde kaɓirɗe kattanɗe koye mum en ngam ɓeydoraade ( ko wayi no jowitiingel e mum , buɓɓirgel , deegowel , baloŋ ) .
Ɓeeynirka naange Parker Solar Probe
Ɓeeynirka weeyo ko daabaa weeyo mo jolnaani hay gooto , berlaaɗo nder weeyo ngam wiɗtude kuule asamaan , ko wayi no Naange , tagopeeje , tagopeeje dooɓaaɗe , e ɓalli tokoosi , kam e jowitiiɗe mum en , kam e weeyo hakkunde tagopeeje walla hakkunde koode .
Ɓeeynirɗe gadane : E hitaande 1959 Dental Sowiyet ( Riisi ) werliima ɓeynirka Luna feewde Lewru .
Ɓeeynirɗe tati duñooɗe e lebbi suwee-sulyee 2020 faade Mbaañ ( Mars ) , njettiima toon e lewru feebariyee 2021 ɓennundu nduu .
Ɓeeynirɗe weeyo ina ceerti e masiŋon weeyo kon koɗaaka ngoɗkon kon , taarotookon Leydi kon .
Ɓeeɗoo , no yoga e senerooji konu Muritani , ko senerooji birigaad , woni telno galaŋ seneraal ɓurɗo lesɗude e yoga e konuuji winndere ndee ( konuuji leydi walla weeyo ) .
Ɓeeɗoo njoyo , ɓe limtu-ɗen mbaɗii mowludaaji e nder gure mumen duuɓi limtinɗi ko adii kuuɓtidingol mowludaaji e nder reedu Fuuta e hitaande 1927 .
Ɓele ko aan artirta mi ?
Ɓernde Merkii ko murlere jamɗe taayɗe , tekkeendi mayre ko 1800 haa 1900 km , ɗuum ina tolnii 55% e mooɓre ( masse ) tagofeere nde , ko heddii ko ko dakkere kaaƴe ɗe tekkeendi 500 haa 600 km dow aaludere he huurii haa hawri , ko ndeen heɓɓotoo nguleeki naange e kaaƴe ummiiɗe weeyo .
Ɓernde am dilli haamtii nde arti e nduu fiɗtaandu
Ɓernde tafaande ñookaama e becce gorko mbo duuɓi 75 , to Franse , ɓernde nde ñeemtinta ko ɓernde tawaande nde e denndaangal mbaadiiji , so tawi joomum woni e golle naamniiɗe doole , nde ɓeydoo dillude ngam yottin'de ƴiiƴam e terɗe , so tawi noon joomum ko ɗaaniiɗo , nde usta dille ngam fotndude waraango ƴiiƴam e ndeer ɓalndu .
Ɓerɗe mettii , piɗtaali kaaɓii , beeli owii .
Ɓesngu Barooɓe yalti ko e worɓe tato : Hammee Baro , Eli Baro e Dawuut walla Dewuut Baro .
Ɓesngu Mammadu Demmba Sih
Ɓesngu Muritani ina foti hollitoyde wonde ina haɓɓii e ɗeen piɓle , hono no waɗiraa e naatirɗe Doosɗe Leydi nii wonande Bayyinaango huuɓtodinngo Jojjanɗe aadee nde 10 desaambar 1948 , e Piɓondiral Afrik wonande Jojjanɗe aadee e ɓesnguuji , nde 28 suwee 1981 .
Ɓesngu afrik na reentina ɗum ɗoo , ina siftina UŇO afrik ko ɗum ɗoo foti won’de ginol golle mum : reen’de leyɗe ɗe e saňan’de ɗe njuɓɓudi moƳƳiri , so heen gooto aaƳiima ɓe safrana koye maɓɓe tawa ɗum ruftaani e ɓesngu leydi ɓe mbiyaani mbaɗaani tinaani tintaani tan haa ina pin’diniree hakkunde jammaagu eggudu e uuƳo .
Ɓesngu afrik waawaa wuurdude nii tan e UŇO afrik mum e dowu aduna mo yimɓe fof njeydi – njeydaa .
Ɓesngu nguu aani , hawri hakkunde galle oo ngam ƴeewde bonannde dee .
Ɓesnguuji men carii , caakiima .
Ɓesnude noon ene soomi kaawisaaji Allah he ñeeñal mum , kono Allah kadi rokkii neɗɗo waawde miijtaade , wiɗtude e yiytude sirluuji ɓurɗi luggiɗde haa o waawi faggitaade heen ganndal .
Ɓet-koode ( Astrométrie ) : ko kañum ɓetata nokku hoodere , yahdu mayre e ngoɗɗeeki mayre .
Ɓet-lewndu ( photométrie ) : kañum ɓetata njalbeendi ( jalbugol ) e ngummbudi ( couleur ) hoodere .
Ɓet-ɓakdi ( spectromètre ) : hollata mbaadi lewndu ( lumière ) hoodere , ngam ɓe mbaawa anndude hol memtinooje gonɗe e mayre .
Ɓetal ( dimension ) lahal ngal wonaa sera , way tan ko no taɓannde waɗa wooda gadduɗo korel , oya adda lahal , ɓe cakka les baade ina njana heen , sikke alaa joom lahal o ɓurata hebbin'de .
Ɓeto : wiyaama wonde ɓeto ngoo ko fannuuji ɗiɗi : ɓeto hebloowo ( évaluation formative ) e ɓeto sakkitto ( évalution sommative ) .
Ɓeto bertalle lowe ɗe ko nii ciforii : lowre 1 : 1 .
Ɓeto hebloowo ngoo , ko horooji walla ƴeewndooji jannginoowo waɗata ñalnde kala , so naatii duɗal , hade fuɗɗaade winndannde , hakkunde winndannde , e joofirde winndannde ekn , ngam ƴeewde so almuɓɓe paamii , ngam anndude ɗo foti artude e hol almuɓɓe fotɓe walliteede ekn .
Ɓeto sakkitto ngoo , ko ɓeto njuɓɓudi jaŋde heewi yuɓɓinde e ardaade ( ardorde duɗal , peŋgal , catal , Goomu jaŋde ngenndi ekn .
Ɓeto ñalɗi diisnondiral ɗii , ngo pelle ɗee mbaɗnoo , wiyiino wonde " eɗen mbaawi hiisaade en njettiima heen paandaale ɗiɗi so cosgol njuɓɓudi njaambureeri kalfinaandi ƴellitde ƊNG ; e – Naattingol ƊNG ɗee he nder TNJ leydi ndii " .
Ɓeydaare gollotooɓe e ñaawoore tuugiinde tan e kaandugol e kattangol .
Ɓeydagol baasal .
Ɓeydagol nguleeki ina ɓeyda kareeli nder winndere ndee : ko ɗum njeñtudi wiɗto bayyinaango ñalnde 1 ut e nder jaaynde ganndal wiyeteende " Science " .
Ɓeydagol nguleeki weeyo toɗɗaaki tan ɓalliwal e wayliwal walla taariindi .
Ɓeydagol yimɓe winndere ndee ina jeyaa kadi e geɗe
Ɓeydagol ñawbuuli .
Ɓeydi Abdarahmaani Siisee e Aamadu Luuti Bah , gardiiɗo Duɗal Professeur Umaar Bah ngalɗinii yeewtere ndee , njaltinii faandaare ngalluure ndee .
Ɓeydi bone kadi , ko alaa tawo meeɗɗo suurtude ndee fedde
Ɓeydii addude bone e bak hikka o fof ko ko laamu ngu saltii tuugnaade e karnal ( liwere njanngu ) almuudɓe ɓe ko , sabu ndeen so almuudɓe mbaɗii bak , kala ŋakkaaɗo toɓɓe ɓe nduttoto e karnal ngal ɓe ƴeewa so tawii almuudo o gollinooma golle moƴƴe e nder hitaande nde , so tawii omo gollunoo ɓe toŋtira mo ɗeen toɓɓe , o rokkee bak makko .
Ɓeydugol pesooɗe he binndol Pulaar , yiyannde Porof .
Ɓii-lendu ina waawi kadi huutoreede to safaara , teeŋti noon oppirooɓe , sabu kala tergal keborngal seekeede safree ina waawi ñeemtineede e mbaadi lewndu ( annoore ) ɓe njiya ngal haa laaɓta , ɓe ngannda ɗo ɓe poti safrude e maggal tawa lorlataa cafrotooɗo o .
Ɓii-lewndu ( Hologramme ) walla mbeelu-fetiindu .
Ɓii-lewndu ko ayaawu ko waɗi wonki walla ko alaa e mbaadi lewndu , feewnirtee ko cereeli laser ( rayon laser ) beñ-weñƴundiraaɗi haa mbaadi ko ñeemtinaa ko waawa feeñde e henndu walla weeyo .
Ɓinnde fooɓre ko fuɗɗoode kala ko waɗi wonki , wonaa huunde yiyatoonde tawa laaɓtinirgal ( microscope ) tawaaka , kono kadi seerataa e won'de e ɓalndu haa jonte ɗiɗe caggal maayde , sabu nguru seerataa e rappude hesɗitinee ɗuum ko golle ɓinɗe pooɓe , nguurndam ƴiiƴaɓel ( globule rouge ) ina tolnoo balɗe 120 ko maa lomtinee so ɗuum alaa nguurndam alaa .
Ɓinnde ko kañum gollotoo e ɓalndu .
Ɓinngu leydaagu he muritani
Ɓinɗe ina ceerti to batte mahdi , mawnugol e mbaydi .
Ɓinɗe pooɓe ( cellules souches )
Ɓitto kammu waɗanaama ɓetirdi wiyetee ko baaroomeetre , ko eddaaji ɗiɗi mbo loocol merkiir e mbo faandu mehru ( ndu ala henndu )
Ɓiy leydi kala , ko aldaa e paltoor nguru ɓalndu , njogoram , diine walla miijo politigi , ina jogii hakke dañde leydi , maa wonii e nder gure walla to dowri .
Ɓiyi Kummba Joorngal e Gelaajo Jeegi , Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi jibinaa ko hakkunde kitaale 1690 e 1700 to Jowol Worgo .
Ɓiyi Raasin Sammba Bukaar Baal e Maymuuna Yumma Jeŋ Lamiin , Ceerno Suleymaani Baal ari e aduna , tuugnaade e daariyankooɓe hesɓe , ko heedde 1720 to Boode e nder falnde Laaw ( Senegaal ) .
Ɓiyleydaagu ko addude ballal mum e nguurndam renndo .
Ɓiɓɓe amen e taniraaɓe am ko min saaktooɓe , e defte ko min winndooɓe sabu cuusal mon e caasal mon min ngonaa hersirooɓe .
Ɓiɓɓe fooɗngo kolliri goodal ɓakdi ɓaleeri
Ɓiɓɓe leydi Muritani heewɓe , jannguɓe , jagge toowɗe , ina nguuri caggal leydi , sibu ko toon ngollotoo .
Ɓiɓɓe rimɓe en koynaama .
Ɓiɗngu moƴƴaagu min ndokkaama .
Ɓiɗɓe Fuuta coodtii on ndañii ronɓe on
Ɓiɗɗo o jokki heen
Ɓiɗɗo o ndaari baabiraaɗo o haa ɓooyi tukkiii , leeli tukkitaade kadi nde tukkitii haydara haalaani .
Ɓnndu nduu ɗaasɗa .
Ɓoccitaade pooɗal leydi naamndi ko doole mawɗe e njaaweeki , ɗuum waɗi yah-weeyo en tuma nde laana maɓɓe ka eggata leydi waytaɓe tan kono huunde teddunde fawaa e dow maɓɓe , ɓe keewi ko lelaade sabu so ɓe ndariima ƴiiƴam maɓɓe telloto faya koyɗe , ina waawi fusde ɗaɗi yalta .
Ɓoggee , ñalnde 10 mee 2009
Ɓoggi giiɗal nder geec
Ɓoggi jaambareeɓe noddii jaambareeɓe nootiima
Ɓoggol " Africa Coast to Europe ( ACE ) "
Ɓoggol Africa Coast to Europe ( ACE ) walla mbiyen ɓoggol Daande maayo Afrik feewde Orop , biyangol taƴii ngol , jokkondiri ko leyɗe 24 afriknaaje e Orop .
Ɓoggol ngol maa jokkondiroy Orop hirnaange e Fuɗnaange ɓadiiɗo kam e leyɗe 16 afriknaaje rewrude e geec Mediteraane , Maayo woɗeewo , jookdu Aden , tufnde Afrik wonnde e geec iñnjeejo haa yettoo sorfundu Bonne-Espérance , roondtoo geec Atalantik haa yettoo Biritaan-Mawɗo .
Ɓoggol ngol timmii meeter e seeɗa .
Ɓokki Sammba Gelaajo Jeegi
Ɓokki kii wuurtii ko juuti caggal Sammba hade makki yande e 1980 .
Ɓoos Taktakri .
Ɓooyaani , jinne oo wi'i mo : Baru , ko ndari-ɗaa ɗoo koo fof mi nanii aɗa haaltoo .
Ɓooyaani , sukaaɓe makko fijoynooɓe ɓee naatti galle .
Ɓooyataa golle ɗee njoofa .
Ɓooytaani Awluɓe Fuuta noddaa e dinngiral ngam teeŋtinde geɗal e gollal ngal ɓe njoganii leñol ngol .
Ɓooytaani mum , gaadaa oo addani min ñaamde , nde min ɗaɓɓiri ɗum ndee , teskii-mi e yeeso taabal ngal njooɗinoo-mi ngal , neɗɗo gooto ina jooɗii ɗoon , ina fadndii bottaari mum .
Ɓooytaani tan o hawri e bileejo ina njogii , o wiꞌi ɗum : " won Waandu arata caggal , ustan ndu laaci mayru sabu ina tampini ndu .
Ɓoso nguurndam ine moƴƴi , kono foti yahdude ko e jiɗaaɗe renndo .
Ɓowngu paawngal dennge
Ɓoyde e leydi adantaa neɗɗo yejjiteede ko golle e balle ngadanta neɗɗo siftoreede .
Ɓoytaani , Hawwa woni e heblanaade dewgal mum .
Ɓulnaade , rewindoo peeje ciynooje sariyaaji leydi ndemeteendi e wasiyaade kala peeje newnooje ƴellitgol ndema e naattingol eddaagu e nder mum .
Ɓural lewru koorka e ɓure golle golleteeɗe heen
Ɓure maɓɓe e defte yoo jannge .
Ɓure mum fof e heewde , yoga e tippule nehdi e jaŋde tuugaaki he ɗemngal ɓurngal haande ngal .
Ɓuree luggiɗinaade e iwdi makko .
Ɓuri haawde ɓe , ko won e dente dokkaaɗe leydi ( tereŋaaji ) , tawi ko dente cosaaɗe ko ɓuraani jonte seeɗa , ko wayi no ‘Mauriperle " kam e otel biyeteeɗo " Ocean Resort " .
Ɓuri teeŋtude ko firande yimɓe heborɓe huwtoraade ɗum , jeyaaka he muuyaaɗe FSI yiɗde mumtude pulfule muynaaɗe , ko maa ɓe mbaawa he kala sahaa huutoraade ɗe to mbinndiin e to haala .
Ɓuri woyeede heen fof noon ko cuddiiɗo makko tokooso o hono sokna Leylaa Taraabelsii nde tawnoo ko mooroowo ŋanaa wonnoo woowaani maa tawa nii meeɗaani ɓoornaade dampe e ɓurtungal .
Ɓurii lewru jooni ko njahdikon ɗiɗon kon naatani ɗanngal juutngal ngam yettaade hawngo wiiduru na toon ine wiyee Jezero , ɗo wonnoo mbalndi weendu ɓooyndu , ɗo kon njuurii ñalnde 18 feebariyee 2022 .
Ɓurnde jaasde e eɓɓooje meeɗnooɗe waɗeede e jarribogol naatnugol ɗemɗe ngenndiije .
Ɓurnoo heeroraade tinndol ko mawdo joom humpito , baawɗo teskaade mo haaldata haa yettina miijo mum ɗo yiɗi ɗo , tawa yuwaani heɗtiiɓe , tawa ko o ceeɓando aduna : oon woni taaniraaɗo .
Ɓurnoo mawnude ko rajo-lonngirgal ina woni Porto Riko , kono jooni ngal yawtaama sabu ngal ɗoo kesal mahangal to Siin ɓuri ɓooyngal ngal fuuf .
Ɓurnoo woƴde mo tan ko jeytaare Fuuta , e ndimaagu Fuuta .
Ɓurɗi heen maantindaade ( ɓayde ) ɗii fof miin ko diidol boɗol tan mbinndumi heen .
Ɓuttiɗde haa ɓurta ina haɗaa to Japon
Ɓuuɓnirka ( frigo ) lomto loonde .
Ɓuuɓnoori Klenkeer : Cumaaɗe ɗe ndewa e maiŋ ɓuuɓnoowo ko yaawi , haa ɗe tolnoo 100°C , ɗe njalta e ɗe ɓawli kurum , ɗe loowee e looɗe kippaaɗe ( silos )

ƊEMNGAL E PAAFTORƊE MUM , KELME KESE E KIIƊƊE ENA TAFEE E NDER MAGGAL .
ƊEMNGAL PULAAR KO DOW .
ƊIƊI : Dobo he ƴuulde Njiylawu .
Ɗaam kuccam kesam Abuu Jubaa hollitii yiɗi waɗdude ɗum ko e saaktooɓe kabaruuji Senegaal .
Ɗaccaa doondiiɗo .
Ɗacce hoɓɓe kirnda !
Ɗahee woownee e beldal .
Ɗahiiru Buubu Suufi Tahiiru Bella Galo Arɗo Ngaddooru , jeytoraaɗo e diisneteeɓe
Ɗahiiru Sih , porfeseer
Ɗakkel elektoronik ngel soklaani batiri , ngel gollortoo ko no badsuuji kuutorteeɗi ngam udditde dame naatirɗe nii , ñaamataa kuuraa ; so a ɓallinii telefoŋ maa tan yonii ɗum tara kabaruuji coklaaɗi ɗii .
Ɗaldude naange , iPhone-uuji , soja ( leñol ñebbe ) , teewu tugal , ɓiɓɓe tekke , comci , kolli , biifi , lallitorɗe alaa fof ko Siin yeeyataa nder Dental Dowlaaji Amerik .
Ɗaldugal/ɗalduɗe : panneau/panneaux
Ɗalee haa yawaare laaɓa moƴƴaani e ɓuraaɗo doole .
Ɗam ndiyam ina tunwi koy !
Ɗamaawu baɗaaɗo e ndee feere safrirde hesere addani Duɗal
Ɗanngal men e ndeer weeyo yahdata ko e ɗanngal e ndeer wono , ko yawti fo artata .
Ɗanniyankooɓe men wonɓe caggal leydi ndokkaama hakke jogaade dipiteeji mum en ɓe ɓe ngootanta , nattii wonde ko suudu sarɗiyeeji suɓantoo ɗum en .
Ɗanno-ɗen ɗaɓɓoyen jawdi e ganndal , ngartiren e Fuuta , nafa en , nafa ɓesnguuji men itta ɗaminaare e wodɓe .
Ɗatal ko dental koode ɓadondiɗe haa ngannomini natal neɗɗo , kullel walla huunde woɗnde , ngaal natal teskaa innaa , ɗeen inɗe ngoni yoga e renndooji kuutortoo , renndo foo kadi waasataa ko heerorii e inɗe ɗate , sabu koode fulɓe mbiyata junngo ñiiwa ɗe wonaa noon renndooji goɗɗi njiyri ɗe , won heen njiyi e majje ko mbaadi bukkeldi mawndi ( Grand Ourse ) , ɗuum noon wadde fawii tan ko e neesu renndo e finaa taawaa mum .
Ɗatal ko faɗo koode ɓadondriɗe e jiyɗe tawa eɗe mbaawi annumin'de natal huunde , to renndo fulɓe , koode ina bannge rewo njogii ko mbaadi junngo ñiiwa ɗe inniraa noon , goɗɗe ina ñukondiri no ɗacce nih , ɗeen mbiyaa ɗaccuki , goɗɗe ina peeña worgo no gallaaɗi burgal ɗe mbiyaa noon .
Ɗate ( les constellations )
Ɗate keedɗe bannge rewo ɗe ɓuri anndeede nde wonnoo ko toon keeweendi yimɓe ngoni .
Ɗatewol ngol feccaa ko pece sappo e ɗiɗe , heen feccere kala lommbi ɗatal .
Ɗaŋe joy deggundirɗe e asamaan
Ɗaŋe leydiije ( joorɗe ) ɗeen ngoni Ɗiiña ( Mercure ) , Raam walla Jaayre ( Vénus ) , Ngaawe walla Leydi ( Terre ) , Mbaañ ( Mars ) , ɗee ɗaŋe keedi ko e Naange ɓuri goɗɗe ɗe ɓadaade nge , eɗe pamɗi kadi wootere e majje fo ina tamii ina yaɓɓoo no Leydi men way nih .
Ɗaŋe walla tagopeeje
Ɗaŋe ɓugale ko paali henndu ( gaasuuji ) tan , ɗeen ngoni Rojju ( Jupiter ) , Fommo ( Saturne ) , Mbuun ( Uranus ) e Paamte ( Neptune ) , ɗee ɗaŋe ɓuri woɗɗude Naange , eɗe mawni eɗe mbiifni no feewi kono hay wootere e majje tamaaki ( sukkaani ) , Kenndirɗe ( atmosphères ) majje ɓuri heen doolnude ko ndiƴƴam ( hidrojen ) , ɗaŋe ɗe ina ndasori bey-weeyɗe ( satellites ) keewɗe , jiidaani e leppi kaaƴe goortiiɗi .
Ɗaŋre : P
Ɗaŋre : Planète
Ɗaŋre funeere Ngaawe yiytaama , ( Aduna keso )
Ɗaŋre ina hoɗo tawa ko waɗi wonki alaa toon , ganndanɗen nde tan ko e nde ɗeɓi fotde to mawneeki e ɗaŋre men Ngaawe , kadi ina gasa tawa ko nde kaaƴhaaƴilde .
Ɗaŋre men Leydi huufii nguurndam law , caggal nde seto-naange mahii , diƴƴe carii e leydi nguurndam fuɗɗii e mbaadi pamardi , etee kala ɗo sikkanoo alaa ko wuuri ɗoon , wooda ko tawaa ɗoon ina wilñitii , hannde e teleeji eɗen njeeɓa leppi kulle guurɗe e ndeer lugge maaje niɓɓiɗɗe , gulɗe keewɗe tooke barooje neɗɗo e won e kulle , nokkuuji ɓittuɗi moññooji ko heewi e kulle , eɗen njananaa ɗeen lugge neɗɗo suusa mutde haa yottooɗe tawa ko ɓalndu mehru , hay so o yooɓiima paali makko henndu , ko ɓuri heewde o nelata toon ko masiŋaaji natooji e pilmooji , hay so o woodi mutde haa toon ne ɓalndu makko kam memetaa ndiyam ɗam .
Ɗaŋre men Ngaawe jeyaa ko e yuɓɓo naange , ɗuum firti ko ndi leydi ndi ngonɗen e dow mum jeya e seto rewngo e hoodere ɓadiinde men nde mbiyeten Naange walla Njaana , Wadde Ɗiiña , Jaayre , Ngaawe , Mbaañ e ɗaŋe goɗɗe ganndaaɗe ɗe fo ko ko mbanngatoo e Naange , ina way no ko Naange tammbii denndaangal ɗaŋe catiiɗe nge , ko ɗum wiyetee yuɓɓo walla seto-Naange .
Ɗaŋre nde ina waɗi faandu henndu kono ko ɓuri heewde e mayru keneeli naange ñoortii ɗum , heddii seeɗa .
Ɗaŋre Ɗiiña walla Batuure ina ɓadii naange no feewi ina wuli wonotaako .
Ɗaɓɓaande winndaa , joɗɗinaa ko kalifu geɗe nder leydi ñalnde 20/04/06 , jokkondire mbaɗaa , kono huunde ndee tehi no feewi .
Ɗaɓɓaande winndude walla yettaade gardiiɗo Shinguiti TV ngam yettude ɗum e yeewtere Suudu Baaba
Ɗaɓɓaande ñaawoore Mariyam Sankara naamndinoo gila 1997 jaɓanooka e oon sahaa .
Ɗaɗngal : so gorko ɗanniima anndaaka ɗo heedi , ɗaldaani joom suudu mum nguura , te o yamiraani goɗɗo nafande mo , o alaa goɗɗo nafanoowo mo debbo oo , tawii kadi o alaa jawdi ndi o nafti hoore makko , haa gorko oo arta rutta mo .
Ɗee baalaaje ɗiɗi ɗe cifi ɗen kadi ene peccitii e pecce keewɗe , fawaade e wootere heen fof no doliri miijo ngoo .
Ɗee balɗe kala baɗtuɗo hakkille mum bannge fuɗnaange caggal geeƴe , maa sooyno hoodere jalbunde laaɓtunde , ko ndeen woni tagofeere Jupiteer , ko ndeen ɓuri mawnude e setonaange , ɓuri nde mawnude tan ko naange , e nde heewi lebbi e asamaan mayre , heen wooturu ina heptina to bannge waawde ndu huufde nguurndam , ndu wi'été ko Oroppa .
Ɗee balɗe noon maa ɓuuɓol ɓeydo e ɗo deegowal ngal e laana maggal woni ɗo , sabu ko e jammaagu ngu balɗe 14 faya , kono kaɓirɗe gollirɗe seese ina e majje .
Ɗee ciiñte njuumtii no feewi to bannge njulaagu , nde tawnoo Portugeec en ina mbaawi termo-termo , yanti heen laana maɓɓe mbiyeteeka karawel kaa alaa ɗo ronkunoo yettaade e tufɗe Afrik hee .
Ɗee dente fof noon acca faranse na bonna mali hono kanum e won’diiɓe mum no mbonnirnoo libi ni haa ko ɗeen bone njahata e leyɗe saahal ɗe haa jooni , haa ɗuum nani reɓana leyde daande maayo atlantik , ina jogori ɓoomdude afrik o fof so dartinaaka , nde tawnoo renndo yimɓe wayi kono feeteeto ndiyam ni , ko memi ɗum fof hawridat .
Ɗee dente tati nguurdii e leydi hee teemedde hitaande .
Ɗee fulɓe mbiyi depputu .
Ɗee geɗe fo ko jarribaaɗe , etee eɗe kuutoree , so gonirɗe ( horloges ) beeyooje ( satellites ) ngaaltatonooke ( régler ) GPS feewataa muk , sabu ɗo ɗe toɗɗotoo huunde ɗo tawetaake ɗoon .
Ɗee geɗe fof ina ngaddana en naamnitaade koye men mbar wonaa " yahnoonde arti " , sabu oɗon nganndi e kitaale capanɗe jeeɗiɗi ( 70 ) , pollugol laamuuji nguu ardiinoo ɗum ko soldateeɓe , jeyanooma e aadaaji leyɗeele Afrik e Ameriik bannge worgo , teeŋti noon e Afrik bannge Hirnaange , hay so tawii oon aada deestinooma seeɗa , ellee o woni ko e artude .
Ɗee geɗe fof pawii tan ko e ngonka e nokku .
Ɗee geɗe limtaaɗe ko huunde tan e loruuji ɗi neɗɗo waawi heɓde weeyo boowal leydi , e tagopeeje goɗɗe , kono ɗum fo e waade noon pellital aadee ina mawni kadi peeje ɗe ina keewi , laaɓguyaagal makko maa naw mbo to woɗɗi .
Ɗee geɗe noon ina ɗaɓɓi gartirgol koolondiral baawngal wallitde beltital hakkillaaji e ɓerɗe .
Ɗee geɗe noon ina ɗaɓɓi gartirgol koolondiral baawngal wattitde beltital hakkillaaji e ɓerɗe .
Ɗee geɗe peññinii caɗeele dookɗe ɗeen lulɗe walla gure keborɗe siñceede to weeyo , yanti heen geɗe dawrugol , hol fotɓe ardaade ɗowa yimɓe , doosɗe potɗe darneede ngam feewnude ngoon renndo serindiingo Leydi , won fuɗɗiiɓe winndude defte juɓɓinooje nguurndam to weeyo .
Ɗee golle newananooki ɓerɗe peewnaaɗe adan ɗe , sibu ko jooni ɓe mbaɗi heen ko fotndata waraango ƴiiƴama e ndeer ɓalndu , mbela neɗɗo ina waawa gollaade no yiɗiri nih , heɓa jeyde hoore mum , tawa aynaani doole ɓernde mum hesere ñookaande e ndeer becce .
Ɗee gure cerindiiɗe ina gasa peŋtana koye muyen neesu kesu e ɗemngal kesal , ɓalli ɗi mbayloo mbela njaaɓa e taariindi maɓɓe kesiri ndi , sukndu e nguru ɓalndu wayloo natta waade no way jooni ni , kadi yaama terɗe kese ɗe meeɗaaka annde peeña e maɓɓe , ko wayno kine baawɗe siimtin'de koñndu ( dioxyde de carbone ) haa cuuytam ( oxygène ) heɓo , yimɓe Mbaañ ( Mars ) mbaawa seertude e paali muyen poofa henndu toon ndu .
Ɗee jowondiree njaaweeki woni JOWONDIRAL GALILE ( relativité galiléenne ) , ko ngaal nguurɗen ñalnde kala , ɗuum noon so en njiɗii heɓtaade njaaweeki lewndu en pawondirat laaɗe keewɗe tan , tawa heen laana fo ina doga e dow ngoɗka ka , so en ɓeydondirii njaaweki laaɗe ɗe ko haɗata men daɗde lewndu tawee ?
Ɗee naamne fof e heewde , won ngal araani .
Ɗee nate kese maa ngaddan annduɓe ɓee waawde limde koode jibinaaɗe ko ɓooyaani kam e keeweendi gaasuuji e punndi toon ɗii .
Ɗee peeje laamagol ɓooyɗe , tabitɗe , tuugiiɗe e cehilaagal hakkunde njuɓɓudi laamu e lawakooɓe , maa ɓeydo teeŋtude e nder Muritani nde keɓi hoore mum ndee , sibu laawɗinaa tan ko ɓurondire renndo duumtuɗe .

Ɗee ɗoo dule Sildu Demmba .
Ɗee ɗoo geɗe heewi addude ɗum ko koomte .
Ɗeen golle ngoni hirjinde e famminde renndo ngoo " holi ko woni demokaraasii " .
Ɗeen golle ɗe Neyl waɗi , ko huunde nde laana kesa ka toppittanto hoore mum , sabu jolooɓe e makka ɓe ɗowataaka , ko kanka ɗowata hoore makka haa ka jippoo ɗo ka hisata ka hisna dimngal makka .

Ɗeen jojjanɗe gorko noon ngoni
Ɗeen maale keewi feeñde ko e nder balɗe tati maa jeeɗiɗi dewɗi
Ɗeen mooɓe pawondirɗe fo e heewde e mawnude so waɗdaama e ko njaaweendi ndi ŋakkira e ɓakdi ko , ala e sago mooɓre woɗnde ɓurnde moolaneede yanta heen , ko ndeen woni ɓakdi ɓaleeri walla ŋakkundi .
Ɗeen nate ko memotooɗe , firti ko eɗen mbaawi ɗe memde , jooni won mbaadi ñeemtin'de ngonndi yiita , ndiin woni mahirde lewndu walla ɓiɓɓe naange , alaa e men majjuɗo ɓiɓɓe naange , heewi ɗo ɗe puunti janɗo ɗomka .
Ɗeen peete lewñitɗe he les ndoondi Gerek e Latin , woni ɗemɗe ɗe ɓe noddiratnoo " les langues vernaculaires " , ɗuum woni ɗemɗe puuyɗe ɗe mbinndetaake njanngetaake , kuwtortee tan ko he nokkuuji dowri , ɗo yimɓe mum ngalaa pinal ƴellitiingal .
Ɗeen ɗen ngoni
Ɗeeɗoo geɗe kala e maɓɓe , kamɓe resondirɓe ɓe , so gooto e maɓɓe yiyii e goɗɗo oo tee ɗum henenaaki ɗum , o mo waawi ɗaɓɓude yaltude e dewgal ngal .
Ɗeeɗoo nate maa kumpit en e faayiida ngooɗoo seppo .
Ɗeeɗoo potnditte maa ngaddan mbaawkaaji ɗii fof ƴellitde kattanɗe mum en maslahaa , ngam ñawndude kirisaaji njuɓɓudi .
Ɗemngal Alamaañeere ceningal biyeteengal Hochdeutsch ( hoxdotsho ) ko noon taforii .
Ɗemngal jeyaa ko e geɗe renndoyankooje baɗeteeɗe , jiyateeɗe , maantinɗe e nder daawal nguurndam kala renndo ɗo ngal huutortee ;
Ɗemngal jeyaa ko e geɗe tagooje kaaldigal , kuutondiral , jotondiral , e nanondiral ngam jaajgol nguurndam e jeeñtingol dañal kala renndo yiɗngo ñiɓaade e ñiiɓde ko duumii ;
Ɗemngal kadi alaa jeyɗo ɗum kono kala ko mbaawɗaa heen ko aan jeyani ɗum hoyre ma .
Ɗemngal ko kuutorgal , ko ngal gollorgal maa njogitaari kala aadee ngam waawde wostondirde miijooji mum e woɗɓe hoɗdaaɓe ;
Ɗemngal ko kuwtorgal ɓurngal doolnude e hatojineede ngam deengol donaaɗi e ƴellitgol pinal aade .
Ɗemngal ko ngalu ngu waasetaake , ngalu ngu dartotaako e jibin’de .
Ɗemngal nii won ɗo fotaani haɓaneede , ɗemngal won ɗo fotaani naatnude hoyre mum e haɓanaade hoyre mum e won e mbaydi kaɓogol ( kaɓogol arani )
Ɗemngal pulaar , ena anndaa jeyaako e ɗemɗe ɓurde ñoƴƴeede e diiwaan Afrik Hirnaange !
Ɗemngal pulaar jeyaa ko e ɗemɗe ɓurɗe hannde soklude darnde e pellital sabu haa jooni won ɗe hakkeeji maggal calaa heftineede .
Ɗemngal suɓeede waɗee ɗemngal
Ɗemngal way kono layanteeri nih , seerata e saraade , konnguɗi ko tafateeɗi ñalnde kala sabu ko huunde nde anndanooka feeñata ala e sago dañanee innde e gollal , ko noon ɗemɗe mawɗe ɗe ngoniri , hono Engele e Farayse , ko ɓuri heewde e gannde kese ndaartatee ko e Engele , ɗuum waɗi Farayse sahaaji ina jogo caɗeele waɗtude won e konngi e ɗemngal he sabu firo ngo ina wappo ko joopa ko .
Ɗemɗe ngenndiije Pulaar , sooninke e Wolof maa naatne , ƴellitee , ɓamtee he denndaangal tolnooji jaŋde ndee , gila he nder janngirɗe laamu haa e janngirɗe keeriiɗe fof , ɗe naatnee he nder tippudi jaŋde e heblo , no ɗemɗe jokkondiral e no ɗemɗe janngirɗe nii wonande heen heen ɗemngal neeniwal kala , e dow ɗaɓɓaande heen ɗemngal kala .

Ɗii kabaruuji baagal Juno nuldi ɗi ko ɓooyaani

Ɗii sababuuji fof ine kollita wonde ine jojjunoo Pelle pinal ɗee toɗɗanee jooɗaniiɓe ɗum en he nder ndii njuɓɓudi cuɓanoytoondi leydi ndii laabi mum jaŋde , tee emin ɗaɓɓi nde ɗum feewnittee e ngoon yeeso .
Ɗii seppooji fof ko salaade hare ñiɓiinde nder " Allaadu Afirik " , hare leñƴiire nder leydi Haaylee Selaase , leydi Menelik diiwɗo Italinaaɓe nde miijinoo halfude leydi Ecopia , Habasha ngenndi Bilaal ɓiy Rabbah , leydi ɗo sete Juulɓe Lislaam moolinoo ngam dogde boneeli Abuu Lahab e Abuu Jahli .
Ɗii wasiyaaji ɗi ngonaa kuuftidinɗi ina mbaawi hebbinde
Ɗii waylo-waylooji e dimle goodɗe dow ina ngaddana leydi kam ne roondaade dimngal uso jonngal , so yahi haa dimle ɗe mbeelii , dimngal duule dow ngal rimtoroo doole e dow leydi ( ko ɓuri heewde ) waɗa majaango heewngo doole haa huɓɓa jaynge wiyeteenge plasma , hellaango rigaango moolanaango rewa heen , ko ɗuum woni manaango .
Ɗii ɗoo duwawuuji keɓal wune , ɗi nokku-mi to ɓuri luggiɗde e ɓernde am mbaawaa suuɗde ngonka keeriika nguuraaka e ngenndi men , tee ko haɓde e kaa ngonka kaaɓniika woni ko saabii ummannde men arwaniire .
Ɗiin beɗi keɗtorɗi ina ngoodi to Portoriiko , to Farayse e to Siin e leyɗe goɗɗe .
Ɗiin heblooji-dowrowi , jogori waɗde ɗum en ko Faatu Kannde-Senngoor , kadi e teddiniraaɗo ngol ɗoo koolol gadanol o , oon woni naɓokayanke Faraysenaajo-Senegaalnaajo Aysa Mayga .
Ɗiin jammaaji ( haa 14 duujal ) Mars maa weeɓ yiide wonan'de ɓe kammu mu'en tunwaani , ko hoodere woɗeere laaɓtunde , ina heeda fuɗnaange caggal futuro seeɗa , in ɓeydoo jenngude tan ina ɓeydoo toowde e laaɓtude .
Ɗiin laamuuji ngoni laamu Maasina , nganndiraangu " Diina " e gardagol Seeku Ahmadu , Laamlaamu Sokoto ( teeminannde 19ɓiire to rewo Niijeriyaa ) e gardagol Usmaan Dan Fojo , e laamu " Tukuloor " ( e leydi Mali hannde ndii ) e gardagol Al Hajji Umar Taal .

Ɗiirtoto tan !
Ɗiiña ( Mercure ) ko ɗaŋre ( planète ) ɓurnde ɓadaade naange e nder seto-naange , sabu alaa ko heedi nde e magge , ko kayre ɓuri famɗude e ɗaŋe ɗe kala .
Ɗiiña heediinde Njaana ( naange ) .
Ɗiiña ina waɗi kaaƴe jaajɗe , tooweeki majje ina yaha haa 3000 meeteer .
Ɗiiña ina woɗɗi naange fotde 57 909 175 km , ko e ndeen nokkuure nde wanngatoo , coortol ( diamètre ) mayre ko 4 879 km , nde timminta wanngaade naange ko e balɗe men 88 , ko ɗuum woni hitaande mayre timmunde , ñalngu mayre noon ko balɗe men 59 .
Ɗiiña maa abbo e tataɓal leydi mawnugol , ɗuum firti ko nde mawnaani no feewi , sabu ko kayre ɓuri famɗude e ɗaŋe setonaange , e nde ɓuri lewru mawnude seeɗa .
Ɗiiña yillanooma laabi ɗiɗi , baage ɗiɗe nulanooma toon ngam wiɗtude , heen gootal wiyetee ko Mariner 10 ngal weeyii e dow ɗaŋre he hitaande 1974 ngal wirtii ngal ruttii hitaande 1976 laabi ɗiɗi goɗɗi , fotde 45% e wertaango leydi ɗaŋre nde tan nataa .
Ɗiiɗoo sarɗiyeeji e nehdiiji cuɗata duwaaw mbaɗta ɗum e dewe Alla dowrowe timminooje njiyaagu juulɗo wonande joomi mum , duwaaw mum jaaboree teddungal e korsa .
Ɗiiɗoo telegaramuuji kollitii en wonde Tuubakooɓe ɓe , alaa ko njiɗnoo so wonaa tabitinde miijo mum en yiɗde feccude , e seerndude , ngam laamaade Fuutankooɓe fof , etee huunde fof ene jaratnoo ɓe heen .

Ɗo e dow tagofeere men ( Leydi ) yoga e henndu metaan ko e ko waɗi wonki ummotoo , ɗuum addani annduɓe sikkitaade Mars ina foti waɗde ko wuuri toon e sifaa nguurndam e dow Leydi , tawde noon alaa ko yiya taw , ɓe mbaawa tan fellitde won'de won ko wuuri toon .
Ɗo e duuɓi 15 garooji yaama keɓen heen ko laaɓi , tawa juurnirɗe kese naatanii wiɗtude ngoon seto haawniingo .
Ɗo e duuɓi limti-limtinɗi garooji naange ina foti gasnude kuɓɓam mum , hamoo haa famɗita , ɓura kadi yaynaade , caggal ɗuum fetta , yaaja haa moɗora Leydi men , kala ko wonnoo heen e baɗte nguurndam momtoo , ina waawi ndeen tawa neɗɗo e peeje mum dañii no eggiri Ngaawe ( Leydi ) hoɗa e ɗaŋe ( tagopeeje ) goɗɗe .
Ɗo e yeeso , maa lewru hoɗe walla yillee ko heewi , ɗuum naamni ko mahde toon koɗorɗe e jipporɗe , booñ biyeteeɗo UBS ina ɗamini ngañaari e yillaade to lewru nde tolnotoo miliyaaruuji 3 dolaar e hitaande 2030 , nde wonno ko ɓuri won'de caɗeele ko kuɓɓam nawojam dampooje , eɓe pewja ƴoogde ɗam e dow lewru , to lubuli lewru worgo e rewo , ndiyam penndiɗam njonɗam ina toon , ko e majjam ɓe ngoniri ittude kuɓɓam nawjam dampooje ɗe , ɗuum maa weeɓnu njoɓdi ɗanngal to lewru , tawde coggu kilograam gooto ɗaam kuɓɓam diwataa 500 dolaar , ɗuum so waɗdaama e coggu ittude ɗam Ngaawe nawa to Lewru , maa sowo ɗum ko famɗi fo laabi 20 , kono tan ina hawra hade neɗɗo dañde ngartam e yahde to Lewru e yeeso mum , maa waɗ daawal ko waɗetee heen e jawdi heewat tawa heɓtetaake .

Ɗo kadi eɗen mbaawi tonngude ɗee ɗoo geɗe
Ɗo naange wonti Maamaare Woɗeere ɗo ronkat deeƴirde noon , aaludere magge mabba hamoo haa famɗita , lare magge keedɗe dow ɗe pusa petta naata e kooyaa weeyo , njogoo mbaadi ruulde mawnde e cooynam .
Ɗo ngal roondii naange ɗo maa ngal hawru e peetee naange caasɗe dogooje 500 km e nder leƴƴannde ( seconde ) ngal wiɗta ɗeen peete coomiiɗe e keneeli naange , ngoon wiɗto maa wallu yimɓe humptaade e anndude nde keneeli naange ɗi ummotoo e magge , ɓe mbaawa heblaade ngam daɗndude beeyweeye ( satellites ) e yah-weeyo en e bone majji .

Ɗumɗoo dey ko seede wonde aadee , kala e sifaa no jibiniraa , Alla ina rokki ɗum kattanɗe goɗɗe , cuuɗiiɗe walla nii peeñɗe , gaddanooje ɗum waawde ƴellitaade e gannde ; ɗuum woni ko wiyetee " So damal uddiima tan , Alla uddittu goɗngal !
Ɗumɗoo fof noon ko huunde saɗtunde no feewi .
Ɗumɗoo fof tawti caɗeele hoɗɓe e leeɗe saraaji wuro ngoo , sabu penaale e ɓorƴitgol yimɓe laamu nguu leyɗe miskineeɓe .
Ɗumɗoo ina foti addande ma faamde , kaliifu , faayre mawnde heɓtiinde ɓaleeɓe Muritani e ngolɗoo binnditagol luurdangol .
Ɗumɗoo ina yahdi e miijo huunde e jannginooɓe , wiyooɓe wonde faayiida golle almuudo njiyotaako e ɗerewol ƴeewndo ngol tottitta ceerno mum ngol , kattanɗe almuudo e ñeeñal mum keddotoo ko e gunndol ɗo ƴeewndotoo jaabawuuji mum ɗii ( ko anndiraa brouillon koo )
Ɗumɗoo kam , ma a taw warii hoore .
Ɗumɗoo ko hujja mawɗo wonande ɗemngal ngal , teeŋtinoowo kattanɗe maggal e semmbe maggal , hujja tawtuɗo hujjaaji goɗɗi , wonde ko ngal ɗemngal kaandungal e janngeede e huutoreede e nder nguurndam .
Ɗumɗoo ko kabaaru ummoriiɗo e Nasa , mo jaayɗe caakti ñalnde 18 mars 2019 ɓennuɗo oo .
Ɗumɗoo ko tiitoonde yeewtere Dental Jagge Muritaninaaje Gonɗe Caggal Leydi ( Collectif des Cadres Mauritaniens Expatriés – CCME ) yuɓɓini ɗoo e Nuwaasoot ñalnde alkamiisa 14 marse 2019 , ngam faccirde miijo mum en ko faati e koɗdigal leƴƴi leydi ndii .
Ɗumɗoo noon , eɗen nganndi hay huunde tan fiyndiraani e goonga !
Ɗumɗoo noon , ma a taw ari tan ko teeŋtinde ko yimɓe heewɓe teskii e balɗe cakkitiiɗe laamu Abdel Asiis , so keewgol dekereeji ƴettaaɗi , dokkooji leydi walla jamirooje awo , walla tan nii toɗɗotooɗi jagge laamu .
Ɗumɗoo noon haawnaaki : ko kuuje ɗiɗi weeyo jiiduɗe edda sibu ko gudde ɗiɗi ɓaleeje pattamñise .
Ɗumɗoo seedtiima Ustaas ko ganndo , ko golluɗo .
Ɗumɗoo woni duwaaw listikhaara Nelaaɗo ( j .
Ɗuum addani Hiisiwal sosaneede njeenaari keeriindi mbiyeteendi " Karaŋ Fields " e hitaande 1936 , ndokketeendi duuɓi nay kala yimɓe nayo .
Ɗuum addani haaliyaŋkooɓe Fulɓe wi’de : So jeewo bonii , galle bonii .
Ɗuum fawii ko mbaawka yimɓe e resondirde to weeyo , wondooɓe e won e rafiiji ɓalli , jommbaani ndoŋka jotondirde haa ɓiɓɓe ndañee heen .
Ɗuum firti ko eɗen mbaawi tonngirde ɗee geɗe kala ko limotoo ngam anndude fotde mum , ngam tonngude limoore tuubakooɓe kuutortonoo ko ɗe maantirɗe I , II , III , IV , V , VI
Ɗuum firti ko hoto ɗemɗe ngenndiije ngon , yo ňoƴƴe , yo Farayseere tan won ɗemngal janngirgal , laamorgal .
Ɗuum firti ko waande soklaani ɓuuɓnooji ( climatiseurs ) so wulii , walla wulneede so ɓuuɓol arii , weeyo mum ko hakindiingo tan .
Ɗuum fo e waade noon , e ɗaminaade moƴƴere e gannde kese to bannge heɓindaade yakawere neɗɗo seeraani e yiilaade ko hesɗi , yaama wooda ko yiita ina lomto ndeelam kuɓɓam .
Ɗuum fo e waade noon , hoolaare ina jogaa .
Ɗuum fof e waade noon , eɗen teskoo won ɓure ngoni he winndannde ndee
Ɗuum fof e wayde noon , fedde waynde no Fedde Ɓamtoore Pulaar-Tabital Pulaagu , sabu kanum tan woni fedde Fulɓe Senegaal fof , hayso wonaa Fulɓe ɓee fof nootii e mayre , waawde ko way nii so waɗii , ko haaju leñol ngol kala , nde nodda denndaangal pelle , dente , annduɓe kam e kala yimɓe heɓtinaaɓe he daranaade nafoore leñol ngol ɓe njooɗadoo ɓe njeewta ɓe ɓamda he dow feere wootere , tawa wonaa wiyee maayo waɗii ndiyam tan gooto fof wiya heen puñcaŋ anndaa ko noodi tawata toon , anndaa ko he yiriinde saamata .
Ɗuum fof e wayde noon , he nder lanndaaji ɗiɗi ɗii kala , yimɓe nani heen ɓe njiyanɗe mum ko wonnde leydi ndii ene hatojini he hooreejo sukaajo , sabu Biden 81 , e Trump 77 , ko nayeeɓe ɓe koolnaaki rokkitde golle bayɗeno hooraagu leydi Amerik .
Ɗuum fof noon ko sabu maɓɓe hulnoode miijooji kesi , e yiyannde aduna hesere .
Ɗuum fof tugnii ko e kaawisaaji ɗi Alla diidiri aduna oo .
Ɗuum haɗaani Ibraahiim ene jokki yiilaade kala ko ene weltina jeewo mum o , Saaratu , sabu ko joom-suudu makko mo o renndi nguurndam duuɓi keewɗi .
Ɗuum heɓtii ko Faraysenaajo biyeteeɗo Éric Volery : ko ina wona duuɓi goddol makko ko ko ñawnoo haa o natti waawde haalde , alaa ko haali gollaade .
Ɗuum heɓtii ko Faraysenaajo mo goddol mum ñawnoo haa waɗti foofirde ɓoggi .
Ɗuum ina faamnii , miin mi waawaa wiyde mboɗo itta walla yedda yettoode Jallo , Sellu Daleen Jallo nde .
Ɗuum ina waɗi faayiida heen bannge , sabu so a heliraama kaas walla horde aɗa waawi taftude hono mum , so tawi aɗa jogii tafirde 3D , kono so ndiin mbaadi yaajnaama yoga e isinaaji uddat sabu nattat jarnude ko jeeyatnoo .
Ɗuum jeyaa ko e geɗe ɗe ɓur-mi weltanaade e nguurndam am , so yiyde hankadi sarwisaaji ɗii mbaɗtii waawde huuɓnude soklaaji to bannge ƴiiƴam e loowtugol , hay so tawii noon eɗum waawi ɓeydaade moƴƴineede .
Ɗuum ko jaakre mawnde wonan'de annduɓe weeyo , kono e ɓe kawri e miijo won'de ko yiyoto e lilluɗe ko ko seeɗa , ko heddi ko wirni ko , ko paalal ɓakdi ɓaleeri , ɓakdi ɓaleeri ndi anndanaaka hay huunde , ko ɓuri haawnaade ko paalal ngal ina sowoo laabi 5 haa 10 e ko yiyete ko .
Ɗuum ko jaakre mawnde wonande annduɓe weeyo , kono eɓe kawri e miijo wonde ko yiyotoo e lilluɗe ɗee ko seeɗa , ko heddii ko wirnii koo , ko paalal ɓakdi ɓaleeri , ɓakdi ɓaleeri ndi anndanaaka tawo hay huunde .
Ɗuum ko konngol jaagorgal toppitiingal kisal leydi Moritani , Hamdi Wul Hamdi , nder jaaynde laamuyankoore ñalnde njaslaari ɓennunde nde .
Ɗuum maa wallu neɗɗo suɓaade mbo resondiri haa ɓe mbaawa dañdude sukaaɓe ronaa-rafi en , wonan'de ɓe ngon'daaka dewle ɓe ina mbaawi suɓaade ndiyam celluɗam e ndeer diƴƴe worɓe dokkiraaɗe ina moofta e ndeer booñuuji .
Ɗuum naatni en he daliilu ɗimmo oo : Pinal .
Ɗuum ndeen janngingol majje e nder heblorde ENA ko gootal e daawe hee .
Ɗuum nonn enen ne ko mbasiyoto ɗen banndiraaɓe ɓee woni : Ɓaawo dee Youtube ko paggorngal ngalu , so joom mum fuɗɗima dañde aboneeji keewɗi ene foti reende kanaal mum .
Ɗuum noon en naamndoto koye men , e nder ɗuum .
Ɗuum noon eɗen cabbii juuragol wojere kaaƴe e dow lewru ɗoo e balɗe sappo , ɗuum laato jaɓɓal sinwaaji gadanal e leydi mayru , hol nde afriknaaɓe lomata yolnde kañen ne ?
Ɗuum noon eɗen cooynoo pooye Lilluɗe goɗɗuɗe e nder weeyo tawa ɗe keedaani ɗo cooyniɗen pooye majje ɗo , no ɓiɓɓe naange ni , ɗeɓata waade kono daarorɗe ngoni e weeyo ngo ni , won huutortooɓe ɗum ngam yuurnaade kuule goɗɗuɗe e nder weeyo .
Ɗuum noon eɗen padi ko baagal ngal safani en ummoraade e buuɗal yurmeende so ngal yollaama e ngoo weeyo demba-lommbeengo .
Ɗuum noon eɗen padi ko baagal ngal safani men e humpito heso immaade e tagofeere woɗeere .
Ɗuum noon eɗen toronoo banndiraaɗo men dewbo o e ɓesngu Mali fof moƴƴere .
Ɗuum noon hade yimɓe feran'de weeyo ala e sago ɗeen caɗeele ñawnde , en kaalaani ŋorto-ŋorto renndo e gonndigal , sabu won nde yimɓe njeegomo meeɗi renndineede e suudu faaɗndu udaa toon nganndanaa boowal hay dara , so hiiri walla weeti alaa heen ko ɓe kumpitte , ɗuum waɗnoo ko Moosko laamorgo Riis , ɓe ngoni nder cuurel ngel fotde balɗe 520 , gooto e maɓɓe ɗoyngol mum weñii , waɗti ɗaanaade nde wondiibe mum pini nde , goɗɗo o yoomre ari e mum , tataɓo o ne natti teskaade ko heewi ( hoore mum heli ) .
Ɗuum noon ina jokki haa e laamu makki sal , sabu e laamu PS abdu juuf yahataano mawludaaji e siyaruujj haa yoga e duwawuuji e joga e uddite golle gasɗe golleede , geɗal heen fof ko galle jaagorɗo ɗeen golle o nawata toon tolniiɗo e ɗuum o .
Ɗuum noon ko huunde fotnde reeneede kadi
Ɗuum noon so koorka hawrii e ceeɗu ina woni bannge rewo Leydi , tammpere waɗat sibu ñalawmaaji ɗi njuutat , teeŋti noon so en ngabbiima rewo goɗɗuɗo , kono wonɓe worgo ɓe kam njammbitta njuuteeki ñalawma sibu ina raɓɓiɗi .
Ɗuum waɗi ordinateeruuji gadani keɓɓotonoo ko haɓɓere bituuji 8 ngolla ɗe laawol gootol , jooni eɗen njiya ordinaateeruuji gollirtooɗi haɓɓere nde bituuji 32 , battindiiɗi ɗi ko haɓɓere nde bituuji 64 ngollata laawol gootol , firti ko kanji ɓuri yaawde golle , sabu ko ɗi keɓɓotoo e keɓe ( données ) ko ɓuri heewde .
Ɗuum waɗi wonndiiɓe Ceerno Aliw Bah nawi ray .
Ɗuum waɗi ɗaŋe keewɗe njiytaama ina mbanngoo e naangeeji goɗɗi , won heen ngoni ko e nokku baawɗo huufde nguurndam goɗɗe ngonaani hee , won heen kadi ko paali gaasuuju no ɗaŋre Rojju ( jupiter ) nih .
Ɗuum yalti ko e jokkondiral makko hanki ngal o waɗdi e muritaninaaɓe wonɓe to ngenndiiji Dentuɗi Amerik .
Ɗuum ɗoon tawa ko e nder ngenndi Moritani e Senegaal fof .
Ɗuumɗoo ne kadi , ko to Japon .
Ɗuɗal ngaal ina heewi almuuɓe worɓe e rewɓe .
Ɠiiwoonde adande toɓii ; nana toɓa .
Ƴ .
Ƴaa maa , mor maa .
Ƴaaƴooɓe ɓee ngartii kadi e diŋiral caggal nde won e naalaŋkooɓe ɓenni .
Ƴeew Mammadu Demmba Mammadu Sih tampunooɗo haa lefol ngol feewi , dañaani hay tawtoreede kewu mbaɗnoongu ñalnde 3 ndee to Galle Sukaaɓe Kiiɗɗo tawi rafi oo ena heɓindii mo .
Ƴeewde iwdiiji goɗɗi : mbele won ɗo winndaande ndee saaktaa bannge goɗɗo , njerondiraa iwdiiji ɗii
Ƴeewde wootiɗinde kelmeendi kuutoteendi e jaayɗe ndii .
Ƴeewee jooni nyaaki !
Ƴeewee jooni ñaaki !
Ƴeewee nate ɗe ngam nganndon jerondiral hakkunde Naange e Tagopeeje .
Ƴeewee woto almamaagal wondude laamu ndoneteengu , ɗo ngondu-ɗaa ko ɓiɓɓe tan ndonata baaba mumen
Ƴeewee ɗee binndanɗe mbela oɗon ɓeydoo faamde
Ƴeewee ɗo haa keɓon heen ko laaɓi
Ƴeewen jaabaade ngalɗoo naamndal mbaɗten heen hakkillaaji no feewi mbele eɗen mbaawa faamde no ɗum wonirta .
Ƴeewen jooni no golle Koppolaani ciforii , ko dañi , ko o ronki , hol mo o waawni kalifaandi , mo o ronkani ekn
Ƴeewen jooni noon ɗo jimol ngol joofi e hol maanaa jimol ngol .
Ƴeewen no Alla Toowɗo Oo wiyiri to simoore Iiraafi : Alla wiyi : minen min nelii Nuuhu fayde e leñol mum .
Ƴeewen no kinɗe laamotooɗe Tararsa ( Hasan en e Suwaaya en ) puɗɗorii dartoraade tuubakiri .
Ƴeewen so tawii maa en keɓan koye men jaabowol e naamne men ɗee .
Ƴeewtaade bakkatuuji mum tuubana Alla , siftora neemaaji mum , manta ɗi , o woɗɗitoo kala goofi , o yamira ko moƴƴi o haɗa pankare .
Ƴeewtagol tolno moƴƴere simoŋ o ko suudu mum waɗi , wonɓe toon ɓe ceerataa e ƴeewtindaade tolno simoŋ o to moƴƴere , e forlitde ko ɗeɓi heen bon'de .
Ƴeewtindoɗee ndiyam ɗam njaraten ɗam no foti famɗude , ko dihal nguurndam , ko dihal toɓooji e ilameeje , maaje belɗe e waameeji , ko e kaal dihal ko ɓuri heewde e kulle nguuri , ko kaal dihal yimɓe milyaaruuji jeeɗiɗi ƴoogata njara njarna jawdi mum .
Ƴeewtindoɗee ɗum no way haawnaade !
Ƴellitaagol Aadee e Neɗɗaagu Mum , ko tiitoonde deftere he fannu Fittiyaagal- psychologie- he ɗemngal Pulaar
Ƴellitaare Fooyre Ɓamtaare e kellifaagal mum
Ƴellitaare e Nehdi e Jaŋde ) / www .
Ƴellitaare faggudu wallitii peeñgol dowlaaji juɓɓuɗi .
Ƴellitaare noon aaɓnotaako ɗoon to laaɓal alaa .
Ƴellitde Jaŋde Toownde E Ɗemngal Pulaar/Fulfulde ;
Ƴellitde e yaajnude jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije goɗɗe ɗee , hono pulaar , sooninke e wolof , ɗemɗe potɗe ƴelliteede mbele ine ngontoya paggorɗe ganndal he denndaangal tolnooji jaŋde , ɗemɗe jokkondiral renndo , kaɓirgal golle e njeñtingol geɗe ƴoƴɗe " .
Ƴellitde nehdi/jaŋde mawɓe , potal eddaagu e ɓamtaare .
Ƴellitgol faggudu e renndo e pinal e peewnugol nokkuuji ɗii .
Ƴero geec diwtungo aadaa , anndiraango " ƴero wuubiluuru " : kam woni huunde ɓurnde hulɓinaade e bonde ardoore e wuubiluuru .
Ƴettu heen ɓiɗɗo gooto , nduwo-ɗaa heen haajumaa mbele aɗa ummoo njahaa .
Ƴettude kuulal sariya wonande waɗɗiinde ciftorgol wonande " ndonaandi aadeeri " .
Ƴettude taasiyoŋ mum ko rewondiri
Ƴettugol gollotooɓe e ñaawoore tuugingol e doosɗe teeŋtuɗe kaandugol e kattangol .
Ƴettugol kuule laaɓtuɗe gaaɓnooje ciynugol timmungol lelnannde doosgal kesere ndee , haa ɗum laatoo goonga he nder njuɓɓudi laamu e nder jaayɗe ; Pirgol denndaangal binndaaɗe laamu kam e kaayitaaji etaa siwil he nder ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee fof , tawa yimɓe ine mbaawa totteede ɗum en ; binndugol ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɗee kala he alluuje jamminooje nokkuuji laamu ; Juɓɓingol oorle duumiiɗe mumtugol humambinnaagal he nder ɓesngu hee , he nder ɗemɗe mum en neeniije e/walla nawdugol ɗemɗe keewɗe .
Ƴewee jooni naange , nge mbaawɗen yiyde gah e Leydi , wonnge to ngoɗɗeki potki 150 milioŋ , siino takkinooma e men no fotata ?
Ƴiiwoole , kaanabbe , cumuuji , yoorooji Musibbaaji weeyo kaaɗtudi , ndeggondirii e hitaande 2021 ndee , bonnuɗi ko heewi .
Ƴiiwoole ɓurɗe bonde he daartol DDA : Ko kewi to DDA hikka koo , wayi ko no darnga nii .
Ƴiiwoonde moolanaande toɓii ñalnde alarba 12 lewru juko 2015 e wuro Maraysa to tunndo Ligisayba Gorgol haa waɗi batte muusɗe .
Ƴiwel am e ƴiiwoole .
Ƴiyeeje mawɗe , won heen ƴi'al korlal majje tan ina ɓura neɗɗo .
Ƴoogaa ko e RFI
Ƴoogaa ko he " kesi Anicet Mbida "
Ƴoƴre ko peeje ngam ɓurde wellitaade e feewnitaade , so oɗon teskii rawane e nder lewru Siilo ( janvier ) ñalnde 28 e mayru gorko baawɗo cokki ina wiyee Gari Kasparoof hawaama e cokki biyeteeɗi Go , alaa ko hawi mbo so wonaa masiŋ !
Ƴoƴre tafaande ( IA )
Ƴoƴre to boowal Ngaawe ( Leydi ) .
Ƴoƴre ñemmbaande , nguurndam njuutɗam walla firtaare yaawnde .
Ƴoƴre ñemmbaande ko hakkille loowaaɗo e masiŋ ngam o waawa gollaade e fewjude ɗo neɗɗo tawaaka , mbela en potaani hulde ndeen ƴoƴre ?
Ƴuundi nder weeyo
ƴeewde ko wonaa tan onndooji sulɗe-yiiteeji , haa teeŋti noon e geɗe keewɗe goɗɗe
ƴellitaade .
ƴellitde ɗum , haysinno wonaa ɗuum tan addanta ɗemngal ƴellitaade .
ƴettaani lekki mum nde fotnoo ƴettude ndee tan , ɗuum ina waawi bonde e cellal
ƴettude juuɗe mum en , ina mema mo , ina mooma e jeese mum en , caggal ɗuum laamɗo
ƴettude safaara maɓɓe ko taƴondiraani ( ina hasii wona wakuuji 8 fof ) .

ƴiiwoonde malu toɓanii en
ƴiiwoonde malu toɓanii en , beeli ɓamtaare cariima .

ɓadtii dingiral ngal .
ɓadtiima powle geec , bempeƴƴe ɗee ɓadtondirat , njaweendi majje ustoo , ɗe ɓeydoo
ɓalal yiiloto ko damal , ala fof ko nawdi demngal arab e lislaam so wona
ɓalndu mum no moƴƴi ;
ɓammi lohi am ɓoornii , mi .
ɓamtude pinal Muritaninaaɓe haa teeŋti e ngal fulɓe ;
ɓamtugol janngingol ɗemɗe ngenndiije naatnanooɗe he jaŋde he hitaande 1979 , dartinaa he hitaande 1999 , fawaade he hujja luulndiiɗo njeñtudi denndaangal ɓetooji baɗanooɗi ; janngingol , he nder duɗe gaggaaji , ɗemɗe ngenndiije ɓole ; naatnugol jarriborde he ɗemɗe pulaar , sooninke e wolof he nder denndaangal ɓetooji ( eksameeji ) e kawgelaaji ( concours ) jaŋde huuɓtodinnde e jaŋde mecce ; Udditgol doge jaŋde pulaar , sooninke e wolof nder janngirɗe heblo ( ENI , ENS , ENAJM ) ekn .
ɓe koye maɓɓe e yeeso ɓeen , ummoriinde ɓe e piggal Beni Hasaan en piynoo ɓe e
ɓe mbeddirto-maa kono kurjuru
ɓe mbi'a nooma bone ficcat laaci ɓe nani kono heewɓe heen nde wonnoo ko fuuntaaɓe kedaa e Hakkillaaji mun , gila hanki taw hannde araani ɓe njaɓaani .
ɓe mbiyi kadi aduna ko garal ngal alaa ruttaade , ko nguurdam ɗam alaa maayde sibu Maayde , ko haala tan kono alaa jahoowo .
ɓe mbiyimo holno ɗuum wonirta o wiyɓe meɗa anndi kay tee ko kaalnatmi on koo onon suhaaɓe am kala e mon keɗiiɗomi , faami ko jiɗmi haalde koo , waɗino mbiyrumi ɗumnii , heɓataa dewle ɗiɗi saha haa tati 3 taw saabii ɗum tan ko ceergal .
ɓe mbiynoo koɓe tampii ɓe kaastii hadafi , kono jooni ɓe njeewniimo haɓe njiyloo hono makko gila hanki haa hannde ɓe njiytaani ɓe keɓaani
ɓe ngoni toon , Ɓe ɓooyii toon yirlaade haɓe ndaara no yimɓe ɓee ndemirta , to mbaalata , e hol no nguurdi toon e ndee ladde Ekn .
ɓe tawii ɗuum ina waɗi caɗeele , teeŋti e tonngude limooje keewɗe , ɓe ngoppi , ɓe ɓami ɗe aarabeeɓe peŋtani koye mumen ina kuutoroo , , ɗeen ngoni ɗe 0 , 1 , 2 , 3 .
ɓee ngami , ndippi , ciiki haa korhorti , kono kaastaani Gise en ena
ɓee njuula hannde , ɓeya njuula janngo !
ɓeen .
ɓeen yiɗnooɓe hadafi woppa laamu yaha , ɓeen wiynooɓe , caɗeele libi fof ko hadafi , so o yehii fof maa rew laawol , so o yehii fof maa feew , fof maa feewne , caɗeele libinaaɓe fof maa cafre , ñawɗo fof maa sellu , baasɗo heen fof maa alɗu .
ɓennungu nguu , Jubo Leyti Kah , yeewtidii e maɓɓe baɗte caɗeele ngaynaaka
ɓernde amkko , walla ko muusata mo wonde hakkunde laawol , ngol ena ummii
ɓernde jeeɓtoore , muuseeki reedu doolnuki , tuƴƴam kine e ɗakkudi walla nguru .
ɓerɗe peefa , ndimaagu lotta , añɓe otta !
ɓesngu senegaal ina mniyamo , lannda moo waɗi o , yoo jogono ɗum-pellital e muñal e cuusal timmungal .
ɓesngu ɗeen leyɗeele kala ngonndi ko e laamɓe mum'en dariiɓe ena
ɓeydugol kuutoragol jaaɓnirɗe e ekkinirɗe kese ngam wallitde jaŋde/jannginirgol ɗemɗe koɗe .
ɓeŋngu haa Alla itti mo e gure teeru , o artiri galle oo e Fuuta .
ɓii pullo wontaa wiy holko ɓe mbiy sabu golle mon e pulaar on njaraama yo alla sellin doole
ɓiyɓe Afrik kuwtortoo ngam kumtondiral haajuuji ñalnde kala
ɓiyɓe Fuutaŋkooɓe nde paarnortoo pine mum'en .
ɓiyɓe diiwaan o .
ɓiɗtaaɓe , lorlaaɓe ( maccuɓe e ko heewi e Baadoolo en ) keeranii " Tubanan " e wondiiɓe mum en ( hono seernaaɓe ɓe Naseer Eddiin woni tiitoonde mum en ) ;
ɓiɗɗo o wiymo baaba enen eɗen njogii weenndu galle men to looti ɗen picine .
ɓoornaade comci timmuɗi , tawa ina sudda cammeeje juuɗe ,
ɓooyataa huɗo fuɗat .
ɓooyii hoyɗude ɗum , hannde arii haa yettii ɗo men ɗoo sabu ko e yontere
ɓornaade comci jaajɗi naatnooji henndu ko ɓuri yiɗeede
ɓurde bonde .
ɓure maa limotaako , a yaynaniima binnde .
ɓuri heewde to naange ko gaas ndiyameejo ( gaas hidoroseen ) .
ɓuri jaalɗinde nde .
ɓuri nanngude hannde e nder diiwaan
ɓuri yaajde toon .
ɓurtunde ngondu-ɗen hannde sabu huccitude e mooɗon ɗoo e
ɓurtunde ngondu-ɗen hannde sabu huccitude e mooɗon ɗoo e lowre men nde
ɓuuɓnde ndee yeeɓaani firigoo walla koysilateer !
ɗe .
ɗe caraaki no feewi e enternet .
ɗee gootal heen kala ene janngee kadi ene huwtoree he nokku ɗo
ɗeen dokke mbaawata tottireede e papparli guretan ko fawaade e no siforaa e nder palaŋuuji ɗeen gure tawa ko Ministeer toppitiiɗo wuraagu ƴettata aretee , toɗɗoo tolno goɗɗondiral mum e gure ɗee .
ɗeen limooje ɗe cellaani si ɓooyii ko ɗeen ngontata goonga ( fenaande wonta goonga ) ɗeen limooje ustooje keeweedni fulɓe na waɗa yimɓe tina ustaare natta hoolaade ko e maɓɓe tawa ɗum fawaaki e goonga .
ɗeen ngoni nde lewru heedi en e naange , e nde ndu woni caggal men ,
ɗemngal Beni Hasaan en .
ɗemngal ene keewi he ndiin leydi .
ɗemngal men naati e nder ( Unicode ) ndawko moƴƴi , kono enenne eɗen poti jogaade Unicode .
ɗemnngal men kaalen mbin-nden mbittenn jaŋngen njaŋngi nen leñol men ɓamten .
ɗemɗe , kono wonaa kamɗe ɗee fof ngoni jaajɗe , cariiɗe he nder
ɗemɗe Afrik ɗe gootal e mum en kala ene tawee he ko ene wona
ɗemɗe Afriknaaje .
ɗemɗe ceertuɗe ene keewi heen , kono ko ɗemngal Swahili/Kiswahili
ɗemɗe pulaar e sooninke wolof ine ngartiree e tippudi nehdi e jaŋde hee ;
ɗi mumtee no ardiiɓe Irak momtirnoo ɓaleeɓe e Kurde en iraknaaɓe .
ɗi ngaameela wiyata ena foola mi , mi saloo dawde gese !
ɗiin nokkuuji .
ɗimmere ndee ko laataade jarlitaniiɗo leydi mum , diiwaan mum , wuro haa e nokku mo wuuri oo .
ɗiɗi ko mbeewa
ɗo Niinawa ɗoo ko dumunna juutɗo ina waajoo ina yamira ko moƴƴi ina haɗa ko
ɗo damal jippunde setooji koɗi ɗii , ngam nawde wanngoytooɓe .
ɗo loritaaka e toɓooji .
ɗo neɗɗo jamminaa nokku ronki yiitude , tawa no jamminiraa nih ina ŋakki , walla o waasa faamde , Ngam wallude aadee e yiitude nokkuuji e dow Leydi , annduɓe koddirii diidi e dow mayri , paliiɗi ( fuɗnaange fay hirnaange ) e coortiiɗi ( rewo fay worgo ) ; waɗiɓe waɗde noon , so tawii en njiɗi anndude nokku ɗo heedi , en ƴeewat hol diidi dewɗi ɗoon , mbiyen , wuro walla nokku maani o , woni ko taƴondiral coortol nanngam e palol nanngam , ( ƴeewee natal ) Coortol gadanol ( fuɗɗoode ) ngol rewi ko wuro ina wiye Greenwich to Angalateer , umaade e maggol faade fuɗnaange ko ( + ) haa 180° , so a roondiima hirnaange ko ( - ) .
ɗo ɓural maggol woniri .
ɗo ɗemngal ɓetetee ko ɗoom jooma maagal en ne kiisetee .
ɗoo , mbiy-ɗen ko hay jamma maa ɗee ɗalduɗe keɓɓo semmbe naange .
ɗoo duwaaw wonan'de kala goongɗinɗo ngoon senngo nde waɗata ɗum ko adii
ɗoo ne ko taaɓal kesal e dow geese , tiɗno ɗee ko yeeso tan fayaa darnde alaa joɗnde alanaa gen gujjo , hannde ɗemngal pulaar yahraani caggal haa teeŋti to bannge geese sabu lowe men ɗee fof ko paayodinɗe ko sooynaa ina ara koo woto woppu en caggal
ɗoon ko dule Baydi Juumo .
ɗowde koolkisagol jaŋde ɗemɗe ngenndiije e heblude kuuɓtodingol mum en ;
ɗowtaade e dow peewal ko aldaa e goofol Alla .
ɗum ( so wonaa Tuunus mo Burgibaa ) .
ɗum , ena woni e laddeeji gila heɓaani duuɓi sappo !
ɗum , moɗi ɗum , refit heen , Yuunus ummii darii e koyɗe mum nder reedu liingu
ɗum .
ɗum ko manoore fulɓe
ɗum leyɗeele sappo ( 10 ) ni ko ɗemɗe ɗiɗi tan ndañaten , woni
ɗum noon kodda fulɓe ine toranoo leñol ngol , sibu ustaare nde ko denndaangal fulɓe njahra neene o .
ɗum ooɗoo gorko .
ɗum'en .
ɗuum firti ko 2x2x2x2x2x2x2x2 = 256
ɗuum fof e wayde noon njiɗen wiyde ko hannde neɗɗo ena waawi yeeɓde , walla ndaarde tele nde weli ɗum fof , ene weldi ɗum fof taw koy Telfoŋ mun Adroid .
ɗuum noon firti ko o hoyat no feewi , yahdu makko e diwe makko wayloto no feewi , yanti heen ala-e-sago o ɓoornoo ɓoornanteeri mbaawndi reenan'de mbo terɗe makko e ciiñsiiñƴe naange lorlooje , ndi reena kadi henndu dummbaabdu e nder heen ngam tamde ɓanndu neɗɗo haɗa ɗum fusde , sabu ɓanndu ndu so yiyii boowal tan ko maayde yaawnde rewata heen , hay so guddel tokosel waɗi e ɓoornanteeri ndi so sukkaaka ko yaawi joomum maayat , ɗuum noon wonan'de gonɗo toon ina liggo ala-e-sago jogoo gasirɗe e kaɓirɗe goɗɗe reentoo yulde walla seekde ɓooranteeri mum , yanti heen so neɗɗo yani ina waawi helde e caɗeele goɗɗe baaɗe noon .
’ Yah winndan mo deftere [ daartol ] tuggude gila nde Allah tagi Aadama haa yettii yonta ngonɗen hannde oo " .
